40001001	Wambota atamba bafapana akupana Jisas Kraisi amamba. Jisas nataga wambota Deviti, Devit nataga wambota atamba Abrahami.
40001002	Bafas ihas wambota atamba Abrahami isimba. Nogama Abrahami Aisak. Nogama Aisaki Jekop. Ea' Jekop ahama Judai naloma sahopana owapana ananimi.
40001003	Juda ahama Peres naloma Sira. Ma'mam amamu'wi Tamar. Ea' Peres ahama Hesroni, ea' Hesron ahama Rami.
40001004	Ram nogamana agilinama Aminadap. Ea' nogamana Aminadapi Nason. Ea' nogama Nasoni Salmon.
40001005	Ea' Salmon nogamana agilinama Boas. Boas ma'mana Rehap. Boas nogamana agilinama Obet. Obet ma'mana Rut, ea' Obet nogamana agilinama Jesi.
40001006	Ea' Jesi anen ahama dembinai king Deviti. Devit naso' ano'w nemata'w fowa' Uria nagaso'akwi nola king Solomon.
40001007	Ea' Solomon nogamana agilinama Rehoboam, ea' Rehoboam nola Abiyah. Ea' nogamana Abiyah agilinama Aser.
40001008	Aser anen ahama Jehosafati, nola Joram. Ea' Joram ahama Usia.
40001009	Ea' Usia nola Jotam, Jotam nola Ehas ahama Hesekaiai.
40001010	Hesekaia nogamana agilinama Manase, ea' Manase nola Amos. Amos ahama Josaiai.
40001011	Ea' Josaia nola Jekonia naloma owapana ananimi maloma ahamam ma'mam safe' sanda' kalabus sapani wambel Babilon lauguni.
40001012	Esis sofa'as sawasi'as sisihis sapani Babilon, Jekonia nogamana ananinai agilinama Sealtiel, ea' Sealtiel nola Jerubal.
40001013	Jerubal anen ahama Abiuti ea' Abiut nola Eliakim. Nogamana ananinai agilinama Asor.
40001014	Asor nogamana agilinama Sadok, ea' Sadok ahama Akimi. Akim nola Eliut.
40001015	Ea' Eliut nogamana agilinama Eleasar, ea' Eleasar ahama Matanii. Ea' Matani nola Jekop ahama Josepi.
40001016	Josep anamba nagaso' Mariai. Ea' Maria dei' kola Jisas, dei' esis saga'i anen Krais Dembinai God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
40001017	Amom bafapana akupana Jisasi fowa'imi siambam magataga na'amba. Amom amamba Abraham nolam magi' magatagai mafi'i matagama Devit, amamba siambam mataga 14-pelaim. Ea' amom amamba Devit nolam magi' magatagai mafi'i matagama nemaf afamba bousi sofa' esis Israel safe' sanda' kalabus sagape wambel Babiloni, amamba wapani 14-pelaim. Ea' amom amamba esis Israel sanda' kalabus Babilon solam magi' magatagai mafi'i a' matagama nogota Krais nagataga, amamba wapani 14-pelaim. Siambam sagakolasom a' mataga hiami 42-pelaim.
40001018	Fowa' Maria kogola Jisas Krais basef fagape na'amba. Ma'mana Maria esis sa'i ako'w koso' Josep, ea' esis bias ina dei' sandaso'ama, ata' owa'atin. Ea' sati Maria akofa' opafa Ambal bu'unai Godi nafi'mai ako'w ea' dei' a' opafu'w.
40001019	Waulunama'w akwo'unai Josep anen aman bu'unai. Anen nandaiwa'ma nonda'akw ambal aol. Na'amba okom ma'i nondambaho' nili'amona'w kope dowaf.
40001020	Anen nape ata' okom mandanda'ma isimba atis, ea' na'oh nandondo'ah owa', anona ensel Dembinaii natagama anen na'ipana na'i, “Josep, ina' akunama Deviti, ina ombal mehenama negao'wa waulu'mina ine'ikwi Maria, owa'i. Dei' main, awani inimba nagapau'wi, Ambal bu'unai Godi nafi'mai ako'w.
40001021	Ea' atiasi a' kola awani aman, awani inimba anen nogatopalopa amam nematawa hiasi ma nogakwaha waf awafi asasifi nofa'as sogotanimaii. Na'amba dei' ina' nihapomana agol ananigili Jisas. Basef kofagefa ma agol agalemba ifimba fa'i, anen aman nogofa' epes ananisii ma sogape andeande'i.
40001022	Hiahaom amamba hiami mataga na'amba si'i anif basef Dembinai nagaso'anaef malogol anona aman profet fowa'inai, dei' afataga endilisi. Fowa' gani profet anamba naga'ias na'amba na'i,
40001023	‘Owagama ano'w nemata'w sa'ukwi owa' ota' kogaso' amania a' opafu'w. Ea' kola anin awani aman agol ananigili Emanuel. Agol agalemba kofagogola ga'ias na'amba ga'i, God nape naloma apa'.
40001024	-
40001025	Ea' Josep na'oh nandambema a' nanda'as si'i ensel naga'ipana. Ea' naila basef ifimba nao'wakw apa' esis ina sandaso'ama atogon atin, owa'. Ata' sape daindai safe' ma ako'w a' kogola awani aman. Ea' nahapomana agol Jisas.
40002001	Maria kola Jisas Betlehem, itap lu'upa agilipa Judia. Nogota atamba Maria kogola Jisas, anona aman dembinai king Herot nape nugumafi walemb hielimbi esis Judai. Ako'w kolana ea', anom amam dembami gawaimi owa' mogogawa Godia mafi'i lauguni gani awin nagatafima a' mafi'i mafi'i mataga lu'wambili Jerusalem ea' ma'i,
40002002	“Dei' awani Dambaini nagataga king dembinai esis Judai nape ani? Afa' wati ondo'w anani'wi kwatafi kwape gani awin nagatafima, ea' dei' waila'w wafi'i wa'i onda' lotumana ofela agol ananigili.”
40002003	Afamba Dembinai King Herot name' basef ifimba, okom iwanim malamafe'ma atiasi awani inimba netaga damben a' nili'amona anen. Ea' esis hiasi sagape Jerusalami wapani a' ombal mahas sa'i atiasi nemaf awafi a' fetaga.
40002004	Ea' king Herot nakolasai amom pris hiami dembami maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ea' nahali'am na'i, “Aman anamba Krais God nandandepana nosapa'ana nogafi'ii, atiasi anen notaga wambel anima?”
40002005	Ea' amom magwamana basef ma'i, “Ma'mana kolana Betlehem, itap lu'upa Judia. Dei' main, anona profet fowa'inai naga'i basef na'i,
40002006	‘Ipa' Betlehem itap lu'upa Judia, ipa' ina epes falafipai, owa'atin. Ipa' ina pape pagi' ma amom gavman dembami mugumafi ipa' Judiai, owa'. Dei' main, anona Dembinai anaf a' notaga wambel ipe'imbili sa'umbili Betlehem. Anen anaf a' nogape dembinai ma ipa' amam nematawa ae'ipai Israel ea' numafi ipa' hipai ma pegape andeande'.’”
40002007	Ea' king Herot nandambaho' atin nofalai amom gawaimi amamba magafi'i awin nagatafimai mandambaho' mandakolas nahali'am na'i, “Nemaf maif ipa' pati ondo'w akwamba kwataga?”
40002008	Ea' amom ma'ipana ma ea', nasapa'am a' mafe' Betlehem na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' fo'o pelapelaoma awani inimba. Ama pitilin, pitanima pefa'ai basef pifi'i pi'ipa ae' wapani. Ae' a'i efe' itilin enda' lotuman efela agol ananigili wapani.”
40002009	Amom mame' basef ananifi ea', mosafel makwaha anen a' mafe', mati ondo'w akwamba sa'ukwi fowa' mali' magatolo'w gani awin nagatafimai, a' kwafe' kwali'a amom. Ea' kwape atapi'w ipat atamba ilif awani inimba Jisas nagapautai.
40002010	Amom mati ondo'w akwamba kwape ipat atamba ea' sonaham a'owa'.
40002011	Ea' mawis ipat atamba awani inimba naloma ma'man Maria sagapautai. Amom mati awani inimba mindiwa nembawa motawa manda' lotuman mafela agol ananigili. Ama main, mupalia paus amamisi magiai hiahawes amom magatalis otamba lu'umbaisi alogw fasifasigwi gwagasi maso'anas. Ea' maso'ana gol naloma anin paura sa'i frankinsens, alogw fasigwi gwagani saloma anin sanda bu'wani sofalan saga'i meri, maso'anas awani inimba Jisas.
40002012	Maso'anas ea', God na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina ata' pitanima pefe'ma King Herot, owa'i. Ea' pila ano'w ufia'w pitanima pefe' wambel ipe'imbili.” Ea' maila ano'w ufia'w daia'w motanima mafe' wambel amamimbili lauguni.
40002013	Amom amamba gawaimi mafe', Josep na'oh owa', nandondo'ah anona ensel Dembinaii nafi'mai anen na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel a' ne'wa awani inimba neloma ma'mana anani'wi pefe' anambel wambel lauguni itap lu'upa Isip. Ea' pipani Isip ama anaf peme' ae' i'ipipa wapani dao', pifi'i. Dei' main, dembinai King Herot atiasi ni'ipa soldia ananimi mola' molaoma awani inimba ma mohan negaga'.”
40002014	Ea' Josep nosafel owamb ambamba atomb nao'wa awani naloma ma'mana Maria asafe' Isip lauguni.
40002015	Josep napani Isip ama King Herot naga' ea' nao'was sotanimai si'i anif basef Dembinai God naga'if malogol anona aman profeti ifimba dei' a' fataga fandawalap fa'i, God na'i, “Nogame ae'anai napani Isip ea' ae' efalana a' notanima nafi'i.”
40002016	King Herot a' nogawa amom amamba gawaimi ina mutanimai ma'ipana, owa'. Mambaso'mana mafe' ano'w ufia'w daia'w. Ea' nembel ananinai a' wandafuna kwapete' na'i noha Jisas noga'. Dei' anen okom mandanda'ma basef ifimba amom gawaimi mali' maga'ipanaefi ma nemaf afamba ondo'w kwagatagaefi. Na'amba dei' nasapa' anom soldia mafe' Betlehema walemb ambalemba bagape felefele'i maha awasi amam hiami dei' sogalam dambaimi mafe' motaga afagof biagof fagalo'ami maga' hi'alam.
40002017	Ea' dei' anif basef fowa' God naga'ipanaef profet Jeremaiai afataga endilisi fandawalap.
40002018	Anen na'i, “Esis sagape anambel wambel Ramai same' analemb amalemb. Esis salef sindiwagef mehipa saga'i uwahipigama awasi sagaga'i. Ano'w nemata'w Resel kwalopa batawisa'w akwa'usi, ina atiasi anis amam nematawa la'ifisa sonda' nembel akwo'umbili begape awanembel, owa'atin. Dei' main, awasi akwa'usi asaga' hi'alas.”
40002019	Josep ata' napani Isip ama King Herot naga', ensel Dembinai Godi nafe' na'ipana ma koh dondo'ah ananini
40002020	na'i, “Ina' safel a ne'wa awani neloma ma'mana anani'wi a pitanima pefe' itap lu'upa Israel. Amom ma'i mogaha awani nogaga'i a' maga' ea'.”
40002021	Ea' Josep nosafel nao'wa awani naloma ma'mana anani'wi asafe' itap lu'upa Israel.
40002022	Apa' Josep name' basefa anona aman Arkelaus king Herot nogamana nataga nofa' wambel naha'ofana nape dembinai king esis Judai. Ea' Josep ombal mahana ma nogafe' Judia. Owa' na'oh nandondo'ah wapani, God na'ipana ma nogafe' anamba itap lu'upa Galili.
40002023	Ea' nafe' nape anin taun sa'uni sofalagon Nasaret si'i anif basef amom profet fowa' maga'iefi ma'i, “Owagama esis sofalana si'i Nasaretinai.” Basef ifimba dei' fataga fandawalap endilisi.
40003001	Nimaguf hiafi ma nogota atamba anona aman Jon nagapisi'as embeli nafi'i nape anep itap lu'upa Judia wafigima fataupigima ea' nawalapa basef fasifi.
40003002	Anen na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Nemaf afamba bu'wafi ea' felefele' fegataga ma epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Na'amba dei' ipa' pendewa' alafugaha waf awafi pembema nelelemb pefe'ma God.”
40003003	Ea' Jon nafe' na'ipasa basef ifimba God naga'ipanafi si'i malogol anona amani profet Aisaia fowa' naga'iefi na'i, “Anaf malogol anona amani noga ni'i anep itap wafigima fataupigima ni'i basef na'amba ni'i, ‘Pendomba ufia'w Dembinai. Pisindi'amona ufiawa ananiwai.’”
40003004	Klos Jon nagalami sanda' auf anom mafis lu'wami kameli sanda'am, ea' nowaho' anota let sanda' agwahup mafisina sanda'anai. Gwa'aisi ananisi na' gwamu'wis saloma aupimbel alupumi.
40003005	Nogota atamba amam nematawa sagape Jerusalami saloma hiasi sagape itap lu'wipai Judia ea' walemb ambalemba felefele'ma walemb Jordani, hiasi safi'mai Jona nogapisi'as embel.
40003006	Ea' esis sawalapa waf awafi esis sanda'afi ea' Jon napisi'as walemb Jordan.
40003007	Afamba Jon nati anom amam dembami esis Judai Farisi maloma anom dembami Sadyusi mafi'i ma mogofa' baptais, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' panda' waf awafii si'i batawis ul aunaii. Ami na'ipipa ma pa'i pefa' pefe' okom wandafunai Godi anaf nogatagama ipe'i?”
40003008	Anen na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' pembema nelelemb pewa' alafugaha waf awafi ipe'ifi, ea' penda' waf fasifi ma pigihimba'mas ipa' a' pambema opalef endilisi paila waf bu'wafi.
40003009	Ipa' ina a' ukup pendanda' pi'i, ‘Abraham anen ahamapa ape'inai’, owa'i. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, God anen la'ifinai ma nonda' otamba atemba begataga epes si'i awasi Abrahami.
40003010	Tamia'w ea' kwape lawah kofagogaha. Lawah mamahogaha owa' hil hogola sa'utip bu'wapia, atiasi solagah sotopa'agah hefe'ma nif.”
40003011	Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pewa' alafugaha waf awafi dei' ae' apisi'ipa embela pigihimba'mas ipa' a' pambema nelelemb pakwaha waf awafi a pefe'ma God. Apa' anona aman atiasi nigi' nugafi'ii, anen banagonai nikila' ae'. Anef nemaf anen nese'epa Ambal bu'unai Godi nogape opalef ipe'ilifi nomon ea' nese'epa nif wapani. Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma egatagwaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'.
40003012	Anen nahapila anol savol lagof ananigufi ma nigasimba' wit si'i rais amamba andeande'. Ama nofa' bu'unai nuwis nembe'ana ipat ananitai. Apa' du'wa'wanimi awasimi nembeham nofam nif amamba lu'wami fandom atapim magapani.”
40003013	Nogota atamba Jisas anakwaha itap lu'upa Galili a' nafi'i walemb Jordan, ea' nafi'mai Jon ama nogapisi'ana.
40003014	Owa' Jon na'i nosopama Jisas nai'pana na'i, “Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma igapisi'ina, owa'. Ina' nipisi' ae' dao', andeande'. Dei' ina' nafi'mai ae' ma main?”
40003015	Owa' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' nenda'meas si'i ae' aga'ipina. Afa' biafa onda'as na'amba ma ondahama waf hiafi usi'ifi, si'i God naga'iefi.” Ea' Jon na'i aho' napisi'ana.
40003016	Jisas nofa' baptais nakwaha embel nandagiai atin, owa', heven a' nandawisi' ma anen, ea' nati Ambal bu'unai Godi nafi'mai anen, si'i amil alamba apa' maga'i ma'unai nufia' nisila'mai anen.
40003017	Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai heven ga'i anif basef ga'i, “Aman anamba Nogame ae'anai endilisi. Ae' okom mohafel maimailana a'owa'. Okom ae'ami bo'oma anen.”
40004001	Ambal bu'unai Godi nofa' Jisas nafe' anep itap wafigima fataupigima ma aman aunai Satan nogwambana nonda' waf awafi.
40004002	Jisas nape awin si'ini du'wanini, ina na' gwa'aisi, owa'. Nolomahana nape dowaf.
40004003	Ea' aman anamba Satan nagagwambanai nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Ina' na'i ina' Nogamana Godi, dei' kipa otamba ambamba baga'oh itapi betaga si'i bret.”
40004004	Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'ipa Satan, na'i, “Baibel na'i, apa' ina ukup pepoma gwa'aisi atis sonda'apa banagepa, owa'. Apa' ukup pendapoma basef Godi atif fenda'apa mogape banagipai.”
40004005	Ea' Satan nao'wana nafe' Jerusalem nahaponana nalutu ipat Godi lu'unai ilif.
40004006	Ea' Satan na'ipana na'i, “Ina' na'i ina' God Nogamana, dei' nindipa' newa itap. Dei' main, basef fagail Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘God atiasi a' ni'ipa ensel ananimi mifi'i muhapilina mumafina ma otamba ina beha bo'wagah ine'igahi, owa'.’”
40004007	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Anif basef Godi wapani fagape fa'i, ‘Ipa' ina a' pegwamba Dembinai God ipe'inai nonda' waf awafi, owa'.’”
40004008	Ea' Satan nao'wana mafe' wapani malota anona halafuta launai a' nihimba'mana hiahaom hiami bu'wami magape itap hiagomai maloma amam nematawa hiasi.
40004009	Ea' na'ipa Jisas na'i, “I'i ina' nindiwa nembawa netawa ni'i ae' dembiwai ine'iwai, atiasi a' ese'ena hiahaom amamba bu'wami mefe'ma ina' hi'ilam ea' ine'imi si'im.”
40004010	Owa' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Satan ina' kwaho ae', a fo'o. Baibel naga'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Ipa' penda' lotuma Dembinai God atona ipe'inai ea' penda' maola anen atona.’”
40004011	Ea' Satan nakwahona nafe', dei' ensel Godi mafi'i matopalopa Jisas mumafiana.
40004012	Jisas name' basefa Jon nanda' kalabus, ea' nosafel nakwaha Nasaret nafe' itap lu'upa Galili.
40004013	Ea' nakwaha wambel ananimbili nafe' Kaperneam, bagape felefele'ma dumb lu'wambi Galili, anep itap agilipa Sebulun naloma Naptali.
40004014	Ea' nafe' nape itap apamba si'i basef fowa' anona profet Aisaia naga'iefi, a fataga fandawalap endilisi. Anen nanda' basef ifimba na'i, God na'i,
40004015	“Itap apamba Sebuluni Naptalii felefele'ma Itap apamba ufia'w kwafe' kwagataga naohi. Itap apamba walemb Jordan fisanamb, walemb hielimbi agol lu'wagili Galili. Esis walemb hielimbi ambalemba ina sogawa basef ae'afi, owa'.
40004016	Ea' sape si'i epes isimba sagape akot atonai, si'i sagaga'i. Owagama gani sigati owaf lu'wafi figaluwi sotologon andeande'.”
40004017	Ea' dei' Jisas nasefela maola naga'ipasa basef atapif. Nawalipasa basef ifimba na'i, “Nemaf afamba bu'wafi felefele' fegataga ma ipa' pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa. Na'amba dei' ipa' pembema nelelemb pefe'ma God pewa' alafugaha waf awafi.”
40004018	Jisas naila akata nafe' atin dumb lu'wambi Galili, nati amam biam Saimon agol wa'agol Pita naloma owamana Andru. Amom mala anembeh mowafa agof manda' bisnis.
40004019	Anen nati amom biam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pifi'i pihapifa ae' pili pefe'. Fowa' ipa' pewafa agof, apa' dei' ihimba'mepa pefe' pi'ipai anis epes sufi'i sila ae'.”
40004020	Ea' amam mame'ana mosafel kwafalis makwaha anembeh ha'oh mailana mafe'.
40004021	Ea' Jisas na'i nindiki'ah nafo'o kwasakwasala owa' nati anom amam biam wapani Jems naloma owamana Jon maloma ahamam amamunai Sebedi. Amom matoma bot mape mosambala anembeh amamimbihi. Ea' Jisas nofala amom biam Jemsi Jon.
40004022	Ea' mosafel kwafalis makwaha bot mafi'i maila Jisas mafe'. Ahamam amamunai Sebedi makwahona nape bot.
40004023	Jisas nafe' itap lu'upa Galili, nafe' na'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi amam nematawa hiasi nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi. Basef bu'wafi anen naga'ipasafi ifimba fa'i, “Nemaf afamba bu'wafi afafi'i fafi'mai apa'. Ama ipa' hipai pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa.” Ea' natopalopa epes hiasi aowas naninani nanda'asi sataga bo'wes wapani. Aowas maina naninani nanda'asi, Jisas la'ifina nanda'as sataga bo'wes.
40004024	Basef Jisasi fesafel fafe'agon walemb anamba hiagoma agol Siria ma nagatopalopa aowas nanda'asi hiasi sagataga bo'wes. Ea' esis Siria wapani sofa'ai hiasi aowas naninani nanda'asi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas. Anis ambagof awami manda'as a sahaga sagagauli, anis ambagof awami mahas maofas nif, anis same' alop akep pagahasapi, esis asofa'as safi'mai Jisas nanda'as sataga bo'wes hi'alas.
40004025	Na'amba amam nematawa hiasi sagi'mana safe'. Anis sape itap apamba Galili saloma anis sagape walemb ambalemba ilifunamailimb Dekapolis saloma anis sagape Jerusalami, anis sagape itap lu'upa Judiai, saloma anis epes sagape walemb Jordan fisanambi esis hiasi sagi'mana safe'.
40005001	Jisas nati esis amam nematawa hiasi ea' nandowasa' halafuta a' nape. Ea' alipumi ananimi mafi'i mandakolas malomana.
40005002	Ea' anen a' nosafela basef ifimba laufi nawalipamef.
40005003	Anen na'i, “Ipa' mamahipama pegawa ea' ipa' atipa owa' la'ifipama penda' maol bu'wani Godia, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, ipa' pawis ea' nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa.
40005004	“Ea' ipa' mamahipama kilef pagapani, ipa' dei' dao' apandagala. Dei' main, God atiasi nonda' nelelemb ipe'ilimbi ambepe bo'walemb.
40005005	“Ea' ipa' mamahipama pagape sa'ombel lafela anisi, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, ipa' atiasi a' pefa' hiahaom bu'wami God na'i endilisi ma nogasi'ipami.
40005006	“Ea' ipa' mamahipama ukup pehafel pagapaga'i waf usi'ifii, si'i nolomagahasa gwa'aisi iap pagaso'asa embeli, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main? Atiasi God nese'epa waf afamba ukup pagapagailafi dondo'ma ipa' si'ipamef.
40005007	“Ea' ipa' mamahipama pagati anis daias uwahipisi, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, atiasi God a' niti ipa' uwahipipa.
40005008	“Ea' ipa' mamahipama ukup pagape be'ep hilili'i ma waf awafi akipai, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, ipa' atiasi a' piti God.
40005009	“Ea' ipa' mamahipama panda' maola pigindiwa'wasa wandaf patalogasa sonda' waf bu'wafi, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, God atiasi a' nofalepa ni'i ipa' awasi ananipai.
40005010	“Ea' ipa' mamahipama pagi'ma waf usi'ifi ma anis epes sanda'mepa waf awafi sagase'epa nimanimi akafimi, dei' dao' ipa' apandagala. Dei' main, dei' ipa' pawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa.
40005011	“Ipa' mamahipama pagagi'ma ae'i pagape na'amba. Anis sandaiwa'ma pagagi'ma ae'i asonda' basef fafifafi awafi baso'aifi ma ipa'. Ea' sanda'epa tofalaepama basef awafi ma sagase'epa akafimi nimanimi. Esis sonda'epa na'ambai dei' ipa' pandagala.
40005012	Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi bendape andeande' sonondehepa endilisi. Dei' main? Hiahaom hiami fasimi ipe'imi ma'oh heven. Esis isimba sanda' waf awafi ma ipa' na'amba atin si'i fowa' anis sanda' waf awafi ma profet amamba mape magali'ma ipe'i.
40005013	“Ipa' si'i sol ama pegatopalopa epes hiasi sagape itapi. Apa' i'i sol alamba a' lumbula usihila a' akal, owa'atin. Atiasi ipa' penda'al pi'imama usihil wapani? Owa'atin. Sol alambai ku'umbili maol akala sonda'al, esis a sokwahol lefe' itap atep a sonda'al fi'ifa'asol atin.
40005014	“Ipa' si'i lam epes hiasi sagape itapi pigihimba'mas. Anagon taun lu'wagoma wamon nagatoma halafuta ilifi ina nape nandambaho', owa'atin.
40005015	Epes ina sakata lambeh sopalo'ambeh ha'oh belitagw lafelagwa, owa'atin. Esis sawamonambeh hatoma belitagw ilifa hogogala'ma epes hiasi sagape ipat nomoni.
40005016	Ea' na'amba atin, ipa' penda' waf usi'ifi si'i lambeh ipe'imbihi hagape alihimbiha ma hogogala'ma naep esis amam nematawai, sogati waf fasifi ipa' panda'afi ma sogasa'ma agol ahamepa nagape ilifi lu'wagol.
40005017	“Ipa' ina a' ukup pendanda' pi'i ae' afi'i ma igali'amona mu'uli Godi neloma basef amom profet fowa' gani magawalipasafi, owa'atin. Ae' ina afi'i ma igali'amonam, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma esapafef iwatanifa fegataga endilisi.
40005018	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Basef ifimba fepe fefe'ma hiahaom magape ilif itapi moloma otagai itap higililam hi'ilam. Apa' anif basef du'wanif amef sa'usa'ufi feloma anif basef bandafi fagail nomona buk mu'uli Godi, ifimba fepe atapif na'amba atin fefe'ma maol hiani Godi netaga nendawalap hi'igalan.
40005019	Na'amba i'i anin epen negali'amona anif basef kwasala'ufa basef ifimba fagape mu'uli Godi ma anin nihimba'ma anis epes daiasa sonda'as na'amba atin, atiasi agol aman anambai a' gofe' sa'osa'ogol ama anamba God nagala'ambemagoma. Apa' epen ami nila mu'uli Godi andeande'ma nihimba'ma anisa sigagi'mana, atiasi anin a' nefa' agol lu'wagili ma anamba God nagala'ambemagoma.
40005020	Na'amba dei' ae' a'ipipa a'i, Ipa' a' ukup pendapoma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi moloma amom dembami Farisi. I'i waf ipe'ifi usi'ifi owa' fikila' waf amamifia, atiasi ipa' ina pefe' piwis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa ma owagama pigawis anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin.
40005021	“Ipa' a' pame' basef ifimba amom akupipa mogofa'afi faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Ipa' owa'i peha anin epen nega'a. I'i anin neha anin epen negaga', epen inimba atiasi a' netagama basefa kot.’
40005022	Apa' dei' ae' a'ipipa a'i, Epen ami okom a' wandafuma anin sahin owan ananisi, anin atiasi a' netagama basefa kot. Ea' epen ami ni'ipa anin sahin owan ananini ni'i, ‘Ina' epen falafini’, anis sonda' kotimana amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti. Apa' i'i anin epen ni'ipa anin daian ni'i, ‘Ina' okom nagahena endilisii’, epen inimba nefe' wambel awambili nif fandif fagapomani.
40005023	“I'i ipa' pi'i pindalali ma God penda' ofa felefele' ma belita atamba sondolalima Godatai ma i'i ipa' ukup pegapoma anef waf awafi ipa' panda'afa anis ukup numbutipa ipe'i, penda'as na'amba.
40005024	Ata' pekwaha mafis gwa'aisi pa'i pindalalima Godasi sonda'oh felefele'ma belita atamba, ipa' ata' pitanima pefe' penandona basef peloma epes isimba panda'mas waf awafii. Ama ea', dao' pifi'i pefa' ofa pefe' pindalali pese'anas God.
40005025	“I'i anin epen ni'i nenda' kotimipai, nelomepa pefe' ma ata' pegalo ufia'wa, ipa' kwafalis pese'ana nembel pewalapa isimba pi'ias peloman, ama a' owa'atin. Na'amba epen inimba a' nenda'epa penda' basefa isimba ma amom jas monda'epa pefe'ma polisman, ea' monda'epa penda' kalabus.
40005026	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipa' ina atiasi pekwaha ipat atamba sanda' kalabusatai ulal, owa'. Ama pegwa hiahaom lu'wami sa'umi ma wiaf ipe'ifi hi'ilaf, dao', a' pefe'.”
40005027	Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ipa' pame'ef ea' basef ifimba fowa' fagatagai. Ipa' ina penda' waf awafi ma so'a waola anis amam nematawa daindaias, owa'i.
40005028	Apa' dei' ae' a'ipipa na'amba a'i, i'i anona aman a' niti ano'w nemata'w, ama nembel ananimbili behafema ako'w, aman anamba ea' nanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi ma nembel ananimbili.”
40005029	Jisas na'ipam na'amba ea' na'ipam anif basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i naep ipe'ipi pagape lagof kwahisigufi penda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, pigip pikwahip. I'i alop du'wanip ipe'ipi pogofa' akafimi, amamba aom kwasakwasala. Apa' ina andeande'ma esis sogakwaha alop si'ip ipe'ipi hi'igalap pogafe' wambel awambili hel nif fagapoma, owa'. Amambai atiasi a' pefa' akafimi awami lu'wami a'owa'.
40005030	“Apa' i'i lagof kwahisigufi fonda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, petopa'agof pekwahogof. I'i alop du'wanip ipe'ipi pogofa' akafimi, amamba aom kwasakwasala. Apa' ina andeande'ma esis sogakwaha alop si'ip ipe'ipi hi'ilap pogafe' wambel awambili hel nif fagapoma, owa'. Amambai akafimi lu'wami endilisi a'owa'.
40005031	“Basef ifimba fowa' fagatagai fa'i, i'i anona aman ni'i nili'amona waulu'mana anani'wi, anen ata' ni'i anif basef nonda'ef fil anop okwatip noso'akw ma nogatopa' daso'ama.
40005032	Apa' ae' a'ipipa a'i, i'i nemata'w akwamba owa' konda' waf awafi so'a waulafia, ma waulunama'w nogakwaho'w dowaf, anen nanda' ako'w kwanda' waf awafi so'a waola anom amam daindaiam. Ea' aman ami nagaso' nemata'w fowa' anona aman nagali'amona'wi, aman anamba nagi' nagaso'akwi wapani nanda' so'a waola nemata'w akwamba.
40005033	“Anif basef fowa' pagame'afi faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Basef ifimba banagafi paga'i endilisi atisafi, ipa' ina a' pesambalif, owa'i. Basef ifimba piga'i endilisi atisafi, pigi'ma basef ifimba dondo'afi a penda'as si'i ipa' paga'iasa naep Dembinaii.
40005034	Apa' dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ina a pi'i basef banagafi endilisi gani ilif, owa'i. Ea' ina pi'i ilif hevena pegewa' banaga anif basef baso'afi, owa'i. Dei' main, gani ilif heven sia bu'wani dembinai Godi nagapoma.
40005035	Ea' na'amba atin ina pi'i itap apa'e dowaf pegewa' banaga anif basef, owa'i. Itap apa'e pandahama si'i anin tebol sa'wini God nagahapona bo'wagahani. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' ina pi'i Jerusalema pegewa' banaga anif basef ipe'ifi, owa'i. Jerusalem anamba taun wambel lu'wagoma dembinai kingi.
40005036	Ipa' ina pewa' banaga basef ipe'ifi pi'i balagah ipe'igahi, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' ina la'ifipama penda' anif auf ama balaga ipe'igai fegataga afitiga a'a alialiga, owa'atin.
40005037	Ipa' pi'ias pinda'i aho' a'a owa'. Pinda'i ifimba atif. Apa' basef wataniaifi, ifimba fataga Satan atona.
40005038	“Ipa' pame'ef ea' basef ifimba fowa' fagatagai fa'i, ‘I'i ipa' pepa' pegaloma anisa sogahepa naep a'a sogatamepa nalelef, ipa' pegwamas pehas wapani penda'as sondagwama atin.’
40005039	Apa' ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ina pegwama epes sonda' ipa' aupai, owa'i. I'i anin epen mamahina negahepa aomb ine'imbi wa'ol, pendambema nehepa wa'ol wapani.
40005040	Ea' i'i anona aman nonda' kotimipa ni'i nogofa' siaogw ipe'igwi, ipa' pese'ana sagegw ipe'igwi wapani.
40005041	I'i anona aman dindinapina ma pefe' pegalomana anagon fele' si'i nogota atotota, dao' ipa' andeande'ma ata' pefe' pelomanago nohotagw biagw laogw wapani.
40005042	Apa' i'i epen mamahina nefalepa ma anis maefah, dao' pese'asas. Apa' i'i anin epen ni'i negewaolamepa wiafi, dao' ipa' ina pindaiwa'man pesambala basef ananifi, owa'i.
40005043	“Ipa' pame'ef ea' basef ifimba fowa' fagatagai fa'i, ‘Ipa' pese'asa nelelemb epes isimba sagape felefele'ma ipe'i, apa' ipa' ukup wandafipa bousi ipe'isi.’
40005044	Apa' ae' dei' a'ipipa anif basef daif a'i, ipa' ukup pipila bousi ipe'isi pese'as nelelemb, pendabetena God nogatopalopas isimba sanda'mepa waf awafi.
40005045	Ipa' penda'as na'amba ma pegape awasi Godi ahamapa nagape heven ilifi. Anen nanda' awin alipini nataga nape heven ilifa nagatopalopa epes bu'wasi saloma epes sanda' waf awafii wapani. Anen nanda' asaf falai ma epes isimba sagape hilili'i saloma isimba owa' sogape hilili'ia wapani.
40005046	I'i ipa' ukup pigaila epes isimba ukup pagapagaila ipe'i atis, atiasi pefa' hiahawes fasisi maisa waf afamba? Owa'atin. Amom amamba manda' waf awafii mogofa' takisi manda' waf afambai atef. Ea' anom daiam manda' waf awafii, amom wapani manda' waf afambai atef. Amom matopalopa esis isimba nomonas sagapoma esis atisii.
40005047	I'i ipa' piganifela isimba alipisi atis ipe'isi, atiasi ipa' petaga pikila' anisa waf mamahefa fasifi? Owa'atin. Esis sogololama Godi sanda'as na'amba atin.
40005048	Ea' ipa' pendape hilili' endilisi si'i ahamepa ipe'inai God nagape heven ilifi.
40006001	“Ipa' solawaipa. Owa'i penda' waf bu'wafi ipe'ifi ma naep esis epesi ma sogatilipaea, ma soga'i ipa' epes bu'upai ma sogasa'ma agof ipe'igufia, owa'i. I'i ipa' penda'as na'amba, ipa' ina atiasi pefa' anis hiahawes fasisi ma ahamepa God nagape heveni, owa'atin.
40006002	I'i ipa' pi'i pegatopalopa anis epes isimba kwahusi, ipa' ina' api'ipa anis daias, owa'i. Ipa' ina penda'as si'i waf afamba amom mambaso'as maga'i malogof biagufi mofapula alelefi batagw ma'ipas sagali', owa'i. Amom manda'am ifagw sanda' lotuwagwi a anamba ufiawa dawalegefa naep epesi sogati amom sogasa'ma agof amamugufi lu'wagof. Owa' hapaimi. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, atiasi God owa'atina nogaso'ama hiahawes fasisi amam amambaea, owa'atin. Hiahawes isimba amamisi na'amba. Epes isimba sagasa'ma agof amamugufi ea' ma'wis isimba atis.
40006003	Apa' i'i ipa' pegatopalopa epes isimba na'ambaisi kwahusi, ipa' pembaho'as penda'as na'amba. Lagol mamahogola gonda'asi, lagol wa'agol ina a' gogawas, owa'atin. Ea' na'amba atin, waf afambai ipa' penda'afa pegatopalopa anisi, ipa' ina pi'ias mehip anis daias some'epa ma penda'as, owa'i.
40006004	Ipa' pembaho'as penda'as. Ama Ahamepa ipe'inai nagati hiahawes isimba sape sandambahi'i ea' anen atona atiasi nogwamepas ipa'.
40006005	Nemaf mamahefa ipa' pendabeten, ipa' ina penda'am si'i waf afamba amam amamba magambaso'asi maga'i malogof biagufi manda'afi, ma mulutu atin nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi a ufiawa lu'uwai dawalegef, ama epes sogatolom, owa'i. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipa', amom anaf God ina a' nogwamama hiahawes fasisi ma waf afambai, owa'atin. Epes isimba asagatolomi ea' ma'wis isimba atis.
40006006	Apa' ipa' nogota atamba pi'i pendabeten, piwis ifagw nomon pewalo utagw ea' pendabetena God ahamepa ipe'inai, anen nape anamba dambahi'igima. Anen nagati hiahawes sape sandambahi'i ma bola nogagwamipai beten.
40006007	Apa' afamba ipa' pendabeten, ipa' ina pendabeten dowaf si'i epes isimba sogololama Godi sanda'am, owa'i. Esis sa'i sondabeten launi ma atiasi God nogame'as. Owa' owa'atin, God ina name'as.
40006008	Apa' ipa' ina pigi'ma waf asasifi, hapaifi. Ahamepa God nagape ilifi nogawa ea' ma hiahawes akipai. Nogota atamba ipa' ata' owa' pihali'anamasa, anen a' nagawas ea'.
40006009	Ipa' pendabeten na'amba pi'i, Ahamapa ape'inai nagape heveni, apa' ma'i agol ine'igili gondape hilili' ma hiasi sogasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol.
40006010	Apa' ma'i nemaf afamba bu'wafi fetaga ma epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol ine'ini nope Dembinai nugumafias. Waf bu'wafi esis ine'isi sagailaf heveni, apa' ma'i milaf itap apa'e wapani na'amba atin.
40006011	Dei' ina' nese'apa gwa'aisi sondahama apa' ma nemaf afa'e.
40006012	Ina' nekwahomasa waf awafi ape'ifi okom mose'enaf si'i apa' magakwahomasa waf awafi anis daias sanda'mapafi ukup pagaso'apaf.
40006013	Ina' owa'i nili'apa mefe'ma hiahaom ahifimi mogogwamba ape'ia. Owa' hapaimi. Netagwahepa ma aman aunai. [Anamba ina' nagala'ambemagoma noloma banagami ine'imi moloma hiahaom mogogala'i ine'imi, amamba ine'imi atom dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.]
40006014	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “I'i ipa' pekwahomasa waf awafi anis daias sanda'mepafi ukup pese'epafa, andeande'ma Ahamepa nagape heveni okom mogaso'anafa ipa' wapani.
40006015	Apa' i'i ipa' owa' ukup pese'epa waf awafi anis daias sanda'mepafia, Ahamepa nagape heveni ina atiasi okom moso'anafa ipa', owa'atin.
40006016	Nimaguf mamahifa ipa' pegakwaha gwa'aisi, ina penda'am si'i amam amamba mambaso'mas maga'i malogof biagufi manda'ami ma manda' amagah amamumi awasim, owa'i. Amom manda' amagah aom na'amba ma amam nematawa sogatulumi sogawa soga'i amom mogakwaha gwa'aisii. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi amom mofa'am ea' hiahaom amamba ma dagala amamini. Epes isimba sagati waf afambai, ea' ma'wis isimba atis.
40006017	Apa' nemaf mamahefa ipa' pegakwaha gwa'aisi ma pendabetena God, ipa' pesa'of penda' wel pindisa balagah pihi'agah.
40006018	Ama anis epes daias ina sogawa ipa' pagakwaha gwa'aisi, owa'. Penda'as na'amba ma Ahamepa nape nandambahi'i anen atona nogawepa. Anen nagati hiahawes sape sandambahi'i, ma bola nogagwamipai beten.
40006019	Ipa' ina a' petama hiahaom bu'wami atom ipe'imi bimbilam itap ana'e, owa'i. Anis sanda' wali sapisila ifagw sawis sagakwalopami, bamagof fomamam magahambombagama waimba nagasagihami.
40006020	Apa' ae' a'ipipa petama hiahaom fasimi ipe'imi mo'omepa gani heven. Anamba bambagufi totoloh ina mototopa'am a waimba ina nasagiham, owa'atin endilisi. Ea' sanda' wali ina a' suwis sakwalopam, owa'atin.
40006021	Wambel mamahembela hiahawes fasisi ipe'isi saga'oma, ea' wambel ambalemba atembel anaf ukup ipe'ipi wapani pegapoma.
40006022	Naep nomon ukup ipe'ipi si'i lama alop si'ip ipe'ipi. I'i ukup ipe'ipi be'ep pepe, ea' alop si'ip ipe'ipi pogala' hi'ilap.
40006023	Apa' i'i ukup ipe'ipi awasip, atiasi alop ipe'ipi hi'ilap ea' akutina. Ea' na'amba atin, i'i lam amamba magape ukup ipe'ipi nomoni si'i akot atona, atiasi akot anamba ea' lu'una a'owa'.
40006024	Ina anin epen nanda' maoli la'ifin nihapila maol biafina amam dembami biam, owa'atin. Na'amba okom mila anona, anona a' nesambalona. Ea' na'amba atin, ipa' ina a' la'ifipa pepe lafela God noloma ugai moni, owa'atin.
40006025	Ea' ae' a'ipipa a'i ipa' ina a' nomonas solasefe' hiahiasa ambagof ipe'igufi pi'i, Apa' ata' mea' main? A mea' embel maimbel? Owa'i. Ipa' ina a' nomonas solasefe' ma alop ipe'ipi pi'i, Atiasi apa' monda' main mombaho' alop ape'ipi? A'i ambagufi alop asikila' gwa'aisii luwaguf?
40006026	Ipa' ata' ukup pepoma amiguf. Afof owa' fonda' aofah fowa gwa'aisi maisa, owa' fotoma gwa'aisi fimbilasa. Afof ifagw owa'atina fotama gwa'aisi soga'oh, ea' satamam sofa'am ma'oh ifagw gwa'aisiagwi, owa'atin. Apa' Ahamepa ipe'inai nagape heveni, anen naso'agof gwa'aisi. Apa' ipa' epes pikila' amiguf agwafomba.
40006027	Ipa' atiasi ami la'ifin nomonas solasefe' lawisa nigiwatania anef nemaf wapani ma ambal ananili logape nogota laota wapani? Owa'atin.
40006028	Dei' maina nomonas ipe'isi salasagafe' a'owa' ma luwaguf mais? Ipa' ata' ukup pepoma afis main sagalo ando'i. Esis sataga salo lu'wis sa'imama? Esis ina sanda' maol, ina sanda' luwaguf mais, owa'atin.
40006029	Apa' ae' a'ipipa fowa' anona aman hiahaom hiamunai Solomon nanda' sosaf hianai ma luwaguf ananimi owa', sosaf ananifi ina fasif si'i afis isimba, owa'atin.
40006030	Aho', otalef afalemba dei' ata' fetawa aof ama naman atef sotopa'alef sokwahelef fefe' nif. Otalef afalemba falafilifi God nofalo'malef. Apa' ipa' amam nematawa pikila' otalef afalemba. Ea' dei' ipa' pagahapifa basef Godi kwasakwasalai, pendegawa endilisi anen nugumafipa wapanii.
40006031	Ea' ipa' ina ukup pelapefe' hihip a'owa' pi'i, ‘Atiasi apa' mea' main? A mea' embel ani? A monda' luwaguf ani? Na'ambai owa'i.
40006032	Epes sagape itapi sogolalama Godi ukup malamondafe' a'owa' ma sogolaoma hiahaom amambai hiami. Apa' Ahamepa ipe'inai nagape heveni anen nogawa ea' hiahawes mamahisa akipai.
40006033	Apa' ipa' ata' ukup pili' pelapelaoma waf usi'ifi bu'wafi feloma pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa pili', dao' a' nese'epa hiahawes isimba ipa' wapani.
40006034	Ea' ipa' ina nomonas sopoma hiahawes sogataga namani, owa'. Nemaf namanifi fendapoma naman atef, ama hiahawes mamahisa sogataga namani. Hiahaom nimanimi akafimi magatagama nimaguf daindai mandahama nimaguf ifimba atif dondo. Ipa' ina' a' nomonas iwanis solasefe', owa'.
40007001	Ipa' ina a' pewaloga anis epes si'i anona jas dembinai nagawaloga basef kot lu'unai, owa'i. Ama anaf God ina nowalogepa, owa'.
40007002	Waf ipa' panda'afa pagawawaloga anis epesafi, anaf waf afamba atef God a' nonda'mepaf ipa' wapani. Ikwaf afamba atef ipa' panda'af pagawalogasafi nogwaf nowaloga ipa'.
40007003	Dei' maina ipa' pagati usan sa'usa'uni nagape naep sahin owan ipe'isii, apa' ipa' owa' pegawa hapataf lu'unai nagape naep ipe'ipia?
40007004	Dei' maina ipa' ata' pali' pa'ipa alipisi paga'i, ‘Owame, ae' a'i igimina usan sa'uni nagape naep ine'ipii.’ Apa' hapataf lu'unai nape naep ine'ipi. Na'ambai owa'i.
40007005	Ipa' malogof biagufipai pagambaso'ami. Ipa' ata' pili' pigi usan hapataf lu'unai nagape naep ipe'ipii ama piti andeande' dao', a' pigimana usas sa'usi sagape naep alipisi ipe'isii.”
40007006	Ea' Jisas na'ipam anif basef waminif atini wapani na'i, “Hiahawes bu'wasi hilili'i, isimba ipa' ina peso' nombagw, owa'i. Ea' ipa' ina pekwaha aolep amamba fasifasimi ipe'imi mefe'ma bogof, owa'i. Na'amba fofa'asa aolep amamba fasifasimi bo'walef afafilifi, ea' nomabagw gwehepa gwea'epa.
40007007	Ipa' pihali' God atiasi nogase'epa hiahawes. Isimba ipa' pala pigalaomasi atiasi a' pitilis. Ipa' peha uta, atiasi God nuwisi'mipata ipa'.
40007008	Dei' main, epes ami sogahali' Godi, atiasi sofa' maefah. Epen ami nela' negelaoma hiahawasi, atiasi nigatilisi. Ea' epen ami negaha utai, atiasi God nuwisi'manata anin.
40007009	I'i anin awani negahali' ahamanama anis gwa'aisi, atiasi ahaman nosa'ma anom otam noso'anam? Owa'atin.
40007010	I'i anin awani negahali' ahamana nogaso'an anol aol, anen atiasi ina noso'an anol ul awali, owa'atin.
40007011	Ea' ipa' amam nematawa aupai pagaso'asa hiahawes fasisi atisa awasi ipe'isii, Ahamepa ipe'inai nagape heveni anen wapani atiasi noso'asa hiahawes fasifasisi isimba sagahali' anini.
40007012	Waf maif ipa' pa'i esis sonda'mepaf ipe'i, ipa' penda'masaf na'amba atin. Basef ifimba kofagefa ma mu'uli Godi naga'ipa Mosesani naloma basef God fowa' naga'ipa amom profet manda'afi.
40007013	Ipa' pefe' piwis uta sa'utai bu'utai. Dei' main, ano'w ufia'w kwafe' kwagawis wambel awambili heli alihi'w a'owa'i uta wapani alihitai. Ea' hiasi amam nematawa safe' saila ufia'w akwamba.
40007014	Apa' uta ma ufia'w kwafe' kwagawis wambel sagape namisagoma ina alihita a'owa', owa'atin. Wapa'mota. Wambel ambalemba sagape be'es andeande' lifilafima. Ufia'w akwamba ahifi'w a'owa' ma sogafe'. Amam nematawa atona atin esis ea' isimba atis sati ufia'w akwamba saila'w.
40007015	Ipa' solawaipa andeande'ma amom profet mambaso'am ma'i mogowalipasa basef Godi. Amom manda' uhuf mafi'i mambaso'mepa mataga patolom ando' atogon mape bo'om sa'umbilim si'i sipsip. Apa' ukup amamipi nomon awep endilisi ma ipa' ma'i mohambombagepa mehepa si'i nombagw wandafugwi. Ea' ipa' ina peme'am, owa'i.
40007016	Ipa' piti waf amamifi fetaga fendawalap si'i sa'utip pagail lawahi, apegawa waf amamifi be'ef a'a awef. Epes ina sola sa'utip wainip mandelef afalemba higatagulifi, owa'atin. A ina sola sa'utip fikip mandelef awalifi, isimba wapani, owa'. Ea' waf awafi amamifi fataga fandawalap awef si'i sa'utip awapi.
40007017	Ea' na'amba atin lawah hiagahi anogah bu'ugahi hogola sa'utip bu'wapi gwa'aipi, apa' lawah augahi hail hola sa'utip awapi numbutipi.
40007018	Lawah bu'ugahi ina a hail hola sa'utip gwa'aipi, a lawah aogahi ina a hil hola sa'utip bu'wapi, owa'atin.
40007019	Lawah hiagahi owa' higail hogola sa'utip gwa'aipia, agahemba esis salagah saofagah nif lu'wafi.
40007020	Ipa' pati waf amamifi fetaga fendawalap si'i sa'utip pagail lawahi, waf amom profeti be'ef a'a awef.
40007021	Ipa' ina pi'i amam nematawa hiasi sofala ae' saga'i Dembiwai, pi'i atiasi sofe' sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias, owa'atin. Epen ami nagi'ma okom Ahamai nagape heveni ma nigailami, anin atin atiasi nuwis heven. Anis daias owa'atin.
40007022	Nemaf afamba atiasi amam nematawa hiasi sifi'i sofala ae' si'i, ‘Apa' magawalipasa basef Godi si'i profet amamba magawalipas ea' ma'i agol ine'igili matofa amom ambagof awami! Apa' ma'i agol ine'igili manda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami!’
40007023	“Ama nemaf afamba owa', ae' iwalipas i'ipas alihis na'amba i'i, ae' ina egawa ipa' kwasakwasala, owa'. Ipa' epes panda' waf awafii delefata pekwaha ae', ea' fo'o.
40007024	“Epes ami some' basef ae'afi ma sigi'mif silif, esis si'i epen gawaini nala' ipat ananitai togotawa banagota itap apamba otambaipa banagapi.
40007025	A'i owa' asaf lu'unai nalai, embel bataga, fufin banagonai naluwi, amamba makoto'ma ipat atamba apa' ina tato, owa'atin. Epen inimba a' nala otamba lu'wami mowala itap mosahopata banagota totawa.
40007026	Apa' epen ami name' basef ae'afi ma anin owa' nigi'mifa, anen si'i anona aman okom magahanai. Anen nala' ipat ananitai tatoma ilifa ko'onaga atoga.
40007027	Ama a'i owa', asaf lu'unai nalai, embel mataga, ea' fufin naluwi banagona. Amamba a'i owa' maola ipat atamba a' tondokwaef towa. Ipat atamba tato ta'oh kwapete' endilisi aota.”
40007028	Nogota atamba Jisas na'i basef ifimba laufi ma hi'alef, esis same' basef ananifi ea' gogolalasis kwapete' endilisi.
40007029	Anen ina nawalipas si'i amam falafumi maga'ipas, owa'. Anen nawalipas dindinip naloma banagami na'amba atin si'i amom agufumi. Anen banagona a'owa' nikila'. Amam dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ina mawalipas na'amba si'i anen, owa'.
40008001	Ea' Jisas nakwaha halaf afamba nilianai, amam nematawa hiasi sagi'mana safe'.
40008002	Owa', anona aman aowas aunai nanda' alop ananipi pagambu'wi nafi'i felefele'ma Jisas nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele' ma anen na'i, “Dembinai, i'i ina' ni'i aho', netopalope ma egataga bo'owe.”
40008003	Ea' Jisas nando lagol nasagol alop aman anambai na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i aho'ma ina' negataga bo'wena.” Ea' dei' atef aowas anamba aunai nanda' alop pagambu'wi nakwahona ea' bo'ona.
40008004	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina a' nefe' ni'ipa anin epen ni'i ae' anda'ena ambo'wena, owa'i. Ina' fo'o nihimba'mana alop ine'ipi ma aman anamba pris. Ea' nese'ana hiahaom amamba anen nondolalima God ea' ina' ninifelona ma nagataga bo'wena si'i mu'uli ananini fowa' Moses naga'ipasani naga'i. Ama amam nematawa hiasi sitilina sogogawa aowas ine'ini ahi'alan.”
40008005	Jisas nafe' wambel Kaperneam ea' anona soldia dembinai nape. Anen dembinai ma nugumafi amom soldia hiami 100-pelaim. Ea' nafi'i nahali' Jisas dindinip na'i,
40008006	“Dembinai, anona aman nanda'me maoli aowas nanda'ana na'oh ipat ananitai. Bo'wagahi lagof saga' sailana. Alop ananipi akep mahana kwapete'.”
40008007	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i. “Ae' atiasi efo'o enda'ana bo'ona.”
40008008	-
40008009	Ea' dembinai anamba soldia na'ipana na'i, “Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma ina' nefo'o negawis ipat ae'atai, owa'. Ina' ninda'i basef atif, bola anen bo'ona. Dei' main, ae' ape lafela anom soldia dembami mumafi mase'e maol. Ea' ape ilifa anom soldia ae'ami imafiam. Iga'ipa anona iga'i, ‘Ina' fo'o’, name'e nafe'. A iga'ipa anona iga'i, ‘Ina' fi'i’, name'e nafi'i. Ea' iga'ipa anamba agol akanai nanda'me maoli iga'i, ‘Ina' da'a maol inimba’, anan name'e nanda'an. Ina' dembinai. Ea' aowas inimba atiasi neme' basef ine'ifi a' nefe'. Dei' ina' ninda'i atin, bola anen bo'ona.”
40008010	Ea' Jisas name' basef ananifi okom malamafe' na'ipa amam nematawa hiasi sagagi'ma anini na'i, “Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa! Soldia dembinai anamba anen ina ipa' Israelinai. Owa' dei' anen nahapifa ae'. Owa' anona aman Israelinai nohapifi na'ambaea, owa'atin. Anen nikila' ipa' Israela nagahapifi banagambel.
40008011	Endilisi ae' a'ipa ipa' Juda hipai, ipa' ina a' ukup pi'i ipa' atipa pefe' piwis anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'. Amam nematawa hiasi daias sifi'i gani awin nagatafima nowala nagaso'ma, isimba sofe' sogawis anambai. A sofe' suwis soloma dembami bafapepa ipe'imi Juda, Abrahami Aisak a Jekop, sope atifigin sea' gwa'aisi solomam.
40008012	Apa' ipa' Juda hipai owa'atin. God nandondomba anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma ma ipa' pigawis, apa' owa'atin. Anaf anen nogalo'ma ipa' ni'ipipa ni'i pefe' wambel awambili owamb atona nagapoma. Ea' peme' akafimi lu'wami penda' nalelef ipe'imi tilili talala' pepe.”
40008013	Ea' Jisas na'ipa soldia anamba dembinai na'i, “Ina' a' fo'o. Ina' na'i ae' la'ifiwai ma egatopalopa aman anamba nanda'mena maol ine'i nogataga bo'ona. Ae' anda'ana bo'ona si'i ina' nagahapifa ae'.” Ea' dei' atef aman anamba ambo'ona wapani.
40008014	-
40008015	Jisas nafe' nawis nomon ipat Pitai nati Pita nandagi'mo'wi awasi'w kwa'oh, alop akwa'upi nifip. Ea' natolo'w nahapila lagol akwa'ugili aowas inimba nakwaho'w nafe' ambo'okw. Ea' kosafel kwape kwanda'mana gwa'aisi anen.
40008016	Wambomota felefele' ma owamb esis sofa'ai amam nematawa hiasi ambagof awami magapaisi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas. Ea' na'ipa ambagof awami mehip natofam mafa' mafe'. Anen nanda' esis hiasi aowas nanda'asi bo'wes.
40008017	Anen nanda'as bo'wes wapani si'i fowa' gani anona profet Aisaia naga'iefi basef na'i, “Anen atona nofa' aowas ape'inai natopalopapa ma mogape be'epa.”
40008018	Jisas nati epes hiasi salutu sala'ambemana, ea' na'ipa alipumi ananimi mondandombola mofa' bot mogafe' dumb ambamba fisanamb.
40008019	Ea' anona aman dembinai nagawalipasa mu'uli Godi a' nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai tisa, ae' a'i efe' elomena. Ea' ofe' atin anamba hiagoma ina na'i negafe'ma.”
40008020	Owa' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Nombagw alupugwi gwa'oh bologwalef itap apa'e wambel agwagumbili. Amiguf wapani fufia' fagafe' ilifi fala' owah fapaoh gani ilif, apa' ae' owa'atin. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, wambel ake ma e'eh egalo balaga ae'agai.”
40008021	Ea' anona aman alipunai Jisasi nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i ata' epe imafi ahame, ata' etopalopana ma noga' iwana nogapani ifi'i ilina.”
40008022	Apa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Hapaimi, esis sagaga'i sondawago esis atis isimba sagaga'i. Apa' ina' owa', ina' fi'i nila ae'.”
40008023	Jisas nalota anota bot naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' malomana mafe' anemb dumb lu'wambi.
40008024	Ea' kwafalis atis fufin lu'wani naluwi, embel mohafel mawis bot nomon felefele'ma bot ta'i togowala embel. Apa' Jisas na'oh nalola bot.
40008025	Ea' alipumi ananimi mafe' minimbalona ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai! Ina' safel netopalopafa. Afa' wa'i ahigililafa owala embel!”
40008026	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' ombal magahepa? Ipa' ina pahapifi pa'i ae' banagewe, owa'atin. Ea' nosafel na'ipa fufin naloma embel na'i, “Ipa' ea' be' tol a betah.” Ea' fufin nowala, embel ina ata' lasiali' a'owa', betah hilili'.
40008027	Ea' amom alipumi ananimi gogolalasom ombal maham kwapete'am ma'i, “Anen epen ami? Na'ipa fufini embel same'ana sagahapifana?”
40008028	Jisas nafe' nataga anagon wa'ol dumb ambamba anep itap esis Gadara sagapoma. Ea' anom amam biam ambagof awami magapaumi mafi'mai anen. Amom mape wandelef sagawa sagaga'ima mafi'i. Amom amamba epes awami magahasi. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi ombal mahasa sogafe' ufia'w akwamba amom magapoma. Ea' mofala Jisas mehip ma'i,
40008029	“Ina' God Nogamana. Ina' na'i nenda' maina afa'? Ina' na'i neha afa'? Nemaf afamba ina' na'i negahafafi ina dei' afataga, ata' owa'atin.”
40008030	Ea' anagof bogof hiagufi falutu fa' gwa'aisi anota damota felefele'.
40008031	Ea' amom ambagof awami mahali' Jisas ma'i, “I'i ina' negatofafama nesapa'afa ofe' uwisa bogof gwagwafumba.”
40008032	Ea' na'ipagof na'i, “Ipa' fo'o!” Ea' makwaha aman anamba mawisi mafe' mawisa bogof. Ea' bogof agwafomba hiagufi fasagih mafa' mafe' mehip mowala awagoma tata a' mowala mala embel dumb afum hi'alam.
40008033	Ea' amom mugumafiagufi mafa' mafe' wambel lu'wagoma ma'ipasa basef ifimba amam nematawa hiasi ma'ipasa hiahaom amamba magatagama amam amamba biami ea' ma'ipasa bogof wapani afum hi'alam.
40008034	Ea' epes hiasi wambel ambalembaisi safi'i sati Jisas sahali'ana sa'ipana dindinip sa'i anen nokwaha itap apamba asasima a' nefe' anagon.
40009001	Esis sandaiwa'ma Jisas ea' nalota anota bot nafe' dumb lu'wambi fisanamb ea' nataga wambel ananimbili kofagama.
40009002	Ea' anom amam mofa'ai anona aman mafi'i. Lagufi bo'wagah saga' sagailanai ea' tol na'oh alahis. Nogota atamba Jisas natolom nogawa amom mahapifana ma'i anen banagonai ma nogatopalopa aman anamba aowas nanda'anai bo'ona. Ea' na'ipa aman anamba na'i, “Ina' epen ae'inai! Opaf ine'ifi fondape awanef. Waf awafi ina' nanda'afi ae' akwahomenaf hi'alaf okom mase'eaf.”
40009003	Ea' anom amam dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ukup pandanda' na'amba manda'ipama ma'i, “Aman anamba Jisas nanda' God findiwana na'ipana awagon.”
40009004	Jisas nogawa nomonas isimbai amamisi. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' ukup pandanda' awepa paga'i na'amba?
40009005	Dei' hiahaom maim ipa' pa'i ahifima ae'? Ae' banagiwai ma i'ipa aowas nanda'anai iga'i, ‘Ae' ekwahomana waf awafi anen nanda'afi okom mogase'eaf’ a'a i'ipana iga'i, ‘Nosafel nogafe'.’ Basef ifimba ma nosafel nogafe' ipa' pa'i amamba ahifima ae'.
40009006	Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, a'i ipa' pegawa ae' la'ifiwai ma ekwahomasa waf awafi hiafi amam nematawa sagape itapi sanda'afi okom mogase'eaf. Ae' a'i ihimba'mepa ae' la'ifiwai ma enda' hiahaom amamba.” Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel sa'ma alahis ine'isi fo'o ipat ine'itai.”
40009007	Ea' anen nosafel nafe' ipat ananitai.
40009008	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi satolona sosafel gogolalasis ombal mahas kwapete' sogawa God natopalopa aman anamba naso'ana banagami lu'wami. Na'amba esis sasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.
40009009	Ea' Jisas nosafel nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafo'o nati ae' Matyu, anda' basefa buk akwa'ii. Ae' ape ipat ata'e mogofa' takisa. Ea' Jisas na'ipi na'i, “Ina' fi'i nila ae'.” Ea' ae' asafel ailana afe'.
40009010	Ea' Jisas naloma alipufai ananifai wape ipat ae'atai wa' gwa'aisi atin, owa' amam hiami manda' waf awafii maloma anom hiami mogofa' takisi mafi'i malomafa ma' gwa'aisi.
40009011	Ea' amom Farisi dembami mati Jisas nape nalomafa wa' gwa'aisi, mahali' alipumi ananimi ma'i, “Dei' maina anen dembinai tisa ipe'inai nape naloma amom mogofa' takisi maloma amam amamba manda' waf awafii maga' gwa'aisi atogon?”
40009012	Owa' Jisas name'am na'ipam na'i, “Isimba aowas akasi ina a safe'ma dokta, owa'. Esis bu'wasi. Apa' isimba aowas nanda'asi atis dao', safe'ma dokta.
40009013	Anif basef fagape buk Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, God na'i, ‘Ipa' ina peha mafis peso' ae', owa'i. Apa' ipa' pindati anis amam nematawa uwahipis a petopalopas dao', a' andeande'.’ Apa' ipa' ina pegawa basef ifimba kofagefa, owa'. Dei' pefe' pitalifif pendegawef. Dei' main, ae' ina afi'i ma egefala epes sanda' waf bu'wafii, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma egefala epes isimba sanda' waf awafii atis.”
40009014	Jon aman anamba nagapisi'as embeli, alipisi ananisi same' basef ananifi safi'i anamba Jisas nagapoma sahali'ana na'amba sa'i, “Anif nimaguf afa' waloma amom Farisi afa' ukup pandanda'ma anif basef fowa'ifi dei' wakwaha gwa'aisi wape dowaf. Dei' maina amom alipumi ine'imi owa' mokwaha gwa'aisi si'i afa'a?”
40009015	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'i basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i anis sonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma anis aman nemata'w bias sondaso'amai, ipa' pa'i esis alipisi atiasi a' sondaiwa'ma gwa'aisi afamba anen nagaso' nemata'wi nape nagalomas? Owa'atin endilisi. Apa' nemaf afamba anen nokwaha esis nogafe' anagon lauguni dao', esis sololama gwa'aisi.”
40009016	Ea' na'ipasa anif basef waminif atina luwaguf na'i, “Ina andeande'ma pegatopa' lowaf namifi pesambalef fegaloma anef lowaf apifi, owa'. Na'amba atiasi lowaf afamba namifi fendatagwah, fehape' apifi bolotaf a' notaga lu'una.” Ea' na'i anif basef waminif atin wapani na'i,
40009017	“Embel wainimbel dambaimbeli apa' ina mowalambel agwahup apinai memeina si'i botol, owa'atin. I'i anin nenda'am na'amba, embel wain netef hian, nohape' agwahup anamba pepe'etana ea' wain kolo'olam awasim hi'ilam. Apa' wain dambaini mowalan agwahup dambaina, na'ambai andeande'. Ma embel beloma agwahup sogape andeande'.”
40009018	Jisas ata' nape na'ipas atin, owa' anona aman dembinai esis Judai nafi'i nindiwa nembawa notawa na'ipana na'i, “Nogame ae'akwi a' afu'w. Ae' a'i ina' nefe' newamona lagol ine'igili ako'wa ambal lopao'w kogape namo'w.”
40009019	Ea' Jisas nosafel naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' malomana.
40009020	Owa' ano'w nemata'w kwafi'i alafuga Jisasi kwahapila lowaf ananifi da'malififa. Aowas awasini nanda'akwa kwape gamba atapi'w afagof 12-pelaiguf.
40009021	Ea' ako'w okom mandanda' ma'i, “I'i ae' egasa lagola lowaf ananifi, atiasi ambo'owe.”
40009022	Ea' Jisas nandambema natolo'w na'ipa'w na'i, “Nogame ae'inai! Opaf ine'ifi fope awanef. Ina' ea' nahapifa ae' banagiwai. Isimba atis dei' anda'ena bo'wena.”
40009023	Ea' Jisas nafe' ipat aman anamba dembinai esis Judai nati anis amam nematawa sofapula batagwa nemata'w akwamba aiawai'wi afu'wi. Ea' epes hiasi sa'i gugul sapoma'w.
40009024	Ea' anen na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' si'amae! Ako'w ina kwaga' dogw, owa'. Kwa'oh atin.” Owa' esis sanda'iafana.
40009025	A sohafel sawis ando' ea', Jisas nikila'as nawis nomon nahapila lagol akwa'ugili nafela'w kosafel ambo'okw wapani.
40009026	Ea' basef nemata'w akwambai a' fafe'agon hi'alagon.
40009027	Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' atin, nati amam biam naep pagaso'ami magi'mana mofalana mehip na'amba ma'i, “Ina' akunamana Deviti, niti afa' uwahipifa.”
40009028	Ea' Jisas nafe' nawis anota ipat nomon owa', amom amamba mafi'mai anen nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pihapifa ae' banagiwai ma enda'epa bo'wepa?” Ea' amom ma'i, “Aho', Dembinai afa'inai.”
40009029	Ea' nasa lagofa naep amamipi na'i, “Ae' egawepa, ipa' pa'i ae' la'ifiwai. Na'amba ae' enda' naep ipe'ipi ambo'wep wapani pendahama pagahapifa ae'.”
40009030	Ea' dei' naep amamipi ambo'wep matologon andeande'. Na'amba Jisas na'ipam dindinip na'i, “Ipa' ina pefe' pi'ipa anis amam nematawa daiasa anda'epa bo'wepa, owa'i.”
40009031	Owa' amom mafe' mawalapa basef ma'ipa amam nematawa hiasi ma'i Jisas nanda' naep amamupi bo'wep. Ea' basef ifimba fafe'agon hi'alagon.
40009032	Amom amamba naep pagaso'ami mafe' ea', esis sofa'i anona aman malogol gagaso'anai. Anen ambal aunai nanda'ana, na'amba ina noga na'i basef, owa'. Ea' sofa'ana nafi'mai Jisas.
40009033	Jisas natofa ambal anamba aunai. Na'amba dei' aman anamba a' na'i andeande'. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sohafel gogolalasis sa'i na'amba sa'i, “Fowa' apa' Israel ina mati anom hiahaom amambai, owa'atin.”
40009034	Apa' anom Farisi dembami esis Judai mambaso'mas ma'i, “Anen natofa ambagof awami ma banagami ambal mamana aunai.”
40009035	Maol Jisas nanda'ani nagape na'amba. Anen nosafel nafe' walemb hiagoma na'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi. Nafe' nawis ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi na'ipasa sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Anen natopalopa amam nematawa hiasi aowas hiana haona nanda'asi sataga bo'wes wapani.
40009036	Ea' nati amam nematawa hiasi uwahipis. Esis dola sape ombal mahas kwapete'. Ina anona aman nape numafias, owa'atin. Esis sape si'i sipsip owa' anin epen nugumafiapia. Ea' nati esis uwahipis.
40009037	Ea' na'ipa alipisi ananisi anif basef waminif atin na'i, “Ipa' piti aofah hiagahi gwa'aimi hiami a' maof ea'. Apa' epes sanda' maoli owa' hiasa, kwasala'wis.
40009038	Ea' ipa' pihali' dembinai kofagonama aofahi. Pihali'ana ma nogasapa'i epes hiasi sofe' sonda' maola sola gwa'aimi ananimi sogambe'am atifigin.”
40010001	Jisas nofalai alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim mafi'mai anen naso'am agol lu'wagili nowa' banagama mogatofa ambagof awami monda' hiasi aowas hiana haona nanda'asi bo'wes.
40010002	Amom amamba aposel 12-pelaim Jisasi, agufuma amamba. Nagali'i Saimon agol wa'agol Pita, owamana ananinai Andru. Ea' Jems nogama Sebedi naloma owamana Jon,
40010003	Filip naloma Bartolomyu, Tomas naloma ae' Matyu anda' basef ifi'i egefa'asa takisi. A Jems Alfius nogamana, a Tadius,
40010004	ea' Saimon anen mini'ap Seloti. Ea' aman anamba Judas nogawalapa Jisasa amom boumi ananimii.
40010005	Jisas nasapa' amam amamba 12-pelaim mafe', naso'ama basef amom na'i, “Ipa' ina pefe'ma epes isimba owa' sogogawa Godia, owa'. Ea' ina pefe' piwis anembel wambel itap esis Samariaipi, owa'i.
40010006	Ipa' pefe' ma esis mini'ap Israel sagape si'i sipsip higilagalapi.
40010007	Pefe' pewalapa basef na'amba pi'i, ‘Nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa' pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa a fafi'i felefele' ea'.’
40010008	Ipa' penda' awasisi bo'wes pesa'ma sagaga'i sope namis wapani, a penda' isimba aowas aunai nanda' alop asasipi pagambu'wi sotaga bo'wes. Ea' petofa ambagof awami magapaisi. Banagami Godi ipa' pegefa'ami, amamba ipa' pefa'am dowaf ina patalom otamba, owa'atin. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' pese'asam dowaf esis ina sotaloma ipa', owa'atin.
40010009	“Ipa' ina pelo' otamba goli silva moloma kapa poket isalef ipe'isi, owa'i.
40010010	Ipa' ina pefa' roksaki siaogw biagw atogw, a su, moloma galahitagw pandahi'amonam pagafi'i, owa'. Epes sanda' maoli, andeande'ma sogofa' gwa'aisi asasisi.
40010011	“I'i ipa' pefe' pigawis anambel wambel, ata' petologon pegawagon andeande'. Aman wambel ambalembainai mamahonama fasinai noga'i awima ipe'i, a' pepe atapipa peloma anen atona a pefe' ma afamba pekwaha wambel ambalemba pegafe'.
40010012	Afamba ipa' pefe' pigawis anota ipat, pi'ipa esis amam nematawa sagape ipat atambai pi'i, ‘Ipa' pepe opalef awanelef.’
40010013	I'i anis ipat atambaisi fasisi sonda'mepa waf soga'i aho'ma ipe'ma, atiasi basef ipe'ifi opalef awanelefafi fepomas. Apa' i'i owa', hapaimi, basef ifimba bu'wafi fitanimamai fepemepa atapif.
40010014	I'i anin epen nindaiwa'ma negase'epa nembela nefa'epa pefe' pigawis ipat ananitai ma nindaiwa' ma negame' basef ipe'ifia, dao' pesafel pekwaha ipat taun inimba pindila'ma usas itap pagail bo'wagah ipe'igahi, ma esis sitilipa sogogawa waf awafi asasifi kofagema asasimi atom.
40010015	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nemaf afamba lu'wafi anaf God nogawaloga epesafi, niti esis fowa' sagape Sodomi Gomora uwahipis kwasakwasala. Apa' epes isimba wambel ambalembaisi ina niti uwahipis, owa'. Akafimi lu'wami awami endilisii anaf a' motagamas.”
40010016	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ipa' peme', ae' esapa'epa pefe' si'i anom sipsip pefe' la'afena nombagw wandafugwi alupugwi. Na'amba ipa' ukup pendanda' andeande' pefe' pila gawa si'i uguf fagafe'. Ea' pigi'ma waf bu'wafi si'i anal amil ma'unai, ipa' ina ukup pepe awepa penda' waf awafi, owa'.
40010017	Ipa' solawaipa andeande'ma anom amam. Amom atiasi a' monda'mepa kota amom dembami Juda ea' mehepa nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi.
40010018	Amom mogawa ipa' ukup pagapoma basef ae'afi ea' mi'i mondaiwa'mepa, ea' mofa'epa pefe' pilutu nogohnaep kingi gavman dembami ma pegawalapa basef ae'afi bu'wafi ma amom moloma esis amam nematawa sogolalama Godi piga'ipasef.
40010019	Esis atiasi sowalapepa ma kot, ipa' ina a' ombal mehepa a'owa' pi'i, ‘Apa' atiasi mogwa basef mi'if mi'imama?’ Owa'i. Atiasi nogota atamba atota God nihimba'mepa basef maif ipa' pewalapef piga'iefi.
40010020	Ifimba ina ipa' atipa pi'if, owa'atin. Spirit Ambal bu'unai Godi atona nowalapa basefa malogof ipe'igufi.
40010021	“Nemaf afamba atiasi esis atis sahin owan sondanda'ma kot sohas soga'. Ea' ahapas sonda'am na'amba atina esis nogaopas asasisi. Ea' batawisas wapani sonda' kotima mamasas asasisi anis sohas soga'.
40010022	Atiasi epes hiasi walemb hiagoma nelelemb numbutima ipa' kwapete' endilisi. Esis sati ipa' pagaila basef ae'afii, na'amba dei' sahepa. Apa' epen ami nihapifi banagen nilutuma negatagama nemaf akutaifii, inimba atiasi God nuwambilan nokwahoman waf awafi ananifi nitanimai nepe andeande'.
40010023	I'i esis sagape anin tauni sonda' waf awafima ipa' ma, pefa' pefe' anambel wambel daiambel. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Ipa' ina atiasi penda' maol ae'ani hi'ilana walemb ambalemba Israeli hiagoma, ata' owa', ipa' a piti ae' igafi'i.
40010024	“Epes sanda' skul atini ina sape dambes sikila' tisa asasinai, owa'. Ea' epen inimba agol akani nanda' maol dowafi anin ina nape ilifa dembinai ananinai, owa'.
40010025	Apa' i'i esis sanda' skuli sogape na'amba atin si'i ae' tisa asasiwai, esis a' ukup pendegawa andeande' pi'i, ‘Andeande'ma afa' ogame' akafimi si'i tisa afa'inai.’ Apa' i'i anin epen agol akani nanda' maol dowafi negape si'i dembinai ananinai, isimba wapani dao' a' andeande'ma negame' akafimi si'i dembinai ananinai. Ae' dembiwai ahamepa ma wambota ae'atai esis sa'i basef awafi ma agol ae'agili sa'i ae' Belsebul. Anaf esis si'ipipa sonda'mepa agof awogufi endilisi fikila' agol Belsebul sanda'meagol ae'i.
40010026	“Ea' ipa' ina ombal mehepa ma amom, owa'i. Hiahaom mape mandambahi'i anaf motaga alihigima hiasi sotolom sogawam. Hiahaom hiami ata' sambaho'wam maga'ihi, anaf a' motaga mondawalap, hiasi sogawam.
40010027	Basef ifimba ae' ambahe'ef akot aga'ipa ipa' atipafi, ifimba pewalapef pi'if alip. Ea' basef pagame'ef sa'ombel hikihika' aligah atogahi, ifimba pelota petoma ifagw ilif pewalapef pi'ifa amam nematawa sogame'ef.
40010028	Ipa' owa'i ombal mehepama esis sogahepa alop atop pogaga'ia, apa' esis ina atiasi la'ifis sogaha nomonasi ambagof ipe'isi, owa'atin. Apa' ipa' ombal mondahepama aman anamba la'ifinai ma nogaha ipa' alop si'ip pogaloma nomonasi ambagof ipe'isi ma wambel awambili hel.
40010029	“Ipa' pegawa epes satala amiguf bias sa'usi ma moni otam wa'ani atitin. Apa' ahamepa ipe'inai ina natiti anin amil atitin niwai dowaf, owa'atin. Numafiagof andeande'.
40010030	Ea' anen a' niamba awif fagalo balagah ipe'igahi dondo' hi'alef.
40010031	Ea' ipa' owa'i ombal mehepaea. Anen okom mapoma ipa' apikila' amiguf hiagufi agwafomba sa'ugufi.”
40010032	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Epen ami newalapa agol ae'agili ma amam nematawa hiasi, anaf ae' wapani ewalapa agol epen inimbai ma naep ahame Godi gani heven.
40010033	Apa' epen ami newa'e alafuga nindaiwa'me ma owa' newalape ni'ipas naep epesia, na'amba atin anaf ae' wapani ese'ana alafuga epen inimba ma naep ahame Godi gani heven.”
40010034	Jisas na'i anif basef waminif atina wandaf na'i, “Ipa' ina pi'i ae' afi'i itap apa'e ma egakolasa ipa' pegape opalef awanelefa atiasi wandaf lopa' gugul owa'atin, owa'. Ae' ifa'i bainat hikalinai a' ifi'i ma atiasi anis epes sosafel sopa' sogaloma anis.
40010035	Ae' afi'i ma enda' waf afamba lopa' gugulifi fegataga, si'i basef fa'ias faga'i, ‘Anaf anona aman noloma ahamana ananinai mondatopa' biafim, ea' ano'w nemata'w koloma ma'ma'w ondatopa' biafiwa, ea' mefi'ma'w akwo'ukwi koloma ma'ma'w kwandagi'mo'wi ondatopa' biafiwa.
40010036	Ea' esis sagape ipat atotai esis wambota aman anambai atiasi sondawal sotaga bousi.’
40010037	“Epen ami okom magamagaila ahamani ma'man ananisi atisi ma owa' okom mimila ae'a, epen inimba ina a' netaga alipini ae'ani endilisi, owa'atin. Ea' epes amam nematawa ami nomonas asasisi asohafel sisila awasi asasisi a'owa', ma owa' nomonas sisila ae'a, isimba ina asotaga alipisi ae'asi endilisi, owa'atin.
40010038	Ae' efa' akafimi anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Epen ami owa' nenda'as na'amba atin si'i ae'a ma nigailima, epen inimba ina la'ifin netaga alipini ae'ani, owa'atin.
40010039	Epen ami okom mopoma ambal ananili atol ni'i nihapilal tatala'il nenda' maol nela'ambema ambal ananili, anaf ambal ananili higililal. Apa' epen okom mopoma ae' ma nesambala ambal ananili itap apa'e, anaf God nowambilai ambal ananili nitanimai nepe andeande' lifilafi.”
40010040	“Epen ami nese'epa nembela niga'i ipa' ae'ipai, anin a' nase'e nembel ae' wapani. Ea' epen inimba nagase'e nembela ae'i, anin naso'ana nembel God nasapa'e agafi'ii.
40010041	Epen ami niti anona aman profeta niga'i, ‘Aman anamba profet nanda' maol Godii. Ae' ese'ana opaf endatopalopana.’ Epen inimba anaf a' nefa' hiahaom bu'wami si'i profet anamba nogofa'ami. Ea' epen ami niti anona aman fasinai nifi'i ma anin ni'i, ‘Ae' a'i anen aman fasinai. Ea' etopalopana ese'ana opaf.’ Epen inimba bola nefa' hiahaom fasimi si'i aman anamba fasinai nogofa'ami.
40010042	I'i epen ami niti anis epes falafisi wafisi a'a agufisi ma anin nitilis okom mimila epes isimba Jisasi, netopalopas nese'asa embel mais. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anaf epen inimba nefa' hiahaom ananimi fasimi ina higililam, owa'atin.”
40011001	Jisas na'ipama basef ifimba alipumi ananimi ma hi'alef, nosafel nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' taun walemb hielimbi itap lu'upa Galili nawalipa amam nematawa hiasi na'ipasa basef Godi.
40011002	Jon nagapisi'as embeli nape nanda' kalabus, ea' name' basefa maol hiani Krais nanda'ani. Ea' dei' Jon nasapa' anom alipumi ananimi mafe'ma Krais.
40011003	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' aman ma'wina a' nafi'i, ea' a'a ata' mope mohafa anona daiana?”
40011004	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipa' pitanima pefe' pi'ipa Jona hiahawes isimba dei' patilis pagame'asi.
40011005	Isimba naep pagaso'asi asati wapani, bo'wagah awamisi asafe' andeande', aowas aunai nanda' alop asasipi pagambu'wi ambo'wes, aligah hagaso'asi ea' same' basef andeande', sagaga'i sotanima sosafel wapani, a kwahusi same' basef bu'wafi Godi.
40011006	Epes mamahisa ukup atifip sagahapifai, isimba asonahas andeande'.”
40011007	Ea' alipumi amamba Joni mafe' atin, Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa ma Jon na'i, “Fowa' ipa' pafe' anep itap fataupigima wafigima, pafe' pati main? Pafe'ma pagati anona aman pupulinai si'i anota elifita fufin naolata tagalimbi? Owa'atin.
40011008	A'a pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman nagala klos fasimi atumii? Owa'atin. Epes isimba sanda' luwaguf maim fasimi atumi esis sape ifagw king dembamii atogw.
40011009	Apa' ipa' dei' pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman profet? Ae' a'ipipa, anen profet dembinai nikila' profet hiami hi'alam.
40011010	Aman anamba ea' ma'una anen atona si'i basef fagape Baibeli na'iasa God fowa' na'ipa Jisas naga'i, ‘Peme', anaf ae' esapa' anona aman nogawalipasa basef ae'afii nili' nofe'ma ina'. Ea' nondondomba ufia'w ine'ikwi.’
40011011	“Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli a' nikila' amam hiami hi'alam magataga itap apa'i. Apa' epen ami dei' nigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafian, inimba dembeni nikila' Jon. I'i epen inimba sa'usa'uni ma wambota Godi, anin wapani dei' nape damben nikila'ana.
40011012	Nogota atamba fowa' Jon nagapisi'as embeli ea' tafi'i togotambel dei', anom amam banagami ma'i mohambombaga waf epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Apa' anom amam dindinapimi dei' mawis mape nomona maol inimba atapim mahapilan tatala'ina anen nogape Dembinai ma amom.
40011013	Amom magawalipasa basefa mu'uli Godi faloma basef amom profeti mawalipasef mape mafi'i metambel nogota Jon nagatagatai.
40011014	Apa' i'i ipa' pi'i aho'ma pigahapifa basef amamifima, dei' pegawa Jon anen si'i Elaija, aman anamba fowa' amom profet ma'i nogafi'ii.
40011015	Ipa' epes ami aligah hagagalipai, peme' basef ifimba andeande'.
40011016	“Atiasi ae' indila'waifa ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itapi ataipai i'imama? Ipa' pape si'i awasi sandakolas sagapoma sofala anis awasi daias saga'i,
40011017	‘Apa' mandagala mufapula batagwa ipa', apa' ipa' ina palemb. Apa' manda' awalef si'i sagatala fawiagof malef mindiwagef, apa' ipa' owa' pelefa.’ Ipa' epes dei' pagape itapi panda' du'wanigai si'i awasi isimba owa' sealemb selef sigindiwagefia.
40011018	Aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli nafi'i ina na' gwa'aisii embel wainimbel, owa'atin. Ea' pa'i ambal aunai napaona.
40011019	Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi afi'i a' gwa'aisi saloma embel wain, ea' patolowe pa'i, ‘Piti aman anamba naga' wali'ita hiatai naga' embel wain hiani endilisii. Anen alipunai ma amom mogofa' takisi magambaso'masi maloma amam manda' waf awafii.’ Apa' epes ami sigaila gawa fasini Godi sonda' waf bu'wafi, isimba atis dei' hiasi sa'i, ‘Gawa inimba bu'wani.’”
40011020	Analemb walemb lu'walimbi taun fowa' Jisas nanda' hiahaom banagami esis satolom sogawam apa' esis ina sambema nelelemba God, owa'atin. Ea' dei' Jisas nanda' megahahas.
40011021	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ati ipa' Korasinipai paloma Betsaida uwahipipa a'owa'. Nimanimi akafimi lu'wami atiasi a' motagamepa. Epes isimba fowa' gani sanda' waf awafii sagape walemb ambalemba bialemb Tairi Saidon ina sati anom hiahaom maol banagami si'i dei' anda'am walemb ipe'ilimbi, owa'. I'i sotolumai, sowaho' begah pepe'agatami si'i luwaguf tol sope nif agambeh. Ama sigihimba'ma anis epes esis ea' sambema nelelemb endilisi safe'ma God. Owa', owa'atin.
40011022	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa. Anaf God nogawaloga esis amom nematawa hiasi, afamba nimanimi Tairi soloma Saidoni amamba ina lu'um a'owa' si'i nimanimi amamba anaf mogatagama ipe'i, owa'atin. Anaf anen niti uwahipis, apa' ipa' owa'.
40011023	Ea' ipa' Kaperneam, anaf esis sosa'ma agof ipe'igufi folota ilif? Owa'atin. Anaf God nokwahipa pefe' wambel awambili hel. I'i fowa' gani anona aman nonda' anom banagami wambel ambalemba Sodom si'i anda'am wambel ipe'imbiliai, epes isimba Sodom ina soga' ma nif lu'wami, owa'atin. Dei' bafasas akusas asasisi sope namis. Owa', owa'atin.
40011024	Dei' ae' a'ipipa, nemaf afamba lu'wafi God nogawaloga epesafi, niti fowa' sagape Sodomi uwahipis kwasakwasala. Apa' anen ina niti uwahipipa, owa'. Anaf pefa' akafimi lu'wami awami endilisi.”
40011025	Nemaf afamba Jisas na'ias na'amba na'i, “O ahame, ina' dembinai ma ilifi itapi. Ina' nambaho' hiahaom amamba ma esis epes gawaisi sogofa' gawa lu'wanii, ea' nambemam nihimba'masam epes isimba gawa akasi falafisi.
40011026	Aho' ahame okom ine'imi maga'i ea' amamba atom.
40011027	Ahame ae'anai nanda' hiahaom hiami hi'alam mape lagol ae'agili. Ina anin epen negawa ae' Nogamana Godi, owa'atin. Anen atona nogawe. Ea' owa' anin epen negawa ahamea, owa'atin. Ae' Nogamana ananiwai atowe egawana. Epes isimba mamahisa igihimba'masa ahamai, isimba wapani esis atis sogawana.
40011028	“Ipa' epes panda' maol numa'winii noma'w kwagahipai ma pegelaoma ufia'w bu'wakwi kwagafe'ma Godi, ipa' hipai pifi'mai ae', enda'epa pegapoma noma'w.
40011029	Peme' basef ae'afi pigi'mif panda' waf ae'afi. Waf afamba si'i anoga lawag ae' ase'epaga pegewandefaga ikaguf ipe'ifii. Ipa' pendefa' gawa ae'ani ma pegegawa ae'. Dei' main? Ae' anda' waf sa'umbilifi ma epesi, ae' ina agasa'ma agol ae'agili atogila okom ae'ami, owa'. Ipa' pifi'mai ae' ma atiasi pegapoma noma'wa ambagof ipe'igufi.
40011030	Dei' main? Maol ae' ese'epan pegefa'ani, inimba ina hiahaom nimanimi, owa'atin. Maol inimba fasini endilisi ma negatopalopa ipa' epes hipai.”
40012001	A'i owa' anef nemaf Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sabat, Jisas nafe' anagon owa', nataga anof aof sagawa witafi a' nawis. Ea' alipumi ananimi mafe' malomana nolomaham mosaga anom wit magaufi ma'am.
40012002	Owa' amom Farisi mati waf afambai alipumi Jisasi manda'afi ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' niti waf afamba alipumi ine'imi manda'afi. Amom ina monda'am na'amba ma nemaf afa'e sabat magapoma noma'wafi, owa'i. Dei' maina amom manda'am na'amba?”
40012003	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pegawa basef ifimba ea' ma waf fowa' dembinai king Devit nanda'afi. Afamba Devit naloma alipumi ananimi nolomagaham
40012004	anen nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon na' bret atamba amom pris mondolali magaso' Godatai. Ea' anen na'ata naso' alipumi ananimi wapani ma'ata atin. Apa' mu'uli ape'ini na'i amom ea' pris atom mea'ata. Owa' anen ina naila mu'uli inimba, owa'.
40012005	Ipa' patalifa basef ifimba fagape buk mu'uli'wi Godi ea' ma amom pris manda' maol ipat lu'unai Godi nomon. Basef ifimba ma nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi amom ina magi'mif, owa'. Mumbisila'ef. Apa' amom ina manda' waf awafi, owa'atin.
40012006	Ae' dei' a'ipipa, anin epen dei' nagape na'ai anin a' nikila' ipat lu'unai Godi.
40012007	Basef fagail buk Baibel fowa' amom manda'afi fa'ias na'amba fa'i, God na'i, ‘Ae' ina okom ma'i bulmakau mafis pindalalima ae'asi, owa'. Ae' okom ma'i ipa' piti sahin owan ipe'isi uwahipis.’ I'i ipa' pegawa basef ifimba Godi kofagefa ai, ipa' ina apewaloga epes isimba owa' sonda' anef waf awafia, pi'i awasi. Owa' owa'atin. Ipa' owa' pegawefa.
40012008	Dei' main, ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ae' atowe ape dembiwai ma nemaf afamba sabata iga'ipipa maol main andeande'ma pigaila basef penda'an nemaf afamba.”
40012009	Jisas nosafel nakwaha aof afamba nafe' nawis anota ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai.
40012010	Ea' nati anona aman lagol awagilinai nape ipat atamba. Aowas nanda'ana lagol ananigili gaga' dindigigil gailana. Anom amam ma'i mowando'mana ufia'wa mogasapaga Jisasa anif basef baso'afi ma monda' kotimana. Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Afa' andeande'ma ogatopalopa anis epes aowas nanda'asi ma nemaf afa'e sagapoma noma'wafi, a'a owa'?”
40012011	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “I'i anona aman ipe'inai sipsip ananipi pofe' powala pogape anoga nowaga lougai nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi, ipa' pafe' pagiapi.
40012012	Waf afambai bu'wafi. Apa' epes sikila' sipsip a'owa'. Ea' na'amba atin apa' monda' waf fasifi mondotopalopa epes nemaf afamba magapoma noma'wafi.”
40012013	Ea' Jisas na'ipa aman anamba lagol awagilinai na'i, “Dowa lagol ine'igili usi'igil.” Ea' aman nando lagol ananigili agataga bo'wagol wapani, si'i wa'agol.
40012014	Owa' amom Farisi mosafel mawis ando' munduwa'anima ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Jisas nogaga'.
40012015	Owa' Jisas nogawa basef ifimba ma amom ma'i mohana nogaga'. Ea' nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' ea' hiasi sagi'mana safe', nanda' isimba aowas nanda'asi hiasi ambo'wes hi'alas.
40012016	Ea' na'ipas dindinip na'i esis ina sowalapa anen si'iana alihina, owa'.
40012017	Anen na'ipas na'amba atin si'i anif basef God fowa' naga'ipa profet Aisaiefi. Basef ifimba fataga endilisi faga'ias na'amba fa'i,
40012018	“Piti aman anamba nanda' maola ae'i, ae' andandepana ea'. Nomonas ae'asi pelele' saisailana a'owa', okom ae'ami ea' bo'oma anen. Ae' atiasi ese'ana Ambal bu'unai Ae'anai nuwalipasa basef ae'afi ma nogawaloga epes hiasi owa' sogogawa ae'ia.
40012019	Aman anamba ina nonda' megahohas ninifalis ni'ipas diga lu'ugai, owa'atin. Esis ina some' malagol ananigili noga niga'i ufiawa lu'uwama, owa'.
40012020	Anota elifita sa'utai tondola'i atamba anen ina nowalota, owa'atin. Ea' anom lam fagandom nimanisi, amamba anen ina nehefam moga', owa'atin. Anen nope nonda' maol atapina nefe' nefe' notagama nemaf afamba nonda' waf bu'wafi fikila' endilisi waf awafi ma fegenalo.
40012021	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi owa' sogogawa ae'ia sila basef ananifi sope sohafana.”
40012022	Nemaf afamba esis sofa'ai anona aman ambal aunai nagawisanai safi'mai Jisas. Naep paloma malagol ananisi soso'ana, ea' Jisas nanda'ana bo'ona, na'i andeande' naep pati natologon nafe' andeande'.
40012023	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi gogolalasis kwapete' sa'i, “Aman anamba anen Devit akunamana a'a owa'?”
40012024	Owa' amom Farisi mame' isimba ma'i, “Anen natofa ambagof awami ma banagami anona ambal mamana aunai agilinama Bielsebul.”
40012025	Owa' Jisas nogawa ukup amamipi na'ipam na'i, “I'i anis epes hiasi sagape itap lu'upa anin kantri sondatopa' biafis sogapa', ina atiasi banages, owa'. I'i anis epes wambota atota sondatopa' biafisa sogapa', esis ina atiasi banages sopa', owa'.
40012026	I'i wambota Satani sondawal biafis sogapa', atiasi wambota ananitai banages si'imama? Owa'atin.
40012027	I'i endilisi ae' atofa ambagof awami ma banagami Bielsebulai, dei' ami natopalopa epes ipe'isi natofam? Owa'atin. Dei' epes isimba ipe'isi sihimba'mepa basef ipe'ifi owa' endilisifia.
40012028	Endilisi, Ambal bu'unai Godi natopalopa ae' atofa ambagof amamba awami. Ea' dei' ipa' pendegawa nemaf afamba pigawisa maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa ea' fatagamepa.
40012029	Anona aman ina banagona nefe' nuwis ipat anona aman banagonai nagapautai nonda' wala hiahaom ananimi, owa'. Anen ata' nili' nombalo'ana nowa'ana sisihina dao', atiasi banagona ma nefe' nuwis nonda' wal nogofa'i hiahaom maga'oh ipat aman anambai.
40012030	Epen ami owa' alipini ae'ani ma owa' negape atapin negaloma ae'ia, anin bouni ae'ani. Epen ami owa' nekolasa sipsip pogaloma ae'apia, anin nagatofa sipsip pafa' pagafe' atona bianai.
40012031	Ea' ae' dei' a'ipipa, God atiasi a' nokwaha waf fafifafi hiafi feloma basef findiwaifi hiafi amam nematawa sanda'afi hi'ilif okom moso'anaf. Apa' epen ami nenda' basef findiwaefa Ambal bu'unai Godi, God ina atiasi nokwahomanaf okom moso'anaf, owa'atin.
40012032	Epen ami nenda' anif basef awafi findiwaefa ae', ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, bola God a' nokwahomana awami amamba ananimi okom moso'anam. Apa' epen ami nenda' basef findiwaefa Ambal bu'unai Godi, God anaf owa'atin endilisi ma nogakwaha findiwa anamba aunai okom mogaso'anana epen inimbaia, owa'atin. Findiwa aunai atapina nopain, dei' nogota ata'e nefe' anaf nogota tigi' togatagai wapani nope atapina.
40012033	“Lawah bu'ugahi hail hola gwa'aisi bu'wasi. Apa' lawah augahi hail hola gwa'aisi awasi. Apa' mati gwa'aisi sagailagahi, mogawa lawah bu'ugahi augahi.
40012034	Ipa' epes aupai si'i uguf fagahasi, ipa' atiasi la'ifipa pi'i basef fasifi? Owa'atin. Basef mamahifa fagape si'ifa opalef epesi, ifimba atif esis sawalapefa malogof asasigufi.
40012035	Epes bu'wasi, esis nomonas fasisi sapais ea' sawalapa waf bu'wafi. Apa' epes awasi waf hiafi awafi fapais ea' sawalapa waf awafi atef.”
40012036	“Apa' ae' a'ipipa. Basef hiafi amam nematawa saga'iefi, anaf God nohali'asa basef ifimba ea' nowalogas nemaf afamba nogawaloga epes hiesiefi.
40012037	Basef ipe'ifi atif anaf God neme'epamef nowaloga ipa' ni'i ipa' epes bu'upai. Apa' i'i owa'atin, ea' basef ifimba ipe'ifi atif anaf God nilif wapani nowaloga ipa' ni'i ipa' epes aupai.”
40012038	Ea' nemaf afamba anom amam dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma anom Farisi mahali'ana ma'i, “Tisa dembinai, afa' wa'i ina' nenda' anom banagami si'i God nanda'ami ma afa' ata' otolom.”
40012039	Owa' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i panda' waf awafii pegewa' alafugaha Godi. Dei' maina ipa' pa'i pigati ae' enda' hiahaom amamba igihimba'mepa banagami Godi? Ae' ina ihimba'mepa banagami amamba ipa', owa'atin. Ametal inimba banagani fowa' God nigihimba'manan profet Jonai atin atiasi ihimba'mepan ipa'.
40012040	Fowa' aman anamba Jona aol lu'unai nowalo'ana nape nembel nomon nimaguf wanif, owambeh wanembeh. Ea' na'amba atina ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi atiasi egape nimaguf wanif owambeh wanembeh itap nomon.
40012041	Afamba God nogawaloga esis amam nematawafi esis epes Ninivaisi sosafel sola' basef fitanima filipa ma waf awafi ipa' panda'afi. Dei' main, esis Ninive same' basef Godi Jona naga'ipasafi ea' sambema nelelemb sakwaha waf awafi safe'ma God. Apa' ae' ikila' Jona.
40012042	Anaf God nogawaloga epesafi, nemaf afamba ano'w nemata'w kwin dembe'wi kwagapani gani wa'ol awin negemba'mai kosafel koloma ipa' pagape na'ai kola' basef fitanima filipa kwi'i ipa' aupai. Dei' main, kwin akwamba kwapani gani itap pafe' pegetambela ea' kwafi'i kwame' basefa gawa lu'wani dembinai king Solomon nagawalipasani. Apa' dei' anona nigikila' Solomoni nape na'a'e.
40012043	“Nemaf afamba anona ambal aunai nakwaha anin epen nawisi nagafi'i, anen nafe' anamba fatauguma nolaoma anagon na'i nogapoma noma'wa. Owa' owa'atin. Ina nati anagona nogape, owa'.
40012044	Ea' na'i, ‘Ae' itanima efe' ipat fowa' agapautai.’ Ea' nafi'i nati ipat atamba asambehata andeande' sofalo'mata tape wafita.
40012045	Ea' notanima nafe' nao'wai anogof ambagof daiagof awagufi 7-pelaiguf wapani mafi'i mawis mape ipat atamba. Ambagof amamba awami a'owa' manda' waf awafii fikila' waf awafi fowa' nali' nanda'afi. Fowa' epen inimba nape awen kwasakwasala, apa' dei' nape awen a'owa' nikila' endilisi poe fowa' nali' nagapaini. Ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i panda' waf awafii, anaf pepe awepa na'amba atin si'i epen inimba.”
40012046	Jisas ata' na'ipasa basef atin esis amam nematawa owa', ma'mana kwafi'i kwaloma owapana ananimi safi'i salutu ando' sa'i si'ipana anif basef.
40012047	Ea' anona aman na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Ina' neme', ma'mena ine'ikwi kwaloma anom owapena ine'imi salutu ando' sa'i solomena si'i.”
40012048	Owa' anen nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Ma'mai owape ae'asi ami?”
40012049	Ea' nanda' lagol nondola'waifa amom alipumi ananimi na'ipas na'i, “Piti ma'me kwaloma owape ae'asi isimba.
40012050	Epes mamahisa sigaila okom Ahamai nagape heveni, ma sonda' waf ananifii, isimba atis si'i ma'me owape hanitiame ae'asi.”
40013001	Nemaf afamba atef Jisas nakwaha ipat nawisi ando' nafe' nape felefele'ma akata dumb lu'wambi.
40013002	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'i salipana sape. Ea' nalota natoma anota bot sa'utai, apa' esis salutu akata.
40013003	Ea' naso'asa basef hiafi waminif atin na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Anona aman nafe' nowaha olemb witimb si'i raisi anof aof.
40013004	Anen nowahemb nafe', anemb bewa ufia'w sagafe'ma ea' amiguf fufia' fafi'i fa'amb.
40013005	Apa' anemb bewa otambaipa itap owa' lu'upa kwasala'up, patoma ilif atogon, owa' pewala awina. Ea' batagai kwafalis.
40013006	A'i awin natafi ma owaf faluwi fahamb alimb masilimb ina bewafa bewala itap atep, owa'. Ea' owaf fahamb a' alimb.
40013007	Apa' anemb bewala la'afena mandelef wandafumi mataga malomam maofana wit, ea' amom ina mail mola gwa'aimi, owa'.
40013008	Apa' anemb bewa bagafe' itap fasipai ea' bataga balo bail bela gwa'aisi. Anemb bela 100-pelaimb, anemb bail bela 60-pelaimb, apa' anemb bail bela 30-pelaimb atom.
40013009	Ipa' aligah hagapaipai ma pagame' basef ifimbai, pendame'ef andeande' ukup pendapomef.”
40013010	Ea' amom alipumi ananimi mafi'mai Jisas ma'ipana ma'i, Dei' maina ina' naga'ipasa basef esis waminif atin?”
40013011	Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “God ea' nihimba'mepa basef kofagefa fape fandambahi'i ma ipa' piwis nomona maol ananini nope Dembinai nugumafipa. Apa' epes isimba, owa'atin. Anen ina nihimba'masa basef ifimba kofagefa, owa'.
