40013012	Epes ami sogahapila basef Godii, atiasi God a' nowatanimasef wapani. Apa' isimba owa' sogahapilifia, atiasi basef kwawia'wif ifimba esis sagahapilafi, God a' nondalombasef esis ea' sope dowaf.
40013013	Basef kofagefa ma ae' dei' aga'i basef waminif atinafi ma esis, ifimba. Esis satologon, apa' esis ina atiasi siti anis maefah. Ea' esis sogahembe' seme' basef, apa' ina sogawa kofagefa, owa'atin.
40013014	Esis sanda'am na'amba ma anif basef fowa'ifi fandawalap endilisi. Basef ifimba anona profet Aisaia fowa' God na'ipanaef nanda'afi faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Ipa' anaf pegehembe' peme' basef, apa' ina pegawa kofagefa. Ipa' petologon atapigin, apa' ina piti anis maefah, owa'atin endilisi.
40013015	Dei' main, ukup amam nematawa isimbai maso'as a'owa', aligah asasigahi haso'as ukup iwanipa sogame' basef. Ea' sasopama naep asasipi ma sogati hiahawes. Ea' aligah asasigahi haso'asa sogame' basef. Ukup asasipi paso' ma sogogawa basef kofagefa. Ama esis sombema opalef sigagi'ma ae' ma enda'as bo'wes wapani. Apa' owa', owa'atin.’
40013016	“Apa' ipa' sonahepa. Dei' main, naep ipe'ipi ea' pati hiahawes, aligah ipe'igahi hame' basef.
40013017	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, fowa' amom profet hiami maloma anom amam manda' waf usi'ifi hilili'i ma'i miti hiahaom amamba dei' ipa' pagatulumi, apa' ina matolom, owa'atin. Ukup amamipi pa'ipa'i a'owa' ma mogame' basef ifimba ipa' pagame'afi, apa' owa', owa'atin. Amom ina mame'ef.”
40013018	“Ipa' peme' basef kofagefa ifimba waminif atini ma aman anamba nogowaha olemb gwa'aimbi aofi.
40013019	Basef ifimba ma epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias fagape na'amba. Olemb begewa ufia'wi ambamba si'i epes isimba sagame' basef ifimbai, apa' esis owa' ukup pepemefa. Ea' Satan nafi'i nelefata basef ifimba God nagawef nomon ukup asasipii.
40013020	Apa' anemb bewa bafe' anagon otambaigimai, ambamba si'i anis epes same' basef Godi sofa'ef kwafalis sandagalamef.
40013021	Apa' isimba si'i masilimb owa' bendala itap awinia. Esis sahapilif nogota bandata ma a'i owa', anis amam nematawa sandaiwa'ma sagahapifa basef Godi sanda'as findiwas, sahas, sanda'masa waf awafi ea' kwafalis atis sandahagas sakwaha sagahapifa Godi.
40013022	Anemb begewala mandelef wandafumi la'afini, ambamba si'i anis same' basef sailif safe', owa' nomonas salasafe' ma hiahaom magape itapi ma ukup pagapagaila moni maim hiami ea' amambai mataga maofana basef Godi. Ea' ina sahapifif sanda' waf bu'wafi banages, owa'atin. A sowa si'i gwa'aisi owa' sogalo andeande'ia.
40013023	Apa' anemb begewa itap fasipai si'i epes isimba same' basef bu'wafi ma ukup asasipi pagapomef sahapilif sogawefa sanda' waf fasifii. Anis sanda' waf bu'wafi si'i begela 100-pelaisi, apa' anis si'i begela 60-pelaisi. Apa' anis si'i begela 30-pelaim dowafi.”
40013024	Ea' Jisas na'ipasa anif basef waminif atini wapani esis amam nematawa hiasi na'i, “Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona aman nafe' nogowaha olemb fasimbi gwa'aimbi aof ananifi.
40013025	A'i owa' owamb esis hiasi saga'ihi, anin epen bouni ananini nafi'i, nowaha otalef awalifi wapani aof afamba anen doko' nogowaha olemb bu'wambia ea' nafe'.
40013026	Ama main, olemb ambamba bu'wambi bataga ma benafa bela gwa'aisi, amom manda' maola aman kofagonama aofi ea' mati otalef awalifi fataga fape faloma olemb fasimbi.
40013027	Ea' mati na'amba, mafi'i ma'ipa anen ma'i, ‘Dembinai, afa' wa'i owa' ina' newaha olemb gwa'aimbi aof ine'ifi. Apa' otalef amamba awasimi magaluwi. Ami newahom mataga?’
40013028	Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Anona aman bounai nanda'am.’ Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, ‘Ina' na'i afa' ofe' ugi otalef amamba awami owa'aniam mo'oh atogon?’
40013029	Owa' aman anamba na'ipam na'i, ‘Ahae' owa'. Na'amba pelelama wit a pigiam moloma otalef awalifi.
40013030	Ipa' kwahowam mondape atifima la'isitai dao', ea' winifa'am. Nogota atamba sogofa' gwa'aisiatai, ae' i'ipa amom manda' maol inimbai i'ipam i'i, ‘Ipa' piwa'ania otalef afalemba awalifi piwasi'alef ondogw fe'eha pegaofalef. Ea' petama wit pefa'am pekolasom mofe' muwis mo'oh ipat ae'atai.’”
40013031	Ea' Jisas naso'asa anif basef waminif atin wapani na'i, “Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i nalelef sa'utipilif sa'ulifi. Anona aman nofa'alef nawalef aof ananifi.
40013032	Anelef nalelef mastetilif sa'usa'ulifi. Ina lu'walef si'i sa'utip gwa'aipi lawah hiagahi, owa'. Afalemba sa'usa'ulef a'owa'. Apa' natagai ma nagalo, lu'una nikila' gwa'aisi hiasi sagape aufahi. Anen nataga lawag lu'unai ea' amiguf fafi'i fala owah fatoma agufugama.”
40013033	Ea' nawalapa anif basef waminif atini wapani ma esis na'i, “Epes isimba sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i yis ano'w nemata'w kofa'as kwambemas saloma plaua hiami magala dram lu'wamii. A'i owa' main, a' matef lu'um.”
40013034	Basef ifimba hiafi Jisas na'ipasef waminif atina amam nematawa isimba hiasi. Anen ina na'ipasef alihif, owa'atin. Na'if waminif atin.
40013035	Dei' anif basef anona aman profet fowa' nanda'afi dei' ea' fataga fandawalap. Profet anamba naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Anaf ae' iga'i malogol i'i basef waminif atin. Ae' i'i basef fape fandambahi'i dambadamba God nanda' ilifi itap fafi'i fafi'i fataga dei'.”
40013036	Ea' Jisas nosafel nakwaha esis amam nematawa hiasi nafe' ipat, ea' alipumi ananimi mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Basef ifimba waminif atina otalef awalifi fagataga aofi, ina' a' newalapa kofagefa ma afa'.”
40013037	Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef na'ipam na'i, “Aman nogowaha olemb bu'wambii anamba ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi.
40013038	Apa' aof afamba si'i walemb itap apa'e hiagoma hi'alagon. Ea' olemb ambamba bu'wambi si'i epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Apa' otalef awalifi, afalemba si'i epes awasisi Satani.
40013039	Ea' aman anamba bounai nogowaha otalef awalifii, anen Satan. Ea' nogota atamba sogola gwa'aisiatai, atamba si'i nemaf akutaifi ma itap apa'e hiagoma. Apa' amam amamba mogola gwa'aimi witi, amamba si'i amom ensel.
40013040	Nemaf afamba amom motama otalef awalifi mofalef nif hi'igalalef na'amba atin si'i nemaf akutaifi.
40013041	Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi anaf ae' esapa'i amom ensel ae'ami ea' motofa hiahaom amamba hiami manda' epes sanda' waf awafii, moloma amam nematawa isimba hiasi hi'ilas sanda' waf awafii muli'amonas sogakwaha anamba ae' agala'ambemagoma.
40013042	Ea' amom ensel a' mokwaha epes isimba sofe' nif lu'wafi, sope nif amamba selef kwapete'as nalelef tilili talala' sope awes.
40013043	Nemaf afamba amam nematawa bu'wasi sogala' a'owa' si'i awin alipini anamba Ahamas nagala'ambemagoma. Epes aligah hagapaipai, ipa' pendame' basef ifimba andeande'.
40013044	“Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anin moni sambaho'wan nagape anof aof itapi. Ea' anona aman nafi'i natilin nambaho'wan wapani. Anen sonahana endilisi nafe' nofala anis epes safi'i saso'ana moni ma satala hiahawes ananisi hi'agalas. Ea' nofa' moni inimba nafe' natala aof afamba.
40013045	“Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona aman nanda' bisnisi nala' nogolaoma anis bahigis fasifasisi atis.
40013046	Ea' nati anis fasisi endilisi sagatalis otamba hiambaii nofala anis epes safi'i ma sogaso'ana otamba sogatala hiahaom ananimi hi'igalam. Ea' nofa' otamba ma isimba nafe' natala bahigis isimba sowasuwaisi atis.
40013047	“Anif wapani. Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona anemb anom amam mafe' malana nowala dumb awina migili'amai agof mamimami.
40013048	Ea' anemb anamba asi'ina ma agof mahondo'ana nafi'i akata wata'ita. Ea' mape manifa' agof fasigufi atogof malo'agof folalef. Apa' agof amamba awasimi makwahom.
40013049	Ama anef nemaf akutaifi itap apa'e ea' na'amba atin si'i amom maganifa' agof fasigufi dei awasigufi dei. Amom ensel anaf mufi'i munifa' epes sanda' waf awafii sagape la'afena amam nematawa isimba fasisii mofa'as mefe'
40013050	mokwahis sofe' nif lu'wami. Ama sogape nif amamba lu'wami sowa selef kwapete'as nalelef tilili talala' sogape.”
40013051	Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' ea' pegawa basef ifimba hiafi a'a owa'?” Ea' magwamana ma'i, “Aho'.”
40013052	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Amom hiami dembami magawalipas mu'uli Godi molafa basef ananifi ma mugawis nomona maol ananini nope Dembinai nugumafiam amom mandahama na'amba. Amom si'i anona aman kofagonama ipati. Anen nafe' nawis ipat nomon nofa'ai hiahawes fasisi, namisi saloma apisi ea' nofa'as nafi'i.”
40013053	Jisas nawalipam basef ifimba waminif atini ma ea', nakwaha wambel ambalemba
40013054	nafe' wambel ananimbili kofagama. Ea' nawis ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai nasefela basef Godi na'ipasef. Anen na'ias na'amba esis agogolalasis kwapete' sa'i, “Gawa inimba naloma banagami amamba ma nanda' hiahaom si'i God nanda'ami, anen nofa'ami ani?
40013055	A'i aman anamba nogama aman nagala' ifagwi Maria kogolanai a'a? Apa' mogawa owapana ananimi Jems Josep Saimoni Judas mape na'a.
40013056	Hanitiamana ananiwai wape walomapa na'a. Apa' hiahaom amamba gawa banagani anen nofa'ani ani?”
40013057	Ea' sowa' alafugaha anen. Owa' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Anona profet agol gatomana analemb walemb hielimbi daialemb, sa'i anen dembinai sahapifana. Apa' ina anagol agol gatoma gandawalapana alihigila wambel kofagama ananima, a ipat ananitai nagapoma, owa'atin.”
40013058	Esis owa' sogahapifa aninia. Na'amba dei' anen ina nanda' anom hiahaom banagami hiami wambel ambalemba, owa'atin.
40014001	Nemaf afamba anona aman agilinama Herot nape dembinai gavmana itap lu'upa Galili. Anen name' basefa maol bu'wani Jisas nanda'ani, ea' name' sasa'ma agol Jisasi gafe' lu'wagol.
40014002	Ea' Herot na'ipa isimba sanda'mana maol na'i, “Aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli, a' nosafel wapani dei' nape banagona nanda' maol si'i God nanda'ani.”
40014003	-
40014004	Fowa' basef ifimba fagape na'amba. Herot owamana Filip waulu'mana anani'wi agili'wa Herodias. Ea' sahomana Herot nandalombana'w. Ea' Jon na'ipa Herot na'i, “Ina' naso' nemata'w sahomenai, ea' nawala mu'uli Godi. Na'ambai ina andeande', owa'.” Apa' Herod nandaiwa'ma nogali'amona'w ea' na'ipa amom soldia mofa' Jon mafe' manda'ana nanda' kalabus.
40014005	Herot na'i nohana noga' apa' owa' owa'atin. Dei' main, anen ombal mahanama amam nematawa hiasi sa'i Jon anen profet. Na'amba Herot ina nahana, owa'.
40014006	-
40014007	Nafe' ma anef nemaf Herot nofala epes hiasi safi'i sanda' kolasa nandagalama nemaf ma'mana kogolanafi. Nemaf afamba Herodias nogama'w kwafi'i kwawisi nomon kwalutu kwalemb. Esis hiasi satolo'w ea' Herot nandagalama'w na'i basef endilifi atif naga'if banagafi na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipina, i'i ina' ni'ipa ae' ma egase'ena anom maefah, ae' igasi'enami.”
40014008	Ea' ako'w kwafe'ma ma'makw kwa'ipa'w kwafe' kwa'ipa Herot kwa'i, “Dei' atef ae' a'i ina' neha aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli noga' netopa' balaga gola anota plet nefa'agai nese'e.”
40014009	-
40014011	Ako'w kwa'ias na'amba, opaf Heroti a' nemanif a'owa'. Apa' anen okom mandanda' ma na'i basef endilifi atif naga'if banagafi, ea' amam nematawa hiasi isimba same'ana. Ea' nasapa' anona aman soldia nafe' ipat kalabusitai natopa' bamato'w Joni nala balaga gala plet nafi'i naso' Herodias nogama'w kofa'aga kwafe' kwaso' ma'makw.
40014012	Ea' amom alipumi Joni mafi'i mofa' alop ananipi mafe' mawana matmat. Ea' mafe' ma'ipa Jisasa hiahaom amamba.
40014013	Jisas name' basef ifimba, anen atona nafe' nakwaha wambel ambalemba nofa' bot nafe' anagon wafigima epes akagoma. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi same' basefa Jisas nafe' sakwaha wambel hiagoma asasima sailana safe' ufia'w sa'i sotolona.
40014014	Jisas nafe' nataga akata nati esis hiasi nati uwahipis. Ea' nati epes asasisi aowas nanda'asi, nanda'as bo'wes wapani.
40014015	A'i owa' main wambomota felefele'ma owamb alipumi ananimi mafi'i ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wape na'a wafigima ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb. Ina' nesapa'as sofo'o analemb walemb sogotala gwa'aisi sonda'as soga'as.”
40014016	Owa' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ina esapa'as sefe', owa'. Ipa' atipa pese'as gwa'aisi.”
40014017	Ea' amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' gwa'aisi owa' hiasa. Bret wa'agolita taloma agof biagof ea' ma'wis sa'omafa.”
40014018	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' fa'as fi'i pese'eas ae'.”
40014019	-
40014020	Ea' na'ipa amam nematawa hiasi sape otalef bo'walifi itap. Ea' nasa'ma bret atamba wa'agolita taloma agof naniga nati heven ilif na'i nanifela God. Ama ea', nindiwata naso' alipumi ananimi mafe' maso'as sa'as dondo' a' alihis andeande'. Ea' alipumi ananimi matatama du'wa'wanis sagasaga'ihi malo'was folalef lu'walifi 12-pelailif asi'ilif kwaef.
40014021	Epes saga' gwa'aisi isimbai hiasi. Esis siamba amam atom mataga 5000-pelaim. Apa' ina siamba awasi nematawa, owa'.
40014022	Jisas nasapa' alipumi ananimi mofa' bot mali' mafe' dumb ambamba mambo fisana. Ea' nasapa' amam nematawa hiasi safe'.
40014023	Safe'ma ea', anen atona nalota anota halafuta nape nandabeten nahali' God. Wambomota felefele'ma owamb, anen atona ata' napani halafuta ilif.
40014024	Apa' alipumi ananimi mape bot mali' mafe' mandasapa' dumb la'afimba, owa' fufin lu'wani nalo nafi'i. Ea' embel lasiali' mafi'i mahagasai bot. Ea' fufin wapani nakoto'ma bot, tanda'am bimi bema tala.
40014025	Akot ata' tail atin, felefele'ma logola, owa' Jisas nagi'mam natoma nafe' embel ilif nafe'ma amom.
40014026	Amom mati anen nalutu nafi'i embel ilif, ombal maham kwapete' ma'i owa', anona gamba nailam nafe'. Ea' manda'am wiwa ma'oh kwapete'.
40014027	Owa' Jisas nalomam na'i kwafalis na'i, “Ipa' banagepa, ombel mogahepa owa'. Ae' atowe ma'uwi ailipa afi'i.”
40014028	Ea' Pita nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai! I'i ina' ma'wina, ni'ipa ae' ilutu efe'mago ina' embel ilif.”
40014029	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fi'i.” Ea' Pita nakwaha bot natoma nafe' embel ilifam nafe'ma Jisas.
40014030	Apa' owa', anen nati embel mohafel lu'um, ombal mahana na'i a' nowala embel. Ea' nofala Jisas na'i, “Dembinai! Ina' topalopae.”
40014031	Ea' kwafalis atis Jisas nowasa' lagol nahapilana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' owa' nihapilif banagena ni'i ae' la'ifiwaia, owa'. Dei' maina ina' nomonas sagape biafis?”
40014032	Ea' amom biam malota bot, fufin naloma embel mandahagas.
40014033	Ea' amom magape boti mati hiahaom amamba manda' lotuma Jisas mafela agol Godi lu'wagol ma'i, “Endilisi atis, ina' Nogamana Godi.”
40014034	Ea' Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mowala mambo dumb ambamba mafe' mataga anagon itap lu'upa Genesaret.
40014035	Ea' anis epes sagape itap apambai sogawana sa'i anamba Jisas. Ea' sasapa' anis safe' sa'ipa anis sagape felefele'i sofa'ai anis aowas nanda'asi safi'mai anen.
40014036	Ea' sofa'ai isimba aowas nanda'asi sa'ipana saisailana sa'i anen ni'i aho'ma isimba sogahapila lowaf ananifi da'malififa atef. Ea' epes mamahisa sagahapilaf lowaf ananifii sataga bo'wes wapani.
40015001	Nemaf afamba anom Farisi dembami esis Judai maloma anom amam dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, makwaha Jerusalem mafi'mai Jisas. Ea' mahali'ana ma'i,
40015002	“Dei' maina alipumi ine'imi mugumbisila' waf ape'ifi akupapa magaso'apafi? Ama amom owa' mosa'opa lagofa moga' gwa'aisia.”
40015003	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' pagawala mu'uli Godi ma pagaila waf ipe'ifi atef?
40015004	Ipa' pawala basef God na'if naga'i, ‘Ipa' pinifela mamasepa ipe'isi pihapifas petopalopas. Epen ami niga'i basef awafi ma ahaman ma'man ananisii, inimba anis daias sohan nega'.’
40015005	Owa' ipa' pambaso'am pa'i anif daif na'amba pa'i, Epen mamahina nindaiwa'ma negatopalopa mamasan ni'ipas ni'i, ‘Otamba mais ae'asi andaiwa'ma egase'epas. Ae' a' andandepasa egaso'anas God.’
40015006	Apa' ipa' Farisi paloma ipa' anipa pagawalipasa mu'uli Godi, ipa' pa'i aho'ma epen inimba negambaso'ma mamasan, ea' owa' netopalopasa.” Ipa' panda' waf afambai pesambala basef ifimba Godi na'i mogatopalopa mamasapa. Ea' panda' waf ipe'ifi atef lu'uf.
40015007	Fowa' profet Aisaia nondola'waifa ipa' endilisi, ipa' paga'i basefa malogof biagufi. Anen nanda'ef andeande' dondo'ma ipa', na'ias na'amba na'i,
40015008	‘Amam nematawa isimba sasa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagola malogof asasigufi atogof ando', apa' opalef asasilifi fape laogona ae'. Ukup asasipi ina sahapifi, owa' atin.
40015009	Esis ina sawalipasa basef ae'afi. Esis sawalapa mu'uli epes sagape itapi atin sambaso'mas sa'i, “Mu'uli inimba basef Godi.” Ea' sanda' lotu sasa'ma agol ae'agili dowadowaf.’”
40015010	Ea' Jisas nofala esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' peme' basef ifimba andeande'ma pegegawef.
40015011	Hiahawes gwa'aisi mais ando'asi ipa' paga'asi sagawis nomoni, isimbai ina sanda'epa awepa, owa'. Apa' hiahaom magape ukup ipe'ipi nomoni mawisi ando', amambai atom manda'epa awepa.”
40015012	Ea' alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' negawa amom Farisi mame' basef ifimba ine'ifi mandaiwa'mef nelelemb aoma ina'?”
40015013	Ea' nagwa basef waminif atina amom na'ipam na'i, “Ahame ae'anai nagape heveni nawa hiahaom anof aof. Ea' hiahaom hiami anen owa' nogowamia amamba anaf a' nigiam moloma nombalef masilimb.
40015014	Ipa' kwahowa amom amamba Farisi ata' mondape. Amom si'i amam naep pagaso'ami ma'i migihimba'ma ufia'wa anis daias. I'i esis naep pagaso'asi si'i sigihimba'masa ufia'w anis epes isimba naep pagaso'asii, atiasi esis hiasi dogwas sefe' sowa asondakolef atin sowasowala sope kwambiwag.”
40015015	Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Ina' ni'i basef ifimba kofagefa waminif atina hiahaom awami ma afa' ata' ome'ef.”
40015016	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' wapani nomonas ata' akepa a'a?
40015017	A'i ipa' owa' ata' pegawaea! Hiahaom ando'ami mawis malogofa mogowala nelelembi, amamba ea' motanima mawisi ando' mafe' mowala dowah.
40015018	Apa' hiahaom magape ipa' nomoni, ukup nomonas awami maim mataga ando', amambai atom manda'epa awepa.
40015019	Hiahaom awami magape ukup nomoni magawisii amamba. Ukup awami, waf soha anis sogaga'i, sonda' so'a waola anis amam nematawa daindaiasi, ea' sonda' anef waf awafi si'i waf afamba so'a waulafi, wal, baso'am, findiwa.
40015020	Waf afambai atef fawisi ando' fanda' epes awasis. Apa' epes owa' sosa'opa lagof andeande'ma soga' gwa'aisia si'i amom Farisi maga'i, amambai ina manda'as awes, owa'atin.”
40015021	Ea' Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' gani wa'ol itap felefele'ma walemb ambalemba bialemb Tairi Saidon.
40015022	Owa' ano'w nemata'w Kenani'wi kwape na'amba. Ako'w kwafi'i kofalana na'amba kwa'i, “O, Dembinai, ina' akunamana Deviti, ina' niti ae' uwahipiwi. Ambal aunai nahambombaga nogame ae'akwi endilisi.”
40015023	Owa' Jisas ina nagwama'wa anif basef ako'w, owa'. Ea' amom alipumi ananimi mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Nemata'w akwamba kwanda'am falafala kwagi'mafai. Ina' sapa'akw kotanima kofo'o!”
40015024	Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'ipa'w na'i, “God nasapa' ae' afi'i ma epes sagape si'i sipsip higilagalapi isimba esis Israeli atis.”
40015025	Owa' ako'w kwafi'i kwindiwa nembawa kwotawa felefele'ma anen kwa'i, “Dembinai, ina' natopalopa ae'.”
40015026	Ea' nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Apa' ina mofa' gwa'aisi awasi ape'isii mokwahis sofe'ma nombagw, owa'.”
40015027	Owa' ako'w kwagwamana basef anen kwa'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i endilisi. Nombagw agogw gwafe' lafela tebol gwatatama gwa'aisi mamasagw agwagwisii sogowa itapi gwa'as.”
40015028	Ako'w kwa'ias na'amba, Jisas nagwama'wa basef na'i, “O, nemata'w, hapif ine'ini lu'wani. Dei' hiahawes ina okom maga'iasi atiasi sotagamena si'i ina' naga'ias.” Ea' nogota atamba atota nogama'w akwa'ukwi ambo'okw wapani.
40015029	Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' felefele'ma dumb Galili. Ea' nondowasa' halafuta tol nape.
40015030	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'i salagamana sofa'i aowas naninani nanda'asi safi'mai anen. Anis bo'wagah awamisi, anis naep pagaso'asi, bihitagof mondola'asi, anis malogof fagaso'asi, aowas anamba hianai. Esis sofa'as safi'i sambe'as sa'oh felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi ea' nanda'as bo'wes.
40015031	Ea' esis gogolalasisa sagati epes isimba naep pagaso'asi satologon, malogof fagaso'asi sa'i, bihitagof mondola'asi ea' usi'im, bo'wagah awasimisi ea' bo'om safe'. Ea' dei' esis hiasi sasa'ma agol God Israeli lu'wagol.
40015032	Ea' Jisas nofalai alipumi ananimi mafi'i na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Ae' ati esis amam nematawa isimba uwahipis. Esis sape salome nimaguf wanif gwa'aisi akas a' nolomahas a'owa'. I'i ae' esapa'as sogafe' dowaf uta baop asasima, sitilif atona atona sowa so'oh sofe' ufiawa.”
40015033	Ea' alipumi ananimi ma'ipana na'amba ma'i, “Na'a wafigima epes akagoma. Atiasi afa' ofa'ai bret atamba ani ma ogaso' amam nematawa isimba hiasi?”
40015034	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Dei' ipa' bret ma'ufita ta'oh?” Owa' amom ma'i, “Afa' bret 7-pelaita taloma agof sa'ugufi kwasala'uguf.”
40015035	Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa ma sogape itap,
40015036	nasa'ma bret 7-pelaita taloma agof agwafomba nanifela God nawalis naso' alipumi ananimi ma mogaso'asas esis amam nematawa hiasi. Amom maso'as hi'alas dondo'.
40015037	Ea' sa'as dondo' a' alihis andeande'. Ea' alipumi ananimi matatama du'wa'wanisi sagasaga'ihi makolasis malo'was folalef lu'walifi 7-pelailif asi'ilif kwaef.
40015038	Esis amam nematawa saga' gwa'aisi isimbai, siamba amam atom mataga 4,000-pelaim. Apa' esis ina siamba awasi nematawa wapani, owa'.
40015039	Ama Jisas nasapa'as sagafi'i, anen nalota bot nafe' gani wa'ol dumb lu'wambi anep itap lu'upa Magadan.
40016001	Ea' anom dembami Farisi maloma anom dembami daiam Sadyusi mafi'mai Jisas ma'i mogwambana ma anen ata' nonda' anom banagami si'i God nagape ilifi nanda'ami ma ata' motolom.
40016002	Owa' anen nagwamam anif basef waminif atin na'i, “Ipa' pagati otaga wambomota felefele'ma owamb a' pa'i, ‘Otaga nasa'of akwahina. Na'amba atiasi nogota bo'otama owaf figalowatai.’
40016003	Apa' kuhumbita pa'i, ‘Otaga ilagw ea' alialim. Manda'am na'amba ma atiasi fufini asaf mogataga.’ Aho', ipa' pati ametal hiani ilifani itapani andeande' apa' dei' ipa' owa' pegawa ametal nogota ata'ili andeande'a.
40016004	Ipa' mini'ap amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i panda' waf awafii pegewa' alafugaha Godi. Dei' pefalagama pa'i pigati anin ametal banagani. Apa' ae' owa'atina enda'an pigatilina, owa'atin. Ametal inimba banagani fowa' God nigihimba'manan profet Jonai atin atiasi ihimba'mepan ipa'.” Jisas na'ipam ea', nakwahom nafe'.
40016005	Ea' Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mofa' bot mowala mambo dumb ambamba mataga fisana, apa' amom ukup paso'ama mofa' anota bret togalomam.
40016006	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pindimafuma andeande', solawaipama yis amamba amom Farisii maloma amom Sadyusii!”
40016007	Ea' amom mame' anen na'ias na'amba, amom manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' okom maso'afa bret ta'ihi, dei' na'ipafa.”
40016008	Owa' Jisas nogawa ukup amamipi na'ipam na'i, “Hapif ipe'ini ina banagen. Dei' maina ipa' panda'ipama paga'i, ‘Afa' bret akafa?’
40016009	Ipa' ukup pandanda' ma bret atamba wanifita biafita esis hiasi 5,000-pelais sa'ata ma du'wanita taga'ihi, a'a owa'? Pakolasata palo'wata folalef ma'ulif? Ipa' ata' owa' pegawefa?
40016010	Ea' ipa' owa' ukup pepoma bret atamba 7-pelaita afamba hiasi 4,000-pelais saga'atama du'wanita taga'ihi pakolasata palo'wata folalef ma'ulif?
40016011	Dei' maina ipa' owa' pegegawaea? Ae' ina a'ipipa bret endilisitai, owa'. Ae' a'i ipa' solawaipama yis amamba amom Farisii maloma amom Sadyusii.”
40016012	Ea' dei' amom mogawa, anen ina na'ipama yis isimba endilisisi, owa'. Anen na'i amom solawaima basef amom Farisi maloma amom Sadyusi magawalipasafi.
40016013	Jisas nafe' naloma alipumi ananimi mataga felefele'ma anambel wambel Sisaria Filipai. Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Amam nematawa esis sogawa ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi sogawa agol maigil sanda'meagol?
40016014	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Anis sa'i ina' Jon aman nagapisi'as embeli. Anis sa'i ina' Elaija. Apa' anis sa'i ina' Jeremaia a'a anina profet.”
40016015	Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipa' pa'i ae' ami?”
40016016	Saimon Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' Krais, aman anamba God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii. Ina' Nogamana God ambal namili lagapaunai.”
40016017	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef Pita na'i, “Saimon, ina' nogama Jonai, ina' sonahena. Ina anona aman itapanai nihimba'mena basef ifimba na'if, owa'atin. Ahame atona nagape heveni nihimba'menaef na'if.
40016018	Dei' a'ipina endilisi, agol ine'igili Pita, agol agalemba ga'i otam. Atiasi ae' enda' ma'ol banaganima sios ae'asi sotoma otam amamba ilif. Ama banagami amamba ga'i ina banagema migikila' esis, owa'atin.
40016019	Ae' atiasi ese'ena ki utaini ina' ma anamba God nagala'ambemagoma heven. Hiahaom ina' negewa'am na'a itapi, amamba anaf God nowa'am gani heven wapani. Apa' hiahaom mamahoma ina' negatagwahom na'a itapi, amamba anaf God notagwahom gani heven wapani.”
40016020	Ea' Jisas na'ipam basef banagafi na'i amom owa'i mi'ipa anis epesa anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'iia, owa'i. Mombaho'ana.
40016021	Nogota atamba Jisas nali' nandasafel nihimba'ma alipumi ananimi ma atiasi nofe' nogawis Jerusalem ama agufumi Judai mogaso'ana akafimi. Amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi moloma amom pris dembami atiasi moso'ana akafimi lu'wami anona mohana nogaga'. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilifa anef fegafe'ma wanifi a' notanima nosafel wapani.
40016022	Ea' Pita nofa' Jisas nendelefata nasa gemba ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, owa'atin, ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma hiahaom amamba mogatagama ina', owa'i, hapaimi!”
40016023	Ea' Jisas nandambema na'ipa Pita na'i, “Ina' si'i Satan. Dei' main, ina' owa' okom mopoma okom Godia, owa'. Okom mandapoma nomonas epes sagape itapi atis. Owa'i nehefa ufia'w ae'akwia. Delefata nefe' alafuga ae'agai.”
40016024	Dei' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ae' efa' akafimi anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. I'i anin epen ni'i nila ae', anin nenda'as na'amba atin si'i ae' ma nigaili. Ea' nitalogofa okom ananimi ma maol main anin na'i nenda'ani.
40016025	Epen ami okom mopoma ambal ananili atol, ni'i nihapilal tatala'il, anaf ambal ananili higililal. Apa' ami okom mopoma ae' ma nesambala ambal ananili itap apa'e, anaf ambal ananili God a' nofa'al lotanimai nepe andeande' lifilafi.
40016026	I'i epen ami nenda' maol naninani ma negefa' gwa'aimi uga hiahaom hiami itapami atom higiligalami, anin wapani awen higililan nelomam. Dei' bola hiahaom amamba anaf motopalopan mi'imama? Owa'atin endilisi. Inimba atiasi nefa' hiahaom maima negatal ambal ananili ma netanima negewambilali wapani? Owa'atin.
40016027	Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, anaf ae' ifi'i elomai hiahaom fasimi banagami mogogala'i ahamai moloma amom ensel ae'ami. Ama nemaf afamba, ae' egwamasa hiahaom hiami esis amam nematawa hiasi mondahama waf esis sanda'afi hi'ilaf.
40016028	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Anis epes dei' sagalutu na'ai, esis ina atiasi soga' ulal, ata' owa'atin, asiti ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi egape si'i dembiwai king igafi'i.”
40017001	A'i owa' main, nimaguf wanif fafe'ma hi'alef, Jisas nao'wa Pita naloma Jemsi owamana Jon nao'wam mondowasa' anota halafuta lautai. Nao'wa amom atom tol mape.
40017002	Owa' mati alop ananipi apandati na'a pogala' a'owa'. Ea' nogohnaep ananisi sogala' si'i owaf, ea' luwaguf ananimi mataga afitim si'i lambeh magahihil.
40017003	Ea' amom wanom mape owa' mati amam biam fowa'imi Mosesi Elaija mataga malutu ma'i maloma Jisas.
40017004	Amom mati isimba, Pita na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wape na'a'e a' fafas. Ina' niga'i awima, dao' ae' ela' aolah wanoh na'a'e, anop ine'ipi anop Mosesi anop Elaijai.”
40017005	Anen ata' na'i nagail atini, anom ilagw afitimi mogogala' a'owa'i maluwi maofana amom. Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai ilagw amamba ga'i basef ga'i, “Anen nogame ae'ani, ae' okom mohafel maimailana a'owa' ea' ae' okom mohafel maila waf ananifi. Ipa' pendame' basef ananifi.”
40017006	Amom alipumi ananimi mame' basef ifimba, ombal maham a'owa' ea' mowafa motawa mando' amagah itap.
40017007	Owa' Jisas nafi'i felefele'ma amom nasa lagola amom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' safel. Ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i.”
40017008	Ea' amom masa'ma naep matologon owa', ina ata' mati anin epen, owa'atin. Mati Jisas atona nalutu nalomam.
40017009	Ea' amom ata' makwaha halafuta milianai atin, owa' Jisas na'ipam dindinip na'i, “Ipa' ina pewalapa hiahaom amamba dei' pagatulumi, pi'ipa anin epenam, owa'i. A pefe' dondo'ma nemaf afamba ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ekwaha wandofa itanima egasafel wapani, dao' pi'ipas.”
40017010	Ea' alipumi ananimi mahali'ana ma'i, “Dei' maina amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maga'i Elaija fowa'inai ata' nili' nogafi'i?”
40017011	Ea' anen nagwa basef na'i, “Aho' endilisi, Elaija anen nifi'i ma nondondomba hiahaom hiami hi'igalam wapani.
40017012	Apa' owa' dei' ae' a'ipipa, anona Elaija a' nafi'i ea', apa' esis amam nematawa ina sogawa anen, owa' sa'i anona daiana. Esis sandaila ukup asasimi atom sandanda' waf aunai naninani ma anen. Ea' atiasi sonda'am na'amba atina sogase'e akafimi ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi.”
40017013	Jisas na'ias na'amba, ea' alipumi ananimi mogawa anen na'ipama Elaija anen waminif atina Jon nagapisi'as embeli.
40017014	Amom mafe' mataga ma esis amam nematawa hiasi, anona aman nafi'i natagama Jisas nindiwa nembawa notaoma anen
40017015	na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' ni'i uwahipigai ma awani aman ae'ani. Anin ambal aunai nanda'an name' akafimi lu'wami a'owa' ma alop ananipi. Aho', lifilafi ambal amamba nanda'an newala nasef nif fagandifi nafe' newala nala embel dondol.
40017016	Ae' ao'wan wafe'ma alipumi ine'imi owa', amom ina la'ifima monda'an bo'wen, owa'.”
40017017	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'amba na'i, “Ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i owa' pigahapifaia. Ea' nelelemb ipe'imi owa' bepe andeande'a. Nimaguf ata' epe elomepa? Nimaguf ma'uf wapani ma egefa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipa' okwan nifi'mai ae'.”
40017018	Jisas nagagaola ambal anamba aunai ea' nakwaha aman anamba sa'unai, ea' dei' atef aowas ananini hi'alan.
40017019	Ama main, alipumi Jisasi atom malomana mape, mahali'ana ma'i, “Dei' maina afa' owa' banagefama ogatofa ambal anamba aunaia?”
40017020	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Hapif ipe'ini ata' sa'win, Isimba atis dei' ipa' ina la'ifipa, ata' owa'. Aho', ae' a'ipipa endilisi, i'i hapif ipe'ini nendahama si'i nalelef sa'wisa'wisi mastetilif lawag, dao' atiasi ipa' pi'ipa halafuta tati pi'i, ina' dagia nefe' newala gani wa'ol, atiasi anen nondagia nogafi'i. Ipa' pihapifi banagambel na'amba, dei' banagepa ma penda' maol hiani hi'igalan.
40017021	[Apa' owa' ano'w ufia'w daia'wa pegatofa ambagof amambai awamia, owa'atin. Pelelama gwa'aisi ma pendabeten, dao' ea' isimba atis.]”
40017022	Nemaf afamba Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mafi'i atef anamba itap lu'upa Galili, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi felefele' anona aman noso'asa ae' efe'ma lagof amom boumi ae'ami.
40017023	Ea' amam amamba mohe ega'. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilifa ea', i'i owa' anef fegafe'ma wanifi, itanima esafel wapani.” Ea' nelelemb amom alipumi ananimi nimanilimb a'owa'.
40017024	Ama main Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mataga anambel wambel Kaperneam. Ea' amom mogofa' takisa ipat lu'unai Godi mafi'mai Pita mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa ipe'inai anen natala takisa ipat anamba?”
40017025	Ea' Pita na'i “Aho'.” Ama Pita notanima nafe' nawis anota ipat nomon, ea' Jisas nali' nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' okom mandanda' ma'imama? Amom king dembami itapami mofa' otamba ma takisa uga maima ami? Amom mofa'asa mini'ap esis amam nematawa amamisi atis a'a anis daiasa anin kantri?”
40017026	Ea' Pita na'i, “Ama anis amam nematawa daias.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Na'amba esis mini'ap kingi ina satala takis, owa'. Sape dowaf.
40017027	Afa' a' solawaifa. Na'amba amom muti afa' owa' onda' takisa amom ukup numbutipa afa' mi'i afa' aofai. Ea' dei' ina' fo'o la huk dumb ambamba ma nigagiai aol alamba lagali'i ina' newala malogol aoli niti anin moni atitin, moni inimba dondo' ma takisa afa' biafa. Ea' ina' nefa' moni inimba nese'aman amom, ama negatala takis isimba afa' biafai.”
40018001	Nemaf afamba amom alipumi Jisasi mafi'mai anen mahali'ana ma'i, “Ami nikila' anis daias nataga damben a'owa' ma anamba ina' nagala'ambemagoma?”
40018002	Ea' Jisas nofala anin awani nafi'mai anen nahaponan nalutu la'afena amom.
40018003	Ea' na'ipam, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Epen ami ni'i aho'ma God nope dembinai ma anin, ama naso'ana nembel God i'i awasi isimba saga'i aho'mana, isimba sanda'as na'ambai atiasi sogawis anamba God nagala'ambemagomai. I'i owa', owa'atin.
40018004	Epen ami negape sa'umbilini owa' negasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagilia netaga si'i awani inimbai dao' epen inimbai ea' nikila' anis daiasa negape dambeni anamba ae' agala'ambemagoma.
40018005	Epen ami neso' opafa negatopalopa anin awani si'i ini'i ma okom ananimi mopoma ae', anin nase'e opaf ae' wapani natopalope.
40018006	“I'i anin epen nenda' anin epen sa'wini nagahapifa ae'i, nefe' nenda' waf awafi, epen inimba negape na'amba. I'i anis epes sofa' epen inimba sondola otam lu'unai nila bini'w anani'wi sofa'an sofe' solan negewala naoh mami lu'wamiai, anin ata' nepe andeande' kwasakwasala. Apa' owa' owa'atin. I'i epen inimba nenda' anin sa'wini negakwaha nagahapifa ae'a, epen inimba atiasi nepe awen a'owa' nikila' negewala naoh afini.
40018007	Ipa' epes itapipai, ae' ati ipa' uwahipipa ma hiahaom amamba mogogwambipai monda'epa penda' waf awafii. Endilisi hiahaom amamba atiasi mogatagai, apa' epes ami sonda'am mogatagai, ae' ati esis uwahipis endilisi. Dei' main, anaf seme' akafimi lu'wami.”
40018008	Ea' Jisas na'ipam anif basef wapani waminif atin na'i, “I'i lagof a'a bo'wagah ipe'isi sonda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, petopa'as pikwahis sofo'o. Andeande' kwasakwasala ma lagufi bo'wagah atona atin sope, ma pefa' ambal namili pegape andeande'. Apa' sofa'epa sokwahepa nif lu'wami fandom atapim magapaini, anamba ina atiasi pepe andeande', owa'. Pepe awepa.
40018009	Apa' i'i naep ipe'ipi penda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, dao' pigip pikwahip. Atom atin mope ma pefa' ambal namili pegape andeande'. Na'amba naep bip pepomepa sakwahepa pefe' pewala nif lu'wafi fandif atapif fagapani wambel awambili hel. Na'amba ina atiasi pepe andeande', owa'. Pepe awepa.
40018010	“Ipa' solawaipa! Na'amba pi'i anin epen atitin sa'wini pi'i inimba anin falafini, owa'i. Dei' main, amom ensel magape heveni mumafi epes isimbai sa'wisi andeande'. Ensel amamba dondol magape felefele'ma ahame God nagape heveni.
40018011	[Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ae' afi'i ma elaoma epes higilagalasi iwambilas sokwaha waf awafi sogotanimai.]
40018012	“Ipa' ukup pa'imama? I'i anona aman nugumafi anop sipsip 100-pelaip ama anop atotop higililap, aman anamba ata' nokwaha sipsip apamba 99-pelaip pulutu anagon dohogw, anen ata' nefe' nola' nolaoma anona higiligalanai.
40018013	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, i'i nogofa'i sipsip apamba ea', atiasi sonohana a'owa' ma sipsip apamba. Dagala ananimi a' mikila' nandagala ma sipsip amamba magalutuwi.
40018014	Ea' na'amba atin ahamepa ipe'inai nagape gani heveni nandaiwa' ma anin epen sa'wini higiligalan, owa'.
40018015	“I'i sahin owan sonda' waf awafima ina', ina' nefe' nitilin ipa' atipa pepe ea' nihimba'man waf awafi ananifi. I'i anin negame' basef ine'ifima dao', andeande', si'i ina' niwambilai anin a' nigitanimai wapani.
40018016	Apa' i'i anin owa' neme' basef ine'ifia, ina' nihali' anin epen o epes bias wapani ea' pefe' atin. Ama ipa' bipa o wanipa pefe'ma pegame' basef epen inimbai ma pegawalegef.
40018017	Ama i'i anin nindaiwa'ma negame' basef ipe'ifi ma dao' ina' a' ni'ipa esis Kristen hiasi sondakolas atogini a' ni'ipasan. Ama anin ni'i nindaiwa'ma negame' basefa esis Kristen hiasi wapani dao', ina' nekwahin nepe si'i isimba owa' sogogawa Godia, si'i amam amamba awami mogofa' takisi.
40018018	“Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Hiahaom ipa' pegewa'am na'a itapi, amamba anaf God nowa'am gani heven wapani. Apa' hiahaom mamahoma ipa' pegatagwahom na'a itapi, amamba anaf God notagwahom gani heven wapani.
40018019	“Ea' ae' a'ias endilisi ma ipa' wapani. I'i epes bias sagape itapi ukup pefe' atogona anis maefaha esis bias si'i sondabeten sohali' Goda nogaso'asa hiahawes isimba, ea' andeande' ahame ae'anai nagapani heveni atiasi a' noso'asam esis.
40018020	Aho', i'i epes bias a'a wanis ukup pepoma agol ae'agili ma sunduwa'anima anamba atogon, ae' ape alomas.”
40018021	Nemaf afamba Pita nafi'i nahali' Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, nimaguf ma'uma'uf sahin owan ae'asi sonda'me waf awafi ae', ma okom mose'e waf awafi asasifi egakwahef? Nimaguf 7-pelaif a'a ma'uf?”
40018022	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'amba na'i, “Ae' ina a'ipina nimaguf ifimba atif 7-pelaif, owa'atin. Ae' a'i ina' nekwaha waf awafi asasifi nimaguf hiafi 490-pelaif.
40018023	“Dei' main, esis sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona dembinai king na'i nogawa wialef fagapoma amom manda' maol ananinii ma'ulif.
40018024	Ea' anen nasefelas nanda'as nogawas andeande'ma nonda' amom mogogwamana wiaf, ea' sofa' anona aman safe'ma anen. Ea' aman anamba nogowaola wiafa moni inimba 10 milian kinai.
40018025	Apa' anen moni akana ma nogagwan dondo'ma nigambi wiaf afamba anen nanda'afi. Ea' dembinai king na'ipas na'i esis a' sotala aman anamba noloma waulu'mana awasi ananisi ma sope agof akas sonda' maol sogape lafela anis epes atapis ea' sotala hiahaom asasimi wapani, sofa' moni ma sogagwa wiaf afamba.
40018026	“Ea' aman anamba nowafa notawa itapa naep king anamba dembinai na'ipana na'amba na'i, ‘Ina' niti ae' uwahipiwi nepe nehafa ae'. Anaf ae' egwamena wiaf afamba hi'ilafa ina'.’
40018027	Ea' dembinai anamba nati owahipina a' okom maso'ana wiaf ananifi nakwahona nafe' wahifina.
40018028	“Owa' aman anamba nawisi ando' nati anona amom atom manda' maol atini, anen nowaola wiafa moni kwaia'win si'i 10 kina. Ea' nombalo' aman anamba nowa'ana sisihina bini'w anani'wi na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' negwame wiaf ine'ifi hi'indalaf!’
40018029	“Ea' aman anamba nowafa notawa itap ea' nahali'ana dindinip na'i, ‘Ina' niti ae' owahipiwi ea' nepe nehafa ae'! Bola egwamena wiaf ine'ifi hi'ilaf.’
40018030	“Owa' anen nandaiwa'. Ea' nofa'ana nafe' nanda'ana nanda' kalabus, ama nope nogagwa wiaf afamba.
40018031	Amom mandao'oma manda' maoli mati isimba, a' nelelemb nimanilimb endilisi mafe' mawalapa hiahawes isimba ma dembinai amamunai.
40018032	“Ea' dembinai nofalai aman anamba nanda' maoli ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' aman nanda' maol awasinii. Doko' ina' naloma ae' nalef, ea' akwaha wiaf afamba lu'wafi ine'ifi hi'alaf.
40018033	Ae' ati ina' owahipina, apa' dei' maina ina' owa' niga'i owahipigama alipini ine'ini panda' maol atinia?’
40018034	Ea' dembinai okom numbutina naso'amana amam amamba mugumafi kalabusi ma mogaso'ana akafimi lu'wami nope nope nogwa wiaf ananifi hi'igalaf.
40018035	“I'i ukup ipa' hipaii owa' pekwaha waf awafi endilisima sahin owan ipe'isi ukup pese'epafa, bola na'amba atina Ahame ae'anai nagape heveni wapani nonda'mepas ipa' na'amba atin si'i dembinai nanda'ama aman anamba.”
40019001	Jisas na'i basef ifimba hiafi ma hi'alef, a' nakwaha itap apamba Galili nafe' anep itap Judia gani wa'ol walemb Jordan fisanamb.
40019002	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sagi'mana safe' ea' nanda' epes hiasi aowas nanda'asi ambo'wes.
40019003	Ea' anom dembami Farisi mafi'mai anen mahali'ana anif basef magwambana ma'i, “Mu'uli ape'ini andeande'ma anona aman nondaiwa'ma waulu'mana anani'wi nogali'amona'wa okom ananimi atom a'a owa'?”
40019004	Ea' anen nagwamama basef amom na'i, “Ipa' patalifa basef ifimba Godi pagawef ea'. Basef ifimba faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' hiahaom hiami nanda' epes sataga suwafisi numa'isi.’
40019005	God na'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Na'amba esis bias ina ata' sope si'i sagape daindai, owa'. Aman a' nokwaha mamasana ananisi ea' nefe' noloma waulu'mana anani'wi, asotaga sope alop atotop.’
40019006	Ea' esis bias sondaso'ama asotaga si'i alop atifip. Esis ina ata' si'i sagape biasa sagape daindai, owa'. Ea' hiahawes mais God nagapete'as sisihisi, isimba anin epen ina nehape'as, owa'i.”
40019007	Ea' Farisi amamba ma'ipana wapani ma'i, “Moses na'ipapa mu'uli inimba naga'i, aman nonda' anif basef fil okwatip noso'akwef ea' nili'amona'w kofe'.”
40019008	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amom na'i, “Ipa' panda' du'waniga. Dei' Moses na'i aho'ma ufia'w akwamba dei' paila'w pali'amona wauhiamepa patopa' waf daso'amaifi. Apa' fowa' gani dambadamba ina anif basef ifimbai ma pagatopa' waf daso'amaifi, owa'atin.
40019009	Ae' a'ipipa a'i, I'i ano'w nemata'w anona amani owa' konda' waf awafi so'a waulafia, ma anen nogakwaho'w dowafa nogaso' ano'w daia'w wapani, anen nanda' waf awafi so'a waola nemata'w akwamba nali' nagaso'akwi.”
40019010	Ea' amom alipumi ananimi a' ma'ipana ma'i, “I'i waf afambai endilisifi ma owa' nope atapina noloma ako'wa, dao' daso'ama hapaini. Ea' andeande'ma nemata'w akana nogape dowaf.”
40019011	Ea' anen na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Ina atiasi amam nematawa hiasi la'ifis sofa' basef ifimba ma sogahapilif, owa'atin. Epes atis isimba God nagaso'as pepel ea'i, esis atis sofa'ef.
40019012	“Dei' main, amam na'ambaimi mape amom owa' la'ifima mogaso' nematawaia. Anom mamamam amamuwai olam ea' atapim mape na'amba. Ea' anom, amam matopa'mam alop amamipi. Ea' amom ina la'ifima mogaso' nematawa, owa'. Ea' anom, ukup papoma mugawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiam. Ea' mandaiwa'ma mogaso' nematawa. Aman ami la'ifina nigaila basef ifimbai, anen a' nindailif andeande'.”
40019013	Nemaf afamba esis sao'wamanai anis awasi sa'wisi sofa'as safi'mai anen, sa'i anen nowamona lagof ananigufi ma awasi isimba nondabetenas. Owa' alipumi ananimi mandaiwa'ma awasi isimba ea' masopama esis sofa'as sagafi'mai anen.
40019014	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ipa' kwahowa awasi isimba sifi'mai ae'. Ipa' pindaiwa'mas owa'. Esis amam nematawa sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiasi, esis same' basef ananifi sagailif si'i awasi isimba.”
40019015	Ea' nawamona lagof ananigufi balagah asasigahi, nakwaha esis a' nafe'.
40019016	Ea' anona aman nagwama Jisas na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ae' atiasi enda' waf maif bu'wafi ma egefa' ambal namili egape andeande' lifilafi?”
40019017	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ina' nagahali' ae' ma hiahawes isimbai? Anona aman atotona nagape ilifi anen bu'unai. I'i ina' ni'i nefa' ambal namiliai, dao' andeande'ma nigaila basefa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosasani hiani.”
40019018	Ea' aman anamba nahali' Jisas na'i, “Mu'uli mamahina?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' owa'i nenda' waf awafi so'a waulafia, neha anis epes soga' nenda' wal, owa'i, ina' owa'i nembaso'ma anis epes daiasa,
40019019	ina' neme' basef mamasinai nihapilif nilif ea' nindimafias andeande'. Ina' a' okom mimila anis sagape felefele'ma ine'i, si'i ina' okom magamagaila ina' atinama nigimafi ina'.”
40019020	Ea' aman anamba ata' sa'unai awaminai na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Mu'uli inimba hiani ae' ahapilan ailan afi'i ea'. Dei' waf mamahefa ata' fape?”
40019021	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “I'i ina' ni'i negataga bo'wena dondo'ma negefa' ambal namili ma, dao' ina' fo'o nese'asa hiahaom ine'imi ma anis daias sotalinama nefa' moni inimba nenda'an neso' isimba kwahusi. Nenda'as na'amba ma anaf negefa' hiahawes fasisi gani heven. Ea' ina' nifi'i nihapifi nila ae'.”
40019022	Ea' aman anamba sa'unai name' basef ifimba owa', nomonas ananisi a' iwanis ea' nandambema megahaihailana nafe'. Dei' main, anen hiahaom hiamunai.
40019023	Ea' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'amba na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, epes isimba ugai moni hianaisi, sanda'am danda' ahifim a'owa' ma sofe' sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Atona atin sefe' suwis.
40019024	Ae' a'i i'ipipa wapani, Anin mafin lu'unai kamel nogawis bolotaf nil sogosambala luwagufeli, anamba ila ma nogawis. Apa' amam nematawa hiahaom hiamisi sofe' sogawis nomona maol Godi, sonda'am danda' ahifim a'owa' ma sofe' sogawis. Maol inimba ahifim a'owa' nikila' maol kamel nogawis bolotaf nili.”
40019025	Ea' alipumi ananimi mame' basef ifimba owa', amom agogolalasom kwapete' endilisi. Ea' ma'i, “I'i na'ambaiai, anaf God nuwambilai epes mamahisa sotanimai sope andeande' lifilafi? Owa'atin.”
40019026	Ea' Jisas nosaniga natiti amom na'ipam na'i, “Hiahaom epes owa' la'ifisa sonda'amia, amamba God atona banagonai ma nonda'am. Anen banagonai ma nonda' hiahaom hiami hi'igalam.”
40019027	Anen na'ias na'amba, ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' ea' wakwaha hiahaom afa'imi hiami, ea' dei' wafi'i wahapifa basef ine'ifi wailina. Afa' atiasi ofa' hiahawes mais?”
40019028	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi ipa'. Owagama nemaf afamba fegataga ma hiahaom hiami mogataga dambaim wapani, afamba ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, efa' banagami mogogala'i etoma sia king ae'ani. Nemaf afamba ipa' amam ae'ipai ea' pagail ae'i atiasi ipa' 12-pelaipa petoma siaifah fasimi amom dembami kingi 12-pelaim, ea' pewawaloga misi'ah 12-pelaih amam nematawa ape'isi Israel.
40019029	Ea' epes ami ukup pegapoma ae' ma sokwaha ifagw gwoloma sahin owan ahasas mamasas a batawisas soloma aofah mais asasisii, anaf asofa' hiahaom timbi tambel hiami a'owa', mikila' mogwa fowa'imi atapim. Ea' anaf asofa' ambal namili sogape andeande' lifilafi.
40019030	Apa' epes hiasi dei' sataga sagali'i agof fagatomasi, anaf agof akas asotaga sigi'. Apa' epes isimba sataga sagagi'i anaf a' agof fotomas sotaga sili'.”
40020001	“Aho', epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona aman nagagoma itap lu'wapi ananipi. A'i owa' ma lala kuhimbita atota owa'a, anen nafe'ma nugufa'i anom amam monda' maol aof afamba ananifi nagawa sa'utip mandelef wainilifip.
40020002	Anen nafe' na'i naloma anom manda' maoli ea' nalomam nembel atembela otamba atiasi mogofa'ambai, mofa' wan kina atona atina nemaf afamba. Ea' nasapa'am mafe' manda' maol aof ananifi.
40020003	“Ea' anen nape ma awin nandagiai nape si'i 9 klok, anen a nafe' owa' nati anom amam ata' tol malutu dowaf anamba mondowa'anima magapoma.
40020004	Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipa' wapani fo'o penda' maol aof ae'afi ma egase'epa otamba bendendaepa bendahama waf bu'wafi.’
40020005	Ea' amom a' mafe'. “Ama a'i owa' awin nandasapa' 12 klok anen nafe' wapani ea' nanda'as na'amba atin si'i doko' nanda'as. “Ama awin nendemba'a 3 klok, nafe' nanda'as wapani si'i doko' nanda'as.
40020006	“Ea' ma wambomota 5 klok main, a' nafe' nati anom ata' malutu dowaf. Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Dei' maina ipa' ata' tol pagalutu dowaf na'a'e nemaf afa'e laof?’
40020007	“Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, ‘Ina anona aman naso'afa maol afa', owa'atin.’ Anen na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipa' wapani fo'o penda' maol aof afamba.’
40020008	“Ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb aman anamba nugumafi aofi nafi'i na'ipa aman nugumafi amom manda' maoli na'i, ‘Ina' fala manda' maoli amamba hiami ea' nese'ama moni amom. Ina' nili' neso' amom amamba magi' magatagai, nese'aman nefe' nefe' netagama amam amamba mali' mataga manda' maoli.’
40020009	“Ea' amam amamba mataga manda' maol wambomota 5 kloki, mataga mofa' wan kina atona atin.
40020010	Ea' amam amamba mali' mosafel kuhimbita manda' maoli, mafi'i ukup pandanda' pa'i atiasi amom a' mofa' moni lu'wani mikila' anom. Owa', owa'atin. Amom wapani mofa' wan kina na'amba atin.
40020011	Ea' manda' megahaha aman anamba nugumafi aof afambai.
40020012	“Ea' ma'ias na'amba ma'i, ‘Amom amamba magi' magatagai, amom mafi'i manda' maol nogota bandata si'i awa atitin, owa' ina' a' naso'ama moni inimba na'amba atin si'i afa' ogofa'ani. Apa' afa' wali' wanda' maol lu'unai endilisi ma nemaf laufi, ea' owaf nahanahafa.’
40020013	“Amom ma'ias na'amba ma ea', anen nagwamana basef anona aman amamunai na'ipana na'amba na'i, ‘Alipunai, ae' ina anda'ena awena, owa'. Afa' biafa wali' wa'ias ea' nomonas atifisa pegefa' wan kina atin.
40020014	Ina' fa'a moni ine'ini ea' fo'o. Otamba ae' agase'enamba ine'i, ea' ikwaf afamba atef ae' a' ese'anamba aman anamba nagi' nafi'i nanda' maoli, pefa'amba dondo' atin.
40020015	Ae' anda' maol si'i okom ae'ami maga'iana moni ae'ani. Na'amba andeande', waf usi'ifi. Ae' anda' waf bu'wafi ma igimafi amom magi' magafi'i wambomotai. Na'amba dei' ina' kowalena ma otamba amamimbai?’
40020016	“Anaf na'amba atin, epes isimba dei' sataga sagagi'i agof akasi a' agof fotomas sotaga sili', apa' epes isimba sataga sagali'i agof fagatomasi, anaf agof akas asotaga sigi'.”
40020017	Ea' Jisas na'i nondowasa' Jerusalem. Anen nao'wa alipumi ananimi atom mafe'. Amom ata' mafe' atin ufia'w owa', na'ipam na'i,
40020018	“Peme'. Dei' afa' ea' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi anona aman nonda'e efe'ma amom pris dembami moloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, ea' monda' kotimi a' mi'i basef mondame'maefa mohe egaga'.
40020019	Ea' monda'e efe'ma esis sogolalama Godi ma sonda' salamala ae' sonda'e findiwae ma basef awafi sehe egaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilif anef fegafe'ma wanifi, God a' nosa'me itanima esafel wapani.”
40020020	Nemaf afamba Sebedi waulu'mana ma'ma Jamesi Joni kwao'wai nogaopa'w akwa'umi biam safi'mai Jisas. Ea' kwindiwa nembawa kotawa itapa kuga'ipana anif basef.
40020021	Ea' Jisas nahali'akw na'i, “Ina' na'i ae' enda'mena main?” Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Ina' ni'i anaf owagama negataga dembinai, anamba ina' nagala'ambemagoma, nemaf afamba ae' a'i nogaope amamba ae'ami biam mope dembem felefele'ma ina', anona nil wa'ol egawama, a' anona nil wa'ol da'asaigilima.”
40020022	Ako'w kwa'ias na'ambama, ea' Jisas nagwama'w na'ipa amom na'i, “Ipa' ina pagawa andeande'ma hiahawes ipa' pagahali'imasi, owa'! Ipa' banagepama paga' embela kap apamba dei' ae' ega' embelapi, a'a owa'?” Ea' magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' ila la'ififai.”
40020023	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi, ipa' bipa atiasi pea' embela kap apamba ae' ega' embelapi. Apa' pegape lagol kwahisigili o gagaili ae'agufi, isimba ina maol ae'ani, owa'. Ahame atona ni'i esis isimba nandandepas ea'i dao' esis atis sope lagof kwahisigili gagaili ae'agufi.”
40020024	Ea' alipumi du'wanim ilifunamaim mame' amom biam ma'ias na'amba, manda' megahaha amom sahomana owamana.
40020025	Owa' Jisas nofalai amom mafi'mai anen, a' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pagawa, anom king magape dembami ma isimba sogolalama Godi, amom mape ilifa esis a'owa' manda'mas dondog manda'as kwapete'as. Ea' amom dembami mape banagem a'owa' ma manda' esis amam nematawa sagaila malogof amamugufi.
40020026	Apa' waf afambai ina a' fepoma ipa', hapaifi. Aman ami a' nogape dembinai ma ipe'i, anen ata' nili' nope si'i nanda' maola ipa' hipaii.
40020027	Ea' aman ami ni'i nogataga dembinai ma ipe'i, anen ata' nili' nope si'i agol akani nanda' maol nagape lafela hiasii.”
40020028	Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ae' wapani na'amba atin. Ina afi'i ma esis sonda'me maola sogatopalope, owa'. Ae' afi'i enda' maol egatapalopa ipa' hipai ma waf awafi fagawasi'ipai. Afi'i ma sehe ega' etala ipa' peloma epes hiasi igatagwahipama waf awafi ipe'ifi.”
40020029	Ea' Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi makwaha wambel ambalemba Jeriko ma'i mefe' atin owa', amam nematawa hiasi sagi'ma anen safe'.
40020030	Ea' amam biam naep pagaso'ami tol mape felefele'ma ufia'w. Ea' mame' basef sa'i Jisas nafi'i ea' mofalana mehip ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' akunamana Deviti, niti afa' uwahipifa!”
40020031	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sinifalom sa'i mosopama malogof. Owa' owa'atin, amom mofalana mehip a'owa' ma'i, “Dembinai ina' akunamana Deviti, niti afa' uwahipifa!”
40020032	Ea' Jisas nalutu nofala amom biam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pa'i ae' enda'mepa main?”
40020033	Ea' amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wa'i ina' newalamafa naep afa'ipi ma ugati andeande'.”
40020034	Ea' Jisas nati amom owahipim nasa lagof ananigufi naep amamipi, ea' dei' atef amom biam mati andeande' wapani, a' magi'ma Jisas mafe'.
40021001	Ea' amom mafe' mataga felefele'ma Jerusalem, mataga Betfagai felefele'ma halafuta Oliv. Ea' Jisas nasapa' alipumi ananimi biam na'ipam na'i.
40021002	“Ipa' bipa pefe' piwis wambel bambalimba bagape gani wa'ili felefele'ma na'ai. Ea' apiti anona mafin donki sa'unai esis sandolona nail naloma nogani ananinai malutu. Ipa' petagwahom ea' pefa'am pifi'mai ae'.
40021003	I'i anin epen ni'i nigahali'ipa ma anif basefa, pi'ipan pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maolanam, ama bola nosapa'am mutanimipai kwafalis.’”
40021004	Hiahawes isimba amom mogofa'ai donki a' sataga dindi'i dondo' sagi'ma si'i basef ifimba fowa' anona aman profet Aisaia naga'iefi, anen naga'i na'amba na'i,
40021005	“Ipa' pi'ipa epes sagape Saioni pi'i, ‘Ipa' piti, dei' king dembinai ipe'inai anaf nifi'mai ipa'. Anen nanda' waf sa'umbilifii, ea' notoma donki nogani nofa'ana nifi'i.’”
40021006	Ea' alipumi amamba biam ananimi mafe' ea' manda'as si'i doko' naga'ipamas.
40021007	Amom mofa' donki anamba nalomai nogani mafi'mai Jisas, mawamona sagegw amamugwi gwatoma ilifa donki amamba biam. Ea' Jisas nandagia natoma donki amamba.
40021008	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sandombamana sagegw ufia'w, sasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Anis satopa'i apulita lawah hogotawa felefele'i saso'wiam ufia'w sofalo'ma'w.
40021009	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sali' sagi' safela ao'aligil na'amba sa'i, “Hosana. Apa' mandanifal endilisi ma ina'. Ina' akunamana Deviti! Apa' ma'i God nofalo'ma ina' nagafi'i agol ananigilii nese'ena banagami ma nenda' maol ananini. Apa' mandanifal endilisi ma dembinai God nagape ilifi.”
40021010	Nemaf afamba Jisas nafe' nawis wambel ambalemba Jerusalem, ea' amam nematawa hiasi sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' ea' soga sa'i mehip sandahali'ma sa'i, “Aman anamba anen mamahonama?”
40021011	Ea' esis amam nematawa safe' sagalomanai sandagalamana sa'i, “Aman anamba anen Dembinai profet Jisas, aman nagape anambel wambel Nasareti bagape anep itap Galili.”
40021012	Ea' Jisas nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nali'amona esis hiasi sanda' bisnisi saloma isimba sagatalom ipat anamba nomoni. Anom mati otamba anisi ea' mindisila'mamba. Ea' Jisas nambema tebolifah amamisi nakolo'was. Anis sanda' bisnisa sogatala amiguf ma'unamb. Ea' nambema siaifah asasisi nakolo'was wapani.
40021013	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Basef fagape Baibeli God na'i, ‘Ipat ae'anai nondapoma epes hiasi sifi'i sopaona sondabeten sogahali' ae'. Apa' owa', panda'ana nataga si'i sandambaho' sanda' wala.”
40021014	Jisas ata' napani ipat anamba lu'unai nomon owa' sofa'mani epes isimba naep pagaso'asi a bo'wagah maim mogokwasi safi'manai, ea' nanda'as bo'wes.
40021015	Owa' amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mati anen nanda' maol banagani fasini, ea' mame' esis awasi sondagalama anen gani ipat lu'unai nomon sa'i, “Apa' ma'i God a' nondatopalopa Dembinai ape'inai akunamana Deviti!” Ea' amom dei' ukup awep kwapete'a anen.
40021016	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' a' negawa basef kofagefa?” Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Aho', ae' egawef.” Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pitalif ea' basef ifimba fagail Baibeli pagawef. Basef ifimba fowa'ifi faga'i na'amba fa'i, God, ‘Ina' anaf niwalipa awasi sa'wisi soloma isimba ata' agunifisi saga' nomambeh atembihi, ea' sosa'ma agol ine'igili.’”
40021017	Ea' anen nakwaha taun inimba, nawisi ando' nafe' nape anembel wambel Betani owamb ambamba.
40021018	Ama wafilu kuhimbita atota Jisas nosafel notanima nafe' taun inimba, ea' nolomahana.
40021019	Ea' nati anoga lawag fik gotawa ufia'w ea' nafe' natologa. Apa' ina nati anip sa'utip pailaga, owa'atin. Apul atom. Ea' na'ipaga na'i, “Ina' ina ata' anip sa'utip pilina wapani. Ea' owa'atin endilisi.” Ea' kwafalis atis lawag agamba bowaga ea' aliga hi'alaga.
40021020	Ea' amom alipumi ananimi mati lawag agamba aliga, gogolalasom kwapete'. Ea' ma'i, “Dei' maina lawag agamba fik bowaga ea' aliga kwafalis atis?”
40021021	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amom na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. I'i ipa' pihapifi endilisi, ma ipa' ina bimbiafip pipaipa, dao' atiasi ea' penda'as si'i ae' anda'asa lawag agamba fik. Ea' ipa' ina penda' isimba atis, owa'atin. I'i ipa' pi'ipa halafuta tatumba pi'i, ‘Ina' dagia nefe' newala naoh,’ atiasi ateme'ef tilif si'i ipa' paga'ias.
40021022	I'i ipa' pihapilif endilisi ma pendabetena, hiahawes isimba ipa' pandabetena pa'i pegefa'asi atiasi ipa' a' pefa'as.”
40021023	Ea' Jisas notanima nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nape nawalipasa basef esis amam nematawa si'i dondol nagawalipas. Ea' amom pris dembami maloma agufumi Judai mafi'mai anen mahali'ana ma'i, “Ami na'ipina dei' nape dembinai nanda' maol inimba?”
40021024	Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef na'i, “Ae' wapani a'i ihali'ipa ma anif basefa ipa' ata' pili' pi'ipif ae' ma bola iga'ipipa ami na'ipi ape dembinai anda' maol inimba.
40021025	Aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli, ami na'ipana ma nanda' maol inimba? God nagape heveni na'ipana nanda'an a'a anin epen itapani na'ipana?” Ea' mame' basef ifimba manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' i'i uga'i, ‘God nagape heveni naga'ipana,’ atiasi anen a' ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipa' owa' pagahapifanaea?’
40021026	Apa' afa' i'i uga'i, ‘Anin epen itapani na'ipana,’ na'amba esis amam nematawa a' sohafa. Afa' ombal mahafama esis. Dei' main, esis hiasi sa'i Jon anona profet dembinai.”
40021027	Ea' magwamana basef Jisas ma'i, “Afa' owa' ogawama.” Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ea' na'amba atin ae' ina i'ipipa ma ami nase'e banagami na'ipi anda' maol inimba ae'ani, owa'.”
40021028	“Apa' ipa' ukup pape pa'imama? Anona aman nogaopana biam. Anen nafe'ma anona na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogame ae'inai, dei' ina' fo'o nenda' maola aof ae'afi egawa mandelef wainilifa.’
40021029	Owa' nogamana nagwamana na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' andaiwa'.’ A'i owa' main owa', nambema nembel a' nafe'.
40021030	Ea' nafe' na'ipa anona wapani na'ipana na'amba atin si'i doko' nali' naga'i. Owa' nagwamana basef na'i, ‘Aho', ahame.’ Apa' anen ina nagi'ma basef ananifi nafe', owa'atin.
40021031	“Ea' dei' nogaopana amamba biam ananimi mamahonama nagi'ma basef ahamanai?” “Amom ma'i, “Nagali'i.” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam amamba mogofa' takisi manda' waf awafii maloma nematawa wanda' waf awafi wanda' so'a wauli esis ea' sefe' suwis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias sili'a ipa'.
40021032	Ipa' pagawa aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli. Anen nali' nafi'mai ipa' ea' nihimba'mepa wafa ufia'w usi'i'wi, apa' ipa' owa' pihapifanaea. Apa' epes isimba awasisi anom mogofa'asa takisi maloma anowa nematawa wanda' waf awafi so'a wauli esis ea' sahapifana. Ipa' pati esis sagahapifana na'ambai, apa' ipa' ina pambema opalef pakwaha waf awafi pahapifana, owa'atin.
40021033	“Ipa' peme' anif basef waminif atini. Anona aman dembinai nanda' anof aof nagawa waina nahefagomaf. Aof afamba nomon anen nanda' anona tang notawa ma sogafa'asa sa'utip ipimba wainip, ea' nala' anota ipat lautai totawa ma sope sugumafiagon. Ea' nakwahomam aof afamba anom amam ma'i monda' maolafa bisnisi. Ea' nafe' napani anambel wambel lauguni.
40021034	Ama nogota sa'utip pagailatai, nasapa' anom manda' maola anini mafe' ma amom manda' maol aof ananifii. Anen na'i amom moso'ana anip sa'utip gwa'aipi aof afamba.
40021035	Ea' amom amamba manda' maol aofi mofa' amam amamba kofagonama aofi naspa'am magafi'ii mombalo'am maham, anona mahana afuna endilisi, anona makwaha otamba mahana, apa' anona mahana dowaf a' nafa' nafe'.
40021036	Ea' anen kofagonama aofi nasapa' anom hiami daiam mafe' wapani. Apa' amom amamba manda' maol manda'as na'amba atina amom si'i mali' magafi'ii.
40021037	A'i owa' nagi' nasapa' nogamana ananinai nafe'ma amom manda' maol aofi. Ea' anen na'ias na'i, ‘Atiasi ila, amom a' meme' malogol nogame ae'anai.’
40021038	“Owa' owa'atin, amom mati nogamana ananinai nafi'i, manda'ipama atin ma'i, ‘Aman nanumba owagama nogofa' hiahaom hiami ahamanai. Awi, a' ohana ma afuna ma afa' atofa ogofa' aof afa'e.’
40021039	Ea' mombalo'ana mofa'ana mawisi aof ando'efa mahana afuna.
40021040	“Nemaf afamba aman kofagonama aof afambai nogafi'i nonda' maina amom?”
40021041	Ea' amom magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Namanani anen nonda'mam waf awafi endilisi ma amam amamba awasimi noham moga'. Ea' noso'asa aof afamba fefe'ma anis epes daias sumafiaf, ama nogota gwa'aisi sogail owa' esis a soso'ana anis gwa'aisi anen.”
40021042	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' patalifa basef Godi pagawef ea'. Basef Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘Otam amamba magala' ifagwi mogelefatami dei' mataga mape otam banagami mape magali'i mogombalo' ipati. Dembinai God nanda' amamba mataga, apa' matolom fasifasim a'owa'.’
40021043	“Ea' ae' dei' a'ipipa. God atiasi a' nelefata basefa waf bu'wafi anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma ma ipa', a noso'asam anis epes atiasi sombale'ef sonda' waf bu'wafi.
40021044	[Ea' epes mamahisa kwahogalas sogowa otam anambai, atiasi esis pepe'etas. Apa' i'i otam anamba nowa nogosali'as, a' loloweas si'i sopof atof.]”
40021045	Ea' amom pris dembami maloma dembami amom Judai Farisi mame' basef ifimba waminif atini Jisas naga'iefi ma'i owa', anen nondola'waifa amom na'i basef ifimba.
40021046	Ea' ma'i mombalo'ana owa' ombal bahama esis amam nematawa. Esis hiasi sogawana sa'i Jisas anona profet.
40022001	Ea' Jisas nanda' anif basef waminif atin wapani na'i,
40022002	“Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anona king dembinai itapnai. Nogamana ananinai na'i nogao'wa ako'w, ea' king anamba nanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi.
40022003	Ama nemaf afamba soga'asafi anen nasapa' amam amamba manda' maola anini mafe' mofalai epes isimba fowa' nogofalasi ma sogafi'mai gwa'aisi isimba. Owa' sandaiwa'ma sogafi'i.
40022004	“Ea' anen nasapa' anom wapani manda' maola anini motambel mafe', ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipa' fo'mago epes isimba ae' ea' andandepas sagapani ea' pi'ipas na'amba pi'i, “Peme', ae' andandomba gwa'aimi ae'ami ea'. Mafis bulmakau suwafumi a mafis amamba lu'wami ae'ami, apa' maham. Ea' hiahaom hiami mandandombol ma'oh ea'. Ipa' pifi'mai gwa'aisi isimba enda'asa nogame nogaso' ako'wi.”’
40022005	“Owa' amom ukup iwanipa mome'efa mogafe' ea' mandambema mandafe' daindai ma maol amamini. Anona nafe' aof, anona nafe'ma bisnis ananisi.
40022006	Apa' amom magapani mombalo' amamba manda' maola kingi manda'am kwapete'am maham afum.
40022007	Ea' king anamba nembel wandafuna nasapa' soldia ananimi mafe' maha amom manda' maola anini afum hi'alam. Ea' makata maofa wambel amamimbili wapani.
40022008	Ea' king na'ipa amom manda' maoli na'i, ‘Gwa'aisi enda'asa nogame noso' ako'wa soga'asi ea' sandandombol sa'oh, apa' epes isimba ae' igifalasi, ina sanda' waf andeande'ma sogafi'i, owa'.
40022009	Na'amba dei' ipa' pefe' ufiawa awamba hiawai dawalegefa pigati isimba epes hiasi pi'ipas pefalas sifi'mai gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi daso'amaisi.’
40022010	Anen na'ias na'amba ma main, amom manda' maoli mafe'agon gani gani ufiawa dawalegef matamai epes isimba magatilisi, epes bu'wasi saloma awasisi. Ea' safi'i sape ipat atamba sondaso'ama ma a' si'ita kwaef endilisi.
40022011	“Esis sape ea' dembinai king nawis nomona nigatilis. Ea' nati anin epen atitin, ina nala klos sagalasa nemaf afamba daso'amaifii, owa'.
40022012	Ea' king na'ipana na'i, ‘Alipunai, dei' maina ina' owa' nila klos isimba sandaso'amaisi nifi'i niwisi na'aea?’ Owa', anen ina na'i anif basef, owa'atin.
40022013	“Ea' king na'ipa amom manda' maoli na'i, ‘Ipa' piwasi' lagof bo'wagaha epen inimba pikwahin nefe' niwis nepe akot ando'. Akot atamba atiasi anin nelef nenda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' nepe.’”
40022014	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Aho', God nogofala epes hiasi na'amba atin si'i king anamba nanda'as. Anen nofala hiasi, apa' owa' nandandepa atona atin sufi'i suwis sope sogalomana.”
40022015	Ea' amom dembami Farisi mafe' manda' basef ma'if mandame'maefa mogowa' Jisas. Amom ma'i meme' anif basef ananifi owa' andeande'ia ma monda'mana basef mogowa'ana si'i sogapalo' agof anembeh.
40022016	Ea' masapa' alipumi magaila amomi maloma amam amamba anep mini'ap Heroti amom mafe'ma Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' ogawena, ina' aman naga'i endilisii. Ina ombel magahinai, owa'. Owa' niga'ipasa anif basef isimba anis agof lu'wagufisia a anif basef daifa isimba agof akasi falafisia, owa'atin. Ina' naga'ipas basef atifif endilisifi atif Godi amam nematawa hiasi dondo' atin hi'agalasi.
40022017	Ea' dao' ina' ni'ipafa. Dei' ina' okom mandanda' ma'imama? Mu'uli ape'ini na'i andeande'ma apa' mogaso'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi a'a owa'?”
40022018	Owa' Jisas nogawa ea' ma waf awafi amamifi ea' na'i, “Ipa' amam paga'i malogof biagufi, dei' maina ipa' pagagwamba ae'?
40022019	Ipa' himba'me anin moni takisini ma ata' itilin.” Ea' mofa'manai anin moni ma natilin
40022020	nahali'am na'i, “Ambal laloma agol isimba sagaili amisi?”
40022021	Ea' ma'i, “Isimba Sisari gavman dembinai.” Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Dao' hiahawes dembinai Sisari, isimba pese'anas Sisar. Apa' hiahawes Godi, pese'anas God.”
40022022	Amom mame'anama basef ifimba ea' gogolalasom kwapete'am makwahana a' mafe'.
40022023	Nemaf afamba atef anom amam anep mini'ap Sadyusi, mafi'mai Jisas. Amom mini'ap apamba magahapifa sagaga'i ina atiasi sotanima sosafel wapani, owa'atin. Ea' amom mafe' mahali' Jisas
40022024	ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, Moses na'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga' ma anen awasi akana, ea' owamana noso' waulu'mana anani'wi nola anis awasi ma sogaha'ofana.’
40022025	Ea' fowa' anom amam ape'imi ambep atetep mape la'afena apa', amom 7-pelaim. Nagali'i sahomam naso'akw awani aka'w naga', nakwaho'w kwape. Ea' owamana naso'akw naga' nakwaho'w kwapani awani aka'w.
40022026	“Ea' owamana nandatu'unai wapani nanda'as na'amba atin, ea' anona nandatu'umi naso'akw manda'as na'amba atin mafe' mafe'ma matagama owagufunai akutainai.
40022027	Amom amamba ambipim ea' mandaga' atin hi'andalam. Ama main, nemata'w waulu'mam kwagi'mam kwagi' kwaga'.
40022028	Anaf esis sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, nemata'w akwamba kwagaso' amom 7-pelaimi anaf mamahonama noso'akw? Amom 7-pelaim a' maso'akw atin hi'alam.”
40022029	Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef amom na'i, “Ipa' owa' pegawa basef Baibel naga'iefia, ea' owa' pagawa banagami Godia. Ea' ipa' dei' ina pa'i basef andeande', owa'atin.
40022030	Nemaf afamba sagaga'i sokwaha wandelef sotanima sogosafel wapani, amam nematawa ina ata' sondaso'ama wapani, a' owa'atin. Sope dowaf si'i ensel magape heveni.
40022031	Apa' basef ifimba esis amam nematawa sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, ipa' patalifa basef ifimba God na'if fagape Baibeli ea'. Anen naga'ipipa na'amba na'i,
40022032	‘Ae' God Abrahami, Aisaki a Jekopi.’ Basef ifimba fa'i God ina Dembinai ma epes isimba sagaga'ii, owa'atin. Anen God epes isimba ambal lapais sagape namisii.”
40022033	Esis amam nematawa same' na'amba sosafel gogolalasisa basef ananifi.
40022034	Jisas a' nasopama malogofa amam amamba dembami Sadyusi ma basef ifimba. Na'amba anom amam dembami Farisi mame' basef ifimba a mandakolasi mafi'i felefele'ma anen.
40022035	Ea' anona nagaloma amomi nogogawa mu'uli Godi na'i nogwamba Jisasa niga'i anif basef owa' andeande'a ma nonda'mana basef sogowa'ana si'i sogapalo' agof anembeh. Ea' nahali'ana na'i,
40022036	“Dembinai Tisa, mu'uli Godi mamahina lu'win nikila' mu'uli daian hiani nape nagali'i?”
40022037	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Nomonas ipe'isi sehafel Dembinai God ipe'inai sisilana na'amba. Ukup ipe'ipi pipilana hi'indalep, pese'ana ambagufi nelelemb ipe'isi pendaso'anas hi'indalasa Dembinai God atona.
40022038	-
40022039	Mu'uli inimba lu'wani, nagali' endilisii. Ea' mu'uli nagagi'i inimba, ‘Ipa' ukup pipila anis epes sagape felefele'ma ipe'i, si'i ukup pagapagaila ipa' atipa.’
40022040	Basef kofagefa ma mu'uli hiani Godi faloma basef amom profet manda'afi hiafi hi'alef fape nomona mu'uli inimba biafin.”
40022041	Amom Farisi ata' munduwa'anima malutu atin, Jisas nahali'am
40022042	na'i, “Ipa' ukup pandanda' pa'imama ma Krais anen God nandandepana ea' ma nosapa'ana nogafi'ii? Anen nogama amii?” Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Devit nogamana.”
40022043	Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' maina Ambal bu'unai Godi nagasa'ma nomonas Deviti ma naga'i Krais anen Dembinai? Devit fowa' na'i,
40022044	‘Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai ae'ani na'i, “Ina' nepe lagol kwahisigili ae'agili atapina nefe' netagama anaf ae' enda' bousi ine'isi sogafe' lafela bo'wagah ine'igahi.”’
40022045	Devit fowa' nofala Krais na'i Dembinai. Isimba atis dei' Krais ina aman atona falafunai, owa'. Anen Dembinai.”
40022046	Ea' ina anona aman la'ifina ma nogagwamana basef Jisas, owa'atin. A'i owa' nemaf afamba owa', amom hiami ombel mahama mogahali'anama anif basef wapani. Owa'atin nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' wapani nafe' atin.
40023001	A'i owa' main, Jisas naso'asa basef esis amam nematawa saloma amom alipumi 12-pelaim ananimi.
40023002	Na'ias na'amba na'i, “Amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma dembami amamba Farisi amom maha'ofa Mosasa magawalipasa mu'uli Godi banagambel.
40023003	Andeande'ma pigaila basef hiafi amom maga'ipipafi, apa' ipa' ina penda' waf amom manda'afi, owa' hapaifi. Dei' main, amom ma'ipasa basef hiafi, apa' amom ina mailif, owa'atin.
40023004	Amom mogowatania basef amamifi magawalipasefa sigailif si'i basef wafifi analef aolef wafilifi lu'walifi mawamonalef fagatoma ikaguf asasifi, apa' amom ina matopalopepa mofa'alef kwasala ma lagof amamugufi, owa'atin.
40023005	Hiahaom hiami manda'ami manda'am dowafa epes sotolom siganifelom. Aho', amom mala latif lu'unai nail lagufi balagah amamisi ma manda' beten, ea' manda' sosaf launai nail sagegw amamugwi da'malifigwa.
40023006	Amom ukup pa'i siaifah isimba sotawa sagali'i atis dembami atom magapoma, ma afamba sanda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi a'a anamba ifagw lu'wagwi esis Juda dondol sandakolasugwi.
40023007	Amom ma'i hiasi sotoloma sondalalamam sogasa'ma agof amamugufi anamba sandakolas sagapoma ma ma'i sofalam sonda'i amom, ‘Dembami Tisa’.
40023008	“Apa' anis epes ina sofala ipa' si'i ipa' Dembipai, owa'. Dei' main, ipa' tisa dembinai ipe'inai atotona, ea' ipa' hipai pepe si'i sahin owan wambota atota.
40023009	Ipa' ina pefala anin epen nagape itap apa'e pi'i ahamepa ipe'inai, owa'atin. Dei' main, aman anamba atotona anen ahamepa ipe'inai, nagape heveni.
40023010	Ea' esis ina sofalepa si'i dembipai tisa, owa'. Dei' main, Dembinai tisa ipe'inai Krais atona, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
40023011	Apa' aman ami atiasi nogataga dembinai ipe'inai, dei' ata' nili' nope nonda' maol nope lafela ipa'.
40023012	Ea' na'amba atin, epen ami negasa'ma agol ananigili atogili, epen inimba anaf agol akan. Apa' epen ami nenda' agol ananigili gogafe' lafili, anaf anin nefa' agol lu'wagili.”
40023013	“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' amam malogof biagufipai! Ipa' pewalo uta ma nogohnaep esis amam nematawai ma ina atiasi suwis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai numafias, owa'atin. Dei' main, ipa' ina pafe' pawis nomon, ea' esis amam nematawa sa'i sofe' sogawisi, isimba ipa' pasopamas ufia'wa sofe' sogawis nomon.
40023014	[Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami atiasi mogatagamepa! Ipa' malogof biagufipai. Ipa' pawis ifagw agwamba nematawa alifiwaii, pawis panda' wala hiahawes awousi. Ea' pasafel palutu pandabeten launai atona ma pagambaho' waf awafi ipe'ifi. Panda'am na'amba pandabeten launai dowadowafa esis siga'i ipa' bu'upai. Anaf God nowaloga epes hiasi. Anis epes daias owa' sonda' waf awafi na'ambaia anaf sofa' akafimi kwasakwasala, apa' ipa' a' pefa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi a'owa'.]
40023015	“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' malogof biagufipai! Ipa' pafe'agon hi'agalagini naoh a itap walemb hiagoma, pigifa'i anin epena negataga alipini ipe'ini nigaila basef ipe'ifii. Anin ea' nataga alipini ipe'ini, ea' ipa' panda' anin awen a'owa' nikila' ipa' na'amba. Ipa' aupai ma pagafe' wambel awambili hel nif fagandifi fagapoma. Apa' ipa' panda' anin nanda' waf awafi a'owa' fandahama atiasi negafe' wambel ambalemba awambili.
40023016	“Ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' naep pagasi'ipai pa'i pihimba'masa ufia'w anis epes. Ipa' pagawalipas na'amba pa'i, ‘I'i epen niga'i agola ipat anamba lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwani ma niga'i endilisi gani ilifi, isimba falafisi. Apa' anin niga'i agola gol amamba fasimi sogofalo'ma ipat anamba ma niga'i endilisi ilifi, dao' a' nenda'as nindaila basef si'i naga'i.’
40023017	“Ipa' ukup magahipai ea' naep pagasi'ipai! Maim da'im mape lu'um mikila'? Gol amamba sogofalo'ma ipat anamba amom lu'um a'a, ipat anamba bu'unai nanda' gol amamba mataga bo'oma naep Godi? Ea' dei' ipat anamba atona nikila' gol.
40023018	Ea' ipa' pagawalipas wapani paga'i, ‘I'i epen ami niga'i belita sofa' mafis sagaso' Godani endilisi ilifi, amamba falafumi. Apa' epen ami niga'i ofa mafis sagatoma belita ilifi ma niga'i ilifi, dao' anin a' nindagi'mas si'i naga'ias.’
40023019	“Ipa' naep pagasi'ipai! Hiahawes mais sape lu'wasi? Ofa mafis sape lu'wis a'a belita tanda' ofa inimbai nataga bo'wena naep Godi, dei' nataga lu'win? Ea' dei' belita tikila' ofa.
40023020	Isimba atis dei' epen ami niga'i agol belitai ma niga'i endilisi ilifi, anin newa' banaga basef ifimba ma hiahawes sagatoma belita ilifi saloma belita wapani.
40023021	Ea' epen ami niga'i agol ipat lu'unai Godi ma niga'i endilisi ilifi, anin newa' banaga basef ananifi ma ipat anamba naloma anen nagape ipat anambai.
40023022	Ea' epen ami niga'i heven ilifa negewa' banaga basef ananifi, anin na'i newa' banaga basef ananifi ma sia bu'wani Godi naloma aman anamba nagatoma sia inimbai.
40023023	“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' amam malogof biagufipai! Ipa' pandawaloga nambawai lombo maloma akwal lalilali hiali paso'ana du'wanil ilifunamail God. Panda'as na'amba ma akwal alamba hiali agofula alamba min, dil, kumin. Apa' ipa' a' pindihi'ama basef amamba hiami lu'uma basef mu'uli God naga'iefi ma waf usi'ifi ma pegatopalopa epes, pigati esis uwahipis, penda' hiahaom andeande' datima ma waf endilisifi. Waf afamba hiafi feloma waf pindilali pegaso'ana hiahawes mais Godafi, afamba pekolefaf pihapilaf atin pilaf.
40023024	Ipa' naep pagasi'ipai, pa'i pihimba'masa ufia'w anis epes! Ipa' panda' maola pigisia'ma afi'awa isimba sa'wisi sagail malepi nemba'wi, apa' mafin anamba lu'unai kamel ea' pewalo'ana nalomam.
40023025	“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' amam malogof biagufipai! Ipa' pandombasa kapi plet ando'esa atis hilili'. Apa' nomon owa'. Ipa' opalef si'ipama waf walifi faloma waf afamba alop atopafi awafi.
40023026	Ipa' Farisi, naep pagasi'ipai! Ipa' ata' pili' pendombasa kap nomonepa puli', ma atiasi ande'epa wapani pogataga bo'op.
40023027	“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' epes malogof biagufipai! Ipa' pandahama si'i ifagw sa'ugwi sagawa belatagwa sanda' pen afitinai saofam. Ea' ande'etama bo'ota ma sagatolota, apa' nomonetama si'igina bihitagof epes sagaga'ii maloma hiahaom awasimi alogw magami si'imagon.
40023028	Ipa' pape na'amba atin. Epes esis sati alop ipe'ipi ando' sa'i ipa' panda' waf usi'ifii. Apa' nomon waf aunai baso'amunai ma malogof biagufi panda' simbisambala mu'uli Godi amambai mape si'ima ipa'.
40023029	“Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Ipa' amam paga'i malogof biagufi! Ipa' pefalo'ma matmat amom profet magaga'i taloma wandelefa epes isimba sape hilili' sagaga'i.
40023030	Ea' ipa' pa'i, ‘I'i afa' fowa' ope si'i akusafa afa'isiai, afa' ina otopalopa esis oha amom profet afum, owa'.’
40023031	Ama basef ifimba atif ipa' pagawalapafi kofagefa ipe'ifi atif, pa'i ipa' epes mini'ap apamba pagi' pagatagai saha profet magaga'i.
40023032	Ea' ipa' a' piwatani waf afamba awafi esis akusipai hi'indalaf!
40023033	“Ipa' si'i uguf, awasi pagataga uguf awagufi fagahasi! Kota basef lu'wami Godi nowa'epa nili'amepa pepe wambel awambili hel. Dei' penda'as pi'imama ma anaf pegefa'ma kot atamba? Owa'atin endilisi.
40023034	Apa' dei' ipa' peme'. Ae' asapa'o anom profet molomago anom amam nomonas fasisimi moloma anom gawaimi ma Baibeli amom mofo'o motagamepa. Atiasi ipa' peha anom moga', ea' pendola anom lawah hindisila'mai, anom pepe pegahom nomon ifagw pandakolasugwi. Ea' ipa' penda'am tofalam anembel wambel taun lu'wina ea' petofam mofa' mefe' anin taun daian ea' petofam pelam atin pefe'. Ipa' atiasi penda' waf awafi afamba.
40023035	Ea' dei' epes isimba sagape hilili'i ma anis sahas sagaga'i, kofagema amamba hiami atiasi a' mopoma ipa'. Aho', nagali'i Abel anen aman nagape hilili'i a' nafi'i nafi'i natagama aman akutainai profet Sakaraia, Berekia nogamana, anamba akusipa sahana afuna la'afena ipat lu'unai Godi naloma belita saofa mafis sagaso' Goda. Amamba kofagema atiasi a' mila ipa' atipa.
40023036	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi ipa'. Hiahaom awami akafimi kofagema atiasi a' motagama mini'ap amam nematawa isimba dei' pagapani.
40023037	“O ipa' Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ipa' pagaha amom profet afumi, pakwaha otamba pagaha amom God nasapa'am magafe'ma ipe'i, lifilafi ae' a'i ekolasa ipa' epes hipai si'i awata numa'itai towa'ani nogagwi takolasagw gopasol gwagail bihinagof atatigufi. Owa' owa'atin, ipa' pandaiwa'.
40023038	Ipa' peme'! Dei' ipat bu'utai a wambel ipe'imbili atiasi wafita totawa dowaf.
40023039	Ae' a'ipipa, ipa' atiasi ina petolowe wapani ma anaf piga'i, ‘Apa' ma'i God nofalo'ma aman anamba nagafi'i agol Dembinaii ma nonda'ana sonogahana.’”
40024001	Jisas nakwaha ipat lu'unai Godi nafe' atin, amom alipumi ananimi mafi'mai anen. Amom ma'i mihimba'mana ifagw lu'wagwi lotugwi.
40024002	Owa' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pati ifagw amamba lu'wami a'a? Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anaf ina atiasi anemba otamba bendatomama atin banagemba bepe, owa'atin. Asugulatam sowalom hi'ilam mofe' mo'oh atona atin.”
40024003	Jisas tol nape halafuta atamba Oliv, ea' alipumi ananimi atom mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' ni'ipafa hiahaom amamba nambai' motaga. Ametal mail lili' lotaga ma afa' ogogawa ina' na'i netanima nigafi'i ma itap ana'e higiligalana?”
40024004	Ea' Jisas nagwamama anif basef laufi na'i, “Ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba anin epen a' nembaso'mepa.
40024005	Dei' main, amam hiami anef nemaf mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'i agol ae'agili mi'i, ‘Ae' ma'uwi ae' Krais, God nandandepe nasapa'e agafi'ii.’ Ea' mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiasi some' basef amamifi si'i endilisifi silif.
40024006	Anef nemaf peme' amalemba sonda' wandaf a anis sondaha basefa wandaf si'ipipaf, ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Hiahaom amamba atiasi mogatagai, apa' nemaf akutaifi ata' ota'.
40024007	Anis epes sagape anamba itap lu'wagoma sofela wandaf sopa' soloma esis sagape anep itap daiapi. Anona dembinai king nosafel no'wa anis walemb hielimbi ananisi sopa' soloma anona dembinai king daiana no'wa ananisi analemb walembi. Analemb walemb nolom mohas sope, ea' analemb walemb hiagoma atona atin itap bolatin nope.
40024008	Hiahaom amamba hiami amom ata' muli' motaga si'i akafimi mali' magatagama nemata'w kwa'i kogola awani.
40024009	“Nemaf afamba esis sofa'epa ma sogase'epa akafimi nimanimi, ea' sehepa pega'. Epes hiasi walemb hiagoma nelelemb numbutima ipa' kwapete' endilisi. Esis sati ipa' pagaila basef ae'afii, na'amba dei' sahepa.
40024010	Nemaf afamba amam nematawa hiasi sokwaha hapif asasini, ea' sondawawalapa atin soso'asas sefe'ma bousi sohas, ea' epes isimba ukup awepisi wapani.
40024011	Ea' amam amamba hiami mombaso'am muga'i amom profeti mosafel mufi'i mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiasi.
40024012	Waf awafi atiasi a' nosafel lu'una, na'amba amam nematawa hiasi asokwaha waf afamba ukup pigapigaila anis daidaias piga'i uwahipis.
40024013	Apa' epen ami nihapifi banagen nilutu negatagama nemaf akutaifii, inimba atiasi God nuwambilan nokwahoman waf awafi ananifi nitanimai nepe andeande'.
40024014	Ea' atiasi esis si'ipasa basef ifimba bu'wafi Godima epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol ananini nope Dembinai nugumafias. Esis si'ipas ganimba itap hiagoma hi'ilagon ama amam nematawa hiasi ganimba walemb hielimbi ata' sili' some'ef. Ama main owa', nemaf akutaifi a' fetaga.
40024015	“Anef nemaf ipa' piti hiahaom awami mogahambombaga hiahaom bu'wamii motaga si'i fowa' gani profet Daniel naga'i basef fagail Baibeli faga'i. Hiahaom amamba motaga mope anamba bo'wagoma ipat lu'unai Godi nomon. (Epen ami nigatalifa basef ifimbai anin a' okom mondapomef andeande'.)
40024016	Nemaf afamba amam nematawa sagape itap lu'wapi Judiai sofa' sefe' sondowasa'o halafutagw.
40024017	A epen ami nagape ipat ando'i felefele'i ina ata' netanima nefe' niwis nefa'i hiahawes ananisi ipat nomon, owa'i.
