40024018	Epen ami nigaili aofi, ina ata' netanima nefe' wambel nefa' saket main ananisi, owa'i.
40024019	Nematawa opafuwai waloma awamba awasi ata' saga' nomagof atogufi, ae' a'i awo uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota atamba ogame' akafimi lu'wami.
40024020	Ipa' pendabetena ipa' ina apefa' pefe' nogota atamba fufini asaf sogatagama a'a nemaf afamba sabat sagapoma noma'wafi, owa'.
40024021	Nogota atamba akafimi mugatagai lu'wami endilisi. Fowa' dambadamba itap pagataga nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' nimanimi awami amambai fowa' ina anom na'ambaimi mataga, owa'atin. Ea' anaf wapani owa' anom nimanimi amambai motagaia, owa'atin.
40024022	I'i God owa' nonda' nimaguf fefe' bandefa, atiasi amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas higiligalasi. Owa' owa'atin. God okom mapoma epes isimba anen nogosaho'as ea'i dei' nahagasa nogota atamba bandata.
40024023	“Nemaf afamba fegataga ma i'i anis epes si'ipipa siga'i, ‘Ipa' piti Krais God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii anen nape na'a, o nani nape gani,’ ipa' ina pihapifas, owa'.
40024024	Nemaf afamba anom amam mombaso'am muga'i amom Kraisi a amom profeti, a' motaga monda' ametal banagani naninani monda' banagami hiami si'i God nanda'ami. Endilisi i'i amom banagema, a' mombaso'ma amam nematawa God nogosaho'as ea'i mohambombagas. Apa' owa' owa'atin.
40024025	Peme', ae' ea' a'ipipa hiahawes isimba dei' ata' owa' sogatagaia.
40024026	“Ama epes ami si'ipipa siga'i, ‘Ipa' piti, anen nani nape gani epes akagoma wafigima, ipa' ina peme'as pefe'agon, owa'. Apa' i'i epes ami siga'i, ‘Ipa' piti nani nape ipat tati nomon’, ipa' ina pihapifas, owa'i.
40024027	Ipa' pegawa otaga holagala, holala natagai gani awin nagatafima ea' nogala' nafe' anamba hiagoma awin negewalama. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, afamba ae' itanima igafi'ii, enda'am na'amba atin hiasi sotolowe.
40024028	Mamahagoma alop sagaga'i poga'oma, ea' na'amba atogon anaf komemb mefe' munduwa'animama.
40024029	“Akafimi nimanimi hiami ma nogota atamba hi'ilam ea', kwafalis atis awin alipini a' netaga owamb, ea' owambini ina ata' negala', a'owa'. Ea' ondowa mowai otaga ilif, hiahaom hiami banagami magape otagai ea' bol atin mope.
40024030	“Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Nemaf afamba ametal ae'ani netaga gani otaga ilif, amam nematawa hiasi sagape itap hiagomai a' selef. Ea' siti ae' eloma ilagw otaga ilif ifi'i eloma hiahaom mogogala'i fasimi Godi moloma banagami ananimi.
40024031	Ea' alof lu'unai nogal mehip, esapa' amom ensel ae'ami mefe' itap hiagoma awin natafima negewalama wa'owa'ol anamba biafigin biafigin mefe'agon hi'ilagon ganimba itapi otaga safe' sogotambela. Atiasi ensel amamba mofe' mofa'ai esis amam nematawa God nogasaho'as ea' ananisii sondakolas atogon.
40024032	“Ipa' nomonas sondanda'ma anif basef waminif atina ilaof. Ipa' piti ilaof nogonafa ma basowa, pegawa nogota atamba nelemb ea' felefele'ma sogaof.
40024033	Ea' na'amba atin anaf piti hiahaom amamba ali' aga'ipipami a' motaga hi'igalam, ipa' pegawa ae' afi'i alutu felefele'ma uta. Ina ata' nogota laota, owa'.
40024034	“Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' ata' pagapani ina atiasi pega' ulal, ata' owa', ipa' piti hiahaom amamba hiami motaga hi'igalam.
40024035	Otaga noloma itap hiagoma anaf a' higililam, apa' basef ae'afi ina higililif, owa'atin endilisi. Fegape atapif lifilafii.
40024036	-
40024037	“Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi a'ipipa. Owa' anin epen negawa nemaf a'a nogota atamba ae' igafi'atai. Amom ensel magape ilifi wapani ina mogawa. Ae' nogamana Godi wapani ina egawa, owa'. Ahame atona nagape ilifi anen atotona negawa nemaf afamba. Waf fowa' sanda'af nogota atamba Noa nagapautai, ea' na'amba atin si'i anaf esis sonda'af nemaf afambai felefele'ma ifi'i egataga itap apa'e.
40024038	Fowa' embel lu'wami ata' owa' motagaia, nogota atamba esis sape sa' gwa'aisi sa' embel amam nematawa sindikikila'ma sandaso'ama atin safe' safe' sataga nemaf afamba Noa nafe' nagawis galaho'w.
40024039	Amam nematawa isimba ina sogawa nemaf afamba, owa'atin. Esis ukup maso'as sandape na'amba atin safe' satagama afamba embel lu'wami mataga magaha esis amam nematawa hiasi mambaho'was hi'agalas. Ea' anaf na'amba atina nemaf afamba ae' itanima igafi'i.
40024040	Afamba amam biam mondao'oma monda' maol mogail aofi, God a' nofa' anona, anona nokwahona nil.
40024041	Ea' anowa nematawa biawa onda' maola plaua onda' breti, atiasi God nofa' ano'w kofe' nokwaha ano'w kope.
40024042	“Ea' ipa' a' solawaipa andeande'. Ipa' ina pegawa nambai' dembinai ipe'inai nogafi'i, owa'atin.
40024043	Ipa' ukup pepoma anif basef waminif atini. I'i ahama ipati nili' nogawa owamb nogota mamahotama nanda' wali nogafi'atai, ama silisilawi numafiata nogape, nanda' wali ina atiasi nifi'i nupisila ipat ananitai nuwis nomon, owa'atin.
40024044	Ea' ipa' wapani silisilawi pendape. Dei' main? Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ifi'i anef nemaf ipa' ina atiasi pegawa pi'i ifi'i ulal nemaf afamba, owa'.”
40024045	“Ipa' hipai penda' waf bu'wafi si'i anamba nugumafi amom manda' maoli okom bu'wami mapaona nanda' maol andeande' datimai. Aman anamba dembinai ananinai nandandepana ma nugumafi ananimi manda' maoli ma nogaso'ama gwa'aisi amom nogota dondo'atai.
40024046	Anafa dembinai ananinai notanima nogafi'i, ma niti aman anamba nanda' maol andeande', dao' aman anamba sonohana.
40024047	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Dembinai ananinai anaf nonda'ana nope dambena nugumafi hiahaom hiami ananimi hi'igalam.
40024048	Apa' i'i aman anamba nonda' waf awafi okom magapoma opaf ananifi atofi a' ni'i, ‘Dembinai ae'anai ina atiasi nifi'i ulal, owa'atin.’
40024049	Ama anen noha amom manda' maol atini nea' gwa'aisi embel noloma amam amamba manda' spaki.
40024050	Ea' Dembinai ananinai atiasi notanima nifi'i anef nemaf, apa' aman anamba ina atiasi ni'i Dembinai nifi'i ulal, ata' owa'. Dembinai nogafi'i nifi'i nogota atamba anen okom mogaso'anatama.
40024051	Ea' a' nohana nili'amonana nefe' nope noloma epes isimba sagambaso'ami malogof biagufisi. Wambel anamba awagoma selef sonda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' sope.
40025001	“Anef nogota atamba epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i anif basef waminif atina nematawa ilufunamaiwa. Anona aman na'i nogaso' ano'w nemata'wi, nafe' napani ma notanima nogafi'i. Ea' nematawa awamba aiawaiwai osafel ofa' lambeh handandawa wafe' wa'i olaoma aman anamba ufia'w ofa'ana nifi'i.
40025002	Wanowa biawa gawa akawai apa' wanowa biawa ogogawai.
40025003	Awamba gawa akawai ofa' lambeh halomawa wafi'i, apa' awo ina ofa'ai kerosin atifin nalomawa, owa'.
40025004	Apa' awamba gawaiwai owala kerosin batowagof ofa'an atifin naloma lambeh awoumbihi ofa'as atifis wafi'i.
40025005	Aman anamba ina dei' nafi'i ulal, ata' owa'. Ea' awo hiawai naep nimanip ambeh hahawa a' wa'oh.
40025006	“Wa'oh wafe' wafe' ma a'i owa' amanota la'afitama a' wame' anef maf fataga fa'i, ‘Dei' aman nagaso' ako'wi nafi'i. Ipa' pefe' petolona ufia'w pefa'ana pifi'i.’
40025007	Ea' nematawa awamba osafel, wandondomba lambeh awoumbihi ma ogafe'.
40025008	Apa' nematawa awamba gawa akawai wandaila awamba gawaiwai wa'ipawa wa'i, ‘Ipa' ata' pese'apa kerosin du'wanin. Lambeh ape'imbihi ha'i a feganda'ambeh.’
40025009	Owa' awo wa'ipawa wa'i, ‘Ahae' owa'atin. Kerosin owa' hiana dondo'ma apa'a, owa'. Ipa' fo'o petala anin ipe'ini.’
40025010	“Ea' awo ata' wafe' watala kerosin wagailii, aman anamba nogaso' nemata'wi a' nafi'i. Ea' nematawa awamba wanda'as dumbili dombol wagapani, a' wawis ipat nomon walomana sa' gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma aman nagaso' ako'wi, ea' uta a' taso'.
40025011	“Ea' awamba wafe' wagatala kerosini otanima wafi'i wagi' wataga, ea' walutu ofalana wa'i, ‘Dembinai, dembinai, ina' usi'mapai uta.’
40025012	“Owa' anen nagwamawai basef na'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' owa' egawepaia.’
40025013	Ea' Jisas na'i anif basef wapani na'i, “Dei' ea' na'amba atin, ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Dei' main, ipa' ina pegawa nambai' ae' igafi'i.”
40025014	“Nemaf afamba ae' itanima igafi'afii epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias sope na'amba atin si'i anif basef waminif atina anona aman na'i nogafe' anagoni. Anen nofalai amom amamba manda' maola anini mafi'i, a' naso'ama hiahawes lagof amamugufi.
40025015	Anen okom mapoma waf amamifi faloma gawa amamini atona atin, ea' nawalogamam moni amom. Anona naso'ana hiani a'owa' 5,000 kina, anona naso'ana hiani kwasakwasala 2,000 kina, anona naso'ana kwasala'in 1,000 kina. Anen nanda'mamas na'amba ma main, a' nafe'.
40025016	Ea' aman anamba nogofa' 5,000 kinai nanda' maola nogombamai inimba dembinai nagaso'anani, ma nogofa' 5,000 kina wamani wapani.
40025017	Ea' aman anamba nogofa' 2,000 kinai wapani nanda' maol nombaman a' nofa' anin 2,000 kina wamani wapani naloma fowa'ini.
40025018	Apa' aman anamba nogofa' 1,000 kinai owa' nofa'an nafe' nala'agon nawa moni inimba dembinai ananinai nambaho'wan nape itap.
40025019	“Ama nogota laota tafe'ma main, dembinai amamunai notanima nafi'i. Ea' na'i ata' ni'i basef andeande' noloma amom nogawa moni inimba anen nagaso'amani.
40025020	Ea' aman anamba nogofa' 5,000 kinai nafi'i ea' nofa'ai 5,000 kina inimba anen nanda' maol nogofa'ani wapani a na'ipa dembinai ananinai na'i, ‘Dembinai, ina' nase'e 5,000 kina atin, apa' dei' ina' niti ae' anda' maola moni inimba dei' efa' 5,000 kina wamani wapani.’
40025021	“Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' aman bu'unai nanda' maol andeande' datima. Dei' fowa' ina' nimafi hiahawes sa'wisi andeande' datima. Dei' enda'ena nimafi hiahawes lu'wasi. Ina' nifi'i nendagala neloma dembinai ine'inai.’
40025022	“Ea' aman anamba nogofa' 2,000 kinai nafi'i a' na'i, ‘Dembinai, ina' niti. Ina' nase'e 2,000 kina atin, owa', dei' anda' maola moni inimba, dei' ifa'ai 2,000 kina wamani wapani.’
40025023	“Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' aman bu'unai nanda' maol andeande' datimai. Fowa' ina' nimafi hiahawes sa'wisi andeande' datima. Dei' enda'ena nimafi hiahawes lu'wasi. Ina' fi'i nendagala neloma Dembinai ine'inai.’
40025024	Ea' aman anamba nogofa' 1,000 kinai anen wapani nafi'i na'ipa dembinai ananinai na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' egawa ina' aman dindinapinai nagala'ambema hiahawes naga'i ine'isi atisi. Aof anona aman nagawasafi afamba ina' nafe' nala'asaf. Ea' anep itap anona aman nogowaha olembepi, ina' nafi'i nalas.
40025025	Ae' nomonas sapoma ina'. Ea' ae' ombal bahe ma ina', dei' afe' ala'agon ambaho' 1,000 kina ine'ini nape itap. Isimba hiahawes ine'isi ea' ina' tanima dofa'aso.’
40025026	“Ea' dembinai ananinai nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nanda' maoli, ina' aman awinai endilisi. Ina' ala'uta nagahinai. Endilisi ina' a' negawa ae' ala' gwa'aisi anona aman nagawas aof ananifii, a afe' agatopa' wit anep itap anona amani.
40025027	I'i na'ambaiai, dei' nefa'an negambe'an benga ae' itanima ifi'i efa'an negaloma anin wamani wapani.
40025028	“Ea' ipa' dalombana 1,000 kina aman anamba pese'anan nefe'ma aman nanumba nogofa' moni 10,000 kinai.
40025029	Dei' main? Epes ami sagahapila hiahawesi isimba atiasi sofa' anis wamasi wapani ma hiahawes asasisi sogataga hias. Apa' epen ami owa' nigahapila hiahawesia ea' hiahawes anin nagahapilasi, isimba atiasi endalombanas anin.
40025030	Aman anamba wafinai ipa' pekwahona nefe' nuwis ando' akotigima endilisi. Wambel anamba awagoma selef sonda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' sope.”
40025031	“Anaf ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ifi'i ilumai glori mogogala'i ae'ami, ea' amom ensel hiami molome mifi'i. Ama nemaf afamba ae' epe etoma sia lu'unai ae'ani ma mogogala'i magafi'i heveni.
40025032	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sifi'i hi'ilas sope nogohnaep ae'asi. Ea' ae' inifa'as enda'as sope misi'ah biah, si'i aman nugumafi sipsipi nanifa' sipsip pagafe' anagon, meme magafe' anagon.
40025033	Ea' enda' epes a' sefe' sulutu wa'ol lagol kwahisigili ae'agili si'i sipsip, apa' epes isimba God nondaiwa'masi sulutu wa'ol lagol egawama si'i meme.
40025034	“Ea' ae' dembiwai king i'ipa esis isimba sagape lagol kwahisigilii i'i, ‘Ipa' ahame ae'anai nofalo'mepa ma sonogahipai, ipa' piwis anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma pefa' hiahaom amamba ipe'imi fowa' itap owa' ata' petagaia nandondombam magapomipai.
40025035	Dei' main, ipa' fowa' pati ae' nolomahe ape ipa' pase'e gwa'aisi. A pati iap pase'e, pase'e embel a' embel. Ae' agafi'i anambel wambili ipa' pefa'e pafe' ifagw ipe'igwi.
40025036	Ea' ae' luwaguf mais ake, ipa' pase'eas anda'as ea' awasiwi ipa' pimafi andeande'. Ae' ape anda' kalabus, ipa' pafo'o patolowe.’
40025037	“Ea' esis isimba sagape hilili'i atiasi sogwa basef ananifi si'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' nemaf mamahefa apa' mati ina' nolomahena mase'ena gwa'aisi ina'? A' anef nemaf ina' iap pase'ena apa' mase'ena embel?
40025038	Ea' nogota mamahotama apa' matilina si'i anambel wambelinai apa' mofa'ena mafi'i ifagw ape'igwi? Ea' nemaf mamahefa apa' matilina lowaf akena, mase'ena lowaf?
40025039	Ea' nemaf mamahefa mati awasina nape kalabus mafe' magatilina?’
40025040	“Ea' ae' dembiwai king egwamasa basef i'i, Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Maol bu'wani mamahina ipa' panda'ana pagatopalopa esis sahin owan ae'asi falafisi agof akasi, inimbai ipa' ina panda'masan esis atis, owa'. Panda'mean ae' wapani.
40025041	“Ea' ae' i'ipa esis sagalutu wa'ol lagol igawamai wapani i'i, Ipa' delefata pekwaha ae' fo'o. God nandaiwa'mepa na'i ipa' epes awipai. Ipa' fo'o wambel awambili nif lu'wafi fagapoma. Nif ifimba ahame nanda'ef fandandombol fapoma aman aunai Satan naloma ensel ananimi.
40025042	Dei' main, ipa' fowa' ina panda' waf bu'wafi, owa'atin. Ae' nolomahe agape, ipa' ina pase'e gwa'aisi, owa'. Ea' ae' iap pagase'ema embel, ipa' ina pase'e embel a' embel, owa'.
40025043	Ea' ae' si'i epen anagon lauguniwai, apa' ipa' owa' pefa'e pefe' ifagw ipe'igwia, owa'. Ea' lowaf ake ipa' ina pase'e lowaf, ae' awasiwi, ape anda' kalabus apa' ipa' ina pafo'o patolowe, owa'atin.
40025044	“Ea' esis wapani a' sogwa basef sohali'ana si'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' nemaf mamahefa apa' mati ina' gwa'aisi embel akana nolomahena, a ina' epen anagon lauguninai, a ina' lowaf akana awasina a nape nanda' kalabus, ea' apa' owa' mofo'o motopalopenaea?’
40025045	“Ea' ae' a' egwamasa basef esis i'i, Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, waf maif owa' penda'afa anin epen inimba falafuna agol akania, isimba ea' na'amba atin ina panda'meaf ae' wapani, owa'atin.
40025046	Ea' amam nematawa isimba sofe' sofa' hiahaom awami akafimi magape atapim lifilafii. Apa' epes isimba bu'wasi anaf sofa' ambal namili a' sofe' sope anamba sogape bo'wes lifilafima.”
40026001	Jisas nawalipasa basef ifimba laufi ma hi'alef, ama nogota atamba anen na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i,
40026002	“Ipa' pegawa, nimaguf bif dowaf ata' fapoma nemaf afamba ma soga' gwa'aisi lu'wasi sa'i Pasova afegataga. Atiasi nemaf afamba anona aman nowalapa ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ma anom amam boumi mogandele lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai mohe egaga'.”
40026003	Nemaf afamba amom pris dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai munduwa'anima mape ipat Kaiafasi, anen pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii.
40026004	Ea' ma'i basef mandame'maefa monda' uhuf mefe'ma mombalo' Jisas mohana nogaga'.
40026005	Owa' amom mandaiwa'ma mogombalo'ana nemaf afamba sanda' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasiafi. Na'amba epes hiasi ukup awep ea' sohafel sonda' wandaf.
40026006	Nemaf afamba Jisas nafe' Betani nape ipat anona aman Saimoni, fowa' aowas aunai nanda' alop ananipi pagambu'wi, apa' dei' ambo'ona.
40026007	Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwafi'mai anen kwahapila anol botol sanda'al si'i otami, embel sanda alogw fasigwi gwaga'ani sagatalin otamba lu'umbai nala botol alamba. Ea' kwakolo'w sanda inimba newala balaga Jisasi ma tebol anen nagatomama.
40026008	Amom alipumi ananimi mati na'amba, ukup amamipi awep a'owa'. Ea' ma'i, “Dei' maina ako'w kwagahambombaga sanda inimba nagafe' dowaf?
40026009	I'i afa' ofa'ana anis epes sotalin moni hiani ma afa' ofa'an ogaso' epes isimba kwahusa gwa'aisi mainai, dao' andeande'. Apa' owa', owa'atin.”
40026010	Ea' Jisas nogawa ukup amamipi, na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' ukup awasip pagapoma nemata'w akwamba? Owa'i. Ako'w kwanda' waf afamba fasifima ae'.
40026011	Isimba kwahusa gwa'aisi maini sape salomepa nimaguf hiafi. Apa' ae' ina ata' elomepa egape nimaguf hiafi, owa'atin.
40026012	Nemata'w akwamba kwakolo'wa sanda inimba ma alop ae'api, kwanda' isimba kwindila'waifa felefele'ma esis sogawe matmat.
40026013	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, ganimba itap walemb hiagoma anaf siga'ipasa basef bu'wafi ae'afi, si'ipasa basef ako'ufi wapani ma ukup pegapoma waf bu'wafi ako'w kwanda'meafi.”
40026014	Nogota atamba anona amom alipumi Jisasi 12-pelaim, aman anamba Judas Keriotinai a' nafe'ma amom pris hiami dembami.
40026015	Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pa'i pese'e main petalowe ma igihimba'mepana?” Ea' amom matalifa moni silva 30-pelain a' maso'ana.
40026016	A'i owa' nogota atamba atota nanda'as atapina nala' nolaoma ano'w ufia'wa nigihimba'mama Jisas amoma mogombalo'ana.
40026017	Nemaf afamba sali' saga' anis gwa'aisi saga'i Pasovai esis sa' bret atamba owa' togatef lu'utaia ea' amom alipumi ananimi mafi'mai anen mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat anima ma ina' nega' gwa'aisi isimba?”
40026018	Ea' na'i, “Ipa' pefe' taun, pefe'ma anona aman pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dembinai Tisa na'i, “Nemaf dondo'afi God nandandepamiefi ea' felefele'. Ae' a'i ea' Pasova inimba eloma alipumi ae'ami ope ipat ine'itai.’”
40026019	Ea' amom alipumi ananimi manda'as na'amba atin si'i anen naga'ipam ea' manda' gwa'aisi Pasovai dumbili dombol.
40026020	A'i owa' owamb anen nape na' gwa'aisi tebol naloma alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim.
40026021	Ea' amom mape ma' gwa'aisi atin owa', Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona afa'inai atiasi a' nefe' nihimba'ma amom boumi ma ae' egapoma.”
40026022	Ea' ukup amamipi nimanip a'owa', mosafel mahali'ana atona atin ma'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'a ami?”
40026023	Owa' anen nagwamama basef na'i, “Aman anamba dei'aol nalome wahapila bret wagalata disi, anen ea' ma'una, anamba atiasi nogawalapa ae'i.
40026024	Aho', ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi anis epes sehe egaga' si'i Buk Baibel naga'iasa ae'. Apa' aman anamba nogawalapa ae' ma boumii, anen uwahipina endilisi. Atiasi hiahaom awami endilisi a' motagamana. Fowa' ma'mana owa' ata' kolanai, dao' a' andeande'. Ama anen ina a' notagama hiahaom akafimi amamba awami. Owa', a' owa'atin.”
40026025	Ea' aman anamba Judas nogawalapa Jisasa bousii anen anagwa basefa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ae' a'ias a'a owa'atin?” Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' atina na'iam.”
40026026	Jisas nalomam ata' mape ma' gwa'aisi atin, ama main, nasa'ma anota bret, nandabeten nanifela God, nawalota naso'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' sa'mata pea'ata. Bret atamba alop ae'api.”
40026027	Ea' nasa'mai anop kap embel wain bagalapi nanifela God, naso'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' hipai gwa'embel atin.
40026028	Embel ambalemba esimbel ae'ambeli bewa' banaga basef ifimba God nagala' lapafi dambaifi. Esimbel ambalemba ae' ekolo'wambela God nokwahomasa waf awafi epes hiasii okom mogaso'anaf.
40026029	Ae' a'ipipa, ina ata' itanima ia' wainimbel wapani, owa'. Ae' efe' etaga anamba ahame nagala'ambemagoma, dao' a' ia' anin wain dambaini elomepa anamba.
40026030	Amom manda' anof awaf ea', mawisi a' mafe' mondowasa' halafuta Oliv.
40026031	Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Atiasi owamb amba'e pindaiwa'ma pagahapifi a pekwahowe. Dei' main, fowa' gani Baibel naga'i na'amba na'i, God na'i, ‘Anaf owagama gani, ae' eha aman anamba nugumafi sipsipi noga'. Ea' sipsip amamba atiasi a' mofa' mefe' atona biana.’
40026032	“Apa' owa' owa'atin, atiasi ae' itanima asafel wapani a' ili'ipa efe' itap lu'upa Galili.”
40026033	Ea' Pita nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “I'i anom owa' mohapifina banagema ma mi'i mokwahena, hapaimi, ihapifina banagewe ina atiasi ikwahina, owa'atin.”
40026034	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, atiasi owamb amba'e awata ata' owa' totaea, ina' a' nendehali'mi ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisasa.’”
40026035	Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Owa'atin. Esis soha afa' biafa oga' atin. Ae' ina a' indahali'mina, owa'atin endilisi.” Ea' alipumi hiami Jisasi ma'ias na'amba atin hi'alam.
40026036	Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mafe' atin anagon Getsemani lawah oliv hogotawama. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pepe na'a, ae' efe' gani wa'ol endabeten.”
40026037	Ea' anen nao'wa Pita naloma Sebedi nogaopana Jemsi Jon a' mafe'. Ea' name' opaf ananifi a' nimanif kwapete' endilisi.
40026038	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Nembel ae'ambili nimanimbil a'owa', ma ae' egaga'. Ipa' pepe na'a silisilawi pepe pesase ma igitanimai.”
40026039	Ea' anen nandambema nafe' kwasakwasala, a' nowa nambe' opaf notawa nandabeten na'i, “O ahame ae'inai, i'i ina' niga'i awima, dao' nekwahome kap apamba. Apa' owa', ina' nindaila okom ine'imi atom, ae' owa'.”
40026040	Nahali'ana ea', nosafel notanima nafe'ma alipumi ananimi magapoma, owa' nati amom a' ma'oh maga' mafe'. Ea' nofala Pita na'i, “Ipa' banagepa pepe pesasa ae' a'a owa'? Nogota a'ipipa a'i pepe pegasasa ae' ina laota, owa'. Nogota bandata si'i aua atitin.
40026041	Ipa' solawaipa pepe pendabeten. Na'amba hiahaom mogogwambipai a' motagama ipa'. Endilisi ambagof ipe'igufi fa'i awima pendabeten, apa' alop owa' banagepa, ala'uta tahepa.”
40026042	Ea' anen notanima nafe'ma bif nandabeten na'i, “Ahame ae'inai, i'i kap apamba owa' ano'w ufia'wa ae' indihi'amapa, ea' hapaimi, ae' ea' endefa'ap. Ina nindaila okom ine'imi atom.”
40026043	Anen nahali'ana ea' nandambemef notanima nafi'i bif magapoma nati amom ata' ma'oh atin, naep amamipi nimanip.
40026044	Ea' nakwahom notanima nafe' nandabeten wapanima a' wanif. Beten inimba atin doko' nali' nanda'ani, atin notanima nanda'an wapani.
40026045	Ama main, notanima nafi'mai amom magapoma na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ata' papoma noma'w pa'oh atin a'a? Peme'! Nogota ae'atai atataga. Dei' nemaf afa'e anona aman aunai a' nifi'i nulumai anom amam awami mufi'i mowa ae', ataga epen egefa' alop epesi.
40026046	Safel! A' ofe' uti aman anamba nigihimba'mama ae'i dei' a' nafi'i.”
40026047	Jisas ata' nalutu na'ipam atin, owa' anona aman nafi'i. Aman anamba Judas, anona amom 12-pelaim Jisasi. Anen nafi'i nalomai amam hiami mahapila bainagwi belep. Amom pris dembami malumai amom agufumi dembami esis Judai masapa'am mafi'i.
40026048	Ea' aman anamba nogawalapa Jisasi, a' nali' na'ipam nanda' ametal nihimba'maman na'i, “Atiasi ipa' piti ae' igasisi'a dalogwanai, aman anamba ea' ma'una Jisas. Ipa' pihapilana pembalo'ana tatala'ina.”
40026049	Ea' anen nafe'ma Jisas kwafalis na'i, “Owamb bu'wambi, Dembinai.” Ea' nasisi' dalogwana.
40026050	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “O alipunai, hiahawes ina' nafi'i ma na'i nenda'asi, awi ina' da'as kwafalis.” Ea' amom mafi'i felefele'ma anen mowasa' lagof mahapilana sisihina.
40026051	Ea' anona aman nape nagaloma Jisasi, nala lagol nagiai bainat ananitai naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii, ea' natopa' aliga ananigai pele'ataga gowa.
40026052	Owa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Sapa' bainat tofe' tope tagapoma. Amom hiami mogapa' bainagwi, atiasi bainagw goham moga'.
40026053	Ina' negawa banagami Ahamai a'a owa'? I'i ae' ihali'ana ai, anen naso'ai ensel ananimi hiami a'owa' kwafalis atis, mikila' misi'ah ahamba soldia 12-pelaih. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
40026054	Ae' i'i enda' waf afamba ai, atiasi basef ifimba fowa' God na'if fagape buk Baibeli ina atiasi fetaga alihif dondo'ma esis sifi'i sogombale'e, owa'atin.”
40026055	Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa hiasi na'i, “Ipa' pefa'i bainagwi belep pafi'i si'i pafi'i pa'i pegewa' anona aman aunai napa' nagaloma gavmani a'a? Nimaguf hiafi ae' ape alomepa ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wafi esis amam nematawa hiasi, apa' ipa' owa' pembale'ea.
40026056	Apa' dei' hiahaom amamba ipa' panda'ami mataga dondo'ma basef ifimba fowa' God na'ipa amom profet manda'ef fagail buki a' fataga endilisi.” Ea' alipumi ananimi hiami makwahona mafa' mafe' hi'alam.
40026057	Amom amamba mogombalo' Jisasi mofa'ana mafe' ipat anona pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii Kaiafas. Ea' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma agufumi esis Judai mundowa'anima mape.
40026058	Apa' Pita ina nalomam nafe' atef owa'. Anen nagigi'mam nafe' nataga indalelemb nawis ipat dembinai prisi nafe' nape naloma amom polisman mapoma nif. Anen na'i nope niti atiasi main netaga.
40026059	Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami Juda mugumafi koti, amom hiami ma'i molaoma anis epesa sombaso'ma Jisas sosapagana ma anif basefa mohana nogaga'.
40026060	Ea' epes hiasi sataga sa'i basef baso'afi fafe'ma anen. Apa' esis ina satagama anif basef endilisifi kofagefa ma mohana nogaga', owa'. A'i owa' main, anom amam biam mataga
40026061	ma'i, “Aman anamba na'i anif basef na'i, ‘Ae' la'ifiwai ma igugulata ipat lu'unai Godi ma itanima egala'ana wapani nimaguf wanif dowaf.’”
40026062	Ea' pris anamba dembinai nalutu nahali' Jisas na'amba na'i, “Ina' negwa basef ifimba a'a owa'? Dei' maina amom maga'ipina basef na'amba?”
40026063	Owa' Jisas ina na'i anif basef, owa'atin. Ea' pris anamba na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi ma agol Dembinai Godi nagape lifilafii, ina' kipa apa'. Ina' Krais Nogama Godi nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii, a'a owa'?”
40026064	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ipa' pa'ias ea' ma'wis. Apa' ae' a'ipipa, anaf owagama ipa' piti ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, epe lagol kwahisigili Godi banagewe. Epe otaga ilif itanima ifi'i petolowe.”
40026065	Jisas na'ias na'amba owa' pris anamba a' okom wandafuna ea' nahape' klos amamba anen nagalami na'ias na'i, “Anen a' nanda' dembinai God findiwana ma basef awafi! Apa' ina ata' mofalai anis wapani sifi'i si'i anif basefa anen, owa'atin. Anen na'ipana basef awafi God, ea' ifimba dei' pame'anamef ea'.
40026066	Ipa' ukup pape pa'imama?” Amom hiami magwamana ma'i, “Anen nanda' waf awafi ea' andeande'ma a' noga'o.”
40026067	Ea' amom misi'wafa amaga Jisasi mahana. Anom mopagamana aomb masopamana naep ananipi ma'i, “Ina' Krais God nasapa'ena nagafi'ii,
40026068	ina' a' ni'i basef si'i anona profet naga'iefi newalapa ami nagahinai.”
40026069	Pita tol nape indalelemb nomon nape ipat ande'etama. Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwanda' maoli kwafi'i felefele' ma anen ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Ina' wapani nape nagaloma Jisas ganimba itap lu'upa Galilii.”
40026070	Owa' Pita nandahali' na'i owa' ma naep isimba hiasii na'i, “Ae' ina egawa basef ifimba ina' naga'iefi, owa'atin.”
40026071	Ea' nafe' nalutu indalelemb nomon felefele'ma uta, ano'w nemata'w kwatolona wapani kwa'ipa esis amam nematawa sagape felefele'i kwa'i, “Aman anamba anen nape nagaloma Jisas Nasaretinaii.”
40026072	Owa' Pita nandahali'ma basef wapani ea' na'i, “Endilisi ilif, ae' ina egawa aman anamba.”
40026073	A'i owa' main, owa' anom amam malutu mafi'i ma'ipa Pita ma'i, “Endilisi atis, ina' aman mini'ap amamipi. Diga ine'igai gawalapena alihina.”
40026074	“Ea' dei' Pita nosafel na'i basef naga'if banagafi na'i “Endilisi gani ilif, ae' ina egawa aman anamba ipa' dei' paga'inai, owa' atin endilisi.” Anen na'ias ea', owa', awata atata.
40026075	Ea' Pita a' okom mandanda' ma basef nambati' Jisas na'ipanaef, naga'i, “Awata owa' ata' totaea, ina' atiasi ina' a' nembaso'mas ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ina' owa' negawea.’” Ea' Pita nawisi nafe' ando' nalef mehip a'owa'.
40027001	A'i owa' lala kuhimbita amom pris hiami dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Jisas nogaga'.
40027002	Amom mowa'ana mofa'ana mafe' maso' gavman dembinai Pailat.
40027003	Dei' aman anamba Judas nagawalapa Jisasa amom boumi nati amom manda' basef mapa'aga Jisasa nogaga'. Ea' nati amom mapa'agana manda' hiahawes isimba, ea' nofa' nimanimi lu'wami a'owa'. Ea' dei' anen notanima nowambela moni silva inimba 30-pelain nafe'ma amom pris amamba dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai.
40027004	Ea' na'i, “Ae' anda' waf awafi awalapa aman anamba bu'unai, owa' nonda' waf awafia atiasi a' noga'.” Owa' amom ma'i, “Amamba ina kofagema afa'imi, owa'. Amamba ea' kofagema ine'imi atom.”
40027005	Ea' Judas nakwaha moni silva inimba ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, nafe' anagon nandaha nail mandof ea' a' afuna.
40027006	Amom pris amamba dembami mofa' moni inimba ma'i, “Moni inimba anin nagatala aman anamba afa' wahana nogaga'i. Ea' afa' ina ombe' moni inimba neloma moni naga'oh ipat lu'unai Godi, owa'i.”
40027007	Ea' amom ma'i anif basef mandame'maef, ama moni inimba manda'an matala anep itapa anona aman nagala' malihi. Ea' mofa' itap apamba ma monda' matmata sogawa epes isimba lauginisi safi'i salomas sape sagaga'i.
40027008	Ea' dei' sofala agilipa sa'i, “Itap esimbel bagatalipi.” Dei' agol agalemba ma itap apamba ata' gape atapigil.
40027009	Ea' anif basef fowa' gani God nigihimba'manaef anona aman profet Jeremaia nanda'afi ifimba dei' a' fataga alihif fandawalap. Basef ifimba faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Amom mofa' otamba silva 30-pelaimba, esis Juda asandandepamba ma aman anambai.
40027010	Ea' moni inimba satala anep itapa anona aman nagala' malihi, si'i Dembinai naga'ipa ae' dindinip.”
40027011	Amom mofa' Jisas mafe' nalutu nogohnaep dembinai gavman Pailati, ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' king dembinai Judai a'a owa'?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef ifimba ina' naga'iefi endilisifi.”
40027012	Ea' amom pris amamba dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai masapagana ma basef hiafi, apa' anen ina nagwamam anif basef, owa'.
40027013	Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' name' basef ifimba hiafi esis sanda'mena kotefi, a'a owa'?”
40027014	Owa' Jisas ina nagwamana basef Pailat, owa'atin. Ea' dembinai gavman gogolalasona kwapete'.
40027015	Nogota atamba gavman anamba dembinai waf ananifi na'amba. Afagof danda ma nemaf afamba bu'wafi esis sanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasiafi, anen a nakwahowa anin epen nanda' kalabusi nafe' wahifin. Epen mamahina esis amam nematawa hiasi sandandepani, dembinai gavman na'i aho' nakwahin nafe'ma esis wahifin.
40027016	Nemaf afamba anona aman aunai nape nanda' kalabus, agilinama Barabas. Aman anamba nanda' waf awafi endilisi.
40027017	-
40027018	Ea' esis amam nematawa sunduwa'anima salutu. Pailat nogawa amom dembami esis Judai kowalama epes hiasi sagaila basef Jisasi ukup aom atom mapomana dei' manda' kotimana. Isimba atis dei' nahali'as na'i, “Ipa' pa'i ae' ekwaha ami nekwaha kalabus nefe'mago ipa'? Ekwaha Barabas a'a Jisas, esis saga'i Krais dembinai?”
40027019	Ea' Pailat nape ipat atamba sandakolas sanda' kota, ea' waulu'mana anani'wi kwasapa' basef fafi'mai anen kwa'i, “Ina' owa'i a' nenda' anin mae awanima aman anamba fasinaia, owa'i. Ae' doko' a'oh owamb andondo'ah atolona ea' efa' akafimi ma anen.”
40027020	Apa' amom pris amamba dembami maloma anom agufumi esis Judai masa'ma nomonas esis amam nematawai ma sohali' Pailata nogakwahowa Barabas, a soha Jisas nogaga'.
40027021	Ea' dembinai Pailat na'ipas wapani na'i, “Amam amamba biam, ipa' pa'i ae' ekwaha ami nefe'mago ipa'?” Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Barabas.”
40027022	Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Dei' ipa' pa'i ae' enda'mana main aman anamba Jisas paga'i Kraisi?” Esis hiasi nahali'as sa'i “Dolana nil lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai!”
40027023	Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Dei' main? Anen nanda' waf maif awafi?” Owa' esis gigal sa'oh sa'i mehip sa'i, “Dolana lawag hana afuna!”
40027024	Ea' Pailat a' nogawa basef ananifi ina banagefa nogapa'agas, owa'. Na'amba asonda' wandaf lu'wafi. Ea' Pailat nolai anambel embel nasa'opa lagof ananigufi ma naep esis amam nematawai nindihimba' na'ias na'i, “Ae' kofagema owa'atina egaha aman anamba nogaga'. Maol ipe'ini atin,”
40027025	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sagwa basef sa'i, “Ea' kofagema amamba a' mondafi'mai apa' moloma awasi ape'isi.”
40027026	Ea' Pailat nakwahowa Barabas nafe'ma esis. Ea' na'ipa amom soldia ma mogopagaha Jisas mofa'ana mefe' mogandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
40027027	Ea' amom soldia mofa' Jisas mawisi ipat amom gavmani lu'utai. Ea' mofala anom soldia hiami mafi'i munduwa'anima ma anen.
40027028	Ea' mowalia luwaguf maim ananimi malamana anota saket akwahitai.
40027029	Ea' mowalo'mana anof mandof higatagufi, mala'watefaf si'i hat mowalo'manana balaga ananigai. Ea' maso'ana anota alifita nahapilata lagol ananigili. Amom mindiwa nembawa motawa felefele'ma anen, manda' salamal lahana ma'i basef findiwaifi ma anen ma'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi, ina' king dembinai esis Judai!”
40027030	Ea' misi'wafana mandalombana alifita atamba mopagahona balaga ananigai.
40027031	Manda'ana findiwana ma ea', mowalimana saket atamba, malamana klos mais ananisi a mofa'ana mafe'ma mogandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
40027032	Amom mosafel mafe' owa' mati anona aman Saimon Sairiniinai. Ea' amom soldia masasapa'ana ma notopalopa Jisas nogofa' lawag ananigai.
40027033	Ea' mafe' mataga anagon agiligima Golgota. Apa' dei' mambemefagol ma'i, Pipitagol Balagaigil.
40027034	Ea' maso'ana anambel embel wainimbel manda' marasin numbutinai nalomambela nea' embel begahagofa akep lu'wami. Anen ata' name' embel atin, owa', nandaiwa'mambel.
40027035	Amom mandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ea', manda' satu ma luwaguf maim ananimi ma ami nigikila'i mofa'ef mondondamef atona atin.
40027036	Amom tol mape anamba mumafiana.
40027037	Ea' manda' anif basef fail lawag ilifugama felefele'ma balaga ananigai. Basef ifimba kotefi Pailat nanda'afi faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “AMAN ANAMBA ANEN JISAS, DEMBINAI ESIS JUDAI.”
40027038	Felefele'ma Jisas nagaima amom soldia mandola anom biam manda' waf awafii manda' wali. Amom mandola Jisas nail la'afen, ea' mandola amom biam mail wa'owa'ol.
40027039	Ea' anis amam nematawa safi'i kilikila' sagaili esis sanda' salamala anen, sapapati balagah sa'ias na'amba
40027040	sa'i, “Awi, ina' aman nigugulata ipat anamba Godi, ma netanima negasa'mana nimaguf wanifi, dei' netopalopa ina'. I'i ina' nogama Godiai, nendatagwah nisila'i.”
40027041	Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom agufumi esis Judai wapani, hiami malomam manda'ana findiwana ma'i,
40027042	“Anen nandatopalopa anis daindaias apa' dei' ina natopalopa anen, owa'atin. Anen dembinai king esis Israeli. Ea' dao' dei' nondatagwah lawag ilif nisila'i ma apa' motolona mogahapifana.
40027043	Anen nahapifa God na'ias na'i, ‘Ae' Nogama Godi.’ Ea' dao', i'i God okom mimila anen ai, anen nondatopalopana.”
40027044	Ea' amom amamba biam manda' wali sandolam magalumanai manda'ana findiwana si'i amom agufumi mali' manda'manam.
40027045	Awin a'i owa' nandasapa' akot lu'unai a' nataga dogw naofana itap hiagoma esis Judai akotigin nape nafe' nafe' nataga awin nandambema nagape gani 3 klok wambomota. Ea' nataga negala' wapani.
40027046	Felefele'ma awin nandambema 3 klok, Jisas noga na'i mehip na'i, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabaktani?” Apa' mambemef ma'ias na'amba ma'i, “God ae'inai, God ae'inai, dei' maina ina' nagakwahowe?”
40027047	Ea' anis epes salutu felefele' same' anen na'ias na'amba sa'i, “Anen nofala anona profet Elaija.”
40027048	Ea' anona aman nasagih nafe' kwafalis nofa' anom mosong magape naohi nalam mowala embel wainimbel numbutimbeli nagiam nasapa'am anagol bagol nandowam mafe'ma Jisas noga' embel.
40027049	Owa' anis salutu sa'i, “Ata' ota' kwahowana, ma ata' muti atiasi Elaija nifi'i notagwahona, a'a owa'?”
40027050	Ea' Jisas nanda'as go'ala mehip a'owa' wapani ea' ambal ananili a' landahi' lafe'ana.
40027051	Owa' anef lowaf lu'wafi si'i utai fegetaol ipat Godi lu'unai nomoni, palalaf gani ilif fewala itap fataga biafif. Ea' itap bol atin nape otamba lu'wami pepe'am.
40027052	Ea' anamba sagawa epes sagaga'ima matmat mandawisi' ea' amam nematawa hiasi Godi fowa' sagaga'i sosafel wapani.
40027053	Esis sokwaha matmat afamba Jisas nogosafel wapani, sofe' sogawis Jerusalem, wambel sandandepambela sonda' maol Godima. Ea' epes hiasi asatilis.
40027054	Kepten anamba dembinai nugumafi soldia hiamii naloma amom soldia mape mugumafi Jisasi mati hiahaom amamba. Nogota atamba mati hiahaom mataga itap bol atin nape, ombal maham a'owa' ma'i, “Endilisi atis, aman anamba Nogamana Godi.”
40027055	Nematawa hiawai wagagi'ma Jisasi wakwaha itap apamba lu'upa Galili wafi'i wagatopalopanai awo walutuwi laogon watologon.
40027056	Ano'w Maria Makdalai'wi. Ano'w agol atogol Maria, kogola Jemsi Josepi. Ea' ano'w kogola amam biam Sebedi nogaopana.
40027057	A'i owa' wambomota anona aman Arimateainai hiahaom hiamunai agilinama Josep anen alipunai nagaila Jisasi a' nafi'i.
40027058	Nafe'ma Pailat nahali'ana ma nofa'i alop Jisasi nogawana. Ea' Pailat na'ipa amoma mogaso'ana.
40027059	Josep nofa'ap ea' nanda' lowaf namifi afitifi.
40027060	Ea' naola'ana nawis matmat ananitai dambaitai, fowa' nagwasana nagawis anom otam lu'unai. Ea' dei' nambema anona otam lu'unai nafe' nowalo uta matmat atamba. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma main, a' nafe'.
40027061	Ea' Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w awo agol atogol, awo biawa wape wa'ol felefele' watologon.
40027062	Ama a'i owa' wafilu nemaf sagandomba hiahawes gwa'aisi maisafi afamba fafe'ma ea', amom pris dembami maloma amom Farisi dembami mafe' malagama Pailat.
40027063	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' a' ukup papoma anif basef aman anamba nagambaso'ami naga'iefi fowa' anen ata' nagape. Anen naga'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Nimaguf wanif a' fefe'ma hi'ilif owa', ae' a' itanima esafel wapani.’
40027064	Isimba atis dei' ina' a' ni'ipam mumafi matmat atamba andeande'ma nimaguf wanif ata' ahi'ilif. Na'amba amom alipumi ananimi a' mifi'i mokwalopana a' mofa'ana mefe' mi'ipa esis amam nematawa mi'i, ‘Anen notanima nosafel matmat wapani.’ Ea' baso'am anamba dei'inai a' lu'una nikila' nagali'i.”
40027065	Ea' Pailat na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pe'wa anom soldia pefe' pewalo uta matmat atamba sisihita, si'i ukup ipe'ipi paga'ias dondo'ma gawa ipe'ini.”
40027066	Ea' amom mafe' mowalowa matmat sisihita ea' manda'ima uta masaho'mata manda' anin ametal banagani ma epes ina a suwalin suwis. Ea' ma'ipa anom soldia mape mumafiagon.
40028001	Nemaf afamba esis Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sabat fafe'ma hi'alaf, ea' sande nemaf fagali'ma wiki, kuhumbita atota felefele'ma awin nigatafi, nematawa awamba biawa Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w agol atogol wafi'i ma ugati matmat.
40028002	Ea' kwafalis atis imauna lu'unai nasol mehip. Ea' anona ensel Dembinaii nisila'i gani heven, a' nafe' nelefata owap apamba pegewalo utai nafe' na'oh wa'ol a tol natomana.
40028003	Amaga ananigai a gogala' a'owa' si'i otaga pele'alama nogogala' lu'waguf maim ananimi afitim a'owa' si'i ais mandati.
40028004	Ea' amam amamba soldia mugumafi matmati a' ombal maham kwapete' a'owa' ambombol atin ma'oh itap si'i sagaga'i.
40028005	Owa' ensel anamba na'ipa awo biawa na'i, “Ipa' bipa ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Ae' egawa ipa' pafi'i pa'i pelaoma Jisas, aman anamba esis sagandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
40028006	Anen ina ata' nape na'a, owa'. Anen a' notanima nosafel ea' si'i fowa' naga'ipipa! Ipa' fi'i ma ata' piti na'a naga'oma. Dei' a' wafigin nape.
40028007	Dei' ipa' fo'o kwafalis pi'ipa alipumi ananimi pi'i, ‘Anen nosafel wapani ea'. Peme'. Anen a' nali'ipa nafe' itap apamba Galili. Ipa' fo'o petolonago ganimba.’ Basef ae'afi ea' ifimba.”
40028008	Ea' awo ombal magahawai dei' ea' sonahawa wapani, kwafalis atis wakwaha matmat wasagih wafe'ma uga'ipa amom alipumi ananimi.
40028009	Owa' Jisas nati awo ufia'w nanda'mawa gude na'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi endilisi.” Ea' awo wafe' felefele'ma anen wahapila bo'wagah ananigahi ma onda' lotuma anen.
40028010	Owa' Jisas na'ipawa na'i, “Ipa' ina a' ombal mehepa, owa'i. Ipa' bipa pefe' pi'ipa amom owape ae'ami mofo'o Galili. Bola motolowe ganimba.”
40028011	Nematawa awamba biawa ata' wafe' atin, anom soldia mugumafi matmati a' mafe' mawis taun ma'ipa amom pris dembami ma hiahaom amamba magatagai.
40028012	Ea' pris amamba maloma agufumi esis Judai ma'i anif basef mandame'maef ea' maso'ama anin moni hiani nafe'ma soldia anamba
40028013	ma'ipam ma'i, “Ipa' piga'ias na'amba pi'i, ‘Owamb afa' waga'ihi, amom alipumi ananimi mafi'i makwalopana mofa'ana.’
40028014	Ama gavman dembinai neme' basefana, dao' afa' a' onda' okom ananimi awanema ipa' basef akepa.”
40028015	Ea' amom soldia mofa' moni inimba mame' basef amamifi a' magi'mif. Ea' basef ifimba ma hiahawes isimba ea' fafe'agon hi'alagon walemb esis Judai, ea' ata' sa'iif atin fafi'i fatagama dei' sa'if atapif.
40028016	Ea' amom alipumi 11-pelaim mafe' Galili mataga halafuta atamba Jisas nali' na'ipam mogafe'ma.
40028017	Ea' mati Jisas masa'ma agol ananigili manifelona. Apa' anom a' nomonas bimbiafis sapaom.
40028018	Ea' Jisas nafi'i felefele'ma amom na'ipam na'i, “God a' nase'epam ea' banagami ilifami itapami.
40028019	Na'amba dei' ipa' pefe' piwalipa amam nematawa ma basef fasifi ae'afi, penda'as sotaga alipisi ma sigaila basef ae'afi datima ea' pipisi'as embela agol Ahamai goloma ae'agili foloma Ambal bu'unai Ananili.
40028020	Ea' piwalipasa sogagi'ma basef bu'wafi hiafi ae'afi agawalipipaef dindinipi. Endilisi atis, ae' ape alomepa ma nimaguf hiafi danda, a pefe' pefe' ma nemaf akutaifi nogota hi'igalata.” Basef ea' ma'uf.
41001001	-
41001002	Basef ifimba bu'wafima Jisas Krais, Nogamana Godi. Basef ifimba fandasefel fataga si'i anona profet fowa'inai Aisaia nanda'ef fagail buki. Aisaia na'i basef ifimba na'amba, God na'i, “Ina' neme'. Owagama ae' esapa' anona aman nogofa'o basef ae'afii nili' nofe'ma ina' nondondomba ufia'w ine'ikwi.
41001003	Anep itap wafigima fataupigima malogol anona amani, anaf ni'i basef na'amba ni'i, ‘Ipa' pendondomba ufia'w Dembinaii kondafe' usi'i'w. Ufiawa ananiwai kondafe' hilili'i.’”
41001004	Jon nagapisi'as embeli nafe' anagon wafigima fataupigima nawalapa basefa amam nematawa hiasi na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' pewa' alafugaha waf awafi pembema nelelemba God pefa' baptaisa God nogakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi okom mogaso'anaf.
41001005	Ea' esis hiasi sagape anep itap lu'upa Judiai saloma amam nematawa hiasi sagape Jerusalami safi'mai Jon sa'i seme' basef ananifi. Ea' sawalapa waf awafi esis sanda'afi, Jon napisi'as walemb Jordan.
41001006	Anen nala anom klos sanda' auf anom mafis lu'wami kameli sanda'am, ea' nowaho' let sanda' agwahup mafisina sanda'anai, nagundisam. Gwa'aisi naga'asi na' gwamu'wis saloma aupimbel alupumi.
41001007	Anen nawalapa basef na'i, “Anona aman atiasi nigi' nugafi'ii, anan banagonai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma egatagwaha mandalefa su ananimi, owa'.
41001008	Ae' ipisi'ipa embel atembal, apa' anen owa'. Anen atiasi nese'epa Ambal bu'unai Godi nogape opalef ipe'ilifi nomon.”
41001009	Afamba Jisas nakwaha Nasaret anep itap lu'upa Galili a' nafi'i. Jon napisi'ana walemb Jordan.
41001010	Jisas nakwaha embel walemb nandagiai atin, owa' nati heven nandawisi' alihina, ma anen, nati Ambal bu'unai Godi nafi'mai anen si'i amil alamba apa' maga'i ma'unai nufia' nisila'mai anen.
41001011	Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai heven ga'i anif basef ga'i, “Ina' Nogame ae'inai. Ae' okom mohafel maimailina a'owa'. Ea' okom ae'ami bo'oma ina'.”
41001012	-
41001013	Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nofa' Jisas nafe' anagon fataupigima mafis atom alupumi magalutuma nimaguf 40-pelaif, awin si'ini du'wanini. Owa' Satan nafi'i nagwambana. Ma ea', amom ensel mafi'i mumafi Jisas matopalopana.
41001014	Afamba amom manda' Jon nanda' kalabus, Jisas a' nafe' itap lu'upa Galili nanda' maol nawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi na'ipasef
41001015	na'i, “Nemaf afamba felefele' afetaga ma epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Na'amba ipa' dei' pendewa' alafugaha waf awafi pembema nelelemb pihapifa basef ifimba bu'wafi.”
41001016	Jisas naila akata nafe' atin dumb lu'wambi Galili, nati amam biam Saimon naloma owamana Andru. Amom mala anembeh mowafa agof manda' bisnis.
41001017	Ea' Jisas natolom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pifi'i pihapila basef ae'afi pila ae'. Fowa' ipa' pewafa agof, apa' dei' ihimba'mepa pefe' piga'ipa anis epes pefa'asi sogaila ae'.”
41001018	Ea' mame'ana makwaha anembeh ha'oh, amom mailana a' mafe'.
41001019	Ea' nindiki'ah nafo'o felefele' akata nati Jems naloma owamana Jon, Sebedi nogaopana. Amom biam matoma bot mape mosambala anembeh amamimbihi.
41001020	Owa' Jisas natolom nofalam kwafalis mame'ana. Ea' mohafel kwafalis makwaha ahamam naloma anom manda' maola anini mape bot, amom biam maila Jisas mafe'.
41001021	Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi Jemsi Jon, Saimoni Andru mafe' Kaperneam mape. Nemaf afamba esis Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sabat, Jisas nao'wam mafe' mawis ipat Juda sandakolasatai ea' na'ipasa basef amam nematawa.
41001022	Esis same' basef ananifi ea' gogolalasis kwapete' endilisi. Anen ina nawalipas si'i amam falafumi maga'ipas, owa'. Anen na'ipas dindinip si'i anona agilinai naga'ipas. Amom magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ina mawalipas na'amba si'i anen, owa'.
41001023	Afamba anona aman nape nalomas ipat atamba, ambal aunai napaona ea' kwafalis atin ambal anamba noga na'i mehip na'i,
41001024	“O Jisas ina' Nasaretinai, ina' nafi'i na'i nenda' maina apa'? Nafi'i ma negahambombagapa? Ae' egawena ina' aman bu'unai hilili'i Godi.”
41001025	Ea' Jisas ninifalom na'i, “Ina' ambalip awinai, sopama malogol kwahowa aman anamba fo'o.”
41001026	Ea' ambal anamba aunai nakoto' anen kwapete' nanda'am go'ala mehip nakwahona nawisi nafe'.
41001027	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi gogolalasis sandakoto'ma ea' sanda'ipama sa'i, “Amamba main da'im? Ifimba anif basef dambaifi? Anen natofa ambagof awami na'ipam si'i anona aman banagonai. Hiahaom amamba hiami maloma ambagof awami wapani mame' basefana makwaha epes mafa' mafe'.”
41001028	Ea' basef ifimba ma maol Jisas nanda'ani fafe'agon hi'alagon walemb hiagoma bagape nomona itap apamba lu'upa Galili.
41001029	Jisas naloma alipumi biamibiam ananimi mosafel makwaha ipat Juda sandakolasatai ea' usi'im mafe' wambel Saimoni Andrui ea' mawis ipat amamutai. Jemsi Jon wapani mafe' malomam.
41001030	Ea' esis sa'ipa Jisasa Saimon nandagi'mo'wi awasi'w kwa'oh, alop akwa'upi nifip.
41001031	Ea' nafe'ma ako'w nahapila lagol akwa'ugili nasa'ma'w. Ea' aowas inimba nakwaho'w nafe' ambo'okw, kwanda'masas gwa'aisi esis.
41001032	A'i owa' wambomota awin newala naso', esis sofa'ai isimba aowas nanda'asi saloma anis ambagof awami magapaisi safi'mai Jisas.
41001033	Ea' esis hiasi sagape taun inimbai safi'i salutu felefele'ma uta ipat sili'ak.
41001034	Ea' Jisas nanda' amam nematawa hiasi aowas naninani nanda'asi bo'wes, natofamasa anom ambagof awami magapaisi ea' sataga bo'wes. Ambagof awami mogawa Jisas anen nogamana Godi. Na'amba nasopama malogof ambagof amambai afasopam be' mape.
41001035	Wafilu kuhimbita atota akot ata' tail, Jisas nosafel nakwaha ipat atamba nagapoma. Anen atona nosafel nafe' anamba wafigima ea' nape nanda' betena God.
41001036	Saimon naloma anom alipumi ananimi mosafel matimana owa', ea' molaomana magi'mana mafe'.
41001037	Molaomana mafe'ma matolona ma'ipana ma'i, “Epes hiasi solaomena.”
41001038	Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ata' diamaso, afa' ata' ofe' analemb walemb daialemb hiagoma bagape felefele'i. Ae' ata' i'ipasa basef bu'wafi esis. Maol inimba atin ae' dei' afi'i.”
41001039	Ea' naso'asa basef nafe'agon hi'alagon walemb hiagoma agol lu'wagoma Galili, naso'asa basef bu'wafi nomon ifagw Juda sandakolasugwi natofamas ambagof awami magape anis epesi mandahi' mawisi mafe'.
41001040	Owa' anona aman aowas aunai nanda' alop ananipi pagambu'wi, nafi'i felefele'ma Jisas nindiwa nembawa notawa na'ipana dindinip na'i, “I'i ina' ni'i aho' netopalope ma egataga bo'owe.”
41001041	Ea' Jisas nati anen uwahipina nando lagola nasagol anen na'i, “Ae' a'i aho'ma ina' negataga bo'wena.”
41001042	Ea' dei' atef aowas anamba nanda' alop pagambu'wi nakwahona ea' bo'ona.
41001043	Jisas nasapa'ana kwafalis na'ipana dindinip
41001044	na'i, “Ina' a' nefe' ni'ipa anin epen ni'i ae' anda'ena bo'wena, owa'i. Ina' fo'o nihimba'ma alop ine'ipi ma aman anamba pris. Ea' nese'ana hiahaom amamba anen nondolalima God ea' ina' ninifelona ma nagataga bo'wena si'i mu'uli anan nagaso' Mosesani naga'i. Ama amam nematawa hiasi sitilina sogogawa aowas ine'ini ahi'alan.”
41001045	Owa' owa'atin. Aman anamba na'ipasam mafe'agon hi'alagon amam nematawa hiasi sogawa amamba ma anen nagataga bo'ona. Ea' Jisas ina nafe' nawis anambel wambel ma naep hiasii, owa'. Na'amba hiasi sifi'i sososopamana. Ea' ina nawis anambel wambel lu'wambili, owa'. Atapina nape anamba wafigima atogon. Bola esis amam nematawa sagape ganiganii safi'mai anen.
41002001	Anif nimaguf fafe'ma main, Jisas notanima nafe' Kaperneam. Ea' esis same' basefa anen a nafi'i nape ipat.
41002002	Amam nematawa hiasi sandakolas ipat atamba nagapautai asi'ita dogw. Na'amba uta owa' anagon nogal kwasakwasala ma sofe' sogawisa. Ea' nawalipasa basef ifimba bu'wafi.
41002003	Owa' anom amam biamibiam manda' belita malai aman anamba lagufi bo'wagah sandahapimanai mofa'ana ma'i mofe'ma Jisas.
41002004	Owa' ipat asi'itama amam nematawa hiasi salutu sili'ak, ea' ina anagona mofa'ana muwis mogafe' felefele'ma Jisas, owa'atin. Ea' malota ipat ilif ande'etama mapisila bogwan ilif mapa belita mala'ana nowalai nomon Jisas nagalutuma.
41002005	Nogota atamba Jisas nati amom a' nogawa amom mahapifana ma'i anen banagonai ma nogatopalopa aman anamba aowas nanda'anai. Ea' na'ipa aman anamba na'i, “Ina' epen ae'inai. Waf awafi ina' nanda'afi ae' akwahomenaf hi'alaf.”
41002006	Ea' anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mape mame'ana. Nelelemb amamilimbi awalemba basef ananifi. Na'amba amom nomonas salasafe' ma'i,
41002007	“Dei' maina Jisas naga'ias na'amba? Anen nanda' God findiwana. Owa' atina anona aman la'ifinaima nogakwaha waf awafia. Maol inimba God atona nanda'ani.”
41002008	Jisas nogawa nomonas isimbai amamisi ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina nomonas ipe'isi sagape na'amba?”
41002009	Dei' hiahaom maim ipa' pa'i ahifima ae'? Ae' banagiwai ma i'ipa aowas nanda'anai iga'i, ‘Ae' ekwahomana waf awafi anen nanda'afi, a'a i'ipana iga'i nosa'ma alahis ananisi nosafel nogafe'. Basef ifimba ma nogasa'ma alahis ananisi pa'i amamba ahifima ae'.
41002010	Ae' a'i ipa' pegawa ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, la'ifiwai ma egakwaha waf awafi hiafi amam nematawa sagape itapi sanda'afi. Ae' a'i ihimba'mepa ae' la'ifiwai ma enda' hiahaom amamba.”
41002011	Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina, ina' safel sa'ma alahis ine'isi fo'o ipat ine'itai.”
41002012	Ea' esis salutu satolona sati anen kwafalis nosafel nasa'ma alahis naga'ihisi a' nafe'. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi gogolalasis kwapete'as, safela agol Godi lu'wagol sa'i, “Fowa' apa' ina mati anom si'i na'amba, owa'atin.”
41002013	Jisas notanima naila akata nafe' dumb lu'wambi agilimba Galilii. Amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen na'ipasa basef bu'wafi.
41002014	Jisas nosafel nafe' owa', nati anona aman Livai, Alfius nogamana nape ipat sogofa' takisa. Aman anamba nogofa'asa takisa amam nematawa hiasii. Jisas nofalana na'i, “Ina' fi'i nila ae'.’ Ea' nosafel nafe' nailana.
41002015	Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi ma' gwa'aisi ipat Livaii maloma amam hiami awami. Anom mogofa' takisi, anom manda' waf awafii maloma Jisas ma' gwa'aisi. Amam amambai ina mahapifa Jisas, owa'. Mailana dowaf.
41002016	Ea' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi amom Farisi mati Jisas na' gwa'aisi naloma amam awami maloma amam amamba mogofa' takisi. Ea' mahali' alipumi ananimi ma'i, “Dei' maina dembinai tisa nape naloma amom mogofa' takisi maloma amam amamba manda' waf awafii maga' gwa'aisi atogon?”
41002017	Ea' Jisas name'am na'amba na'ipam na'i, “Isimba aowas akasi ina sofe'ma dokta, owa'. Esis bu'wasi. Apa' isimba aowas nanda'asi atis dao', safe'ma dokta. Ae' ina afi'i ma egefala epes isimba bu'wasi sagape hilili'i, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma egefala isimba sanda' waf awafii.”
41002018	Anef nemaf amam amamba alipumi Joni maloma anom dembami Farisi mololama gwa'aisi ma mondabeten bu'wani. Ea' anom amam daiam mafi'i ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Dei' maina amom alipumi Joni maloma amom Farisi mololama gwa'aisi ma mandabeten, apa' ine'imi owa' mololama gwa'aisia?”
41002019	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'i basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i anis sonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma anis aman nemata'w bias sondaso'amai, ipa' pa'i esis alipisi atiasi sololama gwa'aisi isimba? Owa'atin endilisi. Nemaf afamba esis bias sondaso'ama, alipisi asasisi sonohas sea' gwa'aisi solomas.
41002020	Apa' anafa anis daias sofa' aman anamba nagaso' nemata'wi nogafe' laogon dao', esis sololama gwa'aisi, apa' dei' ata' owa'atin.”
41002021	Ea' Jisas nanda' anif basef waminif atina luwaguf na'i, “Ina andeande'ma pegatopa' lowaf namifi pesambalef fegaloma anef lowaf apifi, owa'. I'i penda'as na'amba, atiasi lowaf afamba namifi fendatagwah fehape' apifi bolotaf a' notaga lu'una.”
41002022	Ea' na'i anif wapani na'i, “Apa' ina anin epen nakolo'wa embel wain dambaini bewala agwahup apinai memeina si'i botol, owa'atin. I'i anin nenda'am na'amba, embel wain netef hian, nohape' agwahup anamba pepe'etana wain kolo'olam awasim hi'ilam. Na'ambai owa'. Anin nakolo'an agwahup dambainai atona.”
41002023	Anef nemaf Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sa'i sabat, Jisas nafe' nawis anof aof sagawa witafi si'i raisi. Ea' alipumi ananimi mafe' malomana mosaga anom wit magaufi ma'am.
41002024	Ea' anom dembami Farisi ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Neme'. Alipumi ine'imi manda'as na'amba ma main? Amom mosambala mu'uli ma nemaf afamba magapoma noma'wafi sabat.”
41002025	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amom Farisi na'i, “Ipa' pegawa basef fagape Baibeli ma waf fowa' dembinai king Devit nanda'afi. Afamba Devit naloma alipumi ananimi gwa'aisi akam nolom magaham. Ipa' pegawa basef ifimba ea'.
41002026	Nemaf afamba Abiatar nape dembinai pris nagali'ma amom prisi, Devit nolom mahana nawis ipat Godi na' bret atamba mondolalima Godatai. Mu'uli ape'ini lu'wani na'i amom pris atom mea'ata. Anis daias owa'i. Apa' Devit ina nagi'ma mu'uli inimba, owa'. Anen na'ata nanda'ata naso' alipumi ananimi ma'ata atin.”
41002027	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “God nali' nanda' epes ea' nagi' na'ipasa nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi sabata nogatopalopas. Ina nanda' epesa sogaila basefa sabat, owa'. Na'amba alipumi ae'ami mogosaga witi ina manda' waf awafi, owa'.
41002028	Ae' atowe ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ape dembiwai ma hiahaom hiami. Ea' ape dembiwai ma nemaf afamba sabata iga'ipipa maol main andeande'ma pigaila basef penda'an nemaf afamba.”
41003001	Anef nemaf Jisas nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai, nati anona aman lagol awagilinai nape.
41003002	Ea' anis sala' solaoma basef kwamaifi ma sosapagana sonda'mana kot. Ea' satolona naep paipailana ma siti nonda' aman anamba bo'ona nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi a'a owa'?
41003003	Ea' anen na'ipa aman anamba lagol awagilinai na'i, “Ina' lutu la'afena naep hiasii.”
41003004	Ea' Jisas nahali'as na'i “Mu'uli lu'wani ape'ini na'ias na'imama? Apa' monda' waf fasifi nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi a'a monda' waf awafi? Apa' monda'asa motopalopa esis sogape andeande' a'a mohambombagas sogaga'?” Owa' esis ina sa'i anif basef, owa'.
41003005	Jisas nasa'ma naep natilis tulif owa', nogawa esis opalef maso' sandaiwa'ma sogame' basef. Na'amba okom ananimi wandafuma esis. Ea' nati esis uwahipis, na'ipa aman anamba lagol awagilinai na'i, “Dowa lagol ine'igili.” Ea' nandowagol gataga bo'wagol wapani.
41003006	Ea' amom dembami Farisi mosafel mafe' maloma anom amam mini'ap Heroti, ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Jisas nogaga'.
41003007	Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi makwaha wambel ambalemba mafe' dumb lu'wambi Galili. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'i walemb hiagoma Galili safe' sagi'mana.
41003008	Esis safi'i hiagoma. Anis safi'i walemb hiagoma Judia, anis safi'i Jerusalem, anis safi'i itap lu'upa Idumea, ea' anis sagape walemb Jordan gani wa'ili saloma anis sagafi'i walemb bielimbi Tairi Saidoni, esis hiasi safi'mai anen. Same' basefa hiahaom Jisas nanda'ami, na'amba safi'mai anen.
41003009	Ea' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Amam nematawa hiasi sape. Na'amba a' sofafa'asowe. Anota bot tola tosasae ma ilita egatoma.”
41003010	Ea' sogawa anen nali' nanda' epes hiasi aowas nanda'asi sagataga bu'wasi. Ea' isimba aowas nanda'asi sanda' bambasi'ma atin safe'ma anen sahapilana ma sogataga bo'wes.
41003011	Ambagof awami magape epesi mati anen mogawana, ea' mowa ma'oh felefele'ma anen opafunama, ea' mofalana ma'i, “Ina' nogamana Godi.” Nogota mamahotama ma nemaf afamba atef magatolona manda'manam na'amba atin.
41003012	Ea' na'ipa ambagof awami dindinipa amom ina mowalapa anen mi'ipasana mi'i anen nogamana Godi, owa'i.
41003013	Jisas nafe' nondowasa' halafuta, nofala amam amamba anen okom maga'iami mafi'mai anen.
41003014	Ea' nandandepa amom 12-pelaima mope mogalomana atapima, nosapa'am mefe' mogowalapa basef.
41003015	Na'ipam naso'ama banagami ma mogatofa ambagof awami magape epesi.
41003016	Amom 12-pelaim nandandepami, agofuma amamba. Saimon agol wa'agol Pita,
41003017	ea' Jems nogama Sebedi, naloma owamana Jon, naso'ama agof wa'agof Boanesis. Agol agalemba kofagogola na'amba, nogaopa otaga diwagalai.
41003018	Ea' Andru, Filip, Bartolomyu, Matyu, Tomas, a Jems nogama Alfiusi, a Tadiusi Saimon. Aman anamba Saimon anen mini'ap Seloti.
41003019	Ea' Judas Keriotinai aman anamba nafe' nagawalapa Jisasa bousii.
41003020	Jisas nafe' ipat ea' esis hiasi safi'i wapani. Ea' naloma alipumi ananimi ina ata' ma' gwa'aisi, owa'.
41003021	Esis wambota Jisasi same' basef ifimba ma anen naloma alipumi ina ma' gwa'aisi, safi'i sa'i so'wana. Ea' sa'i, “Anen ambagof awami manda'ana dei' nahaga nagaol.”
41003022	Anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mapani Jerusalem mulianai mambaso'am ma'i, Jisas natofa ambagof awami ma banagami anona ambal aunai mamana agilinama Bielsebul.
41003023	Ea' Jisas nofalai amom mafi'i malutu felefele'ma anen na'i anif basef waminif atina amom na'i, “Satan ina notofa anen atona, owa'atin.
41003024	I'i anis analemb walemb hiagoma esis atis sondatopa' biafisa sogapa', ina atiasi banages, owa'atin. Esis sandawal biafis a' owa' banagesa.
41003025	I'i anis anota wambota sagape ipat atototai sondawal mini'ap biafipa sogapa', esis ea' sandatopa' biafis, ina atiasi sope banages, a' owa'atin. Ea' sandawal biafis.
41003026	I'i wambota Satani sondawal biafis sogapa' atiasi wambota ananitai banages si'imama? Owa'atin. Satan wapani ina banagona, a' owa'atin.”
41003027	“Anona aman ina banagona nefe' nuwis ipat anona aman banagonai nagapautai dowaf nonda' wala hiahaom ananimi, owa'. Anen ata' nili' nombalo'ana ma nowa'ana sisihina dao', anen banagona nuwis nonda' wal nogofa'i hiahaom maga'oh ipat aman anambai.”
41003028	-
41003030	Amom magawalipasa mu'uli Godii mambaso'am manda' findiwama Ambal bu'unai Godi ma'i, “Anona ambal aunai natopalopa Jisas nanda' maol ananini.” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa, atiasi God nokwaha waf awafi fafifafi hiafi feloma basef findiwaifi hiafi amam nematawa sanda'afi hi'ilaf. Apa' epen ami nenda' basef findiwaefa Ambal bu'unai Godi, God atiasi owa'atin endilisi ma nogakwaha findiwa anamba aunai ma epen inimbaia, owa'atin. Findiwa aunai atapina nopain dei' nefe' anaf wapani, atapina nope.”
41003031	Afamba Jisas naloma hiasi sape salomana ipat nomon. Ea' ma'mana kwaloma owapana ananimi safi'i sataga salutu ipat ando'. Nomon asi'igina epes. Ea' salutu ando' sa'ipa anis sawis sa'ipana sa'i Jisas nuwisi ando' nefe'ma esis.
41003032	Ea' isimba hiasi sape sagalomanai sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' neme', ma'mena ine'ikwi kwaloma owapena ine'imi salutu ando' sa'i solomena si'i.”
41003033	Ea' nagwamasa basef na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Ma'mai owape ae'asi ami?”
41003034	Anen nati esis amam nematawa sape sagalipana na'ipas na'i, “Piti ma'mai kwaloma owape ae'asi isimba.
41003035	Epes mamahisa sigaila okom Godii ma sonda' waf ananifii, isimba ma'me owape hanitiame ae'asi.”
41004001	-
41004003	Anef Jisas nasefela maol wapani nanda'an nawalipa amam nematawa hiasi felefele'ma dumb lu'wambi Galili. Ea' esis safi'i salipana sape. Ea' nalota natoma anota bot tagala embel dumb ambambai, apa' esis sape akata felefele'ma embel. Ea' naso'asa basef hiafi waminif atin na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Ipa' peme'! Anona aman nafe' nowaha olemb witimb si'i raisi anof aof.
41004004	Anen nowahemb nafe', anemb bewa ufia'w sagafe'ma ea' amiguf fufia' fafi'i fa'amb.
41004005	-
41004006	Anemb bewa itap otambaipa, itap ina lu'up, owa'. Kwasala'up patoma ilif atogon owa' pewala awina, ea' batagai kwafalis apa' masilimb ina bewafa bewala itap atep, owa'. A'i owa' awin natafi ma owaf faluwi fahamb, otamba bega'efamb alimb.
41004007	Anemb bewala la'afena mandelef wandafumi mataga malomam maofana wit, ea' ina malo andeande' mail mola gwa'aimi, owa'.
41004008	Ea' anemb bewa itap bu'wapi, ea' bataga lu'umb, bail bela gwa'aisi. Anona nola 30-pelaimb, anona 60 apa' anona nola 100-pelaimb.”
41004009	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' aligah hagagalipai ma pagame' basef ifimbai, peme'ef andeande' ukup pendapomef.”
41004010	A'i owa' maina Jisas atona nape, alipumi 12-pelaim ananimi maloma anis sape sagalomanai safi'i sahali'ana ma basef ifimba waminif atini.
41004011	Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “God ea' nihimba'mepa basef kofagefa fape fandambahi'i ma epes sogawis nomona maol bu'wani ananini nope Dembinai nugumafias. Dei' God ea' nihimba'mepa basef ifimba kofagefa alihif. Ipa' pame'ef pegawef ea'. Apa' esis isimba sogolalama Godi, owa'atin. Esis same' basef waminif atini atif.
41004012	Ama anif basef fagape Baibeli fandawalap fa'ias faga'i, ‘Esis anaf sotologon, apa' ina siti anin mae, owa'. Ea' esis sogahembe' seme' basef, apa' ina sogawa kofagefa, owa'atin. Ama esis ina sogawa basef kofagefa sombema nelelemba egakwaha waf awafi asasifi, owa'atin.’”
41004013	Jisas nahali' esis na'i, “Ipa' owa' pegawa basef ifimba waminif atin doko' aga'ipipafia? Atiasi ipa' pelafa basef waminif atini hi'ilif pi'imama?
41004014	Dei' aman anamba nogowaha olemb gwa'aimbii, anen si'i anona naga'ipasa basef Godii.
41004015	Ea' olemb ambamba begewa ufia'wi si'i anis sagame' basefi, owa', Satan nafi'i nelefata basef ifimba God nagaso'asef nelelemb asasilimbi.
41004016	Apa' anemb bewa bafe' anagon otambaigimai, ambamba si'i anis epes same' basef Godi sofa'ef kwafalis sandagalamef.
41004017	Apa' isimba si'i masilimb owa' bewafa begewala itap awinia. Esis sahapilif nogota bandata ma a'i owa', anis amam nematawa sandaiwa'ma sagahapifa basef Godi sanda'as findiwas sahas sanda'masa waf awafi ea' kwafalis atis sandahagas sakwaha sagahapifa Godi.
41004018	Anemb begewala mandelef wandafumi la'afini, ambamba si'i anis same' basef sailif safe',
41004019	a'i owa' hiahaom nimanimi maloma hiahaom esis satolom kowagalasami baso'ami maloma moni uga maina esis sa'i sogofa'ami hiami magape itapanai, amambai mataga maofana basef Godi. Ea' ina sahapifif sanda' waf bu'wafi banages, owa'atin. A sowa si'i gwa'aisi owa' sogalo andeande'ia.
41004020	Apa' anemb begawa itap fasipai si'i epes isimba same' basef bu'wafi sofa'ef sahapilif sanda' waf fasifii. Anis si'i begela 30-pelaisi, apa' anis si'i begela 60-pelaisi, apa' anis si'i begela 100-pelais hiasi.
41004021	Jisas na'ipas nanda' basef waminif atin na'i, “A'i epes sakata lambeh sopalo'ambeh ha'oh belitagw lafelagwa a'a sopalo'ambeh handambaho' baket? Owa'atin. Esis sawamonambeh belitagw ilif.
41004022	Hiahaom mape mandambahi'i, anaf motaga alihigima hiasi sotolom sogawam. Apa' hiahaom hiami ata' sambaho'wam maga'ihi, anaf motaga mondawalap, hiasi sogawam.
41004023	Ipa' aligah hagagalipai pagame' basefi, ipa' pendame'ef andeande'.”
41004024	Ea' na'ipam wapani na'i, “Basef ipa' pagame'afi, ifimba a' pendegawef andeande'. Basef mamahifa faloma waf maif ipa' panda'masaf anis daiasi, ikwaf afamba atef anaf God nogwamepaf ipa', ea' nowatanimipa anom wapani.
41004025	Epes ami sagahapila basef Godii, atiasi God nowatanimasef wapani. Apa' isimba owa' sogahapilifia, atiasi basef kwawia'wif ifimba esis sogahapilafi, God a' nondalombasef esis ea' sope dowaf.”
41004026	Jisas na'ipas basef waminif atin na'i, “Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias, amamba si'i anif basef waminif atin dei' ae' iga'ipipafi. Anona aman nowaha olemb gwa'aimbi aof ananifi.
41004027	Ea' nafi'i nape baop na'oh owambeh hiembihi, nape nimaguf hiafi safe' apa' olemb ambamba nagawambi bataga balo lu'wimb ba'imama? Anen ina nogawa bagataga bataga ba'imama, owa'atin.
41004028	Itap atep panda' olemb ambamba bataga balo bela gwa'aisi sailamb. Doko' ata' soh atoh hali', a'i owa' main, afis sataga ea' gwa'aisi sandanda' lu'wis sail.
41004029	Ea' satagama a'i owa' lu'wis, afis andeande' asaof. Nemaf afamba sagala' gwa'aisiefi fataga, aman anamba nanda' maol naloma nagwatop.”
41004030	Jisas na'ias wapani na'i, “Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias na'amba atin si'i main? Ae' indila'waifam i'i basef maif waminif atini?
41004031	Analef nalelef mastetilif sa'usa'ulifi si'i nalelef waminipilif. Ina lu'walef a'owa' si'i sa'utip gwa'aipi lawah hiagahi magawagah itapi, owa'. Afalemba sa'osa'olef a'owa'. Anen nagawaf itap.
41004032	Nawafa main, natagai ma nagalo lu'una a' nikila' lawah hiagahi hogotawa aofahi. Nataga lawag lu'unai, agof fandalona fafe'agon ganigani. Ea' amiguf fafi'i fala owah fandambaho'ma owaf fatoma agufugama.”
41004033	Jisas na'ipas basef waminif atin si'i nali' naga'ipasafi. Na'ipas nondola'waifa hiahawes hiasi fagi'ma gawa asasini nafe' negetambel.
41004034	Anen ina na'i anif basef alihifa esis, owa'. Anen na'if waminif atin. Apa' a'i owa', alipumi ananimi atom malomana mape, dao' na'ipamef alihif kofagefa waminif atini.
41004035	Nemaf afamba atef, wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Afa' a' ofe' dumb ambamba fisanamb.”
41004036	Ea' amom makwaha esis amam nematawa hiasi mafe' bot atamba Jisas nagatumatai mofa'ata mafe'. Anis daias sofa' anogw botagw daiagw waloma bot atamba safe'.
41004037	Ea' anona fufin lu'unai naluwi, naoh manda'am lasiali' mafe' mawis bot nomon ea' ta'i si'itama embel.
41004038	Jisas na'oh nolola bot tagagi'ma nola pilo' na'oh. Ea' amom mafe' minimbalona ma'ipana ma'i, “Tisa dembinai, afa' wa'i ahigililafa, ina' negawafa, a'a owa'?”
41004039	Ea' Jisas nosafel ninifala fufin na'ipa embel naoh na'i, “Ipa' ea'. Fufin neloma embel ipa' be' pepe.” Ea' fufin nowala, embel ina ata' lasiali' a' owa'atin betah hilili'.
41004040	Ea' na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ipa' ombel mahepama main? Ipa' pihapifa basef Godi pa'i ae' banagiwai, a'a owa'?”
41004041	Ea' amom mati na'amba, ombel maham kwapete' endilisi ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Anen epen ami? Na'ipa fufini embel same'ana sagahapifana?”
41005001	Jisas nao'wa alipumi nafe' nataga anagon wa'ol dumb ambamba itap esis Gerasai sagapoma.
41005002	-
41005003	Anen nakwaha bot nisila'i, kwafalis atin anona aman ambagof awami magapaunai nafi'mai anen. Aman anamba nape na'oh dondol wandelef sagawa epes sagaga'ima nafi'i. Ea' sen wapani ina sisihina, owa'.
41005004	Esis sali' sombalo'ana sumafiana dondol, sanda' seni hankap banagami sowa'ana lagof bo'wagahana lifilafi. Owa' owa'atin. Anen nahape'am atin. Owa' anin epen banagena nembalo'ana sisihina nogapea, owa'atin.
41005005	Dondol owamb alip nape nafe' wandelef halafutagw, nagafe' nanda'am wiwa nafe'. Nasa'ma otamba hikalimi natotopa' alop ananipi.
41005006	Anen ata' nati Jisas nafi'i laogon, nasagih nafi'i nindiwa nembawa notaomana.
41005007	-
41005008	Ea' Jisas nogawa aman anamba ambagof awami magapaunai. Ea' na'ipam na'i “Ipa' ambagof aupai, ipa' kwahowa aman anamba.” Ea' anen hoga'ala mehip na'i “Jisas, ina' Nogamana dembinai God nagape ilif endilisii, ina' na'i nenda' maina ae'? Ae' a'ipina endilisi gani ilifa agol Godi, ina' owa'i nese'e akafimia.”
41005009	Owa' Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Agol ine'igili ami?” Anen na'i, “Apa' ambagof aupai hiapai. Dei' agol ape'igili mini'ap laupi.”
41005010	Ea' nahali' Jisas dindinip na'i, “Ina' netofafa ofa' ofe' anep itap lauguni, owa'i.”
41005011	Anagof bogof hiagufi falutu fa' gwa'aisi anota damota felefele'.
41005012	Ea' ambagof amamba mofala Jisas ma'ipana dindinip ma'i, “Ina' netofafa ofe' uwis ope oloma bogof gwagwafumba.”
41005013	Ea' Jisas na'i aho'mam, makwaha aman anamba mawisi a' mafe' mawisa bogof. Ea' bogof agwafomba hiagufi 2000-pelaiguf fafa' fafe' mehip kwapete'agof filiana anagon awagoma tata. Ea' bogof agwafomba hiagufi fafa' fafe' mehip fowala ta'alogol awagoma tata fola embel dumb afum hi'alam.
41005014	Ea' amom mugumafiagufi mafa' mafe' ma'ipasa basef ifimba wambel lu'wagoma amam nematawa hiasi. Ea' ma'ipas anagon daiagon wapani ma hiahaom amamba amom magatulumi.
41005015	Ea' safi'mai Jisas sati aman anamba fowa' ambagof awami magapaunai, dei' ambo'ona nomonas fasisi sapaona andeande' nowaho' lowaf nape. Amam nematawa hiasi satalona ombel mahas.
41005016	Ea' esis sagati hiahaom amambai, sa'ipa esis wambelisi ma hiahaom magataga aman anamba ambagof awami magapaunai. Ea' sa'ipas hiahaom magatagama bogufi wapani.
41005017	Ea' esis hiasi sa'ipa Jisas dindinip sa'i nokwaha itap apamba asasima nofo'o anagon.
41005018	Ea' Jisas nalota bot owa', aman anamba fowa' ambagof awami magapaunai nahali' Jisas dindinip na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena.”
41005019	Apa' Jisas ina na'i aho'mana, owa'. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nefe'ma esis wambota atota ine'isi ni'ipasa amamba dembinai nanda'menam ine'i nati uwahipina ma nanda'ena bo'wena.”
41005020	Ea' aman anamba nafe' nawalapa basef ifimba na'ipasef walemb ilifunamailimb Dekapolisa hiahaom Jisas nanda'manami. Ea' esis amam nematawa gogolalasis kwapete ukup malamafe'.
41005021	Jisas nofa' bot notanima nambo dumb ambamba nafe' fisana gani wa'ol, ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'i sape salagamana felefele'ma dumb akata
41005022	ea' anona aman Jairus nugumafi ipat Juda sandakolasatai nafi'i. Anen nati Jisas, nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi.
41005023	Ea' na'ipana dindinip na'i, “Sa'ukwi nogame ae'akwi afagof 12-pelaiguf fagalo'akwi felefele' kwa'i akoga'. Ae' a'i ina' nefe' newamona lagol ine'igili ako'wa ambal lopao'w kogape namo'w.”
41005024	Jisas nalomana mafe', hiasi amam nematawa safe' sagi'mam sandalili'amona atin salutu dogw.
41005025	Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwape kwalomas, aowas aowasini nanda'a'w kwape gamba atapi'w afagof 12-pelaiguf.
41005026	Ako'w kwafe'ma dokta hiasi saso'akwa akafimi, ea' kwalamona moni ako'wini hi'alana kwagatala dokta isimba hiasi ma sonda'akw bo'okw, owa' owa'atin. Aowas inimba nataga lu'win atapin napao'w.
41005027	Ea' kwame' basefa Jisas nafela anis aowas nanda'asi ambo'wes. Ea' kwaloma amam nematawa hiasi kwafi'i alafuga Jisasi kwahapila lowaf ananifi.
41005028	Ako'w okom mandanda' ma'i, “Ae' egasa lagola lowaf ananifi, atiasi ambo'owe.”
41005029	Ea' kwafalis atin esimbel pele'atam ea' kwame' alop akwa'upi pataga bo'op, aowas dei' a' nafe' ea'.
41005030	Ea' Jisas name' alop ananipi powafa, name' anom banagami ananimi makwahona mafe'ma manda' anin epen bo'wen. Na'amba nandambema la'afena esis hiasi na'i, “Ami nasa lagola lowaf ae'afi?”
41005031	Ea' alipumi ananimi ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' natilis a'a owa' amam nematawa isimba hiasi salutu sandalili'amona atin sagalomafa? Dei' maina ina' ata' naga'i, ‘Ami nasa lagola ae'?’”
41005032	Ea' Jisas nandambema natologon na'i niti inimba nagahapilanai.
41005033	Ea' nemata'w akwamba kogawa hiahawes isimba sagatagama'wi, ombal maha'w ambombol atin. Ea' kwafi'i kwindiwa nembawa kotawa felefele'ma anen, kwawalapa hiahaom kwa'iam alihim.
41005034	Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Nemata'w, ina' ea' nahapifa ae' banagiwai. Isimba atis dei' anda'ena bo'wena. Ina' fo'o, opaf ine'ifi fope awanef. Esimbel ine'imi a' fataom, dei' aowas ine'ini ahi'alan.”
41005035	Jisas ata' na'ipa'w atin, nati anom amam makwaha ipat Jairusi a' mafi'i ma'ipa Jairus ma'i, “Nogamena ine'ikwi akwaga' ea'. Isimba atis dei' ina nenda' Dembinai Tisa nofo'o noma'w kohana, owa', hapaimi.”
41005036	Owa' Jisas ina nowa' aligah name'ama basef ifimba amamifi, owa'. Ea' na'ipa Jairus na'i, “Ina' ombel mogahena owa'i. Hapifa ae' banagiwai.”
41005037	Ea' anen ina na'i aho'ma amam nematawa hiasi sogalomana, sogawis ipat atamba, owa'. Anen nao'wa Pitai Jems maloma Jon amom atom mawis malomana.
41005038	Mafe' mataga ipat Jairusi, Jisas nati esis salef mehip sawa salopa'w kwapete'as.
41005039	Ea' nawis na'ipas nomon na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' palef panda' kwala'ap lu'unai? Awani inimba ina naga' dogw, owa'. Anin na'oh atin.”
41005040	Ea' esis sanda' iafana kwapete'as ama naga'ias na'amba. Ea' nagalo'ma esis sawisi ando'. Anen nao'wa ahama'wi ma'makw saloma alipumi ananimi wanom, esis atis safe' sawis nomon awani inimba naga' naga'oma.
41005041	Ea' nahapila lagol akwa'ugili na'ipa'w na'i, “Talita kumi.” Apa' mambema basef ifimba ma'i, “Nemata'w sa'ukwi, ae' a'ipina, ina' dei' safel.”
41005042	Ea' kwafalis atin nemata'w akwamba afagof 12-pelaiguf fagalo'akwi kosafel kwafe' esis satolo'w, sosafel gogolalasis kwapete'.
41005043	Ea' Jisas na'ipas dindinipa sigaila basef ananifi na'i, “Ipa' ina pi'ipa anin epena hiahawes isimba, owa'i.” Ea' na'ipa esisa sogaso'akw anis gwa'aisi kogwa'as.
41006001	Jisas nosafel nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' wambel ananimbili kofagama Nasaret naloma alipumi ananimi.
41006002	A'i owa' nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi sa'i sabat, nafe' nawis ipat Juda sandakolasatai naso'asa basef Godi amam nematawa, same'anamef sosafel gogolalasis sa'i, “Aman anamba nofa' basef ifimba ani? Gawa inimba nagape anini gawa mamahina? Ami natopalopana ma dei' nanda' banagami amamba si'i God nanda'ami?
41006003	Apa' magawa aman anamba fowa' nanda' kamda nagala' ifagwi. Anen Maria nogama'w, nagape wambel atimbili. Anen sahoma Jemsi Joses, a Judasi Saimon. Hanitiamana ananiwai wape walomapa na'a.” Esis sa'ias na'amba opalef a' awelefa anen, sowa' alafugahana.
41006004	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Anona profet agol gatomana analemb walemb daialemb, sa'i anen dembinai sahapifana. Apa' ina anagol agol gatoma gandawalapana alihigila wambel ananimbili kofagama, wambota ananisi owa'.
41006005	Na'amba anen ina nanda' anom banagami si'i God nanda'ami wambel ambalemba, owa'atin. Anen nasa lagofa anis aowas nanda'asi atona atin nanda'as bo'wes. Ina nanda' hiasi na'amba atin, owa'. Nanda' isimba atis kwaia'wis.
41006006	Amam nematawa Nasaretisi owa' sohapifa Goda. Na'amba anen nomonas salasafe'mas. Jisas nakwaha wambel ananimbili Nasaret nafe' na'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa walemb hiagoma.
41006007	Ea' nofala alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim mafi'mai anen a' naso'ama banagami ananimi ma mogatofa ambagof awami, ea' nasapa'am mafe' biam atom.
41006008	-
41006009	Na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina pefa' gwa'aisi isalef moni solomepa, owa'i. Ipa' pela su pihapila galahitagw atogw pefe'. Apa' ina pefa' siogw biagw atogw, owa'i. Pefa' atona atin gondondaepa.”
41006010	Ea' na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ipa' pefe' pegataga anambel wambela, i'i anis si'i aho'ma pefe' pigawis ipat asasitai, ipa' pendape ipat atamba atota. Ama main pekwahota pesafel pefe'.
41006011	I'i analemb walemb owa' sofa'epa pefe' ifagw asasigwi seme' basef ipe'ifia, ipa' penda'as na'amba. Pekwaha wambel ambalemba pindila'ma usas itap pagail bo'wagah ipe'igahi ma sitilipa sogogawa waf awafi kofagema ea' asasimi atom.”
41006012	Ea' nasapa'am mafe' biam atom makwaha basef ma'i, “Ipa' pewa' alafugaha waf awafi, pembema nelelemb pendafe'ma God.”
41006013	Ea' mafe' matofa ambagof awami magape esisi. Ea' mofa' wel fasili makolo'wala esis aowas nanda'asi hiasi sataga bo'wes.
41006014	Dei' anona gavman king dembinai Herot name' basefa maol inimba Jisas nali' nanda'ani. Ea' agol Jisasi gataga lu'wagol gafe'agon hi'alagon. Ea' anis amam nematawa sa'i, “Jon nagapisi'as embeli dei' nosafel wapani nape banagona nanda' maol si'i God nanda'ani.”
41006015	Owa' anis daias sa'i, “Anen profet Elija fowa'inai.” Apa' anis sa'i, “Anen anona profet si'i profet amamba fowa'imi.”
41006016	Gavman anamba king Herot name' na'amba ea' na'i, “Jon fowa' ae' atopa' bamafugana, apa' owa' a' notanima nosafel wapani nanda' maol Jisasi.”
41006017	-
41006018	Fowa' Herot naso' nemata'w owamana Filipi agili'wa Herodias. Ea' sahomana Herot nolaepana'w naso'akw. Ea' Jon nati waf afamba na'ipana na'i, “Ina' naso' nemata'w sahomenai, ea' nawala mu'uli Godi. Na'ambai ina andeande, owa'.” Ea' Herot nasapa' anom amam mafe' mombalo' Jon mofa'ana mafe' nanda' kalabus.
41006019	-
41006020	Ea' Herodias kwame' basef ifimba, okom aom endilisi ma Jon, kwa'i kohana afuna, apa' owa', owa'atin. Herot anen ombal mahanama Jon ea' numafiana andeande'. Isimba atis ako'w ina banage'wa kohana nogaga', owa'. Herot nogawa Jon aman bu'unai Godi. Afamba anen nagame' basef Jon naga'ipanaefi, anen nomonas hiahawes, ea' ombal mahana. Anen okom ma'ima'i a'owa' ma nogame' basef ananifi.
41006021	A'i owa' main, Herodias kolaoma ano'w ufia'w ma kohana nogaga'. Ea' basef fagape na'amba. Herot nanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma okom mogapoma nemaf afamba ma'mana kogolanafi. Anen nanda' gwa'aisi isimba ma anom dembami magatopalopana ma maol gavmani a anom dembami daiam mugumafi amom soldiai maloma anom dembami magape walemb anamba hiagoma Galilii.
41006022	Ea' amom dembami maloma Herot mape ma' gwa'aisi, owa' ano'w nemata'w sa'ukwi aiawai'wi kwawisi kwalemb nomon. Ako'w Herodias nogama'w. Ea' Herot naloma amom dembami nomonas sa'i sa'i ako'w a'owa'. Ea' na'ipa'w na'i, “Ina' na'i ae' ese'ena hiahawes mais? Ina' ni'ipias ae' ma egase'enas.”
41006023	Herot na'ias endilisi gani ilif na'i, “I'i ina' nihali' ae' ma egase'ena anin maemae ine'ma, ae' egasi'inai. Apa' ina' ni'i ae' egawala hiahaom ae'ami hiami maga'oh anamba agala'ambemagoma egase'ena du'wanima, ae' a'i aho'. Ina' du'wanim, ae' du'wanim, donda'am atin.”
41006024	Ea' ako'w kwawisi ando' kwafe' kwahali' ma'makw akwa'u'wi kwa'i, “Ae' atiasi i'ipa Herot efa' hiahawes mais?” Ea' ma'makw kwa'ipa'w kwa'i, “Ina' ni'ipana ni'i nefa'ai balaga Jon nagapisi'as embeli.”
41006025	Ea' kwandambemef kwawis nomon kwafalisa Herot kwa'i, “Dei' atef ae' a'i ina' neha Jon nagapisi'as embeli noga' netopa' balaga gola anota plet nefa'agai nese'e.”
41006026	Ako'w kwa'ias na'amba, opaf Heroti a' nimanif a'owa'. Apa' anen okom mandanda' ma na'i basef endilisifi atif naga'if banagafi ea' amam nematawa isimba sape salomana saga' gwa'aisii same'ana. Ea' ina ata' nosambala basef akwa'ufi, owa'.
41006027	Kwafalis Herot nasapa' anona soldia nafe'ma noha Jon nofa' balaga nogafi'i. Soldia anamba nafe' ipat sanda' kalabusa natopa' bamato'w Joni nofa' balaga
41006028	nalaga gala anota plet nofa'aga nafi'i naso' Herodias nogama'w kofa'aga kwafe' kwaso' ma'ma'w.
41006029	Ea' alipumi Joni magaila basef ananifii mame' basef ifimba ma anen, mafi'i mofa' si'ina mafe' mawana matmat. Ea' ma'uf.
41006030	Amom aposel Jisasi dei' motanima mafi'i mandakolas malomana. Ea' mape manifa maol mafe' manda'ani ma'ipana basef hiafi amom maga'ipasafi hi'alef.
41006031	Ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi fi'i fe' sail sanda' Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi ina ata' anota nogota ma amom moga' gwa'aisi, owa'. Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Wale, afa' atofa ofe' anagon wafigima ma ata' tol opoma noma'w.”
41006032	Ea' mofa' bot mafe' anamba wafigima epes akagoma, amom atom mafe'.
41006033	Owa' owa'atin. Esis amam nematawa hiasi sogawa amom magafe'ma. Ea' esis hiasi sakwaha walemb hiagoma lu'wagoma kolo'walas sasagih safe' anamba ea' sali' sataga anamba amom ma'i mogafe'ma.
41006034	Jisas nafe'ma nisila' akata, nati esis hiasi. Natilis nati ina anona aman nape numafias, owa'atin. Esis sape si'i sipsip owa' anin epen nigimafiapia, ea' nati esis uwahipis nawalipasa basef bu'wafi hiafi.
41006035	Ama awin a'i newala naso', alipumi ananimi mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Ana'e wafigima epes akagoma, awin na'i a' newala.
41006036	Sapa'as sofo'o walemb aofah asasisi daindai sagape felefele'i ma sogatala gwa'aisi mais soga'as.”
41006037	Owa' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam, na'i, “Ipa' atipa pese'as gwa'aisi.” Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' na'i afa' ofe' utalai bret 200 kina oso'osas? 200 kina otamba hiambai.”
41006038	Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' bret ma'ufita ta'oh? Ata' fo'o petolota.” Ea' mafe' matolota ma'i, “Bret wa'agolita taloma agof biagof sa'oh.”
41006039	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pi'ipa esis amam nematawa sope sofe' oto otowa otalef fasilifi.”
41006040	Ea' sape safe' si'i amom maga'ipas, anis sataga 100-pelais, anis 50-pelais, na'amba atin.
41006041	Ea' Jisas nasa'ma bret atamba wa'agolita taloma agof biagof naniga nati heven nanifela God. Ama ea', nindiwata naso' alipumi ananimi mafe' maso' esis hiasi amam nematawa hi'agalas. Ea' nasa'ma agof wapani nawalogof naso'am maso'asagof.
41006042	Esis sa'as alihis andondo',
41006043	alipumi ananimi matatama du'wa'wanisi saga'ihi, malo'was folalef lu'walifi 12-pelailif si'ilif kwaef.
41006044	Esis amam nematawa saga' gwa'aisi isimbai hiasi, siamba amam atom mataga 5,000-pelaim. Apa' esis ina siamba awasi nematawa wapani, owa'.
41006045	Jisas nasapa' alipumi ananimi mofa' bot mali' mafe' dumb ambamba mambo fisanamb Betsaida. Ea' nasapa' amam nematawa hiasi safe'.
