41006046	Nasapa'as sagafi'i, anen nandowasa' halafuta nape na'i nonda' beten.
41006047	Wambomota alipumi ananimi mape bot ata' atapim mala dumb lu'wambi la'afimba. Apa' Jisas atona nalutu akata.
41006048	Ea' nati fufin lu'wani nalo nafi'i anamba amom ma'i mogafe'ma, ea' nakoto'ma amom manda' pul masasapa' bot a' numa'una endilisi. Akot ata' tail atin felefele'ma logola owa', Jisas nagi'mam natoma nafi'i embel ilifa nafe'ma amom. Ea' na'i nikila'am nefe'.
41006049	Owa' mati anen natoma nafi'i embel ilif. Ma'i owa' anona gamba, ea' manda'as wiwa ma'oh kwapete'am.
41006050	Amom matolona gogolalasom. Owa' Jisas nalomam na'i kwafalis na'i, “Ipa' banagepa, ombel mogahepa owa'. Ae' atowe ma'uwi ailipa afi'i.”
41006051	Ea' nalota bot nape nalomam, dei' fufin a' newala opalef amamilifi gogolalasom kwapete'am endilisi, ea' nomonas salasafe' hiahias.
41006052	Amom ina ata' nomonas sape andeande'ma bret atamba Jisas naso'asata esis hiasi saga'atai, owa'. Na'amba amom ma'i anen ina banagonai. Ukup amamipi paso'am.
41006053	Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mowala mambo dumb ambamba mafe' mataga anep itap lu'upa Genesaret. Ea' mowa' bot tail,
41006054	misila' mafe' owa', esis kwafalis sati Jisas asagawana.
41006055	Ea' sasagih safe' anamba hiagoma ganigani. Esis same' basefa Jisas nagapoma, ea' sala aowas nanda'asi belitagw sofa'as safi'mai anen.
41006056	Walemb hiagoma lu'wagon sa'ogon, naloma anamba hiagoma Jisas nagafe'ma, esis sambe' isimba aowas nanda'asi sa'oh baop la'afen. Ea' sofala Jisas banagembela niga'i aho'ma isimba sogahapila lowaf ananifi da'malififa atef. Ea' esis mamahisa sagahahapilafi sataga bo'wes wapani.
41007001	Amam dembami Farisi maloma anom dembami daiam magawalipasa mu'uli Godi amom mapani Jerusalem mafi'i mandakolas maloma Jisas.
41007002	Ea' mati anom alipumi Jisasi ma' gwa'aisi owa' mosa'opa lagof bo'wagof mea'as si'i amom Farisi maga'ias, owa'. Ea' amom Farisi ma'i amom alipumi Jisasi lagof amamugufi aloguguf.
41007003	Dei' main, amom Farisi maloma esis hiasi Juda hi'alas, sagi'ma mu'uli inimba esis akupasi. I'i esis owa' sosa'opa lagof andeande'a, ina sea' gwa'aisi, owa'.
41007004	Esis sogafe' maketa sotanima sogafi'i, ma owa' sosa'opa lagofa, ina sea' gwa'aisi, owa'. Esis sagi'ma mu'uli hiani naninani sogofa'ana akupas asasisii. Sasa'opa kahi sospaes, a disi belegw atis, ama sagagi'ma mu'uli akupasi.
41007005	Na'amba amom Farisi maloma dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dei' si'i maina alipumi ine'imi owa' migi'ma mu'uli amom akupamia? Lagof amamugufi aloguguf ma' gwa'aisi.”
41007006	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Fowa' profet Aisaia, nindila'waifa ipa' endilisi, ipa' paga'i basefa malogof biagufii. Anen nanda'ef andeande' dondo'ma ipa' na'ias na'amba na'i, God na'i, ‘Amam nematawa isimba sasa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagola malogof asasigufi atogof, apa' opalef asasilifi fape laogona ae'. Ukup asasipi ina sahapifi, owa'atin.
41007007	Esis ina sawalipasa basef ae'afi, owa'. Sawalapa mu'uli epes sagape itapi atin, sambaso'mas sa'i, “Mu'uli inimba basef Godi.” Ea' sanda' lotu sasa'ma agol ae'agili dowadowaf.”
41007008	Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ipa' apakwaha mu'uli Godi ea', dei' pahapila waf epes sagape itapi atef tetele'if.”
41007009	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pegegawa andeande'i pa'i penda' waf fasifi atifi, owa' dei' apesambala mu'uli Godi ma pagagi'ma waf ipe'ifi atef.
41007010	Fowa' gani Moses nagawalipasa mu'uli inimba na'ipas naga'i, ‘Ipa' pinifela mamasepa ipe'isi pihapifas petopalopas.’ Anif wapani na'if na'i, ‘Epen ami niga'i basef awafima ahaman ma'man ananisii, inimba anis daias sohan nega'.’
41007011	Owa' ipa' pambaso'am pa'i anif daif na'amba pa'i, Epen mamahina nindaiwa'ma negatopalopa mamasan ni'ipas niga'i, ‘Otamba mais ae'asi andaiwa'ma egase'epas, ae' a' andandepasa egaso'anas God.’
41007012	Apa' ipa' Farisi paloma ipa' anipa pagawalipasa mu'uli Godi, ipa' pa'i aho'ma epen inimba negambaso'ma mamasan, ea' owa' netopalopasa.
41007013	Ipa' paila mu'uli fowa' gani pegefa'ana akupipa ipe'imii, panda' waf afambai pesambala basef ifimba Godi na'i mogatopalopa mamasapa. Ea' panda' waf ipe'ifi atef lu'ufi panda' waf awafi lifilafi na'amba ina andeande', owa'.”
41007014	Jisas nofalai amam nematawa hiasi wapani na'ipas anif basef waminif atin na'i, “Ipa' hipai peme' basef ae'afi okokomef pendegawef.
41007015	Hiahawes gwa'aisi mais ando'asi ipa' pa'as sagawis nomoni, isimbai ina sanda'epa awepa, owa'. Apa' hiahaom magape ukup ipe'ipi nomoni mawisi ando', amambai atom manda'epa awepa.
41007016	[Ipa' aligah hagagalipai, a pendame' basef ifimba.]” Jisas naga'ipas na'amba,
41007017	ea' nakwaha amam nematawa isimba hiasi a' nafe' nawis ipat. Ea' alipumi ananimi atom mahali'ana ma basef ifimba kofagefa waminif atini doko' naga'ipasafi.
41007018	-
41007019	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “A'i ipa' owa' ata' pegawaea! Hiahawes gwa'aisi main sagape ando'i owa' anis ipa' paga'asia sonda'epa awepaia, owa'atin. Gwa'aisi isimba sa'as sogowala opalef nomoni a safe' sakas safe' sowala dowah. Ea' ukup ipe'ipi ina awep, owa'atin. Waf afambai maga' gwa'aisi hiasi ina awafi, owa'.” Jisas na'ipasa basefa gwa'aisi sasisasi hiasi hi'alas bu'wasi atis muga'asi.
41007020	Ea' na'ipam wapani na'i, “Hiahaom magape ipa' epesi nomoni, ukup nomonas awami maim mataga ando', amambai atom manda'epa awepa.
41007021	Hiahaom awami magape ukup nomoni magawisii amamba. Waf naninani aunai, nomonas awami, waf sanda' so'a waulafi, wal, soha anis sogaga'i,
41007022	sogahambombaga waf daso'amaifi, waf kowagalasafi, waf baso'amunai naninani aunai, du'waniga, simbisambal, findiwa, sagafela agof asasigufi atogof lu'wagof, waf gawa akanai.
41007023	Waf anamba naninani hianahaona aunai, anamba nape nomon ukup ipe'ipi nawisi ando' nanda'epa awepa.”
41007024	Jisas nosafel nakwaha wambel ambalemba, nafe' Tair nafe' nawis anota ipat. Anen nandaiwa'ma anin epen negegawa anen nagape na'amba. Owa', owa'atin. Anen ina nandambaho'.
41007025	Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwame' basefa anen nape na'amba. Nemata'w akwamba nogama'w akwa'u'wi ambal aunai napao'w. Ea' ma'ma'w kwafalis kwafi'mai Jisas kwindiwa nembawa kotowa felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi.
41007026	Ako'w Finisiai'wi anep itap lu'upa Siria. Ako'w ina Judai'wi, owa'. Kwa'i diga Griki. Ea' kwahali' Jisas dindinipa nogatofama'wa ambal aunai nagape nogama'w akwa'u'wii.
41007027	Ea' na'ipa'w anif basef waminif atin na'i, “Apa' ata' moso'asa gwa'aisi awasi ape'isi sili'. Apa' ina mofa' gwa'aisi awasi ape'isii mokwahis sofe'ma nombagw, owa'.”
41007028	Owa' ako'w akwagwamana basef anen kwa'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i endilisi. Nombagw agogw gwafe' lafela tebol gwatatama gwa'aisi awasii sogowa itapi gwa'as.”
41007029	Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Ina' na'ias na'amba andeande'. Ea' tanima fo'o. Ambal aunai nakwaha nogamena ine'ikwi a' nawisi nafe' ea'.”
41007030	Ea' ako'w kotanima kwafe' ipat akwa'utai, kwati nogama'w akwo'ukwi tol kwa'oh alahis, ambal aunai nakwaho'w a' nawisi nafe' ea' ambo'okw kwa'oh andeande'.
41007031	Dei' Jisas nosafel nakwaha anambel wambel Tair, a' nafe' nawis la'afena wambel Saidon. Ea' nakwaha Saidon nafe' atin ganimba walemb ilifunamailimb Dekapolis, nataga dumb lu'wambi Galili.
41007032	Ea' esis sao'wai anona aman nafi'mai Jisas, aligah haso'ana haloma afega ananigai dindigiga. Ea' ina na'i andeande', owa'. Na'amba esis sofala Jisas ma nosa lagofa anen nonda'ana bo'ona.
41007033	Ea' Jisas nao'wana amom biam mafe' makwaha esis amom atom mape. Ea' nasapa' faguf bif ananifi fawis aligah aman anambai, wa'owa'ol. Ea' nisi'waf nasa faf afega aman anambai,
41007034	Jisas nosaniga nati heven, nahi okom nowafam mehip, na'ias na'amba na'i, “Efata.” Basef kofagefa ifimba fa'i, “Ina' aligah hogal neme' ni'i andeande'.”
41007035	Ea' aligah a hagal, hiahaom manda' afega dindiginai ahigilalam kwafalis. Dei' a' na'i andeande'.
41007036	Ea' Jisas na'ipas nombomba'asa esis ina si'ipasa hiahawes isimba ma anin epen. Nape na'ipas dindinip timbi tambel. Owa', owa'atin. Esis sawalapam sa'ipasam timbi tambel seme'am.
41007037	Ea' esis bolalas endilisi sa'i, “Hiahaom hiami anen nanda'ami nanda'am bo'om atin. Anen nanda' esis aligah hagaso'asi same' andeande', esis malagof fagaso'asii a soga sa'i andeande'.
41008001	Afamba amam nematawa hiasi sandakolas wapani sa'i seme' basef Jisasi. Ea' esis gwa'aisi akas. Na'amba Jisas nofala alipumi ananimi mafi'i na'ipam na'i,
41008002	-
41008003	“Ae' ati esis amam nematawa isimba uwahipis. Esis a sape salome nimaguf wanif gwa'aisi akas nolom mahas a'owa'. I'i ae' esapa'as sogafe' dowaf uta baop asasima, sitilif atona sowa so'oh sofe' iaiaf. Anis safi'i laogoma.”
41008004	Ea' alipumi ananimi magwamana basef ma'i, “Ana'e wafigima epes akagoma. Atiasi afa' ofa'ai bret anima oso' amam nematawa isimba sea'as? Afa' bret ina hiata, owa'.”
41008005	Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipa' bret ma'uta ta'oh?” Amom ma'i, “7-pelaita.”
41008006	Ea' na'ipa esis amam nematawa sape itap, anen nafela bret atamba 7-pelaita, nanifela God nawalota naso' alipumi ananimi ma maso'asata esis amam nematawa hiasi. Amom maso'as dondo' hi'alas.
41008007	Ea' amom anagof agof sa'ugufi biagof wapani fa'oh. Ea' anen nasa'magof nanifela God, naso' amoma mogaso'asagof wapani.
41008008	Ea' esis sa'as, dondo' alihis. Ea' alipumi ananimi matatamai du'wa'wanisi sagasaga'ihi makolasis malo'was folalef lu'walifi 7-pelailif asi'ilif kwaef.
41008009	Amam nematawa saga gwa'aisi isimbai sataga hiasi, 4,000-pelais. Ea' Jisas nasapa'as safe'.
41008010	Ea' kwafalis atin anen nalota bot naloma alipumi ananimi, mafe' anep itap lu'upa Dalmanuta.
41008011	Ea' amom Farisi mafi'i ma'i basef mandahihianamaef maloma Jisas. Amom ma'i mogwambana ma mugati anen banagona a'a owa'. Na'amba mofalana ma'i anen nonda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami. Amom ma'i anen nihimba'mama anen nagape banagami Godi ma dei' nanda' hiahaom amamba.
41008012	Jisas name' ambal ananili nemanil ea' na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i pa'i pefalagama pa'i pigati anin ametal banagani? Apa' ae' owa'atina enda'an pigatilina, owa'atin.”
41008013	Ea' nakwaha esis a' notanima nalota bot nafe' dumb ambamba fisanamb.
41008014	Amom alipumi Jisasi ukup paso'ama mogofa' bret hiata togalomam. Amom mofa' atotota tala bot
41008015	Ea' Jisas naumbalom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pindimafuma andeande', solawaipama yis amamba Farisii maloma yis Herotii.”
41008016	Ea' mame' anen na'ias na'amba, a manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' ukup paso'afa bret ta'ihi dei' na'ipafa na'amba.”
41008017	Jisas nogawa basef amamifi, na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' paga'i, ‘Ipa' bret akepa?’ A'i ipa' ukup pase'epa, owa' ata' pegawaea?
41008018	Ipa' naep papaipa, apa' ipa' owa' ata' piti anin maemaea. Ea' aligah hapaipa, apa' ipa' ina' peme' basef, owa'. Ukup a' pase'epa.
41008019	Afamba ae' agawala bret 5-pelaita ma epes isimba 5000-pelais, ama du'wa'wanita taga'ihi patatamata palo'wata folalef ma'ulif si'lif?” Ea' amom ma'i, “12-pelailif.”
41008020	“Apa' anef nemaf agawala bret 7-pelaita ma du'wa'wanita taga'ihi patatamata palo'wata folalef ma'ulif si'ilif?” Ea' amom ma'i, “7-pelailif.”
41008021	Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Owa'atin. Ipa' ina dei' apegawa, ata' owa'.”
41008022	Amom mafe' mataga Betsaida, sao'wamanai anona aman naep pagaso'anai nafi'mai Jisas, sa'ipana dindinipa nogasa lagol ananigili nonda'ana bo'ona.
41008023	Ea' nahapila lagol anen naep pagaso'anai, nofa'ana nakwaha wambel nawis ando' nisi'wafa naep ananipi, nasa lagola anen nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' nati ambambasif a'a ata' owa'?”
41008024	Ea' aman anamba natologon, na'i,
41008025	“Ae' ati anis epes apa' agatilis si'i lawah hagafe'.” Ea' Jisas nasa lagol wapani, naep ananipi dei' a' natologon mehip naep ananipi apataga be'ep, andeande', nati hiahawes pelele'.
41008026	Ea' Jisas nasapa'ana nafe' ipat ananitai na'ipana na'i, “Ina' owa'i nefe' niwis wambel ni'ipasa ae' anda'ena ambo'wenaia, owa'i. Ina' nefe' usi'ina ipat ine'itai.”
41008027	Jisas nosafel naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' felefele'ma anambel wambel Sisaria Filipai. Amom mafe'ma ufia'w, nahali'am na'i, “Esis amam nematawa sa'i ae' aman mamahowema?”
41008028	Ea' amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Anis sa'i ina' Jon, aman nagapisi'as embeli. Ea' anis sa'i ina' Elaija. Apa' anis sa'i ina' anina profet, fowa'inai.
41008029	Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipa' pa'i ae' ami?” Ea' Pita nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'i.”
41008030	Ea' na'ipam dindinip na'i, “Ipa' ina a' pewalapa ae' pi'ipa anis pi'i ae' Krais, owa'i.”
41008031	Ea' Jisas nasefela basef ananifi nawalipam na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi agufumi Judai mose'e akafimi lu'wami. Amom moloma amom pris dembami moloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godii. Atiasi mondaiwa'me mose'e alafugah mohe ega' ma nimaguf bif ea', fegafe'ma wanifi a' esafel wapani.”
41008032	Anen nawalapa basef ifimba alihifa amom. Ea' Pita nofa'ana nendelefata nasa gemba ea' nagagaolana ma basef ifimba naga'ipasafi.
41008033	Owa' Jisas nandambema natiti alipumi ananimi, nanda' megahaha Pita na'i, “Ina' si'i Satan. Dei' main, ina' owa' okom mopoma okom Godia. Okom mandapoma nomonas epes sagape itapi atis. Delefata nefe' alafuga ae'agai.”
41008034	Ea' Jisas nofalai esis amam nematawa safi'mai anen saloma alipumi ananimi na'ipas na'i, “I'i anin epen ni'i nila ae', anin ata' netalogofa okom amambai ananimi atom, nefe' lafel ea' ina ombel mohana anis sohan negaga', owa'. Ae' efa' akafimi ma anda' maol Godi, atiasi sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Epen inimba a' nenda'as na'amba atin si'i ae' ma nigagi'ma ae'. Apa' i'i owa', owa'atin.
41008035	Epen ami okom mopoma ambal ananili atol, ni'i nihapilal tatala'il, anaf ambal ananili higililal. Apa' epen ami okom mopoma ae' eloma basef bu'wafi Godi ma nesambala ambal ananili itap apa'e, anaf God a' nofa' ambal ananili lotanimai nepe andeande' lifilafi.
41008036	I'i epen ami nenda' maol naninani negefa' gwa'aimi uga hiahaom hiami itapami atom higiligalami, anin wapani awen higililan nelomam. Dei' hiahaom amamba atiasi motopalopan mi'imama? Owa'atin endilisi.
41008037	Epen inimba atiasi nefa' hiahaom maima negatal ambal ananili ma nitanima negewambilali wapani? Owa'atin.
41008038	Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Amam nematawa dei'isi sanda' waf aunai sakwaha sagahapifa Godi. Epes isimba mamahisa ambal aola ae' sondafa'me eloma basef ae'afi, anaf ae' wapani ambal aola epes isimba endafa'mas nemaf afamba ae' ifi'i egaloma hiahaom fasimi banagami mogogala'i ahamai elomai amom ensel bu'wami Godi wapani.
41009001	Jisas na'ipa esis na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi ipa', anipa pagalutu na'aii atiasi ina pega' ulal, ata' owa'. Anipa apiti banagami Godi moloma anen nogape dembinai kinga epes ananisi.”
41009002	A'i owa' main, nimaguf wanif wanif fafe'ma hi'alef, Jisas nao'wa Pita naloma Jemsi Jon nao'wam mondowasa' anota halafuta lautai. Nao'wa amom atom tol mape, owa' mati alop ananipi apandati na'a pogala' a'owa'.
41009003	Luwaguf maim ananimi mataga mogala' afitim a'owa'. Ina anona aman itapanai la'ifina nanda' luwaguf maim mataga afitim na'amba, owa'atin.
41009004	Ea' mati amam biam fowa'imi, Elaija naloma Moses mataga malutu ma'i maloma Jisas.
41009005	-
41009006	Pita naloma Jemsi Jon ombel maham endilisi, ea' Pita na'i ni'i anif basef, owa', owa'atin, anen ina ata' okom mapoma basef na'i niga'iefi, a' owa'atin. Ea' na'ias na'amba na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wape na'a'e a' fafas, ata' ola' anoh aolah wanoh hondandamepa. Ina' anop, Moses anop, Elaija anop.”
41009007	Owa' anom ilagw maofana amom. Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai ilagw amamba ga'i basef ga'i, “Anen Nogame ae'anai, ae' okom mohafel maimailana a'owa'. Ipa' pendame' basef ananifi.”
41009008	Alipumi Jisasi wanom matologon kwafalis ganigani, apa' ina mati anin epen, owa'atin. Mati Jisas atona nalutu nalomam.
41009009	Ea' amom ata' makwaha halafuta mafi'i atin, Jisas na'ipam dindinip na'i, “Ipa' ina pewalapa hiahaom amamba dei' pagatulumi pi'ipa anin epenam, owa'i. Apefe' dondo'ma nemaf afamba ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ma sehe ega' egesafel matmat wapani, dao' pi'ipas.”
41009010	Ea' amom mahapila basef ifimba mape, manda'ipama ma'i, “Basef ifimba Jisasi notanima nogosafel matmat, kofagefa fafe' fa'imama?”
41009011	Ea' mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dei' maina amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maga'i Elaija fowa'inai ata' nili' nogafi'i?”
41009012	Jisas nagwamam basef na'i, “Aho' endilisi. Elaija nifi'i nondondomba hiahaom hiami hi'igalam wapani. Apa' basef fagape buk Baibeli fa'i dembinai anaf notaga epen nogofa' alop epesi nope ni'imama? Ifimba fa'i anen neme' akafimi lu'wami ma esis sogowa' alafugahanai.
41009013	Dei' a'ipipa, anona Elaija a' nafi'i ea', apa' esis sagi'ma nomonas asasimi atom, sanda'mana waf awafi endilisi si'i anif basef fagape buk Baibeli faga'ias.”
41009014	Jisas naloma alipumi wanom mafi'i mati anom alipumi du'wanim 9-pelaim magapanii, ea' mati amam nematawa hiasi salutu felefele'ma amom. Ea' mati anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ma'i basef mandahihianamaef maloma alipumi Jisasi 9-pelaim.
41009015	Amam nematawa isimba hiasi sati Jisas nafi'i, sosafel gogolalasis kwapete'as, sasagih safe'ma anen sanifelona.
41009016	Ea' Jisas nahali' amom alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ipa' palomam pa'i main pandahihianaman?”
41009017	Ea' anona aman nagape la'afena amam nematawai nagwamana basef Jisas na'i, “Dembinai tisa, awani aman ae'ani anona ambal aunai napain, malogol gaso'an. Na'amba efa'an afi'mai ina'.
41009018	Nimaguf ifimba hiafi ambal anamba aunai nahapilan sisihin nakwahin newa itap. Ea' ofap pataga malogolan, nalelef fendetapa' imun dogw, a alop ananipi dindigisip a'owa'. Ae' a'ipa alipumi ine'imi a'i motofa ambal anamba aunai nofa' nofo'o, apa' amom owa' banagema.”
41009019	Ea' Jisas name' basef ifimba, na'ipas na'i, “O, ipa' amam nematawa owa' pegahapifaea. Nimaguf ma'uf ae' ata' epe elomepa? Nimaguf ma'uf wapani ma egefa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipa' okwan nifi'mai ae'.”
41009020	Ea' esis sao'wamana awani inimba anen. Ambal anamba aunai nati Jisas, kwafalis atis nakoto' anin kwapete', nafe' newa itap hota atin na'oh, apah afitimi ofap mataga sisih malogol ananigili.
41009021	Ea' Jisas nahali' ahama awani inimbai na'i, “Nogamena ine'ini, aowas inimba nanda'an nape nimaguf ma'uf?” Anen na'ipana na'i, “Fowa' ata' awani nape atapina na'amba atin.
41009022	Dondol ambal aunai nakwahin newala nasef nif, a newala embel na'i nohan afin. Apa' i'i ina' banagena ma, niti apa' owahipipa netopalopapa.”
41009023	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ina' nagahali'i na'amba? Epen ami nigahapifi endilisii, anin banagena maol fasini naninani.”
41009024	Ea' aman anamba na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Ae' ahapifina kwasakwasala. Dei' netopalope ma igahapifina banagewe endilisi.”
41009025	Ea' Jisas nati amam nematawa safi'i salutu salipana felefele', na'ipa ambal anamba aunai mehip na'i, “Ina' ambal awasinai nagasopama aligahi malogol awani inimbai, ina' lofa'o nekwaha awani inimba, netanima nigafi'mani owa'i.”
41009026	Ea' ambal anamba aunai nakoto'an mehip hoga'ala kwapete' nakwahowan nandahi' nafe'. Ea' awani inimba a' nandati si'i sagaga'i ea' hiasi satilin sa'ias na'amba sa'i, “Anin a' naga' ea'.”
41009027	Na'amba Jisas nahapila lagol ananigili naso'man ea' bo'wen nalutu.
41009028	A'i owa' main, Jisas nafe' nawis anota ipat nape naloma alipumi ananimi mape. Ea' mahali'ana na'amba ma'i, “Dei' maina afa' owa' banagefama ogatofa ambal anamba aunaia?”
41009029	Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pendabeten pihali' God atin, ipa' a' banagepa ma pegatofa ambal anambai aunai. Owa' ano'w ufia'w daia'wa pegatofanaia. Beten atin.”
41009030	-
41009031	Ea' Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi makwaha na'amba magapoma mafe' mataga itap apamba Galili mawis mafe' anagon mape. Dei' main, Jisas na'i nope nondambaho' nolomama nogawalipama basef ananifi. Na'amba nandaiwa'ma anona aman nogogawa anamba amom mafe' magapoma. Anen naso'ama basef na'amba na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi felefele' anona aman noso'asa ae' efe'ma lagof amom boumi ae'ami mehe egaga'. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilif fegafe'ma wanifi, a' itanima esafel efa' ambal wapani.”
41009032	Ea' alipumi ananimi mame' basef ifimba atif, apa' amom ina mogawef, owa'. Na'amba amom ombel mahama mogahali'ana ma basef ifimba kofagefa.
41009033	-
41009034	Ea' Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' mataga Kaperneam, mafe' mawis ipat nomon, Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pa'i basef maif, doko' wagafi'i ufia'w?” Doko' magafi'i ufia'w, amom ma'i basef hiafi ma'i atiasi ami nepe nili' dembinai ma amom. Owa' ina' magwamana anif basef, owa'atin. Tol mape dowaf.
41009035	Ea' Jisas nape itap nofala amom mafi'i mape felefele' na'ipam na'i, “Epen ami ni'i netaga dembinai nepe nigali'i, anin ata' nili' netaga si'i nanda' maola anasi, netaga falafini ma naep epesi.”
41009036	Ea' Jisas naso'mai anin awani sa'wini nahaponan la'afena amom nahapilan na'ipam na'i,
41009037	“Epen ami neso' opafa negatopalopa anin awani si'i ini'i ma okom ananimi mopoma ae', anin nase'e opaf ae' wapani natopalope. Ea' epen ami negatopalopa ae'i, ina natopalopa ae' atowe, owa'. Anin natopalopa anen nasapa'e agafi'ii wapani.”
41009038	Jon nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wati anona aman nanda' maol natofa ambagof awami ma agol ine'igili. Apa' anen ina nagi'ma afa' owa', ea' dei' wasopamana.”
41009039	Owa' Jisas na'ipana Jon na'i, “Ipa' ina apesopamana, owa'i. Epen mamahina nanda' maol fasini ma agol ae'agili, anin ina a' ni'ipasa basef awafi ma ae', owa'.
41009040	Epen ami owa' bouni afe'inia, inimba alipini afa'ini.
41009041	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, epen ami nitilipa ni'i ipa' epes ae'ipai ma netopalopepa nese'epa anin mai sa'wini si'i embel kwaia'umbel pea'ambal, owagama God nogwaman hiahaom fasimi anin.
41009042	Jisas na'ipas na'amba na'i, “I'i anin epen nenda' anin epen sa'wini nagahapifa ae'i, nefe' nenda' waf awafi, atiasi epen inimba nefa' akafimi awami. Anis epes sofa' epen inimba sondola otam lu'unai nila bini'w anani'wi sofa'an sofe' solan newala naoh mami lu'wami, ata' nepe andeande' kwasakwasala. Apa' i'i epen inimba nenda' anin sa'wini negakwaha nagahapifa ae', epen inimba atiasi nepe awen a'owa' nikila' negewala naoh laumi.
41009043	Ea' i'i lagof ipe'igufi fonda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, petopa'agof pekwahogof. Ea' atogol atin fope, ma ambal lopaipa pegape andeande' lifilafi. Na'amba lagof agwafomba fanda' waf awafii fope, fofa'epa pefe' wambel awambili nif fagape lifilafima.
41009044	[Wambel ambalemba endihip sa'usa'umi namugopim atapim magape lifilafii, magagugumba epesi, ea' nif ifimba wapani ina hi'agalafi, owa'atin.]
41009045	I'i bo'wagah ipe'igahi honda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, petopa'agah pekwahogah. Ea' atoga atin hope, ma ambal lopaipa pegape andeande' lifilafi. Na'amba bo'wagah agahemba handa'epa panda' waf awafii hope, hofa'epa pefe' wambel awambili, nif fagape lifilafima.
41009046	[Wambel ambalemba endihip sa'usa'umi namugopim atapim magape lifilafii, magagugumba epesi, ea' nif ifimba wapani ina hi'agalafi, owa'atin.]
41009047	I'i naep ipe'ipi penda'epa pewa ma waf awafi, pigip pikwahip. Atom atin pepe ma pegafe' anamba God nagala'ambemagoma pegape andeande' lifilafima. Na'amba nam amamba manda'an nanda' waf awafii mope, a' mofa'an nefe' wambel awambili nif fagape lifilafiima.
41009048	Wambel ambalemba endihip sa'usa'umi namugopim atapim magape lifilafii, magagugumba epesi, ea' nif ifimba wapani ina hi'agalafi, owa'atin.
41009049	-
41009050	“Anef nemaf epes hiasi hi'ilas sogame' akafimi lu'wami si'i nif monda'as sogape be'es hilili'. Sol usihili fasili ma gwa'aimi, apa' sol owa' usihilia, dei' atiasi penda'al pi'imama usihil wapani? Owa'atin. Ipa' panda' sola gwa'aisi usihis. Ea' ipa' na'amba atin si'i sol usihili, opalef ipe'ilifi atifilif pendaloma sahin owan hiasi petopalopas.”
41010001	Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba, nafe' anep itap lu'upa Judiai nambo walemb Jordan gani fisana. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen wapani, naso'asa basef si'i dondol nagawalipas.
41010002	Ea' anom dembami Farisi mafi'i mahali' Jisasa anif basef magwambana ma'i, “Mu'uli ape'ini andeande'ma anona aman nondaiwa'ma nemata'w anani'wi nogali'amona'w a'a owa'?”
41010003	Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef na'ipam na'i, “Moses nase'epa mu'uli mamahina?”
41010004	Amom magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Moses na'i aho'ma anona aman ni'i nogali'amona ako'wi, ni'i anif basef fil okwatip noso'akwap nili'amona'w kofe'.”
41010005	Owa' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' panda' du'waniga, dei' Moses nanda'mepa mu'uli inimba.
41010006	Fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' hiahaom hiami, ‘Nanda' epes ea' sataga suwafisi numa'isi.’
41010007	God na'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Esis bias ina ata' sope si'i sagape daindai, owa'. Aman nokwaha mamasana ananisi nefe' noloma waulu'mana anani'wi, esis bias asope alop atotop.
41010008	Ea' esis bias sondaso'ama sotaga si'i alop atifip.’ Esis ina ata' si'i sagape biasa sagape daindai, owa'.
41010009	Ea' hiahawes mais God a' nagapete'as sisihisi, isimba anin epen ina nehape'as, owa'i.”
41010010	A'i owa' main, Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mafe' mawis mape ipat, mahali'ana ma waf afamba sandaso'amafi.
41010011	Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Aman ami nagakwaha waulu'mana anani'wi ma nagaso' ano'w daia'w wapanii, anen nanda' waf awafi so'a waola nemata'w akwamba nali' nagaso'akwi.
41010012	Ea' na'amba atin, i'i nemata'w ami kokwaha anona koso' anona daiana, ako'w kwawala waf bu'wafi kwatopa' daso'ama kwanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi ma anen nali' nagaso'akwi.”
41010013	Ea' esis sao'wamanai anis awasi sa'wisi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas, sa'i anen nosa lagofa niga'ipasa basef fasifi awasi isimba. Owa' alipumi ananimi mandaiwa'ma esis awasi isimba ea' masopama esis sofa'as sogafi'mai anen.
41010014	Ea' Jisas nati amom manda' waf afambai, anen a' nembel awambela amom a' na'ipam, na'i, “Ipa' kwahowa awasi isimba sifi'mai ae'. Ipa' ina pihagasis, owa'i. Esis amam nematawa sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiasi same' basef ananifi sagailif si'i awasi isimba.
41010015	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, epen ami ni'i aho'ma God nope dembinaiman ama nese'ana nembel God si'i awasi isimba saga'i aho'mana, isimba sanda'as na'ambai atiasi sogawis anamba God nagala'am bemagomai. I'i owa', owa'atin.”
41010016	Ea' anen nasa'ma awasi isimba nahapilas satoma bo'wagah ananigahi nasa lagof ananigufi balagah asasigahi na'ipasa basef fasifi nowa' banagas.
41010017	Jisas nosafel nafe', anona aman nasagih nafi'mai anen nindiwa nembawa notawa nahali'ana na'i, “Tisa bu'winai, ae' atiasi enda' maina egefa' ambal namili egape andeande' lifilafi?”
41010018	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ina' naga'i ae' bu'uwai? God atona anen bu'winai.
41010019	Ina' negawa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani naga'i, ‘Ina' owa'i nenda' waf awafi so'a waulafi neha anis soga' a nenda' wal, owa'i, ina' owa'i nembaso'ma anis epes daiasa, ea' ina nembaso'am banagena ma negefa' anom hiahaom anasi dowadowaf, owa'i. Ina' neme' basef mamasinai nihapilif nilif nindimafias andeande'.”
41010020	Ea' aman anamba na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Tisa, mu'uli inimba hiani ahapilan ailan fowa' ata' awani afi'i afi'i ataga dei'.”
41010021	Ea' nomonas Jisasi sohafela anen saisailana, na'ipana na'i, “Ina' anef waf fasifi atetef owa' ata' nenda'afa. Ina' fo'o nese'asa hiahaom ine'imi ma anis daias sotalinama nefa' moni inimba nenda'an neso' isimba kwahusi. Nenda'as na'amba ma anaf negefa' hiahawes fasisi gani ilif. Ea' nifi'i nihapifi nila ae'.”
41010022	Owa' aman anamba hiahaom hiamunai nandaiwa'ma nonda'am nogaso' anis epes daias. Ea' nomonas ananisi iwanis nandambema megahaihailana nafe'.
41010023	Ea' Jisas natologon ganigani na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Epes isimba ugai moni hianaisi sanda'am da nda' ahifim a'owa' ma sefe' sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Atona atin sefe' suwis.”
41010024	Ea' amom mosafel gogolalasoma basef ifimba naga'ipamafi. Owa' Jisas nagwamama basef wapani na'i, “Owape ae'ipai, ufia'w kwagafe' anambai ina andipa'wi, owa', ahifi'wi.
41010025	Anin mafin lu'unai kamel nogawis bolotaf nil sogosambala luwagufeli, anamba ila ina ahifima a'owa' ma nogawis. Apa' amam nematawa hiahaom hiamisi i'i sofe' sogawis nomona maol Godi, sonda'am da nda' ahifim a'owa' ma sofe' sogawis. Maol inimba ahifim a'owa' nikila' maol kamel nogawis bolotaf nili.”
41010026	Owa' alipumi ananimi mosafel gogolalasom kwapete'am manda'ipama ma'i, “I'i na'ambaiai, anaf God nuwambilai epes mamahisa nokwahomas waf awafi sotanimai sope andeande' lifilafi? Owa'atin.”
41010027	Ea' Jisas nasa'ma naep natiti amom na'ipam na'i, “Hiahaom epes owa' la'ifisa sonda'amia, amamba God atona banagonai ma nonda'am. Anen banagonai ma nonda' hiahaom hiami hi'igalam.”
41010028	Ea' Pita nasefela basef na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' wakwaha hiahaom afa'imi hiami, dei' wafi'i wahapifa basef ine'ifi wailina.”
41010029	-
41010030	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Aho' endilisi, ae' aga'ipipa na'amba a'i, Ipa' epes ami ukup pegapoma ae' eloma basef bu'wafi Godi ma sokwaha ifagw gwoloma sahin owan ahasas mamasas a batawisas soloma aofah mais asasisi, atiasi asofa' hiahawes isimba dambaisi hiasi a'owa', sikila' asasisi fowa'isi. Ea' anis daias atiasi sehepa sonda'mepa was awafi. Apa' anaf owagama nogota bu'utai togataga, pefa' ambal namili pepe andeande' lifilafi.
41010031	Apa' epes hiasi dei' sataga sagali'i agof fagatomasi, anaf agof akas asotaga sigi'. Apa' epes isimba sataga sagagi'i anaf a' agof fotomas sotaga sili'.”
41010032	Esis saila ufia'w safe' sondowasa' Jerusalem, Jisas nafe' nali'as. Ea' alipumi ananimi magi'mana mafe'. Amom mogawa anen a' nafe' Jerusalem, na'amba dei' amom agogolalasom. Esis sagagi'ma amomi, esis wapani sogawa anen nofe' Jerusalem ea' ombel mahas. Ea' Jisas nao'wa alipumi atom mafe' mape anagon dei, na'ipam hiahaom amamba atiasi mogatagamanai.
41010033	Na'ipam na'i, “Peme'. Dei' afa' ea' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi anona aman nonda'e efe'ma amom pris dembami moloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ea' monda' kotimi a' mi'i basef mondame'maefa mohe egaga'. Ea' monda'e efe'ma esis sogolalama Godi ma
41010034	sonda' salamala ae' sonda'e findiwae sisisi'wafe sopopagahowe ea' sehe ega'. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilif, anef fefe' fegataga wanifi a' itanima esafel wapani.”
41010035	Jemsi Jon, Sebedi nogaopana mafi'i mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, afa' biafa wa'i uhali'ina ma anif basef ea' nenda'mafaef afa' biafa.”
41010036	Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pa'i enda'mepa main?”
41010037	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Anaf owagama ina' netaga negefa' agol lu'wagili mogogala'i gani wambel Godi, nemaf afamba afa' wa'i ina' nenda'afa ope dembefa wil olomena wa'owa'ol anona nil wa'ol egawama a' anona nil wa'ol da'asaigilima.”
41010038	Owa' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa ina pegawa andeande'ma hiahawes pagahali'imasi, owa'! Ipa' banagepama pega' embela kap apamba dei' ega' embelapi, a'a owa'?” Jisas na'ipam na'amba ea' na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ipa' bipa banagepama pegefa' baptais isimba dei' egefa'asi a'a owa'?”
41010039	Ea' magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' ila la'ififai.” Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi, kap apamba dei' ae' ega' embelapai, a sa'of inimba atiasi egasa'ofani si'i baptaisi, isimba ipa' atiasi pegefa'asi.
41010040	Apa' pegape lagol kwahisigili o gagaili ae'agufi, isimba ina maol ae'ani, owa'. God atona ni'i esis isimba a' nandandepas ea'i dao', esis atis sope lagof kwahisigili gagaili ae'agufi.”
41010041	Ea' alipumi du'wanim ilifunamaim mame' amom biam ma'ias na'amba, manda' megahaha Jemsi Jon.
41010042	Ea' Jisas nofala amom hiami mafi'mai anen, na'ipam atin na'i, “Ipa' pegawa epes sogolalama Godi sa'i agufumi asasimi dembami, amom mape ilifa esis a'owa' manda'mas dondog manda'as kwapete'as. Ea' mape banagem a'owa' manda' esis amam nematawa sogaila malogof amamugufi.
41010043	Apa' waf afambai ina a' fepoma ipa', hapaifi. Aman ami nogape dembinai ma ipe'i, anen ata' nili' nope si'i nanda' maola ipa' hipaii.
41010044	-
41010045	Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ina afi'ima esis sonda'me maola sogatopalope, owa'. Ae' afi'i enda' maol egatopalopa ipa' hipai ma waf awafi fagawasipai. Ae' afi'i ma sehe ega' etala ipa' peloma epes hiasi igatawahipama waf awafi ipe'ifi. Ea' aman ami ni'i nogataga dembinai ma ipe'i, anen ata' nili' nope si'i agol akanai nonda'masa maol hiasi dowadowaf.”
41010046	Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mafe' mataga Jeriko. Ea' ma'i mokwaha Jeriko mefe' moloma amam nematawa hiasi, mataga ufia'w kwagawisi wambili, owa', anona aman naep pagaso'anai Bartimeas, nogama Timeusi, tol nape felefele'ma ufia'w. Anen nape nandailasa otamba gwa'aisi mais sogaso'ana.
41010047	Bartimeas name' basefa Jisas Nasaretinai nafi'i nape, ea' nofalana mehip na'i, “Jisas, akunamana Deviti, ina' niti ae' uwahipiwi.”
41010048	Owa' esis hiasi sinifalona sa'i, “Ina' sopama malogol.” Owa' anen fala atin nape na'i, “Jisas ina' akunamana Deviti, netelowe uwahipiwi.”
41010049	Ea' Jisas nafi'i nalutu na'i, “Falana nifi'mai.” Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Nomonas banages. Safel! Jisas a' nofalinai.”
41010050	Ea' anen nakwaha saket ananitai nosafel kwafalis nafe'ma Jisas.
41010051	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' na'i ae' enda'mena main?” Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai tisa, ae' a'i iti andeande' wapani.”
41010052	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ipa' fo'o. Ina' ea' nahapifa ae' banagiwai ma anda'ena bo'wena wapani.” Ea' kwafalis atis naep apatiana andeande' nagi'ma Jisas nafe' ufia'w.
41011001	Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' mataga felefele'ma Jerusalem, ea' mataga Betfagai Betani walemb ambalemba bialemb, felefele'ma halafuta Oliv. Ea' Jisas nasapa' alipumi ananimi biam
41011002	na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pefe' wambel bambalimba bagape gani wa'ili felefele'ma na'ai. Pefe' piwis wambel ambalemba, piti anona donki sa'unai sandolana nail. Ina dei' anona aman a' natomana, ata' owa'atin. Petagwahona pefa'ana pifi'mai ae'.
41011003	I'i anin epen nigahali'ipa niga'i, ‘Ipa' pafi'i panda'as na'amba ma main?’ Ipa' pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maolana ma bola nosapa'ana notanimamipai kwafalis.’”
41011004	-
41011005	Ea' amom biam mafe' mati anona donki sa'unai sapete'ana nail ipat uta ando' felefele'ma ufia'w. Amom ata' matagwahona atin owa', anis salutu felefele' sahali'am sa'i, “Ipa' patagwaha donki anamba ma main?”
41011006	Ea' ma'ipas si'i Jisas doko' naga'ipam. Ea' sa'i aho'ma amom mogofa' donki anamba.
41011007	Ea' mofa'ana mafi'mai Jisas, mawamona sagegw amamugwi gwatoma donki anamba Jisas natomagw.
41011008	Ea' esis hiasi sandombamana sagegw ufia'w. Anis satopa'i apulita lawah hogatawa aof felefele'i saso'wiam ufia'w sofalo'ma'w.
41011009	Esis hiasi sali' sagi' safela ao'aligil na'amba sa'i, “Hosana. Apa' mandanifal endilisi ma ina'. Apa' ma'i God nofalo'ma ina' nagafi'i agol ananigilii nese'ena banagami ma nenda' maol ananini.
41011010	Fowa' gani God nanda' akunamapa ape'inai Devit nape dembinai ma esis nugumafias. Dei' awi God nonda' ina' andeande', nepe Dembinai ma apa' nimafiapa si'i Devit fowa' nape dembinai nugumafias. Hosana. Apa' mondafela agol Godi golota ilif endilisi.”
41011011	Ea' Jisas nataga nawis Jerusalem nafe' nawis ipat Godi lu'unai. Nawis nati hiahaom nafe'ma hi'alam, awin na'i a' newala, nao'wa alipumi 12-pelaim ananimi mafe' Betani.
41011012	Wafilu Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mohafel makwaha Betani mafi'i atin, owa' Jisas a' nolomahana.
41011013	Ea' nalutu nati anoga lawag agiligama fik gotawai laogon felefele', agog a' apuliga. Ea' nafe' felefele' nowando'ma sa'utip. Apa' ina nati anip pailaga, owa'. Nati apul atom. Nogota gogailatai ata' owa' totagaea.
41011014	Ea' Jisas na'ipaga na'i, “Ina ata' nil nela anip sa'utip wapani, a' owa'atin endilisi.” Ea' alipumi ananimi mame' basef ifimba naga'ipagaefi.
41011015	Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' mataga Jerusalem, ea' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nali'amona esis hiasi sanda' bisnisi saloma isimba sagatalom ipat anamba nomoni sawisi ando'. Anom amam mati otamba anisi mindisila'mamba. Ea' Jisas nambema tebolifah amamisi nakolo'was. Anis sanda' bisnisa sogatala amiguf ma'unamb. Ea' nambema siaifah asasisi nakolo'masas wapani.
41011016	Ea' nanda'imagon na'i, “Ina ata' sofa' anom hiahaom amamba suwisi nomon wapani ipat anamba sandakolas sagapoma, a'owa'.”
41011017	Ea' na'ipas basef Godi fagail Baibeli na'i, “Ipat ae'anai nondapoma esis sagape ganimba walemb hiagomai ma sifi'i sopaona sondabeten sogahali'i. Apa' owa', a' panda'ana nataga si'i sandambaho' sanda' wala.”
41011018	Amam nematawa hiasi gogolalasisa basef ananifi. Isimba atis pris amamba dembami maloma dembami mogawalipasa mu'uli Godi a' ombal bahama anen. Ea' mala' molaoma ufia'wa mohana nogaga'.
41011019	A'i owa' wambomota, Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi makwaha Jerusalem a' mafe'.
41011020	Wafilu kuhimbita atota Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' mati lawag agamba fik bowaga aliga, soh haloma nombalef alim hi'alam.
41011021	Pita natologa, okom mapoma Jisas naga'iefi basefa lawag agamba ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai tisa, ina' niti lawag aga'e nambati' ina' naga'ipagai, a' aliga hi'alaga.”
41011022	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pihapifa God.
41011023	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, epen ami owa' okom bimbiafim mopoina ma anin okom atifim nihapifi endilisi ni'ipa halafuta tatumba ni'i, ‘Ina' dagia a' nefe' newala naoh,’ endilisi God atiasi a' nonda'am motaga si'i anin okom mandanda'.
41011024	I'i ipa' pi'i pendabetena anis maemaefah pi'i pefa'as, ipa' pihapifa God endilisi pendabeten pi'i, ‘Aho' endilisi, afa' atiasi ogofa'asi,’ Ma atiasi pefa'as si'i paga'ias.
41011025	Afamba ipa' pilutu pendabeten, pekwahomasa waf awafi anis sanda'mepafi, ukup pese'epaf. Ama Ahamepa nagape heveni okom mogaso'anafa ipa' wapani.
41011026	[Apa' ipa' i'i owa' ukup pese'epafa, Ahamepa nagape heveni ina okom moso'anafa ipa', owa'atin.]”
41011027	Ea' Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafi'i Jerusalem wapani, ea' nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi sandakolasa. Anen ata' nafe' atin, owa' pris dembami maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godii maloma agufumi esis Judai mafi'mai anen.
41011028	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' nefa' agol maigila dei' nanda' waf afambai? Ami na'ipina ma negape dembinai ma nanda' maol inimba?”
41011029	Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef na'i, “Ae' wapani, a'i ihali'ipa ma anif basefa ipa' ata' pili' pi'ipif ae', ma bola iga'ipipa ami na'ipi ape dembiwai anda' maol inimba.
41011030	Jon nagapisi' amam nematawa hiasi, ami na'ipana napisi'as? God nagape heveni na'ipana napisi'as a'a anin epen itapani na'ipana? Ipa' pegwamef pi'ipif.”
41011031	Ea' mame' basef ifimba manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' uga'i, ‘God nagape heveni na'ipa Jon nagapisi'as,’ na'amba atiasi a' ni'ipa afa' ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipa' owa' pegahapifanaia?’
41011032	Apa' afa' uga'i, ‘Anin epen itapani na'ipana nagapisi'as,’ na'amba esis amam nematawa a' sohafa.” Dei' main, esis hiasi sa'i Jon anen profet endilisinai. Amom a' ombel mahama esis.
41011033	Ea' magwamana basef ma'i, “Afa' owa' ogawama.” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' na'amba atin, ina i'ipipa ami nase'e banagami na'ipi anda' maol inimba ae'ani.”
41012001	Jisas nanda' anif basef waminif atina esis na'i, “Anona aman nanda' anof aof nagawa waina nahefagomaf. Aof afamba nomon nanda' anona tang notawa ma sogafa'asa sa'utip ipimba wainip. Anen nala' anota ipat lautai totawa ma sope sugumafiagon. Ea' nakwahomam aof afamba anom amam ma'i monda' maolanaf. Anen nafe' napani anambel wambel lauguni.
41012002	Ama nogota sa'utip pagailatai, anen kofagonama aof afambai nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe' ma amom manda' maol aof ananifi. Ea' na'i amom moso'ana anip sa'utip gwa'aipi ma aof afamba.
41012003	Owa' mombalo'ana mahana mali'amonana notanima nafe' dowaf.
41012004	Ea' anen kofagonama aofi nasapa' anona daiana nafe' wapani ma mogaso'ana anip sa'utip. Owa' mombalo'ana wapani mahana mawala balagana manda'ana kwapete'ana.
41012005	Ea' kofagonama aofi nasapa' anona daiana nafe' wapani owa', a' mahana afuna, kofagonama aofi nasapa' anom hiami mafe'. Owa', mahami atin anom afum.
41012006	A'i owa' nagi' nasapa' atotona nagapani wapani. Anamba nogamana ananinai. Nomonas ananisi sohafel sagasagailanai a'owa'i. Ea' nasapa'ana nafe'ma amom manda' maol aofi. Anen kofagonama aofi na'ias na'i, ‘Atiasi ila, amom a' meme' malogol nogame ae'anai.
41012007	Owa' amom mati anen nafi'i manda'ipama atin ma'i, ‘Aman nanumba ma'una owagama nogofa' hiahaom hiami ahamanai. Awi a' ohana afuna, ma afa' atofa ogofa' aof afa'e.’
41012008	Ea' mombalo'ana mahana afuna makwaha alop ananinai nawis na'oh aof ando'.
41012009	Ea' atiasi anen kofagonama aof afambai nonda' maina amom? Atiasi nifi'i a' noham a' afum hi'ilam, noso'asa aof afamba fefe'ma anis epes daias.
41012010	Ipa' patalifa basef Godi pegawef ea'. Basef Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘Otam amamba magala' ifagwi mogelefatami dei' mataga mape otam banagami mape magali'i mogombalo' ipati.
41012011	Dembinai nanda' amamba mataga, apa' matolom fasifasim a'owa' agogolalasapa.’”
41012012	Ea' amom agufumi esis Judai mogawa anen na'i basef ifimba waminif atini nondola'waifa amom. Ea' ma'i a' mombalo'ana. Owa', ombel mahama esis amam nematawa hiasi. Ea' makwahona mafe'.
41012013	Ea' amom agufumi Judai masapa' anom Farisi maloma anom daiam mini'ap Heroti mafe'ma Jisas ma'i meme' anif basef ananifi owa' andeande'ia ma monda'mana basef mogowa'ana si'i sogapalo' agof anembeh.
41012014	Amom mafi'i makikipana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' ogawena ina' aman naga'i endilisii. Owa' niga'ipasa anif basef isimba anis agof lu'wagufisia a anif basef daifa isimba agof akasi falafisia, owa'atin. Ina' naga'ipasa basef endilisifi atif Godi amam nematawa hiasi dondo' atin hi'agalafi.
41012015	Mu'uli ape'ini na'i andeande'ma apa' mogaso'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi, a'a owa'?” Owa' Jisas a' nogawa baso'am amamini na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' pagagwamba ae'? Fa'mai anin moni atitina ata' itilin.”
41012016	Ea' mofa'manani ma natilin nahali'am na'i, “Ambal laloma agol isimba sagaili amisi?” Ma'i, “Isimba Sisari gavman dembinai.”
41012017	Ea' magwamam na'ipam na'i, “Dao' hiahawes isimba dembinai Sisari pese'anas Sisar. Apa' hiahawes Godi, pese'anas God.” Ea' amom gogolalasom nomonas hiahawesa anen.
41012018	Anom amam anep mini'ap Sadyusi amom mini'ap apamba ma'i sagaga'i ina atiasi sotanima sosafel wapani, owa'atin. Ea' mafi'mai Jisas mahali'ana ma'i,
41012019	“Dembinai Tisa, fowa' Moses nanda' anif basef fagail buki ma apa'i fa'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga', ma anen awasi akana, waulu'mana ata' kope, owamana ananinai a' noso'akw nola anis awasi ma sogaha'ofana.’
41012020	Ea' amom wambota atotota 7-pelaim mape. Nagali'i sahomam naso'akw awani aka'w naga' nakwaho'w kwape.
41012021	-
41012022	Ea' owamana nagi' naso'akw, naga' nakwaho'w kwape awani aka'w. Ea' owapam mandatu'umi manda'as na'amba atin, maso' nemata'w akwamba maga' atin hi'alam mafe' mafe'ma matagama owagufunai akutainai. Amom amamba ambipim ina mola anis awasi, owa'. Mandaga' atin. Ama main, waulu'mam kwagi' kwaga' kwagi'mam.
41012023	Ea' anaf esis sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, nemata'w akwamba kopoma mamahonama? Amom 7-pelaim a' maso'akw atin hi'alam kwape waulu'mam amamu'wi.”
41012024	Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef amom na'i, “Ipa' owa' pegawa basef Baibel naga'iefia, ea' owa' pegawa banagami Godia. Ipa' dei' ina pa'i basef andeande', owa'atin.
41012025	Nemaf afamba sagaga'i sokwaha wandelef sogosafel wapani, amam nematawa ina ata' sondaso'ama wapani, a' owa'atin. Sope dowaf si'i ensel magape heveni.
41012026	Basef ifimba ma sagaga'i sotanima sogosafel wapani, ipa' patalifa basef fagail buk Baibeli, fowa' God naga'ipanaef Mosesi. Basef ifimba fa'i nif ileliwa wagataga ma lawag sa'ugai fagandogai. Basef ifimba God na'ipa Moses na'i, ‘Ae' God Abrahami, Aisaki, a Jekopi.’
41012027	Basef ifimba faga'i Dembinaii, anen ina God epes sagaga'ii, owa'atin. Anen God epes isimba ambal lapais sagape namisi. Ea' basef ipe'ifi ina endilisifi. Ipa' ina pegawef andeande', owa'atin.”
41012028	Anona aman dembinai nagawalipasa mu'uli Godi nafi'i, name' amom ma'i maloma Jisas mandahihianama basef. Ea' name' Jisas nagwamam basef bu'wafi atif. Ea' nahali'ana na'i, “Mu'uli Godi apa' magahapifani hiani. Apa' mu'uli mamahina lu'win nikila' mu'uli daian hiani nape nagali'i?”
41012029	Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Mu'uli nagali'i inimba. Ipa' Israel, ipa' peme'! Dembinai God ape'inai, anen atona Dembinai.
41012030	Nomonas ipe'isi sohafela dembinai God ipe'inai sisilana na'amba. Ukup ipe'ipi pipilana hi'indalep, pese'ana ambagufi nelelemb soloma pepel ipe'isi pendaso'anas hi'indalasa Dembinai God atona.
41012031	Ea' mu'uli nagafe'ma bifi inimba. Ipa' ukup pipila anis epes sagape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ukup pagapagaila ipa' atipa. Owa' anin mu'uli nikila' mu'uli inimba biafina, owa'atin.”
41012032	Ea' aman anamba na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'ias andeande'. Aho' God atona anen Dembinai, anen atona nape. Owa' anona aman nope dembinai si'i anona.
41012033	Aho', mu'uli lu'wani nagali'i inimba. Nomonas ipe'isi sohafela anen sisilana na'amba. Ukup ipe'ipi pipilana hi'indalep, pese'ana nelelembi gawa soloma pepel ipe'isi hi'indalas. Na'ambai andeande'. Ea' mu'uli nagagi'i inimba. Ipa' piti uwahipis nomonas sisila epes ami sagape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ipa' nomonas sagaila ipa' atipa. Na'ambai andeande'. I'i apa' mugaila mu'uli inimba biafin, waf afambai bu'wafi fikila' gwa'aisi mafis main mogaso'anas Godi ata' be'es kwasakwasala.”
41012034	Jisas name' aman anamba nagwa basef si'i aman gawa bu'waninai. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ina' ata' nogota laota ma nigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai mugumafina, owa'.” Ea' amom hiami ombel mahama mogahali' Jisasa anif basef wapani.
41012035	Jisas nape ipat lu'unai Godi naso'asa basef esis amam nematawa na'i, “Amom magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ma'i, ‘Krais, aman anamba God nandandepana nogafi'ii, Devit akunamana. Ea' ma'i Krais aman atona dowaf itapanai. Dei' maina maga'ias na'amba ma Krais?
41012036	Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'ma Devit na'i, ‘Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'i, “Ina' nepe lagol kwahisigili ae'agili atapina nefe' netagama ae' enda' bousi ine'isi sogafe' lafela bo'wagah ine'igahi.”’
41012037	Aman anamba king Devit fowa' nofala Krais na'i Dembinai. Isimba atis dei' Krais ina aman atona falafunai, owa'. Anen dembinai.” Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sonahasa sagame' basef ananifi.
41012038	Jisas nawalipas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' solawaipa ma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi. Amom ma'i mowaho' luwaguf laumi atom mondafe'ma esis sotoloma siga'i amom dembami manda' waf fasifii. Amom ma'i mope anamba esis hiasi sandatama sagapoma ma sotoloma sondalalamam soganifelom.
41012039	Amam amamba ukup pa'i mondape siaifah isimba sotawa sagali'i atis, dembami atom magapoma nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi a'a anamba hiasi sandakolas nimaguf ifimba sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami ma hiasi sogatolom.
41012040	Amom magawis ifagw agwamba nematawa alifiwaii, mawis manda' wala hiahawes awousi. Ea' mosafel malutu mandabeten launai dowadowafa esis sotolom siga'i amom bu'wami. Anaf God nowaloga epes hiasi. Anis epes daias owa' sonda' waf awafi na'ambaia anaf sofa' akafimi kwasakwasala, apa' amom a' mofa' nimanimi a'owa' lu'wami endilisi.”
41012041	Jisas nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi, nape felefele'ma bokis moni nagalasi. Anen nape nati amam nematawa safi'i sagala moni negewala bokis. Amam nematawa isimba moni hianaisi sala moni hiani.
41012042	Apa' ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwafi'i kwala moni sa'wisa'wini biafin si'i 10 toea newala bokis isimba.
41012043	Ea' nofala alipumi ananimi mafi'i na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nemata'w akwamba alifi'wi kwa'waha moni lu'wani nikila' moni hiani amam nematawa hiasi sagalani.
41012044	Epes isimba hiasi moni hianai na'omas, sala du'wanin atin newala bokis. Apa' nemata'w akwamba, moni aka'w endilisi, ako'w kwala moni ako'uni hi'alan. Ea' owa' anin ne'eha kogatala gwa'aisia, a' owa'atin. Ea' moni ako'wini biafin sa'wini a' nikila' moni hiani esis sagalani hi'alan.”
41013001	Jisas nape nomon ipat anamba lu'unai Godi. Ea' na'i nokwaha ipat anamba nuwisi ando', anona alipunai ananimi nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Tisa, ina' niti ifagw amamba fasifasimi. Sanda' otamba lu'wami sanda'am suwasuwaim.”
41013002	Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nati ifagw amamba lu'wami, a'a? Anaf ina anemba otamba bendatomama atin banagemba bepe, owa'atin. A sugulatam sowalom hi'ilam mofe' mo'oh atona atin hi'ilam.”
41013003	Jisas nape halafuta Oliv ea' nati ipat lu'unai Godi notawa do'wan wa'ol. Ea' Pita naloma Jemsi Jon a Andru atom mafi'mai anen mahali'ana ma'i,
41013004	“Ina' ni'ipafa hiahaom amamba nambai' motaga? Ametal mail lili' lotaga ma apa' mogogawa hiahaom amamba felefele'ma mogataga si'i dei'aol naga'ipafa?”
41013005	Ea' Jisas na'ipama basef laufi na'amba na'i, “Ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba anin epen a' nembaso'mepa.
41013006	Dei' main, amam hiami anef nemaf mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'i agol ae'agili mi'i, ‘Ae' ma'uwi ae' Krais, God nandandepe nasapa'e agafi'ii.’ Ea' atiasi amom mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiasi.
41013007	Anef nemaf peme' amalemba wandaf anis sondaha basefa wandaf si'ipipaf, apa' ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Hiahaom amamba atiasi mogatagai, apa' nemaf akutaifi ata' ota'.
41013008	Anis epes sagape anamba itap lu'wagoma sofela wandaf sopa' soloma anis sagape anep itap daiapi. Anona dembinai king no'wa anis walemb hielimbi ananisi sopa' soloma anona dembinai king daiana no'wa ananisi analemb walembi. Analemb walemb hiagoma atona atin itap bol atin nope, ea' anis epes hiasi sagape analemb walembi nolomohas sope. Hiahaom amamba ata' muli' motaga si'i akafimi mali' magatagama nemata'w kwa'i kogola awani. Apa' akafimi anaf migi' mogatagai a' lu'um a'owa' mikila' amamba mogali'i.
41013009	Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Anaf sonda' kotimipa ma gavman dembami asasimi. Ea' sehepa nomon ifagw Juda sandakolasugwi. Ipa' pagame' basef ae'afi pagaila ae'i isimba atis dei' sondaiwa'mepa sonda'epa pilutu nogohnaep kingi moloma gavman dembami ma pegawalapa basef ae'afi bu'wafi piga'ipasef.
41013010	Alipisi ae'asi ata' sili' sofe' walemb hiagoma si'ipa amam nematawa hiasi some' basef bu'wafi Godi fili'. Ama main nemaf akutaifi figi' fetaga.
41013011	Afamba esis sowalapepa sofa'epa pegafe'ma kot, ipa' ina ombel mehepa a pi'i, ‘Atiasi afa' wi'i basef maif?’ Owa'. Basef hiafi God nogasi'ipafi ma nogota atamba atota, ifimba ipa' pewalapef. Ifimba ina basef ipe'ifi atif, owa'. Ambal bu'unai Godi atona nowalapefa ipa' pi'if.
41013012	Anef nemaf esis atis sahin owan sondanda'ma kot, sohas afis. Ea' ahapas sonda'am na'amba atina esis nogaopas asasisi. Ea' batawisas wapani sonda' kotima mamasas asasisi anis sohas afis.
41013013	Atiasi epes hiasi walemb hiagoma nelelemb numbutima ipa' kwapete' endilisi. Esis sati ipa' pagaila basef ae'afii, na'amba dei' sahepa. Apa' epen ami nihapifi banagen nilutu negataga nemaf akutaifii, inimba atiasi God nuwambilan nokwahoman waf awafi ananifi nitanimai nepe andeande'.
41013014	“Anef nemaf ipa' piti hiahaom awami mogahambombaga hiahaom bu'wamii motaga mogape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi. God nandaiwa' endilisi ma hiahaom amamba awami mogape nomon ipat ananinai.” (Epen ami negatalifa basef ifimbai, anin a' okom mondapomef andeande'.) Ea' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi wapani na'i, “Nemaf afamba amam nematawa sagape itap lu'wapi Judiai sofa' sefe' sondowasa'o halafutagw.
41013015	Ea' epen ami nagape ipat ando'i ina ata' netanima niwis nefa'i hiahawes ananisi ipat nomon, owa'i. Anin a' nefa' nendafo'o mehip.
41013016	Epen ami nigail aofi, ina ata' nitanima nefe' wambel nefa' saket main ananisi, owa'i. Anin a' nefa' nendafo'o mehip.
41013017	Nematawa opafuwai waloma awamba awasi ota'asi saga' nomagof atogufi, ae' a'i awo uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota atamba ogame' akafimi lu'wami.
41013018	Ipa' pendabetena hiahaom amamba akafimi ina motagamepa nogota atamba fufini asaf sogatagatai.
41013019	Nogota atamba akafimi mugatagai lu'wami endilisi. Fowa' dambadamba itap pagataga nafi'i nafi'i natagama dei', nimanimi awami amambai ina anom na'ambaimi mataga, owa'atin. Ea' anaf wapani ina atiasi anom nimanimi amambai motaga, owa'atin.
41013020	I'i God owa' nonda' nimaguf fefe' bandefa, atiasi amam nematawa hiasi higiligalasi hi'ilas. Owa' owa'atin. Apa' God okom mapoma epes isimba anen nandandepas ea'i, dei' nahagasa nogota atamba bandata.
41013021	Nemaf afamba fetaga ma i'i anis epes si'ipipa siga'i, ‘Ipa' piti Krais, God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, anen nape na'a, o nani nape gani,’ ipa' ina pihapifas, owa' hapaisi.
41013022	Atiasi anom amam mombaso'am muga'i amom Kraisi a'a muga'i profeti, a' motaga monda' ametal hiahaom banagami mamimami monda' banagami hiami si'i God nanda'ami. Endilisi i'i amom banagema, a' mombaso'ma amam nematawa God nosaho'as ea'i mohambombagas. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
41013023	Ea' ipa' a' solawaipa andeande'. Ae' ali' a'ipipa ea' ma hiahaom amamba nimanimi akafimi anaf mugi' mugatagai.
41013024	“Akafimi nimanimi hiami ma nogota atamba hi'ilam ea', kwafalis atis awin alipini a' netaga owamb, ea' owambini ina ata' negala', a'owa'.
41013025	Ea' ondowa mowai otaga ilif, hiahaom hiami banagami magape otagai ea' bol atin mope.
41013026	Nogota atamba esis siti ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi eloma ilagw otaga ilif ifi'i eloma hiahaom mogogala'i fasimi Godi moloma banagami ananimi.
41013027	Nogota atamba ae' igafi'i esapa' ensel amamba ae'ami mofe' itap hiagoma awin natafima negewalama lambilif anamba wa'owa'ol biafigin biafigin mefe'agon hi'ilagon ganimba itapi otaga safe' sogotambela. Atiasi ensel amamba mefe' mofa'ai esis amam nematawa God nogosaho'as ananisii sondakolas atogon.
41013028	“Ipa' nomonas sondanda'ma anif basef waminif atina ilaof. Ipa' piti ilaof nogonafa ma basowa, pegawa nogota atamba nelemb ea' felefele'ma sogaof.’
41013029	“Ea' na'amba atin anaf piti hiahaom amamba ae' ali' aga'ipipami mogataga, ipa' pegawa ae' afi'i alutu felefele'ma uta. Ina ata' nogota laota, owa'.
41013030	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i ata' pagapani ina atiasi apega' ulal, ata' owa' ipa' piti esis ea' siti hiahaom amamba motaga hi'igalam.
41013031	Otaga noloma itap hiagoma anaf a' higililam hi'ilam, apa' basef ae'afi ina anaf higililif, owa'atin endilisi. Fegape atapif lifilafii.
41013032	“Owa' anin epen negawa nemaf afamba hiahaom amamba mogatagafia, owa'. Amom ensel magape heveni maloma ae' Nogama Godi afa' wapani ina ogawaf, owa'. God atona nogawa nemaf afamba.
41013033	Ipa' ina pegawa hiahaom amamba nambai' motaga, owa'. Ipa' solawaipa, pindumafuma andeande' pendape.
41013034	Ipa' peme' anif basef waminif atin dei' iga'ipipafi. Nemaf afamba si'i anona aman nakwaha ipat ananitai nagafe' anagon. Anen nofalai amom manda' maola anini mafi'i nawaloga maol nagaso'am atona atina mugumafi hiahawes ananisi. Ea' na'ipa aman nugumafi utai ma nugumafiata andeande'.
41013035	Ea' ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Ipa' ina pegawa nambai' Dembinai nugumafi ipati nugafi'i. Atiasi nifi'i wambomota a'a amanota a'a lalamota awatagw gogata, a'a kuhimbita atota, ipa' ina pegawam, owa'.
41013036	Na'amba anen nifi'i kwafalis atis niti ipa' ata' pe'eh atin.
41013037	Basef ifimba ae' agase'epaef ipe'i, ifimba ae' a'ipa amam nematawa hiasi hi'alas. Ipa' solawaipa andeande' pepe ma hiahaom ae' aga'ipipami mogataga.”
41014001	Anef nemaf bu'wafi sa'i Pasova ma esis Juda sonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi soga' anota bret owa' togatef lu'utaia. Nimaguf bif ata' fape ma nemaf afamba bu'wafi sa'i soga' gwa'aisi Pasovaefi. Afamba amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma anom pris dembami ma'i monda' uhuf mefe'ma mombalo' Jisas mohana nogaga'.
41014002	Amom ma'ias na'amba ma'i, “Nemaf afamba sanda' gwa'aisi lu'wasiafi afa' ina ombalo'ana, hapainai. Na'amba epes hiasi ukup awep sohafel sonda' wandaf.”
41014003	Nemaf afamba Jisas nafe' Betani, nape ipat anona aman Saimoni, fowa' aowas aunai nanda' alop ananipi pagambu'wi, ma dei' ambu'unai, Jisas ata' nape na' gwa'aisi atin, owa' ano'w nemata'w kwahapila anol botol sanda'al si'i otami, sanda alogw fasigwi gwagani sagatalin otamba lu'umbai nala botol alamba, agilina nad. Ea' kopalia botol alamba kwakolo'wan newala balaga Jisasi.
41014004	Owa' anis epes sape satolom sa'i, “Dei' maina kwagakolo' sanda inimba dowadowaf?” Ea' esis ukup numbutip kwapete' ma ako'w,
41014005	sa'i, “I'i afa' ofa'ana anis epes soso'afa moni nikila' 300 kina sotalina ofa'an ogaso' epes isimba kwahusa gwa'aisi mainai, dao' andeande'. Apa' owa' owa'atin.” Esis ukup numbutip a'owa' sapoma nemata'w akwamba.
41014006	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' ina a' ukup aoma ako'w, owa'i. Ako'w kwanda' waf fasifima ae'.
41014007	Isimba gwa'aisi main akasi lifilafi sape dowaf salomepa. Nemaf mamahefa pi'i petopalopas pegaso'as moni, andeande', pese'asan. Epes isimba gwa'asi main akasi sape salomepa nimaguf hiafi, apa' ae' owa'. Ae' ina elomepa egape nimaguf hiafi, owa'.
41014008	Maol inimba ako'w kwogawan kwanda'ani, ako'w kwanda'an. Felefele'ma atiasi esis sehe egaga' ma sogawe matmata. Okom ako'umi mapoma felefele'ma egaga'. Na'amba dei' kofa'i sanda' inimba kwafi'i kwakolo'wan newala balaga ae'agai koko'walan newala alop ae'api.
41014009	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, ganimba itap walemb hiagoma anaf siga'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi, si'ipasa basef ako'ufi wapani ma ukup pegapoma, waf bu'wafi ako'w kwanda'meafi.”
41014010	Amam amamba Jisasi 12-pelaim anona amamunai agilinama Judas Keriotinai a nafe' gani amom pris dembami magapoma. Anen na'i ni'ipama Jisas atona nogapoma mofe' mogombalo'ana.
41014011	Amom mame' basef ananifi sonaham endilisi. Ea' ma'i basef mandame'maef na'amba ma'i, “Andeande', afa' a' ose'ena anin moni.” Ea' Judas na'i aho' a' nala' nolaoma ano'w ufia'wa nigihimba'mama Jisas amoma mogombalo'ana.
41014012	Nemaf afamba sali' saga' gwa'aisi saga'i Pasovai esis sa' bret atamba owa' togatef lu'utaia, ea' saha sipsip nogami sondolalima Goda sonda' gwa'aisi isimba. Ea' alipumi Jisasi mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat anima?”
41014013	-
41014014	Ea' Jisas na'ipa ananimi biam na'i, “Ipa' pefe' piwis gani wambel lu'wambili, piti anona aman ufia'w nofa' embel sospen lu'unai. Ea' pigi'mana pefe' piwis ipat atamba anen nefe' nogawisatai. Ea' pihali' ahama ipat atambai pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i, ipat atamba esis saga'ohotai totawa ani? Anen na'i no'wa afa' atofa alipufai ope onda' gwa'aisi isimba Pasova.’
41014015	Ea' nihimba'mepa rum amamba lu'wami mape ilif, ea' sandombata tebol siaifah sa'oh atifis. Ipa' pendondombamafa gwa'aisi rum amamba.”
41014016	Ea' amom mafe' mawis wambel ambalemba mati hiahawes isimba si'i Jisas nali' naga'ipamasi ea' mandondomba gwa'aisi isimba Pasova.
41014017	Ama wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Jisas naloma alipumi 12-pelaim mafe' mataga ipat atamba
41014018	mawis ata' mape ma' gwa'aisi atin, owa Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona afa'inai dei' nape nalomafa naga' gwa'aisii, atiasi a' nefe' nihimba'ma amom boumi ma ae' egapoma.”
41014019	Ea' amom mame' na'amba ukup amamipi a' nimanip ea' mahali'ana atona atin ma'i, “Ae' a'a ami?”
41014020	Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Anona afa'inai nalome ae' wahapila bret wagalata disi, ea' anamba atona.
41014021	Aho', ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi anis epes sehe egaga', si'i Buk Baibel naga'iasa ae'. Apa' aman anamba nogawalapa ae' ma boumii, anen uwahipina endilisi. Atiasi hiahaom awami endilisi a' motagamana. Fowa' ma'mana owa' ata' kolana ai, dao' a' andeande'. Ama anen ina a' notagama hiahaom akafimi amamba awami ea' hapaimi. Owa', a' owa'atin.”
41014022	Jisas nalomam ata' mape ma' gwa'aisi atin, ama main, nasa'ma anota bret, nandabeten nanifela God, nawalota naso'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' sa'mata pea'ata. Bret atamba alop ae'api.”
41014023	Ea' nasa'mai anop kap embel wain bagalapi nandabeten nanifela God naso'amambel amom hiami ma' embel atin.
41014024	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Embel ambalemba esimbel ae'ambeli begewa' banaga basef ifimba God nagala' lapafi dambaifi. Ae' ekolo'wambela egatopalopa amam nematawa hiasi.
41014025	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ina ata' itanima ia' embel wainimbel wapani, owa'. Efe' etaga anamba God nagala'ambemagoma dao', a' ia' anin wain dambaini.”
41014026	Amom manda' anof awaf ea' mawisi a' mafe' mondowasa' halafuta Oliv.
41014027	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amom alipumi na'i, “Fowa' gani Baibel naga'i na'amba na'i, God na'i, ‘Anaf owagama gani, ae' a' eha aman anamba nugumafi sipsipi noga'. Ea' sipsip amamba atiasi a' mofa' mofe' atona biana.’ Atiasi ipa' a pekwaha pigahapifa ae' pefa' pefe' atona biana, si'i fowa' God naga'ias.
41014028	Apa' owa' owa'atin, atiasi ae' itanima esafel wapani, ili'ipa efe' itap lu'upa Galili.”
41014029	Ea' Pita nagwamana na'i, “I'i amom hiami ine'imi mogakwaha ine'ma, hapaimi, apa' ae' owa'atin.”
41014030	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, dei' owamb amba'e, awata ata' owa' tota bifa, ina' a' nendahali'mi ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisasa.’”
41014031	Owa' owa'atin. Pita dindinapina na'ipana banagambel na'i, “Owa'atin. I'i esis sogahafa, afa' biafa oga' atin. Ae' ina a' indahali'mina, owa'atin endilisi.” Ea' alipumi hiami Jisasi ma'ias na'amba atin hi'alam.
41014032	Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' mataga itap Getsemani, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pepe na'a. Ae' cefe' gani wa'ol endabeten ihali' God.”
41014033	Jisas nao'wa Pitai Jems a Jon mafe' malomana. Ea' opaf Jisasi a' aof kwapete'af
41014034	na'ipam na'i, “Nembel ae'ambili a' nimanimbil a'owa', ma a' egaga' nomonas ae'asi a' awes endilisi. Ipa' pepe na'a silisilawi pepe pesasae igitanimai.”
41014035	Ea' Jisas nandambemef nafe', nambe' opaf na'oh itap nahali' God. Na'i notofa hiahaom awami amamba anen atiasi nogame'agamami.
41014036	Ea' nahali' God na'i, “O, Ahame ina' banaginai ma nanda' hiahaom hiami hi'agalami. Nekwahome kap apamba. Apa' owa', ina' nindaila okom ine'imi atom, ae' owa'.”
41014037	Anen nahali'ana ea', nosafel notanima nafe'ma alipumi ananimi magapoma. Nafe' natolom owa', nati amom ma'oh maga' mafe'. Ea' nofala Saimon Pita na'i, “Saimon, ipa' ata' owa' pepea, panda'oh atin a'amon? Dei' maina ipa' owa' banagepama pepe pegasasa ae'a? Nogota ina laota ma a'ipipa a'i pepe pegasasa ae', owa'. Nogota bandata si'i awa atitin.
41014038	Ipa' solawaipa pepe pendabeten. Na'amba hiahaom mogogwambipai a' motagamepa. Endilisi ukup ipe'ipi pa'i awima pendabeten, apa' alop owa' banagepa, ala'uta tahepa, ma pendabeten pegalome.”
41014039	Jisas na'ipam na'amba ma ea', a' notanima nafe' nahali' God. Nahali'anama basef ifimba atif nali' nagahali'anamafi.
41014040	Nahali'ana ea' nandambemef notanima nafi'i amom magapoma nati ata' ma'oh atin. Ea' ninimbalom mosafel ma'i, “Atiasi afa' wi'ipana basef maif?” Ambeh lu'wambihi haham ea' ma'oh maga' mafe'.
41014041	Anen nandambema notanima nafe' wapani nahali' God si'i doko' nali' nagahali'ana bif. Ea' notanima nafi'mai amom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' papoma noma'w pa'oh atin? Dei' ipa' koh ea', safel. Dei' nemaf afa'e anona aman a' nifi'i nulumai anom amam awami mufi'i mowa' ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi.
41014042	Safel! A' ofe' uti aman anamba nigihimba'mama ae'i dei' a' nafi'i.”
41014043	Jisas ata' nalutu na'ipam atin, owa' anona aman a' nafi'i. Aman anamba Judas anona amom 12-pelaim ananimi nafi'i nalumai amam hiami mahapila bainagwi belep malomana mafi'i. Amom pris dembami malumai agufumi dembami esis Judai masapa'am mafi'i.
41014044	Ea' aman anamba nagawalapa Jisasi, nali' na'ipam nanda' ametal nihimba'mam na'i, “Atiasi piti aman anamba ae' igasisi'a dalogwanai, ea' Jisas anamba ma'una. Ipa' hapilana pewa'ana andeande' pefa'ana pefe'.”
41014045	Amom ata' mataga atin, owa' Judas nafe'ma Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Tisa dembinai.” Ea' nasisi' dalot Jisasi.
41014046	Ea' amom mowasa' lagof mombalo' Jisas.
41014047	Owa' anona aman nagalutu felefele'ma Jisasi nagiai bainat naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii, natopa' aliga ananigai pele'atowaga gowa.
41014048	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amom boumi na'i, “Ipa' pefa'i bainagwi belep pafi'i pa'i pegewa' anona aman aunai nanda' wal napa' nagaloma gavmani a'a?
41014049	Nimaguf hiafi ae' ape alomepa ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wafi ma esis aman nematawa hiasi, ipa' owa' pembale'ea. Apa' dei' paila basef fagape Baibeli pafi'i pewa'e si'i basef fowa' Faga'ias. Ae' a'i basef ifimba dei' fetaga endilisi a fela gwa'aisi.”
41014050	Ea' alipumi ananimi hiami makwahona mafa' mafe' hi'alam.
41014051	Anona aman sa'unai nagi'ma Jisas nafi'i nowaho' anef lowaf afitifi ea' amom magahapila bainagwi bilipi ma'i mombalo'ana.
41014052	Owa' owa'atin. Anen nakwaha lowaf atef fa'oh a' nafa' nafe' dowaf.
41014053	Amom mofa' Jisas mafe'ma pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii. Anen naloma amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami daiam magawalipasa mu'uli Godi amom hiami mandakolas atogon.
41014054	Ea' Pita ina nalomam atef nafe', owa'. Anen nagigi'mam nafe' nawis indalelemba pris anamba dembinai ea' nape naloma polisman mapoma nif.
41014055	Ea' amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami Juda hiami mugumafi koti ma'i molaoma anis epesa sombaso'am sogasapaga Jisasa anif basefa, mohana nogaga'. Owa', amom ina mati anif, owa'atin.
41014056	Esis hiasi sambaso'mana sasapagana dowaf, apa' ina sa'i endilisifi fafe' atifigin, owa'. Sa'if fandafe' daindai.
41014057	Owa' amom daiam malutu masapagana mambaso'mana ma anif basef na'amba ma'i,
41014058	“Afa' wame' Jisas na'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Ipat Godi lu'unai epes sanda'anai, atiasi ae' igulatana, ma nimaguf wanif a' esa'mana notawa wapani. Apa' ae' ina enda' lagof esa'mana, owa'.’”
41014059	Ea' basef ifimba amom maga'iefi ina ma'i endilisifi fafe' atifigin, owa'. Ma'if fandafe' daindai.
41014060	Ea' pris anamba dembinai nalutu la'afen nahali' Jisas na'amba na'i, “Ina' negwa basef ifimba, a'a owa'? Dei' maina amom maga'ipina basef na'amba?”
41014061	Owa', owa'atin. Jisas nasopama malagol nalutu. Anen ina nagwamana basef anen, owa'. Na'amba pris anamba dembinai nahali'ana wapani na'i, “Ina' Krais aman anamba God nasapa'ena nagafi'ii a'a owa'? Ina' Nogamana God apa' manda' lotumanai, a'a owa'?”
41014062	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Endilisi ae' ma'uwi. Anaf owagama ipa' apiti ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi epe lagol kwahisigili Godi banagewe epe otaga ilif itanimai ifi'i petolowe.”
41014063	Jisas na'ias na'amba owa', pris anamba a' okom wandafuna ea' nahape' lowaf anen nagalafi na'ias na'i, “Apa' ina ata' mofalai anis wapani sifi'i si'i anif basefa anen, owa'atin.
41014064	Anen nanda' God findiwana ea' ifimba apame'ef. Dei' ipa' ukup pape pa'imama?” Ea' amom hiami ma'i anif basef mandame'maef ma'i, “Anen nanda' waf awafi andeande'ma mohana nogaga'.”
41014065	Ea' anom mosafel misisi'wafana masopama naep ananipi mahana ma'ipana ma'i, “Ni'i basef si'i profet newalapa wagahinai ami nahena?” Ea' amom polisman mafi'i mahana a' mofa'ana mafe'.
41014066	-
41014067	Ano'w nemata'w kwanda'mana maol pris anamba dembinai kwafi'i kwati Pita napoma nif ipat ando'. Ea' kwalutu naep do'a anen, kogawana kwa'ipana na'amba kwa'i, “Anina ina' nape nagaloma Jisas Nasaretinai.”
41014068	Ea' Pita nandahali' na'ipa'w na'i, “Owa'. Ae' ina egawa basef kofagefa ina' naga'iefi.” Ea' anen nosafel nafe' felefele'ma indambel uta, anota awata atata.
41014069	Ea' nemata'w akwamba kwatolona kwa'ipas wapani isimba sagalutu felefele'i kwai'pas na'amba kwa'i, “Aman anamba wapani alipunai nagaloma Jisasi.”
41014070	Owa' Pita na'ias wapani na'i, “Ae' ina egawana, ae' owa'.” A'i owa' nogota laota kwasakwasala, owa' anis sagalutu felefele'i sa'ipa Pita wapani sa'i, “Endilisi, ina' alipinai nagaloma amom Jisasi. Ina' wapani aman Galilinai.”
41014071	Dei' Pita nandahali' na'i basef banagafi na'i, “Endilisi ilif, ae' ina egawa aman anamba ipa' paga'ianai, owa'atin.”
41014072	Anen na'ias ea' owa', awata atata bif ea' Pita a' okom mandanda'ma basef doko' Jisas na'ipanaef owambi naga'i, “Awata owa' ata' tota bifa, ina' nembaso'mas ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Owa' negawea.’” Ea' Pita okom mandanda'ma basef ifimba ea' nalef mehip.
41015001	A'i owa' kuhimbita atota amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami daiam Judai a amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, maloma anom Juda dembami mugumafi koti, amom hiami mandakolas maila basef atifif. Amom mowa' Jisas mofa'ana mafe' maso' gavman dembinai Pailat.
41015002	Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' king dembinai Judai a'a owa'?” Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef ifimba ina' naga'iefi endilisifi.”
41015003	Ea' amom pris dembami masapaga Jisasa basef hiafi.
41015004	Na'amba Pailat nahali'ana wapani na'i, “Ina' owa' negwa anif basefa? Ina' neme'. Amom manda'mena basef hiafi ma ina'.”
41015005	Owa' Jisas ina nagwa anif basef wapani, owa'. Na'amba Pailat nomonas salasafe' hiahias.
41015006	Nemaf afamba esis Juda sanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi saga'i Pasovai. Afagof danda ma nemaf afamba danda'afi Pailat nanda'as na'amba. Anen nakwahowa anona nagape kalabusi nafe' wahifina. Aman ami esis amam nematawa saga'ianai, Pailat name'asa nakwahona nafe'mas.
41015007	A'i owa' nogota atamba anona aman nagape kalabusi agilinama Barabas. Anen nanda' kalabus naloma anom amam mapa' magaloma gavmani maha anis sagaga'i.
41015008	Ea' esis hiasi safi'i salutu sofala Pailat sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' nekwahowa anona aman nagape kalabusi nifi'mai apa' wahifina si'i afagof danda nanda'am.”
41015009	Ea' nagwamasa basef na'i, “Dei' ae' ekwahowa king dembinai ipa' nefe'mago ipa', a'a ami?”
41015010	Dei' main, Pailat anen nogawa amom pris dembami kowalama epes hiasi sagaila basef Jisasi ukup aom atom mapomana dei' manda' kotimana.
41015011	Ea' amom masa'ma nomonas amam nematawa hiasi ma sogahali' Pailata nogakwaha Barabas atona nogafi'mai esis.
41015012	Ea' Pailat na'ias wapani na'amba na'i, “Atiasi ipa' pa'i ae' enda'ana i'imamana aman anamba ipa' pegefalona paga'i king dembinai esis Judai?”
41015013	Ea' esis gigal sa'oh mehip sa'i, “Dolana lawag hana noga'.”
41015014	Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Dei' main? Anen nanda' waf maif awafi?” Owa' esis gigal sa'i mehip sa'i, “Dolana lawag hana afuna!”
41015015	Ea' Pailat na'i nila nomonas asasisi. Ea' nakwahowa Barabas nafe'ma esis na'ipa amom soldia ma mogopagaha Jisas mofa'ana mefe'ma mogandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
41015016	Amom soldia mofa' Jisas mawisi ipat gavmani lu'utai. Ea' mofala anom soldia hiami mafi'i munduwa'anima ma anen
41015017	malamana saket akwahitai. Ea' mofa'i anona mandof higatagunai manogana mala'watefana si'i hat mowalo'manana balaga ananigai.
41015018	Ea' malutu manda'ana findiwana ma'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi, ina' king dembinai esis Judai.”
41015019	Ea' amom mahana anota alifita balaga ananigai, misisi'wafana mindiwa nembawa motawa masa'ma agol ananigili dowaf.
41015020	Manda'ana findiwana ma ea', mowalimana saket atamba akwahitai, malamana lowaf ananifi mofa'ana mafe'ma mogandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
41015021	Amom soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' ata' malo ufia'w la'afen, owa' matagama anona aman Saimon, nape wambel ananimbili itap lu'upa Sairini nafi'i. Nogaopana ananimi biam Aleksanderi Rufus. Saimon napani alup nafi'i, na'i nefe' Jerusalem. Owa' amom soldia ma'ipana dindinapa nogofa' lawag Jisasi. Ea' masapa'ana nofa'aga nafe'.
41015022	Ea' mofa' Jisas mafe' mataga anagon agiligima Golgota. Apa' dei' mambemefagol ma'i, Pipitagol Balagaigil.
41015023	Ea' maso'ana anambel embel wain mambemam magaloma anona marasin agilina meri ma nea' embel begahagofa akep lu'wami. Owa' anen ina na'i aho' na'am, owa'. Nandaiwa'mam.
41015024	Ea' mandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ma main, manda' satu ma luwaguf maim ananimi ma ami nigikila'i ma mofa'ef mondondamef atona atin.
41015025	Kuhumbita awin ata' natafi nainaili 9 klok, soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' mandolana lawag agamba.
41015026	Amom mofa' anin pepa basef ifimba doko' amom Juda magasapaga Jisasafi Pailat nanda'ef fagaili fa'i, “Anamba dembinai king esis Judai.” Amom manda' basef ifimba fail balaga Jisasi lawag ilif.
41015027	Felefele'ma Jisas nagaima, amom soldia mandola anom biam manda' waf awafii manda' wali. Amom mandola Jisas nail la'afen, ea' mandola amom biam mail wa'owa'ol.
41015028	[Na'amba si'i anif basef Baibel naga'iefi dei' afataga alihif fandawalap. Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Anaf esis nomonas sopoma anen noloma amom amamba manda' waf awafii.”]
41015029	Ea' anis amam nematawa safi'i kilikila' sagaili sanda' salamala anen, sapapati balagah sa'ias na'amba sa'i, “Awi, ina' aman nigugulata ipat anamba dembinai Godi, ma netanima negasa'mana nimaguf wanifi,
41015030	dei' netopalopa ina' nendatagwah nisila'i.”
41015031	Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi hiami malomam malutu manda'ana findiwana ma'i, “Anen nandatopalopa anis daindaias, apa' dei' ina natopalopa anen, owa'atin.
41015032	I'i aman anamba Krais Dembinai esis Israeli, anen nokwaha lawag nisila'i ma motolona mogahapifana.” Amom biam sandolam magaloma Jisasi wapani manda'ana findiwana ma basef awafi.
41015033	Awin nandasapa' akot lu'unai a' nataga itap hiagoma esis Judai akotigin. Akot a' nape nafe' nafe' ma awin nandambema 3 klok wambomota. Ea' awin nataga negala' wapani.
41015034	Awin nandambema 3 klok, Jisas noga na'i mehip na'i, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” Apa' mambemef ma'ias na'amba ma'i, “God ae'inai, God ae'inai, dei' maina ina' nagakwahowe?”
41015035	Anis epes salutu felefele' same' anen na'ias na'amba sa'i, “Peme'. Anen nofala anona profet Elaija.”
41015036	Ea' anona aman nasagih nafe' nofa' anom mosong magape naohi nalam mowala embel wainimbel numbutimbeli nagiam nasapa'am anagol bagol nandowam mafe'ma Jisas noga' embel. Ea' aman anamba na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' ata' ota' atiasi muti Elaija nifi'i notagwahona nisila'i a'a owa'?”
41015037	Ea' Jisas galala mehip ea' naga' dogw.
41015038	Ea' dei' anona lowaf lu'unai si'i utai negetaol ipat Godi lu'unai nomoni palalana gani ilif nowala itap nataga biafina.
41015039	Ea' kepten anamba dembinai nugumafi soldia hiamii, nalutu felefele'ma Jisas nati anen naga' na'amba ea' na'ias na'i, “Endilisi atis, aman anamba nogamana Godi.”
41015040	Ea' anowa nematawa walutuwi laogon wagatologinii awamba. Ano'w Maria Makdalai'wi a ano'w agol atogol Maria ma'ma Joses naloma Jems sa'unai a' ano'w Salome.
41015041	Fowa' Jisas ata' nagape Galili, awo wagawagaila anini ma wagatopalopana ma anis hiahawea gwa'aisi mais. Anowa hiawai wapani walomana ondondowasa' Jerusalem.
41015042	-
41015043	A'i owa' wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Josep Arimateainai nafi'i. Anen dembinai ma kot esis Judai, agol lu'wagilinai. Nape nohafa nemaf bu'wafi fegataga ma hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Dei' sanda' hiahaom gwa'aisi mais dumbulidombola naman nemaf afamba sabat fegataga. Ea' Josep nafe' nawis nalutu naep Pailati. Anen ina ombal mahana, owa'. Nahali'ana ma nofa'i alop Jisasi nogawana.
41015044	Na'amba Pailat agogolalasona okom ma'i Jisas ina dei' a' afuna endilisi, ata' owa'. Ea' nofala anona dembinai soldia nafi'i nahali'ana na'amba na'i, “Jisas a' naga' ea' a'a owa'?”
41015045	Soldia anamba na'ipana na'i, “Jisas a' naga' endilisi ea'.” Ea' Pailat na'ipa Josep na'i, “Dao' ina' nefe' nefa' alop Jisasi.”
41015046	Fowa' anis sanda' anota matmat sagwasa otam lu'unai nagal nawis nomon. Ea' dei' Josep na'i nowa Jisas matmat atamba. Ea' nafe' notala anona lowaf afitinai nafi'i natagwaha alop Jisasi nisila'i ma nanda' lowaf anamba nowa'ana ma ea', nasapa'ana nawis matmat atamba nalana nomon. Ea' nambema anona otam lu'unai nafe' nowalo uta matmat atamba.
41015047	Anowa nematawa biawa Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Maria ma'ma Josesi, awo walutu watologon wati anamba Josep nagawa Jisasa.
41016001	Nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi afafe' hi'alaf, Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Maria ma'ma Jemsi waloma Salome watala anom wel alogw fasifasimi maga'ami. Awo wa'i ofa'am ofe' ondisa alop Jisasi.
41016002	Wafilu nemaf Sande, kuhimbita atota awo ofa' wel alamba wafe' matmat.
41016003	Awo ata' wafe' atin ufia'w, wanda'ipama na'amba wa'i, “Atiasi ami netopalopafa nelefata otam anamba nogowalo utai?”
41016004	Ea' watologon owa', wati otam amamba lu'unai ina ata' mape mowalo uta, owa'. Anin epen a' nafe' nawisi'am mafe' ma'oh wa'ol.
41016005	Awo wawis matmat nomon, wati anona aman sa'unai tol nape uta wa'ol lagol kwahisigilima. Nala anona lowaf launai afitinai. Na'amba awo gogolalasowa kwapete' ombel mahawa.
41016006	Ea' anen na'ipawa na'amba na'i, “Ipa' ina a' ombel mehepa, owa'i. Ae' egawepa ipa' pa'i pifi'i pelaoma Jisas Nasaretinai, esis sandolana naga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Anen a' notanima nosafel ea', ina ata' nape na'a, owa'. Ipa' piti na'a sofa'ana sawisi salana nagalama. Dei' a' wafigin nape.
41016007	Ea' ipa' fo'o pi'ipa alipumi ananimi ea' pi'ipa Pita nalomam na'amba pi'i, ‘Jisas a' nali'ipa nafe' itap apamba Galili. Ipa' pefo'o petolona si'i nimbewa' naga'ipipa.’”
41016008	Ea' wakwaha matmat wawisi ando' a' wafa' wafe'. Awo ombel mahawa wanda'am bombol atin. Ea' awo ina wa'ipasa basefa anis epes, owa'atin.
41016009	[Jisas notanima nosafel Sande kuhimbita atona, ea' nali' natagama Maria Makdalai'wi, fowa' nagatofama'wa ambagof awami 7-pelaim magapau'wi.
41016010	Ako'w kwafe' anagon alipumi Jisasi magapoma. Nomonas amamisi nimanis a'owa', mape malef.
41016011	Ea' kwa'ipam kwa'i, “Ae' ati Jisas a' notanima nosafel wapani nape namona.” Amom mame' basef ifimba ako'ufi, apa' ina mahapifa'w, owa'.
41016012	A'i owa' main, anom alipumi Jisasi biam makwaha wambel lu'wagoma maila ufia'w kwagafe' alupi mafe'. Ea' Jisas nandati na'a nafe' natagamam.
41016013	Amom biam matolona motanima mafe' mawalapa basef ifimba ma alipumi du'wanim magapanii, apa' amom ina mahapifam, owa'atin.
41016014	A'i owa' main, alipumi 11-pelaim Jisasi mape ma' gwa'aisi atin, Jisas nafe' natagamam. Nimbewa' anis satolona notanima nogosafel wapani ea' sa'ipamana, apa' owa'. Amom ina mahapifas ma'i sa'i endilisi, owa'. Ma'i owa' sambaso'mam atin. Ea' Jisas nanda' megahaham.
41016015	Ea' na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Ipa' pefe' walemb hiagoma pi'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi ma amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas.
41016016	Epes ami sagahapifai sofa' baptais, anaf God a' notanima nofa'asi wapani ea' ananisi. Apa' isimba owa' sogahapifaea, anaf God a' nonda'mas kota basef lu'wafi ma waf awafi esis sanda'afi.
41016017	God atiasi nonda' esis isimba sogahapilafi banagesa sonda' anom hiahaom banagami si'i anen nanda'ami. Ea' sohali' ae' ma esis banagesa sigali'amona ambagof awami magapaisi, a si'i anona diga hianai dambainai.
41016018	Ea' sohapila uguf fagahasi lagof asasimi apa' ina a' fohas soga', owa'. Ea' soga' embel numbutimbeli wapani, esis ina a' soga', owa'. Apa' anis owa' sogahapifaea, soga' embel ambalimbai, a' soga'. Ea' atiasi esis isimba sogahapifai sosa lagofa anis aowas nanda'asi ambo'wes wapani.”
41016019	Dembinai Jisas nawalipas na'ipas ea', God nofa'ana nalota heven. Ea' nofa' agol lu'wagili nape lagol kwahisigili Godi banagagili.
41016020	Ea' alipumi ananimi a' mafe' ganimba walemba hiagoma mawalapa basef Godi. Anen nowa' banagama manda' maol banagani si'i God nanda'ani. Anis daias sati maol inimba sa'i, “Endilisi atis, God natopalopama basef bu'wafi endilisi.” Basef ifimba ea' ma'uf.]
42001001	O dembinai Tiofilus, fowa' amam hiami manda' basef hiafi faila hiahaom hiami God nanda'am magataga la'afena afa'i, amom ukup patapeamb manda'ef fagaili.
42001002	Fowa' dambadamba Jisas nasefela maol nanda'an anom alipumi ananimi mati hiahaom amamba naep amamipi dei' mawalipapa basef ifimba ea' anom daiam manda'ef fail.
42001003	Ae' ahali' anisa maol inimba, afi'i afi'i dei' anda'ef andeande' si'i fowa' fagataga. Anom daiam mihimba'mef dei' ae' egawa basef kofagefa. Isimba atis dei' ae' ilagon andeande'ma enda' anif basef fegafe'mago ina' dembinai Tiofilus.
42001004	Anda'efa ina' negegawa basef ifimba kofagefa esis sagawalipinafi endilisifi atif.
42001005	Nemaf afamba anona king Herot dembinai ma gavmani nugumafi anis epes sagape anep itap lu'upa Judiai, anona aman pris nape, agilinama Sekaraia. Anen anep mini'ap amom anona aman dembinai fowa'inai Abiya. Sekaraia waulu'mana Elisabet. Ako'w kwagataga wambota anona aman Erani.
42001006	Esis bias Sekaraiai Elisabet sape usi'isa naep Godi saila mu'uli ananini hiani hi'alan. Ea' saila basef Godi andeande' datima, kofagema akas.
42001007	Apa' Elisabet asa'w ea' esis bias awasi akas, ahages ea'.
42001008	Nogota atamba amom mini'ap Sekaraiai nemaf amamifi fataga ma monda' maol, ea' Sekaraia nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nanda' maol nondolalima God.
