42001009	Amom pris maila waf amamifi mandandepana ma nogawis ipat anamba nomon nogaofa hiahaom amamba nogoh alogw fasigwi gwagami.
42001010	Nogota atamba anen nawis nagaofam, esis amam nematawa hiasi sunduwa'anima sape sandabeten ando'.
42001011	Ea' Sekaraia nati anona ensel dembinai Godi nataga nalutu belita wa'ol lagol kwahisigilima. Belita atamba amom pris mondolalima Goda hiahaom amamba alogw fasigwi gwaga'ami.
42001012	Ea' Sekaraia natolona agogolalasana ombel mahana nomonas salasafe'ma ensel anamba.
42001013	Owa' ensel anamba na'ipana na'amba na'i, “Sekaraia, ina ombel mehena, owa'i. God name'enama beten ine'ini ea'. Waulu'mina ine'ikwi Elisabet namanani akola anin awani aman ine'ini. Ea' ina' nefalana agol ananigili Jon.
42001014	Nembel ine'imbili atiasi nepe andeande' sonohenama awani inimba. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi wapani asonohasa awani inimba nagataga.
42001015	Dei' main, anin anaf netaga dambeni agol lu'wagili ma naep Dembinaii. Anin ina nea' embel wainimbel beloma embel banagami, owa'atin. Anin ata' nagape opaf ma'manai, Ambal bu'unai Godi napain si'in nowa' banagan.
42001016	Anaf anin netaga damben negambema amam nematawa hiasi Israeli ma nefa'as sotanimai sogafe'ma God Dembinai asasinai.
42001017	Anin a' nili' nefe'ma Dembinai nefa' banagami Godi ma nenda' maol ananini si'i fowa' Elaija nofa'ama nanda'an. Ea' nembema nelelemb ahapasi befe'ma awasi ma esis nomonas sondaima atin. Ea' nembema epes isimba sogosambala basef Godii ma sogofa' nomonas fasisi si'i epes bu'wasi ma netopalopas nenda'as sondandombol sogapoma Dembinai nogafi'i.”
42001018	Ea' Sekaraia nahali' ensel anamba na'i, “Ae' atiasi iti ametal maila egegawa basef ifimba fegataga endilisi? Ae' hagewe ea' waulu'mi wapani ea' hage'w.”
42001019	Ea' ensel nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' Gebriel, agalutu naep Godi. Anen atona nasapa'e afi'i a'ipina basef ifimba fasifi.
42001020	Ea' ina' a' name', apa' ina' owa' nihapila basef ae'afia. Ea' dei' malogol ine'igili agese'ena, ina atiasi ni'i, owa'atin. A' nefe' nefe' netagama hiahawes isimba ae' aga'iasi sogataga. Basef ifimba ae'afi atiasi fetaga na'amba atin anef nemaf God naga'iefi.”
42001021	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sape sohafa Sekaraia ando' nomonas sandanda' sa'i, “Nogota laota main natagamana ipat lu'unai Godi nomon?”
42001022	Ama nawisi ando' owa', ina na'i anif basefa esis, owa'. Na'amba esis sogawana sa'i anen nati anom maefah mandati na'ai ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuma nomon. Ea' anen nape nanda'masa lagol atogol na'ipasa hiahawes, apa' malogol ananigili agaso'ana gape.
42001023	Ama maol Sekaraiai hi'alan, notanima nafe' wambel ananimbili.
42001024	A'i owa' main, waulu'mana anani'wi Elisabet a' opafu'w. Ea' kwandambaho' atin kwape ipat aomb wanemb biamb a kwa'i na'amba kwa'i,
42001025	“Dei' Dembinai okom maimaili ma nagatopalope na'amba. Fowa' ae' asawe, ambal ae'anai aona ma esis amam nematawa apa' dei' a' owa'atin.”
42001026	Elisabet ea' opafu'wa aomb wanemb biamb ea', dei' anin wapani a' wanemb wanemb. Dei' God nasapa' ensel anamba Gebriel nafe' anambel wambel Nasaret bagape itap lu'upa Galilii.
42001027	Wambel ambalemba ano'w nemata'w sa'ukwi aiawai'wi kwape, agol akwa'ugili Maria. Ina dei' kwaso' anona aman, ata' owa'. Dei' sandandepa'wa kogaso' anona aman agilinama Josep. Aman anamba nagataga wambota atamba akunamana dembinai Deviti.
42001028	Ea' ensel anamba nafe'ma ako'w na'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi, nemata'w. Dembinai God okom maimailina a'owa'. Anen nofalo'mena nape nalomena dondol numafina.”
42001029	Maria kwame' basef ifimba nomonas akwa'usi a' nimanis endilisi. Okom akwa'umi mandanda' ma'i, “Kofagefa fa'i main?”
42001030	Ea' ensel anamba na'ipa'w na'i, “Maria, ina ombel mohena, owa'i. Okom Godi bo'onama ina'.
42001031	-
42001032	Ina' neme'. Atiasi ina' upafina a' nela anin awani aman. Ea' nenda'mana agol Jisas. Anin anaf a' nepe aman dembeni, sosa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Ea' si'i anen Nogamana God nagape ilifi. Anaf dembinai God a' nonda' awani inimba nepe dembinai king si'i fowa' gani Devit nagape king. Devit anen wambota atamba dei' awani inimba nagatagatai.
42001033	Anin anaf nepe dembinai king numafi mini'ap Jekopi lifilafi. Anin atin nepe damben atapin lifilafi anamba anin nagala'ambemagoma.
42001034	Ea' Maria kwa'ipa ensel anamba kwa'i, “Amamba motaga mi'imama? Ae' ina dei' aso' anona aman, ata' owa'atin.”
42001035	Ea' ensel anamba nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Ambal bu'wali Godi nifi'mai ina', banagami God nagape ilifi moso'alina. Ea' dei' awani inimba atiasi negalani anin bo'wen hilili'i. Ea' esis atiasi sosa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol sofalana si'i anin Nogamana Godi.
42001036	Neme', amani'mina ine'ikwi Elisabet ako'w hage'w ea', owa' dei' a' opafu'w. Fowa' esis sa'i, ‘Ako'w asa'wi’, apa' dei' ako'w a' opafu'w aomb wanemb wanemb akwa'umbi a' bafe' ea'.
42001037	Owa' anom maefah ahifima God nonda'ama, owa'atin.”
42001038	Ea' Maria kwagwamana kwa'i, “Ae' ape anda' maol Dembinaii. Ae' a'i anen nonda'meas si'i ina' naga'i.” Ensel anamba na'ipa'w na'amba ma ea', nakwaho'w a' nafe'.
42001039	Afamba Maria kosafel kwafalis kondowasa' anambel wambel bagape halafutagwi anep itap lu'upa Judiai,
42001040	kwafe' kwawis ipat Sekaraiai kwanda'ma'wa nemaf bu'wafi Elisabet.
42001041	Elisabet kwame' Maria ata' kwanda'ma'wa gude atin, awani Elisabati fete' atin nape opaf akwa'ufi nomon. Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi si'inama ako'w,
42001042	koga kwa'i mehip kwa'i, “God nofalo'mena nanda'ena dagalaina endilisi. Dagala ine'ini nikila' dagala anowa daiawa ogofa'ani. Ea' awani inimba atiasi nigalani, anin wapani God nofalo'man nonda'an sonohan.
42001043	Ae' gogolalasowe ma God okom bo'oma ae' nanda'e sonagahe ma nanda' ina' ma'ma Dembinai ae'anai nagafi'mai ae'.
42001044	Neme', aligah ae'agahi ata' hame' nemaf bu'wafi ine'ifi atin, owa' batawin nagape opaf ae'afii sonahan afete' atin nape.
42001045	Ina' a' dagalaina endilisi, nagahapila basef Dembinai naga'ipinafi atiasi a' fetaga na'amba atin si'i anen nali' naga'ipina.”
42001046	Ea' Maria kwanda' anof awaf kwa'i, “Ae' a'i basefa anen Dembinai asa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Okom ae'ami mapoma basef ifimba
42001047	ma God nofa'e egetanimai. Dei' sonahe ma anen.
42001048	Dei' main? Ae' nemata'w anda' maola anini, ae' falafuwai, owa' anen a' okom mapoma ae' natopalope. Ipa' peme'. Dei' atapiwi epe anaf owagama wapani hiasi tagahafel sogapani amam nematawa esis sofale si'i, ‘Dembinai God natopalope nagase'e dagala.’
42001049	God banagona a'owa' nanda'me hiahaom banagami ma ae' ea' agol ananigili lu'wagol gape hilili' atapigil.
42001050	Okom uwahipimi ananimi magape atapima epes mamahisa ombel mahasa sa'i sogagi'ma anini. Ea' mape atapim maloma epes isimba ea' sope na'amba atin dei' awasi bafas ihas anaf sigi' sogatagai.
42001051	Lagol ananigili nanda' hiahaom banagami. Ea' ukup asasipi saga'i esis atis agof lu'wagufi a' nali'amonas safa' safe' gani gani daindaiagon.
42001052	Anen natalogofa amom king dembami ea' nasa'ma agofa isimba agof akasi.
42001053	Anen naso'asa hiahaom fasimi ma isimba nolomagahasa waf fasifii, apa' epes isimba hiahaom hiamisi, natofam mafe' dowaf.
42001054	-
42001055	Anen okom mapoma basef fowa' nala' lap nagaloma bafapapa akupapafi. Basef ifimba fowa' na'ipa Abraham naloma wambota ananisi owagama sigi' sogatagai. Ama owagama nigati esis owahipisa nogatopalopas lifilafi. Anen nagatopalopa apa' Israel manda' maol ananinii.”
42001056	Ea' kwape kwaloma Elisabet aumb wanemb. A'i owa' main, akutanima kwafe' wambel akwa'umbili.
42001057	Nemaf afamba fataga ea' Elisabet kogola awani aman.
42001058	Esis wambel atembel ambep atep ako'w Elisabeti a sogawa Dembinai nati uwahipi'w endilisi ma kogola awani inimba. Ea' esis sandagala saloma'w.
42001059	Nimaguf 7-pelaif afafe' falo'wan ea', nemaf fagafe'ma 8i, esis safi'i sa'i siti amom mogatopa'mana alop ananipi, ea' esis sa'i sofalana agol Sekaraia si'i ahamana.
42001060	Owa' ma'amana kwa'i, “Owa'. Apa' monda'mana anagol agol Jon.”
42001061	Ea' esis sa'ipa'w sa'i, “Owa', anis ambep ine'ipi tagasi ina anis sanda' agol agalemba Jon, owa'atin.”
42001062	Ea' sanda' lagof atogof sahali' ahamana sa'i anen na'i nonda'mana agol maigil nogamana.
42001063	Anen nanda' logof atogof na'ipas sofa'ai anota selet, a nonda' agol nogamanai. Ea' nanda'agol na'i, “Agol ananigili Jon.” Ea' esis agogolalasis kwapete'.
42001064	Anen ata' nanda' agol atin owa', a' noga na'i malogol ananigili, afega ananigai agiawi andeande', nandagala nasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.
42001065	Ea' hiasi esis wambel atembel ananimbili ombel mahas. Ea' dei' hiahawes isimba gatis safe'agon hi'alagon walemb ambalemba bagape halafutagw itap lu'upa Judiai.
42001066	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi same' basefa hiahawes isimbai, ukup asasipi pandanda' pafe' sa'i, “Anaf awani inimba nepe ni'imama? Anin atiasi a' netaga aman dambeni endilisi.” Esis sogawa banagami Dembinaii mape malomana.
42001067	Awani inimba Jon ahamana Sekaraia, Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'ina anen ea' nawalapa basef Godi si'i amom profet fowa' maga'ipasef na'i,
42001068	“Ae' a'i apa' mosa'ma agol Godi Dembinai lu'wagol, God apa' Israeli anen nafi'i natopalopa apa' amam nematawa ananipai. Ea' natalepa magakwaha waf awafi apa' manda'afi.
42001069	Ea' nandandepa anona aman banagonai atiasi nofa'apa nokwahamapa waf awafi mogotanimai. Fowa' gani Devit nanda' maol Godi, apa' dei' aman anamba nofa'apa mogotanimai, anen akunamana Deviti.
42001070	Basef ifimba si'i fowa' gani nagawalapefa amom profet bu'wami ananimi maga'if malogof amamugufi.
42001071	Ma'i anaf anen nofa'apa mokwaha lagof esis bousi ape'isi soloma epes isimba ukup aom endilisi ma ape'i.
42001072	Fowa' anen na'i anaf a' niti akusapa ape'isi fowa'isi uwahipis notopalopas. Ea' anen okom mopoma basef bu'wafi fowa' nagala' lapafi. Anen ina atiasi ni'i anif daif, owa'.
42001073	Anen na'i basef ifimba endilisifi atif naga'if banagafi ma akunamapa ape'inai Abraham. Ea' dei' na'if na'amba atin si'i fowa' naga'ias.
42001074	Anen na'i notagwahepa ma lagof esis bousi ape'isi ma monda'mana maol ananini, apa' ina a' ombal mohapa, owa'.
42001075	Apa' mope itap apa'e monda' maol ananini nimaguf hiafi danda mofe' mofe' motagama mogaga'. Ma nogohnaep ananisi monda' maol inimba ma waf ananifi usi'if hilili'i.
42001076	“Ea' ina', awani ae'inai, basef ine'ifi ifimba. Anaf God a' ni'i ina' profet nanda' maola God nagape ilifi. Ama atiasi ina' nefe' nigali'ma Dembinai negandombamana ufia'w anani'wi.
42001077	Ama negawalipa amam nematawa ananisi nogakwahowa waf awafi asasifi. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma sogogawa anen nofa' esis sogotanimai.
42001078	God ape'inai nati esis uwahipis a'owa' dei' nakwahamasa waf awafi asasifi. Anen atiasi nosapa'i mogogala'i magape heveni mifi'mai apa' mope atapim.
42001079	Ama mogogala'ma epes sagape akoti, a isimba ga' na'i nogatagamasi. Anen nisindi'amona apa' ma mogafe' ufia'w opalef awanelefa'wi.”
42001080	A'i owa' main, awani inimba nataga lu'win banagona ea' okom ananimi a' nogawa. Anen nape itap wafigima epes akagoma nape nape ma nemaf afamba nataga nandawalap alihinama naep esis Israeli.
42002001	Anef nemaf anona aman gavman dembinai esis Romi Sisar Ogastus nagape, nanda' anin mu'uli gavmani na'amba. Anen na'i nofa' agofa esis amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilasa fugail buk gavmani.
42002002	Afamba dambadamba anen nali' nogofa' agof. Afamba anona aman Sairinias nagape gavman dembinai ma anep itap Siria.
42002003	Isimba atis amam nematawa hiasi safe' wambel kofagama asasimbili ma sonda' agof asasigufi.
42002004	Josep anona aman anamba anep ambep esimbel Deviti. Anen nakwaha Nasaret nagape anep itap lu'upa Galilii, ea' nondowasa' nafe' wambel Deviti Betlehem. Wambel ambalemba bagape anep itap lu'upa Judia.
42002005	Ea' Josep nafe' naloma ano'w nemata'w Maria, esis sandandepana'w sa'i nogaso'akwi ma esis bias sonda' agof asasigufi. Ea' ako'w opafu'w.
42002006	Esis bias ata' sapani atin wambel Betlehem, owa' nemaf ako'w kogolanafi a' fataga.
42002007	Ea' kwali' kola awani aman ako'uni nagali'i. Ipat esis hiasi sakolata sagapautai asi'ita a'owa'. Ea' dei' kwanda' lowaf kwasala'uf kwala anin na'oh nomon bokis gwa'aisi bulmakauwi sagalama.
42002008	Felefele'ma wambel ambalemba anom amam mugumafi sipsipi mape wa'ol otalef walol mogotaoma mumafi sipsip mape owamb.
42002009	Owa' anona ensel nafi'i nalumai mogogala'i Dembinaii, mogala' mala'ambema amom ea' ombal maham endilisi.
42002010	Owa', ensel anamba na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Peme', ae' ifa'mipai basef bu'wafi ipa', ifimba fenda' amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas sonogahas endilisii.
42002011	Dei' nemaf afa'e ano'w nemata'w kwagape Betlehem wambel Deviti kola anin awani aman. Anen aman anamba nokwahomepa waf awafi nofa'epa pigitanimai. Anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, Dembinai.
42002012	Ipa' pefe' piti awani inimba pegegawan na'amba. Piti sanda' lowaf kwasala'uf sowa'an salan na'oh bokis isimba sagala gwa'aisi bulmakauwi sagalama.”
42002013	Ensel anamba na'ias na'amba ma ea', owa' kwafalis anom ensel hiami banagami misila'i gani heven mataga maloma ensel anamba ea' mandagala mafela agol Godi ma'i,
42002014	“Apa' masa'ma agol God nagape gani ilif endilisii lu'wagol. Banagami mogogala'i ananimi atom. Ea' epes ami sagape itapi God okom bo'oma esisi, nelelemb asasilimbi bepe awanelemb.”
42002015	Ea' amom ensel makwaha amom mugumafi sipsipi motanima malota heven. Ea' amom mugumafi sipsipi manda'ipama atin ma'i, “Wale, ata' ofe' Betlehem uti hiahaom amamba Dembinai nigihimba'mafami.”
42002016	Ea' mosafel kwafalis mafe' mati Maria kwaloma Josep sape. Awani salan na'oh bokis nomon sagala gwa'aisi bulmakauwi sagalama.
42002017	Amom matilin ea' mawalapa basef ensel naga'ipamafi ma awani inimba.
42002018	Ea' amam nematawa asame' basef ifimba amom maga'iefi, esis hiasi same' basef ifimba agogolalasis ea' nomonas hiahawes sapomef.
42002019	Apa' Maria kwame' basef ifimba hiafi nomonas sapomef fape okom akwa'umi.
42002020	Ea' amam amamba motanima mafe' masa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol ma'i anen Dembinai bu'winai. Amom sonahama hiahaom amamba hiami mame'am magatulumi, a' mataga si'i ensel maga'ipamami.
42002021	A'i owa' nemaf fagafe'ma 8i fataga, nemaf afamba amom ma'i motopa'mana alop awani. Ea' matopa'mana alop awani inimba amani. Ea' sofalana agol Jisas si'i ensel nali' naga'ipa'wagili nogota atamba owa' ata' kogofa' opafa.
42002022	Nemaf afamba fataga ea' ma esis sonda' awani inimba noloma ma'mana sondolali sonda' ofa sowando' alogwa sogataga bo'wes si'i basef fagail mu'uli inimba fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani faga'ias. Ea' esis mamasana sao'wana safe' sondowasa' Jerusalema sogaso'ana awani inimba Dembinai Goda nogohnaep ananisi.
42002023	Esis sanda'as na'amba si'i basef fagape buk Baibeli faga'iasa mu'uli Dembinaii fa'i, “Awasi amam amamba mamahoma wali' dambadamba ogolami, amamba ipa' pefalam pi'i amom dembinai Godi atom.”
42002024	Esis bias sa'i sondolalima God sagi'ma basef fagail mu'uli inimba Dembinai na'ipa Moses naga'i, “Esis bias sofa' amiguf ma'unamb biamb, a'a sofa' mefagof sa'ugufi biagof.” Sofa'as sanda'as na'amba.
42002025	-
42002026	Ea' anona aman nagape Jerusalami agilinama Simeon. Anen nagagi'ma waf fasifi Godi nagape hilili'i. Anen nape nasasa nogota atamba God nifi'i notopalopa esis Israel nogakwaha akafimi asasimi. Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nape okom ananimi nihimba'mana anen ina atiasi noga' ulal, owa'. Anen ata' nope niti Krais, Dembinai nandandepana nosapa'ana nogafi'ii.
42002027	Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'mana nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi. Ea' esis mamasa Jisasi sao'wana safi'i sondolalimana si'i mu'uli Godi naga'ias.
42002028	Ea' Simeon nandalombasana lagof ananigufi nanifela God nasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol na'ias na'amba na'i,
42002029	“O Dembinai, ae' anda' maola ine'i. Dei' ina' kwahowae nomonas sope sa'ombel a' ega' efo'o si'i basef ifimba fowa' naga'iefi.
42002030	Naep ae'api atilin ea' awani aman inimba ina' nasapa'ana nafi'i nuwambilapa nokwahomapa waf awafi mogotambilii. Na'amba dei' ina' nekwahowa ae' a' ega' efo'o.
42002031	Ina' nanda' awani inimba dumbulidombola amam nematawa hiasi sogatolona.
42002032	Anen si'i anona nogogala'i nogogala'ma epes isimba sogololama Godi nigihimba'mas. Ama nonda' amam nematawa ine'isi Israel sogofa' agof lu'wagufi.”
42002033	Ea' mamasana Jisasi agogolalasis nomonas salasafe'ma basef ifimba Simeon naga'iefi.
42002034	Simeon na'ipas basef fasifi nowa' banagas ea' na'ipa ma'mana Jisasi na'amba na'i, “Ina' neme'. Awani inimba God nandandepan ea' ma nogohambombaga anis amam nematawa Israel sogowa' alafugaha anini. Apa' anis daias nofa'as sokwaha waf awafi sigafi'mai anini. Anen si'i anol ametal God nanda'ali ma anis hiasi sonda'mana du'waniga sondaiwa'ma basef ananifii.
42002035	Awani inimba napoma negawalapa nomonas hiasi sape sandambahi'i sogataga alihis. Maria, ina' atiasi a' okom nimanim si'i anona bainat hikalinai nogatopa' okom ine'imi.”
42002036	Ea' ano'w nemata'w profet agili'wa Ana. Ahama'w ako'unai Fanyuel. Ambep akunama'wi Aser. Ako'w ahage'w a'owa'. Fowa' kwaso' aman kwalomana sape afagof 7-pelaiguf.
42002037	A'i owa' main, waulunama'w a' naga'. Ea' kwape dowaf, kwafe' kwafe' dei' afagof akwa'ugufi fataga 84-pelaiguf. Ako'w ina kwa'waha ipat lu'unai Godi anif nimaguf, owa'atin. Ako'w kololama gwa'aisi kwape kwandabeten ea' kwanda' lotu kwahapila maol Godi kwanda'an kwafe' owamb alip.
42002038	Nemaf afamba atef ako'w kwafi'i anamba Simeoni Josep Maria sagalutuma kwanifela God. Anis wapani sagalutu na'ambai sape sogohafa nemaf afamba God nogatopalopa esis sagape Jerusalami sogape wahifis. Ea' ako'w wapani kwa'ipas basefa awani inimba.
42002039	Esis Josepi Maria sanda'as sagi'mas ea' maol inimba si'i Dembinai fowa' naga'iasa mu'uli ananini ea' sotanima safe' Nasaret asasima kofagama. Wambel anamba bape anagon itap lu'upa Galili.
42002040	Ea' awani Jisas andambena a' nataga banagona ma gawa hiani lu'wani. Ea' God okom maimailana natopalopana nowa' banagona.
42002041	Afagof danda mamasana Jisasi sondowasa' safe' Jerusalema esis Juda sanda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi sofalas saga'i Pasovai.
42002042	Afagof Jisasi dei' afataga 12-pelaiguf falo'wana ea' sao'wana sondowasa' Jerusalem saila waf asasifi si'i afagof danda sanda'afi.
42002043	Ama nimaguf ifimba Pasovaefi a' fafe'ma hi'alef, esis mamasana sotanima safe'. Apa' sa'unai ina nafe' nalomas, owa'. Asakwahona napani Jerusalem. Esis ina sogawa anen napani, owa'.
42002044	Sa'i owa' a' nali' nafe' naloma anis daias safe'. Esis asafe' anef nemaf si'ifi hi'alaf, ea' asala naepa anen solaomana la'afena esis wambota atota saloma esis alipisi.
42002045	Esis mamasana solaomana lawa lawa sati owa'atin, ea' sotanima safe' Jerusalem solaomana.
42002046	Esis bias solaomana safe' nimaguf wanif ahi'alef. A'i owa' main, asatolona nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi. Anen nape naloma amom gawaimi magawalipasa mu'uli Godii. Nape nagahembe'ma basef amamifi atapina ea' nahali'amef.
42002047	Amom dembami maloma esis hiasi same' basef ananifi, agogolalasisa basefi gawa ananini nagagwamama basef amom.
42002048	Ea' mamasana satolona nape la'afena amom dambedambena nalomam mape ea' gogolalasis kwapete'. Ea' ma'mana kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Nogame, dei' maina nanda' isimbai ma afa'? Ahamena naloma ae' opalef afa'ilifi a' nimanilif a'owa' ma ogolaomena.”
42002049	Ea' anen nagwamas na'ipas na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' bipa pala' pelaome pagafe' hi'agalagon? Ae' dei' ape anda' maol ipat ahame Godi, isimba ipa' pegawas a'a owa'?”
42002050	Owa' esis ina sogawa basef anen naga'ipasafi kofagefa, owa'atin.
42002051	Ea' Jisas nafe' naloma esis bias asiliana Nasaret, name' esis dondol naila malogof asasigufi. Ea' ma'mana anani'wi okom mapoma basefa hiahawes isimba sagatagama awani akwa'uni fape okom akwa'umi.
42002052	Jisas ea' nataga dambena. Ea' gawa ananini nataga lu'win andeande' fasin, ea' God naloma epes wapani sagatolona ambo'ona a'owa'.
42003001	Anagol afagol anona gavman dembinai esis Romi Taiberius Sisar nagape dembinai ma itap lu'upa hiagoma esis Romi afagof 14-pelaiguf hi'alagofa anagol wapani, gagafe'ma 15-pelaigufi, Pontius Pailat ata' nape dembinai gavmana walemb hielimbi agol Judia. Anona aman Filip nape gavman dembinai numafi itap apamba lu'upa Ituriai Trakonitis walemb hielimbi. Ea' owamana ananinai Herot ata' nape dembinai numafi walemb hielimbi agol Galili. Anona aman Lisanias nape dembinai gavman numafi hiagoma agol lu'wagola Abileneai.
42003002	Ea' afagol agalemba atogol Anasi Kaiafas amom biam pris dembami mape magali'ma pris hiamii. Nogota atamba ma afagol agalemba basef Godi fafi'mai Jon, Sekaraia nogamana. Anen nape anep itap wafigima epes akagoma, nemaf afamba basef Godi fafi'mai anen.
42003003	Ea' nafe' anamba hiagoma walemb Jordan na'ipasa basef Godi amam ne matawa. Na'ipasa sombema nelelemb sowa' alafugaha waf awafi sofa' baptais embela God nokwahomasa waf awafi asasifi okom mogaso'anaf.
42003004	Anen nawalapa basef ifimba Godi si'i profet Aisaia fowa' nawalapef nanda'ef fagail buk Baibeli faga'i, “Anep itap wafigima fataupigima, malogol anona amani anaf noga ni'i, ‘Pendondomba ufia'w Dembinaii, penda' ufiawa ofe' usi'iwa.
42003005	Pesa anamba kwambiwah afogoma ma si'igin dondo' atin, petopa' halafutagw laumi bandami hiami ma mowala dondo'am. Dilindila'ma penda'agon usi'igin. Ea' ufiawa awamba wanda' lotasila'i sonda'awa andeande'.
42003006	Amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas anaf siti God nogatopalopa anis amam nematawa nofa'as nokwahomas waf awafi nowambelas sugutanimai.’”
42003007	Hiasi amam nematawa safi'mai Jon ama sa'i nogapisi'as embel. Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' panda' waf awafii, si'i batawis ul aunaii logolaipai. Ami na'ipipa ma pa'i pefa' pefe' pindihi'ama okom wandafunai Godi anaf na'i nogatagama ipe'i?
42003008	Apa' dei' a'ipipa a'i penda' waf fasifi ma pigihimba'mas ipa' a' pambema nelelemb endilisi paila waf bu'wafi. Ipa' ina a' ukup pendanda' pi'i, ‘Abraham ahamapa ape'inai’, na'amba ipa' ea' fasipai, owa', hapaimi. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, God anen la'ifinai ma nonda' otamba atemba begataga epes si'i awasi Abrahami.
42003009	Tamia'w akwandandombol kwa'oha kogatopa' lawah kofagah nombalefima. Lawah mamahogaha owa' hil hogola sa'utip bu'wapia, agahemba atiasi solagah sotopa'agah hefe'ma nif.”
42003010	Anen na'ias ea', esis hiasi sahali'ana sa'i, “Apa' atiasi monda' maina monda' waf fasifi God naga'iefi?”
42003011	Ea' Jon na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Epen ami siaogw biagw atogwi nekwahomana anota anin siot akani, ea' ami gwa'aisi saga'omani inimba nenda'as newalogas wapani.”
42003012	Ea' anom amam awami mogofa' takisi mafi'mai Jon ma'i nupisi'am embel ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai, atiasi afa' onda' maina ogahapila basef fasifi Godi?”
42003013	Anen na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pefa' otamba bendahama si'i gavman naga'ipipambai atemba. Ipa' ina pefa' anemba wapani, owa'i.”
42003014	Ea' anom soldia mafi'i mahali'ana ma'i, “Afa' atiasi onda' maina ogohapila basef Godi?” Anen nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina a' pembaso'ma epes piumbalis penda'as ombel mohas penda'mas kot pendelelaepasa moni asasini dowaf, owa'i. Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi bendape awanelemba otamba ipe'imbai dondo'ma ikwaf amom dembami mandandepafi.”
42003015	Ea' dei' nomonas esis amam nematawai mosafel banagem, ea' hiasi ukup pandanda'ma Jon sa'i, “Jon anen Krais, ma'una God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'ii, a'a owa'?”
42003016	Ea' Jon nagwamasa basef na'ipas na'i, “Ae' apisi'ipa embel atembal. Apa' anona aman atiasi nigi' nugafi'ii, anen banagonai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma egatagwaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'atin. Anef nemaf anen nese'epa Ambal bu'wali Godi nogape opalef ipe'ilifi nomon ea' nese'epa nif wapani.
42003017	Anen nahapila anol savol lagof ananigufi ma nigasimba' wit si'i rais amamba andeande'. Ama nofa' wit bu'winai nuwis nembe'ana ipat ananitai. Apa' du'wa'wanimi awasimi nembeham nofam nif amamba lu'wami fandom atapim magapani.”
42003018	Dei' Jon nawalapa anif basef daif hiafi wapani ma nogasa'ma ukup asasipi ma sonda' waf bu'wafi. Ea' nawalipasa basef bu'wafi.
42003019	Owa' Jon nanda' megahaha aman anamba Herot, gavman dembinai asasinai, ma waf awafi hiafi anen nanda'afi. Anen nandalombana Herodias nemata'w sahomana nagaso'akwi, ea' nanda' anef waf awafi hiafi wapani.
42003020	Dei' nowatani anef wapani ma nanda' Jon nanda' kalabus.
42003021	Jon napisi'a amam nematawa hiasi ma ea', napisi' Jisas wapani. Jisas nofa' baptaisa ea', anen ata' nandabeten atin owa', heven a' nandawisi'.
42003022	Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nisila'i si'i amil alamba apa' maga'i ma'unai nufia' nisila'mai anen. Ea' anagol malagol ga'i gatagai heven ga'i anef basef ga'i, “Ina' Nogame ae'inai endilisi. Ae' okom mohafel maimailina a'owa'. Okom ae'ami fasima ina'.”
42003023	Afamba Jisas nagasefela maol, afagof ananigufi fataga 30-pelaiguf. Esis amam nematawa ukup pandanda' dowaf pa'i Jisas nogama Josepi.
42003024	Bafapana Jisasi agufuma amamba. Josep, Heli nogamana. Ea' Heli, Matat nogamana. Ea' Matat, Livai nogamana. Livai, Melki nogamana. Melki, Janai nogamana. Ea' Janai, Josep nogamana.
42003025	Josep, Matatias nogamana. Matatias, Amos nogamana. Amos, Nahum nogamana. Ea' Nahum, Esli nogamana. Ea' Esli, Nagai nogamana.
42003026	Nagai, Mat nogamana. Mat, Matatias nogamana. Ea' Matatias, Semen nogamana. Ea' Semen, Josek nogamana. Josek, Joda nogamana.
42003027	Joda, Joanan nogamana. Joanan, Resa nogamana. Resa, Serubabel nogamana. Serubabel, Sealtiel nogamana. Sealtiel, Neri nogamana.
42003028	Neri, Melki nogamana. Melki, Adi nogamana. Adi, Kosam nogamana. Kosam, Elmadam nogamana. Elmadam, Er nogamana.
42003029	Er, Josua nogamana. Ea' Josua, Eleasar nogamana. Ea' Eleasar, Jorim nogamana. Jorim, Matat nogamana. Ea' Matat, Livai nogamana
42003030	Livai, Simeon nogamana. Ea' Simeon, Juda nogamana. Juda, Josep nogamana. Ea' Josep, Jonam nogamana. Jonam, Eliakim nogamana.
42003031	Eliakim, Melea nogamana. Melea, Mena nogamana. Mena, Matata nogamana. Matata, Natan nogamana. Natan, Devit nogamana.
42003032	Devit, Jesi nogamana. Jesi, Obet nogamana. Obet, Boas nogamana. Boas, Salmon nogamana. Salmon, Nason nogamana.
42003033	Nason, Aminadap nogamana. Aminadap, anen Atmin nogamana. Atmin, Arni nogamana. Arni anen Hesron nogamana. Hesron, Peres nogamana. Peres, Juda nogamana.
42003034	Ea' Juda anen Jekop nogamana. Jekop anen Aisak nogamana. Aisak, Abraham nogamana. Abraham, Tera nogamana. Tera, Nahor nogamana.
42003035	Nahor, Seruk nogamana. Seruk, Reu nogamana. Reu, Pelek nogamana. Pelek, Eber nogamana. Eber anen Sela nogamana.
42003036	Sela anen Kainan nogamana. Kainan, Arpaksat nogamana. Arpaksat, Siem nogamana. Siem, Noa nogamana. Noa, Lamek nogamana.
42003037	Lamek, Metusela nogamana. Ea' Metusela, Enok nogamana. Enok, Jaret nogamana. Jaret, Mahalalel nogamana. Mahalalel, Kainan nogamana.
42003038	Kainan, Enos nogamana. Enos, Set nogamana. Set, Adam nogamana. Adam, God nogamana. Bafapana Jisasi ea' ma'um.
42004001	Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'inama Jisas ea' nakwaha walemb ambamba Jordan nandagiai notanima nafe'. Ea' Ambal anamba nofa'ana nafe' anagon wafigima fataupigima.
42004002	Jisas nape anamba nimaguf hiafi ea' Satan nafi'i nagwambana ma nogosambala mu'uli Godi nimaguf ifimba awin si'ini du'wanini. Jisas ina na' anis gwa'aisi nimaguf ifimba hiafi, owa'. Ea' a' nolomahana.
42004003	Ea' Satan na'ipana na'i, “Ina' na'i ina' Nogamana Godi, dei' kipa otam amamba baga'oh itapi motaga si'i bret.”
42004004	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Baibel na'i bret atota ina atoso'asa ambagof esis epes, owa'atin.”
42004005	Ea' Satan nofa'ana nondowasa' ilif nihimba'mana hiahaom hiami fasimi magape itap hiagoma amom king dembami magala'ambemagoma. Nihimba'managon kwafalis atis.
42004006	Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Hiahaom hiami banagami amamba amom king mugumafiami maloma hiahaom fasimi uga maina, hiahaom amamba God nagase'eami. Apa' dei' i'i egaso'anam anin epena, ae' ese'anam.
42004007	I'i ina' nindiwa nembawa netawa nenda' lotu sonehenama ae', hiahaom amamba atiasi a' ine'imi atom.”
42004008	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Baibel naga'ias na'amba na'i, ‘Ipa' penda' lotuma Dembinai God atona ipe'inai, ea' penda' maola anen atona.’”
42004009	A'i owa' main, Satan nofa' Jisas nondowasa' Jerusalem nahaponana nalutu ipat Godi lu'unai ilif. Ea' Satan na'ipana na'i, “Ina' na'i ina' Nogamana Godi, dei' netoma nindipa' newa itap.
42004010	-
42004011	Dei' main, anif basef Godi fagail buk Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘God atiasi ni'ipa amom ensel mufi'i muhapilina lagof amamugufi mumafina ma otamba ina beha bo'wagah ine'igahi, owa'.’”
42004012	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Anif basef Godi wapani fagape na'amba fa'i, ‘Ina pegwamba Dembinai God ipe'inai nonda' waf awafi, owa'i.’”
42004013	Satan nanda' gwamba hiani ma ea', nakwaha Jisas nafe' nohafana ma anef nemaf nogagwambana wapani.
42004014	Banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi mape opaf Jisasi a' notanima nafe' itap lu'upa Galili. Ea' same' basef gatifa anen fafe'agon hi'alagon walemb ambalemba bagape Galilii.
42004015	Dondol anen nanda' maol nawalipasa basef Godi ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi. Ea' hiasi amam nematawa sasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol.
42004016	Jisas nafe' Nasaret taun inimba kofagama, fowa' anen ata' aonama nagapoma. A'i owa' nemaf afamba sabat esis Juda sagapoma noma'wafi, nafe' nawis ipat Juda sandakolasatai si'i dondol nanda'as. Anen nalutu natalifa basef Godi,
42004017	ea' saso'ana anin pepa launi. Pepa inimba anif basef Godi fowa' profet Aisaia nanda'ef fagailani. Anen nopalian niatifan nati basef ifimba natalifif faga'i na'amba fa'i,
42004018	“Ambal bu'unai Dembinaii nape ae'. Ea' nandandepe ma egawalapa basef bu'wafima epes isimba kwahusa hiahawesi. Nasapa'e afi'i ma igawalapa basef na'amba iga'i, ‘Ipa' panda' kalabusi pekwaha kalabus pefe' wahifipa. Ipa' epes naep pagasi'ipai, ipa' piti andeande' wapani.’ Anen nasapa'e afi'i egatopalopa isimba sogofa' nimanimii sogape andeande'.
42004019	Ea' i'ipas basef hiasi ma nogota atamba bu'utai ma Dembinai niti uwahipis notopalopas sogape andeande'.”
42004020	Ea' Jisas nala'watefa pepa inimba launi naso'anan anona aman nugumafi ipati anen nape. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sagape nomoni naep do' anen atona.
42004021	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' a' pame', ae' atalifa basef Godi fowa'ifi atin owa', dei' a' fataga alihif endilisi fandawalapa ae'.”
42004022	Ea' esis sasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol sa'i anen aman bu'unai ea' gogolalasisa basef bu'wafi fagataga malogol ananigili. Ea' esis sandahali'ma sa'i, “Aman anamba Josep nogamana a'a?”
42004023	Jisas na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Endilisi atis ipa' atiasi penda' basef ifimba waminif atina ae' pi'i, ‘Dokta, ina' nenda' alop ine'ipi potaga bo'op puli', ea' pi'i wapani pi'i waf afamba nali' nanda'af Kaperneami, afamba apa' mame'af ea'. Ina' dei' nenda'af fetaga na'a wambel kofagama ine'ima.’”
42004024	Ea' anen na'ias na'amba wapani na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Anona profet epes ina saso'ana opalef same' basef ananifi wambel kofagama, owa'.
42004025	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi atis. Nogota atamba fowa' Elaija nagapautai owaf atona nagandogwa, asaf ina ata' falai afagof wanogof aomb wanemb wanemb, owa'atin. Ea' nolom lu'unai nataga ganimba hiagoma. Nogota atamba nematawa hiawai Israeliwai amom maga' mialifawa wape.
42004026	Apa' God ina nasapa' Elaija nafe'ma anowa awambai, owa'atin. Anen nasapa'ana nafe'ma ano'w nemata'w daia'w kwagape Serafati, wambel bagape anep itap lu'upa Saidoni. Ea' akwamba ato'w.
42004027	Ea' nogota atamba anona aowas aunai nataga nanda' alop esis amam nematawa Israeli pagambo'wi. Apa' ina anin epen asasini nataga bo'wen, owa'atin. Anona aman daiana Naman Siriainai ea' anen atona nataga bo'ona.”
42004028	Ea' esis hiasi sape ipat atamba same' basef ifimba, a' nomonas wandafum kwapete'a Jisas.
42004029	Ea' sosafel sali'amonana nawisi taun ando'. Taun inimba asasini natoma halafuta ilif. Ea' sofa'ana safe' halafuta atamba sa'i sogwalo'ana niliana tata.
42004030	Owa', anen nandali'amona esis la'afisa a' nafe'.
42004031	Jisas niliana Kaperneam taun inimba nagape itap lu'upa Galilii. A'i owa' nemaf afamba Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sa'i sabat, anen nawis nomon ipat sandakolasatai nawalipas.
42004032	Same'ana sa'i anen nofa' agol lu'wagili dei' na'ipasa basef banagafi. Ea' sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' endilisi.
42004033	Anona aman ambafuh manda'anai nape ipat atamba, ambal aunai napaona. Anen galala mehip endilisi na'ias na'i,
42004034	“E! Jisas ina' Nasaretinai, na'i nifi'i nenda' maina apa'? Ina' nafi'i ma negahambombagapa? Ae' egawa ina' nogama God bu'winai hilili'i.”
42004035	Owa' Jisas ninifalona na'amba na'i, “Ina' ambalip awinai sopama malogol kwaha aman anamba.” Ea' ambalip anamba nakwahona nowa itap la'afena esis nawisi nafe', ina ata' nahambombagana wapani, a' owa'atin.
42004036	Esis hiasi gogolalasis sandakoto'ma sanda'ipama sa'i, “Ifimba basef mamahifa? Anen natofa ambagof awami na'ipam si'i anona aman banagonai. Ambagof awami mame' basefa anen, makwahona mafa' mafe'.”
42004037	Ea' basef ifimba nanda' hiahaom amamba banagami fafe'agon hi'alagon walemb bagape na'ambai.
42004038	Saimon nandagi'mo'wi aowas nanda'akw alop ako'upi nifip kwapete'. Ea' Jisas nosafel nakwaha ipat atamba sanda' kolasatai, nafe' nawis ipat Saimoni. Ea' sahali'ana ma nogatopalopa'w.
42004039	Ea' anen nafe' nalutu felefele' ma ako'w nataloga aowas inimba natofan nafa' nakwaha ako'w. Ea' kosafel kwafalis kwanda'masa gwa'aisi esis.
42004040	A'i owa' awin newala naso', esis amam nematawa sofa' anis alipisi aowas hiana haona nanda'asi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas. Ea' nasa lagofas atona atin nanda'as bo'wes hi'alas.
42004041	Ea' ambagof awami hiami makwaha esis hiasi mawisi mafe' ea'. Ambagof amamba awami mofalana higihiga' ma'oh ma'i, “Ina' nogamana Godi.” Amom mogawa anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Ea' Jisas ninifalom na'i ina ata' mi'i anif basef, owa'. Mosopama malogof.
42004042	A'i owa' kuhimbita atota Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba nafe' anagon wafigima epes akagoma. Esis safe' solaomana satolona asafe'ma anen. Esis ina sa'i anen nokwaha esis nofe' owa', sa'i sotalifana nope atapina nolomas.
42004043	Owa', na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'i ewalapa basef fasifi ma epes sogawisa maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. A'i ewalapa basef ifimba anagon taun hiani wapani. God nasapa'e afi'i enda'ani maol inimba atin.”
42004044	Ea' nafe' nawalapa basef Godi ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi nawalapef nafe' nafe' atapina itap lu'upa Judia.
42005001	Anef nemaf Jisas nalutu dumb Genesaret akata naloma hiasi amam nematawa sala'ambemana sape same' basef Godi.
42005002	Ea' nati anota bot sa'utai biata tala embel felefele'ma nimbapif dumb ambamba. Ea' amom mogowafa agufi mandani' mafe' masa'opa anembeh amamimbihi.
42005003	Jisas nalota natoma bot Saimoni ea' na'ipana na'i, “Sapa' bot nokwaha bandagoma nefe' laogoma kwasala.” Ea' Jisas natoma bot nawalipasa basef esis amam nematawa.
42005004	Anen nawalipasa ea' na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ina' sapa' bot tofo'o dumb embel laogoma ea' pela anembeh howala pewafai anogof agof.”
42005005	Ea' Saimon nagwa basef na'i, “Dembinai, doko' owamb laomb afa' wanda' maol banagambel owa', ina wagi anol aol, owa'atin. Owa' na'ipa ae' na'amba, dei' ela anemb bewala.”
42005006	A'i owa', mala anemb bewala mowafai agof hiami. Ea' anemb ba'i pele'etamba agof hiami a'owa'.
42005007	Ea' amom mowaulai alipumi amamumi magape anota boti mafi'i matopalopam mowafai agof malam bot biafita si'ita, ta'i a' towala.
42005008	Saimon Pita nati na'amba, ea' nindiwa nembawa natawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi na'ipana na'i, “O Dembinai, ina' kwaha ae', afo'o. Ae' aman auwai!”
42005009	Dei' main, anen naloma amom magalumanai mati agof mogowafami hiami a'owa'. Ea' amom gogolalasom nomonas salasafe'.
42005010	Nogaopana Sebedii biam Jems naloma Jon maloma Pita mandau'umai wapani gogolalasoma agof amamba. Ea' Jisas na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ina' ombal mogahena, owa'i. Dei' atef nesafela anin maol daian nenda'an atapinaman nefa'i epes sifi'i sigaili.”
42005011	Ea' amom manda' botagw gwafe' bandagoma, a' makwaha hiahaom amamumi hi'alam ma'oh, ea' mailana mafe'.
42005012	Nogota atamba Jisas nape anin taun, anona aman nagape na'ambai aowas aunai nanda' alop ananipi hi'alap pagambu'wi. Anen nati Jisas nafi'i, nowafa nambe' nembel itap kwafalis atis na'ipana dindinip na'i, “Dembinai, i'i ina' ni'i aho', nenda'e etaga bo'owe.”
42005013	Ea' Jisas nando lagol nasagol alop aman anambai na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i aho' ma ina' negataga bo'wena.” Ea' dei' atef aowas inimba aunai nanda' alop pagambu'wi nakwahona ea' bo'ona.
42005014	Jisas na'ipana dindinip na'i, “Ina a' nefe' ni'ipa anin epen ni'i ae' anda'ena bo'wena, owa'i. Ina' fo'o nihimba'mana alop ine'ipi ma aman anamba pris. Ea' nese'ana hiahaom amamba anen nondolalima God ea' ina' ninifelona ma nagataga bo'wena si'i mu'uli ananini fowa' Moses naga'ipasani naga'i. Ama esis hiasi sogogawa aowas ine'ini ahi'alan.”
42005015	Owa', owa'atin. Diga basefa hiahawes isimba Jisas nanda'manas aman anambai gatis safe' ganigani. Fowa' ina hiasi same' basef ifimba, owa', apa' dei' hias a'owa'. Isimba atis dei' epes hiasi safi'i ma sogame' anona nogatofamasa aowas asasini.
42005016	Apa' nimaguf hiafi anen nafe' anamba wafigima epes akagoma ma nape nandabeten.
42005017	Anef nemaf Jisas nape nawalipa esis amam nematawa ea' anom dembami Farisi maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi tol mape. Anom mafi'i walemb hielimbi itap lu'upa biafip Judiai Galili. Apa' anom mafi'i Jerusalem. Ea' banagami Dembinai Godi mape Jisas, ama nanda' epes aowas nanda'asi sogohafel bo'wes wapani.
42005018	Ea' anom amam daiam mofa' anona aman lagof bo'wagah sagaga'anai, na'oh alihis mofa'ana mafi'i. Ea' ma'i mofa'ana mefe' muwis ipat membe'ana felefele'ma Jisas.
42005019	Owa' asi'igina amam nematawa hiasi. Amom ina mati ano'w ufia'wa mofa' awasini mugawis nomon, owa'. Ea' malota ipat ilif mihianama bogwan mala aman anamba awasinai naloma alihis nowala nomon la'afena amam nematawa, mambe'ana na'oh Jisas opafunama.
42005020	Nogota atamba Jisas natolom nogawa amom mahapifa ma'i anen banagonai ma nogatopalopa aman anamba aowas nanda'anai. Ea' na'ipa aman anamba na'i, “Ina' epen ae'inai. Waf awafi ina' nanda'afi ae' akwahomenaf hi'alaf okom mase'eaf.”
42005021	Ea' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom Farisi atom ukup atip pandanda' pa'i, “Aman anamba mamahonama nanda' God findiwanai? Owa'atina anona aman la'ifinama nogakwaha waf awafia. Maol inimba God atona nanda'ani.”
42005022	Jisas nogawa nomonas isimbai amamisi. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina nomonas ipe'isi sagape na'amba?
42005023	Dei' hiahaom maim ipa' pa'i ahifima ae'? Ae' banagiwai ma i'ipa aowas nanda'anai iga'i, Ae' egakwahomana waf awafi anen nanda'afi a'a i'ipana iga'i nogasa'ma alahis ananisi nosafel nogafe'. Basef ifimba ma nogasa'ma alahis ananisi, ipa' pa'i amamba ahifima ae'.
42005024	Ae' a'i ipa' pegawa ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, la'ifiwai ma egakwaha waf awafi hiafi amam nematawa sagape itapi sanda'afi. Ae' a'i ihimba'mepa ae' la'ifiwai ma enda' hiahaom amamba. Ea' anen na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, ina' safel sa'ma alahis ine'isi nefe' ipat ine'itai.”
42005025	Jisas na'ipana atin na'amba, nosafel nalutu nasa'ma alahis ananisi naep amam nematawa hiasii. Ea' ata' nafe' atin ufia'w, nandagala nafela agol Godi lu'wagol nafe' ipat ananitai.
42005026	Ea' amam nematawa isimba hiasi gogolalasis kwapete' endilisi, ombal mahas a'owa' safela agol Godi lu'wagol sa'i, “Dei' apa' mati anef waf dambaifi daiaf fowa' owa' mogatilifia.”
42005027	A'i owa' main, Jisas nosafel nafe' nati anona aman nogofa' takisi tol nape ipat sogofa' takisa, agilinama Livai. Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fi'i nila ae'.”
42005028	Ea' nosafel nailana nafe'. Hiahaom hiami ananimi nakwahom ma'oh.
42005029	Ama main, Livai nanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ipat ananitai ma noganifela Jisas. Ea' amam hiami awami mogofa' takisi maloma anom daiam wapani mape ma' gwa'aisi maloma amom biam.
42005030	Ea' anom Farisi dembami maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, amom Farisi, mape manda' megahaha amom alipumi Jisasi. Ma'i, “Dei' maina ipa' pape pa' gwa'aisi pagaloma amom mogofa' takisi maloma amam amamba manda' waf awafii? Na'ambai ina andeande', hapaimi.”
42005031	Owa' Jisas name'am na'ipam na'i, “Isimba aowas akasi ina safe'ma dokta, owa'. Esis bu'wasi. Apa' isimba aowas nanda'asi atis, dao' safe'ma dokta.
42005032	Ae' ina afi'i ma egefala epes sagape andeande'i sogambema opalef, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma egefala epes sanda' waf awafii atis sombema nelelemb sokwaha waf awafi sogafe'ma God.”
42005033	Ea' anis epes sa'ipa Jisas na'amba sa'i, “Alipumi Joni maloma alipumi amom dembami Farisii ukup papoma basef Godi. Ea' anif nimaguf wikifah danda amom molalama gwa'aisi mondabeten atin. Apa' alipumi ine'imi owa' monda' waf afambaia. Amom ma' gwa'aisi embel mais atapis dondol.”
42005034	Ea' nagwamas na'i basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i anis sonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma anis aman nemata'w bias sondaso'amai, ipa' ina la'ifipama penda' esis alipisi sondowalo' sondaiwa'ma gwa'aisi afamba anen nagaso' nemata'wi nape nagalomas, owa'atin endilisi.
42005035	Apa' nemaf afamba anen nagaso' nemata'wi nokwaha esis nogafe' anagon lauguni, dao' esis a sololama gwa'aisi.”
42005036	Ea' Jisas na'ipasa anif basef waminif atina luwaguf na'i, “Ina andeande'ma pegatopa' lowaf namifi pesambalef fegaloma anef lowaf apifi, owa'. I'i anis sonda'am na'amba, lowaf ina atiasi findati na'amba atin feloma apifi, owa'. Namifi a' pele'etaf atin.
42005037	Apa' ina anin epen nakolo'wa embel wain dambaini agwahup apinai memeina, owa'. I'i anin nenda'am na'amba, embel wain netef hian, nohape' agwahup anamba pepe'etana ea' wain kolo'olam awasim hi'ilam.
42005038	Apa' wain dambainai sakolo'wan agwahup dambainai atona.
42005039	Ea' ami noga' embel wain apini anin ina atiasi nomonas si'i wain dambaini, owa'. Anin a' na'i, ‘Wain apini fasini nikila' dambaini.’”
42006001	A'i owa' anef nemaf Juda sagapoma noma'wafi sabat, Jisas nafe' anagon owa' nataga anof aof sagawa witafi a' nawis. Ea' alipumi ananimi mafe' malomana, ea' mosaga anom wit magaofi moka'isam lagof amamugufi ma'am.
42006002	Owa' anom Farisi mahali'am ma'i, “Ina penda'am na'amba ma nemaf afa'e sabat magapoma noma'wafi, owa'i. Dei' maina panda'am na'amba?”
42006003	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pegawa basef ifimba ma waf fowa' dembinai King Devit nanda'afi. Afamba Devit naloma alipumi ananimi nolomagaham
42006004	anen nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon na' bret atamba amom pris mondolali mogaso' Godatai. Ea' na'ata naso' alipumi ananimi ma'ata atin. Apa' mu'uli ape'ini na'i amom pris atom mea'ata.”
42006005	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ape Dembiwai ma nemaf afamba sabata iga'ipipa maol main andeande'ma pigaila basef penda'an nemaf afamba.”
42006006	Anef nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi sabat a' fataga. Jisas nafe' nawis nomon ipat Juda sandakolasatai nape na'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa. Ea' anona aman nape nalomas, lagol kwahisigili ananigili awagol gaga' gail.
42006007	Amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma anom dembami Farisi ma'i mowando'ma ufia'wa mogasapaga Jisasa anif basef baso'afi ma monda' kotimana. Ea' manda'ana naep di'indi'ana. Ma'i mogati anen nosambala mu'uli ma nemaf afamba sabat nonda' aman anamba bo'ona a'a owa'?
42006008	Owa' anen a' nogawa nomonas amamisi, na'ipa aman anamba lagol awagilinai na'i, “Ina' safel nilutu naep hiasii la'afena esis sogatilina.” Ea' anen nosafel nalutu.
42006009	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'i ihali'ipa ma mu'uli ape'ini na'ias na'imama? Nemaf afa'e apa' ma'i monda' waf bu'wafi a'a monda' waf awafi? Na'i apa' motopalopasa sogape andeande' a'a mohambombagas sogaga'?”
42006010	Ea' natologon tulif amam nematawa hiasi, na'ipa aman anamba na'i, “Dowa lagol ine'igili usi'igil.” Ea' anen nando lagol ananigili agataga bo'wagol wapani.
42006011	Owa' amom Farisi nelelemb wandafum kwapete' endilisi ma anen. Ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' atiasi onda' maina Jisas?”
42006012	Nemaf afamba Jisas nandowasa' nafe' halafutagwa nandabetena God. Ea' owamb amamba laomb anen nape nandabeten nafe' a' lala.
42006013	Awin a'i owa' natafi, anen nofala alipumi ananimi hiami mafi'i nandandepa 12-pelaim nahapomama agol aposel amom atom.
42006014	Anona Saimon, ea' Jisas nanda'mana agol wa'agol Pita. A Andru, owamana Saimoni. Ea' Jemsi Jon. A Filipi Bartolomyu,
42006015	Matyu naloma Tomas ea' Jems nogama Alfiusi. Ea' Saimon anen pati inimba Seloti.
42006016	Ea' Judas nogamana Jemsi, a Judas Keriotinai, aman anamba nogawalapa Jisasa boumi ananimii.
42006017	Ea' Jisas niliana naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' anagon bembe'agoma, doko' esis alipisi hiasi ananisi safi'i sali' sagalutuma. Ea' epes hiasi safi'i. Anis safi'i walemb hiagoma anep itap lu'upa Judia a anis safi'i walemb bialemb Tairi Saidon bape bagalo'ma naohi, anis safi'i Jerusalem.
42006018	Esis safi'i ma sogame' basef ananifi ma nogatofa aowas asasinai. Ea' esis amam nematawa ambagof awami magahambombagasi safi'i, Jisas nanda'as bo'wes wapani.
42006019	Banagami ananimi mafe' manda' esis hiasi bo'wes. Ea' dei' esis hiasi sa'i sohahapila anen.
42006020	Jisas natiti amom alipumi ananimi na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' kwahupai otamba mais akipai, ipa' pawis ea' nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa. Isimba atis dei' ipa' sonahepa pandagala pape.
42006021	Ipa' epes nolomagahipai, dei' sonahepa pape andeande'. Dei' main, anaf ipa' pea' gwa'aisi a' alihipa. Ipa' epes nelelemb nimanilimba pagalifi, dei' sonahepa pape andeande'. Dei' main, anaf ipa' sonehepa pinda'iaf.
42006022	Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Nambimb anis daias siti ipa' pila ae', esis nelelemb awalemba ipa' endilisi. Ea' sowa' alafugaha ipa' sohaponamepa agof awagufi si'iguf wa'agof endilisi si'i ipa' epes aupai sindaiwa'mepa sili'amonepa.
42006023	Nemaf afamba esis sonda'epa na'amba, ipa' a sonondahepa pilutu pialemb atin. Dei' main, hiahaom hiami fasimi ipe'imi ma'oh heven. Fowa' akupas bafapas asasisi sanda' amom profet aom na'amba atin.
42006024	Apa' ipa' otamba uga maim hiamipai, ipa' solawaipa ma hiahaom awami akafimi mogatagamepai. Dei' main, ipa' dei' pefa'am ea' hiahaom monda'epa dagalaipamami.
42006025	Ipa' dei' paga' gwa'aisi alihipai, solawaipa ma hiahaom awami akafimi. Dei' main, anaf ipa' a' nolomehepa. Ipa' dei' panda'iafi, ipa' solawaipa ma hiahaom awami akafimi. Dei' main, anaf ipa' pelefa penda'aga a'owa'.
42006026	Ipa' dei' epes hiasi hi'alas sagafela agof ipe'igufi saga'i ipa' bu'upai, ipa' solawaipa ma hiahaom akafimi awami. Dei' main, fowa' akusas bafasas asasisi saga'ipam na'amba atina amom profet mambaso'am maga'ipasa basef Godii. Sanda'mamam na'amba atin, safela agof amamugufi.
42006027	Apa' ipa' pagame' basef ae'afii, ipa' ukup pelele' pindaila bousi ipe'isi, penda'masa waf bu'wafi isimba nelelemb awalemba ipe'i.
42006028	Ipa' pihali' Goda nonda'mas waf bu'wafi ma epes isimba sanda'mepa ko'opi. Ea' pendabetena epes isimba sanda'epa aupai.
42006029	I'i epen mamahina negahepa aomb wa'oli, pendambema nehepa wa'ol wapani. I'i epen mamahina nefa'mepa saket ipe'itai, ina pinda'imata, owa'i. Pese'anota wapani.
42006030	I'i epen mamahina nefalepama anis maefah, ipa' pese'anas. Ea' i'i epen mamahina negefa' hiahaom ipe'imi, ipa' owa'i pi'ipana dindinipa negwamepama, owa'i.
42006031	Waf maif ipa' pa'i esis sonda'mepaf ipe'i, ipa' penda'masaf na'amba atin.
42006032	“I'i ipa' ukup pipila epes isimba ukup pagapagaila ipe'i, atiasi pefa' hiahawes fasisi maisa waf afamba? Owa'atin. Epes sanda' waf awafii esis sanda'af na'amba atin. Ukup paipaila epes isimba ukup pagapagailasi.
42006033	I'i ipa' penda' waf fasifi ma isimba sanda' waf fasifi atifa ipe'i, atiasi ami nesa'ma agof ipe'igufi? Owa'atin. Epes isimba sanda' waf awafii esis wapani sanda' waf na'ambaifi.
42006034	I'i ipa' pese'asa anis hiahawes epes isimba ipa' pegawa esis atiasi sogogwamepasii, anaf ami nefela agof ipe'igufi? Bola owa'atin. Epes awasi wapani sagaso'asa anom maefah anis sanda' waf awafii, ama esis sotanima sogofa'am na'amba atin mondagwama si'i sali' sagaso'asam.
42006035	Apa' ipa' ukup pindapindaila bousi ipe'isi, penda'mas waf fasifi esis pese'asa hiahawes. Ipa' ina ata' pi'i anaf esis sogwamepas, owa'. Ipa' penda'as na'amba anaf God nagape ilifi nese'epa hiahaom lu'wami fasimi ma pegape awasi ananipai. Dei' main, anen naga'i uwahipigama esis isimba owa' soganifelonaia saloma isimba sanda' waf awafii.
42006036	Ahamepa ipe'inai naga'i uwahipigama esis sanda' waf awafii. Ipa' penda'as na'amba atin si'i anen nagati esis uwahipis.
42006037	“Ipa' ina a' pewaloga anis epes si'i anona jas dembinai nagawaloga basef kot lu'unai, owa'i. Ama anaf God ina nowalogepa, owa'. Ipa' ina a' pesapaga anis epes dowaf, owa'i. Ama anaf God ina nosapaga ipa' wapani, owa'. Ipa' pekwahowa waf awafi anis sanda'mepaf ipe'i. Ama anaf God nogwas nogakwahowa waf awafi ipe'ifi.
42006038	Ipa' pese'asa hiahawes anis epesa God nogase'epa hiahawes ipa'. Anaf anen nogase'epa hiahawes hiasi si'isi'isa ipa' endilisi si'im kwaef a'owa' miki'. Ikwaf ipa' pegaso'asaf anis epesi, anaf ikwaf afamba atef God nese'epaf ipa'.”
42006039	Ea' Jisas na'ipasa anif basef waminif atina esis wapani na'i, “A'i anin epen naep pagaso'ani la'ifinama nigihimba'man ufia'w anin daian naep pagaso'ani? Owa'atin. Atiasi esis bias dogwas hendihandef sefe' sondakolef sowala atin kwambiwag.
42006040	Epes sanda' skul atini ina sape dambes sikila' tisa asasinai, owa'. Esis sonda' skula hi'alan, dao' sotaga na'amba atin si'i tisa asasinai.
42006041	“Dei' maina ipa' pagati usan sa'usa'uni nagape naep sahin owan ipe'isii, apa' ipa' owa' pegawa hapataf lu'unai nagape naep ipe'ipia?
42006042	Dei' maina ipa' ata' pali' pa'ipa alipisi piga'i, ‘Owame, ae' a'i igimina usan sa'uni nagape naep ine'ipii.’ Apa' ipa' hapataf lu'unai anamba nape naep ipe'ipi. Ipa' malogof biagufipai pagambaso'ami. Ipa' ata' pili' pigi usan hapataf lu'unai nagape naep ipe'ipii, ma piti andeande', dao' a' pigimana usas sa'usi sagape naep alipisi ipe'isii.”
42006043	Lawag bu'ugai ina gola gwa'aisi awasi, owa'. Ea' na'amba atin lawag augai ina gola gwa'aisi bu'wasi, owa'atin.
42006044	Apa' mati gwa'aisi sagailagahi, mogawa lawah bu'ugahi augahi. Epes ina sola sa'utip fikip usihip si'i ahipi anof mandof higatagufi, owa'atin. A ina sola sa'utip wainip anof mandof pipi'ambinif, isimba wapani owa'.
42006045	Epes na'amba atin. Epen bu'wani, anin nomonas fasisi sapain nembel ananimbili, ea' nawalapa waf bu'wafi. Apa' epen awani waf hiafi awafi awasi hiasi fapain nembel ananimbili. Ea' nawalapa waf awafi atefi. Dei' main, waf maif bu'wafi awafi fape si'ifa nembel ananinai, afamba dei' malogol gawalapafi.
42006046	“Dei' maina ipa' paga'i ae' Dembiwai, Dembiwai, apa' ipa' owa' pila malogol ae'agilia?
42006047	Ami nifi'mai ae' ma nigaila malogol ae'agilii, dei' ae' indila'waifa waf ananifi ma ipa' pegegawaf.
42006048	Epen inimba si'i anona aman nagala' ipati. Anen nandoma olalef fewala gani itap awin otamba mogotaoma. Ea' nanda' ipat tatoma ilifa otamba ambamba. Ama main, walemb nawisi embel kolo'walami mafe', ipat ina tandagwamba, owa'. Dei' main? Aman anamba nanda'ata banagota.
42006049	Apa' epen ami name' basef ae'afi owa' nilifa, inimba si'i anona daiana nagala' ipat falafutai. Anen nanda'ata nala'ata dowaf tatoma itap atep ilif. A'i owa' maina walemb nawisi embel mokwaefa ipat atamba kwafalis atis a' tato totowata aota hi'alata. Ea' ma'uf.”
42007001	Jisas na'i basef ifimba laufi ma hi'alef, a' nafe' nataga anambel wambel Kaperneam.
42007002	Anona aman dembinai nape. Anen kepten nugumafi soldia hiami 100-pelaimi. Anona nanda' maola anini aowasina felefele'ma nogaga'. Ea' kepten okom maimailana
42007003	ea' name' basefa Jisas nasapa' anom agufumi Judai mafe' mofala Jisasa nonda' aman anamba bo'ona.
42007004	Ea' mafe' matagama Jisas ma'ipana dindinip ma'i, “Kepten anamba aman bu'unai, andeande'ma ina' negatopalopana nenda' aman nanda' maola anini bo'ona.
42007005	Dei' main, anen okom magamagaila apa' Judai nala' ipat apa' mandakolasatai.”
42007006	Ea' Jisas nafe' nalomam nafe' nataga felefele'ma ipat owa', Kepten anamba nasapa' anom alipumi mofa'ai basef ananifi mafi'i ma'ipa Jisas na'amba ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' negafo'o owa', hapaimi. Ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma ina' nefo'o negawis ipat ae'atai, owa'.
42007007	-
42007008	Isimba atis ae' wapani ina bo'owe ma egafe'mago ina', owa'atin. Ina' ninda'i basef atif bola anen bo'ona. Dei' main, ae' ape lafela anom soldia dembami mumafi mase'e maol. Ea' ape ilifa anom soldia ae'ami imafiam. Iga'ipa anona iga'i, ‘Ina' fo'o’, name'e nafe'. A iga'ipa anona iga'i, ‘Ina' fi'i’, neme'e nafi'i. Ea' iga'ipa anamba agol akanai nanda'me maoli iga'i, ‘Ina' da'a maol inimba’, anen name'e nanda'an. Ina' dembinai. Ea' aowas inimba atiasi neme' basef ine'ifi a' nefe'. Dei' ina' ninda'i atin, ea' anen ambo'ona wapani.”
42007009	Jisas name' basef ananifi okom malamafe' ea' nandambema na'ipa amam nematawa hiasi sagagi'ma anini na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa, soldia dembinai anamba anen ina ipa' Israelinai. Owa' dei' nahapifa ae'. Owa' anona aman Israelinai nohapifi na'ambaea, owa'atin. Anen nikila' ipa' Israela nagahapifi banagambel.”
42007010	Ea' amom amamba kepten nasapa'am magafi'ii motanima mafe' ipat mati aman anamba nanda' maola kepteni bo'ona ea'.
42007011	A'i owa' main, Jisas nafe' anambel wambel Nen. Alipumi ananimi maloma anis amam nematawa hiasi safe' salomana.
42007012	Anen nafe' felefele'ma uta sagawis wambel ambalembama, owa' nati anis sofa' anin awani nagaga'i safi'i sa'i sowan. Awani inimba nagaga'i ma'man alifi'wi. Ako'w kola anin atin, waulunama'w a' naga'. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape wambel ambalembai safi'i salumai ako'w.
42007013	Dembinai nati ako'w, okom ananimi ma'i uwahipi'w ea' na'ipa'w na'i, “Ina' negalef owa'i.”
42007014	Ama main, anen nafe' felefele' nasa lagola bokis sagalanasi. Ea' amom mogofa'ai bokis isimbai tol malutu. Ea' Jisas na'i, “Awani, ina' neme'! Ae' a'ipina, ina' safel.”
42007015	-
42007016	Awani inimba nagaga' ea'i nesafel nape na'i. Ea' Jisas naso'akwan ma'man anani'wi. Na'amba esis ombal mahas a'owa' safela agol Godi sa'i, “Anona aman profet dembinai nataga ea' la'afena apa'. God nafi'i ma nogatopalopa amam nematawa ananipai.”
42007017	Ea' basef ifimba ma maol Jisasi fafe'agon hi'alagon anamba itap lu'upa Judia ea' anamba hiagoma wapani.
42007018	Alipumi Joni ma'ipana hiahaom amamba banagami Jisas nanda'ami. Ea' Jon nofala alipumi biam ananimi
42007019	nasapa'am mafe' mahali' Dembinai Jisas ma'i, “Ina' aman ma'wina a' nafi'i, ea' a'a ata' mope mohafa anona daiana?”
42007020	Alipumi amamba biam Joni matagama Jisas ea' ma'i, “Jon nagapisi'as embeli nasapa' afa' biafa wafi'mai ina', anen na'i nogawa, ‘Ina' aman ma'wina nafi'i, a'a ata' mope mohafa anona daiana?’”
42007021	Nemaf afamba atef Jisas nanda' amam nematawa aowas hiana haona nanda'asi sataga bo'wes. Anen natofamasa ambagof awami magapaisi. Hiasi naep pagaso'asi nanda'masep patimas andeande'.
42007022	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipa' pitanima pefe' pi'ipa Jona hiahawes isimba dei' patilis pagame'asi. Isimba naep pagaso'asi asati wapani, bo'wagah awamisi safe' andeande'. Isimba aowas aunai nanda' alop asasipi pagambu'wi ambo'wes, aligah hagaso'asi same' basef andeande', sagaga'i sotanima sosafel wapani a kwahusi same' basef bu'wafi Godi.
42007023	Epes mamahisa ukup atifip sagahapifai, isimba asonohas andeande'.”
42007024	Amom biam mogofa'i basefa Joni a' motanima mafe'. Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa ma Jon na'i, “Fowa' ipa' pafe' anep itap fataupigima wafigima pafe' pati main? Pafe'ma pagati anona aman pupulinai si'i anota elifita fufin naolata tagalimbi? Owa'atin.
42007025	A'a pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman nagala klos fasimi atumii? Owa'atin. Epes isimba sogatala hiahaom bu'wami atumi ma moni hianai sagala klos fasimi atumi, epes isimba sagape ifagw bu'wagwi atogw amom king dembami magapaugwi.
42007026	Apa' ipa' dei' pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman profet? Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, anen profet dembinai nikila' profet hiami hi'alam.
42007027	Aman anamba ea' ma'una anen atona si'i basef fagape Baibeli na'iasa God fowa' na'ias naga'i, ‘Ina' neme', anaf ae' esapa' aman nogofa'o basef ae'afii nili' nefe'ma ina' nondondomba ufia'w ine'ikwi.’
42007028	Ae' a'ipipa, Jon dambena nikila' amam hiami ma itap apa'e. Apa' epen ami dei' nigawis nomona maol Godi nope dembinai nugumafian, inimba dambeni nikila' Jon. I'i epen inimba agol akani ma wambota Godi, anin wapani dei' nape dambeni nikila'ana.”
42007029	Ea' amom mogofa' takis mogambaso'masi maloma epes hiasi sagame' basef Jisasi esis sa'i, “Aho', waf Godi andeande'.” Dei' main, Jon atona nagapisi'asi.
42007030	Apa' amom Farisi maloma anom magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ina mofa' baptaisa Jon, owa'. Amom manda'as na'amba dei' mandambema mowa' alafugaha ufia'w fasi'wi God nigihimba'mama'wi.
42007031	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Atiasi ae' indila'waifa ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itapi i'imama? Ae' i'ipipa basef maif waminif atina pegegawa waf ipe'ifi?
42007032	Ipa' pape si'i anis awasi sandakolas sagapoma sofala anis awasi daias saga'i, ‘Apa' mandagala mufapula batagwa ipa', apa' ipa' ina palemb. Apa' manda' awalef si'i sagatala fawiagof malef mindiwagef, apa' ipa' owa' pelefa.’
42007033	“Aman anamba Jon nagapisi'as embeli nafi'i, ina na' gwa'aisii embel wain, owa'atin. Ea' pa'i ambal aunai napaona.
42007034	Dei' ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi afi'i a' gwa'aisi saloma embel wain, ea' patolowe pa'i, ‘Piti anen aman naga' wali'ita hiatai, naga' embel wain hiani endilisii. Anen alipunai ma amom mogofa' takisi magambaso'masi maloma amam manda' waf awafii!’
42007035	Apa' epes ami sigaila gawa fasini Godi, esis hiasi sa'i, ‘Gawa inimba anin bu'wani!’”
42007036	Anona aman Farisi nahali' Jisasa nifi'i nea' gwa'aisi nogalomana. Ea' nafe' ipat atamba Farisii nalomana ma' gwa'aisi.
42007037	Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwagape taun inimbai kwanda' waf awafii. Ako'w kwame' basefa Jisas na' gwa'aisi ipat atamba. Ea' kofa' anol botol fasili si'i otam embel sanda alogw fasigwi gwagani kwafi'i.
42007038	Ea' kwawis kwafe' kwalutu alafuga Jisasi felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi kwalef. Ea' embif akwa'ufi faluwi fewala bo'wagah Jisasi ea' kwanda' auf balagaifi kopati' embif akwa'ufi, kwape kwasisi' bo'wagah ananigahi kwanda' lotumana. Ea' kwakolo' sanda inimba bo'wagah ananigahi.
42007039	Ea' Farisi anamba nahali' Jisas nagafi'ii nati isimba, nomonas ananisi sandanda' sa'i, “I'i aman anamba endilisi anen profetai, a' nogawa nemata'w akwamba kwagahapila anini, nogawa waf akwa'ufi. Dei' main? Ako'w kwanda' waf awafii.”
42007040	Ea' Jisas nagwamana nomonas isimba Farisi anamba na'ipana na'i, “Saimon, ae' a'i i'ipina anif basef.” Ea' Saimon na'i, “Tisa, ina' walapa basef ine'ifi.”
42007041	Jisas na'i, “Amam biam anof wiaf fapoma amoma anona aman otamba hiamunai. Anona nowaola wiafa 100 kina apa' anona 10 kina atin.
42007042	Ama main, amom biam ina la'ifima mogogwa wiaf afamba, owa'. Ea' dei' aman anamba okom maso'ana wiaf afamba amom biami nakwahomamaf. Ea' amom biam atiasi ami okom mimila anen a'owa' nikila' anona?”
42007043	Saimon nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “Ae' a'i aman anamba nagaso'ana wiaf lu'wafii 100 kinai.” Jisas na'i, “Ina' nawalogef andeande'.”
42007044	Ea' nandambema na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ina' niti nemata'w akwa'e? Ae' afi'i awisi ipat ine'itai. Ina' owa' nese'e embel esa'opa bo'wagah ae'agahia, owa'atin. Apa' nemata'w akwamba kwasa'opa bo'wagah ae'agahi ma embif fagaluwi naep akwa'upii. Ea' kopati'if balaga akwa'ugai.
42007045	Ina' owa' nisisi' ae'a. Apa' doko' ae' afi'i awisi atin, ako'w kwape kwasisi' bo'wagah ae'agahi atapi'w kwape kwafi'i kwataga dei'.
42007046	Ina' owa' nenda' wel nefame balaga ae'agaia. Apa' ako'w kwaofame bo'wagah ae'agahi embel sanda.
42007047	Na'amba dei' ae' a'ipina. Ako'w okom maimaila ae' a'owa'. Waf afamba okom magamagaila ae'afi fihimba'mapa waf awafi akwa'ufi hiafi akwahoma'waf hi'alaf. Epen ami God nokwahoman waf awafi ananifi kwasala'uf okom moso'anaf, epen inimba anin atiasi okom mimila God kwasakwasala.”
42007048	Ea' Jisas na'ipa nemata'w akwamba na'i, “Ae' akwahomena waf awafi ine'ifi okom mase'eaf.”
42007049	Ea' amom mape ma' gwa'aisi magalumanai mape ukup talambi manda'ipama ma'i, “Aman anamba anen mamahonama na'i atiasi banagonama nogakwaha waf awafii?”
42007050	Jisas na'ipa nemata'w akwamba na'i, “Ina' nahapifa ae' banagiwai. Isimba atis God nakwahomena waf awafi ine'ifi nowambelena nitanimai nepe andeande'. Ina' fo'o, ea' nembel ine'imbili bepe awanembel.”
42008001	A'i owa' main, Jisas nafe' walemb hielimbi naso'asa basef bu'wafi amam nematawa sagape taun inimbai walemb hiagomai. Na'ipasa basef ifimba bu'wafi ma atiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope dembinai nugumafias. Alipumi ananimi maloma
42008002	anowa nematawa safe' salomana. Nematawa awamba fowa' aowas nanda'awa Jisas natofamawa ambagof awami nanda'awa bo'owa. Ano'w Maria sofala'w sa'i Makdalai'wi, fowa' nagatofama'wa ambagof awami 7-pelaim magapau'wi.
42008003	Ea' ano'w Joana nemata'w anona aman nugumafi ipat Heroti, agol ananigili Susa. A' ano'w Susana kwaloma anowa nematawa hiawai daiawa wapani wafe' walomana. Awo watopalopa anen naloma alipumi ananimi ma otamba gwa'aisi mais awausi.
42008004	Esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'i taun hiagoma, safi'i sandakolas safi'mai Jisas. Ea' anen naso'asa basef waminif atin na'amba na'i,
42008005	“Anona aman nafe' nowaha olemb witimb si'i raisi anof aof. Nowahemb nafe', anemb bewa ufia'w sagafe'ma. Anis epes safe' safafa'asemb ea' amiguf fufia' fafi'i fa'amb.
42008006	Anemb bewa anagon otambaigima. Ea' bataga apa' itap owa' embelepa. Gagalisimb ea' alimb.
42008007	Anemb bewala la'afena mandelef wandafumi mataga malomam maofana wit, ea' amom ina mail mola gwa'aimi, owa'.
42008008	Ea' anemb bewa begafe' itap fasipai ea' bataga balo bail bela gwa'aisi. Olemb ambamba atona bataga balo bail bela gwa'aisi hiasi 100-pelais atis.” Jisas na'ias na'amba ma ea', na'ipas mehip na'i, “Ipa' aligah hagagalipai ma pegame' basef ifimbai, pendame'ef andeande' ukup pendapomef.”
42008009	Ama main amom alipumi Jisasi mahali'anama basef kofagefa waminif atini.
42008010	Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “God ea' nihimba'mepa basef kofagefa fape fandambahi'i ma ipa' pigawis nomona maol ananini nope Dembinai nugumafipa. Apa' anis daias owa'. God ina nihimba'mas basef ifimba kofagefa, owa'. Ama esis ina seme' basef ifimba alihif, owa'. Seme' basef waminif atini atifa atiasi sotologon, apa' ina siti anis maefah, owa'. Ea' sogahembe' seme' basef, apa' ina sogawa kofagefa, owa'atin.”
42008011	Basef waminif atini kofagefa na'amba. Olemb ambamba si'i basef Godi.
42008012	Anemb begewala ufia'wi ambamba si'i epes same' basef, owa' Satan nafi'i nelefata basef ifimba fagape nelelemb asasilimbi ma esis ina sahapifa God nakwahomas waf awafi sagape andeande', owa'atin.
42008013	Anemb bewa bafe' anagon otambaigimai, ambamba si'i anis epes same' basef Godi ea' sofa'ef sandagalamef. Apa' isimba si'i masilimb owa' bendala begewala itap awinia. Esis sahapilif nogota bandata ma a'i owa', Satan nagwambasa sonda' waf awafi ea' sandahagas sakwaha sagahapifa God.
42008014	Anemb begewala mandelef wandafumi la'afini, ambamba si'i anis same' basef sailif safe' ama main owa', anom nimanimi mamimami maloma moni main a anom dagala maim itapami, hiahaom amamba maso'ala esis. Ea' ina sahapilif sanda' waf bu'wafi banages, owa'atin. A sowa si'i gwa'aisi owa' sogalo andeande'ia.
42008015	Apa' olemb ambamba begewala itap fasipai, ambamba si'i anis same' basef sahapilif tatala'if. Nelelemb asasilimbi fasilimba sagame' basef Godi sogailif. Esis sape banages sanda' waf fasifi banagef, isimba sape si'i olemb bataga balo bail begela gwa'aisi andeande'i.”
42008016	“Epes ina sakata lambeh sopalo'ambeh ha'oh lafelagwa baketia o belitagw lafelagwa, owa'atin. Esis sawamonambeh hatoma belita ilifa epes isimba suwisi sigati nogogala'.
42008017	Hiahaom mape mandambahi'i anaf motaga alihigima hiasi sotolom sogawam. Apa' hiahaom hiami ata' sambaho'wam maga'ihi, anaf a' motaga mondawalap, hiasi sogawam.
42008018	Ea' ipa' solawaipa pendame' basef andeande'. Epes ami sogahapila basef Godii, atiasi God a' nowatanimasef wapani. Apa' isimba owa' sogahapilifia, atiasi basef kwawia'wif ifimba esis sogahapilafi, God a' nondalombasef esis sope dowaf.”
42008019	Nemaf afamba ma'mana Jisasi kwao'wa owapana safi'mai anen. Owa' amam nematawa hiasi sandakolasi sili'amana, ea' esis ina safe' felefele'ma anen, owa'.
42008020	Ea' anis epes sape sagalomanai sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' neme', ma'mena ine'ikwi kwaloma anom owapena ine'imi safi'i salutu ando', sa'i solomena si'i.”
42008021	Ea' nagwamasa basef isimba hiasi na'ipas na'i, “Esis amam nematawa isimba sogame' basef Godii sogailafi, isimba ma'me sahin owan ae'asi.”
42008022	Anef nemaf Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi malota anota bot. Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Afa' ofe' dumb ambamba fisanamb.” Ea' amom malota bot mafe'.
42008023	Bot atamba tafe' atin, Jisas ambehahana na'oh nolola. Ama main, anona fufin lu'unai naluwi dumb ambamba, embel kolo'walam mawisi bot nomon ta'i asi'ita ma embel felefele'ma mogowala.
42008024	Ea' mafe' minimbalona ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wa'i ahigililafa.” Anen nosafel ninifala fufini embel. Ea' fufin nowala embel ina ata' lasiali' a'owa', betah hilili'.
42008025	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Hapif ipe'inai nape ani?” Amom ombal maham ukup hiahawep. Ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Anen epen ami? Na'ipa fufini embel same'ana sagahapifana.”
42008026	A'i owa' main, Jisas naloma alipumi mafe' mataga anagon esis Gegesa sagapoma, anamba nape wa'ol dumb fisanamb itap apamba Galili.
42008027	Ea' Jisas nakwaha bot nisila' nafe' akata, anona aman nagape taun inimbai nafi'mai anen. Anom ambagof awami mapaona. Anen ina nowaho' anef lowaf nape andeande' anota ipat, owa'atin. Fowa' anen aona nape atapina nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei'. Nape nafe' wandelef matmati atom.
42008028	-
42008029	Anona ambal aunai nahapilana tatala'ina. Esis sombalo'ana sumafiana dondol sanda' seni hankap sowa'ana lagof bo'wagah, owa', owa'atin. Nahape'am atin. Ea' ambal anamba aunai nofa'ana nafe' anamba epes akagoma. Aman anamba nafi'i nati Jisas, go'ala nalef nafi'i nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi. Ea' Jisas na'ipana dindinip na'i. “Ina' ambal aunai kwaha aman anamba fo'o.” Ea' nofalana mehip a'owa' na'i, “Jisas, ina' Nogamana dembinai God nagape ilif endilisii, ina' na'i nenda' maina ae'? Ae' a'ipina endilisi gani ilifa agol Godi, ina' owa'i nese'e akafimia.”
42008030	A'i owa' main, Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Agol ine'igili ami?” Anen na'i, “Agol ae'agili ambagof hiami.” Dei' main, ambagof awami hiami mafe' mawisana.
42008031	Ea' ambagof amamba gigal ma'oh banagambel mofala Jisas atapim ma'i, “Ina' owa'i netofafa ofe' owala nowaga launai owa' nowala nogotambilia.”
42008032	Anamba anogof bogof hiagufi falutu fa' gwa'aisi anota damota felefele'. Ea' ambagof awami mofala Jisas dindinip ma'i, “Ina' ni'i aho'ma afa' ofe' uwis bogof gwagwafumba!” Ea' na'i aho'mam,
42008033	makwaha aman anamba mawisi a' mafe' mawisa bogof. Ea' bogof agwafomba hiagufi mafa' mafe' mehip mowala ta'alogol awagoma tata, mowala embel dumb afum hi'alam.
42008034	Ea' amom mugumafiagufi mati hiahaom magatagama bogof agwafumbai, mafa' mafe' ma'ipasa hiahaom amamba amom magatulumi amam nematawa sagape tauni sagail aofah felefele'i wapani.
42008035	Ea' esis safe'ma sigati hiahaom amambai. Safi'mai Jisas sati aman anamba fowa' ambagof awami magapaunai dei' makwahona ea' ambo'ona nomonas fasisi sapaona andeande' nowaho' lowaf tol nape felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi. Esis sati amamba a' ombal mahas.
42008036	Ea' epes isimba sagati hiahawes isimbai, sa'ipas sa'i waf Jisas nanda'afa aman anamba fowa' ambagof awami magapaunai dei' ambo'ona wapani.
42008037	Ea' epes hiasi sagape anamba Gegesai ombal mahas a'owa' sa'ipa Jisas sa'i, “Ina' nekwaha apa' a fo'o.” Ea' Jisas nalota anota bot notanima nafe'.
42008038	Aman anamba fowa' ambagof awami magapaunai nahali' Jisas dindinip na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena.” Owa' Jisas nasapa'ana na'i,
42008039	“Ina' tanima fo'o wambel ine'imbili, newalapa basefa hiahaom hiami God nanda'menam ine'i.” Ea' aman anamba nafe' nawalapa basefa hiahaom amamba ma amam nematawa hiasi sagape taun inimbai hi'alasa hiahaom Jisas nanda'manam anini.
42008040	Jisas notanima nafi'i, anis amam nematawa hiasi sape sohafana. Ea' sanda'mana nemaf bu'wafi sandagalama nagafi'i.
42008041	-
42008042	Ama main, anona aman nataga agilinama Jairus. Anen nugumafi ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai. Nogamana nemata'w atoto'w afagof akwa'ugufi 12-pelaiguf felefele' kwa'i koga'. Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi, nahali'ana dindinip na'i, “Ina' nifi'i ipat ae'atai.” Jisas nafe' esis amam nematawa hiasi safe' salipana dogw.
42008043	Anen ata' nafe' atin, owa', ano'w nemata'w kwafi'i felefele'ma alafuga ananigai. Aowas awasini nanda'akwa kwape gamba atapi'w afagof 12-pelaiguf. Otamba ako'umbai basa bewala hi'alambama kwagatala dokta hiami, apa' ina anom la'ifima monda'akw kogataga bo'okw, owa'atin.
42008044	Ea' kwafe' kwasa lagola saket Jisasi da'malifitama. Kwanda'as na'amba, kwafalis atin esimbel a' maso', ea' ina ata' maluwi wapani, a' owa'atin.
42008045	Ea' Jisas nahali'as na'i, “Ami nasa lagola ae'?” Ea' esis hiasi sa'i atin atin sa'i, “Ae' owa'.” Ea' Pita na'i, “Dembinai, epes hiasi isimba salutu salipina, esis safe' gol ina'.”
42008046	Owa' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ame' banagami ae'ami makwahowe mafe'ma monda' anin epen bo'wen. Ae' egawa anin epen nasa lagol alop ae'api.”
42008047	Ea' nemata'w akwamba kogawa ako'w ina atiasi kondambaho'w ma anen, owa'. Na'amba ako'w bolala'w kwafi'i kowafa kotawa itap felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi ma naep amam nematawa hiasii. Ea' kwawalapa basef kofagefa akwa'ufi ma dei' kwagasa lagola anen. Ea' kwa'i, “Aowas ae'ani ahi'alan kwafalis atetef.”
42008048	Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Nogame, dei' ina' ea' nahapifa ae' banagiwai. Isimba atis dei' anda'ena bo'wena. Ina' fo'o opaf ine'ifi fope awanef.”
42008049	Anen ata' na'i atin owa', anona aman nakwaha ipat Jairusi nafi'i na'ipa Jairus na'amba na'i, “Nogamena ine'ikwi a kwaga' ea'. Na'amba ina nenda' Dembinai Tisa nofo'o noma'w kohana, owa', hapaimi.”
42008050	Owa' Jisas name'as na'ipa Jairus na'i, “Ina' ombal mehena, owa'i. Ina' nihapifi atin, ama atiasi nogamena ine'ikwi kogosafel wapani.”
42008051	-
42008052	Ea' Jisas nafe' nataga ipat Jairusi apa' ina na'i aho'ma amam nematawa hiasi suwis ipat sogalomana, owa'. Nao'wa Pitai Jon Jems atom maloma ma'ma'wi ahama'w atis safe' sawis salomana. Esis amam nematawa hiasi sape salef sanda'agama'w a'owa'. Owa' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' ina pelef, owa'i. Tol pepe. Ako'w ina kwaga' dogw, owa'. Kwa'oh atin.”
42008053	Ea' esis sanda'iafana kwapete'. Esis sogawa ako'w kwaga' endilisi.
42008054	Owa' Jisas nahapila lagol akwa'ugili nofala'w na'i, “Sa'ukwi, ina' safel.”
42008055	Ea' ambal akwa'uli lotanima lafi'i lawisa'w wapani kosafel kwafalis. Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis mamasa'w na'i, “Ipa' so'akwa anis gwa'aisi.”
42008056	Ea' sati isimba, agogolalasis endilisi nomonas salasafe'. Na'amba Jisas na'ipas dindinipa sogagi'ma basef ananifi na'i, “Ipa' ina pi'ipa anin epena hiahawes isimba, owa'i.”
42009001	Nemaf afamba Jisas nofalai alipumi 12-pelaim ananimi mandakolas mafi'i naso'am agol lu'wagili nowa' banagama mogatofa ambagof hiami awami mogatofa aowas hianai naninani nogafe'.
42009002	Ea' nasapa'am mafe' ma'ipas basefa epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias ea' manda' awasisi bo'wes.
42009003	Anen na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina pefa' anis maefah galahitagwi isalef gwa'aisi moni, owa'i, hapaisi. Ipa' ina pefa' siagw biagw atogw, owa'. Pefa' atota atin.
42009004	I'i pefe' pigawis anota ipat, ipa' pepe ipat atamba atota. Ama main, pekwaha wambel ambalemba apefe'.
42009005	Apa' i'i esis owa' sofa'epa pegafe' ifagw asasigwia, dao' ipa' pekwaha wambel ambalemba pindila'ma usas itap pagail bo'wagah ipe'igahi ma esis sitilipa sogogawa waf awafi asasifi kofagema asasimi atom.”
42009006	Ea' alipumi Jisasi makwaha anamba magapoma mafe' walemb anamba hiagoma ma'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi. Ea' matopalopa epes aowas nanda'asi sagape walemb hiagomai manda'as bo'wes wapani.
42009007	Gavman dembinai king Herot nugumafi itap lu'upa Galili name' basefa hiahawes isimba hiasi sataga, apa ina nogawas andeande' ea' nomonas salasafe'. Dei' main, anis epes sa'i, “Jon a' notanima nosafel matmat wapani.”
42009008	Apa' anis sa'i anif basefa Elaija profet fowa'inai sa'i, “Anen nosafel wapani.” Ea' anis sa'i, “Anona aman profet fowa'inai notanima nosafel wapani.”
42009009	Apa' Herot na'i, “Jon ae' atopa' bini'wana ea'. Apa' aman anamba agame' basefanai, anen mamahonama?” Nape atapina na'i niti Jisas.
42009010	Aposel alipumi Jisasi motanima mafi'i ma'ipa Jisasa hiahawes maol amom manda'ani. Ea' anen nao'wam makwaha anis epes daias, amom atom mafe' anin taun Betsaida.
42009011	A'i owa' main, esis sogawa anamba nagapoma sagi'mana safe'. Safi'mai anen, nanda'mas nemaf bu'wafi nandagalama esis sagafi'i. Ea' nawalipas basefa esis sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Ea' nanda' epes aowas nanda'asi asataga bo'wes.
42009012	Ama wambomota awin newala, alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim mafi'mai anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' nesapa' amam nematawa isimba sofo'o walemb aofah sagape felefele'i ma sogolaoma ifagwi gwa'aisi. Dei' main, ana'e afa' wagapoma wafigima epes akagoma.”
42009013	Owa' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' atipa pese'as gwa'aisi.” Ea' amom ma'i, “Afa' gwa'aisi owa' hiasa. Bret wa'agolita taloma agof biagof ea' isimba atis sa'oh. Apa' ina' na'i afa' ofe' utalai gwa'aisi ma amam nematawa isimba hiasi?”
42009014	Amam atom hiami 5,000-pelaim mape. Apa' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ipa' pi'ipa esis sondakolas sope oto otowa sotagama misi'ah wa'agilih atoh.”
42009015	Ea' manda' amam nematawa hiasi sape.
42009016	Jisas nasa'ma bret atamba wa'agolita taloma agof biagof, naniga nati heven ilif nanifela God. Ea' nawalota naso' alipumi ananimi maso' esis amam nematawa hiasi hi'agalas.
42009017	Sa'as alihis andondo', alipumi ananimi matatama du'wa'wanisi sagasaga'ihi malo'was folalef lu'walifi 12-pelailif si'ilif kwaef.
42009018	Anef nemaf Jisas atotona nape nandabeten, alipumi ananimi mape malomana nahali'am na'i, “Esis amam nematawa sa'i ae' aman mamahowema?”
42009019	Owa' amom magwa basef na'amba ma'i, “Anis sa'i ina' Jon aman nagapisi'as embeli. Apa anis sa'i ina' anona profet daiana fowa'inai netanima nesafel wapani, a anis sa'i ina' Elaija.”
42009020	Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipa' pa'i ae' ami?” Pita nagwa basef na'i, “Ina' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii.”
42009021	Jisas na'ipam basef banagafi na'i amom ina mi'ipasa basef ifimba anis daias mi'i anen Krais, owa'i.
42009022	Ea' na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi atiasi efa' akafimi hiami ma anom agufumi dembami moloma anom dembami pris a anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi atiasi mowa' alafugaha ae', mohe ega'. Apa' nimaguf bif hi'ilif anef fegafe'ma wanifi, God a' nosa'me itanima esafel wapani.”
42009023	Ea' na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ae' efa' akafimi anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. I'i anin epen ni'i nila ae', anin nenda'as na'amba atin si'i ae' atapin nimaguf danda ma nigaili. Ea' netalogofa okom ananimi ma maol main anin na'i nenda'ani.
42009024	Dei' main, epen ami okom mopoma ambal ananili atol, ni'i nihapilal tatala'il, anaf ambal ananili higililal. Apa' ami okom mopoma ae' ma nesambala ambal ananili itap apa'e, anaf ambal ananili God nofa'al lotanimai nepe andeande' lifilafi.
42009025	I'i epen ami nenda' maol naninani ma negefa' gwa'aimi uga hiahaom hiami itapami atom higiligalami, anin wapani awen higililan nelomam. Dei' bola hiahaom amamba atiasi motopalopan mi'imama? Owa'atin endilisi.
42009026	Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. I'i epen ami ambal aola ae' nendafa'me eloma basef ae'afi, ae' wapani ambal aola epen inimba endafa'man nemaf afamba ae' ifi'i egaloma hiahaom fasimi banagami mogogala'i ae'ami, elomai mogogala'i Godi a amom ensel hilili'i wapani.
42009027	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anipa pagalutu na'ai atiasi ina pega' ulal, ata' owa'. Anipa atiasi apiti God nogape dembinai ma epes ananisi.”
42009028	Jisas na'ipasa basef ifimba ma ea', nimaguf ifimba 8-pelaif fafe'ma ea', anen nao'wa Pita naloma Jemsi Jon, nao'wam mondowasa' anota halafuta ma nondabeten.
42009029	Anen nape nandabeten atin, amaga ananigai agataga gandati na'a, ea' luwaguf nagalami a' mataga afitim a'owa' mogala'.
42009030	-
42009031	Ea' amam biam fowa'imi Mosesi Elaija mataga maloma mogogala'i banagami ilifami ea' malutu ma'i malomana. Amom ma'i ma atiasi Jisas a' nigaila okom Godi ma nokwaha itap apa'e nogaga' gani Jerusalem.
42009032	Pita naloma alipumi biam Jisasi amom naep nimanip a'owa' ma'i mo'oh atin. Owa' mosafel mati mogogala'i Jisasi maloma amam amamba biam malutu magalumanai.
42009033	Amom biam ma'i mokwaha Jisas mefe', owa' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wape na'a'e a' fafas. Afa' ola' anoh aolah wanoh hondandamepa. Ina' anop, Moses anop Elaija anop.” Pita ina nogawa andeande'ma naga'i basef ifimba.
42009034	Anen ata' na'i basef atin, anom ilagw maofana amom mili'amam a' ombal maham.
42009035	Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai ilagw nomon ga'i, “Anamba anen Nogame ae'anai. Ae' andandepana ea'. Ipa' pendame' basef ananifi.”
42009036	Malogol agalemba ga'i ea', amom mati Jisas atona nalutu. Ea' amom malogof faso', ina ma'ipa anis epesa hiahaom amamba magatulumi, owa'.
42009037	Ama naman amom makwaha halafuta atamba miliana, ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi safi'i sowando'ma Jisas ufia'w.
42009038	Anona aman nagalutu la'afena esisi na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ahali'ina dindinip a'i, ina' niti nogame ae'anai uwahipina. Ea' anen atotona.
42009039	Anona ambal aunai nahapilana sisihina, ea' kwafalis anen hoga'ala kwapete'. Ea' ambal anamba aunai naolana kwapete' endilisi, ofap nataga sisih malogol ananigili. Ambal anamba nahambombagana alop ananipi endilisi, ea' ina nakwahona, owa'atin. Napaona atapina.
42009040	Ea' ae' dei' ahali' alipumi ine'imi ma mogatofa ambal anamba aunai. Owa', amom ina la'ifim.”
42009041	Jisas nagwa basef na'ipas dindinip nasa'ma ukup asasipi na'i, “O, ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itapi, owa' pigahapifaia, nelelemb ipe'ilimbi owa' bepe andeande'a. Nimaguf ma'uf ae' ata' epe elomepa wapani ma egefa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipa' okwan nifi'mai ae'.”
42009042	Nogamana ata' nafi'i atin, owa' ambal anamba aunai naolana nafe' nowa itap nakoto'ana kwapete' endilisi. Owa' Jisas ninifala ambal aunai nanda' aman anamba sa'unai bo'ona ea' naso'anana notanima nafe'ma ahamana ananinai.
42009043	Isimba atis dei' amam nematawa hiasi sati banagami lu'wami Godi agogolalasis kwapete' endilisi. Esis ata' nomonas salasafe' hiahias atina hiahaom amamba anen nanda'ami, owa' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'amba na'i,
42009044	“Ipa' pembe' aligah andeande'ma basef dei' ae' iga'ipipafi. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi atiasi felefele' anona aman noso'asa ae' efe'ma lagof amom boumi ae'ami.”
42009045	Ea' amom alipumi mame' basef ifimba atif, apa' ina mogawa kofagefa, owa'. Ata' fandambaho'ma amom. Ea' amom ombal mahama mogahali'ana ma basef ifimba kofagefa.”
42009046	Ea' alipumi Jisasi ma'i anif basef mafitapef ma'i ami nepe dembinai amamunai.
42009047	Owa' Jisas nogawa nomonas isimbai sagape nelelemb amamilimb, ea' nasa'mai anin awani sa'wini nafi'i nalutu nalomana.
42009048	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Epen ami neso' opafa negatopalopa anin awani si'i ini'i ma okom ananimi mopoma ae', anin nase'e opaf ae' wapani natopalope. Ea' epen ami negatopalopa ae'i, anin natopalopa anen nasapa'e agafi'ii wapani. Dei' main? Epen ami nepe agol akana la'afena ipa' hipai, anin nape dembeni nali'ma ipa'.”
42009049	Ea' Jon nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wati anona aman nanda' maol natofa ambagof awami ma agol ine'igili. Anen ina nagi'mafa. Ea' dei' wasopamana.”
42009050	Owa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ipa' ina apesopamana, owa'i. Dei' main? Epen ami ina bouni ipe'ini, inimba alipini ipe'ini.”
42009051	Nogota God na'i nofa' Jisas nogalota heven tafi'i felefele', ea' Jisas okom banagem na'i a' nefe' Jerusalem.
42009052	Ea' nasapa' anom amam mali' mofa' basef ananifi mafe'. Mafe' mawis anambel wambel esis Samariai ma mogandondomba hiahawes ananisi.
