42009053	Owa', esis wambel ambalemba sowa' alafugaha Jisas sandaiwa'ma sofa'ana sogafe' ipat asasitai. Dei' main? Esis sogawa anen na'i nefe' Jerusalem.
42009054	Ea' alipumi amamba biam ananimi Jemsi Jon mati waf afamba ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i afa' ofalai nif fagandifi fisila'i hevena fegando epes isimba?”
42009055	Owa' Jisas nandambema ninifala amom biam.
42009056	Ea' mafe' anambel wambel daiambel.
42009057	Amom ata' mafe' ufia'w atin, owa' anona aman na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena. Ea' ofe' atin anamba hiagoma ina' na'i negafe'ma.”
42009058	Owa' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Nombagw alupugwi bologwalefa itap apa'e wambel agwagumbili. Amiguf wapani fufia' fagafe' ilifi fala' owah fapaoh gani ilif, apa' ae' owa'atin. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi wambel ake ma e'eh egalo balaga ae'agai.”
42009059	Ea' na'ipa anona aman daiana na'i, “Ina' nifi'i nila ae'.” Owa' anen na'i, “Ae' a'i ata' epe imafi ahame ata' etopalopana ma noga' iwana nogapani ifi'i ilina.”
42009060	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Hapaimi, esis sagaga'i sondawago esis atis isimba sagaga'i. Apa' ina' fo'o newalapa basefa epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias.”
42009061	Ea' anona aman daiana na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i ilina. Apa' ina' ata' ni'i aho'ma ae' efe'ma esis wambota ae'atai inifelis i'i nemaf bu'wafi ma esis sili'?”
42009062	Owa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Epen ami nesafel nili' nenda' maol aofi ma nendambema niti alafuga ma negakwaha maol ananini, anin ina la'ifina nenda' maola ni'ipas sogawis nomona maol Godi, owa'atin.”
42010001	Ama main, Dembinai nandandepa anom alipumi ananimi 72-pelaim nasapa'am mafe' mandaho'ma biam atom mali'ana mafe'. Anen nasapa'am mafe' taun walemb hiagoma anen na'i nogafe'agoma.
42010002	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' piti aofah hiagahi gwa'aimi hiami a' maof ea', apa' epes sanda' maoli owa' hiasa, kwasala'wis. Ea' ipa' penda' betena pihali' dembinai kofagonama aofi. Pihali'ana ma nogosapa'i epes hiasi sofe' sonda' maola sola gwa'aimi ananimi sogambe'am atifigin.
42010003	Ipa' fo'o. Peme', ae' asapa' ipa' pefe' si'i mafis sipsip la'afena nombagw alupugwi.
42010004	Ipa' ina pefa' paos manisi soloma brasbeli su, owa'i. Ipa' ina penda'masa nimaguf bu'wafi anis amam nematawa ufiawa, owa'i. Pefe' kwafalis.
42010005	I'i ipa' pefe' pigawis anota ipata, ata' pili' pi'ias na'amba pi'i, afa' wa'i God nonda' opalef ipa' hipai pagape ipat atambai fepe awanelef.
42010006	Ama i'i anin epen opaf awanafi nepe ipat atamba, ea' basef bu'wafi ipe'ifi fepoma epen inimba. Apa' i'i owa', hapaimi, basef ifimba bu'wafi fitanimai fepemepa atapif.
42010007	Ipa' pendape ipat atamba atota. Ina pepe pefe' ifagw gwagwigwagwi, owa'i. Pepe ipat atamba atotota pea' gwa'aisi embel esis sagasi'ipasi. Dei' main, amom manda' maoli andeande'ma mogofa' otamba ma maol amamini.
42010008	I'i ipa' pefe' pigawis anin taun ama esis sofa'epa pegafe' ifagw asasigwi, ipa' pefa' gwa'aisi esis sagatambe'mepas ipe'i.
42010009	Ea' penda' isimba aowas nanda'asi bo'wes wambel ambalemba. Ea' pi'ipa esis pi'i, ‘Nemaf afamba felefele'ma fegataga ma ipa' pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa.’
42010010	Apa' ipa' i'i pefe' piwis anin taun, ama esis owa' sofa'epa pefe' ifagw asasigwia, ipa' pefe' pilutu ufiawa taun inimba pi'i,
42010011	‘Itap du'wa'wanipi ma taun inimba ipe'ini paila bo'wagah afa'igahi, apa' afa' upati'ap pitanima pefe'mago ipa'. Ama ipa' ukup pendanda' pegawa basef ifimba andeande'. Nemaf afataga felefele' ma epes sogawis nomona maol Godi, owa', ipa' pandaiwa'.’
42010012	Dei' ae' a'ipipa, nemaf afamba lu'wafi God nogawaloga epesafi anen anaf niti esis fowa' sagape Sodomi uwahipis kwasakwasala. Apa epes isimba wambel ambalembaisi anen ina niti uwahipis, owa'. Akafimi lu'wami awami endilisii anaf a' motagamas.”
42010013	“Ae' ati ipa' Korasinipai paloma Betsaida owahipipa a'owa'! Nimanimi akafimi lu'wami atiasi a' motagamepa. Epes isimba fowa' gani sanda' waf awafii sagape walemb ambalemba bialembi Tairi Saidoni, esis ina sati anin maol bu'wani banagani si'i dei' anda'am walemb ipe'ilimbi, owa'. I'i esis isimba Tairi Saidon siti maol inimba ai, esis sowaho' begah pepe'agatami si'i luwaguf tol sope nif agambeh. Ama sigihimba'ma anis epes esis ea' sambema nelelemb endilisi safe'ma God. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
42010014	Nemaf afamba God nogawaloga epesafi, niti esis fowa' sagape Tairi Saidoni uwahipis kwasakwasala. Apa' ipa' anen ina niti uwahipipa, owa'. Anaf pefa' akafimi lu'wami awami endilisi.
42010015	Ea' ipa' Kaperneam, anaf esis sosa'ma agof ipe'igufi folota ilif? Owa'atin. Anaf God nokwahepa pefe' pewala wambel awambili hel.”
42010016	Ea' na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Epen ami negame' malogof ipe'igufii, anin name' malogol ae'agili wapani. Apa' epen ami nese'epa alafugah ipa', anin nase'e alafuga ae' ea' naso'ana alafuga anen nasapa'e agafi'ii wapani.”
42010017	A'i owa' main, amom amamba mafe' manda' maoli 72-pelaim motanima mafi'i sonaham endilisi ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wahapila agol ine'igili, ambagof awami mame' basef afa'ifi.”
42010018	-
42010019	Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ati Satan a' nowai heven si'i otaga holala ma diwagala. Peme', ae' ea' ase'epa banagami ipa' ma atiasi la'ifipa pegefa'asa uguf awagufi wandafugufi foloma awisuguf. Ama la'ifipa pegapa'aga banagami hiami aman bounai aunai ipe'inai. Ea' ina atiasi anin mae atitin nehambombagepa, owa'atin.
42010020	Apa' ipa' ina pendagalama ambagof awami magame' basef ipe'ifi, owa'i. Ipa' sonendahepa ma God nanda' agof ipe'igufi fail buk anani'wi gani heven.”
42010021	Nogota atamba atota Ambal bu'unai Godi nawalapa dagala nembel Jisasi ea' na'i, “O ahame, ina' Dembinai ma ilifi itapi. Ae' asa'ma agol ine'igili anifelina. Dei' main? Ina' nambaho' hiahaom amamba ma esis epes gawaisi sogofa' gawa lu'wanii, ea' nambemam nihimba'masam epes isimba gawa akasi falafisi. Aho' ahame, okom ine'imi maga'i, ea' amamba atom.
42010022	“Ahame ae'anai nanda' hiahaom hiami hi'alam mape lagol ae'agili. Ina anin epen negawa ae' Nogamana Godi, owa'atin. Anen atona nogawe. Ea' owa' anin epen negawa ahamea, owa'atin. Ae' Nogamana ananiwai atowe egawana. Ae' aloma epes isimba mamahisa igihimba'masa isimba wapani, esis atis sogawana.”
42010023	Ea' anen nandambema nati amom alipumi ananimi atom mape malomana na'ipam na'i, “Epes sagati hiahaom ipa' pagatulumi esis sonahas.
42010024	Dei' main? Fowa' amom king dembami hiami maloma amom profet hiami ma'i miti hiahaom amamba dei' ipa' pagatulumi. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ukup amamipi pa'ipa'i a'owa' ma ma'i mogame' basef ifimba ipa' pagame'afi, apa' owa', owa'atin. Amom ina mame'ef matolom.”
42010025	Anona aman gawainai nagawalipasa mu'uli Godii nosafel na'i nogwamba Jisas nememe'mana. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' enda' maina atiasi egefa' ambal namili egape andeande' lifilafi?”
42010026	Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Basef maif fapoma mu'uli Godi? Ina' natalifif na'imama?”
42010027	Owa' anen nagwamana basef na'i, “Nomonas ipe'isi sehafela dembinai God ipe'inai sisilana na'amba. Ukup ipe'ipi pipilana hi'indalep, pese'ana ambagufi nelelemb soloma pepel ipe'isi pendaso'anas hi'indalasa dembinai God atona. Ea' ukup pipila anis epes sagape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ukup pagapagaila ipa' atipa.”
42010028	Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Isimba ina' nagwa basef usi'if. Ina' nenda'as na'amba ma atiasi negape ambal namili dondol lifilafi.”
42010029	Aman anamba na'i nondanda' agol ananigili atogol gondape bo'wagol. Ea' na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Epes sagape felefele'ma ae'i, esis ami?”
42010030	Ea' Jisas nagwamana anif basef na'i, “Anona aman nakwaha Jerusalem nafe' niliana Jeriko. Ea' anom manda' wali matolona ufia'w, mandolaepana hiahaom hiami luwaguf maim ananimi mahana kwapete'. Amom manda'am na'amba makwahona mafe'. Anen nandati si'i nagaga'i.
42010031	Nemaf afamba anona aman pris naila ufia'w akwamba nafe'. Owa' nati aman anamba, nindihi'amana naila ufia'w wa'akw nafe'.
42010032	Ama main, anona aman wambota Livaii naila ufia'w akwamba nafi'i wapani. Nafi'i nati aman anamba owa', nindihi'amana naila ufia'w wa'ol atogon nafe'.
42010033	Owa', anona aman Samariainai naila ufia'w akwamba nafi'i natagama aman anamba. Anen natolona nati owahipina endilisi.
42010034	Ea' nafe' felefele'ma anen nakolo'wa wel marasin naloma embel waina melegw ananigwi, ea' nowa'managw. Ea' nasa'mana nawamonana natoma donki ananini nofa'ana nafe' nahaponana nape ipat esis fi'ife' sagapautai ea' na'ipa aman nugumafi ipati ma nugumafiana andeande'.
42010035	Ama wafilu anen naso'ana 2 kina aman nugumafi ipat atambai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nimafi aman anamba andeande'. Ama i'i anin moni ine'ini nesa negewalama anona, anef itanimai egwamenan.’”
42010036	Jisas na'ipana basef ifimba ea' nahali'ana na'i, “Dei' ina' okom mapomas na'imama? Amam wanom maila ufia'w magafi'ii, amom ami nanda'as si'i aman nagape felefele'ma aman anamba amam awami magahanai?”
42010037	Ea' nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Aman anamba Samariainai nati anen uwahipina natopalopana.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fo'o nenda'am na'amba atin.”
42010038	Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mafe' ufia'w, ea' nataga anambel wambel nafe' nawis. Ea' ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Marta kofa'ana kwafe' ipat akwa'utai.
42010039	Owama'w akwa'u'wi agili'wa Maria. Maria kwafi'i kwape felefele'ma bo'wagah Dembinai, kwame' basef ananifi.
42010040	Apa' Marta kwanda' maol hiani ma kwagandondomba gwa'aimi. Nomonas akwa'usi sandapoma mamimami. Ea' kwafe'ma Jisas kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, ina' netelowe uwahipiwi. Owame ae'akwi kwa'waha ae' atowe anda' maola agandondomba gwa'aisi. Ina' kipa'w kufi'i kotopalope.”
42010041	Owa' Dembinai nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Marta, Marta, ina' okom mandapoma mamimami ma nembel ine'imbili nafe' aona ma hiahaom hiami.
42010042	Apa' hiahawes fasisi atifis ina' ata' akena. Maria kwa'i kofa' hiahawes isimba fasisi sikila' anis daias. Ina anin epen la'ifinama negelefata hiahawes isimba bu'wasi ma ako'w, owa'.”
42011001	Anef nemaf Jisas nandabeten nape anagon. A'i owa' nandabetena hi'alan, anona alipunai ananinai na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' nihimba'mafa ondabeten si'i fowa' Jon nigihimba'ma alipumi ananimi.”
42011002	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Afamba ipa' pi'i pendabeten, ipa' piga'ias na'amba pi'i, Ahamapa, apa' ma'i agol ine'igili gondape hilili' ma hiasi sogasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol. Ma'i nemaf afamba bu'wafi fifi'i ma epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol ine'ini nepe Dembinai nugumafias.
42011003	Dei' ina' nese'apa gwa'aisi sondahama nemaf afa'e.
42011004	Ina' nekwahomapa waf awafi ape'ifi okom mose'enaf. Dei' main? Apa' wapani makwahomasa waf awafi anis sanda'mapafi ukup paso'apaf. Ina' owa'i ne'wapa mefe'ma hiahaom ahifimi mogogwamba ape'ia.”
42011005	Ea' na'ipam anif basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i anona aman alipunai ipe'inai nefe' niga'ipa alipunai ananinai owamb amanota niga'i, ‘O alipunai, ina' se'e bret wanifita
42011006	ma igimafi alipunai ae'anai nafi'i natagama ae', apa' ae' gwa'aisi ake ma igimafiana.’
42011007	Owa', aman anamba napani ipat nomon nagwai basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' andaiwa'ma negase'e noma'w ae', owa'. Ae' awasi sa'oh ea' ao'was ma'oh alahis. Ae' ina la'ifiwi ma esafel egase'ena gwa'aisi, owa'.’ Dei' nonda'as ni'imama?
42011008	Ae' a'ipipa, aman ipat atambainai ina okom mapomana na'i aman anamba alipunai ananinai ma nosafel nogaso'an gwa'aisi, owa'atin. Anen okom iwanima nagame' aman anamba falafala atapina nagapomana. Isimba atis dei' nosafel naso'ana hiahaom hiami anen waowaolomi.
42011009	“Dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipa' pihali' Goda, atiasi nogase'epa hiahawes. Isimba ipa' pala pilaomasi, atiasi a' pitilis. Ipa' peha uta, atiasi God nuwisi'mipata ipa'.
42011010	Dei' main, epes ami sogahali' Godi, sofa' maefah. Epen ami nela negelaoma hiahawesi, atiasi higatilisi. Ea' epen ami negaha utai, atiasi God nuwisi'manata anin.
42011011	“I'i anin awani nigahali' ahaman ananini nogaso'an anol aol, anen ina atiasi noso'an anol ul awali, owa'atin.
42011012	I'i awani nihali' ahamana nogaso'ana anomb kohomb, atiasi noso'an anol aunil awali? Isimba wapani, owa'atin.
42011013	Ea' ipa' amam nematawa aupai pagaso'asa hiahawes fasisi atisa awasi ipe'isii, ahamepa ipe'inai nagape heveni anen wapani atiasi noso'asa Ambal bu'winai ananinai isimba sagahali'anai.”
42011014	Jisas anona ambal aunai nape nagasopama malogol anona amani. Nafa' nafe', ea' aman anamba ambo'ona noga na'i. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi ukup hiahawep papoma isimba.
42011015	Owa' anis epes sa'i, “Anen natofa ambagof awami ma banagami anona ambal aunai mamana agilinama Belsebul.”
42011016	Apa' anis epes sa'i sogwambana sofalana sa'i anen ata' nonda' anin maol banagani nagafi'i heveni ma sitilin sogogawa endilisi God natopalopana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
42011017	Owa' anen nogawa ukup asasipi na'ipas na'i, “I'i anis epes hiasi sagape itap lu'upa anin kantri sondatopa' biafis sogapa', ina atiasi banages, owa'. I'i anis epes wambota atota sondatopa' biafisa sogapa', esis ina atiasi banages sopa', owa'atin.
42011018	I'i wambota Satani sondawal biafis sogapa', atiasi wambota atamba atotota banages sopa' si'imama? Owa'atin. Ipa' pa'i ae' atofa ambagof awami ma banagami ambal aunai mamana Belsebul. Na'amba ae' dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba.
42011019	I'i endilisi ae' atofa ambagof awami ma banagami Belsebuliai, dei' ami newa' banaga alipumi ipe'imi motofa ambagof awami? Owa'atin. Ea' dei' alipumi ipe'imi mihimba'mepa basef ifimba ipe'ifi owa' endilisifia.
42011020	Banagami Godi atom matopalopa ae' atofa ambagof awami. Ea' dei' ipa' pegawa nemaf afamba epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias afataga ma ipa' ea'.”
42011021	Ea' Jisas na'ipas anif basef waminif atin na'i, “I'i anona aman banagonai nohapila wambawa maim banagona nogapoma ipat ananitai andeande', hiahawes ananisi hiasi sope andeande'.
42011022	Apa' i'i anona aman banagona a'owa'i nigikila' aman nanumba ma anen notaga dindinapina nifi'i nonda' wandaf nolomana nondolaepana wambawa maim aman anamba nagawamona okomami, dao' a' nofa' hiahaom ananimi nowalogam mefe'ma anom amam daiam.
42011023	“Epen ami owa' alipini ae'ani owa' nepe atapin negaloma ae'ia, anin bouni ae'ani. Ea' epen ami owa' nekolasa sipsip pogaloma ae'apia, inimba nagatofa sipsip pafa' pagafe' atona bianai.
42011024	“Nemaf afamba anona ambal aunai nakwaha anin epen nawisi nagafi'i, anen nafe' anamba fatauguma nolaoma anagon na'i nogapoma noma'wa. Nolaomagona owa' niti anagona, ea' ni'i, ‘Ae' itanima efe' ipat fowa' agapautai.’
42011025	Ea' nafi'i nati ipat atamba asambehata andeande' sofalo'mata tape.
42011026	Ea' notanima nafe' nao'wai ambagof deiagof awagufi 7-pelaiguf wapani mafi'i mawis mape ipat atamba. Ambagof amamba awami a'owa' manda' waf awafii fikila' waf awafi fowa' nali' nanda'afi. Fowa' epen inimba ata' nape awen kwasakwasala, apa' dei' nape awen nikila' endilisi poe fowa' nali' nagapaini.”
42011027	Jisas ata' na'i basef ifimba atin owa', anis epes hiasi safi'i salipana. Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwape la'afena esis kwa'i na'amba kwa'i, “Nemata'w akwamba fowa' kogolaena ma kwagase'ena nomambeh ine'i, ako'w kwandagala.”
42011028	Owa' Jisas na'i, “Owa'atin. Ipa' amam nematawa pagame' basef Godi ma pagagi'mafi, ipa' pandagala ea'.”
42011029	Amam nematawa hiasi safi'i sandakolasi sape, Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' amam nematawa dei' pagape itap apa'i, ipa' epes aupai. Dei' pefalagama pa'i pigati anin ametal banagani. Apa' ae' owa'atina enda'an pigatilina, owa'atin. Ametal inimba fowa' God nigihimba'manan Jonai atin atiasi ihimba'mepan ipa'.
42011030	Anona profet Jonai nataga si'i anin ametal nihimba'ma esis amam nematawa Ninivaisi. Ea' na'amba atina ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ataga ape si'i anin ametal Godi ma ipa' amam nematawa pagape nogota ata'i.
42011031	Anaf God nogawaloga epesafi, nemaf afamba ano'w nemata'w kwin dembe'wi kwagapani gani wa'ol awin negemba'mai kosafel koloma ipa' pagape na'ai kola' basef fitanima filipa kwi'i ipa' aupai. Dei' main, kwin akwamba kwapani gani itap pafe' pegetambela, ea' kwafi'i kwame basefa gawa lu'wani dembinai king Solomon nagawalipasani. Apa' dei' anona nigikila' Solomoni nape na'a'e.
42011032	Afamba God nogawaloga esis amam nematawafi esis epes Ninivaisi sosafel sola' basef fitanima filipa ma waf awafi ipa' panda'afi. Dei' main? Esis Ninive same' basef Godi Jona naga'ipasafi, ea' sambema nelelemb sakwaha waf awafi safe'ma God. Apa' dei' anona aman nigikila' Jonai nape na'a'e.
42011033	“Epes ina sokata lambeh nomon ifagw sosapa'am sombaho'am mofe' lafela maloh, owa'atin. Esis sakatambeh hatoma belitagw ilifa suwis sogati haugun.
42011034	Naep nomon ukup ipe'ipi si'i lama alop si'ip ipe'ipi. I'i ukup ipe'ipi be'ep pepe, alop si'ip ipe'ipi pogala' hi'ilap. Apa' i'i ukup ipe'ipi awasip, atiasi alop ipe'ipi hi'ilap ea' akutina.
42011035	Dei' ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba nogogala'i nagape nomona ipe'i a' akotina.
42011036	I'i alop ipe'ipi pogala' hi'ilap, ina anagon kwaia'agon akotigin, owa'. Ea' atiasi alop ipe'ipi pogala' hi'ilap a'owa' si'i lambeh hatoma hogala' hogahihimipa.
42011037	Jisas nanda' basef ifimba ma main, anona aman dembinai Farisi nofalana na'i nifi'i nea' gwa'aisi nolomana. Ea' Jisas nafe' nawis nomon ipat natoma tebol.
42011038	Farisi anamba nati anen nafe' nape na' gwa'aisi owa' nosa'opa lagof fuli' si'i waf amom Farisi magagi'mafia. Ea' anen okom hiahaom mapoma waf afamba.
42011039	Owa' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ipa' Farisi, ipa' pandombasa kapi plet ande'esa atis hilili'. Apa' nomon owa'. Ipa' opalef nomon si'ipama waf walifi faloma anef waf awafi daiaf wapani.
42011040	Ipa' epes ukup pagahipai. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, God nanda' hiahaom ande'ema, nomonema wapani.
42011041	Apa' hiahaom magala nomon kahi plegw ipe'isii, amamba ipa' penda'am pese' epes kwahusi petopalopas. I'i ipa' penda'as na'amba, atiasi hiahawes hiasi ipe'isi ambe'es hilili'.
42011042	“Ipa' Farisi uwahipipa ma akafimi atiasi mogatagamipai. Ipa' pandawaloga nambawai lombo maloma akwal lalilali hiali paso'ana du'wanil ilifunamail God. Apa' ipa' a' pindihi'ama waf bu'wafi usi'ifi ukup pagapagaila Godafi ukup pase'epaf fape. Waf afamba feloma waf pindalali pegaso'ana hiahawes mais Godafi, afamba pekolefaf pihapilaf atin pilaf.
42011043	“Ipa' Farisi, ae' a'i uwahipipama akafimi nimanimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamipai! Ukup ipe'ipi pasa'mepa pa'i pendape nogohnaep epesi nomon ifagw pandakolasugwi ma esis amam nematawa sondagalaipa sonda'mepa nemaf bu'wafi ipa' anamba epes hiasi sandatama sagapoma.
42011044	“Ae' a'i uwahipipa endilisi ma nimanimi akafimi anaf mogatagamipai! Ipa' si'i matmat tape tandambaho' itap nomoni epes ina sogawata, owa', esis satoma safe' ilif ande'etama.”
42011045	Anona aman nagawalipasa mu'uli Godi nagwamana basef na'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'ias na'amba, nasapagafa na'i afa' wapani epes aufai.”
42011046	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ipa' amam dembipai pagawalipasa mu'uli Godii, ae' a'i owahipigama ipa' wapani ma akafimi nimanimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa. Ipa' panda' hiahaom nimanimi matoma magapai' esis amam nematawai, noma'w nagahasi. Apa' ipa' owa' petopalopas pefa' nimanimi amamba lagof ipe'igufia, owa'atin endilisi.
42011047	“Ae' a'i uwahipipama nimanimi akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamepa! Esis a'mes ipe'isi saha amom profet maga', ea' ipa' pefalo'ma matmat amamutai.
42011048	Waf afambai fawalapa basef alihif fa'i ipa' pa'i aho'ma esis saha amom profet fowa'imi magaga'. Ea' dei' pefalo'ma matmat amamutai,
42011049	panda'as na'amba si'i anif basef fagail ano'w buk sa'ukwi saga'i gawa Godi fa'i, ‘Anaf ae' esapa' anom profet moloma aposel mefe'mago esis, asoha anom moga' ea' anom sonda'am kwapete'am.’
42011050	Ea' dei' amam nematawa nogota ata'isi, anaf God noso'as nimanimi ma kofagema amamba sagaha profet hiami afum hi'agalam fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' ilif itap ea' nafi'i nataga nogota ata'e.
42011051	Nagali'i Abel nafi'i natagama profet Sekaraia sahana afuna la'afena ipat lu'unai Godi naloma belita saofa mafis sagaso' Goda. Amamba kofagema atiasi mila ipa' atipa dei' pagape itap apa'i.
42011052	“Ipa' amam gawaipai pegegawa mu'uli Godi, ae' a'i uwahipipa ma nimanimi akafimi lu'wami anaf mogatagamipai. Ipa' a' pelefata ki inimba pegefa' gawani. Ipa' atipa ina pawisi' uta pawis nomon, owa'. Ipa' pahefa ufia'wa anis sa'i sogawis nomoni.”
42011053	Ea' nakwaha ipat atamba nawis ando', amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom Farisi a' wandafum kwapete'am a'owa' ma mogasapagana basef anen. Amom ma'i mogwamba malogol ananigili ma basef fafifafi.
42011054	Amom mape matiti anen atapim ma'i mome' anen noga'i anif basef fegataga malogol ananigili ma monda'mana kot.
42012001	Anis amam nematawa hiasi a'owa' safi'i sunduwa'anima dogw endilisi sandafafa'asanima atin bo'wagah asasigahi. Ea' Jisas nali' na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ipa' pindimafuma andeande'ma yis amom Farisii. Basef kofagefa ma yis isimba fa'i waf baso'afi maga'i malogof biagufi.
42012002	Hiahaom mape mandambahi'i, anef nemaf a' motaga alihim alihigima. Hiahaom mandagigil magapani, anef nemaf epes sogawa amamba.
42012003	Ea' basef hiafi ipa' panda'ef akoti atiasi seme'ef alip. Ea' basef ipa' hikihika' atin panda'ef ifagw nomoni, atiasi sotoma ifagw ando' sowalapef fefe'.
42012004	“Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ae' a'ipipa na'amba. Ipa' owa'i ombel mehepama anom amam moha alop atop pogaga'ia ma anaf amom ina la'ifima monda' anin mae wapani, owa'atin.
42012005	Apa' ae' ata' i'ipipa aman ipa' ombal begahepamanai. Anamba nohepa pegaga'i, ea' anaf wapani banagonai ma nogakwahipa pegafe' wambel awambili hel. Aho', ae' a'ipipa, ipa' a' ombal begahepamanai, aman anamba atona.
42012006	“Ipa' pegawa, epes satala amiguf sa'usi wanis bias otamba 2 toea. Apa' God ina okom maso'ana anin amil sa'uni na'ambaini, owa'.
42012007	Endilisi, anen niamba awif hiafi fagala balagah ipe'igahi dondo' hi'alef. Ea' ipa' owa'i ombal mehepaea. Anen okom mapoma ipa' apikila' amiguf hiagufi agwafomba sa'ugufi.
42012008	“Ae' a'ipipa, ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Epen ami newalapa agol ae'agili ma amam nematawa hiasi, anaf ae' ewalapa agol epen inimbai ma naep amom ensel Godi.
42012009	Apa' epen ami negase'e alafuga ae'i naep amam nematawai, bola ae' ese'an alafuga anin naep amom ensel Godi.
42012010	Epen ami nenda' anif basef awafi findiwaefa ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, bola God a' nokwahomana awami amamba ananimi. Apa' epen ami nenda' basef findiwaefa Ambal bu'unai Godi, anaf God owa'atin endilisi ma nogakwaha findiwa anamba aunai ma epen inimbaia.
42012011	Nemaf afamba atiasi esis sofa' ipa' pefe' pigawis ifagw amamba esis Juda sandakolasugwi a'a sofa'epa pegafe'ma naep amom agufumi sonda'mepa kot, ipa' ina ombal behepa, owa'i. Ipa' ina api'i, ‘Atiasi apa' mogwa basef mi'imama? Atiasi monda' basef maif?’ Owa'i.
42012012	Dei' main, nogota atamba atota Ambal bu'unai Godi nihimba'mepa basef maif atiasi pegagwaefi.”
42012013	Anona aman atotona ma amam nematawa hiasi anen na'ipa Jisas na'amba na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i ina' ni'ipa sahome ae'anai nowaloga hiahaom amamba ahamafai nese'e wa'am.”
42012014	Owa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ae' andaiwa'! Ami nandandepa ae' ma epe igahihi'a ipa' egawalogepa hiahawesa ipa'? Owa'atin.”
42012015	Ea' anen na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' solawaipa andeande'ma ipa' ina kowolepama anom hiahaom. Epen hiahaom hiamin a'owa'i, ina nefa' ambal namili ma hiahaom amamba ananimi, owa'atin.”
42012016	Ea' naso'asa anif basef waminif atin na'i, “Aof anona aman otamba hiambainai fola gwa'aisi hiasi.
42012017	Aman anamba okom mandapoma nembel ananimbili atembel na'i, ‘Dei' ae' ata' enda'as i'imama? Ae' ifagw ake ma etama gwa'aisi ae'asi hiasi imbilas soga'ome.’
42012018	“Ea' na'i, ‘Ae' enda'as na'amba. Igulata ifagw ae'agwi a' ila' dambaigwi lu'wagwi gwikila' fowa'igwi. Ama atiasi ikolasai gwa'asi wit hianai noloma hiahaom hiami fasimi ae'ami moga'oh ifagw agwamba.
42012019	Ea' i'ipa ae' i'i, “Ae' egape andeande'i. Hiahaom hiami fasimi mope mondahama afagof hiagufi. Ea' dei' epoma noma'w ea' gwa'aisii embel sonehe endape.”’
42012020	“Owa' God na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' aman owa' negegawa andeande'ia. Dei' owamb amba'e ae' igi ambal ine'ili a' nega'. Ea' hiahaom amamba hiami ina' nanda'am nandondombam maga'ihi, amamba atiasi ami nefa'am?’
42012021	“Amamba na'amba atin si'i epes satama hiahaom hiami asasimi atom sagambilami. Esis hiahawes akasa naep Godi.”
42012022	Ea' Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ina nomonas solasefe' hiahiasa ambagof ipe'igufi ea' pi'i, ‘Apa' ata' mea' main?’ Owa'i. Ipa' ina nomonas solasefe' hiahiasa alop ipe'ipi pi'i, ‘Atiasi apa' monda' main mombaho' alop ape'ipi?’ Owa'i.
42012023	Dei' main, ambagof afof ina gwa'aisi atis. Ea' alop ina luwaguf atif, owa'atin.
42012024	Ipa' ukup pepoma amiguf. Afof owa' fowa gwa'aisi wita, owa' fotama gwa'aisi fimbilasa. Afof ifagw akagofa fotama gwa'aisi soga'oh. God atona naso'agof wali'ita. Apa' ipa' epes pikila' amiguf agwafomba endilisi.
42012025	Ipa' atiasi ami la'ifin nomonas solasefe' lawisa nigiwatania anef nemaf wapani ma ambal ananili logape nogota laota wapani? Owa'atin.
42012026	I'i ipa' owa' la'ifipama penda' anis maefah sa'usa'usi na'ambaea, dei' maina ipa' ata' nomonas salasagafe' hiahiasa anom maefah mamimami daiam?
42012027	“Ipa' ata' ukup pepoma afis. Esis ina sanda' maol ina sanda' luwaguf mais, owa'atin. Apa' ae' a'ipipa, fowa' anona aman hiahaom hiamunai Solomon nanda' sosaf hianai ma luwaguf ananimi, owa' sosaf ananifi ina fasif si'i afis isimba, owa'atin.
42012028	Aho', otalef afalemba dei' ata' fetawa aof ama naman atef sotopa'alef sokwahelef fefe' nif. Otalef afalemba falafilifi God nofalo'malef. Apa' ipa' amam nematawa pikila' otalef afalemba. Ea' dei' ipa' pagahapifa basef Godi kwasakwasalai, ipa' pendegawa endilisi anen nugumafipa andeande' wapanii.
42012029	Ea' ipa' ina nomonas solasefe' hiahias pi'i, ‘Atiasi mea' gwa'aisi embel mais?’ Owa'i. Ipa' ina nomonas iwanis solasefe'ma hiahawes isimbai, owa'.
42012030	Epes sagape itapi sogolalama Godi esis ukup malamondafe' a'owa' ma sogolaoma hiahaom amambai hiami. Apa' ahamepa ipe'inai nagape heveni anen nogawa ea' hiahawes mamahisa akipai.
42012031	Apa' ipa' ata' ukup pili' pelapelaoma waf usi'ifi bu'wafi feloma pigawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafipa pili', dao' a' nese'epa hiahawes isimba ipa' wapani.
42012032	“Ipa' epes si'i mini'ap bandapi sipsipi, ipa' ina ombel behepa, owa'i. Ahamepa ipe'inai okom bo'oma ipa' pefe' pigawis nomona maol ananini ma nope Dembinai nugumafipa.
42012033	Ipa' pese'asa hiahaom hiami ipe'imi ma anis epes daias sotalomipam, ea' pefa' otamba pewalogamba peso' isimba kwahusi petopalopas. Ipa' penda' maol pelaoma paos otambaisi anaf owa' folo'ogolasia. Ipa' pekolasa otamba uga maim hiahaom fasimi atom heven anaf owa' higiligalamia. Anamba epes isimba sanda' wali ina safe' felefele', totoloh mais owa' sohambombaga maefaha, owa'.
42012034	Dei' main, wambel mamahembela hiahawes fasisi ipe'isi saga'oma, anamba atogon anaf ukup ipe'ipi wapani pegapoma.
42012035	“Ipa' penda' luwaguf ipe'ifi bandef, a pewaho' legw, ea' pekata lambeh pendondombol silisilawi pepe.
42012036	Ipa' pendape si'i epes sape sagasasa aman dembinai asasinai na'i nokwaha gwa'aisi lu'wasi sandaso'amai notanima nogafi'i. I'i nifi'i noha uta ipat ananitai, esis suwisi'manota kwafalis.
42012037	Andeande'ma amom manda' maoli silisilawi mope mugati dembinai amamunai nifi'i notoloma sonogaham. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, atiasi dembinai nili' nowaho' lowaf bandaf nowaho' let, ama nonda'mam gwa'aisi. Ea' ni'ipam motoma tebol anen nifi'i nogaso'ama gwa'aisi.
42012038	Anen nifi'i amanota la'afitama a'a noloma awatagw guli' gugatai, a'a nogota mamahotama, ma niti amom silisilawi mogapoma, sonoham.
42012039	“Ipa' ukup pepoma anif basef waminif atini. I'i ahama ipati nili' nogawa nogota nanda' wali nogafi'atai ma silisilawi nogape, nanda' wali ina atiasi nifi'i nupisila ipat ananitai nuwis nomon, owa'atin.
42012040	Ipa' wapani silisilawi pendape. Dei' main? Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ifi'i anef nemaf ipa' ina atiasi pegawa pi'i ifi'i ulal nemaf afamba, owa'.”
42012041	Ea' Pita na'i, “Dembinai, basef ifimba waminif atini ina' naso'afaef afa' atofa, a'a esis amam nematawa hiasi wapani?”
42012042	Ea' Dembinai na'i, “Ipa' hipai penda' waf bu'wafi si'i anamba nugumafi amom manda' maoli okom bu'wami mapaona nanda' maol andeande' datimai. Aman anamba dembinai ananinai nandandepana ma nugumafi ananimi manda' maoli ma nogaso'ama gwa'aisi amom nogota dondo'atai.
42012043	Anaf dembinai ananinai notanima nogafi'i ma niti aman anamba nanda' maol andeande', dao' aman anamba sonohana.
42012044	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, dembinai ananinai anaf nondandepana nope dambena nugumafi hiahaom hiami ananimi hi'igalam.
42012045	Apa' i'i aman anamba okom magapoma opaf ananifi atof a' ni'i, ‘Dembinai ae'anai ina atiasi nifi'i ulal, owa'atin.’ Ama anen nosafel noha anis amam nematawa sanda' maoli, nonda' gwa'aisi embel da gwa' nonda' spak nogape.
42012046	Anen i'i nonda'as na'amba ma, Dembinai ananinai atiasi notanima nifi'i anef nemaf apa' aman anamba ina atiasi ni'i Dembinai nifi'i ulal, ata' owa'. Dembinai nogafi'i nifi'i nogota atamba anen okom mogaso'anatama. Nifi'i nohambombaga aman anamba endilisi, ea' nonda'ana nope noloma epes owa' sohahapifa Godi sagapoma.
42012047	“Epen mamahina nanda' maola anini, anin negawa ea' ma okom dembinai ananinai, apa' anin owa' nendondomba hiahawes nila nomonas dembinaiia, anaf dembinai nohan mehip a'owa'.
42012048	Apa' epen mamahina nanda' maoli owa' negawa okom dembinai ananinaia ma nenda' waf fendahama afamba negefa' akafimiafi, atiasi dembinai nohan sa'ombel. Ea' epes mamahisa anis daias sogaso'asa hiahaom hiami saso'as sugumafiami, anaf epes isimba si'ipas sogwamasam wapani mikila' fowa' sali' sagaso'asami.
42012049	“Ae' afi'i ma egawaho' nif itap apa'e ea' a'i nif ifimba dei' a' fendandif lu'uf. Owa', ata' owa'.
42012050	Ea' ae' okom ma'i efa' anin sa'of. Dei' ae' owa' ata' efa'ana, nembel ae'ambili nimanimbil endilisi.
42012051	Ipa' pa'i ae' afi'i ma igahagofa wandaf hiafi fogaga' itap ama hiasi sogape opalef awanelef? Owa'atin. Ae' a'ipipa, ae' afi'i ma egawala mini'ap esis amam nematawa.
42012052	Ama dei', a anaf wapani epes wanis bias sogape ipat atotota wambota atototai asondatopa' biefis. Wanis soloma bias sifitap ea' bias sofala wanis si'i bousi ea' na'amba atin.
42012053	Atiasi esis sondatopa', anona aman noloma ahamana ananinai mondatopa' biafim, ea' ano'w nemata'w koloma ma'ma'w ondatopa' biafiwa, ea' mefi'ma'w ako'ukwi koloma ma'ma'w kwandagi'mo'wi ondatopa' biafiwa. Esis atiasi sondatopa' na'amba.”
42012054	Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa wapani na'i, “Ipa' pagati otaga gogatafi gani awin negewalama, kwafalis ipa' pegawa pa'i, ‘Asaf fa'i afelai.’ Ea' asaf afalai, endilisi.
42012055	Ipa' pati fufin banagani nagafi'i awin nagatopa'ima nagataga, ipa' pegawa pa'i, ‘Atiasi owaf a' nuluwi banagona.’ Endilisi atis, faluwi banagef na'amba atin.
42012056	Ipa' epes paga'i malogof biagufi! Ipa' pati ametal hiani ilifani itapani andeande', apa' dei' ipa' owa' pegawa ametal nogota ata'ili andeande'a.”
42012057	“Dei' maina ipa' owa' pegegawa andeande'ma pegawaloga waf usi'ifi? Endilisi, ipa' pegawaf a' pendawalogaf andeande'.
42012058	Afamba ipa' pefe' pegaloma epen inimba na'i nendakotimipai, ipa' ata' pefe' pigail ufia'w, nogota atamba atota penandona basef ifimba peloman. Na'amba anin a' nenda' ipa' pepe penda' kot. Ea' nanda' koti noso'ama ipa' pefe'ma amom polisman a' monda'epa penda' kalabus.
42012059	Ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ina atiasi pekwaha ipat atamba sanda' kalabusatai ulal, owa'. Ama pegwa hiahaom lu'wami sa'umi ma wiaf ipe'ifi hi'ilaf dao', a pefe'.”
42013001	Nemaf afamba atef anis epes sape sa'ipa Jisasa anis epes Galilisii. Nogota atamba esis sape sondolali ma God sanda' ofa atin, gavman dembinai Pailat nahas saga'.
42013002	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Ipa' ukup pandanda'mas pa'i epes isimba Galilisi sagaga'i, asikila' anis epes Galiliisi daias sanda' waf awafi, ama kofagema amamba atom dei' sofa' nimanimi saga'? Owa'atin.
42013003	Ae' a'ipipas usi'is. Owa'atin endilisi! I'i ipa' owa' pembema nelelemba waf awafi ipe'ifia, anaf ipa' hipai pega' higililipa na'amba atin si'i esis.
42013004	Dei' si'i maina anis epes isimba 18-pelais wambel Siloam ipat lautai tato tasindifasa afis hi'agalas, isimba ipa' pa'i waf awafi asasifi afikila' waf awafi isimba anis daias sagape Jerusalami?
42013005	Owa'atin. Ipa' owa' pembema nelelemba hiahaom awami ipe'imia, anaf ipa' hipai apega' na'amba atin si'i esis.
42013006	Ea' Jisas nawalapa anif basef waminif atini na'i, “Anona aman nawa anoga lawag fik aof ananifi nagawa waina, ama main nafi'i nowando'ma sa'utipa lawag agamba, owa' owa'atin.
42013007	Ea' na'ipa anen nanda' maol aof afambai na'i, ‘Neme'. Afagof wanogof ae' afi'i ilaoma sa'utip lawag agamba fik, owa' owa'atin. Na'amba dei' ina' laga. Dei' maina gotawa gogofa' ifat atota itap dowadowaf?’
42013008	Ea' anen nanda' maol aofi nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ina' ata' kwahowaga gope afagol agale'e atogol. Ama ata' ila' itap peloma omba bulmakaum isimbe'aga.
42013009	Ama iti atiasi gil gola sa'utip afagol agale'e a'a owa', i'i owa', dao' ina' a' nelaga.’”
42013010	Nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi Jisas na'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa anota ipat Juda sandakolasatai nomon.
42013011	Ea' ano'w nemata'w ambal aunai nagapau'wi kwape, ambal anamba aunai naso'akw aowas ako'w nanda'a'w nape afagof 18-pelaiguf ea' alafuga akwa'ugai gondala'akw, ina kosafel kwalutu andeande', owa'atin.
42013012	Jisas natolo'w nofala'w kwafi'i na'ipa'w na'i, “Nemata'w, ae' a' atofa aowas ine'ini ea' nape wahifina.”
42013013	Anen nasa lagol ananigili nemata'w akwamba ea' kwafalis atis kwalutu usi'ikw. Ea' kwasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.
42013014	Owa' aman anamba dembinai nugumafi ipat lotuwi nembel wandafimbila Jisas nanda'a'w bo'okw nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi. Ea' anen na'ipa esis amam nematawa na'i, “Nimaguf ifimba wanif wanif maolifi. Ea' dei' ipa' pi'i aman anamba notofamepa aowas ipe'ini, andeande'ma pigafi'i nemaf maolifi. Apa' ipa' ina pifi'mai maol inimba ma nemaf magapoma noma'wafi, owa'i.”
42013015	Ea' Dembinai nagwamana basef na'i, “Ipa' amam paga'i malogof biagufi! Peme! Nemaf magapoma noma'wafi ipa' hipai pafe' ifagw bulmakauwi ma pagatagwaha bulmakau maloma donki ipe'imi pao'wam mafe' maga' embel.
42013016	Apa' nemata'w akwamba ako'w kwagataga ambep Abrahami, owa' Satan a' nahipa'w sisihi'w kwape afagof 18-pelaiguf. Ea' dei' nemaf afamba magapoma noma'wafi ae' a'i etagwaha mandof fogowa'a'wi ma kogape wahifi'w.”
42013017	Jisas na'ias na'amba, nanda' esis bousi ananisi ambagof aom kwapete'. Apa' amam nematawa hiasi asonahas endilisi ma hiahaom bu'wami banagami hiami anen nanda'ami.
42013018	Ea' Jisas na'ias wapani na'i, “Epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias si'i main? Ae' indila'waifam i'imama?
42013019	Amamba si'i analef nalelef sa'usa'ulifi apa' mofalas maga'i masteti. Anona aman nofa' nalelef afalemba nawalef aof ananifi. A'i owa' main, mataga malo si'i lawah lu'ugahi ea' amiguf fafi'i fala' owah fatoma agufugaha.”
42013020	Ea' Jisas na'ias wapani na'i, “Ae' a'i indila'waifa epes sogawis nomona maol Godi i'imama?
42013021	Ae' indila'waifama, anis yis ano'w nemata'w kofa'as kwambemas saloma plaua hiami magala dram lu'wamii. A'i owa' main, a' matef lu'um.”
42013022	Jisas nafe' walemb hiagoma lu'wagoma sa'ogoma bagape felefele'ma ufia'w kwagafe' Jerusalami nanda' maol nawalipa esis amam nematawa, ea' nafe' okom ma'i nefe' Jerusalem ea' nafe'.
42013023	Owa' anona aman na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i ihali'ina ma epes isimba anaf God nofa'as sogotanimai. Isimba hiasi a'a kwaia'wis?” Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i,
42013024	“Ipa' pewa' banaga bihitagof ipe'igufi banagagof endilisi, pefe' pigawis uta sa'usa'utai. Dei' main, epes hiasi atiasi si'i suwis nomon, apa' owa' la'ifisa.
42013025	Atiasi ahama ipati nosafel nowalowa uta ipat atamba. Ea' ipa' pifi'i pilutu peha uta ando' falafala na'amba pi'i, ‘Dembinai, usi'mapai uta.’ “Ea' nogwai basefa ipa' ni'ias ni'i, ‘Ipa' animaipai? Ae' owa' egawepaea.’
42013026	Ea' pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Apa' mape ma' gwa'aisi embel magalomena, nalutu nawalapa basef naga'ipapa walemb ape'ilimbi.’
42013027	Owa' anen nogwa basef ni'i, ‘Ipa' animaipai? Ae' owa' egawepaea. Ipa' panda' waf awafii, ipa' hipai delefata hi'ilipa pekwaha ae'.’
42013028	“Anaf ipa' piti Abrahami Aisak Jekop moloma profet amamba hiami hi'ilam mope anamba God nagala'ambemagoma nomon, apa' ipa' owa'. Ipa' nogalo'mepa pepe ando'. Anamba pelef penda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' pepe.
42013029	Ea' esis amam nematawa sifi'i gani awin nagatafima nogowalama noloma anamba wa'owa'ol esis a sope sea' gwa'aisi anamba God nagala'ambemagoma.
42013030	Aho' endilisi, anis epes dei' sataga sagagi'i agof akasi, anaf a' agof fotomas sotaga sili'. Apa' anis dei' sataga sagali'i agof fagatomasi anaf agof akas asotaga sigi'.”
42013031	Nogota atamba atota anom amam Farisi mafi'mai Jisas ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' nekwaha wambel ambale'e fo'o anagon. Dei' main, Herot na'i nehena nega'.”
42013032	Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' fo'o pi'ipa aman anamba nanda' uhufi si'i nombat aluputai pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dei' a naman wapani ae' ambagof amamba awami magape epesi, ea' enda' esis epes awasisi bo'wes. I'i owa' nemaf fegafe'ma wanifi hi'ilaf, imbifa maol ae'ani hi'ilan.’ Ipa' piga'ipana na'amba.
42013033	Apa' dei' naman bimb ae' efe' enda' maol inimba. Ina andeande'ma esis soha anona profet nogaga' anambel wambel daiambel, owa'atin. Sohana noga' Jerusalem atogon.
42013034	“O ipa' Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ipa' pagaha amom profet afumi, pakwaha otamba pagaha amom God nasapa'am magafe'ma ipe'i, lifilafi ae' a'i ekolasa ipa' epes hipai si'i awata numa'itai towa'ani nogagwi takolasagw gopasol gwagail bihinagof atatigufi. Owa' owa'atin, ipa' pandaiwa'.
42013035	Ipa' peme'! Dei' ipat bu'utai a wambel ipe'imbili atiasi wafita totawa dowaf. Ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ina atiasi petolowe wapani ma anaf piga'i, ‘Apa' ma'i God nofalo'ma aman anamba nagafi'i agol Dembinaii ma nogaso'ana banagami ananimi.’”
42014001	Anef nemaf esis Juda sagapoma noma'wafi Jisas nafe' naloma anona aman Farisi na' gwa'aisi ipat ananitai. Ea' esis sanda'ana naep di'indi'ana endilisi.
42014002	Anona aman lagufi bo'wagah sagalotawana kwapete'i nape Jisas nogohnaepinama.
42014003	Ea' Jisas nati aman anamba, nahali' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom Farisi na'i, “A'i afa' onda' aman aowas nanda'anai bo'ona nemaf afamba magapoma noma'wafi, a'a owa'?”
42014004	Owa' amom masopama malogof. Ea' nofa' aman anamba nanda'ana bo'ona nasapa'ana nafe'.
42014005	Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “I'i anona aman ipe'inai awani ananini a'a anona bulmakau ananisi sogowala hul embelili nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi, a'i aman anamba ahama isimbai nefe' nigiasi kwafalis nemaf afamba a'a owa'? Endilisi, nefe' nigagiasii.”
42014006	Ea' amom ina la'ifima mogogwa basef ifimba, owa'atin.
42014007	Jisas nati esis safi'mai gwa'aisi isimba sa'i sope siaifah bu'wasi satawa sagali'i bo'wagoma atogini. Ea' na'ipasa basef waminif atin na'i,
42014008	“I'i anona aman nogofalepama anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi sonda'asa aman nogaso' nemata'wi ma pegafe', ipa' owa'i pefe' petoma pili' siaifah fasisi amom dembami atom magatomasia, owa'i. Na'amba aman anamba nofo'o nofalai anona aman agol lu'wagilinai gikila' agol ine'igili.
42014009	Ama aman anamba nofalena nifi'i ni'ipina ni'i, ‘Ina' kwahomana sia inimba bu'wani aman ana'e.’ Nonda'as na'amba, ina' ambal aona a'owa'. Ea' nonda'ena nefe' nepe nigi'i endilisi alafugah.
42014010	Apa' i'i anona aman nogofala ina' nefe' nelomana nega' gwa'aisi, ina' nefe' nepe nigi'i alafugah endilisi. Ina' nenda'as na'amba ma atiasi nofalena niga'i, ‘Alipunai, ina' nifi'i nepe nili' bo'ogoma!’ Anen nonda'as na'amba, dao' atiasi nefa' agol lu'wagili ma naep epes isimba hiasi sa' gwa'aisi sagalominai.
42014011	Dei' main, epen mamahina negasa'ma agol ananigili atigili, God nonda'an nisila'. Apa' epen mamahina nenda' agol ananigili gigisila'i, anaf God nosa'ma agola anin.”
42014012	Ea' Jisas na'ipa aman anamba nagafe'ma gwa'aisi isimbai nahali'ana na'i, “I'i ina' nenda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi a'a sa'usi, ina' owa'i nefala alipisi soloma sahin owan wambota ine'isi a ina' wambel atembel hiahaom hiamisi, owa'i. I'i nenda'as na'amba, anef esis sogofalena ma nefe' nea' gwa'aisi ifagw asasigwi, ea' sogwamena gwa'aisi ine'isi. Owa'.
42014013	Ina' i'i nenda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi, nefala isimba awapisi kwahusa hiahaomi, bo'wagah aogahisi naep pagaso'asi.
42014014	Epes isimba ina la'ifisa sogogwamena gwa'aisi ina', owa'. I'i ina' nenda'as na'amba, nendagala nepe andeande'. Ea' anaf God nogwamena hiahawes isimba bu'wasi ma nemaf afamba epes isimba sanda' waf bu'wafi sagaga'i sogosafel wapani.”
42014015	Anona aman asasinai nagape la'afena esis sa' gwa'aisi sagalomanai name' basef ifimba, na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Epen ami nepe nega' gwa'aisi lu'wasi anamba God nagala'ambemagomai, anin sowenondahan.”
42014016	Ea' Jisas na'ipana basef waminif atin na'i, “Anona aman na'i nonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi. Ea' nofalai epes hiasi safi'mai gwa'aisi isimba.
42014017	Nemaf dondo'afi endilisi ma gwa'aisi isimba fataga, ea' nasapa' anona nanda' maola anini nafe' na'ipa epes isimba fowa' nogofalasi. Ea' na'ipas na'i, ‘Ipa' fi'i. Hiahaom hiami mandandombol mape ea'.’
42014018	“Owa' epes isimba hiasi atona atin sosafel sa'i basef sa'i esis ina sofe', owa'. Anona aman na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' andaiwa'ma egafo'o. Ata' efe' itipa'ma aof ae'afi.’
42014019	“Ea' anona na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' atala bulmakau ilifunamaima monda' maol mogawala itap, ea' dei' efe' egwambam endondomam. Ea' ae' ina efo'o.’
42014020	“Owa' anona daiana na'i, ‘Dei' atef ae' aso' nemata'w. Na'amba ae' ina efo'o, owa'.’
42014021	“Aman anamba nanda' maola anini notanima nafe' na'ipa dembinai ananinai ma isimba. Ea' anen ahama ipati nembel wandafuna ea' na'ipa nanda'mana maol ananinii na'i, ‘Ina' kwafalis fo'o ufiawa hiawai lu'uwama sao'wama ma taun inimba ea' nefa'ai isimba falafalafisi, lagof awagufi, alop awasipisi, naep pagaso'asi, bo'wagah aogahisi ina' ne'wasi sifi'i suwisi nomon ipat ae'atai.’
42014022	“A'i owa' main, aman anamba nanda' maoli na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' aila basef ine'ifi ea', apa' owa' ati ipat ina dei' si'ita, ata' owa'. Anis siaifah ata' wafis sotawa dowaf. Ipat ina dei' si'ita, ata' owa'.’
42014023	“Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' fo'o ufiawa hiawai lu'uwama nila indalelemb nefe' aofah ea' nehende'ai esis amam nematawa sifi'i suwisi nomon ipat ae'atai ma si'ita.
42014024	Ae' a'ipina endilisi, epes isimba hiasi fowa' ae' egefalasi, esis owa'atin endilisi ma sogofa' gwa'aisi ae'asia.’”
42014025	Mini'ap laupi amam nematawa safi'i saloma Jisas, ea' nandambema na'ipas na'i,
42014026	“Epen ami nifi'mai ae', ma anin owa' nesambala mamasan waulu'man batawis ananisi soloma sahin owan wambota ananisi, ea' ambal ananili wapani, anin ina atiasi nepe banagen mini'ap ae'api nepe alipini ae'ani, owa'.
42014027	Ae' efa' akafimi anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Epen ami owa' nenda'as na'amba atin si'i ae' ma nigailima, epen inimba ina la'ifin netaga alipini ae'ani, owa'atin.
42014028	“Anin epen ipe'ini i'i nenda' anota ipat lu'utai togalota ilif, anin nenda'as ni'imama? Anin ata' nope nomonas talambi nili' ma negawa andeande' otamba ambamba ipatimbai. Atiasi otamba ananimbai bendahama ipat atamba hi'igalata a'a owa'?
42014029	Apa' i'i owa'atina nenda' isimbai sogali'a, ma nili' nonda' simen atina owa' nonda' ipat atamba hi'ilataea. Atiasi epes hiasi sagatolotai si'i basef sonda'i'ipama aman anamba sonda' findiwana
42014030	si'ias si'i, ‘Epen inimba nasefela ipat atamba, apa' anin owa' la'ifin nimbifataea.’
42014031	“Anif basef daif wapani ifimba. I'i anona aman dembinai king ni'i nofe' nopa' nogaloma anona king daiana, anen ata' nope okom mondanda'mas andeande'. Soldia ananimi misi'ah ilifunamaih dowaf, apa' king anamba nagagi'i anen nifi'i noloma soldia ananimi misi'ah 20-pelaih hiami. Ea' king anamba nagali'i na'i ata' nili' nogawa na'amba. Anen atiasi nopa' nogaloma king anamba nagagi'i la'ifinama nogali'amonas a'a owa'?
42014032	Anen nonda'as na'amba ma nogogawa anen ina la'ifina, dao' boumi ananimi ata' mili laogon, a' nili' nosapa' anom amam mofe'ma anen mofalana monda'ipama basef mi'i wandaf hapaifi.
42014033	Ea' ipa' na'amba atin. Ipa' epen ami owa'atina negewa' alafuga ma hiahawes ananisi ma negesambalisa, anin ina atiasi la'ifina negape alipini mini'ap ae'api, owa'atin.
42014034	“Ipa' pegawa sol alol fasili. Apa' i'i sol alamba a' lumbula usihila a' akal, owa'atin. Atiasi ipa' penda'al pi'imama usihil wapani? Owa'atin.
42014035	Sol alamba ina andeande' bo'ola apa' monda'al aofah, a'a mokwahol logaloma omba bulmakaum, owa'atin. Apa' melefatam mokwahom atin. Epen ami aligah hagalina nagame' basefi, anin a' nindailif.”
42015001	Epes hiasi saloma anom amam manda' waf awafi mogofa' takisi saloma anis epes sanda' waf awafii safi'i felefele'ma Jisas same' basefa ananifi.
42015002	Ea' anom dembami Farisi maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi manda' megahahama anen ma'i, “Aman anamba nandaloma epes isimba sanda' waf awafii nofalas alipisi nalomas nanda' gwa'aisi.”
42015003	Owa' Jisas naso'ama basef ifimba waminif atin na'ipam na'i,
42015004	“I'i anona aman ipe'inai numafi anop sipsip 100-pelaip ama anop atotop higililap, aman anamba ata' nokwaha sipsip apamba 99-pelaip pulutu pea' gwa'aisi anagon, anen ata' nefe' nola' nolaoma anona higilagalanai. Nolaomana nafe' nafe' natolona nasa'mana
42015005	nowandefana ikaf ananifi, sonahanamana nofa'ana nafi'i.
42015006	Nafi'i nataga ipat ananitai, nofalai esis alipisi ananisi saloma esis anen wambel atembel sandakolas atogon. Ea' na'ipas na'i, ‘Ipa' pendagala peloma ae'! Anona sipsip ae'anai higilalana, owa' ae' afa' elaomana itanima ifa'anai ea'.’”
42015007	Dei' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa ea' na'amba atina esis amam nematawa sagape heveni sandagala kwasakwasala ma epes isimba 99-pelais ambo'wes, ina sanda' waf awafi ma sotanima sogambema nelelemb, owa'. Apa' i'i anin epen nenda' waf awafii ni'i negambema nembel, atiasi esis sagape heveni sondagala a'owa' ma anin.
42015008	“I'i ano'w nemata'w anin moni ilifunamain siliva anin atitin higiligalan, atiasi konda' maina kolaoman kogatilin? Ako'w kokata lam kombehagon ipat nomon kolaoman andeande' hi'ilagon kofe' kofe' ma kogatilin.
42015009	Ako'w kwatilin ea', kofala esis alipisi wambel akwa'umbili sondakolasi ea' kwi'ipas kwi'i, ‘Ipa' pendagala peloma ae'! Anin moni ae'ani higilalan, owa' dei' elaoman afe' atilin itanima ifa'ani ea'.’
42015010	Dei' ae' a'ipipa ea' na'amba atin si'i amom ensel Godi sonogahama anin epen nanda' waf awafii nembema nembel negafe'ma God.”
42015011	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Anona aman nogaopana biam.
42015012	Aonama nafe' na'ipa ahamana ananinai na'i, ‘Ahame, ae' okom mapoma otamba mais hiahawes afa' ogafa'asi ma nemaf ina' negaga'. Dei' ae' a'i efa' du'wanis ae'asi. Ina' niwalis biafis newalogamafas afa' biafa. Ae' a'i ina' nese'eas dei'.’ Ea' ahamam nawaloga hiahawes hiasi ananisi safe'ma amom nogaopana biam.
42015013	“Ea' a'i owa' main, ina ata' nogota laota aonama nakolasa hiahawes hiasi ananisi nafe' napani anambel wambel lauguni ea' nalalamona hiahaom hiami ananimi ma waf naninani aunai anen nagi'ma okom ananimi ma'iama nanda'ami. Ea' otamba ananimbai hi'alamba ma waf awafi.
42015014	Anen nanda' otamba ananimbai ma hi'alamba, a'i owa' main, nogota nolom lu'unai nagahasatama nataga itap apamba hiagoma hi'alagon. Ea' anen hiahawes akana nape wahifina.
42015015	Anen nafe' nanda' maola anona aman itap apambainai. Aman anamba nasapa'ana nafe' itap ananipi ma nugumafi bogof ananigufi.
42015016	Bogof afamba fa' sa'utip lawahip, ea' anen wapani na'i nea' sa'utip ipimba ma opaf ananifi. Anen ina anis saso'ana gwa'aisi, owa'.
42015017	A'i owa' main, okom ananimi mogawa andeande' ea' na'ias na'i, ‘Amam hiami manda' maola ahame ae'anai amom gwa'aisi hiasi a'owa'. Apa' ae' ape na'a'e ame'aga endilisi ma nolomagahe.
42015018	Hapaimi, ae' atiasi esafel efe'ma ahame ae'anai. Ea' i'ipana i'i, “Ahame, ae' anda' waf awafi ma God ina' wapani.
42015019	Dei' ae' ina aman bu'uwai ma ina' negefala ae' nogamena ine'iwai, owa'. Ina' nenda'e epe si'i anona nanda'mena maoli.”’
42015020	“Ea' nosafel nafe'ma ahamana. Owa' anen ata' naili laogon ahamana natolona, nomonas saisailana nasagih nafe' nahapila nogamana ananinai nombalo'ana nasisi' malogol ananigili.
42015021	Ea' nogamana na'ipana na'i, ‘Ahame, ae' ea' anda' waf awafi ma God ina' wapani. Ae' ina ata' aman bu'uwai ma ina' negefala ae' niga'i nogamena ine'iwai, owa'atin.’
42015022	“Owa' ahamana na'ipa amom manda' maola anini na'i, ‘Ipa' fa'ai lowaf fasifi laufi namifi ae'afi pefa'af pifi'i ulal pewaho'manaf anen. Ea' pelamana anin ring faf ananifi, pelamana su bo'wagah ananigahi.
42015023	Fa'ai bulmakau noganai anamba lu'unai gigititi'i pehana ma apa' mea'ana mondagalamana.
42015024	Dei' main, nogame anamba ae'anai dolomana si'i nagaga' ea'i, owa' dei' ambal lapaona wapani. Anen higilalana ea', apa' dei' owa' matolona wapani.’ Ea' esis sandagala.
42015025	“Apa' nogamana ananinai dembinai naili aof. Ama main, anen nafi'i nataga felefele'ma ipat, owa' name' amalemba sanda' musik sagalemb.
42015026	“Ea' nofala anona nanda' maoli nahali'ana na'i, ‘Esis sanda' main?’
42015027	“Ea' anen nanda' maoli na'ipana na'i, ‘Owamena ine'inai notanima nafi'i, ea' ahamena ine'inai nandagalamana, na'amba dei' naha anona bulmakau lu'unai. Dei' main, anen notanimai ina ata' nape aona, owa'. Nape andeande'.’
42015028	“Owa' nogamana ananinai dembinai okom numbutim ea' nandaiwa'ma nogawis nomon. Ea' ahamana nawisi ando' na'ipana dindina nogawis nomon, apa' owa'.
42015029	Anen nagwamana basef ahamana na'i, ‘Afagof hiagufi ae' ahapila maol ine'ini si'i agol ake anda' maol dowafi. Ae' ina esambala basef mu'uli ine'ini anef atetef, owa'. Apa' ina' owa' nese'e anin mae sa'wini dowaf si'i meme nogani ma endagala eloma alipisi ae'asia, owa'atin.
42015030	Apa' awani anamba ine'inai anen nalalamona hiahaom hiami ine'imi ea' ma awo nematawa gembaiwai. Ea' dei' notanimai, ina' okom mapomana dei' nahamana bulmakau anamba anen.’
42015031	“Ea' ahamana na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogame, dondol lifilafi afa' biafa wagape atogini. Ea' hiahawes ae'asi isimba ine'isi atis.
42015032	Apa' dei' afa' ondagala, ea' nelelemb afa'ilimbi bo'walemb. Dei' main, owamena anamba ine'inai fowa' nafe' lauguni si'i nagaga'i, owa' dei' nafi'i nataga ambal lapaona wapani. Anen higilagalanai, owa' dei' afa' watolona wapani.’”
42016001	Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Anona aman hiahaom hiamunai nao'wa anona ananinai nugumafi maol ananinii nape. Ea' anis safi'mai aman anamba hiahaom hiamunai sasapaga anen nanda'mana maoli ma basef sa'i, ‘Nugumafi maol ine'inii anen nakwaha otamba hiambai ine'imbai bafe' dowaf.’
42016002	“Ea' nofala aman anamba nugumafi maoli nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dei' maina basef ifimba ae' agame'asefa ine'i? Ina' nefe' niamba hiahawes ae'asi sagape lagol ine'igili newalapas. Ina ata' nepe nimafi maol ae'ani wapani, a'owa'.’
42016003	“Ea' nugumafi maoli nomonas salasafe' ma nembel ananimbili na'i, ‘Ae' atiasi ata' enda'as i'imama? Dembinai na'i nili'amone ma epe igimafi maol dei'. Ae' ina la'ifiwi ma egawala itap. Ea' ambal aola indaila anis epesa gwa'aisi mais.
42016004	Owa' ae' nomonas sandanda'ma anis hiahawes ea' ma enda'asa atiasi epes sofa'e efe' ifagw asasigwi ma nemaf afamba dembinai nigali'amone ma maol inimba dei' anda'ani.’
42016005	“Ea' nofala amom hiami atona atin wialef figataomami mafi'mai anen. Anona aman nali' nafi'manai nahali'ana na'i, ‘Ina' wialef ma'ulif fapoma dembinai ae'anai?’
42016006	“Ea' anen na'i, ‘Darep wel lu'wapi 100-pelaip.’ Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' kwafalis nepe niti tiketa wiaf nenda' amefa darep 50-pelaip atip fil.’
42016007	Ama main, anona nataga nahali'ana na'i, ‘Wialef ine'imi ma'ufim?’ “Anen na'i, ‘Begah witigah 100-pelaigah.’ “Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nefa' tiket atamba wiaf ine'ifi fagailatai ea' nenda' 80-pelaigah.’
42016008	“Ea' aman dembinai nasa'ma agola aman anamba aunai nugumafi maoli. Dei' main, anen nanda' waf gawaifi si'i aman nomonas sagapaunai. Epes ukup asasipi pagapagaila hiahawes mais sagape itap apa'ii esis sanda' maola waf gawaifi si'i epes nomonas sagapaisi sikila' epes sagape nogogala'mai owa' sogogawa andeande'ia.”
42016009	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa ma moni uga maim maga'oh itap apa'ii, ipa' penda' anis amam nematawa sotaga alipisi ipe'isi. Ama main, i'i nemaf esis sogahapila uga moniafi hi'igalaf, dao' atiasi God ni'i aho'ma nofa'epa pefe' ifagw pegape andeande' lifilafiagwi.
42016010	Ami nimafi hiahawes sa'wisi andeande' datima, anaf nimafi hiahawes lu'wasi andeande' wapani. Apa' epen ami nembaso'am, owa' nenda' maol andeande'ma hiahawes sa'wisa'wisia, anaf anin ina nenda' hiahawes lu'wasi andeande' wapani, owa'atin.
42016011	Ipa' i'i owa' pimafi moni uga maim magape itap apa'ea, anaf ami nese'epa hiahawes bu'wasi endilisi pigimafias? Owa'atin endilisi.
42016012	Ipa' i'i owa' pimafi hiahawes anis epesia, ami nese'epa hiahawes ipe'isi atis pimafias? Owa'atin.
42016013	“Ina anin epen nanda' maoli la'ifin nihapila maol biafina amam dembami biam, owa'atin. Na'amba okom mila anona, anona a' nesambalona. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' ina a' la'ifipa pepe lafela God noloma ugai moni wapani, owa'.”
42016014	Ama amom Farisi magame' basef ifimba hiafi Jisas naga'iefi, amom manda'mana wa'ap anen. Dei' main, amom ukup pagapagaila moni atini.
42016015	Owa' anen na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' panda' ipa' patagama epes sanda' waf usi'ifi ma nogohnaep epesi. Apa' God nogawa ukup ipe'imi nomon. Hiahaom epes sagasa'ma agofami sagatalom otamba hiambaii, amamba falafumi atoma naep Godi.
42016016	Basef amom profet magawalipasafi basefa fagail mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani ifimba amom mawalipasef atapif fape mafi'i metambel nogota Jon nagatagatai. Apa' nogota atamba Joni tafi'i tataga dei' basef fasifi ma epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias, ifimba fape fafe' fataga walemb hiagoma. Ea' epes hiasi hi'alas dindinapis sanda' maol lu'wani a'owa' ma sofe' sogawis nomona maol inimba Godi.
42016017	Anif basef du'wanifa amef sa'usa'ufi feloma anif basef bandafi fagail nomona buk mu'uli Godi ina anaf fefe' higililif lamonef hi'ilif, owa'atin. Fepe atapif fikila' itapi otaga anaf higiligalasi.
42016018	“Aman ami nagakwaha waulu'mana anani'wi ma nogaso' ano'w daia'w wapanii, anen nanda' so'a waola nemata'w akwamba nali' nagaso'akwi. Ea' aman ami naso' ano'w nemata'w fowa' anona aman nagali'amona'wi aman anamba nagi' nagaso'akwi wapani nanda' waf awafi so'a waola nemata'w akwamba.
42016019	“Anona aman hiahaom hiamunai nape. Dondol anen nala siaogw fasifasigwi atogw a luwaguf bu'wafi sagatalif otamba hiambaii. Ea' nimaguf hiafi dondol nondofa' gwa'aisi bu'wasi atis nandape andeande' a'owa'.
42016020	Apa' felefele'ma ipat ananitai anona aman kwahunai nandailasa gwa'aisi moni maisi nape, agilinama Lasarus. Alop ananipi si'ipa ilambeh.
42016021	Anis epes sofa'ana safi'i na'oh felefele'ma ipat aman anambai. Anen na'i notatama gwa'aisi du'wa'wanisi sowa saga'oh tebol lafelena aman anamba hiahaom hiamunai ma ata' nea'as nogaso' opaf. Ea' anogw nombagw gwafi'i gwapalo'mana ilambeh ananimi afegah agwagugahi.
42016022	“A'i owa' main, aman anamba falafunai naga', ea' anom ensel mofa'ana mafe' mahaponana nape wambel bu'wambili felefele'ma Abraham. Ea' aman anamba hiahaom hiamunai anen wapani naga', sawana.
42016023	Owa' nafe' wambel awambili hel nofa' akef lu'wami. Ea' natologon nafe' ilif, nati Abraham napani laogon a'owa', Lasarus nape nalomana.
42016024	Ea' nofalana na'i, ‘Ahame Abraham, ina' niti uwahipiwi nesapa' Lasarus nufi'i nola faf ananifi du'wanif embel nupihi'mi afega ae'agai kwasakwasala. Ae' ame' akafimi awami endilisi ma nif ifi'i.’
42016025	“Owa' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogame, ina' okom mondanda'ma fowa' ata' nagape namina itap nefa' hiahaom fasimi atom. Apa' Lasarus nofa' hiahaom hiami awami. Owa' dei' wambel ambale'e nembel ananimbili bape fasimbil, apa' ina' nefa' akafimi awami.
42016026	Ea' anis maefah wapani sape. La'afena apa' maloma ipa' God nanda' anona kwambiwag lu'unai. Na'amba epes sagape na'ai ma sa'i sotopa' kwambiwag anamba sogafo'o ma ipa', esis ina la'ifis. Ea' epes sagapani na'ambai, esis ina la'ifisa sotopa'i kwambiwag sigafi'mai apa', owa'atin.’
42016027	“Ea' aman anamba na'i, ‘Ahame dao'. Ae' a'i ina' nesapa'o Lasarus notanima nofo'o ipat ahame ae'anai.
42016028	Ae' anom owape wanom biam mapani. Ama Lasarus ni'ipama banagafi amom. Na'amba amom wapani mufi'i wambel ambale'e mofa' akafimi lu'wami.’
42016029	“Owa' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Owa'. Owapena ine'imi mondame'ago basefa Moses noloma amom profet fetopalopam. Amom mondame'ago basef fafimba.’
42016030	“Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ahame Abraham, owa'atin. Ina atiasi mome'am, owa'. Apa' i'i anin epen nagaga'i nesafel wandofa negafe'ma amom, dao' bola meme'an mombema nelelemb.’
42016031	“Owa' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Owa'atina mogame' basefa Moses noloma amom profetia, ea' atiasi anin epen nagaga'i nitanima negesafel wandof, amom ina atiasi mohapifa inimba wapani, owa'atin.’”
42017001	Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Endilisi hiahaom amamba mogogwambipai ma penda' waf awafii. Endilisi hiahaom amamba atiasi mogatagai, apa' epes ami sonda' hiahaom amamba awami mogatagai, ae' ati esis uwahipis endilisi. Dei' main, esis anaf seme' akafimi nimanimi lu'wami.
42017002	I'i anis epes sofa' epen inimba sondola otam lu'unai nila bini'w anani'wi sofa'an sofe' solan negewala naoh mami lu'wami ma afinai, anin ata' nepe andeande' kwasakwasala. Apa' owa' owa'atin. I'i epen inimba nenda' anin sa'uni negakwaha nigahapifa ae'a, epen inimba atiasi nepe awen a'owa' nikila' negewala naoh afinai.
42017003	Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. I'i owamepa ipe'inai nonda' waf awafi ma, pi'ipana basef dindinipa nogakwahef. Ama i'i anen nogambema nembela, ipa' ukup pese'epa waf awafi ananifi.
42017004	Apa' i'i anen nonda'mepa waf awafi ipa' lifilafi nil 7-pelaifa nemaf atetef, ama anen netanima nifi'mai ipa' ma nohotagw agwamba 7-pelaigw ni'i, ‘Ae' a' ambema nembel’, ea' dao' ipa' ukup a' pese'epa waf awafi ananifi.”
42017005	Amom aposel Jisasi ma'ipa Dembinai amamunai ma'i, “Ina' nenda' afa' ohapifina banagefa ukila' wali' wagahapifina.”
42017006	Ea' Dembinai na'ipam na'i, “I'i hapif ipe'ini nendahama si'i nalelef sa'wisa'wisi mastetilif lawag, dao' atiasi ipa' pi'ipa lawag gagumba sa'utip pagailagai piga'i, ‘Ina' dagia neloma kofaga nefe' newala naoh embel nomon,’ ea' agog a' gigi'ma basef ipe'ifi.”
42017007	“I'i anona aman ipe'inai nofa' anona aman daiana nonda' maola anen nowala itap aof a'a numafi sipsip, ama main notanimai nifi'i ipat, ea' atiasi dembinai nugumafi anini ni'ipana ni'i, ‘Ina' fi'i kwafalis nepe nea' wali'ita’? Owa'atin.
42017008	Atiasi a' ni'ipana ni'i, ‘Ina' nendondomba gwa'aisi ae'asi, newaho' let, nendome gwa'aisi ae' nili' nefa'as nifi'i. Ma ili' ia'asa main, ina' nigi' nea' ine'isi.’
42017009	“Ea' atiasi anen a' ninifela aman anamba nanda'mana maoli ma nogaila malogol ananigili? Owa'atin.
42017010	Ea' ipa' wapani na'amba atin. I'i ipa' penda' hiahawes hiasi hi'ilas si'i God naga'ipipa, dao' ipa' pi'i basef pi'i, ‘Afa' wanda' maoli awasifai. Hiahawes afa' wanda'asi, isimba maol afa'ini atin.’”
42017011	Ea' Jisas naila ufia'w nafe' Jerusalem, nafe' la'afena itap lu'upa biafip Samariai Galili.
42017012	Anen nataga anambel wambel, owa' amam ilifunamaim aowas aunai nanda' alop amamipi pagambo'wi mafi'i ufia'w ata' malutuwi laogon,
42017013	mofalana mehip ma'i, “Jisas, Dembinai, ina' ni'i uwahipigama afa'!”
42017014	Ea' Jisas natolom na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' fo'o pihimba'mam alop ipe'ipi ma amom pris.” Ea' amom ata' mafe' atin owa', alop amamipi pataga bo'op.
42017015	Anona aman amamunai nati alop ananipi bo'op, notanima nafe' noga na'i mehip nafela agol Godi.
42017016	Ea' nasisil nowafa notawa itap felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi nanifelona. Anen ina Judainai, owa'. Anen Samariainai.
42017017	Ea' Jisas natolona na'i, “Ae' a'i owa' ipa' ilifunamaipa ambe'epa atin. Dei' 9-pelaim amuma?
42017018	Owa' anom motanima mifi'i mefela agol Godia? Aman anamba anagon daiagininai, anen atotona.”
42017019	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel fo'o. Ina' nahapifa ae', isimba atis dei' nataga bo'wena wapani.”
42017020	Anom dembami Farisi mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Nogota mamahotama nemaf afamba bu'wafi fetaga ma apa' mugawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiapa?” Anen nagwamam basef amom na'i, “Amamba esis ina sotolom naep, owa'.
42017021	Esis ina atiasi si'i, ‘Piti, amamba mape na'a, a'a mape gani, owa'atin. Peme'! Amamba mape opalef ipe'ilifi nomon ea'.”
42017022	Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Anef nemaf dondo'afi fegataga, nelelemb ipe'ilimbi belef endilisi pi'i, ‘Apa' ma'i aman anamba notaga epen nogofa' alop epesi ata' nifi'i notaga ulala ata' motolona kwasakwasala.’ Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ipa' ina petolowe, owa'.
42017023	Ea' atiasi anis epes si'ipipa si'i, ‘Piti nani nape gani,’ anis si'i ‘Piti anen nape na'a'e.’ Apa' ipa' ina peme'as pigi'mas, owa' hapaisi.
42017024	-
42017026	Ipa' pegawa pele'ala ma otaga bendagala holagala nafe'agon hi'alagon. Ea' ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi enda'am na'amba atina anaf ae' egataga. Apa' ae' ata' ili' efa' akafimi hiami ma epes nogota ata'isi dei' sogowa' alafugahai. Waf fowa' sanda'afa nogota atamba Noa nagapautai, ea' na'amba atin si'i anaf esis sonda'af nemaf afamba felefele'ma ifi'i egataga itap apa'e.
42017027	Sa' gwa'aisi, sa' embel, amam nematawa sindikikila'ma sandaso'ama atin safe' safe' sataga nemaf afamba Noa nafe' nagawis galaho'w. Ea' embel lu'wami mataga maha esis amam nematawa hiasi afis hi'alas.
42017028	“Esis sanda' waf na'amba atin si'i nogota atamba Lot nagapautai wapani. Sa' gwa'aisi, sa' embel satala hiahawes saso'asas safe'ma anis satalis, sawa hiahawes aofah, sala' ifagw.
42017029	Owa' Lot nakwaha Sodom nafe', ma nemaf afamba atef nif faloma otamba salfa fagandumi mowai heven si'i asaf fagalai ea' mahambombaga amam nematawa hiasi saga' hi'alas.
42017030	“Ea' anaf na'amba atina nemaf ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesii igatagaefi.
42017031	Nemaf afamba epen ami nagape ipat ando'i felefele'i, ina ata' netanima nuwis nefa'ai hiahawes ananisi ipat nomon, owa'i. Ea' na'amba atin epen nigaili aofi, ina ata' netanima nefe' ipat, owa'i.
42017032	“Ipa' nomonas sondanda'ma Lot waulu'mana.
42017033	Epen ami ni'i nela'ambema ambal ananili si'il dao', ambal ananili anaf higililal. Apa' ami i'i nelelama ambal ananili, anaf ambal ananili lope andeande' atapil lifilafi.
42017034	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, nemaf afamba owamb amam biam mo'oh ipat belita atotota, God nofa' anona, anona nokwahona nope.
42017035	Anowa nematawa biawa onda' maola plaua onda' breti, atiasi God nofa' ano'w, nokwaha ano'w kope.
42017036	[Amam biam mogail aofi, atiasi God nofa' anona, nokwaha anona nope.]”
42017037	Alipumi ananimi mame' basef ifimba ma'i, “Dembinai, amamba anaf motaga ani?” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Mamahagoma alop sagaga'i poga'oma, ea' na'amba atogon atiasi komemb mufi'i munduwa'animama.”
42018001	Jisas naso'am basef wamon atin alipumi ananimi ma nigihimba'mam mondabeten nimaguf danda ma amom ina ala'uta toham ukup iwanip, owa'i.
42018002	Anen na'ias na'i, “Anona dembinai jas nogonandona basefi, nape anin taun. Anen ina ombal bahana ma dembinai God, ina nomonas sapoma anis epes wapani, owa'.
42018003	“Ano'w nemata'w waulunama'w nagaga'a'wi kwape taun inimba. Dondol ako'w kwafi'mai jas anamba kwa'ipana kwa'i, ‘Bousi ae'asi sa'i sohambombaga ae'. Ina' ata' netopalope ma kot.’
42018004	“Jas anamba nali' nandaiwa'ma nogatopalopa'w. A'i owa' main, okom ananimi ma'i, ‘Ae' ina ombal bahema God a ukup epesi.
42018005	Apa' nemata'w akwamba alifi'wi kwase'e numa'umi ae'. Ea' hapaimi, ata' etopalopago ako'w ulala kot. Na'amba kufi'i lifilafi konda' okom molowe.’”
42018006	Ea' Dembinai na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' peme' basefa jas anamba aunai.
42018007	Epes isimba God nandandepas ea' ananisii, esis salef sakokona lifilafi owamb alip. Dei' God notopalopasa kot a'a owa'? Aho', nogatopalopasi. Anen ina ni'ipas fafifafi, owa'atin.
42018008	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, atiasi nogatopalopas kwafalisi. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Apa' anaf ae' igafi'i, nemaf afamba iti amam nematawa itapipai pihapifi, a'a owa'atin?”
42018009	Anis epes ukup pandapoma esis atis sa'i esis epes fasisi sanda' waf bu'wafi, ea' sa'i anis daias awasisi. Epes isimba Jisas naso'asa basef waminif atin na'i,
42018010	“Anom amam biam ma'i mofe' mondabeten ipat lu'unai Godi. Anona Farisi, anona aman aunai nogofa' takisi.
42018011	Farisi anamba nalutu okom mandapoma anen atona nandabeten na'amba na'i, ‘Ae' anifelina God, ama ae' ina si'i anis epes daias awasisi. Esis sambaso'mas sogofa' uga mais anis daiasi, sanda' waf awafii, sagatopa' mu'uli ine'ini ma sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi. Ae' ina anda'am si'i esis, owa'atin. Ae' anifelina ma ae' ina si'i aman nanumba aunai nogofa' takisi.
42018012	Wikifah hiagahi ae' akwaha gwa'aisi nimaguf bifa andabeten. Ea' hiahawes hiasi ae' egefa'asi, awala du'wanis ilifunamaisa ase'enas ina'.’”
42018013	-
42018014	“Apa' aman anamba nogofa' takisi nalutuwi laogon nandaiwa'ma niniga negati heven, owa'. Naha mafata ananitai atapita na'i, ‘O God, ae' aman anda' waf awafii, ina' niti ae' owahipiwi netopalope.’ Ea' notanima nafe' ipat ananitai. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, aman anamba nogofa' takisi na'ias na'amba, anen bo'ona ma naep Godi. Apa' aman anamba nali' nandabetani, owa'. Dei' main, epen ami negasa'ma agol ananigili atigili, atiasi God nonda' agol ananigili gowala. Apa' epen ami nenda' agol gigisila'i, bola God nosa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol.”
42018015	Esis sao'wamanai anis awasi sa'wisi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas, sa'i anen nosa lagofa nofalo'masa nonda'as sonogahas. Owa', alipumi ananimi mati isimba mandaiwa'ma awasi isimba ea' masopama esis sofa'as sogafi'mai anen.
42018016	Ea' Jisas nofala awasi isimba safi'i felefele'ma anen ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' kwahowa awasi isimba sifi'mai ae'. Owa'i pili'amasa. Dei' main, esis amam nematawa sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias anaf sefe' anen nagala'ambemagomai, esis same' basef ananifi sagailif si'i awasi isimba.
42018017	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Epen ami ni'i aho'ma God nope Dembinai ma anina nese'ana nembel God si'i awasi isimba saga'i aho'mana, isimba sanda'as na'ambai atiasi sogawis anamba God nagala'ambemagomai. I'i owa', owa'atin.”
42018018	Anona agilinai Judainai nahali' Jisas na'i, “Tisa bu'winai, ae' atiasi enda' maina egefa' ambal namili egape andeande' lifilafi?”
42018019	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina naga'i ae' bu'uwai? God atona bu'unai.
42018020	Ina' negawa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani naga'i, ‘Ina' owa'i nenda' waf awafi so'a waulafia, ina neha anis epes soga' nenda' wal, owa'i, ina' owa'i nembaso'ma anis epes daiasa, ina' neme' basef mamasinai nihapilif nilif ea' nindimafias andeande'.”
42018021	Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Mu'uli inimba hiani ahapilan ailan fowa' ata' sa'owe afi'i afi'i ataga dei'.”
42018022	Ea' Jisas name' basef ifimba na'ipana na'i, “Ina' anef waf fasifi atetef owa' ata' nenda'afa. Ina' fo'o nese'asa hiahaom ine'imi hi'indalama anis daias sotalinama nefa' moni inimba nenda'an neso' isimba kwahusi. Nenda'as na'amba ma anaf negefa' hiahawes fasisi gani heven. Ea' nifi'i nihapifi nila ae'.”
42018023	Owa' anen name' basef ifimba, nembel ananimbili nimanimbil a'owa'. Anen agilinai hiahaom hiamunai. Na'amba dei' anen nembel nimanimbil.
42018024	Ea' Jisas natolona na'i, “Epes isimba ugai moni hianaisi, sanda'am danda' ahifim a'owa' ma sogafe' anamba God nagala'ambemagoma. Atona atin sefe'.
42018025	Anin mafin lu'unai kamel nogawis bolotaf nil sogosambala luwagufeli, anamba ila ina ahifim a'owa' ma nogawis. Apa' amam nematawa hiahaom hiamisi i'i sogafe' anamba, sonda'am danda' ahifim a'owa' ma sogafe'. Maol inimba ahifim a'owa' nikila' maol kamel nogawis bolotaf nili.”
42018026	Epes isimba same' na'amba sa'i, “I'i na'ambaiai, anaf God nuwambilai epes mamahisa sotanimai sope andeande' lifilafi? Owa'atin.”
42018027	Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Hiahaom epes owa' la'ifisa sonda'amia, amamba God atona banagonai ma nonda'am.”
42018028	Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' ea' wakwaha hiahaom afa'ii hiami ea' dei' wafi'i wahapifa basef ine'ifi wailina.”
42018029	Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipa' epen ami nekwaha ipat toloma ako'w awasi sahin owan ahasan mamasan ananisi, ma nenda' maola epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias,
42018030	anef nemaf God nogwaman hiahaom hiami mikila' amamba nali' nagalamonomi. Anaf owagama nogota bu'utai togataga, epen inimba a' nofa' ambal namili ma negape andeande' lifilafi.”
42018031	Ea' Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim na'ipam na'i, “Peme', dei' afa' ea' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ama basef ifimba hiafi amom profet fowa' manda'ef fagail buki faga'i ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi fetaga alihif fendawalap hi'igalef.
42018032	Atiasi amom monda'e efe'ma anis epes sogolalama Godi. Ea' sonda' wa'ap sonda'e findiwae sehe sonda'me waf awafi sisisi'wafe
42018033	a sopopagahowe sehe ega'. Ama nimaguf bif hi'ilif, ama anef fegafe'ma wanifi, owa', a' itanima esafel wapani.”
42018034	Apa' amom alipumi ananimi ina mogawa basef ifimba, owa'. Basef kofagefa faga'ias ata' fandambaho'ma amom, ea' ina ukup pandanda'mas andeande'ma hiahawes Jisas na'i nonda'asi, owa'atin.
42018035	Jisas nafe' nataga felefele'ma anambel wambel Jeriko, ea' anona aman naep pagaso'anai nape ufia'w wa'akw dawalegef nandailasa gwa'aisi moni mais.
42018036	Owa' name' esis hiasi safi'i sikila'ana safe', nahali'as na'i, “Esis sanda' main notaga?”
42018037	Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai anamba dei' nafi'i nikila'ena nafe'.”
42018038	Ea' nofalana na'i, “Jisas, ina' Devit akunamana, niti ae' owahipiwi!”
42018039	Epes isimba sali' sagafi'i sinifalona na'amba sa'i, “Ina' sopama malogol!” Owa' anen fala atin nape na'i, “Ina' Devit akunamana, niti ae' owahipiwi”
42018040	Ea' Jisas nafi'i nalutu na'ipas na'i, “Da'ana nifi'mai ae'.” Anen nafe' felefele', Jisas nahali'ana na'i,
42018041	“Ina' na'i ae' enda'mena main?” Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i iti andeande' wapani.”
42018042	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Naep ine'ipi piti. Ina' nahapifa ae' banagena. Isimba atis dei' nataga bo'wena wapani.”
42018043	Ea' kwafalis atis naep apatiana andeande', nagi'ma Jisas nafe' ufia'w nasa'ma agol Godi. Ea' esis amam nematawa sati isimba sasa'ma agol Godi wapani.
42019001	Jisas nafe' nawis anambel wambel Jeriko, na'i nefe'.
42019002	Owa' anona aman hiahaom hiamunai nape, agol ananigili Sakius anen agilinai ma amam amamba mogofa' takisi.
42019003	Anen na'i niti Jisasa nogogawana anen mamahonama. Owa' amam nematawa wambelisi hiasi salutu sili'ak. Sakius anen bandabandana, ea' ina nati Jisas, owa'.
42019004	Ea' nasagih nali' nafe' nalota natoma anoga lawag fik ama niti Jisas nogafi'i.
42019005	Jisas nataga anamba nosaniga nati ilif na'ipana na'i, “Sakius, dei' ae' efe' epe ipat ine'itai. Ina' sila'i kwafalis.”
42019006	Ea' nisila'i kwafalis nembel ananimbili sonahambel, nofa' Jisas nafe' ipat ananitai.
42019007	Ea' esis amam nematawa sati isimba, ukup numbutip sa'i basef wandafifi sa'i, “Anen nafe' nape ipat anona aman nanda' waf awafii.”
42019008	Apa' Sakius nosafel nalutu na'ipa Dembinai na'i, “Dembinai, ina' neme'. Dei' ae' a'i ewala hiahaom hiami ae'ami la'afen dondo' atin, ea' ese'as du'wanim isimba kwahusi. I'i ae' embaso'ma anin epena ekwalopa maefah ananimi, atiasi ae' egwamana hiami bifibif.”
42019009	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' God nowambilai amam nematawa sagape ipat ata'ii nokwahomas waf awafi sotanimai ea'. Dei' main, aman anamba wapani nataga akunamana Abrahami.
42019010	Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ae' afi'i ma elaoma epes higilagalasi iwambilas sokwaha waf awafi sogotanimai.”
42019011	Esis same' basef ifimba, ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i anif basef waminif atin wapani. Dei' main, anen nape felefele'ma Jerusalem, ea' esis ukup pandanda' pa'i epes hiasi siti God dei' atef notaga nope Dembinai nugumafias. Ea' na'i basef ifimba waminif atin
42019012	na'i, “Anona aman dembinai na'i nefe' anambel wambel lauguni ma esis sonda'ana nogape king dembinai. Anef anen notanima nifi'i.
42019013	Ea' nofalai anom amam ilifunamaim manda' maol ananinii, ea' natambe' moni 20 kina nandahama amom. Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipa' penda' maol pembama moni inimba pefe' petagama ae' itanima igafi'i.’
42019014	“Apa' owa' esis wambel atembel aman anambai ukup aoma anen endilisi. Ea' nafe' sasapa' anom amam magi'mana mafe' ma'i, ‘Apa' mandaiwa'ma ina' negape king dembinai ma apa'.’
42019015	“Owa' owa'atin. Esis sanda'ana nataga nape king dembinai ama main, notanima nafi'i. Ea' na'i, ‘Falai amom amamba manda' maoli fowa' ae' agaso'am monii. Ae' a'i ata' egawa moni wamani ma'ufin amom hiami atona atin mogofa'ani.’
42019016	“Ea' nagali'i nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' anda' maola 20 kina inimba ine'ini embaman dei' efa'ai 200 kina wamani.’
42019017	“Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nanda' maol andeande' datimai. Ina' ea' nimafi moni inimba kwasala'win andeande'. Dei' ea' ese'ena agol lu'wagili ina' ma nigimafi taun lu'wagoma ilifunamaigin.’
42019018	“Ea' anona nagafe'ma biami nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' anda' maola 20 kina ini'i dei' ea' itanima ifa'ai 100 kina wapani.’
42019019	“Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' enda'ena nimafi taun wambel lu'wambili wanifin biafin.’
42019020	Ea' anona nagagi'i nafi'i wapani na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, 20 kina ine'ini ini'i. Ae' ewa'an anip hankisip ambe'an na'oh.
42019021	Ae' egawa ina' aman dindinapinai. Anis maefah anis epes sambe'as saga'ihi, isimba ina' nefa'as. Gwa'aisi anin epen daian nagawasi, isimba ina' nagala'asi. Na'amba ae' ombal mahe ma ina'. Ea' dei' ambaho'wa moni inimba na'omena.’
42019022	“Owa' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nanda' maoli, ina' epen awinai nanda' du'wanigai. Basef ine'ifi atif fawalogena. Dei' ina' negawa ae' aman dindinapiwai agala' gwa'aisi anona aman nagawasi.
42019023	I'i ina' negawa na'ambaiai, dei' nefa'an negambe'an benga ae' itanima ifi'i efa'an negaloma anin wamani wapani.’
42019024	“Ea' na'ipa esis sagalutu na'amba felefele'i na'i, ‘Ipa' dalombana 20 kina aman anamba pese'anan aman nanumba nogofa' moni 200 kinai.’
42019025	“Owa' esis sa'ipana sa'i, ‘Dembinai, anen nofa' bitigwif ilifunamaif 200 kina ea'.’
42019026	“Owa' anen na'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa, epes ami sogahapila hiahawesi isimba atiasi ese'as anis hiahawes wapani esis. Apa' epen ami owa' nigahapila hiahawesia, ea' hiahawes sa'wisa'wisi anin nagahapilasi, isimba atiasi endalombanas anin.
42019027	Owa' isimba esis bousi ae'asi, sandaiwa'ma ae' egape dembiwai king asasiwai igimafias, ipa' fa'as fi'i na'a pehas soga' naep ae'api.’”
42019028	Jisas na'i basef ifimba ea' nali' nafe' naila ufia'w kwagafe' Jerusalami nondowasa'.
42019029	Ea' nataga Betfagai Betani walemb ambalemba felefele'ma halafuta atamba Oliv ea' nasapa' alipumi ananimi biam mali' mafe'
42019030	na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pefe' wambel bambalimba bagape gani wa'ili felefele'ma na'ai. Pefe' piwis apiti anona mafin donki ata' sa'unai esis sandolona nail. Ina dei' anin epen natomana, ata' owa'atin. Petagwahona pefa'ana pifi'mai ae'.
42019031	I'i anin epen nihali'ipa niga'i, ‘Dei' pagatagwahona ma main?’ Ea' pegwaman pi'ipan pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maola.’”
42019032	Jisas nasapa' amom biam mafe' mati hiahawes isimba na'amba atin si'i doko' naga'ipam.
42019033	Ea' matagwaha mandofa donki anamba sa'unai. Matagwahona atin owa', amom mugumafi donki anambai ma'ipam ma'i, “Dei' maina ipa' pagatagwaha donki anamba?”
42019034	Amom ma'ipam ma'i, “Dembinai na'i nonda' anin maola.”
42019035	Ea' amom mofa' donki anamba mafi'mai Jisas mawamona sagegw amamugwi gwatoma ilifa donki anamba.
42019036	Ea' matopalopa Jisas nalota natoma donki anamba nafe', ea' esis amam nematawa sa'i sosa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Ea' dei' sandombamana sagegw saso'wiam ufia'w sofalo'ma'w.
42019037	Anen nafi'i ea' felefele' ma ufia'w kogilianai halafuta Olivi. Alipisi ananisi hiasi ea' sandagala, ukup papomai hiahaom amamba banagami fowa' nanda'ami. Ea' lilililif sa'oh mehip, sasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.
42019038	Sa'ias na'amba sa'i, “Apa' mosa'ma agola God nagape ilifi lu'wagol, mogogala'i mapoma anen atona. Ma'i anen nofalo'ma ina' dembinai king nagafi'i agol ananigilii nese'ena banagami ma nenda' maol ananini. Esis sagape heveni opalef awanelef.”
42019039	Owa' anom dembami Farisi mape maloma epes hiasi ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ina' ninifala alipisi ine'isi ma ata' sosopama malogof.”
42019040	Jisas nagwamam basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, i'i esis sogasopama malogof, atiasi ea' otamba atom maga'oh itapi mope mi'i gigal mehip.”
42019041	Jisas nataga felefele' ma Jerusalem natologon nalopagon. Nalopa esis amam nematawa taun inimbaisi.
42019042	Ea' na'i, “I'i dei' nemaf afa'e atef ipa' pegawa basef kofagefa ma pegape opalef awanelefai, dao' isimba atiasi andeande'. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Basef ifimba ata' fandambaho', dei' ipa' owa' ata' pegawefa.
42019043	Anafa anef nemaf fetaga, ea' atiasi bousi ipe'isi sifi'i sola' indalelemb sonda' wandaf soganogama ipa'. Ea' sili'ama ipa' endilisi ma anamba hiagoma.
42019044	Ea' sehepa sohambombagepa endilisi, peloma awasi ipe'isi sagape nomona wambel ipe'imbili. Esis sohambombaga wambel awagon hi'ilagon endilisi, ea' ina atiasi otamba sagala' ifagwambai bendatomama atin atapimba bepe, owa'. A sugulatam mo'oh daindai. Dei' main? Ipa' owa' pegawa nemaf dei' God nogafi'afii ma nefa'epa pitanimai pegape andeande'a.”
42019045	Ea' Jisas nosafel nawis ipat lu'unai Godi ea' nali'amona amom amamba manda' bisnisi manda' maola magatala hiahawes ipat anamba nomoni.
42019046	Anen na'ipam na'i, “Basef fagape Baibeli, God na'i, ‘Ipat ae'anai nondapoma esis sifi'i sopaona sondabeten sogahali' ae'.’ Apa' owa', panda'ana nataga si'i sandambaho' sanda' wala.”
42019047	Nimaguf hiafi Jisas nawalipasa basef ipat anamba nomon. Ea' amom pris dembami maloma anom agufumi Judai maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mala' molaoma ufia'wa mohana nogaga'.
42019048	Owa' esis amam nematawa hiasi dindinapis a'owa' ma sagame' basef ananifi. Na'amba amom ina mati ano'w ufia'wa mogahana, owa'atin.
42020001	Anef nemaf Jisas nape naso'asa basef amam nematawa ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, nawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi. Owa' amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami daiam magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma agufumi amom Judai mafi'mai anen.
42020002	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' ni'ipafa. Ina' nanda' maol inimba ma banagami amimi? Ami na'ipina dei' nape dembinai nanda' maol inimba?”
42020003	Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ae' wapani a'i ihali'ipama anif basef, pi'ipif.
42020004	Maol Joni nagapisi' amam nematawa embeli, God nagape heveni na'ipana napisi'as a'a anin epen itapani na'ipana?”
42020005	Owa' amom mame' basef ifimba manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' i'i uga'i, ‘God nagape heveni naga'ipa Jon nagapisi'asi’, na'amba atiasi anen a' ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipa' owa' pegahapifanaea?’
42020006	Apa' afa' i'i uga'i, ‘Anin epen nagape itapani naga'ipana’, na'amba esis amam nematawa hiasi a' sohafa. Dei' main, hiasi sa'i Jon anona profet.”
42020007	Ea' magwamana basef Jisas ma'i, “Afa' owa' ogawama.”
42020008	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ea' na'amba atin ae' ina i'ipipa ma ami nase'e banagami na'ipi anda' maol inimba ae'ani, owa'.”
42020009	Jisas na'ipasa basef ifimba waminif atini esis amam nematawa na'i, “Anona aman nanda' anof aof nagawa waina. Ea' nakwahomam aof afamba anom amam ma'i monda' maolafa bisnisi. Ea' nafe' napani nogota lautai anambel wambel lauguni.
42020010	Ama nogota sa'utip pagailatai, anen kofagonama aof afambai nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe'ma amom manda' maol aof ananifii. Anen na'i amom moso'ana anip sa'utip gwa'aipi ma aof afamba. Owa' amom mahana mali'amonana notanima nafe' dowaf.
42020011	Ea' kofagonama aofi nasapa' anona daiana nafe' wapani ma amom, owa' mahana wapani manda'ana aona matofana nafe' dowaf.
42020012	Ea' nasapa' anona daiana nagafe'ma wanifi. Owa' amom mahana makwahona nawis na'oh ando'.
42020013	“Ea' anen kofagonama aofi na'i, ‘Ae' ata' enda' main? Nogame ae'inai aman, ae' okom magamagailanai, a' esapa'ana nofo'o. Atiasi meme' malogol ananigili a'a owa'?’
