42020014	“Ea' amom mati nogamana nafi'i, manda'ipama atin ma'i, ‘Aman anamba anaf nanumba owagama nogofa' hiahaom hiami ahamanai. Awi, a' ohana ma afa' atofa ogofa' aof afa'e.’
42020015	Ea' mahana makwahona mawisi aof ande'efa, mahana afuna. Ea' atiasi kofagonama aof afambai nonda' maina amom?
42020016	Atiasi nifi'i noham afum hi'ilam, noso'asa aof afamba fefe'ma anis epes daias.” Esis same' basef ifimba sa'i, “Waf afamba awafi endilisi. Afa' wandaiwa'mafi.”
42020017	Owa' Jisas natiti esis na'ipas na'i, “Dao', ea' na'amba atin si'i basef ifimba fagape Baibeli faga'i, ‘Otam amamba amom manda' maoli magali'amonami, dei' a' mataga lu'um mombalo' ipat atamba.’ Basef ifimba kofagefa fa'i main?
42020018	Epes mamahisa kwahogalas sogowa otam anambai, atiasi a pepe'etas hi'ilas. Apa' i'i otam anamba nowa nogasali'as, a' loloweas si'i sopof atof.”
42020019	Ea' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom pris dembami mame' basef ifimba waminif atini Jisas naga'iefi, ma'i owa' anen nondola'waifa amom. Ea' dei' atef ma'i mohapila Jisas mowa'ana. Apa' owa', ombal bahama esis amam nematawa.
42020020	Ea' manda'ana naep di'indi'ana ma mombalo'ana mogofa'ana. Ea' maso'am anemba otamba anom amam masapa'am mafi'i magatolonai. Amam amamba manda' uhuf mambaso'am ma'i amom manda' waf endilisifii. Apa' owa' amom ma'i mombalo' Jisasa anif basef naga'iefi ma moso' anen nogafe'ma gavman dembinai ma nonda' kotimana.
42020021	Ea' mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Tisa dembinai, apa' mogawena basef ine'ifi bu'wafi atif naga'ipasef esis amam nematawai. Ina' na'i basef atififa epes isimba hiasi agufisi saloma isimba agof akasi na'amba atin hi'alas. Ina' na'ipas basef faloma waf bu'wasi Godi endilisi ma epes hiasi.
42020022	Mu'uli ape'ini na'ias na'imama? Apa' mogaso'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi a'a owa'?”
42020023	Apa' Jisas nogawa ea' ma baso'am amamunai. Ea' na'ipam na'i,
42020024	“Ipa' pihimba'me anin moni ma ata' itilin. Ambal laloma agol isimba sagaili amisi?” Ea' ma'i, “Isimba gavman dembinai Sisari.”
42020025	Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Dao', hiahawes dembinai Sisari, isimba pese'anas Sisar. Apa' hiahawes Godi, pese'anas God.”
42020026	Ea' amom ina la'ifima mogombalo'ana ma anif basefa naep esis amam nematawa hiasii, owa'atin. Amom nomonas sape salasafe'ma basef ifimba naga'ipamafi, ea' masopama malogof tol mape.
42020027	Anom anep mini'ap Sadyusi mafi'mai Jisas. Amom mini'ap apamba mahapila basef ifimba ma'i sagaga'i ina atiasi sotanima sosafel wapani, owa'atin.
42020028	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, fowa' Moses nanda' anif basef fail buki ma apa' fa'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga' ma anen awasi akana, waulu'mana ata' kope owamana ananinai a' noso'akwa nola anis awasi sogaha'ofana.’
42020029	Anaf nemaf anom wambota atotota 7-pelaim mape. Nagali'i sahomam naso'akw awani aka'w naga' nakwaho'w kwape.
42020030	Ea' owamana nandatu'unai nafela'w naso'akw.
42020031	Ea' owamana nandatu'unai wapani nanda'as na'amba atin, ea' anona nandatu'umi naso'akw manda'as na'amba atin mafe' matagama owagufunai akutainai. Amom amamba ambipim 7-pelaim ina mola anis awasi, owa' mandaga' atin.
42020032	Ama main, nemata'w waulu'mam kwagi'mam kwagi' kwaga'.
42020033	Ea' anaf esis sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, nemata'w akwamba kope nemata'w ami'wi? Amom 7-pelaim a' maso'akw kwape waulu'mam amamu'wi.”
42020034	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amam nematawa nogota ata'aisi dei' sandaso'ama.
42020035	Apa' epes mamahisa God na'i andeande'ma sotanima sogosafel wapanima sogape namisi nemaf afamba, ina sondaso'ama, a' owa'atin.
42020036	Esis ina soga' wapani, owa'. A sope si'i amom ensel Godi. God nosa'mas sosafel wapani wandof. Ea' asope awasi ananisi.
42020037	Basef ifimba ma esis sagaga'i sotanima sogosafel wapani, ifimba fowa' Moses nihimba'mepaef nif ileliwa wataga lawag sa'ugai fagandogai, fa'i anen nofala Dembinai na'i God Abrahami, God Aisaki, a God Jekopi.
42020038	Apa' God ina Dembinai ma epes isimba sagaga'ii, owa'atin. Anen Dembinai ma epes isimba sagape namisii. Dei' main, epes hiasi sape namisa naep Godi hi'alas.”
42020039	-
42020040	Jisas na'ias na'amba, amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ombel mahama mogahali'ana ma anif basef wapani. Ea' anom magwamana basef ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ina' na'ias andeande'.”
42020041	A'i owa' main, Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amom ma'i Krais, Devit akunamana God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Ma'i Krais aman atona dowaf falafunai si'i epes sagape itapi. Dei' maina amom maga'ias na'amba ma Krais?
42020042	Buk akwamba Sami Devit naga'i na'amba na'i, ‘Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'i, “Ina' nepe lagol kwahisigili ae'agili,
42020043	atapina nefe' netagama anaf ae' enda' bousi ine'isi sogafe' lafelena si'i sia bo'wagah ine'igahi hogataoma.”’
42020044	Devit fowa' nofala Krais na'i anen Dembinai. Isimba atis Krais ina aman atona falafunai, owa'. Anen Dembinai.”
42020045	Amam nematawa hiasi ata' sape same' basef ifimba atin, Jisas na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i,
42020046	“Ipa' silisilawi pepoma amam amamba dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi. Amom ma'i mondawisa luwagwif fasifi atif mondafe', si'i dembami atom mandawisafi. Ma'i anis epes daias sotolom sondalalamam sonda'mam nemaf bu'wafi siganifelom anamba lu'wagoma ma naep hiasi sandatama sagapoma ma sogasa'ma agof amamugufi lu'wagof. Ea' amom ukup pa'i siaifah isimba sotawa sagali'i atis, dembami atom magapoma, nomon ifagw esis Juda hiasi sandakolasugwi a'a anamba hiasi sandakolas nimaguf ifimba sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami.
42020047	Amam amamba magawis ifagw agwamba nematawa alifiwaii, manda' wala hiahawes awousi. Ea' mandabeten launai atona dowadowafa esis sotolom siga'i amom bu'wami. Anaf God nowaloga epes hiasi. Anis epes daias owa' sonda' waf awafi na'ambaia anaf sofa' akafimi kwasakwasala, apa' amom mofa' nimanimi awami lu'wami endilisi a'owa'.”
42021001	Jisas nape ipat lu'unai Godi natologon tulif nati anis epes moni hianaisi sakwaha moni newala bokis moni nagalasi ma sogaso' God.
42021002	Ea' nati ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwala moni sa'wini si'i 2 toea newala bokis isimba.
42021003	Ea' na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nemata'w akwamba alifi'wi kwa'waha moni lu'wani nikila' otamba hiambai esis amam nematawa hiasi sagalambai.
42021004	Epes isimba hiasi moni hianai na'omas sakwaha du'wanin atin newala bokis. Apa' nemata'w akwamba moni aka'w endilisi kwa'waha moni ako'wini hi'alan. Ea' owa' anin ne'eha kogatala gwa'aisia, a' owa'atin. Ea' moni ako'wini biafin sa'wini a' nikila' moni hiani esis sagalani.”
42021005	Anom alipumi Jisasi ma'i basefa ipat lu'unai Godi ma'i, “Esis sofalo'ma ipat anamba otamba fasifasimi hiahaom fasimi esis amam nematawa sagaso'anam Godi.” Ea' Jisas na'i,
42021006	“Hiahaom amamba dei' pagatulumi, anef nemaf dondo'afi fegataga, ina atiasi anemba otamba bendatomama atin banagemba bepe, owa'atin. Asugulatam sowalom hi'ilam mofe' mo'oh atona atin hi'ilam.”
42021007	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, nemaf mamahefa amamba motaga? Ametal mamahina nili' netaga ma afa' ogogawa amamba felefele' mogataga?”
42021008	Jisas na'i, “Ipa' sisilawe pendape. Na'amba anis epes sombaso'mepa. Epes hiasi atiasi sifi'i si'i agol ae'agili si'i, ‘Ae' ea' ma'uwi.’ Ea' anis si'i, ‘Dei' nemaf ea' fafi'i felefele' ea'.’ Apa' kwawia', ipa' ina pefe' pila esis, owa'i.
42021009	Anef nemaf peme'asa basefa wandaf lu'wafi hiafi ea' anis si'i sondaiwa'ma amom gavman dembami mumafias sonda' wandaf. Nemaf afamba ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Hiahaom amamba ata' mili' motaga, apa' nemaf akutaifi ina fetaga kwafalis, ata' owa'.”
42021010	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Anis epes sagape anip itap daiapi sofela wandaf sopa' soloma esis sagape anep itap daiapi. Anona aman dembinai king no'wa anis walemb hielimbi ananisi sopa' soloma anona dembinai king daiana no'wa ananisi analemb walembi.
42021011	Anaf imauna lu'wani a' notaga itap hiagoma. Anagon daiagon nolom lu'una notagamas, ea' aowas lu'unai notaga walemb hiagoma. Esis atiasi siti gani ilif ametal lu'unai nogatagama hiahaom mamimami monda' epes ombel mogahahas endilisii.
42021012	“Apa' hiahaom amamba hiami ina a' motaga ulal, ata' owa'. Esis asili' sombalo' ipa' pahapifi pagaila basef ae'afii. Ea' sonda'epa kwapete'epa sohambombagepa. Sonda'mepa kot nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi sonda'epa penda' kalabus. Ea' sofa'epa pefe' sohaponepa pilutu nogohnaep amom king moloma gavman dembami.
42021013	Sonda'mepa waf afambai si'i ano'w ufia'wa pewalapa basef bu'wafi piga'ipasef.
42021014	Ea' ipa' pihapila nomonas ipe'isi sope banages, ama ipa' ina ukup pepoma anif basef pi'i pegagwamasef ulal, owa'i.
42021015	Dei' main, atiasi ae' atowe enda' basef fepe malogof ipe'igufi ese'epa gawa fasini ma bousi isimba ipe'isi ina a' la'ifisa sogagwa basef ifimba ae' igasi'ipafi, owa'.
42021016	Ahasepa mamasepa sahin owan ambeh esimbel atis ipe'isi soloma alipisi, esis wapani atiasi sowalapepa ma bousi ipe'isi. Ea' asoha anipa pega'.
42021017	Atiasi epes hiasi walemb hiagoma nelelemb numbutima ipa' kwapete' endilisi. Esis sati ipa' pagaila basef ae'afii, na'amba dei' sahepa.
42021018	Apa' ipa' ina atiasi pega', owa'atin. Ina anef awif atetef fagape balagah ipe'igahii higililif, owa'atin.
42021019	Ipa' pepe banagepa ma anaf pegefa' ambal namili.”
42021020	“Nemaf afamba ipa' pigati soldia hiami esis bousii sifi'i sogonauli' Jerusalemafi, ipa' a' pegawa atiasi felefele'ma taun inimba lu'wani negataga awen.
42021021	Nemaf afamba amam nematawa sogape itap lu'wapi Judiai sofa' sefe' sondowasa'o halafutagw. Ea' esis amam nematawa sagape nomona Jerusalemi sokwaha wambel ambalemba sofa' sondafo'o laogon. Ea' isimba sagape aofah wambel ambalembai, ina ata' sofe' suwis, owa'.
42021022	Dei' main, nemaf afamba God a' nogwamasa awami isimba sonda' waf awafii si'i basef hiafi fagail buk Baibeli fendawalap alihif hi'igalef.
42021023	Nematawa opafuwai waloma awamba awasi ota'asi ata' saga' nomagof atogufi, ae' a'i awo uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota atamba ogame' akafimi lu'wami. Nimanimi amamba a' lu'um a'owa' motaga itap apa'e ma nembel wandafunai Godi atiasi nogafe'ma epes isimba.
42021024	Anis, bainagw mohas soga'. Anis, bousi sonda' kalabusimas sofa'as sefe' sope itap apa'e hiagoma hi'ilagon. Ea' epes isimba sogolalama Godi a' sotaga sofa'asa wambel ambalemba Jerusalem bo'wagah asasigahi sumafiagon. Ea' sope atapis sofe' na'amba atina nemaf God nandandepafi ma nogota asasitai hi'igalata.
42021025	“Atiasi ametal hianai notagama awin alipini owambini neloma ondowa. Ama itap apa'e amam nematawa hiasi sagape anep itap lu'upai bololas endilisi. Esis ombal mohas kwapete' ma naoh lu'wami mohafel lu'um mutuwi monda'am lilatin ea' sowa solopam.
42021026	Ea' ondowa maim magape gani ilifi mondakoto' bolatin fi'ife' mope. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi ombal mohas kwapete' sowa so'oh itap si'i sagaga'i. Esis ukup pepoma hiahaom amamba ma'i mogataga itap apa'e.
42021027	“Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Nogota atamba asiti ae' iloma ilagw otaga ilif ifi'i iloma hiahaom mogogala'i fasimi Godi moloma banagami ananimi.
42021028	Anef i'i hiahaom amamba mogataga, nemaf afamba ipa' pilutu pesaniga pesa'ma balagah ipe'igahi. Dei' main, nemaf afamba felefele'ma fegataga God nogatagwahepa ma waf awafi ipe'ifi nofa'epa pigatanimai.”
42021029	Jisas na'ipasa basef waminif atin na'i, “Ipa' piti lawag agamba fik goloma lawah hiagahi wapani.
42021030	Ipa' piti ilaof nogonafa ma basowa, pegawa nogota atamba nelemb ea' felefele'ma sogaof.
42021031	Ea' na'amba atin, i'i ipa' piti hiahaom amamba ae' ali' aga'ipipami mogataga, ipa' pegawa nemaf afamba God nope Dembinai nugumafi epes hiasi ananisi felefele'ma fegataga.
42021032	“Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' ata' pagapani ina atiasi pega' ulal, ata' owa', ipa' ea' piti hiahaom amamba hiami mogataga hi'igalam.
42021033	Otaga noloma itap hiagoma anaf a' higililam hi'ilam, apa' basef ae'afi ina higililif, owa'atin endilisi. Fegape atapif lifilafii. Amom alipumi Jisasi solawaim andeande'ma mindihi'ama waf hiafi awafi.
42021034	“Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Ipa' solawaipa andeande'ma nemaf ae', igafi'afii. Na'amba penda' waf awafi pegalaga alop atopafi, pea' embel banagami atom hiami a' nomonas solasefe' ma nimanimi mamimami itapami atom. I'i waf afambai fisi'alipa hi'igalipa, atiasi nemaf afamba ae' igafi'afii fetagamepa kwafalis atis si'i sakwaha wambawa sagaha mafis.
42021035	Nemaf afamba fegataga ma amam nematawa sagape itap hiagomai ganigani ea' na'amba atin si'i wambawa ogofa' mafis.
42021036	Dondol ufilu wafilu silisilawi pendape ma ina penda' waf awafi afambai, owa'. Pepe pendabeten lifilafi ma God nogase'epa pepel pigalutu banagepama pindihi'ama hiahaom amambai ma'i mogatagamipai. Ama pigalutu banagepa ma ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi inifa'epa egawalogepa.”
42021037	Nimaguf hiafi dondol Jisas nape atapina nawalipa esis amam nematawa ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, apa' owamb a' nafe' na'ihi halafuta atamba Oliv.
42021038	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sosafel kuhukuhumbita atota safi'mai anona sogame' basef ananifi ipat lu'unai Godi atapis dondol.
42022001	Felefele' ma nemaf sonda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi esis Juda soga' bret owa' togatef lu'utaia. Sofalaf sa'i nemaf bu'wafi Pasova felefele' ma fegataga.
42022002	Amom pris dembami maloma dembami amamba magawalipasa mu'uli Godi ombal mahama esis amam nematawa. Ea' ma'i, “Atiasi afa' oha Jisas wi'imama?”
42022003	Ea' Satan nawis nembel Judasi Keriotinai. Anen amom 12-pelaim alipumi Jisasi.
42022004	Anen nafe'ma anom pris dembami maloma anom plisman dembami mape ipat lu'unai Godi. Amom amamba ma'i basef mandame'maefa Judas nolaoma ufia'wa noso'ama Jisas nogafe' lagof amamugufi.
42022005	Ea' sonaham ma'i basef mandame'maefa mogaso'ana anemba otamba Judas.
42022006	Ea' anen na'i aho'ma basef amamifi, a' nala' nolaoma ano'w ufia'wa nigihimba'mama Jisas amoma mogombalo'ana. Anen nape ma anef nemaf kwahufi ma owa' anis amam nematawa sope soglomanafia.
42022007	Nemaf afamba fataga esis Juda sa'i sonda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi sea' anota bret owa' togatifia. Afamba sa'i soha anom sipsip hiami nogami ma sonda' gwa'aisi isimba Pasova.
42022008	Jisas nasapa' Pitai Jon na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pefe' pendondombamafa gwa'aisi isimba Pasova ma afa' ogwa'as.”
42022009	Ea' amom mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat anima?”
42022010	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Peme', ipa' pefe' piwis gani wambel lu'wambili, atiasi piti anona aman nofa' embel sospen lu'unai nitilipa ufia'w. Ea' pigi'mana pefe' piwis ipat atamba anen nefe' nogawisatai.
42022011	Ea' pihali' ahama ipat atambai pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i, ipat atamba esis saga'ohotai totawa ani? Anen na'i no'wa afa' atofa alipufai ope onda' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Pasova.’
42022012	Ea' anen nihimba'mepa rum amamba lu'wami mape ilif, tebol siaifah sa'oh atifis. Ipa' pendondomba gwa'aisi rum amamba.”
42022013	Ea' amom mafe' mati hiahawes isimba na'amba atin si'i Jisas nali' naga'ipamas ea' mandondomba gwa'aisi isimba Pasova.
42022014	Nogota atataga ma soga' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Pasova, Jisas nao'wa alipumi ananimi mafi'i mape, anen nafe' nape felefele'ma tebol
42022015	na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'i ata' ea' gwa'aisi isimba Pasova elomepa uli', ma bola efa' akafimi lu'wami.
42022016	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ina ata' ea' gwa'aisi isimba Pasova wapani, owa'. Apa' anef nemaf basefa gwa'aisi isimba Pasova kofagefa fetaga fendawalap alihif anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, dao' ea'as wapani.”
42022017	Ea' anen nasa'mai anop kap embel wain bagalapi nanifela God na'i, “Ipa' sa'ma gwa'aisi isimba pendandamas.
42022018	Ae' a'ipipa, dei' a' anaf wapani ae' ina atiasi ia' embel wainimbel elomepa, owa'. Ama anaf God nope Dembinai nugumafi epes hiasi soloma hiahaom hiami hi'igalam, dao' ae' a' ea' embel wain inimba wapani elomepa.”
42022019	Ea' anen nafelai bret nanifela God nawalota naso'am na'i, “Bret atamba alop ae'api. [Ae' ase'epata ma egatopalopepa. Penda'as atapisa ukup pegapoma ae'.”
42022020	Amom ma'asa hi'alas, a'i owa' main, ea' nanda'as na'amba atina anop kap embel wainimbel bagalapi, na'i, “Wain embel ambalemba amamba esimbel ae'ambeli bewa' banaga basef God nagala' lapafi dambaifi. Esimbel ambalemba ae' ekolo'wambela egatopalopepa.]
42022021	Apa' ipa' piti aman anamba na'i nogawalapa ae' ma amom boumi ae'amii, nape na' gwa'aisi nalome tebol ini'i.
42022022	Aho', ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, atiasi ega' si'i ufia'w fowa' gani God nandandepa'wi. Apa' aman anamba nogawalape ma amom boumii, ae' ati uwahipina a'owa'. Dei' main, nimanimi akafimi lu'wami a' motagamana.”
42022023	Anen na'ias na'amba, alipumi ananimi atom mandahahali'ma ma'i, “Epen afa'ini ami atiasi nenda' waf afambai?”
42022024	Amom alipumi Jisasi ma'i anif basef mafitapef ma'i, “Ami nepe dambeni afa'ini?”
42022025	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amom king dembami esis hiasi sagape anep itap lu'upai, mape dembami asasimi manda'as kwapete'as. Amom banagami mumafi esis banagambel, ea' ma'i esis sofalam agof fasigufi si'i manda' waf fasifi mogatopalopasi.
42022026	Apa' ipa' ina penda'as na'amba, owa'i. Aman ami ni'i nogape a' dembinai ma ipe'i, anen ata' nope si'i amamba agof akami si'i isimba sanda' maoli ma sogatopalopepa.
42022027	Epen ami dambeni nikila' anis daias? Epen natoma naga' gwa'aisi teboli a'a epen nanda' gwa'aisi nefa'as nagafi'manaii? Apa' ae' ape la'afena ipa' si'i nanda' maoli ma egatopalopepa.
42022028	Fowa' hiahaom amamba magagwamba ae'i, nimaguf ifimba ipa' pape pagalome, ipa' ina pakwahowe, owa'atin.
42022029	Ahame ae'anai nase'e agol lu'wagili na'ipi ape dembiwai, ea' na'amba atin ae' ese'epa agof lu'wagufi i'ipipa pepe dembipai king.
42022030	Nemaf afamba ipa' a' pepe dembipai king peloma ae' pea' gwa'aisi embel pelome tebol ae'ani anamba God nagala'ambemagoma. Ea' pepe siaifah fasimi amom dembami kingi, pewawaloga misi'ah 12-pelaih amam nematawa ape'isi Israel.”
42022031	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Saimon, Saimon, ina' neme'. God na'i aho'ma Satan nogwamba ipa' ma penda' waf awafi si'i sogogakisa rais ama bu'wami mafe' anagon awami magafe' anagon daiagon.
42022032	Apa' owa' atin. Ae' andabetena egatopalopena ma banagena nigahapifa ae' atapina. Atiasi nembema nembel newa' banaga owapena ine'imi.”
42022033	Owa' Pita nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ea' anda'as dumbulidombola elomena ogafe' kalabus. Ae' anda'as dumbulidombola ega' egalomena wapani.”
42022034	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Pita, ae' a'ipina endilisi! Atiasi owamb amba'e awata ata' owa' totaea, ina' a' nendahali'mi ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisasa.’”
42022035	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amom na'i, “Fowa' ae' asapa'epa pandailagof pagafe', ipa' ina pefa' paos monisi saloma brasbeli su, owa'. Pafe' dowaf. Nemaf afamba anis hiahawes akepa a'a owa'?” Amom magwas ma'i, “Owa'atin.”
42022036	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Apa' dei' aman ami paos monisi saga'omanai anen a' nofa'as. Ea' brasbel wapani na'amba atin. Aman bainat akanai anen noso'asa saket ananitai anis sotalota, notala anota bainat.
42022037	“Dei' main, anif basefa ae' felefele'ma fetaga fendawalap. Anif basef fagail Buk Baibeli fowa' faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Esis nomonas sondanda'me si'i ae' aman auwai atowe.’ Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Basef ifimba felefele' fetaga endilisi ma nimanimi akafimi waf awafi atiasi mogataga ma ae'i.”
42022038	Ea' alipumi ananimi ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' niti. Afa' bainagw biagw agwa'e.” Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ea' amamba.”
42022039	Ea' Jisas nakwaha taun nawis ando' a' nafe' halafuta Oliv, si'i dondol nanda'as. Ea' alipumi ananimi magi'mana mafe'.
42022040	Anen nataga na'amba na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pendabetena hiahaom nogagwamba ipe'i ina a' motagamepa, owa'.”
42022041	Ea' nakwaha amom nindisi'ah nafo'o kwasakwasala, nogota bandata si'i aman nakwaha anom otam mafe' mogatambela. Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa nandabeten na'i,
42022042	“Ahame, i'i ina' niga'i awima, dao' nekwahome kap apamba. Apa' owa', ina' nindaila okom ine'imi atom, ae' owa'.”
42022043	[Ea' anona ensel nafi'i heven nowa' banagona.
42022044	Jisas name'agama nimanimi akafimi ea' aom endilisi, ea' nandabeten banagambel a'owa', agwah mandona si'i esimbel magalo itap.]
42022045	Anen nandabeten ea' nosafel nafe'ma alipumi ananimi. Owa' nati amom ukup iwanipi panda'am ma'oh atin.
42022046	Ea' na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' paga'oh? Ipa' safel pendabeten. Na'amba hiahaom mogogwambipai a' mifi'i motagamepa.”
42022047	Jisas ata' na'i atin, owa' amam mini'ap launai a' mafi'i. Aman anamba sofalana sa'i Judas, anen alipunai amom 12-pelaim Jisasi, nafi'i nali'ai amom. Anen nafi'i felefele'ma Jisasa nogasisi' dalogw ananigwi.
42022048	Owa' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Judas, ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Ina' nasisi'i nihimba'ma amom boumi ae'ami, a'a?”
42022049	Alipumi ananimi mape malomana mati amom boumi Jisasi ma'i mohana ea' mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i afa' oham bainagw?”
42022050	Owa' anona amom alipumi ananimi naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii ea' natopa' aliga kwahisigai pele'ataga gowa.
42022051	Owa' Jisas nataloga amom na'i, “Kwaha waf afambai, ea' hapaifi.” Ea' Jisas nasa lagol aliga aman anambai, gataga bo'oga wapani.
42022052	Ea' Jisas na'ipa agufumi maloma amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami mugumafi polisman hiamii ipat lu'unai Godi, mafi'i ma'i mogombalo'anai. Na'i, “Ipa' pefa'i bainagwi belep pafi'i si'i pa'i pegewa' anona aman nanda' wali a'a?
42022053	Nimaguf hiafi dondol ae' ape alomepa ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wafi ma esis amam nematawa hiasi apa' ipa' owa' Pembale'ea. Apa' dei' nogota ata'e a' nemaf ipe'ifi. Dei' banagami owamb akuti a' mikila'.”
42022054	Jisas na'iasa ea' amom mahapilana mofa'ana mafe' mawis ipat pris dembinaii. Apa' Pita ina nalomam nafe' atef, owa', nagigi'mam nafe' nail laogon.
42022055	Esis sakata nif indalelemb ambalemba nomon ipat tagapoma mapomef. Ea' Pita nape nalomam.
42022056	Ano'w nemata'w kwanda' maoli kwati anen napoma nif. Ea' kwatotolona kwa'i, “Aman anamba wapani anen nape nagaloma Jisasi.”
42022057	Apa' Pita na'i, “Ahae', ae' owa'.” Anen na'i, “Nemata'w, ae' ina egawa anen, owa'.”
42022058	A'i owa' nogota laota kwasala, anona aman nati Pita na'i, “Ina' wapani ina' aman mini'ap amamipi.” Owa' Pita na'i, “Ahae', ae' owa'.”
42022059	A'i nogota laota kwasakwasala tafe' owa', anona aman daiana na'i banagambel na'i, “Endilisi atis, aman anamba wapani nape nagaloma anini. Dei' main, anen wapani Galilinai atona.”
42022060	Owa' Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Ahae', ae' owa' egawa basef ifimba ine'ifia.” Anen ata' na'ias na'amba atin, owa' awata a' tata.
42022061	Ea' Dembinai nandambema a' natiti Pita, owa' okom Pitai mandanda' ma basef ifimba doko' Dembinai na'ipanafi naga'i, “Owamb amba'e awata ata' owa' totaea, ina' atiasi a' nembaso'mas ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ina' owa' negawea.’”
42022062	Ea' Pita nawisi nafe' ando' nalef mehip.
42022063	Amom mugumafi Jisasi manda' anen findiwana mahana.
42022064	Amom mapete' anef lowaf mambaho'mana naep mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' ni'i basef profeti newalapa ami nagahinai.”
42022065	Ea' manda' basef hiafi daif awafi wapani ma anen.
42022066	Ama awin natafi amom agufumi dembami esis Judai maloma amom pris dembami maloma anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, amom hiami mondowa'anima mape. Ea' mofa' Jisas mafi'mai amom mahali'ana ma'i,
42022067	“Ina' ni'ipafa. Ina' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii a'a owa'?” Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “I'i ae' iga'ipipa, ina atiasi pihapifi.
42022068	Ea' i'i igahali'ipa ma anif basef, ipa' ina pegwa basef ae'afi, owa'.
42022069	Ea' dei' a' anaf gani owagama wapani ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi egape wa'ol lagol kwahisigili Godi banagagili.”
42022070	Ea' amom hiami ma'i, “Dei' ina' a' God Nogamana a'amon?” Anen nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipa' pa'ias ea' ma'wis.”
42022071	Ea' amom ma'i, “Afa' wa'i ata' ome' basef mamahifa wapani? Owa'. Malogol ananigili atogol ea' ga'i basef ifimba afa' wame'ef ea'.”
42023001	Ea' amom dembami hiami mosafel mofa' Jisas mafe'ma dembinai gavman Pailat.
42023002	Ea' ma'i masapagana manda'mana basef ma'i, “Afa' wati aman anamba nanda' waf awafi nasa'ma ukup epes hiasii ma sonda' wandaf sogaloma gavman. Anen nandaiwa'ma mogaso'ana takis gavman dembinai Sisar ea' na'ipapa na'i anen atona anona dembinai king Krais.”
42023003	Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' king dembinai Judai a'a owa'?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef ifimba ina' naga'iefi endilisifi.”
42023004	Ea' Pailat na'ipa amom pris dembami maloma esis amam nematawa hiasi na'i, “Ae' ina ati anis maefah awasi, owa'. Ina ati anef waf awafima aman anamba enda'mana anif basef, owa'.”
42023005	Owa' amom manda'mana basef Jisasi ma'ipana banagambel ma'i, “Anen naso'asa basef esis amam nematawa hiasi sosafel banages sa'i sonda' wandafa ganimba walemb hielimbi Judia. Anen nanda'i maol gani itap lu'upa Galili ea' nafi'i nataga na'a.”
42023006	Pailat name' basef ifimba saga'ifa anini ma nanda' maol nagafe'agon hi'alagon anamba hiagoma itap apamba Galili ea' nahali' amom na'i, “Aman anamba anen Galilinai a'a?”
42023007	Amom ma'ipana ea' nogawa Jisas anen Galilinai gavman dembinai Herot nugumafiagoma. Ea' Pailat nasapa'ana nafe'ma Herot. Nogota atamba Herot ata' napani Jerusalem.
42023008	Herot nati Jisas asonahanamana a'owa'. Anen name' basefa anen nogota lautai, ea' na'i notolona. Anen name' basefa maol Jisas nanda'ani ea' na'i Jisas ata' nonda' anom banagami si'i God nanda'ami ma ata' notolom.
42023009	Ea' Herot nahali'anama hiahaom hiami. Apa' Jisas ina nagwamana anif basef anen, owa'.
42023010	Amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi mafi'i malutu felefele' manda'mana kot masapagana banagambel a'owa'.
42023011	Ea' Herot nao'wa amom soldia ananimi manda' Jisas findiwana ma basef awafi. Ea' mofa'ai anef lowaf fasifi mowaho'manaf masapa'ana notanima nafe'ma Pailat.
42023012	Fowa' Herot naloma Pailat manda' migimigahi, apa' dei' nemaf afamba a' alipumi mandandomboma atogon.
42023013	Ea' Pailat nofalai amom pris dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai maloma esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'i sandakolas.
42023014	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' fa'ai aman anamba pa'i nasa'ma ukup epes hiasii nahambombagasa sanda' wandafi fi'mai ae'. Doko' ahali'ana ma hiahawes isimba ma nogohnaep ipe'isi a' pame'. Ae' ina ati anom maefah awami ma aman anamba ma hiahawes isimba ipa' panda' basefasi, owa'.
42023015	Dembinai gavman Herot wapani na'amba atin. Dei' main, anen nasapa'ana notanima nafi'mai apa'. Ipa' pegawa aman anamba ina nanda' anin mae awani ma apa' mohana nogaga', owa'atin.
42023016	Atiasi ehana atin ekwahona nefe' wahifina.”
42023017	[Apa' waf esis Judai fagape na'amba. Afagof danda nemaf afamba sanda' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Pasova gavman dembinai Pailat natagwahowa anona nanda' kalabusi nafe' wahifina ma esis.]
42023018	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi gigal sa'oh na'amba sa'i, “Ha aman anamba ma a' noga', ea' tagwaha Barabas nifi'mai apa'.”
42023019	Aman anamba Barabas anen napa' nagaloma amom gavmani ma taun inimba lu'wani ea' naha epes hiasi saga'. Ea' dei' sanda'ana nanda' kalabus.
42023020	Pailat na'i nokwahowa Jisas nefe' wahifina, ea' nahali'as wapani.
42023021	Owa', soga sa'i mehip sa'i, “Hana noga', hana noga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.”
42023022	Ea' Pailat notambel nahali'as wanif wapani na'i, “Dei' nanda' waf maif awafi? Ae' ina ati anef waf awafi kofagefa fapoma aman anamba ma apa' mohana nogaga', owa'atin. Ae' i'ipa amom soldia mopopagahana ea' ekwahona nefe' wahifina.”
42023023	Apa' owa' owa'atin, esis gigal sa'oh mehip sa'i anen nohana nondaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Ea' basef asasifi fapa'aga basef Pailati.
42023024	Ea' Pailat nasopama malogol ananigili naila nomonas asasisi.
42023025	Aman anamba nanda' wandaf nagaloma gavmani naha anis sagaga'i, sanda'ana nape nanda' kalabus, Pailat nakwahona nafe'mas wahifina. Esis sa'ipa Pailat sa'i anen notanima nokwahona kalabus nifi'mai esis wapani, ea' nagi'ma nomonas asasisi nakwahona nafe'mas wahifina naso'asa Jisas nafe'ma esisa amom soldia mofa'ana mofe' mogahana.
42023026	Amom soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' ea' mati anona aman Saimon, anen anop nomopunai anep itap Sairininai, napani alup nafi'i na'i nofe' nuwis wambel taun lu'wagoma. Ea' molaepana masasapa'ana nowandefa lawag agamba usi'igai ti'wanaegai ikaf ananifi nofa'aga nigi'ma Jisas nogafe'.
42023027	Ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi safe' sagi'mana a anowa nematawa wapani wafe' walef windiwagef wa'i uwahipigai ma anen.
42023028	Owa' Jisas nandambema na'ipawa na'i, “Ipa' nematawa Jerusalamipai, ipa' ina pelopa ae', owa'. Ipa' pendalopa ipa' peloma awasi ipe'isi, andeande'.
42023029	Dei' main, anef nemaf fegataga anis epes ea' si'i, ‘Awo nematawa owa' ata' ogola awasia, ea' awamba owa' ogaso' nomambeha awasia, awamba atiasi ope andeande' sonohawa.’
42023030	Nemaf afamba esis asi'ipa halafutagw si'i, ‘Ipa' piwai pipai'apa pese'alepa!’ Ea' esis si'ipa damotagw si'i, ‘Ipa' so'alepa.’
42023031	Dei' esis sanda' waf awafi ma lawag namugai. Apa' atiasi lawag agamba gogataga aliaga, gope gi'imama?
42023032	Ea' amom soldia mofa' amam biam manda' waf awafii ma'i moham moga' moloma Jisas.
42023033	Ea' safe' sataga anagon sofalagon saga'i Pipitagol Balagaigil. Anamba amom soldia magandola Jisas lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegaima. Ea' mandola anom biam manda' waf awafii manda' wali mandolam mail wa'owa'ol Jisas nail la'afen.
42023034	Ea' Jisas na'ipa God na'i, “Ahame, ina' nekwahowa waf awafi amom manda'meaf ae'i, okom mose'enaf. Amom ina mogawa andeande' hiahaom amamba manda'meam ae'i, owa'.” Ea' manda' satu ma luwaguf maim ananimi ma ami nigikila'i mofa'ef mondondamef atona atin.
42023035	Ea' esis amam nematawa salutu sape satolona same' amom agufumi esis Judai manda' salamalana manda'iafana ma'i, “Anen nandatopalopa anis daias. Apa' endilisi anen Krais God nogosaho'anaiai, ata' notopalopa anen atona nondatagwah nisila'i.”
42023036	Amom soldia wapani manda' salamalana manda'iafana. Ea' mafi'i felefele'ma anen ma'i moso'ana anambel embel wainimbel numbutimbeli.
42023037	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “I'i endilisi ina' dembinai king Judaiai, dao' ina' ata' netopalopa ina' atina.”
42023038	Anif basef fagail lawag agamba ilifa balaga ananigaii faga'ias fa'i, “AMAN ANAMBA DEMBINAI KING ESIS JUDAI.”
42023039	Ea' anona aman nanda' waf awafii nagail wa'ili na'i basef awafima Jisas na'i, “Ina' Krais endilisiai, ina' ata' netopalopa ina' nili' ea' netopalopafa wapani.”
42023040	Owa' anona nagail wa'ili nagagaolana na'i, “Ina' nefa' akafimi na'amba atin si'i aman anamba. Ina' owa' ombal mohenama Goda?
42023041	Amom soldia maha afa' oga' andeande' wandahama waf awafi afa' wanda'afi. Apa' aman anamba ina nanda' waf awafi, owa'atin.”
42023042	Ea' nandambema na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Jisas, anaf ina' negataga dembinai king, nemaf afamba ina' okom mondanda'ma ae'.”
42023043	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, ina' dei' a' nepe nelome wambel bu'wambili Paradais.”
42023044	Awin a'i owa' nandasapa', akot lu'unai a' nataga dogw naofana itap hiagoma esis Judai nape nafe' nafe' nataga awin nandambema nagape gani 3 klok wambomota. Ea' nataga negala' wapani.
42023045	Ea' anona lowaf lu'unai si'i utai nagail ipat Godi lu'unai nomoni palalana hi'alana nandawal nataga biafina.
42023046	Ea' Jisas galala mehip na'i, “Ahame ae'inai, ae' a' ese'enago ambal ae'ali lofo'o lagol ine'igili.” Anen na'ias na'ambama ea', naga' dogw.
42023047	Ea' kepten nugumafi amom soldiai nalutu nati hiahaom amamba ea' nasa'ma agol Godi na'i, “Endilisi atis, aman anamba bu'unai.”
42023048	Ea' amam nematawa isimba hiasi safi'i sandakolasa sagati hiahaom amamba magatagai, satolom ea' saha mefetagw asasigwi sindihihimba' nomonas asasisi iwanis a'owa' ea' sotanima safe'.
42023049	Esis alipisi hiasi Jisasi saloma anowa nematawa wagafi'i itap lu'upa Galilii wagi'ma Jisas wafi'i, esis salutu laogon felefele' sati hiahaom amamba.
42023050	Anona aman agilinama Josep anen Arimateainai itap lu'upa Judia. Anen aman bu'unai, kaunsel dembinai ma amom mugumafi esis Juda hiasii.
42023051	Anen ina na'i aho'ma amom dembami Juda moha Jisas nogaga', owa'atin. Anen nape nahafa nemaf bu'wafi fegataga ma epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias.
42023052	Aman anamba nafe'ma Pailat nahali'ana ma nogofa'i alop Jisasi nogawana.
42023053	Ea' nafe' natagwaha alop Jisasi nisila'i, nanda' anef lowaf afitifi nopalo'ana ma nombafana, nasapa'ana nawis matmat atamba nalana nomon. Matmat atamba sagwasota tawis anona otam lu'unai. Fowa' esis ina dei' sawa anin epenagon, ata' owa' atin.
42023054	Nemaf afamba sa'i sogowando'ma hiahawesafi nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi sa'i sabat felefele'ma fegataga.
42023055	Nematawa awamba Galiliwai waloma Jisas wagafi'ii, awo doko' wagi'ma Josep wali' wafe' wati matmat atamba. Ea' wati nomon na'amba Josep nagawa Jisasa.
42023056	Watolona ea' otanima wafe' ifagw awaugwi, wandondomba wel laloma hiahawes alogw fasigwi gwagasi ma bimb ofa'as ofe' matmat ogandisa alop Jisasi. Nemaf afamba sabat fataga, wapoma noma'w si'i mu'uli Godi naga'i.
42024001	Ama main wafilu nemaf afamba sande fagali'ma wik agambai kuhumbita atota awo osafel wafe' matmat. Agufuwama awamba. Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w awo agol atogol Maria ma'mana Jemsi waloma Joana ea' waloma anowa daiawa wapani. Ea' ofa' wel mais alogw fasigwi gwagasi awo wali' wagandondombasi, ofa'as wafe' matmat.
42024002	Ea' watologon owa', wati otam anamba ina ata' mape mowalo uta, owa'. Anin epen a' nafe' nawisi'am mafe' ma'oh wa'oh.
42024003	Ea' wawis nomon apa' awo ina wati Jisas, owa'atin.
42024004	Ea' awo nomonas salasafe' hiahiasa isimba. Owa' kwafalis atis wati anom amam biam malutu felefele' luwaguf amamifi mogala' a'owa'.
42024005	Ea' awo ombal mahawa a'owa' windiwa balagah wati itap. Owa' amom ma'ipawa ma'i, “Ipa' pafi'i pelaoma aman anamba ambal lagapaunai ma na'a epes sagaga'i ma main? Anen ina ata' nape na'a, owa'. A' nosafel ea'!
42024006	Ipa' ukup pendapoma basef ifimba fowa' nali' naga'ipipafi. Nemaf afamba ata' nape nagalomepa ganimba itap apamba Galili na'ipipa na'i,
42024007	‘Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Esis atiasi sese'e efe'ma amom manda' waf awafii, mondele lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Ma nimaguf bif hi'ilif, anef wapani a' itanima esafel.’”
42024008	Ea' awo ukup pandanda'ma basef ifimba fowa' naga'iefi.
42024009	Ea' wakwaha matmat otanima wafe' wa'ipa amom alipumi ananimi 11-pelaim maloma anis alipisi hiasi ananisi wapani ma hiahawes isimba.
42024010	Nematawa awamba wanowa Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Joanai ano'w Maria Jems ma'mana. Awo wape waloma anowa daiawa wa'ipa amom aposel 11-pelaim.
42024011	Owa' amom ma'i awo wambaso'mam wa'i basef gawa akafi, owa' mohapifawaia.
42024012	Apa' Pita nosafel nasagih nafe' matmat nasisil nati nomon owa', nati luwaguf mogowa'anami atom ma'oh. Ea' notanima nafe' ipat nomonas salasafe'ma hiahawes isimba sagatagai.
42024013	Nemaf afamba anom amam biam alipumi Jisasi mosafel a' mafe' anambel wambel sa'umbili felefele' agilimbila Emeus. Ufia'w akwamba kwa'waha Jerusalem kwagafe' Emeusi nohotagw 7-pelaigw, 14 kilomita.
42024014	Amom mafe' ea' manifa hiahawes isimba dei' sagatagai.
42024015	Amom ma'ias mandahahali'mas mafe', ea' Jisas nataga felefele' nafe' nalomam.
42024016	Apa' naep amamipi walufip, ina mati Jisas mogawana, owa'atin.
42024017	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pa'i main pafe'?” Nahali'am na'amba, ukup amamipi iwaiwanip malutu.
42024018	Ea' anona amom biam Kliopas nagwamana basef na'i, “Epes hiasi sagape Jerusalami sati hiahaom amamba magataga nemaf afa'ii sogawam. Apa' ina' atina owa' negawaia.”
42024019	Anen na'ias na'amba, Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Main da'im?” Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Hiahaom amamba magatagama Jisas Nasaretinai. Anen dembinai profet naga'ipa esis amam nematawa basef fasifi banagafi. Anen banagonai ma nawalipasa basef ifimba nanda' maol banagani ma naep Godi naloma epes wapani.
42024020	Ea' amom pris dembami maloma agufumi dembami ape'imi maso'amana nafe'ma amom gavman dembami. Ea' amom gavman ma'i basefa mohana nogaga'. Ea' mandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
42024021	Apa' fowa' afa' ukup pa'i endilisi wa'i, ‘Aman anamba nogatagwaha apa' Israel mogape wahifipai.’ Aho', ea' anif basef wapani. Hiahaom amamba mataga ea' nemaf dei'ifi fagafe' wanifi.
42024022	Dei' anowa nematawa afa'iwai mini'ap atep wanda'afa gogolalasofa kwapete'. Kuhimbita atota osafel wafe' matmat,
42024023	apa' awo ina wati Jisas, owa'atin. Ea' otanima wa'ias wa'i, ‘Afa' wati anom ensel si'i wa'oh wandanda'ah watolom ma'ipafa ma'i. “Anen nosafel nape namona.”’
42024024	“Ea' anom amam afa'imi mafe' matmat mati hiahawes na'amba atin si'i awo waga'ias. Apa' anen ina matolona, owa'atin.”
42024025	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “O, ipa' bipa nomonas akipai. Ukup ipe'imi ea' mase'epa, ina pahapifa basef amom profeti kwafalis, owa'.
42024026	Krais anen ata' nili' nofa' akafimi ma main, a' nofa' banagami mogogala'i ananimi migi'. Dei' maina ipa' owa' pegegawaea?”
42024027	Ea' nali' nasefela basef hiafi Baibelifi amom profet maloma Moses manda'afi nawalipamef. Na'ipam basef ifimba hiafi faga'i anini nawalipamef kofagefa hi'alef.
42024028	Amom mafe' mataga felefele'ma wambel ambalemba ma'i mogafe'ma. Ea' Jisas na'i ata' nofe' atin,
42024029	owa' matalifana ma'i, “Ina' nepe nelomafa. Awin ea' newala felefele'ma owamb.” Ea' nawis nape nalomam.
42024030	Amom ma'i mea' gwa'aisi, anen nape nalomam nasa'ma bret nanifela God nawalota naso'amata.
42024031	Anen nanda'asa amom na'amba naep amamipi pele'atep dei' ea' mogawana. Ea' nosafel nafe' nakwaha amom dolomana.
42024032	Ea' ma'i, “Afa' wagafi'i ufia'w ukup afa'ipi ea' pehafel endilisi ma anen nawalapa basef fagape Baibel naga'ipafaef nogota atamba.”
42024033	Amom ma'ias na'amba owa', nogota atamba atota mosafel a' motanima mafe' Jerusalem. Ea' mati alipumi 11-pelaim Jisasi maloma anis alipisi amamisi amamisi sandatama sape.
42024034	Ea' sa'ipa amom biam sa'i, “Endilisi atis Dembinai a' notanima nosafel! Saimon natolona ea'.”
42024035	Ea' amom biam ma'ipasa hiahawes doko' magatilis ufia'wi. Ma'ipasas ma'i, “Anen nalomafa wape nawala bret watolona ea' ogawana.”
42024036	Esis ata' sa'i basef ifimba atin, owa' Jisas a' nalutu la'afena esis na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'i opalef ipe'ilifi fepe awanelef.”
42024037	Ea' satolona sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' a' ombal mahas. Esis sa'i owa' sati anona gamba.
42024038	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' gogolalasipa kwapete' ma main? Dei' maina ukup ipe'ipi palapagafe'?
42024039	Ipa' piti lagufi bo'wagah ae'asi. Ae' atowe ea' ma'uwi ape si'iwi. Ipa' pesa lagofa ae' peme'e. Gambefah ina alopi bihitagof mapais si'i pagati magape alop ae'apii, owa'atin.”
42024040	Anen na'ias na'amba ma ea', nihimba'masa lagof bo'wagah ananisi.
42024041	Ea' sonahasa anen. Apa' esis gogolalasis kwapete' nomonas sape hiahawes, owa' ata' sohapifanaia. Ea' nahali'as na'i, “Ipa' anis gwa'aisi a'a owa'?”
42024042	Ea' saso'ana anol aol du'wanil sagaofali.
42024043	Nandalombasal na'al ama nogohnaep asasisi.
42024044	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Fowa' ae' ata' ape agalomepa, a'ipipa ea' ma basef hiafi fagail buk Baibeli ma mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani. Buk akwamba amom profeti faloma buk Sami, basef ifimba hiafi faga'i ae'i. Basef ifimba hiafi dei' fataga endilisi fandawalap hi'alef.”
42024045	Anen nihimba'mas andeande'ma ukup asasipi ma sogogawa basef fagail Buk Baibeli.
42024046	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Fowa' amom manda' basef ifimba fagail buk Baibeli fa'i Krais a' nondame' akafimi sohana noga' ma nimaguf bif hi'ilif anef fegafe'ma wanifi, dao' notanima nosafel matmat wapani.
42024047	Ama agol ananigili atiasi alipisi ananisi sili' sowalapa basef Jerusalem ea' si'ipasef amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas sagape walemb hiagomai ma sembema nelelemba God nokwahomasa awami asasimi okom mogaso'anam.
42024048	Ipa' apati hiahaom amamba magatagamai ma atiasi piga'ipa hiasi.
42024049	Ipa' peme! Anom hiahaom banagami fowa' Ahame na'iam endilisi na'i nogasi'ipami felefele' mifi'mipai. Ipa' pendape atapipa taun inimba pefe'ma petaga nemaf afamba banagami mugisila'i heven ilifi mogafi'mai ipa'.”
42024050	Jisas nao'wa esis amam nematawa hiasi safe' sataga felefele'ma Betani ea' nasa'ma lagof falota nofalo'masa nogowa' banagas.
42024051	Anen ata' na'ipasa atin, God a' nagiana nakwaha esis nalota heven.
42024052	Ea' sanifelona sanda' lotumana ea' sandagala a'owa' sotanima safe' Jerusalem sandagala atapis sape.
42024053	Ea' dondol sagape ipat lu'unai Godi safela agol ananigili lu'wagol endilisi. Ea' ma'uf.
43001001	Fowa' gani dambadamba anif Basef epen nape. Ea' Basef epen anamba nape naloma God. Ea' epen anamba agilinama Basef anen atona God.
43001002	Fowa' dambadamba epen anamba agilinama Basef naloma God nape.
43001003	Anen nanda' hiahaom hiami. Owa' anin mae atitin netaga ano'w ufia'wa, owa'atin. Hiahaom magatagai hiami anen atona nanda'am mataga.
43001004	Ambal namili lagapaunai lape epen anamba ea' ambal alol logogala'ma esis epesi.
43001005	Mogogala'i amamba mogogala'ma akuti. Ea' akot ina taofana anen, owa' atin endilisi. Anen nogogala'ma esis amam nematawa hiasii, anen ea' nafi'i itap apa'e ma dei' nogota ata'e.
43001006	Anona aman daiana nataga, agilinama Jon, God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
43001007	Anen nafi'i ma nogowalapa basef. Dei' nawalapa basefa nogogala'i anamba ma epes hiasi sogame' basef ananifi sogahapifana.
43001008	Jon nawalapa basef ifimba na'i anen ina nagwapin inimba nigigala'i, owa'. Anen nali' nafi'ima nogawalapa basef alihifa nagwapin anamba endilisinai nogogala'i.
43001009	Nagwapin anamba nogogala' endilisii, anen nogogala'ma esis amam nematawa hiasii, ea' nafi'i itap apa'e ma dei' nogota ata'e.
43001010	Fowa' gani anen nanda' itap apa'e pataga, dei' nafi'i nape itap apa'e. Apa' esis amam nematawa sagape itap apa'ii ina sogawana, owa'.
43001011	Anen nafi'i nataga kofagama itap lu'upa esis Juda, owa' esis mini'ap ananisi ina sogawana sa'i aho' sofa'ana sahapifana, owa'atin.
43001012	Apa' esis mamahisa sogawana si'i aho' sogahapifanai, noso'asa anin ametala sogataga awasi Godi.
43001013	Esis ina sataga awasi Godi ma waf bu'wafi mamasas sogolasi, owa'atin. Esis ina sataga awasi Godi si'i ukup mamasas pa'i ma sogolas, owa'atin. God atona nanda'as sataga awasi ananisi.
43001014	Basef fataga epen ea' nape la'afena afa', ea' wati glori mogogala'i banagami ananimi. Glori amamba mogogala'i banagami nogamanai atom, ahamana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Anen natopalopapa dowaf nowa' banagapa ma nigihimba'mapa waf endilisifi fape si'ifa anen.
43001015	Jon nawalapa basefa anen na'amba na'i, “Anen aman anamba fowa' a'ipipana aga'i. Aman nigi'ma ae' nogafi'ii, anen nape nagali'ma ae'i. Anen fowa'inai nagapan na'ambai, nape nali'ma ae'.”
43001016	Apa' hiapai mofa' hiahawes fasisi sagape si'isa anini. Waf afamba natopalopapa dowaf nogowa' banagapa nanda'as sandape na'amba atin nimaguf hiafi.
43001017	God naso'ana mu'uli ananini Mosesa nagawalipapa. Apa' Jisas Krais natopalopapa dowafa waf endilisifi.
43001018	Owa' anona aman atotona nili' niti God kwasakwasalaia, owa'atin endilisi. Nogamana anamba Godi atotona nape felefele' endilisi naloma anen ahamana ea' nawalapa basef kofagefa ma apa' nihimba'mapa God.
43001019	Anom amam dembami Judaimi mapani Jerusalem masapa'i anom amam mafe' mahali' Jon. Anom pris maloma anom Livai mugumafi ipat Godii, amom mapani Jerusalem mafi'i mahali' Jon ma'i, “Ina' aman mamahinama?”
43001020	Ea' Jon ina nambaho' basef, owa'. Anen nagwamam nawalapa basef na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ina Krais God nandandepe nasapa'e agafi'ii, owa'.”
43001021	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dei' ina anina profet fowa'inai agilinama Elaija?” Owa' anen na'i, “Ae' owa'.” Ea' ma'i, “Dei' ina' aman anamba profet apa' mape mogohafanai?” Owa' nagwamama basef na'i, “Owa'.”
43001022	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Dei' ina' ami? Ama afa' utanima ofe' uga'ipa dembami masapa'afa wagafi'ii. Ina' na'i ina' atina na'i basef maif, ina' ami?”
43001023	Ea' Jon nagwa basef si'i fowa' profet Aisaia naga'i na'i, “Ae' anagol malogol dowaf goga ga'i anep itap fataupigima gaga'ias na'amba ga'i, ‘Pendomba ufia'w Dembinaii!’
43001024	-
43001025	Ea' amom Farisi dembami Judai masapa'am mafi'i mogahali' anini mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' Krais God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii a'a, ina' Elaija a'a, ina' anona profet dembinai? I'i ina' owa' Kraisa, a owa' Ilaijaia, anona profeta, dei' ina' napisi'asa main?” Jon nagwamam na'ipam na'i,
43001026	“Ae' agapisi'as embel atembeli, apa' anona aman anamba nape la'afena ipa', ipa' ina pegawana.
43001027	Aman anamba nagi'ma ae' nagafi'ii. Ae' ina ambo'owe a'owa' egatagwaha mandalefa su ananimi, owa'atin. Anen dembinai a'owa', nikila' ae'.”
43001028	Basef ifimba fataga anambel wambel Betani walemb Jordan fisanamb, Jon nagapisi' esis amam nematawama.
43001029	Wafilu owa', Jon nati Jisas nafi'mai anen na'ipas na'amba na'i, “Ipa' piti aman anamba anen si'i mafin sipsip noganai Godi, anamba esis sanda' ofa anai. Anen si'i sipsip nogakwaha waf awafi esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi sanda'afi.
43001030	Anen ma'una apamba ea' nafi'i. Anamba fowa' ae' a'ipipa aga'i, ‘Anona aman nigi'ma ae' nogafi'ii, anen nagali'ma ae'i. Anen a' nali' nape apa' ae' selai agi' ataga.’
43001031	Ae' ina a' egawa anen epen mamahonama, ata' owa'atin. Ae' afi'i apisi'ipa embela egawalapa aman anamba dembinai ma apa' amam nematawa Israel.”
43001032	Ea' Jon nawalapa basef alihif na'i, “Ae' ea' ati Ambal bu'unai Godi nakwaha heven nisila'i si'i amil alamba apa' maga'i ma'unai nisila'i ea' nafe' nape nomona anen.
43001033	Ae' ina egawa anen, owa'. Apa' God nasapa'e afi'i ma igapisi'as embel ea' na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' niti Ambal bu'unai Ae'anai nisila'o ma nogapaunai aman anamba, ea' ma'una ea' aman anamba. Anen atiasi nogaso'as Ambal Ae'anai bu'unai nogape opalef asasilifi nomoni.’
43001034	Ae' ea' atolona endilisi awalapa basef alihifa anen a'if a'i, Anamba anen Nogamana Godi endilisi.”
43001035	A'i owa' wafilu Jon a nafe' nalutu wapani na'amba ea' alipumi ananimi biam malomana mape.
43001036	Ea' nati Jisas nafo'o, na'ipa alipumi ananimi nihimba'mama Jisas na'i, “Piti, anen si'i sipsip noganai Godi.”
43001037	Ea' alipumi ananimi mame' na'ipas na'amba, maila Jisas.
43001038	Jisas nandambema owa' nati amom mailana na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pa'i pifi'i pelaoma main?” Owa' ma'ipana ma'i, “Rabai, ina' nagapoma ipat ati?” Agol agalemba “Rabai” apa' mombomagol mi'i, “Dembinai Tisa.”
43001039	Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' fi'i ma ata' petologon.” Ea' mafe' ipat anen nagapautai. Nemaf afamba atef wambomota awin nandambema napani gani wa'ol 4 klok, ea' malomana mapani.
43001040	Amom mame' basef ifimba Jisasi Jon naga'iefi mailana. Amom agufuma Andrui Saimon Pita, amom atom sahomana owamana.
43001041	Andru a' ata' usi'ina notanima nali' nafe' nowando'ma Saimon, ama ni'ipana niga'i, “Afa' wati Dembinai Mesaia ea'.” Apa' dei' mambema agol agalemba Mesaia ma'i Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
43001042	Ea' Andru nao'wa Saimon nafi'mai Jisas natolona na'i, “Ina' Saimon nogama Joni. Anaf agol ine'igili a' nendefala Sifas.” Agol kofagogola agalemba “Pita” ga'i otam.
43001043	Wafilu wapani Jisas na'i nefe' itap apamba lu'upa Galili. Ea' nowando'ma Filip natolona na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fi'i nigi'ma basef ae'afi nila ae'.”
43001044	Filip nafi'i wambel ambalemba atembel Pitai Andru magafi'ima, Betsaida.
43001045	Ea' Filip nafe' nolaoma Nataniel na'ipana na'i, “Aman anamba fowa' Moses nanda' basefa mu'uli God naga'ianai, ea' amom profet wapani manda' basef maga'ianai, aman anamba ma'una afa' ea' watolona. Anen aman Nasaretinai, Josep nogamana.”
43001046	Ea' nahali' Filip na'i, “Dei' anis hiahawes fasisi sataga safi'i Nasaret?” Filip na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fi'i netelona.”
43001047	Ea' Jisas nati Nataniel nafi'mai anen na'ipana na'i, “Niti aman anamba Israelinai endilisi, aman bu'unai. Anen owa' niga'i anif basef baso'asefia.”
43001048	Ea' Nataniel na'ipana na'i, “Dei' ina' negawe na'imama?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Doko' Filip ina dei' nofalena, ata' owa'atin, ae' ali' atilina nagape lawag fik kofagegama. Nogota atamba atilina.”
43001049	Nataniel nagwamana na'i, “Tisa Dembinai, ina' Nogamana Godi endilisi. Ina' dembinai King apa' Israeli.”
43001050	Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'i, “Ae' doko' ea' ali' atilina egawena nagape lawag kofagegama. Isimba atis dei' ina' nahapifi. Endilisi anaf ina' a' niti anom hiahaom banagami mikila' dei' atilina nagape laogon.”
43001051	Ea' Jisas na'ipana wapani na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi atis, anaf ipa' piti heven nundausi' nogal ea' amom ensel Godi lota sila'mima ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi.”
43002001	Anef nemaf fagafe'ma wanifi anona aman naso' ano'w nemata'w wambel ambalemba Kana bagape itap apamba lu'upa Galilii. Ea' ma'mama Jisasi kwape ipat atamba sandaso'amatai.
43002002	Esis sofala Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi wapani mafi'i mati daso'ama inimba.
43002003	A'i owa' main embel wain ahi'alan. Ea' ma'mana Jisasi kwafi'i kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Esis embel wain a' akas.”
43002004	Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Ma'me, maol inimba ina ae'ani. Ea' ina maol ine'ini, owa'. Nogota ae'atai ina dei' tataga, ata' owa'.”
43002005	Ea' kwa'ipa amom manda' maola anen nogaso' nemata'wi kwa'i, “I'i anen niga'ipipa anif basefa, ipa' pihapifana.”
43002006	Anom maloh lu'wami ma'oh ama esis Juda saila mu'uli Godi sagasa'ofami. Maloh amamba wanom wanom sanda' otamba sanda'ami si'i dram lu'wami 44 galon.
43002007	Jisas na'ipa amom manda' maol na'i, “Ipa' pilai embel pekolo'wam maloh amamba ma si'im kwaef endilisi.” Ea' amom molam si'im si'i anen naga'ipam.
43002008	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' kolo' du'wanimbel pefa'ambel pefe' pese'anam aman nugumafi gwa'aisii.” Ea' mofa'mana embel mafe'.
43002009	Dembinai nugumafi gwa'aisii embel ambalemba name'ambel owa', ea' bataga fasimbel si'i wain, apa' anen ina nogawa embel ambalemba amom mogofa'ambelima, owa'atin. Apa' amom manda' maola anini mogawambel. Amom molai embel atembel wafimbili. Ea' anen dembinai nofala aman anamba nagaso' nemata'wi
43002010	nahali'ana na'i, “Epes hiasi ata' sali' saso'asa wain inimba bu'wani nali' sa'ana ea' sagi' sofa'masi wain inimba awasin kwasakwasalai. Apa' ina' owa'atin. Ina' nambaho'wa wain inimba bu'wani na'ihi dei'aol nagi' nofa'an nafi'i.”
43002011	Amamba ametal banagami magali'i si'i God nanda'ami, dambadamba Jisas nanda'am Kana itap apamba lu'upa Galili. Anen nihimba'ma esisa glori ananimi banagami mogogala'i. Ea' amom alipumi ananimi mahapifana.
43002012	Isimba hi'alasa main, Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi miliana Kaperneam maloma ma'mana anani'wi kwaloma owapana ananimi wapani ea' sape na'amba anif nimaguf.
43002013	Nemaf afamba Pasovaefi felefele'ma fegataga, Jisas nondowasa' Jerusalem.
43002014	Ea' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon nati epes satama mafis amamba sipsip bulmakau amiguf ma'unamb ea' anis satalom otamba sindisila'mamba.
43002015	Ea' Jisas nasa'ma anof mandof strin nanda'af nanda' anep wip si'i bumbulita. Ea' nopagaha epes isimba natofas natofamasa hiahaom amamba asasimi sipsipi bulmakau wapani mawis mafe' ando'. Ea' nugulatamasa otamba moni esis sindisila'manai nakwahona, nambema tebol asasimi nakolo'masom.
43002016	Ea' na'ipa amam amamba magatala amigufi na'i, “Ipa' fa'a hiahaom amamba fo'o.”
43002017	Ea' alipumi ananimi ukup pandanda'ma anif basef fagape Baibeli fa'ias faga'i, “Ae' okom mohafel a'owa' ma enda' maol banagambel endilisi ma igimafi ipat ine'inai nogape andeande'.”
43002018	Owa' amom Juda mati anen nanda'am na'amba, ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' ata' nihimba'mafa anol ametala hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami ma ogogawa ina' agol lu'wagilinai ma nanda'am na'amba ma afa'.”
43002019	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipa' da'a ipat anamba lu'unai Godi awasina, atiasi ae' itanima ila'ana nogotawa wapani nimaguf wanif dowaf.”
43002020	Ea' amom Juda ma'ipana ma'i, “Ipat anamba sanda'ana sala'ana afagof hiagufi 46-pelaiguf, apa' owa' ina' na'i nimaguf wanif dowaf nela'ana notawa wapani a'amon?”
43002021	Apa' ipat anamba Jisas naga'ianai ina na'i ipat anamba endilisinai lu'unai Godi, owa'. Anen na'i alop ananipi.
43002022	Ma anaf God nosa'mana wapani nowaga sogawanama, nogota atamba amom alipumi ananimi a' ukup popoma basef ifimba ananifi fowa' naga'iefi. Ea' dei' a' mahapifa basef ifimba fagape Baibeli faloma basef ifimba Jisas fowa' naga'iefi.
43002023	Jisas nape Jerusalem ama nimaguf ifimba Pasovaefi, esis amam nematawa hiasi sati maol anen nanda'ani banagani. Ea' sahapifa agol ananigili.
43002024	Apa' Jisas nogawa epes hiasi hi'alas. Na'amba anen ina nahapifas, owa'.
43002025	Anen ina gawa akanai ma anis daias soga'ipana ma waf epesi, owa'atin. Anen a' nogawa epes hiasi hi'alas ea' nogawa ukupi opalef asasisi.
43003001	Anona aman agilinama Nikodemus, anen Farisi agol lu'wagili ma esis Juda.
43003002	Anamb owamb nafi'mai Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Tisa Dembinai, apa' mogawa ina', God nasapa'ena nafi'i si'i dembinai Tisa. I'i owa' God nope noloma anin epena, anin ina la'ifina nenda' maol inimba banagani ina' nanda'ani, owa'atin.”
43003003	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi atis, epen ami i'i owa' God nolan netaga dambaina, anin ina atiasi nuwis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafian, owa'atin.”
43003004	Nikodemus nahali'ana na'i, “Dei' isimba ea' hagasi sonda'am si'imama ma solas sogataga dambais wapani? A sotanima sundawis nelelemb mamamasi a'amon, ama bola otanima olasi wapani?”
43003005	Owa' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ambal bu'unai Godi la'ifina nolan negataga dambain. Ae' a'ipina endilisi, i'i owa' Ambal Godi nolana dambaina embela, ina atiasi la'ifin nuwis nomona maol Godi, owa'atin. Apa' i'i Ambal Godi nogolan dambaina, dao'. Anin ilama nogawis nomona maol ananini.
43003006	Hiahaom magataga alop atopi, amamba alop atopumi si'i ano'w nemata'w kogola awani. Apa' hiahaom Ambal Godi nogolami, amamba mataga si'i ambal bu'unai.
43003007	Ina a' nomonas hiahawesa aga'ipina na'amba aga'i pegataga dambaipa wapani si'i epes sogolaipa, owa'i.
43003008	Fufin nagaluwi nandagi'ma anin si'i nalo nagafe' ganigani. Ina' name' amalemb magala'an, apa' ina negawa anamba anin nalo nagafi'ima ma a' nalo nagafe'ma, owa'atin. Epes hiasi Ambal bu'unai Godi nolasa sagataga dambaisi, esis ea' sataga na'amba atin.”
43003009	Ea' Nikodemus nagwamana na'i, “Hiahawes isimba atiasi sotaga sondowalap si'imama?”
43003010	Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Dei' si'i main? Ina' Tisa dembinai esis Judai, owa' ina' owa' ata' negawa chiahawes isimbaia?
43003011	Endilisi atis ae' a'ipina apa' ma'i hiahawes apa' mogogawasi, ea' mawalapa hiahawes isimba a' magatilisi. Apa' owa' ipa' pewa' alafugaha basef ifimba afa' wagawalapafi.
43003012	Ae' a'ipipa hiahawes isimba itapasi, apa' ipa' ina pegawam pahapifam, owa'. I'i ae' iga'ipipa hiahaom ilifami, atiasi ipa' pegawa pihapifam pi'imama? Owa'atin.
43003013	Ina anona aman itapanai nalota gani heven, owa'. Ae' atowe. Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi ea' ae' atowe akwaha heven isila'i, ea' ma'uwi.
43003014	Fowa' gani aman anamba Moses nasa'ma anal ul nanda' kapa nanda'ali lail anoga lawag ilif. Nanda'am anamba wafigima fataupigima. Amamba ea' na'amba atina atiasi sefela ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi sendele igail anoga lawag ilif.
43003015	Ama epes mamahisa isimba sogahapifa ae'i, atiasi sofa' ambal namili sogape andeande' lifilafi.
43003016	Aho' endilisi, God nogamana aman ananinai atotona nape. Owa', owa'atin. Anen okom maimaila amam nematawa hiapai magape itapi hi'alapa. Ea' naso'apai Nogamana ananinai atotona ma epes ami sogahapifanai sogape andeande', ina soga'ma waf awafi, owa'atin. Sofa' ambal namili sope andeande' lifilafi.
43003017	God ina nasapa' Nogamana ananinai nafi'i itap apa'e ma nonda' kotimapa, owa'atin. Anen nasapa'ana nafi'i ma nimbimai epes hiapai magape itapi nokwahomapa waf awafi mogafi'mai anen.
43003018	Epen ami nigahapifa anini, anin atiasi basef akana kot lu'utai. Apa' epen ami owa' nigahapifanaia, epen inimba a' lamonan higililan ea' ma kot anamba lu'unai aunai. Dei' main? Anin nandaiwa'ma nigahapifa Nogamana atotona Godi, na'amba epes isimbai a' lamonas hi'ilas.
43003019	Basef kofagefa ma kot lu'unai anamba na'amba. Mogogala'i a' mafi'i mataga itap apa'e ea', owa' esis ukup panda'i waf atona anamba itapanai si'i owambi, sandaiwa'ma mogogala'i amamba. Dei' maina esis sandaiwa'? Esis sanda' waf awafi na'amba dei' sandaiwa'.
43003020	Epes ami sanda' waf awafii, sogowa' alafugaha mogogala'ii, esis sandaiwa'ma waf awafi asasifi fendawalap. Ea' dei' ombal mahas sandaiwa'.
43003021	Epen ami nanda' waf endilisifi, anaf anin negatagama mogogala'i. Ma anis epes daias sitilin sogogawa anin nape sisihin atapina God nanda' maol ananini.
43003022	Basef ifimba hi'alefa main, Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi a' mafe' itap lu'upa Judia. Ea' nape nalomam napisi' esis amam nematawa.
43003023	Apa' Jon nape wambel ambalemba Inon felefele'ma anambel wambel Selim. Anamba walemb lu'wambi begetaha, esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'i na'amba, anen napisi'as.
43003024	Nemaf afamba dembinai King Herot ina dei' nanda' Jon nanda' kalabus, ata' owa',
43003025	amom alipumi Joni ma'i anif basef fape la'afena amom maloma anona aman Judainai. Amom ma'i basefa waf afamba esis Juda sasa'of sogowando' alogwa ma sogape bo'wesa naep Godi.
43003026	Ea' alipumi Joni mafe'ma anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, aman fowa' nape nagaloma ina' gani wa'ol walemb Jordani ma ina' nagawalapa basef naga'ifanai, aman anamba dei' amam nematawa hiasi safe'ma anen napisi'as embel.”
43003027	Jon na'ipam na'i, “I'i God nagape heveni owa' noso'an anis maefah anin epena, epen inimba ina a' la'ifin nenda' anin maol, owa'atin.
43003028	Ipa' apegawa basef ifimba fowa' ae' aga'iefi a'i ae' ina Krais, God nandandepe nasapa'e agafi'ii, owa'. Apa' God nasapa'e ali' afi'mai Krais.
43003029	I'i anona aman nogaso' ano'w nemata'wi, nemata'w akwamba ea' anani'wi nagaso'akwi. Ea' alipunai aman anambai sonahana nalutu name' aman anamba dei' nagaso'akwi nagafi'i. Dei' na'amba atina ae' sonahe a'owa' ma okom ae'ami, andagalama Dembinai Jisas.
43003030	Agol ananigili lu'wagol, apa' agol ae'agili a' gowala gofe' sa'ogol.”
43003031	Aman nagafi'i ilifi anen nape ilifa hiahaom hiami. Apa' aman nagataga itapi anen itapanai naga'i basef itapafi atifi. Apa' aman nagafi'i heveni anen nape ilifa hiahaom hiami.
43003032	Anen na'i basef nawalapa hiahawes hiasi natilis nagame'as ea'i. Apa' ina anin epen neme' basef ifimba anen naga'iefi, owa'atin.
43003033	Epen ami name' basef ananifi ma nigailafi, anin na'i aho'ma basef ifimba nihimba'masaf alihif God anen naga'i basef endilisifi atifi.
43003034	Aman anamba God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii anen nawalapa basef Godi. Ea' God naso'ana Ambal bu'unai ananinai nape si'inama anen.
43003035	Ahamana God okom maimaila Nogamana ea' naso'ana hiahaom hiami hi'alama lagof ananigufi.
43003036	Epen ami nagahapifa Nogamana ananinai, epen inimba dei' a' nefa' ambal namilima negape andeande' lifilafi dondol. Apa' epen ami newa' alafugama Nogamana ananinai, inimba ina atiasi nefa' ambal namili, owa'atin. Anaf nembel wandafunai Godi a' nopoman.
43004001	Nemaf afamba amom Farisi dembami Judai mame' anif basef na'amba fa'i, “Jisas napisi' alipisi hiasi nikila' isimba Jon nagapisi'asi.”
43004002	Apa' Jisas ina napisi'as, owa'. Amom alipumi ananimi atom mapisi'as.
43004003	Jisas ea' nogawa amom Farisi mame' basef ifimba. Ea' anen nakwaha itap apamba Judia notanima nafe' itap lu'upa Galili wapani.
43004004	Ufia'w akwamba anen naila'w nagafi'i, kwafe' la'afena itap lu'upa Samaria.
43004005	Ea' nafe' nataga anambel wambel nagape Samariai taun inimba agiligima sa'i Sikar. Anamba nape felefele'ma Jekop fowa' nagaso'anap nogamana ananinai Josepa.
43004006	Ifata sogola embelatai fowa' Jekop nagandowatai tape wambel ambalemba. Nogota atamba nemaf awin nandasapa'. Jisas nafi'i laogon na'amba napoma noma'w ifata atamba saga' embela.
43004007	Ea' ano'w nemata'w Samariai'wi kwafi'i kwa'i kola embel, owa' Jisas natolo'w a' nahali'akwa kogaso'ana anambel embel.
43004008	Apa' alipumi ananimi mafe' wambel lu'wambili ma mogatalai gwa'aisi.
43004009	Ea' nemata'w akwamba kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Ina' Judainai, ina apa' atepa, owa'atin. Ae' nemata'w Samariaiwai. Dei' maina ina' nagahali'ima embel, ‘Isi'ina embel nega' embel?’” Esis Juda ina sagaloma esis Samaria atogini, owa'atin. Esis naumbih.
43004010	Ea' Jisas nagwama'wa basef ako'w na'i, “I'i ina' okom mopaina ma negawa anin mae fasifasini God na'i nogasi'inaniai, ina' a' negawa aman anamba nagahali'inai ma embeli, ina' nihali'anama anambel embel ambal namili lagapaimbeli anen a' nese'enambel.”
43004011	Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Aman Dembinai, ifata ana'e launai nowala gani awin. Ina' baket akena ma negela embel. Dei' ina' nilai embel ambalemba ambal namili lagapaimbeli anima?
43004012	Akunamapa ape'inai Jekop na' embelata nao'wa nogaopana ananisi saloma mafis bulmakau sipsip maim asasimi sa'ambelata. Dei' ea' nakwahota tapoma apa'. A'i ina' nikila' anen ama negese'apa embel ambal namili lagapaimbeli?”
43004013	Jisas nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Epes mamahisa soga' embel ambalembai, bola iap pese'as wapani.
43004014	Apa' epen ami nega' embel ambalemba ae' a'i igaso'anambeli, anin ina atiasi iap pese'an wapani ma nimaguf hiafi dondol negape, owa'atin. Embel ambalemba ae' agaso'anambeli atiasi begataga si'i embel bagataga dowafi bambul atapimbel bagapani ma nomon opaf ananifi nefa' ambal namili negape andeande' lifilafi.”
43004015	Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, ina' se'e embel ambalemba ma ae' ina ata' iap pese'e itanima ifi'i na'a ma egela embel wapani, owa'.”
43004016	Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Ina' fo'o falai waulunamena nili' ea' pitanima pifi'i na'a.”
43004017	Ea' kwagwamana basef kwa'i, “Ae' aman ake.” Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Ina' na'i ina' aman akena, isimba ina' na'i endilisi atis.
43004018	Dei' main? Ina' fowa' amam ine'imi wanom biam. Apa' aman anamba dei' ina' nape nagalomanai anamba ina aman ine'inai, owa'. Basef ifimba ine'ifi endilisifi.”
43004019	-
43004020	Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Aman Dembinai, dei' ae' egawaena, ina' anina profet. Esis a'mes bafas ape'isi safe' sogonalo'ma halafuta anamba sanda' lotuma. Ea' ipa' Juda pa'i wambel esis sanda' lotuwagoma anamba napani Jerusalem.”
43004021	Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Nemata'w, ina' nindahapifa ae'. Anef nemaf fegataga ipa' ina atiasi pefe' penda' lotuma Ahame halafuta atamba, a penda' lotumana Jerusalem atogon, owa'atin.
43004022	Ipa' panda' lotuma hiahawes ipa' owa' pegegawasia. Apa' Juda manda' lotuma hiahawes apa' mogogawasi. Basef kofagefa ma apa' manda' lotu ifimba. God nowambilai amam nematawa ma nogakwaha waf awafi esis sanda'afi, amamba matagama apa' Juda atepa.
43004023	Nemaf afamba fa'i figatagai, dei' fataga ea' ma amam nematawa mamahisa sanda' lotu endilisii a' sondanda' lotuma Ahamapa Goda Ambal bu'unai ananinai noloma waf bu'wafi endilisifi. Anen nowando'ma amam nematawa na'ambaisi ma sonda' lotumana.
43004024	God anen ambal. Na'amba amam nematawa mamahisa si'i sonda' lotumana endilisii, esis a' sondanda' lotumana andeande'ma ukup peloma ambagof asasimi ma waf endilisifi.”
43004025	Nemata'w akwamba kwagwamana basef kwa'i, “Ae' egawa aman anamba Mesaia sofalana saga'i Kraisi, God nandandepana nosapa'ana nugafi'ii. Afamba anen nugafi'i, nowalapam ni'ipapa hiahaom hiami.”
43004026	Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Ae' ea' ma'uwi, dei' a'i alomena.”
43004027	Anen na'ipa ako'w na'amba, owa' alipumi ananimi motanima mafi'i. Ea' amom a' nomonas hiahawesa anen naloma nemata'w akwamba nalutu naga'i. Apa' amom ina anona nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' na'i nefa' main? Ama dei' naloma'w naga'i?” Owa'.
43004028	Ama main, nemata'w akwamba kwa'waha baket kogola embelatai ta'oh, kotanima kwafe' taun wambel lu'wambili. Ea' kwa'ipa esis kwa'i,
43004029	“Ipa' pifi'i piti anona aman nawalapai hiahaom hiami fowa' ae' anda'ami na'ipiam hi'alam. Anen Krais a'amon?” Ea' esis same' na'amba,
43004030	sakwaha wambel safi'i sati Jisas.
43004031	Owa' alipumi ananimi ma'ipana dindinip ma'i, “Ina' ata' nea' gwa'aisi.”
43004032	Owa' anen na'ipam na'i, “Ae' anis gwa'aisi sa'oh, isimba ipa' owa' pegawasa.”
43004033	Ea' alipumi ananimi atom mape manifas ma'i, “A' anis sofa'manai anis gwa'aisi a'a?”
43004034	Ama main Jisas nawalapef na'ipam na'i, “Gwa'aisi ae'asi isimba. God nasapa'e afi'i. Dei' ae' a'i indaila okom ananimi atom enda' maol ananini atin efe' imbifan hi'indalan. Maol inimba si'i gwa'aisi ae'asi.
43004035	Ipa' paga'ias pa'i, aomb biambibiamb ata' bape ma nogota atamba gwa'aisi sogaofatai togataga. Apa' dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ata' sa'ma naep petologon aof tulif. Gwa'aimi maof ea' ma sogala'am.
43004036	Epen ami negala' gwa'aisii, anin nefa' otamba ma maol inimba nanda'ani. Ea' nakolasa gwa'aisi isimba ambal namili lagapaisi sogape lifilafi. Ea' epes isimba sagawasi saloma anis daias sagala'asi sokolata sondagala atin.
43004037	Na'amba dei' basef gawaifi ifimba afataga endilisifi atif, ‘Anin epen nawasogon aof afamba, ea' anin daian nafe' nala'as.’
43004038	Ae' asapa' ipa' pafe'ma pegala'i gwa'aisi aof afamba fowa' ipa' owa' penda' maolanafia. Anis epes sanda' maola aof afamba, ea' ipa' pefa' gwa'aisi dowafa esis daias sanda'as sagawasi.”
43004039	Ako'w doko' kwa'i Jisas nawalapa hiahaom ako'w fowa' kwanda'ami, nawalapam na'ipa'wam alihim. Ea' esis Samaria amam nematawa hiasi sagape taun inimbai same' basefa ako'w asahapifana.
43004040	Ea' esis safi'mai anen sahali'ana dindinip sa'i ata' nope nogaloma esis. Ea' napani nimaguf bif nalomas wambel ambalemba.
43004041	Ea' epes hiasi wapani wambel ambalembaisi same' basef ananifi sahapilif.
43004042	Ea' sa'ipa ako'w sa'i, “Dei' apa' ina mame' basef ine'ifi atif mahapilif, owa'atin. Apa' mame' basef aman anambai a' mogawa anen atona nowambilai amam nematawa hiasi itapasi mokwaha waf awafi asasifi sogotanimai.”
43004043	Nimaguf ifimba bif hi'alef, Jisas nakwaha wambel ambalemba a' nafe' itap lu'upa Galili.
43004044	Fowa' jisas anen atona nawalapa basef na'if na'i, “Anona profet ina anagol agol gatoma gandawalapana alihigila wambel kofagama ananima, owa'.”
43004045	Ea' dei' nafe' nataga itap apamba Galili, ea' esis asonahasa anen nagafi'i. Dei' main, esis fowa' safe' Jerusalema nemaf bu'wafi Pasovaefi ea' satolom sogawa hiahaom hiami anen nanda'am nemaf afambai.
43004046	-
43004047	Anen notanima nafe' wapani nataga anambel wambel Kana itap lu'upa Galili. Wambel ambalemba fowa' nambema embel bagataga si'i waina. Ea' anona agilinai nanda' maola dembinai kingi, nogamana ananinai aowas nanda'ana na'oh anambel wambel Kaperneam felefele'ma a' nogaga'. Apa' agilinai anamba nape Kana name' basefa Jisas nakwaha itap lu'upa Judia nafi'i Galili, ea' nafe'ma Jisas nahali'ana dindinipa nefe' nonda' nogamana ananinai bo'ona.
43004048	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “I'i ipa' hipai pigati banagami mamimami si'i God nanda'amima, ipa' pihapifi. I'i owa', owa'atin.”
43004049	Ea' anen nanda' maola dembinai kingi na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' lianai kwafalis. Na'amba nogame ae'anai a' noga'.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' fo'o. Nogamena ine'inai atiasi a' nope namona ambal lopaona.”
43004050	-
43004051	Ea' aman anamba nahapifa basef Jisasi a' nafe'. Anen ata' nafe' atin ufia'w owa', amom manda'mana maoli mafi'i matolona ufia'w ma'ipana ma'i, “Nogamena ine'inai ambal lapaona a' nosafel nape.”
43004052	Ea' nahali'ama nogota mamahotama nogamana ananinai nosafel bo'ona kwasakwasala. Ea' ma'i, “Nambati' awin nendemba'a aowas alop nifipini nakwahona ea' hi'alan.”
43004053	Ea' ahama awani inimbai a' nogawa nambati' nogota atamba atota Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Nogamena ine'inai ambal lopain nepe.” Ea' nahapifa Jisas naloma esis amam nematawa ananisi wapani.
43004054	Fowa' Jisas nakwaha itap lu'upa Judia a' nafe' nataga itap lu'upa Galili, ea' dei' nanda' ametal inimba banagani. Ametal inimba nagafe'ma bifi nanda' awani inimba bo'wen.
43005001	Jisas nape Galili ma main, anef nemaf esis Juda soga' gwa'aisi lu'wasiafi ea' fataga. Ea' anen nondowasa' Jerusalem.
43005002	Wambel ambalemba nomon felefele'ma uta lu'utai sipsip magawisatai anamba anemb dumb sa'usa'umbi betahagon. Agilimba esis sofalamb diga Hibrui sa'i Betesda. Dumb ambamba ambugufimba wa'owa'ol sala' ifagw sanda' ilalef wanelef bialef fape.
43005003	Ilalef afalemba epes isimba hiasi aowas nanda'asi sape saloma isimba naep pagaso'asi saloma bo'wagahi lagof saga' sagailasi. [Esis sape sasasa embel pindawianama atina benda'as da'inda.
43005004	Anif nimaguf anona ensel Dembinai Godi nakwehef nowala dumb ambamba nanda' embel banda'as wianaiwiana ea', dao'. Epen ami aowas nanda'ani nili' nefe' newala embel a' netaga bo'wen wapani.]
43005005	Anona aman nape aowas lu'unai nanda'ana nape afagof hiagufi 38-pelaiguf.
43005006	Ea' Jisas natolona tol na'oh ea' nogawa aman anamba awasina na'oh nogota laota a'owa'. Na'amba nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' na'i atiasi alop ine'ipi potaga bo'op, a'a owa'?”
43005007	Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, “Aman dembinai, nemaf afamba embel banda'as wianaiwiana ina anis epes sasa'me salae ewala embel, owa'atin. Ae' atowe anda'am a'i efe' owa'a, anis daias sali' sowala sikila'e.”
43005008	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel dasa'ma nilutu nefa' alahis ine'isi a' nilutu nefe'.”
43005009	Ea' kwafalis atis alop ananipi ea' pataga bo'op andeande'. Na'amba anen bo'ona nosafel nalutu nasa'ma alahis ananisi ea' nafe'.
43005010	Ea' amom dembami esis Judai mati aman anamba aunai nasa'ma alahis ananisi nofa'as nalutu nafe' naep amamipi nemaf afamba sabat noma'wafi. Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Dei' nemaf apa' magapoma noma'wafi, mu'uli ape'ini na'i owa'i ma ina' nesa'ma alahis nefa'as negafe'a, owa'i.”
43005011	Owa' anen nagwamama basef na'i, “Aman anamba nanda'e bu'uwai anen na'ipi na'i, ‘Sa'ma alahis ine'isi a' nefa'as nefe'.’”
43005012	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Aman mamahonama na'ipina na'i, ‘Ina' sa'ma alahis ine'isi nefa'as nefe'?’”
43005013	Apa' aman anamba ina nogawa anen nanda'ana bu'unai, owa'atin. Dei' main? Jisas nafe' nandambaho' naloma amam nematawa hiasi wambel ambalembaisi.
43005014	Ama main Jisas natolona ipat lu'unai Godi na'ipana na'i, “Neme'! Dei' ina' ambo'wena ea'. Ea' ina' owa'i nitanima nefe' nenda' waf awafi wapania, owa'. Na'amba hiahaom awami endilisi a' motagamena.
43005015	Ea' nafe' na'ipa amom Juda na'i, “Aman anamba nanda'e bu'uwai anen Jisas.”
43005016	Ea' dei' amom Juda ukup numbutipa anen nanda' aman anamba awasinai nosafel nofa' alahis naga'ihisi nagafe' nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi. Ea' dei' mosafel manda'mana waf awafi mowando'mana ma mogahana.
43005017	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amom na'i, “Ahame ae'anai nanda' maol nafi'i notambel dei' nemaf afa'e sabat wapani. Ea' ae' wapani anda' maol si'i anen.”
43005018	Owa' amom Juda ukup panda'i atin a'owa' ma'i mohana nogaga'. Amom ma'i anen nosambala basefa mu'uli ma nemaf afamba sagapoma noma'wafi. Ea' Jisas na'ias wapani na'i God anen ahamana ananinai endilisi. Ea' amom ma'i anen na'i a' notaga nope na'amba atin si'i God. Isimba atis dei' mandaiwa'mana.
43005019	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amom na'i, “Ae' a'i endilisi atis a'ipipa. Ae' Nogamana Godi ina la'ifiwai ma enda' anis maefaha okom ae'ami atom, owa'atin. Ae' anda' hiahawes isimba ati ahame nanda'asi, ea' isimba atis. Dei' main, hiahaom hiami ahame nanda'ami, amamba ae' Nogamana wapani dei' anda'am.
43005020	Ahame ae'anai a' okom maimaila ae' Nogamana a'owa' nihimba'me hiahaom hiami anen nanda'ami. Ma anaf nigihimba'me anin maol lu'wani nikila' amamba. Na'amba atiasi ipa' a' gogololasipa kwapete' ma maol inimba lu'wani.
43005021	Ahame nagasa'ma esis sagaga'i sogosafel wapani ma nogaso'as ambal namili. Ea' dei' na'amba atin Nogamana ananiwai wapani ae' aso'as ambal namili epes ae' okom maga'iasi.
43005022	Ahame God ina nagawaloga anin epeni si'i sanda'mas koti sanda'as, owa'. Maol hiani ma nonda'masa kot, a' nase'ean ae' Nogamana hi'alan.
43005023	Ama dei' esis amam nematawa hiasi sasa'ma agol ae' Nogamanai lu'wagol si'i sagasa'ma agol ahamai lu'wagol. Epen mamahina owa' negasa'ma agol ae' Nogamanai lu'wagola, epen inimba anin ina nasa'ma agol ahamai God nasapa' ae' agafi'ii lu'wagol, owa'atin.
43005024	Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa. Epen ami neme' basef ae'afi ma nihapifa anen nasapa' ae' agafi'ii, epen inimba anin ina a' nefa' basef lu'wafi ma kot, owa'atin. Anin a' nefa' ambal namili nikila' ga'.
43005025	Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa, nemaf afamba fa'i figatagai, dei' fataga ea' ma esis sagaga'i atiasi sogame' lagol ae'agili Nogamana Godi. Epes ami sogame' ae'i, atiasi asofa' ambal namili ma sogape bo'wes endilisi.
43005026	Ambal namili lape ahame atona. Ea' nowa' banaga ae' Nogamana ananiwai ea' ae' wapani na'amba atin si'i anen ahame, ambal namili lapauwai,
43005027	ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. Na'amba God nase'e agola hiahaom banagami ma egawaloga epesa kot basef lu'wafi.
43005028	-
43005029	Ipa' ina a' ukup hiahawep pepoma amamba, owa'i. Nemaf dondo'afi fi'i fegataga amam nematawa hiasi saga' sawas sagape wandelefi anaf some' malogol ae'agili sosafel sokwaha wandelef suwisi ando'. Ea' epes ami sanda' waf fasifii, anaf sosafel wapani sofa' ambal namili sope namis. Apa' epes mamahisa sanda' waf awafii, anaf sotanima sosafel sefe' sulutu sonda' basef lu'wafi ma kot.”
43005030	Ea' Jisas na'ias na'i, “Ae' ina anda' anin mae ma okom ae'ami atom, owa'. Basef ae' agame'efa ahamai, ifimba atif ailif awalapefa esisa kot. Ea' basef ifimba ma kot ae'atai ifimba usi'if andeande'. Ae' ina anda'ama agaila nomonas ae'asi atis, owa'atin. Ae' anda' maol aila okom aman anamba nasapa'e agafi'ii.
43005031	I'i ae' atowe ewalapa basefa ae' atowe ai, na'amba ipa' api'i basef ifimba ae' aga'iefi ina endilisifi. Owa'atin. Pi'i basef baso'aifi.
43005032	Anen nape dei', nawalapa basefa ae'. Na'amba ae' dei' egawa basef ifimba faga'iasa ae'i endilisifi atif.
43005033	Fowa' ipa' pasapa' basef fafe'mago Jon. Anen nawalapa basef endilisifi ma ae' ea'.
43005034	Na'amba dei' ae' ina efala anis epes itapasi ma sowalapa basefa ae' sogatopalope, owa'atin. Ae' a'i God nuwambilipai nokwahomepa waf awafi pitanima pifi'mai anen. Ea' dei' a'i basef ifimba.
43005035	Aman anamba Jon si'i anin nagwapina nogogala'ma amam nematawa. Ea' ukup ipe'ipi pa'i aho'ma ipa' pendagala nogota atamba kwaia'uta ma mogogala'i amamba Joni.
43005036	Hiahaom amamba maol banagani ahame nase'ean na'i imafian enda'an hi'igalani, inimba atin ae' dei' anda'an. Inimba maol banagani nikila' maol Joni nagawalapa basef kofagefa ma ae'i. Ea' maol inimba ae' anda'ani nihimba'ma esis amam nematawa sogogawa Ahame nasapa'e dei' afi'i.
43005037	Ea' Ahame nasapa'e agafi'ii, anen atona nawalapa basef kofagefa ma ae'. Apa' fowa' gani pafi'i pataga dei' ipa' ina pati nogohnaep ananisi a pame' amalemba malogol ananigili, owa'atin endilisi. Ea' ipa' ina pati amaga ananigai, owa'.
43005038	Ea' basef ananifi wapani ifimba ina fape ukup ipe'ipi, owa'atin. Dei' main, ipa' owa' pihapifa ae' God nasapa'e agafi'iia.
43005039	Ukup ipe'ipi pandanda' paga'i basef ifimba fagape Buk Baibeli fagase'epa ambal namili ipe'i ma pegape andeande' lifilafi. Ea' pati basef ifimba pegawa ea' panda' maol pewando'ma basef ifimba hiafi. Dei' basef ifimba atif Baibelifi fa'i ae' fawalape. Owa', owa'atin.
43005040	Ipa' pandaiwama pifi'mai ae' pefa' ambal namili pegape andeande' lifilafi.
43005041	“Ae' ina okom ma'i epes itapasi sogasa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagol, owa'.
43005042	Apa' ae' ea' egawa ukup ipe'ipi ina paipaila God, owa'atin.
43005043	Ae' afi'i agol ahame ae'anai, apa' ipa' ina pase'e opalef ae', owa'atin. Apa' anaf anona aman daiana nogafi'i ma agol ananigili atogili, ipa' a' pi'i aho' pese'ana opalef anen.
43005044	Ukup ipe'ipi pa'i pendefa' agof lu'wagufi ma sahopepa owapepa ipe'imi atom. Apa' God owa'atin. Dei' ipa' atiasi pihapifi pi'imama? Owa'atin.
43005045	Ipa' ina a' ukup pendanda' pi'i atiasi ae' enda' kotimipa ma Ahame God, owa'atin. Aman nonda' kotima ipe'i, anen Moses, aman anamba ipa' pa'i atiasi nogatopalopipai.
43005046	Ipa' i'i pihapifa basef ananifi, ea' pihapifa basef ae'afi wapani. Dei' main, anen atona nanda' basef ifimba ma ae' fail Buk Baibel.
43005047	Apa' ipa' owa' pihapifa basef anen nanda'afi ma ae'a, owa'. Atiasi ipa' pihapifa basef ae'afi pi'imama? Owa'atin.”
43006001	Jisas nanda' basef ifimba ma main, a' nafe' nambo dumb ambamba Galili fisanamb. Dumb ambamba sa'i Taiberias.
43006002	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen. Dei' main, esis sati hiahaom amamba banagami anen nanda'am na'ambai ma nanda' isimba aowas naninani nanda'asi sagataga bo'wes. Ea' sailana.
43006003	-
43006004	Nemaf afamba lu'wafi sanda' gwa'aisiafi saga'i Pasovaefi felefele' ma fegataga. Ea' nondowasa' halafuta atamba nao'wa alipumi anan mape.
43006005	Jisas natologon ganigani nati amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen. Ea' na'ipa Filip na'i, “Afa' ata' otala bret ani ma ogaso' amam nematawa isimba soga'ata?”
43006006	Apa' Jisas nagwambana na'ias na'amba. Anen nogawas ea' hiahawes anen na'i nonda'asi.
43006007	Ea' Filip nagwamana basef na'i, “Afa' i'i ogatala bret 200 kina, ina atiasi dondo'ma epes isimba hiasi sea'ata kwasakwasala, owa'atin.”
43006008	Ea' anona amom alipumi Jisasi Andru, Saimon Pita sahomana, na'ipa Jisas na'i,
43006009	“Anona aman sa'unai nahapila anis gwa'aisi bret sa'usa'utai wa'agolita taloma agof sa'ugufi biagof nape na'a. Apa' isimba ina atiasi dondo'ma epes isimba hiasi, owa'atin.”
43006010	Anamba otalef fasilifi fagapoma. Ea' Jisas na'ipa alipumi na'i, “Kipa esis amam nematawa hiasi sope itap.” Ea' amam atom mataga 5,000-pelaim mape otalef itap.
43006011	Ea' Jisas nafela bret atamba nanifela God ama ea', naso'asata esis sagape itapi. Ea' nanda'as na'amba atina agof wapani. Naso'asas sa'as alihis dindi'i dondo' si'i doko' nolomagahas.
43006012	Sa'as alihis ea', anen na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Ipa' petatama du'wawanis sagasaga'ihi. Na'amba so'oh sowala dowadowaf.”
43006013	Esis sa'as safe' owa' du'wanis sa'oh. Ama main, alipumi mafe' matatama du'wa'wanisi malo'was folalef lu'walifi 12-pelailifa bret atamba.
43006014	Ea' esis amam nematawa sati ametal inimba ma hiahaom banagami amamba Jisas nanda'ami sa'ias sa'i, “Endilisi atis, anen aman profet anamba nagafi'i itap apai.”
43006015	Ea' Jisas nogawa ukup asasipi sa'i sufi'i sohapilana sonda'ana notaga nope si'i anona dembinai kinga nugumafias. Owa', anen atona notanima nondowasa' halafuta ilif.
43006016	A'i owa' wambomota felefele'ma owamb, alipumi Jisasi
43006017	malota bot mafe' dumb ambamba ma'i mombo Kaperneam. Ea' owamb baso'am la'afen, apa' Jisas ina dei' nafi'i natagamam, ata' owa'atin.
43006018	Ea' fufin banagonai naluwi, naoh amohafel manda'am fetawa lasiali' a'owa'.
43006019	Amom manda' pul mafe' nogota lautai si'i nohotagw wanogw, owa' mati Jisas analutu nafi'i embel ilif dumb ambamba nafi'i nataga felefele'ma bot tagafe'ma. Ea' amom ombel maham a'owa'.
43006020	Owa' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' banagepa, ombal mogahepa owa'. Ae' atowe ma'uwi ailipa afi'i. Ipa' ina a' ombel mehepa, owa'i.”
43006021	Ea' ma'i aho'ma nondagiai bot. Ea' bot atafe' kwafalis tataga tol anamba amom ma'i mogafe'ma.
43006022	Esis amam nematawa hiasi nambati' sagapani dumb fisanai, esis sogawa ea' sa'i, “Nambati' alipumi ananimi atom malota bot atamba a' mafe'. Apa' anen ina nafe' nalomam, owa'atin. Ina a' anota bot tail taloma atamba, owa'. Atotota tala.”
43006023	Ea' anogw botagw wapani Taibiriasigwi gwafi'i felefele'ma na'amba anen nape nanifela God nagaso'as gwa'aisima.
43006024	Esis amam nematawa sati Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi amom ina ata' mape, owa'. Ea' safe' salota anogw botagw safe' Kaperneam solaoma Jisas.
43006025	Esis solaomana ma satolona gani wa'ol dumb ambamba fisanamb, sa'ipana sa'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ina' nambai' nafi'i na'a?”
43006026	Owa' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipa' ina ukup pandanda'ma banagami ae' anda'ami dei' pafi'i pa'i petolowe, owa'atin. Ipa' ukup papoma bret atota paga'atai ma nelelemb ipe'ilimbi si'ilimb, isimba atis dei' pala' pelaome pafi'i.
43006027	Ipa' ina a' penda' maola pegefa' gwa'aisi isimba awasi folo'ogolasi, owa'i. Ipa' a' pendanda' maola gwa'aisi bu'wasi saga'asa sogape be'es andeande' lifilafii. Gwa'aisi isimba ambal namili lagape lifilafii. Gwa'aisi isimbai ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi, ae' atowe atiasi ese'epas ipa'. God a' nase'e agola nandandepe ea' ma enda' maol inimba lu'wani.”
43006028	Ea' sahali'ana sa'i “Dei' apa' monda' maol main ata' nili'ma monda' maol Godi?”
43006029	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Maol Godi na'amba. Ipa' pihapifa ae', God nasapa'e agafi'ii.”
43006030	Ea' esis sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' nihimba'mapa hiahaom maim banagami ma apa' mitilina mogahapifina? Ina' nanda' maol main?
