43006031	A'mesapa ape'isi fowa' sa' anis gwa'aisi agilisa sa'i mana ma itap apamba wafigima fataupigima si'i basef fagape Baibeli fa'ias faga'i, ‘Anen naso'asai gwa'aisi sagafi'i heveni sa'as.’”
43006032	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa, Moses ina nase'epa gwa'aisi isimba sagafi'i heveni, owa'atin. Ahame ae'anai atona nasi'ipai gwa'aisi isimba endilisisi.
43006033	Gwa'aisi isimba God nagasi'ipasi isimba ae' akwaha ilif isila'i ma agaso'asa ambal namili esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi.”
43006034	Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Dembinai, dei' ina' nese'apa gwa'aisi isimba atapis sope lifilafi.”
43006035	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' atowe ae' gwa'aisi bret ambal namili bu'wali lagapauwai. Epen ami nigafi'mai ae'i ina atiasi nolomohan, a epen mamahina nigahapifa ae'i, anin ina atiasi iap pese'an wapani ma embel, owa'atin.
43006036	Ae' a'ipipa, ipa' patolowe ea' apa' ipa' ina pahapifa basef bu'wafi ae'afi, owa'.
43006037	Epes mamahisa ahame nagase'eas ae'i, isimba atis asifi'mai ae'. Epen ami ni'i nigafi'mai ae'i, ae' ina atiasi ili'amonan, owa'atin endilisi.
43006038	Ae' ina akwaha heven isila'i ma igaila okom ae'ami atom, owa'atin. Ae' afi'ima igaila basefa okom ananimi nasapa'e agafi'ii.
43006039	Okom aman anamba nasapa'e agafi'ii magape na'amba. Esis amam nematawa hiasi anen a' nagase'eas ae'i, ae' ina ekwaha anin atitin nepe higililan lamonan, owa'atin. Ae' egasa'mas wapani nemaf akutaifi.
43006040	Okom ahame ae'anai magape na'amba. Amam nematawa hiasi mamahisa siti ae' ma sogame' basef ae'afii ma sogahapifai, esis isimba atiasi sofa' ambal namili sogape andeande' lifilafii. Ea' esa'mas wapani nemaf akutaifi.”
43006041	Ea' anen na'i, “Ae' atowe gwa'aisi akwaha heven agafi'ii.” Anen na'ias na'amba, owa' esis Juda sanda' megahahana sa'i basef hiafi ma anen.
43006042	Esis sa'ias na'amba sa'i, “Dei' si'i main? Aman anamba Jisas anen Josep nogamana. Ahamanai ma'mana ananisi apa' mogawas. Dei' maina anen naga'i, ‘Ae' akwaha heven isila'i?’”
43006043	Jisas nagwamasa basef esis na'i, “Ipa' ina a' pi'i basef hiahaof la'afena ipa'.
43006044	Anin epen ina la'ifina anin atin nigafi'mai ae' dowaf, owa'atin. Ahame nasapa'e dei' afi'i, anen i'i nogasa'ma nomonas anin epeni, dao'. Epen inimba atiasi a' nifi'mai ae', ea' anaf ae' esa'man wapani nemaf akutaifi.
43006045	Basef amom profet maga'iefi fagape Buk Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘God anaf nuwalipa amam nematawa hiasi.’ Amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas sogame' basef ahame ae'anai ma sogogawa anini, esis isimba sogafi'mai ae'i.
43006046	“Ina anin epen atitin nati ahame, owa'. Fowa' ae' ape agaloma Goda agafi'ii, ea' ae' atowe atolona.
43006047	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi atis. Epen ami neme' basef ae'afi nihapifi, anin dei' nefa' ambal namili nepe andeande' lifilafi.
43006048	Ae' gwa'aisi bret ambal namili lagapauwai.
43006049	Fowa' a'mesepa ipe'isi sa' gwa'aisi isimba mana itap anamba wafigima fataupigima, dei' asaga' safe' ea'.
43006050	Apa' gwa'aisi isimba dei' sakwaha heven sagafi'i isimba na'amba. I'i epen ami nega'asi, anin ina atiasi a' nega', owa'atin. Nepe atapin.
43006051	Ae' gwa'aisi ambal namili lagapauwai akwaha heven nepe andeande' lifilafi. Gwa'aisi isimba ae' atiasi igasi'inasi, isimba alop ae'api ese' amam nematawa itapasi ma sogofa' ambal namili sogape andeande' lifilafi.”
43006052	Ea' amom dembami Juda ma'i basef mehip mandahihianama Jisas la'afena amom atom ma'i, “Dei' si'i maina aman anamba na'i nogaso'apa alop ananipi apa' moga'ap?”
43006053	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi atis, ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi. I'i ipa' pindaiwa'ma pega' alopi esimbel ae'asima, ipa' ina atiasi pefa' ambal namili, owa'atin.
43006054	Epen ami nega' alopi esimbel ae'asii, inimba dei' a' nefa' ambal namili negape andeande' lifilafi dondoli ea' esa'man wapani nemaf akutaifi.
43006055	Dei' main? Alop ae'api si'i gwa'aisi endilisisi, ea' esimbel ae'ambeli endilisimbeli ma soga'as.
43006056	Epen ami nega' alopi asimbel ae'asii, anin a' nepe sisihin neloma ae', ea' ae' epe sisihiwi eloman.
43006057	Ahame ambal namili lagapaunai nasapa'e sisihiwi afi'i, ea' ae' dei' ape ambal namili ahamai. Ea' na'amba atina epen ami nega' alop ae'apii, anin atiasi a' nefa' ambal namili ma banagami ae'ami.
43006058	Gwa'aisi isimba sakwaha heven sigisila'i, isimba ina sa'ata ma ea' sagasagafi'i, owa'atin. Epen mamahina nega' gwa'aisi isimbai, anin atiasi a' nefa' ambal namili ma negape lifilafi dondoli.”
43006059	Jisas na'ipam na'amba, nawalipam nomon ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai wambel Kaperneam.
43006060	Anis alipisi Jisasi hiasi same' basef ifimba ea' sa'i, “Basef ifimba ahihifa apa'. Atiasi ami nilif? Owa' owa'atin.”
43006061	Jisas nogawa alipisi ananisi sanda' migimigah. Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Basef ifimba fa'i fehambombaga ukup ipe'ipi a'a?
43006062	I'i ipa' piti ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi itanima ilita gani ilif fowa' agapanima, atiasi agogolalasipa kwapete'epa.
43006063	Ambal bu'unai Godi atiasi nese'epa ambal namili pepe andeande' lifilafi dondol. Apa' wafi gawa epesi atis ina asotopalopepa, owa'atin. Basef ifimba atif ae' aga'iefi, ifimba ambal namili lagapaifi fegape andeande' lifilafii.
43006064	Apa' anipa ina pahapifa basef ae'afi, owa'.” Dei' main? Jisas fowa' nogawa ami owa' nogahapifanaia ma atiasi ni'ipa boumi nigihimba'mama anen nagapoma.
43006065	Ea' na'ipas wapani na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa ma ami nigafi'mai ae'i, ahame ae'anai a' notopalopan nohondo'ani. I'i owa', owa'atin. Ina anis sifi'mai ae' dowaf, owa'. Ahame atona notopalopas nofa'asi, dao' andeande'.”
43006066	Ea' dei' anis alipisi ananisi hiasi asakwahona sotanima safe' daindai, ina ata' sape salomana wapani, a'owa'.
43006067	Ea' Jisas nahali' alipumi ananimi 12-pelaim na'i, “Ipa' wapani pa'i pekwaha ae' pitanima pefe', a'amon?”
43006068	Owa' Saimon Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Dembinai, afa' okwaha ina' ofe' ugi'ma ami? Basef ine'ifi atif fa'ipafa ma ogape ambal namili andeande' lifilafi.
43006069	Afa' wahapifina ogawa endilisi ina' aman Godi bu'winai hilili'i, nasapa'ena nagafi'ii.”
43006070	Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ae' andandepa ipa' 12-pelaipa ea' ae'ipai owa' anona ipe'inai ambal aunai.”
43006071	Jisas na'i anona amamunai amom 12-pelaim agilinama Judas, anen Saimon Keriotinai nogamana.
43007001	Ama main, Jisas nafe' nolalona walemb hiagoma itap lu'upa Galili. Anom Juda dembami asasimi magape Judai ma'i mohana noga'. Na'amba anen ina ata' nape itap asasipi, owa'. Anen nape Galili atogon.
43007002	Ea' felefele' ma anef nemaf esis Juda sanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma ukup pegapoma esis sondolalima God. Ea' sala' aolah sa'uhi sapaoha sanda' gwa'aisi isimba.
43007003	Ea' owapana Jisasi ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' nekwaha na'a'e a' nefe' itap lu'upa Judia, ma alipisi sigati maol banagani ine'ini si'i God nanda'ani.
43007004	I'i anona aman ni'i epes hiasi sogogawa maol ananini, anen ina nondambaho' nonda'an, owa'. Ina' ea' na'amba atin, nekwaha wambel ine'imbili nefe'ma epes hiasi sitilina sigati maol ine'ini ma sogasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol.”
43007005	Owapana ananimi wapani amom ina mahapifana, owa'. Ea' dei' ma'ipana basef ifimbai.
43007006	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Nimaguf hiafi ipe'ifi atif, apa' nemaf ae'afi dondo'afi ina dei' afataga, ata' owa'. Nogota ae'atai totaga dao', a' efe' Jerusalem.
43007007	Ae' awalapa waf awafi esis sagape itapi sanda'afi. Ea' dei' esis ukup awepa ae'. Apa' esis ina la'ifisa ukup awepa ipa', owa'atin.
43007008	Ipa' pili' pendowasa' pefe'ma gwa'aisi isimba. Ae' ota'. Dei' ae' ina a' endowasa', ata' owa'. Dei' main, nogota ae'atai ata' owa' totagaia.”
43007009	Anen na'ipam na'amba ma ea', ata' napani Galili.
43007010	Ea' owapana Jisasi mondowasa' mafe' Jerusalem ma gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi. Amom mali' mafe', anen wapani nagi'mam nondowasa'ma gwa'aisi isimba. Apa' anen ina nafe' nandawalap, owa'atin. Anen nandambaho' atin nafe'.
43007011	Anamba sanda' gwa'aisi amom dembami Juda mape naep petaoma Jisas. Ea' mahali' esis ma'i, “Aman anamba nape ani?”
43007012	Amam nematawa hiasi esis atis sanda'ipama anen sa'osa'ombel sa'i, “Anen aman bu'unai.” Apa' anis sa'i, “Owa', anen nagambaso'ma epes hiasii.”
43007013	Apa' ina anin epen nawalapa basef na'if alihifa Jisas, owa'atin. Dei' main, esis hiasi ombel mahasa amom agufumi esis Judai.
43007014	Nemaf afamba esis ata' sape sanda' gwa'aisi isimba atin, Jisas nafi'i nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nawalipasa basef esis.
43007015	Amom agufumi Judai bombolalasom a'owa' mahali'as ma'i, “Ami naso'ana gawa inimba?’
43007016	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Gawa inimba ina gawa ae'ani, owa'. Gawa anona amani nasapa'e agafi'ii.
43007017	I'i anin epen okom mi'i nenda' maol Godi si'i anen naga'iani, atiasi epen inimba a' negawa basef ae' agawalipasafi fataga God a'a fataga ae' atowe.
43007018	Ami niga'ipasa gawa ananini atini, anin na'i esis sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Apa' ami ni'i nenda' maola negasa'ma agol anen nasapa'e agafi'ii, anin epen bo'wen hilili'i. Anin na'i basef endilisifi atif.
43007019	Moses nase'epa mu'uli Godi ipa', apa' owa' anin epen nila mu'uli inimbaia, owa'atin. Dei' maina ipa' pa'i pehe egaga'?”
43007020	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sagwamana basef sa'ipana sa'i, “Ambal aunai napaina. Dei' ina' na'i, ami na'i nehena nega'?”
43007021	Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' anda' anom hiahaom banagami atifim. Ea' dei' ipa' gogolalasipa.
43007022	Apa' ipa' patopa'mam alop nogaopepa ipe'imi nemaf afamba sabat sagapoma noma'wafi. Dei' main? Ipa' pagi'ma mu'uli inimba fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani. Moses atona ina nali' nanda' waf afamba owa'. Dambadamba waf afamba fali' fapoma amom agufumi Judai fowa'imi magali'i.
43007023	Ipa' patopa'mam alop nogaopepa nemaf afamba sabat ama ipa' ina pewala mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani. Na'amba ipa' pa'i andeande'ma pagatopa'mam alop nogaopepai. Dei' maina ipa' ukup numbutipa ae' ma anda' anona aman bo'ona andeande' nemaf afamba sabat?
43007024	Ipa' owa'i pewaloga hiahawes penda'as hi'ihi'as naep atip dowafa, owa'. Ipa' pewalogas ukup ipe'ipi ma waf usi'ifi atefa pegegawa waf asasifi be'ef a'a awef.”
43007025	Anis Juda sagape Jerusalemi same' basef ifimba ananifi sahali'as sa'i, “Anen ea' ma'una anamba dembami ape'imi ma'i mohana nogaga'i, a'a owa'?
43007026	Anen nape nawalipasa basef alihigima apa' amom agufumi ina magwamana anif basef, owa'. Isimba endilisi a'amon? Amom mogawa aman anamba Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, a'a owa'?
43007027	Apa' mogawa aman anamba nataga itap ape'ipi. Apa' anaf owagama Krais nogafi'i, ina anin epen negawa Krais anaf nogatagama, owa'.”
43007028	Ea' Jisas ata' nape ipat lu'unai Godi nawalipas na'i mehip na'i, “Ipa' pegawa ae' endilisi apegawa ae' agatagama wambel kofagama. Apa' ae' ina afi'i dowaf aila okom ae'ami atom, owa'. Anen nasapa'e agafi'ii endilisinai. Ipa' ina pegawana, owa'.
43007029	Apa' ae' egawana. Dei' main, fowa' ae' alomana wape atogon ea' anen nasapa'e afi'i.”
43007030	Esis same' basef ifimba ananifi, opalef awalefa anen sa'i sofa'ana sonda'mana basef sonda' kotimana, owa' owa'atin. Dei' main, nemaf afamba nogaga'afi ina fataga, ata' owa'.
43007031	Epes hiasi same'anana dowaf apa' anis sahapifana sa'i, “Nemaf afamba Krais nonda' maol banagani. Maol Kraisi a' nikila' maol aman anamba nanda'ani?”
43007032	Amom Farisi mame' esis amam nematawa hiasi sa'i basef fafifafi ma Jisas. Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom Farisi masapa' anom plisman amamumi mafi'i mogowa'ana.
43007033	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ina ata' elomepa epe nogota laota, owa'atin. Ae' epe nogota bandata ea' itanima efe'ma anen nasapa'e agafi'ii.
43007034	Ipa' atiasi pelaoma ae' pefe', owa'atin. Gani ae' atiasi igapanima, ipa' ina la'ifipa pefe'agono, owa'.”
43007035	Ea' amom Juda atom manda'ipama ma'i, “Aman anamba na'i nefe' anima ma afa' ogolaomana? Anen atiasi nefe'ma esis Juda afa'isi saloma Grik a'amon?
43007036	Ea' na'i, ‘Ipa' pewando'ma ae' apa' ina atiasi petolowe, owa'.’ Ea' na'ias wapani na'i, ‘Ipa' ina la'ifipa piti ae' egapoma, owa'.’ Basef ifimba kofagefa mamahifa?”
43007037	Owa' nemaf afamba akutaifi lu'wafi ma esis Juda sonda' gwa'aisi isimba, Jisas nalutu na'i dindinip na'i, “Epen ami iap pese'an nifi'mai ae' nea' embel.
43007038	Epen ami nihapifa ae' si'i basef fagail Buk Baibeli fa'ias faga'i, ‘Ami nigahapifa ae'i, atiasi embel ambal namili lagapaimbeli bitagai okom ananimi nomon a kolo' atin biwisi ando'.’”
43007039	Basef Jisasi kofagefa fa'i Ambal bu'unai Godi anaf nope nogaloma esis sogahapifanai ukup asasipi nomon. Nemaf afamba Ambal bu'unai Godi ina' dei' nawis anis epes sagahapifanai, ata' owa'. Dei' main, Jisas ata' owa' noga' nosafel wapani nofa' agol lu'wagilima mogogala'i ananimia, ata' owa'.
43007040	Ea' anis amam nematawa same' basef ifimba sa'i, “Endilisi, aman anamba anen dembinai Profet apa' mape mogahafanai.”
43007041	Apa' anis daias sa'i, “Dei' Krais nataga itap lu'upa Galili, a'a owa'? Owa'atin.
43007042	Basef fagail Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘Krais owagama notaga wambota Deviti wambel Betlehem, Devit fowa' nagapoma.’”
43007043	Ea' esis amam nematawa sandawal mini'ap biafipa Jisas. Anis sa'i anen Krais, apa' anis sa'i, “Owa'.”
43007044	Ea' anis sa'i sofa'ana nefe'ma kot, apa' owa'. Ina anis sando lagof sahapilana, owa'.
43007045	Ea' plisman amamba motanima mafe'ma amom pris dembami maloma amom dembami Farisi magapoma. Ea' dembami amamba mahali' plisman ma'i, “Dei' maina ipa' owa' pewa' Jisas pefa'ana pifi'ia?”
43007046	Owa' amom ma'i, “Fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' owa' anin epen newalapa basef si'i anen naga'iefia, owa'.”
43007047	Amom Farisi magwamama basef ma'i, “Anen nambaso'mepa wapani, a'amon?
43007048	-
43007049	Ina anona dembinai a'a anona Farisi nahapifana, owa'atin. Apa' amam nematawa isimba hiasi, ina sogawa mu'uli Godi, owa'. Isimba atis anaf God nogwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'afi.”
43007050	-
43007051	Nikodemas fowa' nagafe'ma Jisasi, anen dembinai naloma amom dembami Farisi, nahali'am na'i, “Afa' andeande'ma onda' waf awafi ma aman anamba a'a owa'atin? Mu'uli afa'ini naga'i na'amba na'i, afa' uli' uhali'ana ma ogogawa waf ananifi feloma maol ananini, ma main dao', afa' a' wi'i anif basef.”
43007052	-
43007053	Amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' wapani Galilinai a'a? Owa'atin. Ina' ata' niti basef fagail Buk Baibeli ea' nitalifif. Ama atiasi negegawa ina anona profet nataga itap lu'upa Galili, owa'atin.”
43008001	[Amam amamba hiami mafe' ifagw amamigwi, apa' Jisas nondowasa' nafe' halafuta Oliv.
43008002	Ea' a'i owa' kuhumbita atota notanima nafe' ipat lu'unai Godi. Esis amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen ea' nape nawalipasa basef.
43008003	Ea' amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi maloma amom Farisi mati ano'w nemata'w kwanda' so'a waol kwaloma anona aman kwa'oh mao'wakw mafi'i. Ea' ma'ipa'w kwalutu la'afena amom hiami matolo'w.
43008004	Ea' ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, nemata'w akwamba afa' watolo'w kwaloma anona aman kwanda' so'a waola waf awafi.
43008005	Mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani na'ipafa na'i afa' okwaha otamba oha nematawa wanda' waf afambai ogaga'. Ina' okom mape ma'imama?”
43008006	Amom ma'i mogwambana i'i anen owa' nogwamoma basef andeande'a, monda' kotimana. Owa', Jisas nasisil notawa nanda' faf ananifi nanda' anif basef fail itap.
43008007	Amom malutu mahali'ana ma basef hiafi, ea' nosafel nalutu na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ami owa' penda' waf awafia, ipa' pili' pekwaha otam peha ako'w.”
43008008	-
43008009	Ea' anen nasisil wapani nanda' anif basef fail itap. Amom mati basef ifimba matalifif, ea' mandaumb atona atin motanima mafe'. Amom hagami mali' mafe' ea' sa'umi magi' mafe'. Mafe' atona atin makwaha ako'w kwaloma Jisas atis sape.
43008010	Ea' Jisas nosafel nalutu nahali'akw na'i, “Dei' amam amamba mape ani? Owa' anona aman ni'i nonda' kotima ina'a?”
43008011	Ako'w kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, owa'. A' mafe' hi'alam.” Ea' na'ipa'w na'i, “Ae' na'amba atin si'i amom. Ae' ina anda' kotimina, owa'. Ina' fo'o, apa' ina netanima nenda' waf awafi wapani, owa'i.”]
43008012	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam nematawa wapani na'i, “Ae' si'i mogogala'i fasimi egala'ma ipa' hipai pagape itapi. Epen ami nila ae' anin ina atiasi nefe' akota ufia'w anani'wi, owa'. Anin nepe nogogala'i ambal namili lopain.”
43008013	Amom dembami Farisi ma'ipana ma'i, “Dei' ina' nanda'i basefa ina' atina. Na'amba afa' ina ohapifina, owa'. Basef ine'ifi ina endilisifi, owa'atin.”
43008014	Jisas nagwamam basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipasa basefa ae'. Ea' dei' basef ifimba ae'afi endilisifi atif. Dei' main, ae' a' egawa ae' ataga agafi'ima ea' egawa anamba anaf egafe'ma. Apa' ipa' ina pegawa anamba ae' ataga agafi'ima, anaf egafe'ma, owa'.
43008015	Ipa' pawaloga epes si'i epes sagape itapi sagawalogas. Apa' ae' owa'. Ae' ina ewaloga anin epen, owa'.
43008016	I'i ae' egawaloga anis epes, ae' ewalogas andeande' endilisi. Dei' main? Ina ae' atowe ape, owa'. Ae' ape aloma ahame nasapa'e agafi'ii. Na'amba afa' biafa wawalogas andeande' endilisi.
43008017	Anif basef fagail mu'uli ipe'ini fa'i, ‘I'i anom amam biam muga'i basef atifif, basef ifimba amamifi endilisifi atif.’
43008018	Basef ifimba ma ae' afa' biafa wa'if, ae' aloma Ahame ae'anai nasapa'e agafi'ii.”
43008019	Ea' amom mahali'ana ma'i, “Ahamena ine'inai nape ani?” Jisas nagwamamef na'i, “Ipa' ina pegawa ae', ea' ipa' ina' pegawa ahame ae'anai wapani. I'i ipa' pegawa ae'ai, ipa' pegawa ahame ae'anai wapani. Owa' owa'atin.”
43008020	Jisas ata' nawalapa basef ananifi nomon ipat lu'unai Godi ma rum sagambe' otamba moni sanda' ofaeni naga'oma. Apa' ina anona aman nafe' nombalo'ana nofa'ana ma kot, owa'. Dei' main, nogota ananitai ata' owa' totagaia.
43008021	Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ae' a' efe'. Apa' ipa' ina atiasi petolowe, owa'. Ipa' atiasi pepe a pega' ma waf awafi ipe'ifi. Dei' main, anamba ae' egafe'ma, ipa' ina atiasi la'ifipa pefe'agono, owa'.”
43008022	Ea' amom Juda manda'ipama ma'i, “Anen na'i nefe' ani, ma afa' ina la'ififa ogafe'a? Dei' maina anen naga'i na'amba? Anen na'i nondaha anen atona a'a?”
43008023	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'i, “Ipa' pagape itapi. Apa' ae' agape ilifi. Walemb ipe'ilimbi itap apa'e, apa' ae' owa'.
43008024	Ae' a'ipipa ea'. Atiasi ipa' pega' waf awafi ipe'ifi ata' atapif fipaipa. I'i ipa' owa' pihapifa ae', aman God nasapa'e agafi'iia, atiasi ipa' pegaga' waf awafi ipe'ifi atapif fepaipa.”
43008025	-
43008026	Amom mahali'ana ma'i, “Ina' aman mamahinama?” Owa' Jisas nagwamamef na'i, “Si'i fowa' aga'ipipa. Ae' la'ifiwai ma iga'ipipa basef hiafi ipa' ma enda' kotimipa ma basef hiafi ifimba aga'ipipafi. Apa' anen nasapa'e agafi'ii, anen endilisinai. Basef ananifi ae' ame'ef ea' a'ipipaef ipa' pagape itapi.”
43008027	Amom ina mogawa anen naga'ipama ahamana ananinai, owa'.
43008028	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Namanani ipa' pesa'ma anen nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi pendelona nil lawag usi'igai ti'waenagai ilif. Nemaf afamba a' pegawa basef ifimba fa'i ae' atowe ea' ma'uwi si'i ali' aga'ipipa. Ea' pegawa ae' ina anda' maol ae' atowe aga'iani, owa'. Basef Ahame nagawalipiefi, ifimba atif a'if a'ipipaef.
43008029	Anen nasapa'e agafi'ii nape nalome. Anen ina nakwahowe ae' atowe ape, owa'. Dei' main, dondol ae' anda' maol okom ananimi maga'iani.”
43008030	Jisas ata' na'ipam atin, owa' hiasi sahapifana.
43008031	Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis Juda sagahapifanai na'i, “I'i ipa' pihapifa basef ae'afi pigi'mif, ipa' alipipai endilisi.
43008032	Ea' ipa' atiasi pegawa basef endilisifi ea' ifimba atif fetagwahepa pepe wahifipa.”
43008033	Owa' esis sagwamana basef sa'i, “Apa' akupana Abrahami. Apa' ina agof akapa mape lafela anis epes, owa'atin. Dei' maina ina' na'ipapa naga'i basef endilisifi fatagwahepa magape wahifipa?”
43008034	Jisas nagwamas basef na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, epen ami nape nanda' waf awafii, waf afambai fewa'an si'i agol akani nagape lafela anis epesi.
43008035	Epen inimba agol akani ina nape andeande' ipat nomon dondol, owa'. Apa' Nogamana endilisi dao'. Anen nape ipat atamba nomon dondol.
43008036	I'i ae' Nogamana ananiwai etagwahipa panda' waf awafi fagawasi'ipa sisihipai, atiasi pepe andeande' wahifipa endilisi.
43008037	Ae' egawa ipa' wambota Abrahami. Apa' ipa' pa'i pehe ega'. Dei' main, basef ifimba ae'afi ina fape nomonas ipe'isi, owa'.
43008038	Ae' awalapa basef ifimba gawaifi ma hiahawes ae' aloma ahame ae'anai wagatilisi, ea' a'ipipa basef ifimba, apa' owa' ipa' panda'am si'i pagame' ahamepa ipe'inai naga'ipipa.”
43008039	-
43008040	Esis Juda sagwamana basef sa'i, “Ahamapa ape'inai Abraham.” Ea' Jisas na'i, “I'i ipa' Abraham batawisanaiai, ipa' a' penda' maol Abrahami. Owa', owa'atin. Ipa' pa'i dindinipa pehe egaga'. Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi atif ame' God naga'ipiefi. Abraham ina nanda' waf afambai si'i ipa' pa'i pehe egaga', owa'atin.
43008041	Ipa' panda' waf ahamepa ipe'inai nanda'afi.” Esis sagwamana basef sa'i, “Mamamapa ape'iwai ina wanda' so'a waol olapa, owa'. Ahamapa ape'inai God atotona.”
43008042	Jisas na'ipas na'i, “I'i God ahamepa ipe'inaiai, ukup ipe'ipi pipila ae'. Ina ae' atowe ela okom afi'i, owa'atin. Ahame nasapa'e afi'i ape na'a.
43008043	Dei' maina ipa' owa' peme' basef ae'afia? Ipa' ina la'ifipama pegame' basef ae' aga'iefi, owa'.
43008044	“Ipa' si'i ahamepa ipe'inai naga'iani. Fowa' dambadamba nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei', anen naha epes sagaga'i, ea' nowa' alafugama basef endilisifi. Nomonas ananisi ina sapoma basef endilisifi, owa'. Anen nambaso'mas nimaguf hiafi dondol lifilafi. Basef baso'aifi anen naga'iefi, ifimba ananifi atif fagataga okom ananimi atumi.
43008045	Apa' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi atif. Isimba atis dei' pandaiwa'ma pigahapifi.
43008046	Ipa' epen mamahina nagape la'afena ipe'i banagena negawalapa anef waf awafi atetef ae' anda'afi? Owa'atin. Apa' i'i ae' iga'ipipa basef endilisifi, dei' maina ipa' owa' pihapifia?
43008047	Epes Godi same' basef ananifi. Apa' ipa' ina epes Godi, owa'. Ipa' anipa daipa. Na'amba ipa' owa' peme' basef ananifia.”
43008048	Esis Juda sagwamana basef sa'i, “Apa' ma'i endilisi ina' Samariainai bounai ape'inai ea' ambal aunai napaina.”
43008049	Jisas na'i, “Ae' ambal aunai owa'atin. Apa' ae' asa'ma agol Ahame ae'anai ea' ipa' pataloga agol ae'agili.
43008050	Ae' ina anda' maola anis sogasa'ma agol ae'igili lu'wagol, owa'. Apa' anona dembinai nanda' maol inimba, ma anis daias sogasa'ma agol ae'agili, dembinai anamba Ahame nape jasa ae'.
43008051	Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi atif. Epen ami nihapifa basef ae'afi nilif, anin ina atiasi nega', owa'. A' nepe lifilafi dondol.”
43008052	Esis Juda same' basef ifimba sa'i, “Dei' apa' magawa ina' ambal aunai nape nomonas ine'isi. Abraham fowa' a' naga' ea' amom profet fowa'imi wapani a' maga'. Owa' ina' na'i, epen ami nihapifa basef ine'ifi anin ina nega', owa'.”
43008053	Ea' sahali'ana wapani sa'i, “Ina' a' nikila' ahamapa ape'inai Abraham? Anen naga' ea' amom profet wapani a' maga'. Apa' ina' na'i ina' atina aman mamahinama?
43008054	-
43008055	Jisas nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “I'i ae' esa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagilai, agol ae'agili wafigil si'i basef wafifi. Apa' Ahame ipa' paga'i God ipe'inai, anen nasa'ma agol ae'igili lu'wagol. Apa' ipa' ina pegawana, owa'. Ae' atowe egawana. I'i ae' i'i owa' igawanaia, ae' aga'i basef baso'ami si'i ipa' pagambaso'am. Owa' owa'atin. Ae' egawana aila basef ananifi.
43008056	“Abraham akunamepa ipe'inai, anen a' nandagala ma nogati nogota ae'atai owagama togataga, si'i nagati ae' ma sonagahana endilisi.”
43008057	Esis Juda sa'ipana sa'i, “Afagof ine'igufi ata' owa' 50-pelaigufa, ina' na'i a' nati Abraham?”
43008058	Jisas nagwamas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, fowa' gani Abraham ma'mana ata' owa' kolanaea, ae' ali' ape.”
43008059	Ea' esis same' basef ananifi, ea' amom Juda mafe' masa'mai otamba ma'i mokwahemba mohana owa', Jisas nandambaho' nawisi nakwaha ipat lu'unai Godi nafe'.
43009001	Jisas nafe' ufia'w ea' nati anona aman naep pagaso'anai. Fowa' ma'mana kogolana naep paso'ana nape na'amba atin atapina.
43009002	Alipumi ananimi mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, dei' maina aman anamba naep pagaso'ana? Anen nanda' waf awafi a'a esis mamasana sanda' waf awafi solana?”
43009003	Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Kofagema ma anen naep pagaso'ana ina mamasana sanda' waf awafi a'a anen nanda' waf awafi, owa'. Anen naep paso'ana ma maol Godi negataga lu'win. Isimba atis dei' naep paso'ana.
43009004	Dei' ea' alip, nogota apa' monda' maola anen nasapa'e agafi'ii. Owamb bogataga ina atiasi anis epes sonda' maol, owa'atin.
43009005	Ae' ata' egape itap apa'e ipe'ipi, ae' si'i nagwapin nogogala'i ipe'iwai ipa' hipai pagape itapi.”
43009006	Jisas na'ipam na'amba, ea' nisi'wafa apah itap nagwindisah haloma itap. Ea' nasomana naep aman anamba.
43009007	Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nefe' nesa'opa naep embel dumb amamba Siloam.” Basef kofagefa ma agol agalemba ifimba fa'i, nasapa'ana. Ea' aman anamba nafe' nasa'opa naep ananipi, ma ata' notanimai atin owa', naep patiana andeande' bo'ona.
43009008	Esis wambel atembel saloma anis fowa' sati anen nagape ufia'w nandailasa otamba gwa'aisi maini sahali'as sa'i, “Anen aman anamba ma'una fowa' nape ufia'w nandailasa gwa'aisii?”
43009009	Ea' anis sa'i, “Anen ma'una.” Apa' anis sa'i, “Owa'. Anona daiana anamba. Apa amaga ananigai si'i anen.” Apa' aman anamba fowa' naep pagaso'anai na'i, “Ae' ma'uwi.”
43009010	Ea' esis sahali'ana sa'i, “Ina' nanda' maina dei' nagati andeande'?”
43009011	Anen nagwamas na'i, “Anona aman agol ananigili Jisas nanda' itap paloma apah ananihi nambemam nanda'meam naep ae'api. Ea' na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' nefe' nesa'of dumb Siloam.’ Ea' afa' asa'of ea' naep apati.”
43009012	Ea' sahali'ana sa'i, “Aman anamba nape ani?” Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ina egawa nagapoma, owa'.”
43009013	Esis sao'wa aman anamba fowa' naep pagaso'anai safe'ma amom dembami Farisi.
43009014	Nemaf afamba esis sagapoma noma'wafi sabat, afamba atef Jisas nanda' itap Paloma apah nambemam nanda'manam naep ananipi, ea' naep patiana.
43009015	Ea' amom Farisi mahali'ana wapani ma'i, “Anen nanda'mena maina dei' naep pagati?” Aman anamba nagwamam na'i, “Anen nanda' itap paloma apah ananihi nanda'meam naep ae'api, ea' afa' asa'opa naep ea' dei' apati.”
43009016	Ea' anom Farisi ma'i, “Aman anamba ina nagi'ma mu'uli ma nemaf afamba sabat, owa'. Ea' anen ina aman Godi, owa'atin.” Owa' anom Farisi daiam ma'i, “Anona aman nanda' waf awafii ina la'ifina nonda' maol banagani si'i God nanda'ani, owa'atin.” Ea' amom Farisi mandawal biafim.
43009017	Ea' mahali' aman anamba fowa' naep pagaso'anai ma'i, “Ina' negawana na'imama? Waf ananifi mamahefa? Aman anamba nanda' naep ine'ipi pagatii.” Aman anamba na'i, “Anen anona profet.”
43009018	Endilisi aman anamba fowa' naep pagaso'anai dei' patiana. Apa' amom dembami esis Judai ina mahapifana ma'i endilisi, owa'. Ea' mofalai mamasana ananisi safi'i mahali'as.
43009019	Ea' mahali'as ma'i, “Aman anamba nogamepa ipe'inai a'a owa'? Aman anamba ipa' pa'i naep ananipi pagaso'anai fowa' ma'mana kogolana? Dei' anen nati andeande' na'imama?”
43009020	Esis mamasana sagwamam basef sa'i, “Afa' ogawa anen nogamafa afa'inai. Ea' ogawa fowa' ma'mana kogolana naep paso'ana.
43009021	Apa' afa' ina ogawa dei' anen nagati, nati andeande' na'imama. Ami nanda' naep ananipi patiana, afa' ina ogawa. Anen dambena ea', afa' wa'i ipa' pihali'ana nonda'ipipa.”
43009022	Esis mamasana ananisi ombal mahasa amom agufumi Judai. Ea' dei' sa'ias na'amba. Dei' main, amom agufumi ma'i basef ea' ma'i, epen ami ni'i basefa Jisas niga'i anen Kraisi, amom a' mili'amonana ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai ma ina nenda' lotu nelomas wapani, owa'.
43009023	Amom ma'ias na'amba dei' mamasana ananisi ombal mahas sa'i, “Anen dambena ea'. Pihali'ana nonda'ipipa.”
43009024	Amom mofalai aman anamba wapani ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' ni'i basef endilisifi atif, God natilina. Afa' ogawa aman anamba Jisas, anen aman aunai.”
43009025	Anen nagwamam na'i, “Ae' ina egawa waf ananifi awafi, a'a owa'. Apa' ae' egawa endilisi atis, fowa' naep ae'api pase'e apa' dei' owa', ati andeande'.”
43009026	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Anen nanda'mena maina dei' nanda' naep ine'ipi pagati?”
43009027	Anen nagwamamef na'i, “Doko' ae' a'ipipa ea', apa' ipa' ina pame'e, owa'. Dei' maina pa'i pegame' basef ifimba wapani? Ipa' wapani pa'i petaga alipipai ananipai pilana?”
43009028	Owa' amom ma'i basef wandafifi ma anen ma'i, “Ina' aman alipunai ananinai. Apa' afa' alipufai Mosesi.
43009029	Afa' ogawa God fowa' na'ipa Moses ea' apa' aman anamba afa' ina ogawa waf kofagefa ananifi anen nataga ani?”
43009030	Anen nagwamamef na'i, “Amamba hiahaom maim? Ipa' ina pegawa anen nataga ani, apa' anen nanda' naep ae'api pati.
43009031	Apa' mogawa God ina name' esis sanda' waf awafii, owa'. Anen name' epen ami nanda' maol ananini nagasa'ma agol ananigili ma negame' basef ananifi.
43009032	Fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' ina anif basef fa'i anona aman ma'mana kolana ea' nataga naep paso'ana ma anef nemaf anona aman daiana nonda' naep pigatiana, owa'atin.
43009033	I'i aman anamba ina aman Godiai, anen ina atiasi nonda' anis maefah, owa', owa'atin. Anen aman Godi.”
43009034	Amom magwamana basef ma'i, “Endilisi, fowa' ma'mena kogolaena ina' nanda' waf awafi atef. Ea' ina a' niwalipafa, owa'i.” Ea' amom mali'amonana ipat atamba esis Juda sandakolasatai ina ata' nolomas nonda' lotu wapani, a' owa'.
43009035	Ea' Jisas name' basefa amom mali'amonana nape ando' nowando'mana natolona nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' nahapifa aman anamba nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi, a'a owa'?”
43009036	Aman anamba nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, aman anamba ami? Ni'ipiana ma igahapifana.”
43009037	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' ina' natolona ea'. Anen epen anamba dei' na'i nagalomanai.”
43009038	Ea' na'i, “Dembinai, dei' ahapifina.” Na'ias na'amba ea', nindiwa nembawa notawa itap nanifelona nasa'ma agol ananigili.
43009039	Jisas na'i, “Ae' afi'i itap apa'e ma ewaloga epes hiasi hi'igalas. Ama esis naep pagaso'asi atiasi sogati andeande' a isimba naep pagatiasi ea' naep pese'as.”
43009040	Anom Farisi mape malomana mame' basef ifimba mahali'ana ma'i, “Ifimba basef maif? Ina' na'i afa' naep paso'afa wapani a'amon?”
43009041	Jisas na'ipam na'i, “I'i ipa' naep pese'epa ai, ipa' waf awafi akepa. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ipa' apa'i, ‘Afa' wagatii.’ Na'amba waf awafi ipe'ifi ata' fapomepa.”
43010001	Jisas na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, epen ami owa' nusi' uta indalelemb sipsipia ma anin nelota niwisi anagon daiagona, epen inimba nanda' wali.
43010002	Apa' epen inimba usi'ini nigawisi utai, anin nigimafi sipsipi.
43010003	Aman nugumafi utai nawisi'man uta ma nugumafi sipsip. Amom sipsip mame' malogol ananigili. Nofala agofa sipsip ananimi, ea' nao'wam mawisi ando'.
43010004	Nao'wa sipsip ananimi hiami mawisi ando' hi'alam ea' nali' nafe', amom magi'mana. Dei' main? Amom mogawa malogol ananigili.
43010005	Apa' sipsip ina magi'ma anona daiana, owa'. Na'amba mondafa'mana a' mofa' mefe' atona biana. Dei' main? Amom ina mogawa malogol ananigili, owa'.?
43010006	Ea' Jisas na'ipasa basef waminif atin na'amba, apa' esis ina sogawa basef kofagefa, owa'atin.
43010007	Ea' Jisas na'ipas wapani na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, ae' si'i uta sipsip mugawisatai.
43010008	Amom fowa' mugumafi sipsipi, hiami manda' wali apa' sipsip ina mame' malogof amamugufi, owa'.
43010009	Ae' si'i uta, epen ami niwisi ae' nomon, God nuwambilai anin nokwahoman waf awafi nepe andeande'. Anin nifi'i niwisi niwis nepe netaga nefe' nefa' gwa'aisi bu'wasi.
43010010	Amom manda' wali mafi'i ma monda' wal mohas soga' mogahambombagas. Apa' ae' afi'i ma ipa' pegape andeande' ambal lopaipa endilisi a'owa'.
43010011	Ae' aman bu'uwai igimafi sipsipi, a'i aho' ma egaga' ma egatopalopa sipsip igimafiami.
43010012	I'i anona aman nonda' kontrak dowafi ma nugumafi sipsip amambai, anen okom mi'i nogofa' otamba atembai, anen ina atiasi numafi sipsip andeande', owa'. Anen ina aman endilisi nugumafi sipsipi, owa'. Ea' nemaf mamahefa niti nombagw gwagail alupi gugafi'i, a' ombal mohana nokwaha sipsip atom mulutu nofa' nefe'. Ea' nombagw agwamba guwis goha sipsip mofa' mefe' atona biana.
43010013	Aman anamba nanda' maola otamba atembai, anen nandaiwa'ma nugumafi sipsip amamba andeande', owa'. Ea' atiasi niti nombagw agwamba a' ombal mohana nofa' nefe'.
43010014	“Ae' aman bu'uwai igimafi sipsip andeande'i. Ae' egawa sipsip ae'ami a sipsip mogawa ae' wapani.
43010015	Ea' na'amba atin ahame ae'anai nogawa ae', ae' egawa anen. Ae' a'i aho'ma ega' egatopalopa sipsip ae'ami.
43010016	Ae' anom sipsip daiam malutumi. Apa' amom ina malutu nomon indalelemb ambalemba, owa'. Amom magalutu indalelemb anagon daiagini. Ae' okom ma'iam a'owa' anef nemaf a' efa'am mifi'i meme' malogol ae'igili ekolasom mulutu indalelemb atelemb ae' atowe imafiam.
43010017	Ae' a'i aho'ma egaga' ma atiasi esafel egape namowe wapani. Isimba atis ahame ae'anai okom maimaili a'owa'.
43010018	Ina anona aman noha ambal ae'ali ega', owa'atin. Okom ae'ami atom ma'i aho'ma atiasi egaga'. Ae' efa' agol lu'wagili ma ega' egesafel wapani. Agol agalemba ahame atona nase'eagol.”
43010019	-
43010020	Esis Juda same' basef ifimba ea' esis sandatopa' biafis. Hiasi sa'i, “Ambagof awami mapaona ea' nahaga nagaol a'owa'. Dei' maina ipa' pagame' malogol ananigili?”
43010021	Apa' anis daias sa'i, “Anona aman ambagof awami magapaunai ina na'i anif basef si'i anen naga'iefi, owa'. Anona aman ambagof awami magapaunai ai, ina la'ifinama nonda' aman anamba naep pagaso'anai nogati wapani, owa'atin.”
43010022	-
43010023	Nogota atamba asaf atef fagalatama esis Juda sanda' anis gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma ukup pagapoma fowa' gani sagawisi ipat Godi. Ea' Jisas nafe' nomon ipat lu'unai Godi ilafunama sale'w fowa' Solomon nanda'akwi.
43010024	Ea' amom Juda mafi'i malutu malipana ma'i, “Nimaguf mamahifa ina' nenda' opalef afa'ilifi fetaga nomonas biafis? I'i ina' Kraisai, ni'ipafa basef alihif.”
43010025	Jisas nagwamam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa ea', apa' ipa' ina ukup pehafel pahapifi, owa'. Ae' anda' hiahaom banagami ma agol ahamai, amamba mihimba'mepa ae' epen mamahowema.
43010026	Apa' ipa' ina sipsip ae'ipai, owa'. Ipa' anipa daipa. Na'amba dei' ipa' ina pahapifa ae', owa'.
43010027	Sipsip ae'ami mame' malogol ae'agili ea' egawam mame' basef ae'afi maili.
43010028	Ae' egaso'am ambal namili ma mogape andeande' dondol lifilafi. Amom ina moga', owa'atin. Ina anin epen la'ifina netagwahom lagof ae'agufi negefa'am, owa'atin endilisi. Amom mope lagof ae'agufi atapim dondol lifilafi.
43010029	“Ahame ae'anai nase'e epes isimba ae'asi. Ina anin epen atiasi la'ifina nitagwahis lagol ahamai negefa'as, owa'atin. Dei' main, ahame ae'anai banagonai a'owa' nikila' epes hiasi hi'alas.
43010030	Ae' aloma ahame, afa' biafa wape atotofa.”
43010031	Ea' amom Juda mafe' mofa'i otamba wapani ma'i mokwahemba mohana afuna.
43010032	Apa Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ihimba'mepa maol bu'wani hiami nagataga Ahamai ea' patilin. Apa' ukup ipe'ipi papoma maol mamahina anda'ani ma dei' pa'i pekwaha otamba pegahe?”
43010033	Amam Juda magwamana ma'i, “Afa' ina wakwaha otamba wa'i ohena ma anin maol bu'wani, owa'. Ina' aman falafunai nanda' findiwa, na'i ina' atina God. Ea' afa' wa'i ohena otamba.”
43010034	Jisas nagwamam na'i, “Anif basef fagail mu'uli ipe'ini fa'ias fa'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa ea' a'i, ipa' si'i anom god daiam.’
43010035	-
43010036	Fowa' basef Godi fafe'ma epes isimba fa'i, ‘God na'i ipa' si'i anom god daiam.’ Basef ifimba ina fenalo, owa'. Fape atapif fandawalap endilisi. Ahame ae'anai atona nosahe'e nanda'e ape hilili' ananiwai atowe nasapa'e afi'i itap apa'e enda' maol ananini. Ea' a'i ae' Nogamana ananiwai. Dei' maina ipa' paga'i, ae' anda' God findiwana?’
43010037	I'i ae' ina anda' maol Ahame ae'anaiai, dao' andeande'ma ipa' pindaiwa' ma pigahapifi.
43010038	Apa' ae' anda' maol ananini ma i'i ipa' owa' pihapifia, hapaimi. Ipa' piti maol atin ae'ani pegawa Ahame nape nalome, ae' ape alomana.”
43010039	Ea' amom ma'i mombalo'ana ma mogowa'ana. Owa', owa'atin. Anen nakwaha amom a' nafe'.
43010040	Jisas notanima natopa' walemb Jordan nambo fisana nafe' nataga anamba fowa' dambadamba Jon nagapisi'asa nape na'amba.
43010041	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen. Esis sa'i, “Jon owa' nonda' anin maol banagania, apa' basef ananifi hiafi naga'ifa Jisasi, ifimba endilisifi atif.”
43010042	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi sahapifa Jisas na'amba.
43011001	-
43011002	Anona aman aowas nanda'anai agol ananigili Lasarus. Anen naloma hanitiamana ananiwai biawa, Maria kwaloma Marta sape wambel ambalemba Betani. Maria akwamba fowa' kwagakolo'wa sanda balaga Dembinaii ma kwanda' auf balaga ako'ugai kwagandisamana bo'wagah ananigahi.
43011003	Ea' awo wasapa' basef fafe'ma Jisas wa'i, “Dembinai, aman anamba ina' okom magamagailanai a' awasina na'oh.”
43011004	Ea' Jisas name' basef ifimba na'i, “Aowas inimba ina natagamana ma nogaga', owa'. Aowas inimba natagamana ma esis sogasa'ma agol ae' Nogamana Godi, a sogasa'ma agol ananigili wapani.”
43011005	Ea' Jisas okom maimaila Marta kwaloma owama'w Maria waloma Lasarus.
43011006	Anen name' basefa Lasarus awasina, apa' anen ata' napani nimaguf bif wapani wambel ambalemba nagapanima.
43011007	Nimaguf bif fafe'ma ea', na'ipa alipumi ananimi na'i, “Afa' dei' a' otanima ofe' itap lu'upa Judia.”
43011008	Ea' alipumi ananimi magwamana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, nimbewa' esis Juda sa'i sokwaha otamba sehena afina, apa' dei' ina' na'i netanima nefe' anamba wapani, a'amon?”
43011009	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'i, “Nemaf atetef awa 12-pelain nape. Epen ami nagafe' alipi anin ina newa, owa'. Dei' main, anin nati hauguma itap apa'e howalagon nafe' andeande'.
43011010	Apa' i'i anin negafe' owambi, atiasi a' newa. Dei' main? Anin nagwapin nogogala'i akan.”
43011011	Jisas na'ipam na'amba ma ea', na'ipam wapani na'i, “Alipunai afa'inai Lasarus anen na'oh. Ae' atiasi efe' ganimba itap Judia ma iginimbalona.”
43011012	Ea' alipumi ananimi magwamana basef ma'i, “Dembinai, i'i anen no'oh atinai, dao' atiasi ambo'ona.”
43011013	Doko' Jisas nali' naga'ipam na'i Lasarus naga'oh, fa'i Lasarus a' naga' endilisi. Apa' alipumi ananimi ukup pa'i anen ata' na'oh dowaf.
43011014	Dei' Jisas na'ipam alihif na'i, “Lasarus a' naga' ea' endilisi.
43011015	Ae' sonahe ma ae' ina alomana wape atogon nemaf anen nagaga'afi. Ama ipa' atiasi pigahapifa ae'. Dei' afa' ofe'ma anen.”
43011016	Ea' Tomas agol wa'agol Didimas na'ipa alipumi Jisasi daiam na'i, “Afa' ofe' wapani ma oga' ogaloma anen.”
43011017	Lasarus naga' a' sawana. Nimaguf bifibif fafe' ea', Jisas a' nafi'i nataga. Anan nogawa Lasarus sawana nape wandof nimaguf bifibif.
43011018	-
43011019	Wambel ambalemba Betani bape felefele'ma Jerusalem, si'i kilomita wanifin. Ea' amom Juda hiami mafi'i ma monda' opalef hanitiamana biawa Martai Maria fegape sa'umbela anen hanitinamawa nagaga'.
43011020	Marta kwame' basefa Jisas nafi'i atin, kwafe' kowando'mana ufia'w, apa' Maria ata' kwapani ipat.
43011021	Ea' Marta kwafe'ma Jisas kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, i'i ina' nepe na'a'e ai, hanitiname ae'anai ina noga', owa'atin.”
43011022	Owa' ako'w kwa'ipana wapani kwa'i, “Ae' egawa ina' nigahali' Goda hiahawes mais, anen nogasi'inasi.”
43011023	Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Hanitinamena atiasi nogosafel wapanii.”
43011024	Ea' Marta kwagwamana kwa'i, “Ae' egawa anen anaf a' nosafel wapani nemaf akutaifi afamba epes hiasi sagaga'i sogosafel wapaniefi.”
43011025	Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Kofagama epes sogosafel wapani ma sogofa' ambal namili, ae' atowe. Epen ami nihapifa ae', atiasi nega' ea' nesafel wapani nefa' ambal namili nepe andeande'.
43011026	Epen ami ata' nape namina nigahapifa ae'i, anin nepe andeande'. Ina nega' wapani, owa'atin. Nepe lifilafi dondol. Ina' nahapila basef ifimba, a'a owa'?”
43011027	Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Aho' dembinai, ae' ahapifa ina' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nagafi'ii. Ina' Nogamana ananinai, fowa' anen na'i nigafi'i itap apa'i.”
43011028	Ako'w kwa'ipana na'amba, kotanima kwafe'ma owama'w Maria kwa'ipa'w sa'osa'ombel kwa'i, “Dembinai Tisa a' nafi'i nataga nofalena.”
43011029	Maria kwame' basef ifimba atin, kosafel kwafalis kwafe'mana.
43011030	Jisas ina dei' nawisi wambel lu'wambela la'afen, owa'. Afa' naili wambel di'imbili doko' Marta kwagatolonama.
43011031	Amom Juda mape maloma Maria nomon ipat awoutai ma'i mowa' banaga nomonas ako'usi ma sogape banages. Ea' amom mati Maria kwasafel kwafalis kwafe'. Amom ukup pa'i owa' ako'w kofe' wandofa kogalopana. Ea' magima'w mafe'.
43011032	Ea' Maria kwafe'ma anamba Jisas nagapoma kwatolona kundiwa nembawa felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, i'i ina' nepe nelomapa ai, hanitiname ae'anai ina noga', owa'atin. Apa' owa' napani laogon dei' anen naga'.”
43011033	Jisas nati ako'w kwape kwalef atin ea' nati amom Juda mafi'i maloma'w malef wapani. Ea' nati esis uwahipis opaf ananifi a' aof a'owa' na'i a' nelef atin.
43011034	Ea' nahali'as na'i, “Ipa' pawana ani?” Ea' esis sa'ipana sa'i, “Dembinai, fi'i netelogon.”
43011035	Owa' a' nalef.
43011036	Amom Juda mati anen nalef na'amba ma'i, “Ipa' petolona! Anen okom maimailana a'owa'.”
43011037	Ape' anom ma'i, “Aman anamba ma'una nanda' aman anamba naep pagaso'anai ma dei' pagatianai. Anen la'ifinai ma fowa' a' nili' nifi'i ma notopalopa aman anamba ai, dei' a' nope a'a noga'?”
43011038	Ea' Jisas opaf nimanif endilisi nafe' nataga wandof afamba lu'wafi sagwasogon nagawis nomon otam lu'unai. Ea' sanda' anona owap lu'unai sowalo uta.
43011039	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' lefata owap anamba nogowalo utai.” Ea' Marta haniti'ma aman anamba nagaga'i kwa'i, “Dembinai, anen a' nape nimaguf bifibif ea'. Dei' alogw awami a' mana.”
43011040	Owa' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Fowa' ali' a'ipina dei' i'ipina wapani, i'i ina' nihapifa ae', atiasi niti mogogala'i banagami Godi.”
43011041	-
43011042	Ea' esis selefata owap anamba ea' Jisas naniga nati ilif na'i, “Ahame, ae' anifelina ma nagame'e. Ae' egawa ina' name'e lifilafi apa' ae' a'ias na'amba ma esis amam nematawa sagalutu na'ai sogahapifa ae', ina' nasapa'e agafi'ii.”
43011043	Jisas nandabeten na'amba ea', nofalana mehip na'i, “Lasarus, safel niwisi ando'.”
43011044	Ea' aman anamba nasafel nawisi ando'. Apa' bo'wagah haloma lagof amaga ananimi sanda' lowaf sombafana. Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' tagwahomana luwaguf amamba ea' pekwahona nefe' wahifina.”
43011045	Amom Juda hiami mafi'i mati Maria maloma'w malef, ea' mati amamba Jisas nanda'ami. Ea' a' mahapifana.
43011046	Apa' anom mafe'ma amom dembami Farisi ma'ipama amamba Jisas nanda'ami.
43011047	Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom Farisi hiami mofala anom dembami mafi'i mandakolasa monda' kot. Ea' ma'i, “Afa' atiasi onda' maina aman anamba nanda' maol banaganii?
43011048	I'i ope ogatotolona ma nonda' maol inimba, atiasi hiasi asohapifana hi'ilas. Ea' amom Rom atiasi mifi'i mohambombaga ipat lu'unai Godi noloma apa' Juda hiapai wapani.”
43011049	Ea' anona aman agilinai Judai agol Kaiafas, anen dembinai pris nape nagali'ma pris hiamii ma afagol agalemba na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' ina pegawa anis hiahawes, owa'atin.
43011050	Ipa' ina dei' pegawa anif basef, owa'. I'i aman atotona nogaga'ma amam nematawa hiasi, na'ambai a' andeande'ma ipa'. Afa' wandaiwa' ma esis sogahambombaga apa' Juda. Na'amba mini'ap ape'ipi Judai a' lamonap.”
43011051	Anen ina na'i basef ifimba ma okom ananimi atom, owa'atin. Anen nape pris dembinai afagol agalemba. Ea' na'i basef Ambal bu'unai Godi naga'ipanaefi si'i profet na'i Jisas a' nondaga' ma nogatopalopa esis Juda hiasi.
43011052	Kaiafas na'i Jisas ina a' noga' notopalopa esis Juda atis, owa'atin. Anen noga' ma nogatopalopa epes Godi hiasi sapesasa sagafe' itap hiagomai hi'ilas nuwambilasi nonda'as sogataga mini'ap atetep.
43011053	Nemaf afamba atef amom agufumi Judai a' mali' ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Jisas nogaga'.
43011054	Ea' Jisas ina ata' nafe' alihina anamba esis Juda sagapoma, a' owa'. Anen nafe' nandambaho' atin felefele'ma anamba wafigima fataupigima ma wambel ambalemba Ifraim. Nape na'amba naloma alipumi ananimi.
43011055	Ina nogota laota ma esis Juda soga' gwa'aisi lu'wasi saga'i Pasovai, owa'. Ea' esis Juda hiasi sakwaha walemb asasilimbi a' safe' Jerusalem atogon. Safe'ma sigaila basef Godi fowa'ifi sosa'of sotofa alogwa sogandondomba alop asasipi ma God negati esis bo'wes hilili' ma soga' gwa'aisi isimba.
43011056	Esis sape ipat lu'unai Godi nomon sowando'ma Jisas ea' sahali'as sa'i, “Ipa' ukup pape pa'imama? Anen atiasi nifi'mai gwa'aisi isimba a'a owa'?”
43011057	Ea' amom pris dembami maloma amom Farisi hiami ma'ias dindinip ma'i, “Epen ami negawa Jisas nagapoma ni'ipafa ofe' ombalo'ana ma onda'mana basef.”
43012001	Nimaguf wanif wanif ata' fapoma esis Juda sonda' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Pasova. Nemaf afamba Jisas a' nataga wambel Betani, alipunai Lasarus nagapoma. Fowa' naga'ma Jisas nasa'mana nogosafel wapanii.
43012002	Ea' sanda'mana gwa'aisi Jisas. Marta kwanda' gwa'aisi, apa' Lasarus nape nalomas sape sa' gwa'aisi saloma Jisas.
43012003	Ea' Maria kwahapila anop kap si'ipa sanda bu'wani agilina nad sagatalin otamba hiambaii. Ea' kwahapilan kwakolo'wan kwandisamana bo'wagah Jisasi kwanda' auf balaga ako'ugai kopati'manan. Ea' ipat atamba asi'itama alogw bu'wagwi ma sanda inimbai.
43012004	Apa' anona alipunai Jisasi Judas Keriotinai kowalana ma sanda inimba nandaiwa'ma kwakolo'wan kwagasapelin. Aman anamba atiasi a' nogowalapa Jisas niga'ipa amom boumianai.
43012005	Ea' Judas na'ipas na'i, “I'i afa' ofa' sanda inimba anis epes soso'afa moni 300 kina sotalina ofa'an ogaso' epes isimba kwahusa gwa'aisi mainai, dao' andeande'. Apa' owa', owa'atin.”
43012006	Apa' Judas okom ananimi ina ma'i notopalopa isimba kwahusa hiahawesi, owa'atin. Anen na'ias na'amba ma nonda' wal nogofa'amba. Dei' main, anen nugumafi bokis isimba Jisas naloma alipumi ananimi mala otamba amamimbai bagalasi ma dondol nanda' wala anemba. Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i,
43012007	-
43012008	“Ipa' owa'i pi'ipa'w basef ifimbaia, owa'i. Andeande'ma ako'w kwagakolo'wa sanda inimba ma atiasi nemaf afamba sehe igaga'afi ma sogawe. Isimba kwahusa gwa'aisi maini sape salomepa nimaguf hiafi. Apa' ae' ina epe egalomepa nogota lautai, owa'.”
43012009	Esis Juda hiasi same' basefa Jisas nape Betani. Ea' safi'i sa'i sotolona ea' sa'i siti Lasarus wapani, nimbewa' naga'ma Jisas nasa'mana nogosafel wapanii.
43012010	Ea' amom pris dembami ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Lasarus nogaga' wapani.
43012011	Dei' main, anis Juda hiasi sati Lasarus notanima nosafel ambal lapaona. Isimba atis dei' sakwaha amom dembami Juda asafe' saila Jisas sahapifana.
43012012	Wafilu epes hiasi safi'mai gwa'aisi isimba Pasova, same' basefa Jisas ata' nafi'i atin Jerusalem.
43012013	Ea' satopa' agof lawahiguf apilugufa sahapilagof safi'i satagamana ufia'w. Ea' soga sa'i mehip sa'i, “Hosana. Apa' mandanifal endilisi ma ina'. Apa' ma'i God nofalo'ma ina' nagafi'i agol ananigilii nese'ena banagami ma nenda' maol ananini. Ina' king dembinai apa' Israeli.”
43012014	-
43012015	Ea' Jisas nowando'ma donki atitin sa'uni natilin nandagala natoman nafe' si'i fowa' anif basef Godi fagail Buk Baibeli faga'i, “Ipa' wambel Saion, ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Dembinai king ipe'inai anaf notoma donki noganai nofa'ana nifi'i.”
43012016	Nemaf afamba alipumi Jisasi ina mogawa basef ifimba kofagefa faga'i Jisasi, owa'atin. Ama nogota atamba Jisas noga' ma nosafel wapani notanima nogalota ilif, dao' amom a' mogawa basef ifimba faga'i anini. Ea' ukup pepoma amamba epes isimba sanda'manam anini wapani.
43012017	Anis epes sali' sati Jisas nogofala aman anamba nagaga'i Lasarus napani matmat nogosafel wapani. Ea' sa'ipa hiasi ma basef ifimba Lasarasi.
43012018	Ea' epes hiasi same' basefa Jisas nanda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami. Ea' dei' safe' satolona.
43012019	Ea' amom Farisi manda'ipama ma'i, “Maol afa'ini ina la'ifin, owa'. Afa' agof akafa. Piti amam nematawa hiasi safi'mai anen atona hi'alas.”
43012020	Epes hiasi safe' Jerusalem ama gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi sonda' lotuma God. Ea' anom Grik wapani mafe' malomas.
43012021	Anona aman alipunai Jisasi Filip anen Betsaidainai itap lu'upa Galili. Amom Grik mafi'mai gwa'aisi isimba ea' mafi'mai Filip ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wa'i uti Jisas.”
43012022	Filip nafe' na'ipa Andru, amom biam mafe' ma'ipa Jisas.
43012023	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ataga epen egefa' alop epesi a' afi'i. Nogota atamba anis asasa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagol.
43012024	Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi, i'i olemb witimb owa' bewa itap nomona, olemb ambamba bepe atifimb. Apa' i'i bewa begewala itap nomon, dao' ambamba ambetaga belo bil hiambi.
43012025	Epen ami okom mopoma ambal ananili atol ni'i nihapilal tatala'il, anaf ambal ananili higililal. Apa' epen ami okom mopoma ae' ma nesambala ambal ananili itap apa'e, anaf God a' nofa'al lotanimai nepe andeande' lifilafi.
43012026	Epen ami ni'i nenda' maol ae'anii, anin a' nindaila ae'. Mamahagoma ae' egapoma, inimba nanda' maola ae'i anin negapoma anamba. Ea' epen ami nenda' maol ae'anii, Ahame ae'anai atiasi nosa'ma agol ananigili.
43012027	Ea' Jisas na'ipas wapani na'i, “Dei' opaf ae'afi bolalaf afataga aof. Ae' basef owa'atina iga'if. Atiasi ae' a' i'i, ‘Ahame, ina' li'amona akafimi amamba ma'i mogatagama ae' dei'i a'a?’ Owa'atin. Ae' afi'i nogota ata'e ape itap apa'e ma maol inimba atin ae' enda'ana sehe egaga'.
43012028	Ahame, ina' nenda'ama epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol.” Ea' anogol malogol ga'i gatagai heven ga'i, “Ae' anda'ama sogasa'ma agol ae'agili gogataga lu'wagol, owa' atiasi enda'agol gotaga lu'wagol wapani.”
43012029	Ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi salutu sagame' malogol agalembai sa'i, “Owa', otaga diwala.” Apa' anis sa'i, “Anona ensel na'ipana anif basef.”
43012030	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Malogol agalemba ina ga'i ma gogatopalopa ae', owa'. Agalemba ga'i ma gogatopalopa ipa'.
43012031	Dei' Ahame God a' nawaloga wafa amam nematawa hiasi sagape itap apai ea' natofa dembinai nugumafi itap apai.
43012032	Atiasi esis sendele il atin lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ilifa atiasi ihindi'ai esis amam nematawa hiasi sifi'mai ae' hi'igalas.”
43012033	Jisas na'ipas na'amba ma nigihimba'mas sogogawa ufia'w anen atiasi nogaga'akwi.
43012034	Ea' esis sagwamana sa'i, “Mu'uli ape'ini naga'i na'amba na'i, Krais anen nogape lifilafi dondoli. Dei' maina ina' naga'i, ‘Anen nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi atiasi sogandolona lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ilif?’ Dembinai nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi, anen epen mamahonama?”
43012035	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Nogota ata' bandata ma nagwapin nogala' nogalomepa. Dei' ipa' a' pendafe' hauguma. Na'amba owamb botagamepa. Epen ami negafe' owambi, anin ina negawa anamba negafe'ma, owa'.
43012036	Ae' ape si'i nagwapin ipe'ini. Ipa' pindahapifa nagwapin inimba ma pegataga awasi nagwapin nogogala'i.” Jisas na'ipas ea', nakwaha esis a' nafe' nandambaho'mas.
43012037	Jisas a' nanda' maol banagani hiani, si'i God nanda'ani esis satilin. Apa' esis ina sahapifana, owa'.
43012038	Si'i basef ifimba fowa' profet Aisaia nanda'afi faga'ias dei' fataga fandawalap fa'i, “Anaf epes ami sohapila basef afa'ifi? Esis sogati banagami Godi esis mamahisa? Owa'atin.”
43012039	-
43012040	Esis ina la'ifisa sogahapifa Jisas. Dei' main, profet anamba Aisaia nanda' anif basef Godi wapani faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Anen nanda' naep asasipi apaso'as nanda' ukup asasipi paso' ma ina atiasi sotologon ea' ukup asasipi wapani ina atiasi sogawa ma sogambema nelelemba ae' enda'as bo'wes, owa'atin.”
43012041	Fowa' Aisaia nati banagami mogogala'i Jisasi ea' na'ias na'amba ma anen atona.
43012042	Amom agufumi hiami a' mahapifa Jisas. Apa' owa', amom ombal bahama amom Farisi dembami. Ea' amom ina mawalapa basef ma'ipasef alihif, owa'. Ombal bahama amom Farisi mogali'amonama ina ata' moloma esis Juda monda' lotu wapani, owa'.
43012043	Amom agufumi amamba ukup pa'i esis a'owa' ma sogasa'ma agof amamugufi atogof lu'wagof. Apa' amom ina ukup pa'i God nosa'ma agof amamugufi, owa'atin.
43012044	Ea' Jisas na'ipas dindinip na'i, “Epen nigahapifa ae'i, anin ina nahapifa ae' atowe, owa'. Anin nahapifa anen nasapa'e agafi'ii wapani.
43012045	Epen ami niti ae' anin nati anen nasapa'e agafi'ii wapani.
43012046	Ae' afi'i itap apa'e si'i anin nagwapin ama epen ami nigahapifai, anin ina a' nepe owamb, owa'atin.
43012047	Epen ami neme' basef ae'afi ma owa' nihapifif nilifa, ae' ina anaf ewaloga anin, owa'. Dei' main? Ae' ina afi'i itap apa'e ma egawaloga epes sagape itapi, owa'atin. Ae' afi'i ma iwambilas sogotanimai.
43012048	Epen ami negase'e alafuga ae'i ma anin owa' nihapifa ae'a, anaf anona dembinai jas a' nowaloga anin. Nemaf afamba akutaifi basef ifimba atif ae' aga'iefi ifimba fenda' anin a' fewawalogon.
43012049	Dei' main? Ae' ina a'i anif basefa okom ae'ami atom maga'iefi, owa'. Ahame ae'anai atona na'ipi basef ifimba dindinipa iga'ipasef. Ea' anen nasapa'e afi'i a'if si'i okom ananimi maga'iefi.
43012050	Ae' egawa basef ananifi fawalapa ambal namili ma ipa' pegape andeande' lifilafi. Na'amba basef ae' aga'ipasafi ea' ifimba atif si'i Ahame naga'ipiefi.”
43013001	Nemaf afamba lu'wafi esis Juda soga' gwa'aisi isimba Pasova owa' ata' fetagaea. Jisas nogawa nogota ananitai a' tataga ma nogakwaha itap apa'e nogafe'ma Ahamana. Ea' okom ananimi maimaila epes ananisi sagape itapi a'owa'. Na'amba dei' nihimba'masa okom ananimi lu'wami magamagaila esisi.
43013002	Ea' wambomota anen naloma alipumi mape ma' gwa'aisi isimba. Ea' Saimon nogamana Judas Keriotinai nalomam mape. Owa' aman aunai Satan a' nali' naso'ma nomonas Judasi ma nefe' nigihimba'ma boumi ma Jisas nogapoma.
43013003	Ea' Jisas nogawa Ahamana nanda' anen banagona ma hiahaom hiami. Ea' nogawa anen nape naloma God nafi'i ea' atiasi a' notanima nefe'mana wapani.
43013004	Ea' nosafel natagwaha siot lautai ananitai nowaha' anin taul.
43013005	Ea' nakolo' embel anis dis nafe' notawa nasa'opamam bo'wagah amom alipumi ananimi ea' nanda' taul alamba nogowaha'ali nopati'mamagah.
43013006	Nasa'opamagah nafe', natagama Saimon Pita. Owa' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, negesa'opame bo'wagah ae'agahi, owa'.”
43013007	Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Ina' owa' negawa maol inimba ae' dei' enda'ania. Apa' anaf dao', ina' negawan.”
43013008	Ea' Pita na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Owa'. Ina' owa'i nesa'opa bo'wagah ae'agahia, owa'.” Owa' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “I'i ae' owa' esa'opamena bo'wagah ine'igahia, ina atiasi nepe alipunai ae'inai, owa'atin.”
43013009	Ea' Saimon Pita nagwamana na'i, “Dembinai, ina negesa'opame bo'wagah atagah, owa'. Nesa'ope hi'ili lagof balaga wapani sotaga be'es.”
43013010	Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Epen ami nagasa'of ea'i, anin ina atiasi nesa'of wapani, owa'. Anin bo'wen ea'. Ipa' hipai ipa' be'epa hilili', apa' anona ipe'inai atotona ata' owa' bo'ona hilili'a.”
43013011	Dei' main? Anen a' nogawa ami atiasi nefe' niga'ipa boumi ananimi ma nigihimba'mama nogapomai. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' hipai ambe'epa hilili', apa' anona ipe'inai atotona ata' owa' bu'unaia.”
43013012	Anen nasa'opamam bo'wagah amamugahi ea', nala siot ananitai nafe' natoma felefele'ma tebol. Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pegawa maol inimba ae' anda'mepani a'a owa'?
43013013	Ipa' pefale tisa a'a Dembiwai, na'amba andeande'. Ae' ea' ma'uwi, basef ifimba endilisifi atif.
43013014	Ae' Dembiwai ipe'iwai a tisa ipe'iwai. Ae' doko' asa'opa bo'wagah ipe'igahi. Ea' ipa' wapani a' pendasa'opa bo'wagah ipe'igahi atona atin.
43013015	Ae' ea' ihimba'mepa waf afamba ae'afi. Ipa' penda'am na'amba atin si'i ae' anda'am.
43013016	Dei' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi atif. Epen inimba agol akani nanda' maol dowadowafi, anin ina nape ilifa dembinai ananinai, owa'. Ea' anona dembinai nasapa' anin nagafi'i, inimba ina nikila' dembinai anamba ananinai, owa'.
43013017	“Dei' ipa' pegawa waf afamba ea'. I'i pigi'maf andeande', dao' a pendagala.
43013018	Ae' basef ake ma ipa' hipai pefe' pewalapa basef piga'ipa boumi ma ae', owa'. Ae' egawepa andandepepa ea'. Apa' basef Godi fagail buk Baibeli atiasi fetaga endilisi ma anen nogawalapa ae' ma boumii. Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘Aman anamba noga' gwa'aisi nugalumai atiasi nigi bo'waga egimugama nofa'asa ae'.’
43013019	“Ae' dei' ape a'ipipa basef ifimba ma waf afamba ina dei' fataga, ata' owa'atin. Ama atiasi fetaga fendawalap, dao' ipa' pihapifa ae' ea' ma'uwi.
43013020	Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisi, epen ami negaso'an nembel anin epen ae' agasapa'ani, anin nase'e nembel ae'. Ea' epen ami negase'e nembel ae'i, anin naso'ana nembel Ahame ae'anai wapani nasapa'e agafi'ii.”
43013021	Jisas na'ipam basef ifimba ea', okom ananimi nimanim a'owa'. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona afa'inai atiasi nefe' nihimba'ma boumi ma ae' egapoma.”
43013022	Ea' alipumi ananimi manda' tima atin tol mape. Amom ina mogawa Jisas na'i ami.
43013023	Ae' alipuwai Jisasi, anen okom magamagailai ape felefele' ma anen.
43013024	Ea' Saimon Pita nanda' balaga na'ipi na'i, “Ina' hali'ago anen na'i ami.”
43013025	Ea' ae' indiki'ah afe' felefele'ma Jisas ahali'ana a'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i ami?”
43013026	Jisas nagwame na'i, “Ae' atiasi ila bret nemba'w egaso'anotai, aman anamba ea' ma'una anen.” Ea' nala bret nemba'w naso' Judas Keriotinai Saimon nogamana.
43013027	Ea' ata' nahapila bret atin, owa' aman aunai Satan a' nawisana nembel ananimbili nomon. Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Maol ina' na'i nenda'ani da'an kwafalis.”
43013028	Apa' afa' alipufai Jisasi wape waga' gwa'aisii, afa' ina ogawa basef Jisasi kofagefa, owa'.
43013029	Judas nugumafi otamba afa'imbai. Na'amba anom alipumi Jisasi ukup pandanda' pa'i Jisas na'ipana ma nefe' nogotala anis gwa'aisi ma nonda' gwa'aisi isimba a'a na'ipana na'i noso'asa anemba otamba isimba kwahusi.
43013030	Ea' Judas ata' nahapila bret atin, nafe' nawis ando' kwafalis. Ea' owamb akot atowafai.
43013031	Ea' Judas ata' nafe' atin nagawis ando'i, Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Dei' esis asosa'ma agol ae'agili ataga epen egefa' alop epesi lu'wagol. Ea' sosa'ma agol Ahame Godi ma maol ae' anda'ani wapani.
43013032	Isimba atis Ahame God wapani nosa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagol dei' atefa maol anen nanda'ani.
43013033	Ipa' sa'upai, ae' elomepa ope nogota bandata a' efe'. Ipa' atiasi pewando'me apa' ina atiasi petolowe, owa'. Anamba ae' egafe'ma, ipa' ina la'ifipama atiasi pegafe'agono, owa. Basef ifimba atif fowa' aga'ipa amom Judafi, dei' a'ipipaef wapani.
43013034	Dei' ase'epa mu'uli ae'ani dambaini ma ipa' ukup pindaima atin si'i okom ae'ami magamagaila ipa'. Ea' na'amba atin, ukup ipe'ipi pindaima atin.
43013035	I'i ukup ipe'ipi pindaima atin, atiasi epes hiasi sogawa ipa' alipipai ae'ipai.”
43013036	Ea' Saimon Pita nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' a' nefe' ani?” Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Anamba dei' ae' egafe'ma, ina atiasi nigi'mi nefe'agono, owa'. Apa' anaf owagama dao', ina' a' nigi'mi nefo'o.”
43013037	Ea' Pita nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, dei' maina ae' ina la'ifiwi ma dei' igagi'mina? Ae' a'i aho'ma ega' egalomena.”
43013038	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' na'i aho' endilisi ma nega' negaloma ae' a'amon? Ae' a'ipina endilisi, atiasi owamb amba'e awata owa' ata' totaea, ina' a' nendahali'mi ni'ias wanif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisasa.’”
43014001	Jisas na'ipafa na'i, “Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi ina besafel nimanilimb a'owa', owa'i. Ipa' pindahapifa God, pihapifa ae' wapani.
43014002	Ipat Ahame ae'anai alihinai satopa' ilalef hielifi fape fandandapa. I'i owa'ai, fowa' ae' i'ipipa. Apa' owa', endilisi atis ae' a' efe' endondomba wambel ipe'imbili.
43014003	Ae' i'i efe'ma egandomba wambel ipe'imbilima owagama itanimai efa'epa pefe' pepe pelome. Ea' anamba ae' egapoma, ipa' wapani pepe anamba atogon pelome.
43014004	Ea' ipa' a' pegawa ufia'w ae' igafe'akwi ma wambel ambalemba.”
43014005	Tomas nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, afa' owa' ogawaia ina' nefe' ani? Afa' ina ogawa ufia'w akwamba ina' na'i negafe'akwi.”
43014006	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ae' atowe ufia'w kofagewe ma basef endilisifi feloma ambal namili. Owa' anin epen la'ifina nefe' negatagama Ahame ano'w ufia'wa, owa'atin. Ea' ae' atowe.
43014007	I'i ipa' pegawa ae', Pegawa Ahame ae'anai wapani. Ea' dei' apatolona. Dei' atef ipa' patolona pegawana.”
43014008	Filip na'ipana nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' himba'mafa Ahamena ine'inai afa' ma isimba ea' sondahama afa'.”
43014009	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Filip, nogota ea' lautai ape agalomepa, ina' owa' ata' negawa ea'? Epen ami nagati ae' ea'i, anin a' nati Ahame ae'anai wapani. Dei' maina ina' ata' naga'i, ae' igihimba'mepa Ahame ipa'?’
43014010	Ina' nahapifa ae' ma negawa ae' aloma Ahame afa' atotofa, ae' ape anen, anen nape ae', a'a owa'? Basef ae' agasi'ipafi, ifimba ae' ina anda'ef okom ae'ami atom, owa'. Ahame nape ae' ea' anen atona nanda' maol ananini hiani.
43014011	Ipa' pindahapifa basef ifimba. Ae' ape Ahame, Ahame nape ae'. I'i owa'ma, ipa' ukup pendapoma maol banagani hiani anda'ani. Ipa' piti maol inimba, pindahapifi.
43014012	“Basef endilisifi atif dei' a'ipipa. Epen ami nigahapifa ae'i, maol hiani dei' anda'ani, anin wapani atiasi nenda'an. Ama anaf nenda' maol lu'wani a'owa' nikila' maol ae'ani. Dei' main? Ae' efe'ma Ahame.
43014013	Hiahawes hiasi ipa' pendabeten pigahali'anasa agol ae'agilii, atiasi ae' inda'asi. Ama Ahame a nogofa' agol lu'wagilima maol ae' Nogamana ananiwai atiasi inda'ani.
43014014	Hiahawes ipa' pigahali' ae'masi ma agol ae'agili, pihapifi endilisi, dao' atiasi inda'asi.
43014015	“I'i ipa' ukup pi'i ae' endilisi, dao' ipa' pindagi'ma mu'uli ae'ani andeande'.
43014016	Ama atiasi ihali' Ahame, ma nogasi'ipai anona notopalopepa nogowa' banagaipai. Anen nope nogaloma ipa' lifilafi dondoli.
43014017	Anamba Ambal bu'unai Godi naga'i basef endilisifii. Esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi ina atiasi sotolona sogawana sofa'ana, owa'. Apa' ipa' pegawana ea' nape nalomepa, ea' atiasi a' nuwis nope nomon opalef ipe'ilimbi.
43014018	Ae' ina a' ikwahipa tol pepe dowaf, si'i awasi isimba alifisi ahasas mamasas akasi, owa'atin. Atiasi ae' igafi'mipai.
43014019	Nogota kwaia'uta esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafii ina atiasi sotolowe wapani, owa'. Apa' ipa' pigatolowai. Ae' ape namowe ambal namili, ea' na'amba atin ipa' pepe namipa ambal namili wapani.
43014020	Ama nemaf afamba ipa' apegawa ae' ape Ahame, ape nomona ipa', ipa' pape ae'.
43014021	Epen ami negefa' mu'uli ae'ani nigi'mana nigailan andeande'i, anin a' okom maimaila ae' endilisi. Atiasi Ahame ae'anai okom mila anin. Ea' ae' wapani okom mimilan anin ea' etaga endawalapa anin alihiwi.”
43014022	Jisas na'ias na'amba, ea' anona Judas ina anamba Keriotinai, owa', anona daiana, na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, dei' maina ina' na'i nigihimba'mafa ina' netaga nendawalap alihinama afa', ina' owa' nihimba'masa ina' alihinama esis sagaila waf itapafia?”
43014023	Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i epen okom muga'i ae' endilisii, anin atiasi nila basef ae'afi andeande'. Ea' Ahame ae'anai atiasi okom mimila anin. Ea' afa' biafa ufi'mai anin ope oloman lifilafi.
43014024	Epen nandaiwa'ma ae' endilisii, anin ina atiasi nila basef ae'afi andeande', owa'. Ea' basef ifimba ipa' pagame'afi, ifimba ina ae'afi, owa'. Ifimba basef Ahame Godi nasapa'e agafi'ii.
43014025	Ae' ata' ape atapiwi alomepa a'ipipa basef ifimba.
43014026	Apa' anen notopalopepa ma nogowa' banagaipai, anen Ambal bu'unai Godi. Anamba Ahame atiasi nosapa'ana nugafi'i agol ae'agili. Ea' nowalipipa ma hiahawes hiasi, nosa'ma nomonas ipe'isi ma ukup pegapoma basef hiafi wapani agasi'ipafi.
43014027	Ae' a'i ikwahipa. Apa' ae' ina enda'epa ombal behepa ukup iwaiwanip pepe si'i amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi sanda'as, owa'. Ae' a' enda'epa pepe ukup awanep endilisi ma ukup ipe'ipi ina atiasi pesafel awep, owa'. Ea' ina ombal mehepa, owa'.
43014028	Ipa' pame'ef ea' basef ifimba agasi'ipafi. Ae' ikwahipa efe'. Bola itanimaimipai. I'i ipa' ukup pila ae' endilisi, ea' ipa' asonendahepa ma ae' egafe'ma Ahame. Dei' main? Ahame anen dembinai nikila' ae'.
43014029	Hiahawes isimba ina dei' asataga, ata' owa'. Apa' ae' ali' a'ipipas ea' ma nemaf afamba hiahawes isimba sogatagama ipa' pegawas pigahapifa ae'.
43014030	Ae' ina atiasi enda' basef hiafi elomepa, a'owa'. Dei' main? Aman dembinai aunai nugumafi itap apa'ii anamba dei' a' nafi'i. Anen ina atiasi la'ifinama nonda'me anis maefah, owa'atin.
43014031	Apa' ae' a'i esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi sondogawa ae' okom maimaila Ahame endilisi ea' dei' anda'as na'amba atin si'i anen nanda'ipi. Na'amba dei' afa' a' ofe'.
43015001	“Ae' si'i lawag si'iga endilisi. Ahame ae'anai anen si'i ahama aof afamba sagawa lawah sa'utip gwa'aipi pagailagahi.
43015002	Agof hiagufi sa'utip owa' pigailagufia, agwafomba Ahame natopa'agof nelefatagof. Apa' anagof agof fail fogola gwa'aisii agwafomba anen nandombagof natopa'agof nahagasogof ama atiasi fogape bo'ogof fil fogola gwa'aisi hiasi andeande'.
43015003	Basef ifimba ae' agasi'ipafi fanda'epa pataga be'epa hilili' ea'.
43015004	Ipa' pendape ae' si'i ae' agape ipa'. I'i agof atogof wafiguf, ina atiasi sa'utip pilagof, owa'. I'i agof owa' fondala sisihiguf lawag si'igaea, afof ina atiasi folo andeande', fil fola gwa'aisi, owa'. Ea' na'amba atin si'i ipa'. I'i ipa' owa' pepe peloma ae'a, ipa' wapani ina atiasi pela anis gwa'aisi, owa'atin.
43015005	Ae' si'i lawag si'iga. Ipa' si'i agofugama. Epen negape ae'i ma ae' egape anini, atiasi negela gwa'aisi hiasii. I'i ipa' pekwaha ae', ipa' atipa ina atiasi penda' anis maefah, owa'atin.
43015006	“I'i anin epen owa' nepe ae'a, atiasi esis sili'amonan si'i sagatopa' agof namugufi ma aliguf. Ama satamagof sowa'aniagof a sogaofagof nif.
43015007	I'i ipa' pepe ae' ma basef ae'afi fepe nomona ipa', ipa' pihali' ae' ma basef maif pendahama ukup ipe'ipi paga'ias, dao' atiasi hiahawes isimba sotagamepa na'amba atin.
43015008	I'i ipa' pela gwa'aisi hiasi, Ahame ae'anai nofa' agol lu'wagili. Ama atiasi pegataga alipipai ae'ipai.
43015009	Ahame okom maimaila ae', ea' na'amba atin ae' okom maimailipa. Dondol ipa' pendape okom ae'ami la'afima ma pegegawa okom ae'ami pelele' mailipa a'owa'.
43015010	I'i ipa' pila mu'uli ae'ani andeande', atiasi apepe okom ae'ami la'afima nomon si'i ae' agaila mu'uli ahamai andeande'ma agape okom ananimi la'afima nomon.
43015011	Ae' a'ipipa basef ifimba ma a'i dagala ae'ani inimba nepe nelomepa ae' dagala ipe'ini a' nepe si'ina nelelemb ipe'ilimbi.
43015012	Mu'uli ae'ani inimba. Ipa' ukup pindaima atina sahin owan ipe'isi endilisi si'i ae' okom magamagailipa.
43015013	I'i anin epen nekwaha ambal ananili atol nega' netopalopa esis alipisi atis, waf afambai afikila' waf afamba anin epen daian nanda'afi.
43015014	Ipa' pila mu'uli aga'ipipani andeande', dao' ipa' alipipai ae'ipai.
43015015	Epen agol akani dembinai ananinai ina na'ipan basef alihifa maol anen nanda'ani, owa'atin. Apa' ae' a'ipipa basef hiafi Ahame ae'anai naga'ipiefi. Na'amba dei' ae' ina efalepa epes falafipai agof akipai, owa'. Ae' efalepa alipipai.
43015016	Ipa' ina pali' pandandepa ae' ipe'iwai, owa'. Ae' ali' andandepepa ea' ae'ipai. Ea' anda'epa panda' maol bu'wani. Ama pefe' penda' maol bu'wani si'i lawah hogola gwa'aisi ma maol bu'wani ipe'ini negape andeande'. Ama i'i ipa' pendabeten pihali' Ahame ma anis hiahawesa agol ae'igili, anen nogasi'ipasi.
43015017	Ae' ase'epa mu'uli ipa' na'amba. Ipa' ukup pindandaima atin endilisi ma sahin owan ipe'isi.
43015018	“I'i esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi si'i sofala ipa' boupai dao', ipa' pendegawa esis fowa' sali' sofala ae' bouwai.
43015019	I'i a' endilisi ipa' epes itapipaiai, esis sagaila waf itapafi a' ukup pipilipa si'i ipa' mini'ap asasipai atipa. Apa' owa', ipa' ina epes itap apa'ipai, owa'atin. Ae' esahe'epa ea' ma pegakwaha waf itapafi. Ea' dei' esis sagaila waf itapafi sofalepa boupai.
43015020	“Ipa' ukup pendapoma basef ifimba ae' agasi'ipafi andeande'. Epen inimba agol akani nanda' maol dowadowafi, anin ina nape ilifa dembinai ananinai, owa'. Ae' ea' sali' sanda'me waf awafi, ea' atiasi esis sonda'mepa waf awafi, sonda'epa awepa wapani. Esis i'i sigi'ma basef ae'afiai, dao' atiasi esis sigi'ma basef ipe'ifi wapani. Owa', owa'atin.
43015021	Esis ina sogawa Ahame nasapa'e agafi'ii, owa'. Ipa' ukup pagapoma agol ae'agili, ea' ae'ipai. Ea' esis sagaila waf esis itapafi asonda' hiahaom awami hiami ma ipa'.
43015022	I'i endilisi ae' owa' ifi'i i'ipasa basef ifimba ai, esis waf awafi akas. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Dei' esis owa' ano'w ufia'wa sogombaho' waf awafi asasifia, owa'atin.
43015023	Epen negefala ae' bouwai, anin nefala Ahame ae'anai bounai wapani.
43015024	Esis sagaila waf itapafi ina sati anona aman nanda' maol nandahama maol ae' anda'ani, owa'. I'i endilisi ae' owa' enda' maol inimbaea, esis waf awafi akas. Apa' dei' sati maol banagani ae'ani ea', owa', asowa' alafugaha ae' ukup awepa ae' aloma Ahame ae'anai wapani.
43015025	Apa' waf afamba asasifi afamba ea' fafe' dondo'ma anif basef ifimba fagail mu'uli esis Judai fa'i, ‘Esis ukup awepa ae' dowadowaf. Ae' basef kofagefa ake.’
43015026	“Apa' anen natopalopepa nogowa' banagaipai, anen napani naloma Ahame. Ea' ae' esapa'ana nifi'mai ipa'. Anen Ambal bu'unai nawalapa basef naga'i endilisii. Anamba nafi'i ma nogawalapa basefa ae'.
43015027	Ea' ipa' wapani atiasi pi'i basef pewalapefa esis. Dei' main, ipa' fowa' dambadamba pati asefela maol anda'an paloma pape atapipa pafi'i pataga dei'.”
43016001	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapani na'i, “Ae' dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba hi'alef ea' ma ipa' ina pekwaha pagahapifa ae', owa'i.
43016002	Atiasi esis sili'amonipai ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi. Anef nemaf atiasi fegataga ma epes ami sehepa pegaga', esis atiasi ukup pendanda' si'i sanda' maol fasini Godi. Apa' owa'atin.
43016003	Fowa' esis ina sogawa Ahame naloma ae' wapani, owa. Na'amba esis atiasi sonda' waf afambai.
43016004	Apa' dei' a'ipipa ea' ma hiahawes isimba. Ama nogota atiasi togataga ma esis sonda'epa na'amba, ipa' ukup pendanda'ma basef ifimba dei' aga'ipipafi.
43016005	“Fowa' ae' ape agalomepa ae' ina a'ipipa ma hiahawes isimba, owa'. Apa' dei' ea' efe'ma anen anamba nasapa'e agafi'ii. Ina anona aman ipe'inai nahali'i na'i, ‘Ina' nefe' ani?’ Owa'atin.
43016006	Ae' anda' basef ifimba ea' ma ipa'. Ea' dei' nelelemb ipe'ilimbi nimanilimb a'owa'.
43016007	Apa' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi. Ae' ekwahipa efe' ma etopalopepa pegape andeande'. I'i ae' owa' ma igafe'ai, dei' Spirit Ambal Godi Nogowa' banagaipai, ina atiasi nifi'mai ipa', owa'atin. Apa' i'i ae' egafe', dao', atiasi esapa'ana nifi'mai ipa'.
43016008	Nemaf afamba nugafi'i, a' nihimba'ma esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi ma sogogawa basef kofagefa ma waf wanifif afamba. Waf awafi feloma waf usi'ifi feloma basefa God nondakotimas.
43016009	Waf awafi kofagefa asasifi na'amba. Esis ina sohapifa ae', owa'atin.
43016010	Waf kofagefa usi'ifi na'amba. Ae' efe'ma Ahame ea' atiasi ipa' ina petolowe wapani, owa'.
43016011	Basef kofagefa ma kot ifimba. Aman dembinai aunai ma epes sagape itap apa'i, anen ea' gasopana ma kot atamba ma basef lu'wafi God dei' nanda'manatai.
43016012	Ae' basef hiafi a'owa' ma a'i iga'ipipafi, apa' ipa' ina la'ifipama pegefa'ef dei', owa'.
43016013	Nemaf afamba Spirit Ambal Godi naga'i basef endilisifii nugafi'i, a' nisindi'amonepa ma basef hiafi endilisifi. Anen ina a' nowalapa basef nomonas ananisi atis, owa'atin. Basef nagame'ef ea'i, ifimba atif nowalapef ni'if. Ama atiasi noga'ipipa hiahaom amamba ma'i anaf migi' mogatagai.
43016014	Ea' nofa' basef ae'afi nowalapefa ipa' ma nogowalapa agol ae'agili.
43016015	Hiahaom hiami, amamba ae'ami. Ea' dei' ae' a'ias a'i. Atiasi nofa' basef ae'afi ni'if nowalapefa ipa'.
43016016	“Nogota kwaia'uta ipa' ina atiasi petolowe wapani, owa'. Ama nogota bandata kwasakwasala owa', ipa' apetelowe wapani.”
43016017	Anom alipumi ananimi, amom atom manda'ipama ma'i na'amba ma'i, “Basef maif kofagefa ifimba anen naga'ipafaef afa'i? Anen na'i, nogota kwaia'uta, afa' ina atiasi otolona, ma main owa', a' otolona wapani. Na'i nogafe'ma ahamana. Afa' ina ogawa basef ifimba kofagefa, owa'.”
43016018	Ea' amom ma'ias wapani ma'i, “Nogota atamba kwaia'uta anen naga'iatai, isimba hiahawes mais? Afa' ina ogawa basef ifimba naga'if na'ambai, owa'.”
43016019	Owa' Jisas a' nogawa amom ma'i mogahali'ana, ea' na'ipam na'i, “A'i ipa' pandahali'ma basef ifimba kofagefa ae' aga'iefi. Ae' aga'if na'amba. Nogota kwaia'uta atiasi ipa' ina petolowe, owa'. Ama owa' nogota laota kwasakwasala, owa' a petolowe wapani.
43016020	Endilisi atis ae' a'ipipa. Ipa' atiasi pelef mehip a'owa' ea' pelef pindiwagef endilisi. Apa' esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi atiasi sondagala. Apa' ipa' a' nelelemb nimanilimb. Owa', owa'atin. Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi nimanilimbi atiasi bendambema betaga pendagala endilisi.
43016021	Nemata'w opafu'wi ma kwa'i kogola awanii ako'w kwame' akafimi kogawa nogota akwa'uta ma kogola awani atataga. Na'amba opaf akwa'ufi a' nimanif. Ako'w kolana ea', ako'w ina ata' okom mandanda'ma akafimi amamba wapani, owa'atin. Ako'w ea' kwandagala atin kwapoma awani nataga nape itap ea'.
43016022	Ipa' na'amba atin, dei' ipa' nelelemb nimanilimb. Atiasi ae' itilipa wapani, owa' nelelemb ipe'ilimbi asonohalemb. Ina anin epen la'ifina negalamona dagala inimba ipe'ini, owa'atin.
43016023	Atiasi nemaf afamba ipa' ina pihali'i ma anin mae atitin, owa'. Apa' dei' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisifi ipa'. I'i ipa' pihali' Ahame ma maefah maisa agol ae'agili dao', atiasi nese'epas.
43016024	Fowa' ipa' ina pahali'i ma pegefa' anis maefaha agol ae'agili, owa'. Dei' pihali'imas, atiasi pegefa'asi ma nelelemb ipe'ilimbi asonogahepa endilisi.
43016025	“Ae' dei' anda' basef ifimba waminif atina ipa'. Apa' ae' ina atiasi ata' i'ipipa basef waminif atin, owa'. Nemaf afamba ae' ewalapef alihif i'ipipaef ipa' ma Ahame.
43016026	Ama nemaf afamba atiasi ipa' pihali' Ahame ma agol ae'agili. Ae' ina ata' i'ipipa na'amba i'i ae' atowe atiasi ihali'ana ma nogatopalopepa, owa'atin.
43016027	Ahame atona okom maimailipa a'owa'. Dei' main, ipa' ukup paipaila ae' a'owa', ea' ipa' pahapifi pegawa ae' ape aloma God afi'i.
43016028	Fowa' ae' ape aloma Ahame ea' akwahona afi'i itap apa'e ea'. Dei' ae' a'i ekwaha itap a' itanima efe'ma anen.”
43016029	Alipumi ananimi ma'i, “Aho', dei' ina' na'ipafas alihis, ina ata' na'i basef waminif atin, owa'.
43016030	Dei' afa' ogawa ina ata' nape nasasa anin epen nihali'ina nili', owa'atin. Ina' negawa hiahaom hiami ea'. Isimba atis dei' afa' wahapifa ina' nape naloma God nafi'i.”
43016031	Jisas nagwamam basef na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' dei' pahapifa ae' a'amon?
43016032	Ipa' peme'. Dei' nogota ea' felefele', aho' atataga ea' ma atiasi sotofa ipa' hipai atona biana pefe' walemb ipe'ilimbi. Ea' pekwaha ae' atowe epe. Apa' ina ae' atowe epe, owa'atin. Ahame nape nalome.
43016033	Ae' a'i atiasi ipa' pepe pelome nelelemb pepe sa'ombel. Ea' dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba. Itap apa'e ipa' atiasi peme' nelelemb nimanilimb. Apa' nelelemb ipe'ilimbi atiasi ambetaga banagelemb. Dei' main, ae' atalogofa waf itapafi a ikila'af ea'.”
43017001	Jisas na'i basef na'amba ma ea', a' naniga nati heven nandabeten na'i, “Ahame, nogota atataga ea'. Ina' nese'e agol lu'wagili ae' Nogamena ine'iwai, ma atiasi la'ifiwi ma egasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol.
43017002	Dei' main? Ina' nesahe'e ea' ma epe Dembiwai ili'ma epes hi'igalas egaso'as ambal namili epes isimba hiasi ina' nagasi'iesi. Ambal alamba sogape andeande' lifilafi dondoli.
43017003	Ambal lagape andeande' lifilafii kofagefa ifimba. Esis sogawa ina' atina God endilisinai, sogawa endilisi ae' Jisas Krais, ina' nasapa'e agafi'ii.
43017004	“Maol inimba ina' nasapa'e afi'i ma enda'ani, ae' anda'an ambifan ea'. Ea' dei' asa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagola nogohnaep esis amam nematawa itapasi.
43017005	Ahame, fowa' itap owa' ata' pitagaia ae' ape alomena efa' agol lu'wagili ea'. Dei' nendase'e agol agalemba lu'wagili si'i fowa'.
43017006	Ae' awalapa agol ine'igili ea' a'ipa esis epes isimba ina' nagase'eas ae'i ma itap apa'e. Isimba epes ine'isi nagase'eas ae' ea'i. Esis saila basef ine'ifi andeande'.
43017007	Dei' asogawa hiahaom hiami ina' nagase'eam ae' ea'i, amamba mafi'i ina' atina.
43017008	Basef hiafi ina' nagase'ef ea'i, ifimba ae' a'ipasef ea', sofa'efa sogogawa endilisi fowa' ae' ape alomena afi'i. Ea' sahapila basef ifimba ina' nasapa'e agafi'ii.
43017009	“Dei' ae' andabetena egatopalopa isimba. Ae' ina andabetena egatopalopa esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi, owa'. Ae' anda' betena egatopalopa isimba ina' nagase'eas ae'i. Dei' main? Isimba esis ine'isi si'isi.
43017010	Ea' epes ae'asi, isimba ine'isi. Epes hiasi ine'isi hi'ilas isimba ae'asi. Ea' esis sasa'ma agol ae'agili.
43017011	Dei' ae' ina ata' epe itap apa'e wapani, owa'. Apa' esis sope itap apa'e. Ae' ea' efe'mago ina'. Ahame be'ena hilili'i, ina' nimafi esisa atiasi sogape banagesa banagami ine'imi, banagami amamba ina' ea' nagase'eam ae'i. Ma esis sogape wambota atotota si'i afa' biafa wagape atotofa.
43017012	Nogota atamba ae' ape agaloma esis, ae' imafias sape banagami ine'imi, banagami amamba ina' ea' nagase'eam ae'i. Ae' imafias andeande' ea' ina anin atitin higilalan, owa'. Aman higiligalanai, ea' anen atona atiasi nogafe' wambel awambili, ma basef ine'ifi fagail buk Baibeli fetaga endilisi fendawalap.
43017013	Ae' dei' ata' ape itap apa'e a'i basef ifimba ma dagala ae'ani negape si'ina nelelemb asasilimbi. Ea' dei' a' efe'mago ina'.
43017014	“Basef ine'ifi, ae' aso'asef ea'. Esis amam nematawa asofala esis bousi sanda'as awes. Dei' main? Esis ina sagi'ma waf itap apa'ifi si'i ae' wapani ina itap apa'iwai, owa'.
43017015	Ae' ina andabeten ahali'ina ma negelefata esis itap apa'e, owa'atin. Ae' andabetena ina' nigimafiasa aman aunai ina nohambombagas, owa'atin.
43017016	Esis ina sagi'ma waf itap apa'ifi si'i ae' wapani ina itap apa'iwai, owa'.
43017017	Basef ine'ifi ifimba endilisifi. Ina' nenda' esis sondataga ine'isi atis bo'wes hilili'ma basef ifimba.
43017018	Fowa' ina' nasapa'e afi'i ape la'afena esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi. Dei' na'amba atin ae' wapani ea' asapa' esis ae'asi sofe' la'afena esis isimba itapasi.
43017019	Ae' ase'ena ae' ina' ea' ine'iwai atowe ma etopalopa esis wapani sogataga bo'wes hilili' ine'isi atis.
43017020	“Apa' ae' ina andabetena egatopalopa esis isimba atis, owa'atin. Ae' andabetena egatopalopa epes isimba anaf sogame' basefa esisi ma sogahapifa ae'i.
43017021	Ahame, ae' andabetena esis isimba hiasi asondape ukup atifip si'i ina' Ahame nape nagalome a ae' ape agalomena. Ea' na'amba atin, anda' betena esis sogape afa' biafa. Ama amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi sogahapifa ina' atina a' nasapa'e agafi'ii.
43017022	Fowa' ina' nasa'ma agol ae'agili lu'wagol ea' dei' asa'ma agof asasigufi lu'wagofa sogape nembel atotombel si'i afa' biafa wagape.
43017023	Ina' nape nalome a ae' anaf epe eloma esis, ae', ea' na'amba atin ae' okom ma'i esis asondataga nembel atotombel endilisi. Ama esis amam nematawa itapasi sogogawa ina' nasapa'e afi'i, ea' ina' okom maimailas a'owa' si'i okom magamagaila ae' a'owa'.
43017024	“Ahame, ae' okom ma'i esis amam nematawa ina' nagase'eas ae'i sope solome wambel ambalemba. Ae' okom ma'i esis siti hiahaom banagami fasimi mogogala'i ae'ami, mogogala'i amamba ina' nagase'eam ae'i. Fowa' itap ata' owa' petagaea, nogota atamba ina' okom maila ae'. Ea' nase'e mogogala'i amamba.
43017025	Ahame usi'inai hilili'i, esis amam nematawa sagaila waf itapafi ina sogawa ina'. Apa' ae' egawena. Ea' esis isimba alipisi sogawa ina' nasapa'e afi'i.
43017026	Ae' a' awalapa agol ine'igili ma esis. Ea' ae' atiasi endawalapagol atin atapigil. Ama esis sogofa' waf afamba ukup pindaima atinafi ma anis daindaias wapani si'i ina' okom magamagaila ae' ma ae' egape nomona esis.”
43018001	Jisas nandabeten nahali' Ahamana ea', naloma alipumi ananimi a' mafe' mowala mambo walemb Kidron fisanamb lawah oliv hogotaoma. Nao'wam mafe' anamba.
43018002	Anen Judas a' nogawa anamba ma atiasi nefe' nigihimba'ma boumi ma Jisas. Dei' main? Nimaguf hiafi dondol Jisas nao'wam mandakolas magapoma anamba.
43018003	Ea' Judas nafi'i nao'wa anom soldia maloma anom plisman amom pris maloma amom Farisi masapa'am magafi'i. Amom mahapila bagah nagwahis lambeh maloma hiahaom sagapa'ami mofa'am atin mafi'i anamba.
43018004	Ea' Jisas nogawa hiahaom hiami atiasi mogatagamanai. Ea' nafe' nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' pewando'ma ami?”
43018005	Ea' magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai.” Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' ma'uwi.” Owa' Judas na'i nigihimba'mam Jisasi, anen nalutu nalomam wapani.
43018006	Jisas ata' na'ipam atin na'i, “Ae' ma'uwi.” Owa' a' mandahagas mowa motawa itap.
43018007	Ea' Jisas nahali'am wapani na'i, “Ipa' pewando'ma ami?” Ea' ma'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai.”
