43018008	Jisas na'i, “Doko' ae' a'ipipa a'i ae' ea' ma'uwi. I'i ipa' pewando'ma ae', pihapili pekwahogo amom amamba mofo'o wahifim.”
43018009	Jisas dei' na'ipam na'amba nagi'ma basef ifimba fowa' naga'iefi ma fegataga endilisi. Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Amam amamba fowa' ina' nagase'eami, ina anona atotona higililana, owa'.”
43018010	Ea' Saimon Pita nahapila anota bainat nagiatai naha anona aman Malkas nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii. Ea' natopa' aliga kwahisigai ananigai gowa.
43018011	Ea' Jisas na'ipa Pita dindinip na'i, “Ina' tanima la bainat nowala let. Ae' a' ia' embela kap Ahame nagasi'iapi.”
43018012	Ea' amom soldia maloma dembinai amamunai maloma amom plisman Judai hiami mombalo' Jisas manda' mandof mowa' lagofana.
43018013	Ea' mao'wana nali' nafe' ma Anas, Kaiafas fafomana. Afagol agalemba, Kaiafas dembinai pris nape nagali'ma pris hiamii.
43018014	Kaiafas nali' naga'ipa amom agufumi Juda naga'i, “I'i anona aman noga' ma apa' Juda hiapai, waf afambai andeande', waf bu'wafi.”
43018015	Ea' Saimon Pita naloma ae' alipuwai Jisasi wagi'ma Jisas wafi'i. Pris anamba dembinai nogawa ae'. Ea' awis aloma Jisas ipat nomon.
43018016	Apa' Pita tol nalutu uta indalelemb ando'. Ae' itanima awisi ando' a'ipa ano'w nemata'w kugumafi utai ea' ao'wa Pita wawis nomon.
43018017	Ea' nemata'w kugumafi utai kwa'ipa Pita kwa'i, “Ina' wapani alipunai aman anambai, a'a owa'?” Owa' anen nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Ae' owa'.”
43018018	Amom manda' maola pris anamba dembinai maloma anom plisman amom hiami nomanamb bam makata nif a' malutumif fahi'am. Ea' Pita wapani nalomam nalutumif.
43018019	Ea' pris anamba dembinai nahali' Jisas ipat nomon. Nahali'ana ma alipumi ananimi maloma basef anen nagawalipasafi.
43018020	Owa' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Ae' awalipasa basef ae'afi alihigima ma epes hiasi itapasi. Ae' awalipas nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi nimaguf hiafi dondol. Ea' awalipas ipat lu'unai Godi wapani, ipat anamba esis Juda hiasi sandakolasanai. Basef ae' aga'iefi ina fandambaho', owa'atin.
43018021	Dei' maina ina' nagahali' ae'? Dei' nigahali' esis sagame' basef agawalipasafi. Esis sogawef.”
43018022	Jisas na'i basef ifimba atin, owa' anona plisman nalutu felefele' naha amaga lagol ananigili na'ipa Jisas dindinip na'i, “Ina' owa'i negwamana basef ifimba dembinai prisa.”
43018023	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anif basef awafi, dao' ina' ni'ipa amom hiami na'amba. Apa' owa'atin. Ae' iga'i basef endilisifi, dei' nahe ma main?”
43018024	Mandelef ata' fapomana atin lagof Jisasi, ea' Anas nasapa'ana nafe'ma pris anamba dembinai Kaiafas.
43018025	Saimon Pita tol nalutuma nif fahi'ana, ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “A'i ina' alipunai ananinai?” Owa' anen na'i, “Ahae', ae' owa'.”
43018026	Ea' anona aman nape felefele'ma Pita. Anen nanda' maola pris anamba dembinai. Anen amom atom wambota atota aman anamba doko' Pita nahana nagatalisa nagakwalisa aliganai. Ea' na'ipa Pita na'i, “Endilisi atis, ae' ati ina' nape nagaloma Jisasi ganimba lawah oliv hogatawama.”
43018027	Ea' Pita nandahali' na'i wapani na'i, “Ae' owa'.” Anen ata' na'i atin, owa', awata atata.
43018028	Ama kuhimbita atota amom matagwaha Jisas makwaha ipat Kaiafasi, mofa'ana mafe' ipat gavman dembinai. Ea' amom Juda ina mafe' mawis ipat atamba, owa'. Amom ma'i, “Na'amba a' mofa' alogw awagwi ea' ina atiasi mea' gwa'aisi lu'wasi Pasova, owa'atin.”
43018029	Amom ukup pandanda' na'amba ea' tol malutu ando' Pailat nafi'mai amom na'i, “Ipa' pa'i penda'mana kot aman anamba ma main?”
43018030	Amom magwamana basef ma'i, “I'i aman anamba owa' nonda' waf awafia, apa' ina a' mofa'ana nifi'mai ina'.”
43018031	Ea' Pailat na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' atipa pefa'ana penda' kotimana nondahama mu'uli ipe'ini atin. Apa' ae' owa', andaiwa'.” Ea' amom Juda magwamana ma'i, “Mu'uli ipa' Romi na'i owa'i ma mogaha anin epen negaga', owa'atin endilisi.”
43018032	Hiahawes isimba amom Juda manda'asi ina sataga dowaf, owa'atin. Isimba sataga sagi'ma basef ifimba Jisas nali' naga'iefi afegataga endilisi. Dei' main? Anen nali' na'i, “Atiasi esis sehe ega' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.”
43018033	Ea' gavman dembinai Pailat netanima nawis ipat lu'utai gavmani nomon. Ea' nofala Jisas nafi'i nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' king dembinai esis Judai?”
43018034	Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Basef ifimba fataga okom ine'imi atom a'a anis daias sa'ipinaefa ae'?”
43018035	Ea' Pailat nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' okom ma'i ae' wapani ae' Judaiwai? Owa'atin. Epes ine'isi saloma amom pris dembami, esis atis sombalo'ena sowa'ena nafi'mai ae'. Ina' nanda' waf maif?”
43018036	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' ina Judaiwai king igimafi epes itapasi, owa'atin. I'i ae' epe dembiwai king itap apa'iai, alipumi ae'ami manda' maola ae'i motopalope mopa' ma Juda ina la'ifisa sogombale'e. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
43018037	Ea' Pailat na'i, “Na'amba ina' anina king dembinai.” Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ina' na'i ae' anawe dembiwai king. Basef ifimba endilisifi. Ma'me kolae ma egape king dembiwai. Ae' afi'i itap apa'e ma igawalipasa basef endilisifi. Epen ami nenda' waf endilisifi, inimba negame' basef ae'afii.”
43018038	Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Basef ifimba endilisifi, basef maif?” Pailat na'ias na'amba ea' notanima nawis ando' esis Juda sagapoma na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ina ati anis maefah awasi ma anen, owa'. Ina ati anef waf awafi ma enda'mana anif basef, owa'.
43018039	Apa' waf ipa' Juda, ma panda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi Pasova, ae' akwaha anin epen nanda' kalabusi nafe'mago ipa'. Dei' ipa' pa'i ae' ekwaha king dembinai ipa' Judai nefe'mago ipa', a'a ami?”
43018040	Ea' esis sagwamana basef dindinip sa'i, “Owa'atin, anen owa'. Ina' nekwaha Barabas nifi'mai apa'.” Aman anamba Barabas anen nanda' walii naha epes sagaga'i.
43019001	Ea' gavman dembinai Pailat nao'wa Jisas nafe' na'ipa amom soldia mopagahona.
43019002	-
43019003	Mapagahona ma ea', mala'watefa anof mandof higatagufi si'i anota hat mowalo'manota balaga ananigai, malamana anef lowaf akwahifi. Ea' timbi tambel mafe'ma anen ma'ipana ma'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi, ina' dembinai king Judai.” Amom manda' salomala anen manda'ana findiwana na'amba, mahana amaga ananigai.
43019004	Ea' Pailat nawis ando' wapani na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “Ipa' peme'! Ae' ao'wana nafi'mai ipa' ma pegegawa ae' ina ati anis maefah awasi, owa'. Ina ati anef waf awafi ma anen enda'mana anif basef, owa'.”
43019005	Ea' Jisas a' nawis ando'. Hat atamba manda' mandof higatagufi magala'watefaf si'i hati fapomana balaga ananigai ea' lowaf akwahifi fapomana. Ea' Pailat na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' piti aman ana'e.”
43019006	Ea' amom pris dembami maloma plisman amamumi ata' matolona atin, ma'ias dindinip mehip a'owa' ma'i, “Dolana nil lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai!” Ea' Pailat nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipa' atipa fa'ana dolanago. Apa' ae' owa', ae' ina ati anef waf awafi anen nanda'afi ma enda' kotimana, owa'atin.”
43019007	Ea' amom Juda magwamana basef ma'i, “Anen naga'i anen Nogamana Godi. Ea' mu'uli ape'ini na'i anen a' nondaga'.”
43019008	Fowa' Pailat ombal mahana kwasakwasala apa' dei' owa', name' basef ifimba atif, ombal a' lu'um mahana a'owa'.
43019009	Ea' nawis nomon ipat atamba nahali' Jisas na'i, “Ina' nataga nafi'i ani?” Apa' Jisas ina nagwamana anif basef, owa'.
43019010	Ea' Pailat na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nandaiwa'ma niga'ipi anif basef? Ina' negawa ae', a'a owa'? Ae' banagiwai ma ekwaha ina' negafe' dowaf a'a i'ipas sehena negaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.”
43019011	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i God nagape ilifi owa' nese'ena banagami ina'a, ina' atina ina banagena ma negatalogofa ae', owa'. I'i nehe ega', waf afamba awafi. Apa' amom amamba mofa'e agafi'mai ine'i, waf amamifi awafi lu'uf a'owa', fikila' waf awafi ine'ifi.”
43019012	Pailat name' basef ifimba atin, ea' na'i notagwaha Jisas nefe' wahifina. Owa' esis Juda sofalana mehip sa'i, “I'i ina' netagwaha aman anamba nefe' wahifina, ina alipunai ma Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi, owa'. Epen ami na'i anin atin king dambeni anin bouni Sisari.”
43019013	Pailat name' basef ifimba atin, nofa'i Jisas nawisi nataga ando' ea' nape anin sia amom dembami jas magapoma. Anamba sa'i ufia'w otamba atembai'wi. Ufia'w akwamba diga Hibrui sa'i Gabata.
43019014	Nemaf afamba esis Juda sape sandondomba gwa'aisi ma naman sonda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi Pasova. Ea' awin a' nandasapa' nape 12 klok. Owa' Pailat na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “Piti dembinai king ipe'inai nalutu na'a'e.”
43019015	Owa' esis Juda sa'ipana mehip sa'i, “Fa'ana, fa'ana, nendelana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.” Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Ipa' pa'i ae' endela king dembinai ipe'inai lawag a'a owa'?” Ea' amom pris dembami magwamana basef ma'i, “Apa' owa' anona dembinai kinga, Sisar atona anen dembinai king ape'inai.”
43019016	Ea' Pailat nakwahomasa Jisas esis Juda ma sogandolona lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
43019017	Ea' amom soldia mowa' Jisas mofa'ana mafe'. Jisas atotona nofa' lawag ananigai a' nafe' nakwaha wambel lu'wambili nawis ando' nafe' nataga anagon agiligima Pipitagol Balagaigil. Diga Hibrui sa'i Golgota.
43019018	Anamba amom mowa'ana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai naloma anom amam biam. Anona nail wa'ol, anona nail wa'ol, ea' Jisas nail la'afen.
43019019	Gavman Dembinai Pailat nanda' anif basef nofa'ef nanda'ef fail lawag agamba ilif. Basef faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai, anen Dembinai King esis Judai.”
43019020	Esis Juda hiasi sati basef ifimba satalifif. Dei' main, anamba amom magandola Jisasa nape felefele' Jerusalem. Ea' basef fa'i diga wanifiga. Diga Hibrui, Latini, a diga Griki.
43019021	Amom pris dembami esis Judai ma'ipa Pailat ma'i, “Ina' owa'i nenda' basef ifimba ni'i, ‘Dembinai King esis Judaia’, hapaifi. Ina' nenda' basef ni'i, ‘Anen na'i, Ae' Dembiwai King esis Judai.’”
43019022	Ea' Pailat nagwamam na'i, “Basef ae' anda'ef ea'i fendape atapif.”
43019023	Amom soldia mandola Jisas ea', mofa' luwaguf ananifi matambe'ef biafigin biafigina mondandama aolef mofa'alef fendandamam. Ea' mofa' siot ananitai wapani. Siot atamba esis ina sosambalota, owa'. Sanda'ata tape si'ita ilif tafe' tataga owin.
43019024	Amom manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' ina owala siot atamba, owa'i. Afa' onda' pilai satu ma ami nigikila'i nefa'ata.” Amom ma'ias na'amba maila anif basef fowa'ifi fagape Buk Baibeli afataga fandawalap endilisi. Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Amom matambe' luwaguf ae'afi fafe'ma amom atona atin ea' manda' satu ma ami nigikila'i nefa'ef.” Ea' amom soldia manda'as na'amba atin.
43019025	-
43019026	Ma'ma Jisasi kwaloma owama'w ako'ukwi waloma ano'w nemata'w Maria kwagaso' Klopasi waloma Maria Makdalai'wi awo biawai biawa walutu felefele'ma lawag Jisas nagailagai. Ea' Jisas nati ma'mana anani'wi kwaloma ae' ananiwai okom magamagailai, afa' biafa walutu felefele'ma anen. Ea' na'ipa ma'mana na'i, “Ma'me, aman anamba nogamena ine'inai.”
43019027	Ea' na'ipa ae' alipuwai ananiwai na'i, “Nemata'w akwamba ma'mena ine'ikwi.” Nogota atamba ae' efa'akw kwafe' ipat ae'atai ma igimafia'w dondol atapi'w.
43019028	A'i owa' main, Jisas nogawa maol hiani ananini ahi'alan, ea' okom ma'i anif basef fagape Buk Baibeli fetaga fendawalap. Ea' na'i, “Ae' iap pase'ema embel.” Anen na'ias na'amba nagi'ma basef ifimba Baibelifi.
43019029	Ea' anol botol si'ila embel wain numbutimbeli ba'oh. Ea' amom mofa' anom mosong mowala wain embel ambalemba magiam masapa'am anogol bagol mofa'am mandomanam malogol Jisasi ma noga' embel.
43019030	Anen na' wain embel ambalemba ea' na'i, “Maol inimba ahi'alan.” Ea' nindiwa balaga ambal a' landahi' lafe'ana naga' dogw.
43019031	Nemaf afamba esis Juda sape sandondomba gwa'aisi maisa naman sonda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi Pasova. Nemaf afamba dei'ifi sabat lu'wafi fikila' sabat anif nimaguf hiafi. Ea' amom Juda mandaiwa' ma amom wanom migail atapim lawah agahemba nemaf afamba lu'wafi. Ea' mafe' mahali' Pailata amom soldia mugundiwa bo'wagah amamugahi ma mogaga' ulala motagwahom mugisila'i.
43019032	Ea' amom soldia mafe' anamba maham magaila. Ea' mati anona nagail wa'ili mindiwa bo'wagahana a' naga'. Ea' mafe'ma anona wa'ol mundiwa bo'wagahana.
43019033	Ea' mafe' ma Jisas nagaila, owa' mati anen a' naga' dogw endilisi. Ea' amom ina mindiwa bo'wagah ananigahi, owa'.
43019034	Ea' anona soldia nanda' wamba'w napisila lambeh Jisasi wa'ol. Ea' kwafalis atis esimbel baloma embel maluwi.
43019035	Ae' ati amamba naep ae'api a'ipipa basef ifimba. Ea' basef ifimba ae'afi endilisifi atif. Ae' egawa basef ifimba aga'ipipafi endilisifi a'ipipa ma ipa' wapani pigahapifif.
43019036	-
43019037	Fowa' basef fagail Buk Baibeli fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “Owagama bihitagof ananigufi ina totoweagof, owa'atin.” Ea' anif wapani fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “Owagama esis siti aman anamba sagapisilana wamba'wi.” Amom soldia manda'am na'amba maila basef ifimba atif fagail Buk Baibeli fataga fandawalap endilisi.
43019038	Josep Arimateainai anen alipunai Jisasi, apa' anen ombal mahana ma amom Juda. Ea' nahapifana nomonas atis sape sandambaho'. A'i owa' main, anen nafe' nahali' Pailata alop Jisasi, Ea' Pailat na'i aho', a' nafe' nofa'ap nafe'.
43019039	-
43019040	Anen Josep nafe' naloma Nikodemus, anamba fowa' nafe' nagati Jisas anomb owambi. Anen nofa'i anin marasin bu'wani sanda'an ifat lawahi, agilima mer naloma alos. Marasin inimba hiani nimanin a'owa', 75 paun. Ea' amom biam mafe' mofa' alop Jisasi manda' luwaguf afitifi faloma marasin inimba mombafana, maila waf esis Judai.
43019041	Felefele'ma anamba magandola Jisasa anof aof fape. Aof afamba anona bolotaf nagal si'i matmat dambaitai nape. Anamba esis ina dei' sawa anin epenagon, ata' owa'atin.
43019042	Matmat atamba tape felefele'. Nemaf afamba nemaf esis Juda sa'i sogowando'ma hiahawesafi, ma nemaf sagapoma noma'wafi sa'i sabat felefele'ma fegataga. Ea' mofa' alop Jisasi mawana matmat atamba.
43020001	Akot ata' tail, felefele'ma kuhumbita nemaf Sande Maria Makdalai'wi kosafel kwafe' matmat. Ea' kwati otam ina ata' masopama uta matmati, owa'atin. Anin epen nelefatam a' mafe' ma'oh wa'ol.
43020002	Ea' kotanima kwasagih kwafi'mai ae'i Saimon Pita wagapoma, ae' alipuwai Jisasi okom magamagailai. Ea' kwa'ipafa kwa'i, “Anis safe' sofa' Dembinai nakwaha matmat asafe'. Ea' afa' ina ogawana safe' sambe'ana anima.”
43020003	-
43020004	Ea' ea' aloma Pita wasagih wafe' wataga matmat atamba. Wasagih wafe', apa' ae' ikila' Pita ali' afa' ataga matmat atamba.
43020005	Ea' indiwa nembawa etawa ati luwaguf atif fa'oh nomon apa' ina awis nomon, owa'.
43020006	-
43020007	Owa' Saimon Pita nagi'mi nafi'i nataga ea' nawis matmat bolotaf nomon. Ea' nati luwaguf mogowa'anami atom ma'oh, maloma anef lowaf manda'af mogowa' balagonafi. Lowaf afamba sindiwaf sambe'af fa'oh anagon daiagon. Apa' luwaguf ifimba anif fa'oh dei.
43020008	Ea' ae' ali' agafe' matmat atambai agi'mana awis nomon ati hiahawes isimba a' ahapifana.
43020009	Nogota atamba afa' ina ogawa basef fagail Buk Baibeli faga'i Jisas noga' notanima nogosafel wapani, owa'.
43020010	Ea' afa' biafa utanima wafe' ipat.
43020011	Apa' Maria ato'w kwalutu kwalopana matmat ando'. Kwalutu kwalopana atin, kwasisil kwati bolotaf matmat nomon,
43020012	akwati ensel biam mala luwaguf afitimi mape anamba alop Jisasi doko' paga'oma. Amom biam anona nape balaga Jisasi gagafe'ma, anona bo'wagah hagafe'ma.
43020013	Ea' mahali'akw ma'i, “Ina' nalopa main?” Ea' ako'w kwagwamam basef kwa'i, “Anis asofa' Dembinai ae'anai safe' ea' ina egawa anamba safe' sagambe'anama, owa'atin.”
43020014	Kwa'ipam basef ifimba ma ea', kwandambema owa' kwati Jisas nalutu naloma'w. Apa' ina kogawa anen kwa'i Jisas, owa'.
43020015	Ea' Jisas nahali'akw na'i, “Nemata'w, dei' maina ina' nagalef? Ina' newando'ma ami?” Ako'w okom ma'i owa' anona nanda' maol aofi. Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, i'i ina' negefa'anama, ni'ipi anamba nefa'ana nafe' nagambe'anama?”
43020016	Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Maria.” Ea' kwandambema kwati anen kwaipana diga Hibrui kwa'i, “Rabonai.” Basef kofagefa fa'i Dembinai Tisa.
43020017	Ea' anen Jisas na'i, “Ina nigahapila alop ae'api, owa'i. Dei' main? Ae' ina dei' a' itanima afe'ma Ahame gani ilif ata' owa'. Ina' nefe'ma owape ae'ami ni'ipam ni'i, Ae' a' itanima ilita ilifa Ahame ae'anai a Ahamepa ipe'inai, efe'ma God Dembinai ae'anai, a God Dembinai ipe'inai.”
43020018	Ea' ako'w kwafe'ma alipumi ananimi magapoma kwa'ipam kwa'i, “Ae' ati Dembinai ea'!” Ea' kwa'ipama basef ifimba anen naga'ipa'wafi.
43020019	Nemaf afamba Sande owamb, afa' alipufai Jisasi wandakolas ondotowalo wape anota ipat nomon. Afa' ombal mahafama amom dembami esis Judai. Owa' Jisas nafi'i nalutu nalomafa na'ipafa na'i, “Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi bepe sa'ombel.”
43020020	Na'ipafa basef ifimba ea', nihimba'mafa lagufi lambeh ananisi. Ea' afa' wati Dembinai afa'inai ea', asonahafama anen a'owa'.
43020021	Ea' na'ipafa wapani na'i, “Ae' a'i nelelemb ipe'ilimbi bepe awanalemb. Ae' dei' a'i esapa'epa pefe' pi'ipasa basef Godi si'i Ahame nasapa'e afi'i aga'ipipa.”
43020022	Na'ipafa ifimba ma ea', a' naomafa ambip na'ipafa na'i, “Ipa' pefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi.
43020023	Ama i'i pegakwaha waf awafi epen ami nanda'afi, God wapani a' nokwahomanaf okom moso'anaf. Apa' i'i ipa' owa' pekwaha waf afamba awafia, God wapani ina atiasi nokwahef okom moso'anaf, owa'atin.”
43020024	Anona ma afa' 12-pelaifa alipufai Jisasi, Tomas agol wa'agol Didimas. Kofagogola sa'i ma'mam kofolam atifi. Nemaf afamba Jisas nafi'i nagatolofa, Tomas ina nape nalomafa, owa'.
43020025	Ea' anom alipumi ananimi mafe' ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wati Dembinai afa'inai ea'.” Owa' Tomas na'ipam na'i, “I'i ae' owa' ata' iti melegwa lagof ananigufi sagahana nigufa, ma esa faf ae'afi ma niguf fagawisa ea' esapa' lagol ae'agili guwis nomon lambeh ananimbihi, dao' ihapifana. Apa' i'i owa', owa'atin.”
43020026	Nimaguf 8-pelaif fefe'ma ea', afa' wape anota ipat nomon, ondotowalo wape. Afamba Tomas wapani nape nalomafa. Owa' Jisas nawisi nalutu nalomafa na'ipaf na'i, “Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi bepe awanelemb.”
43020027	Ea' na'ipa Tomas na'i, “Dowa faf ine'ifi fifi'i na'a. Ea' niti lagof ae'agufi. Nesapa' lagol ine'igili guwisi lambeh ae'ambihi nomon. Ina okom bimbiafim mopaina, owa'i. Nindahapifi endilisi.”
43020028	Ea' Tomas na'ipana na'i, “O, Dembinai ae'inai, God ae'inai.”
43020029	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' natolowe ea', dei' nahapifi. Apa' epes ami owa' sogatolowaia, sahapifi sonahas endilisi.”
43020030	Jisas nanda' hiahaom hiami banagami daiam si'i God nanda'ami ma nogohnaep alipufai ananifai. Basefa hiahaom amamba ina anda'ef hi'alef fape buk akwa'e, owa'.
43020031	Anda' basef ifimba do'wanif atifa hiahaom amamba ma ipa' pigahapifa Jisas anen Nogamana Godi, anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Ma pihapifa agol ananigili pefa' ambal namili pegape namipa dondol lifilafi.
43021001	-
43021002	Jisas naga' nosafel wapani ma ea', alipufai ananifai a' watolona wapani nimaguf bif. A'i owa' main, wagi' watolona wapani. Basef faga'ias na'amba. Jisas nafe'ma afa' gani dumb lu'wambi Taiberias. Anofa afa' ondowa'anima atogon wagapani afamba. Saimon Pita, Tomas agol wa'agol Didimas maloma Nataniel, anen Kenainai, itap lu'upa Galili. Amom maloma nogaopana biam Sebedii maloma amom biam daiam Jisasi ondowa'anima wape atogon.
43021003	Ea' Saimon Pita na'ipafa na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' igi agof.” Ea' afa' wa'i, “Olomena ofe' atin.” Ea' wafe' walota anota bot wafe' wa'i ugi agof wafe' wanda'am owamb ambamba laomb danda' apa' afa' ina wagi anol aol, owa'atin.
43021004	Wafilu kuhimbita atota Jisas nafe' nalutu dumb ambamba akata apa' afa' ina ogawa wa'i anen Jisas, owa'.
43021005	Ea' nofalafa na'i, “Awami sa'upai, ipa' pagi anogof agof a'a owa'?” Ea' wagwamana basef wa'i, “Owa'atin.”
43021006	Ea' na'ipafa na'i, “Ipa' ata' pela anemb bewala bot atamba wa'ol lagol kwahisigilima. Ea' atiasi apiti anogof agof.” Ea' afa' wa'i ola anemb owa', owafai agof hiami. Ea' ina la'ififa ogagiai anemb bilitai begatoma bot nomon, owa'atin. Dei' main? Agof hiami a'owa' mala anemba namba asi'ina.
43021007	Ae' alipuwai Jisasi okom magamagailai, a'ipa Pita a'i, “Nanumba Dembinai afa'inai.” Saimon Pita doko' natagwaha saket ananitai ta'oh ea' nanda' maol owa', name' basef ifimba nala saket wapani nanda' kopi' nowala embel dumb nopaul nafe' embel.
43021008	Ea' afa' daiafa watoma bot wagi'mana wagiai anemb si'inama agof. Afa' ina wail laogona akata, owa'. Si'i 100 mita.
43021009	Wafe' wataga akata, wati anif nif fandif ea' wati anagof agof fasef nif faloma anota bret.
43021010	Ea' Jisas na'ipafa na'i, “Ipa' fa'i anagof agof doko' pagagiagufi.”
43021011	Ea' Saimon Pita nalota bot atamba nagiai anemb bafi'i akata. Anemb ambamba si'imba agof lu'wagufi atogof 153-pelaiguf. Apa' anemb ina pele'atamb, owa'atin.
43021012	Ea' Jisas na'ipafa na'i, “Ipa' fi'i ma ata' pea' gwa'aisi.” Apa' afa' ina anona banagona ma nohali'ana niga'i, “Ina' ami?” Owa'atin. Dei' main, afa' ogawa anen Dembinai afa'inai.
43021013	Jisas nafi'i nofa' bret naso'afa, a agof wapani na'amba atin.
43021014	Fowa' Jisas nogosafel wapani, nali' nafe'ma afa' alipufai ananifai watolona nimaguf bif. A'i owa' main, dei' watolona wapani a' wanif.
43021015	Afa' wa' gwa'aisi ma ea', Jisas na'ipa Saimon Pita na'i, “Saimon nogama Joni, ina' okom maimaili a'owa' nikila' anom alipumi amamba daiam, a'a owa'?” Ea' anen na'i, “Aho', Dembinai. Ina' negawa ae' okom maimailina.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nese'ama gwa'aisi sipsip nogami ae'ami.”
43021016	Ea' Jisas nahali'ana wapani na'i, “Saimon nogama Joni, ina' okom maimaili endilisi, a'a owa'?” Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, “Aho', Dembinai. Ina' negawa ae' okom maimailina.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nimafi sipsip ae'ami.”
43021017	Jisas nali' nahali'ana bif ea' dei' nahali'ana wapani a' wanif na'i, “Saimon nogama Joni, ina' okom maimaili a'a owa'?” Ea' Pita okom iwanim na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' negawa hiahaom hiami. Ina' negawa ae' okom maimailina.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nese'ama gwa'aisi sipsip ae'ami.
43021018	Endilisi ae' a'ipina, fowa' ina' ata' sa'wina, ina' nowaho' let ea' nafe' mamahagoma nomonas ine'isi sa'i negafe'ma. Apa' owagama ina' negatagama hagena, ina' atiasi nendowa logof ine'igufi ma anom amam daiam mowaho'mena let mohapilina nefe' anamba ina' nindaiwa'magoma.”
43021019	Jisas na'ipana na'amba ma nigihimba'mam ufia'w ma soha Pita nogaga' ma epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol. Ea' dei' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Nila ae'.”
43021020	Ea' Pita nandambema nati ae', alipuwai Jisas okom magamagailai, agi'mam afi'i. Ae' ma'uwi fowa' afa' wape wa' gwa'aisi ma indisi'ah felefele'ma Jisas ahali'ana aga'i, “Dembinai, atiasi ami ni'ipa boumi ma nigihimba'mama ina' negapoma?”
43021021	Ea' Pita natiti ae', nahali' Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, aman anamba anaf nope ni'imama?”
43021022	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anen a' nope ambal lopaona nope nefe' nefe' afamba ae' igitanimai, isimba ina maol ine'ini, owa'atin. Ina' nila ae'.”
43021023	Ea' basef baso'afi wafifi ifimba fafe'ma afa' alipufai Jisasi fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “Aman anamba anaf ina noga', owa'.” Apa' Jisas ina na'ipafa basef ifimba esis saga'iefi, owa'. Basef ifimba kwamaifi. Jisas na'i basef ifimba atif na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anen nope nefe' nefe' ma nemaf ae' igitanimai, isimba ina maol ine'ini, owa'atin.”
43021024	Aman anamba alipunai Jisasi ea' ae' ma'uwi. Ae' a'ipipa basef ifimba ma hiahaom amamba Jisas nanda'ami dei' anda'am magail buk akwa'i. Apa' Kristen mogawa basef ifimba endilisifi atif ae' anda'afi.
43021025	Jisas nanda' anin maol hiani daian wapani. I'i anis epes sonda' basefa maol Jisasi hi'ilan filai, ae' a'i itap anamba hiagoma owa' anagona buk hianai noga'oha, owa'atin. Asi'igin dog. Basef ea' ma'uf.
44001001	O, alipunai Tiofilus, buk akwamba fowa' ae' anda'akwi anda' basefa hiahaom hiami Jisas nanda'ami nagawalipa esis amam nematawa
44001002	ma dambadamba nali' nanda'am ea' mafi'i matagama nemaf afamba God nofa'ana nagalota gani heven. Fowa' Jisas owa' ata' nolota hevena, anen nali' naso'ama basef ifimba na'ipam dindinipa maol amom aposel amamba anen nandandepami. Anen naso'ama maol inimba amoma banagami amamba Ambal bu'unai Godi.
44001003	Fowa' saha Jisas nofa' akafimi naga' ea', notanima nosafel wapani nafe' natagama alipumi ananimi. Ea' nape awin si'ini du'wanini nanda' hiahaom hiami banagami ma nihimba'mam mogogawa endilisi anen nofa' ambal namili nape namona. Nimaguf ifimba anen nawalipama epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias.
44001004	Anen ata' nape nagalomam na'ipam dindinip na'i, “Ipa' dei' ina pekwaha Jerusalem ulal, owa'i. Pepe pehafa hiahaom amamba Ahame na'i endilisi atis nogasi'ipami. Amamba fowa' ae' aga'ipipami.
44001005	Fowa' Jon nali' napisi' amam nematawa hiasi embel. Apa' ipa' atiasi apefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nuwisipa. Ina atiasi nogota laota tefe', ata' bandata ipa' a' pefa' Ambal anamba nuwis nope nolomepa.
44001006	Nemaf afamba amom alipumi Jisasi mandakolas atogon mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai, a'i atiasi nogota ata'e ina' nenda' apa' mofa' agol lu'wagili ma mogali'amona esis bousi ma apa' atepa ape'ilimbi a'a owa'?”
44001007	Ea' anen na'ipam na'i, “Amamba ina hiahaom ipe'imi ma pegegawa nogota ma nimaguf Ahame nandandepafi, owa'. Anen atona numafi amamba.
44001008	Apa' basef ipe'ifi ifimba. Atiasi Ambal bu'unai Godi nifi'mai ipa', nemaf afamba pefa' banagami ma main, dao' apewalapa basef ae'afi Jerusalem ea' ganimba hiagoma agol Judia a' ganimba itap lu'upa Samaria, ea' pefe' anamba itap walemb hiagoma hi'ilagon.”
44001009	Jisas na'i basef ifimba hi'alef, esis ata' salutu sagatologini atin, owa' sati anen nandagia nakwaha itap nalota ilif. Ea' anom ilagw mofa'ana mafe' ea' ina satolona wapani, owa'atin.
44001010	Anen nafe' ea', esis ata' salutu satologon atin ilif otaga owa' anom amam biam magala klos afitimii mondokwama mataga malomas malutu.
44001011	Ea' ma'ipas ma'i, “Ipa' amam nematawa Galilipai, ipa' ina pilutu pititi otaga ilif, owa'. Jisas anamba dei' God nofa'ana nakwahepa ea' nofa'ana nalota heven. Anaf notanima nogafi'i pegatolona na'amba atin si'i dei' palutu patolona nagalota heven.”
44001012	Ea' esis sakwaha halafuta atamba Oliv, sotanima safe' Jerusalem. Halafuta atamba ina laogona Jerusalem, owa', felefele' nogota atotota kilomita atitin si'i esis Juda sefe' sifi'i nemaf afamba sabat sagapoma noma'wafi.
44001013	Esis sotanima safi'i Jerusalem, safe' sawis ipat ea' safe' salota sape ipat ilif esis sagapoma. Agof amamugufi agwafomba. Pita naloma Jemsi Jon a Andru a Filip naloma Tomasi Bartolomyu Matyu ea' Jems, Alfius nogamana, a Judas, Jems nogamana ea' Saimon anap mini'ap Seloti.
44001014	Amom alipumi Jisasi mandakolas nimaguf hiafi lifilafi ma manda' beten maloma anowa nematawa saloma ako'w Maria Jisas ma'mana saloma owapana Jisasi wapani. Esis hiasi sape sandabeten atogon.
44001015	A'i owa', anef nemaf esis Kristen 120-pelais hiasi sandakolas sape ea' Pita nosafel nalutu na'i,
44001016	“Sahin owan ae'ipai, anif basef fagail buk Baibeli fowa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa malogol dembinai king Deviti fa'ias na'amba. Na'i aman anamba Judas owagama nonda' waf awafi ma nigihimba'mama Jisas boumi. Ufia'w ina kwaso', owa'. Kwagala basef ifimba fegataga alihif. God atona na'i, dei' basef ifimba fataga fandawalap. Fowa' Judas ina dei' nanda' waf awafi nawalapa Jisasa amom, ata' owa', nogota atamba
44001017	anen alipunai afa'inai nanda' maol nagaloma afa'i.”
44001018	“Moni Judas nogofa'ana waf afamba awafi ananifii a' natala anep itap. Anen nafe' itap apamba nowa la'afinama pe'ana nembel kolo'walanai hi'alana a' afuna.
44001019	Ea' epes hiasi sagape Jerusalami asogawa isimba. Ea' diga asasigai sofala anamba agiligima sa'i Akeldama. Apa' ma'i itap apamba esimbel kolo'walambel begetawapi.”
44001020	Dei' main, Pita naga'i basef ifimba fagape Buk Baibel Sami na'i, “‘Ipat ananitai atot tondape wafita dowaf. Ina anona aman nopaota, owa'atin.’ Ea' anin Sam na'i anif basef wapani na'amba na'i, ‘Anona aman anaf a' noho'ofana nofa' maol ananini.’
44001021	-
44001022	“Ea' dei' apa' a' mondandepa anona aman ape'inai noho'ofanago ma mogawalipas basef ifimba Jisas notanima nogosafel wapani. Apa' a' mondandepa anona ma amom amamba mape magaloma ape'i ma afamba Dembinai Jisas nape nagalomapa. Afamba Jon nagawalipasa basef Godi nagapisi' amam nematawa nafi'i nafi'i nataga ma nemaf God nofa' Jisas nalota heven nagakwahepa.”
44001023	Pita na'ias na'amba ma main, esis Kristen asandandepa amam biam. Anona Josep, agol wa'agol Barsabas, ea' agol wa'agol wapani sa'i Jastus. Ea' anona Matias.
44001024	Ea' esis sandabeten na'amba sa'i, “Dembinai, ina' negawa ukup epes hiasii hi'alep. Ina' nendandepa amam amamba biam nihimba'mapa aman mamahonama
44001025	nogofa' maol aposel nogaha'ofa aman anamba Judas. Anen a' nakwaha maol inimba nafe' wambel awambili ma negawamana waf awafi.”
44001026	Ea' esis sanda' agof amom biami fail otamba biamba. Ea' sala otamba ambamba bala anep malep si'i tin sakoto'wamba sati otam mali' magatagai agol Matiasi. Ea' sagawa God nandandepa Matias. Ea' sanda' anen nanda' maol naloma amom aposel 11-pelaima monda' maol Godi.
44002001	Nemaf afamba lu'wafi Pentikos afagataga, esis hiasi sagahapifanai sandakolas sape ipat atotota.
44002002	A'i owa' main, owa' same' anom amalemb lu'wami manda'am mafi'i heven. Amalemb amamba mandame' si'i fufin banagonai nagaluwi ea' ipat atamba esis sagapautai asi'itama amalemb amamba.
44002003	Ea' sati anogah afegah hogala si'i nif ileliwa pepa'atawa wafe' watoma esis hiasi atona atin hi'alas.
44002004	Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'inama esis atona atin hi'alas, sa'i basef Godi ma diga naninani analemb walembi. Ambal anamba nanda'am mataga malogof asasigufi.
44002005	Anis Juda safi'i sape Jerusalem, sanda' lotuma Godi, safi'i sandanda misi'ah hiahi ganimba itap hiagoma.
44002006	Esis hiasi same' amalemb amamba ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi daias safi'i sunduwa'anima sape. Ea' epes isimba hiasi atona atin same' esis sagahapifanai ea' sa'i basef Godi ma diga naninani analemb walembi. Ea' sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' a'owa' ma sagame' diga asasigai.
44002007	Esis sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' a' nomonas salasafe' hiahias. Ea' sa'ias sa'i, “Amom amamba Galilimi, owa' a' ma'i diga ape'igai atona atini.
44002008	Dei' maina apa' hiapai atona atin magame' amom maga'i diga ape'igai dondo' si'i apa' magame'agama mamasapa ape'isi? Apa' mafi'i itap apamba hiapi lu'upa agufipa apamba.
44002009	-
44002010	Partiai Midia a Elam ea' Judiai Kapadosia paloma Pontusi Esia a Frigia Pamfiliai Isip ea' apa' anep itap lu'upa Mesopotamia ea' esis ganimba Libiama felefele'ma wambel Sairini. Ea' anepa apa' wambel Rom mafi'i mape na'a.
44002011	Apa' Juda maloma anis epes daias maila waf esis Juda sanda' lotuwafi ea' apa' itap lu'upa kofagama Kriti Arebia, apa' hiapai mame' amom mawalapa basefa hiahaom banagami maol Godi ma diga ape'igai hiagai.”
44002012	Ea' hiasi sosafel gogolalasis kwapete', esis nomonas sape hiahias. Esis atis sandahali'ma sa'i, “Hiahawes isimba sandanda' sa'imama?”
44002013	Owa' anis sanda' iafam sa'i, “Amom ma' embel wain dambaini ea' mahaga magaol dei' ma'i basef na'ambaifi.”
44002014	A'i owa' main, Pita nosafel nalutu naloma amom aposel 11-pelaim ea' noga na'i banagambel nawalapa basefa esis amam nematawa hiasi na'i, “Ipa' Juda alipipai paloma ipa' amam nematawa hipai pafi'i pagape Jerusalami, ipa' pembe' aligaha basef ae'afi, ma pegegawa hiahawes isimba.
44002015	Ipa' pa'i amam amamba manda' spak, owa'atin. Dei' ata' kuhimbita awin ata' natafi atin nainail si'i 9 klok.
44002016	Apa' hiahaom amamba mataga si'i anona profet Joel fowa' naga'i,
44002017	God na'i, ‘Felefele'ma nemaf akutaifi Ae' ese'as Ambal bu'unai ae'anai nope amam nematawa hiasi. Ea' esa'ma esis batawisipa ipe'isi asowalapa basef si'i amom profet maga'if. Ea' ihimba'ma amam sa'umi ipe'imi waf bu'wafi ae'afi ma mope naep pese'am mogatolomi, ea' ese'ama koh dondo'ah amom hagami ipe'mi ma igihimba'mam waf ae'afi.
44002018	Aho', nemaf afamba atiasi ae' ese'asa Ambal bu'unai ae'anai nope esis amam nematawa ae'asi sanda' maola ae'i nosa'mas sowalapa basef ae'afi.
44002019	Ea' enda' anef waf daiaf fetaga gani otaga ilif, enda' hiahaom banagami motaga na'a'e itap owin. Amamba na'amba. Enda' nogoh hiagwi otaga, enda' esimbel, nif fagandifi.
44002020	Ea' embema awin alipini netaga owamb owambini netaga akwahin si'i esimbel. Ama i'i owa' main, owa' nemaf Dembinaii a' fetaga. Nemaf afamba ananifi lu'wafi endilisi a'owa'.
44002021	Felefele'ma nemaf afamba epes ami sogofala agol Dembinai, bola neme'as nofa'as nokwahomas waf awafi sotanimai sope epes ananisi.’”
44002022	Ea' Pita na'ipas wapani na'i, “Ipa' epes Israelipai, ipa' peme' anif basef dei' iga'ipipa aman anamba Jisas Nasaratinai. Ipa' pegawa ea' ma maol inimba banagani naloma banagami amamba God nanda'am la'afena ipe'i ma lagol aman anambai. Amamba mihimba'mepa andeande' aman anamba God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
44002023	Fowa' gani God nogawa ea' okom mandanda' na'amba ma nonda' aman anamba nefe' nogape lagof ipe'igufi. Ea' epes isimba sogombalo' mu'uli Godii satopalopa ipa' pembalo'ana pandolana nail lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ea' pahana naga'.
44002024	Apa' owa', owa'atin. God notanima nasa'mana wapani a' nakwaha akafimi ma ga' ananimi. Dei' main, ga' inimba ina banagen a'owa' ma nihapilana nogape, owa'atin.
44002025	“Aho', fowa' gani Devit naga'i basefa Jisas na'i, ‘Ae' ati Dembinai ae'anai nape nalome wa'ol lagol ae'agili kwahisigilima dondol lifilafi. Ea' anis epes ina sanda'me anom nimanimi akafimi, owa'.
44002026	Isimba atis dei' okom ae'ami sonaham ea' afega ae'agai gandagala. Ae' epen falafuwai igaga'i, atiasi epe ehafa anona nogatopalope.
44002027	Dei' main, atiasi ina nekwaha ambal ae'ali a' lofe' lope anamba epes sagaga'i sagapoma, owa'atin. Ea' ina atiasi nekwahowa alop aman anamba bu'winai hilili'i nanda' maol ine'i folo'olap, owa'atin.
44002028	Ina' ea' nihimba'me ufiawa wafe' wagatagama waf ambal namilifi. Ina' nape nalome sonahe endilisi.’”
44002029	Ea' Pita na'ipas wapani na'i, “Ipa' sahope owape ae'ipai, dei' ae' a'i ewalapa basef i'ipipaef wal atina aman anamba akunamapa ape'inai Devit. Anen fowa' naga' sawana, dei' wandof ananifi ata' fape la'afena apa' atapif. Basef ifimba Devit ina na'ifa anen atona, owa'atin.
44002030	Apa' aman anamba Devit anen profet ea' nogawa God na'i basef banagafi na'i endilisi ilif na'amba ma anaf nonda' bafamana Deviti notaga nogape dembinai king si'i Devit nagape king.
44002031	Fowa' Devit ata' nagape, a' nogawa ea' amamba God na'i nonda'ami. Na'amba dei' anen na'i Dembinai Krais anaf noga' notanima nosafel wapani. Anen na'ias ea' na'i, ‘Anaf God ina nokwaha anen nope anamba sagaga'i sagapoma wandelef alop ananipi folo'olap, owa'.’
44002032	Aman anamba anen Jisas God ea' nasa'mana notanima nosafel wapani. Ea' afa' hiafai a' wati amamba dei' wa'iam.
44002033	Dei' God nasa'mana nosafel nalota gani ilif ea' nape lagol kwahisigili Godi. Anen a' nofa' Ambal bu'unai Godi ea' ma Ahamana, si'i fowa' Ahamana naga'ipana na'i nogaso'ana. Isimba atis dei' Jisas naso'asam esis hiahaom amamba patolom pagame'am ea'i.
44002034	Dei' main, Devit ina a' nalota heven, owa'. Apa' anen fowa' na'ias basefa na'i, ‘Dembinai na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'amba na'i, “Ina' nepe lagol kwahisigili ae'agili ma nepe dembinai negaloma ae'.
44002035	I'i owa' main, enda' bousi ine'isi sefe' lafela ina' nikila'as.”’
44002036	Ea' dei' Pita na'ias na'amba na'i, “Dei' apa' Israel mondagawa isimba andeande'. Aman anamba Jisas ipa' pagandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai pahana nagaga'i, dei' God nanda'ana nataga nape Dembinai anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.”
44002037	Esis same' basef ifimba owa', faha nelelemb asasilimbi a'owa'. Ea' sa'ipa Pita naloma amom aposel daiam sa'i, “Ipa' sahopapa, dei' apa' ea' monda' maina mogape andeande'?”
44002038	Ea' Pita na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' hipai pekwaha waf awafi pendembema nelelemba God ea' ipa' hipai atona atin pefa' baptaisa agol Dembinai Jisas Kraisi ma nogakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi. Ipa' penda'as na'amba, atiasi God nese'epa Ambal bu'unai Ananinai nuwisipa.
44002039	Fowa' God na'i basef endilisifi banagafi na'i nese'epa Ambal bu'unai Ananinai nuwisipa peloma awasi ipe'isi soloma esis isimba amam nematawa hiasi ata' sagapani laugunii anaf sigi' sogatagai. Aho' God Dembinai ape'inai na'ias ea' ma nogaso'as Ambal bu'unai Ananinai nuwis epes isimba mamahisa anaf nogofalasi.”
44002040	Pita ina na'ipasa basef ifimba atif, owa'. Na'ipasa anif basef hiafi dindinipa nogafela ukup asasipi na'i, “Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba apefa' nimanimi akafimi lu'wami peloma amam nematawa dei'isi sanda' waf awafii.”
44002041	Ea' esis isimba ea' sagame' basef Pitai endilisii ma sagahapilafi, esis ea' sofa' baptais. Nemaf afamba God nowatani mini'ap asasipi apataga laop ea' 3,000-pelais sataga Kristen, ea' sape saloma esis isimba amam nematawa sagahapifanai.
44002042	Amam nematawa isimba sagataga Kristen dambaisi esis banages a'owa' ma sagame' basef amom aposel magawalipasafi asandatopalopa atina anis sahin owan sape atogon atin sa' gwa'aisi sandabeten sahali' God atogon atin.
44002043	Nimaguf hiafi God nanda' ametal lu'unai ma hiahaom banagami hiami magatagama lagof amom aposeli. Ea' amam nematawa hiasi a' ombal lu'wami mahas atapis nimaguf hiafi.
44002044	Ea' esis hiasi hi'alas sagahapifa Kraisi sandakolas sape atogon atin sindihimba' opalef asasilifi a' atifilif. Ea' sagawa hiahawes asasisi gwa'aisi uga main hiasi, ina ata' esis atona atini, owa'. Hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam esis hiasii sagahapifanai.
44002045	Ea' esis anis sagahapifanai saso'asa itap asasipi anis paloma anis hiahawes asasisi safe'ma anis epes daindaias satalamasas. Ea' sofa' otamba ma hiahawes isimba satambe'amba sanda'amba saso' epes isimba gwa'aisi mais akasi.
44002046	Ea' esis hiasi nembel atembel ea' nimaguf danda safe' ipat lu'unai Godi. Ea' sakolata safe' sa' gwa'aisi ifagw asasigwi. Esis sonahasa sogaso'as gwa'aisi ma sogatopalopa anis daias ea' sonahasa sakolata saga' gwa'aisi atogon.
44002047	Lifilafi esis sasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol, ea' opalef esis amam nematawa hiasii sagape ando'i bo'walefa esis Kristen ama nimaguf hiafi. Ea' Dembinai nanda' maol nimaguf danda ma nogofa' anis amam nematawa sakwaha waf awafi ma sagafi'mai anen, nowatani mini'ap isimba sagahapifanai.
44003001	Nogota atamba esis Kristen sandabetenatai, Pita naloma Jon mafe' ipat lu'unai Godi ma'i mondabeten. Nemaf afamba ea' wambomota 3 klok.
44003002	Ea' anona aman bo'wagah hondola'anai nape anamba, ma'mana anani'wi fowa' kogolana nape atapina. Dondol esis sanda'ana sofa'ana sahaponana nape ipat lu'unai Godi ando' felefele'ma uta saga'i fasitai. Ma nondailasa moni gwa'aisi maisa esis amam nematawa sawis sagafe'ma lotuwi.
44003003	Aman anamba nati Pitai Jon ma'i mofe' mugawis ipat atamba, nahali' amom biama mogaso'ana anemba otamba anen.
44003004	Owa' Pitai Jon matiti anen dindinip, Pita na'i, “Ina' ata' niti afa' biafa.”
44003005	Ea' nandambema nati amom, okom mandanda' na'i owa' moso'ana anis maefah.
44003006	Owa' Pita na'i, “Ae' moni ake, apa' hiahawes bu'wasi a'i atiasi igasi'inasi isimba. Ae' a'i banagami Jisas Krais Nasaratinai atom a'ipina, dei' safel a' nilutu nefe'.”
44003007	Ea' nahapila lagol kwahisigili aman anamba aunaii, nasa'mana. Ea' kwafalis atis bo'wagah haloma nembawai ha'walelef ananisi banages sataga bo'wes.
44003008	Ea' anen felalana nosafel nalutu ea' nalutu nafe'. Ea' nalomom mafe' mawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon nandagala kwapi' atin nalutu nalemb nafe' nasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.
44003009	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sati anen nafe' nasa'ma agol Godi,
44003010	ea' sogawana sa'i anen ma'una aman anamba bo'wagoh hondola'anai, fowa' nagape dondol uta atamba saga'i fasitai ipat Godi lu'unai nape nandailasa moni maisi. Esis sati anen bo'ona sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' ukup pape hiahaop.
44003011	-
44003012	Aman anamba nandagala ma nagataga bo'ona ea' esis sasagih safi'i ma sogatolona ilaf afamba saga'i ilaf Solomoni. Pita nati isimba, na'ipa esis na'i, “Ipa' epes Israel, dei' maina nomonas hiahawes sagapoma amamba? Dei' maina ipa' pagatiti afa' biafa? Pa'i banagami afa'imi maloma waf usi'ifi afa'isi atis sanda' aman anamba nataga bo'ona nosafel nafe'? Owa'atin endilisi.
44003013	God anamba bafapapa ape'imi Abraham naloma Aisaki Jekop manda' lotumanai, anen atona nanda'ana nataga bo'ona nasa'ma agol Jisasi, nanda' maola anini. Anen ea' aman anamba atona ipa' pandaiwa'mana pagaso'amana amom agufumi gavmani. Dembinai Pailat na'i notagwahona nogafi'i, owa' owa'atin. Ipa' pandaiwa'mana pewa' alafugahana.
44003014	Ipa' pewa alafugaha aman anamba nanda' maol Godi atin, usi'ina endilisii. Ea' pefala Pailat dindinipa anona aman awasinai naha anis epes sagaga'i, ea' nakwahomepanai.
44003015	Apa' aman bu'unai kofagonama nogofa'apa mogafe' ufia'w ambal namili'wi, anamba ea' pahana naga'. Owa' God nasa'mana nosafel matmat wapani ea' afa' biafa wape amam ananifai ogawalapa basefa isimba, wati anen nagape namona endilisi.
44003016	Ea' afa' biafa wahapifa Jisas. Anen atona nafela hapif afa'ini, banagami ananimi manda' aman anamba bo'ona naep ipe'ipi hipai. Banagami Jisasi atom dei' mowa' banaga aman anamba, patolona pegegawanai.
44003017	“Endilisi, alipipai, ae' egawa, ipa' ina pegawa andeande'ma dei' panda' waf afambai awafi ma Jisas, owa'. Amom agufumi ipe'imi wapani amom na'amba atin.
44003018	Fowa' God nawalapa basefa amom profet hiamii, ma Krais, God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Basef ifimba fa'i Krais a' nogame' akafimi. Ea' waf afamba dei' ipa' panda'afi, afamba fandahama basef ifimba amamifi fataga fandawalap endilisi.
44003019	“Dei' ipa' ata' pekwaha nomonas amambai awami ipe'imi, pembema nelelemba Goda nogakwahomepa waf awafi ipe'ifi ma nonda'epa pegataga be'epa.
44003020	Ipa' i'i penda'as na'amba, atiasi Dembinai God nese'epa banagami namumi ma ambagof ipe'igufi. Ama atiasi nogasapa' Krais nogafi'mai ipa'. Aman anamba fowa' God nandandepana ma ipa' ea'i, anen Jisas.
44003021	Dei' napani heven nosasa nemaf afamba God nonda' hiahaom hiami mogataga dambaim wapani. Si'i fowa' naga'ifa ipe'i ma amom profet ananimi bo'om hilili'i.
44003022	Si'i Moses naga'i Jisas na'amba na'i, ‘God Dembinai ipe'inai, atiasi a' nofa' anona sahomepa ipe'inai, nonda'ana nope profet si'i ae'. Ipa' peme' basef ananifi hiafi hi'indalef.
44003023	Ea' epes ami sondaiwa'ma sogame' basefa profet anambai, esis ina ata' sope mini'ap apamba epes Godi, owa'. Atiasi nohas soga'.’
44003024	“Ea' amom profet amamba hiami, Samyuel naloma amom profet mataga magagi'ma anini, hiami ma'iasa dei' nimaguf ifi'i.
44003025	Basef endilisifi atif God naga'ifa ipe'i ma amom profet, dei' fape ma fagatopalopa ipa' wapani. Fowa' God nala' lapa basef banagafi ma bafasepa ipe'isi. Dei' basef ifimba fape endilisi ma fagatopalopa ipa' wapani. Fowa' anen na'ipa Abrahama anaf Jisas nogataga na'i, ‘Anaf owagama bafasena ine'isi ae' egatopalopa esis misi'ah amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilasa sogape andeande' itap hiagoma.’
44003026	Ea' God a nandandepa anen nanda' maol ananinii, nasapana nali' nafi'mai ipa' ma nofalo'mepa natopalopepa nanda'epa pambema nelelemb atona atina pagakwaha waf aunai ipe'inai.”
44004001	Pitai Jon ata' ma'i maloma esis amam nematawa atin, anom pris maloma kepten nugumafi ipat lu'unai Godi maloma anom Sadyusi mafi'i.
44004002	Amom mogawa amom biam mawalapa basef ma'ipasa Jisas notanima nogosafel matmat wapani. Ea' ma'i esis hiasi sogaga'i atiasi sogosafel wapani. Amom dembami ma'i basef ifimba amam biam maga'iefi ina endilisifi. Na'amba amom mandaiwa' a' manda' megahoham.
44004003	Ea' dei' amom mafi'i mombalo' amom biam wambomota awin nandambema. Ea' manda'am manda' kalabus owamb ambamba masasa wafilu kuhimbita.
44004004	Esis amam nematawa hiasi same' basef ifimba Jisas nogosafel nowaga wapani sahapifana. Isimba atis dei' esis sagahapifanai sataga hias, amom atom mataga felefele'ma 5 tausen (5,000). Apa' ina siamba awasi nematawa, owa'.
44004005	Nemaf fagagi'i amom dembami asasimi maloma agufumi maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi, a' mandakolas Jerusalem.
44004006	Dembinai pris Anas, nape nagali'ma pris hiamii, naloma Kaiafas, a Jon, Aleksander ea' anom daiam wapani wambota Anasi, mafi'i hi'alam mandakolas maloma amom dembami.
44004007	Ea' amom amamba hiami manda' amom aposel biam malutu nogohnaep amamisi mahali'am dindinip ma'i, “Ipa' pefa' banagami mamahoma pa'i agol maigila dei' panda' hiahawes isimba? Kias!”
44004008	Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'ina Pita nowa' banagona na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' Israel amam dembipai a ipa' agufipai,
44004009	ipa' dei' pahali' afa' biafa ma wanda' waf bu'wafi wagatopalopa aman anamba bo'wagah aogahinai. Ipa' pa'i pegawa anen nataga bo'ona na'imama.
44004010	I'i a' na'amba ma, dao'. Ipa' hipai a' pendegawa, esis mini'ap Israel hiasi wapani asondogawa, ma banagami agol Jisas Krais Nasaratinaii atogol dei' alop aman anambai banagep ambo'ona nosafel nagalutu naep ipe'ipi. Ipa' pandola Jisas lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai pahana afuna, apa' dei' God nasa'mana nosafili matmat wapani.
44004011	“Basef ifimba fagail Buk Baibeli ma aman anamba fa'i, ‘Otam amamba ipa' pagala' ifagwi pandaiwa'mam pelefatam maga'ihi, dei' a' mandambema mataga mape mali' mowa' banaga ipat atamba.’
44004012	Ina anin epen daian la'ifin niwambilapa mutanimai, owa'atin. Ea' anen atona. Ama ganimba itap hiagoma, fowa' dei' wapani God ina nawalapa agola anona aman daiana ma notopalopapa nokwaha waf awafi nowambilapai ma mogape andeande', owa'atin. Ea' anen atona.”
44004013	Amom agufumi mati Pitai Jon malutu banagem ma'i basef ifimba. Ea' agufumi mogawa amom biam ina manda' skuli, owa'. Amom lolaimi atom. Ea' amom agufumi ukup pehafel kwapete' nomonas hiahawesa amom. Ea' mogawa amom biam ma'i fowa' mape magaloma Jisasi.
44004014	Owa' agufumi mati aman anamba bo'wagah hondola'anai nataga bo'ona, nalutu naloma Pitai Jon. Ea' amom ina ma'i anif basef magwamamef amom biam, owa'atin.
44004015	Ea' ma'ipa amom biama mokwaha ipat atamba mandakolasatai a' muwis ando'. Amom biam magawis ando'i, amom ma'i basef mandame'maef ma'i,
44004016	“Afa' atiasi ata' onda' amam amamba biam wi'imama ma ogasopama malogofam. Dei' main, amom manda' maol banagani si'i God nanda'ani, ea' epes hiasi sagape Jerusalami sogawam. Afa' ina la'ififa ma ombaso'mas uga'i, ‘Amom ina manda' maol inimba’, owa'atin.
44004017	Afa' a' onda'i basef banagafi ma amom biam ina ata' mi'ipasa basef wapani anis daiasa agol agalemba, owa'. Na'amba basef ifimba a' fefe'agon hi'ilagona esis amam nematawa hiasi.”
44004018	Ea' agufumi motanima mofala amom biam mawisi wapani ma'ipam dindinip ma'i, “Ipa' bipa ina ata' pi'ipasa basef ifimba kwasakwasala ma agol Jisasi, ina ata' piwalipasa agol Jisasi ma anis amam nematawa, owa'i.”
44004019	Owa' Pita naloma Jon magwa basef ma'i, “I'i afa' okwaha basef Godi ma ogagi'ma basef ipe'ifi, na'ambai andeande'ma naep Godi a'a owa'? Ipa' ata' ukup pendanda'ma isimba pegawas pewalogas.
44004020	Apa' afa' biafa ina a' osopama malogof, owa'atin. Afa' ogawalapa basef hiafi ma hiahawes watilis wagame'asi.”
44004021	-
44004022	Ea' agufumi mowatania anif basef banagafi ma'ipamef amom biama mogasopama malogof, ea' makwahom mafe'. Esis hiasi sasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol ma hiahaom amamba sati amom biam manda'ami. Na'amba agufumi ina mati anif basef kofagefa ma mogaso'ama akafimi amom, owa'atin. Aman anamba amom biam manda' maol banagani ma bu'unai, aowas ananini natagamana nape atapin nogota lautai afagof 40-pelaiguf.
44004023	Agufumi Judai matagwaha amom biam motanima mafe'ma esis sagahapifanai, ea' ma'ipasa basef hiafi amom pris dembami maloma agufumi maga'ipamafi.
44004024	Esis same'ef ea', hiasi a' nembel atotombel sandabeten sasa'ma agol Godi na'amba sa'i, “Dembinai, ina' nagahapila ilif itapi, ina' a' nanda' itap otaga, a naoh a hiahaom amamba hiami magapaumi.
44004025	Fowa' gani ina' nanda' akunamapa ape'inai Devit na'i basef. Anen nanda' maol ine'ini ea' Ambal bu'unai ine'inai nasa'mana nahali'as na'i, ‘Dei' maina esis owa' Judaisia ukup wandafip a'owa'? Dei' maina esis mini'ap epes ukup awep a'owa' ma Dembinai? Owa' owa'atin. Esis ina la'ifis, owa'.
44004026	Amom dembami king ganimba itap hiagoma mandandombol maloma amom agufumi mandatama mape atogon manda' wandafa mogatalogofa Dembinai God noloma Krais Dembinai nasapa'ana nagafi'ii. Owa', owa'atin, ina la'ifim.’
44004027	“Herot naloma Pontius Pailat maloma anis epes ina Judaisi saloma esis Israel saila basef ifimba Deviti a' sakolata wambel ambalemba atembela sogapa'aga Jisas aman anamba bo'ona hilili'i nanda' maol ine'inii, fowa' ina' nandandepana ea'i.
44004028	Esis sandakolas atogona sonda' hiahaom hiami si'i fowa' ina' banagena okom ine'imi ma'i mogataga.
44004029	Dembinai, ina' okom mondapoma basef hiafi wandafifi esis saga'iefi, ea' nendatopalopa afa' wanda' maola ine'i. Ama afa' banagefa endilisi ogawalapa basef ine'ifi, ma afa' ina ombal mohafa, owa'atin.
44004030	Ina' newamona lagof ine'igufi nihimba'ma esis ina' banagonai ma negatopalopa esis awasisi sogataga bo'wes wapani. Ea' nenda' hiahaom banagami mamimami ma agol Jisasi, anen bo'ona hilili'i nanda'mena maoli.”
44004031	Esis sandabetena ea', same' ipat atamba sandabetenatai bolalata. Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi si'inama esis, ea' sawalapa basef Godi banagambel, esis ina ombal mahasa amom agufumi esis Judai, owa'atin.
44004032	Epes hiasi sagahapifanai nembel atembel, ea' nomonas atifis. Ina anin epen atitin nati anis hiahawes atitis ananisi na'i, “Hiahawes isimba ae'asi atis.” Owa'atin. Hiahawes hiasi asasisi, isimba esis hiasii atis.
44004033	Amom aposel mawalapa basef ma'ipasefa Jisas Dembinai ape'inai notanima nogosafel, ea' basef amamifi banagef a'owa'. Ea' okom Godi nagatopalopa esis dowafi a' lu'una a'owa' ma epes isimba hiasi sagahapifanai.
44004034	Esis sandatopalopa atin. Na'amba ina anin epen atitin la'afena esis hiahawes gwa'aisi main akan, owa'atin. Esis hiasi kofagesa itapi ifagwi, esis saso'asas anis daias satalis saso'asa otamba. Ea' sofa'ai otamba ambamba safi'i,
44004035	saso'amamba amom aposel. Ea' amom manda'amba maso' isimba gwa'aisi mais akasi.
44004036	Ea' anona aman bu'unai agol ananigili Josep amom aposel manda'mana anagol agol Barnabas. Agol agalemba kofagogola na'amba, “Epen nogowa' banaga ukup epesi.” Anen anona Livai, aman anamba anin ailan Saiprusinai.
44004037	Anen naso'asa itap ananipi anis epes satalep saso'ana otamba nofa'amba nafi'i naso'amamba amom aposel ma mogatopalopa anis gwa'aisi mais akasi.
44005001	Anona aman agilinama Ananaias, anen nape naloma waulu'mana anani'wi Sapaira. Anen naso'asa anep itap asasipi anis epes satalep.
44005002	Ea' nofa' otamba du'wanimba atemba naso'amamba aposel, du'wanimba ba'oma esis. Anen nambaso'ma amom na'i otamba ea' ma'umba naso'amamba si'imba. Waulu'mana wapani kogawa isimba.
44005003	Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Ananaias, ina' na'i aho'ma Satan nafi'i nawis nape si'ina ma nembel ine'imbili ma dei' nagambaso'ma Ambal bu'unai Godi nagambaho' otamba du'wanimba ma itap apamba?
44005004	Fowa' esis ata' owa' sotala itapa, nogota atamba ata' itap ine'ipi atep. Ama dei' satalep ea', otamba ine'imbai nimafiamba. Dei' maina ina' okom mandanda'ma waf afambai awafi ma nembel ine'imbili? Ina nambaso'ma apa' epes atepa, owa'. Ina' nambaso'ma God.”
44005005	Ananaias name' basef ifimba, nowa itap a' afuna. Ea' esis same' basef ifimba ma nagaga', ombel mahas kwapete' a'owa'.
44005006	Ea' anom amam sa'umi mafi'i mofa' alop ananipi mowa'ap lowaf mofa'ana mafe' mawana.
44005007	Ama nogota bandata kwasakwasala awa wanifin a' nafe'ma main, ako'w waulu'mana kwafi'i kwawisi. Ako'w ina kogawa hiahawes sagatagama anini, owa'.
44005008	Ea' Pita na'ipa'w na'i, “Ipa' pegefa'ani moni ea' inimba nandahama itap apamba ea' ma'win, a'a owa'?” Ako'w kwambaso'mana kwa'i, “Aho'! Ma'win inimba atin.”
44005009	Ea' Pita na'ipa'w na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' bipa pa'i basef baso'afi pandame'maefa pagagwamba Ambal bu'unai Dembinaii? Neme'! Amam amamba ata' mofa' waulunamena ine'inai mafe' mawana, amamba mafi'i malutu uta. Atiasi mofa' ina' wapani nigi'mana nefe'!”
44005010	Ea' kwafalis atis ako'w kowa itap felefele'ma bo'wagah Pitai afu'w. Ea' amom sa'umi mawisi nomon mati ako'w afu'w, a' mofa'akw mafe' mawa'w felefele'ma waulunama'w akwa'unai.
44005011	Ea' esis Kristen hiasi saloma esis amam nematawa sagame' basefa hiahaom amambai, a' ombel mahas kwapete'!
44005012	Amom aposel manda' hiahaom banagami mamimami hiami la'afena esis amam nematawa. Ea' epes isimba hiasi sogahapifanai hi'alas a' nembel atembel sandakolas sape atogon ilaf ipat Solomoni felefele'ma ipat lu'unai Godi.
44005013	Anis amam nematawa hiasi ombel mahas, ea' ina safi'i sandakolas salomas, owa'. Apa' isimba sagape ando'i sasa'ma agof esis Kristeni sa'i esis epes bu'wasi.
44005014	Ea' anis amam nematawa hiasi sahapifa Dembinai, ea' safi'i timbi tambel sawisa mini'ap ananipi atapis sape.
44005015	Esis saloma anis daias wapani sati banagami amamba amom aposel manda'ami. Ea' sofa' awasisi safi'i sambe'as sa'oh ando' ufiawa, salas belitagw gwagwigwagwi sofa'as safi'i. Esis ukup pa'i, i'i Pita ina nefe'ma esisa, ea' hapaimi. Andeande'ma owaf fenda' ambal ananili atol lefe' lumbisila'as.
44005016	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi walemb hielimbi bagape felefele'ma Jerusalami wapani safi'i sandakolas salomas. Esis sofa'ai awasisi safi'i salumai epes isimba ambagof awami mapais magahambombagasi. Ea' epes isimba hiasi sataga bo'wes hi'alas wapani.
44005017	Ea' pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii naloma amom amamba hiami alipumi ananimi Sadyusi anep mini'ap, amom kowalam a'owa' ma maol bu'wani amom aposel manda'ani. Dei' main amom mati esis hiasi saila basef amamifi.
44005018	Isimba atis dei' amom mosafel mombalo' amom aposel maso'am kalabus lu'wami.
44005019	Ama a'i owamb, owa' anona ensel Dembinaii nafi'i nawisi' uta lu'utai indalelemba kalabus ea' nafelai amom aposel mawisi ando' na'i,
44005020	“Ipa' fo'o pilutu ipat Godi lu'unai nomon pewalapa basefa amam nematawa hiasi ma waf hiafi dambaifi ma ambal namili.”
44005021	Ea' amom aposel mame' basef ifimba, kuhimbita mafe' ipat Godi lu'unai ma'ipa esis amam nematawa. Pris anamba dembinai naloma amom alipumi ananimi mafi'i mofalai agufumi hiami Israeli mafi'i mandakolas atogon. Ea' masapa' basef fafe' ipat sanda' kalabusa, mofa'ai amom aposel mugafi'i.
44005022	Ea' amom plisman mafe' ipat sanda' kalabusa, owa' ina mati amom aposel, owa'atin. Ea' motanima mafe' ma'ipa amom dembami ma'i,
44005023	“Afa' wati uta ipat kalabusi sowalowata sisihita, ea' amom plisman mugumafiatai malutu mumafi utagw hiagwi andeande'. Afa' wawisi' uta wawis nomon, apa' afa' ina wati anin epen atitin nape nomon, owa'atin.”
44005024	Ea' kepten nugumafi ipat Godi naloma amom pris dembami meme' basef ifimba ea' nomonas salasafe' hiahias ma'i, “Maim amamba atiasi dei' mogatagai?”
44005025	Amom mape nomonas salasafe'ma isimba owa', anona aman nafi'i nataga na'ipam na'i, “Peme', amam amamba ipa' panda'am magape kalabusi dei' malutu ipat Godi nomon ma'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa.”
44005026	Ea' kepten naloma amom plisman mafe' mufa'i amom aposel mafi'i. Apa' amom ina maham, owa'atin. Amom ombel maham ma'i, “Na'amba esis amam nematawa asokwaha otamba sohafa.”
44005027	Amom mofa'ai amom aposel malutu nogohnaep amom dembami esis Judai la'afen. Ea' pris anamba dembinai na'ipam na'i,
44005028	“Afa' wa'ipipa basef banagafi wa'i, ipa' ina pewalapa basef pi'ipasef amam nematawa ma agol agalemba, owa'i. Apa' owa', ipa' panda' basef ifimba fape fafe'agon hi'alagon Jerusalem asi'igina basef ipe'ifi. Ea' pa'i basef pasapagafa pa'i kofagema afa'imi, afa' waha aman anamba naga'.”
44005029	Owa' Pita naloma amom aposel magwa basef ma'ipam ma'i, “Afa' ina ugi'ma basef epesi, owa'. Afa' undagi'ma basef Godi atif.
44005030	Ipa' pandola Jisas lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ea' pahana naga'. Owa', God anamba bafapapa apa' Juda manda' lotumanai a' nasa'mana nosafel wapani wandof.
44005031	Ea' God nofa'ana nalota ilif nahaponana nape lagol kwahisigili ananigili. Ea' nape agilinai ma notopalopa apa' Israel hiapai, nofa'apa mutanimai membema nelelemba opalefa nogakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi okom mogoso'anaf.
44005032	Fowa' dei' wapani afa' waloma Ambal bu'unai Godi wagawalapa basefa hiahawes isimba hiasi afa' watilis ogogawasi. God naso'asa Ambal bu'unai ananinai ea' ma amam nematawa sagaila basef ananifii.”
44005033	Amom mame' basef ifimba, a' ukup wandafip kwapete' endilisi ma'i moha amom aposel moga'.
44005034	Owa' anona dembinai nalutu la'afena amom dembami esis Judai, anen Farisi agilinama Gameliel. Anen dembinai tisa ma mu'uli Godi, ea' esis amam nematawa saganifela agol ananigili. Na'ipa amoma mogakwaha amom aposel mugawis ando' kwasakwasala.
44005035	Ea' na'ipa amom dembami Juda na'i, “Ipa' amam Israelipai, ipa' i'i penda' anis maemaefaha amom amamba ma, ipa' ata' ukup pendanda' andeande' pili'.
44005036	Ipa' pegawa ea' nogota tatumba fowa', anona aman Teudas nosafel na'i, ‘Ae' aman dembiwai, agiliwai.’ Ea' amam hiami felefele' ma 400-pelaim mafe' mailana. Owa' anis epes sahana naga', ea' amam magahapifanai mafa' mafe' atona biana. Ea' maol amamini a' newala dowaf.
44005037	“A'i owa' maina nogota atamba gavman nogofa'asa agof esis amam nematawa hiasii, anona Judas daiana Galilinai nosafel nambemefa ukup anis epes hiasi. Ea' safe' sailana safela wandaf sapa' saloma gavman sa'i sili'amonana. Owa' sahana naga' wapani, ea' epes isimba hiasi sagahapifanai safa' safe' atona biana hi'alas.
44005038	Na'amba dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipa' ombel mondahepama amam amamba, ea' pekwahom mopano. I'i amom monda' maola epes atisai, atiasi maol inimba awasin newala si'i maol amom biam doko' ali' aga'ipipami.
44005039	Apa' i'i God atona nowa' banaga amoma basef ifimba kofagefa ai, ipa' ina dao' atiasi la'ifipama pegasopama amom, owa'atin. Na'amba ipa' apepa' peloma God!”
44005040	Ea' amom dembami maila basef Gamelieli ma'i, “Afa' oham atin dowaf.” Ea' mofala amom aposel mafi'i, ma'ipa amom plismana mogaham. Ea' ma'ipam dindinip ma'i, “Ipa' ina ata' pi'i basef ifimba ma agol Jisasi wapani, owa'i.” Ea' makwaha amom a' mafe'.
44005041	Ea' amom aposel makwaha amom dembami Juda a' mafe' mawis ando'. Mandagala God nati amom ila ma mogofa' akafimi nimanimi ma agol Jisasi.
44005042	Amom ina makwaha maol inimba magawalipasa basef bu'wafi ma Jisas anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, owa'atin. Nimaguf danda amom manda' maol mawalipa esis amam nematawa hiasi ipat Godi lu'unai, ifagw asasigwi wapani.
44006001	Nogota atamba esis alipisi sagaila Jisasi sataga hias a'owa'. Esis Juda hiasi apa' anis saga'i diga Griki safitap saloma anis Juda saga'i diga Hibrui ea' sa'i, “Nimaguf hiafi ipa' pagatopalopa esis amam nematawa isimba gwa'aisi main akasi, apa' anowa nematawa alifiwai ape'iwai owa'.”
44006002	Amom aposel 12-pelaim mati nimanimi amamba a' mofalai esis alipisi isimba hiasi safi'i ma'ipas ma'i, “I'i afa' okwaha maol inimba ogawalipasa basef Godi ma ogatambe' gwa'aisi, na'ambai ina andeande', owa'atin.
44006003	Ipa' Kristen alipipai, ipa' ata' pewando'ma anom amam 7-pelaim la'afena ipa' magape andeande'ma naep esis amam nematawai, Ambal bu'unai Godi nagape si'inami nomonas bu'wasi sagapaumi. Ama afa' onda'am mopoma mugumafi maol inimba.
44006004	Apa' afa' opoma ondabeten atin a oga'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa ogatopalopas.”
44006005	Amam nematawa hiasi ukup pa'i basef ifimba. Ea' sandandepa Stiven, anen nagahapifa Jisasi ma Ambal bu'unai Godi nagape si'inanai. Ea' sandandepa Filip naloma Prokoras, a Nikanon naloma Timon maloma Parmenas Nikolas. Aman anamba Nikolas Antiokinai, fowa' nafi'i naila waf esis Judai.
44006006	Ea' esis hiasi sanda' amam amamba malutu felefele'ma nogohnaep amom aposeli mawamona lagofa amom manda'mam betena monda' maol inimba.
44006007	Ea' basef Godi fandasauli' fafe'. Amam nematawa hiasi sagape Jerusalami a' sataga alipisi sahapifa Jisas. Owa' pris amamba hiami wapani mahapifa Jisas mailana.
44006008	God natopalopa Stiven nowa' banagona, nanda' banagami mamimami lu'wami la'afena esis amam nematawa.
44006009	Ea' anom amam mosafel ma'i basef mandahihianamaef maloma Stiven. Amom anom amam Juda manda' anin lotu daiani, esis sa'i ipat manda' lotuwatai agol na'amba. Amom fowa' manda' maol mape sisihima anis daias apa' dei' mape wahifim. Amom walemb Sairini naloma Aleksandriai ma anep itap lu'upa daiap Silisiai Esia.
44006010	Ambal bu'unai Godi naso'ana gawa fasini Stiven. Ea' amom ina la'ifima mi'i basef migikila'ana, owa'atin.
44006011	Ea' manda' anef waf baso'aifi ma mogaha Stiven. Ea' mofa'i anom amam ma'i basef ma'i, “Afa' wame' anen na'i basef nanda' Moses findiwana naloma Goda basef amamifi.”
44006012	Ea' amom masa'mai nelelemb esis amam nematawai saloma amom agufumi asasimi maloma amom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi. Ea' esis safe'ma Stiven sombalo'ana sofa'ana safe'ma amom dembami Juda.
44006013	Ea' sanda' anom amam malutu ma mogasapagana anif basef baso'aifi. Amam amamba ma'i, “Dondol lifilafi aman anamba naga'i basef awafi ma ipat lu'unai Godi apa' manda' lotuma naloma mu'uli fowa' God naga'ipa Mosesani.
44006014	Apa' mame' anen na'i, ‘Aman anamba Jisas Nasaratinai atiasi nohambombaga ipat anamba apa' manda' lotuma a' nonda' anef waf dambaifi feha'ofa waf hiafi fowa' Moses naga'ipapaf ape'i.’”
44006015	Ea' amom hiami mandakolasi hi'alam naep do' matiti Stiven ea' mati amaga ananigai a' gogala' gataga si'i amaga anona enseli.
44007001	Ea' pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii nahali' Stiven na'i, “Basef ifimba endilisi a'a owa'?”
44007002	Ea' Stiven na'ipam basef laufi na'i, “Ipa' sahin owan, a ipa' ahape, ipa' peme' ae'. Fowa' bafamapa ape'inai Abraham nagape itap lu'upa Mesopotamia ina dei' a' nafe' wambel Haran, ama nogota atamba God Dembinai nogogala'i a' natagamana.
44007003	Ea' God na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nekwaha wambel itap ine'isi peloma sahin owan ine'isi a' nefe' anagon lauguni nepe anep itap ae' a'i igihimba'menap ine'i.’
44007004	“Ea' dei' Abraham nakwaha itap lu'upa Kaldia a' nafe' nafe' nataga nape wambel Haran. Ama main, ahamana ananinai naga', ea' God nasapa'ana nafi'i nape itap apa'e dei' apa' magapaipi.
44007005	God ina dei' naso'ana itap apamba Abraham ma nogahapilap si'ip, ata' owa'atin. Itap apamba anep kwaia'up wapani si'i apop kwasala mende', owa'atin. Apa' God na'i basef endilisi atifa anaf owagama, dao' anen a' noso'ana itap apamba anona nohapilap nogaloma esis bafasana ananisi anaf sigi' sogatagai sogahapilap. Nogota atamba Abraham awani ata' akana God naga'ipana basef ifimba.
44007006	Na'ipana na'i, ‘Mini'ap awasi ine'isi anaf sope itap esis mini'ap anis epes daiasi. Ea' mini'ap epes isimba anis daiasi anaf sonda' mini'ap awasi ine'isi sonda' maol numa'uni agof akas sope lafela esis ea' sonda'as kwapete'as sope sofe' sotaga nogota lautai afagof 400-pelaiguf.
44007007	Apa' anaf owagama ae' egwamasa waf awafi esis. Ama anaf wapani esis mini'ap awasi ine'isi sogakwaha itap apamba sufi'i sope sonda' lotuma ae' itap apa'e.’”
44007008	“Ea' God na'i Abraham atiasi notopa' alopa nogaila basef banagafi God nali' nala' lap nagalomana afi. Ama main, Abraham name' basef ifimba nailif natopa' alop ananipi anola Aisak nogamana ananinai ma nimaguf 8-pelaif fala'ana, a' natopa'mana alop ananipi wapani. Ama main, Aisak nataga ahama Jekopi, ea' Jekop a' ahama bafapapa amamba 12-pelaim.
44007009	Amom bafapapa 11-pelaim kowalama owamam Josep. Na'amba mali'amonana anop nomop daias satalona ma agol akana nonda' maol nogape lafela esis. Ea' sofa'ana safe' itap lu'upa Isip. Apa' owa' God nape nalomana.
44007010	Anen natopalopana natalogofa nimanimi hiami ananimi nape wahifina. Ama nemaf afamba anen na'i basef nagaloma dembinai king Isipinai Fero, God naso'ana gawa fasini na'i basef nalomana ma nanda' king Fero okom magailana. Ea' dei' king anamba nanda'ana nataga nape dembinai gavmana itap apamba Isip ea' numafi hiahaom hiami ma ipat anen kingi.
44007011	“A'i owa' main, nolom lu'unai nataga itap apamba Isip anamba hiagoma nafe'agon hi'alagon nafe' nataga itap lu'upa Kainan wapani, ea' esis satagama nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' esis bafasapa ape'isi sagape Kenani ina ata' sofa' anis gwa'aisi, owa'atin.
44007012	Owa' Jekop Josep ahamana a' name' basef sa'i gwa'aisi sa'oh itap apamba Isip. Ea' nasapa' amom bafapapa ape'imi mali' mafe' dambadamba.
44007013	Ama main, magi' motanima mafe'ma bif, ea' Josep na'ipa amom sahopana na'amba na'i, ‘Ae' Josep.’ Ea' dei' king a' nogawa amom wambota Josepi mafi'i.
44007014	“Ea' Josep nasapa' basef fafe' nofalai ahamana Jekop nokwaha Kainan nigi'mana nogafi'i Isip, noloma esis wambota ananisi hiasi sataga 75-pelais.
44007015	Na'amba Jekop niliana itap apamba Isip naloma bafapapa ape'imi ma main, amom a' maga'.
44007016	Amom maga' ea', sofa'am sotanima safe' wambel Sekem sawam matmat atamba fowa' Abraham nowasa' otamba nagatalagoma ma awasi Hemoi.
44007017	“Nemaf afamba God na'i endilisi ma nonda' hiahawes isimba. Fowa' anen naga'ipa Ebrahama anen atiasi nonda'asi, nogota atamba felefele' dei' tataga. Ea' esis mini'ap ape'ipi Israel asataga lu'wis ea' amam nematawa a' hias a'owa' sape itap hiagoma Isip.
44007018	Ea' anona aman dambainai nataga dembinai king, apa' anen ina nogawa na'i fowa' Josep nagape dembinai ma Isip, owa'.
44007019	King anamba nambaso'mas nanda'masa waf a maol numa'uni ma mini'ap esis ape'isi. Anen nanda' waf awafi ma esis bafasapa ape'isi, anen a' banagona endilisi na'i esis sokwaha awasi asasisi sope ando' ma a' afis.
44007020	Nogota atamba Moses ma'mana kolana. Anen awani fasinai a'owa'. Ea' mamasana sumafiana andeande' ipat asasitai ma aomb wanemb.
44007021	Ama main, sofa'ana safe' sambaho'wana na'oh alop ando'. Owa' dembinai king Fero nogamana kwafi'i kwatolona kofa'ana kwalagana si'i nogama'w akwa'unai si'ina.
44007022	Ea' Moses nanda' skul nalafa gawa hiani esis Isipi ea' anen a' aman dembinai nanda' maol banagani naga'i banagafi ma seme'ef sagagi'mif.
44007023	Moses a'i owa' nape ma dambena ma afagof 40-pelaiguf ea', a' okom mandanda'ma esis wambota ananisi Israel ea' nafe' natilis.
44007024	Nati anona Isipinai nahambombaga anona Israelinai a'owa'. Ea' Moses natopalopa Israelinai naha aman anamba Isipinai afuna.
44007025	Ea' anen nomonas sandanda' sa'i, epes ae'asi atiasi si'i na'amba si'i, ‘God a' natopalopa apa' ma lagof Mosesi ma notagwahepa mugape wahifipa.’ Owa' owa'atin. Esis ukup ina pandanda' na'amba, owa'.
44007026	“A'i owa' wafilu, Moses notanima nafe' natilis wapani owa' nati anom biam amom atom Israel mapa' wapani. Ea' na'i nohagofa amom biam nohape'am ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipa' atipa sahomana owamana penda'as na'amba, owa'i. Dei' maina ipa' pagahambombaga ipa' atipa?’
44007027	“Owa', aman anamba nali' nagahambombaga anini nambasi' Moses na'ipana na'i, ‘Ami na'ipina ma negape dembinai ma negawaloga afa'?
44007028	A'i ina' na'i nehe si'i nambati' nagaha aman anamba Isipinai nagaga'?’
44007029	Anen na'ias na'amba owa', Moses ombel mahana nafa' nafe'. Nafe' nape anep itap lu'upa Midian laogoma. Ama main, naso' nemata'w nola awasi bias.
44007030	“Ama afagof 40-pelaiguf fafe'ma hi'alagof, owa' anona ensel Dembinaii natagamana itap wafigima epes akagoma felefele'ma halaf Sainai. Ensel nape nomona nif ileliwa fandom magatagai anoga lawag sa'ugai.
44007031	Ea' Moses natolom a' nomonas hiahawes sandanda'ma amamba magataga ma anini. Ea' nafe' felefele'ma nagatolom andeande', owa' Dembinai na'ipana na'i,
44007032	‘Ae' God amom bafapena ine'imi manda' lotumai. Ae' God Abrahami Aisak Jekop fowa' manda' lotumai.’ Ea' Moses bolalana ombel mahana ma nogatologon.
44007033	“Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Tagwaha su magape bo'wagah ine'igahii. Itap apa'e ina' dei' nagalutuma itap ae'api hilili'i.
44007034	Ae' ati esis mini'ap amam nematawa ae'asi sagame' akafimi lu'wami itap apamba Isip. Ae' ame' lef asasinai ea', dei' a' isila'i ma etopalopasa egelefata nimanimi amamba asasimi. Na'amba dei' ina' ea' safel. Ae' a'i esapa'ena netanima nefe' Isip.’
44007035	“Moses aman anamba fowa' sosambalona saga'i, ‘Ami na'i ina' nepe dembinai ma negawalogapa?’ Dei' aman anamba atona God nasapa'ana nafe' si'i dembinai ma nugumafias nowambilasi nofa'as sogotanimai. God nowa' banagona ma anamba ensel natagamana nalomana naga'i ma lawag agamba sa'ugai.
44007036	Moses ea' nao'was safe' sakwaha Isip, nanda' maol naninani banagani si'i God nanda'ani ma itap lu'upa Isip a naoh embel akwahimi ea' anamba itap wafigima epes akagoma, ma afagof agwafomba 40-pelaiguf.
44007037	Moses aman anamba ma'una anen na'ipa esis Israel naga'i, ‘Atiasi owagama God nosapa' anona sahomepa ipe'inai nonda'ana nope profet si'i Ae'.’
44007038	Ama a'i owa', esis Israel safe' sandakolas anamba wafigima fataupigima Moses aman anamba atona nape nagaloma esisi. Anen nape naloma bafapapa ape'imi wapani. Anona ensel nape naloma Moses naso'ana basef Godi halafuta atamba Sainai ea' Moses naso'apa basef ifimba ambal namilifi apa'.
44007039	Apa' bafasapa ape'isi sandaiwa'ma sogame' basef ananifi, owa'. Esis sosambalona ea' sanda'agama anamba fowa' sagapanima Isip ukup paipailagon.
44007040	Ea' sa'ipa aman anamba Eran sa'i, ‘Aman anamba Moses nofa'apai Isip magafi'ii, apa' ina mogawana nafe' nasa natawa ani? Ea' ina' da'mapa anona god baso'amunai ape'inai ma anen nope nogaloma apa'.’
44007041	Nemaf afamba esis sanda' anona bulmakau ea' sondolalima god anamba baso'amunai. Ea' sandagala ma god anamba sanda'ana lagof asasigufi atugufi.
44007042	Ea' dembinai God naso'asa alafuga esis nakwaha esisa sonda' lotu sogafela agofa awin owambini alipini neloma ondowa si'i basef fagape buk profeti fagail buk Baibeli fa'ias faga'i, ‘Ipa' epes Israel, ipa' paha bulmakau maloma sipsip pendalali ma ae' pagape anamba wafigima epes akagoma afagof 40-pelaiguf, a'a? Owa'atin!
44007043	Ipa' pefa' ipat selitai panda' lotuma Molokatai, ea' pefa'ata taloma ametal si'i ondo'w god baso'amunai Refani, ambagof awami amamba hiami ipa' panda'ama panda' lotumami. Na'amba atiasi ae' a' ili'amonepa pefe' pepe lauguni peloma wambel Babilon gani wa'ol.’
44007044	“Fowa' bafasapa ape'isi sape anamba wafigima epes akagoma, nogota atamba sowalo sel si'i ipat sanda' lotu. Ipat atamba tihimba'mapa atamba God nagapautai. Ipat atamba God naga'ipasa basef ananifima. Esis sanda' ipat lotu inimba sel nandahama ikwaf afamba God nigihimba'manaf Mosesi. God na'ipana ma nonda'af ea' na'amba atin.
44007045	Ama main, amom bafapapa ape'imi mafi'i maloma Josua ma mogofa' itap esis anis epes mini'ap daiapi. Ea' God nali'amona esisa nogohnaep esis bafasapa ape'isi. Ama nemaf afamba sofa'ai ipat atamba selitai, ea' sanda'ata totawa na'a atapita tape nafi'i nafi'i nogota Devit nagape dembinai king.
44007046	Devit nanda' waf bu'wafi ma God natopalopana nogowa' banagona. Ea' nandabetena Goda anen na'i nogala' anota ipat bu'utai ma God anamba fowa' Jekop nanda' lotumanai.
44007047	Apa' owa', nogamana Solomon nanda' ipat anamba lu'unai Godi nala'ana.
44007048	Owa' owa atin. God dembinai endilisinai, ina nagape ifagw agwamba epes sagala'agw lagof asasigufii, owa'atin. Basef ifimba fagail Buk Baibeli si'i anona profet naga'if,
44007049	“Dembinai naga'i na'amba na'i, “Heven si'i sia ae' agapaini a itap apa'e ae' ahaponai bo'wagah hagatomama. Ipat mamahotama atiasi ipa' pela'meata ae'? Owa'atin. Atiasi ae' epoma noma'w anima? Owa'atin.
44007050	Lagof ae'agufi atogof anda' hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam,’
44007051	“Ipa' epes panda' du'wanigai. Ipa' epes pegelelama basef Godi si'i anis daias owa' sogogawa Godia. Ipa' pandaiwa' ma pegame' basef Godi ma nelelembi aligah ipe'isi. Dondol ipa' pegesambala Ambal bu'unai Godi. Ipa' panda'am na'amba atin si'i fowa' a'mesepa ipe'isi sanda'am.
44007052	Amom profet hiami fowa' magapani esis akusipa ipe'isi sanda' waf awafima amom hiami hi'alam saham sanda'am aom. Saha amom profet maga'ipasa aman bu'unai hilili'i anaf nogafi'ii. Ea' dei' ipa' pawalapana ma amom boumi mahana naga' ea'.
44007053	Fowa' God nase'epa mu'uli ananini ipa'. Ea' amom ensel atom ma'ipipa mu'uli inimba, apa' owa' ipa' ina peme'an pagi'man, owa'atin.”
44007054	Amom mame' basef ifimba faha nelelemb amamilimbi endilisi a'owa'. Amom nalelef finditapa imunam dogw ukup wandafum endilisi ma Stiven.
44007055	Apa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'inama anen, naniga nati heven naep do' endilisi. Nati banagami mogogala'i Godi ea' nati Jisas nalutu wa'ol lagol kwahisigili Godi.
44007056	Ea' Stiven na'ipam na'i, “Peme'! Ae' ati heven a' nandawisi' ea' Dembinai nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi nalutu wa'ol lagol kwahisigili Godi.”
44007057	Ea' amom gigal ma'oh mehip a'owa', masopama aligah amamigahi mandaiwa'ma mogame' basef ifimba. Ea' mosafel masagih mafe' atef mombalo' Stiven.
44007058	Ea' mali'amonana nakwaha wambel nawis nalutu wambel ando'. Amom doko' mali' magasapaganama basefi mowalia siaogw amamugwi mambe'agw gwa'oh felefele'ma anona aman sa'unai nagalutuma agilinama Sol. Mowaliagw gwa'oha mokwaha otamba mehip mogaha Stiven.
44007059	Makwaha otamba mahana atin owa', nandabeten na'amba na'i, “O Dembinai Jisas, ina' fa'ago ambal ae'ali!”
44007060	Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa na'i mehip na'i, “O Dembinai, ina' owa'i negwamama waf anamba aunai amoma, owa'i.” Stiven na'ias na'amba, a' naga'.
44008001	Ea' Sol nomonas atifis naloma amom magaha Stiven nagaga'i. Nogota atamba esis amam nematawa sandaiwa'ma esis Kristen sagape Jerusalami, sahas saso'as akafimi nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' isimba atis dei' esis sagahapifanai asafa' safe'agon hi'alagon atona biana ma anamba itap lu'upa Judiai Samaria. Apa' amom aposel atom ata' mapani atapim Jerusalem.
44008002	Anom amam magaila waf Godi andeande'i mofa' Stiven mawana, manda' lef lu'wani ma anen.
44008003	Apa' Sol nanda' maol na'i nohambombaga esis Kristen. Anen nafe' nawis ifagw hiagwi atona atin nofa'ai amam nematawa hiasi sagahapifanai. Ea' nahondo'as nofa'as nafe' nanda'as sanda' kalabus.
44008004	Esis Kristen safa' safe'agon hi'alagon walemb hielimbi analemb daindaialemb sawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi sa'ipasef.
44008005	Ea' Filip nowala nafe' anambel wambel itap lu'upa Samaria nawalipasa basef bu'wafi na'i Jisas anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
44008006	Amam nematawa hiasi same' basefa anen asati banagami anen nanda'ami ea' sagahembe' andeande'ma basef ananifi.
44008007	Banagami amamba na'amba. Amam nematawa hiasi ambagof awami magapaisi, ambagof amamba manda'am wiwa ma'oh kwapete' endilisi a' makwaha esis mawisi mafa' mafe'. Ea' epes isimba lagof bo'wagah awamisi, anis isimba bihitagof fofowagalamasi, esis hiasi asataga bo'wes wapani.
44008008	Ea' dei' esis wambel ambalemba sofa' dagala lu'wani.
44008009	Ea' anona aman nape agilinama Saimon. Aman anamba fowa' nanda' naohi ufiali nape atapina nafi'i nataga dei' nemaf afamba. Ea' nanda' ukup esis amam nematawa Samariaisi a malamafe' hiahiam a'owa'. Aman anamba na'ias na'i, “Ae' aman dembiwai.”
44008010	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi agof akasi a agufisi, esis hiasi hi'alas sandahembe'ma na'amba atina sagame' basef Saimoni. Sa'ias sa'i, “Aman anamba anen nofa' banagami amamba dembinai Godi sofalam saga'i banagami lu'wamii.”
44008011	Ea' esis banagesa sagame' basef ananifi. Dei' main, nimaguf hiafi anen nanda' waf fafifafi hiafi banagafi ko'op ufial ea' satelef a' nomonas salasafe' hiahias.
44008012	Ea' Filip nawalipasa basef bu'wafi esis hiasi. Nawalipasa agol Jisas Kraisi ma sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Ea' sahapifa basef ifimba sofa' baptais.
44008013	Ea' aman anamba Saimon wapani nahapifa Jisas a' nofa' baptais nape naloma Filip. Anen nati Filip nanda' ametal banagonai naninani si'i God nanda'ani, ea' a' okom hiahaom mapaona.
44008014	Amom aposel magape Jerusalami mame' basefa esis Samaria asofa' basef Godi. Na'amba masapa' Pitai Jon mafe'ma esis.
44008015	Amom biam miliana mandabetena Goda nogatopalopa esisa sogofa' Ambal bu'unai Godi.
44008016	Dei' main, Ambal Godi ina dei' nawisa esis, ata' owa'atin. Esis sofa' baptais atisa agol Jisasi atogol.
44008017	Ea' amom biam mawamona lagofa esis ea' sofa' Ambal bu'unai Godi.
44008018	Ea' Saimon nati amom aposel biam mawamona lagof atogofa esis sofa' Ambal Godi. Na'amba anen nofa' moni ananini nafi'mai amom na'ipam na'i,
44008019	“Ipa' bipa pese'e banagami amamba ae' wapani ma ae' i'i egawamona lagofa anin epena, negefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi.”
44008020	Owa' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Hiahaom fasimi God nagaso'asam dowaf si'i preseni, amamba ina' okom mandanda' na'i ilama negatalom otamba ine'imbai? Owa'atin. Ae' a'i otamba ine'imbai beloma ina' pefe' wambel awambili hel.
44008021	Ina' owa' bo'wenama nigawisa maol inimba Godi afa' wanda'ania, owa'atin endilisi! Dei' main, okom ine'inai ina usi'inama naep Godi, owa'atin.
44008022	Ina' newa' alafugama waf afamba awafi ine'ifi nembema nembel nefe'ma God. Ea' nendabetena Dembinai ma nokwaha kofagema amamba ma okom ine'imi magapoma waf awafii.
44008023	Dei' main, ae' ati ina' kowalena a'owa' ma presen hiahaom fasimi God nagaso'apami. Ea' nembel ine'imbili awambela isimba, waf afamba awafi afewa'ena atapif nape si'i kalabus.”
44008024	Ea' Saimon nagwa basef na'i, “Ipa' bipa pendabetena Dembinai ma anen nogatopalopa ae'. Ama hiahaom amamba ipa' paga'iami ina a' motagame, owa!”
44008025	Ea' amom biam ma'ipasa basef Dembinai Jisas Kraisi esis amam nematawa. Ama main, motanima mondowasa' Jerusalem. Magafe' ufia'w, mawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi walemb hielimbi esis Samaria.
44008026	Ea' anona ensel Dembinaii na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ina' nendendombola negafe' gani wa'ol awin natopa' negemba'ma, ma ufia'w kwa'waha Jerusalem kwiliana kwagafe' Gasama. Ufia'w akwamba fowa' esis sagafe'akwi. Dei' a' owa'. Ufia'w akwamba kwape anamba wafigima fataupigima.”
44008027	Ea' Filip nosafel a' nafe'. Ea' natagama anona aman Itiopiainai ufia'w akwamba. Anen aman dembinai nugumafi otamba hiambai ma kwin akwamba dembe'wi gavman kugumafi esis walemb hiagoma Itiopiai, sofala'w saga'i Kandesi. Aman anamba nimbewa' nafi'i Jerusalema nanda' lotu,
44008028	dei' na'i notanima nefe'. Anen natoma karis ananimi si'i wilkar ea' natoma nati basef fagail buk Baibeli fowa' profet Aisaia nanda'afi a' nafe'.
44008029	Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ina' fo'o felefele'ma aman anamba nefe' neloma wilkar nanimba.”
44008030	Ea' Filip nasagih nafe' felefele'ma anen, a' name' aman anamba natalifa basef ifimba Aisaia nanda'afi. Ea' Filip nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' negawa basef ifimba kofagefa dei' natalifif nagafi'ii, a'a owa'?”
44008031	Ea' aman anamba nagwa basef na'i, “I'i anin epen owa' nihimba'mefa, dei' egawa basef ifimba i'imama?” Ea' na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ina' lotai netoma neloma ae'.”
44008032	Basef ifimba du'wanif Godi anen nagatalififi faga'iasa Jisas fa'i, “Esis sao'wana nafe' si'i sipsip ama sa'i sohana nogaga'. Anen si'i sipsip noganai esis sahapilana sagatopa'mana auf ananimi, anen ina nanda'am fe' atin na'oh, owa'atin. Ea' na'amba atina aman anamba, ina malogol gagalana, owa'atin.
44008033	Esis sapa'agana endilisi ea' ina sanda'mana kota basef usi'ifi, owa'. Anen awasi akana ma anis sitilis soganifa basefas. Dei' main, sahana naga' sagia ambal ananili ma ina ata' nope itap wapani, a'owa'.”
44008034	Ea' aman anamba dembinai nugumafi maola kwini na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ae' a'i ihali'ina. Profet anamba na'i ami ma dei' nanda' basef ifimba? Na'ifa anen atona a'a na'ifa anin epen daian?”
44008035	Ea' Filip na'i basef nawalapefa aman anamba. Nasumbai basef ifimba du'wanif Godi aman anamba naga'iefi fafe' fafe' ea' nawalapai basef bu'wafi Jisasi.
44008036	Amom biam ma'i mafe' owa', matagama anemb walemb. Ea' aman anamba na'ipa Filip na'i, “Niti walemb ambamba betah. Dei' ata' main nape nili'ama ae' egefa' baptais?”
44008037	[Ea' Filip na'i, “I'i ina' nihapifana endilisi ma nembel ine'imbili, ina' dao' ila.” Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' ahapifa Jisas Krais anen nogamana Godi.”]
44008038	Ea' na'ias a main, wilkar negetawai, Filip naloma aman anamba dembinai misila' mafe' mowala walemb. Ea' Filip napisi'ana.
44008039	Ea' amom biam makwaha walemb mandagiai wata'ita, kwafalis atis Ambal bu'unai Dembinaii nofa' Filip a' nafe'. Ea' aman anamba dembinai ina ata' natolona wapani, a'owa', dolomana. Ea' anen sonahana nandagala naila ufia'w anani'wi nafe'.
44008040	Apa' Filip nafe' nataga Asdot. Anen nafe' taun anamba hiagoma ganigani nawalapa basef bu'wafi Jisasi. Ama main, notanima nafe' nataga wambel Sisaria.
