44009001	Fowa' basef ifimba ata' owa' fetagaea, nogota atamba Sol nanda'am na'amba. Anen na'ias banagambel a'owa' ma nogahambombaga esis alipisi sagaila Dembinaii nohas sogaga'. Ea' nafe'ma pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii.
44009002	Na'ipana ea' pris anamba nanda' basefa pas safe'ma agufumi hiami mugumafi ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi wambel Damaskusi. Ea' naso'ana pasa basef ifimba Sol. Faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “I'i Sol nogati anis amam nematawa sigaila ufia'w akwamba dambai'wi sogape Damaskusi, nonda' kalabusimas nihapilas nofa'as sifi'i Jerusalem.”
44009003	Ea' Sol nafe' nataga felefele'ma Damaskus owa', kwafalis atis anom mogogala'i mafi'i misila'i heven a' mogala'ma anen a'owa'.
44009004	Ea' nowai nafe' na'oh itap ea' name' anagol malogol ga'ipana ga'i, “Sol, Sol, dei' maina ina' nanda' maola nagahambombaga ae'?”
44009005	Ea' Sol nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, ina' ami?” Ea' malagol agalemba ga'i, “Ae' Jisas ina' nanda' maol nagahambombagai.
44009006	Dei' ina' safel a' nefe' niwis wambel lu'wambili. Bola anona aman ni'ipina hiahawes ina' atiasi nenda'asi.”
44009007	Ea' amom mafe' magaloma Soli mame' malogol agalemba apa' ina la'ifima moga'i anif basef, owa'. Tol malutu dowaf. Mame' malogol gaga'i, apa' ina mati anin epen, owa'atin.
44009008	Ea' Sol nosafel na'i niti, owa' owa'atin. Nati akot atona. Ea' amom mahapila lagof ananigufi mofa'ana mafe' mawis Damaskus.
44009009	Anen nati akot atona nape nimaguf wanif ea' ina na' wali'ita o embel mais, owa'atin.
44009010	Ea' anona alipunai nagaila Jisasi nape na'amba Damaskus, agilinama Ananaias. Ea' na'oh nandondo'ah, nati Dembinai nofalana na'ipana na'i, “Ananaias!” Ea' anan noga na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ape na'a.”
44009011	Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel fo'o ufia'w akwamba saga'i usi'i'wi. Nefe' ipat Judasi a niti anona aman Tarsusinai, agilinama Sol. Dei' nape nandabeten.
44009012	Sol na'oh nandondo'ah a' nati anona aman agilinama Ananaias atiasi nifi'i nuwisi nowamona lagofa anona nonda' naep pigati andeande' wapani.”
44009013	Ea' Ananaias nagwa basef na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ame' basef hiafi ma aman anamba, waf awafi hiafi anen nanda'afa esis amam nematawa ine'isi gani Jerusalem.
44009014	Anen nofa' agol banagagili ea' ma amom pris dembami ma nogombalo' amam nematawa sandabetena agol ine'igilii wambel ambale'e ma nonda' kalabusimas.”
44009015	Owa' Dembinai na'ipana nasapa'ana na'i, “Ina' fo'o. Aman anamba atiasi nonda' maol ae'ani. Ae' andandepana ea' ma nefe' niga'ipasa basefa agol ae'agili anis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia soloma amom dembami king asasimi moloma esis Israel wapani.
44009016	Atiasi ae' ihimba'mana akafimi mamimami hiami moloma nimanimi ma nogawalapa agol ae'agili. Na'amba ina' dei' fo'o netelona.”
44009017	Ea' Ananaias nafe' nawis ipat nomon nasa lagofa Sol na'i, “Sahome Sol, Dembinai Jisas natagamena ufia'w nogota atamba ina' nagafi'i na'a'e. Dei' nasapa'e afi'mai ina' a' nigati andeande' wapani ma Ambal bu'unai Godi nogape si'inama ina'.”
44009018	Ea' hiahaom mape magasopama naep Soli si'i dunduwif agufumi, a' mandafi kwafalis atis makwaha naep Soli mowa. Ea' naep ananipi pati wapani, nosafel nofa' baptais.
44009019	Ama main, na' gwa'aisi banagona wapani. Sol nape anif nimaguf naloma amom alipumi magaila Jisasi Damaskus.
44009020	Ea' nafe' kwafalis ifagw hiagwi esis Juda sandakolasugwi nawalapa basef Jisasi na'i, “Jisas anen nogamana Godi.”
44009021	Epes hiasi same' basef ananifi ea' sosafel gogolalasis kwapete' sa'i, “Aman anamba nagahambombaga amam nematawa sogofala agol agalembai ma wambel Jerusalem. Ea' dei' nafi'i na'a ma nogowa' esis nonda' kalabusimas nofa'as sogafe'ma amom pris dembami. Ea' ma'una aman anamba atona.”
44009022	Apa' banagami Soli a' mataga banagem a'owa' ma basef nagawalipasafi. Ea' esis Juda sagape Damaskusi same' basefa anen. Esis ina la'ifisa sogwa anif basef siga'ipanaef, owa'atin. Anen banagona nihimba'mas endilisi na'i, “Jisas anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.”
44009023	Nimaguf hiafi fafe'ma ea', amom Juda mandanif ea' ma'i basef mandame'maefa moha Sol nogaga'.
44009024	Apa' Sol name' basef ifimba amamifi. Ea' amom Juda hiami mape mumafi utagw hiagwi ma taun inimba owamb alip wapani ma ma'i moha Sol nogaga'.
44009025	Owa' amom alipumi Soli mofa'ana owamb mafe' malota indalelemb otamba. Ea' malana nape anona folaf lu'unai, mapana mandelef malana nisila' indalelemb ando'.
44009026	Ama main, Sol nafe' Jerusalem ea' na'i nondakolas nogaloma esis alipisi sagaila Jisasi. Apa' owa', esis hiasi ombel mahasana. Ea' esis ina sagahapifana sa'i anen alipunai nagaila Jisasi, ata' owa'.
44009027	A'i owa', Barnabas nao'wana mafe'ma amom aposel owa' na'ipama Sol nagati Dembinai ufia'w ma Dembinai nagaso'ana basef anen. Ea' Barnabas na'ipam na'i anen nawalapa basef na'ipasefa agol Jisasi banagambel Damaskus, dei' anen ina ata' ombel mahana, owa'.
44009028	Ea' dei' asogawa anen wambota atota Jisasi nalomas nape la'afena esis. Anen nanda' maol banagambel, nafe' Jerusalem anamba hiagoma nawalapa basefa agol dembinaii. Anen ina ombel mahana, owa'atin.
44009029	Nanda' maol na'ipasa basef naloma amom Juda mogagawa diga Griki ea' na'i basef napa' nalomam. Apa' amom mandaiwa'ma basef ananifi molaoma ufia'wa mohana nogaga'.
44009030	Ama amom Kristen sahin owan mogawa isimba, ea' mofa' Sol mafe' miliana Sisaria. Ea' masapa'ana nafe' nape wambel Tarsus.
44009031	Dei' esis amam nematawa Kristen sagape anamba itap apamba lu'upa hiagoma Judiai Galili a Samaria sape opalef awanelef sape andeande' wandaf mais a' owa'atin ea' esis Kristen sape banages. Esis sape lafela Dembinai ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nowa' banaga opalef asasilifi. Ea' esis mini'ap Kristen apataga loup.
44009032	Pita nafe' walemb anamba hiagoma ea' niliana nafe' taun inimba Lida wapani nape naloma esis amam nematawa Godi sagape wambel ambalembai.
44009033	Ea' nati anona aman Inas. Alop bihitagof ananisi a' saga'ana, tol na'oh nala alahis atis nape nogota laota afagof 8-pelaiguf.
44009034	Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Inas, dei' Jisas Krais a' nanda'ena bo'wena wapani. Ina' safel nendondomba alahis ine'isi andeande'.” Pita na'ipana ea' dei' atef nosafel.
44009035	Ea' epes hiasi walemb ambalemba bialemb Lidai Saron satolona sambema nelelemb safe'ma Dembinai.
44009036	Anembel wambel Jopa ano'w nemata'w kwagaila Jisasi kwape, agol akwa'ugili Tabita. Diga esis Griki sofala'w sa'i Dokas agol anin mafini sa'i dia. Dondol lifilafi ako'w kwanda' waf bu'wafi ma kwagatopalopa esis amam nematawa kwahusi ma gwa'aisi mais.
44009037	Nemaf afamba awasi'w a' kwaga'. Ea' sasa'opa alop akwa'upi ma sogawa'w. Ea' sofa'akw sambe'akw kwa'oh rum ilifami.
44009038	Wambel Lida nape felefele' ma Jopa. Ea' esis alipisi sagaila Jisasi same' basefa Pita nape Lida, sasapa' amam biam mafe'ma anen mahali'ana na'amba ma'i, “Ina' nifi'mai afa'. Niga'i ota' ota' owa'.”
44009039	Ea' Pita nosafel nafe' nalomam, ea' mafe' mataga mofa'ana mafe' rum amamba ilif ako'w kwaga'oma. Nematawa hiawai alifiwai wafi'i walutu felefele'ma Pita wape walef. Ea' wihimba'mana klos sagegw maim ako'w Dokas kwanda'masami doko' ata' kwape kwagalomawa.
44009040	Ea' Pita nagalo'ma esis amam nematawa sawisi ando', nindiwa nembawa notawa nandabeten. Ea' nambema amaga ananigai gafe'ma alop nemata'wi na'i, “Tabita, ina' safel.” Ea' ako'w naep pati kwati Pita, akosafel kwape.
44009041	Ea' Pita nahapila lagol akwa'ugili nasa'ma'w kwalutu. Ea' nofalai esis amam nematawa sagahapifa Godi saloma nematawa awamba alifiwai, naso'awa ako'w kotanima kwafe'mawa.
44009042	Basef ifimba fafe' anamba hiagoma wambel Jopa ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi same'ef sahapifa Dembinai.
44009043	Pita nape wambel ambalemba Jopa nimaguf hiafi. Anen nape naloma anona aman nagandondomba agwafih bulmakaumi agol ananigili Saimon.
44010001	Anona aman nagape Sisariai agilinama Konilias, anen agilinai kepten nugumafi soldia 100-pelaimi. Amom mini'ap soldia amamba saga'i agol soldia Italimi.
44010002	Anen aman nanda' lotuwi naloma hiasi ananisi sagape ipat atotai sanda' lotu ma God. Anen nagaso'as moni mais hiasi ma nagatopalopa esis Juda isimba kwahusi otamba mais akasi. Ea' dondol nandabetena God.
44010003	Anef nemaf wambomota awin nendemba'a 3 klok, anen nati anom maefah si'i na'oh nandondo'ah a' mataga alihim a'owa'. Nati anona ensel Godi nafi'mai anen na'ipana na'i, “Konilias.”
44010004	Ea' Konilias natolona, a' ombel mahana a'owa' na'i, “Dembinai, ina' na'i main?” Ea' ensel na'ipana na'i, “God a' name' beten ine'ini ea', okom ma'i waf ina' nanda'afa nagaso'as moni mais nagatopalopa amam nematawa hiahawes akasi. Ea' God ata' okom mapomas atin sape.
44010005	Dei' ina' nesapa' anom amam mofo'o Jopa mowando'ma anona aman agilinama Saimon agol wa'agol Pita. Mofalana nifi'i.
44010006	Aman anamba nape ipat anona Saimoni, anen nagandondomba agwafih bulmakaumi. Ipat ananitai totawa felefele'ma naoh gwafe' gogotambela.”
44010007	Ensel na'ipa Konilias ea', a' nafe'. Ea' Konilias nofalai amam biam ananimi manda'mana maoli maloma anona soldia. Soldia anamba nanda' lotu dondoli nape nanda' maola Koniliasi.
44010008	Ea' Konilias na'ipa amam amamba wanom andeande'ma basef ifimba hi'alef, ea' nasapa'am mafe' wambel ambalemba Jopa.
44010009	Ea' amom wanom mosafel mafe' ma'oh ufia'w. Ama lala mosafel mafe' mataga felefele'ma Jopa. Nogota atamba awin nandasapa' Pita a' nalota natoma ipat ando' ilifa nondabeten.
44010010	Ea' nolomahana na'i nea' gwa'aisi, apa' esis ata' sanda'as atin, ea' anom maefah matagamana si'i koh dondo'ah.
44010011	Nati otaga ilif a' nandawisi' ea' anona maena si'i lowaf lu'unai endilisi nisila'i ilif nowalai. Anom maefah mahapila da'malififa biafigin biafigin malana nisila'i.
44010012	Hiahaom magala lowaf anamba nomoni, mafis hiahaom hiami, amiguf hiagof haogof fagail alupi, faloma uguf mamimami hiami.
44010013	Ea' anagol malogol ga'ipa Pita ga'i, “Pita, ina' safel neha mafis nea'am.”
44010014	Owa' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' owa'i endilisi. Ae' ina ea' anis mafis apa' Juda maga'i awasisi, owa'.”
44010015	Ea' malogol agalemba ga'ipana wapani ga'i, “Hiahaom God naga'i bu'wami, amamba ina ni'i awami, owa'i.”
44010016	Amamba matagamana wanif na'amba, ma main, kwafalis a' motanima malota otaga heven wapani.
44010017	Ea' Pita okom malamafe'ma hiahawes isimba na'i, “Koh dondo'ah inimba ae' agatulumi kofagema mamahoma?” Anen okom mandanda' na'amba atapina nape owa', amam amamba Konilias nasapa'am magafi'ii a' mataga mahali'asa ipat Saimon nagapautai. Ea' mogawata, mafi'i malutu utaitama.
44010018	Ea' mofalana ma'i, “Saimon agol wa'agol Pita, anen nape na'a a'a owa'?”
44010019	Pita ata' nape okom mandanda'ma hiahawes isimba owa', Ambal bu'unai Godi na'ipana na'i, “Neme'! Amam amamba wanom ma'i molaoma ina'.
44010020	Ina' safel nisila' ea' nefe' nelomom. Ina' owa'i okom mope hiahaoma, owa'. Dei' main, ae' atowe asapa'am mafi'i.”
44010021	Ea' Pita nisila'ma amom amamba na'ipam na'i, “Aman anamba ipa' pa'i pigalaomanai ae' ea' ma'uwi. Ipa' pafi'mai main?”
44010022	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Konilias anen kepten dembinai nugumafi soldia 100-pelaim hiamii, nasapa'afa wafi'i. Anen nagape hilili'i nanda' lotuma Godi. Esis Juda hiasi saga'i, ‘Anen aman bu'unai.’ Anona ensel Godi na'ipana ma nofalena negafe' ipat ananitai, ma ata' nogame' anif basef ine'ifi.”
44010023	Ea' Pita na'ipam a' mawis ipat nomon, nao'wam numafiam mape owamb ambamba. Wafilu nosafel a' nafe' nalomam. Anom amam Kristen Jopaimi mafe' malomana.
44010024	Amom mosafel mafe' ma'oh owamb atotomb ufia'w, ea' mafe' mataga Sisaria. Ea' Konilias nape nasasa amom. Anen nali' nofalai esis wambota atis ananisi saloma alipisi ananisi endilisi sunduwa'anima sape.
44010025	Ea' Pita nafi'i na'i a' nuwisi ipat owa', Konilias nafi'i natagamana nindiwa nembawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Pitai nanda' lotu nasa'ma agol ananigili.
44010026	Owa' Pita nasa'mana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel. Ae' wapani epen atowe si'i ina'.”
44010027	Ea' Pita naloma Konilias ma'i, a' mawis ipat nomon, nati amam nematawa hiasi sandakolas sape.
44010028	Ea' Pita na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' pegawa ea' mu'uli apa' Judai ma'i owa'atin endilisi ma apa' mefe' mugawis ifagw a'a mope mogaloma anis epes daias owa' Judaisia, owa'. Apa' God a' nihimba'me ma anis epes owa' Judaisia si'i ipa' na'a na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina nendafa'ma anin epen ni'i anin nanda' waf awafii, owa'i.’
44010029	Ea' ae' ina esambala basef ifimba God naga'ipiefi, owa'. Ea' ame' fala ipe'ini afi'i. Dei' a'i ihali'ipa, “Ipa' pefale afi'i ma main?”
44010030	Ea' Konilias nagwamana na'i, “Hiahawes sagatagama ae'i ma dei' nimaguf a' wanif fafe' ea', isimba na'amba. Ae' ape andabeten ipat ae'atai, nogota awin newala nagape owambuguma 3 klok. Nogota ea' na'amba atin si'i dei'. Andabeten ape owa', ati anona aman nalutu felefele'ma amaga ae'agai, luwaguf maim ananimi a' mombal mataga magala' a'owa'.
44010031	Ea' nofale na'i, ‘Konilias, God name' beten ine'ini ea', okom mapoma hiahawes hiasi ine'isi naso'asas nagatopalopa esis isimba hiahawes akasi.
44010032	Ea' ina' nesapa' anom amam mofe' Jopa mofalai Saimon agol wa'agol Pita. Aman anamba nape naloma anona Saimon ipat ananitai, nagandondomba agwafih bulmakaumi. Anen nape felefele'ma naoh gwafe' gogotambela.’
44010033	Ea' dei' ae' kwafalis asapa' anom amam mafe'mago ina' ea' dei' ina' nanda' waf fasifi a' nafi'i. Dei' apa' hiapai mafi'i mape na'a ma naep Godi ma mogame' basef hiafi Dembinai nagase'enaef ine'i ma niga'ipapaef.”
44010034	Ea' Pita na'ias na'i, “Endilisi atis, dei' ae' egawa okom Godi anen ina okom ma'i wambota mini'ap esis Judai atis, owa'atin.
44010035	Anen okom maimaila epes mamahisa sanda' lotuma anini sanda' waf fasifii.
44010036	Ipa' a' pegawa basef ifimba God na'if fagafe'ma apa' mini'ap Israeli. Anen nawalapa basef bu'wafi Jisas Kraisi, anen Dembinai ma epes hiasii nanda'apa mataga nembel atifimbil maloma God opalef fepe sa'umbel fegalomana.
44010037	Ipa' a' pegawa, fowa' Jon nawalapa basefa esis sogombema opalefa waf awafi ma sogofa' baptais, nogota atamba basef fafe' itap lu'upa Galili ea' fataga anamba walemb hielimbi agol Judia.
44010038	Basef ifimba, basef Jisas Nasaratinai. God a' nandandepana na'amba. Anen naso'ana Ambal bu'unai Godi naloma banagami lu'wami. Ea' nafe' walemb hiagoma ganigani natopalopa esis amam nematawa. Ea' dei' God nape nalomana nanda' epes hiasi Satan nagahambombagasi ambo'wes wapani.
44010039	“Ea' ae' afi'i aloma amom wanom afa' wagawalapa basefa hiahaom amamba banagami anen nanda'am gani Jerusalemi naloma analemb walemb daialemb hielimbi apa' Juda magapoma. Ea' esis sandolona lawag sahana naga' ma waf afamba.
44010040	Ama nimaguf bif hi'alef ea' fagafe'ma wanifi God nasa'mana nosafel wapani nawalapana alihina.
44010041	God ina nihimba'masana Juda hiasi hi'alas satolona, owa'. Nihimba'ma afa' atofa fowa' God nandandepafa ma ogawalapa basef ananifii. Anen notanima nosafel matmat wapani ea' wa' gwa'aisi walomana.
44010042	Anen na'ipafa dindinipa uga'ipa esis amam nematawa ogawalapa basef alihif na'amba. God nandandepa aman anamba ea' ma anaf nogape aman nonda'masa kota epes isimba sagape namisi soloma isimba sagaga' ea'i.
44010043	Amom profet hiami ma'iasa anen na'amba ma'i, ‘Banagami ma agol ananigili atogol God nakwaha waf awafi esis amam nematawa hiasi sagahapifanai.’”
44010044	Pita ata' na'i basef ifimba atin owa', Ambal bu'unai Godi nisila'i ma amam nematawa hiasi sagame' basef Godi nawisas.
44010045	Amam amamba Judaimi magahapifi mafi'i magalumai Pitai mosafel gogolalasom kwapete' ma mati God nagaso'as Ambal bu'unai ananinai dowaf si'i presena esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia wapani.
44010046	Amom Juda mame' esis sa'i anoga diga naninani sasa'ma agol Godi ea' amom gogolalasom kwapete'. Ea' Pita na'i,
44010047	“Ina anin epen la'ifina nindaiwa'ma sogapisi' amam nematawa isimba embel, owa'atin. Esis a' sofa' Ambal bu'unai Godi na'amba atin si'i apa'.”
44010048	Ea' na'ipa esis dindinip na'i, “Ipa' pefa' baptaisa agol Jisas Kraisi.” Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' ata' nepe nelomapa anif nimaguf wapani.”
44011001	Ea' amom aposel maloma esis sahin owan sagahapifanai sagape anamba Judia hiagomai same' basef ifimba ma anis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia wapani sofa' basef Godi sagahapilif.
44011002	Ea' Pita notanima nondowasa' Jerusalem, owa' anis epes Juda sagahapifa basef Godi sape. Esis sahapila waf fowa'ifi dindinip sa'i esis hiasi sagahapifanai sondagi'ma mu'uli esis Judai ma mogatopa' alop amamipi. Ea' solola'agomana dindinipa basef ananifi
44011003	sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' a' nafe' nawis ifagw amam amamba owa' Juda mogatopa' alopia na' gwa'aisi nalomam.”
44011004	Owa' Pita na'ipasa basef laufi ma hiahawes hiasi sagatagai. Nali' na'ipasa basef dambadamba fagali'i nailif nafe' nafe' nambif. Ea' na'i,
44011005	“Ae' ape taun Jopa andabeten ape owa', okom ae'ami mandambemef ati anis hiahawes si'i andanda'oh. Anom hiahaom lu'wami misila'i ilif si'i lowaf laufi endilisi. Hiahaom magahapila lowaf anamba da'malifinama biafigin biafigini mahapilana malana nowalai heven ilif ea' nafi'mai ae'.
44011006	Ea' ae' a'i ata' egawa amamba andeande', atologon nomon lowaf anamba ati hiahaom mamimami hiami magape nomona lowaf anambai. Ati mafis hiam haom magalutu itapi mafis alupumi maloma uguf amiguf hiahaom magail alupi.
44011007	Ea' ame' anagol malagol ga'ipi ga'i, ‘Pita, ina' safel neha anom mafis nea'am.’
44011008	“Owa' a'ipa Dembinai a'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' andaiwa' endilisi! Fowa' ae' ata' sa'owe afi'i afi'i ataga dei' ae' ina aga' anom maefah awami alugumii, owa'atin.’
44011009	“Owa' malogol agalemba gafi'i ilif wapani bif ga'i, ‘Hiahaom God nanda'ami magataga bu'wamii, amamba ina a' ni'i alugumi, owa'i.’
44011010	Hiahaom amamba matagama ae' wanifa ea', motanima malota heven ilif hi'alam.
44011011	“Ama main, dei' atef amam amamba wanom mafi'i mataga ipat atamba afa' wagapoma. Anona aman nagape Sisariai nasapa'am mafi'mai ae'.
44011012	Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' fo'o lomago amom, ina' owa'i okom molamefe'a.’ Amom sahope amamba wanom wanom mafe' malome. Ea' afa' wafe' wawis ipat aman anambai,
44011013	na'ipafa ma nagati ensel nagalutumana nomon gani ipat ananitai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ina' nesapa' anom amam mofe' Jopa mi'ipa Saimon agol wa'agol Pita ma nigafi'mai ina'.
44011014	Ama noga'ipina anif basef ina' ma basef ifimba atifa God notopalopa ina' negaloma esis wambota ine'isi soloma esis sanda' maol ine'inii ma nofa'epa nokwahomepa waf awafi pitanimai pegape andeande'.’
44011015	“Ea' ae' asoumbai basef a'if, Ambal bu'unai Godi a' nisila'mai esis, nafi'i na'amba atin si'i nali' nagafi'mai apa' Juda dambadamba.
44011016	Ea' okom mapoma basef ifimba Dembinaii wapani. Ifimba faga'i, ‘Jon napisi'as embel, apa' ina embel atembal, owa'. Atiasi pefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nuwisipa.’
44011017	Fowa' apa' mogahapifa Dembinai Jisas Krais ea' God naso'apa Ambal bu'unai ananinai apa' dowaf si'i presen. Ea' dei' ae' ami ma la'ifiwi egasopama God? Owa'atin.”
44011018	Esis same' basef ifimba Pita naga'ipasafi ea' ukup paso'asa basef ifimba asasifi saso'ma agol Godi sa'i, “Dei' apa' a' mogawa God nambema nelelemb esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia ma esis wapani safe'ma anen sogape ambal namili.”
44011019	Fowa' amom magaha Stiven nagaga'i manda' nimanimi lu'wami matagama esis Kristen amam nematawa mahas. Ea' esis sagahapifanai safa' safe'agon ganigani ea' sataga anambel wambel Antiok safe' anep itap biafip lu'wapi Saiprusi Fonisia sawalapa basef Godi ma esis Juda atis. Anis daias owa'atin.
44011020	Apa' anom amam Saiprusimi maloma anom Sairinimi mafe' Antiok mawalapa basef ifimba ma esis Grik wapani. Amom mawalapa basef bu'wafi ma Dembinai Jisas Krais.
44011021	Ea' banagami Dembinaii atom mape maloma amom, isimba atis dei' amam nematawa hiasi sambema nelelemb safi'mai Dembinai.
44011022	Ea' esis amam nematawa Kristen sagape Jerusalemi same' basefa isimba ea' sasapa' Barnabas nafe' Antiok.
44011023	Anen nafe' nataga nati God nanda' esis bo'wesa waf bu'wafi numafias nandagalamas. Nafela ukup esis amam nematawa hiasi ma sogaila Dembinai banagambel dondol.
44011024	Barnabas anen aman bu'unai, Ambal bu'unai Godi nape si'inama anen, nagahapifana datimai. Ea' natopalopa esis amam nematawa mini'ap laupi ma sagahapifa Dembinai ea' sawisi mini'ap ananipi.
44011025	Ea' Barnabas nafe' Tarsus nolaoma Sol.
44011026	Ama natolona, nofa'ana nafi'i Antiok. Ea' amom biam mape anagol afagol si'igili maloma esis Kristen amam nematawa sagape Antioki mawalipa mini'ap laupi amam nematawa ma basef Godi. Ea' esis amam nematawa sagaila Jisasi, anis daias sofalas agol agalemba Kristen dambadamba wambel ambalemba Antiok.
44011027	Nogota atamba anom profet magape Jerusalami miliana Antiok.
44011028	Anona profeta amom sofalana sa'i Agabus, anen nalutu banagonama Ambal bu'unai Godi ea' nawalapa basefa nemaf lu'wafi nolomogahasafi atiasi fegataga itap walemb anamba hiagoma. Ama a'i owa' main, aman anamba Klodius nataga nape gavman dembinai esis Romi, nogota atamba nolom lu'unai a' nataga si'i fowa' Agabus naga'ias.
44011029	Ea' esis amam nematawa sagaila Jisas Kraisi sa'i basef sandame'maefa sogofa' anin moni negafe'ma esis alipisi sahin owan sagape Judai ma sogatopalopas. Esis Kristen atona atin ukup pandanda'ma moni naga'omasi sawalogon saso'as du'wanin hiani nafe'ma maol inimba. Anis otamba hiambai saso'asa hiambai apa' anis otamba kwaia'umba saso'asa kwaia'umba. Hiasi sanda'as na'amba atin.
44011030	Esis sanda'as na'amba, sasapa' Barnabasi Sol biam mofa' moni inimba mafe'ma amom agufumi mugumafi esis amam nematawa Kristen sagape Jerusalami.
44012001	Nogota atamba dembinai king Herot nahambombaga anis amam nematawa Kristen.
44012002	Ea' na'ipa anom soldia ananimi maha Jems, Jon sahomana bainat naga'.
44012003	Ea' anen nati esis Juda sa'i aho'ma isimba ea' nanda' kalabusima Pita wapani nogota atamba esis Juda sanda' gwa'aisi lu'wasi saga' bret wafitai owa' togatifia.
44012004	Anen nombalo' Pita nanda'ana nanda' kalabus. Ea' nanda'ana nafe'ma soldia misi'ah biahi biah ea' mumafiana. Herot okom mandanda' na'i ota' ma esis Juda sope sea' gwa'aisi lu'wasi saga'i Pasovai ma hi'ilas, dao' a' nola'i Pita nuwisi ando'ma naep amam nematawa hiasi sotolona, a' nohana noga'.
44012005	Owa' Pita napani kalabus amom mape mumafiana. Apa' lifilafi esis Kristen sandabeten banagambela God nugumafiana.
44012006	Ama wafilu Herot na'i nofa' Pita nefe' kot. Ea' nemaf afamba owa' ata' fetaga ulala, a'i owa' owamb ambamba Pita na'oh la'afena anom soldia biam. Amom mowa' Pita sen biafin. Anom soldia malutu mumafi uta ipat atamba sanda' kalabusa.
44012007	Ea' kwafalis atis atef bif owa', ensel Dembinaii nataga naloma nogogala'i nogala' nawis ipat sanda' kalabusa nomon. Ea' ensel napisi lambeh Pitai ninimbalana na'ipana na'i, “Ina' safel kwafalis.” Ea' sen pele'atana dowaf lagof Pitai nowa na'oh itap.
44012008	Ea' ensel na'ipana na'i, “Ina' waho' let nugundisa klos la su bo'wagah ine'igahi.” Ea' Pita nanda'am si'i ensel naga'ipana. Ea' ensel na'ipana wapani na'i, “La saket ine'inai nigi'ma ae' nifi'i.”
44012009	Ea' Pita nakwaha ipat sanda' kalabusa nomon nagi'ma ensel a' nafe'. Apa' anen ina nogawa hiahawes isimba ensel nanda'asi na'i endilisi, owa'. Pita na'i owa', si'i na'oh nandondo'ah atin.
44012010	Amom biam mafe' makwaha amom plisman malutu magali'i mafe' mikila' anom wapani ea' mafe' mataga uta lu'utai ainambitai. Uta atamba sagafe' tauna. Ea' uta atamba lu'utai tandawisi' dowafa amom biam. Ea' amom makwaha kalabus mawisi ando' a' mafe' ano'w ufia'w. Ea' kwafalis atis ensel a' nandambaho'ma Pita nafe' anagon.
44012011	Ea' okom Pitai a' mataga alihim nogawa na'i, “Dei' ae' egawa endilisi. Dembinai nasapa'i ensel ananinai nafi'i natagwahowe ma lagol dembinai king Heroti, ma awami amamba hiami esis Juda ukup papoma sa'i sonda'me ami.”
44012012	Anen okom mandanda'ma isimba ea', nafe' ipat Mariai, Jon Mak ma'mana nati esis Kristen sandakolas sape ipat atamba atota sape sandabeten.
44012013	Ea' Pita nafe' nalutu naha uta ando', ano'w nemata'w kwanda'mas maoli agili'wa Roda kwafi'i kwa'i kuwisi' uta.
44012014	Owa' kwame' malogol Pitai a' kogawana, okom akwa'umi sonaha'w a'owa' ea' ina kwawisi' uta, owa'. Kwasagih kotanima kwafe' nomon kwa'ipas kwa'i, “Pita nani nalutu uta ando'!”
44012015	Owa' esis sa'ipa'w sa'i, “Ina' okom maolena a'a!” Owa' ako'w dindinapi'w kwa'ias kwa'i, “Owa'atin. Endilisi atis, anen nalutu ando'.” Ea' esis sa'i, “Anamba ensel ananinai atona.”
44012016	Owa' Pita ata' nalutu naha uta atapina. Ea' esis same'ana safe' sawisi' uta satolona, sosafel gogolalasis kwapete'asa anen.
44012017	Ea' Pita nanda' lagol atogol na'ipasa sogasopama malogof. Ea' na'ipasa hiahawes isimba Dembinai nofa'ana nakwaha ipat sanda' kalabusa nao'wana nagawisi ando'. Ea' na'i, “Ipa' pi'ipago Jems nolomago sahin owan ama hiahawes isimba.” Ea' nakwaha esis notanima nawisi ando' nafe' anagon.
44012018	Ama awin natafi, amom soldia matimana owa', a' mosafel gogolalasom kwapete' nomonas hiahawes sapaomana ea' ma'i, “Pita nafe' ani?”
44012019	Ea' Herot wapani nala' nolaoma Pita, apa' owa' owa'atin, ina natolona nofa'anai, owa'. Ea' nandambema nahali' amom soldia nanda' kotimama noham mogaga'. Ea' Herot nakwaha itap lu'upa Judia nafe' niliana napani wambel Sisaria.
44012020	Anen okom numbutinama esis amam nematawa sagape walemb lu'walimbi bialemb Tairi Saidon. Ea' anis epes Tairi Saidon sakolata safi'mai anen. Ea' sali' solaoma Blastus, nanda' maola dembinai kingi. Ea' sonandana basef salefa sonda' okom anamba wandafunai nogaga'. Dei' main, epes sagape walemb ambalemba bielimbi sogofa' gwa'aisi ma itap lu'upa kingi.
44012021	Ama anef nemaf Herot nandandepafi anen nandausa sosaf dembinai kingi ea' nape natoma sia kingi nanda' basef lu'wafi ma esis.
44012022	Ea' esis sematefana sa'i mehip sa'i, “Anamba malogol anona dembinai si'i God. Anen ina malogol anona epeni, owa'atin!”
44012023	Ea' Herot ina ata' nasa'ma agol Godi, a' owa'atin. Na'amba dei' atef ensel Dembinaii nahana. Ea' asagof uguf sa'usa'usi sahana sahahape' alop ananinai ea' afuna.
44012024	Ea' basef Dembinaii fataga banagef fafe' walemb hielimbi ma epes hiasi sogahapifana.
44012025	Barnabas naloma Sol mambifa maol God nagaso'amani hi'alan Jerusalem ea' motanima mafe' Antiok mao'wa Jon Mak nafe' nalomam.
44013001	Esis amam nematawa Kristen sagape Antioki anom amam magawalapa basef fasifi Godi mape. Anom profet maloma anom tisa magawalipasa basef Godi isimba sagahapifanai. Agof amamugufi agwafomba. Barnabasi Saimon agol wa'agol Naisa, Lusius, anen wambel Sairininai, maloma Sol, a Manain, anen alipunai Heroti gavman dembinai.
44013002	Esis Kristen sololama gwa'aisi sanda' lotuma God atona sape. Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi na'ipas na'i, “Ipa' pendandepa Barnabasi Sola maol inimba ae' efalam andandepam monda'ani.”
44013003	Ea' esis sololama gwa'aisi sandabeten, sawamona lagofa amom biam sasapa'am mafe'.
44013004	Ambal bu'unai Godi nasapa' amom biam mafe' miliana anambel wambel Selusia. Ea' malota anop sip na'amba Salusia pofa'am mafe' anin ailan Saiprus.
44013005	Ea' mataga Salamis, mawis nomon ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai ma'ipasa basef bu'wafi Godi, Jon Mak wapani nape nalomam natopalopam.
44013006	Amom mafe' mataga walemb ambalemba hielimbi bagape ailan inimba Saiprusi, ea' mafe' mataga wambel Pafos bape bagandi'i. Ea' mati anona aman anen Judainai. Anen nanda' ko'op pagaloma hiahaom mamimami baso'amii. Anen profet nagambaso'ma esis hiasii, agilinama Barjisas.
44013007	Anen alipunai ma dembinai gavman agilinama Sergius Paulus. Sergius Paulus anen nomonas fasisi sagapaunai. Anen nofalai Barnabas naloma Sol mafi'i ma anen nogame' basef Godi ma amom.
44013008	Owa' aman anamba agol ananigili diga Griki sa'i Elimas, nanda' ko'opi nataloga amom biam Barnabasi Sol. Na'i nupati okom gavman anamba dembinai ma ina atiasi nohapifa basef Godi.
44013009	Owa' aman anamba Sol, sogofalana Poli, anen banagami lu'wami Ambal bu'unai Godi magapaunai. Ea' anen naep do' Elimas natotolona na'ipana na'i,
44013010	“Ina' awani nogama Satani! Ina' bounai ma waf afamba hiafi fasifi! Waf afamba baso'amifi hiafi awafi asi'ifa ina' endilisi! Ina' nimaguf hiafi dondol nagambemefa basef endilisifi bu'wafi Dembinaii fagataga baso'afi. Dei' maina ina' nandaiwa'ma negakwaha waf awafi ine'ifi?
44013011	Ea' dei' ina' neme'. Dei' Dembinai a' nehena lagol ananigili ea' atiasi naep ine'ipi pese'ena. Ea' ina' atiasi niti awin alipini, owa'. Ea' nepe na'amba atin anif nimaguf.” Pol na'ias na'amba ma ea', kwafalis atis anom maefah si'i ilagwi akot tasopama naep Elimasi. Ea' naha ganigani nafe' nolaoma anis epesa sogahapila lagof ananigufi ma sigihimba'mana ufia'w anen.
44013012	Ea' gavman anamba dembinai nati hiahawes isimba gogolalasona endilisi ma basef Dembinaii ea' dei' nahapifa Jisas.
44013013	Pol naloma amom magalumanai makwaha wambel Pafos ea' sip pofa'am mafe' anambel wambel Perga bagape anep itap lu'upa Pamfilia. Owa' aman anamba Jon nakwaha amom notanima nafe' Jerusalem.
44013014	Ea' makwaha wambel ambalemba Perga mafe' mataga anambel wambel Antiok bagape anep itap lu'upa Pisidiai. A'i owa' nemaf afamba sabat esis Juda sagapoma noma'wafi amom mafe' mawis ipat Juda sandakolasatai ea' matoma sia.
44013015	Ea' anona aman natalifa basefa mu'uli God nagaso' Moses faloma basef amom profet maga'iefi ea' ma main, amom agufumi Judai masapa' basef fafe'ma Pol naloma amom manda' maol atini ma'ias ma'i, “Alipipai, ipa' i'i anif basefa fegewa' banaga ukup esis amam nematawai ma, dao' ipa' awi kiaef.”
44013016	Ea' Pol nosafel nasa'ma lagol na'i basef na'i, “Ipa' Israel hipai paloma ipa' anipa epes penda' lotuma Godi, ipa' peme' basef ae'afi.
44013017	God dembinai esis Israeli, anen nandandepa esis akusapa ape'isi ma afamba esis sefe' sailas sagapani itap apamba lu'upa Isip ea' anen nanda'as sataga hias a'owa' mini'ap laupi. A'i owa' main, banagami ananimi atom nofa' esis sakwaha itap apamba safi'i.
44013018	Ama owa', anamba wafigima fataupigima nofa' nimanimi ma waf asasifi ma afagof agwafomba 40-pelaiguf.
44013019	Ma itap lu'upa agilipa Kainan anen nahambombaga misi'ah 7-pelaih amam nematawa hiasi ea' naso'asa itap apamba pafe'ma esis Israel,
44013020	ea' sahapila itap apamba sape afagof agwafomba 450-pelaiguf. “Ea' anen nasa'ma amom dembami esis Israeli ea' amom mumafi esis sape sape satagama nemaf aman anamba profet Samuel nagataga.
44013021	Nogota atamba esis sawa salef sa'i sofa' anona king dembinai, ea' God naso'asa anona aman Sol, Kis nogamana. Aman anamba nataga mini'ap Benjamini. Ea' anen nape king dembinai ma afagof hiagufi 40-pelaiguf.
44013022	“A'i owa' main, God nali'amona king Sol, nanda' Devit nataga nape king asasinai. Anen na'ipasa aman anamba Devit na'i, ‘Devit nogama Jesii, okom ae'ami maimailana a'owa'. Anen atiasi nogaila okom ae'ami atom maga'iasi.’
44013023	Ea' God nanda'as na'amba si'i fowa' na'ias na'i nonda'as. Ama wambota Deviti owagama God nosa'ma Jisas, aman anamba nogofa' apa' Israeli.
44013024	Fowa' Jisas ata' owa' nifi'ia, nogota atamba aman anamba Jon nawalapa basef na'ipa esis Israel hiasi ma sombema nelelemb sokwaha waf awafi sefe'ma Goda sogofa' baptais.
44013025	Ea' felefele'ma Jon na'i nonda' maol ananini hi'igalan, a' na'i, ‘Ipa' ukup papoma ae' pa'imama? Ae' ina aman anamba dembinai ipa' pape pegehafanai, owa'. Ipa' peme'! Aman anamba anaf nigi'ma ae' nogafi'ii, anen bu'unai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina bu'uwai ma egatagwaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'.’
44013026	“Ipa' sahin owan, ipa' mini'ap epes pagataga Abrahami, anipa ea' daipa panda' lotuma Godi, peme'. Dei' basef ifimba God nasapa'ef fafi'mai apa' hiapai. Basef ifimba ma anen atiasi nofa'apa mokwaha waf awafi mogotanimai.
44013027	Ea' esis sagape Jerusalami saloma amom agufumi asasimi, esis ina sogawa aman anamba nofa'apa mogotanimaii, owa'. Esis ina sogawa andeande' basef ifimba amom profet fowa' maga'iefi, owa'. Anom agufumi matalifif sabat nimaguf hiafi sagapoma noma'wafi. Apa' ina sogawef, owa'. Basef ifimba atif fataga endilisi nemaf afamba esis sanda' kotima Jisas saga'i anen aman aunai ma sahana nogaga'.
44013028	Esis ina sati anif basef kofagefa waf awafi ma sohana nogaga', owa'. Ea' sofalai gavman dembinai Pailat ma ni'i aho'ma mohana nogaga' dowaf.
44013029	Esis sanda'as hi'alas hiahawes isimba si'i fowa' amom profet ma'i basef manda'ef fagape buk Baibeli maga'ifa anini. Ama main, esis satagwaha anen nisila'i lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ea' sawana anota matmat.
44013030	Owa' God nasa'mana wapani.
44013031	Esis isimba hiasi sakwaha itap apamba lu'wagoma agol Galili ea' salomana sondowasa' Jerusalemi, esis satolona nimaguf hiafi. Dei' epes isimba safe' sawalapa basefa apa' Israela anen.
44013032	“Ea' apa' dei' ma'ipipa basef fasifi ipa'. Hiahawes isimba fowa' God na'iasa na'i nogaso'asas akusipa ape'isii,
44013033	ea' ma'wis isimba dei' God naso' apa' awasi ananipai ma nasa'ma Jisas nagape namona. Nasa'ma Jisas si'i basef fagape buk Baibel Sam nagafe'ma bifi faga'ias na'amba God na'i, ‘Ina' Nogame ae'inai. Nemaf dei'ifi ae' ataga ahamena ine'iwai.’
44013034	Dei' God nasa'mana wapani matmat, ea' anen ina ata' notanima nofe' matmat wapani folo'olana, owa'atin. Ea' na'amba atin si'i God na'ias wapani naga'i, ‘Atiasi ae' etopalopepa ese'epa basef ifimba fasifi ae'afi ipa', fowa' a'if ea' ma a'i iga'ipanaef Deviti, ifimba andeande'ma ipa' pigahapifif.’
44013035	“Ea' si'i anif basef fagape buk Sami ma anen wapani faga'ias na'amba fa'i, ‘Ina atiasi ni'i aho'ma aman anamba nonda' maol ine'ini datimai folo'olana, owa'atin.’
44013036	“Apa' mogawa Devit nagahapila maol nagaila okom Godii la'afena esis amam nematawa sape sagaloma anini. A'i owa' main, anen naga' nafe' naloma amom bafapana ananimi ea' folo'walana.
44013037	Apa' aman anamba God notanima nagafelona wapanii, anen ina folo'walana, owa'atin.
44013038	Isimba atis dei' ae' a'i ipa' sahin owan pegawa basef ape'ifi ifimba. Aman anamba nakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi okom maso'anaf.
44013039	Mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani inimba ina banagani ma negakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi ma pegape wahifipa andeande', owa'atin. Apa' aman anamba nagakwaha waf hiafi awafi ma ipa' ami pegahapifa anini, ma pegape wahifipa usi'ipa ma naep Godi.
44013040	Dei' ipa' pendegawa waf ipe'ifi andeande' be'ef a'a awef? Na'amba hiahaom amamba awami mifi'mai ipa' si'i amom profet fowa' maga'iami ma'i,
44013041	‘Ipa' panda' basef findiwaifii, ipa' petologon nomonas solasefe' ea' awepa. Ae' anda' anin maol banagani ma nimaguf ipa' ata' pagapaifi. I'i anin epen niga'ipipa maol inimba ai, ipa' ina atiasi pihapifa inimba, owa'.’”
44013042	Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas ma'i muwis mofe' ando', owa' esis amam nematawa sa'ias na'amba sa'i, “Nemaf sabat afamba figagi'i apa' ma'i ipa' bipa pitanima pifi'i ea' pi'ipapa basef ifimba wapani.”
44013043	Ea' esis sakwaha ipat sandakolasatai sawisi ando' ea' esis Juda hiasi saloma anis epes hiasi daias sagi'mam. Epes isimba daias ina Juda, owa'. Apa' esis asofa' waf esis Juda sanda' lotuwafi ea'. Ea' amom biam maso'asa basef esis hiasi ma sape banages sahapifa God nanda' waf bu'wafi ma apa' dowafi.
44013044	Ama a'i owa' main sabat nemaf fagagi'i, amam nematawa sagape wambel ambalembai safi'i sandakolasa sogame' basef Godi. Amam nematawa isimba felefele'ma hi'igalas wambel ambalemba.
44013045	Owa' esis Juda sagati amam nematawa hiasi a'owa' sandakolasi, ea' ukup kowalep endilisi a'owa'. Ea' sa'i basef awafi ma Pol sa'i anen nambaso'mas.
44013046	Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas ina ombal maham, owa'. Amom ma'ipasef banagambel alihif ma'i, “Endilisi, afa' ata' ondase'epa basef Godi ipa' Juda pindali'. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ipa' apewa' alafugaha basef ifimba. Isimba ipa' pa'ias pa'i, ‘Apa' mandaiwa'ma mogofa' ambal namili ma mogape andeande' lifilafi.’ “Ipa' pa'i na'amba dei' ipa' peme'. Afa' dei' a' okwaha ipa' ofe' ugi'ma epes owa Judaisia wi'ipasa basef ifimba.
44013047	Dei' main, Dembinai na'ipafa dindinipa anif basef fagail buk Baibeli naga'i na'amba na'i, ‘Ae' anda' ipa' si'i lagala'ma esis anis daias owa' Judaisia. Ama ipa' pegatopalopa esis amam nematawa sagape walemb hiagomai ma itap apa'e. Ama anaf efa'as sotanimai hi'igalas.’”
44013048	Ea' esis daias owa' Judaisia same' basef ifimba sandagala a'owa'. Esis sonahasa basef Dembinaii sasa'ma agol ananigili. Ea' amam nematawa isimba God nogosaho'asi ma sogape namis dondol lifilafi, isimba sagahapifa Jisasi.
44013049	Ea' basef Dembinai fafe'agon hi'alagon anamba hiagoma.
44013050	Owa' esis Juda sasa'mai anowa nematawa agufuwai wanda' lotuma Godi waloma anom agufumi magape taun inimba lu'wagomai ea' sahambombaga Poli Barnabas sanda'am kwapete'am. Ea' sagalo'mam wambel asasimbili.
44013051	Ea' amom mandila'ma sopof fagail bo'wagah amamugahi ma mondola'waifa waf awafi fegapoma esis. Ea' mosafel mafe' Aikoniam.
44013052	Esis alipisi sagaila Jisasi asonahas endilisi ea' banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi mape si'ima esis.
44014001	Ea' Poli Barnabas mafe' mataga Aikoniam mafe' mawis ipat Juda sandakolasatai mawalapa basef si'i mali' manda'as. Amom mawalapa basef fasifi ea' esis Judai hiasi saloma anis daias owa' Judaia sahapifa God.
44014002	Apa' anis Juda ina sahapifa God, owa'. Esis sasa'ma nomonasa anis amam nematawa daias owa' Judaisia ea' sanda' epes isimba nelelemb awalemba esis Kristen.
44014003	Amom biam mapani nogota lautai Aikoniam ea' mawalapa basef Dembinaii banagambel alihif. Amom ina ombal maham, owa'. Ma'ipasa basefa Dembinai natopalopa esis dowaf nogowa' banagas. Ea' Dembinai nowa' banaga amom biam, manda' maol banagani naninani si'i God nanda'ani. Ea' dei' esis sogawa basef ifimba endilisifi atif.
44014004	Apa' esis amam nematawa taun inimba sandatopa' mini'ap biafip. Esis nelelemb atifilimb saloma esis Juda, apa' anis saloma amom aposel biam nembel atembel.
44014005	Ama main, esis epes owa' Judaisia saloma esis sanda'ipama sa'i basef sandame'maef saloma amom agufumi asasimi ea' sa'i sonda' Poli Barnabas aom. Sa'i sokwaha otamba soham afum.
44014006	Ea' amom mogawa isimba mafa' mafe' itap lu'upa Likonia ma walemb bialemb Listrai Derbe ea' analemb walemb felefele'ma anamba.
44014007	Amom manda' maol mawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi ma esis sagape walemb ambalembai.
44014008	Anona aman nagape wambel ambalemba Listrai, bo'wagah ananigahi owa' banagogaha. Fowa' anen ata' nagape nembel ma'manai bo'wagah aogah atapigah hapaona ea' aogah hi'alagah. Aman anamba ina nalutu nafe' kwasakwasala, owa'atin.
44014009	Ea' anen name' Pol na'i basef ea' Pol natolona banagambel nogawana na'i aman anamba nahapifa Goda nogataga bo'ona wapani.
44014010	Ea' natolona dindinip na'i basef banagambel na'amba na'i, “Ina' safel nilutu.” Ea' nosafel nandasa'ma kwafalis nalutu ea' nafe'.
44014011	Amam nematawa hiasi sati hiahawes isimba Pol nanda'asi ea' soga sa'i diga Likoniai na'amba sa'i, “Amom god dembami ape'imi biam mataga si'i epes misila'mai apa'!”
44014012	Barnabas sofalana sa'i anona dembinai Sus. Ea' Pol anen aman nanda' basef atumi. Ea' sofalana sa'i anona dembinai Hermes.
44014013	Ipat esis sanda' lotuma Susi totawa ando' taun inimba. Ea' pris nondolalima Susi nofa' anom bulmakau suwafumi maloma anis afis sogowalo'asi ea' nafi'i uta atamba tauni. Anen nalumai esis amam nematawa sa'i sondolali sonda' ofa ma amom biam.
44014014	Owa' aposel Barnabasi Pol mame' esis sa'i basef na'amba, amom mahape' klos maim amom magalami. Ea' masagih mafe' mawala esis amam nematawa la'afisa ma'ipas mehip ma'i,
44014015	“Ipa' epes, dei' maina panda'am na'amba? Afa' wandaiwa'. Afa' biafa ina God dembifai, owa'atin. Afa' epes atofa dowaf si'i ipa' wawalipipa basef bu'wafi. Ama ipa' pegakwaha god amamba falafumi baso'ami ma pefe' pigaila God nagape namona atapinai. Anen nanda' otaga ilif naloma itapi epes hiasi saloma naoh embel lu'wami maloma hiahaom hiami magapaumi.
44014016	Endilisi fowa' nimaguf hiafi nape natiti esis amam nematawa misi'ah hiasi safe'ma waf asasifi.
44014017	Apa' anen ina nape nandambahi'i, owa'atin. Anen nihimba'mapa waf ananifi ma nanda' waf bu'wafi ma apa'. Anen napani heven nanda' asaf falai ma ipa' ea' nanda' hiahaom gwa'aimi bu'wami mataga dondo' nogota amamutai. Ea' nowapanimipa gwa'aisi ipa', nanda' opalef ipe'ilifi sowenahalef.”
44014018	Amom ma'ipasa basef ifimba, manda' maol lu'wani a'owa' magatalagas ina sondolalim sonda' ofamam, owa'.
44014019	Anom Juda magape Antioki Aikoniam mafi'i Listra masa'ma ukup asasipi. Ea' dei' esis sakwaha otamba saha Pol sa'i owa' afuna ea' sahondo'ana nawisi na'oh ando' taun inimba.
44014020	Owa' esis sagahapifa Godi safi'i salutu salipana, a' nosafel wapani ea' nafe' nawis taun. Ama wafilu nafe' naloma Barnabas mafe' Derbe.
44014021	Poli Barnabas mawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi taun inimba ea' masa'ma ukup esis amam nematawa hiasii sataga Kristen, alipisi Jisasi. Ama main, a' motanima mafe' walemb ambalemba Listrai Aikoniam Antiok
44014022	ea' mowa' banaga esis Kristen. Amom ma'ipas dindinip na'amba ma'i, “Ipa' pendape banagepa pindahapifa Dembinai God. Apa' mondame' nimanimi akafimi mamimami ma mugawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiapa.”
44014023	Ea' mandandepa agufumi mugumafi esis Kristeni mandanda' sios isimba hiasi. Amom mololama gwa'asi mandabetena manda' esis sogape banagesa lagol Dembinaii anamba ea' sagahapifanai.
44014024	Ama main, amom mafe' la'afena anip itap lu'upa Pisidia, mafe' mataga anep itap wa'ol Pamfilia.
44014025	Amom mawalapa basefa esis epes sagape Pergai, ama main, miliana Atalia.
44014026	Anamba Atalia malota sip ea' pofa'am mafe' Antiok. Wambel ambalemba fowa' esis Kristen sandandepam magapoma lagol Godi ma nagatopalopam dowafa monda' maol inimba dei' manda'ani hi'agalani. Ea' dei' motanima mafi'i wambel ambale'e.
44014027	Amom mataga Antiok mofala esis muwa'anias sanda' kolasi ea' ma'ipasa basefa maol Dembinai nape nalomam natopalopam manda'ani. Ea' ma'i, “God nanda' ufia'w kwagala esis amam nematawa hiasi anis daias owa' Judaisia ma sogahapifa Krais.”
44014028	Ea' mapani anif nimaguf hiafi maloma esis sagahapifa Kraisi.
44015001	Anom amam magape Judiai miliana mataga Antiok ma'ipasa basef esis Kristen sagape wambota atota Godi. Masefela basef ma'ipas ma'i, “I'i ipa' pindaiwa'ma pigaila waf God naga'ipa Mosesafi ma owa' petopa' alop ipe'ipia, atiasi God ina nuwambilaipa pitanimai, owa'atin.”
44015002	Amom ma'ias na'amba, manda' ukup Poli Barnabasi numbutip a'owa' ea' ma'i basef banagafi mandahihianama maloma amom Judaimi. Ea' esis Kristen sandandepa Poli Barnabas maloma anom amam magahapifa Kraisi wapani mondowasa' Jerusalem ma'i basef ifimba monandonaef maloma amom aposel maloma agufumi siosi.
44015003	Esis Kristen sasapa'am mafe' ea' mafe' la'afena itap lu'upa Fonisiai Samaria. Ma'ipasa basef esis Kristen sagape itap apamba biafipi ma sogogawa God ea' nambema ukupa anis epes daias owa' Judaisia. Esis Kristen same' basef ifimba fanda' esis sandagala a'owa'.
44015004	Amom mafe' mataga Jerusalem, amom aposel maloma esis amam nematawa Kristen saloma agufumi asasimi sosafel sandalalamam sanda'mam gude amom. Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas mosafel ma'ipas basefa maol hiani God natopalopama manda'ani.
44015005	Owa' anom Kristen Farisi mosafel ma'ipa esis ma'i, “Ipa' pendatopa'masa alop asasipi, pi'ipasa sogaila wafa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani.”
44015006	Ea' amom aposel maloma agufumi mugumafi maol Godi mandakolas mape ea' monandona basef ifimba.
44015007	Amom ma'i basef hiafi ma ea', Pita nosafel nalutu na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' sahin owan, ipa' pegawa, fowa' God nawaloga maola afa', ea' Anen nosaho' ae' ea' ma egawalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi ma epes daias owa' Judaisia seme'efa sogahapifa God.
44015008	God nogawa nelelemb esis amam nematawa hiasi ea', nihimba'mafa nembel ananimbili ila ma esis. Anen nihimba'mapa na'amba ea' naso'asa Ambal bu'unai Ananinai esis si'i nagaso'apana apa'.
44015009	Anen ina nanda' anef wafa apa' a anef waf daiaf esis, owa'atin. Esis sahapifa God isimba atis opalef asasilifi fataga bo'walef.
44015010	Dei' maina ipa' pa'i ata' pegagwamba God? Ipa' ina pegwambasa hiahaom nimanimi esis Kristen sofa'am, owa'i. Fowa' esis bafasapa ea' apa' wapani, ina la'ifipama mogofa' nimanimi ma mogatopa' alop ape'ipi, owa'atin.
44015011	Apa' mogawa ufia'w akwamba Dembinai Jisas nagatopalopapa dowaf, dei' God nofa'apa mutanimai ea' ananipai, apa' maloma esis wapani.”
44015012	Pita na'ias na'amba owa', esis sandakolas atogini ina ata' sa'i anif basef, a' owa'atin. Ea' sambe' aligaha Barnabasi Pol. Amom biam mawalapa basef hiafi ma God nowa' banagam manda' hiahaom banagami si'i anen nanda'ami ma nogohnaep esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia.
44015013	Amom ma'ipasa ea', Jems na'ias na'i, “Ipa' sahin owan, ipa' peme' basef ae'afi.
44015014	Simeon na'ipapa ea' ma dambadamba God nihimba'mapa nali' nagati esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisia uwahipis nowambilai anis sogape ananisi.
44015015	Ea' basef fowa' God naga'ipa amom profet fagail buk Baibeli ea' na'amba atin si'i ifimba. Basef ifimba faga'ias fa'i,
44015016	“Anafa ae' itanima igafi'i, ipat atamba Deviti ea' tagatuwi, atamba atiasi esa'mata totawa wapani. Hiahaom ipat atambai ea' awasim, amamba atiasi enda'am motaga dambaim wapani, ea' esa'mata totawa.
44015017	Ma atiasi esis soloma anis daias sogololama Godi wapani la' lawa sogolaoma Dembinai, isimba hiasi efalasi ea' ae'asi.
44015018	Fowa' gani endilisi Dembinai nawalapa basef ifimba ea' dei' wapani na'if na'amba atin.”
44015019	Dei' nomonas ae'asi sandanda' na'amba. Epes anep mini'ap asagambema nelelemb sagafe'ma God ea'i, apa' ina moso'asa nimanimi esis, owa'.
44015020	Apa' monda' anif basef fefe'ma esis mi'ipas mi'i ina sea' gwa'aisi mais sondolalimasa god baso'amunaii, owa'i. Isimba alogw awagwi gwagailasi. Esis sindihi'amago waf afamba so'a waulafi ea' ina sea' mafis saham sogowa' bamafugahama afumi, owa'i. Ea' owa'i sea' esimbela anis mafis amambai beloma anis daias wapani, owa'i. Ae' a'i apa' monda'masa basef ifimba atif fefe'ma esis.
44015021	Dei' main, apa' mogawa fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' ma amom magawalapa basef God nagaso' Mosesafi kofagefa ea' ifimba atif magawalipasefa taun inimba hiani. Matalifamasef ifagw hiagwi apa' Juda mandakolasugwi nimaguf hiafi sagapoma noma'wafi.”
44015022	Ea' amom aposel maloma agufumi mugumafi maol Godi maloma esis Kristen hiasi sa'i basef atifif sandandepa anom amam biam asasimi agufumi Judas agol wa'agol Barsabas naloma Sailas. Amom biam amagah lu'ugahimi la'afena esis Kristeni. Ea' sa'i sosapa'am mefe' Antiok moloma Poli Barnabas.
44015023	Esis saso'ama anif basef fagail pipai ma lagof amom biami Judasi Sailas faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Afa' aposel afa' agufufai sahopepa ipe'ifai, ea' afa' dei' wanda'ago basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' sahin owan owa' Judaipaia. Ipa' pagape wambel Antioki ma itap lu'upa Siriai Silisia, afa' wa'i nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa' sahin owan.
44015024	Afa' wame'as ea' anis epes afa'isi safo'o sanda'epa pesafel gogolalasipa kwapete' ma basef asasifi, sanda'epa ombal mahepa ukup pandopelaepa. Esis sanda'am na'amba sa'i sogahondo' ukup ipe'ipi. Apa' afa' ina' wa'ipas safo'o sonda'epa na'amba, owa'.
44015025	Afa' wame' basef ifimba ea' wa'ipasa ukup pape atogon wa'i basef wandame'maef. Ea' wandandepa amam amamba biama osapa'am mofe'mago ipa' molomago biam apa' ukup pagailam a'owa'i, Barnabasi Pol.
44015026	Amom biam ina ombal mahama mogololama ambagof amamugufi ma mogasa'ma agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi monda' maol ananini, owa'.
44015027	Afa' dei' wasapa'ago Judas naloma Sailas ama atiasi mi'ipipa basef ifimba atif afa' wa'if wanda'ef fagafe'mago ipe'i malogof amamugufi.
44015028	Holi Spirit Ambal Godi nape nalomafa wa'i basef wandame'maef na'amba. Afa' ina ose'epa anom nimanimi pefa'am, owa'. Waf afambai atef ipa' pendanda'af.
44015029	Ipa' ina pea' mafis saham sondolali ma god baso'amunaii, owa'i. Ipa' ina pea' esimbela anis mafis, owa'i. Ipa' ina pea' mafis sogowa' bamafugahami ma afumi, owa'i. Ea' pindihi'ama waf afamba so'a waulafi awafi. I'i ipa' solawaipa andeande'ma pindihi'ama waf afambai, andeande' ipa' a' penda' waf bu'wafi.”
44015030	Ea' esis sios sasapa'am mafi'i Antiok, makolasai esis Kristen atogon maso'asa pas isimba.
44015031	Ea' esis satilis sonahasa basef ifimba bu'wafi fegewa' banaga esisi.
44015032	Judas naloma Sailas amom profet. Dei' ma'ipasa basef hiafi bu'wafi esis Kristen, mowa' banagas mafela ukup asasipi.
44015033	Amom ata' mapani nogota laota kwasakwasala Antiok, esis Kristen sanda'mam nemaf bu'wafi ma amom mogape ukup awanep. Ea' sasapa'am mutanima mafe' ma esis sasapa'am magafi'ii.
44015034	[Apa' Sailas na'i ata' nupani Antiok.]
44015035	Owa' owa'atin. Barnabas naloma Pol atom ata' mapani Antiok, manda' maol maloma anom amam hiami wapani mawalapa basef bu'wafi Dembinaii mawalipasef.
44015036	Ama main anif nimaguf fafe' ma hi'alef owa', Pol na'ipa Barnabas na'i, “Afa' biafa ata' otanima ofe' uti esis Kristen sahin owan taun hiagoma fowa' wafe' wagawalapa basef Dembinaima. Ama ogogawa esis, sape andeande' a'a owa.”
44015037	-
44015038	Ea' Barnabas na'i no'wa Jon Mak nefe' nolomam. Apa' Pol nandaiwa'ma anen nefe' nogalomam. Dei' main, aman anamba fowa' nakwaha amom gani Pamfilia notanima nafe'. Ina nalomam atin mafe' manda' maol hi'alan, owa'.
44015039	Amom biam manda' migimigaha isimba ea' dei' ina ata' manda' maol atogon, a'owa'. Ea' Barnabas nao'wa Jon Mak nafe' nalomana malota anop sip mafe' anin ailan agol Saiprus.
44015040	Apa' Pol nao'wa Sailas nalomana mafe'. Ea' esis Kristen hiasi sasapa'am sa'i, “Okom lu'unai Dembinai nope nolomepa notopalopepa dowaf numafipa.”
44015041	Ea' nafe' la'afena itap apamba biafip lu'upa Siriai Silisia naloma Sailas mafe' mowa' banaga esis Kristen.
44016001	Pol nafe' nataga Derbai Listra wapani wambel ambalemba anona aman alipunai nagahapifa Jisasi nape, agilinama Timoti. Anen nogama ano'w nemata'w Judai'wi, ako'w wapani Kristen. Apa' ahamana esis Griki.
44016002	Esis Kristen Listrai Aikoniami sa'i waf Timotii bu'wafi.
44016003	Pol okom ma'i Timoti nefe' nolomana. Ea' isimba atis dei' nao'wana natopa'mana alop. Pol okokoma esis Juda sagape na'ambai na'i, I'i Timoti owa' notopa' alopa, esis ina atiasi some' basef ananifi, owa'. Na'amba dei' naila waf esis Judai natopa'mana alop. Dei' main, esis hiasi sogawa Timoti ahamana anen Grikinai.
44016004	Nimaguf hiafi amom malutu mafe' walemb ambalemba hielimbi ma'ipasa basef esis. Basef ifimba fowa' amom aposel maloma agufumi ma'if mandame'maef Jerusalami, ifimba dei' maso'asef esis Kristen ea' ma'ipas ma'i, “Ipa' pindaila basef ifimba.”
44016005	Ea' dei' esis Kristen sahapifa Jisas banages a'owa' ea' wambota esis Kristeni sataga sandanda nimaguf hiafi ahias a'owa'.
44016006	Ambal bu'unai Godi nasopama amom mogawalapa basefa esis Asia. Ea' mafe' la'afena itap apamba lu'upa biafip Frigiai Galesia.
44016007	Ea' mape anep itap lu'upa Misia, mafe' mataga felefele' ma anep itap lu'upa Bitinia ma'i muwis itap apamba. Owa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nili'amama mogafe' anamba.
44016008	Ea' amom mindihi'ama Misia miliana mafe' Troas.
44016009	A'i owa' owamb ambamba, Pol nati anom hiahaom si'i koh dondo'ah, nati anona aman Masedoniainai nalutu nofalai Pol na'ipana dindinip na'i, “Ina' newala nimbuwi naoh a' nifi'i Masedonia netopalopapa.”
44016010	Ea' Pol nati amamba, afa' kwafalis atis olaoma ufia'wa ogafe' itap lu'upa Masedonia. Afa' ogawa God nofalafa ma ogawalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi ma esis.
44016011	Ea' walota sip wambel ambalemba Troas ea' wafe', wafe' usi'ifa Samotres. Ama a'i anef nemaf owa' a' wafe' Neapolis.
44016012	Ea' wakwaha wambel ambalemba a' wafe' Filipai, anamba fowa' esis Rom safi'i sagapoma. Wambel ambalemba lu'wambilima itap apamba Masedonia. Ea' wape anamba anif nimaguf.
44016013	Ama a'i owa' sabat, a' wafe' wawis indalelemb uta ando' ma wambel ambalemba, wafe' anemb walemb. Afa' wa'i felefele'ma walemb ambamba anagon esis Juda sandabetenagoma. Wape anamba owa', wati anowa nematawa ondowa'anima wape ea' afa' wape walomawa wa'i.
44016014	Ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Lidia kwanda' lotuma Godi kwame' basef ifimba. Ako'w Taiatairai'wi, kwanda' maol kwanda' bisnisa luwaguf akwahifi. Dembinai napati okom akwa'umi ea' kwagahembe'ma basef ifimba Pol naga'iefi.
44016015	Ea' kofa' baptais kwaloma esis sagape ipat atotai wapani. Ako'w kofa' baptaisa ea', kwa'ipafa kwa'i, “I'i ipa' ukup pandanda' pa'i ae' ahapifa Dembinai endilisi, ipa' fi'i pepe peloma ae' ipat ae'atai.” Ea' ako'w dindinapi'wa afa' wafe' waila basef akwa'ufi.
44016016	Anef nemaf afa' wafe' anagon esis sape sandabetenagoma, wati ano'w nemata'w kwafi'i kwatolofa ufia'w. Ako'w agol aka'w kwape lafela anom amam kwanda' maolam. Nemata'w akwamba anona ambal aunai napao'w ea' ambal anamba nagawalapa basefa hiahawes atiasi sogatagai. Ako'w kwahali' ambal anamba ma basef mamimami ea' nagwama'wef. Ea' dei' amam amamba dembami akwa'umi mofa' otamba hiambai ma ako'w kwanda'am na'amba.
44016017	Nemata'w akwamba kwagi'ma Pol kwaloma afa', ea' kwanda'am falafala atapi'w kwail kwa'i, “Amom manda' maola God nagape ilif endilisii, ma'ipapa basefa ufia'w God nowambelapa mutanima mufi'i mogape andeande'akwi.”
44016018	Dondol nemata'w akwamba kwanda'as na'amba atin nimaguf hiafi. Ea' Pol okom iwanima ako'w a'owa', nandambema na'ipa ambal anamba nagapau'wi na'i, “Ae' a'ipina agol Jisas Kraisi, kwaho'w nemata'w akwamba a' nefe'!” Ea' ambal anamba nakwaha ako'w kwafalis a' nafe'.
44016019	Ea' amom dembami mugumafia'wi mogawa kofagema ma ufia'w akwamba mogofa' otamba'wi a' owa'atin. Ea' dei' mombalo' Poli Sailas mahondo'am mafe'ma agufumi mugumafi koti mandatama magapoma.
44016020	Ea' ma'ipam ma'i, “Amam amamba biam Judaimi. Amom manda' maol mafela ukup awapi esis amam nematawai ma wambel ape'ima.
44016021	Ea' mawalapa basefa anef waf apa' epes Romipai mandaiwa'mafi. Mu'uli ape'ini nandaiwa'ma apa' mugaila waf afamba amamifi, owa'atin.”
44016022	Ea' esis amam nematawa wapani sasapaga amom biam. Ea' amom dembami mugumafi koti mowando' siaogw amamugwi ma mogopagaha alop amamipi.
44016023	Ea' mopagahom hiafi timbi tambel manda'am manda' kalabus. Ma'ipa aman nalutu nugumafi utai dindinipa nulutu nugumafiam andeande'.
44016024	Ea' anen name' basef banagafi na'amba, nanda'am mapani rum amamba magape la'afen howa'e ipat atamba sanda' kalabusa. Ea' nowa' bo'wagah amamugahi sen, hail anop indap lu'wapi.
44016025	Ama a'i owa' owamb la'afimba amanota Poli Sailas mandabeten manda' awalef masa'ma agol Godi ea' anis daias sanda' kalabusi same' manda'am.
44016026	Ea' kwafalis atis imauna lu'unai nataga naola olalef mogombalo' ipat kalabusi. Ea' utagw mandawisi', sen negewa' esis sanda' kalabusi a' nandatagwah.
44016027	Ea' anen nugumafi esis kalabusi nosafel nati utagw ipat gwandawisi', na'i owa' kalabus sawisi safa' sagafe'ma. Ea' nagiai bainat ananinai na'i a' nondaha alop ananipi noga'.
44016028	Owa' Pol noga na'i mehip na'i, “Hai, ina' owa'i nehambombaga ine'a! Apa' hiapai mape!”
44016029	Ea' anen galala nofalasa lam sofa'am safi'i ea' nasagih nafi'i nawisi nomon. Anen ombal mahana endilisi bombobombol nape nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma Poli Sailas.
44016030	Nofa' amom biam mawis ando' nahali'am na'i, “Ipa' dembipai, ae' enda' maina atiasi God nofa'e embema nembel itanimai igahapifana?”
44016031	Amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' nihapifa Dembinai Jisas, ama atiasi God nofa'ena nitanimai nogakwaha waf awafi ine'ifi. Ea' neloma wambota ine'isi wapani na'amba atin.”
44016032	Amom ma'ipana basef Godi naloma epes isimba ananisi sagape ipat ananitaii.
44016033	Ea' dei' atef anen nofa' amom nasa'opamam esimbela melegw amamugwi sagahama, owamb ambamba atomb. Ea' kwafalis anen naloma wambota awasi waulu'mana ananisi sofa' baptais.
44016034	Ea' nofa'am mafe' ipat ananitai naso'ama gwa'aisi. Ea' anen naloma esis sagape ipat ananitai sandagala endilisi a'owa' ma sagahapifa God.
44016035	Ama lala owa', amom jas manda'mas basefi masapa' anom plisman mafi'i ma'i, “Ipa' kwaha amam amamba biam a' mofo'o.”
44016036	Ea' anen nugumafi kalabusi nofa' basef ifimba nafe'ma Pol na'ipana na'i, “Amam dembami manda'mas koti masapa' basef fafi'mai ipa' ma ea' pegafe'. Na'amba dei' ipa' pekwaha kalabus afo'o ea' opalef ipe'ilifi fendape sa'ombel.”
44016037	Owa' Pol na'ipa amom plisman na'i, “Afa' biafa Romufai, amom ina manda' kotimafa andeande'ma mogati anef waf awafi ma afa' biafa, owa'atin. Amom mahafa dowadowafa naep esis amam nematawai. Ea' manda'afa wanda' kalabus. Owa' dei' ma'i mondambaho' a' mili'amona afa' ofe'? Owa'atin endilisi! Amom ata' mifi'i dao', mo'wafa uwis ando'.”
44016038	Ea' amom plisman mofa' basef ifimba mafe'ma amam amamba manda' kotimasi, mame' basef fa'i amom biam Romumi ea' ombal baham.
44016039	Ea' mafe'ma amom biam maola'i amom biam mawisi ando' ma'i diga uwahipigai malomam. Ea' ma'ipama mogakwaha wambel ambalemba mogafe' anagon daiagon.
44016040	Ea' makwaha ipat kalabusi mawisi a' mafe' ipat Lidiai mati esis Kristen ma'ipasa anif basefa mogowa' banaga nelelemb asasilimbi. Ama main a' mafe'.
44017001	Amom biam mafe' mataga anambel wambel Amfipolis ea' makwaha wambel ambalemba mafe' mataga Apolonia. Ea' makwaha wambel ambalemba wapani a' mafe' mataga Tesalonaika. Anota ipat lu'utai esis Juda sandakolasatai wambel ambalemba.
44017002	Ea' Pol nanda'as na'amba atin si'i nanda'as dondol, ea' nafe' nawis ipat atamba nalomas. Amom mape wikifah wanogah ama nimaguf ifimba wanif sagapoma noma'wafi sabat, Pol na'i nalomasa basef Godi fagail buk Baibeli.
44017003	Anen nawalapa basef kofagefa Godi na'ipasef, na'i, “Krais God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii anen nofa' akafimi ma naga' notanima nogosafel wapani.” Ea' anen na'i, “Ina' ano'w ufia'w daia'wa God nogatopalopapa, owa'atin. Jisas anamba ae' agawalapa basefanai, anen Krais.”
44017004	Ea' anis amam nematawa Judaisi sahapifa Krais ea' saila Poli Sailas sataga wambota atotota Godi. Anis Grik sanda' lotuma Godi hiasi saloma anowa nematawa dembiwai hiawai, esis wapani sataga wambota Godi saila amom biam.
44017005	Owa' esis Juda akowalas nelelemb awalemba esis hiasi sagahapila basef Poli Sailas maga'ipasafi. Na'amba esis sofa' anom amam awami manda' waf awafii. Dondol amom magape anamba esis sandatama sagapomai. Ea' sakolasa amam nematawa hiasi a'owa' ukup pehafela sa'i sogapa'. Ea' gigal sa'oh safitap a'owa'. Ea' safe' sambiasa uta ipat Jesoni ma suwis sogolaoma Poli Sailas. Sa'i sofa'am muwisi ando'ma sogaso'asam amam nematawa hiasi.
44017006	Apa' owa', esis ina sati amom biam, owa'atin. Ea' sahokolai Jeson gagatoma ipat atambai naloma anis Kristen safe'ma amom agufumi wambel ambalembaimi. Esis sanda' ukup asasipi pandanda' sa'i, “Amam amamba biam manda' waf awafi fataga itap hiagoma ea' dei' mafi'i mape na'a.
44017007	Jeson nao'wam mape ipat ananitai. Amom mogosambala lo dembinai gavman Romunai, maga'i anona king dembinai daiana nape agol ananigili Jisas.”
44017008	Esis amam nematawa hiasi saloma agufumi wambelimi same' basef ifimba, asosafel gogolalasis kwapete' sa'i mehip.
44017009	Ea' dei' agufumi manda' Jeson naloma esis Kristen isimba sali' satala kot, sotagwaha amom mogafe' wahifim.
44017010	Ama owamb atomb ambamba esis Kristen sasapa' Poli Sailas a' mafe' anambel wambel Beria. Amom mafe' mataga Beria, mafe' mawis ipat lu'utai esis Juda sandakolasatai.
44017011	Epes sagape Beriai opalef fafe' endilisi same' basef sanda' waf bu'wafi sikila' esis sagape Tesalonaikai. Apa' esis Beria dao' sofa' basef sandagalamef a'owa'. Ea' dondol satalifa basef fagail buk Baibeli, ma sogogawa basef Pol naga'ipasafi endilisifi a'a owa'.
44017012	Ea' dei' amam nematawa Juda hiasi sahapifa Krais. Ea' anowa nematawa hiawai agof lu'wagufuwai waloma anom Grik hiami wapani sahapifana.
44017013	A'i owa' main, esis Juda sagape Tesalonaikai same' basef fa'i, Pol nawalapa basef Godi Beria. Ea' safe' salalamona nomonas esis amam nematawa sagape Beriai awes.
44017014	Na'amba dei' atef amom Kristen masapa' Pol a' niliana nafe' naoh akata. Apa' Sailasi Timoti atom mape Beria.
44017015	Ea' amom mofa' Pol magafe' ufia'wi malutumana mafe' mahaponana Atens. Ama motanima mafe' owa', Pol nasapa' basef fafe'ma Sailasi Timoti na'i, “Ipa' bipa pifi'mai ae' kwafalis.”
44017016	Pol nape nasasa amom biam Atens ea' nati wambel ambalemba nati god baso'amunai hiana a' owa'. Ea' okom mandaiwa' endilisi ma esis sanda' lotuma amamba.
44017017	Ea' nimaguf hiafi anen nafe' ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai na'i basef hiafi naloma esis Juda saloma anis isimba sonda' lotuma Godi. Nalomas sa'i basef sandahihianamaef nahagofa ukup asasipi. Ea' nimaguf hiafi nafe' anamba esis sandatama sagapoma, na'i basef hiafi nalomas sa'i sandahihianamaef saloma anis safi'i sagapani.
44017018	Anom amam tisa gawaimi anom Epikurian maloma anom Stoik ma'i basef mandahihianama maloma Pol ma'i, “Aman anamba okom magahanai, naga'i basef mamimamii, anen na'i ni'i main?” Pol nawalapa basef bu'wafi Jisasi na'ipasa Jisas nogosafel matmat. Ea' anom ma'i, “Anen na'i nowalapa basefa anom god dembami anambel wambili a'a?”
44017019	Ea' mofa' Pol mafe' maloma anom gawaimi mandakolas anota domota agol Areopagus. Amom ma'i, “Afa' wa'i ogawa basef ifimba dambaifi ina' nagaso'asef esis amam nematawai.
44017020	Afa' wagahembe'ma basef ine'ifi ma ogogawef. Owa' owa'atin, anif daif. Ea' dei' afa' wa'i ata' ogawa basef ifimba kofagefa.”
44017021	Esis Atens hiasi saloma epes analemb walembi safi'i sagape Atensi, ina safi'i sanda' anin mae, owa'atin. Esis saha nimaguf hiafi sambanef sapoma sanda' basef atom dambaimi ma sagame' basef dambaifi.
44017022	Pol nalutu la'afena amom gawaimi mandakolas halafuta Areopagusi na'ipasef na'i, “Ipa' epes Atensipai, ae' ati ipa' banagepa a'owa' ma hiahaom hiami panda' lotumami.
44017023	Doko' ae' afo'o owa' ati hiahaom amamba ipa' panda' lotumami ea' ati anom otam ipa' panda' ofa panda' lotumami wapani, esis sanda' anif basef fail otam amamba faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘God anamba apa' owa' mogogawa agilinamaia.’ Apa' owa' owa'atin, ipa' pandanda' lotumana falafuna, dei' awalapa basef alihif a'ipipana.
44017024	“God nanda' itap paloma apa' epes maloma hiahaom magape itap apa'e, anen Dembinai ma otagai itapi. Anen ina nagape nomona ifagw lotugwi epes sagala'agw lagufi, owa'atin.
44017025	Anen atona naso'ama ambal namili laloma ambip saloma hiahaom hiamuma epes hiasi. Ea' anen ina anin mae akana ma epes sotopalopana sogaso'ana anis maefah, owa'atin.
44017026	Bafamapa atona anen God nanda' misi'ah amam nematawa hiasi sataga hi'alas. Ea' nanda'as sape itap hiagoma. Anen atona nanda' nohotagw nimaguf ma'uma'uf fandahama esis sagape mamahogomai. Ea' nosaho' itap pafe' pegetambela paloma walemb asasilimbi.
44017027	God nanda'am na'amba ma esis sola' sogolaoma anona sogahapifana. I'i esis la' wando' sowando'mana sefe' sotolona a'a owa'. Apa' anen ina nape laogona apa' hiapai atona atin, owa'atin.
44017028	Si'i anona aman ipe'inai na'i basef naga'i, ‘Apa' mofa' ambal namili ma anen ea' naso'apa pepel, dei' malutu mafe'.’ Si'i anom amam gawaimi maga'i na'amba ma'i, ‘Apa' wapani awasi ananipai.’
44017029	“Ea' Pol na'i wapani na'i, “Apa' mape awasi Godi. Ea' apa' ina ukup pendanda' pi'i anen si'i ambal dowaf epes sanda' otambai gol silva sanda'ami, owa'. Amamba ina a' ukup epesi atip pandanda'mam sanda'am gawa asasini, owa'atin.
44017030	Fowa' epes owa' ata' sogawanaia, God ina na'i basef hiahaofa hiahaom hiami esis sanda'am nogota atambai, owa'. Apa' dei' anen ea' na'i dindinipa epes hiasi ma walemb hiagoma na'i, ‘Ipa' pewa' alafugaha waf awafi pembema nelelemb peso' ae'.’
44017031	“Anen a' nandandepa anef nemaf ea' ma nonda' kot. Nemaf afamba anen nowaloga waf amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas. Basefa kot ananitai anaf fefe' usi'if hilili' hi'ilif. Anen nandandepa anona aman ea' ma nogahapila kot atamba. Aman anamba naga' ea' ma God nagasa'mana wapani matmati. Isimba atis apa' mogawa basef ifimba endilisifi atifa anen nonda'mas kot.”
44017032	Esis same' basef ifimba ma epes sogosafel wapani matmat ea' anis sa'i basef sanda' findiwaef. Apa' anis sa'i, “Dao', apa' ma'i atiasi meme' basef ine'ifi wapani ma hiahawes isimba.”
44017033	Ea' Pol nakwaha amom gawaimi mandakolas magapani a' nafe'.
44017034	Ea' anis epes sahapifa Jisas saila Pol safe'. Epes isimba Dionisius, anen anona gawainai ma amom mandakolas Areopagusi naloma ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Damaris saloma anis daias wapani.
44018001	A'i owa' main, Pol nakwaha Atens nafe' anambel wambel Korin.
44018002	Ea' nati anona aman Judainai agilinama Akila. Mamasana solana nataga Pontus. Nimbewa' nakwaha itap lu'upa Itali nafi'i naloma waulu'mana Prisila. Dei' main, Klodius nape nagali'i gavman Romunai na'ipa esis Juda dindinipa sogakwaha Roma sotanima sogafe'. Ea' Pol nafe'ma na'i nogati esis bias.
44018003	Ea' nape nanda' maol naloma esis. Dei' main, anen nanda' maol inimba atin naloma esis, sogofa' otamba maina sosambala sel sanda'am sagala' ifagwami.
44018004	Nimaguf hiafi esis sagapoma noma'wafi, Pol nafe' ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai ea' na'i nalomasa nogafela ukup asasipi sogahapifa Jisas, Juda saloma esis Grik wapani.
44018005	Sailasi Timoti makwaha itap lu'upa Masedonia mafi'i Pol nagapoma, nogota atamba Pol nakwaha maol inimba nogosambala sel ea' nanda' maol atapina nawalapa basef bu'wafi nimaguf hiafi. Nawalapef banagambela esis Juda na'amba na'i, “Jisas anen Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.”
44018006	Owa' esis sosambala basef ananifi sanda' anen findiwana. Ea' nanda'masa anin ametal nihimba'masa waf awafi asasifi. Nandila'ma sopof usas sagail klos ananisi sa'oma esis, na'ipas banagambel na'i, “I'i ipa' higiligalepama, kofagema ea' ipe'imi atom. Ae' basef akema amamba. Dei' ae' a' efe'ma igawalipa amam nematawa isimba owa' Judaisia sogololama Godi.”
44018007	Ea' Pol nakwaha ipat sandakolasatai nawisi ando' nafe' anota ipat togatawa felefele'ma ipat atambai a' nape atapina. Ipat atamba anona amani, agol ananigili Titius Jastus. Aman anamba nogawa God nanda' lotumanai.
44018008	Anona aman agilinai nugumafi lotu esis Judai Krispus. Anen naloma esis wambota ananisi sahapifa Dembinai. Ea' esis Korin hiasi same' basef Pol nagawalipasafi sahapifa Jisas sofa' baptais.
44018009	Owa' anef nemaf owamb Pol nati anom maefah si'i koh dondo'ah, Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ina ombal mohena nesopama malogol, owa'i. Newalapa basef ni'if.
44018010	Dei' main, ae' ape alomena. Amam nematawa hiasi sagape taun wambel ambalembai esis ae'asi. Ea' ina a' anona aman nosafel nohambombagena, owa'.”
44018011	Pol nape wambel ambalemba Korin nogota lautai afagol si'igili du'wanigili ea' na'ipasa basef Godi nawalipasef.
44018012	Ama main, anona aman agilinama Galio nataga nape gavman dembinai ma itap lu'upa esis Grik sagapoma. Nogota atamba esis Juda sosafel sandame'ma na'amba atin sombalo' Pol sofa'ana safe'ma kot sambaso'mana sa'i,
44018013	“Aman anamba nagasa'ma ukup esis amam nematawai ma sogosambala basefa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani ape'ini naloma Romi sanda' lotuma Goda anef waf daiaf.”
44018014	Pol na'i nogwa basef, owa' Galio na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “I'i aman anamba nowala lo nonda' anef waf awafi ma pa'i penda'mana basefai, dao' ae' a' eme' basef ipe'ifi.
44018015	Apa' owa', ipa' pafi'i pahali'ima enda' kota basef anagof agofa mu'uli ape'ini atin. Ea' hapaimi, ipa' atipa penandonago isimba. Ae' andaiwa'ma egame' kota hiahaom na'ambaimi, owa'.”
44018016	Ea' anen nali'amona esis sakwaha kot safe'.
44018017	Esis sombalo' Sostenes agilinai nugumafi lotu Judai, sahana felefele'ma anamba esis sanda' kota. Apa' Galio ina okom mandanda'ma hiahawes isimba, owa'. Nape natitilis dowaf.
44018018	Pol ata' nape nimaguf hiafi wambel ambalemba Korin naloma esis Kristen. Ama main, nanda'masa nemaf bu'wafi esis nakwahis ea' nandagia sip. Sip pakwaha wambel ambalemba pa'i pefe' itap lu'upa Siria. Akilai Prisila safe' salomana. Afamba Pol owa' ata' nolota sipa, anen natopa' awif balaga wambel ambalemba Senkria. Dei' main, anen na'i basef banagafi naloma Goda na'i nonda' anin mae.
44018019	Esis safe' sataga Efesus, Pol nakwaha esis Prisilai Akila wambel ambalemba. Ea' anen atona nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai naloma esis Juda sa'i basef sandahihianamaef ea' nawalipasa basef Godi ma nogasindi'amonas.
44018020	Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Ina' ata' nepe nogota laota nelomapa.” Owa' na'i, “Ae' bola dao'.”
44018021	Ea' na'i nemaf bu'wafi ma esis na'i, “I'i God ni'i aho'me, anef nemaf itanimai ifi'i itilipa.” Ea' nakwaha Efesus, a' nafe' sip.
44018022	Sip pafe' pail Sisaria, Pol nisila' nafe' Jerusalem nanda'mas nemaf bu'wafi naloma esis Kristen hiasi. Ea' niliana Antiok.
44018023	Pol napani nogota lautai kwasakwasala Antiok ama main, notanima nafe' wapani analemb walemb hielimbi ganigani ma itap lu'upa Galesiai Frigia fowa' nali' nagafe'ma. Ea' nanda' maol nowa' banaga esis Kristen hi'alas.
44018024	Anona Judainai, aman Aleksandriainai nafi'i nape Efesus. Agol ananigili Apolos. Anen naga'i basef bu'wafi atifi, nogogawa buk Baibel a'owa'i.
44018025	Fowa' anis sawalipana ma ufia'w Dembinaii ea' dei' banagona a'owa' ma naga'ipas andeande' hiahaom Jisas nanda'ami. Apa' anen nogawa basefa baptais Joni atis.
44018026	Ea' nafe' ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi nawalipasa basef. Anen ina ombal mahana ma esis amam nematawa, owa'atin. Prisilai Akila same' anen sao'wana safe' ipat asasitai sihimba'mana anif basef wapani ma ufia'w Godi ma nogogawa basef kofagefa.
44018027	A'i owa' main, Apolos na'i nefe' esis Krik sagapoma ea' esis Kristen sagape Efesusi sowa' banaga nomonas ananisi ma nanda'as na'amba. Esis sanda' anif basef fafe'ma esis Kristen Grikisi, sa'ipasa sogofa'ana. Apolos nafe' nataga Grik sagapoma, nati anis amam nematawa sagahapifa Jisasi. Fowa' God nati uwahipis natopalopas dowafa sogahapifana. Dei' Apolos nanda' maol natopalopa Kristen isimba hilili' nowa' banagas.
44018028	Anen banagona endilisi a'owa' ma nagagwa basef esis Judai ma nogohnaep esis amam nematawai. Anen banagona nalomas nanda' hihianama natalogofas nikila'as. Ama nigihimba'masa basef alihifa buk Baibela Jisas Krais God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii.
44019001	Apolos nape Korin, nogota atamba Pol a' nafe' walemb ambalemba bagape nomona halafutagwi ea' nafe' nataga Efesus nati anis Kristen.
44019002	Ea' nahali'as na'i, “Fowa' ipa' pahapifa Jisas pefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi?” Owa' esis sa'i, “Ata' owa'atin. Apa' ina mame' basefa anen Ambal Godi Holi Spirit nape, owa'.”
44019003	Ea' Pol na'ipas na'i, “Dei' ipa' pefa' baptaisa main?” Ea' sa'i, “Apa' mofa' baptais Joni.”
44019004	Ea' Pol na'i, “Fowa' Jon nagapisi'as embeli na'ias na'i, ‘Ipa' pembema nelelemb pewa' alafugaha waf awafi pefe'ma God, pefa' baptais. Ea' pindahapifa aman anamba dembinai atiasi nigi'ma ae' nigafi'ii. Aman anamba anen Jisas.’”
44019005	Esis same' basef ifimba, asahapifa Dembinai Jisas sofa' baptaisa agol ananigili.
44019006	Ea' Pol nawamona lagofa esis, Holi Spirit Ambal Godi a' nafi'mai esis nasa'mas sa'i diga naninani sawalapa basef si'i amom profet maga'if.
44019007	Esis siamba epes isimba sataga felefele'ma 12-pelais.
44019008	Ea' Pol nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sandakolasatai nawalapa basef bu'wafi. Anen nanda'as na'amba atin nape aomb wanemb. Ina ombal mahana, owa'. Anen banagona na'ipas. Anen naloma esis sape sa'i basef atin, na'ipasa nogafela ukup asasipi ma sogogawa sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias atapina.
44019009	Apa' owa', anis sasopama opalef banages a'owa', ina sahapifa Jisas, owa'atin. Esis sa'i basef awafi ma ufia'w Dembinaii ma naep esis amam nematawai. Ea' dei' Pol nakwaha esis hiasi nao'wa esis Kristen atis safe' salomana. Pol nawalapa basef nimaguf hiafi atapina ipat atamba Tiranusi, atamba sagawalipas basefa.
44019010	Ea' nanda'as na'amba atin nape afagof biagof. Esis amam nematawa hiasi hi'alas sagape itap lu'upa Asiai walemb hielimbi same' basef Dembinaii, Juda saloma isimba owa' Judaisia wapani.
44019011	God natopalopa Pol nanda' hiahaom mamimami banagami hiami si'i God nanda'ami.
44019012	Esis sati amamba, sofa' hankisip luwaguf maisa sanogam alop Poli, sofa'as safe'ma esis aowas nanda'asi. Esis sanda'am na'amba owa', aowas hiani hi'alan ea' ambagof awami makwaha esis mafe'.
44019013	Ea' anom Juda mafe' ganigani manda' bisnisa maol inimba matofa ambagof awami. Mati maol Pol nanda'ani manda' so'wale mopehafa agol Dembinai Jisas ma'i motalogofa ambagof awami ma waf afambai. Ma'ias na'amba atona atin ma'i, “Agol Jisas anamba Pol nagawalapa basefanai, apa' ma'ipipa dindinip a'owa' ma pekwaha epes isimba pigawisi ando'.”
44019014	Ea' anona aman Judainai pris dembinai agol ananigili Siva. Nogaopana ananimi 7-pelaim manda' waf afamba ma'i mogatalogofa ambagof awami ma agol Jisasi.
44019015	Owa', aman anamba ambal aunai nagapaunai nagwa basefa amom na'amba na'i, “Ae' egawa Jisasi Pol. Apa' ipa' epes mamahipama? Ae' ina' egawepa.”
44019016	Ea' aman anamba ambal aunai nagapaunai fete'ana nalotawa amom ea' naham napa'agofam nanda'am aom kwapete'am nahambombaga alop amamipi nahape' luwaguf maim amamumi makwaha ipat atamba mafa' mafe' alop wahifip.
44019017	A'i owa' main, epes hiasi sagape Efesusi Juda saloma esis owa' Judaisia wapani same' basef ifimba ea' ombal lu'wami matagama esis hiasi hi'alas. Sasa'ma agol Dembinai Jisasi lu'wagol.
44019018	Amam nematawa hiasi sagahapifanai safi'i sawalapa waf awafi esis sanda'afi sa'iaf.
44019019	Ea' isimba hiasi sanda' naoh awagwi gwagwigwagwi, satamai buk anamba hianai sanda' ko'op ma'akw naoh boumi magailanai saofana nifa nogohnaep esis amam nematawai. Esis satalifa otamba ma'umba ma sagatala buk akwambambai bataga 50,000 kina.
44019020	Sanda' waf afambai, na'amba basef Dembinaii afataga banagef fawalapai banagami ananimi mataga lu'um a'owa'.
44019021	A'i owa' gi', okom Poli mosafel banagem na'i nefe' itap lu'upa Masedonia esis Grik sagapoma, ma main a' nefe' Jerusalem. Anen na'ias na'i, “Ae' efe' anamba ma main, a' efe' iti Rom wapani.”
44019022	Ea' nasapa' amom biam magatopalopanai Timoti naloma Erastus ea' mafe' itap apamba Masedonia. Apa' Pol ata' nape kwasala itap lu'upa Asia wapani.
44019023	Nogota atamba anis epes sanda' naumbih sagaloma ufia'w usi'i'wi Dembinaii sanda' kwala'ap lu'unai sindininifama gigal sa'oh mehip.
44019024	Anona aman agilinama Demitrius, aman anamba nanda' hiahaom hiami ma anin kapa silva. Anen kofagonama nanda' bisnis nanda' ifagw sa'usa'usi a'owa' manda' kapa silva manda'asi. Ea' sandati si'i ipat lu'utai sanda' lotuma god nemata'w akwamba Artemis. Ea' naso'ama maol amam manda' maol silvai mofa' otamba lu'umbai.
44019025	Ea' natama amam amamba maloma anom amam manda' maol atifin si'i amom manda'ani na'i, “Ipa' pegawa, apa' mogofa' otamba lu'umbaini maol ea' inimba atin.
44019026	Ea' aman anamba Pol nahokola amam nematawa hiasi saila anef waf daiaf nalamona ukup asasipi, isimba ipa' patilis pegawas! Anen ina nanda'am na'a Efesus atogon, owa'atin. Anen nanda'am mafe'agon hi'alagon felefele'ma itap lu'upa Asia anamba hiagoma. Anen naga'i, ‘Amom god apa' manda' lagof manda'ami, amamba ina god endilisimi, owa'atin.’
44019027	“Basef ifimba Poli atiasi fehambombaga maola bisnis ape'isi. Ea' ina isimba atis, owa'atin. Basef ifimba ananifi afehambombaga ipat lu'utai god nemata'w dembe'wi Artemis. Ea' totaga falafutai ma nogohnaep esis amam nematawai ma ukup asasipi. Dei' esis sagape Asiai hiasi saloma epes hiasi sagape itap hiagomai wapani sanda' lotuma god nemata'w akwamba ato'w. Apa' owa', basef Poli fa'i fehambombaga agol lu'wagili akwa'ugili.”
44019028	Amom manda' maoli mame' basef ifimba, ukup amamipi wandafip endilisi moga ma'i mehip ma'i, “Artemis apa' Efesusi ea' ako'w ato'w dembe'wi agol lu'wagili'wi.”
44019029	Ea' epes hiasi sagape taun inimbai sanda'am gigal wigo sa'oh banagambel a'owa'. Ea' sosafel safe' anamba sunduwa'anima saga'i basefa. Sahondo' Gaiusi Aristarkus Masedoniaimi mafi'i magaloma Poli, mafe' maloma esis.
44019030	Pol na'i nefe' ni'ipa esis amam nematawa la'afisa owa', esis Kristen sili'amana.
44019031	Anom amam magape gavman dembami ma itap lu'upa Asiai amom alipumi Poli masapa' basef fafe'ma anen. Ea' ma'ipana dindinipa ina nefe' nuwis anamba sandatama sape saganifa basefa, owa'i.
44019032	Amam nematawa isimba mini'ap hiasi ukup asasipi ea' pandopelas a'owa'. Anis soga sa'i sonda'i anif basef, anis sanda'i anif daif. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi ina sogawa esis safi'i sandakolasa main.
44019033	Esis Juda sasapa' Aleksander nafe' la'afena esis salutu saga'i basefa. Ama sa'i anen niga'ipasa anif basef. Ea' Aleksander nasa'ma lagol na'i nogwamasa basef esis amam nematawa.
44019034	Owa' satolona asogawa anen Judainai. Na'amba dei' hiasi sandame'ma na'amba atin sakolo' malogof atef sa'i, “Artemis apa' Efesusi ea' ako'w ato'w dembe'wi agol lu'wagili'wi.” Esis gigal sa'oh na'amba atin sape atapis nogota lautai awa biafin.
44019035	Ama main, kaunsel agilinai esis Efesusi nataloga esis amam nematawa na'i, “Ipa' epes Efesusipai, esis hiasi sagape walemb hielimbi sogawa Efesus anin taun nigimafi ipat lu'utai sanda' lotuma god dembe'wi Artemisii, inimba nigimafi otam migihi'amami muguwai heven ilifi.
44019036	Ina anona aman nasambala basef ifimba, owa'atin. Ipa' sopama malogof be' pepe. Ipa' ina penda' anin mae kwafalis, owa'i.
44019037	Ipa' pefa'ai amam amamba biam mafi'i na'a ea'. Apa' amom ina makwalopa anin mae ma ipat lu'utai apa' manda' lotuwatai, owa'. Amom ina ma'i basef findiwaifi ma god nemata'w ape'ikwi, owa'atin.
44019038	I'i Demitrius noloma amom manda' maola anini mi'i monda' basefa epen ami, bola anef nemaf monda'efa kot. Amom jas dembami mape. Amom Demitriusiami monda'ipam.
44019039	I'i ipa' penda' anif basef wapani, dao' penandonaef anamba sandatama saga'i basefa nogota atamba dembami gavman moga'ipasefa.
44019040	Amom dembami gavman Rom atiasi monda'mapa basef a'a owa'? Apa' ina mogawa. Dei' maina apa' mafela wandaf manda'af dei' nemaf afa'e? Kofagesa owa'atin endilisi ma hiahawes isimba. I'i amom dembami Rom mogahali'apa ma hiahawes kofagesa ma dakolas inimba awani, apa' atiasi ina anif basefa mogogwaef, owa'atin.”
44019041	Kaunsel na'iasa ea', nasapa' esis amam nematawa safe'.
44020001	Esis salamapa sowala, Pol nofalai esis Kristen safi'mai anen, naso'as anif basef nowa' banaga opalef asasilifi. Ea' nanda'masa nemaf bu'wafi esis nakwahis nafe' itap lu'upa Masedonia.
44020002	Anen nafe' anamba hiagoma nawalipasa basef hiafi esis Kristen nowa' banaga opalef asasilifi. Ama main, nafe' nataga itap lu'upa esis Grik sagapoma.
44020003	Anen nape aomb wanemb itap apamba. Ama main, na'i nofa' sip nefe' itap lu'upa Siria owa', a' nogawa esis Juda sa'i basef sandame'maefa sohana nogaga'. Ea' nanindifa okom ananimi na'i netanima nefe' nuwis itap lu'upa Masedonia la'afen.
44020004	Sopater Beriainai, Pirus nogamana, nafe' nalomana. Ea' amam biam Tesalonaikaimi Aristarkus Sekundus a Gaius Derbeinai. Naloma Timoti maloma amam biam Asiaimi Tikikus naloma Trofimus, amom amamba mafe' maloma Pol.
44020005	Amom mali'afa mafe' mape masasafa Troas.
44020006	Nimaguf ifimba esis Juda sa' gwa'aisi sagaloma bret owa' togatifia, yis akatai. Nimaguf ifimba fafe'ma hi'alef, afa' walota anop sip wakwaha Filipai a' wafe'. Wafe' nimaguf wanif bif fafe'ma hi'alef, a' watagama amom mali' magafi'i Troas mape wik si'igai.
44020007	Nemaf Sarere owamb afa' wandakolas waloma esis Kristena moga' gwa'aisi atogon ea' mofa' komunion gwa'aisi Jisasi. Naman Pol na'i a' nefe'. Na'amba nawalipasa basef nafe' nafe' a' akita amanota.
44020008	Rum amamba, lambeh hiembihi hotaol anamba apa' mandakolas magapoma ilif.
44020009	Ea' anona aman sa'unai agilinama Yutikus natoma windoa. Pol ata' na'i basef fafe' atin owa', Yutikus ambeh hahana naep pa'i pese'ana na'oh ea' a' na'oh nolola endilisi. Rum amamba wanifim magape ilifi la'afeni, anen nowai gani ilif laogoma nafe' itap. Ea' esis sisila' safe' sofa'anai owa' sati a' afuna endilisi.
44020010	Ea' Pol nisila' nasisil nowa natoma aman anamba sa'unai nahapila lagol ananigili na'ias na'i, “Ipa' ina pesafel gogololasipa a ukup pepe awep, owa'i. Ambal ata' lapaona.”
44020011	Ea' Pol nao'was sotanima salota ipat ilif wapani, nawala bret sa'ata. Ama main, Pol na'i basef laufi wapani nalomas nafe' nataga lagala. Ea' Pol nakwahis a' nafe'.
44020012	Aman anamba sa'unai nape namona ambal lapaona a' sofa'ana safe' sambe'ana ipat ananitai, opalef asasilifi ambo'walef wapani.
44020013	Afa' wali' wafe' walota sip a' wafe' wataga Asos. Afa' wa'i owando'ma Pol Asos ofa'ana ofe' sip. Dei' main, doko' Pol nali' na'ipafa basef na'i a' nili' nefe' itap notaga Asos.
44020014	Ea' Pol nafi'i natolofa wambel ambalemba Asos ea' ofa'ana wafe' sip wafe' Mitilini.
