44020015	Ea' sip pofa'afa wakwaha Mitilini wa'oh ama lala wataga felefele'ma anin ailan Kios. Ea' wa'oha lala wapani wataga anin ailan Samos. Ea' wa'oh wapani ma lala a' wafe' wataga Miletus.
44020016	Pol nasopama nomonas ananisi banagesa na'i amom mindikila' Efesus. Anen nandaiwa'ma nogape dowadowaf anif nimaguf itap lu'upa Asia, owa'. Na'i nondafe' ulal Jerusalem nemaf afamba saga'i Pentikosi.
44020017	Afa' wataga Miletus, Pol nasapa' basef fafe' Efesus nofala amom agufumi esis Kristeni mugafi'mai anen.
44020018	Ea' mafi'i matagamana na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' pegawa ea' ma waf ae' ali' anda'af fagali' dambadambai afamba ae' agataga itap lu'upa Asia dondol ape agalomepa.
44020019	Ipa' pegawa, nimaguf hiafi lifilafi esis Juda sa'i basef sa'i sogopa'aga ae' sehe egaga'. Amambai atom ae' efa' nimanimi magagwamba ae'. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ae' anda' agol ae'agili gafe' lafel a'owa', efa' akafimi nimanimi ea' embif falowi naep ae'api ma anda' maol Dembinaii.
44020020	Apa' ae' ina ombal mahe andafa'ma agawalapa basef hiafi ma agatopalopepa, owa'atin. Ama anamba ipa' pandakolasa awalipipa, ea' awalipipa ifagw ipe'igwi nomon wapani. Isimba ipa' apegawas.
44020021	Ae' a'i basef dindinipa esis Juda saloma isimba owa' Judaisia wapani ma sowa' alafugaha waf awafi sombema nelelemb sofe'ma God, sogahapifa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas.
44020022	Ea' ipa' peme', dei' Ambal bu'unai Godi nafela okom ae'ami aila anen atona. Isimba atis dei' ae' efe' Jerusalem. Atiasi main netagama ae' ganimba, ae' ina egawa hiahawes isimba, owa'.
44020023	Ae' egawa isimba atis. Anamba ae' agafe'ma, walemb hiagoma Ambal Godi nihimba'me basef dindinip na'amba na'i, ‘Ina' atiasi niti esis sonda'mena waf hiafi akafifi nimanifi ea' sonda'ena nenda' kalabus.’
44020024	“Apa' ae' ina okom mapoma ambal ae'ali atol logape, owa'. Ea' ina banagewe a'owa' ma igahapila ambal ae'ali tatala'il, owa'atin. Ae' a'i ila ufia'w akwamba ea' aila'w agafi'i. A'i enda'an hi'ilan datima maol inimba Dembinai Jisas nagase'eani. Maol inimba egawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi natopalopapa dowaf nofa'apa mogotanimai.
44020025	“Ea' ipa' peme'. Fowa' ae' afe' la'afena ipa' hipai awalapa basefa epes hiasi sogawis nomona maol bu'wani Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Apa' owa' dei' egawa, namanani ipa' hipai ina atiasi piti amaga ae'agai wapani, a' owa'atin.
44020026	Ea' dei' ae' a'ipipa. I'i anin epen ipe'ini awen higililan, amamba ina kofagema ae'ami, owa'atin. Kofagema ipe'imi atom.
44020027	Dei' main, ae' ina ombal mahe andahagasa aga'ipipa basefa nomonas hiasi Godi, owa'. A'ipipaef hi'alef.
44020028	Ipa' pindimafi ipa' andeande' ea' pimafi esis amam nematawa isimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nandandepepa ea' ma pigimafisi. Ipa' solawaipa andeande' ma pigimafi esis Kristen sios Godi andeande' si'i sanda' maoli sugumafi sipsip andeande'. God natala esis Kristen ea' ma esimbel nogamanai atembel.
44020029	Ae' egawa atiasi ikwahahipa efe', anom amam awami si'i nombagw wandafugwi a' mufi'i motaga la'afena ipa' ea' mohambombaga esis Kristen si'i nombagw gwagaha sipsip.
44020030	Ea' atiasi anis epes ipa' atipa sosafel si'i basef baso'ami atoma sogalalamona nomonas esis Kristeni sofe' sigailas.
44020031	Ipa' dei' solawaipa andeande' lifilafi. Ipa' ukup pendapoma isimba. Afagof agwafomba wanogof dondol owamb alip ae' ina apoma noma'w ma awalipipa agasa'ma ukup ipa' hipai atona atin, owa'atin. Awalipipa aloma embif fagaluwi naep ae'api.
44020032	“Dei' anda'epa pepe banagami ma lagol Dembinaii, God okom maimailipa ma natopalopepa dowaf nofa'epa pigatanimai. Amamba la'ifima mogowa' banagaipa mogase'epa hiahaom fasimi atom God nagaso'asam amam nematawa anen nanda'as bo'wes hilili' ea' ananisi atiasi.
44020033	Ae' ina kowalema otamba silva gol luwaguf maim anin epeni, owa'atin.
44020034	Ipa' atipa ea' pegawa, ae' atowe anda' maol atopalopa ae' aloma amom mape magalumai ma anis hiahawes akafamasi.
44020035	Maol hiani ae'ani, ae' ihimba'mepa ma apa' mondanda' maol banagambela mogatopalopa isimba mamahisa owa' banagesa sogatopalopa esisia. Ea' apa' ukup pendapoma basef ifimba Dembinai Jisas naga'iefi. Anen naga'i na'amba na'i, ‘Dagala anin epen negaso'as maefah anasi a' nikila' dagala epen inimba negefa'as. God nofalo'ma epen inimba nikila' inimba negefa'asi.’”
44020036	Pol nanda' basef ifimba ma ea', nindiwa nembawa nandabeten naloma agufumi amamba.
44020037	Ama main, amom hiami malef kwapete'am mandalulupatanima ea' mombalo' Pol mapipi'asana masisi' malogol magugumba dalogw Poli.
44020038	Doko' Pol nali' naga'i basef na'i, “Atiasi ipa' ina piti amaga ae'agai wapani, a'owa'.” Amom mame' basef ananifi hiafi hi'alef. Apa' ifimba do'wanif atif fanda' opalef amamilifi a' nimanilif a'owa'. Ea' malutumana nafe' nalota sip.
44021001	Afa' wakwaha agufumi wafe' walota sip pakwaha Miletus apafe'. Afa' usi'ifa wafe' naoh wataga Kos. Ama wafilu wafe' wataga Rodes. Ea' wakwaha Rodes wafe' wataga Patara wakwaha sip apamba usila'i wape.
44021002	Ea' wati anop sip daiap pa'i pefe' Fonisia ea' walota apamba pakwaha anamba apafe'.
44021003	Ea' wati ailan inimba Saiprus wikila'agon nape kwahisigilima. Afa' wafe' wataga itap lu'upa Siria ea' wafe' wataga wail Tair. Esis sa'i sowafa uga ma sip apamba wambel ambalemba.
44021004	Ea' afa' wafe' owando'ma anis Kristen watilis a' wape walomas wik si'igai. Ea' Ambal Godi nasa'ma ukup esis Kristeni ma soga'ipa Pola ina nefe' Jerusalem, owa'i.
44021005	Afa' wanda' nogota afa'itai hi'alata wambel ambalemba, wa'i a' ofe'. Amom Kristen maloma awasi nematawa amamisi salutumafa wafe' wawis ando'ma taun inimba. Ea' apa' mindiwa nembawa mandabeten naoh akata.
44021006	Ea' esis sa'i basef sonahas salomafa ma mondaso'ama lagof atin asotanima safe' ifagw asasigwi, afa' wafe' sip.
44021007	Afa' wafe' sip wakwaha Tair wafe' wataga Tolemes. Ea' wape wanda'masa nemaf bu'wafi esis Kristen wape walomas nemaf atetef.
44021008	Ama wafilu wakwaha Tolemes wafe' wataga Sisaria wakwaha sip ea' wafe' ipat anona aman Filip nagawalipasa basef Godii, wape walomana. Anen anona ma amom amamba 7-pelaimi fowa' mandandepam Jerusalami ma magatopalopa amom Aposeli.
44021009	Anen nola nematawa biawai biawa, ina dei' waso' amam, ata' owa'. God naso'awa gawa wawalapa basef ananifi si'i profet.
44021010	Afa' wape Sisaria anif nimaguf wapani ea', anona profet agilinama Agabus nakwaha itap lu'upa Judia nilianai Sisaria.
44021011	Anen nafi'mai afa' nofa' let Poli nowa' bo'wagahi lagof ananisi atis. Ea' na'ias na'amba na'i, “Spirit Ambal Godi naga'i na'amba na'i, ‘Amom Juda magape Jerusalami atiasi a' mowa' aman anamba ahama let atambai. Ea' moso'ana nefe'ma lagof anom amam mogololama Godi.’”
44021012	Afa' wame' basef ifimba ea' waloma esis wambel ambalembaisi wapani wa'ipa Pol dindinip wa'i anen ina nefe' Jerusalem, owa'i.
44021013	Owa', Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' panda' kilef a'owa' ma panda' okom ae'ami aom? Ae' ina andandumbulidombola enda' kalabus atis dowaf, owa'. Ae' ea' andandombola egaga' wapani Jerusalema egasa'ma agol Dembinai Jisasi.”
44021014	Ea' afa' ina la'ififama wogapa'aga nomonas ananisi, owa'. Ea' afa' ukup paso'afa ma basef ifimba wa'i, “Okom Dembinaii nondataga.”
44021015	Anif nimaguf fafe'ma ea', afa' wandondomba hiahawes afa'isi ma ogafe' Jerusalem.
44021016	Ea' anis alipisi sagaila Jisasi Sisariaisi safe' salomafa. Esis salutumafa wafe' ipat Nasoni, anen Saiprusinai nataga Kristen fowa'inai. Anen na'i afa' atiasi ope ipat ananinai.
44021017	Ea' wafe' wataga Jerusalem, esis Kristen sandagalama sogofa'afa.
44021018	Ama wafilu nemaf gi'maifi Pol nafe' nalomafa ma negati Jems. Ea' amom agufumi hiami ma esis Kristeni mape malomana.
44021019	Pol nanda'mam nemaf bu'wafi ea' na'ipama hiahaom hiami ma God natopalopana nanda'am la'afena esis amam nematawa anep mini'ap sogololama Godi.
44021020	Amom mame'ef ea', masa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol. Ea' ma'ipa Pol ma'i, “Sahomafa, ina' negawa esis Juda tausen hiasi hiasi a'owa' sahapifa Jisas sataga Kristen. Ea' Kristen isimba hiasi banages a'owa' ma sagaila mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani.
44021021	Apa' anis epes daias sambaso'mas sa'ipasa ina' na'amba sa'i, ‘Pol na'ipa esis Juda safe' sape sagalomas analemb walembi anep mini'ap owa' Judaisia. Na'ipasa esis sogakwaha mu'uli inimba fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani.’ Anen na'i, ‘Ipa' ina petopa' alopa amom sa'umi ipe'imi ea' ipa' ina ata' pilaf wapani waf fowa'ifi, hapaifi.’ Anis epes daias seme' basef ina' naga'iefi dei' sa'ias na'amba.
44021022	Apa' mogawa endilisi atiasi esis Kristen Judaisi some' basefa ina' nafi'i nataga. Na'amba dei' afa' ata' onda'as wi'imama?
44021023	Ea' afa' wa'i ata' wi'ipina anef wafa ina' ata' nenda'as na'amba. Afa' anom amam biamibiam ma'i basef endilisifi mala' lapa Goda monda' anis maefah.
44021024	Ea' ina' ne'wa amom pindaila waf afamba fenda'epa pegataga hilili'ma naep Godi. Ina' nenda'mama otamba amamimbai wapani amom migi'ma waf esis Judai ma mogandowa balagah amamugahi. Ina' nenda'as na'amba, epes hiasi sogawa basef ifimba esis sanda'menaef ine'i, ifimba baso'aifi atif. Ea' sogawa ina' naila mu'uli inimba.
44021025	Apa' esis Kristen anep mini'ap owa' Judaisia, apa' manda' basef fagafe'masi maga'ipasa basef ifimba fowa' mogowa'afi. Esis solawais sondape andeande' na'amba. Esis ina sea' mafis saham sagaso' god baso'amunai, a ina sea' esimbel, ea' ina sea' mafis amamba sogowa' metewa ma afumi, a' ina sonda' waf awafi so'a waulafi, owa'i.”
44021026	Ea' Pol nao'wa amam amamba, ma wafilu ea' naila waf hiafi ma nonda' anen nagataga hilili' ma naep Godi nogaloma amom. Anen nanda'as na'amba nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi na'ipa amom pris. Na'ipama nemaf afamba atiasi anen no'wa amam amamba mifi'i ma amom pris monda' ofa mondolali ma amom atona atina mogataga hilili'.
44021027	Ama main, nimaguf ifimba 7-pelaif felefele'ma ea' hi'igalef, anom Juda magape itap lu'upa Asiai mati Pol nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi a' masa'ma ukup esis amam nematawa hiasii ma mogombalo'ana.
44021028	Ea' soga sa'i mehip na'amba sa'i, “Ipa' epes Israelipai, topalopapa! Aman anamba nihimba'ma epes hiasi walemb hiagoma napa'aga mini'ap ape'ipi Israela mu'uli inimba Godi Moses nagawalipasani naloma ipat lu'unai Godi wapani. Ea' ina isimba atis, owa'. Anen nau'wai anis epes owa' Judaisia safi'i sawisi nomon ipat anamba sanda'ana aluguna.”
44021029	Dei' main, fowa' amom mati anona aman Trofimus Efesusinai owa' Judainaia nape naloma Pol taun inimba. Ea' amom ukup pandanda' ma'i Pol nao'wana mafe' mawis nomon ipat anamba. Owa' owa'atin. Mambaso'as.
44021030	Ea' isimba atis dei' esis hiasi sagape Jerusalami sosafel gogolalasis kwapete'a basef ifimba sa'i sonda' wandaf. Ea' sasagih safi'i sunduwa'anima sawis ipat nomon sombalo' Pol sahondo'ana nawisi ando'. Ea' kwafalis atis sowalowa utagw ipat anamba.
44021031	Esis sa'i soha Pol noga', owa' basef fafe' fatagama soldia dembinai nugumafi amom soldiai. Basef fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “Esis Jerusalemi hiasi sosafel bolalas kwapete' sa'i sonda' wandaf.”
44021032	Ea' kwafalis anen nofa' anom soldia masagih milianama esis hiasi. Ea' amom Juda mati anen ofisa dembinai nao'wa amom soldia, makwaha Pol ina ata' mahana wapani, a'owa'.
44021033	Soldia anamba dembinai nafi'i felefele' nombalo' Pol na'ipa amom soldia mowa' lagof ananigufi sen biafin. Ea' nahali' esis na'i, “Anen ami? Anen nanda' main?”
44021034	Amam nematawa hiasi sosafel sagwa basef. Apa' esis ina sagwaef fafe' atogon, owa'. Sagwaef fandafe' daindai. Ea' kwala'ap alu'una, ofisa dembinai ina nogawa basef kofagefa asasifi, owa'. Ea' na'ipa amom soldia ma mo'wa Pol nefe' nogawis ipat amom soldiai.
44021035	Ea' Pol nafe' nataga bombol sagalota ipat atambai, esis amam nematawa dindinapis a'owa' ma sogahana. Na'amba amom soldia masa'mana mofa'ana mafe'.
44021036	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi sagi'mana safe' gigal sa'oh dindinip sa'i, “Hana ma afuna, hana ma afuna!”
44021037	Amom soldia ma'i a' mofa' Pol mofe' muwis ipat amamutai nomon, ea' Pol nahali' ofisa dembinai na'i, “Ae' a'i i'ipina anif basef a'a owa'?” Owa' soldia anamba dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ina' negawa diga Griki?
44021038	Ae' a'i owa' ina' aman Isipinai fowa' nogota tatumba nafela wandaf napa' nagaloma gavmani ea' nao'wa 4,000-pelaim amam magahapila bainagwi nao'wam mafe' anamba wafigima epes akagoma.”
44021039	Owa' Pol na'i, “Owa'. Ae' aman Judaiwai. Wambel ae'ambili Tarsus itap lu'upa Silisia. Apa' ae' aman anambel wambel lu'wambili agol lu'wagili. Ina' ni'i awi, ae' i'ipasa anif basef esis amam nematawa.”
44021040	Ea' soldia anamba na'i aho'mana noga'i. Pol nalutu bombol inimba, nasa'ma lagol nanda'agol de'inda' ma esis amam nematawa, asasopama malogof. Ea' Pol na'ipasa basef diga Hibrui.
44022001	Na'ias na'amba na'i, “Ipa' sahin owan a ipa' ahape, ipa' peme'. Ae' a'i egwa basefa ipa' dei' ma pegegawa ae' ina anda' anef waf awafi, owa'atin.”
44022002	Esis same' Pol na'i diga esis Hibrui, a' malogof faso'as sape, ina ata' sanda'as de'inda', owa'atin.
44022003	Pol na'i, “Ae' Juda. Ma'me ae'akwi kolae Tarsus itap lu'upa Silisia, apa' ae' ataga dambewe taun ini'i. Ae' anda' skula dembinai tisa Gameliel ea' nawalipi andeande'ma mu'uli inimba hiani amom bafapapa ape'imii. Na'amba ae' okom mohafel banagem a'owa' ma agaila God si'i ipa' dei' pagailana.
44022004	Ea' fowa' ae' anda' maol ahambombaga esis epes sagaila ufia'w akwamba sagahapifa Dembinaia'wi. Owa' aha esis amam nematawa wapani, a'i ehas soga'. Ea' ewa'as sen efa'as afa' ipat sanda' kalabusatai.
44022005	Pris dembinai naloma amom agufumi hiami esis Judai mogawa andeande'ma mogawalapa basef ifimba endilisifi. Amom mase'e pas manda'asa amom sahin owan amamisi Juda sagape Damaskusi, ea' ae' afe' Damaskus a'i embalo' esis sagape wambel ambalembai ewa'as sen. Ae' a'i efa' esis sagaila ufia'w akwambai sufi'i Jerusalem a sogofa' akafimi ma amom plisman mogahas.
44022006	“Ae' afe' ataga felefele'ma Damaskus, awin a' nandasapa' 12 klok. Owa' kwafalis atis anona nogogala'i nisila'i heven nogala'me a'owa'.
44022007	Ea' ewa itap ame' anagol malogol ga'ipi na'amba ga'i, ‘Sol, Sol, dei' maina nagahambombaga ae'?’
44022008	“Ea' ae' agwa basef a'i, ‘Dembinai, ina' ami?’ “Ea' na'ipi na'i, ‘Ae' Jisas Nasaratiwai ina' nagahambombagai.’
44022009	“Amom malome magalutuwi mati amamba mogogala'i, apa' amom ina mame' malogola aman anamba naga'ipai, owa'.
44022010	“Ea' ae' a'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' ae' atiasi enda' main?’ “Ea' Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' safel nefe' niwis Damaskus ama atiasi anona aman nofo'o ni'ipina maol hiani ae' a'i enda'menani.’
44022011	“Mogogala'i amamba mogala' a'owa', ea' ae' ina ati hiahawes, owa'atin. Naep pase'e dogw. Ea' amam amamba malutu magaloma ae'i mahapila lagof ae'agufi mofa'e afe' Damaskus.
44022012	“Anona aman nape Damaskus agilinama Ananaias. Aman anamba nagaila mu'uli Godi andeande'i. Amam nematawa Juda sagape Damaskusi sa'i anen aman bu'unai.
44022013	“Anen nafi'i nalutu felefele' ma ae' na'ipi na'i, ‘Owame Sol, dei' naep ine'ipi apiti wapani.’ “Ea' nogota atamba atota naep ae'api pati wapani.
44022014	“Ea' na'i, ‘God bafapapa ape'imi anen nandandepena ma negegawa okom ananimi ma nigati aman bu'unai hilili'i. Ama nenda' maol Godi ma negame' basef ananifi fegataga malogol ananigili.
44022015	Atiasi ina' newalapa basef ananifi ni'ipa amam nematawa hiasi ma hiahawes isimba ina' name'as nagatilisi.
44022016	Dei' maina ina' ata' nape nagasasa atin? Ina' safel nefalana nosa'opena nokwahomena waf awafi ine'ifi ma negefa' baptais!’
44022017	“Ama anif nimaguf fafe'ma ea', ae' itanima afi'i Jerusalem, ea' awis andabeten nomon ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuma, si'i a'oh andando'ah.
44022018	Ea' ati Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' kwafalis nekwaha Jerusalem nefe'. Ina' i'i negawalapa basef ae'afi na'a, ina atiasi seme'ena, owa'atin.’
44022019	“Ea' a'ipa Dembinai a'i, ‘Dembinai, na'ambai owa'. Esis asogawa ae' fowa' agafe' ifagw hiagwi esis Juda sandakolasugwi hi'alagwa egembalo' esis amam nematawa hiasi sagahapifinai agahas.
44022020	Fowa' esis saha Stiven naga', aman naga'ipas basefa ine'i, nogota atamba alutu felefele' ea' okom ae'anai bo'onama amambai. Ae' alutu imafi sagegw maim amom magahanai.’
44022021	“Owa' Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina' fo'o. Atiasi ae' esapa'ena nefe' ufia'w laogoma ma esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi sogogawa ae'ia.’”
44022022	Esis Juda ea' same' basef Poli fafe' fatagama basef ifimba faga'i epes isimba owa' Judaisia. Ea' esis galala mehip sa'i, “Hana ma afuna! Epes na'ambaimi ina mope itap, owa'. Anen ina ata' nope namona. Hapainai!”
44022023	Esis gigal sa'oh ea' sowali sagegw lagof asasigufi sakwaha sopof nalota ilif.
44022024	Ea' soldia anamba dembinai na'ipa soldia dindinipa mo'wana mofe' mugawis ipat amom soldiai nomon. Ea' na'ipa amom soldia mohana ma nogawalapa basef ifimba kofagefa. Anen na'i nogawa andeande' dei' maina esis sogofalana na'amba.
44022025	Ea' amom mowa'ana ma mogahana anota let, owa' Pol nahali' anona kepten dembinai nagalutu felefele'i na'amba na'i, “A'i lo na'i ipa' ila ma penda' basef na'amba ma aman anamba Romunai? Ae' Romuwai. Ipa' ina dei' panda'me kot ea' ma dei' ipa' pagahe. Waf afambai andeande'?”
44022026	Ea' kepten anamba name' basef ifimba, nafe' na'ipa soldia anamba dembinai na'i, “Ina' na'i nenda' main? Aman anamba anen Romunai!”
44022027	Ea' soldia anamba dembinai nafi'mai Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ina' kipa ae'. Ina' aman Romunai, a'a?” Pol nagwamana basef na'i, “Aho'.”
44022028	Ea' soldia anamba dembinai na'i, “Ae' akwaha otamba hiambai atala pepa ma agataga aman Romuwai.” Ea' Pol na'i, “Ae' owa'. Mamase esis Romisi. Ea' ae' wapani Romuwai.”
44022029	Ea' amam amamba mahali'ana ma'i mogahanai, a' owa'atin. Amom ea' ombal maham mandafa'mana. Ea' soldia anamba dembinai okom mandanda'ma Pol anen Romunai a' na'ipama mogowa'ana sen. Ea' soldia anamba wapani ombal mahana.
44022030	Ama a'i owa' wafilu nemaf fagagi'i, soldia anamba na'i nogawa andeande' ea' amom Juda ma'i basefa waf mamahefa Pol nanda'afi. Ea' soldia anamba natagwahamana sen ea' nasapa' basef fafe'ma amom pris dembami maloma amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti mifi'i munduwa'anima mope. Ea' anen nao'wa Pol nafi'i nahaponana nalutu nogohnaep amamisi.
44023001	Pol natiti amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti dindinip ea' na'i, “Ipa' sahope, ae' afe' naep Godi, ea' okom ae'ami andeande'ma fe' ae'ani ma nogohnaep Godi, afi'i ataga dei'. Malogol gagape opaf ae' nomoni ina gihimba'me anef waf awafi ae' anda'afi, owa'.”
44023002	Anen na'ias na'amba owa', pris dembinai Ananaias nape nagali'ma pris hiamii na'ipa amom amam magalutumana felefele'i ma mogopagaha malogol ananigili.
44023003	Ea' Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ina' aman aunai si'i anom indalelemb awami sanda' pen bu'wani afitini sagandisam ando' atogini. Atiasi God a' nehena. Ina' nape na'a naila mu'uli inimba Godi ma nanda' kotima ae', ea' ina' atina nesambala mu'uli inimba ma dei' na'ipam mogahe!”
44023004	Ea' amom magalutu felefele'i ma'ipana ma'i, “Ina' na'i basef findiwaefa aman pris dembinai Godi.”
44023005	Owa' Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Ipa' sahope, ae' ina egawa a'i anen pris dembinai, owa'. Dei' main, basef fagail buk Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, ‘Ipa' ina pi'ipa agilinai nugumafi ipe'i pi'ipana basef awafi, owa'.’ Isimba ae' egawas.”
44023006	Ea' Pol nogawa amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti anom Sadyusimi a anom Farisimi. Na'amba anen na'ipam mehip na'amba na'i, “Ipa' sahope, ae' Farisiwai ea' ahame ae'anai Farisinai. Ae' ahapilif a'i endilisi anef nemaf epes sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, dei' ape asasa nemaf afamba. Kofagefa ifimba atif dei' esis sanda' kotima ae'.”
44023007	Anen na'ipam basef ifimba, ea' amom atom mafitap la'afena amom Farisi maloma Sadyusi ea' mandawal biafim.
44023008	Dei' main, amom Sadyusi mahapilif ma'i epes sagaga'i anaf ina sotanima sosafel wapani, owa'. Amom ma'i ensel owa'atin a ambagof spirit, owa'atin. Apa' amom Farisi mahapila ifimba ambagufi ensel saloma epes sagaga'i sogosafel wapani endilisifi.
44023009	Isimba atis amom gigal ma'oh mehip a'owa'. Ea' anom dembami magawalipasa mu'uli Godi amom Farisi mosafel malutu ma'ias dindinip na'amba ma'i, “Afa' wati aman anamba basef kofagefa akana. I'i anona ambal a'a anona ensel ni'ipana ma niga'ipasa basef ifimba dao', andeande'.”
44023010	Ea' fitap a' nataga lu'win a'owa', soldia dembinai ombal bahana ma Pol, na'i na'amba mini'ap biafip mondahohondo'mana pele'atana biafina a' afuna. Ea' na'ipa amom soldia ananimi miliana mombalo' Pol la'afena amom mofa'ana nogafe' ipat amamutai.
44023011	Ama wafilu owamb Dembinai nafi'i nalutu felefele'ma Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ina' nindalutu banagena. Ina ombal mehena, owa'i. Fowa' nawalapa basef ae'afi Jerusalem, ea' atiasi ina' newalapef na'amba atin taun lu'wani Rom wapani.”
44023012	Ea' wafilu kuhumbita amom Juda mandakolas ma'i basef mandame'maef fape atogon ma'i endilisi ilifa mogaha Pol afuna. Amom ma'i ina mea' gwa'aisi embel sili', owa'i ota'ma mohana afuna, dao' mea'as.
44023013	Amom ma'i ilif endilisi mandame'ma basef ifimbai, amom hiami mikila' 40-pelaim.
44023014	Amom mafe'ma amom pris dembami maloma agufumi Judai ma'ipam ma'i, “Afa' ea' wa'i basef wandame'maefa ogaha Pol afuna, afa' wa'i endilisi ilif ina ata' wea' gwa'aisi ambel kwasakwasala owa'i, ota'ma a' oha Pol afuna.
44023015	Na'amba dei' ipa' peloma amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti pesapa' basef fefe'ma soldia dembinai Romunai ma nofa'i Pol nogafi'mai ipa'. Ipa' pembaso'mana pi'i, ‘Afa' wa'i ata' ome' basef kofagefa Poli andeande'.’ Ea' afa' wanda'as dumbilidombol wape. Anen ina a' nifi'i notagamepa ata' owa'atin, afa' ea' uli' ohana afuna.”
44023016	Owa' nogamana tagonai name' amom Juda ma'i mofe' mogapoma Pol ufia'w ma mogahana, nafe' ipat amom soldiai nawis na'ipa Pol.
44023017	Ea' Pol nofala anona soldia dembinai na'i, “Okwago aman anamba sa'unai nefe'mago kepten dembinai ma amom soldia hiami. Anen anif basefa na'i noga'ipanaef.”
44023018	Ea' soldia anamba nao'wana nafe'ma kepten dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Aman anamba nanda' kalabusi Pol nofala ae' na'ipi ao'wai aman anamba sa'unai nafi'mai ina'. Anen anif basefa noga'ipinaef.”
44023019	Ea' kepten anamba nahapila lagol ananigili nofa'ana nendelefata nafe' wa'ol, amom atom mape nahali'ana na'i, “Ina' na'i ni'ipi basef maif?”
44023020	Ea' sa'unai na'ipana na'i, “Amom Juda ma'i basef mandame'maef ea' ma ma'i mogahali'ina ma naman nefa' Pol nogafe'ma amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti. Amom mambaso'am ma'i ata' mohali' Pol atonama basef kofagefa ananifi.
44023021	Apa' ina nigi'ma basef amamifi, owa'i. Dei' main, anom amam amamumi hiami a' mikila' 40-pelaim ma'i basef banagafi mandame'maef ma'i endilisi ilif ina a' mea' gwa'aisi ambel kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Ota' ma a' muli' moha Pol afuna. Isimba atis dei' amom mape ufia'w masasa. Amom dumbili dombol mape masasa ina' ma niga'i aho'ma basef amamifi.”
44023022	Ea' Kepten anamba nasapa' anen sa'unai a' nafe' na'ipana dindinip na'i, “Ina nefe' ni'ipa anin epen atitina basef ifimba, owa'i.”
44023023	Ea' kepten anamba nofala anom soldia dembami biam na'ipam na'i, “Ipa' bipa pefa'ai soldia hiami 200-pelaim moloma anom soldia 70-pelaim mogatoma hosi ea' 200-pelaim mogahapila wambawai. Ipa' pendondombama pegafe' Sisaria bola owamb 9 klok.
44023024	Ea' pendondomba anom hosa Pol wapani nogatomam ea' pefa'ana andeande' pefe'ma gavman dembinai Filiks.”
44023025	Kepten anamba nanda' anif basef fefe'ma Filiks na'amba fa'i,
44023026	“Ae' Klodius Lisias anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ina' gavman dembinai nape nagali'i, Filiks. Nemaf bu'wafi.
44023027	Amom Juda ma'i mombalo' aman anamba ma'i nohana noga'. Apa' ae' ea' ame'anama basef anen na'i anen aman Romunai. Ea' ae' aloma amom soldia wafe' watagama amom Juda wandalombamana lagof amamugufi.
44023028	Ae' a'i ata' egawa basef kofagefa amom magasapaganamafi, na'amba ae' ao'wana ilianama amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti.
44023029	Ea' ma'ipi anif basefa mu'uli amamini masapagana ma basef ifimba. Apa' amom ina manda' kotimana ma anis maefaha ohana nogaga', a'a onda' kalabusimana, owa'atin.
44023030	Owa' dei' anif basef fatagama ae' ma amom ma'i anif basef mandame'maefa ma'i mohana nogaga'. Ea' dei' ae' kwafalis asapa'ana nafe'mago ina'. Ea' ae' a'ipa amam amamba magasapaganai ma mofo'o mondawalapa basef alihifa nogohnaep ine'isi ma ina' nendegawa hiahawes isimba amom ma'i monda' kotimanasi.”
44023031	Ea' amom soldia mame' basef a' mofa' Pol mafe' anambel wambel Antipatris owamb.
44023032	Ama lala, soldia amamba motanima mafe' ifagw amamugwi Jerusalem. Apa' amom 70-pelaim magatoma hosi atom mofa' Pol mafe' Sisaria.
44023033	Mafe' mataga Sisaria, maso'ana pasa basef ifimba gavman dembinai ea' mofa'ai Pol wapani nafi'i nalutu nogohnaep ananisi.
44023034	Ea' dembinai gavman anamba nafi'i nati pas isimba ea' nahali' Pol na'i, “Ina' itap lu'upa agol lu'wagola ani?” Ea' Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ae' Silisiaiwai.”
44023035	Ea' anen na'ipa Pol na'i, “Atiasi amam amamba magasapaga ine'i, mufi'i motaga, dao' ae' eme' basef ine'ifi.” Ea' na'ipa amom manda' kalabusima Pol ipat lu'utai gavman dembinai Heroti.
44024001	Nimaguf wanif bif fafe' ea', pris dembinai Ananaias niliana nafe' Sisaria naloma anom agufumi Judai ea' anona aman Tetalas aman nogogawa mu'uli gavmani nalomam nafi'i. Amom hiami ma'ipa gavman dembinai Filiksa basef ifimba ma'i mondakotima Polafi.
44024002	Ea' gavman anamba nofalai Pol nafi'i, Tetalas nanda' basef fatiti anen. Ea' na'ipa Filiks na'i, “Ina' aman dembinai Filiks, ina' natopalopa apa' Juda ma magape nogota laota andeande' a'owa' ea' wandaf mais a' owa'atin. Nomonas bu'wasi ine'isi nagatopalopa esis wambota ape'isi ma dei' magape hilili' andeande' migikila' fowa' magape.
44024003	Ea' apa' magape walemb hiagomai nelelemb ape'ilimbi bape bo'walemb a'owa' ma ina'. Ea' nimaguf hiafi dondol manifelina a'owa' ma isimba.
44024004	Apa' ae' andaiwa'ma igahapilina nogota laota. Dei' ahali'ina ma negame' basef ape'ifi bandafi.
44024005	“Apa' mogawa aman anamba nanda'mapa hiahaom awami hiami. Ea' nanda' naumbih nasa'mai ukup awapi naloma esis Juda hiasi napa' nalomas itap hiagoma walemb hielimbii. Anen amaga lu'ugai ma epes isimba sapa' sagawala mini'ap ape'ipii ma ea' sagape anep mini'ap dei'i, saga'i esis mini'ap Nasarati.
44024006	Ea' anen na'i nonda' ipat lu'unai sanda' lotuma Godanai aluguna wapani owa', apa' mombalo'ana [ma'i monda' kotimana ma mu'uli ape'ini.
44024007	Apa' kepten dembinai Lisias nafi'i, banagona a'owa' ma apa', nahondo'ana lagof ape'igufi.
44024008	Anen na'i dindinipa apa' mandakotima anini mifi'i mondataga nogohnaep ine'isi.] I'i dei' ina' nihali' aman anamba, bola ina' negawa endilisi basef ananifi ma niga'i hiahawes hiasi apa' mandakotimanasi.”
44024009	Ea' amom Juda dembami wapani matopalopa anen masapaga Pol mawalapef ma'if ma'i, “Basef ifimba endilisifi atif.”
44024010	Ea' gavman dembinai nanda' balaga nahali' Pol nagwa basef na'amba na'i, “Ae' egawa afagof hiagufi ina' nanda' jas nape dembinai gavman nugumafi mini'ap apamba epes hiasi. Na'amba dei' nembel ae'ambili fasimbil a'owa' ma egagwa basef ifimba igihimba'mina ae' ina anda' anef waf awafi, owa'atin.
44024011	I'i ina' nigahali' esis, atiasi a' neme' basef ifimba. Nimaguf ata' 12-pelaif atif dowaf ae' afe' Jerusalema anda' lotu.
44024012	Ea' amom Juda ma'i mondakotima ae'i mati ae' ina a'i anif basef afitapef aloma anin epen nomon ipat lu'unai Godi, owa'. Amom ina mati ae' asa'ma ukup asasipi ma sogapa' ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi nomon a'a anagon nomona wambel ambalemba lu'wambili, owa'atin.
44024013	Ea' basef ifimba esis sandakotimafi, esis ina atiasi la'ifis sowalapa anif basef kofagefa ma ina' negegawa, owa'.
44024014	“Apa' ae' a'i ewalapa basef ifimba atifa ina'. Ufia'w akwamba esis Juda atis sandaiwa'ma'wi sa'i waf afamba sagawala wambotagwafi ina endilisifi. Apa' waf afambai endilisifi ae' ahapilaf ailaf. Ae' aila ufia'w akwamba anda' lotu ma God amom bafapapa apa' Juda hiapai manda' lotumanai. Ae' ahapifa basef hiafi fagape mu'uli Godi naloma basef hiafi amom profet fowa' manda'afi.
44024015	Ae' ahapifif ape ehafa God anaf nogasa'ma esis sagaga'i, epes isimba bu'wasi hilili'i soloma isimba sanda' waf awafii wapani. Amom manda' kotima ae'i wapani mahapifif mape mohafa God na'amba atin.
44024016	Ea' dondol ae' anda' maol lu'wani ma egape andeande' hilili' ma malogol gagape opaf ae' nomoni ina gihimba'me anef waf awafi ae' anda'afi, owa'. A'i waf awafi ake ma naep Godi noloma nogohnaep epesi wapani.
44024017	“Ae' ape anogof afagof analemb walemb daialemb ama main, itanima afi'i Jerusalem ma mini'ap ae'api. Ae' ifa'i moni maisa egatopalopa isimba kwahusi ea' eha anis mafis indalalima God egaso'ana.
44024018	Anda'as na'amba ma anda' waf bu'wafi alogwa waf awafi ake ma naep Godi. Ea' esis satolowe. Ina anis amam nematawa hiasi sape salome asa'ma nelelemb anis epesi sanda' kwala'ap naninani, owa'atin.
44024019	Owa', anis Juda sagape itap lu'upa Esiaisi safi'i sombale'e. I'i esis anif basefa ae'a, dei' andeande'ma sifi'i na'a naep ine'ipi sondakotimi.
44024020	I'i owa'atin, amom amamba munda'ipina anif basefa hiahawes mais amom mati ae' anda'as awasi, afamba agalutu nogohnaep amom Juda dembami mugumafi koti.
44024021	Anif basef atifif a'amon. Ama afamba agalutu la'afena amoma, ae' ega aga'i, ‘Ae' ahapifa God nogasa'ma esis sagaga'i sogohafel wapanii, ea' isimba atis ipa' dei' pandakotima ae' ma nogohnaep ipe'isi.’”
44024022	Filiks nogawa andeande'ma hapif naloma waf soga'i ufia'w esis Kristeni. Ea' na'ipa esis Juda ma ata' sope sogasasana. Anen na'i, “Ota'ma soldia dembinai Lisias nilianai, dao' ae' enandonamepa basef ifimba ipe'ifi.”
44024023	Ea' na'ipa anona soldia dembinai ma ata' nola' Pol nuwis nope kalabus nope wahifina dowaf. Ea' na'i aho'ma esis alipisi ananisi sifi'i sogatopalopana ma hiahawes.
44024024	Anif nimaguf fafe'ma ea', Filiks nao'wa waulu'mana anani'wi Drusila safi'i. Ako'w Drusila mini'ap esis Judai. Ea' Filiks nofala Pol na'i name' anif basef ananifi. Ea' Pol nafi'i na'ipana basef kofagefa ma esis sogahapifa Jisas Krais.
44024025	Na'ipana waf usi'ifi hilili' ma epes sugumafi alop asasipi datima ma anaf God nonda' kotima epes hiasi. Na'ias na'amba owa', Filiks ombal mahana. Ea' na'i, “Ina' ea' fo'o. Ama nambimba anef nemaf, dao' efalena wapani.”
44024026	Filiks nape nohafa anin mae wapani. Anen na'i owa', Pol nogaso'ana anin moni ma nokwahona nogafe' wahifina. Na'amba dondol anen nofalana nafi'i na'i nalomana.
44024027	Afagof biagof fafe'ma hi'alagof, Festus nofa' maol Filiksi. Ea' Filiks na'i ata' nonda' ukup esis Judai pegape andeande'. Ea' ata' nanda' Pol nape nanda' kalabus.
44025001	Festus nafi'i nofa' maol nape dembinai gavman numafi itap lu'wagoma walemb hielimbi fowa' Filiks nugumafiagoma. Nape nimaguf wanifa ea', nakwaha wambel Sisaria nondowasa' Jerusalem.
44025002	Ea' amom pris dembami maloma agufumi Judai mafi'mai anen masapaga Pol
44025003	ma'ipa Festus banagambel ma'i, “Ina' netopalopafa nesapa' aman anamba nifi'i na'a.” Dei' main, amom ma'i mondambaho' mogape ufia'wa mohana nogaga'.
44025004	Ea' Festus nagwa basef na'ipam na'i, “Pol nanda' kalabus nape wambel Sisaria. Felefele' atiasi ae' itanima efe' ganimba.
44025005	Ea' amom agufumi ipe'imi mifi'i miliana moloma ae'. Ama i'i aman anamba nanda' waf awafimanai, dao' amom a' mondakotimana.”
44025006	Festus nape nalomam nimaguf 8-pelaif a'a ilifunamaif, a' niliana wambel Sisaria. Ama wafilu nafe' nawis ipat sandakota na'ipa amom soldia mo'wa Pol mogafi'i.
44025007	Ea' amom Juda makwaha Jerusalem mape masasa Pol nafi'i miliana malutu felefele'ma anen masapagana basef hiafi nimanifi. Owa' amom mandakot dowadowaf, basef kofagefa amamifi owa'anifa.
44025008	Ea' Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Ae' ina anda' anef waf awafi ma mu'uli apa' Judai, ipat lu'unai Godi, a'a mu'uli Sisari wapani, owa'atin.”
44025009	Owa' Festus na'i nonda' ukup esis Judai pepe be'ep. Ea' nahali' Pol na'i, “Ina' na'i nefe' Jerusalem ama bola eme'enama basef ine'ifi ganimba?”
44025010	Owa' Pol na'i, “Ipat ata'e ae' dei' agalutuatai, ata'e ipat lu'utai Sisari sanda' kota. Ipat ata'e atota pegame' basefa kot ae'ataima. Ina' atina negawa ea', ae' ina anda' anef waf awafi ma esis Juda, owa'atin.
44025011	I'i ae' anef waf awafi ma enda' anin mae awani nendahama ae' egaga'ai, ea' andeande'ma amom mohe egaga'. Apa' i'i basef ifimba amom mandakotima ae'afi owa' endilisia, ina andeande'ma dembinai gavman nese'e egafe'ma lagof amamugufi, owa'atin. Dei' ae' efala gavman dembinai Sisar neme' kot ae'atai.”
44025012	Ea' Festus ata' na'i basef naloma amom dembami ananimi, na'ipa Pol na'i, “Ina' a' nefala Sisar ama nogame' kot ine'itai, dao' ina' fo'mago Sisar.”
44025013	Ama anif nimaguf fafe'ma ea', dembinai king Agripa nafi'i naloma ano'w nemata'w Bernaisi esis bias safi'i Sisaria sa'i sonda'mana nemaf bu'wafi Festus.
44025014	Esis sape Sisaria nimaguf hiafi ea' Festas nawalapa basef na'ipanaef king Agripa ma Pol. Anen na'i, “Anona aman fowa' nagapani Filiks nanda'ana sa'ombemana dei' nanda' kalabus.
44025015	Fowa' ae' agapani Jerusalem, amom pris dembami maloma agufumi esis Judai masapagana mahali' ae' ma iga'i endilisi anen aman aunai ma nogaga'.
44025016	“Apa' ae' agwamama basef na'amba a'i, ‘Apa' Rom waf afamba akapa ma mogaso'ana akafimi dowadowafa anin epen, owa'. Apa' i'i basef figailani, anin ata' nili' nilutu nenda' basefa nogohnaep esis isimba sanda' kotimani ma apa' ata' moso'ana nogota anina negagwa anif basefa esis sanda' kotimani.’”
44025017	Afamba amom agufumi Judai mafi'i na'a, ina anda' salaisala ma egame' basefana, owa'atin. Ama nemaf gi'maifi ae' afe' ape ipat sanda' kota a'ipa esisa sofa' aman anamba nogafi'i.
44025018	Ea' amom manda' kotima anini mafi'i malutu masapagana. Apa' amom ina mola' anif basef endilisifi ma waf awafi manindipanaefa a'i amom monda' kotimanafi, owa'atin.
44025019	Amom mandahihianama anif basef malomana ma waf esis sanda' lotuwafi ea' anifa anona aman nagaga'i, Jisas. Owa' Pol na'i aman anamba nape namona ambal lapaona.
44025020	Ae' a'i ila' elaoma basef ifimba kofagefa andeande', apa' nomonas ae'asi ina sogawa, owa'. Ae' ina la'ifiwi, owa'atin. Ea' ahali'ana a'i, “Ina' na'i nefe' Jerusalem ama bola eme'enama basef ine'ifi ganimba?
44025021	“Owa' Pol na'i anen nondape kalabus ama bola gavman dembinai ape'inai Sisar neme' basef ananifi. Ae' a'i anen nondape kalabus ama main, esapa'ana nefe'mago Sisar.”
44025022	Ea' Agripa na'ipa Festus na'i, “Ae' atowe a'i eme' basef ananifi.” Ea' Festus na'ipana na'i, “Aho', naman ina' neme'ana.”
44025023	Ama wafilu Agripa naloma nemata'w akwamba Bernaisi safi'i sanda' sosaf hiani ma sogasa'ma agof asasigufi lu'wagof. Ea' sawis ipat lu'utai sandakolas sape saga'i basefa nomon saloma amom soldia dembami magali'i maloma amom agufumi taun inimbai. Ea' Festus na'ipas dindinip sao'wa Pol nafi'i.
44025024	Ea' Festus na'i, “King Agripa, naloma ipa' epes hipai pape pagaloma ape'i, ipa' pati aman anamba. Esis amam nematawa hiasi Juda sagape Jerusalami saloma sagape na'ai wapani sanda' kotimana nogohnaep ae'asi. Esis gigal sa'oh banagambel sa'ipi sa'i ehana afuna. Sa'i, ‘Na'amba a' nope namona wapani.’
44025025	Apa' ae' ati anen ina nanda' anin mae awani ma nogaga', owa'atin. Apa' anen nofala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nogame' kota anen. Isimba atis ae' a'i basefa esapa'ana nogafo'o.
44025026	Apa' ae' ina ati anif basefa anen fataga alihifa enda' anif basefa pas esapa'as sogafe'ma Sisar, owa'. Ea' dei' king Agripa ae' au'wai aman anamba nafi'mai ina', neloma ipa' hipai wapani. Afa' ondame' basef ananifi andeande'ma bola ae' egawama enda' anif basef figail pas.
44025027	Dei' main, ina andeande'ma esapa'ana nogafe' dowaf. Afa' onda' anif basef sanda' kotimanafi fil pepa fefe' felomana, dao' andeande'.”
44026001	Ea' Agripa na'ipa Pol na'i, “Dei' ina' nendagwa basef ifimba amom magasapagainamafi.” Pol nasa'ma lagol na'i basef ananifi na'i,
44026002	“King dembinai Agripa, ae' a'i egwa basef ifimba hiafi amom Juda magasapaga ae'afi. Ae' okom mandanda' ma'i andeande'ma a'i egawalapa basef ae'afi ma naep ine'ipi.
44026003	Dei' main? Ina' negawa andeande'ma waf apa' Judai faloma hiahawes apa' ukup pandanda'mas pagafe' daindaimasi. Isimba atis dei' ae' a'i ina' neme' basef ae'afi, okom ine'imi ina a' iwanim kwafalis, owa'.
44026004	“Fowa' ape afi'i afi'i ataga dei' fe' inimba ae'ani esis Juda hiasi sogawa. Fowa' ata' sa'owe agape itap ae'api ea' afe' agape Jerusalem wapani.
44026005	Fowa' gani esis sogawa ae'. I'i ukup asasipi pi'i aho', a' sowalapa basef ifimba ma waf ae'afi. Esis sogawa ae' aila waf mini'ap apa' Farisi. Waf afamba ahifif a'owa', fikila' waf hiafi anef daiafa lotu ape'ini.
44026006	Ea' basef kofagefa ma kot na'amba. Ae' ahipif endilisi ma God nosa'ma sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, isimba atis. Ae' ahapilif ape ehafa God nonda' hiahawes isimba sogataga si'i fowa' naga'ipamef akupapa apa' Judai. Isimba atis dei' esis sanda' kotimi.
44026007	Ambeh ape'ihi 12-pelaih manda' lotuma God owamb alip ea' mahapilif endilisi mape mohafa isimba atis. Dei' a'ipa ina' dembinai king, ae' wapani ahapilif ape ehafa amamba. Ea' esis Juda sasapagae.”
44026008	Pol na'ipa king Agripa ea' nandambema na'ipa amom Juda na'i, “Dei' maina ipa' paga'i basef ina endilisifi ma God anaf nogasa'ma esis isimba sagaga'i wapani? Ipa' pindahapifa basef ifimba.
44026009	“Fowa' ae' wapani okom mandanda' ma'i ae' enda' hiahaom hiami ma egatalogofa agol Jisas Nasaratinaii.
44026010	Ae' anda'am na'amba atina anis epes gani Jerusalem. Amom pris dembami mase'e banagami anda' kalabusima amam nematawa hiasi Godi. Nemaf afamba amom pris dembami ma'i moha anis Kristen sogaga', ae' wapani a'i aho'.
44026011	Ea' nimaguf hiafi ae' aso'as nimanimi Kristen isimba ahas nomon ifagw esis Juda sandakolasugwi hiagwi. Ae' a'i enda' esisa sonda' Dembinai findiwana ma sogakwaha hapif. Ae' okom wandafuna endilisi ma esis, ailas afe' analemb walemb lauguni lu'wagoma,
44026012	“Efa' banagamuma amom pris dembami masapa'e afe' Damaskus.
44026013	Ae' a'ipa ina' dembinai king, ma awin nandasapa' ae' aila ufia'w afe', ati anona nogogala'i nisila'i heven nogala' a'owa' nikila' awin owaf fagalo. Mogogala'i mafi'i mogala'me aloma amom mafe' magalumai.
44026014	Afa' hiafai owa wa'oh itap ea' ae' ame' anagol malogol ga'ipi diga Hibrui ga'i, ‘Sol, Sol, dei' maina ina' nanda' maol nagahambombaga ae'? Ina' nanda' maol naha inimba owa' negawaia. Dei' nefa' akafimi bumbulita si'i anona naha bulmakau ananimi bumbulita nagasindi'amonam.
44026015	“Ea' ahali'ana a'i, ‘Dembinai ina' ami?’ “Ea' Dembinai na'i, ‘Ae' Jisas, ina' nagahambombagai.
44026016	Ea' ina' safel nilutu. Ae' afi'mai ina' ma hiahawes isimba. Ae' a'i esahe'ena ma nigahapila maol ae'ani, negawalapa basefa hiahawes ina' nagatilisa ae'i. Ea' hiahawes isimba anaf ae' igihimba'menasi.
44026017	Atiasi ae' itagwahina lagof esis mini'ap ine'isi Juda ea' itagwahina ma lagof isimba anis epes sogololama Godi wapani. Ae' esapa'ena nefe'ma esis isimba.
44026018	Ama negawala naep asasipi ma esis sogowa' alafugaha akota waf awafi sembema nelelemb sogafi'mai mogogala'i ma sokwaha banagami Satani sogafi'mai God. Esis sahapifa ae' ma egakwaha waf awafi asasifi. Ama sogofa' hiahaom bu'wami soloma anis amam nematawa God nanda'as bo'wes hilili' ananisi atisi.’
44026019	“Dembinai king Agripa, ae' ati hiahawes isimba sagataga heveni ea' ina esambala basef ifimba, owa'atin.
44026020	Ae' ali' awalapa basefa esis amam nematawa sagape Damaskusi ma main owa', awalapefa epes sagape Jerusalami ea' awalapefa esis sagape itap lu'upa Juda hiagomai, ama main afe' awalapefa isimba sogololama Godi wapani. Ae' awalapa basefa penda' maol peloma waf sambema nelelemb sagafe'ma Godafi fendahamaf.
44026021	Ae' anda'as na'amba ea' kofagesa isimba atis dei' esis Juda sombale'e ipat lu'unai Godi sa'i sohe ega'.
44026022	Apa' God natopalope afi'i afi'i ataga dei' alutu na'a ea' awalapa basefa epes hiasi agof akasi saloma ipa' agufipai wapani. Ae' ina ewalapa anif basef daif, owa'. Awalapa basef ifimba Godi atif fowa' amom profet maloma Moses maga'iefi ma hiahawes owagama sogatagai.
44026023	Amom maga'if na'amba ma'i, ‘Dembinai Krais ata' nofa' akafimi, ma atiasi notanima nogosafel matmat nigali'ma epes hiasi. Ama atiasi anen nowalapa basefa epes hiasi sogawef si'i mogogala'i mogogala'ma esis ananisi saloma isimba sogololama Godi wapani.’”
44026024	Pol na'ipas na'amba owa', Festus noga na'i banagambel na'amba na'i, “Pol, ina' okom naolena! Ina' nati buk hiami natalifam nogawam dei' gawa anamba lu'unai nanda'ena okom naolena!”
44026025	Ea' Pol nagwamana na'i, “Ina' aman dembinai Festus, ae' ina okom naole, owa'atin. Ae' okom mapaowe dei' a'i endilisi.
44026026	Ina' dembinai king negawas hi'alas hiahawes isimba hiasi. Ea' ae' dei' awalapas a'ias, ae' ina ombal mahe, owa'atin. Ae' egawa hiahawes isimba hiasi ina sandambaho'ma naepi aligah ine'isi, owa'atin. Ina' natilis negawas ea'. Dei' main, hiahawes isimba ina sataga sandambaho', owa'.
44026027	Ina' dembinai king Agripa, ina' nahapifa basef Godi amom profet fowa' magawalipasafi a'a owa'? Ae' egawa ina' nahapifif!”
44026028	Ea' king Agripa na'ipa Pol na'i, “Awasi, nogota atamba kwaia'uta ina' na'i nenda'e etaga Kristen?”
44026029	Ea' Pol na'i, “Nogota bandata a'a laota wapani andeande'. Apa' ae' andabetena God na'amba. A'i atiasi ina' neloma epes isimba hiasi dei' pagame' basef ae'afii petaga Kristen na'amba atin si'i ae'. Apa' sen anamba nogowa' ae'i, andaiwa'ma amamba mogawasi'ipa.”
44026030	Pol na'ias na'amba owa', dembinai king nali' nosafel nalutu naloma Bernaisi saloma gavman dembinai saloma epes isimba sape sagalomasi.
44026031	Ea' sawis ando'. Esis atis sanda'ipama sa'i, “Aman anamba ina nanda' anin mae awani ma nogaga' a'a nonda' kalabus, owa'.”
44026032	Ea' Agripa na'ipa Festus na'i, “I'i aman anamba owa' nofala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nogame'anama kotai, ina' netagwahona nofo'o wahifina.”
44027001	Ea' anom dembami Rom ma'i basef mandame'maefa afa' ofa' sip ogafe' itap lu'upa Itali. Ea' anom dembami daiam masapa' Pol naloma anis daias sanda' kalabusi ma anona soldia dembinai Julius nugumafias. Anen anona mini'ap soldia gavman dembinai Sisari.
44027002	Ea' afa' walota anop sip Adramitiumi. Sip apamba pa'i pefe' analemb walemb bagape naoh agwamba itap lu'upa Asiai. Afa' wafe' ea' anona aman Aristarkus Tesalonaikainai ma itap lu'upa Masedonia nafe' nalomafa.
44027003	A'i owa' wafilu wafe' wail anambel wambel Saidon. Ea' aman anamba Julius numafi Pol nanda' waf fasifi ma anen. Na'i aho'ma anen nefe' nigati alipisi ananisi ma nogofa' gwa'aisi maisa esis.
44027004	Afa' wakwaha Saidon wafe' owa' fufin a' naluwi anamba afa' wa'i ogafe'ma. Ea' wafe' ailan Saiprus wa'ol fufin akagoma.
44027005	Ea' wafe' watopa' naoh wafe' felefele'ma itap lu'upa Silisia a Pamfiliama, ea' wafe' watagama anambel wambel Maira itap lu'upa Lisia.
44027006	Wambel ambalemba Julius nati anop sip Aleksandria pa'i pefe' itap lu'upa Itali. Ea' na'ipafa wafe' walota sip apamba.
44027007	Wafe', sip apamba pafe' sa'osa'ombel ama anif nimaguf ahi'alef. Wanda'am noma'w nahafa a'owa', ea' wataga felefele'ma anambel wambel Nidas. Fufin nalo lu'una nili'amafa, ea' ina ata' wafe' mehip, a'owa'. Ea' wafe' anin ailan Krit wa'ol fufin owa'ma felefele'ma itap Salmone da'malifipa.
44027008	Wanda'am noma'w nahafa a'owa', ea' waila naoh atogw wafe' felefele'ma akata ailan inimba Krit. A'i owa' main, wataga anambel wambel Fasigima Sip Pagaila. Anamba felefele'ma wambel taun lu'wani Lasea.
44027009	Nimaguf hiafi fafe' hi'alef owa', nemaf afamba esis Juda sogololama gwa'aisiafi hi'alaf a' ea' anef nimaguf wapani. Nogota atamba naoh gwanda'am lasiali'. Ina nogota bo'ota ma sip pogafe', owa'. Ea' Pol na'ipasa basef esis na'amba na'i,
44027010	“Ipa' amam, peme'. I'i dei' afa' ogafe'ma, atiasi otagama numa'umi ea' hiahaom hiami higililam. Ina atiasi uga maim atom moloma sip higililam, owa'atin. Ambagof afa'igufi wapani atiasi higililagof. Ae' egawas endilisi.”
44027011	Owa' Julius name' dembinai kapten anamba nugumafi amom manda' maol sipi maloma aman anamba ahama sipi ea' ina name' basef Pol naga'iefi, owa'.
44027012	Basis isimba sip pafe' pagaima ina bo'wagon a'owa' ma sip pogailagon nogota atamba fufin nigaluwataima, owa'. Ea' amom hiami magape sipi ma'i anif basef mandame'maefa ma'i mokwaha wambel ambalemba mofe'. Amom i'i la'ifimai, ma'i mofe' motaga ulal basis isimba Finiks a' mope anamba nogota atamba lautai fufin lu'wani nagaluwataima. Basis isimba Finiks sagape ailan inimba Krit. Anamba fasigima ma sip pofe' pondambaho'ma fufin pugaila. Basis isimba sape sandasapa'ma awin negewalama felefele'ma lambilif wa'olwa'ol nemba' negenafama.
44027013	Sape nogota bandata tafe' ea', fufin sa'wini nalo nafi'i wa'ol awin natopa' negenafama, ea' ina banagen a'owa'. Ea' amom ma'ias ma'i atiasi amom mogafe' andeande'i si'i ukup amamipi paga'i. Na'amba magiai anka nalotai ea' wafe' waila naoh atogw felefele'ma bandagoma ailan inimba Krit.
44027014	A'i owa' main, owa' fufin banagonai sa'i taleo a' naluwi nalo nafi'i ailan inimba Krit.
44027015	Nambembema sip apamba ea' ina la'ifipa pogafe' anamba fufin nagafi'ima, owa'. Ea' wapoma fufin atin nefa'ap pafe'.
44027016	Ama wandandafel wafe' anin ailan wa'ol fufin akagoma sofalagon sa'i Koda. Wanda'am da nda' numa'um a'owa' ma ogowa' bot sa'utai sisihita.
44027017	Ea' amom magiai bot atamba sa'utai talotai sip ilif ea' mowa' sip la'afipa ma analef mandelefa ata' banagep. Amom ombal maham a'owa' ma mofe' sisihim mogail anamba ko'onaga aunai naga'oma, felefele'ma itap lu'upa Libia, Afrika. Ea' matagwahai sel towala atin dowaf.
44027018	Fufin naloma naoh makoto'ma afa' mehip a'owa'. Wafilu magi anona uga nimaninai makwahona nowala naoh.
44027019	Ama nemaf fagafe'ma wanifi manda' lagof amamugufi atogof makwaha anom hiahaom sel mandelef maim manda' sip nimaninai.
44027020	Nimaguf hiafi afa' ina ata' wati awini ondowa, owa'atin. Fufin lu'unai atona endilisi nakoto'mafa wandape na'amba atin. Ea' wa'i atiasi ina ofe' otaga anagon andeande', owa'atin. Wa'i higililafa atin.
44027021	Nimaguf hiafi amom ina ata' ma' gwa'aisi, ea' Pol nosafel nalutu la'afena amom na'i, “Ipa' peme'. Fowa' ipa' andeande'ma pendame' basef ae'afi ma afa' ina okwaha Krit ufi'i ulal. Afa' i'i onda'as na'ambaiai, afa' ina dei' onda'am numa'um na'amba, a hiahaom uga maim afa'imi ahigililam, owa'atin.
44027022	Ea' dei' a'ipipa asa'ma ukup ipe'ipi pepe banagepa. Ina atiasi anona aman afa'inai nofe' higililana, owa'atin. Sip atop dao' atiasi ea' higililap.
44027023	Dei' maina ae' egawa isimba? Ae' aman Godi anda' lotuma anini. Doko' owamb anona ensel ananinai nafi'i nalutu felefele'ma ae'
44027024	na'ipi na'i, ‘Pol, ina' owa'i ombal mehenaea. Ina' atiasi nefe' nigalutu nogohnaep gavman dembinai Sisari. Ea' ina' neme', epes hiasi isimba sape sagalomena sipi, isimba God atiasi nogatopalopasi. Ea' ina atiasi anin higililan, owa'.’
44027025	“Ipa' ina ombal mehepa, owa'i. Dei' main, ae' ahapifa God anen atiasi nonda' hiahaom amamba motaga si'i naga'ipiam.
44027026	Apa' afa' ata' ofe' wil sisihifa anemba otamba ma anin ailan.”
44027027	A'i owa' owambeh ambahemba wikifah biagah tol wala atin wafe' naoh agwamba Adriai. Ama owa' owamb la'afimba awin nandasapa' amom mugumafi uga sipi ea' mogawa ma'i sip ea' pafe' pataga felefele'ma anin ailan.
44027028	Ea' mala mandof si'i ikwaf fewala naoh mondola'waifagon fihimba'mam fa'i 40 mita, laogon kwasakwasala. Ea' wafo'o kwasakwasala, walaf wapani mondola'waifagon fa'i 30 mita, ina laogon, owa'.
44027029	Ea' amom ombal maham ma'i, “Na'amba mofe' atin sisihim mope anom otamba anamba otambaigima.” Ea' makwaha anka biafin biafin newala sip apamba pagagi'ma ma mogombalo' sip. Ea' amom ukup pa'i awin alipini ata' nitafi kwafalis.
44027030	Amam manda' maol sipi ma'i ata' mola' molaoma ufia'wa mokwaha sip mogafe'. Ea' mala bot sa'utai towala mambaso'am ma'i mowasa' anona anka nowala sip apamba pagagi'ma.
44027031	Ea' Pol na'ipa dembinai soldia Julius naloma amom soldia na'ipam na'i, “Amam amamba i'i owa' mope sip atapima, atiasi ipa' awepa higililipa.”
44027032	Ea' amom soldia matopa' mandelefa bot sa'utai atamba malata togowalai.
44027033	Ea' felefele'ma awin na'i nigatafi, Pol na'ipam basef amom hiami. Anen na'i nowa' banagama ata' mogwa' anis gwa'aisi. Ea' na'i, “Nogota lautai ipa' pape dowaf owa' wea' anis gwa'aisia ea' pape ombal mahepa ma hiahawes mais sogatagamepai. Ipa' pape dowaf nimaguf ifimba 14-pelaif ea' pafi'i pataga nemaf dei'ifi.
44027034	Dei' a'ipipa dindinip, a'i ipa' ata' pea' anis gwa'aisi ma sowa' banagaipa. Peme', ina atiasi anis maefah sotaga sohambombagepa, owa'atin endilisi. Pepe andeande'.”
44027035	Anen na'ias na'amba ma main, nasa'mai anota bret naep amamipi nandabeten nanifela God, nawalota na'ata.
44027036	Ea' amom hiami ukup ambe'ep, ea' ma' gwa'aisi wapani.
44027037	Afa' hiafai wagape sipi wataga 276-pelaifa hiafai.
44027038	Amom ma'as ea', makwaha wit mowala naoh ama sip ata' sofalip.
44027039	Awin natafima lala, amom mati anap itap, apa' amom ina mogawa itap apamba akata, owa'. Amom mati anis basis sip pafe' pagaila nondola' nawis a'owa'. Ma'i i'i la'ifima ai, dei' monda' sip pondowasa' ko'onaga akata.
44027040	Ea' matopa' mandelefa anka anamba hianai makwahom mala naoh. Ea' matagwaha mandof manda'af mogowa' stiaifi, mandola sela fufin nofa' sip pogafe' akata.
44027041	Owa' sip asisihip pape anona ko'onaga asisihip pail. Pagali'ma sisihip a'owa' pape otamba. Ea' naoh mato maha pagagi'ma ea' maolona palalana.
44027042	Ea' amom soldia ukup amamipi pa'i moha amamba manda' kalabusi afum hi'ilam, ama amom ina ata' mopaol a' mofa' mefe', owa'.
44027043	Owa' dembinai soldia Julius na'i notopalopa Pol. Ea' na'ipam na'i ina a' moham afum, owa'i. Mondape. Ea' na'ipa amam amamba mogogawa paoli ma motoma mindipa' mopaol mili' mogafe' akata.
44027044	Apa' anom mogololama paoli, mohapila palag maim tatala'im moloma indah sip anamba papalagalami mohapilam tol mola naoh gofa'am mofe' bandagoma akata. Afa' wame' basef ananifi wanda'as na'amba, dei' afa' hiafai wafe' be'efa wataga walutu naoh akata.
44028001	Afa' wafe' wataga andeande' akata, ea' wame' esis sa'i ailan inimba Malta.
44028002	Esis epes wambel ambalembaisi sanda'mafa waf fasifi a'owa'. Asaf falai ea' nomanambigin. Ea' sakata nif sa'ipa afa' hiafai wafe' felefele'ma nif.
44028003	Ea' Pol nafe' nasa'ma nif nawamonef. Owa' anona ul nagahasi nape nif fahi'ana pao nawisi ando' nondofapa lagol Poli nalelef uli mawis nomon.
44028004	Ea' esis amam nematawa wambelisi sati ul anamba nagumba lagol Poli ali'atin nail, ea' sa'i, “Endilisi, aman anamba naha epes sagaga'i. Anen ina afuna naoh embel, owa'atin. Apa' god anamba ape'inai nagagwa waf usi'ifii nandaiwa'ma nogape namona wapani.”
44028005	Owa' Pol niali' lagol ul pele'atana nafe' nowala nasef nif ea' anen ina awasina kwasakwasala, owa'atin.
44028006	Ea' esis sape sasasa, sa'i sigati lagol gogalota, a'a anen nogowa kwafalisa afuna, owa', owa'atin. Esis sape nogota laota ea' ina sati anis maefah awasi satagaman, owa'atin. Ea' sambema ukup sa'i basef sa'i, “Ahame, Pol anen anona dembinai God.”
44028007	Itap pagape felefele'ma anamba afa' wagapomai itap apamba anona aman dembinaii nugumafi esis sagape ailan inimbai, agilinama Publius. Aman anamba nofa'afa wafe' ipat ananitai numafiafa andeande' wape walomana nimaguf wanif.
44028008	Publius ahamana awasina na'oh. Alop ananipi nifip ea' nako' embel atom. Ea' Pol nafe' nasa lagof alop ananipi ea' nataga bo'ona wapani.
44028009	A'i owa' nanda'as na'amba owa', anis daias ailan inimbaisi awas nanda'asi safi'mai anen nanda'mas beten sataga bo'wes wapani.
44028010	Ea' esis saso'afa hiahaom fasimi a'owa'. Ama afa' wa'i ogafe' owa', saso'afa hiahawes hiasi afa' waowaolasi ea' sofa'as sambe'mafas anop sip afa' ogafe'api.
44028011	Apa' afa' ata' wape aomb wanemb ailan inimba. Ama main, walota sip apamba pagail ailan inimbai nogota atamba fufin lu'wani nagaluwatai. Sip apamba Aleksandriai. Agilipa sa'i sahomana owamana amom atom magape isag atogai, nogaopana anona god baso'amunai Sus. Ea' afa' wakwahogon wafe'.
44028012	Wafe' wataga Sirakyus wape nimaguf wanif
44028013	wakwaha anamba wafe' wataga Regium. Ama nemaf fagagi'i fufin lu'unai nalo nafi'i awin negemba'ma, ama nemaf fagagi'i ea' wataga anis basis Puteoli.
44028014	Wambel ambalemba afa' wati anis Kristen. Ea' sa'ipafa wape walomas wik si'igai. Ama main, a' wafe' Rom.
44028015	Esis Kristen sagape Romi same' basefa afa' wafi'i, anis safi'i sotambel Maket wambel Apiusi, apa' anis safi'i sotambel wambel agol agalemba saga'i ifagw wanogw sanda' fi'i fe' sagapaugwi. Ea' satolofa ufia'w. Pol nati esis, nandagala nanifela God okom ananimi ambanagem.
44028016	Afa' wafe' wataga Rom, gavman Romunai na'i aho'ma Pol atona nogape anota ipat noloma anona soldia numafiana nogape atapina.
44028017	Nimaguf wanif fafe' ma ea', Pol nofalai amom agufumi Judai mafi'i mandakolas. Ea' na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Ipa' sahope, ae' ina anda' anin mae ahambombaga epes ape'isi ma egesambala waf amom bafapapa ape'imii, owa'atin. Apa' owa' amom dembami Judai manda' kalabusima ae' Jerusalem ea' manda'e afi'i lagof amom Romi.
44028018	Amom Rom mame' basefa kot ae'atai, ae' basefa waf awafi kofagefa owa'atina mohe egaga'. Ea' ma'i motagwahowe.
44028019	Owa' amom Juda mosambala basef ifimba. Na'amba dei' ae' ufia'w ake ma egafe' wahifiwi. Ea' efala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nogame' basefa kot ae'atai. Apa' ae' ina endakotima epes ae'asi ma anis maefah, owa'atin.
44028020	Basef kofagefa ifimba atif dei' efalepa pafi'i. Ae' a'i ese'epa anif basef. Ae' ahapifif ape ehafa anen anamba apa' Israel hiapai mape mogohafanai. Ae' agahapifanai. Isimba atis kofagesa ma dei' manda' sen inimba mowa'e.”
44028021	Ea' amom ma'ipana ma'i, “Owa' anom amam Judaimi mosapa'i anif basefa moga'ipafa ina'a, owa'atin. Ea' ina anona aman Judainai nafi'i nape na'ipafa andeande'ma na'i anif basef awafi ma ina', owa'atin.
44028022	Apa' afa' wa'i ata' ome' nomonas ine'isi atisa malogol ine'igili. Afa' ogawa, walemb hiagoma esis amam nematawa sanda' basef awafi ma mini'ap apamba ine'ipi.”
44028023	Ea' amam mandandepa anef nemafa amam hiami mugafi'mai Pol ipat ananitai. Ea' mafi'i kuhimbita mape mape mataga wambomota, anen na'i basef kofagefa nawalapefa amom. Ea' nawalapa basef alihifa epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Anen nawalapa anif basefa mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesafi faloma basef Godi amom profet fowa' maga'iefi. Ama basef ifimba anen na'if banagambela nagasa'ma ukup amamipi ma mogahapifa Jisas.
44028024	Anom mahapifana ma basef ananifi, apa' anom owa' mohapifanaea.
44028025	Ea' nomonas sandapaom daindai a' mandafe'. Apa' doko' li' Pol na'ipama anif basef na'amba na'i, “Ambal bu'unai Godi na'i endilisi atisa amom akupapa ape'imi ma malogol profet Aisaiai. Fowa' anen naga'i na'amba na'i,
44028026	‘Ina' fo'mago esis amam nematawa isimba ni'ipas na'amba ni'i. Atiasi ipa' pepe peme' basef, apa' ipa' ina pegawa kofagefa, owa'. Ipa' pepe naep petawa, apa' ipa' ina atiasi piti anin mae pegawan, owa'atin.
44028027	Dei' main, ukup epes amam nematawa isimba paso'as ea', ukup ea' iwanipa sogame' basefa aligah asasigahi, sasopama naep asasipi ea'. I'i owa'ai, esis asiti hiahawes, ea' seme' basef aligah asasigahi a ukup pendanda'ma basef kofagefa, ea' sombema opalef sotanima sifi'mai ae' ma atiasi enda' esis bo'wes wapani. Owa' owa'atin.’”
44028028	Ea' Pol na'ipam basef akutaifi na'i, “Dei' ae' a'i ipa' pendegawa basefa God nofa'apa nokwahomapa waf awafi motanima magafi'mai anen, ifimba anen nasapa'ef fafe'ma anis amam nematawa sogololama Godi. Esis isimba dao', atiasi sila basef ifimba, apa' ipa' owa'.”
44028029	Pol na'ipam basef ifimba ma ea', amom dembami Juda a' mafe'. Ea' ma'i basef lu'wafi ma'if manda' hihianamaef la'afena amom atom.
44028030	A'i owa' main, Pol nape atapina afagof si'igufi biagof ipat atamba anen nagatalotai ea' naso'as opaf nanda'mas waf fasifi epes hiasi safi'i sagatolonai.
44028031	Anen nawalapa basef bu'wafi ma epes sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Ea' nawalipasa basefa dembinai Jisas Krais. Anen ina ombal mahana, owa'. Nawalapef na'if alihif ea' ina anin epen nasopamana, owa'atin. Basef ifimba ea' ma'uf.
45001001	Ae' Pol ape lafela Krais Jisas anda' maola anen atona. God nofale ma enda' maol aposel ea' nosahe'e ma egawalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi.
45001002	-
45001004	Basef ifimba fagape na'amba. Fowa' gani God nala' lapa basef ifimba bu'wafi ea' na'ipa amom profet ananimi mawalipasef manda'ef fail buk Godi. Basef ifimba fa'i Nogamana ananinai, Jisas Krais dembinai ape'inai. Ea' nofa' alop apa' epesi nataga wambota aman dembinai king Deviti. Apa' dei' Ambal bu'unai Godi nawalapana alihina ma banagami Godi, anen Nogamana ananinai endilisi. Ambal anamba nasa'mana nogosafel wandof wapani.
45001005	Lagof Jisasi atogof God natopalope dowaf nowa' banagae anda' maol aposela asa'ma agol Jisas Kraisi lu'wagol. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma anaf anis amam nematawa misi'ah hiasi hi'ilas sohapifana sogaila basef ananifi.
45001006	Ipa' wapani pape mini'ap apamba. Ipa' pame' fala Jisas Kraisi ea' pailana pape ananipai.
45001007	Ipa' epes Romipai, God okom maimailipa nofalepa ma pagape amam nematawa ananipai atipa. Ae' anda' basef ifimba fafi'mipai. Ae' a'i God ahamapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banaga opalef ipe'ilifi fepe sa'ombel.
45001008	Ae' a'i ata' ili' iga'iesi isimba. Ae' anifela God ae'anai ma agol Jisas Kraisi, anifelona ma ipa' wapani. Dei' main, esis itap ganimba hiagoma sa'i basef ifimba ma ipa' pagahapifana.
45001009	-
45001010	God nogawa nemaf mamahefa andabetenafi okom ae'ami mandanda' ma ipa' anda'mepa beten. Ae' anda' maol Godi aloma okom ae'ami si'ima agawalipasa basef bu'wafi ma Nogamana ananinai. Beten ae'ani nagape na'amba. Fowa' dondol nimaguf hiafi ahali'ana ma efo'o igatilipa. Owa', owa'atin. Dei' wapani ahali'ana ma anen ni'i awiai, nonda'me ano'w ufia'wa efo'o igatilipa.
45001011	Ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma atiasi efo'o igatilipa ma ewa' banagaepa egase'epa anis hiahaom fasimi Spirit Ambal Godi nogase'epam dowafi.
45001012	Amamba na'amba. Ae' a'i hapif ae'ani netopalopa ipa' ea' ipe'ini netopalopa ae' newa' banagae. Isimba sowa' banaga opalef ape'ilifi na'amba atin.
45001013	Ae' a'i ipa' alipipai ata' pegawa nimaguf hiafi ae' a'i efe'mago ipa' ea' afi'i ataga dei'. Owa' anis hiahawes sasopama ufia'wa ae'. Fowa' atopalopa anis sogololama Godi sataga Kristen salutu banages. Ea' dei' a'i ata' etopalopepa si'i agatopalopa esis.
45001014	Ae' wiaf fotaome ma egatopalopa epes hiasi Krais. Wiaf afamba na'amba. Krais natalowe maol lu'wani dei' ae' egwamanan etopalopa epes isimba hiasi hi'ilas. Ma sogogawa waf bu'wafi dambaifii soloma isimba sogololama waf dambaifii, epes gawaisi soloma isimba owa' gawaisia wapani.
45001015	Isimba atis dei' opaf ae'afi fosafel endilisi ma egawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi ma ipa' epes Romipai wapani.
45001016	Ae' ina ombal mahe ambal aola egawalipasa basef bu'wami Godi, owa'atin. Ae' ahapifa basef amamba bu'wami banagewe a'owa'. Dei' main, amamba banagami Godi mofa' epes mamahisa sagahapifanai sogotanimai. Esis Juda sahapifi sali' ipa' hipai owa' Judaipaia pagi'.
45001017	Dei' main, basef amamba bu'wami Godi mihimba'mepa waf usi'ifi ananifi. Afamba na'amba. I'i apa' mohapifa Jisas banagepa atapipa, God ni'i apa' be'epa hilili'i. Ina ano'w ufia'w daia'wa apa' mogataga be'epa hilili' ma nogohnaep ananisi, owa'atin. Hapif atin. Ufia'w si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Epen ami nigahapifa Godi, anen ni'i anin bu'wani hilili'i ea' nepe namin atapin dondol.”
45001018	Dei' a' anaf owagama wapani okom numbutinai Godi nifi'i heven notaga nondawalap atapina ma waf hiafi awafi epes sanda'afi hi'ilaf. Anen nogwamasa akafimi awami ma epes isimba hiasi sogowa' alafugaha waf bu'wafi ananifi sanda' waf awafii dei' sagataloga basef endilisifi ananifi.
45001019	Dei' main, waf hiafi Godi ina fandambaho', owa'atin. Waf mamahefa dondo' ma gawa epesi God a' nihimba'masaf fataga alihif fandawalapa.
45001020	Fowa' dambadamba God nanda' hiahaom hiami nogota atamba tafi'i tataga dei', esis sati hiahaom anen nanda'ami. Hiahaom amamba esis ilama sogogawa ma anef waf hiafi Godi esis owa' la'ifisa sogatelef naepia. Isimba na'amba. Esis satelef endilisi waf Godi kofagefa, anen dembinai nikila' amom dembami hiami magape itapi hi'alam. Esis sati waf afamba faloma banagami lu'wami ananimi magape lifilafi dondoli. Ea' isimba atis dei' esis ina ano'w ufia'wa sondahali' sombaho' waf awafi asasifi soga'i, “Ae' owa' egawaea.” Owa'atin.
45001021	Esis sogawa God nape, apa' esis ina sogawa sa'i anen bu'unai endilisi ma sofela agol ananigili lu'wagol a'a soganifelona, owa'atin. Ukup asasimi mandapoma hiahaom falafalafumi atom ea' nelelemb asasimi ina mataga andeande', owa'. Mataga akutim awasim a'owa'.
45001022	Esis aligah maso'as sa'ias sa'i, “Apa' mogogawai,” apa' owa' esis sataga ukup mahamahasa waf bu'wafi.
45001023	Ea' saso'ana alafugah God owa' nogaga'ia, ina sanda' lotumana sanifelona, owa'atin. Sandomba lawah otamba maim falafumi atom mataga god baso'amunai mandati si'i amiguf, mafis uguf maim maloma epes owa' sogape namis atapisia, ea' sanda' lotumam sanifelom.
45001024	Esis sandaiwa'ma God sowa' alafugahana. Isimba atis dei' anen nakwaha esis ea' ukup asasipi pehafel banagambel pahokolas sanda' waf hiafi alugufi. Sanda so'a waolaf sahambombaga alop asasipi.
45001025	Dei' main, esis ukup paso'asa basef Godi endilisifi a sagi'ma basef baso'ami atom maho'ofa basef endilisifi ananifi. Ea' sanda' lotuma hiahaom amamba God nanda'ami, apa' anen, sosambalona. God anen bu'unai kofagonama hiahaom amamba hiami, apa' mondasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol lifilafi endilisi.
45001026	-
45001027	Ea' God nakwaha esis saila ukup epesi atipa sanda' waf awafi ambagof awagufafi. Sanda' waf afamba awafi faha'ofa waf daso'amaifi. Nematawa waila waf ikiakafi waloma anowa daiawa. Anom amam wapani manda'am na'amba atin. Ukup amamipi pehafel a'owa' pa'ipa'i amam daiam ama molomam monda' waf awafi. Ea' waf afambai fahambombaga ukup paloma alop amamisi dindi'i dondo' fagwa waf awafi amamifi.
45001028	Ukup asasipi atip pandaiwa'ma sogahapifa God nomonas asasisi. Isimba atis dei' nape natitilis saila nomonas awami asasimi atoma sanda' waf naninani aunai owa' andeande'ma epes sonda'anaia.
45001029	-
45001030	Esis sanda' waf hiafi fafifafi awafi fape si'ifa esis. Ukup pehafel pa'ipa'i sogofa' hiahaom hiami ma esis atis. Waf awafi agufifa afamba. Ukup kowagalepa hiahaom bu'wami awami, ukup numbutipa sogaha anis, saha anis daias sagaga', migimigah sambaso'ama sogofa' anom hiahaom anin epeni dowadowafa, ea' sanda' maola sagahambombaga epes. Waf anamba aunai asi'ina endilisi ma esis. Ea' sanda'i'ipamas sa'i basef sawalapefa sogola'asa agof anis daiasi ma nogohnaep epes hiasii. Esis sataga bousi saloma God, gigal sa'oh sa'i digah lu'wami atom, sola'asa basef banagafi sagasa'ma agof asasigufi atogof. Ukup pandanda' ma waf naninani aunai dambainai. Ea' sosambala basef mamasasi.
45001031	Esis sololama gawa bu'wani ma waf bu'wafi ea' sa'i basef andeande', apa' ina saila basef fimba asasifi datima, owa'. Esis ina ukup paipaila anis daias satilis uwahipis, owa'atin.
45001032	Basefa mu'uli Godi usi'ini na'amba na'i, “Epes sanda' waf na'ambainai esis a' sondaga'.” Epes isimba sogawa mu'uli inimba, apa' owa'atin. Sandanda' waf afamba awafi atef. Apa' ina sanda'af dowadowaf, owa'atin. Sasa'ma agofa anis daias sanda' waf awafi na'ambai sandagalas.
45002001	Ipa' mamahipama pa'i basef pagawaloga anis daiasi, atiasi kofagema ipe'imi atom. Peme', ipa' pa'i basef pagawaloga anis epes daiasi, waf afambai ipa' pandawaloga ipa' atipa. Dei' main, isimba ipa' pa'i basef pagawalogasi, ina' sanda' waf awafii.
45002002	Apa' mogawa God nonda' kotima epes sanda' waf afambai awafi ma basef usi'ifi atef.
45002003	Apa' epen ina' nagasapaga anis epes deideiasi sanda' waf fafifafi na'ambaifii, epen ina' nanda' waf afambaii. Dei' ina' okom mandanda' ma'imama? Ina' atiasi la'ifinama nindihi'ama basef God nonda' kotimasafi nefa' negafe'? Owa'atin endilisi.
45002004	God nanda'ena andeande' a'owa', ea' ata' nape nasasaena nogota lautai, ina nagwamena waf awafi nase'ena akafimi kwafalis, owa'atin. Waf afamba bu'wafi Godi ina' okom mandanda'maf na'i falafifi? Anen nanda'mena waf afamba bu'wafi ma ata' negambema nembel. A'i ina' negawaf a'a owa'?
45002005	Ina' nanda' du'wanigai ea' dei' ina ata' nembema nembel, owa'. Ina' natama akafimi lu'wami nikikama ina' atina. Ama nemaf okom numbutinai Godi notaga alihina ma kota, nogowaloga epes hiasi ma basef usi'ifi banagafi ananifi.
45002006	Nemaf afamba anen nowalogamasa waf epesi atona atin, nogwamasaf fendahama waf esis sanda'afi.
45002007	Anis sagape banages atapisa waf bu'wafi sanda' maol solaoma ufia'wa sogofa' agof lu'wagufi, sigati mogogala'i ma sogape andeande' lifilafi.
45002008	Apa' anis ukup pandapoma esis atis ea' sowa' alafugaha basef endilisifi saila waf ikiakafi. Epes isimba anaf God okom numbutina a'owa' nindaiwa'masa waf awafi asasifi.
45002009	Nimanimi lu'wami moloma akafimi anaf mupai' epes isimba hiasi sanda' waf awafii hi'ilas. Esis Juda sili' ea' isimba owa' Judaisia wapani sigi' solomas
45002010	Apa' God anaf noso'asa poe bu'wani ma mogogala'i agof lu'wagufi foloma opalef awanilifi epes isimba hiasi sanda' waf fasifii. Esis Juda sili' ea' isimba owa' Judaisia sigi'.
45002011	Dei' main, anen nowaloga epes hiasi ma ikwaf usi'ifi atef.
45002012	Anen okom mandanda' na'amba. Epes mamahisa sogololama mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani sanda' waf awafii, anaf a' higililas. Apa' epes Juda sogogawa mu'uli inimba ea'i ma dei' sanda' waf awafii, anaf nowalogasa mu'uli inimba atin.
45002013	Ina epes isimba sagame' mu'uli dowadowafi sataga bo'wes hilili'ma naep Godi, owa'atin. Epes mamahisa same' basefa sagaila mu'ulii, isimba atis anaf God ni'i esis bo'wes hilili'i.
45002014	Esis isimba sogololama Godi, waf asasifi na'amba. Esis mu'uli akas, apa' nemaf mamahefa sagaila malogofa nomon nelelemb asasimi, waf afamba a' fataga si'i mu'uli asasimi. Esis mu'uli Godi akas, apa' endilisi sailana waf afamba ma nelelemb asasimi.
45002015	Waf afamba asasifi fihimba'mapa basefa mu'uli inimba fagape ukup asasipi. Ea' malogof fagape opalef asasimi nomoni, amamba wapani mihimba'mapa na'amba atin. Dei' main, ukup asasipi pa'ias pihimba'mas alihif na'amba. Anif nimaguf panda' kotimasa waf awafi, apa' anif nimaguf andeande' dondo'ma waf esis sanda'afi.
45002016	Amamba anaf motaga na'amba atina nemaf afamba God nogawaloga waf hiafi epesi. Afamba anen ni'i ila ma Jisas Krais nope dembinai nogawaloga waf hiafi asasifi fandambahi'i feloma basef sa'if sagambaho'afi. Basef bu'wafi God ae' agawalapafi ifimba atif.
45002017	Ipa' pendefala pa'i ipa' Juda pagahipifa mu'uli inimba fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani sisihina negatopalopepa pindihi'ama okom wandafumi Godi. Ea' ipa' pandasa'ma agof ipe'igufi panda'i, “Apa' mogawa God endilisinai.”
45002018	Ea' ipa' pegawa okom God na'i pigagi'mami ma pegelafa waf mu'uli inimba ma ukup pi'i waf usi'ifi pigailaf.
45002019	Ipa' pegawa pa'i ipa' epes pegegawa basef Godi ma pigasindi'amona epes isimba naep pagaso'asi ea' pape si'i nagwapina epes isimba sagape akoti ma pigihimba'mas.
45002020	Ipa' epes gawaipai pagawalipa isimba gawa akasi saloma anis daias sogololama basef Godii sagape si'i awasi ata' sa'wisi. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa pa'i basef endilisifi hiafi faloma gawa hiani hi'alas sape mu'uli inimba pelafan pegegawani.
45002021	Basef ifimba atif hiafi fagali'i dei' fitanima fila ipa'. Ipa' pandawalipa anis epes daias, apa' ipa' owa' ata' pili' piwalipa ipa' atipaia? Ipa' pawalipasa basef anis pa'i, “Ipa' ina a' penda' wal, owa'i”, apa' ae' a'i ipa' wapani panda' wali?
45002022	Ipa' pawalipasa basef anis pa'i, “Ipa' ina a' pehambombaga waf daso'amaifi, owa'i.” Apa' owa' ipa' wapani panda' waf afambai awafi? Ipa' pandaiwa'ma god baso'amunai, apa' owa' apakwalopa hiahawes saga'oh ifagw epes sanda' lotuma god amamba baso'amii? Na'ambai ina andeande', owa'.
45002023	Ipa' pandasa'ma agof ipe'igufi atogof lu'wagof panda'i, “Apa' mogogawa mu'uli Godii nagaso' Mosesanii.” Apa' owa' ipa' pimbisila' mu'uli inimba panda' waf afambai atef dei' pahambombaga agol Godi.
45002024	Waf ipe'ifi awef si'i basef fagail buki fa'ias faga'i, “Kofagema ea' ipa' Judai atom, dei' esis owa' Judaisia sogololama Godi sa'i basef sanda' agol Godi findiwagol.”
45002025	Endilisi, i'i ipa' Juda pihapila mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani pilan endilisi, dao' waf afamba magatopa' alopafi bu'wafi. Apa' i'i ipa' pegawala mu'uli inimba, atiasi a' pelelama God petaga na'amba atin si'i ipa' owa' pegatopa' alopia.
45002026	Epes isimba owa' Judaisi sogatopa'mas alopia, esis sagape na'amba. I'i esis sila waf afamba hiafi usi'ifi ma mu'uli inimba, atiasi sotaga si'i isimba sagatopa'mas alopi ma naep Godi.
45002027	Endilisi, esis owa' Judaisia atiasi sola' basef mila ipa' Juda. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani nagape buki ea' patopa' alop ipe'ipi, apa' owa' ipa' pimbisila' basefa mu'uli inimba. Apa' esis isimba owa' Judaisi sogatopa' alopia saila basefa mu'uli inimba.
45002028	I'i ipa' epes Juda dowadowaf, ipa' ina Juda endilisipai, owa'. Ea' waf afamba sagatopa' alopafi ina waf alop atop si'ipi, owa'atin.
45002029	Ipa' epes hipai Juda. I'i opalef ipe'ilifi fetaga dambailif, ipa' Juda endilisi. Waf sagatopa' alopafi, God nanda'af opalef ipe'ilifi nomon. Maol inimba ina natagama basefa mu'uli nagail buki, owa'. Ambal bu'unai Ananinai atona nanda'an. Epen ami nenda'as na'ambai, anin agol akana nogohnaep epesi, owa'atin. Anin agol lu'wagola naep Godi atip.
45003001	Dei' esis Juda sikila' anis daias owa' Judaisia ma waf maif bu'wafi? Waf bu'wafi maif fatagama waf afamba magatopa' alopafi?
45003002	Awasi! Waf hiafi fasifi fatagaf. Waf fagali'i afamba. God nali' naso'asa basef ananifi endilisifi atif esis Juda ma sugumafif.
45003003	Endilisi, anis ina sahapifa basef ifimba andeande'. Owa' dei' ata' si'i main? A'i waf afamba awasifi asasifi atiasi fenda' God nokwaha basef endilisifi ananifi?
45003004	Owa'atin endilisi. Apa' mi'i basef monda'i, epes hiasi sagambaso'ami, apa' God atotona naga'i basef endilisi dondoli, nanda' maol datimai si'i Baibel naga'i, “Atiasi epes amam nematawa hiasi seme' basef ine'ifi si'i endilisifi atif. Nemaf afamba esis si'i sonda' kotimina, ina God atiasi nepa'agas nikila'as.”
45003005	-
45003006	Dei' i'ipipa anif basef apa' epes ukup paga'iefi. Basef ifimba na'amba. Dei' ata' mama? I'i waf awafi ape'ifi fawalapai waf usi'ifi Godi fataga alihifai, apa' atiasi mi'ias mi'imama? Mi'i God nanda' waf awafi okom wandafuma nogagwamapa waf awafi ape'ifi? Owa'atin endilisi. I'i God nonda' waf awafiai, dei' anen nowaloga waf amam nematawa hiasi ma main? Owa'atin endilisi.
45003007	Apa' anis epes ukup pandanda' dowaf sambaso'am sa'i, “I'i epes hiasi siti waf baso'afi awafi ape'ifi feloma waf Godi endilisifi ma sowalogaf, asogawa waf Godi fikila' waf ape'ifi. Ea' waf ape'ifi fawalapai agol Godi lu'wagol. Apa' na'ambaiai, God ina atiasi nogwamapa waf awafi ape'ifi, owa'atin.” Apa' owa'atin endilisi.
45003008	I'i apa' mila ukup ipimbai atip, mefe' mefe' mi'i, “Awi, apa' a' monda' waf awafi ma mugawalapai waf bu'wafi Godi.” Endilisi, anis epes sambaso'mas sa'i basef findiwaefa ae' sa'i ae' aga'ias na'amba. Apa' owa'atin. Epes isimba saga'i basef ifimbai, anaf God nogwamasa waf awafi asasifi dondo'af atin.
45003009	Dei' si'i main? Basef ifimba doko'ifi kofagefa fa'i main? Fa'i apa' Juda mikila' anis daias owa' Judaisia ma waf bu'wafi, a'a owa'? Owa'atin endilisi. Ae' ihimba'mepa basef ea', waf awafi faso'ala apa' hiapai hi'alapa, esis Juda saloma isimba sogololama basef Godi wapani.
45003010	Baibel na'i isimba na'amba na'i, “Ina anin epen bo'wen hilili' nape, owa'atin endilisi.
45003011	Ina anin epen negawa waf bu'wafi. Ina anin epen nanda' maol nelaoma God, owa'atin.
45003012	Epes hiasi sololama ufia'w ea' sataga epes awasis endilisi hi'alas. Aho', owa' anin atitin bo'wena.
45003013	Malogof asasimi mandahama si'i nowagah kwambifah sagawa epesa mindihianama alihim magape. Esis sa'i basef hiafi baso'afi faloma basef hiafi fafifafi ma sagahasopalo'wa anis epes daias, si'i nombot nagape uguf faha epes sagaga'i.
45003014	Dondol ukup asasipi numbutip a'owa' sa'i basef awami atoma sagaso'as nimanimi anis daias.
45003015	Esis kwafalis atisa sagaha anis daias sagaga'.
45003016	Dondol sahambombaga epes hiasi saso'asa akafimi nimanimi hiami.
45003017	Opalef asasilifi ina fape awanelefa sogape opalef atifilif sogaloma anis epes daias, owa'atin.
45003018	Esis ina ukup paipaila God ombal mahasana ma sogaila waf ananifi, owa'atin.”
45003019	Ea' dei' apa' mogawa basef mamahifa Godi fagape mu'uli anen nagaso' Moses ani fa'i apa' Juda mogape lafelani inimbai mondailan. Owa' ina la'ifipa mailan andeande', owa'. Ea' ina anin epen la'ifina niga'i, “Ae' epen bo'owe hilili'i,” Owa'atin. Apa' epes hiapai ganimba hiagoma, kofagema mapoma apa' ma naep Godi anaf nogawalogapa.
45003020	Dei' main, waf afamba mogaila mu'uli inimba, owa' anin epen atitin atiasi negefa' agol epen bo'wen hilili' ma naep Godia, owa'. Mu'uli inimba nihimba'mapa waf awafi ape'ifi ea'.
45003021	Apa' dei' waf usi'ifi Godi ea' fataga alihigima fandawalap. Afamba ina fataga fagi'ma waf sanda' maol sa'i sogaila mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani, owa'atin. Afamba fataga ano'w ufia'w na'amba. Basef hiafi Godi fagail Buki fawalapai waf afamba. Anif fail mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani ea' anif amom profet hiami manda'afi.
45003022	Waf afamba na'amba. Epen nagahapifa Jisas Kraisi, inimba God nofalan na'i epen bo'wen hilili'i. Ea' apa' epes hiapai mogahapilafi hi'alapa, God nanda'apa na'amba atin, esis Juda saloma isimba owa' Judaisia wapani.
45003023	Apa' epes hiapai hi'alapa manda' waf awafi mumbisila' mu'uli Godi ea' ina la'ifipama atiasi mogati mogogala'i bu'wami ananimi, owa'atin.
45003024	Apa' owa' God nati apa' uwahipipa, natopalopapa dowaf. Apa' mahapifa Krais Jisas ea' God na'i apa' bu'upai. Apa' ina maso'ana anis maefah matalona, owa'atin. Anen natopalopapa ma Krais Jisas ea' natagwahepa natalepa ma mogape wahifipa.
45003025	God nihimba'masana alihina amam nematawa hiasi na'amba. Anen naga' esimbel ananimbeli balo bali'amona okom wandafunai Godi ma bagakwaha waf awafi epes mamahisa sagahapifanai. Ga' Krais Jisasi atin dei' God nihimba'mapa waf ananifi usi'ifi hilili'i na'amba. Fowa' nanda' esis amam nematawa sa'ombemas ea' ina nogwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'afi, owa'.
45003026	Apa' dei' dao', anen nihimba'mapa waf usi'ifi ananifi ea' fataga alihigima ma nogagwamasa waf awafi asasifi. Isimba atis dei' apa' mogawa anen usi'ina hilili' hi'agalanai ma noga'i epes mamahisa sogahapifa Jisasi bo'wes hilili'i.
45003027	Ea' dei' apa' ufia'w akapa ma mogasa'ma agof ape'igufi atogof lu'wagof, owa'atin. Ufia'w akwamba ea' kwaso'. Main da'im mahefa ufia'w akwamba? A'i waf afamba magaila mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani? Owa'atin endilisi! Waf magahapifa Jisasafi atef fahefa ufia'w akwamba.
45003028	Ea' apa' mogawa epes mamahisa sagahapifa Jisas atini, God na'i esis atis sataga bo'wes hilili', apa' esis sanda' maola sogaila mu'uli inimbai, owa'atin.
45003029	Dei' mama? A'i God anen Dembinai esis Judai atona? Owa'atin. Anen esis isimba owa' Judaisia wapani.
45003030	Dei' main, God anen ea' anamba atona. Anen na'i basef atifif fafe'ma epes hiasi. Epes ami sogahapifa Krais Jisasi, atiasi God ni'i esis isimba bo'wes hilili'i, esis Juda saloma isimba owa' Judaisia wapani.
45003031	Isimba atis dei' hapif inimba apa' ina mi'i apa' mapa'aga mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani, owa'atin endilisi! Apa' mahapifa Krais Jisas dei' mawalapa basef kofagefa ma mu'uli inimba.
45004001	Apa' mi'i basefa Abraham akunamapa apa' Judai mi'imama? Anen nanda' maina God naga'i anen bu'unai?
45004002	I'i Abraham a' endilisi ma nonda' maol bu'wani ma dei' nagataga aman bo'ona hilili'ai, dao' anen a' nondagala nosa'ma agol ananigili atogol lu'wagol. Apa' naep Godi owa'.
45004003	Baibel na'ias na'imama? Naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Abraham nahapifa God ea' okom mandanda'ma hapif inimba na'i anen bo'ona hilili'.”
45004004	Apa' mogawa epes sanda' maoli ma sogofa' hiahawesa maoli, hiahawes isimba ina mi'ias mi'i mogofa'as dowaf si'i preseni, owa'atin. Isimba hiahawes sagatopa' maolasi atis.
45004005	Apa' God ina nati maol bu'wani epes sanda'ani ma niga'i esis bu'wasi, owa'atin. Anen nati epen mamahina nagahapifana la'ifinai ma nogofala epes sanda' waf awafii bo'wes hilili'i. Ea' God okom mandanda'ma okom epeni maga'i endilisi atis epen inimbai dei' na'i anin bo'wen hilili'i.
45004006	Fowa' Devit wapani nanda' anif basef fail buk Baibela epes mamahisa God natilis naga'i bo'wes hilili'i, isimba a sandagala. Esis ina sanda' maol, owa'. Sahapifana atin dei' na'i esis bo'wes hilili'.
45004007	Devit nanda' basef ifimba na'i, “Epes ami God nagakwaha waf awafi asasifi okom magaso'anafi ma nagaofana awami asasimi, epes isimba sonahas.
45004008	Epes ami Dembinai owa' okom mopoma waf awafi asasifia, isimba sonahas.”
45004009	Epes isimba Devit na'i sonagahasi, epes isimba sagatopa' alopi atis? Owa'atin. Isimba owa' sogatopa' alopia wapani. Dei' main, doko' ae' a'ipipa Baibel naga'i na'amba na'i, “Abraham nahapifa God, ea' God okom mandanda' ma hapif inimba na'i anen bo'ona hilili'.”
45004010	Dei' Abraham nape si'i maina God okom mapomana naga'i aman bu'unai hilili'i? Anen nali' natopa' alop ea' a'a ata' owa' ata' notopa' alopa? Anen ina dei' natopa' alopa God naga'i anen bo'ona hilili'i, ata' owa'atin.
45004011	Fowa' Abraham nali' nahapifa God nofalana epen bu'unai hilili'i. Ama main, nagi' natopa' alop. Waf afamba nagatopa' alopafi anol ametal God nihimba'mana na'amba na'i nemaf afamba ata' owa' notopa' alopa, a' na'i anen aman bu'unai nagahapifa Godi. Isimba atis dei' anen nataga akunama epes hiasi nagahapifa Godi owa' sogatopa' alopia. Esis sahapifa God atin, nofalas epes bu'wasi.
45004012	Ea' anen akunama epes isimba Juda sagatopa' alopi wapani. Apa' esis ina satopa' alop atop, owa'. Esis sagi'ma bo'wagah Abrahami sahapifa God si'i fowa' anen nagahapifana nogota atamba ata' owa' nogatopa' alopa.
45004013	Fowa' gani God na'i basef nala' lap nagaloma Abraham na'i, “Ae' anaf ese'ena itap hiagoma ina' neloma esis bafasena akusena ine'isi wapani.” Apa' Abraham ina naila mu'uli anaf God nogaso' Mosesani ma dei' God nala' lap nalomana naga'ipana basef ifimba, ata' owa'atin. Abraham nali' nahapifa God dei' nofalana aman bo'ona hilili'i na'ipana basef ifimba.
45004014	Anif basef fatopalopa ifimba fagali'i na'amba fa'i, I'i epes sagaila mu'uli mamahina Godi ma sofa' hiahaom amamba God nogaso'asamiai atiasi waf afamba mogahapifa Godafi a' fenalo ea' basef ifimba lapafi Godi wapani a' owa' banagefa, ea' owa'atin.
45004015	Dei' main, mu'uli inimba nigihimba'mapa okom numbutimi Godi ma nogaso'as akafimi isimba sogasambala mu'uli inimbai. I'i apa' owa' mila basefa mu'uli inimbaia, God okom wandafuna nopomapa. I'i mu'uli inimba owa'ai, God ina a' ni'i epes sumbisila' mu'uli inimba satopa'an, owa'atin.
45004016	Abraham nahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' God na'ipana basef ifimba lapafi bu'wafi ma apa' mogogawa endilisi God na'ipas basef ifimba wapani na'i apa' hiapai bafapa Abrahami, naso'apaef dowaf si'i presen. Ina naso'asef epes isimba sagaila mu'uli inimba atini, owa'. Epes mamahisa sagahapifa God na'amba atin si'i Abrahami, esis wapani. Anen nali' nahapifa God nataga bafamapa nali' naumb nagali'i ma apa' hiapai mamahepama dei' magi' magahapifa Godi.
45004017	Si'i Baibel naga'i, God fowa' na'ipa Abraham naga'i, “Ae' enda'ena nepe bafama isimba misi'ah epes hiasii.” Abraham anen bafamapa ape'inai ma naep Godi. Anen nahapifa God atona nagaso'asa ambal namili epes sagaga'ii, a nogofala hiahawes hiasi ata' owa' sogatagaia si'i sataga sagape ea'i.
45004018	Abraham ina dei' nati hiahawes isimba God na'ipanas ea' na'i nonda'asi. Apa' owa', anen nahapilif endilisi si'i nagatilis ea'i. Isimba atis dei' nataga “Bafama esis amam nematawa misi'ah hiasi.” Si'i fowa' God na'ias ea' naga'i, “Owagama esis mini'ap wambota ine'isi sogataga na'amba.”
45004019	-
45004020	Abraham hagona ea' felefele'ma afagof 100-pelaiguf alop ananipi a' pala'of si'i nagaga'i. Ea' waulu'mana Sera a' hage'w wapani asa'w ina la'ifi'wa kogola awasi, owa'. Abraham okom mapoma isimba, apa' okom ananimi banagami nogogawa God endilisi ina mowala, owa'atin. Anen nahapifa God banagambela basef God nagala' lapafi ma hiahawes anaf sigi' sogatagai.
