Hapif atin nanda'ana banagona ea' nafela agol Godi lu'wagol.
45004021	Anen nahapifa God endilisi ma nogogawa anen la'ifinai ma nonda'as na'amba si'i fowa' na'i nonda'asa basef ifimba nagala' lapafi.
45004022	Isimba atis dei' God a' okom mapoma hapif ananini ea' na'i, “Anen epen bo'ona hilili'i.”
45004023	Fowa' amom profet manda' basef ifimba fagape Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, “God okom mapoma anen epen bo'ona hilili'i.” Amom ina manda' basef ifimba ma Abraham atona, owa'atin.
45004024	Manda'efa apa' wapani. Apa' mahapifa God nasa'ma Jisas dembinai ape'inai nogosafel matmati. Isimba atis atiasi God okom mondanda'ma hapif ape'ini a' ni'i apa' be'epa hilili'i.
45004025	God nasapa' Jisas nafi'i naga'ma nagakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi. Ea' nasa'mana matmata noga'i apa' amam nematawa be'epa hilili'i.
45005001	Basef kofagefa fape fagali'i ifimba, hapif ape'ini atin dei' God nofalapa epes be'epa hilili'i. Isimba atis dei' Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nanda'apa mape opalef atelef awanelef maloma God.
45005002	Anen atona ufia'wa apa' mahapifana mogape nomona okom Godi magamagaila apa' a'owa'i, natopalopapa dowaf nambemapai dei' magape andeande'mami. Apa' mogawa endilisi mape mohafa anaf God nofa'apa mope molomana mugati mogogala'i ananimi. Hapif inimba nanda'apa sonahapa ma amamba.
45005003	Apa' ina sonahapama amamba atom, owa'atin. Apa' sonahapama nimanimi mogatagamapa wapani. Dei' main, apa' mogawa mofa'ama mogowa' banagapa wapani.
45005004	I'i apa' mulutu banagepama gwamba, God niga'i aho'mapai. Isimba atis dei' apa' mogawa endilisi anen nigaila basef ananifi datimai ma notopalopapa mope mogohafa' mogogala'i banagami ananimi anaf mogatagai.
45005005	I'i apa' mogawa endilisi na'amba, gawa ape'ini ina atiasi nenalo, owa'. Dei' main, God naso'apa Ambal bu'unai Ananinai ea' waf okom magamagailapafi fape lu'ufa opalef ape'ilifi.
45005006	Fowa' apa' ina banagepa ma monda' waf bu'wafi, owa', nogota atamba God nandandepata ea'i, Krais naga'ma apa' mogowa' alafugaha Godi.
45005007	Ipa' ukup pandanda' pa'imama? Anin epen na'i nega'ma negatopalopa epen ami na'i nigaila mu'uli Godi, a'a owa'? A'i atiasi ina anis si'i aho', owa'atin. Apa' i'i anin epen bo'wen hilili'i, dao' anin ila ma nega' negatopalopa epen inimba bu'wani.
45005008	Apa' ata' manda' waf awafi atin, Krais naga' natopalopapa. Ea' dei' God nihimba'mapa okom lu'unai naganagaila ape'i nandawalap. Krais a nikila' epen inimba bo'wen hilili'i naga' natopalopapa.
45005009	Anen naga' esimbel ananimbeli balo dei' God nofalapa amam nematawa be'epa hilili'i. Isimba atis dei' apa' a' mogawa endilisi atis Krais natagwahepa ma okom wandafunai Godi.
45005010	Fowa' apa' ata' mape boupai Godi, owa' dei' nanda'apa mataga alipipai ananipai opalef atifilif malomana. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma Nogamana ananinai nagaga'ma apa'. Isimba atis dei' apa' mape alipipai Godi mogawa endilisi Krais nape namona ma dei' motanima molomana sisihipa mogape.
45005011	Apa' ina isimba atis, owa'. Apa' mondagala ma God. Dei' main? Fowa' apa' boupai ma anen apa' dei' Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nali'amona naumbih ape'imi nanda'apa mataga alipipai malomana. Ea' dei' sonahapama anen.
45005012	Apa' mogawa isimba. Aman atotona nali' nanda' waf awafi, dei' waf awafi fape nelelemb amam nematawa itapasi. Ea' dei' waf awafi fahokolai ga' nafi'i, dei' ga' nefa' epes hiasi hi'alas saga'. Dei' main, epes hiasi ea' sanda' waf awafi hi'alas.
45005013	Fowa' gani nogota atamba God ata' owa' noso'anai mu'uli ananini Mosesa, waf awafi fali' fataga fape itap ana'e. Apa' i'i basefa mu'uli inimba owa'atinai, dei' God ina a' nowaloga epesa waf awafi asasifi, owa'atin.
45005014	Apa' ga' nataga nape nogota atamba Adami nafi'i nataga nogota Mosesi. Epes isimba hiasi ina sogawa mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani, owa'atin. Apa' owa' ga' nahapilas sisihis hi'alas. Fowa' God naso'ana mu'uli ananini Adam, owa' Adam natolapan. Anis epes daias ina sumbisila'an si'i Adam nagatolapan, owa'. Apa' ga' nahapilas wapani. Aman anamba Adam nondola'waifa aman anamba Dembinai atona nigi' nogatagai.
45005015	Waf God nagatopalopapa dowafafi ma Jisas Kraisi faloma waf awafi Adam nanda'afi, ina na'amba atin, owa'atin endilisi. Aman anamba Adam atotona nanda' waf awafi, dei' nanda' epes hiasi saga'. Apa' God nagatopalopapa dowafi, amamba mataga lu'um a'owa' ma aman atotona Jisas Krais. Ea' apa' dei' mofa' hiahawes isimba presen Godi nikila' ga' inimba ea' nataga lu'una a'owa' ma nagatopalopa epes hiasi.
45005016	Waf bu'wafi God nagatopalopapa dowafafi afamba ina fape atogon faloma waf awafi aman anamba atotona nanda'afi, owa'atin endilisi. Aman anamba nanda' waf atetef awafi. Ea' God nawaloga apa' epes hiapai na'i, “Ipa' awepa hi'alepa a'owa'.” Apa' manda' waf awafi hiafi apa' God okom maimailapa natopalopapa dowaf ea' na'i apa' epes be'epa hilili'i.
45005017	Aman anamba atotona nanda' waf awafi. Isimba atis dei' ga' nesafel nowalo' epes hiasi hi'alasa anen atona. Apa' maol aman anamba atotona Jisas Kraisi a' lu'win banagen a'owa' nikila' ga' ma nagatopalopa epes mamahisa God natopalopas dowafa sogofa' waf usi'ifi hilili'i, epes isimba atiasi sope namisa sogape dembesi.
45005018	Dei' apa' magape na'amba. Fowa' waf awafi atetef fanda' apa' hiapai higilalapa hi'alapa. Ea' na'amba atin waf usi'ifi atetef fatagwahepa ma waf awafi fanda'apa dei' mape namepa.
45005019	Aman atotona nosambala basef Godi dei' apa' hiapai mape manda' waf awafi. Ea' na'amba atin aman bu'unai atotona naila basef ifimba, dei' apa' hiapai motaga usi'ipa hilili' ma naep Godi.
45005020	Ama main, mu'uli inimba God nogaso' Mosesani natagama esis sogogawa waf asasifi awafi sagatopa' mu'uli inimba. Apa' esis ina sakwaha waf afamba awafi, owa'atin. Sanda'af hiafi a'owa'. Apa' owa', ufia'w God nagatopalopa esisa'w dowafi kwataga lu'ukw a'owa' ma esis.
45005021	Fowa' waf awafi fataga fape ilifa apa' hiapai dei' maga'. Apa' dei' waf God nagatopalopapa dowafafi fape ilif a'owa' fikila'. Anen natopalopapa ea' nofalapa amam nematawa usi'ipa hilili'i ma mogofa' ambal namili lagape lifilafi dondoli ma dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais.
45006001	Ea' dei' apa' monda' basef maif wapani? Apa' mondanda' waf awafi atapipa ma atiasi waf God nogatopalopapa dowafafi fegataga lu'wif a'owa'? Apa' mi'ias na'amba a'a owa'?
45006002	Owa'atin endilisi! Waf awafi atef, dei' apa' maga' ea'. Dei' maina apa' ata' magafe' waf afambai awafi atef? Owa'atin, hapaifi.
45006003	Ipa' pegawa apa' mamahepama mogofa' sa'ofa magape mandaloma sisihipama Krais Jisasi ea' mofa' sa'of maloma ga' ananini.
45006004	Sa'of inimba apa' mandaloma sisihipa maloma ga' Jisasi, God nawapa maloma Krais matmat. Banagami fasimi ahamanai atom masa'ma Krais nosafel matmat. Ea' na'amba atina apa' mosafel wapani mape banagepa mogafe' waf dambaifi ma ambal namili itap apa'e.
45006005	Apa' mandaloma endilisi tatala'ipa maloma anona ga' inimba ananini si'i anen nagaga'. Ea' na'amba atin anaf mondaloma tatala'ipa mosafel wapani molomana.
45006006	Apa' mogawa opalef apimi ape'imi amamba maga' mail lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai maloma Krais ea' God natalogofa banagami waf aunai manda' maol magape alop ape'ipii. Isimba atis dei' waf awafi ina fawasi'apa sisihipa wapani, owa'.
45006007	Dei' main, anona aman nagaga'i, waf awafi ina ata' fahapilana sisihina wapani, owa'.
45006008	Aho', apa' maga' maloma Krais. Ea' mogawa endilisi atiasi mope ambal namili molomana wapani.
45006009	Apa' mogawa God nasa'ma Krais nosafel matmat ea'. Isimba atis anen ina atiasi noga' wapani, owa'. Ga' ina banagen a'owa' negatalogofa anen, owa'atin.
45006010	Anen naga' atetef ea' ma'um. Ga' inimba atin anen nahambombaga banagami amamba waf awafii mowala hi'alam. Anen dei' nape ambal namili naila okom Godi atom.
45006011	Ea' na'amba atina ipa' wapani a' ukup pendapoma ipa' atipa paga' ea' pakwaha waf awafi si'i sagaga'i. Ipa' ukup pendapoma ipa' ea' pape sisihipa paloma Krais Jisas pape namipa paloma God.
45006012	Ipa' ina pi'i aho'ma waf awafi fepe fetaga banagef femafi ipa', owa'i. Na'amba waf afamba awafi fehende'epa a pila waf alop atopafi.
45006013	Ipa' ina peso' lagof bo'wagah ipe'isi sefe'ma penda' waf awafi, owa'i. Pendaso'anas God atona soloma nomonas ukup ipe'isi hi'indalasa anen atona si'i epes sotanima sogosafel matmat wapani sagape namis. Ea' ipa' pese'ana alop du'wa'wanipi hi'indalapa Goda penda' waf usi'ifi.
45006014	Ipa' pegawa waf aunai ina ata' nope lu'unama ipa' wapani, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' dei' ina ata' pape lafela mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani ma pigailan, owa'atin. Ipa' apape lafela ufia'w Godi ato'w okom maimailapa ma nagatopalopapa dowaf.
45006015	Ea' dei' apa' ata' monda'as mi'imama? Apa' ina mape lafela mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani, owa'atin. Apa' dei' mape lafela ufia'w akwamba God nagatopalopapa dowafa'wi. Ea' dei' apa' monda' waf awafi a'a owa'? Owa'atin endilisi!
45006016	I'i ipa' peso' ipa' atipa penda' maol pepe lafela aman ami, ipa' pape sisihipama anen atona. I'i ipa' peso' opalefa waf awafi, ipa' pape lafela waf afamba fawasi'ipa sisihipa paga'. Apa' i'i ipa' peso' opalefa waf bu'wafi, dao' pape lafela God pataga usi'ipa hilili' ma naep ananipi.
45006017	Endilisi, fowa' ipa' pape lafela waf awafi fawasi'ipa sisihipa. Owa' God nanda'epa pape lafela basef ananifi pailif ea' paso'ana ukup nelelemb hi'alasa pagaila basef ifimba endilisifi ipa' pigalafafi. Ea' apa' mundanifela God.
45006018	Anen natagwahipa ma banagami waf awafii, dei' pataga epes panda' maol pape lafela waf usi'ifi fawasi'ipa sisihipa.
45006019	Ukup ipe'ipi ina dei' banagep, owa'. Isimba atis dei' aila ukup apa' epesi a'ias alihis a'i. Fowa' ipa' ata' paso' alop ipe'ipi du'wa'wanip pape lafela waf awasif alugufi faloma waf hiafi sogosambala mu'uliefi ea' fawasi'ipa sisihipa. Apa' dei' peso' alop wa'awa'api hi'ilap pondafe'ma waf usi'ifi fiwasi'ipa sisihipa ma pegape Godi atipa si'ipa.
45006020	Fowa' ipa' ata' pape lafela waf awafi fawasi'ipa sisihipa ea' nogota atamba ipa' ata' pape pelelama waf usi'ifi.
45006021	Ipa' pefa' hiahawes mais fasisi ma waf awafi fowa' panda'afi, ma dei' ipa' ambagof awagufafi? Owa'atin. Waf afambai fagawalapai ga' atini.
45006022	Owa' dei' God natagwahipa ea' ma waf awafi nanda'epa pape panda' maola anen pape lafelana atapipa. Maol inimba atiasi netaga nela gwa'aisi isimba. Ipa' pepe be'epa hilili' ananipai atipa ma pegefa' ambal namili andeande' dondol lifilafi.
45006023	Waf awafi fagwamasa awami ma isimba sanda' maola waf awafii. Awami amamba. Esis atiasi soga' atin higililas. Apa' God dei' naso'apai presen fasini dowaf, inimba ambal namili lagape dondoli ma mope sisihipa mogoloma Krais Jisas.
45007001	Ipa' alipipai, ipa' pegawa mu'uli ma waf daso'amaifi ea'. Ea' pegawa andeande'ma basef ifimba dei' iga'ipipafi. Nogota atamba epen ata' nagape namin, anin ata' nape lafela mu'uli inimba.
45007002	Basef kofagefa ma mu'uli inimba ifimba. I'i ano'w nemata'w kwagaso' amani, ma anen ata' nogape namona, mu'uli inimba ata' newa'ana naloma ako'w ata' sape sisihis. Apa' i'i waulunama'w nogaga', dao' mu'uli inimba nagahapilasi pele'atan kwape wahifi'w.
45007003	Ea' i'i anen aman ata' nope ambal lapaona ma waulu'mana kofe' kogaso' anona aman daiana, ea' sofala'w si'i ako'w kwanda' waf awafi so'a waola anona aman daianai. Apa' i'i aman akwa'unai nogaga', mu'uli inimba ina ata' nahapilas sisihis wapani, a' owa'. Ako'w kwandatagwah kwape wahifi'w. Esis ina si'i basefa ako'w si'i ako'w kwanda' so'a wauli, owa'atin.
45007004	Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ae' a'i i'ipipa basef ifimba kofagefa. Apa' hiapai mape sisihipa maloma Krais ea' isimba atis dei' maga' ea'. Dei' mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani ina ata' nahapilapa sisihipa wapani, a' owa'. Apa' ea' mape sisihipama anona aman God naso'mana nogosafel matmat wapanii ea' monda' maol ananini atin.
45007005	Fowa' ata' magape atapipa opalef apimi, mu'uli inimba nafilai ukup awami ma alop ape'ipi. Ea' manda' maola waf awafi fataga ma ga' atin.
45007006	Apa' dei' maga' maloma Krais makwaha hiahaom magahapilapa sisihipai. Ea' mu'uli inimba ina ata' newa'apa wapani, owa'atin. Mape wahifipa. Dei' apa' ina ata' manda' maol maila mu'uli inimba amom manda'an nagail buki, owa'atin. Apa' manda' maola waf dambaifi Ambal bu'unai Godi nanda'afi.
45007007	Dei' apa' ata' mi'ias mi'imama? Mi'i mu'uli atin waf awafini a'a owa'? Owa'atin endilisi! Mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani nihimba'me waf maif awafi kofagefa ma egegawaf. Waf afamba kowagalasafi fagape na'amba. Mu'uli inimba naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Ina kowolena ma anis hiahawes anona amani, owa'i.” I'i mu'uli inimba owa' nihimba'me na'ambaea, ae' ina egawa waf awafi kowagalasafi. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
45007008	Mu'uli inimba si'i ano'w ufia'wa waf awafi fagasa'mai okom naninani nanda' ae' kowagalema hiahaom hiami. Apa' mu'uli inimba owa'atinai, waf awafi si'i fagaga'i atef.
45007009	-
45007010	Fowa' gani mu'uli inimba ata' owa', nogota atamba ata' ape okom mase'e elelama waf awafi. A'i owa' main owa', basef kofagefa ma mu'uli inimba fafi'mai ae' ea' waf awafi fesafel fafe' ambal ae'ali ea' fahe aga'ma mu'uli inimba. Doko' li' God nanda' mu'uli ananini ma nogase'e ambal namili owa', ae' ina' efa' ambal namilima mu'uli inimbai, owa'. Anin nahe andaga' atin.
45007011	Dei' main, waf awafi fasopama ufia'wa mu'uli inimba ea' fambaso'me. Mu'uli inimba nasa'ma okoma ae' nihimba'me waf awafi fahe aga'.
45007012	Ea' apa' mogawa mu'uli atin, anin bo'wen hilili'i. Basef ifimba hiafi fagape mu'uli inimbai wapani be'ef hilili'i.
45007013	Dei' a' main wapani? A'i mu'uli inimba fasini nahe aga'? Owa'atin endilisi! Waf awafi atef fahe aga'. Apa' hiahawes isimba si'i ano'w ufia'wa waf awafi fahe agaga'i ma waf afamba awafi kofagefa fetaga fendawalap. Ea' mu'uli inimba nihimba'mapa waf awafi kofagefa, afamba ea' awef endilisi a'owa'.
45007014	Apa' mogawa mu'uli inimba nafi'i Ambal bu'unai Godi nihimba'mapa okom ananimi. Apa' ae' okom apinai nape ina aila okom Godi, owa'. Waf awafi fala'atae anda' maola waf anamba aunai.
45007015	Apa' dei' ae' ina egawa waf kofagefa anda'afi, owa'. Waf ae' okom ma'ima'iaf a'i enda'afi, afamba ina anda'af, owa'.
45007016	Okom ae'ami atom a'ias na'amba a'i aho'ma mu'uli inimba bu'wani ma eme'an igailan. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ina ailan, owa'. Atolapan anda' waf awafi andaiwa'ma enda'afi.
45007017	Apa' ina ae' atowe anda'an, owa'. Waf aunai nagape okom ae'anai nomoni, anamba atona nanda'am.
45007018	Ae' egawa okom ae'anai nomon, ina anom nomonas bu'wami mape, owa'. Opaf anamba apinai ae'anai atona nahambombage. Endilisi, ae' okom ma'i enda' waf fasifi atef, apa' owa'. Ina la'ifiwi anda'af, owa'.
45007019	-
45007020	Aho', waf fasifi okom ma'i enda'afi, afamba ina anda'af, owa'atin. Apa' waf awafi andaiwa'ma enda'afi, afamba atef anda'af. Ea' ae' egawa ina ae' ela okom anda' amamba, owa'atin. Waf awafi fagape opaf ae' nomoni, afamba atef fanda'e anda'am.
45007021	Isimba atis dei' ati waf na'ambaifi fape ae'. Okom ma'i enda' waf fasifi, apa' waf awafi fagape nomonas ae'ami anda'af.
45007022	Endilisi okom ae'ami ma'ima'i mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani a'owa' andagalaman.
45007023	Apa' owa', ati anef waf daiaf fape alop si'ip wa'awa'ap ae'api nomon. Ea' waf afamba fapa' faloma mu'uli inimba nagape okom ae'amii. Waf afamba atef fagape alop wa'awa'ap ae'apii fala'atae fanda'e anda' maola waf afamba awafi.
45007024	Ea' owahipiwi! Ae' epen dagala akai, okom nimanimiwai. Atiasi ami netagwahowe ma opaf apinai dei' nahe agaga'i?
45007025	Owa', ae' anifela God! Anen atona nanda' Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai natagwahowe ape wahifiwi. Dei' ape na'amba. Okom ae'ami atom, ape lafela mu'uli inimba, apa' opaf apinai ape lafela banagami waf awafii.
45008001	Basef ifimba fagali'i kofagefa ifimba. Apa' amam nematawa mape sisihipa magaloma Krais Jisasi, ina ata' anif basef dei' ma God nonda'mapa kota basef lu'wafi mogofa' akafimi ma waf awafi apa' manda'afi, owa'atin.
45008002	Dei' main, banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi nagaso'apa ambal namili ape'i, anen natagwahepa ma banagami waf awafii maloma banagami ga'i. Anen nanda'am na'amba ma Krais Jisas atona ea' mape sisihipama anen dei' mape wahifipa.
45008003	Maol mamahina mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani owa' banagena nenda'ania, God nanda'an. Dei' main, opalef apa' epesi pupulim, owa' banagema. Dei' God nanda' maol inimba na'amba. Nasapa'i Nogamana ananinai atona nafi'i nataga si'i apa' epes manda' waf awafii. Ama nokwahomapa waf awafi hi'ilaf okom mogaso'anaf dogw. Anen nafi'ima nogokwaha waf awafi apa' epesi feloma akafimi ma waf afamba ea' God naso'anam mapoma anen atona.
45008004	Anen nanda'am na'amba ma apa' mofe' mogaila waf be'ef usi'ifi fagape mu'uli inimbai. Dei' main, apa' dei' ina mafe' maila fe' inimba opalef apilifi, owa'. Mafe' maila fe' dambaini Ambal Godi.
45008005	Epes sagaila waf opalef apilifi sagafi'i, ukup asasipi pafe' talala' paila hiahaom amamba opalef apilifi fagafagailami. Apa' epes ami safe' sagaila Ambal bu'unai Godii, ukup asasipi pafe' talala' paila hiahaom okom Ambal bu'winai naga'iami atom.
45008006	I'i ukup epes isimbai pepoma hiahaom awami ma nelelemb apimi asasimi atom, amamba mawalapai ga' higiligalasani. Apa' epen ami nomonas ananisi sisihis sogapoma hiahawes Spirit Ambal Godi, epen inimba dei' nape ambal namili opaf fape awanef.
45008007	Epes mamahisa ukup pigaila waf opalef apimii, isimba sataga bousi Godi. Dei' main, esis ina sape lafela mu'uli hiani Godi, owa'. Ina banagesa sigaila mu'uli inimba, owa'atin.
45008008	Epes mamahisa sagape lafela waf opalef apilifii, epes isimba ina la'ifisa sonda' waf God okom maga'iafi, owa'atin.
45008009	Apa' i'i endilisi Ambal bu'unai Godi nupaipa, ipa' ina ata' pape lafela waf afamba apifi awafi ma nembel apinai, owa'. Ipa' pape lafela waf Ambal bu'unaii. Apa' epen ami Spirit Ambal Kraisi owa' nope anina, inimba ina epen Kraisi, owa'.
45008010	Waf awafi faha alop ipe'ipi ma atiasi pogaga'. Apa' i'i Krais nogape nomona ipa', Ambal ananinai nonda'epa pepe namipa.
45008011	Fowa' God nasa'ma Jisas notanima nosafel wandof. Ea' Ambal ananinai natopalopepa na'amba. Ipa' epes mamahipama Ambal bu'unai Godi nupaipa nomon, dao' a' nese'epa ambal namili alop ipe'ipi wapani. Ipa' pagaga' ea'i apa' owa', dei' anen nanda'epa pape namipa.
45008012	Ipa' alipipai ma wambota Kraisi, anif basef fagi'ma ifimba fa'i Krais natalepa ma maol lu'wani dei' apa' anof wiaf ata' fotaomapa ma mugaila okom Ambal bu'unai Godi. Apa' wiaf akapa ma mofe' mugaila opaf anamba apinai, owa'.
45008013	I'i ipa' pefe' pigaila waf afamba opaf apinaima, anaf apega'. Apa' i'i ipa' peha waf awafi ipe'ifi fega' ma banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi, dao' anaf apepe namipa.
45008014	Epes ami sagaila wafa Ambal bu'unai Godi, isimba dei' sape awasi Godi wambota ananisi.
45008015	Dei' main, ipa' ina pefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nahapilipa sisihipa si'i sanda' kalabusi ma ata' ombel mogahepa wapani, owa'atin. Ipa' apefa' Ambal bu'unai anamba nanda'epa pataga awasi Godi. Banagami Ambal bu'unai atom dei' mofalana ma'i, “Ahamapa! Ahamapa!”
45008016	Ambal bu'unai Godi atona nape sisihina apa' natopalopa ambagof ape'igufi ea' dei' mawalapa basef ma'if alihif, mape awasi Godi.
45008017	Apa' magape awasi Godii. Ea' anaf mofa' hiahaom Ahamapai moloma hiahaom anen nambe'ama Krais nugumafiami, mofa'am moloma Krais. I'i dei' apa' mofa' akafimi mogalomanama, anaf mofa' poe bu'wani endilisi nonda'apa mogala' molomana.
45008018	Ae' okom ma'i poe inimba bu'wani anaf netaga nendawalapa apa' gani heveni, inimba anaf nikila'am endilisi akafimi amamba apa' dei' mogofa'am nogota ata'i.
45008019	Hiahawes hiasi lu'wis sa'wis God nanda'asi saloma apa' epes wapani masa'ma balagah naep do' endilisi ea' mape masasa nogota ape'itai ma awasi Godi anaf sotaga sondawalap alihis.
45008020	Dei' hiahawes isimba lu'wis sa'wis saloma apa' epes ata' mape wafipa dowaf, maol akapa. Ina apa' atepa mola ukup manda'am mape, owa'atin. God atona nala'ambemapa mape lafela anen mape masasa hiahaom lu'wami anaf na'i nonda'ama ape'i.
45008021	Dei' hiahaom awami amamba hiami mowa' hiahawes God nanda'asi salomapa epes mawasi'apa manda'apa awepa folo'walapa. Apa' anaf God notofa hiahaom amamba awami ea' mofa' mogogala'i mupe wahifipa andeande', amamba God nandandepam magapoma wambota ananisii.
45008022	Apa' mogawa hiahawes hiasi lu'wis sa'wis God nanda'asi same' akafimi si'i nemata'w kwa'i kogola awani. Ea' hiahawes isimbai salef kwapete' sape safi'i sataga dei'.
45008023	Apa' ina hiahawes isimba atis, owa'atin. Fa'i apa' epes ananipai wapani, God okom ma'i anaf owagama notopalopapa ma mogape andeande'. Ea' dei' anen nali' naso'apa Ambal bu'unai ananinai. Ambal anamba naso'apana dowafi si'i presen. Ea' apa' wapani mame' akafimi kilef mape mohafa anef nemaf God notalepa ma mogataga si'i awasi ananipai, ma nemaf afamba nogaso'apa alop dambaipi namupi.
45008024	God nowambelapa dei' mahapifana mape mohafana nonda'apa mogataga endilisi dindi'i dondo' ma hiahaom amamba fasimi. Apa' hiahaom mape mogohafami ma magatolom ea'i, apa' ina ata' mope mohafam wapani, owa'. Apa' i'i anin epen nigati hiahawes isimba nape negehafasi ea', dei' maina ata' nepe negehafas wapani? Owa'atin.
45008025	Apa' hiahawes apa' ata' owa' mugatilisia apa' mogawa endilisi anaf mogofa'asi, na'amba apa' ukup banagep papoma isimba ea' mape mahafas.
45008026	-
45008027	Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi wapani nafi'i natopalopa apa' owa' banagipaia, nowa' banaga ukup ape'ipi. Nemaf mamahefa apa' ukup owa' banagepa mogawa basef ifimba mogahali'anaefia, Ambal ananinai nandabeten natopalopapa. Anen nandabeten, apa' anen ina na'i nandabeten nahali'ana ma anif basef, owa'. Nanda' e waa atin nandabeten. Ea' God, nogawa ukup epesi hi'alep, nogawa okom Ambal ananinai wapani. Dei' main, nemaf afamba Ambal ananinai nandabeten na'amba, anen naila okom Godi nandabetena apa' epes ananipai.
45008028	Hiahaom mamahoma ma'i mogatagamapai, bu'wami awami hiami, God nanda'am manda' maol atina mogatopalopa apa' epes ukup pagapagaila anini. Apa' epes isimba nogofalas ea'i ma sonda' maol sigaila okom ananimii.
45008029	Dei' main, epes isimba God fowa' nogogawas ea'i nosaho'asa sotaga sondati na'amba atin si'i Nogamana ananinai ma anen notaga nogape si'i sahomas dembinai ma esis sahin owan wambota ananisi.
45008030	Epes isimba fowa' nogosaho'as ea'i, anen nofalas wapani. Ea' isimba nogofalas ea'i, anen na'i esis epes usi'isi ma naep ananipi ea' naso'as banagami mogogala'i ananimi ma anaf sondati si'i anen.
45008031	Apa' mame' basefa hiahaom amamba bu'wami God nanda'mapami dei' muwatanif mi'imama? I'i God nogatopalopapa, dei' anaf ina anis la'ifisa sogohambombagapa, owa'atin endilisi.
45008032	Anen ina ombal mahanama nagaso'apai Nogamana ananinai, owa'atin. Anen nasapa'anai nafi'i ma nogatopalopa apa' hiapai. Na'amba dei' isimba endilisi atis anaf anen nogaso'apai anom hiahaom hiami wapani dowaf mugalumai anini.
45008033	Apa' epes nogosaho'apa ea'i, anaf epen ami ni'i apa' epes aupai manda' waf awafii? Owa'atin. God atona na'i apa' epes usi'ipai.
45008034	Anaf ina anis epes sofalapa si'i apa' epes aupai ma God nogagwamapa waf awafi ape'ifi, owa'atin. Dei' main, Krais Jisas naga' notanima nosafel wapani. Ea' anen nape wa'ol lagol kwahisigili Godi banagagoma ea' nandabetena nagatopalopapa wapani.
45008035	Anaf maim da'im melefatapa ma mogakwaha okom Kraisi magamagailapai? I'i nimanimi mogatagamapa ma mogofa' akafimi ma nolomohapa klos luwaguf mais akapa a anis sohapa sonda'apa awepa ma i'i hiahaom awami mi'i mogahambombagapa, ma anis sohapa mogaga', anaf hiahaom amambai melefatapa ma okom Kraisi magamagailapai? Owa'atin endilisi.
45008036	Endilisi, hiahaom na'ambaimi motagamapa si'i Baibel na'iam naga'i, “Apa' mape amam nematawa ine'ipai, isimba atis dei' nimaguf hiafi sa'i sohapa moga'. Satelepa si'i sipsipa sa'i sohapa mondaga' atin.”
45008037	Apa' hiahaom amambai hapaimi. Krais anen okom maimailapa a'owa' ea' dondol nowa' banagapa nanda'apa mikila' hiahaom amambai endilisi.
45008038	Aho' ae' egawa endilisi, ina anom maefah la'ifima anaf melefatapa ma okom lu'unai Godi, owa'atin. Nemaf mamahefa apa' moga' a'a mogape, anen okom maimailapa atapim. Amom ensel maloma banagami awami mamimami mape mugumafi itapi, opa'wal, ma'akw, naoh, ambagof awami mamimami wapani a hiahaom dei' magapani a anom anaf migi' mogatagai, banagami mamimami
45008039	a hiahaom banagami awami magape ilifi itap awini a anom hiahaom migi' mogafi'i, hiahaom amamba hiami ina anaf la'ifima megelefata apa'ma okom lu'unai Godi, owa'atin endilisi. Anen okom maimailapa atapina nihimba'mapa amamba ma Krais Jisas Dembinai ape'inai.
45009001	Basef ifimba ae' aga'iefi endilisi, ae' aman Kraisi ea' ina ambaso'am, owa'. Ambal bu'unai Godi nihimba'me nalome umafi malogol gagape opaf ae' nomoni nihimba'me na'ipi aga'i basef endilisifi atifi.
45009002	Basef ifimba na'amba. Opaf ae'afi nimanif endilisi ea' okom mandanda' mafe' aom dondol.
45009003	Ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma a'i God nowambilai esis alipisi esimbel atembel ae'asi Israel sotanimai. Ea' i'i ano'w ufia'w na'ambaiai, ae' endabetena Kraisa ae' lamene egaho'ofa esis sogafe' wambel bu'wambili heven, apa' ae' owa'atin.
45009004	Apa' Israel God nandandepapa ea'i, nanda'apa mataga awasi ananipai ea' na'i aho'ma mogati mogogala'i banagami ananimi. Anen nala' lapa basef ananifi nalomapa ea' naso'apa mu'uli bu'wani ananini naloma waf endilisifi monda' lotumafi. Apa' mofa' basef ifimba God naga'i endilisi atisafi.
45009005	Bafapapa akupapa dembami ape'imi mamumba magali'i amamba ape'imi atom. Ea' esimbel ape'imbeli atembel Krais nataga epen, anen God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, nape nali'ma epes saloma hiahaom hiami numafiam. Anen God endilisinai ea' mondasa'ma agol ananigili dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.
45009006	Apa' basef ifimba God nagala' lapafi ina higiligalef dowafi, owa'atin. Epes sagataga mini'ap Israeli, hiasi ina a' Israel atis endilisi God nandandepas ananisi ea'i, owa'.
45009007	Ea' apa' ina a' mi'iam na'amba mi'i, “Esis sataga esimbel Abrahami ea' esis hiasi a sape batawis endilisi ananisi,” owa'atin. Fowa' gani God naga'ipana na'amba na'i, “Esis esimbel Aisaki atis owagama sofa' agol wambota ine'isi.”
45009008	Isimba na'amba. Anis batawis Abrahami ina awasi Godi, owa'atin. Isimba sagataga basef ifimba God nala' lapef nagaso' Abrahamafi atis, agol gatomas ea' bafasana Abrahami endilisi.
45009009	Lapa basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Nemaf afamba andandepaf ea'i, bola itanimai ea' Sera kola awani aman.”
45009010	Ea' ina isimba atis, owa'. Nogaopa'w biam Rebekai ahamam atotona ea' Aisak atona bafamapa ape'inai.
45009011	-
45009012	Apa' God okom mandanda' ea' ma waf nandandepa epesafi. Anen ina okom mandanda'ma maol epes sanda'ani ea' nosaho'as, owa'atin. Nogaopa'w amamba biam ata' mape nomona nembel akwa'umbili God na'ipa'w na'i, “Nogali'i dembinai a' nope lafela aonama nogagi'i. Sahomana anaf nonda'mana maol owamana.” God naila okom ananimi atom dei' na'ipa'w na'amba. Anen ina okom ma'i anin maol bu'wani awani amom anaf monda'ani, owa'atin. Anen naila okom ananimi atom na'i basef na'amba.
45009013	Amamba si'i Baibel naga'i, “Ae' okom maimaila Jekop, apa' Iso andaiwa'mana endilisi.”
45009014	Ea' apa' dei' ata' mi'i main? Mi'i, “God nanda' waf owa' andeande'a?” Owa'atin endilisi!
45009015	Anen na'ipa Moses na'i, “Endilisi, anaf ae' i'i uwahipigama epen mamahina iga'i uwahipigamani ea' etopalopa epen mamahina ae' okom ma'i igatopalopani.”
45009016	Apa' ina mi'i ukup epesi atip paloma maol epesi atin sanda' God natopalopapa, owa'atin. God atona nati apa' uwahipipa dei' okom ananimi atom natopalopapa dowaf.
45009017	Ea' Baibel na'i God na'ipa dembinai king Fero na'amba na'i, “Ae' a'i ihimba'masa banagami ae'ami epes hias ma anaf sogawalapa agol ae'agili siga'iagol itap hiagoma. Isimba atis dei' afelena nanda' hiahawes isimba.”
45009018	Apa' mogawa i'i God ni'i nogatopalopa anin epen dowaf, dao' anen notopalopan. Apa' i'i nogasopama opaf anin epenima, dao' nosopamamanaf.
45009019	Apa' ina' atiasi ni'ipa ae' na'amba ni'i, “I'i na'ambama, dao' dei' maina God ata' naga'iam atin naga'i epen kofagema mapomana waf awafi anin nanda'afi? Ami la'ifina negapa'aga okom banagami Godi mogohafili? Owa'atin.”
45009020	Apa' epen, ina' mamahinama ma ni'i niginifala God? Owa'atin. A'i malep sanda' nombol sagala'api la'ifipa piginifala aman anamba nanda'ap nagala'api piga'i, “Dei' maina ina' nanda'e na'ambae?” Owa'atin.
45009021	Aman nagala' malihi nofa'i anep itap nala' maloh biahap, anep maol bu'wanipi, anep falafalafipi maol awaniapi. Endilisi isimba andeande'.
45009022	God wapani nanda'am na'amba atin si'i aman nagala' malihi. Fowa' nanda' epes sataga ea' naila okom ananimi atom na'i aho'ma anis epes sogafe' ufia'w higiligalasa'wi. Esis safe' ufia'w akwamba, apa' anen ina nagwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'afi ulal, owa'. Anen ata' nanimbelis nape nasasas nogota laota ma anaf nogahambombagas. Dei' main, anen na'i nowalapa okom numbutinai ananinai notaga alihina noloma banagami ananimi ma epes hiasi sogogawam.
45009023	Anen na'i nowalapam motaga alihim hiahaom mogogala'i fasimi ananimi ma anis epes anen nagati uwahipisi sogogawam. Epes isimba anen naila okom ananimi atom fowa' nandandepasa nogaso'asa mogogala'i esis.
45009024	Amamba ea' ma'i apa' atepa. Anen nofalapa ea'. Ina nofala anis Juda atis, owa'atin. Nofala anis owa' Judaisia wapani.
45009025	Basef anona aman profet Hosea fowa' nanda'afi wapani faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Esis amam nematawa isimba fowa' ina epes ae'asi, anaf i'i esis epes ae'asi, ea' epes isimba fowa' ae' owa' okom mogailasia egaso'asa opafia, anaf okom mimilas.
45009026	Ea' wambel ali' a'ipas aga'i, ‘Ipa' ina epes ae'ipai’, anaf wambel ambalemba atembel sofalas si'i, ‘Esis awasi Godi nagape namunai.’”
45009027	Fowa' profet Aisaia nondola'waifa esis Israel na'amba na'i, “I'i esis Israel sotaga hias a'owa' si'i ko'onaga gaga'oh naoh akata ai, ea' hapaisi. Anaf Dembinai nofa'ai kwasala'wis dowaf nokwahomas waf awafi sotanimai.
45009028	Anen nonda' basefa kot hi'ilif notopa'ef kwafalis nogwamasa akafimi epes hiasi itapasi hi'ilas.”
45009029	Ea' na'amba atin si'i fowa' Aisaia na'ias naga'i, “I'i Dembinai banagonai nugumafi hiahaom hiamii owa' nosopama akafimi epes isimba sagape itap apa'ii ai, anaf apa' motaga lamonapa si'i walemb ambalemba bialemb Sodomi Gomora. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Nasopamam ea'.”
45009030	Dei' apa' ata' mi'ias mi'imama? Apa' mi'ias na'amba mi'i, “Esis owa' Judaisia ina sanda' maol noma'wini ma sogofa' waf usi'ifi, esis sofa' waf afamba ea'. Esis sahapifa God sofa' waf afamba usi'ifi.
45009031	Apa' esis Israel sanda' numa'umi ma sagaila mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani ma sogofa' waf afamba usi'ifi, owa' esis ina sofa'af, owa'atin.”
45009032	Dei' main, esis sandaiwa'ma sohapifana sogofa' waf usi'ifi. Esis ukup pandanda' pa'i sonda' maol atin sofa'af. Owa' asendesambaola anom otam sowa.
45009033	Amamba si'i Baibel naga'i, “Peme! Ae' ambe' anom otam wambel lu'wambili esis Israeli agol Saion. Otam amamba banagami motawa mogahambombaga epes sendesambaola sogowa. Apa' epen ami nigahapifa aman anambai, anaf anin ina okom iwanim, owa'atin. Nepe sonohan.”
45010001	Alipipai, okom ae'ami ma'ias a'owa' andabetena anaf God nofa' esis Israel nokwahomas waf awafi sogotanimai.
45010002	Ae' egawa esis andeande' ea' a'i isimba. Esis ukup pehafel a'owa' sanda' maol banagani ma sogaila God, apa' owa' esis ina sogawa basef Godi endilisifi andeande', owa'atin.
45010003	-
45010004	Esis ukup mahamahasa waf God nanda'afi ma noga'i apa' epes usi'ipai. Ea' sanda'am sandawalapa waf usi'ifi asasifi atefa sagaila mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani. Ea' esis ina safe' lafela Goda noga'i apa' epes usi'ipai, owa'atin. Apa' Krais nafi'i nataga ea'. Isimba atis dei' apa' ina ata' mape lafela mu'uli inimba, a' owa'atin. Anen nafi'i nandawalapa amam nematawa mamahisa sagahapifa anini ea' dei' God nofalas na'i esis amam nematawa bo'wes hilili'i.
45010005	Waf afamba epen nagaila mu'uli inimba ma God naga'i anin usi'ini, Moses fowa' naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Epen ami nenda' waf afamba hiafi andeande' hi'igalafi, anaf anin nefa' ambal namili ma nigaila mu'uli inimba.”
45010006	Apa' waf epen nagahapifanai God na'i anin usi'ini, waf afamba faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Ipa' owa'i ukup pendanda' ma nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pi'i, ‘Anaf ami nefe' nelota heven?’ nihali' Krais nigisila'i, owa'i.
45010007	“Ea' ipa' owa'i pi'ias na'amba pi'i, ‘Anaf ami nefe' newala wambel epes sagaga'ii nihali' Krais notanimai.’ Na'ambai wapani owa'i.”
45010008	Apa' basef ifimba fa'i main? Ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Basef ifimba fape felefele'ma ipa', fape malogufi nelelemb ipe'isi.” Basef apa' magahapilafi mawalapef maga'iefi ifimba.
45010009	I'i ipa' pewalapa basef ifimba alihif pi'i Jisas anen Dembinai ma pihapifa God nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pi'i anen nasa'mana nogosafel matmat wapani, bola God nofa'ai ipa' wapani pitanimai pepe andeande'.
45010010	Dei' main, apa' mahapilif nelelemb ape'ilimbi God na'i apa' amam nematawa magataga be'epa hilili' ea'i. Ea' mawalapa hapif malogof ape'igufi God nofa'apa nokwahomapa waf awafi mutanimai mape andeande'.
45010011	Amamba si'i Baibel naga'i, “Epen mamahina nagahapifa anini, anaf epen inimba ina okom iwanim, owa'atin.”
45010012	Esis Juda saloma isimba owa' Judaisia ea' na'amba atin, God anen Dembinai atotona apa' hiapaii. Ea' anen natopalopapa naso'apa waf bu'wafi dowafa epes isimba mamahisa sogofala anini,
45010013	si'i Baibel naga'i, “Epes mamahisa soga'i agol Dembinai ma sogofala anini, atiasi nofa'as nokwahomas waf awafi sotanimai.”
45010014	Apa' i'i esis owa' sohapifanaia atiasi sofalana sogawana si'i mama? Ea' esis i'i owa' seme' basefanaea, atiasi sohapifana si'imama? Ea' i'i anin epen owa' ni'ipasa basef esisa, dei' esis sogawef si'imama? Owa'atin endilisi.
45010015	I'i God owa' nosapa'i amam amambaia, dei' atiasi amom mefe' mowalapef mi'imama? Owa'atin. Si'i Baibel naga'i na'amba na'i, “Awasi! Maol inimba epes sofa'i basef bu'wafi ae'afi sogafi'ii, inimba fasini endilisi a'owa'!”
45010016	Apa' ina Israel hiasi saila basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi, owa'atin. Fowa' profet anamba Aisaia naga'i na'amba na'i, “Dembinai, anaf ami nihapila basef ifimba esis sogame'efa afa'i? Owa'atin.”
45010017	Ea' apa' mogawa, apa' hiapai mame' basef bu'wafi ea' ifimba atif fasa'mai hapif ape'ini. Ea' dei' basef ifimba fataga ufia'w mai'w? Ifimba fataga amom magawalapa basef Kraisi atom.
45010018	Apa' ae' a'ias na'amba. A'i esis ina same' basef ifimba bu'wafi? Owa'atin. Esis same'ef ea', si'i Baibel naga'i, “Basef fafe' fandahama walemb hielimbi fafe'agon hi'alagon.”
45010019	Ae' etambel a'ias. A'i esis Israel sogawa basef ifimba a'a owa'? Owa'atin. Sogawa ea'. Moses nali' naga'i basef ifimba na'i, “God na'i, ‘Ae' efa' anis amam nematawa falafisi, esis ina epes banagasi anep mini'ap endilisipi, owa'. Ae' ifa'asi etopalopas falafis anaf ipa' kowolepama waf bu'wafi ae' enda'masaf esisi. Ae' ifa'ai epes isimba owa' sogogawaia ea' anaf ipa' pinifalis penda' megahohas.’”
45010020	Apa' Aisaia ina ombal mahana ma na'iam nagawalapam, owa'atin. Anen nawalapam na'iam alihim na'amba na'i, “Epes isimba owa' sogolaoma ae'ia, dei' satolowe ea'. Epes isimba owa' sogahali'asa ae'ia, dei' ataga andawalapa esis.”
45010021	Apa' esis Israel ina na'ipas na'amba, owa'atin. Anen na'ipas anif daif na'i, “God na'i, ‘Epes isimba sanda' du'wanigai sogosambala basefi. Nogota lautai a'owa' ae' efalas anda' lagof iwaulasi. Owa', owa'atin.’”
45011001	Dei' a'i ihali'ipa, God a' nali'amona Israel hiasi mini'ap ananisi? Owa'atin endilisi! Ae' wapani Israeliwai esimbel Abrahami, wambota Benjamini.
45011002	Mini'ap isimba Godi anen fowa' nandandepas ea'i, ina nali'amonas, owa'. Ipa' pegawa basef Elaijai fagail Baibeli. Elaija nandabeten nanda' kotima esis Israela God, naga'i na'amba na'i,
45011003	“Dembinai, esis saha amom profet maga'. Ea' sugulata belitagw ine'igwi sondolaliminama. Ea' ae' atowe ata' atapiwi ape profet anda' maola ina'. Dei' esis salasolaome ma sehe egaga'.”
45011004	Apa' God nagwamana basef maif Elaija? Anen na'ipana na'i, “Ae' ifa'ai epes hiasi 7,000-pelais ae'asi, isimba ina sanda' lotuma god baso'amunai Baal, owa'.”
45011005	Isimba ea' na'amba atin si'i dei' wapani esis mini'ap du'wanis sape, God fowa' natilis uwahipis natopalopas dowaf. Isimba atis dei' nosaho'asa sagape epes ananisi si'is.
45011006	Anen nati uwahipis natopalopas dowaf nosaho'as. Anen ina okom mandanda'ma anin maol bu'wani esis sanda'ani nosaho'as, owa'atin. I'i esis sonda' maol bu'wani ma God nosaho'asai, anen ina a' niti uwahipis maol bu'wani ma God nosaho'asai, anen ina a' niti uwahipis notopalopas dowaf nosaho'as, owa'atin. I'i na'ambaiai, waf afamba nagati uwahipisafi, afamba falafifi atef, owa' endilisifia.
45011007	Dei' apa' ata' mi'ias mi'imama? Waf afamba God niti epes niga'i be'es hilili'i, afamba esis Israel sanda' numa'umi ma sa'i sogofa'afi, apa' ina sofa'af, owa'. Fowa' God nosaho' esis du'wanis atis ea' isimba atis sofa'af. Apa' esis Israel hiasi opalef asasimi maso'as ea',
45011008	si'i buk Baibel naga'i, “God nanda' opalef asasilifi si'i saga'oh. Nanda' naep asasipi ina pati ea' esis ina same' basef kofagefa, owa'atin. Ea' sape na'amba atin safi'i sataga dei'.”
45011009	Devit wapani na'i basef ifimba atifa waf opalef esis Israeli maso'as ea' na'i, “Ae' a'i nemaf afamba esis sope soga' gwa'aisi lu'wasi atin, God nowasi'asa nogagwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'afi si'i mandelef sandolam mail alialefa mogowa' mafis, ea' si'i isalefi waiwa sanda'am magapoma mafisi.
45011010	“Ae' a'i naep asasipi petaga walufipa ina atiasi siti. Ea' ina' awi nenda' nimanimi akafimi mindiwa alafugah asasigahi ma atapis sogape na'amba atin.”
45011011	Dei' ae' ahali'ipa. Esis Juda sendesambaol sowa lamonas? Owa'atin endilisi! Esis sololama ufia'w sanda' waf awafi, isimba atis dei' God notanima nofa' anis epes sogololama Godi owa' Judaisia sotanima safe'ma anen. God nanda'as na'amba ma esis Juda ata' sigati waf afamba fasifi nanda'masaf esis sogololama anini ma anaf esis Juda kowogalasa waf afamba bu'wafi God nanda'masafi.
45011012	Esis Juda sowa' alafugaha God, isimba atis dei' anen natopalopa amam nematawa hiasi itapasi sagape walemb hiagomai. Esis Juda sololama waf Godi, isimba atis dei' God natopalopa isimba owa' Judaisia nofa'as sotanimai sogape andeande'. Ea' nemaf afamba esis Juda hiasi hi'ilas dondo'ma ikwaf God okom maga'iefi sotanima sifi'mai anen, esis misi'ah hiasi owa' Judaisia, God notopalopas endilisi ma nofa'ai hiasi sogotanimai.
45011013	Dei' a'i ese'epa anif basef ipa' atipa owa' Judaipaia. God nasapa'e afe'ma anda' maola esis owa' Judaisia si'i ipa'. Ea' sonahema maol inimba bu'wani dei' anda'ani.
45011014	Maol inimba ae' okom ma'ian a'owa' ma egasa'ma esis Juda wambota ae'asi ma kowogalasa ipa' dei' pape andeande' pagaloma Godi. Ama ae' egefa' esis Juda du'wanis atis sotanima sogafe'ma God.
45011015	Aho', anen nowa' alafuga ma esis, isimba atis dei' nofa'ai anis epes itap hiagoma sataga nembel atembel salomana. Ama anef nemaf God noso'as nembela esis Juda sotanima sogafe'ma anen, notopalopa epes hiasi itap hiagoma sotanima sope andeande' sondagala si'i sondagala ma anis epes saga' sotanima sogasafeli.
45011016	Waf afamba esis Juda sotanima sogafe'ma God si'i basef waminif atini na'amba fa'i, i'i bret du'wanita tagali'i sanda'ata saso'anata Godi bo'ota hilili', ea' bret si'ita wapani Godi bo'ota hilili'i atota. I'i esis soso'ana nombalef lawagilif si'ilif God, dao' agufugama wapani Godi atoga.
45011017	God nindiwaga nelefata anogof agof lawag oliviga sagawaga aofi ea' nofa'ai anogol agola anoga lawag oliviga alupugai nuwataniaga lawag agamba sagawaga aofi. Ipa' owa' Judaipaia, ipa' si'i agol lawag agamba alupugai. Isimba atis dei' ipa' pefa' hiahaom maim bu'wami mataga ma epes isimba Juda si'i agol lawag agamba alupugai gogofa' ifata nombalef lawag sagawaga aofi.
45011018	Dei' ipa' owa' Judaipaia ina pi'i ipa' atipa bu'upai pikila' esis Juda si'i agof agwafomba God nigindiwagufi, owa'. Ipa' ina' pi'i ipa' bi'ipai esis epes awasi, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' ina pegewa' banaga nombalifi, owa'. Nombalef atelef fewa' banagaipa.
45011019	A'i ipa' atiasi pi'ias na'amba pi'i, “God nindiwa agof agwafomba ma nogowatani apa' si'i anogol agol lawagigil.”
45011020	Dao' andeande', apa' esis Juda ina sahapifana, isimba atis dei' nahape'as. Apa' ipa' pahapifana dei' pape sisihipama anen. Apa' ipa' owa'i pesa'ma agof ipe'igufi pi'i ipa' atipa bu'upaia, owa'i. Ipa' ombal mondahepa solawaipa.
45011021	Fowa' God ina na'i aho'ma esis Juda si'i agof agwafomba lawag sagawaga aofi fape atapiguf, owa'. Ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba nonda'mepas na'amba atin si'i nanda' esis.
45011022	Ea' ipa' ukup pendanda'mam andeande' okom biafim Godi uwahipimi wandafumi wapani. Epes sagakwaha waf ananifii, na'ipas dindinip. Apa' ipa' God naga'i uwahipipai, i'i ipa' pigaila uwahipimi amamba, dao' andeande'. Apa' i'i owa', anaf notopa'epa wapani.
45011023	I'i esis Juda sokwaha waf awafi sogosambala Godafi, dao' atiasi nofa'as sotanimai si'i nogowatania agof agwafomba fowa' nigindiwagufi. Endilisi, God banagonai ma nonda'as na'amba.
45011024	Ipa' pegawa fowa' ipa' ata' papani atin si'ipa lawag oliv alupugai, ea' God nanda' anin maol daiana ipa' natopa' anogol agola lawag agamba ea' nowataniaga anoga lawag oliv bu'ugai sagawaga aofi. God nanda' maol inimba. Ea' endilisi atis, anaf a' nofa' esis Juda sotanimai si'i agof nindiwagof lawag sagawaga aofi nuwataniagof fitanima fope lawag afafugai si'iga. Maol inimba ina ahifina anen, owa'. Andipeni.
45011025	Alipipai, ae' andaiwa'ma ipa' ukup pegehepama basef ifimba fowa' fandambahi'i dei' fandawalap alihif. Na'amba ipa' ukup pendanda' ma ipa' atipa pi'i, “Apa' mogogawai.” Basef ifimba fowa' fandambahi'i na'amba. Esis Israel opalef asasilifi faso'as, apa' ina faso'as atapilif fape, owa'. Fefe' fefe' fendahama nogota atamba esis owa' Judaisia hiasi sifi'i sogafe'ma God dondo' ma ikwaf okom ananimi maga'iefi.
45011026	I'i owa' main, esis Israel hiasi God nofa'as nokwahomasa waf awafi sotanima sifi'mai anen si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Anaf aman anamba nofa'as sogotanimai, nupani wambel Saion nifi'i notagwaha waf awafi esis wambota Jekopi, waf awafi sogosambala basef Godiefi.
45011027	Anef nemaf ekwaha waf hiafi awafi asasifi okom mose'eaf, i'ipasa basef agala' lapafi esis.”
45011028	Juda sosambala basef bu'wafi Godi, sataga bousi ananisi saha'ofa ipa' owa' Judaipaia nofa'epa pigatanimaii. Apa' God fowa' nosaho'as ea' okom maimailas. Dei' main, anen okom mapoma bafasam asasimi ma basef ifimba nala' lap nagalomamafi.
45011029	I'i God nondandepa anin epen noso'an presen fasini dowaf, anaf anen ina nosambala basef ifimba ni'ipan ni'i hapaifi noho'ofef, owa'atin. Basef ifimba atapif fepe.
45011030	Fowa' ipa' owa' Judaipaia pesambala basef Godi. Ea' esis Juda wapani sosambala basef ifimba. Isimba atis dei' ipa' pefa' okom uwahipimi Godi.
45011031	Ea' na'amba atin dei' esis Juda wapani sosambala basef ama dei' sogofa' okom amamba uwahipimi Godi si'i ipa'.
45011032	God nanda' epes hiasi hi'alas sogape lafela waf afamba sogosambala basefafi ma anen anaf niti esis hiasi uwahipis nogatopalopas dowaf.
45011033	Awasi! Okom Godi naloma gawa ananini fasini lu'um a'owa' endilisi. Apa' epes ina la'ifipa endilisi ma mogogawa kofagema basef ananifi, okom hiami mogatambela, owa'atin. Apa' owa'atin endilisi ma mogawalapa basefa anen okom maga'iefi. Ea' apa' owa' mogawa waf hianai ananinaia, owa'atin.
45011034	Endilisi atis, si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Ami negawa okom Dembinaii? Ami naso'ana nomonas anen?
45011035	Ami nali' naso'ana hiahawes anen ama atiasi nogagwamanas? Owa'atin endilisi.”
45011036	Anen nanda' hiahaom hiami hi'alam magape ilif itapi numafiam maloma epes. Ea' hiahaom amamba hiami maloma epes mape ma mogasa'ma agol ananigili atogol. Apa' epes hiapai hi'ilapa mondasa'ma agol ananigili lifilafi dondol. Endilisi.
45012001	Alipipai, basef ifimba hiafi fagali'i endilisifi atif. Isimba atis dei' ahali'ipa dindinipa ipa' ukup pendanda'ma okom lu'unai Godi naganagaila ape'i nagati apa' uwahipipa. Ea' pindilali ma anen si'i fowa' saha mafis sagaso'ana pendaso'ana alop ipe'ipi si'ip hi'indalap. Alop ata' pope namop atapip pese'anap God atona hi'ilap ea' ananipi si'ip, si'i waf anen okom maga'iefi. Ipa' penda'as na'amba, penda' lotu endilisi ma God ukup ipe'ipi nomon.
45012002	Ipa' ina pepe pindati na'amba atin si'i sagaila waf itapafi, owa'i. Ipa' pi'i aho'ma God nonda' ukup ipe'ipi nomon petaga dambaipa waf ipe'ifi atiasi fegataga dambaif wapani. Ma bola pegegawa waf endilisifi God okom maga'iefi. Waf afambai bu'wafi usi'ifi.
45012003	God natopalope dowaf, isimba atis dei' a'ipipa atona atin. Ipa' pegawa waf faloma gawa ipe'ini sandanda' sa'imama, apa' ipa' ina ukup pendanda' pi'i ipa' atipa fasipai endilisi, owa'i. Ipa' ata' pewaloga ipa' ukup pendanda' pefe' andeande' pendahama hapif ipe'ini God nagasi'ipani nafe' negetambel.
45012004	Apa' mogawa alop ape'ipi atotop, apa' sa'osa'opa hiapi. Ea' apamba hiapi ina panda' maol atifin, owa'atin. Panda'an daindai.
45012005	Ea' na'amba atin apa' amam nematawa hiapai magape sisihipama Kraisi, apa' si'i alop atotop. Ea' apa' hiapai atona atin si'i mandatopalopa atin magaloma anop alop wa'awa'api hiapi.
45012006	God natopalopapa dowaf naso'apa presen hiahaom fasimi ananimi maloma gawa naninani. I'i God nosa'ma okom anin epeni ma negawalapa anif basef, anin nendawalapef dondo' ma hapif ananini.
45012007	Epen mamahina negatopalopa esis sahin owani, anin nendanda' maol inimba endilisi negatopalopa alipisi. I'i epen gawaini ma nigihimba'mas si'i tisai, anin nendanda'an endilisi nihimba'mas.
45012008	Ea' epen ami negegawa ma negafela ukup esis epesi, dao' anin nendanda' maol inimba endilisi negasa'ma ukup asasipi. Epen negaso'an hiahawes anin alipinii, anin a' nendaso'an hias. Epen nigimafi anin maoli, okom ananimi mondohafel endilisi ma maol inimba. Epen nigati anin alipini uwahipini ma netopalopan nigimafiani, anin sonohan nendatopalopan.
45012009	Ipa' ukup pagapagaila esis sahin owan, dao' ipa' ukup pindailas endilisi. Ipa' ina pembmaso'am, owa'i. Ipa' pendewa' alafugah endilisi ma waf awafi, pendape sisihipa endilisi ma waf bu'wafi.
45012010	Ipa' pendaso'asa opalef esis sahin owan ukup pindailas endilisi. Ipa' hipai atona atin pendasa'ma agof isimba anis daindaiasi atis.
45012011	Ipa' pendanda' maol banagambel lifilafi ukup pehafel a'owa' penda' maol Dembinaii.
45012012	Ipa' pepe pehafa Dembinai nogatopalopepa. Ea' pendagala atin hi'indalepa. I'i nimanimi mogatagamepa, pilutu banagepa. Ea' pendabeten nimaguf danda lifilafi.
45012013	I'i amam nematawa Godi hiahawes akas, dao' petopalopas pese'as. I'i epes analemb walemb lauguni sifi'i sogatagamepa, dao' pimafias andeande'.
45012014	Epes sogahambombaga ipe'i, pendabeten pihali' Goda nofalo'mas sogataga andeande'. Aho', pendabetena esis. Apa' ipa' ina pendabeten pihali'ana nonda' esis awes, owa'i.
45012015	Esis epes sondagalai, ipa' sonehepa pendalomas. Ea' isimba sogalifi, pelef pelomas.
45012016	Ipa' ukup pendapoma sahin owan ipe'isi hi'indalas pepan opalef atelef pendalomas, si'i ukup pagapoma ipa' atipa. Ipa' ina ukup pendanda'ma ipa' atipa pi'i dembipai, owa'i. Pefe' peloma epes isimba falafisi. Ipa' ina ukup pi'i ipa' atipa gawaipai, owa'i.
45012017	I'i epes sonda' waf awafi ma ipe'i, ina pegwamasa waf awafi esis, owa'i. Ipa' ukup pendapoma waf bu'wafi ma naep epes hiasii penda'af.
45012018	Ipa' ina ukup pendanda'ma wandaf, owa'i. I'i ufia'w andepa'wai, ipa' pepe opalef atelef pelomas hi'indalas.
45012019	Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai endilisi, ina pegwamasa waf aunai esis sanda'mepa anai, owa'i. Ipa' pindihi'amas sondafe'mago Goda okom wandafunai nondanda' maola esis. Dei' main, basef fagail Baibeli fa'i, “Waf gwaifi ma anis epes sanda' waf awafii, afamba maol ae'ani. Ae' atowe bola egwamasa waf afamba awafi ma esis.” Dembinai naga'i na'amba.
45012020	Apa' ipa' penda'as si'i Baibel naga'i, “I'i bousi ipe'isi nolomohas, dao' pese'asa gwa'aisi esis. I'i iap pese'as, pese'asa embel. I'i ipa' penda'as na'amba, atiasi penda' esis ambagof awagofa waf awafi asasifi.”
45012021	Ea' dei' a'ipipa, ipa' ina pepe pititi waf awafi fikila' ipa', owa'i. Apa' pendanda' waf bu'wafi ma pegatalogofa waf afamba awafi.
45013001	Epes hiasi a' sondape lafela amom gavman. Apa' mogawa ina anona gavman nataga dowaf, owa'atin. Maol hiani gavmani nataga lagol Godi atogol. Ea' gavman amamba hiami magapani, God atona nanda'am mape.
45013002	I'i epen mamahina negesambala basef gavmani, anin nesambala waf Godi wapani. I'i epes ami sogosambala amambai, atiasi sofa' akafimi awami ma waf afamba esis sanda'afi.
45013003	Amom gavman ina mapoma mugaumbela epes isimba sanda' waf fasifii, owa'. Amom mapoma mugaumbela epes isimba sanda' waf awafii. I'i ipa' pindaiwa'ma ombal mogahepama amom gavmana, dao' penda' waf bu'wafi atefa amom atiasi moganifela agof ipe'igufi.
45013004	Gavman manda' maola Godi motopalopepa pegape andeande'. Apa' i'i ipa' penda' waf awafi, ipa' ombal mondahepamam. Ipa' pegawa bainat anamba magahapilanai, ina mahapilana dowaf, owa'. Manda' maol Godi ma mogogwa akafimi awami ma isimba sanda' waf awafii.
45013005	Na'amba dei' apa' a' mondape lafela amom. Apa' ina a' ombal mohapama akafimi amamba atom awami ea' mila basef amamifi, owa'. Apa' mundaila malogof fagape opalef ape'ilifi nomon monda'as na'amba.
45013006	Isimba atis dei' ipa' panda' tekis. Dei' main, amom gavman manda'mana maol Godi dondol banagem mumafi maol inimba atin.
45013007	Ipa' maol inimba napomepa ma pegaso'am hiahawes sasisasi epes amamba, pendaso'am. Amom mogofa'asa tekisi, pese'ama tekis. Amom mogofa'asa moni maisa mogatala waf mu'uli gavmani, pese'am. Dembami mamahoma manda' maol bu'wani nandahama epes sogasa'ma agof amamugufi, dao' pendafe' lafela amom. Ipa' sonehepa ma pegasa'ma agofa anom amam, dao' pesa'ma agof amamugufi.
45013008	Ipa' ina pewaola anof wiafa moni mais fotaoma anin epen, owa'i. Apa' anof wiaf atotof fondotaomapa atapif. Wiaf afamba ukup ipe'ipi pigapigaila anis sahin owan hiasi. Dei' main, epen mamahina okom mogamogaila anin epen daiani, anin nagaila mu'uli inimba endilisii.
45013009	Apa' mogawa mu'uli inimba naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Ina' owa'i nehambombaga waf daso'amaifia ea' owa'i neha anis amam nematawa soga'a, owa'i nenda' wala, ea' ina a' kowolena ma hiahaom anis daindaiasi, owa'i.” Mu'uli inimba naloma anin mu'uli mamahina nagapani wapani, kofagena inimba atin naga'i na'amba na'i, “Ina' okom mimila anis epes daias na'amba atin si'i okom magapoma ina' atina.”
45013010	Epen ami okom maimaila anin epen daiana nagaso'an opaf anini, inimba ina nanda' waf awafi ma anin, owa'. Epen inimba okom magamagaila anin epen daiani, anin naila mu'uli inimba endilisi.
45013011	Ae' a'i ipa' penda' waf afambai. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa ea' nogota ata'e dei' magapautai. Nogota ata'e ipa' pekwaha koha pegesafel. Ipa' pegawa fowa' apa' mataga mahapifana dambaipa, nemaf afamba God na'i a' nowambelapa mogotanimai ata' fapani laogon, apa' dei' fataga felefele' kwasakwasala.
45013012	Owamb ba'i a' hi'ilamb ea' felefele'ma lola negataga. Na'amba andeande'ma apa' mogakwaha waf hiafi awafi owambifi ma monda' waf usi'ifi alipifi fepe tatala'if si'i mofa' walitapa magahagasa wandafa waf awafi.
45013013	Apa' mondafe' hilili' andeande' si'i epes sagape alipi. Ina mea' embel banagimbeli mohagamogaol ea' gigal mo'oh mi'i basef wandafifi, owa'i. Apa' owa'i monda' waf so'a waulafia monda' salamala basef awafi alugufi. Apa' ina' monda' migimigah mopa' ea' kowolapa ma hiahaom anis epes daiasii, owa'i.
45013014	Apa' dei' pefa' Dembinai Jisas Krais ea' pindawisana si'i klos amamba lu'wami sanda' wandafami pefa'ana pepomana. Ipa' ina ukup pelapefe' ma pigaila nomonas awami alop atonaimi, owa'i.
45014001	Epen mamahina nagahapifanai, hapif ananini owa' banagania, inimba ipa' pese'an nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pefa'an pifi'i piwisi amam nematawa Kristen. Apa' ina pi'i pifitap pelomana basef mamimami, owa'i.
45014002	Anin epen nahapifana banagen, na' gwa'aimi mamimami hiami. Apa' hapif anin epeni ina banagen, na'amba ina na' mafis maim, owa'.
45014003	Ea' epen inimba naga' gwa'aimi mamimamii, ina okom iwanim mopoma epen inimba owa' nega' mafisia, owa'i. Ea' epen inimba owa' nega' mafisia ina okom iwanim mopoma epen inimba naga' gwa'aimi mamimamii nanda' waf awafi, owa'i.
45014004	Ipa' ina pewaloga anin epen nanda' maola anin epen daiani, owa'i. I'i anin nigalutu banagena maol ananini o negewa, isimba maol anen Dembinai nugumafi anini atin. Anin atiasi nigalutu banagani. Dei' main, Dembinai ananinai atona la'ifinama nogowa' banaga anina nigalutu banagen.
45014005	Anin epen okom mapoma anef nemaf lu'uf a'owa' fikila' anif nimaguf hiafi. Apa' anin daian na'i nimaguf hiafi na'ambaif atin. Epes isimba hiasi atona atin sondameme'ma ukup asasipi atip andeande'.
45014006	Epen mamahina okom magapoma anef nemaf be'ef a'owa'i, anin okom mandanda' ma Dembinai dei' nanda'am na'amba. Ea' epen inimba naga' gwa'aimi mamimamii, anin okom mandanda'ma Dembinai na'am. Dei' main, anin nanifela God na'as. Apa' epen inimba owa' nega' gwa'aimi mamimami hiamia, anin okom mapoma Dembinai, dei' nandaiwa'ma anis gwa'aisi. Inimba wapani nanifela God nihi'as.
45014007	Apa' mogawa la'afena apa' ina anin epen nape nanda' maol naila okom ananimi atom, owa'. Ea' ina anin epen naila okom ananimi atom naga', owa'atin.
45014008	I'i apa' mope, dao' monda' maola mogasa'ma agol Dembinaii. I'i moga', moga'ma mogasa'ma agol Dembinaii. Ea' i'i apa' mope namepa o moga', apa' Dembinaii atepa.
45014009	Ea' isimba atis Krais naga' notanima ambal lapaona nosafel wapani ma nagape Dembinai ma epes isimba sagaga'i saloma isimba ata' sagape namisi.
45014010	Dei' maina ipa' pagawaloga sahin owan ipe'isi ma fe' asasini a paga'ipas basef iwanifi? Na'ambai owa'i. Ipa' pegawa anaf apa' hiapai hi'ilapa a' mulutu gani God nope nogowaloga epes hiasima ea' nowalogapa ma basef lu'wafi.
45014011	Amamba si'i Baibel na'iam naga'i, “Dembinai naga'iam na'amba na'i, ‘Ae' a'i endilisi atis, anaf epes hiasi sindiwa nembawa sotawa sonda' lotuma ae' hi'ilas, ea' sowalapa basef alihif si'if si'i ae' God endilisiwai.’”
45014012	Ea' apa' mogawa apa' hiapai atona atin anaf moga'ipa Goda waf hiafi kofagefa apa' manda'afi.
45014013	Ea' ipa' ina pewaloga sahin owan ipe'isi ma fe' asasini wapani, hapaimi. Apa' ukup pendanda' na'amba mi'i apa' ina monda' anef wafa monda' owamapa ape'inai nowa nonda' waf awafi, owa'i.
45014014	Dembinai Jisas ea' nawalipi egawa isimba. Ina anom hiahaom gwa'aisi mafis mais awasim dowadowaf, owa'. Okom epeni atom mandanda'ma anis maefah alugwisi, dei' hiahawes isimba awes alugwis.
45014015	I'i ina' nea' anis maefaha waf afamba ine'ifi fehambombaga okom owamenai, ina' negawa, waf afambai ina' owa' okom mimila owamenaea, owa'. Krais naga' ea' ma nogowambilai owamena anamba. Ea' ina' owa'i nehambombagana ma gwa'aisi ine'isia.
45014016	Ipa' ina penda' anef waf anis sahin owan Kristen sitilipa fenda' ukup asasipi iwanip, owa'i. I'i ipa' pi'i waf afamba bu'wafi, ipa' ina penda'afa naep asasipi, hapaifi.
45014017	Waf afamba saga' gwa'aisi embelafi, afambai ina kofagefa ma anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin. Anamba waf usi'ifi hilili'i a opalef awanilifi faloma waf sonagahasafi atef fagapoma. Ambal bu'unai Godi naso'apai waf afambai.
45014018	Epen ami nape nanda' maola Kraisii ma owa' nenda' anef waf fenda' Kristen ukup iwanipia, atiasi God okom bo'oma waf ananifi ea' epes wapani sogawa anin epen bu'wani.
45014019	Dei' apa' mundaila waf hiafi fenda' apa' mogape opalef atelifi, a waf usi'ifi hiafi fegewa' banaga hapif esis sahin owani.
45014020	Ina' okom mopoma gwa'aisi atis ea' nehambombaga maol Godi, owa'i. Endilisi, hiahawes hiasi gwa'aisi bu'wasi. Apa' i'i ina' nea' anis maefaha sonda' anin epen newa nenda' waf awafi, dao' ina' wapani nanda' waf awafi.
45014021	Ina andeande'ma nega' mafisi embel wain gwa'aisi mais, o nenda' anis maefah mamahisa sonda' owamena nogowa ma waf awafi, owa'i.
45014022	Okom ine'imi atom mondanda' neloma Goda hiahawes isimba sonda' owamena nogowai. Epen okom mogapoma anis maefah bu'wasi, okom ananimi ina manda' kotimana hiahawes gwa'aisi mais isimba, anin sonohan.
45014023	Apa' epen ami okom biafima nega'asa, kofagema ananimi atom. Dei' main, okom ananimi ina nahapilif banagen na'as, owa'. Hiahawes hiasi epes owa' sogahapifanaia sanda'ami, amamba awami.
45015001	Apa' epes magahapifana banagambili, maol ape'ini inimba ma mogatopalopa epes isimba hapif owa' banagania. Esis ina la'ifisa sogofa' nimanimi asasimi, isimba apa' motopalopas mofa' nimanimi asasimi. Apa' ina mila nomonas ape'imi atom, owa'i.
45015002	Apa' hiapai atona atin monda' maol mondatopalopa epes sagape felefele'ma ape'i ma atiasi sogofa' waf bu'wafi sogataga banages.
45015003	Apa' mogawa Krais wapani ina sonahana okom ananimi atom, owa'. Waf awafi fatagamana si'i Baibel na'iasa anen naga'i, “Epes sa'i basef findiwaefa ina' ea' basef ifimba atif fafi'i faso'ala ae'.”
45015004	Dei' main, basef hiafi fowa' amom manda'ef fagail Buki manda'efa fagawalipa apa'. Basef ifimba fegewa' banaga opalef ape'ilifi ma mugalutu banagepa mi'i endilisi atis God notopalopapa ma mogape andeande'.
45015005	Apa' mofa' banagami ma God atona nanda'apa malutu banagepa magahapifana. Ae' a'i anen notopalopepa pila waf Krais Jisasi endilisi pigahapila nomonas atifis.
45015006	Ama ipa' pegape opalef atifilif a malogof atogof pegasa'ma agol Godi, anen ahama Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais.
45015007	Ea' ipa' hipai ukup pindaima atin pendaso'asa nelelemb esis sahin owan si'i Krais wapani nagaso'apa nembel apa', ma epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.
45015008	Ae' a'ipipa na'amba. Krais nafi'i nataga nanda' maol nape lafela nagatopalopa esis Juda. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma nigihimba'masa God naga'i basef endilisifi datimai. Basef fowa' nala' lapef nagaloma dembami bafapam akupam asasimi fandawalap alihif.
45015009	Krais nanda' maol inimba ma nogatopalopa esis sogololama Godi owa' Judaisia wapani sogogawa God na'ias esis uwahipisa sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol, si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Anaf ae' ewalapa basef i'i agol ine'igili ma anis epes daias sogololama ine'i. Ea' ela analef awalef efela agol ine'igili.”
45015010	Ea' anif basef Baibeli faga'ias na'amba wapani fa'i, “Ipa' epes pegelelama Godi, pendagala peloma esis wambota ananisi.”
45015011	Ea' anif du'wanif fa'i, “Ipa' hipai pegelelama Godi, pendasa'ma agol Dembinaii. Pendasa'ma agol ananigili ma analef awalef.”
45015012	Ea' Aisaia wapani na'ias na'i, “Anaf anona aman notaga wambota Jesii. Aman anamba a' notaga nope Dembinai ma esis sogololama Godi numafias ea' sohapifana si'i endilisi atis anaf anen notopalopas.”
45015013	Apa' mogawa endilisi notopalopapa ma mogape andeande'. God anen kofagonama amamba. Dei' ae' a'i ipa' pihapifana nonda' dagala lu'wani neloma opalef awanilifi sogataga si'isa ipa'. Ea' a'i banagami Ambal bu'unai ananinai nonda'epa pegawa endilisi atis anaf piti banagami mogogala'i ananimi.
45015014	Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, opaf ae'afi egawa endilisi ma ipa' panda' waf fasifi dondol ea' pegawa gawa hiani naninani. Ea' ipa' ila ma pegaso'as nomonas bu'wasi sahin owan.
45015015	Apa' anif basef anda'efa ipe'i ifimba banagafi a'owa' kwasakwasala. Apa' ae' ina ombal mahe andafa'mefa anda'ef, owa'. A'i esa'ma nomonas ipe'isi. Dei' main, God nati ae' uwahipiwi nase'e nembel ae' natopalope dowaf.
45015016	Ea' anen nanda'e ape anda' maola Krais Jisasa enda' maol la'afena esis sogololama Godi owa' Judaisia. Anda' maol si'i amom mondolali ma Godi awalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi. Ae' a'i ifa'ai epes isimba sogololama Godi sifi'mai anen ea' Ambal bu'unai ananinai nonda'as sotaga epes Godi atis bo'wes hilili' egaso'anas anen si'i ofa anen okom maga'ian a'owa'i.
45015017	Ae' ape sisihiwi aloma Krais Jisas ea' sonahe ma maol inimba anda'ana Godi.
45015018	Krais atona nase'e banagami anda' maol inimba. Anen natopalope nanda'e banagewe afe' anda' maol inimba bu'wani awalipa esis sogololama Godi ma silana sogame' basef ananifi. Ae' andaiwa'ma iga'ipipa anif basef daif, owa'. Ifimba atif.
45015019	Ambal bu'unai Godi nanda' hiahaom banagami nowa' banagae ma anda' banagami mamimami. Epes hiasi sati banagami amamba ea' same' basef Godi sailif. Dambadamba anda'am Jerusalem awalapa basef bu'wafi ma Krais afe' lauguni hi'alagon itambili itap lu'upa Ilirikam.
45015020	Maol inimba ae' okom ma'ian a'owa' ma egawalapa basef ifimba bu'wafi anagon esis owa' ata' sogogawa Kraisia. Ae' andaiwa'ma igi' efe' ewalapef fegatoma anif anom mali' mafe' magawalapafi, owa'.
45015021	Ae' okom ma'ias si'i basef faga'ias, “Esis epes owa' anis sefe' soga'ipasa basefa aninia, anaf seme'efa sotolona. Ea' epes isimba owa' sogame' basefanaia, anaf seme'efana sogawana.”
45015022	Fowa' anda' maol inimba agawalipasa basef Kraisi. Maol inimbai nahefa ufia'w ae'akwi nimaguf hiafi ea' ina afe'mago ipa', ata' owa'.
45015023	Apa' dei' ae' maol ake na'a'e. Afagof hiagufi ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma egafe'mago ipa'.
45015024	Isimba atis dei' a'i ata' ili' efo'o iti ipa' ma main, efe' itap lu'upa Spen. Ea' a'i ata' ipani nogota laota kwasakwasala endagala elomepa ma main, dao' ipa' petopalope pilutumi pehapone ufia'w kwagafe' Speni.
45015025	Apa' dei' a'i efe' Jerusalem enda' maol etopalopa esis amam nematawa Godi.
45015026	Esis Kristen sagape Masedoniai saloma Kristen Griki sa'i basef sandame'maef ea' ma sogowala hiahawes asasisi sonda' du'wanis sefe' Jerusalem, sogaso' esis amam nematawa Godi hiahawes akasi.
45015027	Endilisi ukup asasipi atip pa'ias ea' dei' sanda'as na'amba. Apa' ae' a'i esis sowaolamasa wiaf fotaoma esis Kristen sagape Jerusalami. Fowa' esis Juda sali' soso'asa basef Godi ma sagatopalopa ambagof esis isimba sogololama Godi sagape Masedoniai Griki. Isimba atis dei' andeande'ma esis sogwamasa wiaf afamba esis Judia ma hiahawes sogatopalopa alopi.
45015028	Ea' ae' a'i ata' enda' maol inimba hi'ilan nili'. A'i ata' ese'asa hiahawes isimba bu'wasi esis Jerusalem hi'ilas ama main, ila ufia'w Speni efo'o ma ata' ili' itilipa.
45015029	Ae' egawa ea' nemaf afamba egafe'mago ipa', atiasi hiahaom fasimi Kraisi a' mope si'ima ae' efo'o etagamepa.
45015030	Apa' mahapifa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, ea' mogawa Ambal bu'wali Godi nasa'ma ukup ape'ipi ma pigapigaila esis sahin owan ape'isi. Isimba atis dei' a'ipipa dindinip a'i nomonas isimbai sosa'ma ipa' penda' maol numa'wini pegaloma ae' ma beten. Ipa' pendanda' betena God notopalope ae'
45015031	nogatagwahowe ma lagof anis epes Judaisi owa' sogahapifanaia. Ipa' pendabetena God nonda' amam nematawa ananisi sagape Jerusalami sondagala ma maol inimba anda'ana agatopalopasani.
45015032	I'i God ni'i aho'me ai, efo'o etagamepa epe endagala a'owa' elomepa ata' epoma noma'w kwasakwasala.
45015033	God anen kofagonama opaf awanafi. Ae' a'i anen nope nolomago ipa' hipai. Endilisi.
45016001	Ae' a'ipipa ma pigimafi Fibi andeande', ako'w haniti'mafa afa'ikwi kwanda' maol kwagatopalopa esis Kristen sagape Senkriai.
45016002	Fibi kwape sisihi'wa Dembinai. Ea' ipa' pendaso' nelelemba ako'w si'i waf bu'wafi apa' amam nematawa Godi monda'afi. I'i ako'w nomonas nimanisa anis maefaha, ipa' pendatopalopa'w. Dei' main, ako'w kwatopalopa ae' wapani.
45016003	Ipa' penda'mas nemaf bu'wafi Akila naloma waulu'mana Prisila ea' pi'ipaso dagala ae'ani. Esis bias apa' mandao'oma manda' maol atin Krais Jisasi. Fowa' esis sandandombol endilisi ma sagatopalopa ae'. Nemaf afamba anis sa'i sogahe, esis ina ombal mahas, owa'.
45016004	Sa'i awi ma soga' sotopalopa ae' egape namowe. Ea' ina ae' atowe anifela esis bias, owa'atin. Esis Kristen hiasi fowa' sogolalama Godi wapani, sanifelis.
45016005	Ea' ipa' pise'asa nemaf bu'wafi ma dagala ae'ani esis Kristen isimba safe' sandakolas sagape ipat asasitai. Ea' pi'ipago Epainetus nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi anen alipunai ae'anai endilisi. Anen nali' nahapifa Krais nali'ma epes hiasi itap lu'upa Esia.
45016006	Ipa' penda'makwago nemaf bu'wafi Maria. Ako'w kwanda' maol numa'uni hiani ma kwagatopalopepa.
45016007	Ipa' pese'amo dagala neloma nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi ma amam amamba Andronikus noloma Junias, amom wapani Judaimi si'i ae'. Amom manda' kalabus magaloma ae'i. Amom aposel ma'i amom biam manda' maol bu'wani Godii. Amom mali'ma ae' mahapifa Krais.
45016008	Ipa' pi'ipago Ampliatusa nemaf bu'wafi ma dagala ae'ani. Anen alipunai ae'anai endilisi ma nagape sisihinama Dembinai.
45016009	Pi'ipago Urbanus nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi, anen nanda' maol atitin nagaloma ae'i ma maol Kraisi. Ea' pi'ipago Stakisa nemaf bu'wafi wapani. Anen alipunai ae'anai endilisi.
45016010	Ea' pi'ipago Apelesa nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi, anen agol gandawalapana nagaila Krais endilisi. Pi'ipasago dagala ma nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi ma esis sagape ipat atota Aristobulusi.
45016011	Pi'ipago Herodiona nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi, anen Juda wapani si'i ae'. Pi'ipasago dagala ma nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi esis wambota atota Narsisusi sagahapifa Dembinaii.
45016012	Pi'ipawago nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi ma Trifina kwaloma Trifosa, awo biawa wanda' maol numa'uni Dembinaii. Pese'akw nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi ma Persis, ako'w alipu'wi ae'akwi endilisi, kwanda' maol hiani ahifini ma Dembinai.
45016013	Pi'ipago Rufusa nemaf bu'wafi anen epen bu'unai naloma ma'mana anani'wi ae' wapani egefala'w ma'mai.
45016014	Pi'ipasago dagala ae'ani ma nemaf bu'wafi ma Asinkritus, Flegon, Hermes, Patrobas, a Hermas, ea' esis Kristen sahin owan sape sagalomomi.
45016015	Ipa' pi'ipasago nemaf bu'wafi feloma dagala ae'ani ma Filologus noloma Julia, ea' Nereus noloma haniti'mana anani'wi, ea' Olimpas, soloma esis amam nematawa hiasi Godi sape sagaloma esisi.
45016016	Waf afamba apa' amam nematawa Godi, ipa' hipai atona atin pendagala pendaso'asa lagof esis sahin owan hiasi pindanifelis. Amam nematawa Kristen hiasi sagape na'ai sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi sandagalamepa.
45016017	Alipipai, ae' a'ipipa dindinipa silisolawi andeande' pegapoma anis epes sanda' waf awafii sanda' ipa' Kristen pendawal biafipa sogosambala basef ifimba ipa' pegefa'afi. Waf afambai esis sanda' epes hiasi sowa awes. Ipa' pese'as alafugah epes isimbai.
45016018	Esis ina sanda' maola Dembinai ape'inai Kraisi, owa'atin. Sagaila ukupa alop asasipi atopi. Sanda' basef atif usiusihifi ma sambaso'ma opalef saga'i'ipa anis epes isimba owa' sogogawa anef waf bu'wafi awafi andeandi'i'a.
45016019	Ipa' paila God, dei' epes hiasi sogawepa ea'. Isimba atis dei' ae' sonahema ipa'. Ae' a'i ipa' pendegawa waf bu'wafi endilisi, apa' ipa' ina ukup pendanda'ma waf awafi, owa'.
45016020	God anen kofagonama opaf awanifi, nogota kwaia'uta ma nofa'asa Satan nogafe' lafela bo'wagah ipe'igahi. Ae' ahali' God andabetena Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais notopalopepa dowaf nope atapina nogalomepa.
45016021	Wandao'oma wanda' maol atini Timoti anen nasapa'ago dagala nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'. Lusius naloma Jeson a Sosipater, amom Juda wapani si'i ae', amom wapani masapa' nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'.
45016022	Ae' Tertius, efa' malogola Pol anda'ago basef ifimba. Ae' asapa' basefa nemaf bu'wafi fafe'mago ipa' ma agol Dembinai ape'inai.
45016023	Gaius nasapa'ago dagala ma nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'. Anen numafi ae' Pol andeande' ipat ananitai, ea' numafi esis Kristen hiasi wapani safi'i sandakolas na'a'e. Erastus anen nanda' maola gavmani nugumafi otambai taun wambel ambalembai, ea' sahomapa ape'inai Kwartus, amom biam masapa'o basefa dagala bu'wani ma ipa'.
45016024	[Ae' andabetena Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais notopalopepa dowaf numafipa ma nope nogalomago ipa' hipai. Endilisi.]
45016025	-
45016026	Apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol. Anen la'ifinai ma nogowa' banagaip ma basef bu'wafi ananifi agawalapafi, ifimba basef bu'wafi faga'i Jisas Kraisi. Basef ifimba fowa' nimaguf hiafi ata' fape fandambaho', apa' dei' fataga alihifa basef ifimba fowa' amom profet manda'afi afa' wawalapef alihif. God nagape namona atapinai na'i basef dindinipa basef ifimba bu'wafi dei' fataga fandawalap alihifa misi'ah epes hiasi itap anamba hiagoma ma esis hiasi sogahapifana.
45016027	Anen atotona nogogawai endilisi. Apa' mondasa'ma agol ananigili dondol lifilafi. Jisas Krais atona natopalopapa mondanda'as na'amba. Endilisi.
46001001	-
46001002	Ae' Pol aposel Jisas Kraisi anda' maol ananini. Okom Godi atom nofale nandandepe anda' maol inimba. Ae' aloma owamapa Sostenes wape na'a'e wasapa' dagala nemaf bu'wafi nefe'mago ipa' amam nematawa Kristen sios pagape Korini. Ea' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa'. Ipa' pagape sisihipama Krais Jisasi, God nanda'epa pape hilili' nofalepa nosaho'epa ea' ananipai atipa. Afa' biafa wase'epa dagala ipa' paloma epes hiasi ma walemb hielimbi sogofala agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi, anen dembinai ma apa', esis wapani.
46001003	Afa' biafa wa'i God ape'inai noloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais monda'ago ipa' andeande' mumafipa motopalopago opalef ipe'ilifi fepe sa'ombel.
46001004	Ae' anifela God dondola ipa'. Dei' main, ipa' pagape sisihipama Krais Jisasi. Ea' God notopalopepa dowafa pegape andeande'ma anen atona.
46001005	Ipa' pape sisihipama Krais pape andeande' a'owa ea' pefa' basef hiafi paga'iefi faloma gawa hiani bu'wani.
46001006	Dei' main, basef ifimba bu'wafi Kraisi afa' wagawalapafi fataga alihif fandawalap banagambela opalef ipe'ilifi si'ilif.
46001007	Ea' dei' ipa' pape ukup pehafa dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais anaf nogataga alihina. Afamba pape pehafana apefa' presen hiani Ambal bu'unai Godi nagase'epan dowafi hi'alan. Ina anin akepa, owa'atin.
46001008	Jisas Krais atiasi nowa' banagaepa ma pegape banagepa atipipa pefe' pegatagama nemaf afamba Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nogafi'afii ma diga basef kofagesa akepa nemaf afamba.
46001009	God nanda' hiahawes ananisi hi'alas datimai nofalepa ma pegape opaf atof pegaloma Nogamana ananinai Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai.
46001010	Apa' ipa' sahin owan, a'ipipa banagoga ma agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi na'amba. Ipa' pendape mini'ap atetep endilisi pindaila nomonas atifisa okom atotom.
46001011	Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, esis mini'ap Klowei sa'ipi sa'i ipa' panda' migimigah sape la'afena ipa'.
46001012	Ae' a'i isimba, ipa' hipai atona atin paga'ias na'amba. Anis sa'i, “Apa' mini'ap Poli.” Anis sa'i, “Apa' mini'ap Apolosi.” Ea' anis sa'i, “Apa' mini'ap Pitai.” A anis sa'i, “Apa' mini'ap Kraisi.”
46001013	Ipa' panda'as na'amba ma main? Ipa' pa'i Krais nandawal wa'awa'ana? Ea' pa'i ae' Pol sandele lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ma agatopalopepa? Owa'atin endilisi. Ipa' ina pefa' baptaisa agol ae' Poli, owa'atin.
46001014	Ae' anda' baptaisima amam amamba ipe'imi biam Krispusi Gaius atom. Anis epes ipe'isi daias, owa'. Ae' anifela Goda ina anda' baptaisima anis ipe'isi wapani, owa'.
46001015	Ea' isimba dei' anin epen ina ni'ipipa ni'i ipa' pefa' baptaisa agol ae'agili, owa'.
46001016	Endilisi, anda' baptaisima esis wambota Stefanasi wapani, apa' ae' ina okom mandanda'ma anis wapani, owa'.
46001017	Dei' main, Krais ina nasapa'e afi'ima enda' baptaisima anis epes, owa'atin. Anen nasapa'e ma ewalapa basef bu'wafi Godi iga'if. Ae' ina ewalapa basef ifimba i'if ila anin gawa amom gawaimi maga'iani, owa'. Na'amba epes si'i basefa lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai Krais nagaga'agai si'i basef ifimba owa' banagafia falafifi atif.
46001018	Endilisi, epes isimba sagape ufia'w higiligalasa'wi, esis ukup pandanda'ma basefa lawag agamba usi'igai ti'wanaegai sagandola Kraisagai sa'i basef ambamba falafumi atom putuputa'imi. Apa' amam nematawa dei' God nape nofa'apa nakwahomapa waf awafi mogotanimaii ea' mogawa basef amamba banagami Godi atom.
46001019	Baibel naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Anaf ae' ehambombaga gawa esis isimba gawaisi. Ea' elefata nomonas epes isimba gawaisi saga'i nomonas sasisasi hiahiasii sagapaisi.”
46001020	Dei' amom gawaimi mondanda' mi'imama? Ea' amom gawaimi mogogawa gawa hianii monda' main? Ea' epes isimba itap apa'isi sa'i basef sapa'ef sandahihianamaifi sonda' mamahisa? Owa'atin. God nanda' gawa epes isimba itap apa'isi nataga falafalafini si'i epes isimba sahaga sagagaoli.
46001021	Dei' main, epes itapasi ina la'ifisa sogogawa Goda gawa inimba asasini atin, owa'atin. God anen gawainai ea' nasopamasa ufia'w asasi'wi. Ea' anen okom mandanda' na'i nofa'ai amam nematawa sogahapifanai sotanimai. Esis sahapifa basef ifimba waga'ipasafi epes itapasi saga'i wafifi gawa akafi.” Ea' God nofa'as sotanimai.
46001022	Esis Juda ukup paipaila sigati maol banagani atin si'i God nanda'ani apa' esis Grik ukup pa'ipa'i sogofa' gawa hiani lu'wani.
46001023	Apa' afa' wawalapa basefa Krais nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Basef ifimba fahambombaga ukup esis Judai. Apa' esis Grik ukup pandanda'mef pa'i amamba basef wafimi gawa akami.
46001024	Apa' amam nematawa God nogofalapai, esis Juda saloma anis Grik wapani, basef ifimba fa'i Krais anen banagami gawa Godi.
46001025	Dei' main, basef amamba Godi epes saga'i “Gawa akami wafimi”, amamba gawaimi atom lu'wami mikila' gawa epesi. Ea' hiahaom amamba epes saga'i “Awanami falafumi Godi”, amamba banagem a'owa' mikila' banagami epesi.
46001026	Alipipai ae'ipai, ipa' ata' ukup pendanda'ma fowa' dambadamba God nogofalepa ma pagataga Kristen. Ipa' hipai ina anis epes hiasi la'afena ipa' gawaisi ma itap ana'e, owa'atin. Owa' anis hiasi agof lu'wagufisa. Ea'owa' anis hiasi dembesi banagasia, owa'.
46001027	Apa' God okom ananimi atom nandandepa anis epesa sogape ananisi atis. Epes isimba esis amam nematawa itapasi saga'i gawa akasi, apa' God nandandepas ea' ma nogaha iwana epes gawaisi. Ea' epes isimba itapasi hiasi saga'i falafalafisi owa' banagasia, isimba God nandandepas ea' ma nogaha iwana epes isimba dambesi banagasi.
46001028	Anen nandandepa epes isimba amam nematawa itapasi saga'i owa' fasisia, falafisi atis dowafi agof akasi. Aho', anen nandandepasa nogahambombaga hiahaom amamba banagami mogoloma epes isimba banagasi agufisi itap ana'iisi.
46001029	Nanda'as na'amba ma anin epen ina la'ifina negasa'ma agol ananigili atogol lu'wagola naep Godi, owa'.
46001030	God nahapona ipa' pape sisihipama Krais Jisas ea' nanda' anen nape kofagonama gawa ape'inii. Anen atona ufia'w ape'ikwi ma God nanda'apa mogape be'epa hilili'i ma naep ananipi ma mogape ananipai atepa. Anen atona natalepa nakwahepa ma waf awafi ma magape wahifipa.
46001031	God nanda'am na'amba ma anif basef fagail Baibeli fetaga fendawalap. Basef ifimba faga'i, “Epen ami ni'i sonogahani, anin a' sonondahana Dembinai atona.”
46002001	Alipipai ae'ipai, fowa' agafe'mago ipa' awalapa basef endilisifi Godi ma ipa', ina awalapef a'if aloma gawa ae'ani lu'wani, ma basef bu'wambu'wafi ma iga'i'ipipa, owa'atin.
46002002	Dei' main, okom ae'ami mandanda' na'amba. Afamba ae' ape agalomepa ina ata' okom mapoma anom maefah daiam, owa'. Okom mase'e hiahaom. Ae' okom mondapoma Jisas Krais atona. Aho', anen naga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
46002003	Isimba atis nemaf afamba ape agalomepa, ae' owa' banagewea, ae' pupuliwi. Ae' ombal mahe bolatin ape a'owa'.
46002004	Ea' basef aga'ifa basef bu'wafi Kraisi, ifimba ina a'if gawa ae'ani aloma epesa igahekelipai, owa'atin. Ae' a'ipipa ihimba'mepa banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi atona.
46002005	Anda'as na'amba ma ipa' ina ukup paipaila gawa epesi dei' pahapifa God, owa'. Anda'asa ipa' ukup pehafel pigapigaila banagami Godi atom dei' pahapifana.
46002006	Aho' endilisi. Ae' awalapa basef gawa nagapaifi ma epes isimba mamahisa sahapifa Goda banages ea' sanda' waf ananifi. Apa' gawa ini'i, ina itap apaini, a'a gawa amam agufumi ma itap apai anaf higiligalam lamonami.
46002007	Waf ae'afi fowa' fagape na'amba, dei' wapani, awalapa basefa gawa Godi atin. Basefa gawa inimba fowa' nape nandambaho'ma epes, fowa' gani God ata' owa' nonda' itap apa'ea anen ea' nandandepa gawa inimba ma mogofa' banagami mogogala'i ananimi.
46002008	Owa' anona aman atotona agilinai ma itap apa'e nogawa basefa gawa inimbaea, owa'atin. I'i amom mogawanai, dei' ina mofa' Dembinai mondolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai, owa'atin. Dei' main, aman anamba banagonai mogogala'i banagamunai endilisi. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Amom agufumi ina mogawa basefa gawa inimba, owa'.
46002009	Apa' ae' a'i basefa gawa inimba si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Hiahaom maim God nagandondombam ea' ma epes mamahisa ukup pagaila anen endilisii, amamba a' mikila' ukup epesi. Esis ina la'ifis same'am satolom sagawama ukupi naep aligah asasisi, owa'atin.”
46002010	Apa' God nawalapa hiahaom amamba mandawalapa apa' ma Ambal bu'winai ananinai. Ambal Godi nati hiahaom hiami mape mandamabahi'i, ea' natolom nogawa nomonas hiasi ma waf Godi fape fandambaho' ape'i.
46002011	Dei' epen mamahina ipe'ini negawa nomonas anin epeni? Owa'atin. Ambal epen inimbai atol logawas. Ea' na'amba atin, ina anin epen negawa okom Godi, owa'. Ambal ananinai atona nogawana.
46002012	Apa' ina mofa' spirit ambal itapali, owa'atin. Apa' dei' mofa' Ambal bu'unai Godi ma mogogawa hiahaom maim God nogaso'apam dowafi.
46002013	Amamba ina nomonas gawa epesi sa'ipian, owa'atin. Amamba basef Ambal buwali Godi nagawalapafi. Dei' a'ipasa basef ifimba awalapef a'ifa Ambal bu'unai Godi ma epes isimba mamahisa Ambal Godi nagapaisi.
46002014	Apa' epen ami Ambal bu'unai Godi akan, anin ina la'ifina negefa' hiahaom amamba fasim Ambal Godi nogoso'apam dowafi, owa'atin. Epen inimba okom mapoma amamba na'i falafumi sonda'am ki de'iafami. Anin ina negawam, owa'. Dei' main, Ambal bu'unai Godi atona nawalipasa amamba kofagema.
46002015	Epen mamahina Ambal bu'unai Godi nagapaini, anin nagahihi' hiahawes hiasi. Apa' ina anin epen la'ifina nigahihi' epen inimba Ambal Godi nagapaini, owa'atin.
46002016	Aho', “Dei' epes ami sogawa hiahawesa okom Dembinaii ma atiasi la'ifisa sigihimba'ma anis? Owa'atin.” Apa' dei' apa' mofa' okom Kraisi mapaepa.
46003001	Alipipai, fowa' ae' ina a'ipipa basef si'i agaso'asef epes isimba sagaila okom Ambal bu'unai Godii, owa'. A'ipipaef si'i agaso'asef epes isimba ukup pagaso'asa basef kofagefa Godii, si'i awasi ata' saga' nomagof atogufi.
46003002	Ata' ase'epa nomagof atogof. Ina dei' ase'epa gwa'aisi banagasi, ata' owa'. Dei' main, ipa' ina la'ifipa, ata' owa'. Ae' a'ias endilisi atis, ipa' dei' wapani ata' owa'.
46003003	Dei' main, ipa' ata' pagape atapipa ma waf opaf apinaii. Endilisi, waf anamba nawalapai waf kowagalasafi faloma ukup awepa sahin owani ma basef fitapaifi ata' fape atapifa ipa'. Isimba sihimba'ma apa' hiapai ipa' ata' paila waf anamba nembel apinai. Waf anamba epes itapasi atona.
46003004	Anin epen na'i, “Ae' mini'ap Poli.” Anin na'i, “Ae' mini'ap Apolosi.” Waf afambai ipa' ata' pape si'i epes itapasi atapipa.
46003005	Ipa' ata' nomonas sondanda'mas andeande'. Apolos anen aman mamahonama? A ae' Pol aman mamahowema? Afa' biafa wanda' maoli atofa. Dembinai naso'afa maol nandandafa. Ea' maol inimba afa' biafa wanda'ani, ufia'w akwamba ato'w dei' ipa' pahapifa Krais.
46003006	Ae' ali' ewaha olemb gwa'aimbi, Apolos nagi' nakolo' embelas. Apa' God atotona nanda'am mataga.
46003007	Ea' dei' epen inimba negewaha olemb gwa'aimbii, anin agol akan. Ea' epen nagakolo' embelasi wapani anin agol akan, apa' God nanda' gwa'aisi isimba sagatagai, anen atona agol lu'wagili gatomana.
46003008	Ea' epen inimba negewaha olemb gwa'aimbii naloma epen inimba nagaso' embelembii, esis bias sanda' maol inimba atini. Ea' esis bias atona atin anaf sofa' hiahawes sondahama maol sanda'ani.
46003009	Dei' main, afa' biafa wanda' maol atitin Godi. Ea' ipa' si'i aof ananifi. Ipa' si'i ipat Godi.
46003010	Ama okom ananimi magamagailapai nagatopalopapa dowafi nanda'e ataga ape ali' si'i epen gawainai nanda' ifagwi, ea' awa olaf fape fali' anis sola' ipat totomaf. Apa' epes hiasi atona atin solawais andeande' asola' ipat totoma olaf afamba.
46003011	Ipa' pegawa God nanda' Jisas Krais nape nali' si'i olaf fotawa fagali'i. Isimba atis ina ata' anin epen la'ifina nogawa anof olaf daiaf wapani, owa'atin.
46003012	I'i epen ami ni'i nela' ipat togatoma olaf afamba ilifi, anin nenda' gol nela'ata o nenda' silva mogogala' gambigambisi nela'ata, o nenda' anemba otamba sagalotamamba a'owa'i, o nenda' lawah o nenda' walol o otalef alilifi, nela'ata.
46003013	Nemaf afamba Krais nogafi'afii, maol inimba hiasi sonda'ani netaga nondawalap alihin nepe bo'wen a'a awen. Nemaf afamba fetaga feloma nif lu'wafi. Ea' nif ifimba fendo maol inimba hiani epes hiasi atona atini hi'ilana sogogawa maol asasini bo'wen a'a awen.
46003014	I'i anin epen nela' ipat togatoma olaf afamba ilifi ma nif owa' fendetaea, anaf nefa' anom hiahaom fasimi.
