46003015	Apa' i'i ipat epen nanda' maoli fendota hi'igalata, anaf ina nefa' amamba fasimi, owa'atin. Endilisi, God nofa'an nogotanimai, apa' hiahawes akan nepe dowaf si'i mutanima magalu'wani nifi.
46003016	Ipa' pegawa a'a owa'? Ipa' atipa si'i ipat lu'unai Godi, ea' Ambal bu'unai ananinai nape nomona opalef ipe'ilifi.
46003017	I'i anin epen nehambombaga ipat anamba, anaf God nohambombaga epen inimba. Dei' main, ipat anamba ananinai bo'ona hilili'i. Anamba ea' ipa' atipa.
46003018	Na'amba anin epen nembaso'ma anin atin. I'i epen ipe'ini okom mondanda' ni'i anin gawaini si'i epes itapasi sogofalasi, epen inimba andeande'ma nendambema ata' netaga okom moso'an nili' ma atiasi negataga epen gawaini endilisi.
46003019	Dei' main, gawa itapani inimba falafalafini si'i basef epes sahaga sagagauli saga'iani ma naep Godi. Si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “God nofa' epes gawaisi ma waf gawaifi fafifafi asasifi atef baso'afi si'i epes sagaha mafis isalef.”
46003020	Ea' Baibel na'ias wapani na'amba na'i, “Dembinai nogawa nomonas epes sogogawai falafisi atis.”
46003021	Ea' anin epen ina nefela agof apa' epesi, owa'i. Hiahaom hiami ipe'imi atom.
46003022	Poli Apolos, Pita maloma itap apa'e saloma ambal namili a ga' wapani saloma hiahawes dei' sagapani, anaf sigi' sogatagai, amamba hiami ipe'imi atom.
46003023	Ea' ipa' epes Krais Jisasi, ea' anen Godi.
46004001	Ipa' pendegawa afa' wanda' maol Kraisi ugumafi basef endilisfi Godi fowa' fape fandambahi'ii dei' fataga fandawalap alihif.
46004002	I'i aman dembinai noso'ana maol anin epena nigimafian, anin nimafian ninda'an datima andeande' hi'indalan.
46004003	I'i ipa' pewaloga waf ae'afi ma anis daias sonda'me kot sowaloga waf ae'afi, ae' okom mopoma amamba falafumi atom. Ae' wapani ae' atowe ina awaloga waf ae'afi, owa'.
46004004	Endilisi, malogol gagape opaf ae'afi nomoni ae' ina ame' anef waf awafi anda'afi, owa'. Apa' isimba ina sihimba'me endilisi ma iga'i, “Ae' epen usi'iwi hilili'i”, owa'atin. Aman dembinai jas nogawaloga ae'i, Dembinai atona.
46004005	Ea' dei' nogota dondo'atai ata' owa' ma, ipa' owa'i pewawaloga waf anin epen daiana. Ipa' ata' pepe pehafa nemaf afamba Dembinai nugafi'afii. Anaf anen nofa'i hiahaom hiami mandamabaho' magape akoti motaga mondawalap hauguma nogogala'ma. Nemaf afamba anen nowalapa ukup epes hiasi pape pandambahi'i petaga pindawalap alihigima. Ea' God ni'ipapa basef ananifi apa' hiapai hi'ilapa atona atin dondo' ma maol apa' manda' ani, bo'wen a'a awen.
46004006	Alipipai, ae' okom mandanda' ma'i etopalopepa. Isimba atis ae'i Apolos wihimba'mepa basef ifimba doko' aga'ipipafi kofagefa ma waf afa'ifi. Afa' wanda'as na'amba ma ipa' pegelafa waf ape'ifi basef ifimba kofagefa fa'ias faga'i, “Ipa' ina pimbisila' mu'uli inimba, owa'i.” Ea' dei' ipa' ina penda' du'waniga pesa'ma agola anona daiana, owa'i.
46004007	Alipipai, ipa' panda'as mama? Ami nanda'epa pape dembipai pikila' anis epes daias? Hiahawes isimba hiasi God atona nase'epas. Ea' ipa' ina penda' du'waniga pi'i ipa' atipa dembipai banagipai, owa'i. Hiahawes isimba hiasi ipe'isi, God atona nase'epas.
46004008	O aho', opalef ipe'ilifi asi'ilif ea'! Ipa' hiahaom hiamipai asi'ipa dondo'! Ipa' apikila'afa pataga dembipai king! O uwahipipa! Ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma petaga pegape dembipai kinga atiasi ope dembifai king ogalomepa!
46004009	Ae' okom mandanda' na'amba a'i God nanda' afa' aposel si'i epes sape agof akasi sagagi' endilisii. Epes hiasi hi'alas sagape ilif itapi saloma amom ensel wapani satolofa wandahama epes isimba atiasi sohas sogaga'i.
46004010	Afa' wape si'i epes ukup pagaso'asi ma ogasa'ma agol Kraisi, apa' ipa' pape epes gawaipai ma waf ananifi. Afa' owa' banagefaea, apa' ipa' banagepa ea'. Ipa' agof lu'wagof, apa' afa' agof akafa.
46004011	Fowa' gani wapani nafi'i nataga nogota ata'e wape nolomahafa a bambafugah fataugahifa a'owa', ea' luwaguf mais akafa. Esis sindiwa lagof sahafa atin. Afa' wambel akafa ma ofe' ogape andeande'.
46004012	Wanda' maol numa'uni endilisi ma lagof afa'igufi atogof. Esis sa'i basef sanda'afa findiwafa owa' afa' banagefa ofalo'mas wagwamasa basef bu'wafi atif. Esis sanda'afa aofa, wape banagefa watitilis, afa' ina wagwamas, owa'.
46004013	Esis sa'ipafa basef awafi endilisi apa' owa' wagwamasa basef awanafi sa'osa'ombel. Wataga si'i alapita awasimi endilisi ma itap hiagoma si'i alogw gwagailasi, si'i itap sagafafali'api. Fowa' gani wape na'amba atin wafi'i wataga dei'.
46004014	Ae' ina anda' basef ifimba ma fenda'epa ambagof ipe'igufi awagof, owa'atin. Ae' okom maimailipa si'i awasi ae'ipai, a'i isalima nomonas ipe'isi.
46004015	I'i endilisi ipa' amom mogawalipipa basef Kraisi 10,000-pelaim ea' hapaimi, apa' ahapepa ina hiam, owa'. Waf Krais Jisasi atef ae' atowe ape ahamepa ipe'iwai, ipa' pataga batawis ae'ipai ma basef bu'wafi Godi agawalipipafi.
46004016	Isimba atis dei' afela ukup ipe'ipi ma pigaila waf ae'afi pegafe'.
46004017	Ea' asapa' Timoti nafe'mago ipa'. Anen nogame ae'anai wanda' maol Dembinaii. Anen nugumafi maol inimba datima andeande'i. Ae' okom mailana a'owa', dei' asapa'ana ma atiasi nogasa'ma nomonas ipe'isi ma basefi fe' poe ae'asi agaila waf Kraisi. Ae' agawalipa esis Kristen sios walemb anamba hiagoma ma basefi waf ea' isimba atis.
46004018	Anipa ukup pandanda' pa'i ae' bola dao' efo'o ea' panda' du'waniga.
46004019	Apa' owa'atin. I'i Dembinai ni'i aho'ai, dao' efe'mago ipa' kwafalis. Apa' ae' ina efe'mago ipa'ma egegawa basef amam manda' du'wanigai manda'afi atif, owa'. Basef amamifi hapaifi. Ae' a'i efo'o egawa wafi maol mais Godi amom manda'asi.
46004020	Dei' main, kofegama amamba ma epes isimba sugawisa maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias, amamba ina hiahaom moga'ian atini, owa'atin. Amamba ina basef atif, owa'. Amamba banagami Godi atom.
46004021	Ipa' ukup pa'i waf mamahefa, pa'i efa'ago bumbulita okom wandafumi efo'o ma igasindi'amonepa, o pa'i efa'ago waf okom magamagailipafi sa'ombelifi efe'mepago? Isimba nomonas ipe'isi atis.
46005001	Anif basef fatagama ae' fa'i waf afamba awafi so'a waulafi fapoma ipa'. Waf awafi endilisi fagahambombaga daso'amai, waf afambai epes isimba sogololama Godi ina sanda' anef waf awafi na'ambaifi, owa'atin. Waf afamba na'amba. Anona aman a' naso' nemata'w kugumafianai ahamana nagaso'akwi.
46005002	Dei' ipa' ata' panda' du'waniga atin pasa'ma agof ipe'igufi ma waf afamba awafi ma main? Na'ambai owa'i. A' andeande'ma opalef ipe'ilifi fepe si'ilifa lef ipe'ini ma pegalopa waf afambai awafi. Ipa' pili'amona aman anamba nanda' waf afambai ma ina ata' nope wapani nolomepa, owa'.
46005003	Endilisi, alop ae'api pape laogona ipa', apa' ambal ae'ali lape lalomepa. Ae' si'i endilisi ape agalomepa ma agawaloga waf aman anamba nanda'afi awafi.
46005004	Dei' a'ias ea' na'amba. Nemaf afamba ipa' pendakolasafi ma agol Dembinai Jisasi, ambal ae'ali loloma banagami Dembinai ape'inai Jisasi amamba mope molomepa nemaf afamba.
46005005	Apa' a' miliamonago aman anamba nefe'mago Satana nogahambombaga alop poloma nembel apinai ananinai. Monda'as na'amba ma God nogowambilai ambal aman anambai nemaf Dembinai akutaifi.
46005006	Ipa' panda' du'waniga pasa'ma agof ipe'igufi atogof lu'wagof patiti waf afamba awafi fapomepa, amamba ina waf bu'wafi, owa'atin. Ipa' pegawa ea' basefa mu'uli inimba ma yis isimba sanda' bret tagatifi faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Yis kwasala'wis dowaf sanda' bret hiatai hi'alata tatef lu'uta.”
46005007	Ea' ipa' pili'amona yis amamba apimi ma pegape si'i bret dambaitai yis akatai, si'i endilisi ipa' pagataga epes dambaipai. Dei' main, sipsip sondolali sagahanama gwa'aisi lu'wasi Pasovai anen Krais, esis a' sahana naga' ea', si'i sondolali gwa'aisi mafis maisa God.
46005008	Ea' apa' mondanda' gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Pasova, apa' ina mofa' yis amamba apimi, owa'i. Amamba si'i waf awasinai endilisi. Apa' mondofa' bret wafitai yis akatai, isimba si'i wafa ukup usi'ip hilili'i basef endilisifi.
46005009	Anif basef ali' anda'ef fagafe'ma ipe'i, aga'if na'amba. “Ipa' ina pefala epes isimba sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafii pi'i alipisi, owa'i.”
46005010	Ae' ina a'iasa pegakwaha epes isimba endilisi sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafii, a epes isimba kowagalasa hiahawes anis daiasi a epes isimba sanda' wali o sagahambombaga anis daiasi soloma isimba sanda' lotuma god baso'amunai, owa'. I'i ipa' pi'i pegakwahis endilisima, dao' pekwaha itap apa'e hi'indalepa.
46005011	Apa' basef dei' anda'afi kofagefa na'amba. I'i anona aman ipa' pegefalona owamepai nonda' waf awafi so'a waulafi o kowogalanama hiahawes anis daiasi o nonda' lotuma god baso'amunai, ni'i basef alafugahafi, nea' embel okom mogahanai, nonda' wal nohambombaga anis daias, ipa' ina pefalana alipinai ipe'inai pi'i basef pelomana, owa'i hapainai. Ipa' ina pea' gwa'aisi peloma epes na'ambaisi wapani, owa'.
46005012	-
46005013	Maol sagahihi' epes sagape ando'ma siosi ina maol ae'ani, owa'. God atona anaf nowaloga waf epes isimbai. Apa' maol sagahihi' epes sagape nomoni, dao' inimba maol ipe'ini, ipa' pendanda'an. “Ipa' li'amonago aman aunai nape la'afena ipa' nanda' waf awafii.”
46006001	I'i anin epen la'afena ipa' nenda' basef fila anin epen daian, ina andeande'ma epen inimba netopa'ma esis amam nematawa Godi sope ma nefe' nenda' kota naep amom dembami jas mogololama Godii. Na'ambai owa'i. Andeande'ma epen inimba ambal aola nefe' nenda' kota naep amom jas mogololama Godii.
46006002	Apa' amam nematawa Godi anaf mowawaloga waf epes hiasi itapasi hi'ilas. Ipa' pegawa isimba a'a owa'? Dei' mama? A'i ipa' owa' la'ifipama ata' pegawawaloga basef atif sa'ufi fafifafi ipe'ifia?
46006003	Apa' anaf mowawaloga waf amom enseli wapani. Ipa' pegawa isimba, a'a owa'? Isimba atis dei' apa' la'ifipa endilisi ma mogawaloga basef hiahawes itap apa'isi.
46006004	Ea' i'i ipa' anif basefa hiahawes itapasima, dei' maina ipa' pagaso'am maol inimba sogawaloga basefa epes isimba owa' agof fogatomasa siosia? Owa'.
46006005	Ae' anda' basef ifimba ma fenda' ambagof ipe'igufi awagof. Dei' main? Gawaimi ipe'imi hiami mape la'afena ipa' amom la'ifimama mogawaloga anif basef fegataga la'afena sahin owan bias ipe'isii.
46006006	Apa' owa' dei' anin epen alipini nanda' kotima sahin owan ananini ma naep amom dembami jas owa' mogohapifa Kraisia.
46006007	Aho', ipa' panda' kotima esis alipisi ea' isimba atis dei' sihimba'ma ae' ipa' apewa ea'. Dei' maina owa' pepe pititilisa sonda'mepa waf awafia? Ea' owa' pi'i aho'mas sohondo' anom maefah ipe'imia?
46006008	Penda'am na'amba owa'i. Apa' ipa' ea' panda' waf awafima anis epes pahokola hiahawes asasisi! Aho', ipa' panda' waf na'ambaifi ma esis alipisi endilisi ipe'isi atis.
46006009	Epes mamahisa sanda' waf awafii, anaf ina sofe' anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin. Pegawa isimba a'a owa'? Na'amba ipa' pembaso'ma ukup ipe'ipi atip. Epes sanda' waf awafi ma so'a waola anis amam nematawa daiasi, a epes isimba sanda' lotuma god baso'amunai, a epes sagahabombaga waf daso'amaifi, a amam amamba ukup paga'i waf nematawaifi, a amom amamba manda' waf awafi magaloma anom amami,
46006010	a isimba sanda' wali, a epes kowagalasa hiahawes anis daiasi sa'i sogofa'as atini, a epes isimba sa' embela ukup magahasi, a epes isimba saga'i basef awafi findiwaifi ma anis epesi, ea' isimba sanda' wal sagahambombaga epesi, epes isimba na'ambaisi ina anaf sefe' suwis anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin.
46006011	Fowa' anipa panda' waf afambai. Owa', God nasa'opepa nosaho'epa ea' ananipai atipa si'ipa. God nanda'epa' pagataga epes bu'upai hilili'i ma naep ananipi. Anen nanda'epa na'amba atina agol Dembinai Jisas Kraisi ma Ambal bu'winai God ape'inai.
46006012	Endilisi, anif basef fape fa'i, “Hiahaom hiami hi'ilam andeande'ma ae' enda'am.” Apa' hiahaom amamba atiasi enda'ami ina matopalope, owa'atin. Basef ifimba faga'i, “Hiahaom hiami andeande'ma enda'am.” Basef ifimba fape, apa' ae' ina i'i aho'ma anin mae nepe lu'win nembale'e, owa'atin.
46006013	Apa' anis epes daias sa'i, “Gwa'aisi isimba, alopi atis ea' alop papoma poga' gwa'aisi atis.” Apa' hiahawes isimba biafis, alop paloma gwa'aisi, anaf God nolamonas atef hi'ilas. God ina nanda' alop ape'ipi ma ponda' waf awafi so'a waulafi, owa'atin. Anen nanda'apa ponda' maol ananini atin bu'wani. Ea' anen Dembinai ma alop ape'ipi nugumafiapi.
46006014	Ama banagami ananimi atom nasa'ma Dembinai nosafel wandof matmat, ea' anaf na'amba atina nosa'mapa mogosafel wandelef wapani.
46006015	Alop ipe'ipi alop wa'awa'ap Kraisi atop. Isimba ipa' pegawas a'a owa'? Ea' dei' ipa' pa'i ae' ata' etopa' anop alop wa'awa'ap Kraisi kwaia'up esap poloma alop ano'w nemata'w kwanda' so'a wauli? Owa'atin endilisi!
46006016	Epen mamahina nefa' alop ananipi nesap pogaloma alop ano'w nemata'w kwanda' so'a wauli, anin ea' nataga alop atifip naloma ako'w. Ipa' pegawa isimba a'a owa'? Dei' main, Baibel na'ias ea' waf afamba daso'amaifi usi'ifi na'i, “Esis bias asataga alop atifipa waf afambai.”
46006017	Apa' epen ami nepe sisihin tatala'in negaloma Dembinai a' nataga nomonas atifis nalomana, si'i epen atitin.
46006018	Ipa' pendakwaha waf awafi so'a waulafi pefa' pendafe'. Anef waf hiafi awafi sanda'af alop ando' atogon. Apa' epen nanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi, nanda' waf awafima alop ananipi atop.
46006019	Alop ipe'ipi ipat bu'unai Ambal bu'unai Godii. Ipa' pegawa isimba a'a owa? Ambal anamba a nosaho'epa ea' nape nomona ipa'. Ipa' ina ipa' atipai, owa'atin. Ipa' ananipai atipa si'ipa.
46006020	God natalepa ma maol lu'wani a'owa'. Isimba atis dei' pendasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagola alop ipe'ipi.
46007001	Dei' a'i egwamepa basef ifimba hali'ifi panda'ef fagafi'ii. I'i anona aman owa' nogaso' ano'w nemata'wia, ea' andeande'.
46007002	Apa' owa', waf naninani aunai ma so'a wauli nape. Ea' dei' andeande'ma amam nematawa hiasi atona atin sondaso'ama daindai.
46007003	Alop amani ako'w waulu'mana kumafiap. Aman ina nonda'imap ni'i ananipi, owa'. Ea' na'amba atina alop waulu'manai, alop anen waulunama'w akwa'unaii. Ako'w wapani ina kunda'imap kwi'i akwa'upi, owa'.
46007004	Nemata'w ina kope dambe'w kumafi alop akwa'upi, owa'atin. Aman akwa'unai numafiap. Ea' na'amba atina aman ina nope dambena numafi alop ananipi, owa'atin. Ako'w waulu'mana kumafiap.
46007005	Ipa' bipa pandaso'ama ea' ipa' bipa anin ina newa' alafuga anin ninda'ima alop ananipi, owa'i. Ama i'i ipa' ukup pegape atogona pihi'ama alop nogota bandata ma penda' betena, dao' ipa' pinda'i awi na'amba atina pendabeten bu'wani. Ama ea', penda' alop pondaloma wapani. Na'amba ukup pese'epama pigimafi alop andeande' ea' Satan nogwambepa penda' waf awafi.
46007006	Basef ifimba ae'afi ma amam nematawa sondaso'ama fagape na'amba. Apa' basef ifimba ina lu'wafi ma pigailaf banagambili, owa'. Ifimba basef kwaia'uf aso'epaef atopalopepa.
46007007	Ae' okom ma'i ipa' amam nematawa hipai pepe si'i ae', owa' egaso' nemata'wia. Apa' God a' naso'as hiahaom fasimi mandandas daindai. Anin anom daiam a anin anom daiam.
46007008	Apa' esis amam nematawa owa' sondaso'amaia saloma nematawa alifiwai amom maga' makwahowa wagapani, isimba na'amba. I'i ipa' pegape dowaf si'i ae', andeande'.
46007009	Apa' i'i owa' la'ifipama pepe andeande' pimafi nelelelmb beloma alop ipe'isi andeande'a, dao' pendandaso'ama. Waf ipa' pandaso'amafi, afamba a' andeande' fikila' waf ukup pegehafel banagepa waf awafi so'a waulafi.
46007010	-
46007011	Apa' esis amam nematawa sandaso'ama ea'i, ae' aso'as mu'uli inimba. Inimba ina mu'uli ae'ani atin, owa'atin. Mu'uli inimba Dembinaii na'amba. Ano'w nemata'w ina ko'waha aman akwa'unai, owa'. Apa' ako'w kwi'i kogakwahona, kondape dowaf. I'i owa', kotanima kofe'ma anen wapani kolomana nembel atotombel. Ea' anona aman wapani ina nili'amona waulu'mana anani'wi, owa'i.
46007012	Apa' dei' a'ipa ipa' iafipa na'amba a'i. Basef ifimba ina basef Dembinaii, owa'. Ifimba dei' a'ipipa na'amba a'i i'i fowa' esis bias owa' ata' sohapifa Kraisa ma sondaso'ama sili', ma dei' anen nagi' nahapifa Kraisa ako'w kwi'i aho'ma koso'ana kolomana kogape, anen ina nili'amona'w, owa'i.
46007013	Apa' i'i ako'w ato'w dei' kugi' kohapifa Kraisa nogaso'akwa, ma ni'i aho' nope nogaloma'wa, ako'w ina kwili'amonana, owa'i.
46007014	Dei' main, aman owa' nogahapifa Kraisia nape sisihina nagaloma waulu'mana kwagahapifa Kraisi, anen a' nataga andeande' si'i God nandandepana ea'i. Ea' nemata'w owa' kogahapifa Kraisia kwape kwagaloma anen nagahapifa Kraisi, a' kwataga andeande' si'i God a' nandandepa'w ea'i. I'i owa' ma, bola sogola awasi, ina atiasi sotaga bo'wes, owa'. Apa' dei' sape andeande' si'i God nandandepas ea'i.
46007015	Apa' epen ami owa' negahapifa Kraisia ni'i nekwaha waulu'mana a'a waulunama'w, dao' anin a' nendafe'. I'i waf afambai fetaga na'amba ma esis isimba ipe'isi sahomepa o owamepa aman nemata'w, esis ina ata' tatala'is sape si'i sanda' kalabusi, owa'. God nofalapa ma mogaila wafa opaf awanafi.
46007016	Nemata'w, ina' anaf la'ifinama negatopalopa waulunamena nogataga Kristen a'a owa'? Isimba ina' owa' negawasa. Ea' ina' aman wapani, anaf la'ifinama negatopalopa waulu'mina ine'ikwi kogataga Kristen a'a owa'?
46007017	Maol main bu'wani Dembinai nagawalogan nagaso' anin epeni, anin a' nendape atapina maol inimba atin nali' nanda'ani. Ae' a'ipas mu'uli inimba atina esis Kristen hiasi sios sagape walemb hiagomai.
46007018	A'i anona aman mali' matopa'mana alop ananipi ma God dei' nofalana? Dao' anen ina a' nofana melet atamba alop ananipi wapani nombaho'wata, owa'i. Ea' aman ami owa' motopa'mana alopa ma God dei' nofalanaia, amom ina motopa'mana alop ananipi, owa'i.
46007019	Waf magatopa' alopafi faloma waf owa' mogatopa' alopafia wapani falafifi atef. Apa' waf sagaila mu'uli Godiafi afamba waf endilisifi.
46007020	Ipa' pagapoma maol mamahina bu'wani God dei' nogofalipai, ipa' atapipa pendapoma maol inimba atin.
46007021	I'i ipa' agof akipai panda' maol pagape lafela anis epesi ma dei' God nogofalipai, dao' ipa' ina ukup nimanipa isimba, owa'i. Apa' i'i ano'w ufia'wa pekwaha maol inimba pegape wahifipa, dao' andeande'.
46007022	Dei' main, epen ami agol akani nanda' maol nagape lafela anis epesi, dei' epen inimba Dembinai nakwahoman waf awafi a' wahifin ea' ananini atin. Ea' na'amba atina epen nagape wahifina owa' negape lafela anis epesia dei' Dembinai nofalan ea' nanda' maol nape lafela Krais.
46007023	God natalepa ma maol bu'wani lu'wani ananini. Ea' ipa' ina pepe lafela epes itapasi, owa'i.
46007024	Ipa' alipipai, maol inimba mamahina bu'wani epen inimba nali' nenda'ani ma God dei' nogofalani, dao' anin a' nindapoma maol inimba atin naep Godi.
46007025	Amam nematawa isimba ata' owa' sondaso'amaia, ae' mu'uli Dembinaii akemas, apa' awalapa nomonas ae'asi atis a'ipipa. Anen nati uwahipiwi natopalope ea' nanda'e anda' maol ananini andeande' datima. Na'amba dei' ipa' a' pendame' basef ae'afi andeande'.
46007026	Ama nogota ata'e dei' nimanimi lu'wami mataga, na'amba ipa' a' andeande'ma ipa' hipai pendape na'amba atin si'i dei' pagape.
46007027	Ina' nali' nagaso' nemata'w ea'i, ina nili'amona'w, owa'i. I'i ina' ata' owa' negaso' nemata'wia, ina' okom mondanda' ni'i nefa' ano'w, owa'i.
46007028	Apa' i'i ina' negefa' nemata'wa, ina nanda' waf awafi, owa'. Ea' i'i nemata'w aiawai'wi kogaso' aman, ako'w ina kwanda' waf awafi, owa'. Apa' amam nematawa sandaso'amai esis atiasi a' sofa' nimanimi lu'wami itap apa'e. Andaiwa'ma nimanimi amamba mogatagamepa.
46007029	Ipa' alipipai, a'i basef ae'afi kofagefa na'amba. Dei' nogota ata'e ea' bandata ma itap apa'e pa'i higiligalap. Isimba atis dei' ipa' amam pagaso' nematawai pendape si'i nematawa akipai.
46007030	Ea' epes isimba sawa sagalifi sondape si'i isimba owa' sowa sogalifia. Epes sandagalai sondape si'i isimba owa' sondagalaia. Ea' isimba sagatala hiahawesi sondape si'i sugumafi hiahawes isimba dowafi, owa' asasisia.
46007031	Epes isimba sanda' maola hiahaom itapamii, sondape si'i isimba owa' ukup pigapigaila hiahaom itap apa'imia. Dei' main, apa' mogawa, itap apa'e atiasi petaga pendaho'of higililap.
46007032	Ae' a'i ipa' opalef fendape awanelef, andaiwa'ma hiahaom mamimami mogalalamona nomanas ipe'isi. Amam owa' mogaso' nematawaia ukup palapafe' hihipa maol Dembinaii, ma'i monda' hiahawes Dembinai okom maga'iasi.
46007033	Apa' amam amamba magaso' nematawai, ukup amamipi pafe'ma hiahawes itap apa'isi. Ma'i mondanda' hiahawesa waf awo wauhiamam ukup panda'iefi.
46007034	Ea' ukup amamipi a' pandawal biafip. Apa' nemata'w aiawai'wi ata' owa' kogaso' amania, okom malamafe' a'owa' ma maol Dembinai. Ako'w okom mandanda'ma koso' ako'w ato'w kogafe'ma Dembinai ma kope anani'wi hi'igala'w. Apa' nemata'w kwagaso' amani, nomonas salasagafe'ma hiahaom itap apa'imi atom kwa'i kondanda' waf waulunama'w okom manda'iefi.
46007035	Ae' a'i basef ifimba ma etopalopepa pegape andeande'. Ifimba ina fegasopama ipe'i, owa'atin. Ae' a'i ipa' pendape usi'ipa dondol pendanda' maol Dembinaii atin ama anis maemaefah ina sopati ukup ipe'ipi, owa'atin. Ipa' pendape ukup atifip endilisi.
46007036	I'i anona aman okom mondanda' ni'i, anen ina nanda' waf usi'ifima nemata'w aiawai'wi esis sandandepamana'w anini. Ama okom ananimi mohafema ako'w, ma owa' niti ano'w ufia'wa, anen nila okom ananimi nogaso'akwa, ea' andeande'. Anen ina nanda' waf awafi, owa'. Esis bias ea' sondaso'ama.
46007037	I'i anen owa' okom bimbiafim mopoma ako'wa, nope banagona ninindifa okom ananimi andeande' ni'ias ni'i ako'w kondape dowaf, na'ambai andeande' wapani.
46007038	Ea' aman ami nagaso' nemata'w anani'wi ea'i, anen nanda' waf bu'wafi. Apa' aman ami ata' owa' nogaso'akwia, anamba nanda' waf fasifi a'owa'.
46007039	I'i anona aman nagaso' nemata'wi ata' nogape namona, nemata'w akwamba anani'wi ata' kwape sisihi'w kwalomana. Apa' i'i waulunama'w akwa'unai nogaga', dao' ina ata' anin mae nahipa'w sisihi'w wapani, a' owa'. Ako'w okom ma'i kogaso' aman mamahonama wapanima, dao' kondaso'ana. Apa' ako'w kondaso' aman Kristen.
46007040	Apa' ae' okom mandanda' na'amba. I'i ako'w kogape dowaf, atiasi kondagala a'owa kwikila' dagala kwagaso' amani. Nomanas ae'asi a'i basef ifimba ea' ae' okom mandanda' ma'i ae' wapani efa' Ambal bu'wali Godi nape ae' nihimba'me basef ifimba.
46008001	Dei' ae' a'i i'i basefa mafis saham sowa'am sogopehafa wale anamba baso'amunai. Endilisi, “Apa' hiapai mogawa”, si'i ipa' paga'ias. Gawa inimba atin wafini nagasa'mai waf sanda' du'wanigafi, apa' i'i apa' ukup pipila sahin owan, isimba atiasi sotopalopapa a' motaga Kristen banagepa.
46008002	I'i anona aman okom mondanda' mi'i anen gawainai, owa'atin. Anen owa' ata' nogawa andeande'a.
46008003	Apa' epen ami okom magamagaila Godi, dao' God nogawa epen inimba ea' ananini.
46008004	Waf saga' mafis saham sondolali sagaso' wale baso'amunai ina endilisinai, owa'atin. Anen ikwaf atona wafinai. Ina a' wale endilisinai nape, owa'atin. God endilisinai anen atona nape.
46008005	Endilisi, hiahaom hiami sofalam saga'i, “Dembamii.” I'i a' endilisi ma amom amamba sofalam soga'i, “Wale god baso'amunai” mope ilifi itap,
46008006	ea' diamamo hapaimi. God apa' manda' lotumanai atotona nape. Anen God ahamapa, anen atona kofagonama hiahaom hiami. Kofagema apa' magape itap apa'e, manda' maol ananini atin. Ea' Dembinai atotona nape, anen Jisas Krais. Lagol ananigili atogol dei' God nanda' hiahaom hiami mataga mape. Krais atona nanda' apa' mataga mape namepa.
46008007	Apa' anis epes gawa inimbai bu'wani akas. Epes isimba fowa' saila wale baso'amunai. Ea' dei' sa' mafis amamba sondolali sagaso' wale baso'amunaiami, ukup asasipi papoma mafis amamba sa'i, “Amamba endilisimi,” ea' sa'am. Malogof fagape ukup nomoni ea' aluguma amamba fihimba'ma esis sanda' waf awafi ea'. Dei' main, ukup asasipi ina kilikala' sawalagam andeande' sa'am, owa'.
46008008	Apa' gwa'aimi amamba ina mofa'apa mefe' felefe'ma God, owa'atin. I'i apa' mundaiwa'ma gwa'aisi isimba, apa' ina atiasi mope awepama naep Godi, a i'i moga' mafis isimba ma, apa' ina atiasi motaga be'epa mikila' fowa' magape, owa'atin. Apa' mape wahifipa ma mu'uli inimba fowa'ini naga'i gwa'aisi isimbai.
46008009	Apa' ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba hiahawes isimba ipa' pape wahifipa panda'asi supisila bo'wagah esis epes isimba owa' banagesa sowa ma waf awafi.
46008010	Ina' epen negegawai, i'i negafe' ipat atamba sanda' lotuma wale baso'amunai nepe nega' gwa'aisi, ma anin epen okom ananimi owa' banagema hapifia nigatilina. Atiasi nesa'mai okom ananimi nea' gwa'aisi isimba sagaso' waleasi, a'a owa'? Apa' ina mogawa.
46008011	Na'amba gawa ine'ini nehambombaga epen inimba owa' banagena hapifia, Krais naga' nofa'an negetambilii.
46008012	Ukup anis sahin owan alipisi ina banagep, owa'. I'i ipa' penda' waf afamba awafi pehambombaga hapifa ukup asasipi, ipa' panda' waf afambai ma Krais atona.
46008013	Ea' i'i gwa'aisi isimba aga'asi sonda' alipini ae'ani newa ma waf awafi, dao' ae' ina ata' ea' mafis isimba wapani, owa', hapaimi. Na'amba a' enda' anin newa ma waf awafi.
46009001	Dei' ae' a'i ihali'ipa esa'ma nomonas ipe'isi. Ipa' pa'i ae' ape wahifiwi ape aposel ati Dembinai Jisas ea' a'a owa'? Ea' anda' maol inimba atina dei' ipa' pataga Kristen, a'a owa'? Aho' endilisi.
46009002	I'i anis epes ukup pandanda' pa'i ae' owa' aposela, diago, hapaisi. Ipa' dao'. Ipa' pahapifa Dembinai pape sisihipama anen. Isimba atis dei' ipa' atipa si'i anol ametal lihimba'ma ipa' hipai pegawe ape aposel anda' maol Dembinaii.
46009003	Apa' anis epes sanda'i'ipamae sawaloge. Ea' agwa basef na'amba.
46009004	Endilisi afa' aposel andeande'ma ogofa' gwa'aisi maina maol afa' wanda'ani.
46009005	Ea' andeande'ma ogaso' nematawa Kristen ofe' ogalomawa si'i anom aposel maloma amom owapana Dembinai Jisasi maloma Pita manda'as.
46009006	Ina andeande'ma ae'i Barnabas atofa onda' maola ogofa' otamba afa'imbai, apa' anis daias ipa' atipa petopalopas pimafiasa otamba. Na'ambai owa'.
46009007	Aman mamahonama nanda' maol soldiai anen atona notala gwa'aisi mais ananisi? A epen ami nanda' hiahawes nawas aof ama anen owa' nofa' gwa'aisiafa? O epen ami nimafi bulmakau ma anin owa' nea' nomagofa amoma? Owa'atin endilisi.
46009008	Ae' aila ukup epesi atip a'ias na'amba? Owa'atin. Mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani naga'ias na'amba atin.
46009009	Moses nanda' basef fagape mu'uli Godi faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Bulmakau manda' maol mafa'asa olemb wit magandilamami ma'i moga' anom, ipa' ina pesopama malogof amamugufi, owa'i.” Ipa' pa'i God okom mandapoma amom bulmakau atom a'amon? Owa'atin.
46009010	Anen okom ma'i apa' wapani. Aho', basef ifimba fa'iasa apa' atepa. God okom ma'i waf afambai. Epen nenda' maol negala' itap ananipii neloma epen ami nenda' maol negala gwa'aisi sagaof ea'i, anin dao' okom mondanda'ma opaf ananifi ma negefa' hiahawes du'wanisa maol inimba.
46009011	Afa' wanda' maol Godi wagape na'amba atin. Afa' wawa hiahawes bu'wasi Ambal bu'unai Godi nagaso'afa asi la'afena ipa'. Ea' ipa' ilama pese'afa anis hiahawes pegatopalopa alop afa'ipi ma isimba ina ahifisa ipa', owa'atin.
46009012	Ipa' paso'am hiahawes anom amam daiam magawalipipa basef Godii, apa' afa' dei' mama? Afa' wapani peso'afa hiahawes ipe'isi, andeande'. Dei' main, afa' wali' wanda' maol wagatopalopipai. Apa' hiahawes isimba afa' wa'i aho'ma ogofa'asi, owa' afa' ina ofa'as. Fowa' dambadamba afa' wali' wagafe'mago ipa' wafi'i wafi'i wataga dei', afa' wandaiwa'ma ogwahefa ufia'wa basef bu'wafi Kraisi. Isimba atis afa' wandaiwa'ma ogofa'as. Ea' isimba atis dei' nimanimi hiami matagamafa.
46009013	Dei' ipa' ukup pendanda' ma anif basef. Amom manda' maol ipat lu'unai Godii mofa' gwa'aisi ipat anamba. Ipa' pegawa amom manda' maola belita atamba sondolalima mafisa Goda, amom wapani mofa' mafis du'wa'wanisi belita atamba.
46009014	Ea' na'amba atin Dembinai nanda' mu'uli inimba nape. Amam ami magawalapa basef bu'wafi Godii, amom ata' mondofa' hiahawesa esis amam nematawa sogofa' basef bu'wafi ma sogatopalopa alop amamupi.
46009015	Apa' ae' owa' efa' anis hiahawes isimbaia. Ea' dei' wapani ina anda' basef ifimba ma iga'ipipa ae' andeande'ma egefa' anin mae atitina ipa', owa'atin. Andeande'ma ae' ili' endaga'. Ae' andagala anda' maol Godi atopalopepa owa' efa' anis hiahawes isimbaia. Ae' dei' andaiwa'ma anin epen negali'amona dagala ae'ani ma egasa'ma agol ae'agili ma waf afamba, owa'.
46009016	Apa' ae' ina andagala asa'ma agol ae'agili atogol awalapa basef bu'wafi Godi, owa'atin. Ae' owa' ano'w ufia'wa esopama malagola iga'ipasefa, owa'. Okom ae'ami mahafel endilisi ma a'i inda'ipasef atin. I'i ae' owa' ewalapa basef ifimba bu'wafia, na'amba God nese'e nimanimi lu'wami.
46009017	I'i okom ae'ami atom enda' maol inimba ananiniai, anaf efa' otamba ma maol inimba. Owa' owa'atin. Ae' owa' ano'w ufia'wa, andanda'am atin. Dei' main, inimba anin maol God nase'ean ae' enda'ani.
46009018	Anaf efa' hiahaom fasimi maima anda' maol inimba? Hiahaom amamba fasimi na'amba. Ae' anda' waf afamba bu'wafi atef. Hiahawes ae' ila ma egefa'asa maol inimbai, isimba ina efa'as, owa'. Ae' awalapa basef bu'wafi Godi aso'asef dowaf. Ae' ina a' efalasa hiahawes otamba maisa sogase'e si'i mu'uli Godi naga'ias, owa'.
46009019	Ae' ina anda' maol ape lafela anin epen, owa'. Ae' ape wahifiwi. Apa' okom ae'ami atom anda' ae' ape si'i agape lafela epes hiasi ma egefa'i hiasi sondahama ikwafa pepel ae'ani sogafe'ma God.
46009020	Isimba atis dei' naep esis Judai ataga si'i Juda, ma igifa'ai anis Juda. Ae' ina ape lafela mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani, owa'. Apa' naep isimba sagape lafela mu'uli inimbai, ae' wapani ape lafela mu'uli inimba ma efa'i epes isimba sagafe'ma God.
46009021	Ea' naep epes isimba sogololama mu'uli inimba owa' Judaisia, ataga si'i epes isimba sogololama mu'uli inimbai, ma efa'i epes isimba sogafe'ma God. Apa' ae' ina okom mase'e mu'uli Godi, owa'atin. Dei' aila mu'uli Kraisi.
46009022	Ama naep epes isimba owa' banagasia, ataga si'i esis ama egefa'i epes owa' banagasia. Ae' ataga si'i egefa' waf epes hiasi endondoma ufiawa hiawai ma iwambilai anis sogotanimai.
46009023	Ae' anda' maol inimba ma egafela agol basef bu'wafi Godi ma anaf egefa' hiahawes isimba bu'wasi blesing epes isimba saila basef ifimbai sogofa'asi eloma anis epes Godi wapani.
46009024	Ipa' pegawa epes sasagih sandaloloma atini hiasi sasagih hi'alas safe', apa' atitin nikila'as nefa' prais hiahawes fasisi. Ipa' pegawa isimba a'a owa'? Ea' ipa' wapani pendasagih mehipa pegefa' hiahawes isimba fasisi.
46009025	Epes ami sa'i sisagih sigikila'i ma depambema inimbai, sanda' maol numa'wini a'owa' sagwamba alop asasipi sameme'map nimaguf danda. Epes isimba sanda'am na'amba ma sogofa' prais hiahaom bu'wami kwasakwasala magape nogota bandatai. Apa' Kristen manda'ama mogofa' atapim hiahaom fasimi mogape dondoli.
46009026	Isimba atis ae' dei' naep do' okom kilikala' asagih mehipa ikila' hiasi hi'igalas. Ae' ape si'i anona aman nanda' bokseni nagapa', owa' nokwaha lagof ganigani noha fufutal atol dowadowafa, owa'atin.
46009027	Ae' banagewe aha alop ae'api anindifap ahamap usi'ip pape lafela okom ae'ami. Na'amba egawalapa basef bu'wafi ma anis epes daias, apa' anaf owagama ae' ina efa' prais hiahaom fasimi, a' owa'atin.
46010001	Alipipai, ae' andaiwa'ma ipa' ukup mogamogahepama hiahaom amamba. Esis bafasapa hiasi Israel sape lafela ilagw agwamba gwali'as sagafi'i ea' hiasi safe' bo'wagah asasigahi sowala sambo naoh embel akwahimi
46010002	sawisa ilagw gwaloma naoh embel sagafi'i. Amamba mondola'waifa sogofa' baptais sape sisihis saloma Moses sailana sagafe'.
46010003	Ea' esis hiasi sa' gwa'aisi isimba God nagaso'asasi,
46010004	sa' embel ambalemba God nagaso'asambeli. Aho', sa' embela otam amamba God nagaso'asami nafe' nagalomasi. Otam amamba nondola'waifa Krais atona.
46010005	Apa' owa', God nandaiwa'ma hiasi sagape la'afena esisi. Isimba atis dei' sasa sowala hi'alas itap anamba wafigima fataupigima.
46010006	Ea' hiahaom amamba hiami mataga mindihimba'mapa si'i anef ikwafa apa' motolom mogogawama apa' ina a' kowolapa ukup pipila hiahaom awami si'i esis fowa', owa'i.
46010007	Ipa' ina kowolepa pila wale baso'amunai si'i isimba anis fowa' sanda'am, owa'i. Baibel naga'i esis na'amba na'i, “Amam nematawa sape sanda' gwa'aisi embel sa'as sosafel salemb atin sanda' kwala'ap kinde'iaf sa'oh.”
46010008	Apa' wapani owa'i monda' waf afamba awafi so'a waulafia si'i isimba anis fowa' sanda'am, ama nemaf atetef esis 23,000-pelais saga' dolamas hi'alas.
46010009	Ea' apa' ina mososaefa God mogwambana si'i isimba anis fowa' sagagwambana ma uguf awagufi fahasa esis higilagalas, owa'i.
46010010	Ipa' ina a' ukup awep pi'i diga wandafugai peloma God si'i isimba anis fowa' sanda'manam God, ma ensel anamba naha epes sagaga'ii nafi'i nahas sagaga' hi'agalas, owa'i.
46010011	Hiahaom amamba hiami magatagama esisi, amamba si'i ikwafa apa' epes dei' magape nogota ata'e felefele'ma ta'i hi'igilatai. Amamba si'i ikwafa apa' mogatoloma solawaipa, na'amba monda' waf awafi si'i esis.
46010012	Ea' i'i epen ami niga'i anin atin la'ifin nagalutu banagani, anin a' nendape solawain andeande'. Na'amba newa ma waf awafi.
46010013	Gwamba maina nagatagama ipe'i, amamba ina anom daiam, owa'atin. Amamba ea' na'amba atin si'i gwamba hiani nagatagama epes hiasi. God naila basef ananifi endilisifi nanda' hiahawes ananisi datima. Anen ina atiasi ni'i aho'ma anin gwamba netagama ipa' nikila' banagami ipe'imi, owa'atin. Nemaf afamba gwamba nogatagamepa, God nonda' ano'w ufia'wa notopalopepa pegalutu banagepa.
46010014	Ipa' alipipai endilisi ae'ipai, ipa' pekwaha waf afamba pagailafa wale anamba baso'amunaii pewa' alafugaha anen.
46010015	Ipa' pegegawai, dei' a'ipipa. Ipa' atipa pewawaloga basef ifimba ae'afi.
46010016	Kap apamba aman nugumafi lotuwi nogofalo'mapi, apamba na'amba. Apa' manifela Goda kap apamba pakolasa apa' magaloma esimbel Kraisi. Endilisi atis bret atamba apa' magawalotai, atamba takolasepa magaloma alop Kraisi.
46010017	Bret ea' atotota. Amamba mihimba'mapa amam nematawa hiapai mape si'i alop atotop. Dei' main, apa' hiapai mandaloma ma' bret atotota atamba.
46010018	Ipa' ukup ata' pendapoma esis Israel. Epes isimba saga' gwa'aisi mafis sondolali ma God belita atambai sandakolas saloma Goda belita atamba.
46010019	Basef kofagefa doko' aga'ipipafi fa'i main? Gwa'aisi mafis mais sondololima wale baso'amunai endilisisi? O, wale anamba baso'amunai endilisinai? Ae' aga'ias na'amba? Owa'atin.
46010020	Ae' a'ias a'i hiahaom esis sogololama Godi sondolalima wale baso'amunai, ina sondolali ma God, owa'atin. Ae' andaiwa'ma ipa' pendakolas pegaloma wale anamba baso'amunai, owa'i.
46010021	Ipa' ina pea' embela kap Dembinaii poloma kap wale baso'amunai wapani, owa'i. Ea' ina pea' gwa'aisi belita Dembinaii soloma gwa'aisi belita sondolali ma wale baso'amunaiatai wapani, owa'i.
46010022	Apa' ina a' monda' maol mondao'oma mogaloma wale baso'amunai monda' okom Dembinai aoma apa', owa'i. Apa' ina a' mi'i apa' banagipai mikila' Dembinai, owa'.
46010023	Ipa' pa'i, “Andeande'ma monda' hiahaom mamimami hiami.” Isimba endilisi, apa' ina a' amamba hiami matopalopapa, owa'atin. Ipa' pa'i “Andeande'ma monda' hiahaom mamimami hiami.” Apa' ina hiahaom hiami manda'apa mataga banagepa ma hapif, owa'atin.
46010024	Ipa' ina a' ukup pepoma ipa' atipa pindumafuma pepe andeande', owa'. Ipa' ukup pendapoma anis daias wapani ma petopalopas sogape andeande'.
46010025	Ambegw hiami mafisim sagatalom stowai, amamba ipa' penda'am. Ina a' nomonas sope hiahias pihahali'mam na'ana'a, owa'i.
46010026	Dei' main, “Itap apa'e paloma hiahaom hiami hi'alam amamba Dembinaii atom.”
46010027	I'i anin epen owa' nogahapifa Kraisia nefalepa ni'i pefe' peloman pega' gwa'aisi ma pi'i pegafe'ma, dao' andeande'. Pefe' pea' gwa'aisi hiasi anin nandandombasa nagasi'ipasi. Ipa' ina a' nomonas sotagamepa hiahias pihahali'anas na'ana'a, owa'i.
46010028	Apa' i'i anin epen nili' ni'ipipa niga'i, “Mafis isimba sondolalima wale baso'amunaisi”, dao' ipa' apegawa basef ananifi ina pea'as, owa'i, hapaisi. Ipa' pinda'i uwahipigama epen inimba.
46010029	Ae' ina a'i peme' malogof fagape ukup ipe'ipi nomoni pilas, owa'. A'i pindaila malagol gagape okom nomon epen inimba naga'ipipai. Na'amba anin epen daian ni'i, “Ae' agape wahifiwai. Dei' maina okom anin epen owa' banagania mogasindi'amona ae'?
46010030	I'i ae' inifela Goda ega'as, dei' maina anin epen nesopama ae' ma ega' mafis isimba aganifela Godasi? Na'ambai ae' andaiwa'.”
46010031	Dei' egwa basef epen inimbai. I'i ipa' pi'i pega' gwa'aisi embel mais a penda' hiahawes mamahisa, penda'asa pegasa'ma agol Godi atogol lu'wagol.
46010032	Ipa' a' ukup pendapoma epes hiasi hi'indalas, esis Juda soloma esis owa' Judaisia, ea' soloma amam nematawa sios isimba Godi. Ea' ipa' ina a' penda' anef waf fenda' esis sogowama waf awafi, owa'i.
46010033	Si'i ae' wapani, anda' hiahawes hiasi ma egatopalopa epes hiasi ma ukup piga'i waf bu'wafi hiafi ae' anda'afi. Ae' ina anda'as atopalopa ae' imafi ae' atowe, owa'. Anda'asa agatopalopa amam nematawa hiasi ma God nofa'as nokwahomas waf awafi sogotanimai.
46011001	Ipa' pendandepa waf ae'afi pila ae' si'i ae' andandepa waf Kraisi ma agailana.
46011002	Lifilafi ipa' ukup pandanda'ma ae' paila basef ifimba hiafi agasi'ipafi. Basef ifimba egefa'afi dei' a'ipipaef ipa'. Isimba atis dei' anifelipa a'i panda' waf bu'wafi endilisi.
46011003	Dei' a'i ipa' pegawa basef ifimba. Agilinai amam hiamii anen Krais atona ea' agilinai ako'wanai waulunama'w atona ea' agilinai Kraisi God atona.
46011004	I'i aman ami Ambal bu'unai Godi nosa'mana ni'ipasa basef Godi si'i profet a'a nondabeten ama siti anen nopalo' balaga, aman anamba atiasi a' nonda' agol Kraisi agilinai ananinai gowala.
46011005	Ea' nemata'w ami wapani Ambal Godi nosa'makwa kuga'ipasa basef Godi si'i profet a'a kondabeten ama owa' kopalo' balaga ako'ugaia, ako'w wapani kwanda' ambal waulunama'wi aol. Isimba ea' na'amba atin si'i kwagando balaga ako'ugai hi'agalaga.
46011006	I'i nematawa owa' opalo' balagah awaugahia, awo a' ondatopa'agah bandagah. Waf apa' hiapai fagape na'amba. I'i ambagof awagofa ogatopa'agah bandagah a'a ondowagah hi'igalagah, apa' ma'i waf afamba awafi fanda' nematawa ambagof awagufi. Dei' isimba atis andeande'ma awo ondopalo'agah.
46011007	Amam owa'i mopalo' balagah amamugahia. Dei' main, God nanda' amam mandati si'i anen ama mogawalapai banagami mogogala'i ananimi. Apa' nematawa wagawalapai banagami mogogala'i amami.
46011008	Dei' main, God ina nanda' amana alop nemata'wi, owa'atin. Anen nanda' nemata'wa alop amani.
46011009	Ea' isimba wapani, God ina okom mandanda'ma nemata'w dei' nanda' amana nogatopalopa ako'w, owa'atin. Anen okom mapoma aman dei' nanda' nemata'wa kogatopalopana.
46011010	Isimba atis dei' nematawa ondapalo' balagah awaugahi ondola'waifa ogape lafela amom wauhupawa awoumi. Awo opalo'agah ondambaho'agaha ombal begahawa ma amom ensel mogatolowa.
46011011	Apa' magape sisihipama Dembinaii magape na'amba. Ina nemata'w ato'w kope aman aka'w o aman atona nope nemata'w akana, owa'atin.
46011012	God nanda' nemata'wa alop amani ea' na'amba atin dei' nanda' amam mataga alop nematawai. Apa' God kofagonama hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam.
46011013	Dei' ipa' atipa ata' pendawaloga basef ifimba. I'i nematawa owa' opalo' balagah awaugahi onda' betena Goda, isimba andeande' a'a owa'?
46011014	Waf ape'ifi amam nematawai atef ea' fihimba'mepa' na'amba. I'i amam balagah laugahi, isimba sanda'am ambagof awagof.
46011015	Apa' i'i nematawa balagah hopaowa, dao' andeande', balagah si'i sosaf bu'wafi awaufi. Dei' main, God atona naso'awa balagah laugahi awo ma hogaso'ala balagah awaugahi.
46011016	Apa' i'i epen ami ni'i basef negapa'efa hiahawes isimba, anin a' nendegawa, apa' ina maila anef waf daiaf, owa'atin. Maila waf afambai atef. Ea' esis sios amam nematawa Godi hiasi dei' sailaf na'amba atin.
46011017	Ae' a'i ese'epa anin mu'uli ipa', apa' ae' ina esa'ma agof ipe'igufi, owa'atin. Nogota atamba pandakolas panda' lotu, dakolas ipe'ini nahambombagepa.
46011018	A'i ili' iga'iasi isimba. Nogota atamba ipa' pandakolas panda' lotu, ipa' pandawawal atin. Ae' agame' basefa ipa' na'amba. Ea' ae' okom ma'i kwasakwasala a'i endilisi ipa' pandawawal.
46011019	Endilisi, ipa' pandawawal atin pa'i waf afamba bu'wafi ma epes mamahisa sagaila basef endilisii sotaga sondosali alihis? Owa'atin endilisi.
46011020	Afamba ipa' hipai pandakolasa, ipa' ina pefa' gwa'aisi Dembinaii, owa'atin.
46011021	Ipa' hipai atona atin pali' ulu ulal pa' gwa'aisi ipe'isi atis. Ea' anin nolomahan nape, a anin daian na' embel wain hiani okom mando molan.
46011022	Ipa' ifagw akepama pega' gwa'aisi embel mais? O ipa' pa'i sios amam nematawa Godi isimba awasi falafisi atis, a'a? Ipa' pa'i penda' anis epes gwa'aisi akasi ambagof awagof iwaniguf? Dei' atiasi i'i basef maifa ipa'? Isa'ma agof ipe'igufi? Owa'atin. Hiahawes isimba ipa' panda'asi ae' ina anifelipa asa'ma agof ipe'igufi, owa'.
46011023	Basef ifimba ae' agasi'ipafi ifimba ae' efa'efa Dembinai atona. Ifimba na'amba. Owamb ambamba Judas nagaso'ama Jisas nogafe' lagof amom boumii, ma owamb ambamba Dembinai Jisas nasa'ma bret
46011024	ea' nanifela God nawalota na'i, “Amamba alop ae'api, ase'epapa agatopalopepa'. Ipa' penda'as ea' na'amba atin ukup pendanda'ma ae'.”
46011025	Amom ma'as ea', anen nasa'mai anop kap embel bagalapi nanda'as na'amba atin na'i, “Kap apamba basef banagafi dambaifi ae'afi agala' lapafi. Ametala basef ifimba esimbel ae'ambeli atembel balo bagatopalopipai. Nimaguf hiafi danda ipa' penda' isimba pega' embel, penda'as na'amba ma ukup pegapoma ae'.” Fowa' Jisas naga'ipa alipumi ananimi na'amba.
46011026	Nimaguf hiafi ipa' pega' breti kap embel isimba ma, ipa' pewalapa basefa Dembinai nagaga' fetaga alihif fefe' fefe' fetagama nemaf anen nugafi'afii.
46011027	I'i anin epen owa' okom mili' mope andeande'ma nea' gwa'aisi isimba breti embela kap Dembinaii dowadowaf, anin nanda' waf awafi ma alop paloma esimbel Dembinaii, ea' epen inimba kofagema mopoma anin atin.
46011028	Apa' hiapai ata' muli' mondowaloga ukupi nomonas ape'isi atis ama main, mea' breti embel kap isimba.
46011029	Dei' main, i'i epen owa' nowaloga basef kofagefa ma alop Dembinai ma anin nea' gwa'aisi embel dowafa, kofagema epen inimbai atom.
46011030	Kofagema ea' amamba atom dei' amam nematawa hiasi la'afena ipa' pupulis, owa' banagesa, ea' aowas naninani hiani anis saga'ma waf afambai.
46011031	I'i apa' muli' nomonas kilikala'ma mowawaloga nomonas ape'isi atis andeande'ai, atiasi ina anom kofagema motagama apa', owa'atin.
46011032	Apa' i'i Dembinai nagahihi' waf ape'ifima nogagwa waf awafima apa'a, isimba anen nasa'apa bumbulita nasindi'amonapa ma anaf ina higililapa moloma epes sagaila waf itapafii, owa'atin.
46011033	Ea' dei' ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, i'i ipa' pekolata pega' gwa'aisi Dembinaii, ipa' ata' pepe pehafa anis sili'.
46011034	I'i anin epen ami nolomahan, anin ata' nili' nenda'ago gwa'aisi ipat ananitai. Na'amba dakolas ipe'ini newalapai basef kota ipa'. Basef ifimba du'wanif fagapani ata' owa' iga'ipipafia, nemaf mamahefa egafe'mago ipa', dao' i'ipipaef isindi'amonepa.
46012001	Ipa' alipipai, ae' a'i enda'mepago basef ifimba ma presen hiahaom fasimi Ambal bu'unai Godi nagase'epam ipa' atona atini. Dei' main, andaiwa'ma anipa ipa' ukup pegelelaipa ma amamba.
46012002	Ipa' pegawa ea' ma fowa' ipa' ata' pagape aopama waf awafi pegelelama God, nogota atamba ipa' ukup paila wale baso'amumi maim magahondo'ipai, mememi owa' muga'i kwasakwasalaia.
46012003	Ea' ipa' pendegawa epen mamahina Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'man naga'i basefi, ina atiasi ni'i basef ni'i, “Jisas anaf higililana,” owa'atin. Ea' epen ami Ambal bu'unai Godi akani, anin ina atiasi ni'i basef ni'i, “Jisas anen Dembinai,” owa'atin.
46012004	Presen hiahaom fasimi Ambal bu'unai Godi nagaso'apam dowafi, amamba hiami mamimami. Amamba Ambal Godi atona naso'apam.
46012005	Maol Dembinai hiani naninani nape, apa' Dembinai atotona nape numafian.
46012006	Waf hiafi fafifafi manda' maolafi, apa' God ea' anamba atotona naso'apa pepel epes hiapai ma la'ifipa monda' maol inimba hiani hi'igalan.
46012007	Ambal bu'unai Godi nawalapa pepel ananinai ma epes hiasi atona atina nagatopalopa hiasi hi'agalas.
46012008	Epen atitin Ambal bu'unai Godi naso'an pepela nigihimba'masa gawa hiani bu'wani naninani ma negawalapa epes hiasi. Ea' anin daian Ambal bu'wali Godi anamba atona naso'an pepela negawalapa basef kofagefa waf Godi ma atiasi esis amam nematawa sogogawana andeande'.
46012009	Ea' anin epen daian Ambal bu'unai Godi atona natopalopana nagahapifa God banagambel nanda' maol ananini andeande'. Ea' anin epen nefa' pepela netopalopa aowas nanda'asi sogataga bo'wes. Ambal bu'winai ea' anamba atona.
46012010	A anin epen Ambal Godi natopalopan naso'an pepela nenda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami. Apa' anin daian Ambal Godi nasa'mana niga'i basef Godi. Anin daian nefa' gawa ma negawawaloga spirit ambagof mamimami hiami, bu'wami a'a awami. A anin daian negawama niga'i diga naninani daiana hianai. Ea' anin daian negawama negambema basefa diga anamba naninani daiana.
46012011	Ambal bu'unai Godi anamba atona nanda' maol nawalapa presen hiahaom amamba hiami. Ama okom ananimi atom naso'as presen hiahaom fasimi amamba mafe'ma epes hiasi atona atin.
46012012	Presen hiami fasimi mamimami si'i alop apa' epesi. Alop apa' epesi atifip, apa' sa'osa'opa hiapi ea' alop apamba hiapi lu'up sa'op pafe' pail alop si'ip atotop. Krais wapani na'amba atin.
46012013	Dei' main, apa' hiapai mofa' sa'ofa Ambal bu'unai Godi atotona. Nanda'apa mataga alop atotop, esis Juda saloma owa' Judaisia saloma esis agof akasi a esis sagape wahifisi, owa' sogape lafela anis daiasia wapani. Apa' hiapai mofa' Ambal Godi atotona nape si'ina nelelemb ape'ilimbi.
46012014	Apa' mogawa alop ina atifiminap, owa'atin. Alop sa'osa'opa hiapi.
46012015	I'i bo'waga gi'ias gi'i, “Ae' ina a' lagol agape alop si'ipi, owa'.” I'i bo'aga agamba giga'i basef na'ambaifi, ina andeande', owa'. Basef ifimbai hapaifi. Bo'waga gandala gape alop si'ip apamba atop.
46012016	Ea' aliga wapani gi'ias gi'i, “Ae' ina a' naep ape alop si'ip, owa'.” I'i aliga giga'ias na'ambai, ina andeande' owa', basef ifimba hapaifi. Aliga gandala gape alop si'ip apamba atop.
46012017	I'i alop hiapi si'ip ea' naep atipap hi'ilapei, dei' pogahembe' pome' basef pi'imama? Owa'atin. I'i alop hiapi si'ipa aligah atogah hopaop hi'ilapai, dei' pogahoma alogw pome'agw pi'imama?
46012018	Apa' alop ina pataga si'i na'amba, owa'atin. God atona fowa' nogawa okom mandanda'ma alop atona atin lu'up sa'op dei' nanda'ap pape pandahama si'i okom ananimi atom maga'ias.
46012019	I'i alop si'ipa anop alop atifip popaop hi'ilapai, dei' atiasi alop apamba si'ip pope mama? Owa'atin.
46012020	Apa' alop ina pataga pandanda' na'amba, owa'. Alop wa'awa'ap sa'osa'opa hiapi, apa' alop si'ip atifip.
46012021	Naep ina la'ifipa pi'ipa lagof piga'i, “Afa' wandaiwa'ma ipa' pepe pegalomafa. Afa' atofa ogape, dao' andeande'.” Ea' balaga wapani ina la'ifigama gi'ipa bo'wagah giga'i, “Ae' andaiwa'ma ipa' pepe pegalome, owa'. Ae' atowe epe, dao' andeande'.” Owa'atin.
46012022	Alop apamba wa'awa'ap falafalafupa apa' maga'i owa' banagapia, i'i apamba owa' pondala popea, atiasi alop apamba si'ip ina potaga banagep, owa'atin endilisi.
46012023	Ea' alop apamba wa'ap apa' ambagof awagofapi, apa' mofalo'map a'owa' mumafiap datima.
46012024	Apa' alop wa'ap owa' ambagof awagofapia apamba apa' ina mofalo'map mumafiap na'amba, owa'. Alop apamba ila ma pogape dowaf. God atona nasa alop apamba wa'owa'op hiapi sa pail atogon pataga atifip. Anop wa'ap agof akapi apa' anen nofalap agof lu'wagufi fandandap.
46012025	Anen nanda'as na'amba ma alop apamba ina atiasi pondawal wa'awa'ap, owa'atin. Alop apamba hiapi wa'awa'ap a' ukup pindaima atin pundumafuma andeande' na'amba atin.
46012026	Ama i'i alop wa'ap pome' akepehap, alop hiapi si'ip atiasi pome' akef na'amba atin. Apa' i'i anis epes sinifela wa'ap, hiapi si'ip sonohap hi'ilap polomap.
46012027	Isimba atis dei' ipa' hipai pape alop Kraisi si'ip. Ea' ipa' hipai atona atin alop wa'awa'ap ananipi.
46012028	God nahapona anis epes ananisi sape na'amba ma sios. Magali'i aposel, sagagi'i profet, sagafe'ma wanifi, esis tisa sagawalipasa basef kofagefa Godii. Ama main, sagagi'ma amambai epes isimba sanda' betena sanda' banagami si'i God nanda'ami. Ea' epes isimba sanda' awasisi bo'wes wapani, a esis isimba sagatopalopa anis daiasi, saloma amom mugumafi maol siosi naninani hianii, ea' saloma isimba sogawa ma siga'i diga naninani daiana hianai.
46012029	Dei' ipa' ukup pandanda' pegawa pa'imama? Ipa' pa'i amom hiami hi'alam mape aposel atom? Pa'i amom hiami hi'alam mape profet atom? Ipa' pa'i amom hiami hi'alam mape tisa atom? A pa'i esis hiasi hi'alas sanda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami?
46012030	Pa'i esis hiasi hi'alas sofa' presen hiahaom fasimi ma sonda' awasisi sogotaga bo'wes wapani? A pa'i esis hiasi hi'alas sogawa ma siga'i diga naninani daiana hianai? Pa'i hiasi hi'alas sogawa ma sogambema basefa diga anamba naninani daiana? Owa'atin endilisi.
46012031	Apa' ipa' hipai a' ukup kilikala' pindapindaila pegefa' presen hiahaom fasimi magali'i. Ea' dei' a'i ihimba'mepa ano'w ufia'w atoto'w bo'ombo'okw kwikila' endilisi presen inimba hiani.
46013001	I'i ae' egawa ma iga'i diga naninani epesi goloma enseli wapani, ma ae' owa' okom mimilas ese'asa nembel etopalopasa, malogol diga ae'agai falafugai atoga si'i sagaha olefi wata sagala' dowaf.
46013002	I'i Ambal bu'unai Godi nose'e presen hiahaom fasimi nosa'me ma egawalipasa basef Godi ma egegawa okom hiami Godi mape mandamabahi'i hi'igalam, ama egegawa gawa hiani hi'igalan wapani, ma igahapifa God banagambel endilisi ma la'ifiwi esapa' halafutagw gogafe' gani do'wan, apa' ae' owa' okom mimila esis amam nematawa endilisi, ae' falafuwai atowe.
46013003	I'i ae' egaso'asa hiahaom hiami ae'ami hi'igalama esis isimba kwahusa hiahawesi ma enda' maol Godi iga'i aho'ma anis epes sandaiwa'ma Godi si'i sehe sogaofe nif egaga'. Apa' ae' owa' okom mimilas ese'as nembela, ea' hapaimi. Anaf hiahaom amamba hiami ina motopalope molefate kwasakwasala, owa'atin endilisi.
46013004	Epen mamahina okom magaila anis epes daias endilisi, anin nanda' waf bu'wafi na'amba. Anin ina kwafalis nagwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'manaf anini, owa'atin. Anin nape natitilis. Anin nati epes hiasi uwahipis natopalopas. Anin ina kowagalana epes hiahaom hiamiisii, owa'atin. Ea' ina nagasa'ma agol ananigili atigili, a anin ina okom maga'i anin atini, owa'atin.
46013005	Anin saisailan atin nagape andeande'i. Anin ina okom magapoma hiahawes ananisi a'owa'i, owa'atin. Anin ina okom numbutim kwafalisi, owa'. Ea' ina okom magapoma waf awafi anis daias sanda'manafi, owa'atin.
46013006	Anin ina nandagala ma waf awafi ikiakafi, owa'atin. Anin nandagala ma waf endilisifi bu'wafi atef.
46013007	Nimaguf hiafi dondol anin nanda' waf afamba na'amba. Anin nembel bape awanembela nemaf mamahefa negame' nimanimi akafimi hiami. Anin ina nagandina anis epes kwafalisa waf asasifi, owa'. Anin nahapifa God endilisi nape nehafana ma nogatopalopa esis sogaloma anin wapani. Anin nalutu banagena ma nimanimi akafimi magatagaman.
46013008	Waf afamba ukup pagapagaila anis daias endilisi, afambai anaf ina higililaf, owa'atin endilisi. Apa' waf afamba Ambal Godi nasa'mapa ma mogowalapa basef ananifi, afamba anaf higililaf hi'ilaf. Presen inimba hiahaom fasimi ma epes sogawa saga'i diga naninani hiana haonai, diga anamba hiana haonai anaf hi'ilana. Presen inimba ma epes sogogawa gawa ma waf Godi, gawa inimbai anaf hi'ilan wapani.
46013009	Dei' main, dei' apa' ata' mogawa gawa du'wanin atin. Presen inimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'masa sogawalapa basef ananifi si'i profet, basef ifimba wapani ata' du'wanif atif.
46013010	Apa' anaf hiahaom God okom ma'i motaga mugagi' endilisii mogataga, nemaf afamba hiahaom amamba dei' mogataga wa'awa'ami atiasi hi'ilam.
46013011	Fowa' ae' ata' agape si'i awani a'i basef si'i awani. Ae' ameme'ma hiahawes si'i awani. Apa' afamba agataga dambewe, akwaha waf afamba awanii.
46013012	Dei' apa' mati hiahaom mataga ea', apa' ina mandawalap alihim a'owa', ata' owa'. Mataga si'i mapelaga embel magati walofam atin. Apa' anaf owagama nemaf dondo'afi fegataga, dao' mundatima nogohnaep alihipa. Dei' ata' egawa wa'awa'as atis. Apa' nemaf afamba egawa isimba endilisi si'i God nogogawe.
46013013	Dei' waf wanifif fape, afamba na'amba. Waf mogahapifa Kraisafi faloma waf mope mogahafa Godafi, waf ukup pagapagailas endilisiafi. Waf afamba wanifif. Apa' fagali' endilisii, waf ukup pagapagailas endilisi.
46014001	Ipa' banagepa pili' ukup pindaila epes hiasi pese'asa nelelemb esis. Ea' ukup ipe'ipi pendahafel endilisi ma pegefa' presen hiahaom fasimi Ambal bu'unai Godi nagase'epami. Apa' presen nagali'i ma ipa' penda' maol dindinipa pegefa'ani, inimba na'amba. Presen Ambal Godi nosa'mepa ma pegawalapa basef Godi si'i profet.
46014002	Apa' mogawa epen ami na'i basefa' anoga diga daiagai, anin ina naso'as basef epes, owa'. Anin na'ipa God atona. Dei' main, ina anin epen negawa diga agamba, owa'atin. Banagami Ambal Godi atom anin na'i basef ifimba fowa' fape fandambahi'i.
46014003	Apa' epen ami Ambal Godi nasa'mana naga'i basef Godi si'i profeti, epen inimbai na'ipasef nowa' banaga hapif asasini ea' fasa'masa sonda' waf fasifi fenda' opalef asasilifi awanelef.
46014004	Epen ami naga'i basefa anoga diga daiagai, anin newa' banaga opaf ananifi atof. Apa' epen ami Ambal Godi nasa'man nawalapa basef Godi si'i profet, inimba newa' banaga esis sios amam nematawa Kristen.
46014005	Ae' okom ma'i ipa' hipai hi'ilipa pi'i basefa anoga diga daiaga. Apa' epen ami Ambal Godi nasa'mana newalapa basef Godi si'i profet, anin nikila' epen inimba naga'i basefa anoga diga daiagai owa' nembemef ni'if alihifa. Dei' main, i'i epen inimba owa' nembemef ni'if alihifa, basef ifimba ina fewa' banaga esis sios amam nematawa Kristen sagame'afi, owa'atin. Apa' i'i negambemef alihifa, dao' basef ifimba fewa' banagas.
46014006	Alipipai, ipa' ukup pendame' basef ifimba andeande'. I'i ae' efe'mago ipa' ma ega'i basefa anoga diga daiaga, atiasi etopalopepa ewa' banagaipa i'imama? Owa'atin. Apa' i'i embemef iga'if, dao' ese'epa anif basef God nigihimba'miefi ea' ese'epa gawa fasini ipa' a'a iwalipipama basef kofagefa Godi si'i profeta Ambal Godi nosa'me egawalipipafi.
46014007	Hiahawes ambal akasi, si'i batagwi gita, amamba ea' na'amba atin si'i diga agamba hiagai. I'i amom owa' mogal melef monda' maguf fafifafi fetagaia, apa' atiasi mogahembe' mogawa maguf amamufi alihif mi'imama? Owa'atin.
46014008	I'i bugel alof owa' fogal fi'i alihifa, amom monda' wandafi silisilawi mope mondandombola wandaf mi'imama? Owa'atin.
46014009	Ipa' wapani na'amba atin. Ipa' i'i pi'i basefa anoga diga esis owa' sogogawagaia, atiasi sogawa basef ifimba kofagefa si'imama? Owa'atin. Atiasi basef ipe'ifi fefe' higililif dowaf.
46014010	Endilisi, diga hiaga haoga gape itap apa'e. Apa' ina anoga diga falafugai dowaf, owa'atin. Basef kofagefa fape diga gagigagi hiagai.
46014011	Ae' i'i owa' egawa basef kofagefa anin epen naga'iafia, atiasi anin okom mopoma ae' ni'i ae' epen aga'i anoga diga anambel wambeli. Ea' ae' wapani okom mapoma anin i'i naga'i anoga diga anambel wambili.
46014012	Ipa' wapani na'amba atin. Ipa' ukup pa'i a'owa' ma pegefa' presen hiahaom fasimi Ambal Godi nagase'epami. Ea' ipa' dao' pendanda' maol banagambel endilisi ma pegefa' presen inimbai negewa' banaga hapifa siosi.
46014013	Ea' epen ami naga'i basefa anoga diga daiagai anin nendanda' betena Goda nogoso'an gawa negambema basefa diga agamba.
46014014	Dei' main, i'i enda' betena anoga diga daiaga, ambal ae'ali atol landabeten, apa' okom ae'ami mape dowaf.
46014015	Ea' dei' atiasi enda'as i'imama? Ae' endanda' betena ambal ae'ali eloma okom ae'ami wapani. Ae' endanda' awalefa ambal ae'ali eloma okom ae'ami wapani.
46014016	-
46014017	I'i ipa' pinifela Goda ukup ipe'ipi atip, ama anin epen owa' nefa' anin presen hiahaom fasimi Ambal Godi nagase'epamia, dei' atiasi anin negawa ni'imama ma beten inimba ipe'ini ma niga'i endilisi? Owa'atin. Endilisi, i'i ipa' pendabeten pi'i basef fasifi a'owa', ina atiasi pewa' banaga nembela epen inimbai, owa'atin. Dei' main, anin ina negawa basef ifimba ipa' paga'iefi, owa'.
46014018	Ae' anifela God nimaguf hiafi ma ae' aga'i basefa anoga diga daiaga. Ipa' ina la'ifipama penda'ope, owa'.
46014019	Apa' eloma esis sios mondakolas, ae' a'i i'i basefa amef bandafi wanifif biafifa okom ae'ami iwalipa esisa sogogawef. Ama ae' i'i basefa amef laulaufi fetaga hihif 10,000 pelaifa anoga diga daiaga gagasi'i, ea' hapaifi, falafifi atif.
46014020	Ipa' alipipai, ipa' ina pepe ukup pelapefe' si'i awasi, hapaimi. Waf awafi, dao' ipa' ukup be'ep pepe andeande' ukup pese'epaf si'i awasi. Apa' nomonas ipe'isi sondataga si'i epes dambesi.
46014021	Anif basefa mu'uli Godi fagail buki faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Dembinai na'i, anaf Ae' enda' anis epes anota wambota saga'i anoga diga daiagai isa'mas si'ipasa basef ae'afi epes isimba ae'asi, apa' esis ina atiasi sila basef ifimba, owa'atin.”
46014022	Dei' apa' mogawa presen inimba paga'i basefa anoga diga daiaga, inimba ina ametal God nanda'ana esis sagahapifanai, owa'. Anen nanda'ana epes isimba owa' sogahapifanaia. Apa' presen inimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'mepa pawalapa basef ananifi si'i profet, inimba ina ametal God nagaso'asan epes isimba owa' sogahapifanaia, owa'. Inimba ametal isimba sagahapifanai atis.
46014023	Ea' i'i esis amam nematawa sios hiasi sondakolas atogona ama ipa' hipai a' pi'i basefa anoga diga daiagama anis epes owa' sogofa' presen inimbaia o anis owa' sogahapifa Kraisia sifi'i sope sogalomepa, atiasi asi'i, “Ipa' ukup magahipai.”
46014024	Apa' i'i Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'ma ipa' hipai ma pegawalapa basef Godi si'i profet ama i'i anin epen owa' nogohapifa Kraisia o owa' negegawa basef Godi andeande'ia nifi'i negawis, ama basef ipa' hipaii atiasi feha nembel epen inimbai ea' fewaloga opaf ananifi ma waf maif awafi fagapani.
46014025	Basef hiafi fape fandambaho' okom ananimii, ifimba atiasi afetaga fendawalap alihifa anin nifi'i nindiwa nembawa nitimalo' nefela agol Godi nowalapa basef na'amba ni'i, “Endilisi atis, God nape nalomepa.”
46014026	Ipa' alipipai, dei' basef ifimba akutaifi ae'afi fagape na'amba. Nemaf afamba pendakolas, presen inimba hiani Ambal Godi nagaso'apani napoma ipa' hipai na'amba. Anin epen nenda' anaf awaf, anin daian ni'i anif basef Godi niwalipipa, a anin God naso'ana anif basefa negawalapef, ea' anin daian negawa ma niga'i anoga diga daiaga, a anin daian negawa ma negambema basef ifimba. Ipa' pendanda' hiahaom amamba hiami ma pegewa' banaga hapif esis amam nematawa sios.
46014027	I'i anis ukup pehafela siga'i basefa anoga diga daiaga, bias a'a wanis sinda'i basef atona atin. Ea' ma'wis isimba. Apa' ina a' si'if atef, owa'i. Sinda'if atona atin. Ifimba ea' ma'uf. Ea' anin epen atitin a' nendambema basef ifimba.
46014028	Ama i'i owa' anin epena negambemefa, dao' epen inimba na'i niga'i basefa anoga digai a' nendasopama malogol ananigili ma basef ifimba ma esis sandakolasa. Bola anin atin ni'if nendaloma God.
46014029	Apa' amom profet biam o wanom Ambal Godi nasa'mama mogawalapa basef ananifi, amom a' mondawalapef. Ea' anom daiam mowawaloga basef ifimba.
46014030	I'i anin epen tol nepe lotu neme' basefa God nihimba'mana anif basefa epen inimba, dao' aman anamba nali' nalutu nagawalapa basefi a' nondasopama malogol.
46014031	Ipa' hipai Ambal Godi nasa'mepa pawalapa basef Godi si'i profet, ipa' pewalapef atona atin pi'if daindai ma epes hiasi seme'ef solafefa fegewa' banaga hapif asasini.
46014032	Epes ami sogofa' presen inimba Ambal Godi nasa'masa sogawalapa basef ananifi si'i profet, a' sundumafi presen inimba andeande'.
46014033	Dei' main, God ina nanda' waf uluwalifi, owa'atin. Anen nanda'waf usi'ifi opalef atifilif fagape awanelifi. Apa' sios amam nematawa Kristen sunduwa'anima sogape,
46014034	awo nematawa ina a' ulutu wi'i basef, owa'i. Awo osopama malogof ope dowaf. Sios apa' amam nematawa Godi waf ea' afamba atef. Nematawa ina a' ope wili'ma sios, owa'i. Ondape lafel si'i mu'uli Godi naga'ias.
46014035	I'i awo wi'i ogogawa anif basef kofagefa, bola ofe'ma ifagw asasigwi a' uhali' wauhupawa mi'ipawaef. I'i ano'w nemata'w konda' basef ipa' sios pandakolasa, waf afambai ambagof awogufafi.
46014036	Dei' a'i ihali'ipa. Ipa' kofagepama basef Godi? Ipa' atipa pefa' basef Godi a anis amam nematawa daias owa'? Owa'atin.
46014037	I'i epen ami okom mondanda' ni'i Ambal Godi nasa'man nawalapa basef Godi si'i profet, a'a ni'i anin nefa' presen anin daian, anin a' nendegawa basef ifimba dei' anda'ef ipe'i, ifimba mu'uli Dembinaii.
46014038	Ama i'i anin nindaiwa'ma basef ifimba, ipa' wapani pindaiwa'ma anin.
46014039	Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ukup ipe'ipi pendehafel endilisi ma Ambal Godi nosa'mepa pegawalapa basef ananifi si'i profet. Ea' ipa' ina pesopama ufia'wa piga'i basefa anoga diga daiaga, owa'i.
46014040	Apa' ipa' Kristen pendakolasa lotu, ipa' pendanda' maol andeande'ma atiasi dakolas ipe'ini negataga bo'wen.
46015001	Ipa' alipipai, dei' ae' a'i esa'ma nomonas ipe'isi wapani ma basef amamba bu'wami Godi ali' agasi'ipami. Ipa' pefa'am ea' basef amamba atom dei' pahapilam palutu banagepamam.
46015002	Ae' a'ipipa basef amamba bu'wami. I'i ipa' pihapilam tatala'im, God nofa'epa nokwahomepa waf awafi pitanimai. I'i owa', pahapilam dowadowaf alop atop ando'.
46015003	Basef ali' agasi'ipami, amamba ae' fowa' ali' egefa'ami. Amamba na'amba. Krais naga'ma nagakwaha awami ape'imi, si'i Baibel fowa' naga'iam.
46015004	Ea' esis sofa'ana salana nowaga matmat. Ama nimaguf bif hi'alef fagafe'ma wanifi, God nasa'mana wapani si'i Baibel naga'iam.
46015005	Ama main, nali' natagama Pita ea' nagi' natagama alipumi aninimi 12-pelaim.
46015006	Ea' nataga nandawalapa esis amam nematawa Kristen hiasi satolona, isimba alipisi sagaila anini hiasi a'owa' sikila' epes 500-pelais. Dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa', a'i alipisi isimba hiasi dei' ata' sape, apa' anis asaga' ea'.
46015007	Ma main, natagama Jems natolona. Ea' natagama amom aposel hiami matolona.
46015008	Ma main, owa' ae' agi' endilisi atolona wapani, natagama ae' si'i awani ma'man kogolan ata' kwapeti'i.
46015009	Dei' main, ae' ata' sa'owe ape awani falafuwai la'afena amom aposel. Ae' ina dei' bo'wawe ma epes sofale siga'i aposel, owa'. Dei' main, anda' maol agahambombaga sios Godii.
46015010	Owa' God atona okom maimaili natopalope dowaf nanda'e ape andeande'. Ea' dei' ae' ape. Anan nagatopalope dowaf, isimba ina safe' senalo, owa'. Sanda'e anda' maol banagambel a'owa' ikila' anom aposel daiam. Apa' ina ae' atowe anda' maol inimba, owa'. God natopalope dowaf, isimba atis dei' ape anda'am atapiwi.
46015011	Apa' basef ifimbai, ae' anda'am a'a amom manda'am, owa'. Basef ifimbai wamunaifi hapaifi. Basef amamba bu'wami fasimi atom afa' hiafai wawalipipam ea' amamba atom ipa' pahapilam sisihim.
46015012	Dondol afa' wawalapa basefa Krais nagaga' ma God nasa'mana nogosafel wapani. Dei' maina ipa' anipa pa'i basef na'amba paga'i, “Epes sagaga'i ina anaf sotanima sosafel wapani, owa'.”?
46015013	Ipa' anipa pa'i endilisi esis sagaga'i ina sotanima sosafel, owa'. I'i basef ipe'ifi endilisifiai, Krais wapani, God ina nasa'mana, owa'. Apa' owa' owa'atin.
46015014	I'i a' endilisi God owa' nosa'ma Kraisai, dei' basef amamba afa' wagawalapami falafumi atom ea' waf ipa' pagahapifa Kraisafi falafifi atef wafifi.
46015015	Apa' i'i na'ambaiai, anif basef wapani. Dei' afa' a' otaga amam wambaso'am wagawalapa basef Godii. Dei' main, afa' wa'i basef alihif wawalapefa God nasa'ma Krais nogosafel wapani matmat. Apa' i'i endilisi God owa' nosa'ma sagaga'iai, dao' anen ina nosa'ma Krais wapani, owa'.
46015016	Aho', ipa' anipa pa'i God ina nosa'ma esis epes sagaga'i, owa'. I'i basef ipe'ifi endilisifiai, God ina nosa'ma Krais wapani, owa'atin.
46015017	Apa' i'i endilisi God owa' nosa'ma Kraisai, dei' waf ipa' pagahapifa Kraisafi ina banagefa fegatopalopepa, owa'atin. Falafini atin. Dei' ipa' ata' papoma waf awafi atapipa.
46015018	Ea' epes isimba sagape sisihisa Krais sagaga'i, esis wapani higililas hi'ilas.
46015019	Apa' mahapifa Krais ea' mape mohafa anen. I'i apa' mohapifana mope mohafana nimaguf magape itap apa'e atep, mope awepa kwahupa a'owa' mope migi' endilisi. Andeande'ma esis soga'i uwahipigama anis hiasi sogosambala Kraisi kwasakwasala, apa' magahapifanai a' sonda'i uwahipigamapa a'owa' endilisi. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
46015020	Ina' na'amba, owa'. Krais anaga' ea', owa' dei' endilisi God nafelana nosafel wapani. Anen nosafel na'amba nali'ma epes sagaga' ea'i, si'i gwa'aisi' sali' sagaof aofi.
46015021	Dei' main, anona aman atotona nali' nawalapai waf epes sagaga'afi, ea' na'amba atin anona aman daiana nali' nawalapai ufia'w akwamba sagaga'i sogosafela'wi.
46015022	Hiahaom amamba na'amba. Mini'ap Adami hiasi hi'alas saga' atin. Ea' na'amba atina epes isimba hiasi hi'alas sagape sisihisa Kraisi, anaf God nonda'as sosafel wapani sofa' ambal namili ma sogape namis.
46015023	Apa' epes hiapai atona atin mope mondasasa nogota ape'itai. Aman nagali'i, anen Krais. Anen si'i gwa'aisi sali' sagaofi. Ama nemaf afamba nogotanimafi, apa' hiapai ananipai a' mosafel wapani.
46015024	Ama main, nemaf akutaifi fetaga ma hiahaom hiami awami higililam hi'igalam. Nemaf afamba Krais a' nohambombaga banagami hiami mamimami bu'wami awami magape ilif itapi hi'ilam, ea' noso'ana banagami ananimi ma nugumafi hiahaom hiamii mefe'ma ahamana God.
46015025	Dei' main, Krais a' nope Dembinai King nefe' nefe' notagama nemaf anen nogatalogofa bousi ananisi hiasi sogafe' lafela bo'wagah ananigahi hi'igalas.
46015026	Anen a' nili' nili'amona bousi isimba hiasi ea' nigi' nili'amona ga' si'i bounai nape nagagi'ii nosopamana hi'ilana.
46015027	Dei' main, fowa' God na'ias na'amba na'i, “Anaf ae' enda' hiahaom hiami, hi'ilam moloma epes hiasi wapani sefe' lafela anen.” Basef ifimba faga'i God nanda' hiahaom hiami mogafe' lafela Krais atona. Ea' apa' mogawa basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i hiahaom hiami ifimba ina fa'i God, owa'. Anen nanda' hiahaom amamba hiami mape lafela Krais.
46015028	Nemaf afamba hiahaom amamba hiami mogafe' lafela Krais hi'igalam, ea' Nogamana Godi atotona a' nofe' lafela anen nali' nanda' hiahaom amamba magafe' lafela Kraisi. Ea' God nope nogali' endilisima hiahaom hiami hi'igalam moloma epes hiasi wapani.
46015029	Anis epes sati waf bu'wafi anis Kristeni sape banagesa bousi sahas saga' ea' epes isimba satilis sahapifa Krais sofa' baptais. I'i epes sagaga'i anaf owa' sosafel wapania, epes isimba sogofa' baptaisa epes sagaga'i anaf sogawa sotaga sope si'imama? I'i endilisi ma anin atitin nagaga'i anaf owa' nesafel wapania, dei' maina isimba sogofa' baptaisa epes sagaga'i? Owa'atin.
46015030	Afa' wapani, dondol anis sa'i sohambombagafa. I'i epes isimba sagaga'i owa' sotanima sosafelai, dei' maina afa' wanda'as wagape na'amba? Owa'atin.
46015031	Alipipai, endilisi ae' andagalaipa ma pagape sisipama Krais Jisas dembinai ape'inai. Ea' anif basef wapani endilisifi atif si'i ifimba. Nimaguf hiafi danda ae' ape si'i agaga'i.
46015032	Ae' agape Efesus apa' anda' wandaf aloma mafis magail alupi lu'wami. Amamba atiasi ae' efa' hiahawes bu'wasi maisam? I'i a' endilisi esis sagaga'i owa' sotanima sosafela, ea' si'i anis epes gawaisi saga'i, “Hapaisi, apa' mea' gwa'aisii embela naman mogaga'.”
46015033	Na'amba anis epes sombaso'mepa. Anif basef gawaifi fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “I'i apa' mofe' mogaloma epes sanda' waf awafii, esis a' sohambambaga waf bu'wafi ape'ifi.”
46015034	Dei' ipa' pekwaha ukup amamba magahipai, pitanimai a' ukup pendape andeande'. Ipa' ina penda' waf awafi wapani, owa'i. Ae' enda'epa ambagof awagofa anif basef dei' iga'ipipafi. Anis epes ipe'isi ina dei' sogawa God endilisi, ata' owa' atin. Kofagema amamba ipa' atipa.
46015035	Apa' anona aman atiasi nogahali' na'amba ni'i, “Esis sagaga'i anaf sosafel si'imama? Anaf sofa' alop mamahopa ma sogosafel wapani?”
46015036	Anen nogahali'ma basef na'ambai okom magahanai. Dei'main, apa' magawa olemb witimb o hiahawes, isimba owa' sogaga'ia atiasi isimba ina sope namis, owa'atin.
46015037	Hiahawes isimba apa' magawasi, isimba ina sataga atifis hi'ilas si'i agof o soh mais, owa'atin. Apa' mawa nalelef atelef dowaf, anis gwa'aisi daias.
46015038	Apa' God atona nanda' nalelef afalemba pepe'alef fataga nohotagw ea' soh handanda'alef afis mais sagi' sataga sail si'i anen atona okom mandanda' na'i sogataga. Ea' anen atona nandanda' lawah si'igah haloma soh maisa hiahawes hiasi ma gwa'aisi isimba atona atin daindai.
46015039	Alop hiapi hiahaop ambagof fagapaipi ina atotop, owa'atin. Alop epesi anop daiap, alop mafisi anop daiap. Amigufi anop daiap, a agufi anop daiap.
46015040	Ea' hiahaom magape heveni maloma magape itapi amamba hiami mape. Apa' sosafa hiahaom anef daiaf, sosaf itapafi anef daiaf.
46015041	Awin alipini anef sosaf, a owambini anef daiaf. Ondowa anef sosaf, apa' ondowa wapani hiafi daindaiaf.
46015042	Waf sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, afamba ea' na'amba atin. Alop apa' dei' magawapi, apamba atiasi aop folo'ogalapi. Alop pogosafel wapanii, apamba ina anaf awapi, owa'atin. Pepe atapip.
46015043	Alop apa' magawapi, apamba a' awasip folo'ogalapi. Alop pogosafel wapanii, apamba bu'wapi fasipi endilisi. Alop magawapi apamba ina banagapi, owa'. Alop pogosafel wapanii, apop banagapi.
46015044	Alop apamba a' magawap, itapi. Apa' alop pogosafel wapanii, ilifapi, Ambal bu'unai Godi nugumafiapi. Alop apamba biafip ilifapi itapapi pape.
46015045	Baibel wapani naga'i na'amba na'i, “Aman nagali'i Adam nataga ambal namilinai.” Apa' Adam nagi' nagatagai nataga ambal bu'unai ma nogaso'as ambal namili epesi.
46015046	Apa' alop ilifapi ina pataga pali', owa'atin. Alop itapapi apop pataga pali'. Ea' alop apamba ilifapi pataga pagi'.
46015047	Aman nagali'i, God nanda' itap nanda'ana nataga ambal lapaona. Apa' aman nagi' nagatagai, anen aman heveninai.
46015048	Apa' epes hiapai itapipai, apa' mandati na'amba atin si'i aman anamba God nanda' itap nanda'anai. Apa' epes hiapai hevenipai anaf motaga mundati na'amba atin si'i aman anamba nagafi'i heveni.
46015049	Dei' apa' ata' mape si'i aman anamba itapanai ea' anaf mope na'amba atin si'i aman anamba nagafi'i heveni.
46015050	Ipa' alipipai, dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba usi'ifi. Epes itapasi anaf ina la'ifisa sogawis anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin. Hiahaom itapami higiligalami ina anaf la'ifima mofa' banagami mogape lifilafi, owa'atin.
46015051	-
46015052	Ipa' peme', dei' ae' a'i ewalapa anif basef fali' fape fandambaha' ma ipe'i. Anaf apa' hiapai ina moga', owa'. Atef bif kwafalis atis alof akutainai nogalef, apa' hiapai anaf mondambema hi'ilepa amondati na'a. Dei' main, alof anamba nelef ea' ma esis sagaga'i sogosafili, anaf ina ata' soga' wapani, a'owa'. Ea' apa' mogape itap apa'e wapani mondambema amondati na'a.
46015053	Dei' main, alop apamba apa' magawapi anaf apotoga pondehi namop pope andeande' lifilafi. Alop apamba pagaga'i apotaga namop pope dondol.
46015054	Endilisi, alop apamba magawapi anaf potaga dambaip pope andeande' lifilafi. Ea' alop apamba pagaga'i anaf posafel apondati na'a pofa' ambal namili pope dondol. Nemaf afamba anif basef Baibelifi afetaga faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “God natalogofa ga' nikila' wandof nanda'am hi'alam ea'.”
46015055	“Ina', ga', banagami ine'imi amuma? Ea' wamba'w ine'ikwi hikali'wi akuma? Owa'atin endilisi.”
46015056	Wamba'w sagaga'ma'wi kwataga ma waf awafi ea' banagami ma waf awafi magataga na'amba. Apa' epes hiapai mumbisila' basefa mu'uli Godi hi'alapa. Isimba atis dei' mu'uli inimba nawalapai banagami ma waf awafi.
46015057	Apa' mundanifela God. Ama banagami Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi atom God nowa' banagapa ma dei' migikila' wandafa mogali'amona waf awafi.
46015058	Ea' dei' ipa' alipipai endilisi ae'ipai, pendape banagepa andeande'. Ina ombal mehepa kwasakwasala pendahagas, owa'i. Dondol ipa' banagepama penda' maol Dembinaii. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa maol inimba panda'ana Dembinaii, ina anaf newala dowaf, owa'atin.
46016001	Dei' ae' anif basefa otamba ipa' pa'i pekolasamba pegaso' esis amam nematawa Godii. Ae' ali' ihimba'mas ufia'wa sonda' maol inimba ma esis sios Galesiaisi sondakolas daindai ea' dei' a'i ipa' penda'as na'amba atin.
46016002	Sande nimaguf danda ipa' hipai atona atin ukup pendanda'ma otamba pegefa'amba wik gagali'i ea' pewaloga otamba ambamba pembe'amba dondo' ma ipa' pegefa'amba be'eh dei pimafiamba ifagw ipe'igwi. Ama anaf ipa' ina penda' maol lu'wanima pegelaoma otamba pegasa'amba, owa'.
46016003	Anafa etagamepa, dao' ipa' pendandepa anom amama mogofa' otamba ambamba mogafe' Jerusalem. Ama ae' ese'ama basef amoma mofa'ef esapa'am mogafe'.
46016004	I'i andeande'ma egafe' wapanima, dao' amom mofe' molome.
46016005	Anaf ae' efo'o ili' ewala itap lu'upa Masedonia, ea' efo'o tagamepa. Dei' main, ae' okom mandanda' a'i ata' ili' ewala itap apamba Masedonia efe'.
46016006	Ae' okom mandanda' ma'i ata' epe anif nimaguf elomepa. Ae' ina egawa, epe elomepa nimaguf ma'wif nogota naoh gogohafel lu'ugwatai hi'igalawa ma main, efe' wambel mamahogoma, ipa' pitopalope pimafi ma hiahawes, pilutumi pehapone ufia'w.
46016007	Ipa' pegawa, ae' andaiwa'ma igatilipa nogota bandata, owa'atin. I'i Dembinai niga'ias na'amba ma, a'i ipani nogota laota kwasakwasala elomepa.
46016008	Apa' ae' a'i epe Efesus efe' etagama nemaf afamba Pentikos.
46016009	Dei' main, God nausi'mi ufia'w kwagal alihi'w ea' ma enda' maol bu'wani egaloma amam nematawa hiasi sombema nelelemba sogahipifana endilisi. Apa' owa' bousi hiasi sapaogon wapani.
46016010	I'i Timoti nogatagamaepa ma, dao' ipa' solawaipa andeande' pimafiana ma anen nogape opaf awanef la'afena ipa'. Dei' main, anen nape nanda' maol Dembinaii si'i ae' ape anda'an.
46016011	Na'amba anin epen okom mondanda'mana ni'i anen falafunai neso'ana alafuga, na'ambai owa'i. Ipa' penda' opaf ananifi fope sa'ombel pisi'ana hiahawes petopalopana ea' pilutumana pehaponana ufia'w ma nogafi'mai ae'. Ae' epe ehafana eloma anis alipisi.
46016012	Ea' basef sahomapa ape'inai Apolos fagape na'amba. Nimaguf hiafi a'ipana dindinip a'i anen ata' nolomago anom alipumi ata' mofo'o mitiago ipa', apa' anen nandaiwa' endilisi ma nogafo'o dei'. Nambimba i'i anen niti Dembinai nonda' ufia'w kogala nogafo'o, dao' a' nofo'o.
46016013	Ipa' solawaipa andeande' pindalutu banagepama pigahapifa Krais. Ipa' pendape epes banagepa endilisi si'i dembipai ea' pendalutu bangepa.
46016014	Hiahawes hiasi ipa' penda'asi, ipa' ukup pindapindaila God noloma epes penda'as.
46016015	Ipa' pegawa wambota Stefanasi sali' sataga Kristen sali'ma Grik hiasi. Ea' esis ukup pa'ipa'i a'owa' atapisa sanda' maol sagatopalopa epes Godi. Alipipai, ae' a'ipipa dindinipa
46016016	pegape lafela epes isimba soloma epes mamahisa sandao'oma sanda' maol inimbai.
46016017	Dei' ae' sonahe ma Stefanasi Fatunatus maloma Akaikus amom mafi'mai ae'. Dei' main, ipa' ina atiasi la'ifipama pigafi'i na'a'e, owa'. Amom dei' matopalopepa maho'ofepa mafi'mai ae' na'a'e.
46016018	Amom manda' opaf ae'afi fape awanef mowa' banagae ea' mowa' banaga ipa' wapani. Ea' andeande'ma ipa' pegasa'ma agof amam na'ambaimi.
46016019	Ea' esis sios sagape daindai itap apamba lu'upa walemb hielimbi agol Esiai sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi. Akila i Prisila saloma esis Kristen sios sandakolas ipat esis biasi, esis wapani sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi endilisi ma agol Dembinaii.
46016020	Alipisi hiasi sagape na'a'i sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'. Waf apa' amam nematawa Godi, ipa' hipai atona atin pendaso'ama lagof atin pelomago sahin owan ipe'isi.
46016021	Dei' ae' Pol ahapila pen lagol ae'agili atogol anda'mepago basef ifimba bandafi atif. Ae' anda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'.
46016022	I'i anin epen mamahina nendaiwa'ma nigaso'ana nembel ananimbili Dembinai, okom ae'ami a'i anaf God nohambombagago epen inimba higililano. Dembinai ape'inai, ae' okom mohafel endilisi, a'i ina' fi'i.
46016023	Ae' a'i okom dembinai Jisasi naganagaila ipe'i notopalpepa dowaf nope nolomago ipa' nowa' banagaipa.
46016024	Ae' a'i okom lu'unai ae'anai naganagaila ipe'i nefe'mago ipa' hipai palome magape sisihipama Krais Jisasi. Basef ifimba ea' ma'uf.
47001001	Ae' Pol, God nandandepe aposel Krais Jisasi. Ae' aloma owamapa Timoti wanda'ago basef ifimba ma ipa' amam nematawa Godi pagape Korini pelomago amam nematawa hiasi Godi si'isi sagape anamba hiagoma esis Grik sagapoma.
47001002	Ae' a'i God ahamapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai Jisas Krais motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banagaipago monda' opalef ipe'ilifi fepe awanelef.
47001003	Apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol, anen God ahama Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais. Anen ahamapa ape'inai, kofagonama okom magamagailapai nati apa' uwahipipa. Anen God nanda' opalef nimanilifi apa' hiapaii fagape sa'ombel.
47001004	Nimanimi hiami magatagamapai anen nanda'apa opalef fape awanelef. Ama dei' apa' ila ma monda' opalef epes isimba nimanimi mamimami mogatagamasi fegape awanelef si'i God nali' nagatopalopapa.
47001005	Akafimi lu'wami Krais nali' nogofa'ami dei' apa' wapani mofa'am. Ea' na'amba atin opaf awanifi lu'wafi ananifi dei' faso'alepa.
47001006	I'i dei' anis daias sogaso'afa nimanimi, amamba motopalopepa monda' opalef ipe'ilifi fepe sa'ombela atiasi God nokwahomepa waf awafi nofa'epa pigitanimai. I'i God nonda' opalef afa'ilifi fegape sa'ombel, anen nonda' opalef ipe'ilifi awanelef wapani ma pilutu banagepama pegefa' akafimi amambai si'i afa' ogofa'ami.
47001007	Afa' ogawa endilisi wa'i ipa' pigalutu banagepa. Dei' main, afa' ogawa ipa' apefa' akafimi palomafa ea' na'amba atin atiasi pefa' opalef awanilifi pelomafa wapani.
47001008	Ipa' alipipai, afa' wa'i ipa' ata' pegawa nimanimi akafimi anis epes sagaso'afam gani itap apamba lu'upa Esiai. Akafimi amamba lu'wami a'owa' ea' mahagofa afa', mikila' banagami afa'imi. Ea' afa' ukup pandanda' pa'i endilisi atiasi a' oga'.
47001009	Wameme'ma nimanimi lu'wami ea' ogawa wa'i endilisi atis a' oga'. Apa' owa' amamba matagamafa ma afa' ina ukup pendanda'ma banagami afa'imi atom, owa'atin. Afa' ukup pendapoma banagami Godi atom, amamba magasa'ma epes sagaga'ii.
47001010	Esis saso'afa nimanimi lu'wami sanda'afa aofa endilisi sa'i sohafa oga', owa' God nofa'afa otanimai. Ea' atiasi notopalopafa wapani. Ukup afa'ipi banagep ohapifana endilisi ma atiasi nogatopalopafa ma anom nimanimi lu'wami wapani.
47001011	Ama dei' beten ipa' panda'mafani atin, nonda'mafas na'amba. Ea' God atiasi nogwa beten amam nematawa hiasi sanda'ani ma anen nofalo'mafa nogatopalopafa dowaf. Ama atiasi amam nematawa hiasi ukup pegapoma afa' ma soganifela Goda hiahawes isimba anen nanda'asi.
47001012	Afa' wandagala ma hiahawes isimba. Malagof fagape opalef apa' nomoni fawalapa basef ifimba fa'ipafa wagafe' waf usi'if hilili'i ma waf opalef bu'walififi God nagaso'afaf afa'i. Gawa epes itapasi ina nawalapa waf afambai ma afa', owa'atin. God nati uwahipifa a'owa' natopalopafa dowaf dei' wafe' na'amba. Wafe' waf afambai la'afena epes hiasi sagape itap apa'ii ea' wanda'as na'amba hiafi ma ipa'.
47001013	-
47001014	Afa' ina wanda' anif basef ahififi ma ipa', owa'atin. Wanda' andipefi atif, ifimba ipa' ila ma pitalifif pegegawafi. Dei' ipa' ina pegawa waf afa'ifi andeande', ata' owa'. Apa' ae' okom ma'i ipa' atiasi pegawa endilisi waf afa'ifi hiafi hi'ilaf. Nemaf afamba Dembinai Jisasi, ipa' pendagalama afa' na'amba atin si'i afa' anaf ondagala ma ipa'.
47001015	Ae' egawef endilisi basef ali' aga'ipipafi ma waf bu'wafi ipe'ifi. Ea' fowa' ali' anda' okom ma'i efe'mago ipa' etopalopepa bifa ata' pegegawa waf Godi wapani. Owa' ae' ina afo'o.
47001016	Ae' okom mandanda' ma'i ata' ili' efe'mepago ma main, ekwahipa efe' itap lu'upa Masedonia ma bola ekwaha Masedonia itanima ifi'mipai wapani ma petopalope pesapa'e egafe' itap lu'upa Juda.
47001017	Dei' si'i main? Ae' a'ias ea' ma enda'as na'amba, owa' alambama basef ifimba anda' dambaifi faha'ohef? O i'i ae' okom mi'i enda' anin mae, i'i basef biafif “Aho'” neloma “Owa'” wapani si'i epes itapasi saga'i? Owa'atin endilisi.
47001018	God anen nanda' hiahaom datimai, naga'i endilisi atisi. Basef hiafi afa' wagase'epafi endilisifi atif na'amba atin. Afa' ina wa'i anif basef biafif, “Aho'” naloma “Owa'” fandahapima atogon, owa'atin.
47001019	Nogamana Godi Jisas Krais, ae'i Sailas waloma Timoti wagawalapa basef ananifii, anen ina naga'i na'ambai naga'i, “Aho'” i “Owa'” atifi, owa'atin. Krais naga'i aho' atini.
