47001020	Aho', basefa lap mamahifa God naga'iefi kofagefa fandawalap ea' fa'i Krais atona, anen naga'i aho' atini. Isimba atis dei' apa' ma'i agol Jisas Kraisi atogol ea' ma'i, “Endilisi” ma basef ifimba God nagala' lapafi masa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol.
47001021	-
47001022	God atona nowa' banaga afa', ipa' wapani, ea' mape sisihipama Krais. Anen nanda'mapa ametal ananini apa' nosaho'apa ma mogape ananipai atepa ea' naso'apa Ambal bu'unai ananinai nape nomon opalef ape'ilifi. Ambal anamba God nagaso'apani nali' ma hiahaom du'wanim hiami fasimi God na'i anaf nogaso'apami.
47001023	Ae' a'i basef endilisifi atifa naep Godi. Ae' andaiwa' ma egase'epa nimanimi ipa'. Ea' fowa' ina itanima afo'o Korin, owa'.
47001024	Afa' ina wape wali'ma oganandona waf ipa' pagahapifa Godafi, owa'atin. Dei' main, ipa' atipa palutu banagepa pahapifana ea'. Apa' dei' afa' wanda' maol walomepa ma onda'epa pendagala.
47002001	Okom ae'ami a'ias endilisi na'amba a'i, ae' ina ata' itanima efe'mago ipa' wapani enda' opalef ipe'ilifi nimanilif, owa'.
47002002	I'i enda' opalef ipe'ilifi nimanilifai, atiasi epes mamahisa sonda'e sonehe? Owa'atin endilisi. Ipa' atipa, ea' anda' ukup ipe'ipi iwanip.
47002003	I'i ipa' sonehepa, andeande'. Waf afamba bu'wafi. Apa' i'i ae' efo'o ma penda' opaf ae'afi nimanif, na'ambai andaiwa'. Ea' isimba atis fowa' ali' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa'. Dei' main, ae' egawa ipa' endilisi na'amba. I'i ae' sonehe epe, ipa' hipai wapani sonehepa.
47002004	Endilisi anda'mepago basef ifimba ma nemaf afamba opaf ae'afi agame' nimanimi akafimi lu'wami ea' alomam alef hiafi. Ae' ina anda' basef ifimba ma fegase'epa opalef nimanilifi, owa'atin. Anda'efa ipa' pegegawa ae' okom pelele' mailipa a'owa'.
47002005	I'i anin epen kofagona nenda' opaf nimanifi figatagai, anin ina nanda' opaf ae'afi atof nimanif, owa'atin. Anin nanda' ipa' hipai opalef nimanilif a'owa'. Ae' a'i basefa ipa' hipai a'a anipa iafipa. Andaiwa' ma iga'i basef banagambel a'owa' ma waf awafi anen nanda'afi, owa'. Isimba atis dei' a'ias na'amba ma anipa iafipa.
47002006	Nimanimi akafimi ipa' epes hipai pagaso'anami ea' mandahama anen.
47002007	Ea' dei' penda' anef waf daiaf anen. Andeande'ma pekwaho waf awafi ananifi ukup pegase'epafa pegewa' banagona penda' opaf ananifi awanef. Na'amba nimanimi lu'wami a'owa' monda' okom ananimi aom a' nefe' lafel endilisi.
47002008	Isimba atis dei' a'ipipa dindinip pihimba'ma anona ukup ipe'ipi uwahipipi lu'up paipailana.
47002009	Fowa' anda' basef ifimba agwambepa atin. Ama a'i egegawa ipa' paila basef ae'afi dondol a'a owa'atin?
47002010	I'i ipa' pekwaha waf awafi anin epeni ukup pese'epaf dogw, ae' wapani ekwahomanaf okom mose'eaf. Aho', waf afamba awafi agakwahifi okom ae'ami mandanda' na'amba. Ae' ina egawa okom Kraisi mandanda' ma'imama, apa' i'i andeande'ma ae' egakwahomenafa naep Kraisi, dao' ekwahomanaf endilisi ma etopalopepa pegape andeande'.
47002011	Ae' anda'as na'amba ma Satan ina atiasi nombaso'mapa nikila'apa, owa'. Dei' main, apa' mogawa okom ananimi baso'ami.
47002012	Fowa' Dembinai nanda' ufia'w kwagala ae' afi'i agataga Troasa agawalapa basef bu'wafi ma Krais.
47002013	Apa' opaf ae'afi ina fape sa'ombel, owa'. Dei' main, ae' ina ata' ati owame ae'anai Taitus, owa'. Ea' akwaha esis Troas afi'i ataga anep itap lu'upa Masedonia.
47002014	Apa' dei' ae' anifela God. Dondol anen natopalope ape sisihiwi agaloma Krais ea' ali'amona wandafa waf awafi. Ama maol ae'ani God nawalapa basef ea' anis epes sogawa Krais. Gawa inimba anin si'i alogw fasigwi usihigwi gwa gwagafe'agon hi'agalagini.
47002015	Endilisi ae' si'i alogw fasigwi gwai gwatagai Krais gwafe'ma God. Alogw agwamba gwafe' la'afena epes isimba dei' God nokwahomas waf awafi nowambelas sogotanimai, isimba sagape ufia'w kwagafe' heveni saloma isimba sagape ufia'w higiligalasa'wi wapani.
47002016	Ama wambota isimba sagape ufia'w higiligalasa'wi, alogw agwamba hikapigwi sagaga'agwi. Apa' wambota isimba sagape ufia'w kwagafe' heveni, alogw agwamba bu'wagwi gwagaso'as ambal namili. Ea' dei' ae' okom mandanda'ma maol inimba Godi a'i ina anis epes la'ifisa sonda'an, apa' owa' ae' la'ifiwi anda'an.
47002017	Dei' main, ae' ina si'i anis epes hiasi safe'agon hi'alagona sanda' maola basef Godi ma sogofa' hiahawes asasisi atis, owa'atin. Ae' anda' maol inimba Godi na'ambai. Ae' ina ambaso'am dowafa maol Godi, owa'atin. Ae' anda'an aila afe' usi'ini atin hi'alan, ape sisihiwi aloma Krais. God nasapa'e afi'i awalapa basef fafe' andeande'ma naep ananipi.
47003001	Basef ifimba doko'ifi ipa' pa'i ae' asa'ma agol ae'agili atogol lu'wagol wapani si'i anom amam mambaso'mepa manda'am? O pa'i ae' owa' banagewe enda'as si'i amoma egase'epa anif basefa pas anis daias sanda'afi ma sogasa'ma agol ae'agili? O ipa' wapani atiasi penda' anif basef fil pepa ma pegatopalope? Owa'atin endilisi.
47003002	Basefa pas sogasa'ma agol ae'agili ea' ipa' atipa. Basef ifimba fail sisihif nomon okom ae'ami. Ama epes hiasi sotalififa sogogawef.
47003003	Ipa' pandawalap alihipa, pas isimba ea' ipa' atipa. Krais atona nanda' basefa pas isimba. Anen nandandepe nase'e pas isimba afo'o ase'epas. Anen ina nanda' ing nufagi'if, owa'atin. Anen nufagi'ifa Ambal bu'unai God nagape namunai. Anen ina nufagi'if fail anom otam wa'ami, owa'atin. Nufagi'if fail ukup ipe'ipi nomon.
47003004	Basef ifimba kofagefa na'amba. Krais natopalope endilisi ea' ahapifif banagewe ma God ape na'amba.
47003005	Endilisi ae' atowe ina la'ifiwi ma enda' maol inimba, owa'atin. God atona nanda'e la'ifiwi ma anda' maol inimba ananini.
47003006	Ea' anen atona nanda'e la'ifiwi ma anda' maola ufia'w basef dambaifi nagala' lapafi. Basefa mu'uli inimba ina sanda'ef fail pepa dowaf, owa'. Ifimba Ambal bu'unai ananinai nagawalapafi. Basef sanda'ef fagail pepa dowafi faha epes sagaga'i, apa' Ambal bu'unai ananinai nanda'as sofa' ambal namili sogape namisi.
47003007	God nufagi' basef ifimba fowa'ifi ma mu'uli ananini fail otam. Maol Godi amom manda'ani, inimbai natagama ga' naloma mogogala'i ananimi fasimi wapani. Mogogala'i amamba manda' amaga Mosesi gogogala'i a' mataga sa'osa'om, apa' owa', amamba banagem a'owa' ma esis Israel ina la'ifisa naep do' sigati amaga ananigai, owa'.
47003008	Apa' mogogala'i ma maol Godi Ambal bu'unai ananinai nanda'ani lu'um a'owa' mikila' amamba fowa'imi.
47003009	Maol fowa'ini nawaloga epes, higiligalasi inimba nawalapai mogogala'i Godi. Apa' maol inimba dei'ini nanda' epesa God naga'i esis bo'wes hilili'i, inimba dei' nawalapai mogogala'i ananimi lu'um a'owa' mikila' amamba magali'i.
47003010	Endilisi, mogogala'i fowa'imi ina mogala' na'amba atin si'i dei'imi, owa'. Fowa'imi falafumi atom apa' dei'imi lu'um mikila' a'owa'.
47003011	Maol inimba dei' na'i a' higiligalani, anin fowa' nataga naloma mogogala'i Godi. Apa' mogogala'i dei'imi ma maol inimba nagape lifilafii a' lu'um a'owa' mikila' amamba magali'i.
47003012	Afa' wanda' maol Godii ogawa basef ifimba dambaifi nagala' lapafi endilisifi ea' wape ohafa mogogala'i amamba atiasi mogatagamafa. Ea' afa' ina ombal mahafa kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Afa' banagefa a'owa'.
47003013	Ina wape si'i Moses, owa'. Anen nawala lowaf napete'af amaga ananigai nambaho'waga ma esis Israel ina siti mogogala'i amamba mogafe' sa'osa'ombela hi'igalam, owa'.
47003014	Owa' ukup asasipi paso'as endilisi. Dei' main, dondol esis sagatalifa basef fagail Baibeli fowa' God nagala' lapafi. Nemaf mamahefa sagatalifa basef ifimba, lowaf afamba wa'afi fagape amaga Mosesi ata' fape atapif fasopama ukup asasipi fafi'i fafi'i fataga dei'. Ina fandatagwah, owa'atin. Krais atona, dao' God nahape' lowaf afamba.
47003015	Fowa' sagatalifa basef Moses nanda'afi safi'i sataga dei', lowaf afamba ata' faso'ala opalef asasilifi atapif.
47003016	Apa' i'i epen ami nembema opaf nefe'ma Dembinai, dao' a' fendatagwah.
47003017	Dembinai anamba anen Ambal bu'unai Godi. I'i Spirit Ambal Dembinaii nogape anin epen, ina ata' anis maefah sili'ama anin, owa'atin. Anin nape wahifin.
47003018	Ea' apa' hiapai dei' mape amagah wafigah, mogogala'i bu'wami Dembinai mogala'ma apa' mogogaifa anis epes. Apa' mape na'amba dei' Ambal bu'unai Godi naho'ofa waf ape'ifi ea' mandati si'i Dembinai ma mogogala'i amamba mataga lu'um atapim mafe' atin mape. Amamba mataga Dembinai atona, anen Ambal bu'unai Godi.
47004001	God na'i afa' uwahipifa dei' naso'afa maol inimba. Ea' afa' ina wandahagasa maol inimba, owa'atin.
47004002	Afa' owa' alafugah ea' ma waf ambagof awagufi sandambaho' sanda'afi. Ina ata' wape wafe' waf afamba baso'afi uhufifi watolapa basef Godi walambama lambamaifi wa'if, owa'atin. Afa' wagawalapa basef endilisifi alihifa naep Godi ma epes hiasi seme'ef sogogawef malogof fagape opalef asasilifi nomoni.
47004003	I'i basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi wagawalapafi fendambaho', dao' fandambaho'ma epes isimba atis sagafe' ufia'w higiligalasa'wi. God baso'amunai itap apa'inai nasopama opalefa epes isimba owa' sogahapifa Godia.
47004004	Ama basef ifimba bu'wafi kofagefa ma mogogala'i Kraisi ina atiasi fiwis nomona opalef asasilifi, owa'. Esis ina sati Krais nandati na'amba atin endilisi si'i Godi, owa'.
47004005	Dei' main, afa' ina wawalapa basefa afa' ogasa'ma agof afa'igufi lu'wagof, owa'atin. Afa' wawalapefa Krais Jisas atona anen Dembinai. Afa' waila waf Jisasi dei' agof akafa wape lafela ipa' wanda' maol watopalopepa.
47004006	Fowa' God nati akot atona na'i, “Lola a' nendataga.” Dei' ea' anamba atona nanda' mogogala'i ananimi mataga ma afa' ea' manda' opalef afa'ilifi fegala' a'owa'. Mogogala'i amamba mihimba'mapa gawa ma mogogala'i banagami Godi mape atapim mogala'. Apa' mati amamba ma waf Jisas Kraisi fegala' fataga amaga ananigai.
47004007	Apa' hiahaom amamba fasimi mogogala'i maloma banagami Godi, amamba mape opalef afa'ilifi nomon, afa' si'i maloh sanda' itap sagala'ahi. Ama migihimba'ma epes hiasi sogogawa banagami amamba Godi atom. Afa' owa'.
47004008	Fe' poe afa'ini fowa' dei' wapani nagape na'amba. Anamba hiagoma ogafe'ma dondol akafimi matagamafa, apa' amom ina mahambombagafa endilisi, owa'. Hiahaom hiami masopama nomonas afa'isi, apa' nomonas afa'isi ina higilalas hi'alas, owa'atin.
47004009	Anis epes sanda'afa tofalafa ma sonda'afa aofa, apa' God ina nakwahofa, owa'. Esis sahafa owa wa'oh, owa', owa'atin. Ina afufa endilisi, owa'.
47004010	Lifilafi afa' ofa' akafimi ma ga' Jisasi alop afa'ipi wafe'. Wanda'as na'amba ma ambal namonai nagape Jisasi wapani nagataga alihina alop afa'ipi.
47004011	Dei' main, afa' wanda' maol Jisasi. Isimba atis dei' nimaguf hiafi dondol anis epes sa'i sohafa ome' akafimi oga'. Ama ambal namonai nagape Jisasi notaga nondawalap alop afa'ipi, owa' namop atapip pogapania.
47004012	Ea' dei' epes isimba sa'i sohafa oga' ma ipa' pagahapifanai pefa' ambal namili pegape andeande'.
47004013	Baibel naga'i na'i, “Ae' ahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' awalapa basef alihif a'if.” Afa' wahapifa God na'amba atin si'i Baibel naga'i dei' wawalapef wa'if.
47004014	Dei' main, afa' ea' ogawa God nasa'ma Dembinai Jisas nogosafel matmati, anen atiasi nosa'ma apa' wapani moloma Jisas ea' nofa' afa' oloma ipa' nokolasepa atogon mofe' mope felefele' molomana.
47004015	Hiahaom amamba akafimi hiami matagamafa ma ogatopalopepa. Afa' wafe' wa'ipasa basef God nagatopalopapa dowafafi fefe' fetaga atapif fefe'agon hi'igalagon. Ea' esis sondabeten sinifela God sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol.
47004016	Afa' ukup papoma isimba dei' ina wandahagasa maol Godi, owa'. Endilisi, pepela alop afa'ipi na'i a' newafa atapin hi'ilan. Apa' owa', opalef afa'ilifi fataga dambailif wapani nimaguf hiafi danda.
47004017	Aho', nimanimi amamba magatagamafai amamba sa'osa'om a'owa' ea' atiasi mope nogota bandata. Nimanimi amamba anaf mowalapai mogogala'i poe bu'wani endilisi gani heven dondol lifilafi. Poe inimba bu'wani anaf nikila' endilisi nimanimi amamba sa'umi dei'imi.
47004018	Dei' main, afa' ina naep do' banagambela hiahaom sagatolom naepi, owa'. Hiahaom owa' sogatolom naepia, dao' watolom banagambel. Dei' main, hiahaom sagatolom naepi, amamba atiasi mogape nogota bandatai. Apa' hiahaom amamba owa' sogatolom naepia, amambai mogape lifilafi dondoli.
47005001	Dei' afa' ogawa na'amba. Nemaf afamba ipat atamba sogowalo' selitai sagala'ata itap apa'ii tondatal aota ma, ea' hapaitai. Afa' anota God na'i nogaso'afatai dambaitai. Ipat atamba epes ina sanda'ata sala'ata lagof asasigufi, owa'. Atamba tapani heven ea' totawa lifilafi dondol.
47005002	Dei' afa' wape alop si'i ipat itap apa'e, ea' kem atin wape. Afa' ukup pa'ipa'i a'owa' ma ipat atamba afa'itai tagape heveni ma atiasi togaso'ala alop afa'ipi si'i klos luwaguf.
47005003	I'i afa' ogola klos amamba ea', alop afa'ipi ina atiasi pil wafip dowaf, owa'.
47005004	Aho', nimaguf hiafi afa' ata' wape itap apa'e wape atapifa ipat anamba sogowalo' selanai ea' opalef nimanilif kem atin wape. Afa' ina wandaiwa'ma ogakwaha alop dei'ipi, owa'. Afa' wa'i ondawisa alop dambaipi si'i klos luwaguf ama alop anamba na'i nogaga'i atiasi a' nondambema nogataga ambal dambaili namili endilisi.
47005005	God atona nandondombafa ma ogofa' alop apamba dambaipi ea' naso'afa Ambal bu'unai ananinai. Ambal anamba nagali'ma hiahaom amamba hiami nanda'ami ma na'i anaf nogaso'afam afa'i ea' ogawa endilisi atis anaf a' noso'afam.
47005006	Ea' dei' hiahaom amamba mowa' banaga opalef afa'ilifi dondol. Afa' ogawa, alop afa'ipi ata' si'i ifagw afa' wagapaugwi. Ama nogota ata'e wagape alop apa'e, ina dei' wape waloma Dembinai ma wambel ananimbili, ata' owa'.
47005007	Dei' ata' wahapifana wafe'. Afa' ina dei' watolona, ata' owa'.
47005008	Owa' ae' a'ias ea', opalef afa'ilifi fape banagalef, ukup pehafel a'owa' ma ogakwaha alop dei'ipi ofe' ope ogaloma Dembinai wambel kofagama afa'ima.
47005009	I'i ope ogalomana ilif a'a ogape alop apa'e ma itap apa'e, hapaimi. Afa' dondol ukup pali' pahafel banagepa ogaila okom Dembinaii atom.
47005010	Apa' mogawa endilisi anaf apa' hiapai motaga ma kot atamba Kraisi hi'ilapa. I'i apa' monda' waf bu'wafi a'a waf awafi nogota atamba ata' magape alop ape'ipi. Anaf apa' hiapai atona atin mofa' hiahaom amamba bu'wami a'a awami mogwama waf afamba apa' manda'afi.
47005011	Afa' ombel mahafa ma Dembinai. Isimba atis dei' wanda' maola wagasa'ma nomonas epesi ma sogahapifana. Apa' naep Godi afa' wape alihifa ea'. Ae' okom mandanda' na'amba a'i waf afa'ifi fandawalap alihifa malogof fagape opalef ipe'ilifi nomoni.
47005012	Basef ifimba afa' ina wa'i osa'ma agof afa'igufi atogofa ipa' piga'i afa' amam bu'ufai, owa'. Wa'i onda' ufia'wa ipa' sowenogahepa ma afa' naep anis epesi. Wanda'as na'amba ma ipa' la'ifipa ma pegagwamasa basef esis epes isimba sandagala ma anis daiasi dowafa alop atopi owa' sondagala ma waf bu'wafi asasifia.
47005013	I'i endilisi afa' ope si'i ukup pagaso'asiai, ea' diaogo, hapaimi. Afa' wanda'am na'amba ma ogosa'ma agol Godi. I'i endilisi afa' ukup pepomas andeande', dao' afa' wanda'as na'amba ma wagatopalopepa.
47005014	Okom Kraisi magamagailapai atom masa'mafa ma maol inimba. Dei' main, afa' ukup pandanda' pegawa endilisi na'amba. I'i aman atotona noho'ofa apa' hiapai hi'alapa ma nagaga', isimba si'i apa' hiapai a' maga' ea'.
47005015	Ea' anen naho'ofa apa' hiapai naga' ma apa' epes mogape namepa ma ina a' ukup pelapefe' a'owa' ma apa' atepa, owa'atin. Apa' ukup pendanda'ma aman anamba naha'ofapa naga' ma notanima nogosafel wapanii, ukup pendanda'mana mondanda' maol ananini atapipa.
47005016	Isimba atis dei' afa' ina ata' waila opaf apinai wawaloga waf anin epeni, owa'atin. Endilisi, fowa' waila wafa opaf apinai ea' wawaloga Krais na'amba. Apa' dei' owa'.
47005017	Ea' i'i anin epen nepe negaloma Kraisi, God nanda' anin nataga dambain endilisi. Dei' peme' andeande'. Waf afamba apifi ananifi ahi'alaf ea'. Dei' nanda' waf dambaifi.
47005018	God atona kofagonama waf afamba epes sagataga dambaisafi. Fowa' apa' ata' mape baopai atin, owa' Krais nataga nanda'apa mape opalef atelef maloma God. Ea' God naso'afa maol inimba ma ogatopalopa anona onda' esis bousi ananisi sotaga opalef atifilif sogalomana.
47005019	Basef afa'ifi na'amba. Krais atona God nanda' maol nanda' epes hiasi Basef afa'ifi na'amba. Krais atona God nanda' maol nanda' epes hiasi sakwaha waf naumbihifi sataga opalef atelef salomana. Anen ina ata' okom mandanda'ma waf awafi esis sanda'afi, owa'. Ea' naso'afa maol inimba ma ogawalapa basef ananifi ma nonda' esis bousi sotaga opalef atelef sogalomana.
47005020	Ea' afa' dei' ofa' malogol Kraisi wawalapa basef ananifi. Isimba na'amba atin. God atona nofala epes hiasi banagambela malogof afa'igufi. Ea' waho'ofa Krais wa'ipas na'amba wa'i, “Ipa' pendakwaha waf naumbihifi ma petaga opalef atifilif pegaloma God.”
47005021	Aman anamba ina nanda' waf awafii, apa' God nakolasa awami ape'imi hiami hi'alam mafe'ma anen atona ea' kofagema ape'imi mapoma anen atona nofa'am. Anen nanda'am na'amba ma apa' mogape sisihipama anona mogofa' waf ananifi be'ef hilili'i.
47006001	Afa' wanda' maol Godi wandao'oma walomana. Dei' wa'ipipa banagambel na'amba wa'i, “God natopalopepa dowaf ea'. Na'amba ipa' ukup pese'epa waf afamba nagatopalopepa dowafafi, owa'i.”
47006002	Peme'. God naga'i na'amba na'i, “Nemaf ae' agati uwahipipafi afamba ame' basef ipe'ifi ea'. Nemaf afa'e ae' atopalopepa a'i efa'epa pigatanimai.” Peme'! Dei' atef nemaf God nagati uwahipipafi. Dei' atef God na'i ekwahomepa waf awafi nofa'apa mutanimai.
47006003	Afa' wandaiwa'ma epes siga'ipafa basef awafi ma maol Godi afa' wanda'ani. Isimba atis dei' wandaiwa'ma onda' anis hiahawasa waf awafi soha bo'wagah asasigahi sogowa, owa'atin.
47006004	Apa' dondol wihimba'ma epes hiasi wanda' maol Godii. Dei' wihimba'mas na'amba. Walutu banagefa endilisi ma nimanimi mamimami magatagamafa ma hiahaom ma'i mogahambombagafai.
47006005	Esis sahafa sanda'afa wanda' kalabus. Esis bousi sanda'afa tofalafa sa'ipafa awa awagon. Afa' wanda' maol numa'uni endilisi. Ina wa' gwa'aisi wape wa'oh andeande', owa'atin.
47006006	Wanda' waf bu'wafi hilili'i ea' wahapila gawa fasini, opalef awanelef walutu banagefa ma nimanimi. Wanda' waf bu'wafi ma anis epesi. Ofa' banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi, wanda' waf afamba endilisi ma ukup pagapagaila anis epes watopalopas. Ina wa'i basef malogof atogof, owa'atin.
47006007	Wawalapa basef endilisifi, wanda' maol banagambela banagami Godi. Afa' wahapila waf bu'wafi hilili'i si'i wahapila hiahawes wagapa'asi lagof biagof kwahisigili gagaili.
47006008	Anis epes sasa'ma agof afa'igufi a anis satalogofafa. Anis sa'i basef awafi sanda'i'ipamafa apa' anis sa'ipasa basef anis daiasa waf bu'wafi afa' wanda'afi. Esis ukup pandanda'mafa sa'i afa' epes wagambaso'ami, apa' owa', esis atis epes sagambaso'ami. Afa' waga'i endilisii.
47006009	Wanda'as na'amba, ina a' anin epen negawa afa', apa' owa', hiasi sogawafa. Afa' si'i epes ea' wagaga'i, apa' owa'atin. Afa' ata' wape namofa. God ata' nopagahofa bumbulita ma nagasindi'amonafa, apa' anen ina nahafa afuta, owa'.
47006010	Afa' opalef nimanilif endilisi, apa' owa' sonahafa dondol. Wape si'i isimba hiahawes akasi kwahusi apa' owa' waso'asa hiahaom afa'imi ma epes hiasi. Afa' hiahawes akafa si'i isimba kwahusi, owa' waf bu'wafi Godi fihimba'mafa wape si'i hiahaom hiamifai.
47006011	Ipa' Korin alipipai, ae' a'i basef hiafi bu'wafi fagape okom ae'ami awalapefa ipa' alihif hi'alef, ae' okom pelele' maimailipa a'owa' si'i agalopepa.
47006012	Ae' ina asopama opaf ae'afi isambalipa, owa'atin. Ae' okom maimailipa a'owa'. Apa' owa' ipa' apasopama opalef ipe'ilifi. Ea' ina a' mape opalef atifilif endilisi, owa'.
47006013	Dei' ae' ahamepa, ipa' si'i awasi ae'ipai. Ipa' a' ukup pelele' pindapindaili si'i ae' okom pelele' magamagailipa a'owa'.
47006014	Epes isimba owa' sogahapifa Godia, ipa' ina pelomas pepe pefe' atogon atin, owa'i, hapaisi. Dei' main, waf afamba usi'ifi ina fape atogon faloma waf afamba sogosambala basef Godi, owa'atin. Dei' maina owambi alip sondakolas atogon? Owa'atin.
47006015	Pa'i Kraisi Satan mape mofa' opaf atifif? Owa'atin endilisi. Dei' epes isimba sagahapifa Godi saloma epes isimba owa' sogohapifanaia sogofa' nomonas atifis, atiasi esis sonda' waf mamahefa? Owa'atin. Ina sonda' anef waf bu'wafi atifif, owa'.
47006016	Dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba esa'ma ukup ipe'ipi. Apa' ina andeande'ma mokolasa ipat Godi lu'unai nogaloma hiahaom baso'ami sandombam sanda' lotumami, owa'atin. Ipa' pegawa apa' atepa si'i ipat anamba God nagapaunai nomon. Si'i fowa' anen na'ias na'amba naga'i, “Anaf ae' epe elomas efe' la'afena esis ea' epe God asasiwai a esis wapani sepe epes ae'asi.”
47006017	Ea' Dembinai na'ias wapani na'i, “Ipa' pendakwaha esis pefe' pepe anagon daiagon. Ea' ipa' ina pihapila hiahaom alugumi awami, owa'i. Ama bola ese'epa opaf igifa'ipai.
47006018	Ama egape Ahamepa ipe'iwai ipa' pegape awasi amam nematawa ae'ipai. Dembiwai kofagewema banagami hiamii aga'ias na'amba.”
47007001	Ipa' alipipai afa'ipai endilisi, apa' ea' mofa' basef ifimba Godi endilisifi banagafi. Ea' mondelefata hiahaom amamba awami magape nomona alopi ambagof ape'isi ea' mondape be'epa ombel mondahapama God mila waf endilisifi hilili' a'owa'i.
47007002	Ipa' dei' pendaso'afa opalef ipe'ilifi. Afa' ina wanda' anin epen ipe'ini awen a'a wahambombaga anin, ondololaepa anin epena hiahaom ananimi, owa'atin.
47007003	Ae' agawalapa basefa ipa', ina a'ipipa a'i kofagema ipe'imi atom, owa'atin. Ae' a'ias a'i afa' wase'epa opalef afa'ilifi ipa'. Wanda'as na'amba ma i'i ipa' pegaga'ma, afa' oga' ogalomepa. Apa' i'i pegape namipama, afa' wapani ope namofa olomepa.
47007004	Ae' okom mandanda'mepa endilisi ipa' pape andeande'. Andagala a'owa' ma ipa'. Nimanimi magatagama ae'i hiami, apa' owa' okom ae'ami mapomago ipa', isimba atis dei' sanda' opaf ae'afi fape sa'ombel sonehe endilisi.
47007005	Fowa' afa' wafi'i ogataga itap lu'upa Masedonia ma anamba wapani, alop afa'ipi ina papoma noma'w kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Nimanimi mamimami hiami matagamafa, sa'i basef banagafi safitap salomafa. Ea' ombel mahafa ukup palapafe'.
47007006	Apa' God nowa' banaga epes isimba opalef nimanilifi nasapa' Taitus natagamafa nowa' banagafa.
47007007	Ina Taitus atona natagamafa dei' God nowa' banagafa, owa'atin. Ipa' pewa' banaga Taitus, isimba atis dei' God nowa' banagafa wapani. Taitus na'ipafa na'i ipa' ukup pehafel a'owa' ma pa'i pegatolowe ea' opalef ipe'ilifi falopa fowa' pagase'e akafimi ae'. Ea' nomonas ipe'isi sohafel a'owa' ma pegape opalef atelef pegalome. Isimba atis dei' sonahe a'owa' ikila' fowa'.
47007008	Endilisi ae' egawa basefa pas anda'as sali' sagafo'owi fanda' opalef ipe'ilifi iwanilif, apa' ae' ina opaf iwanifa isimba, owa'. Endilisi, fowa' ae' nembel a' nimanimbil apa' dei' owa'atin. Ae' egawa pasa basef ifimba fanda' opalef ipe'ilifi nimanilif, apa' owa', amambai nogota bandataimi atom.
47007009	Apa' dei' ae' sonahe. Ina sonahema basefa pas isimba fanda' ukup ipe'ipi iwanip, owa'. Ae' andagalama amamba a' manda'epa ea' pambema nelelemb pafe'ma God. Ae' egawa God atona nawalapai nimanimi amamba ipe'imi ma nagatopalopepa.
47007010	Waf Godi na'amba. Nimanimi maim anen nagawalapami manda'apa mombema nelelemb mefe'ma anen nokwahomapa waf awafi nofa'apa mogotanimai. Apa' ina a' nelelemb nimanilimba nimanimi amamba God nagawalapami, owa'atin. Apa' i'i opalef nimanilifa waf itapafi, afambai dao' awafi fagawalapai waf saga' sagafe' wambel awambiliafi, hapaifi.
47007011	Ipa' ukup pendape andeande'ma nimanimi amamba ipe'imi. God nanda'am mawalapai waf bu'wafi fafifafi hiafi ma ipa'. Amamba maso'mepa pasafel kwafalisa pegenandona waf ipe'ifi. Ipa' ambagof awagofa epen inimba ipe'ini nanda' waf awafii, isimba atis dei' ombel mehepama basef aga'ipipaefa okom wandafunai Godi. Opalef ipe'ilifi falef a'owa' ma pa'i pegatolowe ea' banagepama pigasindi'amona epes isimba sanda' waf awafii. Ipa' pagalo'ma epen inimba napani laogon. Panda'as na'amba dei' ma pihimba'ma epes hiasi waf awafi kofagefa akepa ma hiahaom amamba mogatagamipai.
47007012	Ea' endilisi fowa' anda'mepago basef ifimba, ae' ina okom mapoma epen inimba nanda' waf awafii, a'a inimba nagame' akafimi ma waf afambai, owa'. Ae' a'i waf ipe'ifi fetaga fendawalap alihifa naep Godi ma pegegawaf andeande' na'amba. Ipa' ukup paipailafa a'owa'. Ea' isimba atis ae' fowa' anda'mepago basef ifimba.
47007013	Waf afamba ipe'ifi fanda'afa wandagala fowa' banagafa. Apa' ina afa' atofa wandagala, owa'. Taitus wapani nandagala a'owa'. Dei' main, ipa' hipai panda' ambal ananili a' lapoma noma'w. Afa' wati isimba atis, asonahafa a'owa'.
47007014	Fowa' andagalaepa asa'ma agof ipe'igufi lu'wagofa nogohnaep Taitusi ea' dei' ae' ina ambal aola waf afamba, owa'atin. Basef hiafi afa' waga'ipipafi ifimba endilisifi. Ea' na'amba atin basef fowa' wagasa'ma agof ipe'igufi ma nogohnaep Taitusi, ifimba wapani fataga fendasali alihif, ifimba endilisifi atif.
47007015	Fowa' anen nafe'mago ipa', ipa' hipai paso'ana opalef paila basef ananifi ombal mahepa ma pegasambalif. Anen ata' okom mandanda'ma isimba atapis dei' okom ananimi maimailipa endilisi.
47007016	Dei' ae' andagala endilisi ma egegawa ipa' hipai panda' waf hiafi andeande' datima.
47008001	Ipa' alipipai, dei' a'i i'ipipa ma ata' pegegawa waf esis sios Kristen hiasi sagape analemb walemb itap lu'upa Masedoniai. God natopalopas nihimba'mas waf bu'wafi sagatopalopa anis daiasafi.
47008002	Nimanimi lu'wami matagama esis ea' amamba magwamba opalef asasilifi a'owa'. Ea' nogota atamba esis sape hiahawes akas endilisi. Apa' owa', owa'atin esis sofa' dagala lu'unai nalomam. Ea' esis ukup pandanda' ma anis Kristen daias kwahusi, satama moni mais hiasi ma sogatopalopas.
47008003	Ae' egawas ea', awalapas a'ias sandawalap alihis. Isimba hiahawes kwasala'wis saga'omasi esis ilama sogaso'asas, esis saso'asas. Apa' ina saso'asa isimba atis, owa'. Saso'asa anis hias wapani. Ea' asataga wamasa hiahawes endilisi. Esis sandaila ukup asasipi atip.
47008004	Ea' esis banages a'owa' ma afa' sa'i uga'i aho'ma sonda' maol sogaloma anis Kristen daiasa sogatopalopa epes Godi kwahusi sagape itap lu'upa Judiai.
47008005	Fowa' afa' ukup pandanda' na'amba wa'i atiasi esis sogaso'as anin moni. Apa' owa' esis ata' sali' saso' esis atisa Dembinai ma main, saila okom Godi saso'afa nelelemb asasilimbi afa' wapani ma sogaso'afa anemba otamba sogotopalopa Kristen kwahusi.
47008006	Fowa' Taitus nasa'ma maol inimba ma ipa' pagatopalopa Kristen isimba dowaf. Isimba atis dei' afa' banagefa ma anen notopalopepa ma pigambifa maol inimba ahi'igalan.
47008007	Alipipai, hiahawes hiasi ipa' panda' waf fasifi a'owa', pikila' anis daiasa waf afambai. Ipa' pahapifa God banagambel. Ambal bu'unai Godi nase'epa gawa nasa'mepa ma pegawalapa basef bu'wafi. Ipa' pasafel endilisi ma panda' maol Godi ea' ukup paipailafa wapani. Ipa' panda' waf afambai fasifi na'amba. Dei' afa' wa'i ipa' pendanda' anef waf bu'wafi wapani. Petopalopa esis Kristen kwahusi pese'as anis hiahawes dowaf.
47008008	Dei' ae' ina a'ipipa dindinip, owa'atin. Doko' a'ipipa ma waf esis Kristen sagape Masedoniai. Esis sape wamasa hiahawes endilisi apa' owa', ukup pahafel endilisi ma sagatopalopa anis daias dowaf. Dei' a'ipipa basef ifimba ma ewaloga waf ipe'ifi ukup pagapagailasafi egegawaf. Fape be'ef endilisi si'i anis Kristen, a'a owa'?
47008009	Aho'! Ipa' pegawa ufia'w dembinai Jisas Krais nagatopalopapa dowafa'wi. Ufia'w akwamba na'amba. Fowa' anen hiahaom hiamunai, apa' dei' a' nataga wafinai endilisi. Natopalopepa dowaf nataga nape kwahunai, ea' isimba atis dei' ipa' pefa' waf bu'wafi faloma hiahaom hiami bu'wami.
47008010	Nomonas ae'asi isi'i dei' awalapasoma ipa'. Doko'igil ipa' pali'a anis daias ukup pehafela pagatopalopa anis daias wamasa hiahawesi ea' panda'as pali'.
47008011	Isimba atis dei' penda'as pimbifas. Ipa' fowa' ukup pehafel kwafalis atis a'owa' ma pegatopalopas. Ea' dei' wapani na'amba atin kwafalis atis penda'as hi'indalas dondo' na'amba atina hiahawes saga'oma ipe'i.
47008012	I'i ipa' ukup pehafel endilisi ma pegatopalopas paso'as dondo' si'i hiahawes saga'oma ipe'i, na'ambai God natilis na'i waf bu'wafi ma okom ananimi. Apa' hiahawes ipa' akepamasi, God ina okom mandanda'mas, owa'.
47008013	Ae' ina a'ipipa petopalopa anis asogape andeande'ma ipa' pegape awepa, owa'atin. A'i ipa' hipai pendape dondo' na'amba atin.
47008014	Dei' nogota ata'e hiahaom ipe'imi amamba matopalopa epes isimba hiahaom akasi. Ama anaf ipa' hiahaom akepa, hiahaom asasimi motanima motopalopa ipa' hiahaom akipai. Penda'as na'amba ma pegape dondo'epa atin.
47008015	Amamba si'i Baibel na'iam naga'i, “Epen negefa' hiahaom hiamii, amamba ina ahiam si'im kwaef a'owa', owa'atin. Apa' epen negefa' hiahaom kwaia'umi, anin ina waowaola anis maefah, owa'atin.”
47008016	Ae' anifela God, anen nasa'ma okom Taitusi a' nomonas atifis si'i ae'. Ea' okom mohafel a'owa' ma nogatopalopepa.
47008017	Anen ina naila basef afa'ifi atifa osapa'ana nogafe'mago ipa', owa'. Anen okom mohafel wapani ma maol inimba. Ea' dei' okom ananimi atom na'i nefe'mago ipa'.
47008018	Ea' afa' atiasi osapa' anona alipunai nofo'o nolomanago. Dei' main, aman anamba agilinai ma esis Kristen hiasi nanda' maol nagawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi.
47008019	Ina isimba atis, owa'. Esis sios hiasi sandandepana ma nofe' nolomafa ogofa'o otamba ipe'imbai ma ogatopalopa Kristen isimba kwahusi. Maol inimba afa'ini ukup pagapagailasani. Afa' onda'ana ogasa'ma agol Dembinai atogola wigihimba'ma epes hiasi sogogawa opalef afa'ilifi fehafema ogatopalopas.
47008020	Afa' wandaiwa'ma anin epen niga'i basef awami ma waf afa' wanda'afa ugumafi otamba ambamba hiambai ipa' paloma anis daias panda' ofambai. Isimba atis dei' afa' wa'i osapa' owamafa anamba nifi'i nefe'mago ipa'.
47008021	Afa' ukup pandanda'ma onda' waf bu'wafi atefa epes hiasi. Ina naep Dembinai atip, owa'. Nogohnaep epesi wapani.
47008022	Ea' afa' wa'i osapa' anona owamafa afa'inai daiana nifi'i nolomago amom biam. Dondol afa' wagwambana wandondomana ma maol hiani nanda'ani naninani. Owa' wati anen okom mohafel endilisi ma nonda'an. Dei' anen nogawepa endilisi na'i ipa' panda' waf bu'wafi atifi. Ea' anen banagona a'owa' ma nogatopalopafa umafi otamba ambamba ogafo'o.
47008023	Taitus ipa' pegawana. Afa' wandao'oma wanda' maol atini ma wagatopalopepa. Alipumi biam mofo'o mogalomanai mofa' malogof esis sios hiasii mofo'o. Amom manda' maol Krais magasa'ma agol ananigili.
47008024	Ea' ipa' pihimba'manago waf pigati uwahipisafi ma amom wanom ama esis sios hiasi hi'ilas sogogawa endilisi waf afamba ipe'ifi, ma sogogawa wapani afa' ina sonahafa ma ipa' dowaf, owa'atin.
47009001	Ipa' pegawa ea' ma maol bu'wani pagatopalopa esis amam nematawa Godi hiahawes akasi. Ea' ae' ina enda' anif basefa isimba, owa'.
47009002	Ae' egawa ea', nelelemb ipe'ilimbi basafela panda' maol inimba ea' dondol agasa'ma agof ipe'igufi ma nogohnaep esis Kristen sagape itap lu'upa Masedoniai. Aga'ipas na'amba a'i, “Afagol gagalimba gagali'i esis Grik asanda'as dumbulidombol ea' ma sonda' maol inimba.” Ea' esis same' basef ifimba ma ipa' ukup pehafema maol inimba. Dei' isimba ea' sasa'ma esis Kristen Masedoniai hiasi ma sonda'am wapani.
47009003	Apa' ae' andaiwa'ma basef afa' wagasa'ma agof ipe'igufi ma esis Kristen Masedoniaisi atiasi fegataga falafifi atif, owa'. Isimba atis dei' esapa' owapepa ipe'imi wanom mefe'mago ipa'. Andeande'ma ipa' dumbulidombol pegape si'i aga'ipipas.
47009004	I'i owa', anis Masedonia sifi'i solome siti ipa' ata' owa' penda'as dumbulidombola, afa' ambagof awagofa isimba ea' ipa' wapani pelomafa. Dei' main, afa' wali' wa'ipipas wa'i ipa' penda'as dumbulidombol ea'.
47009005	Ea' ae' okom mandanda' a'i i'ipa amom alipumi wanom dindinipa muli' mofo'o motagamepa ma mondondomba otamba ambamba ma'umba pali' pa'ias pa'i pegaso'asambai. Ea' penda'as na'amba ma nemaf ae' egafo'o penda' otamba ambamba hiambai dumbulidombol bo'oh. Ambamba afa' ina wasapa'epa dindinipa pegambe'amba, owa'. Ukup ipe'ipi atip pandanda' ma pegaso'asamba.
47009006	Ipa' ukup pendapoma epen inimba nagawa gwa'aisi kwasala'wisii. Anaf anin negala'as sotaga kwasala'wis. Epen nagawa haesii anaf nela' hiasi.
47009007	Ea' ipa' hipai ata' pili' ukup pindapaipa andeande' atona atin ea' pila nomonas isimba atis pese'as hiahaom. Na'amba anin epen okom iwanima negaso'as hiahawes ananisi a'a anin daian ni'i anis daias si'ipan dindinipa negaso'as na'ambai, owa'. Dei' main, God okom maimaila epes isimba sonogahasa sogaso'as hiahawasi.
47009008	God anen ilama nogase'epa hiahawes bu'wasi hiasi ipa' ma atiasi ipa' si'ipamas endilisi. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma nimaguf hiafi ipa' penda'as pegaso' anis daias ina atiasi hi'ilas, owa'. So'oh atapis. Ea' ipa' a' hiahaom hiamipa penda' maol bu'wani hiani naninani ma pegatopalopa anis daias wapani.
47009009	Si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Epen inimba naso'as hiahawes hiasi epes isimba hiahawes akasi. Ea' epes hiasi hi'alas ukup papoma waf usi'ifi hilili'i ananifi atapif.”
47009010	Dondol God naso'as nalelef gwa'aisi hiasi saga'asi epesa ea' naso'as gwa'aisi sasisasi hiasi epesa soga'as. Ea' bola a' nese'epa hiahaom ipa' wapani ma pegaso'asam anis epes daias. Ama hiahaom amamba ipe'imi mogataga lu'um a'owa' ma pegaso'asam wapani, si'i anin epen nagawa nalelef gwa'aisii ma a'i owa' main, nola' gwa'aisi hias a'owa' nofa'as.
47009011	Atiasi ipa' a' hiahawes hiasi ma dondol la'ifipama pegaso' alipisi kwahusi ma hiahawes hiasi. Nemaf mamahefa afa' ogofa' hiahawes isimba ipe'isi ma ogaso'asas alipisi isimba, waf fasifi ipe'ifi fanda' epes sanifela God.
47009012	Ipa' penda'as na'amba ma pegatopalopa alipisi isimba amam nematawa Godi ma waf afambai, ipa' panda' maola pagatopalopa epes isimba waowaola hiahawasi. Ea' ina a' isimba atis, owa'atin. Ipa' panda' waf afambai pasa'ma epes hiasi ma sogasa'ma agol Godi soganifelona a'owa'.
47009013	Waf afambai ipe'ifi fandawalap alihigima fihimba'ma epes hiasi ma ipa' pagaila basef Godi andeande'. Ea' anis epes daias wapani sosa'ma agol Godi lu'wagola ipa' pagaila basef bu'wafi Kraisi pawalapefa pagatopalopa esis saloma anis daias wapani hi'agalas.
47009014	Ea' esis atiasi ukup pelele' pipilipa a'owa' ma sondabetena ipa'. Dei' main, esis sogawa ea' waf Godi nagatopalopepa dowafafi fape lu'wif a'owa' ma ipa'.
47009015	Waf afamba God nagaso'apafi, amamba lu'um a'owa'. Ea' apa' basef akapa ma mi'i basef mogonandenaefam hi'igalam, owa'atin. Apa' a' mundanifela Goda waf afamba ananifi.
47010001	Ae' Pol ahali'ipa nimanis aila waf Kraisi sa'umbilifi si'i anen nanda' okom ananimi mogafe' lafela epes hiasi. Dei' anifelipa ma anis hiahawes atifis. Anis epes sasapagae sa'ipi na'amba sa'i, “Anen ata' nape nagaloma apa' nanda' anen nafe' sa'osa'ona nafe' lafel, apa' nogota atamba nafe' napani laogon nanda' banagafima apa'.”
47010002	Ae' ihali'ipa na'amba. Anaf ae' egatagamepa, ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba pasasapa'e ese'epa basef banagafi si'i ae' okom ma'i egawalapefa anipa. Ae' ewalapefa ipa' paga'i afa' wafe' wagaila waf awafi itapafii.
47010003	Endilisi, afa' wape wagafe' itap apa'e, apa' ina wape wanda' wandaf si'i epes itapasi sagapa', owa'atin.
47010004	Hiahaom hiami sagapa'ami afa' wagahapilami amom ina itapami, owa'atin. Amamba banagami Godi, la'ifimi ma migindiwa indalelemb banagami bounai Seteni.
47010005	Afa' wigindiwa nomonas epes isimba owa' endilisisia. Ea' waf hiafi fagasopama ufia'wa epes sa'i sogogawa Godi, afamba afa' windiwaf wasopamaf wapani. Ea' afa' wasindi'amona nomonas hiasi apa' epesi ma monda'as usi'is sigaila okom Kraisi.
47010006	Afa' dumbulidombol wape ohafa ipa'. Ama i'i ipa' pigaila basef hiafi afa'ifima, dao' afa' atiasi ogwamasa akafimi awami epes hiasi sogosambala basef Godi hi'ilas.
47010007	Ipa' pati hiahaom magape naep ipe'imi atom ando' atogini, nomon owa'. Dei' piti hiahaom kofagema. I'i epen mamahina banagen niga'i anin epen Kraisi, dao' anin a' nendegawa afa' wapani wape epes Kraisi.
47010008	Dembinai naso'afa agof lu'wagufi afa' ma onda' maol inimba ananini, amamba mogowa' banaga hapif ipe'inii. Amamba ina mohambombagepa, owa'atin. Ama ae' i'i egasa'ma agof afa'igufi atogofa maol inimba Dembinaii, atiasi ae' ina a' ambal aola isimba, owa'.
47010009	Apa' ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma ipa' pi'i ae' agaumbalipa dowafa anis pasa basef ifimba ae'afi, owa'.
47010010	Dei' main, anis epes sa'i, “Aho', pas basef ananifi nimanif a'owa' ea' banagafi ahifif a'owa'. Apa' owa' anen nafi'i natagamapa ma magatolona naep ape'ipi, ina banagona ea' basef ananifi falafifi atif.”
47010011	Epes saga'i basef ifimbai, ata' ukup pendanda' andeande' sondogawa na'amba. Afa' wape laogon ea' wanda' basefa pas atisa ipa'. I'i afa' ope olomepa, a' onda' waf afambai atef si'i basef ifimba wanda'ef fagail pasi.
47010012	Afa' ukup hiahaop dei' wandaiwa' ma uga'i afa' wandati na'amba atin si'i epes sagasa'ma agof asasigufi atogof lu'wagufi, owa'. Epes isimba sandawaloga waf asasifi ma ikwaf ukup asasipi atip. Ea' sandawaloga atin na'amba. Esis isimbai owa' sogogawaia, ukup magahasi.
47010013	Apa' afa' wandaiwa'ma ogatolapai ikwaf afa'ifi ma ogasa'ma agof afa'igufi ilif a'owa', owa'atin. Afa' ondaila ikwaf God nogawalogafafi ma nagaso'afa maol ananini. Afa' waila isimba ea' wafe' wataga ma ipa' wanda' maol inimba. Ea' wasa'ma agof afa'igufi ma maol inimba atin.
47010014	Afa' wame' basefa God wailif wafo'o watagama ipa' dondo' ma alol anen nandandepafamal afa'i. Ea' afa' ina umbisila' alola maol inimba ma wagawalipipa basef ananifi, owa'. I'i afa' owa' ome' basef ananifi naga'ipipafi ugi'mifa, dao' afa' a' umbisila' alol. Owa', owa'atin. Afa' wafo'o ofa'ago basef bu'wafi atif Kraisi fatagamepa.
47010015	Ea' afa' ina umbisila' alola ogasa'ma agof afa'igufi atogofa anin maol anis epes daias sanda'ani, owa'atin. Afa' ukup pandanda' pafe' banagep na'amba. Maol inimba afa' wanda'ani, ipa' atiasi pihapifa Krais banagepa pikila' fowa' pali' pagahapifana ma negataga lu'win la'afena ipa' nigikila' fowa'ini. Afa' wa'i onda'an dondol nendahama ikwaf God nagaso'afafi.
47010016	Wa'ias na'amba ma afa' ata' ogofa' basef bu'wafi Godi ogafo'o laogon anep itap pagape alafugaha ipa' ganimba wa'ili. Ama afa' ina umbisila' ofe'ma maol anona amani osa'ma agof afa'igufi dowafa anin maol aman anamba nanda'an ea'i, owa'.
47010017	“Epen sonogahani anin a' nendagala ma Dembinai atona.”
47010018	Dei' main, apa' mogawa epen mamahina negasa'ma agol ananigili atigili, anin agol akana naep Dembinai, owa'atin. I'i Dembinai nogasa'ma agol anin epeni, dao' epen inimba atin nefa' agol endilisi.
47011001	Ae' a'i ipa' pekwaha ae' ma ata' enda' anif basef falafalafifi kwasakwasala. Aho', ipa' ata' kwahowae.
47011002	Dei' main, God okom ma'ima'i epes a'owa' ma na'i nondandepasa sogape ananisi atis. Ama waf afambai atef ae' okom ma'ima'i ipa' a'owa'. Aho', ae' andandepepa ea' ma pegaso' anona aman atotona, anen Krais. Ae' a'i ese'epa pefe'ma anen si'i nemata'w aiawai'wi kwagape bo'okw endilisi.
47011003	Apa' owa' ae' ombal mahe. Na'amba ukup ipe'ipi a' awep ea' pekwaha waf afamba pegape hilili' nomonas sogapoma Krais atona si'i fowa' gani ul anamba gawainai nagambaso'ma Iv.
47011004	Dei' main, anis epes safi'i satagama ipa' sawalapa basefa anona Jisas daiana, anen ina Jisas anamba afa' wawalapa basef waga'ifani, owa'. Ea' ipa' dei' apefa' anona spirit ambal daiana, ina Ambal bu'unai Godi fowa' ipa' pegefa'ani, owa'. Ea' ipa' apefa' anif basef daif, ina basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi pagame'ef ea' ma afa'i, owa'. Epes isimba safi'i sambaso'mepa sa'i anif basef daifa anona Jisas daiana la'afena ipa', ea' pa'i aho'ma epes isimba pandagalamas pa'i basef ifimba bu'wafi.
47011005	Peme'! Ae' ina okom mandanda' a'i ae' gawa ake ape lafela amom “Aposel amamba ipe'imi magali'i,” owa'atin.
47011006	Endilisi ae' ina egawa a'owa' ma waf afamba egawalapa basefafi, owa'. Apa' ea' hapaini, gawa ae'ani ma basef Godi ina bandan, owa'. Nimaguf hiafi ma waf hiafi afa' wanda'afi wihimba'mepa gawa inimba hiani ma ipa'.
47011007	Ipa' pegawa afamba ae' awalapa basef bu'wafi Godi ma ipa', ina efa' anemba otamba ma isimba, owa'. Anda' waf afamba atalifa ae' afa' lafela agasa'ma ipa'. Dei' main? A'i waf afamba anda'afi awafi a'a? Owa'atin.
47011008	Ae' efa' moni maisa anis Kristen sios sagape anagon daiagini satopalope anda' maola egatopalopepa. Waf afambai si'i egefa' hiahawes asasisi dowaf.
47011009	Fowa' ape agalomepa ata' waowaola hiahawes, nogota atamba ae' ina ahali'ipa ma hiahawes isimba, owa'atin. Dei' main, amom alipumi makwaha itap lu'upa Masedoniai mafi'i matagamepa muwapanimi hiahawes isimba ae' waowaolasi. Ea' ina ahali'ipa kwasakwasala ma pagase'e otamba mais, owa'atin. Ea' atiasi wapani enda'as na'amba atin ina ihahali'ipa ma anis hiahawes, owa'atin.
47011010	Basef endilisifi Kraisi fape ae', isimba endilisi atis. Ea' anif basef wapani endilisifi atif, ifimba na'amba. Anamba hiagoma esis Grik sagapoma ina atiasi anona aman atotona la'ifina ma nogahefa ufia'wa ae' egasa'ma agol ae'agilima waf afamba egefa' otamba maisa ipa', owa'atin.
47011011	Pa'i ae' asa'ma agol ae'agili na'amba ma main? Asa'ma agola egapa'aga ipa'? Owa'atin. God nogawe ea', okom ae'ami maimailipa.
47011012	Apa' anom amam ma'i molaoma ufia'wa mogasa'ma agof amamugufi atogofa ma'i mogataga na'amba atin si'i afa' ma naep epesi. Ea' anda' maola agasopama amoma ufia'w akwamba. Ae' atiasi enda'am na'amba atin epe.
47011013	Amom amamba aposel magambaso'ami manda' maol baso'aminii. Amom mondola'waifa amom aposel Kraisi dowaf, owa' magambaso'ami.
47011014	Ea' ipa' ina pesafel gogolalasipa ma amamba, owa'i. Apa' mogawa Satan atona nondola'waifa ensel nogogala'i nagafe' hiagoma.
47011015	I'i amom manda' maol ananinii wapani mondola'waifa sanda' maol bu'wani waf fasifii, inimba ina anin mae lu'wani, owa'atin. Anaf amom a' mofa' akafimi awami mondahama maol amamini.
47011016	Doko' ali' a'ias, dei' a'ias wapani a'i anin epen ina a' okom mondanda'ma ae' ni'i ae' okom magahai, owa'. Apa' dei' ae' a'i ipa' ata' pi'i aho'me i'i basef si'i epen okom magahani. Pi'i aho'me esa'ma agol ae'agili sonehe kwasakwasala.
47011017	Ae' ina aila Dembinai a'i basef ifimba, owa'atin. Ae' a'i si'i ukup pagaso'asi ma banagewe egasa'ma agol ae'agili atogol.
47011018	Epes hiasi saila waf itapafi sasa'ma agof asasigufi atogof, ea' ae' a'i enda'as wapani. Dei' i'ipipa anif basef si'i epen okom magahani.
47011019	Ipa' hipai gawaipai atipa. Ea' ipa' ukup pehafel a'owa' pa'i aho'ma esis ukup pagaso'asi sagase'epa basef putuputa'afi ipa'.
47011020	Endilisi, ipa' ina pa'i aho'ma esis isimba ukup pagaso'asi atis, owa'. Ipa' pa'i aho'ma amam mamahoma mogambaso'ami mafi'i mahokolepa pagafe' lafela amom. Amom mogofa' hiahawes hiasi ipe'isi masa'ma agof amamugufi atogofa mopa'agaipa ma mogopagaha amagah ipe'igahi. Amom manda'epa na'amba dei' pa'i aho'mam.
47011021	Amom manda' waf awafi fikila' afa'. Ea' afa' ina banagefa onda' waf afamba amom manda'afi, owa'atin. Dei' ae' ata' i'i basef si'i epen okom magahani. I'i anin epen banagena negasa'ma agol ananigili atogola, ae' wapani na'amba atin.
47011022	Amom Hibruimi ma, ae' wapani. Amom amam Israeli ma, ae' wapani. Amom wambota Abrahama, ae' wapani.
47011023	Ae' dei' aga'i si'i epen okom magahani endilisi. I'i monda' maol Kraisi ma, ae' wapani anda' maol Kraisi ikila' amam. Ahifimi numa'umi, amamba ae' ikila' amam ea' kalabus wapani anda' kalabus ikila'am. I'i anis epes sogaham hihif a'owa', isimba wapani ikila'am endilisi. Nimaguf hiafi ae' felefele' ma egaga'.
47011024	Wanif bif Juda sahe wip banagambel hiafi timbi tambel 39-pelaif.
47011025	Nimaguf wanif sahe melu'uta. Anef nemaf sahe otamba. Galahowa awasiwa wanif ea' aowe naoh embel. Ea' nemaf si'ifi atetef owamb si'imb atotomb ae' alemb ala naoh embel la'afen.
47011026	Dondol ae' agafe' lauguni ufia'w lau'wi. Ae' a'i higilili ewala walembeh. Amom amamba manda' waf awafi manda' wali magafe' ufiawai ma'i mehe. Esis asimbel atembel Judaisi sa'i sohambombage ea' epes isimba owa' Judaisia wapani sa'i sonda'e aowe. Anis epes sa'i sonda'e aowe taun ea' anamba itap wafigima wapani, naoh embel wapani. Ea' anom alipumi magambaso'ami wapani ma'i mohambombage.
47011027	Ae' anda' ahifimi hiami mamimami endilisi. Owambeh hiembihi danda ina a'oma ambeh, owa'atin. Nimaguf hiafi ina a' anis gwa'aisi embel mais, owa'. Iap pase'e nolomahe a'i ega' atin. Anif nimaguf daif hiafi elelama gwa'aisi, luwaguf mais ake nomanamb bae.
47011028	Ea' ina a' isimba atis, owa'atin. Nimaguf hiafi ae' nomonas salasafe' hiahiasa esis Kristen hiasi sagape hiagomai sape sa'imama? Sahapifana banages, a'a owa'?
47011029	Epen mamahina owa' banagena, ae' wapani ina ame' banagewe. Ea' epen mamahina newa ma waf awafi, ae' wapani ame' akafimi aloman.
47011030	I'i ae' egasa'ma agol ae'agilima, esa'magola hiahawes mais sihimba'mepa sawalapa ae' owa' banagewea.
47011031	God, anen God Dembinai Jisasi Ahamana wapani, apa' mondasa'ma agol ananigili lifilafi! Anen nogawa basef ifimba doko' ali' aga'iefi ina ambaso'am, owa'atin.
47011032	Fowa' wambel Damaskus, dembinai gavman nagape lafela dembinai king Aretasi anen nanda' amom malutu mugumafi uta indalelemb sagawis taun Damaskusi. Anen na'i nombale'e.
47011033	Owa' anom alipumi mafi'i manda'e atolo'w folaf malae iwalai uta sa'utai indalelemba taun inimba ando'. Isimba atis dei' akwaha lagof gavman anambai ea' afa' afe'.
47012001	Ina ano'w ufia'w daia'w, owa' ae' endasa'ma agol ae'agili atogol wapani. Anda'as na'amba ina la'ifisa sogatopalopapa, owa'. Apa' diaogo, ae' endanda'as. Dei' ae' a'i i'i basefa anin koh dondo'aha basef fape fandambahi'i God nagawalapamef ae'i.
47012002	Ae' egawa anona aman Kraisi, basef ananifi fagape na'amba. Fowa' afagof 14-pelaiguf fafe'ma ea', God nofa'ana nalota heven nagafe'ma wanifigini gani ilif. Anen nani ambal atol lalota a'a naloma alop nalota, ina egawana. God atona nogawana.
47012003	Ea' ae' egawa aman anamba God nofa'ana nalota heven. Anen nani ambal atol nalota a'a alop papaona nalota ae' ina egawana, God atona nogawana.
47012004	Gani heven anen name' basef hiafi fafifafi epes owa' la'ifisa siga'if digaia God nandaiwa' ma epes sogawalapefia.
47012005	Ae' a'i esa'ma agol aman anambai lu'wagol. Apa' agol ae'agili owa'. Ae' i'ias i'i ae' owa' banagewea, ea' isimba atis esa'ma agol ae'agili.
47012006	Endilisi, i'i ae' i'i esa'ma agol ae'agili atogolai, ae' ina si'i epen okom magahani, owa'atin. Dei' main, atiasi i'i endilisi atis. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ae' andaiwa'. Na'amba anin epen ni'i ae' epen bu'uwai a'owa' ikila' waf fe' poe ki ae'ani. Ae' a'i ipa' piti waf ae' anda'afi peme'e ma basef ae' aga'iefi. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' pegawa waf ae'afi andeande'.
47012007	Basef ifi'i God nigihimba'mef ae'i lu'wafi a'owa' endilisi. God nandaiwa'ma egasa'ma agol ae'agili a'owa'. Isimba atis dei' nase'e anom hiahaom si'i higatai mape alop ae'api ame' akafimi, amamba anona ensel Satan nasapa'ana nagafi'ii ma nogase'e akafimi ae'. Amamba magatalogofa ae'i ma ina asa'ma ae', owa' owa'atin.
47012008	Ae' andabetena Dembinai wanifa anen ata' negelefata hiahaom amamba ma ae'.
47012009	Owa' anen na'ipi na'amba na'i, “Ae' atopalopena dowaf, waf afamba banagefa ina'. Dei' main, banagami ae'ami amamba manda' maol banagambel endilisi ma epes owa' banagasia.” Ea' ae' dei' ina ata' okom iwanim, owa'atin. Ae' sonahe a'owa' ma amamba ma banagami Kraisi mogapaowe.
47012010	Isimba atis dei' maol inimba Kraisi atin, ae' ina banagewe, owa'. Esis sanda'me waf awafi ea' sanda'me nimanimi mamimami hiami, anis sahambombage. Ea' hapaimi. Ae' andagala ma hiahaom amamba. Aho' afamba ae' owa' banagewea, nogota atamba ae' banagewe endilisi.
47012011	Basef ifimba ae' aga'iefi ifimba basef putuputa'afi a'if si'i epen okom magahani. Apa' ipa' pesa'ma ae' dei' a'if na'amba. I'i ipa' pasa'ma agol ae'agiliea, afamba waf usi'ifi. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Endilisi ae' epen falafuwai, apa' ina afe' lafela amom amamba “aposel ipe'imi” magali'i, owa'atin.
47012012	Ae' ewa' banaga okom ae'ami anda' numa'umi hiami la'afena ipa', awalapai ametal hiani aposeli. Amamba na'amba. Banagami si'i God nanda'ami mataga hiami mamimami la'afena ipa' mandahama maol Godi. Sati banagami amamba, esis bolalas kwapete'as. Banagami amamba mihimba'mepa ae' aposel endilisiwai.
47012013	Ipa' ina pape lafela anis Kristen sios sagape ganiganii, owa'. Ipa' palomas pape dondo' atina waf hiafi ae' anda'mepafi. Apa' anef waf awafi anda'mepaf ipa' atipai ma esis owa'i, afamba na'amba. Ae' ina endelaepepa anis hiahawes ipe'isi, owa'atin. Dei' ae' a'i uwahipigai, ipa' ukup pese'epa waf afamba awafi anda'mepafi pekwahomeaf.
47012014	Dei' anda'as dumbulidombol efe'mago ipa' ma a' wanif ea' ae' ina atiasi ehendo' hiahawes ipe'isi, owa'. Dei' main, ae' andaiwa'ma egefa' hiahawes ipe'isi, owa'. A'i ifa'ai ipa' atipa. Ipa' pegawa ipa' si'i batawis. Ina andeande'ma esis awasi sogolaoma hiahawes sokolasis sogatopalopa mamasas asasisi, owa'atin. Esis mamasas atis dao', sanda' maol solaoma hiahawes sakolasis satopalopa batawisas.
47012015	Ae' okom ma'ias a'owa' ma egakwaha hiahaom hiami ae'ami ea' elelama ambal ae'ali wapani ekwahola egatopalopepa. Ae' okom ma'i na'amba. Waf ae' okom magamagailipamafi fataga fape lu'ufa a'owa' atapif fikila' fowa'. Apa' waf ipa' ukup pagailimafi afewala sa'osa'of a'owa' atapif fape.
47012016	Ea' ipa' pegawa fowa' ae' ina ase'epa nimanimi ipa', owa'atin. Apa' anis saga'i na'amba sa'i, “Endilisi anen ina nofa' hiahawes ape'isi alihis, apa' anen aman nanda' kikipai ma waf baso'afi nasapagapa nahokolapa.”
47012017	Endilisi fowa' asapa' anom amam mafe'mago ipa'. Dei' si'i main? A'i ae' ambaso'mepa ahondo' anin mae ma lagof ipe'igufi? Owa'atin.
47012018	Ae' asa'ma Taitus nafe'mago ipa'. Ea' asapa' owamapa anamba nafo'o nalomanago. A'i Taitus nambaso'am nahondo' hiahawes ipe'isi a'a owa'? Owa'atin endilisi. Afa' dei' wafe' banagami waf bu'wafi ukup atifip. Ipa' pegawa afa' waila ufia'w atoto'w wafe'.
47012019	Ipa' ina pi'i afa' wanda' basef ifimba hiafi wali' waga'iefi onandona waf afa'ifi ma naep ipe'ipi, owa'. Afa' wape epes Kraisi wanda' basef ifimba ma naep Godi. Alipipai endilisi ae'ipai, afa' wanda' basef ifimba hi'alefa fegewa' banaga hapif ipe'ini.
47012020	Ae' ombel mahe kwasakwasala ea' a'ias na'amba a'i atiasi efo'o etaga ma igatilipa ina atiasi pepe be'epa si'i okom ma'i efo'o iti ipa' pindati, a'owa'. Ea' ipa' wapani atiasi pigati ae' ina epe fasiwi si'i pa'i piti ae' indati, a' owa'atin. Na'amba waf naninani hiani na'ambainai a' nope. Basef lopa' fitapafi, waf kowagalasafi, migimigah, findiwa, da'i'ipama, du'wanigama waf pendatopa' biafipamafi. Ea' ipa' ina pegehembe' andeande'ma pigaila okom atotoma waf sanda' lotuwafi, owa'. Paila ukup daindai. Ae' ombel mahema amamba.
47012021	Na'amba ae' efe'mago ipa' owa', God ae'ani notalogae ma nogohnaep ipe'isi ma agalopa ipa' amam nematawa hipai fowa' panda' waf awafii owa' pembema nelelemb pegafe'ma Godia. Ma ipa' owa' pewa' alafugaha waf alugufi awafi so'a waulafi a nelelemb usiusihilimbi soloma hiahaom awami fowa' pali' panda'ami. Ae' ombal mahema amamba.
47013001	Atiasi ae' efe'mago ipa' ma ea' wanif. “I'i anis epes sogasapaga anin epena anif basef, ama i'i anis daias bias a'a wanis si'i basef atififa waf afamba, dao' ea' basef ifimba sagasapaganafi endilisifi atif.”
47013002	Fowa' ae' ali' afo'o bif ape agalomepa, ae' a'ipa anipa dindinip a'ias na'amba a'i, “Ipa' solawaipa.” Dei' ape laogon a'ipipago wapani na'amba a'i afamba ae' egafo'o wapanima, ina atiasi iti anis soloma ipa' pali' panda' waf awafii i'i bu'upai, owa'. Ewalogepa isindi'amonepa banagambel.
47013003	Nemaf afamba atef ae' egawalipipafi ipa' a' pegawa endilisi si'i Krais na'i basef fagataga malogol ae'agili. Ipa' a' pegawa endilisi atis. Krais ina pupulina ma nanda' maol nagalomepa, owa'atin. Anen banagonai.
47013004	Endilisi, fowa' anen ina banagona a'owa' ma dei' sagandolana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai sahana nagaga', owa'. Apa' owa' banagami atom Godi nasa'mana dei' nape namona. Afa' wandaloma walomana ea' afa' wapani owa' banagefaea. Owa' banagami atom Godi dei' afa' wape namofa walomana ea' atiasi owalapa banagami amamba la'afena ipa'.
47013005	Ipa' dondol ata' pewawaloga opalef ipe'ilifi pegawalef andeande', ipa' pahapifa God endilisi a'a owa'atin? Ipa' pendawawaloga ipa' atipa. Ipa' pegawa Krais Jisas nape opalef ipe'ilifi a'a owa'atin? I'i ata' owa'atin, ikwaf ipe'ifi ina dei' pafe' dondo', owa'. Ata' waowaol.
47013006	Ae' egawa a'i dei' ipa' pegawa ikwaf afa'ifi ina fafe' waowaol, owa'atin. Fafe' fataga dondo'.
47013007	Dei' afa' wandabetena God nogatopalopepa ma ina penda' anef waf awafi, owa'. Afa' ina wandabetena ipa' na'amba ma otaga ondawalap alihifa ma nogohnaep epesi ma siga'i ikwaf afa'ifi dondo', owa'atin. Afa' wanda'ana ipa' penda' waf bu'wafi hilili', apa' afa' ea' hapaifai. Afa' wandawalap alihifa ma nogohnaep epes hiasi sambaso'am sa'i ikwaf afa'ifi ina fafe' fataga, owa'. Afafe' waowaol.
47013008	Ipa' pegawa afa' ina onda' anin mae ma negatalogofa basef endilisifi, owa'atin. Afa' la'ififa ma wanda' maola ogatopalopa basef endilisifi atif.
47013009	Nemaf mamahefa afa' wagame' pupulifa ma ogatopalopepa pegape banagepa, dao' wa'i aho' wandagala a'owa'. Afa' wandabeten dondola Goda ipa' pegataga banagepa be'epa hilili' endilisi.
47013010	Dei' ape laogon anda'ago basef ifimba fafe'mepago ma main? Ae' anda'as na'amba ma atiasi efo'o epe egalomepa ae' ina i'ipipa banagambel a'owa' ma banagami Dembinai nagase'eami, owa'. Banagami amamba anen ina nase'eam ma mogahambombaga ipa', owa'atin. Amamba mogowa' banaga hapif ipe'ini.
47013011	Kristen alipipai, dei' esopama basef hi'ilif a'i endagala inifelipa. Ipa' pendanda' maol banagepa endilisi ma pegataga be'epa hilili'. Ea' pendame' basef ae'afi. Ipa' pindahapila nomonas atifis ea' pendape opalef atifilif awanelef. God, anen kofagonama waf ukup pagapagailasafi faloma opalef awanelefafi nope nolomepago.
47013012	Waf ape'ifi amam nematawa hiapai atona atin Godi, pendaso'ama lagof pelomago esis alipisi.
47013013	Amam nematawa hiasi Godi sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'.
47013014	Ae' a'i Dembinai Jisas Krais niti uwahipipa notopalopepago dowafa okom Godi mogomogailipa. Ea' a'i Ambal bu'unai ananinai nope noloma ipa' hipaii hi'ilipa ma pelomana opalef atelef pegape. Ea' ma'uf.
48001001	Ae' Pol aposel Jisas Kraisii anda' basef ifimba. Ina anona aman nandandepe ma enda' maol aposel, owa'atin. Ahamapa God nasa'ma Jisas Krais nogosafel wandof sagaga'ii amom atom mandandepe ma epe aposel igawalipasa basef Godi.
48001002	Esis Kristen sahin owan hiasi sagape na'ai salome, wanda'mepago dagala ipa' Kristen hipai pagape walemb hiagoma itap lu'upa Galesiai.
48001003	Ae' a'i ahamapa God noloma Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai mowa' banagaepa motopalopepa dowafa opalef ipe'ilifi fegape awanelef.
48001004	Jisas Krais nagi'ma okom ahamapa Godi nalamona ambal ananinai nakwaha waf awafi apa' manda'afi. Anen nanda'as na'amba natagwahepa ma waf awafi hiafi dei' fagape itap apa'ii.
48001005	Ae' a'i amam nematawa hiasi sosa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol ma mogogala'i ananimi atom lifilafi dondol. Endilisi.
48001006	Ae' gogolalasowe ma ipa' pagakwaha waf bu'wafi God nogofalepa, faloma Jisas Krais nagatopalopepa dowafafi. Dei' owa' pakwahef kwafalis atis ea' paila anif basef daif dambaifi.
48001007	Basef bu'wami Godi ea' amamba atom. Ina anif daif wapani, owa'atin. Dei' maina aga'ipipa basef ifimba? Ae' egawa anis epes daias salamona basef bu'wami Kraisi ma ukup ipe'ipi dei' pando pelaepa.
48001008	Apa' i'i ae' a'a, anin epen a'a, anona ensel nifi'i heven ni'ipipa anif basef daif, owa' dondo' ma basef amamba afa' waga'ipipamia, epen inimbai pegame'an owa', hapaini. Ae' a'i atiasi God nowaloga epen inimba awani nili'amonan newala wambel awambili hel.
48001009	Basef amamba wali' wa'ipipam ea', dei' a'ipipam wapani. I'i epen mamahina ni'ipipa anif basef daifa owa' fefe' dondo' si'i basef amamba bu'wami Godi pagagi'mamia, ae' a'i epen inimbai God nowalogon nefe' wambel awambili hel.
48001010	Ipa' ukup pandame' pa'imama ma basef ifimba? Pa'i ae' a'ifa anis sinifelowe sogasa'ma agol ae'agili? Owa'atin. Ae' a'i God atotona opaf bo'ofa ae'. Ipa' pa'ias pa'i a'ifa anis epes soganifelowe? Owa'. I'i enda' maola igambimifai anis epesa opalef bo'walefa ae'ma, ae' ina aman anda' maola Kraisi, owa'atin. Ae' agambaso'ami. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Anda' maola Krais atonai endilisi.
48001011	Sahin owan alipipai ae'ipai, ae' a'i ipa' pegawa basef ifimba ae'afi. Basef bu'wami Godi agawalipasami, amamba ina mataga okom anin epeni, owa'atin.
48001012	Ae' ina efa'ama anin epen, owa'. Ina anin epen nawalipi basef amamba kofagema, owa'atin. Jisas Krais atona nawalipi basef amamba bu'wami.
48001013	Waf fowa' anda'afi, esis sa'ipipaf pegawaf ea'. Fowa' anda' lotu ma God aila waf esis Juda sanda'afi. Ae' agahambombaga esis Kristen epes Godi banagambili. Ae' ina atilis uwahipis, owa'atin. Anda' maol dindinipa ilamonas hi'igalas.
48001014	Ae' ikila' epes hiasi Juda agalomas aol atol wagataga atifi, ikila'asa agaila waf esis Juda sanda' lotuma Godafi. Anis sailaf kwasakwasala apa' ae' ailaf dindinip hi'alaf. Ea' banagewe a'owa' ma agaila waf fowa'ifi amom akupapa manda'afi. Ae' ailaf andeande' a'owa' ikila'as.
48001015	-
48001016	Apa' fowa' gani ma'me ata' owa' kolaea, God natopalope dowaf nosahe'e nofale ma enda'mana maol. Ama main, nemaf afamba anen na'i nihimba'me Nogamana ananinai ma igawalipasa basef bu'wami ananimi isimba sogololama Godi, nemaf afamba ae' ina afe' ahali' anin epena maol inimba, owa'atin.
48001017	Ae' ina afe' wambel Jerusalem ati amom God nali' nandandepama manda' maol aposeli, owa'atin. Nemaf afamba atef afe' itap lu'upa Arebia. Ama main, itanima afe' Damaskus.
48001018	Afagof wanogof fafe'ma ea', afe' Jerusalem ati Pita ape alomana wikifah biagah.
48001019	Apa' ae' ina ati anom aposel daiam, owa'. Ati Jems atotona, Dembinai Jisas owamana.
48001020	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi ma naep Godi nogawa basef ifimba anda'afi, ifimba endilisifi atif. Ae' ina ambaso'mepa, owa'atin.
48001021	A'i owa' main, afe' analemb walemb bagape itap biafip lu'upa Siriai Silisia.
48001022	Nemaf afamba esis Kristen sagape itap lu'upa Judiai ina sogawa ae' andeande', ata' owa'.
48001023	Esis same' basef atifa anis daias saga'i, “Aman anamba fowa' nagahambombagapa maloma basef Kraisi, nandaiwa'ma hapif ape'ini apa' dei' owa'atin. Anamba nawalapa basef amamba atom fowa' nagahambombagami.”
48001024	Ea' God natopalope ahapifana. Isimba atis dei' sasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol.
48002001	Ama afagof hiagufi 14-pelaiguf fafe'ma ea', ae' afe' Jerusalem wapani. Aloma Barnabas wafe' atin. Ae' ao'wa Taitus wapani nafe' nalomafa.
48002002	God nihimba'me na'amba ea' afe'. Basef ifimba bu'wafi agawalapefa esis anep mini'ap owa' Judaisia ihimba'masef esis Kristen sagape Jerusalemi wapani. Ea' aloma amom agufumi atom mape, ihimba'mamef. Ae' andaiwa'ma maol fowa' anda'ani neloma dei' anda'ani netaga falafin negenalo dowaf, owa'atin.
48002003	Taitus, anen alipunai ae'anai, amom mogawa anen aman Grikinai. Apa' amom ina matopa'mana alop si'i amom Juda manda'am, owa'. Ma'i aho'mana.
48002004	Basef ifimba Taitus nogatopa' alop a'a owa' fagataga na'amba. Fowa' amam magambaso'ami ma'i amom Kristen sahin owan endilisimi a' motopa' alop amamipi. Ea' mandambaho' mawisi nomona apa' Kristen ma'i monandona waf usi'ifi Jisas Krais naso'apaf apa' magape sisihipa ma anini. Ea' dei' natagwahepa ma waf awafi mape wahifipa. Amom ma'i mogawa waf afamba magape wahifipa ea' ma'i mili'amapa mogape lafela basef amamifi fowa'ifi.
48002005	Apa' ina ma'i aho'ma mogaila basef amamifi kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Dei' main, apa' ma'i mumafi basef bu'wami endilisimi mondape usi'ima ipa' pigahapifam andeande'.
48002006	Amom agufumi esis Kristen saga'i agufumi asasimi, ae' andaiwa'ma egasa'ma agofa anis epes, owa'. A'i agof mamahagofa falafugufi atogof. God ina nati alop ando' nowalogas, owa'atin. Anen nati ukupi nomonas nomon nawalogas. Amom ina ma'ipi anif basef daif wapani ma igawalipasef, owa'atin.
48002007	Apa' amom mogawa God nase'e maol inimba ma igawalipasa basef bu'wami owa' Judaisia, si'i nagaso'anan Pita nagawalipa esis Juda.
48002008	God nandandepa Pita nowa' banagona ma nonda' maol aposel nogawalapa basef ananifi ma esis Juda. Ea' na'amba atina God nandandepe nowa' banagae ma enda' maol aposel igawalipasa basef ananimi isimba owa' Judaisia.
48002009	Esis Kristen sa'i agufumi asasimi Jemsi Jon, maloma Pita. Amom mogawa God natopalope dowaf nase'e maol inimba. Ea' manda'afa alipufai onda' maol atitin Godi. Ea' amom wanom ma'i maso'afa lagof ae'i Barnabas mihimba'ma esis, afa' waloma amom wape opalef atelef wanda' maol atin Godi. Ea' amom wanom ma'i aho'ma ondawalagatanima ma afa' biafa ogafe' ma esis owa' Judaisia, amom mefe'ma esis Juda.
48002010	Amom ma'ipafa basef ifimba atifif ma'i afa' biafa ope otopalopa esis Kristen sagape Jerusalami kwahusi, otamba mais akasi. Maol inimba ae' okom ma'ian a'owa'.
48002011	Nemaf afamba Pita nafi'i wambel Antiok, ae' esambala basef ananifi ma nogohnaep esis Kristen hiasii. Dei' main, anen nanda' waf awafi.
48002012	Nali' nafi'i nape naloma esis Kristen owa' Judaisi na' gwa'aisi nalomas. A'i owa' main, nati amam amamba Jems nasapa'am magafi'ii, Pita ombal bahana ma amom Juda dindinapima mugaila waf afamba magatopa' alopafi. Ea' nandahagas nakwaha esis Kristen owa' Judaisia, ina ata' na' gwa'aisi nalomas wapani, a' owa'atin.
48002013	Anis Kristen Juda wapani ombal mahas sakwaha esis owa' Judaisia sagi'ma Pita. Barnabas wapani ombal mahana nanda'as na'amba atin si'i esis.
48002014	Nogota atamba ae' ati waf epes isimbai, ina saila ufia'w waf usi'ifi dondo'ma basef bu'wafi Godi endilisifi, owa'atin. Ea' a'ipana nogohnaep esis hiasii a'i, “Ina' Judainai. Apa' owa' dei' ina' naila waf anep mini'ap sogololama Godi. Waf apa' Judai, a' nakwahef ea'. Dei' maina ina' banagena a'owa' ma nelaepa esis mini'ap apamba sogaila waf apa' Judai? Na'ambai ina andeande', owa'. Awasim.
48002015	“Apa' mataga mamasapa ape'isi Juda, apa' ina mataga epes isimba owa' Judaia sanda' waf awafii, owa'atin.
48002016	Apa' mogawa God ina okom mapoma epen inimba nagahapifa mu'uli ananini ea' nanda' epen inimba bo'wen hilili', owa'atin. Epen nagahapifa Jisas Kraisi atin, dao' God nofalan na'i bo'wen hilili'i. Ea' apa' wapani magahapifa Jisas Krais ea'i, God na'i apa' epes bu'upai hilili'i ma magahapifa Krais. Apa' mu'uli owa'atin. Dei' main, ina anin epen naila mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani, dei' God nofalan na'i anin bo'wen hilili'i, owa'atin.
48002017	Apa' mape sisihipama Krais dei' God nofalapa epes be'epa hilili'i. I'i basef ifimba endilisiai, dei' mape ma'imama? Epes sigati apa' owa' mila mu'uli inimba fowa' God nagaso' Mosesania, atiasi sofalapa si'i apa' epes aupai si'i isimba owa' Judaisia. I'i esis si'ipapa na'amba, apa' ina a' mi'i Krais nasa'ma apa' manda' waf afamba awafi, owa'atin.
48002018	I'i ae' egalata anota ipata itanimai esa'mata wapani, dao' isimba sawalapa ae' aman agatopa' mu'uli inimbai.
48002019	“Dei' main, mu'uli inimba nahe aga' ea'. Ina la'ifina negala'ata ae' wapani, owa'. Dei' nahe aga' ma etaga egape namowe efa' ambal namili igaila okom Godi. Ae' ea' ape sisihiwima Krais aga' ail alomana lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
48002020	Ae' ina ape namowe ma ambal ae'ali atol, owa'. Krais atona nape namona opaf ae'afi. Dei' agape itap apa'e, ape aila banagami Nogamana Godi ahapifa anen atona. Anen okom maimaili a'owa', nalamona ambal ananinai ma nagatopalope dowaf.
48002021	Ae' ina ewa' alafugama waf God nagatopalope dowafafi, owa'atin. I'i mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani nenda' epes sotaga bo'wes hilili' ma naep Godiai, dei' waf Krais nagaga'mafi falafifi atef kofagefa akaf.”
48003001	Ipa' Galesia ukup pagahipai. Afa' wawalipipa basef alihifa Jisas Krais nagaga'ma ipa' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai, wawalipipaef alihif endilisi si'i pagatolom naep ipe'ipi. Dei' ata' ami nalamona ukup ipe'ipi pase'epa? Na'ambai owa'.
48003002	Ae' a'i ihali'ipa ma basef atifif. Fowa' ipa' pefa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nape opalef ipe'ilifi. Ipa' paila waf si'i mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani naga'ias pefa'ana a'a pame' basef bu'wami Godi atom pahapifam pefa'ana?
48003003	Endilisi, ae' ati ipa' ukup pagahipai. Ipa' pasefela maol panda'an banagena Ambal bu'unai Godi, apa' dei' owa' pa'i penda'an pimbifana pepel ipe'ini atin. Na'ambai awasim.
48003004	Dei' hiahaom amamba akafimi fowa' ipa' pegefa'ama maol bu'wani Godi pefa'am dowaf? Owa'. Ae' a'i amamba ina matagamepa dowaf, owa'atin.
48003005	Dei' God nase'epa Ambal bu'unai ananinai nanda' maol banagani la'afena ipa' ma main? Anen okom mandanda'ma ipa' paila mu'uli fowa' nagaso' Mosesani a'a pame' basef bu'wami ananimi pahapilam pailam?
48003006	Ipa' ata' ukup pendanda'ma Abraham. Anen si'i ikwafa waf usi'ifi pagahapifa Godafi. Basef Baibelifi fa'ias alihif fa'i, “Abraham nahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' God na'i anen aman bu'unai hilili'i.”
48003007	Ea' dei' ipa' pendegawa, epes isimba mamahisa sogahapifa Godi ma basef bu'wafi ananifi, epes isimba ea' bafasana awasi endilisi Abrahami.
48003008	Fowa' basef Baibelifi fa'ias alihifa nogota owagama God nonda' esis owa' Judaisia sogahapifa anen, sogataga bo'wes hilili' ma naep ananipi. Fowa' basef Baibelifi fa'ipa Abrahama basef bu'wami Godi. Fihimba'mana fa'i, “Anaf owagama God nonda' ina' ma negatopalopa epes hiasi sagape itapi sogape bo'wes.”
48003009	Abraham nahapifa God ea' God nafalo'mana na'ipana basef bu'wami ananimi. Dei' God a' nofalo'ma epes mamahisa sogahapifa anini ni'ipasa basef bu'wami ananimi na'amba atin si'i fowa' nagatopalopa Abraham.
48003010	Epes mamahisa hiasi ukup pagapoma waf sagaila mu'uli esis Juda sagailani dei' sape lafela okom aunai Godi. Dei' main, basef fagail Baibeli faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Epen ami dondol owa' nigaila basef hiafi fagail mu'uli Godi hi'ilifa, isimba sape lafela okom aunai Godi.”
48003011	Dei' basef ifimba fataga fandawalap alihif. Ina anin epen atitin naila mu'uli Godi nataga be'ena naep Godi, owa'atin. Dei' main, basef fagail Baibeli faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Epen mamahina nigahapifa Godi atin netaga bo'wen hilili' ma naep ananipi ma negape andeande' lifilafi.”
48003012	Apa' waf kofagefa sagaila mu'uli inimba Godii ina fape atogon kwasakwasala si'i waf sagahapifa Godafi, owa'atin endilisi. Basef fagail buk Baibeli fa'i anif basef banagafi ma mu'uli inimba fa'i, “Epen ami nagaila basef hiafi fagail mu'uli inimbai hi'agalafi, epen inimba nape namina nagaila basef ifimba hiafi hi'agalef.”
48003013	Apa' owa' Krais natagwahepa ma okom wandafunai Godi nagape mu'uli ananinii. God nanda' nimanimi ma awami ape'imi hiami hi'alam nakolasom mafe'ma anen atona, ea' kofagema amamba mapoma anen atona nofa'am. Dei' main, basef fagail Baibeli fa'i, “Epes mamahisa sandolas sahas sagail lawah usi'igahi ti'wanaegahi, isimba atis sape lafela okom aunai Godi.”
48003014	Krais Jisas nanda'as na'amba ma nonda' hiahawes fasifi God naga'ipanas Abrahami sogatagama anis epes daias sogolalama Godi. Nanda'as na'amba ma apa' mogohapifa basef bu'wami ma mogofa' Ambal bu'unai Ananinai si'i fowa' nala' lap naga'ias.
48003015	Ipa' Kristen sahin owan, a'i i'ipipa anif basef waminif atina waf ape'ifi. I'i anom amam manda' lapa anif banagafi, ina atiasi anin epen la'ifina nehape'ef a'a negewatanif, owa'atin endilisi. Fepe banagef atapif.
48003016	Fowa' Godi Abraham mala' lap papoma bafamana ananinai anaf nogataga, si'i waf apa' epes magala' lapafi. Basef fagail Baibeli ina fa'i, “Ina' neloma bafasena ine'isi.” Owa'atin. Ifimba fa'i epes hiasi. Apa' basef fagail Baibeli fa'i, “Neloma anona bafamena ine'inai.” Ifimba fa'i epen atotona anen Krais.
48003017	Basef ae' aga'ipipafi kofagefa na'amba. Fowa' gani God na'i basef nala' lap na'i endilisi owagama fela gwa'aisi. Ea' afagof hiagufi 430-pelaiguf fafe' fafe'ma ea', God naso'as mu'uli ananini nagaso' Mosesani. Mu'uli inimba ina la'ifina negahape' basef ifimba fagali'i God nala' lap nanda'afi, owa'atin endilisi.
48003018	Dei' main, God nanda' waf bu'wafima apa' nofa'apa makwaha waf awafi mutanimai. I'i mu'uli inimba newalapai waf afamba bu'wafiai, dei' basef God nagala' lapafi owa'. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Fowa' God nala' lapa waf afamba bu'wafi natopalopa Abraham dowaf nofa'ana notanimai.
48003019	Dei' God naso'apa mu'uli inimba ma main? Fowa' gani God nali' naso'apa lap apamba ananipi. Nagi' nowatani mu'uli inimba nigihimba'mapa kofagema ma waf awafi fagataga alihif. Ea' God na'i mu'uli inimba nepe nifi'i netambel nogota atamba Abraham bafamana nogataga atai. Fowa' God na'i basef ifimba nala' lapa bafamana anamba. God na'ipam mu'uli inimba amom ensel ea' ma'ipa epesa aman nagape la'afeni, anen Moses.
48003020	I'i epen atitin nepe, aman nagape la'afeni owa' maol akana. Apa' i'i epes hiasi sogape, dao' anen nope la'afena esis. Apa' God ina anona aman nape la'afen natopalopana, owa'. Ea' anen atona nandape.
48003021	Ipa' pa'i basef ifimba fagail mu'uli esis Juda sagailani fa'i fepa'aga basef God nala' lap naga'iefi a'a owa'? Owa'atin endilisi. Dei' main, apa' hiapai magape itapi manda' waf awafii. I'i God noso'apa anin mu'uli ma mogofa' ambal namiliai, dao' a' motaga epes bu'upai hilili'i ma mugaila mu'uli inimba. Owa', owa'atin.
48003022	Apa' basef fagail Baibeli fa'ias na'amba fa'i, “Epes hiasi sagape itapi sape lafela banagami ma waf awafi hi'alas.” God nanda'as na'amba ma epes mamahisa sagahapifa Jisas Kraisi fowa' nala' lap na'i basef pagapomasi.
48003023	Fowa' gani waf afamba sagahapifa Jisas Kraisafi ina dei' fataga, ata' owa'. Nemaf afamba mu'uli esis Juda sagailani nala'atapa sisihipa mape si'i kalabus mape mape ma dei' nemaf afamba God nihimba'mapas alihisa apa' magahapifa Jisas Krais.
48003024	Mu'uli inimba si'i anin epen nigimafiapa nefa'apa magafe'ma Kraisa mogohapifana ma God nogofalapa epes be'epa hilili'i.
48003025	Dei' nemaf afamba afataga ea' ma mogohapifa Krais. Ea' mu'uli inimba ina ata' nimafiapa wapani, a' owa'atin.
48003026	Ipa' pahapifa Krais Jisas. Isimba atis dei' ipa' hipai pataga awasi Godi, pape sisihipama Krais Jisas.
48003027	Ipa' hipai panda' baptais hi'alepa ma pagape sisihipama Krais. Ea' dei' pefa' waf ananifi si'i pegowaho' lowagwif.
48003028	Dei' ina anis epes sape dambesi ma anis daiasa naep Godi, owa'atin. Esis Juda ina sape dambesa isimba owa' Judaisia, epes mamahisa agof akasi ina sape lafela epes agufisi, amam ina mape dambema awo nematawa, owa'atin. Ipa' hipai pape sisihipama Krais hi'alepa pataga atifipa.
48003029	I'i ipa' Kraisi si'ipa, andeande' ipa' awasi Abrahami pagahapifa Kraisi ma anaf God nofa'epa pitanimai pegape andeande' si'i basef ifimba fowa nala' lap nagaloma Abrahamafi.
48004001	Basef ae'afi fagape na'amba. Awani nogamana nagali'i anamba owagama nogofa' hiahawes ahamanai. Apa' anen ata' sa'ona sanda'ana nape lafela anona aman dembinai. Apa' endilisi hiahawes hiasi ahamanai, a' ananisi si'is.
48004002	Nemaf afamba nogamana ata' sa'ona, nape lafela agufumi mumafianama gwa'aisi otamba mais nafe' nafe'ma nemaf ahamana nandandepafi fagataga. Afamba amom ina ata' mumafiana wapani, a' owa'atin.
48004003	Apa' wapani mape na'amba atin si'i nogamana anamba. Fowa' apa' ata' owa' mohapifa basef Godi andeande'a, nogota atamba ata' manda' maol mape lafela ambagof awami dembami mugumafi hiahaom hiami magape ilif itapi.
48004004	Owa' nogota atamba God naga'iatai tataga, anen nasapa' Nogamana ananinai nafi'i itap apa'e. Ano'w nemata'w kolana nataga epen nape lafela mu'uli esis Juda sagailani.
48004005	Ama nogatagwahepa ma mu'uli inimba negewa'apa ea' natalepa ma mogape wahifipa. Nanda'am na'amba ma God dei' notowandefapa mogape si'i awasi ananipai endilisi si'ipa.
48004006	Apa' mape awasi ananipai. Isimba atis dei' God naso'apa Ambal bu'unai Nogamanai nawis ukup ape'ipi. Ambal anamba nalef nofalana na'i, “Ahame, Ahame!”
48004007	Dei' ipa' ina pape panda' maol lafela ambagof amamba awami, owa'atin endilisi. Ipa' batawis ananipai. Anaf God nogase'epa hiahawes fasisi hiasi nandondombas sapoma nogaso'apas apa' awasi ananipai wapani.
48004008	Fowa' ipa' owa' ata' pegawa Goda, pape panda' maol aunai pape sisihipa lafela ambagof awami. Amom ina endilisimi, owa'atin.
48004009	Dei' ipa' pegawa God. Apa' endilisi, anen nogawa ipa'. Apa' dei' ami ata' nanda'epa pitanima pandahagas pafe' pagaila ambagof amamba awami? Amamba ina banagami, owa'. Dei' maina ipa' pa'i pegape lafelam wapani? Hapaimi.
48004010	-
48004011	Ae' okom mapoma ipa', ombal mahe. Dei' maina ukup ipe'ipi pandanda' be'ebe'ep pagapoma afagol dambaigili galoma awin dambaini saloma nogota asaf owaf sogatagatai saloma anif nimaguf paga'i lu'wafi panda' lotuma Godafi ma pagasafam? Na'ambai hapaimi. Na'amba maol ae' anda'ana agatopalopipani nenalo dowaf.
48004012	Dei' a'ipipa dindinip a'i ipa' pekwaha nomonas isimba pagape lafela mu'uli inimba. Ae' ina ape lafela mu'uli Godi, owa'. Ape wahifiwi. Ea' pepe wahifipa si'i ae'. Dei' main, ae' ahapifa Krais si'i ipa'. Fowa' ipa' ina panda'me anef waf awafi, owa'atin.
48004013	Ipa' pegawa fowa' dambadamba agafe'mago ipa', alop ae'api ina banagep, owa'. Ape alomepa anif nimaguf, awalapa basef bu'wami Godi a'ipipa.
48004014	Aowas lu'wani nanda'e ea' alop ae'api aop. Isimba sanda'epa nimanipa. Apa' ipa' ina patolowe pandafafa'me pewa' alafugahe, owa'atin. Ipa' pandagalame si'i pandagalama anona ensel Godi, a'a si'i Krais Jisas atona.
48004015	Fowa' ape agalomepa ipa' pandagala a'owa'. Apa' dei' dagala ipe'ini ahi'alan. Ae' atowe a'i endilisi i'i ipa' la'ifipa ai, pigi naep ipe'ipi pese'ep.
48004016	Apa' dei' mama? Ae' si'i bouwai ma aga'ipipa basef ifimba endilisifi a'a owa'? Ae' ina egawa, owa'.
48004017	Endilisi, anis epes daias sagambaso'ami ukup pehafel dindinip sa'i sombemefa ukup ipe'ipi ma pigaila basef asasifi. Apa' ukup asasipi ina be'ep, owa'. Esis ina satopalopepa ma basef Godi, owa'atin. Sandaiwa'ma ipa' pegame' basef ae'afi. Sanda'am na'amba ma ipa' ukup pehafel dindinipa pigaila esis atis.
48004018	I'i esis ukup pehafel dindinipa waf bu'wafi ma sogatopalopepa lifilafi, dao' na'ambai a' andeande'. Apa' i'i sonda'as na'amba nimaguf ifimba atif ae' ape agalomepa, ina andeande', owa'. Apa' sonda'as nimaguf ifimba ikwahipa igafe'ai, dao' andeande'.
48004019	Ipa' awasi alipipai ae'ipai, ae' ame' akafimi amamba atom si'i nematawa wame' akafimi ogola awasi. Ame' akafimi amamba ma ipa' efe' efe' etaga ma nogota atamba Krais notaga nondawalap opalef ipe'ilifi nomon.
48004020	Ae' ati uwahipipa! Dei' okom malamafe'ma ipa' a'owa'. Ae' ina egawa etopalopepa i'imama? Ea' okom maimailipa a'i dei' epe elomepa i'ipipa anif basef bu'wafi nogohnaep ipe'isi. Apa' owa'atin.
48004021	Ipa' pa'i pepe lafela mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani. Dei' a'i ihali'ipa ma anif basef. Ipa' pegawa basef kofagefa ma mu'uli inimba a'a owa? Dei' a'ipipa
48004022	si'i basef fagail Baibeli faga'i, atiasi Abraham nola awasi amam biam. Anona, kwanda' maola anen dowafi Hega kogolanai. Apa' anona, waulu'mana endilisi Sera kogolanai.
48004023	Nogamana kwanda' maol dowafi nemata'w akwamba Hega kogolanai si'i apa' epes sandaso'ama sogola awasi. Apa' nogamana Sera kogolanai natagama basef lap God naga'iefi.
48004024	Nematawa awamba biawa ondola'waifa basef lu'wafi ma lap biafip. Nemata'w akwamba Hega kondola'waifa basef fagataga halafuta Sainai. Awasi ako'usi anaf agof akas sonda' maol dowaf sope lafela anis daias.
48004025	Ako'w kondola'waifa halafuta Sainai, tagape anep itap lu'upa Arebiai, ea' ako'w basef waminif atina wambel ambalemba Jerusalem dei' nagape itap apa'i. Dei' main, ako'w kwape kwanda' maol banagambel kwaloma awasi akwa'usi sape lafela banagami si'i esis Juda sagape Jerusalami sagape lafela mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani.
48004026	Apa' wambel mamambel ape'imbili Jerusalem nagape heveni. Epes mamahisa sagape wambel ambalembai ina sape lafela mu'uli inimba, owa'atin. Sandatagwah sape wahifis.
48004027	Dei' main, Baibel naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Nemata'w, ina' nembel bagasi'inai ma owa' negela awasia, ina' awi dei' nindanifal ni'i mehip. Ina' ata' owa' negame' akafimi si'i sola awasi sagame'amia, ina' awi nekwalefa malogol nega ni'i mehip! Nemata'w asa'wi, atiasi kola batawis hiasi kwikila' nemata'w kwagaso' amani kogolasi.”
48004028	Dei' ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' awasi Godi pataga si'i basefa lap God naga'iefi na'amba atin si'i Aisak.
48004029	Fowa' nogota atamba awani aman nagataga waf afamba amam nematawa sandaso'amafi naso'ana nimanimi awani aman inimba God atona nanda'an nagataga banagami Ambal bu'unai ananinai. Isimba ea' na'amba atin dei' wapani. Esis sagape lafela mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani saso'apa akafimi apa' awasi Godi.
48004030	Apa' dei' buk Baibel na'ias na'imama? Na'ias na'i, “Li'amonago nemata'w akwamba agol aka'wi kwanda' maol dowaf kwagape lafela anis daiasi kolomago nogama'w akwa'unai. Awani inimba atiasi ina nefa' hiahawes ahamanai noloma awani nagataga nemata'w kwagape wahifi'wi, owa'atin.”
48004031	Ea' dei' apa' Kristen alipipai, ina si'i awasi magataga nemata'w akwamba kwagape lafela anis daiasi, owa'atin. Apa' si'i awasi magataga nemata'w akwamba wahifi'wii.
48005001	Krais atona natagwahepa magape epes wahifipai. Isimba atis dei' ipa' dalutu banagepa. Ina ata' pi'i awi ma anis epes sehekelepa pepe lafela mu'uli esis Juda sagailani wapani, owa'i.
48005002	Peme', ae' Pol a'ipipa isimba. I'i ipa' piga'i awi ma amom mogatopa'mepa alopa, Krais ina atiasi notopalopepa kwasakwasala, owa'atin endilisi.
48005003	A'i i'ipa ipa' amam hipai wapani. Aman ami ni'i awi ma mogatopa'mana alop ananipi, anen nila mu'uli inimba hiani hi'indalan.
48005004	I'i ipa' pa'i pila mu'uli inimba ma atiasi God niga'i ipa' epes be'epa hilili'ima, ipa' pandahape' pakwaha Krais pefalana bounai, ea' pelelama waf God nagatopalopapa dowafafi pakwahef.
48005005	Apa' owa' atin. Apa' mahapifa Kraisa banagami Ambal bu'unai Godi. Ea' mogawa endilisi mope mohafa anaf God niga'i apa' be'epa hilili'i ma okom ananimi.
48005006	Epen ami nepe sisihina Krais Jisas, waf afamba magatopa' alopafi o owa' mogatopa' alopia afamba falafifi atef owa' banagefa. Apa' waf sagahapifa Kraisafi atef fawalapai waf ukup pagapagailasafi. Isimbai atis fasisi endilisi sikila'.
48005007	Fowa' ipa' pape panda' waf fasifi pailaf andeande'. Apa' dei' ata' ami nasopama ufia'wa ipa' ma owa' pigaila basef endilisifi wapania? Ami nahondo' ukup ipe'ipi pakwaha basef ifimba?
48005008	God ina nanda'epa na'amba, owa'atin. Anen nofalepa pafi'mai anen.
48005009	Anom gawaimi maga'i na'amba ma'i, “Anis yis sanda'asa bret tagatefi, isimba atiasi sonda' bret tetef hi'ilata.”
48005010	Ae' alomepa ukup atifip mape sisihipama Dembinai. Ea' egawepa ipa' atiasi ina pila anis nomonas daias, owa'. Pigaila okom ae'ami atumi. Ae' ina egawa aman anamba nagalamona ukup ipe'ipi, owa'. Ea' diamanago, anen nanda' waf awafii atiasi nofa' akafimi ma God.
48005011	Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, i'i endilisi ae' awalipipa ma basef ifimba pagatopa' alopafiai, dei' maina esis sa'i sogase'e akef? I'i ae' i'ipipa basef ifimbaiai, esis ina si'i sehe', owa'atin. Apa' ae' a'ipipa basef bu'wami ma Krais nagaga' lowag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Ea' esis ukup awep sa'i sese'e akafimi.
48005012	Amom amamba magalalamona ukup ipe'ipii, ea' andeande'ma mogatopa'mama alop apamba du'wanip amamipi atop hi'igalap!
48005013	Endilisi ipa' sahin owan, God nofalipai ma pegape wahifipa hilili'. Na'amba ipa' ukup pendanda' pi'i, apa' ea' mape hilili' wahifipa, dei' andeande'ma monda' waf alop atopafi. Ukup pendanda' na'amba owa'. Ipa' ukup pindapindaila sahin owan ipe'isi penda' maol naninani pendatopalopa atin.
48005014	Dei' main, mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani hiani nape nomona basef ifimba atif fa'i, “Ipa' ukup pipila epes isimba hiasi hi'indalas si'i ukup pagaila ipa' atipa.”
48005015	Apa' i'i ipa' migimigah penda' lopa' fitap nepe la'afena ipa' atipa, ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba ipa' hipai pendakolef pesa pewala atin hi'ilipa!
48005016	Basef ae' aga'iefi ifimba. Ipa' pihapifa Ambal bu'unai Godi pendafe'. I'i ipa' pilas penda'as na'amba, ina atiasi pila waf nembel apinai, owa'atin.
48005017	Apa' mogawa, waf nembel apinai na'i nili'amona Ambal bu'unai Godi, ea' Ambal Godi na'i nili'amona opaf apinai. Amom biam mondopambema mafitap mape. Ea' hiahawes ipa' pa'i pinda'asi ina banagepama penda'as, owa'.
48005018	Ipa' i'i pigaila Ambal bu'unai Godi atona ipa' ina ata' pape lafela mu'uli esis Juda sagailani, owa'.
48005019	Waf opaf apinai epes hiasi sogawaf ea' fape alihif. Afamba na'amba. So'a waol, waf alogufi, ukup pegehafema waf awafi,
