48005020	sandagala saganifela god baso'amunai, sanda' aupi ufial ma'akwi, waf negefala anis bousi, ukup papoma esis atis, migimigah, waf kowagalasafi, ukup wandafip, basef wandafifi ma sondawal biafis sogawala wambotagw,
48005021	ukup awepa waf kowagalasafi, sanda' spak sohaga sogagaol, saga' gwa'aisii embel banagambeli hiasii ma sanda' awalef awalifi, ea' waf naninani aunai na'ambai. Fowa' a'ipipa dei' a'i i'ipipa wapani. Epes mamahisa sanda' waf afambai, anaf ina sefe' suwis anamba God nagala'ambemagoma, owa'atin.
48005022	Apa' Ambal bu'unai Godi nawalapai waf bu'wafi na'amba. Waf ukup pigapigaila anis daias, dagala, opalef awanilifi, waf nepe nititilisa sonda'mena waf awafii, waf sigati uwahipisafi waf ukup be'ebe'epa anis daias negatopalopas, nenda' hiahawes datima ma naep Godi epesi wapani,
48005023	waf sa'umbilifi, faloma waf nomonas sopaisa sugumafi alop andeande'i. Owa' anif basefa mu'uli atitin nepe lu'win negapa'aga waf afamba bu'wafia, owa'atin.
48005024	Epes mamahisa Krais Jisasi sandola opalef apimi mail lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai maloma waf fafifafi ukup pigahafemafi faloma waf hiafi kowagalasafi.
48005025	Ambal bu'unai Godi atona naso'apa ambal namili lapaepa. Ea' dei' apa' mila waf ananifi mondafe'.
48005026	Apa' ina monda' du'waniga mefela agof ape'igufi dowadowaf, mi'i basef moloma alipisi ape'isi mondahihianamaefa anef waf, owa'i. Apa' ina kowolapa ma anis epes daias soloma hiahaom asasimi, owa'i.
48006001	Sahin owan, ipa' i'i pigati anin epen ipe'ini nenda' anef waf awafi, ipa' anipa pagape banagepama Ambal bu'unai Godi petopalopan pisindi'amonan sa'osa'ombel. Ipa' hipai atona atin solawaipa ma waf ipe'ifi. Na'amba Satan nogwamba ipa' wapani.
48006002	Ipa' petopalopa sahin owan ipe'isi ma pegefa' nimanimi asasimi. Penda' waf afambai fefe' fendahama mu'uli Kraisi endilisi.
48006003	I'i anin epen okom mondanda' nembaso'am ni'i anin agol lu'wagilini, ma anin agol akan, epen inimba nandambaso'ma nembel ananimbili atembel.
48006004	Epes hiasi atona atin ata' sihihi' maol asasini daindai, bo'wen a'a owa'. I'i bo'wena, epen inimba sonehana maol inimba ananini. Ea' anin maol akana negawaloga maol anin daiani.
48006005	Amam nematawa hiasi atona atin anaf sofa' nimanimi asasimi daindai.
48006006	Epes mamahisa sogolafa basef Godii, esis ukup pendanda' sowaloga hiahawes fasisi asasisi soso'ana du'wanis sondafe'ma epen gawaini nagawalipasi.
48006007	Ipa' ina pembaso'ma nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pi'i God okom magahanai gawa akanai, owa'i. I'i anin epen newa anis maefah aof ananifi, anaf hiahawes isimba atis nitanima nela'as wapani.
48006008	I'i epen inimba nenda' maol neloma wafa opaf apinai ananinai, bola waf anamba atona nonda' epen inimba awen nega' higililan. Apa' epen mamahina nenda' maol negaloma waf Ambal bu'unai Godi, atiasi Ambal anamba nowalapai ambal namili ma epen inimba nepe andeande' lifilafi.
48006009	Isimba atis dei' apa' ina ala'uta tahapa ma monda' waf fasifi, owa'atin. Monda'as dindinip. I'i bihitagof ape'igufi fonda' maol banagambel, anaf mola'as mofa' gwa'aisi bu'wasi endilisi.
48006010	I'i apa' muti ufia'w fasi'uma, monda' waf fasifi ma epes hiasi mondatopalopas. Apa' mondanda'am na'amba atin banagambel esis sahin owan sogahapifa Dembinaii mikila' manda'asa anis daias.
48006011	Ipa' piti amef ifimba lu'wafi dei' ahapila pen lagol ae'agili anda'mepafi.
48006012	Anom amam dindinapim a'owa' ma ma'i mogatopa'mepa alop ipe'ipi. Dei' maina amom manda'as na'amba? Ma'i mogofa' agof lu'wagufi ma naep epesi. Amom ukup pandanda' na'amba ma'i, “Na'amba anis epes sogawa afa' si'i afa' wagahapifa lawag Kraisi ea' sohafa oga'.”
48006013	Ina anis epes saila mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani andeande' datima, owa'. Amom magatopa' alop amamipii wapani, ina mailan andeande', owa'. Ma'i motopa' alop ipe'ipi ma mogofa' agof lu'wagufi ma mi'ipa epes hiasi moga'i, “Amom Galesia mofa' ametal inimba mogatopa' alop amamipi.”
48006014	Apa' ae' owa'atin. Andaiwa' ma egefela agol ae'agili lu'wagola anis hiahawes daias, owa'atin. Ae' andagala ma egefela agola dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais atona, anen naga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai. Lawag agamba Kraisi atoga, dei' waf itapafi ea' faga' nomon okom ae'ami, dei' ae' si'i epen nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ma naep epes sagape itapi.
48006015	Waf afamba magatopa' alop o owa' mogatopa' alopia, afamba falafifi atef. Apa' God nanda'apa mataga dambaipai, waf afambai atef dao' endilisifi.
48006016	Epes mamahisa sogahapila ukup ipimbai sogailapi, ae' a'i opalef asasilifi fendape sa'ombela, God niti uwahipis notopalopas sogoloma epes Israel hiasi Godi.
48006017	Basef akutaifi ifimba. Ae' andaiwa' ma anona aman nogase'e anom nimanimi wapani, owa'. Dei' main, amam amamba magahai melet atamba Jisasi tape alop ae'api ea'.
48006018	Ipa' alipipai, ae' a'i dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais notopalopepa dowafa pegape andeande'. Dei' okom ananimi mope mondalomago ambagof ipe'igufi. Endilisi.
49001001	Ae' Pol okom Godi atona nandandepe ataga aposel Jisas Kraisi ma anda' maol ananini agawalapa basef ananifi. Ae' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' epes Godi dei' pagape Efesusi, ipa' pahapifa Krais Jisas datima pape sisihipa pagalomana.
49001002	Ae' a'i God ahamapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banagaipa pepe opalef awanelef.
49001003	Apa' ata' mondanifela Ahamapa God, ahama Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais! Ama Krais atona anen naso'apa hiahaom hiami fasimi atom magape otaga ilifi mogatopalopapa ukupi ambagof ape'isi ma poe fe' ki ape'ini nogape andeande'.
49001004	Dei' main, fowa' God ina dei' nanda' itap apa'e, ata' owa'atin, nemaf afamba nosaho'apa ea' mope sisihipama Krais hilili' ma waf awafi kofagefa akapa.
49001005	Anen okom maimailapa a'owa'. Isimba atis anen nali' okom mandanda' nosaho'apa nofa'apa nalagapa mataga si'i awasi ananipai. Anen naila okom ananimi atom nanda'asa lagol Jisas Kraisi atogol.
49001006	God nanda'as na'amba ma apa' mosa'ma agol ananigili moganifelona ma waf fasifi ananifi nagatopalopapa dowafafi. Waf afamba fawalapa banagami mogogala'i ananimi. Anen natopalopapa dowaf naso'apa nogamana okom ananimi magamagailana a'owa'i, ea' mape sisihipama anen.
49001007	Krais atona naga' natagwahepa ma waf awafi natalepa esimbel ananimbeli. Ea' nakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi okom maso'anaf. Anen nanda'as na'amba si'i okom Godi magaila ape'i si'im a'owa' ma waf nagatopalopapa dowafafi.
49001008	Waf afamba naso'apaf si'if a'owa'. Naso'apaf faloma gawa hiani naloma gawa mogogawa waf maif bu'wafi a'a awafi.
49001009	-
49001010	Okom ananimi atom na'i notopalopapa ea' nihimba'mapa basef ananifi fali' fandambaho' fagape okom ananimi atumi. Basef ifimba fagape na'amba. Anen nali' okom mandanda'ma Krais nogape dembinai ma hiahaom hiami magape ilif itapi hi'igalam epes wapani. Nogota atamba anen atona okom maga'iatai togataga, God noso'ana hiahaom amamba mofe' lagol Kraisi atogol ma anen atona nogape dembinai ma hiahaom amamba hi'igalam.
49001011	God nanda' hiahaom amamba hi'alam nagi'ma fowa' dambadamba anen okom mandanda'mam. Ea' nosaho'apa mape sisihipama Krais. Dei' main, anen nandaila okom ananimi si'i fowa' dambadamba okom mandanda'mas.
49001012	Apa' Juda atepa mogawa endilisi mape mogohafa Kraisi, God nandandepapa na'amba ma monda' epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol. Agol agalemba ananigili fasigili a'owa'.
49001013	Ea' dei' ipa' wapani, afamba pegame' basef endilisifi ifimba basef bu'wafi Godi, nofa'epa petanimai pahapifa Krais pape sisihipama anen. Nogota atamba ipa' pahapifa Krais, God naso'epa Ambal bu'unai ananinai nosahe'epa. Ambal bu'unai anamba si'i anin ametal God nanda'mepani ma nigihimba'mepa na'amba.
49001014	Apa' mogawa endilisi atapipa mopoma anaf nogaso'apa hiahaom bu'wami apa' epes ananipai. Anen noso'apam nemaf afamba notagwahepa nofa'apa mofe' mope mogalomana. God nanda'am na'amba ma apa' monda' epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol, agol agalemba fasigili a'owa'.
49001015	-
49001016	Basef doko'ifi endilisifi atif. Isimba atis dei' dondol anda'mepa beten ipa'. Nemaf afamba fagali'i ame' basefa waf ipe'ifi pahapifa Dembinai Jisasa ukup pelele' pagaila amam nematawa hiasi Godi. Ae' anda'as nemaf afamba afi'i afi'i ataga dei', ae' ina akwahipa ma beten, owa'atin. Ae' okom mandanda'mepa andabeten anifela Godepa.
49001017	Jisas Krais anen dembinai ape'inai. Ae' andabeten atapiwi nimaguf hiafi ahali' God, dembinai Jisas Kraisi, anen Ahamapa ape'inai mogogala'i banagami magapaunai. Andabeten ahali'ana ma nogase'epa gawa bu'wani ukup ipe'ipi pegegawa basef kofagefa fendawalap alihifa ipa'. Ama pegegawa God andeande'.
49001018	Ae' andabeten ahali'ana ma nonda' ukup ipe'ipi pindawisi'ma pegegawa waf bu'wafi, ma hiahaom bu'wami anen nofalepa pape pegehafami. Ma pegegawa ambal namili lagape lifilafi dondoli loloma anamba God nagala'ambemagoma nogogala' a'owa'ma. Amamba God nandondomba ma anaf na'i noso'apa mogaloma epes ananisi si'isi.
49001019	Andabeten ahali'ana ma ipa' pegegawa banagami ananimi dondol manda' maola opalef nomon apa' epes magahapifanai. Amamba ea' lu'um a'owa'. Banagami amamba na'amba atin si'i banagami ananimi lu'wami
49001020	nanda'ama nasa'ma Jisas nosafel nagakwaha ga' ananini. Banagami amamba atom God nanda'ana nape wa'ol lagol ananigili kwahisigili banagogoma gani heven.
49001021	Apa' Krais dei' nape dembinai ilif a'owa' ma dembami agufumi hiami maloma hiahaom banagami hiami. Anen nikila' agof lu'wagufi hi'alagof epes dei' sagape nogota ata'ii, ea' isimba sogape nogota tigi' togatagai wapani.
49001022	God nanda' hiahaom hiami mape lafela anen atona. Ea' nanda'ana nape Dambena ilif endilisi ma epes hiasi hi'alas saloma hiahaom hiami hi'alama nagatopalopa esis sios hiasi sagahapifanai hi'alas.
49001023	Esis sagahapifanai si'i alop si'ip Kraisi. Anen nape anamba hiagoma nugumafi hiahaom hiami hi'agalami nape nomona esis sagahapifanai hiasi si'isa anen atona endilisi.
49002001	Basef ipe'ifi fagape na'amba. Fowa' ipa' panda' waf naninani aunai, nahepa paga'. Dei' main, ipa' ina pame' God, owa'. Pesambalona panda' waf awafi.
49002002	Nogota atamba ipa' ata' paila waf awafi atef itapafi ea' paila basefa aman aunai banagonai nugumafi banagami awami mape la'afen mugumafi itapi otagai. Banagami amamba mataga aman anamba aunai dei' nugumafi epes isimba sogosambala Godi.
49002003	Fowa' apa' hiapai hi'alapa manda' waf awafi si'i epes isimba sogosambala Godi sanda'afi, ea' maila nomonas opaf apifi ape'ifi atof. Apa' maila nomonas nembel anamba apinai ma ukup ape'imi atom. Isimba atis dei' ata' mape lafela okom wandafunai Godi, si'i anis epes daias itapasi.
49002004	Owa', God naga'i owahipigama apa' epes a'owa'i, okom lu'wami mailapa.
49002005	Isimba atis dei' nanda'apa mataga namepa. Apa' mape si'i sagaga'i ma waf awafi. Owa' nanda'apa mataga namepa mape sisihipama Krais. Amamba okom lu'unai Godi nagatopalopapa dowafi nofa'epa pitanimai.
49002006	God nasa'mapa mape namepa maloma Jisas Krais, mofa' agol lu'wagili mape sisihipama anen, ea' ukup pandanda' papomana heven.
49002007	God nanda'apa na'amba ma nogota ata'e dei' tefe' tefe' totaga owagama nihimba'mas okom ananimi mailapa nagatopalopapa dowafi, ma epes hiasi hi'ilas soloma ensel hiami hi'ilam sogogawa okom amamba ananimi lu'um a'owa' mandawalap alihima apa' na'amba. Anen nanda'apa mape sisihipama Krais Jisas.
49002008	Dei' main, God natopalopepa dowaf, isimba atis dei' nofa'epa pitanimai pahapifa Krais. Hiahaom amamba ina ipa' atipa panda'am, owa'atin. God atona nase'epam dowaf.
49002009	Amamba ina si'i hiahaom ipa' panda' maol pegefa'ami, owa'. Ea' ina anin epen atitin la'ifina negasa'ma agol ananigili atogola hiahaom amamba, owa'atin.
49002010	Dei' main, God atona nanda'apa mape. Lagol Krais Jisasi atogol nanda'apa mataga dambaipa ma waf fasifi apa' milaf mogafe'.
49002011	Ea' apa' mondogawa isimba andeande'. Lagof amom Judai atogof matopa' alop amamipi. Ea' esis Juda sandafela esis atis sa'i epes sagatopa' alopi. Ea' ipa' fowa' pape pegelelama Godi owa' Judaipaia, sofalepa saga'i, “Owa' pegatopa' alopia.” Basef ifimba fa'i waf alopafi ando' atogini.
49002012	Ipa' pendegawa nogota atamba ata' pape pelelama God, ipa' ata' pape ando' laogona Krais, pape ando'ma esis mini'ap Israel epes Godi, ea' pape ando'ma basef God anen nala' lapef nagaloma asisafi. Basef ifimba naga'i endilisi atisa nogatopalopasafi. Ipa' ina anom hiahaom fasimi pape pegehafam anafi, owa'atin. Ea' ipa' owa' pihapifa Goda.
49002013	Apa' ipa' fowa' pagape laogona Godi, esimbel Kraisi atembal ma ga' ananini befa'epa dei' bakolasepa pafi'i pape felefele'ma Goda lagol Jisasi atogol.
49002014	Dei' main, anen atona kofagonama opaf awanafi, nagakolasa apa' Juda maloma ipa' anep mini'ap fowa' pegelelama Godi, dei' mataga mape epes atifipa. Anen atona nahape' waf afamba fagawala apa' Juda maloma ipa' owa' Judaipaia. Ea' anen atona natopa' waf afamba boufi lopa' fitapafi.
49002015	Ga' Kraisi atin nali'amona basefa mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani faloma anif basef du'wanif fagape mu'uli inimbai. Anen nanda'as na'amba nokolasa misi'ah ahamba biafih, apa' Juda maloma ipa' owa' Judaipaia mogataga si'i epen atitin dambaini. Ama mope opalef awanalef fegape atogon felefele'ma God.
49002016	Krais naga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai nakolasa misi'ah ahamba biah hataga si'i alop atotop. Ea' ga' ananini natagwaha waf asasifi boufi lopa' fitapafi faga' hi'alaf.
49002017	Anen dei' nafi'i na'i basef bu'wafi nawalapef na'i, “Dei' ipa' pape opaf atof paloma Godi epes wapani. Anen na'ipipa basef ifimba fowa' pape laogona God pelelamana, paloma apa' Juda ananipai magape felefele'ma anini wapani.
49002018	Lagol Kraisi atogol apa' mini'ap biafip mape ufia'w alihi'wa mogafe'ma Ahamapa Goda Ambal bu'unai ananinai atona.
49002019	Ea' ipa' dei' ina ata' pape si'i laugunisi dalaisi itap akasi, owa'atin. Ipa' paloma esis amam nematawa mini'ap Godi, ea' wambota ananipai.
49002020	Ipa' pape si'i ipat Godi nape nagala'ata atapitai. Anen nanda'ata tatoma ilifa afa' aposel waloma amom profet nawafa si'i olalefa ipat atamba. Apa' Krais Jisas anen atona si'i olaf fagali'i banagafi endilisi ma ipat atamba.
49002021	Aolagaitama tatoma sisihita ma Krais, ea' banagota andeande' tape. Dei' God ata' nanda' ipat atamba nala'ata atin totaga lu'uta ma togape hilili'ma Dembinai atona.
49002022	Ipa' wapani pagape sisihipama Kraisi, dei' God nape nakolasepa atogon atapina paloma anis Kristen alipisi hiasi. Ea' nanda'epa pataga si'i ipat endilisi God nagapautai ma Ambal bu'unai ananinai atona.
49003001	Krais nakolasa mini'ap biafip Juda saloma esis owa' Judaisia sataga mini'ap atifip. Isimba atis dei' ae' Pol, Krais Jisas nanda'e anda' kalabusa egatopalopa ipa' epes fowa' pegelelama Godi.
49003002	Endilisi atis, apa' hiapai magape itapi natopalopapa dowaf. Amamba anen nase'e ma igimafiam enda' maol ewalapama egawalipipa.
49003003	Maol inimba anen nagasi'iani nagape na'amba. Basef ananifi bu'wafi fowa' ata' fandambaho', apa' dei' God nawalapamef alihif anda'ef bandef fail pas isi'i.
49003004	Ama i'i pigatalifa basef ifi'ima, atiasi pegawa okom ae'ami ma basef hiafi Kraisi fali' fape fandambahi'i.
49003005	Fowa' lifilafi God ina nawalapef alihifa anis epes, owa'. Apa' dei' Ambal bu'unai ananinai nawalapef alihifa afa' aposel waloma amom profet ananifai.
49003006	Basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi fagape na'amba. Esis hiasi owa' Judaisia hi'alas fowa' sogololama Godi saloma ipa' apataga atifipa paloma apa' Israel. Ea' ipa' hipai hi'alepa paloma apa' Juda mofa' hiahaom fasimi hiami God naga'i endilisi atis nogaso'apami ma lagol Krais Jisasi.
49003007	God nanda'e ape anda' maol agawalapa basef ifimba bu'wafi. Anen okom maimaili natopalope dowaf nowa' banagae, isimba atis dei' ape anda' maol inimba.
49003008	Endilisi atis ae' ape falafuwai agagi' endilisi ma amam nematawa hiasi Godi hi'alas. Owa' anen okom maimaili natopalope dowafa anda' maol awalipa esis sogololama Godi basef fasifi ma Krais. Basef ifimba faloma waf afamba bo'wes a'owa' sikila' gawa epes hiasi hi'alan, ea' ina la'ifisa sogogawa isimba kofagesa, owa'.
49003009	Ea' God natopalopas dowaf nihimba'masa okom ananimi maloma waf hiafi ananifi epes hiasi hi'alas. Okom amamba maloma waf afamba ananifi hiafi fowa' dambadamba sape sandambaho' safi'i sataga dei'. Apa' dei' nanda' hiahawes hiasi hi'alas sataga sagapani nase'e maol inimba agawalapa isimba sape sandambahi'i alihis.
49003010	Fowa' God ata' nambaho'was, apa' dei' na'i esis Kristen sios sagahapifanai sihimba'mamas amom dembami agufumi maloma hiahaom banagami hiami magape heveni mogawa gawa Godi. Gawa inimba hiani ananini naninani lu'win sa'win hi'alan.
49003011	Anen nanda'an na'amba atin si'i okom ananimi atom magape atapim dondoli maga'iama lagol dembinai ape'inai Krais Jisasi atogol.
49003012	Apa' mape sisihipama anen mahapifana. Isimba atis apa' ina ombal mahapa ma mogafe'ma God, owa'. Apa' ukup banagep endilisi ea' dei' mafe' felefele'ma anen.
49003013	Ea' dei' a'ipipa a'i, akafimi amamba dei' efa'ama egatopalapepa ami, na'amba piti amamba ukup iwanip pendahagas, owa'i. Pepe banagepa si'i ipa' dembipai. Dei' main, akafimi amamba ame'ama egatopalopepa.
49003014	Ae' nomonas sandanda'ma Krais nakolas apa' Juda maloma ipa' magataga atifipa, isimba atis dei' indiwa nembawa etawa andabeten anifela Ahame.
49003015	Apa' hiapai hi'alapa magape itapi maloma sagape ilifi wapani, apa' amam nematawa wambotagw hiagwi hi'alagw mofa' agof ape'igufi ma anen atona.
49003016	Ae' andabeten ahali'ana na'amba. A'i God notopalopepa ma banagami mogogala'i ananimi lu'wami a'owa'. A'i banagami ananimi atom mowa' banagaepa opalef ipe'ilifi nomona Ambal bu'unai ananinai atona.
49003017	A'i hapif ipe'ini atin Krais nope ipe'ilifi nomon atapina. Ea' andabeten ahali' Goda waf ukup pagapagailasafi fegape si'ifa ipa' ma fegewa' banagaepa pilutu banagepa pigaila waf afamba si'i nombalef lawag gahapila itap gogotawa banagoga.
49003018	A'i ipa' pefa' banagami peloma amam nematawa Godi hiasi pegegawa okom Kraisi naganagailipai, anamba lu'unai endilisi nafe' laona a'owa' nafe' wa'ol wa'ol nalota gani ilif a'owa' ea' nowala nafe' awin endilisi a'owa' nafe' atin.
49003019	Ea' andabeten ahali' God ambifa basef akutaifi na'amba. A'i ipa' pegawa okom anamba Kraisi endilisi, anamba nikila' gawa epes hiasi hi'alas. A'i ipa' pegawa okom anamba Kraisi ma pegape si'ipa a'owa' ma waf bu'wafi God okom maga'iefi hiafi hi'igalaf.
49003020	God anen banagonai. Banagami amamba ananimi dei' manda' maol opalef ape'ilifi nomoni, amamba banagem endilisi. Banagami amamba atom anen la'ifinai ma nonda' hiahaom hiami migikila' basef hiafi mandabeten magahali'anafi hi'alef faloma ukup apa' hiapai hi'alapa wapani.
49003021	Isimba atis dei' apa' Kristen sios magahapifanai munifela God mondasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagola Krais Jisas lifilafi mofe' atin anaf owagama gani. Endilisi.
49004001	Basef ifi'i fagali'i endilisifi atif. Ea' dei' a'i efela ukup ipe'ipi dindinipa poe fe' ipe'ini negafe' dondo'ma waf usi'ifi okom Godi maga'iefi nofalapa ma mogailafi. Ae' anda' kalabusa maol inimba atin Dembinaii dei' a'ipipa na'amba afela nomonas ipe'isi.
49004002	Ipa' pendape lafel endilisi ma epes hiasi penda'as sa'ombemas. Esis sonda'mepa waf awafii, pindanindifa ukup ipe'ipi banagep pepe pititilis. Ipa' ina ukup pesafel awep, owa'i. Ukup pindapindaila sahin owan ipe'isi petopalopas pefa' nimanimi pelomas.
49004003	Ambal bu'unai Godi nakolasepa mape opalef atelef. Ea' dei' penda' maol banagambela pigahapila waf afambai sisihifa waf ukup awanipafi atef. Waf afamba opalef atifilifafi fandawalap fagape na'amba.
49004004	Alop atifip, Ambal bu'unai Godi atifina. Amamba na'amba atin si'i hiahawes atifis, God nali' nofalepa pape pegehafasi.
49004005	Dembinai atotona, hapif atifin, sa'of atifin.
49004006	God ahamapa apa' hiapai anen atotona nape dembinai ma apa' magahapifanai hiapai hi'alapa. Anen nagape anamba hiagoma hi'agalagini, ea' nape nomona apa' hiapai hi'alapa.
49004007	Apa' hiapai atona atin hi'alapa mofa' anom hiahaom fasimi ea', dondo'ma ikwaf Krais nawalogaf nagaso'apaf ea'i.
49004008	Si'i Buk Baibel naga'i na'amba na'i, “Nemaf afamba anen nagafe' gani ilif, nofa' epes hiasi sanda' kalabusi a' nafe' nalota ilif. Ea' naso'asa hiahaom fasimi esis.”
49004009	Basef faga'i, “Nagalota ilif,” kofagefa fa'i main? Ifimba fa'i anen nagali' nafi'i nowala gani awin endilisi a'owa' itap apa'e.
49004010	Ea' aman anamba atona nogowala itap awin endilisii dei' notambel nalota ilif wapani nafe' gani ilif a'owa' nikila' otaga ma nonda' hiahaom hiami hi'igalam si'im kwaifa anen atona.
49004011	Anen atona ea' naso'apa presen hiahaom fasimi na'amba. Anom amam nandandepama monda' maol aposel, a' anom nandandepama monda' maol profet. Ea' anom nandandepama monda' maola mofe' moga'ipasa basef bu'wafi Kraisi epes hiasi. Ea' anom naso'ama gawa mogape pastai tisa mugumafi esis Kristen mowalipasa basef bu'wafi figasindi'amonas andeande'.
49004012	Krais naso'apa hiahaom amamba fasimi ma monda' apa' amam nematawa Godi mondandombola mogape la'ifipama monda' maol bu'wani ananini. Apa' amam nematawa Godi si'i alop Kraisi, ma mondowa' banagama atin mogape.
49004013	Ea' mope mefe' mefe' ma anaf apa' hiapai magahapifanai mogataga opalef atelef endilisi ma hapif ape'ini noloma gawa atifina anen Nogamana Godi. Apa' magataga epes banagepa endilisi magahapifanai si'i epes dambes ea'i, motaga na'amba atin si'i ikwafa waf bu'wafi Kraisi atef.
49004014	I'i apa' mogataga na'amba, apa' ina ata' mope mondati si'i awasi gawa akasi wapani, owa'. I'i epes isimba sogogawa a'owa'i sanda' kikipai ma waf baso'aifii si'ipapa basef hiafi fafifafi, amambai ina monda' ukup ape'ipi bol atin pepe si'i naoh gwagakoto'ma kanu. Amamba ina mogoto'mapa monda'apa si'i fufin nufapusapa mafe' magafi'i, owa'atin.
49004015	Apa' ukup banagep, ea' mi'i basef endilisifi atifa waf ukup pigapigailasafi. Apa' mi'i basef endilisifi na'amba ma mila waf Kraisi bu'wafi hi'igalaf. Ea' motaga banagepa migikila' waf mali' magailafi. Apa' monda'as na'amba mefe' motaga dondo'ma ikwafa waf Kraisi, anen balagonama apa'.
49004016	Anen atona dembinai ma apa' Kristen hiapai. Ea' apa' Kristen hiapai si'i alop wa'awa'ap pagape atifip sisihipa pondatopalopa atin si'i gigisilimb begewa' banaga so'matagw hiagwi lu'ugw sa'ogw hi'agalagw. I'i alop wa'awa'ap hiapi hi'ilap ponda' maol pondahama ikwaf anen naga'iefi, alop apamba si'ip pandatopalopa atin pape banagep pikila' fowa' pagape. Alop apamba pataga banagep atina ukup pandaima atin.
49004017	Dei' a'i i'ipipa anif basef. Ipa' pape sisihipama Dembinai dei' a'ipipa dindinipa agol ananigili. Ipa' ina ata' pila waf afamba sogololama Godi sagailafi, owa'i. Hapaifi. Epes isimba ukup asasipi pandapoma waf falafifi atef.
49004018	Gawa ma ukup asasipi si'i akot atona. Esis sololama gawa fasini, sanda' du'waniga, opalef asasimi maso'as. Isimba atis dei' sape ando' laogona ambal namili Godi.
49004019	Esis ina ata' ambagof awagofa waf afamba awafi asasifi, a' owa'atin. Safe' sawis endilisi ma waf awafi fafifafi hiafi faloma waf awafi so'a waulafi ma sagaila waf alugufi hiafi hi'agalaf. Saila waf afambai atapisa ukup pegehafel endilisi ma sonda' waf afamba awafi wapani.
49004020	Apa' ipa' ina pelafa waf afambai ma Krais, owa'atin endilisi.
49004021	Ae' egawa endilisi ipa' pegawa basef Kraisi ea'. Ipa' pagape sisihipama anini, amom mawalipipa ea' ma basef ifimba endilisifi Jisas nigihimba'mapafi.
49004022	Fowa' ipa' pelafa basef ifimba na'amba. Dei' li'amonago opaf anamba apinai ma waf awafi ipe'ifi. Opaf anamba kofagonama waf baso'afi kowagalasafii, ea' waf afambai dei' fape fahambombagapa. Dei' ea' li'amonago opaf anamba apinai.
49004023	Ea' ukup ipe'ipi petaga dambaip pendaho'of
49004024	pefa' opaf dambaifi. God nanda' opaf anamba dambainai, nataga si'i anen atona ma waf bu'wafi endilisifi usi'if hilili' a'owa'i.
49004025	Ea' ipa' hipai hi'ilipa pendakwaha waf baso'afi ma piga'i basef endilisifi atifa epes hiasi. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa apa' hiapai hi'alapa mape alop wa'awa'ap ea' mataga alop atifip.
49004026	I'i opalef ipe'ilifi numbutilif fepe atapilif, ipa' a' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba ipa' penda' waf awafi opalef numbutilif atapilif pefe' awin a' newala neso'. Na'ambai owa'i.
49004027	Na'amba piwisi' utama Satan.
49004028	Epes mamahisa sanda' wal atini, esis ina ata' sonda' wal wapani, owa'i. Esis dei' sondanda' maola lagof asasigufi ma atiasi sotagama hiahawesa sogaso'asas epes isimba hiahawes akasi.
49004029	Basef awafi ina fetaga malogof ipe'igufi, owa'i. Basef bu'wafi atif fendataga ma fegewa' banaga epes isimba owa' banagesia, dindi'i dondo'ma waf maif bu'wafi esis owa' banagesa sogailafia. Penda'as na'amba ma pegatopalopa epes isimba sogame' basef ipe'ifii.
49004030	Ipa' ina penda' anef waf awafi ma penda' Ambal bu'unai Godi nimanina, owa'i. Anen anol ametal Godi ma God nandandepepa ea' ma pagape ananipai atipa si'ipa ma anef nemaf notagwahipa ma waf awafi nofa'epa pitanimai pegape andeande'.
49004031	Ipa' pendakwaha waf hiafi awafi opalef awalifi migimigah, ukup numbutipi gigala basef findiwaifi awafi. Waf anamba aunai hianai nagahambombaga epesi.
49004032	Ipa' pendanda' waf sa'umbilifi ma esis alipisi pendatopalopas ea' piti uwahipis. Ipa' pendakwahomasa waf awafi esis sanda'mepafi ukup pese'epaf, si'i God nagakwahomepa waf awafi ipe'ifi ma agol Kraisi.
49005001	Ea' ipa' pindaila waf God nanda'afi. Anen okom maimailipa pape si'i awasi ananisi.
49005002	Ipa' pendafe' waf afamba ukup pagapagailasafi si'i Krais okom magaila apa', ma nalamona ambal ananili nagatopalopapa. Anen naso'ana alop ananipi God naga' nondolalimana si'i ofa bu'wani alogw fasigwi usihigwi gwaga'ani.
49005003	Apa' waf afamba hiahaof so'a waulafi, a waf alugufi kowagalasafi awafi, ipa' ina penda'af, owa'i. Basefa waf afamba ina fetaga kwasakwasala la'afena ipa', owa'i. Dei' main, ina' andeande'ma apa' amam nematawa Godi monda' waf afambai, owa'i.
49005004	Ipa' ina penda' basef awafi alugufi a basef putuputa'ifi a penda' basef asalufi awafi, owa'i. Waf afambai ina andeande', owa'atin. Andeande'ma ipa' piganifela God.
49005005	Ipa' pegawa ea' ma epes mamahisa sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafii, a epes mamahisa ukup awamiisii kowagalama hiahaom anis daiasii, a epes isimba kowagalasa hiahawes daiasii si'i sagaila god baso'amunai. Epes isimbai ina atiasi sifi'i suwis anamba God naloma Krais magala'ambemagoma, owa'atin.
49005006	Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba peme' basef anis epesi atif solalamona ukup ipe'ipi pefe'ma waf afambai awafi. Dei' main, waf afamba na'ambaifi, God okom numbutinama epes isimba sanda'afi sogosambala basef ananifii.
49005007	Isimba atis dei' ina penda' waf afamba pendao'oma pelomas, owa'. Hapaifi.
49005008	Dei' main, fowa' ipa' ata' pagape waf awafi si'i owamb. Apa' dei' pape sisihipama Dembinai, isimba atis dei' nahaponepa papoma mogogala'i. Ipa' pendafe' si'i epes sogape alip haugumai.
49005009	Epes sagafe' alip haugumaii sawalapai waf fasifi usi'ifi, endilisifi hiafi hi'alaf.
49005010	Ea' ipa' pendondomaf pegawa waf maif Dembinai okom maga'iefi.
49005011	Ipa' ina peloma epes isimba sanda' waf awafi si'i owambi pendao'oma atogon atin, owa'i. Waf afambai wafifi atef, ina fegela gwa'aisi bu'wasi, owa'atin. Ipa' pindihimba'ma epes isimba hiasi waf afambai awafi.
49005012	Dei' main, ae' ina ewalapa basefa waf anamba aunai epes isimba sandambaho' sanda'ami, owa'. Ae' ambal aola iga'iaf atin dowaf wapani.
49005013	Apa' waf mamahefa nagwahis ileliwa mogala' magawalapafi, kofagefa fataga fape fandawalap.
49005014	Dei' main, hiahaom mamahoma mataga alihim mandawalapi, amamba mataga mape si'i mogogala'i. Isimba atis dei' anif basef fapan faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Ipa' epes paga'ihi dei' safel dasa'ma mehip pekwaha koh! Ipa' pesafel wandelef ea' Krais nese'epa mogogala'i mihihima ipa'.”
49005015	Ipa' pape mogogala'i ea'. Ea' ipa' pindundumafuma andeande'ma fe' ipe'ini. Ipa' ina pefe' si'i epes isimba gawa akasi, owa'i. Ipa' pendafe' si'i epes isimba gawaisi.
49005016	Dei' ipa' nogota ata' tapomepa ma penda' waf Godi. Ea' pendanda'af atapif lifilafi nogota ata'e. Dei' main, nimaguf ifi'i sanda' waf awafi atifafi.
49005017	Ea' ipa' dei' ina pepe si'i epes gawa akasi ukup pese'epa, owa'i. Pendegawa andeande'ma okom Dembinaii.
49005018	Ea' ipa' ina pea' embel banagimbeli pehaga pegaol, owa'i. Waf afambai fegahambombaga ipe'i. Ipa' pinda'i aho'ma Ambal bu'unai Godi nondape si'inama opalef ipe'ilifi.
49005019	Ea' pinda'i basef bu'wafi pinda'imef atin pendaloma esis alipisi ma penda' awalef bu'walefi fagape buk sami feloma awalef lotuwilifi feloma awalef fegewa' banaga ambagofa ukup epesi. Ipa' penda' awalef pesa'ma agol Dembinai banagambel malogufi ukup ipe'isi.
49005020	Dondol pendanifela ahamapa Goda hiahaom hiami ma agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi atogol.
49005021	Ipa' pindaila okom Kraisi ea' pendafe' lafela esis alipisi ipe'isi atapipa.
49005022	Ipa' nematawa pindaila ukupa basef amom wauhupipai si'i pagaila okom Dembinaii.
49005023	Dei' main, aman anen nape balaga nagali'ma ako'wi, si'i Krais nagape balaga nagali'ma sios amam nematawa Godi. Ea' esis hiasi si'i alop si'ip ananipi. Epes isimba anen atona nofa'as sotanimai.
49005024	Epes isimba sios safe' lafela Krais, ea' na'amba atin ipa' nematawa wapani, dondol pendape lafela amom wauhupipa ipe'imi.
49005025	Ipa' amam wapani, ukup pindapindaila wauhiamepa ipe'iwai, si'i Krais okom magamagaila sios amam nematawa Godi, naga' nalamona ambal ananili nagaho'ofas.
49005026	Anen nanda'as na'amba sogataga epes Godi atis be'es hilili' si'i nasa'opas embel sagataga bo'wesa basef ananifi.
49005027	Ama nonda'as sogataga bo'wes endilisi sogape ananisi si'isa alogw hiahaom awami akas. Ea' sope hilili' andeande', hiahaom awami hiahaom akas.
49005028	Dei' na'amba atina ipa' amam ukup pindapindaila awo wauhiamepa si'i ukup pagaila alop ipe'ipi atop. Aman ami okom magaila waulu'mana anani'wii, anen okom maila anen wapani. Dei' main, esis sataga atifis.
49005029	Apa' hiapai mogawa ina anona aman atotona nandaiwa'ma alop si'ip ananipi nahap nalamonap, owa'atin. Amam amamba hiami manda' gwa'aisi malagap mumafiap andeande', si'i Krais nugumafi sios amam nematawa Godi.
49005030	Dei' main, apa' epes wa'awa'apa alop ananipi.
49005031	-
49005032	Basef ifi'i fowa' fape fandambahi'i, lu'wafi nomonas hiesifi. Dei' fataga alihif si'i Buk Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Aman nokwaha mamasana ananisi nefe' nope atapina nogaloma waulu'mana anani'wi, esis bias sataga alop atifip.” Ae' okom mandanda' ma'i basef ifimba faga'i Krais atona naloma sios amam nematawa Godi.
49005033	Apa' basef ifimba kofagefa fa'ias na'amba wapani ma ipa' epes atona atin na'amba fa'i, “Ipa' amam hipai hi'ilepa ukup pindapindaila wauhiamepa ipe'iwai si'i ukup pagapagaila ipa' atipa.” Ea' ipa' nematawa hipai wapani pendasa'ma agofa wauhupipa ipe'imi pinifelom pindaila basef amamifi.
49006001	Ipa' awasi, ipa' pindaila basef mamasepa ipe'isii si'i pagaila basef Dembinaii. Waf afambai usi'if andeande'.
49006002	Dei' main, anif basefa mu'uli nape nagali'i Godi basef endilisifi atif fagapaini faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Ipa' pindaila nomonas mamasepa ipe'isi ea' pesa'ma agofas.”
49006003	Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba ma esis sagaila nomonas mamasasi, “Ma ipa' pegape andeande' nogota laota itap apa'e.”
49006004	Ea' ipa' ahapas ina pehambombaga ukup awasi ipe'isi iwanip owa'i. Ipa' pindumafias andeande' piwalipasa basef Dembinaii penandonamasef pisindi'amonas.
49006005	Ipa' agof akipai panda' maol dowaf pagape lafela agufisii, ipa' peme' basefas pefe' lafelas ombal mehepamas. Ipa' penda' maol inimba pila basef asasifi andeande'ma ukup atifip si'i pagaila basef Kraisi.
49006006	Ipa' ina penda'asa naep asasipi dowadowafa pegambema ukup asasipi atip, owa'atin. Pendanda' maol inimba si'i panda' maol pagape lafela Kraisi. Penda'as na'amba atin si'i pagaila okom Godi ma nelelemb ipe'ilimbi.
49006007	Ipa' ukup pehafel endilisi pendanda' maol inimba andeande'. Ina panda' maola epes atis, owa'. Ipa' panda' maola Dembinai atona.
49006008	Dei' main, ipa' pegawa, i'i epen ami nenda' maol andeande', anaf Dembinai notalin noso'an hiahawes bu'wasi. Ea' nonda'as na'amba atina isimba agof akasi sanda' maol dowafi soloma isimba sanda' maol sogofa' otambai.
49006009	Ipa' agufipai pigimafi isimba agof akasi sanda'mepa maol dowafi, ipa' penda'as na'amba atina esis si'i panda'asa Dembinai atona. Ipa' pendkwahowa waf afamba sagaumbalisafi. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa Dembinai nagape heveni anen Dembinai ipe'inai, asasinai wapani. Anen ina nagawaloga agofa epesi ma naep ananipi, owa'atin. Anen nawaloga hiasi agufisi agof akasi hi'alasa ikwaf usi'ifi atef.
49006010	Dei' a'i isopama basef na'amba. Ipa' pagape sisihipama Dambinaii, pendape banagepama anen atona ma banagami lagola pipitagol atogol ananigili.
49006011	Ipa' pendala luwaguf hiami manda' wandafami God nagase'epami, ma pilutu banagepama pigali'amona waf awafi baso'afi Satani.
49006012	Dei' main? Apa' ina manda' wandaf maloma epes, owa'atin. Apa' manda' wandaf mapa' maloma ambagof gambefah awami mape magali'i ea' maloma amom agufumi awami a' amom ensel banagami awami maloma banagami hiami awami hi'alam mugumafi epes sanda' waf awafii itap apa'ii. Apa' mapa' maloma ambagof awami hiami magape la'afena otagai itapi.
49006013	Isimba atis dei' pendawisa luwaguf amamba banagami sanda' wandafami hiami God nagase'epami hi'indalepa. Ama nemaf afamba awefa, ipa' la'ifipama pigalutu banagepa ma pikila' gwamba anamba hianai pegatofana. Ama pikila' waf awafi hi'igalafa pigalutu banagepa atapipa.
49006014	Ipa' pilutu pendawisa luwaguf amamba na'amba. Ipa' pindahapila basef endilisifi usi'ifi si'i anota let ipa' pegewaho'atai. Ea' penda' waf fasifi usi'if hilili'i fepe alihif si'i sagala siaot banagonai sanda' wandafanai kapa nigili'ama mafatagw ipe'igwi.
49006015	Ea' penda' anef waf bu'wafi na'amba. Pendandombola pegewalapa basef bu'wafi Godi na'i epes sope ukup atifip sogalomana. Ipa' pefa' waf afamba banagafi pindalutu banagepa si'i esis sala su sagalutu banages.
49006016	Ipa' pendanda' waf afamba si'i hiahaom amamba sanda' wandafami ea' piwatani anef waf wapani. Pihapifa Krais tatala'ipa si'i pefa' walitap bandagigil panda' wandaf. Walitap anamba banagonai ma nogahagasa wambawa hikalimi hiami hi'igalam magafi'i aman anamba aunai. Wambawa amamba gwamba awani hiani.
49006017	God nofa'ai ipa' pigatanimai. Amamba ipa' ukup pendanda'mam pefa'am si'i pegowalo' hagw kapaigwi banagagwi balagah ipe'igahi. Ea' pindahapila bainat hikalinai Ambal bu'unai Godi nagasi'ipanai, anamba basef Godi atif.
49006018	Ea' lifilafi pendefa' banagami Ambal bu'unai anambai ma penda' beten naninani hiani pegahali' God. Ipa' solawaipa pendabeten pindumafuma datima. Ina pepoma noma'w, owa'. Pendabeten atapipa ma God notopalopa esis amam nematawa ananisi hiasi hi'igalas.
49006019	Ea' pendabetena ae' wapani ma nemaf mamahefa iga'ipasa basef God notopalopa malogol ae'agili ma basef egawalipasafi. Ama etalogofa ombal mogahe egawalipasa basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi fowa' fape fandambahi'i.
49006020	Ae' awalapa basef ifimba, dei' isimba atis mowa' lagof ae'agufi sen ape anda' kalabus. Maol ae'ani inimba. Ae' efa' malagol Kraisi ma egawalapa basef ifimba ananifi ma epes hiasi. Ea' pendabetena Goda ae' egatalogofa ombala banagewe igawalipasef si'i okom Kraisi maga'i.
49006021	Aman anamba Tikikus anen alipunai endilisi ape'inai, apa' ukup paga'ianai. Anen nape sisihinama Dembinai nanda' maol ananini datima. Anen atiasi nofo'o nowalapa basef ni'ipipa ae' dei' ape a'imama.
49006022	Ae' a'i esapa'ana nefe'mago ipa' ma atiasi pegegawa afa' wagape na'aii wape wa'imama ma nogowa' banagaepa.
49006023	Ae' a'i God ahamapa naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais monda'ago opalef ipa' alipipai hipai fepe atogon peloma God. Ea' a'i amom mese'epago waf afamba ukup pagapagailasafi feloma hapif bu'wani wapani.
49006024	Ea' a'i God notopalopepago dowaf nowa' banaga epes isimba mamahisa ukup pagapagaila Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai atapis sagapani. Waf epes isimba ukup pagailanafi afamba fagape atapifi, owa' hi'igalafia. Ea' ma'uf.
50001001	Ae' Pol aloma Timoti afa' biafa Krais Jisasi atofa wanda' maol ananinii. Wanda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' amam nematawa Godi pagape Filipaii. Basef ifimba fafe'ma ipa' pape sisihipa pagaloma Jisasi paloma agufumi ipe'imi maloma amom magatopalopami wapani.
50001002	Afa' biafa wa'i God Ahamapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai Jisas Krais motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banagaepa monda' opalef ipe'ilifi fepe awanelef.
50001003	Nemaf mamahefa ae' okom mandanda' ma ipa', anifela God ae'anai ma ipa'.
50001004	Ae' sonahe ma nemaf mamahefa andabetena ipa' hipai.
50001005	Dei' main, ipa' panda' waf bu'wafi patopalope awalipasa basef bu'wafi Godi. Dambadamba ipa' pame' basef ifimba bu'wafi pahapilif pandala'ata atapipa palome pafi'i pafi'i pataga dei'.
50001006	Ea' ae' egawa endilisi, God nagafela maol bu'wani nomon opalef ipe'ilifii, atiasi nonda'an nefe' nefe' nimbifan afamba Krais Jisas nogotanimai.
50001007	Ae' ahapila ipa' okom ae'ami, egawa God notopalopepa dei' anaf wapani na'amba atin. Isimba andeande'. Dei' main, apa' mandala'atanima atina maol ananini. Nemaf afa'e dei' agape kalabus a'a nimaguf fafimba ali' agawalapa basef ifimba bu'wafi epes hiasi atopalopasa sogogawa basef ifimba endilisifi atif, nimaguf ifimba hiafi God natopalopapa dowaf, nowa' banagapa.
50001008	Ae' a'ias endilisi ma naep Godi. Anen nogawa okom uwahipimi Krais Jisasi masa'ma ae' ea' okom mohafel endilisi maimailipa ma igati ipa' hipai.
50001009	Ae' andabetena ipa' a'i ipa' ukup pila God pindaima atin peloma sahin owan hiasi ma waf afamba fegataga lu'ufa ipa' feloma gawa hiani neloma nomonas bu'wasi pegegawa basef Godi andeande'.
50001010	Andabetena atiasi pewaloga waf hiafi andeande' pegegawa waf mamahefa bu'wafi a'a awafi. Ama nemaf Krais nogafi'afii pegape be'epa hilili' kofagema akepa ma naep Godi.
50001011	Ae' andabetena waf usi'ifi Jisas Krais nagawalapafi atiasi fepe si'ifa ipa', fegaso'ana agol lu'wagili Goda epes hiasi sigati banagami mogogala'i ananimi.
50001012	Alipipai, dei' a'i ipa' pendegawa hiahawes isi'i sagatagama ae'i ma anda' kalabus, ina sasopama basef bu'wafi Godi, owa'atin. Isimba sanda'am mafe' lu'um lu'um a'owa', ma hiasi sogame'am.
50001013	Ea' soldia amamba Romumi misi'ah hiahi mugumafi ipat dembinai gavmani maloma anis epes sagape na'ai esis wapani sogawe anda' kalabusa agol Kraisi.
50001014	Esis sahin owan hiasi ukup papoma ae' anda' kalabus. Ea' opalef asasilifi banagalefa sagape sisihisa Dembinai, sakwaho ombal magahas dei' salutu banages atapis sikila' fowa' sape sagawalapa basef Godi.
50001015	Endilisi, anis daias kowalasa ae' egefa' agol aposel sondopambema sa'i sofa' agof lu'wagufi sogawalapa basef Kraisi. Apa' isimba sagalutu banagasi sa'i sonda' waf bu'wafi sotopalope ma sogawalapa basef bu'wafi.
50001016	Isimba sogawa ae' ape na'a ma egewa' banaga basef bu'wafi Godi. Ea' esis ukup paipaili sawalapa basef bu'wafi.
50001017	Apa' epes isimba kowagalasa ae'i dei' sawalapa basef Kraisi. Esis ina ukup pehafel endilisi ma sanda' maol sogasa'ma agol Kraisi, owa'atin. Esis sanda'am na'amba ma sogasa'ma agof asasigufi atogof. Sa'i sowatani anom nimanimi wapani ma ae' epe atapiwi enda' kalabus.
50001018	-
50001019	Owa' diago. I'i esis ukup pipila waf endilisifi ma sogawalipasa basef Kraisi a'a i'i anis ukup pipila waf owa' endilisifi ma sogawalipasef, andagalamas atin. Dei' main, sawalapa basef Kraisi atif. Ea' atiasi sonehe wapani ma isimba. Ipa' pandabetena ae' ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi Jisas Kraisi natopalope. Isimba atis dei' egawa atiasi ekwaha kalabus.
50001020	Ae' okom mandanda' egawa endilisi atiasi ae' ina ambal aola egakwaha basef Godi, owa'. Dei' wapani ae' okom banagema egawalipasa basef ananifi si'i fowa' anda'as. I'i epe namowe a'a egaga', ae' okom ma'i hiahaom anda'am alop ae'apii atiasi mosa'ma agol Kraisi lu'wagol.
50001021	Kofagema ma agape namowe na'amba. Epe namowe ma Krais atona. Apa' i'i egaga', epe andeande' elomana efa' hiahawes God nese'e poe bu'wani ikila' dei' agape.
50001022	I'i ata' egape namowe atapiwi itap apa'ema, bola enda' maol bu'wani Godi. Apa' ae' ata' ila ufia'w mamaho'wa? Ae' ina egawa'w.
50001023	Ae' okom biafima isimba. Ae' okom ma'i efe' epe eloma Krais. Na'ambai andeande' a'owa' ikila' poe itapani.
50001024	Apa' i'i ae' ata' epe itap apa'e, ae' la'ifiwi ma egatopalopepa. Na'ambai andeande' a'owa' ma ipa'.
50001025	Ae' egawa isimba endilisi. Ea' egawa atiasi ata' epe atapiwi enda' maol elomepa etopalopepa ma pendagala pihapifa Krais pigikila' fowa' pali' pagape.
50001026	Ama nemaf afamba efo'o etaga epe egalomepa, ipa' pendagala ma Krais Jisas a'owa'.
50001027	Dei' fe' ipe'ini nefe' usi'in nindaila basef bu'wafi Kraisi. I'i ae' egafe'mago ipe'ma, a'a i'i egame' basef atifa ipa' ma, ea' hapaimi. A'i ata' egawa ipa' palutu banagepa opaf atotof pendatopalopa atina pegasa'ma esisa sogahapifa basef ifimba bu'wafi
50001028	ma ipa' ina ombal mehepa ma bousi ipe'isi, owa'. Amamba mihimba'mas na'amba. Atiasi esis higililas hi'igalasi, apa' ipa' owa'. Atiasi God nofa'epa pitanimai pegape andeande'i.
50001029	Dei' main, God nase'epa waf fasifi ma penda' maol Kraisi. Anen ina nase'epa waf pagahapifanafi atef, owa'. Anen nase'epa waf afamba pegefa' akafimi wapani ma agol ananigili.
50001030	Fowa' ame' akafimi lu'wami ma agol Kraisi alutu banagewe si'i anda' wandaf. Amamba ipa' patolom pegawam. Ea' dei' pame' ae' ata' anda'am atin atapiwi. Ipa' pepe pendao'oma pelome ma maol Kraisi si'i wandaf afamba.
50002001	Ipa' pefa' banagami Kraisi a'a owa'? Ea' pegawa Krais okom maimailipa nanda' opalef ipe'ilifi fape awanelef a'a owa'? Ipa' pape ukup atifip paloma Ambal bu'unai Godi a'a owa'? Ea' ukup pandaima pandatopalopa atin a'a owa'? Endilisi, waf afambai fapomepa na'amba.
50002002	I'i na'ambaiai, dao' penda' dagala ae'ani nendataga lu'win endilisi ma waf na'ambaifi. Pepe opalef atifilif ukup atifip, pipila God noloma sahin owan ea' pendape opalef atelef endilisi.
50002003	Ipa' ina ukup pepoma ipa' atipa penda' maola anis epes sagasa'ma agof ipe'igufi lu'wagof, owa'i. Ipa' pendafe' lafela anis daias ea' ina pi'i pepe ilifa esis, owa'.
50002004	Ipa' ina ukup pepoma ipa' atipa, owa'. Ukup pindapindaila anis epes daias wapani soloma hiahawes mais esis ukup paga'iasi.
50002005	Ipa' pindahapila nomonas atifis si'i Krais Jisas okom mandanda'mas.
50002006	Anen nape God endilisinai atapina lifilafi, apa' ina okom mandanda' ma'i nohapila waf afambai atapina nope si'i God, owa'atin.
50002007	Anen nowa' alafugama waf afamba ea' dei' nataga epen endilisinai nofa' alop epesi nanda' waf afamba nataga agol akana nanda' maol nape lafela anis epes.
50002008	Esis satolona sati anen nataga epen endilisinai. Ea' nanda' anen nafe' lafela God naloma epes. Naila okom Godi atom nafe' nafe' ma nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
50002009	Ea' waf afamba atef anen nanda'afi dei' God nasa'mana nalota ilif endilisi a'owa'. Ea' naso'ana anagol agol atotogol gikila' agof hiagufi hi'alagof.
50002010	Anen naso'ana agol agalemba Jisasa anaf epes soloma ambagof maim hiasi sagape heveni a itap apa'e ilif awini hi'ilas sindiwa nembawa ma anen sogafela agol ananigili lu'wagol
50002011	sowalapa basef si'if na'amba si'i, “Jisas Krais anen Dembinai.” Sonda'am na'amba sosa'ma agol Ahamana Godi gogalota ilif endilisi.
50002012	Ea' ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa. Fowa' dondol ape agalomepa ipa' paila basef ae'afi. Ea' dei' wapani penda'as na'amba atin. Dei' ape laogon, ipa' penda'as atapis sondafe' a'owa' pikila' fowa' panda'as. God nanda' maol fasini nakwahomepa waf awafi nofa'epa pitanimai. Isimba atis dei' ipa' ombal mondahepa a'owa' penda' maola pigambifa maol inimba anen nanda'mepani.
50002013	Dei' main, anen nanda' maol opalef ipe'ilifi nomon. Anen atona nafela nomonas ipe'isi ma natopalopepa panda' maol si'i anen atona okom maga'ian.
50002014	Hiahawes ipa' pa'i pinda'asi, pekwaha basef dahihianamaefi feloma waf dowamba'ifi, dao' penda'am.
50002015	-
50002016	Penda'as na'amba ma pegape awasi Godi usi'ipa ma basefa waf awafi akepa. Dei' pape paloma epes mini'ap sagape itap apa'i, esis sakwaha waf usi'ifi asanda' waf awafi. Ipa' pape palomas pihimba'masa basef ambal namilifi si'i ondowa ogotawa ilifi ogogala'ma epes. Penda'as na'amba ma nemaf akutaifi Kraisi ae' sowenegahema ipa' ma egegawa ina anda' maol dowadowaf akwaha pepel ae'ani dowaf, owa'atin.
50002017	Ipa' pahapifa God panda' maol ananini, isimba si'i anis hiahawes ipa' pindalali pagaso'anas anini. I'i atiasi sehe ega' sokolo'wa esimbel ae'ambeli si'i anis sondolali sagakolo' ifat sa'utip, ea' hapaimi, ae' sonehe. Aho', ea' atiasi sonehe egaloma ipe'i.
50002018	Ea' na'amba atin ipa' wapani pendagala pelome.
50002019	I'i Dembinai Jisas ni'i aho', a'i atiasi ina nogota laota esapa' Timoti nefe'mago ipa'. Ma notanima nifi'i niga'ipi ipa' pagape andeande'ma sogowa' banagae.
50002020	Timoti anen opaf atof nalome. Okom ananimi malamafe' a'owa' ma nogatopalopepa ma pagahapifana banagepa. Ina anona aman nagape na'ai si'i anen, owa'atin. Anen atona.
50002021	Amom hiami mape magaloma ae'i mundumafi hiahaom amamumi atom ea' ina ukup paipaila mugumafi maol Jisas Kraisi, owa'.
50002022	Apa' Timoti ina si'i amom, owa'. Ipa' pegawa anen aman bu'unai, okom ma'i notopalopepa. Anen natopalope ma wagawalipasa basef bu'wafi Godi si'i awani nagatopalopa ahaman.
50002023	I'i afamba egegawa hiahaom hiami motagame mi'imama, dao' esapa'ana nefe'mago ipa' kwafalis.
50002024	Ae' ape sisihiwi ma Dembinai a'i anen atiasi nonda'me ufia'w ekwaha kalabus egafe'mago ipa'.
50002025	Ae' okom ma'i esapa' Epafroditus nofo'mago ipa'. Anen owame ae'anai. Anen afa' wandao'oma wanda' maol Godi atini walutu banagefama akafimi si'i soldia. Fowa' ipa' pasapa'ana nafi'i natopalope.
50002026	Nembel ananimbili balef a'owa' ma na'i nogatilipa. Ea' anen okom nimanima ipa' pagame' basefa aowas nanda'ana.
50002027	Endilisi fowa' anen awasina na'i noga'. Owa' God nati anen uwahipina. Apa' ina nati anen atotona uwahipina, owa'atin. Nati ae' uwahipiwi wapani. Anen nandaiwa' a'owa' ma opaf nimanifi foso'alowe ma Epafroditus nogaga'.
50002028	Ea' ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma esapa'ana nogafe'mago ipa' ma' petolona pendagala ma opaf ae'afi awanef.
50002029	Ea' ipa' pendagala endilisi pegefa'ana ma agol Dembinaii. Pendasa'ma agofa amam na'ambaimi.
50002030	Dei' main, anen ina okom mandanda' ma nogape namona, owa'atin. Anen okom mohafela maol Kraisi ea' felefele' noga' ma nogatopalope. Anen okom mapome. Dei' main, ipa' papani laogon anen naha'ofepa nanda' isimba.
50003001	Ipa' alipipai, ae' a'i i'i basef ae'afi hi'ilif na'amba. Ipa' sonendahepa ma Dembinai. Ae' ina okom nimanima enda' basef ifimba atif doko' ali' aga'ipasafi, owa'. Ifimba fegala'ambemepa ma amam awami.
50003002	Ipa' solawaipa ma amam amamba manda' waf awafii si'i nombagw alupumii. Amom ma'i mi'ipipa dindinipa mohondo' ukup ipe'ipi pegatopa' alop ipe'ipi ma pigaila mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani.
50003003	God atona nandandepapa mape ananipai. Ambal bu'unai Godi atona dei' manda' lotumana mafela agol Jisas Kraisi atogol. Apa' ina mahapifa waf sagatopa' alopafi fegatopalopapa, owa'atin.
50003004	Anis epes Juda ukup pa'i, “Apa' Juda epes bu'upai manda' waf ape'ifi hiafi andeande' datima si'i magatopa' alopafi.” Apa' owa', ae' ikila'asa waf afambai. Ae' Judaiwai endilisi.
50003005	Dei' main, nemaf afamba ata' sa'owe agape nimaguf 8-pelaif fagale'e amom matopa' alop ae'api. Ae' epen Israeliwai. Ae' wambota Benjamini. Ae' esimbel atembel esis Hibrui. Ae' Farisi, epen agaila mu'uli Godi fowa' nagaso' Mosesani. Ae' aila mu'uli inimba datima ikila' hiasi.
50003006	Ae' okom mohafel banagem a'owa' ma anda' maol Godi. Fowa' anda' maola agaha esis sios amam nematawa Kristen. I'i epes sowaloge ma waf agaila mu'uli inimbafi, ae' kofagema ake.
50003007	Apa' ae' okom mandanda'ma Krais atona ea' a'i hiahaom amamba hiami ali' anda'ami, amamba falafumi atom.
50003008	-
50003009	Ae' ina a'i hiahaom amamba atom, owa'atin. Ae' okom mandanda' ma Jisas Krais atona Dembinai ae'anai ma hiahaom hiami ali' anda'ami. Gawa inimba endilisini nikila'. Ea' ewa' alafugama hiahaom amamba hi'alam a'i falafumi atom si'i alapita. Ahapila Krais atona tatala'ina, ape sisihiwi ma anen. Ae' andaiwa'ma egefa' agol agalemba aman bo'owe hilili'i ma mu'uli esis Juda sagailani, owa'. A'i efa' agol usi'igili ma waf na'ambaifi. Ae' ahapifa Krais dei' God na'i ae' aman bu'uwai hilili'i.
50003010	Ae' a'i egawa Krais endilisi noloma banagami God nasa'mana nogosafelami. Ae' a'i elomana ondao'oma ma waf afamba ogofa' akafimi ma igahapila nomonas atifis isimba si'i anen okom magapomas nemaf afamba nagaga'afi.
50003011	Ae' a'i enda'as na'amba ma anaf God nogosa'me wapani wandof.
50003012	Ae' ina okom mandanda' a'i a' efa' waf afamba Kraisi hi'alaf ape bo'owe hilili', ata' owa'. Dei' ape sisihiwi ahapila waf afambai tatala'if. Dei' main? Anen nofale nandandepe ma egape ananiwai si'iwi.
50003013	Ipa' alipipai, ae' ina a' okom mandanda' a'i efa' waf afambai ea', ata' owa'. Ahapila okom atotom na'amba. Okom mase'e hiahaom hiami fowa'imi maloma hiahawes fowa' sagatagamai ea' dei' anda' maol banagambela egefa' hiahaom anafimi si'i epen nasagih mehipa nigikila'.
50003014	Ae' asagih mehip totol etaga alola egefa' agola waf bu'wafi. Isimba na'amba. Krais Jisas nanda' maol bu'wani natopalope ape sisihiwima anen. Dei' God nofale ma efe' egape lifilafi heven.
50003015	Apa' hiapai mahapila ukup pagataga si'i epes ea' dambesi ma waf bu'wafi, apa' a' ukup pendafe' atifipa basef ifi'i ali' anda'afi. Ama i'i ipa' anis nomonas daiasa, bola God nisindi'amona ukup ipe'ipi wapani.
50003016	Apa' mondape na'amba. Waf bu'wafi mogofa'af ea'i, afamba mondahapilaf sisihif.
50003017	Alipipai, ipa' hipai pindaila waf ae'afi. Ea' pendandepas andeande' epes sagaila waf afa'ifii ma pigailas.
50003018	Nimaguf hiafi a'ipipa basef ifimba ma bousi Kraisi ea'. Dei' na'amba atin a'ipipaef wapani aloma embif fetah naep ae'api. Epes hiasi saila waf awafi ea' sataga bousi ma basef bu'wafi Krais nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
50003019	Ukup asasipi pagapoma alop atona asasinai amamba si'i god asasinai. Esis sa'i esis atis agufisi sandagala ma waf naninani aunai ambagof awagufunai. Ea' ukup pandapoma hiahaom itapami atom. Epes isimba anaf higililas wambel awambili hel.
50003020	Apa' mape amam nematawa ilifapai, wambel ape'imbili heven. Ea' mape mohafa Dembinai Jisas Krais anaf nokwaha heven nisila'i ma nofa'apa mogatambel.
50003021	Anaf nondomba alop ana'e ape'inai a' notaga bo'ona nogala' gambigambis a'owa' si'i alop ananipi. Anen nonda'ama banagami ananimi atom. Banagami amamba nonda' hiahaom hiami mofe' mogape lafela anen atona.
50004001	Dei' ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa a'i itilipa apa' owa', pape laogona ae'. Kofagesa ma andagala, andagalama ipa' atipa si'i agol lu'wagili hiahawes fasisi anaf egefa'asi. Ipa' pindalutu banagepa ma Dembinai si'i basef ali' aga'ipipafi.
50004002	Ipa' nematawa bipa, Yuodia neloma Sintike, ipa' peme'. Ipa' pendataga opalef atelefa Dembinai.
50004003	Ea' dei' ahali' ina' aman alipunai endilisi nanda' maol Godi datimai, a'ipinago nendatopalopago nematawa awamba biawa. Awo atapiwa wandala'ata walome wanda' maol banagambela basef bu'wafi Godi. Ea' Klemen naloma anis daias ae'asi wanda' maol atin Godi, esis wapani sanda' maol salomafa. Agof asasigufi fape nomona buk ambal namili'wi agof epes sogape andeande' lifilafii fagaila'wi.
50004004	Dondol ipa' sonendahepa ma Dembinai. Ae' a'ias wapani, ipa' sonendahepamana.
50004005	Pendanda' waf sa'umbilifi ma epes hiasi sitilipa sogogawa ipa' paila waf bu'wafi afambai. Dei' main, Dembinai felefele' nifi'i.
50004006	Ipa' ina a' nomonas solasefe'ma hiahaom hiami mogatagamipai, owa'i. Ipa' pi'ipanam Goda hiahaom amamba. Pendandabetena anen pinifelona pihali'ana ma hiahaom ipa' ukup paga'iami.
50004007	Ipa' pape sisihipama Krais Jisas, dei' opaf awanifi God nagaso'apafi afikila' gawa hiani epesi hi'agalani fope folomepa fola'ambema opalefi ukup ipe'isi andeande'.
50004008	Alipipai, dei' ae' a'i enda' basef akutaifi ma ipa'. A'i ipa' ukup pendanda'ma anef waf na'amba. Hiahaom mamahoma endilisimi, usi'imi bu'wami moloma hiahaom bu'wami dondo' ma epes siganifelomi, ipa' ukup pendanda'ma amamba.
50004009	Waf hiafi ipa' patelef pame'af agawalipipafi, afamba ipa' pendanda'af lifilafi. Ea' God nagaso'apa opaf awanefii nope nolomepa.
50004010	Endilisi, fowa' ipa' ukup pandanda'ma ae', apa' ipa' ufia'w akepa ma pegatopalope. Apa' dei' pati ufia'wa patopalope pigihimba'me ukup ipe'ipi pagaila ae'. Ea' andagalama Dembinai a'owa'.
50004011	Ae' ina a'ias na'amba a'i ae' hiahawes ake, owa'atin. Dei' main, ae' egawa ea' na'amba. I'i hiahaom mamahoma motagame, hapaimi. Opaf ae'afi awanefa hiahaom amamba.
50004012	Fowa' agape na'amba. Anef nimaguf ape wafiwi, hiahawes ake. Anif nimaguf ahapila hiahawes hiasi. Ae' egawa ea' waf saga' gwa'aisi hiasafi faloma waf nolom magahasafi wapani. Ae' egawa waf afamba biafif sagahapila hiahaom hiami a hiahawes akasafi wapani. Ama nimaguf hiafi anamba hiagoma ape opaf fape awanefa hiahaom hiami na'ambaimi.
50004013	Krais nowa' banagae nase'e pepel. Isimba atis dei' la'ifiwi ma enda' hiahaom hiami hi'igalam.
50004014	Apa' ipa' panda' waf bu'wafi palome pandao'oma ma pegefa' nimanimi ae'ami.
50004015	Ea' ipa' amam nematawa Filipai, ipa' a' pegawa na'amba. Nemaf afamba ae' asefela maol agawalipipa basef bu'wafi Godi ma agakwaha anambel wambel bagape itap lu'upa ipe'ipi Masedonia, ina dei' anis Kristen sios satopalope. Ina anis Kristen sandao'oma salome ma waf afamba sagaso'asa hiahawes dowafi, ata' owa'. Ipa' atipa panda'af na'amba.
50004016	Ae' ali' agape Tesalonaika, ipa' patopalope nimaguf hiafi.
50004017	Apa' dei' ae' ina ahali'ipa ma hiahawes gwa'aisi mais, owa'. Ae' okom ma'i atiasi God nogwa waf bu'wafi ipa' pagatopalope afi nose'epa hiahaom fasimi.
50004018	Uga hiahaom maim ipa' pagasi'iami hiami mikila' ae' okom maga'iami. Hiahaom ipa' panda'am paso' Epafroditus nogofa'ami efa'am ea'. Amamba si'i ofa pindalalima God pagaso'anami alogw gwagami. Ea' ipa' paso'anam God, nofa'am opaf ananifi ambo'of.
50004019	God hiahaom hiamunai atiasi nuwatanimipa hiahaom amamba ipa' akepamami ma lagol Jisas Kraisi atogol.
50004020	God anen Ahamapa ape'inai. Ea' apa' minifelona mondasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.
50004021	Ae' anda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa' hipai amam nematawa Godi pagape sisihipama Krais Jisasi. Amom owape magaloma ae'i mandagala manda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'.
50004022	Ea' amam nematawa hiasi Godi sandagala sanda' nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'. Esis isimba sanda' maol ipat Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi, esis wapani sandagala ma sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'.
50004023	Ae' a'i okom Dembinai Jisas Kraisi naganagaila ape'i ma nagatopalopapa dowafi nope nondalomago ipa' lifilafi. Ea' ma'uf.
51001001	Ae' Pol, okom Godi atom nandandepe aposel anda' maol Krais Jisasi. Ae' aloma owame ae'anai Timoti wape na'a'e.
51001002	Ea' anda'mepago basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' amam nematawa Godi pegape wambel Kolosii, ipa' alipipai pagape sisihipama Kraisi. Afa' biafa wa'i God ahamapa ape'inai notopalopepa dowaf nowa' banagaepa nonda' opalef ipe'ilifi fepe sa'ombel.
51001003	Nemaf mamahefa afa' wandabetena ipa', dondol afa' wanifela God anen Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais Ahamana. Afa' wanifelona ma pagahapifa Krais andeande'.
51001004	Dei' main, afa' wame' basef ea' ma ipa' na'amba. Ipa' pahapifa Krais Jisas ea' ukup ipe'ipi paipaila amam nematawa Godi hiasi hi'agalas.
51001005	Fowa' basef bu'wafi Godi ifimba endilisifi fatagamepa pame'efa hiahaom bu'wami ipe'imi dei' ma'oh magasasaepa heveni pape pegehafami. Hiahaom amamba bu'wami kofagema ma hapif ipe'ini naloma waf afamba ipe'ifi ukup pagapagailasafi.
51001006	Ama ganimba itap hiagoma basef bu'wami amamba mawalapai waf bu'wafi ma epes hiasi mataga lu'um atapim mikila' fowa'. Basef amamba manda'as na'amba atin si'i dambadamba mali' matagama ipa' pagame'am. Nemaf afamba ipa' pali' pegawa endilisi okom Godi nagatopalopepa dowafi, basef amamba mawalapai waf bu'wafi afamba fataga lu'ufa ipa'.
51001007	Ipa' pelafa basef amamba bu'wami, Epafras nagawalipipami a' pegawam. Anen epen bu'unai afa' ukup pagapagailanai nanda' maola Kraisi nalomafa wandao'oma wanda' maol atitini. Anen naha'ofafa nogatopalopa ipa' ea' numafi maol Kraisi andeande' datima.
51001008	Anen na'ipafa basef ifimba ma Ambal bu'unai Godi nanda'epa ukup pagapagaila amam nematawa Godi hiasi.
51001009	Epafras na'ipafa Ambal bu'unai Godi nanda' maol inimba bu'wani ma opalef ipe'ilifi. Ea' afa' biafa wapani wame' basef ifimba. Nemaf fagali'i wame'ef, afamba atef wasafela beten wanda'ana ipa' wafi'i wafi'i wataga dei'. Afa' ina wakwahipa, owa'. Wandabetena God notopalopepa nonda'epa pegape si'ipa ma gawa ananini endilisi. Gawa inimba Ambal bu'unai ananinai nagase'epani.
51001010	Wanda'as na'amba ma atiasi ipa' la'ifipama fe' poe ipe'ini negataga bo'wen endilisi dondo'ma waf Dembinaii. Wanda'mepa betena Anen negati waf ipe'ifi fenda' okom ananimi bo'oma ipa' nondagalaepa. Ama penda' maol naninani hiani bu'wani hi'igalana pegegawana andeande' pigikila' fowa' pali' pegegawana.
51001011	Afa' wanda'mepa beten wapani na'amba. Wa'i God nowa' banagaepa ma banagami ananimi fasimi mogogala' a'owa'i. Ama ipa' atiasi pigalutu banagepama pegefa' nimanimi mamahoma mogatagamepai ma sonogahepa ea' opalef ipe'ilifi ina fesafel a'owa', fepe sa'ombel.
51001012	Ea' ondabetena ipa' ma piganifela Ahamapa. Anen nanda'epa la'ifipa ma pegefa' hiahaom amamba fasimi anen nagandondombama ipe'i. Amamba anaf pefa'am peloma esis amam nematawa ananisi hiasi anamba anen nagala'ambemagon nogogala'ma.
51001013	Anen natagwahepa ea' ma banagami awami magape owamb akoti ea' nahaponapa mafe' mawis nomona maol Nogamanai nope Dembinai nugumafiapa. Nogamana anamba anen okom maga'iana a'owa'i.
51001014	Nogamana ananinai atona natagwahepa ma banagami amamba ma dei' makwaha waf awafi apa' manda'afi magape wahifipa.
51001015	Krais anen ea' na'amba atin endilisi si'i God anamba apa' owa' mogatolonaia. Anen balaga endilisi naomb nagali'ma hiahaom hiami God nanda'ami magape ilif itapi hi'alam maloma hiahaom ambagof fagapaumi maloma epes hiasi hi'alas.
51001016	God nanda' hiahawes isimba hiasi hi'alas sagape ilif itapi sataga sape lagol nogamanai atogol. Anen atona nanda' amom banagami hiami mape magali'i magape la'afena itapi otagai a agufumi dembami maloma amom dembami enseli maloma amom dembami banagami mugumafi ambagufi. Anen nanda' hiahaom amamba maloma epes hiasi dei' apa' magatolomi maloma hiahaom amamba apa' owa' mogatolom naepia. God nanda' hiahaom hiami mataga mape ma lagol nogamanai atogol ea' hiahaom amamba maloma epes hiasi ananimi atom.
51001017	Anen nape nali'ma hiahaom amamba hiami ea' hiahaom amamba mataga banagami ananimi atom nahapilam banagem mape atapim.
51001018	Anen Dembinai nape nali'ma esis sios amam nematawa Godi ea' si'i alop si'ip ananipi. Anen atona kofagonama sios sagape namis atapisi. Anen nali' dambadamba nogosafel wandofi. Ea' dei' anen atona nape nali'ma hiahaom amamba hiami numafiam.
51001019	Dei' main, okom Godi na'i waf faloma gawai banagami ananimi hi'alam mape nogamana atona. Dei' naso'ana amamba hi'alam anen mapomana atapim.
51001020	God nanda' hiahaom amamba hiami magape ilif itapi hi'alam maloma epes hiasi hi'alas wapani sataga be'es sapoma anen. God nanda'as na'amba ma esimbel Kraisi atembel balo nemaf afamba nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai.
51001021	Fowa' ipa' wapani ata' pape laogona God pewa' alafugahana. Ukup ipe'ipi ata' pefalana bounai ma panda' waf awafi.
51001022	Apa' Krais nataga epen nofa' alop epesi sahana naga', amamba atom God nanda'epa pataga alipipai opaf atof palomana ma ga' Nogamanai atin. Nanda'as na'amba ma nofa'epa pifi'mai anen pegape be'epa hilili', kofagema akepa ma naep ananipi.
51001023	Apa' ipa' pindahapifa basef bu'wafi Godi tatala'if atapipa ma pigalutu banagepa endilisi si'i olaf fagali'i fogowa' banaga ipati. Na'amba ukup pese'epama pegegawa endilisi anaf pegefa' hiahaom amamba fasimi basef bu'wafi faga'iami. Basef ifimba pagame'ef ea'i sawalipasafa epes hiasi sagape itapi hi'alas. Basef ifimba ae' Pol ataga aman anda' maola agawalipasafi.
51001024	Dei' ae' andagala ma efa' akafimi egatopalopa ipa' Kristen amam nematawa sios Kraisi, ipa' si'i alop si'ip ananipi. Anom akafimi apa' manda' maol Kraisi mogofa'ami, amamba ata' mape atapim. Dei' a'i imbifa amamba agame'am alop ae'api anda' maol Kraisi. Ae' a'i ewapanimana akafimi amamba ma anda' maol Kraisi.
51001025	Ae' ataga aman anda' maol agatopalopa sios amam nematawa Godi na'amba. God nandandepe dei' ataga aman anda' maol aga'ipipa basef hiafi ananifi hi'agalafi.
51001026	Fowa' nimaguf hiafi basef ifimba fape fandambaho'ma ukup esis misi'ah amam nematawa hiasii. Apa' dei' afataga fandawalap alihifa ukup esis amam nematawa Godi.
51001027	Okom ananimi magape na'amba. Anen na'i nihimba'mapa basef ifimba fasif a'owa' agol lu'wagilifi, fandawalap fatopalopa esis amam nematawa hiasi hi'agalas. Basef ifimba na'amba. Krais nape opalef ipe'ilifi nomona dei' pape pegehafa anaf pefa' mogogala'i ananimi pegalomana.
51001028	Ea' afa' wawalapa basefa Krais wawalipasef epes hiasi hi'alasa wasindi'amonasa gawa hiani naninani bu'wani. Afa' wa'i umbehagumai epes hiasi atona atin hi'ilas sogafe'ma Kraisa sogape epes ananisi endilisi sogape sisihisa anen.
51001029	Ea' dei' maol ae'ani anda'an numa'win a'owa' ma banagami hiami Kraisi manda' maol banagambel atapim nomon opaf ae'afii.
51002001	Ae' a'i ipa' pegawa na'amba. Ae' anda' numa'umi a'owa' ma atopalopepa paloma Laodisia saloma epes isimba hiasi ata' owa' sigati amaga ae'agaia.
51002002	Ae' anda'am ahifima opalef ipe'ilifi fegataga banagalef pegape ukup pindaima atina sahin owan ipe'isi. Ama ipa' pegefa' gawa fasini endilisi negewa' banaga hapif ipe'ini ma pegegawa basef Godi endilisifi atif. Ae' anda' maol inimba ma ipa' pegegawa basef ifimba Godi kofagefa fowa' fandambahi'i fa'i Krais atona.
51002003	Anen atona nanda' gawa bu'wani naloma nomonas fasisi Godi hiasi hi'alas mataga mandawalap alihim. Amamba fowa' mali' mape mandambaho' si'i epes sambe'am ma'oh mandambahi'i sagatalom otamba hiambai, dei' mandawalap alihima lagol Kraisi atogol.
51002004	Ae' a'ipipa basef ifimba. Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba anin epen nembaso'mepa ma basef kikipaifi usiusihifi.
51002005	Endilisi ae' dei' ina ape alomepa, apa' nomonas ae'asi a si'i ape agalomepa andagalama sati ipa' pagalutu banagepa ma pagahapifa Krais andeande'.
51002006	Ipa' pahapifa Krais Jisas ea' pa'i anen Dembinai ipe'inai. Na'amba dei' a' pefe' pendape sisihipama anen.
51002007	Ipa' pindalutu banagepama anen si'i lawag gogotawa banagoga itap ea' si'i ipat tagatoma ilifa olaf banagafi. Ipa' pindahapifif banagepa basef amamba bu'wami pegelafami pikila' fowa' pali' pagahapifam ea' pindanifela God dondol.
51002008	Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba anin epen a' nese'epa basef wafifi a basef gawaifi epes saga'iefi nembaso'mepa nehekelepa ma basef ifimba si'i sola mafis sogafe'ma isalef. Basef ifimba ina fataga Krais, owa'. Ifimba bafasapa ihasapa ape'isi saga'ipapafi fataga waf itapafi atef.
51002009	Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Dei' main, ipa' apegawa waf Godi faloma gawai banagami ananimi hiami hi'alam mape Krais atona atapim, fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga afamba nagape itap apa'e mopaona atapim.
51002010	God nase'epa ambal namili endilisili lapaipa pape sisihipama Krais. Anen dembinai nape nagali'ma ambagof hiami banagami maloma ensel dembami magape la'afena itapi otaga hi'alam.
51002011	Ipa' pandaloma dog palomana. A pape sisihipama anen, pape si'i panda' waf afamba amom Juda magatopa'mama alopafi. Afamba ina waf epes sanda'afa alop atop dowadowaf wafifi, owa'. Krais atona nanda'mepaf natofa waf apifi ma nembel apinai.
51002012	Ipa' pefa' sa'of ea' pandaloma paloma Krais sawepa palomana. Ipa' pahapifa banagami Godi nagasa'ma Krais matmati, isimba atis dei' anen nasa'mipai wapani paloma Krais.
51002013	Fowa' ipa' paga' ea'. Dei' main, ipa' panda' waf naninani aunai ea' ipa' owa' Judaipaia pegelalama mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani. Apa' dei' God nanda'epa pataga namipa paloma Krais ea' makwahomapa waf awafi apa' manda'afi hiafi hi'alaf.
51002014	Basef ifimba ma mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani fagail buki fa'i akafimi apa' mogofa'ama waf ape'ifi faloma anif basef ahififa mogailafi, basef amamba hiami God a' nali'amonam si'i nandolam magail lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai nalamonam hi'alam.
51002015	Lawag agamba anen natalogofa ambagof awami banagami maloma agufumi amamumi dembami magape la'afena itapi otagai mape lafela anen a' owa' banagema. Anen nikila'am ea' nowa'am sisihim nafe' nali'am nafe' amom mafe' magi'mana ea' epes hiasi sakola naep satolom sa'i epes falafumi.
51002016	Na'amba dei' ipa' ina pi'i aho'ma anona aman nosapaga ipa' ni'ipipa anin mu'uli ma waf saga' gwa'aisi embelafi ma anef nemaf lu'wafi sanda' lotuwafi a'a sonda' anis gwa'aisi ma awin dambaini negataga a'a nemaf Sabat sagapoma noma'wafi, owa'i.
51002017	Hiahaom amamba fowa' esis sagailami mondola'waifa hiahaom anaf migi' mogatagai, amamba dei' mataga ea'. Apa' hiahaom endilisimi atom, amamba Krais atona.
51002018	I'i epen mamahina nepe ninifa koh dahembe' ananini ma hiahawes anen nagatilisi a'a nembaso'mas ni'i anin sa'umbelini nagape lafela anis daiasi a'a nenda' lotu ma amom ensel, ipa' ina pi'i aho'ma epen inimba nepa'agaipa ma pegefa' hiahaom fasimi ipe'imi magasasa ipa' ilifi, owa'i. Epes na'ambaisi sasa'ma agof asasigufi lu'wagofa hiahawes sa'oh sandondo'ah sagatilisi ea' ukup papoma esis atis saila waf afamba itapafi.
51002019	Esis ina sahapila Krais sisihina anen nape nagali' endilisima ma ape'i, owa'. Anen balaga numafi gwa'aisi nalaga alop si'ip ea' nanda' gigisilimb mais so'matagw sandahapima atin alop si'ip. Ea' dei' God nanda' alop pataga lu'up banagep.
51002020	Ipa' paga' ea' paloma Krais ma pagakwaha waf awafi hiafi wafifi itapafi. Dei' maina ipa' ata' pailaf pagafe' si'i ipa' epes itapipai? Dei' maina ipa' ata' pagafe' lafela mu'uli na'ambaini? Hapaimi.
51002021	Mu'uli inimba naga'i na'amba na'i, “Ina' owa'i nihapilan, nea'an, newa'an nepe lagofa, hapaini.”
51002022	Mu'uli inimba na'i hiahawes embel gwa'aisi mais apa' maga'asi. Hiahawes isimba apa' ma'as ea' higilalas. Dei' main, mu'uli inimba epes atis ukup pandanda'man sawalapan sawalipa anis.
51002023	Endilisi, mu'uli inimba nataga si'i mu'uli gawa bu'wani nagapaini ea' na'ipapa nasa'mapa na'ipapa banagambel monda' lotu ma amom ensel a moha alop ape'ipi. Apa' owa', mu'uli inimba ina banagena netopalopapa mogatofa waf awafi alopi ma nembel apinai, owa'atin.
51003001	God nasa'ma ipa' ea' pape sisihipama Krais. Isimba atis ipa' ukup pendapoma hiahawes sagape otaga ilifi, anamba Krais nape agilinai felefele'ma lagol kwahisigili Godi.
51003002	Ipa' ukup pendanda'ma hiahawes sagape ilifi atapipa. Hiahawes sagape itapi owa', hapaisi.
51003003	Dei' main, ipa' paga' ea'. Ipa' pape sisihipama God, dei' ambal namili ipe'ili lape landabaho' si'i Krais dei' nape nandambaho'.
51003004	Krais kofagonama ambal namili ape'ilii anaf notaga nondawalap alihigima, ea' ipa' wapani petaga pefa' mogogala'i ananimi pelomana.
51003005	Ipa' pendaha waf anamba awasinai hianai itapanai nelelemb apimi noga', waf anamba na'amba. Waf so'a waulafi a waf alugufi awafi a waf afamba awafi ukup pigahafemafi a ukup pigapiga'i anis maefah anis epesi, waf afambai si'i waf sagaila god baso'amunai.
51003006	Epes sanda' waf afambai hiafi isimba atis dei' okom wandafunai Godi anaf notaga nogwamaf.
51003007	Fowa' ipa' atipa paila waf awafi afambai hiafi pape lafela waf afambai ukup pigahafemafi.
51003008	Apa' dei' ipa' pendakwaha anef waf awasifi hiafi na'ambaifi. Waf migimigahifi a ukup wandafipi a opalef awalifi ma pigaha anis, a waf basef awafi findiwaifi a basef awasifi alugufi.
51003009	Ipa' ina pembaso'ma esis sahin owan, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' apakwaha waf hiafi awafi ma opaf apinai ea', apataga dambaipa. God nanda'epa pataga dambaipa ma opaf namufi.
51003010	Ea' dondol anen nanda'epa pataga dambaipa atapipa ma pegataga na'amba atin si'i anen nagape, anen nanda' opaf afamba namufii. Anen nanda'as na'amba ma ipa' pegegawana endilisi.
51003011	Ea' dei' Krais atona Dembinai nape nagali'ma epes hiasi hi'alas. Esis Griki Juda a anis owa' Judaisia, esis anoga diga, isimba sagail alupi sogololama waf bu'wafi, agufisi a' agof akasi, waf saga'iafa epes na'ambaisi falafifi atef. Krais atona Dembinai nape nali'ma epes isimba hiasi hi'alas, nape nomona epes sasisasi hi'alas.
51003012	God anen nandandepepa ea' pape amam nematawa ananipai okom maimailipa a'owa'. Ea' ipa' pendanda' waf bu'wafi na'amba. Ipa' pinda'i epes hiasi uwahipis atapipa petopalopas penda'as andeande'. Ipa' petalogofa ipa' pepe lafela anis daias, penda' waf sa'umbilifi ma esis ea' pepe pititi esis sonda'mepa waf fafifafi awafi ipa' ma tol pegape opalef awanelef.
51003013	I'i anin epen ipe'ini sahoman nenda'man waf awafi, ina a' negwamanaf waf awafi anen nanda'manafi, owa'i. Nenda'an sa'ombeman nekwahomana waf awafi ananifi okom mese'enaf. Dembinai a' nakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi ea'. Ea' ipa' wapani penda'as na'amba atin.
51003014	Ipa' penda' waf afambai bu'wafi hiafi ali' aga'ipipafi pindailaf. Ea' penda' anef waf bu'wafi wapani. Ipa' ukup pindaila sahin owan ipe'isi ma waf afamba fakolasepa fanda'epa pagataga atifipai.
51003015	Krais naso'apa opaf awanafi apa' ea' opaf afamba atof fondomafia nelelemb ipe'ilimbi endilisi. God nofalepa pataga alop atifipa pegape opalef awanelef. Ipa' pindanifelona dondol.
51003016	Basef Kraisi fasif a'owa' fendape endilisi opalef ipe'ilifi nomon. Ipa' penda'as na'amba piwalipa esis sahin owan ipe'isi pisindi'amonasa gawa hiani naninani. Ipa' pendanifela Goda opalef ipe'ilifi pendagalamana. Ea' penda' awalef fagail sami ea' penda' awalef lotuwilifi a awalef fegewa' banaga ambagof ipe'igufii.
51003017	Hiahawes mamahisa ipa' atiasi piga'iasa basefi o penda' maolasi, isimba ipa' pendanda'asa agol Jisasi. Ama agol ananigil ipa' pendanifela God ahamapa.
51003018	Ipa' nematawa, ipa' pefe' lafela wauhupipa ipe'imi. Waf afambai dondo'ma ipa' Kristen pinda'afi.
51003019	Ipa' amam wapani, ipa' ukup pindapindaila wauhiamepa ipe'iwai. Ipa' owa'i penda' opalef awaulifi nimanilifa.
51003020	Ipa' batawisas wapani, pendame' basef mamasipai andeande'ma waf a basef asasifi hiafi hi'indalaf. Waf afambai fenda' okom Dembinai bo'om.
51003021	Ipa' ahapas, owa'i penda' opalef batawisipai nimanilif ukup numbutipa. Na'amba ukup asasipi iwanip.
51003022	Ipa' agof akipai pagape lafela anis epes panda' maolasi, pindaila basef ifimba hiafi agufisii. Na'amba penda' maola naep asasipi atip piga'i'ipas, owa'. Ipa' ombal mehepa ma Dembinai, dei' opalef ipe'ilifi fendape usi'ilifa maol inimba penda'an andeande'.
51003023	Ea' hiahaom mamahoma ipa' pinda'ami, amamba pendanda'am banagambel si'i panda' maola Dembinai atona. Ipa' ina panda' maola epes atis, owa'.
51003024	Dei' main, ipa' pegawa ea', anaf Dembinai nofalo'mepa nese'epa hiahaom fasimi ipa'. Amamba anen nandandepam ea' ma'oh masasa ipa' epes ananipai. Ipa' pape panda' maola Krais, Dembinai ape'inai.
51003025	Epen mamahina nanda' waf awafii anin anaf nefa' akafimi awami mondahama waf anin nanda'afi. Dei' main, God nawawaloga epes hiasi agufisi agof akasi hi'alasa ikwaf usi'ifi atetef.
51004001	Ipa' agufipai ma esis agof akasi sanda' maolipai, ipa' pendanda' waf bu'wafi hilili'ma esis. Ipa' pegawa Dembinai ipe'inai nape otaga ilif.
51004002	Ipa' pendabeten atapipa. Beten ipe'ini, ipa' ukup kilikala' pendape andeande' pendanifela God.
51004003	Ipa' pendabeten pihali' Goda nogatopalopafa wapani na'amba. Anen nusi'mafa uta afa' ma ogowalapa basef ananifi. Ama ogawalapa basef ifimba Kraisi fowa' fape fandambahi'i. Isimba atis dei' ae' ape kalabus.
51004004	Ipa' pendandabetena atiasi ae' egawalapa basef ifimba fandambahi'i fegataga alihif si'i okom Godi na'i ae' enda'am.
51004005	Esis sagape ando'a Kraisi, ipa' nomonas sondape andeande'ma fe' ipe'ini. Nimaguf mamahifa ufia'w kwogala ipa' piga'ipasa basef Kraisi, dao' pinda'ipasef.
51004006	Basef ipe'ifi dondol fendataga usihif fasifa pegagwa basefa epes hiasi hi'igalas dondo'ma hiahawes mais ukup asasipi pandanda'masi.
51004007	Tikikus anen sahomapa ape'inai endilisi ae' okom magamagailanai nanda' maol Dembinai datimai ae' alomana wandao'oma wanda'ani. Anen atiasi nefe'mago ipa' nowalapa basef ni'ipipaefa ae' dei' ape a'imama.
51004008	Ae' asapa'ana nafe'mago ipa' ma pegegawa afa' wape wa'imama ma nogowa' banaga opalef ipe'ilifi.
51004009	Anen no'wa Onesimus mefe'mago ipa', anen owamapa nagahapifanai afa' ukup pagapagailanai nanda' maol Godi datimai. Anen nape mini'ap ipe'ipi. Atiasi amom biam mi'ipipago hiahawes hiasi sagataga na'ai.
51004010	Aristarkus anen nanda' kalabus nalome, anen wapani na'iago nemaf fasifi ma ipa'. Ea' Mak wapani, nandataga Barnabasi, nanda'mepago nemaf fasifi ma ipa' wapani. I'i nogatagama ipa' ma, dao' ipa' okwanago si'i ae' aga'ipipago ea'.
51004011	Ea' Jisas agol wa'agol Justus, anen wapani nanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'. Ama mini'ap Judai, amom atom manda' maol malome ma wigihimba'ma hiasi sogawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafias. Amom matopalope ma maol inimba.
51004012	Epafras anen nandagala nanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'. Anen wapani mini'ap ipe'ipi, nanda' maol Krais Jisasi nogape lafelanai. Dondol nandabeten banagambela ipa'. Anen nandabetena God nonda' ipa' pigalutu banagepa si'i epes dembipai pegegawa God andeande'i ma pihapifif tatala'if pegaila okom Godi atapipa.
51004013	Ae' atowe egawa anen, na'amba dei' awalapana a'i anen nanda' maol numa'uni endilisi ma nagatopalopa ipa' paloma esis amam nematawa walemb ambalemba bialemb Laodisiai Hierapolis.
51004014	Luk dokta epen ape'inai ukup pagapagailanai, anen naloma Demas amom manda'ago nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'.
51004015	Ipa' pese'aso dagala ma nemaf bu'wafi ae'afi ma esis alipisi sagape Laodisiai. Ea' penda'masago nemaf bu'wafi ma Nimfa kolomago esis Kristen sios sandakolas ipat ako'utai.
51004016	Ipa' pitalifa basef ifi'i ma ea' pesapa'ef fefe'mago esis Kristen sios sagape Laodisiai, ma esis wapani sitilif soga'if. Ea' basef ifimba ae' asapa'ef fagafe' ma esis Laodisiai, wapani, ifimba ipa' pitilif pi'if.
51004017	Ea' ipa' pi'ipago Arkipus na'amba pi'i, “Ina' nimafi maol inimba negefa'an ea' ma Dembinai andeande' nimbifan.”
51004018	Dei' ae' Pol ahapila pen lagol ae'agili atogol anda'mepago basef ifimba bandafi atif. Dei' anda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa' hipai. Ipa' ukup pendanda' pendapoma ae' amom mowa'e sen ata' ape kalabus atapiwi. Ae' a'i okom lu'unai Godi notopalopago ipa' dowaf numafipago nope nolomago ipa'. Ea' ma'uf.
52001001	Ae' Pol aloma Sailas Timoti wape na'a'e. Ea' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' Kristen pagape wambel Tesalonaikai. Ipa' pape paloma God ahamapa ape'inai naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais. Ipa' Kristen pape paloma amom ea' amamipai si'ipa. Afa' wa'i atiasi God notopalopago ipa' dowafa opalef ipe'ilifi fegape awanelef.
52001002	Nimaguf hiafi danda afa' wanifela God lifilafi ma ipa'. Ea' wa'i agof ipe'igufi wanda' betenepa.
52001003	Afa' ina ala'uta tahafa ma waga'ipa God ahamapa ape'inai ma hapif ipe'ini nigafilai waf fasifi ma ipa' owa'. Fowa' ipa' paso' nelelemba God naloma anis daias wapani. Ea' dei' panda' maol numa'wini. Ipa' ukup pape banagepa pehafa Dembinai Jisas Krais. Ea' wandabeten nimaguf danda ma ipa'.
52001004	Ipa' Kristen alipipai, God nase'epa nembel ipa'. Ea' afa' ogawa anen nosahe'epa ea' ananipai si'ipa.
52001005	Basef ifimba bu'wafi Godi fowa' ogofa'afii, ifimba ina fataga ma ipa' dowaf si'i anif basef wafifi, owa'atin. Ambal bu'unai Godi nowa' banaga basef ifimba ma banagami ananimi ea' wafi'i wa'ipipaef. Ea' fanda' ukup ipe'ipi banagep pahapifana banagepa. Waf fowa' wape walomepa wanda'afi, ipa' pegawaf.
52001006	Isimba atis dei' pegawaf apaila Dembinai. Hiahaom akafimi matagamepa, apa' owa' pefa' basef Godi, ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'mai opalef ipe'ilifi, andagalaepa.
52001007	Ea' pihimba'masa waf fasifi isimba hiasi anis amam nematawa sagahapifa Kraisi sagape itap apamba biefip lu'wagoma Masedoniai Akaia.
52001008	Basef Dembinaii ipa' paga'ipasafi fegal fa'i fafe' si'i wata ta'i tagafe' mehip. Ina fafe' Masedoniai Akaia atogon, owa'atin. Anamba hiagoma esis same' basefa ipa' pagahapifa God. Afa' ina wa'ipa epes isimba, owa'. Ipa' pali' paso' opalefa God andeande'.
52001009	Dei' esis atis sa'i basefa ipa' pandagala pa'i nemaf bu'wafi ma afa' ea' pame' basef afa'ifi fowa' afa' wanofa wagafe'mago ipa'. Esis sa'i ipa' apakwaha hiahaom amamba ambagof awami fowa' ipa' panda' lotumami. Ea' pambema opalef pafe'ma God. Ea' dei' panda' maola God endilisinai, owa' nogaga'ia, nagape atapinai.
52001010	Ea' esis sa'i ipa' pape pehafa Nogamana ananinai anaf nokwaha heven notanima nogafi'i. Anen Jisas, fowa' naga' God nafelanai wapani. Owagama God okom a' numbutinama epes ami sanda' waf awafii. Owa' dei' Jisas nelefatapa ea' ma okom anamba aunai.
52002001	Alipipai, ipa' pegawa ea', fowa' afa' wagafe'mago ipe'i, maol inimba afa' wanda'ani ina nenalo, owa'atin.
52002002	Fowa' wagali' wafe' wambel ambalemba Filipai ea' sanda'afa aofa alop afa'inai, wame' akafimi endilisi. Ipa' pegawa ea'. Owa' God afa'inai nowa' banaga nelelemb afa'ilimbi. Ea' afa' ina ombal mahafa wandafa'ma esis bousi, owa'atin. Afa' banagefa wafo'o wawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi ma ipa'.
52002003	Basef kofagefa waga'ipipafi ina wa'i onda' waf awafi ma ipa', owa'. Afa' ina waila basef ifimba putuputa'afi baso'afi wa'ipipaef, owa'atin.
52002004	God atona nagwambafa natolofa wape hilili' ea' naso'afa maol afa' ma ogowalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi. Ea' ifimba atif dei' wawalapef. Afa' ina wanda' maola epes siganifela maol afa'ini, owa'. Wanda' opeha God atona sonogahana ma maol ananini, anen atona nawalogafa nogawafa.
52002005	Ipa' pegawa basef waga'ipipafi afa' ina wa'i'ipipa, owa'atin endilisi. God natolofa nogawafa ea' afa' ina wanda' maol wambaho' basefa waf kowagalasafi, owa'atin.
52002006	Afa' ina wanda' opeha epes sogasa'ma agofafa, o anis daias o ipa' wapani piganifelofa, owa'atin.
52002007	Afa' wape aposel Kraisi endilisi. Anen nasapa'afa ma onda' maol ananini. Ea' dei' wi'i aho'ai, a' wi'ipipa dindinipa pegaso'afa anis hiahawes gwa'aisi mais. Apa' owa'atin. Nogota tatumba wape wagalomepa afa' wanda' waf nimanis endilisi ma ipa', si'i ano'w nemata'w kugumafi awasi akwa'usi andeande'.
52002008	Afa' ukup paipailipa a'owa'. Ea' wase'epa basef bu'wafi Godi. Ina wa'ipipa basef atif, owa'atin. Wase'epa opalef a'owa'. Ea' wanda'as dumbuli dombola oga' ogatopalopepa.
52002009	Endilisi atis ipa' alipipai pegawa isimba, afa' wanda' maol banagambela wagawalapa basef bu'wafi Godi ma ipa'. Ea' wanda' maol wapani umafi alop afa'ipi ma gwa'aisi mais. Wanda' maol owamb alipa ina opoma ipa' atipa ma ogofa' gwa'aisi maisa ipa', owa'.
52002010	Ipa' patilis pegawas ea' God wapani natilis nogawa ea' waf wanda'afa ipa' pagahapifa Kraisi. Waf afamba afa'ifi bu'wafi usi'ifi, ina' awafi, owa'.
52002011	Ipa' pegawa waf afamba si'i ahamas nanda'masaf awasi ananisi, ea' na'amba atin si'i afa' wanda'mepaf ipa' atona atin. Afa' wasa'ma wawalapefa nomonas ipe'isi, owa banagaipa.
52002012	Wa'ipipaef na'amba ma ipa' penda' waf fegafe' andeande'ma God nitilipa noganifelipa. Ea' nofalepa pafi'i piwis pegalomana anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma hiahaom ananimi atumi mogogala'ma.
52002013	Fowa' ipa' pefa' basef Godi malogof afa'igufi, ea' pahapifif. Basef ifimba ina pefa'ef si'i basef epesi atif, owa'atin. Pefa' basef ifimba endilisifi Godi. Ea' basef ifimba fatopalopa opalef ipe'ilifi, dei' paila waf bu'wafi. Ea' afa' wanifela God dondola ipa' pefa' basef ananifi pagahapifana andeande'.
52002014	Ipa' Kristen alipipai, pame' akafimi na'amba atin si'i esis sagahapifa basef Godi sagape itap lu'upa Judiai. Esis sahapifa Jisas Krais, ea' amam nematawa Godi. Isimba atis dei' esis Juda saso'as akafimi anisa alop asasipi na'amba atin si'i ipa' wambel atembel sagase'epa akafimi.
52002015	Esis Juda saha Dembinai Jisas naloma amom profet maga' ea' sanda' wandaf banagef sali'amonafa. Sogosambala waf God okom maga'iefi sahambombaga epes hiasi.
