52002016	Ea' sasopama ufia'wa afa' uga'ipas basef Godi esis sogololama anini ma nowambilasi sotanimai sogape andeande'. Esis Juda sanda'as na'amba dei' sowatani waf awafi asasifi atapif fataga lu'uf a'owa'. Fowa' God natitilis dowaf apa' dei' okom wandafunai ananinai nafi'i natagamas nemaf akutaifi nonda'as awes lamonas.
52002017	Ipa' Kristen alipipai, esis Juda sali'amonafa nogota bandata ma wagape si'i awasi mamasas akasi. Endilisi afa' ina wati amagahipama, apa' ukup afa'ipi pape palomepa. Isimba atis dei' wanda' maol banagambel a'owa' ma uti ano'w ufia'wa ofo'o ugati amagahipama. Afa' ukup paipailipa a'owa' ma ugatilipa.
52002018	Ea' dei' wa'i ofe'mago ipa'. Ae' Pol anda'as nimaguf hiafi a'i efo'o, owa' Satan nahefamafa ufia'w.
52002019	-
52002020	Anaf Dembinai ape'inai nugafi'i wapani, dao' apa' mulutu nogohnaep ananisi. Afamba afa' ukup be'ep pepoma main? Ea' ondagala ma hiahawes mais fasisi? Owa'atin. Nemaf afamba afa' ondagalama ipa' atipa. Afamba afa' hiapai mofe' mope mogalomana.
52003001	-
52003002	Afa' dei' ina wame' anif basefa ipa' pape pa'imama, ata' owa'atin. Dei' wandaiwa'ma ata' ogape nogota laota na'a'e. Ea' wa'i afa' atofa biafa ope na'a wambel lu'wambili Atens, ea' wasapa' owamafa afa'inai Timoti wanda' maol atin Godi nofo'o ma niga'ipasa basef bu'wafi Kraisi. Wasapa'ana nafo'o nowa banagaipa notopalopepa ma pigahapifana banagepa.
52003003	Na'amba atiasi anipa pendafa'ma hiahaom amamba akafimi lu'wami, ea' pewa alafugaha God. Ipa' pegawa ea', God atona nandandepapa ma mogofa' hiahaom amamba akafimi.
52003004	Aho', fowa' afa' wape wagalomepa, wa'ipipa wa'i, “Anaf afa' ofa akafimi.” Ea' isimba dei' satagamafa si'i fowa' wa'ipipa pegegawas.
52003005	Ae' ina ata' epe esasa wapani, owa'. A'i a' efo'o. Ea' asapa' anona amana nafo'o nogogawa hapif ipe'ini ma nogatopalopepa. Na'amba aman anamba aunai Satan nanda' kikipai ni'i'ipipa ma waf awafi, ea' maol afa' wanda'ani nenalo dowaf.
52003006	Timoti nakwahepa ea' dei' atef nafi'mai afa', nawalapa basef fasifi ma afa'. Na'ipafa ma ipa' pahapifa Kraisa ukup pagapagaila anis epes daias. Ea' na'i ipa' pa'i petolofa, afa' wapani wa'i utilipa.
52003007	Ipa' Kristen alipipai afa'ipai, afa' wame' basef ifimba ogawa ipa' pahapilif pape. Ea' sonahafa ma ipa', wame' ipa' pahapifana pagape. Isimba atis sowa' banagafa ma nimanimi hiami ogofa'ami.
52003008	I'i ipa' pepe banagepama Dembinai, afa' wapani ope ondagala ambal namili endilisi.
52003009	Afa' sonahafa endilisi ma naep God afa'inai. Ipa' pahapifana la'ifipa. Ea' afa' wanifela Goda dagala nagaso'afani.
52003010	Dondol owamb alip afa' wanda' betenepa dindinipa wa'i ugati amagahipama ogogawa ipa' pahapifana banagepa a'a owa'? Afa' wa'i ofo'o ma ogatopalopepa pegaso'ana opalef God banagambela pegape andeande'.
52003011	Afa' wandabeten wahali' ahamafa afa'inai God naloma Dembinai Jisasa monda' ufia'w kogal motopalopafa ogafe'mago ipa'.
52003012	Afa' wa'i Dembinai notopalopepa ma waf afamba pendasoso'ama opalef ipe'ilifi hi'indalalef ea' pese'asalef esis hiasi wapani, waf afamba a' fendataga lu'wifa ipa', si'i afa' wali' wagase'epa nelelemb.
52003013	Wa'i ipa' penda' waf afambai ma God nogowa' banaga opalef ipe'ilifi. Ama anaf Dembinai ape'inai netambel nifi'i nogalumai esis hiasi sagahapifanai sagape hilili'i ma ipa' pegape be'epa hilili' diga basef akepa ma naep Godi ahamapa ape'inai.
52004001	Alipipai, fowa' afa' wa'ipipa wihimba'mepa waf ipa' pepe pefe' andeande' ma pigailafi, si'i God okom maga'iefi. Fowa' pailaf dei' wapani pilaf atapif. Ea' afa' wahali'ipa wasa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma agol Dembinai Jisasa pilaf penda'af fefe' atin fetaga lu'uf.
52004002	Ipa' pegawa basef ifimba wagawalapefa ipe'i ma agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas.
52004003	Okom Godi na'amba. Ipa' amam nematawa pepe be'epa hilili' ananipai atipa ma pindihi'ama waf afamba so'a waulafi.
52004004	Ipa' amam hipai, nemaf mamahefa pa'i pegaso' nematawa pila waf God naga'iefi pendaso'ama andeande' pepe hilili'. Nomonas sopaipa pimafi alop ipe'ipi andeande' datima ma waf awafi so'a waulafi akepa.
52004005	Waf afamba na'amba. Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi owa'i usihilimba waf awafi sanda' so'a waulafia, si'i isimba sogololama God sanda'afi, owa'i. Hapaifi.
52004006	Ea' ipa' amam ina a' penda' waf awafi ma esis sahin owan ipe'isi pefa' nematawa anom amami, owa'i. Dembinai okom wandafunai nagapomasi epes isimbai sanda' waf afambai ma na'i nogagwamasa waf afamba awafi esis sanda'afi. Fowa' afa' wawalapa isimba alihis wa'ipipas dindinip.
52004007	Dembinai God ina nofalapa ma monda' waf afamba awafi, owa'atin. Anen nofalapa ma mugaila waf fasifi hilili'i.
52004008	Basef Godi fa'i apa' ina monda' waf so'a waulafi, owa'atin. Ea' epes mamahisa sogowa' alafugaha basef ifimbai, ina sowa' alafugaha epes atis, owa'atin. Sowa' alafugaha God wapani. God atona nase'epa Ambal bu'unai ananinai.
52004009	Dei' afa' ina ata' onda' anif basefa ipa' ma waf afamba ipa' ukup pigapigaila esis hiasi sahin owanasafi, owa'atin. God nawalipipa hi'alepa ma waf afambai.
52004010	Ipa' pagaso'asa opalef esis sahin owani anamba itap lu'upa Masedoniai. Ipa' alipipai, afa' wa'ipipa dindinip wa'i, ipa' ukup pipila esis sahin owan isimba penda' waf afambai fetaga fefe' banagef.
52004011	Ipa' nomonas solasefe' banagesa pegape sa'ombel pigimafi hiahawes ipe'isi andeande'. Penda' maol lagof ipe'igufi si'i fowa' waga'ipipa.
52004012	Penda'as na'amba ma pegafe' andeande' naep esis isimba owa' ata' sombema nelelemb sogataga Kristenia. Ea' penda'as na'amba ma ina waowaola anis hiahawes, owa'atin endilisi.
52004013	Ipa' sahin owan, afa' wa'i ipa' pegawa andeande'ma amam nematawa isimba sagaga'i. Na'amba nelelemb ipe'ilimbi ukup pipilas pelopas si'i isimba sogololama hapifi sanda'am. Esis owa' sogawa ma sope sogasasa nemaf afamba anaf sotambel sogosafel wapani wandelefafia.
52004014	Apa' mahapifa Jisas, anen naga' sawana ea' notanima nosafel. Isimba atis dei' mogawa mahapifa Goda anaf nowambilai esis Kristen isimba sagahapifana endilisi ma sagaga'i sosafel wapani sufi'i sogalomai Jisas.
52004015	Afa' wawalapa basef Dembinaii atifa ipa' na'amba. Anaf Dembinai notanima nugafi'i, apa' amam nematawa ata' magape itapi ambagof ata' fagapaipai, apa' ina atiasi muli' mofe'ma esis isimba sagaga'i, owa'atin.
52004016	Dembinai nifi'i ni'i dindinip a'owa' ea' ensel Dembinai noga ni'i basef banagafi mehip, nufapula alof lu'unai Godi nonda'am nogal mehip. Nogota atamba Dembinai nokwaha heven nisila'i. Ea' sagahapifa Kraisi fowa' sali' sagaga'i, atiasi sili' sosafel.
52004017	Ama main owa', nemaf afamba atef Dembinai nofa'apa amam nematawa ambagof fagapaipai molota otaga ilif moloma amam nematawa isimba muti Dembinai. Ea' apa' hiapai mope molomana dondol lifilafi.
52004018	Isimba atis dei' pendewa' banagama atina nelelemb ipe'ilimbi ma basef ifimba.
52005001	Ipa' amam nematawa afa'ipai alipipai, afa' ina onda' anif basef laufi ma uga'ipipa nemaf afamba hiahawes isimba sogataga, owa'atin.
52005002	Ipa' pegawa ea' nemaf afamba Dembinai nigafi'afii. Anen nogafi'i nifi'i si'i epen nanda' wali nagafi'i owamba pa'oh pegelelamana.
52005003	Atiasi anis amam nematawa si'ias si'i, “Ea' dei' a' nemaf bu'wafi ma tol mogape andeande'.” Esis owa' si'ias na'amba owa', nogota atamba atota hiahaom mogahambombaga alop asasipii motagamas kwafalis atis, si'i nemata'w kwagame' akepa kogola batawin. Ea' esis ina atiasi sindihi'ama hiahaom amamba, owa'atin.
52005004	Apa' ipa' alipipai, ina ata' pagape owamb akuti si'i isimba sogololama Dembinaii, owa'. Ipa' ina bombolalasipa ma nemaf afamba fegataga si'i bombolagalasipa ma aman nanda' wali nagafi'i, owa'atin.
52005005	Ipa' epes hipai pagape lagala alipi. Ina si'i epes sagape owamb akuti, owa'atin.
52005006	Ea' ipa' ina penda'as si'i isimba anis ukup paso'as sa'oh sogololai, owa'atin. Andeande'ma apa' ukup talambi mope naep pegetawa.
52005007	Apa' mogawa esis isimba saga'ihi esis sa'oh owamb atomb. Ea' isimba sa' embela sahaga sagagauli sanda'am owamb atona.
52005008	Apa' mape si'i epes sagape alipi, nomonas sondapaepa mumafi alop andeande'. Apa' mofa' waf afamba mogahapifana banagepa ma mogaso'as opalef anis, si'i sanda' wandafi sofa' walitah sanda' wandafa magahagasa wambawa. Apa' mogawa basef amamba owagama God nofa'apa mogotanimai. Ukup pendanda' ma basef amamba si'i mogowalo' anota hat banagitai tigili'ama balagah.
52005009	Dembinai God ina nosaho'apa ma mogofa' okom wandafunai ananinai nogahambombagapa, owa'atin. Anen nosaho'apa ma Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai nowambelapa mogotanimai.
52005010	Fowa' anen naga' ma nogatopalopapa, i'i nemaf afamba anen nogotanimai mope ambagof fopaepa a'a moga', mofe' mope namepa molomana.
52005011	Dei' ipa' hipai pewa' banaga nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pendatopalopa atin si'i dei' pape panda'as.
52005012	Ipa' Kristen alipipai afa'ipai, afa' wa'ipipa na'amba, wa'i amom agufumi mugumafi esis Kristeni, anom manda' maol numa'wini malomepa matopalopepa. Ipa' pendafe' lafela amom. Dembinai nanda'am mape agufumi ipe'imi ma mogawa monda' nomonas ipe'isi usi'is.
52005013	Ipa' ukup pepoma maol amamini, ea' ukup pipilam be'ep pepomam endilisi. Ea' ukup atifip pindaima atin peloma esis sahin owan.
52005014	Ipa' Kristen alipipai afa'ipai, afa' wa'ipipago dindinip wasa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma pegatopalopago isimba ala'uta nagahasi banagambel pi'ipasa sokwahago waf ala'uta nagahasanai. Ea' anis ambagof fondola'asi ma owa' siga'i anif basefia, ipa' pewa' banagasa siga'i anif basef. Ea' pewa' banaga anis owa' sogahapifana banagesia. Penda' waf sa'umbilifi ma esis hiasi.
52005015	Na'amba ipa' pegwamasa waf awafi anis epes sanda'mepaf ipe'i, owa'i. Dondol pilutu banagepa ma waf bu'wafi atef, pendanda'maf atin. Ea' penda'masaf isimba anis hiasi wapani.
52005016	Ipa' pendagala lifilafi.
52005017	Pendabeten pihali' God dondol owamb alip.
52005018	Ipa' pinifelona hiahawes hiasi. Ipa' pagape sisihipama Krais Jisasi, God na'i ipa' penda' waf fasifi pinifelonama hiahawes hiasi.
52005019	Ipa' ina pipihi' nif ifimba ma maol Ambal bu'unai Godi nanda'ani, owa'i.
52005020	Ipa' ina pewa' alafugaha basef Godi Ambal bu'unai nasa'mas saga'ipipafi, owa'i.
52005021	Pewaloga basef hiafi, ma pihapila basef fasifi atif tatala'if.
52005022	Ea' pindihi'ama hiahaom awami mamimami hiami.
52005023	God anen kofagonama nomonas awanisi. Ae' a'i anen atona nonda'epa pepe be'epa hilili' ananipai atipa. A'i anen numafi ambagof foloma alop nomonas ipe'isi andeande'ma waf awafi akepa, pegape hilili' ma nemaf afamba Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nogotanimafii.
52005024	God nogofalipai, andeande' a'owa'. Basef feloma maol main na'ias ea' ma nonda'asi, atiasi anen nonda'as endilisi andeande' datimai.
52005025	Ipa' Kristen alipipai, pendanda' betena God nogatopalopafa.
52005026	Ipa' pendaso'ama lagof pendanda'ma nemaf bu'wafi peloma esis Kristen alipisi hiasi.
52005027	Ae' a'ipipa dindinipa agol Dembinaii, ipa' pi'i basef ifimba ma esis Kristen alipisi hiasi.
52005028	Afa' waga'ias na'amba wa'i, Jisas Krais notopalopepa dowaf nowa' banagaipago. Ea' ma'uf.
53001001	Ae' Pol aloma Sailasi Timoti wape na'a'e. Ea' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' Kristen pagape wambel Tesalonaikai. Ipa' pape paloma God ahamapa ape'inai naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais. Ipa' Kristen pape palomam ea' amamipai si'ipa.
53001002	Ae' a'i ahamapa God noloma Dembinai Jisas Krais motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banagaipa ea' mope molomepago mese'epago opalef awanilifi.
53001003	Ipa' Kristen alipipai afa'ipai, afa' wa'i andeande'ma dondol waganifela Goda ipa'. Waf afambai usi'ifi. Dei' main, hapif ipe'ini nataga banagen a'owa' ea' ipa' hipai atona atin ukup pindaima atin. Ea' waf afamba fetaga fendafe' lu'uf a'owa'.
53001004	Waf afamba atef dei' afa' wasa'ma agof ipe'igufi la'afena amam nematawa Kristen. Wa'ias na'amba wa'i esis Tesalonaika sofa' nimanimi maloma akafimi hiami, apa' owa', sahapifa Jisas salutu banages.
53001005	Waf afamba ipe'ifi bu'wafi, God nihimba'mafa na'amba. Anen nawalogapa ma waf ananifi usi'ifi atef. Nanda'as na'amba ma niga'i ipa' bu'upai ma pigawis anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma. Dei' ipa' pefa' nimanimi maloma akafimi hiami. God atiasi nonda'epa be'epa ma pegape anamba nagala'ambemagoma.
53001006	Anaf God nonda' waf usi'ifi na'amba. Nogwamasa nimanimi esis sanda'mepam ipe'i.
53001007	Anen na'i notagwaha nimanimi amamba dei' ipa' pegefa'ami ea' notagwaha nimanimi afa'imi nonda'apa mopoma noma'w andeande'. Nonda'am nemaf afamba Dembinai Jisas nokwaha heven nogataga alihina nogalomai nif lu'wami feloma ensel amamba banagami.
53001008	Nemaf afamba God nohambombaga esis isimba sogololama anini soloma isimba owa' sigaila basef bu'wafi Dembinai ape'inai Jisasia.
53001009	Epes isimba atiasi sofa' akafimi awami na'amba. God nohambombagas lifilafi atapis. Ea' sope laogona nogohnaep Dembinaii, mogogala'i moloma banagami ananimi.
53001010	Nemaf afamba atiasi Dembinai notanimai nifi'i ma amam nematawa hilili'i ananisi sogasa'ma agol ananigili goloma mogogala'i ananimi, ea' amam nematawa sagahapifana sonohasa anen sogasa'ma agol ananigili. Nemaf afamba ipa' wapani penda'as na'amba atin. Dei' main, afa' wawalapa basef Godi la'afena ipa' ea' pahapifa basef ifimba endilisi.
53001011	Afa' ukup pandanda'ma isimba ea' dondol wandabetena God ape'inai ma nogatopalopepa. Afa' ogawa God nofalepa ea' wandabetena anen nonda'epa la'ifipa endilisi si'i anen nofalepa penda'as. Afa' wandabetena God nowa' banagaipa ma penda' waf afamba bu'wafi hiafi pa'i pinda'afi, ea' pendanda' maola pahapifa Krais panda'ani.
53001012	Afa' wandabetena ipa' ma atiasi pegasa'ma agol Dembinai ape'inai Jisasi ma nonda'as na'amba atin nogasa'ma agof ipe'igufi. Amamba motagama God ape'inai naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais mogatopalopepa dowaf mogowa' banagaipa.
53002001	Ipa' Kristen alipipai, afa' wa'i wi'i basefa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais atiasi notanima nugafi'i wapani ma apa' mondakolas mogalomana. Dei' wahali'ipa na'amba.
53002002	Anis epes sa'ipipa sa'i nemaf Dembinai anaf nogafi'afii fataga ea'. Ae' ina' egawa. Basef ifimbai Ambal bu'unai Godi na'ipanef anin epen na'ipipaef a'a anin epen na'ifa okom ananimi atom a'a esis sa'i afa' wanda' basef ifi'i wasapa'ef fafo'o wa'ipasa basef ifimba? I'i pegame'asa basef na'ambaifima, ipa' ina pehafel gogolalasipa kwapete' kwafalis ea' ukup ipe'ipi nimanip a'owa', owa'i.
53002003	Ipa' ina peme' anin epen nembaso'mepa ma anif basefa Dembinai nogotanimai, owa'i. Nemaf Dembinai nogafi'afii, ina fetaga dowadowaf, owa'atin. Epes hiasi ata' sili' sonda' du'waniga soso'ana alafugah ea' aman aunai nogosambala mu'uli Godi notaga nondawalap. Ea' aman anamba owagama nefe' wambel awambili hel nif fagandifi.
53002004	Anen atiasi nohamasa hiahaom amamba hiami epes sanda' lotumami sagailam si'i Godi ea' nowa' alafuga ma hiahaom amamba. Ea' nosa'ma agol ananigili atogol lu'wagol, nonda' hiahaom amambai hiami mofe' lafel. Ea' nuwis nope ipat lu'unai Godi nowalapa basef na'amba ni'i, “Ae' atowe Dembiwai God.”
53002005	Fowa' ae' ape alomepa a'ipipa basefa hiahawes isimba. Ipa' ukup pase'epamas a'amon?
53002006	Ipa' dei' pegawa hiahaom isimba magahefa ufia'wa aman anamba aunai ma notaga nondawalap alihigima nemaf afamba God nandandepanafi.
53002007	Ipa' pegawa dei' banagami amamba mogosambala mu'uli Godi ata' manda' maol mandambaho' mape. Amamba ata' mapoma mondahama nogota atamba aman anamba nigili'ama ufia'w anani'wi atiasi nondaomb nogafe'.
53002008	Nemaf afamba aman anamba aunai nogosambala mu'uli Godi notaga nondawalap. Ea' nemaf Dembinai Jisas nogafi'afii nohana noga'ma malogol ambip ananimi atom moloma lait nogogala'i lu'unai ananinai.
53002009	Aman anamba aunai nogosambala mu'uli Godi atiasi notaga nondawalap alihigima ma banagami Satani atom. Ea' waf baso'aifi Satani ma nonda' maol banagani ametal banagani naninani si'i God nanda'ani.
53002010	Anen nanda' waf hiani baso'amunai ma waf awafi. Atiasi nombaso'ma esis sa'i higiligalasi. Apa' i'i epes isimba siga'i aho'ma basef endilisifi, dao' atiasi God nofa'as sotanimai sope andeande'. Owa', sandaiwa'.
53002011	Ea' atiasi God nosapa'i hiahaom amamba mogombaso'ma esisi ea' seme' basef amamba kwamaimi baso'ami asasimi sahapilam.
53002012	Esis amam nematawa hiasi ina ata' sohapifa basef endilisifi, a' owa'atin. Asonahasa sonda' waf awafi atef. Isimba atis atiasi sofa' hiahaom awami atoma basefa kot anaf Dembinai God nonda'masanai.
53002013	Fowa' gani dambadamba God nosahe'epa ea' ma nowambelepa pitanimai pagahapifa basef endilisifi. Ama banagami Ambal bu'unai ananinai nanda'epa be'epa hilili'. Ea' dondol wanifela Goda ipa'. Kristen alipipai, okom Dembinaii maimailipa.
53002014	Nemaf afamba afa' waga'ipipa basef bu'wafi Godi ma anen nofalepa nogase'epa nogogala'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi. Ma God nogasa'ma agola Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi gogaloma agof ipe'igufi wapani.
53002015	Ea' dei' ipa' Kristen alipipai pindalutu banagepa ma basef hiafi Godi waga'ipipaef malogufi o wagase'epaef okwatihi, ifimba ipa' dailaef.
53002016	Afa' wa'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais naloma God Ahamapa ape'inai ukup amamipi pipilapa ea' motopalopapa dowaf mowa' banagapa. Amom monda'apa na'amba, mowa' banagapa ma nelelemb ape'ilimbi lifilafi. Ea' matopalopapa mope mogohafa God nonda'apa mogape andeande' endilisi.
53002017	Ea' dei' afa' wa'i amom biam mowa' banaga opalef ipe'ilifi motopalopepa penda' waf fasifi hiafi ma piga'ipasa basef fasifi hiafi.
53003001	Ipa' Kristen alipipai, afa' wa'i ata' wi'ipipago anif basef daif wapani. Ipa' pendabetena Goda nogatopalopafa ma basef Dembinaii fendasauli' fegafe' kwafalis anamba hiagoma fegefa' agol lu'wagili si'i fowa' nanda'am la'afena ipa'.
53003002	Ipa' pendabetena afa' ma God nogatagwahofa ma lagofa epes isimba awasi sanda' waf awafii. Ipa' pegawa epes hiasi ina dei' sahapifa basef Godi, ata' owa'.
53003003	Apa' Dembinai naila basef ananifi andeande' nanda' hiahawes ananisi datima ma nowa' banagaipa numafipa ma aman aunai owa' la'ifinama nogahokola ipa'a.
53003004	Dembinai nasa'ma ukup afa'ipi ea' dei' ogawa ipa' na'amba. Waf hiafi wa'ipipa ma pinda'afi, afamba ipa' penda'af endilisi. Ea' anaf wapani ina pindaiwa'maf, owa'. Pilaf penda'af atin.
53003005	Afa' wa'i Dembinai nisindi'amona opalef ipe'ilifi ma pegegawa endilisi God okom maimailipa a'owa'. Afa' wa'i nemaf afamba nimanimi mogatagamepa, pindalutu banagepa ma pepel Kraisi atom penda' waf fasifi atef.
53003006	Ipa' Kristen alipipai, afa' wa'ipipa dindinip na'amba ma agol Dembinai Jisas Kraisi. I'i anis alipisi ipe'isi tol sope dowafa owa' seme' basef ifimba waga'ipasafi silifa, ipa' pindihi'amas pekwahis.
53003007	Ipa' pendegawa ma pigaila waf afa'ifi. Fowa' wape wagalomepa, ina tol wape dowadowaf, owa'.
53003008	Ina ofa' gwa'aisi dowadowafa ipa', owa'atin. Watalis atin wa'as. Ea' wanda' maol banagambel wanda' ahifimi hiami a'owa' owamb alipa ina wapoma ipa' atipa pelagafa ogape, owa'.
53003009	Afa' wi'i ogofa' gwa'aisi ma ipa', God na'i andeande'ma okom ananimi. Apa' afa' wandaiwa'ma ogofa' gwa'aisi ipe'isi, owa'. Afa' wanda'as na'amba ma pigati waf afa' wanda'afi ma petelef pigailaf.
53003010	Ipa' pegawa fowa' wape wagalomepa afa' wase'epa mu'uli na'amba. Na'i epen owa' nenda' maolia, ipa' ina pefagaman pese'an anis gwa'aisi, owa'atin, hapaini.
53003011	Afa' ina wa'ipipa na'amba dowaf, owa'. Wame' basefa anis sagape la'afena ipe'i ina sanda' maol, owa'. Tol sape dowaf. Esis sandapoma basef atom usiusihimi ma hiahaom anis daiasi atom.
53003012	Agol Jisas Kraisi Dembinai ape'inai afa' wa'ipipa dindinipa mu'uli inimba ma epes isimba sagape dowafi, wa'i osa'ma nomonas asasisi ma sonda' waf na'amba. Esis ata' sope andeande'ma sonda' maola sogatagama gwa'aisi asasisi atis dei'.
53003013	Apa' ipa' Kristen alipipai, ipa' ina ala'uta tehepa ma penda' waf bu'wafi, owa'i.
53003014	I'i anin epen owa' nila basef ifimba hiafi afa' wanda'afia, ipa' pendegawa epen inimba andeande'. Ea' pindihi'aman pepe laogona anin. Ama anin ambal aola waf ananifi. Dei' main, anin ina naila basef afa'ifi, owa'atin.
53003015	Apa' ina pefalan pi'i bouni ipe'ini, owa'i. Ukup pepoma anin si'i alipini ea' pi'ipana negegawa waf afamba awafi ma negakwahef.
53003016	Afa' wa'i Dembinai anen kofagonama opaf awenafi dondol nondase'epa okom awanami ma mamahagoma ipa' pepe pegafe'ma. Afa' wa'i Dembinai nope nolomago ipa' hipai.
53003017	Anen nanda' basefi nase'e pen ae' Pol anda' basef ifimba ma lagol ae'agili, a'i nemaf bu'wafi ma ipa'. Ametal inimba ae'ani ma basef ifimba hiafi ae'afi, anda'ef na'amba atin.
53003018	Afa' wa'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais notopalopago ipa' hipai dowaf nowa' banagaepa. Ea' ma'uf.
54001001	Ae' Pol anda' pas isi'i. God nowambilai apa' mutanimai mope andeande' ea' mape mohafa anaf owagama mugati Krais Jisas. Amom biam mandandepe ma'ipi dindinipa agape aposel Krais Jisasi.
54001002	Ae' anda'menago basef ifimba ina' Timoti, ina' nahapifa God dei' nataga nogame ae'inai endilisi. Ae' a'i God noloma Krais Jisas dembinai afa'inai muti uwahipina motopalopena dowaf mowa' banagaena, opaf ine'ifi fope sa'ombel.
54001003	Fowa' ae' afo'o itap lu'upa Masedonia ma aga'ipina dei' na'amba atin, a'ipina wapani. Ina' ata' nendape atapina na'amba Efesusa niga'ipa anom amam dindinipa ina a' mi'ipasa anif basef baso'afi, owa'i. Mi'ipasa basef Godi atif.
54001004	Amom mokwaha basef ambas amamba talimi dowadowafa basef mamimami hiami saga'i agof isimba bafa'w ifa'w asasisi. Basef amamba magalalamona nomonas asasimi, magafela ukup asasimi sa'i basef sandahihianamaefami, amamba ina mogowa' banaga maol Godi, owa'. Maol inimba natagama mogahapifa God atona.
54001005	Apa' mu'uli inimba dei' aga'ipipani, i'i esis sohapilan silan, malogof fagape opalef asasilifi nomoni, fa'ipas fihimba'masa waf asasifi ina awef, owa'. Esis sahapifa God endilisi. Ama atiasi waf afamba hiafi fesa'ma ukup pigapigaila God nogaloma anis daias wapani.
54001006	Apa' anom amam ukup paso'ama waf afambai bu'wafi. Ea' dei' mololama basef bu'wafi ma'i basef wafifi atif.
54001007	Amom ma'i mopoma mogawalipas mu'uli Godi si'i anom dembami tisa ma'i, “Basef afa'ifi endilisifi atif.” Apa' amom ina mogawa basef ifimba maga'iefi mogawa kofagefa wapania, owa'.
54001008	I'i apa' mogawa mu'uli Godi milan, na'ambai andeande'.
54001009	Apa' mondogawa isimba wapani, mu'uli inimba ina nafi'mai epes isimba sagape andeande'i, owa'atin. Inimba nafi'mai epes sanda' waf awafii, sogosambala mu'uli inimbai owa' sogape lafela amom agufumia. Ea' anis sogowa' alafugaha Godi sanda' waf awafii. Anis saga'i waf Godi hapaifii, ma sagaila waf itapafi atefi. A anis saha ahapas mamasas sagaga'i, saha anis daidaias wapani sagaga'i.
54001010	Anis sanda' so'a wauli ma waf afamba awafii, a anis sagahambombaga anis amam nematawa si'i fowa' Sodom sanda'afi. Ea' anis sakwalopa anis epes sambaho'was sape anis daias safi'i satalisa sonda'mas maol. Ea' anis sambaso'ami, ea' anis sambaso'am saga'i basef endilisi gani ilifi. Ea' anis sanda' waf afambai, faloma anef waf hiafi awafi fapa' fagaloma basef endilisifii. Mu'uli Godi nafi'i naga'i epes isimba sanda' waf awafi.
54001011	Basef ifimba fape basef bu'wafi God a nase'ef ae' ma egawalapef. Basef ifimba bu'wafi fa'ipapa God bu'winai endilisi kofagonama dagalai, naloma hiahaom mogogala'i.
54001012	Dembinai ape'inai Krais Jisas nase'e banagami, okom mapoma ae' bu'uwai anda' maol ananini, nanda'e alutuma maol inimba, ea' anifelona.
54001013	Endilisi, fowa' dondol a'i basef anda' salamala agol ananigili, apa' aloma esis Kristen, anda' du'wanigama anen. Apa' ae' ina egawa andeande', owa' ihapifanaia, ea' dei' anda' waf afamba awafima anen atapiwi ape. Isimba atis dei' natolowe uwahipiwi natopalope.
54001014	Dembinai ape'inai natopalope dowaf nowa' banagae dei' ahapifana okom maimailana aloma hiasi.
54001015	Anif basef endilisifi atifa epes hiasi some'efa sogahapifif. Basef ifimba na'amba. Krais Jisas nisila'i itap apa'e ma nofa'apa epes manda' waf awafi mokwahomapaf mutanimai mogape andeande'. Ae' ea' ma'uwi ali' anda' waf awafi ikila' anis daiasi ea' ma'uwi ae' atowe.
54001016	Isimba atis dei' God na'i uwahipigama ae' ali' ma Krais Jisas na'i nihimba'masa anen ina okom wandafunama ae' ulal, owa'. Ae' anda' waf awafi ikila' anis daias, apa' owa' anen nape nohafe nogota lautai ma itanima igafi'mai anen. Ama owagama hiasi sogati ae' ma esis wapani sohapifana sogofa' ambal namili sogape andeande' lifilafi.
54001017	Anen dembinai King nagape dondol lifilafii. Anen owa' nogaga'ia, epes owa' la'ifisa sogatolonaia. Anen atona God endilisinai. Ae' a'i agol lu'wagili banagami mogogala'i mondapoma anen atona dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.
54001018	Nogame ae'inai Timoti, dei' ase'enago basef ifimba nenda' maolanafi. Ae' okom mandanda'ma basef Godi fowa' amom profet Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'mam maga'ipinafi. Ina' nila basef ifimba, nenda' wandaf banagambel andeande' neloma esis bousi.
54001019	Wandaf afamba ina' banagena nigahapifa God nenda' waf usi'ifi hilili', ma malogol gagape opaf ina' nomoni ina gihimba'mena anef waf awafi ina' nanda'afi, owa'. Anis epes sowa' alafugaha waf afambai bu'wafi. Ea' dei' hapif asasini papalalan ea' awasin si'i sip palalap pagail otamba awasip pagala naoh.
54001020	Epes hiasi sanda' waf afambai, amam biam Himeneusi Aleksander hapif amamini a' awen. Ae' andaiwa'mam ali'amonam mafe' lagof Seteni ma mogogawa gawa fasini. Anda'am na'amba amom ina a' monda' basef findiwaefa agol Godi, owa'i.
54002001	-
54002002	Maol inimba ae' a'i esa'ma okom ine'imi nenda'ani, basef fagali'i na'amba. Ipa' pendabeten pefala God pihali'ana, pinifelona ma epes hiasi pendabetena anen nogatopalopa esis soloma amom king dembami moloma gavman dembami wapani. Ipa' pendabeten na'amba ma apa' hiapai tol mogape opalef awanelef, mogaila waf Godi usi'if hilili'i.
54002003	Beten inimbai bu'wani ma naep Godi, notanima nogofa' apa' mogape andeande'i. I'i apa' monda' waf afambai mondabeten, anen sonahana ma apa'.
54002004	Anen na'i nofa'i epes hiasi sotanimamai anen sope andeande'ma sogogawa basef endilisifi kofagefa.
54002005	Apa' mogawa God atotona nape. Ea' anona aman nagape la'afena God naloma epesi, anamba aman endilisinai anen Krais Jisas.
54002006	Anen fowa' God nandandepana ea', nakwaha ambal ananili atola natala apa' epes hiapai nakwahomapa waf awafi mogotanimai. Nemaf afamba dondo'afi Krais nihimba'mapa God na'i nowambilai epes hiasi sogotanimai.
54002007	Ea' dei' God nanda'e ape aposela egawalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi. Ae' a'i endilisi, ina ambaso'am. Anen nanda'e ape dembiwai tisa ma epes anep mini'ap sogololama Godi ma sogahapila basef ifimba endilisifi.
54002008	Ea' dei' ae' a'i epes hiasi walemb hielimbi sondabeten. Ae' okom ma'i esis hiasi sondape bo'wes hilili', sokwaha ukup wandafipi peloma migimigah sondabeten.
54002009	Ae' a'i awo nematawa wapani ondanda' klos mais bu'wasi atis, sondahama awo dondo'. Ina onda'as bandabandas a'owa' sotambel bimbitagw, owa'i. Awo ina ondagala sosaf anambai, ofalo'ma balagah alop si'ipa bahigis mamimami hiami moloma sosaf gol fasimi si'i kapai, owa'. Klos isimba sagalotamas a'owa' otamba hiambai owa'i otalisa, hapaisi.
54002010	Apa' nematawa wa'i basef wa'i ogape awasi Godi, awo ondanda' maol bu'wani hiani naninani. Maol inimba si'i sosaf awoufi endilisifi.
54002011	Nemaf mamahefa ipa' penda' lotu main, nematawa awo ondawalipama ogaila waf afamba sa'umbilifi ea' osopama malogofa ogofa' basef andeande'.
54002012	Ae' ina a'i aho'ma ano'w nemata'w kope dembe'wi tisa kope kwili' kowalepa amoma basef, owa'. Nematawa osopama malogof ondame' basef atif.
54002013	Basef kofagefa fagape na'amba. Fowa' God nali' nanda' aman Adam, ama main nanda' Iv kwagi'.
54002014	Adam ina nahapifa basef baso'afi, owa'. Nemata'w kwahapifa basef baso'afi, ea' kwataga nemata'w kwanda' waf awafii.
54002015	Waf nematawa onda'afi afamba. Awo ondahapifa God endilisi ea' ukup pipila anis daias otopalopas, ea' ondape bo'owa hilili'ma ugumafi awo andeande'ma waf awafi akawa. I'i uhapila waf afamba wilaf atapiwa, God atiasi nokwahomawa waf awafi nofa'awa utanimai ogape andeande'. Ma ogola awasima, atiasi notopalopawa ogolas andeande'.
54003001	Basef ifimba endilisifi. I'i aman ami ni'i nogape dembinai nugumafi esis Kristen sios Godi, anen okom monda'i maol fasini a'owa'.
54003002	Ea' aman ami nope nugumafi siosi nondape andeande' a'owa' ma epes ina siti anef waf awafima anen, owa'. Anen noso' nemata'w atoto'w. Ina nea' embel okom moso'ana, owa'. Anen nomonas sondapaona nundumafi alop ananipi andeande'. Anen nindaila okom bu'wami atom nonda' waf hiafi usi'ifi. Anen okom mi'i hiasi alipisi atis ananisi hi'ilas nondaso'as gwa'aisi. Anen nope notaga tisa bu'winai ma basef bu'wafi atif.
54003003	Ina nea' embel banagimbeli hiambel, owa'. Ina okom wandafuna kwafalis, owa'. Nonda' epes sa'ombemas. Ina nohas atin, owa'. Ina okom mi'i moni a'owa'.
54003004	Anen numafi awasi waulu'mana andeande', ea' nonda' awasi ananisi sila basef ananifi, ma sonda' agol ananigili gogape andeande'.
54003005	Aman mamahonama owa' nugumafi awasi soloma waulu'mana andeande'ia, anen ina notaga nope agilinai numafi sios Godi, owa'.
54003006	Aman anamba nagataga Kristen dambanai ina nope dembinai numafi sios, owa'. Na'amba nonda' du'wanigama God nili'amonana si'i nagali'amona Satan.
54003007	Aman agol bu'wagilinai ma amam nematawa sogololama Godi, dao' aman anamba notaga nope numafi sios. Apa' anen i'i owa' agol bu'wagilinaia, atiasi anen ambal aola waf awafi ea' nofe' nuwis isag anamba Seteni ea' nofa'ana.
54003008	Ea' na'amba atina amam amamba magatopalopa agufumi siosi, amom ukup pendape usi'ipa maol amamini. Amom ina mi'i malogof biagof, owa'. Ina mea' embel banagimbeli hiambel a'owa' mohagamogaol, owa'. Ea' ina mombaso'mas molomas mofa' otamba anis epesi, owa'.
54003009	Basef ifimba endilisifi fowa' fandambahi'i dei' fataga fandawalap alilihif, amom mondahapilif sisihif atapif. Ea' malogof fagape opalef amamilifi nomoni fendape hilili' andeande'.
54003010	Pigali' ata' pegwamba maol amamini. Ama piti monda'an andeande'ma, dao' a' mope monda' maola sios.
54003011	Ea' na'amba atina wauhiamam amamuwai ukup pendapaowa andeande'ma maol awo onda'ani. Awo ina ondaha basefa anis, owa'i. Ondape andeande' ina wea' embel numbutimbeli wain hiambel, owa'i. Dondol ondanda' waf bu'wafi atef.
54003012	Amam monda' maol siosi, wauhiamam amamuwai ato'w atin. Amom mundumafi awo oloma awasi amamisi andeande'.
54003013	Amom mogape monda' maola siosi, i'i monda' maol fasini, atiasi mofa' agof fasigufi. Ama banagem mogowalapa basef bu'wafi, mihimba'mas amom magahapifa Krais Jisasi.
54003014	Endilisi ae' a'i efe'mago ina' kwafalis, apa' dei' ata' anda' basef ifimba ina'.
54003015	Ma i'i owa' efo'o etaga ulala, ina' nitigu basef ifimba ea' negawago waf afamba esis sagape andeande'afi ma wambota atamba Godi. Wambota atamba esis sios Godi ambal namili lagapaunai. Sios Godi si'i olaf banagafi fogowa' banaga basef endilisifi.
54003016	Endilisi atis, basef ifimba kofagefa lu'wafi a'owa'. Owa' anin epen la'ifina negegawefa, owa'. Fandambaho' fape fafe' fafe' dei' God nihimba'mafaef alihif. Basef ifimba na'amba. Anen nataga epen endilisi nofa' alop epesi, nataga nandawalap. Ambal bu'unai Godi nihimba'mapana anen aman bu'unai nagape hilili'i. Amom ensel Godi matolona. Basef ananifi fafe'ma esis wambotagw amam nematawa hiasi sogololama Godi. Esis epes itapasi sahapifana. Ea' God nofa'ana nalota heven nape mogolala'i ananimi.
54004001	Ambal bu'unai Godi na'i basef alihif na'amba. Anaf owagama anis epes sokwaha sagahapifa basef endilisifi Godi. Ea' aseme' malogofa epes isimba ambagof awami magambaso'ami sila basef ambagof awami maga'iami.
54004002	Anom amam magambaso'ami mawalipasa basef ifimba baso'afi. Malogof fagape opalef amamilifi nomoni faso' si'i saofa otamba sagasambagof. Amom ina atiasi ata' momeme'ma waf awafi mogawaf, a' owa'atin.
54004003	Atiasi muwalipasa basef ifimba ma esis sigihi'a waf sandaso'amafi sigihi'a anis gwa'aisi epes saga'asi wapani. Apa' gwa'aisi isimba God atona nanda'asa apa' epes mahapifana mogogawa basef endilisifi. Amambai, apa' mofa'am minifela Goda moga'am.
54004004	Hiahaom hiami God nanda'ami, bu'wami atom. I'i minifelonamam, andeande' mofa'am. Ina mokwahom, owa'.
54004005	Dei' main, basef Godi faloma beten sanda' gwa'aisi isimba sataga bo'wes hilili'.
54004006	Ina' i'i negaso'asa basef ifimba esis Kristen alipisima, dao' atiasi nepe epen bu'winai nenda' maola Krais Jisasi. Ea' nefa' banagami lu'wami ma basef fagasa'ma hapif ine'inii ma gawa nefa'an nagailani.
54004007	Apa' esis amam nematawa saga'i numunefisa basef atom wafimi, newa' alafugamam. Ina' nendelafa waf Godi andeande' nendegawam.
54004008	Ina' negawa, waf afamba niwalipa alop si'ipa ponda' maol pigiawi, isimba la'ifis kwasala ma sogatopalopapa. Apa' ina' nendelafa waf Godi dao', banagef endilisi ma fegatopalopapa ma waf hiafi. I'i ina' nelafa waf Godi, afamba fatopalopa apa' epes hiapai ma dei' magape itap nogota ata'e, ea' fetopalopapa anaf heven wapani.
54004009	Basef ifi'i endilisifi atifa epes hiasi si'i awi ma seme'ef sogahapififi, ifimba na'amba.
54004010	God anen ambal namili lagapaunai. Anen na'i nowambilai amam nematawa hiasi hi'ilas sotanimai sogape andeande'. Ea' dei' endilisi atis nowambilai epes mamahisa sagahapifanai. Dei' mape mohafana ma'i endilisi nogofa'apa. Isimba atis dei' manda' maol numa'uni endilisi.
54004011	Ina' nese'asago basef ifimba fefe'mago esis amam nematawa, ea' niwalipas dindinipa sigailif.
54004012	Esis sati ina' ukup pandanda' pa'i, ina' ata' sa'winai, apa' ina si'i ina' aman falafunai, owa'atin. Ina' nendape si'i ametal bu'wani ma esis Kristen sigaila waf bu'wafi ine'ifi ma fe', poe, ki, hapif ine'isi, soloma waf afamba okom magaila anis deindeiasafi, soloma waf bu'wafi hilili'i.
54004013	Nogota atamba ina' ata' nepe atapina nehafago ae'. Ina' nenda'ago maol banagambela nigatalifa basef Godi alihigima ma epes hiasi, ea' nesa'mago ukup asasipi ma waf sonda'afi ea' niwalipas ni'ipaso andeande'.
54004014	Fowa' agufumi mugumafi siosi mawamona lagofena. Ambal bu'unai Godi nasa'ma manda'mena beten ea' anom amam ma'i basefa presen inimba anen nagasi'inani. Dei' nenda' maol banagen nindimafi presen andeande' inimba God nali' nagase'enan dowafi.
54004015	Dondol ina' nindimafi maol inimba banagena atapina nendapoman. Ama epes hiasi sigati waf ine'ifi fegataga fasif.
54004016	Solawaina andeande'ma waf ina' nanda'afi, ma basef ifimba nigawalipasafi. Dondol ninda'am na'amba atapina banagambel. Ina' i'i nenda'as na'amba, atiasi God notopalopena neloma esis sogagahembe'ma basef malogol ine'igili, nowambelepa pitanimai pegape andeande'.
54005001	Ina nenda' megahogaha amam hagami niga'ipam diga lu'ugai, owa'i. Nisindi'amonam ni'ipam basef sa'umbilifi, nenda'as si'i nanda'manas ahamena ine'inai. Ea' nisindi'amona amam amamba sa'umi si'i nagasindi'amona owapena ine'imi.
54005002	Nisindi'amona nematawa hagiwai si'i nagasindi'amona ma'mena ine'ikwi. Ea' nisindi'amona nematawa sa'uwai si'i nagasindi'amona haniti'mina ine'ikwi, ma waf usi'ifi.
54005003	Basefa nematawa alifiwai faga'i na'amba. Nematawa awamba, i'i owa' anin epen numafiawaea, ina' nendanda'asawa andeande' nimafiawa.
54005004	Apa' i'i ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi anis awasi akwa'usi a'a bafasa'w akwa'usi sope esis ata' sondogawa andeande' na'amba. Maol asasini nigali'i sumafi ahasas mamasas asasisi atis ata' sili' ma sogagwa wiaf fowa' sugumafias. Esis sonda'as na'amba saila basef Godi. Aho', God okom ma'iaf a'owa' waf afambai.
54005005	Apa' i'i ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi ato'w gwaigwai'w kogape, ako'w konda'as na'amba. Ako'w kogawa endilisi God atiasi nogatopalopa'wi ma waf fasifi, kofala God lifilafi owamb alipa beten akwa'uni.
54005006	Apa' i'i ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwila okom akwa'umi atoma kwandagala alop atop dowaf, ako'w si'i kwagaga'i.
54005007	Ina' nesa'ma nomonas nematawai ma ugaila basef ifimba, ma awo atiasi ogape hilili'. Ama anin epen ina ni'ipawa ni'i awo wanda' waf awafi, owa'.
54005008	Epen ami owa' nigimafi esis esimbel atembel ananisia, anin ina atiasi nimafi esis wambota atota endilisi mamasan ahasan soloma batawisan. Epen inimba nakwaha hapif a' nataga epen awani endilisi nikila' isimba owa' sogahapifa Godia.
54005009	-
54005010	I'i anowa nematawa wahupawa magaga'awai awo ina onda' so'a waol, owa'. Ope andeande'ma anis daias sotolowa siga'i wagape andeande'i. Onda' maol bu'wani ma ugumafi batawisawa, ogaso'as gwa'aisi epes ogatopalopa esis Kristen wambota Godi, umafi awasi awausi andeande' ope onda' maol hiani bu'wani naninani ofe' ofe' otagama afagof 60-pelaiguf, dao'. Nematawa awamba nenda' agofawa negawawa ma negaso'awa gwa'aisi. Nematawa wanda'as na'ambai atowa ina' nenda' agof awaugufi fil okwatiha negatopalopawa.
54005011	Apa' ina' owa'i nenda' agofa nematawa awamba awo ata' sa'uwai aiawaiwai alifiwai, owa'. Hapewai. Ama nemaf mamahefa awo wi'i ugi'ma nomonas awousi ondagala alop awoupi atop wi'i ogaso' anom amam wapanima dao', ea' diamawago. Awo nomonas isimbai sapaowa, dei' ea' wakwaha wafa basef bu'wafi Kraisi fowa' wagahapilafi.
54005012	Dei' wakwaha basef bu'wafi banagafi fowa' wa'if wagaloma Kraisi. Wanda' waf afambai awafi, na'amba kofagefa awoufi.
54005013	Ea' anef waf awo wanda'afi wapani. Wanda' waf afamba ala'uta tahasa sanda'afi, ea' wafe' wawis ifagw hi'alagw. Awo ina ala'uta tahawa atin dowaf, owa'. Wakwalopa basef anis daiasi wanda'ef pi'ipe'ef wafe'agon hi'alagon. Ea' wawalapa basef fafifafi ina andeande'ma apa' muga'if, owa'.
54005014	Isimba atis dei' a'i nematawa awamba ata' aiawai kwasakwasalai atiasi oso' amam wapani ma ola awasi umafias ogape ifagw awaugwi atogw. A'i awo ina onda' anom maefah awami motagama esis bousi ma siga'i anif basef awafi ma apa', owa'atin.
54005015	Ina' negawa anowa nematawa wahupawa magaga'i, wakwaha ufia'w fasi'wi wafe' waila Satan.
54005016	I'i anota wambota nemata'w akwambai ako'w Kristena anowa nematawa alifiwai ope, ea' Kristen akwamba kumafiawa. Ako'w konda'as na'amba esis sios ina noma'w nohasa sugumafawa, owa'atin. Na'ambai andeande'ma sios sugumafi nematawa kwahuwai awo atowa wagapani.
54005017	Agufumi mamahoma mugumafi ipa' Kristen monda' maol andeande'i, ipa' pinifelom penda'am andeande' pimafiam pese'am gwa'aisi mais bif atif mikila' anom deiom. Agufumi manda' maol Godi magawalipasa basef kofagefa ananifi ipa' pindimafiam na'amba atin andeande'.
54005018	Basef fagape Buk Baibeli faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Ina' owa'i nesopama malogofa bulmakau manda' maol magafa'asa witi, owa'.” Ea' anif basef wapani na'amba fa'i, “Aman nanda' maoli anen nogofa' anis hiahawes du'wanisa maol ananini.”
54005019	I'i anin epen atitin ni'i, “Agilinai anamba nugumafi esis Kristeni nonda' waf awafi, ina' owai' neme'anama basef ananifia, hapaini. I'i epes bias a'a wanis isi'i basef ifimba ma waf awafi anen nanda'afi, dao' ina' neme'as.
54005020	Apa' i'i anom agufumi monda' waf awafi, ina' nisindi'amonana dindinipa naep esis Kristen hiasi. Ma anis daias ombal mogahasa waf afambai, ma ina sonda' ambambai, owa'.
54005021	Ae' anda'epa ina' andeande'ma nogohnaep Godi naloma Krais Jisas maloma amom ensel God nandandepami. Ina' nindaila basef ifimba andeande'. Ina' owa'i ninifala anom sa'umi ni'ipam mehipa. Ea' owa'i nenda' anom dembami sa'ombemam ni'ipam sa'umbela, owa'i. Niga'ipas na'amba atin. Ea' owa'i ninifala anis epesa, a nenda' anis alipisi sa'ombemasa. Niga'ipas na'amba atin.
54005022	Ina' owa'i nifa'i anona aman kwafalis nenda'ana nope agilinai ma esis Kristena, owa'. Nili' negawana, nendondoma anen nanda' waf bu'wafi a'a nanda' waf awafi. Na'amba anis epes sitilina netopalopa anona nanda' waf awafi, si'i ina' wapani nanda' waf awafi. Ina' solawaina ma negape hilili'.
54005023	Ina' nekwaha waf afamba nega' embel atembel wafimbel dowaf. Andeande'ma noga' wain kwaia'wina negatopalopa opaf ine'ifi ma negatofa aowas inimba dondol nanda'inai.
54005024	Waf awafi anis epesi fape alihifa esis fafe' fali'as sogawaf kwafalis atis. Apa' waf awafi anisi fape fandambaho', ama main afataga fandawalap.
54005025	Ea' na'amba atin, anef waf fasifi wapani fape fandawalap. Apa' anef waf fasifi ina fandawalap ulal, ata' owa'. Afamba wapani ina fandambaho'w dondoli, owa'.
54006001	Ipa' Kristen agof akipai panda' maol dowaf pagape lafela anis daiasi, ipa' ata' ukup pendanda' na'amba. Dembami mugumafi ipe'i, ipa' pinifelam pi'i bu'wami pesa'ma agof amamugufi peme' basef amamifi. Ama anis epes daias ina atiasi si'i basef awafi ma agol Godi, ma waf ipa' Kristeni, owa'.
54006002	Ipa' agof akipai panda' maol dowadowafi ma amom agufumi dembami anom Kristen, ipa' ina ukup pendanda' na'amba pi'i, “Anom Kristen sahopafa atom ea' hapaimi, osambala malogof amamugufi.” Owa'atin. Ipa' ukup pendanda' na'amba pi'i, “Amom Kristen ea' afa' ukup pipilam, onda' maol amamini andeande', ukila' maol wanda'ana amom agufumi owa' Kristenia.” Dei' main, ipa' agof akipai patopalopa amom Kristen ipa' ukup pagapagailami. Timoti, basef ifimba ina niwalipasef nesa'ma ukup asasipi newa' banagas. Dondol ina' niwalipa esis amam nematawa ma sonda' waf fasifi, ea' nesa'masa sonda'am.
54006003	-
54006004	Basef dembinai Jisas Kraisi fawalipapa andeande'ma waf Godi. I'i anona aman nokwaha basef ifimba ma nowalipa esisa anif basef daif owa' fefe' dondo'ma basef ifimba fasisi usi'ifi Jisasia, apa' mogawa aman anamba na'i nonda' du'wanigai. Anen ina nogawa kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Anen nomonas awasisinai. Anen okom manda'i waf afamba nondopambema nogalomasafi atefa, nifitap nondalomasa basef kofagefa. Basef ifimba atif fagawalapa waf afambai. Opalef awalefa anis daindaias, sonda' findiwa, ma sogape ukup aweawep pegapoma sahin owan.
54006005	Epes isimba sandanda' na'ambai, ukup asasipi paolas endilisi, ea' ina sahapila basef fasifi endilisifi, owa'. Ea' sa'i basef sapa'ef sandahihianama saloma anis. Ea' sa'i, “Ufia'w akwamba Godi ufia'w sogofa' uga'wi.”
54006006	Endilisi atis, epen ami nigaila waf Godi, ma anin okom mondanda'ma hiahaom ananimi ni'i. Ea' ma'um a' dondo'ma anin ea', opaf ananifi fope awanef nepe andeande'.
54006007	Apa' mogawa, mamamapa olapa magataga itap apa'e, nemaf afamba apa' ina mofa' anom hiahaom mafi'i, owa'. Anaf mogaga' wapani ina atiasi mofa' anom maefah mofe' molomapa itap apa'e, owa'atin endilisi.
54006008	Apa' anis gwa'aisi luwaguf mais soga'omepa, apa' mi'ias mi'i, “Ea' ma'wis isimba ea' andodo'ma apa'.”
54006009	Apa' epes ukup pape sa'i sogofa' uga maina hianai, esis atiasi sowa ma gwamba anamba aunai, si'i huguf sandowam sambaho'wam magapoma mafisi ma mofe' mowala mopoma sogaham. Ea' atiasi ukup mamimami awami motagamasa hiahaom awami monda' esisa ukup moso'as higiligalas lamonas endilisi.
54006010	Waf afamba ukup piga'i moni a'owa', kofagefa ma waf hiafi awafi. Anis epes ukup lu'um ma'ima'i moni a'owa', ea' waf afambai fahondo'as sakwaha sagahapifa Jisas asafe'ma waf awafi. Ea' sofa' akafimi hiami lu'wami awami a'owa'.
54006011	Apa' ina' aman Godi, newa' alafugama hiahawes isimba nefe' nila waf afamba bu'wafi. Ea' nenda' maola negefa' waf usi'ifi endilisifi Godi, nihapifa Jisasa okom mogamogaila anis daias. Ama nigalutu banagena ma waf awafi anis sonda'menafi. Ina' nenda' waf sa'umbilifi ma anis epes daias.
54006012	Nigahapifa Krais si'i anin epen nasagih mehip nagaloma anis. I'i anin nesagih mehip nefe' nikila', atiasi nefa' hiahawes. Ina' wapani na'amba atin. I'i nihapifana banagena, anaf nepe andeande' lifilafi. Ina' nihapila okom amamba ambal fasili lagape dondoli fowa' God nofalena ma negofa'ali. Anen nofalena nemaf afamba ma negawalapa hapif inimba ine'ini naep epes hiasi sanda' lotuma Godi.
54006013	-
54006014	God naso'am ambal hiahaom hiami ea' Jisas Krais nawalapa basef kofagefa andeande'ma nogohnaep Pontius Pailat gavman dembinai. Naep Godi naloma Jisas Krais dei' ase'ena maol inimba na'amba. Ina' nimafi nomonas ine'isi andeande' nindaila basef ifimba Godi datima. Alogw owa'i gwilifa, ea' epes ina sonda' findiwa ma basef ifimba. Nimafif nendape na'amba atin nefe' netaga afamba Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nogataga alihina.
54006015	Nemaf afamba God naga'iefi nosapa'ana nifi'i. God atona kofagonama dagalai, anen atona Dembinai King nugumafi epes hiasii, soloma hiahaom hiami hi'igalami. Anen king Dembinai ma king hiamii, a' Dembinai ma dembami hiamii.
54006016	Ea' anen atona owa' nogaga'ia, nagape mogogala'i lu'wami endilisii. Ea' apa' dei' ina la'ifipama mogafe' felefele'ma anen, owa'. Dei' anin epen owa' netelonaia. Owagama wapani, owa' anin la'ifina nogati anona, owa'atin. Ae' a'i agol ananigili lu'wagili goloma banagami ananimi mondapoma anen atona lifilafi dondol. Endilisi.
54006017	Ina' ni'ipa epes isimba hiahaom hiamisi ma itap ana'e ina sonda' du'waniga sohapifa hiahaom amamba mamimami hiami awasim kwafalisi, owa'atin. Ina' ni'ipa epes isimba ma sogahapifa God endilisi, dao' andeande'. Anen atona nagaso'apai hiahaom hiami fasimi manda' ukup ape'ipi pagataga sonogahapi.
54006018	Ina' kipa epes isimba hiahaom hiamisi, sonda'ama sogatopalopa maol fasini. Esis dondol sowala hiahawes asasisi sofe'ma anis epes.
54006019	I'i sonda'as na'amba, andeande'ma atiasi sogakolasa hiahaom fasimi atom mogatopalopas anaf owagama. Sonda'as na'amba, sogofa' ambal fasili endilisi.
54006020	O nogame Timoti, ina' solawaina nindimafi basef ifimba God nagase'enafi andeande' datima. Newa' alafugama basef ifimba baso'afi wafifi saga'i basef gawaifi. Basef ifimbai fa'i fegahambombaga waf Godi.
54006021	Anis epes sahapifa basef ifimba baso'afi sa'i, “Apa' mogogawai.” Apa' owa' dei' sakwaha sagahapifa God andola sape. Ae' a'i God notopalopepa dowaf nowa' banagaipa. Ea' ma'uf.
55001001	-
55001002	Ae' Pol anda' basef fafe'mago ina' Timoti, ae' okom magamagailinai. Ina' nahapifa God dei' nataga nogame ae'inai. Okom Godi atom dei' ape aposel Jisas Kraisi. Basef Kraisi endilisifi atif, naso'apa ambal namili apa' magape sisihipama anini. Ae' a'i amom biam motopalopena dowaf mowa' banagaina, ea' muti uwahipina monda' nembel ine'imbili bepe sa'ombel.
55001003	Esis ihase ae'asi saila waf Godi, dei' ae' wapani ailaf. Ea' malogol gagape opaf ae' nomoni ina gihimba'me anef waf awafi anda'afi, owa'. Beten ae'ani owamb alip dondol ae' okom mapomena anifela God.
55001004	Ae' okom mapoma ambif fagaluwi naep ine'ipi, okom mohafel a'owa' a'i ata' efo'o itilina sonehe endilisi.
55001005	Ae' okom mandanda'ma hapif ine'ini, inimba endilisini, ina baso'amini, owa'. Hapif inimba fowa' nali' napoma iha'mena ine'ikwi Lois kwaloma ma'mena Yunis. Ea' egawa endilisi, hapif inimba dei' napoma ina' wapani.
55001006	Fowa' ae' awamona lagofa balaga ine'igai ma God nagase'ena hiahaom fasimi ananimi. Ea' dei' a'i esa'ma nomonas ine'isi ma okom mogapoma hiahaom amamba fasimi magapoma ine'i, si'i sugufapula nif fagandif lu'wif.
55001007	Ambal bu'unai God nagaso'apanai ina nonda'apa ombal mogahapai, owa'atin. Anen naso'apa waf afamba mugalutu banagepamafi ma ukup pigapigaila anis daias mugumafi alop ape'ipi andeande'.
55001008	Ina' owa'i ambal aola niga'ipasa basef Dembinai apa'inaia. Ea' owa'i ambal aola ae' wapania, owa'atin. Ae' anda' kalabusi, epen dembinaii. Ina' nefa' banagami Godi ma banagena nefa' nimanimi nelome ogawalapa basef bu'wafi ananifi.
55001009	God nofa'apa mutanimai mogape andeande'. Anen nofalapa amam nematawa ananipai atepa mogape be'epa hilili'. Ina okom mapoma waf bu'wafi apa' manda'afi nofalapa, owa'atin. Okom ananimi atom maimailapa nofalapa natopalopapa dowaf. Fowa' dambadamba ina dei' nanda' itap, ata' owa', Jisas Krais naso'apa okom apa' natopalopapa dowaf.
55001010	Apa' dei' nogota ata'e Krais Jisas nafi'i nofa'apa motanima magape andeande'i, anen nataga alihina ea'. Dei' maol ananini God natopalopapa dowaf nogowa' banagapa ea' nataga alihin. Krais Jisas nikila' banagami magapoma ga'i, ea' basef bu'wafi Godi fihimba'mapa ambal lagape andeande' lifilafii.
55001011	Anen nali' nanda'e apoma maol inimba egawalapa basef fasifi ma epes hiasi. Ae' aposel God nasapa'e agawalapa basefi, ae' tisa dembiwai anda' maol Jisasi.
55001012	Isimba atis dei' efa' akafimi amamba. Apa' ae' ina ambal aola amamba, owa'atin. Ae' egawa aman anamba agahapifanai. Ae' egawana endilisi anen banagonai ma nugumafi hiahaom hiami moloma epes hiasi ananisi hi'ilas ae' agaso'anas lagof ananigufi. Ea' isimba sope bo'wes andeande' sefe' sotagama nemaf afamba lu'wafi fegataga.
55001013	Basef ifimba fasifi hilili'i ina' nagame'emef malogol ae'agili, basef ifimba si'i anol ametal fasini ma nigihimba'mena waf fasifi negawalipa epesafi. Ina' nihapifa Jisas Krais endilisi ea' okom mimilana nenda' waf na'amba nihapila basef ifimba tatala'if.
55001014	Nimafi basef ifimba bu'wafi endilisifi God nagase'enaef lagof ine'igufi ma nigimafiefi. Ambal bu'wali Godi nape nomona apa', notopalopena numafina ma maol inimba.
55001015	Ina' negawa epes hiasi sagape itap lu'upa Asiai, saloma amom biam Figelusi Hermogenes sakwahowe safe'.
55001016	Ae' andabetena Dembinai ma ata' nogati Onesiforus naloma wambota ananisi uwahipis. Dei' main, dondol nanda' okom ae'ami mape andeande'. Anen ina ambal aola ae' ape anda' kalabus, owa'atin.
55001017	Anen nafi'i Rom nanda' maol lu'wani nala' nolaome, nagatolowe.
55001018	Ae' andabetena Dembinai ma nogati anen uwahipina nemaf afamba lu'wafi. Anen natopalope nimaguf hiafi wambel ambalemba Efesus, isimba ina' negawas andeande' a'owa'.
55002001	Nogame ae'inai, dondol ina' nepe banagena ma Krais Jisas notopalopena dowafa banagami amamba nagaso' apa' magape sisihipama anini.
55002002	Basef hiafi ina' name' agawalapefa nogohnaep epes hiasii, ifimba newalapefa anom amam gawaimi mogogawa basef andeande'i, ma muga'ipa anis daias datima.
55002003	Ina' nendape banagena a'owa' si'i aman anamba soldia nindalutu banagena nindaila Krais Jisas. Nefa' nimanimi amamba neloma afa' anofa soldia ananifai ma maol inimba.
55002004	Aman anamba nagape si'i soldiai, ina nahapila maol naninani, owa'atin. Nandanda' maol inimba soldiai fasini atina na'i dembinai soldia ananinai okom muga'i maol ananini.
55002005	Na'amba atin, aman ami nondopambema noloma anis nogasagihi, nondaila waf afamba esis sagasagihafi. Ama nikila' nogofa' hiahawes isimba fasisi sasagih sikila'ma sogofa'asi. Apa' anen i'i owa' nigi'ma waf afamba sagasagihafi andeande'a, atiasi ina nofa' hiahawes isimba, owa'atin.
55002006	Aman nanda' maol lu'wani aofi ma nugumafiaf andeande'i atiasi nili' nogofa' gwa'aisi aof afambai nikila' anis daias.
55002007	Ina' okom mondapoma basef ifimba aga'iefi. Atiasi dembinai nondogamena okom ine'imi, ea' negawa basef ifimba hiafi kofagefa.
55002008	Dondol ina okom mopoma Jisas Krais, anen naga' ea' notanima nosafel wapani. Anen wambota atamba Deviti, si'i aga'iasa basef bu'wafi Godi.
55002009	Ae' awalapa basef ifimba fasifi. Isimba atis dei' sa'i ae' auwai, sase'e akafimi mamimami awami. Aho' sanda'e anda' kalabus wapani. Apa' basef Godi ina fanda' kalabus fape, owa'atin endilisi.
55002010	Ea' ewa' banaga okom ae'anai ma egalutu banagewe dondol egatopalopa epes isimba God nogosaho'as ea' ananisii. Ae' a'i God notopalopa esisa nofa'as sogotanimai ma Krais Jisas soloma mogogala'i banagami magape lifilafii.
55002011	Apa' mundahapifa basef ifimba endilisifi sisihif. “I'i endilisi apa' a' maga' malomana, bola apa' mosafel mope namepa molomana wapani.
55002012	Apa' i'i mope banagepama mogofa' nimanimi hiamima, anaf dao' mope si'i king dembipai molomana. I'i mogowa' alafugahana ma, anen wapani anaf nowa' alafugahapa.
55002013	I'i apa' mi'i apa' alipipai milana, ma owa' mugailanai, basef ifimba ape'ifia, ea' apa' hapaipai. Apa' anen atona nagaila basef ananifi endilisi datimaii. Ina atiasi nokwahif nombaso'ma anen, owa'atin endilisi.”
55002014	Dondol ina' nesa'ma ukup asasipi ma basef ifimba. Ni'ipas banagambela naep Godi, ipa' ina pi'i basef pepa'ef pelomasa basef mamimami, owa'. Waf afambai ina fetopalopas kwasakwasala, owa'atin. Waf afamba atiasi fegahambombaga isimba sogame'afi.
55002015	Ina' nenda' maol Godi banagambela negataga aman nanda' maol endilisii, ma ambal ine'ili ina aola maol inimba, owa'. Nenda'as na'amba ma God okom bo'oma ina' ma niga'i basef ananifi usi'if endilisi.
55002016	Ina' nindihi'ama basef awafi. Ifimba ina basef Godi, owa'. Basef amambai atiasi monda' esis sogafe' ufia'w anamba aunai ma sogowa' alafugaha God.
55002017	Basef asasifi awafi atif atiasi afetaga lu'wif si'i ilambeh awami, monda'as motaga lu'um endilisi. Tisa asasimi biam Himeneus naloma Filetus manda' waf afamba, maga'i basef mamimami wafimi.
55002018	Amam amamba mololama basef endilisifi ea' ma'ias ma'i, “Apa' motanima mosafel ea', ina ata' motanima mosafel wapani, a' owa'atin.” Basef ifimba atif amom mahambombaga ukup banagapi anis sagahapifa Godi.
55002019	Apa' dei' God nawa olaf banagafi ea', dei' fape. Olaf afamba anif amef failaf faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Dembinai nogawa andeande'ma epes isimba ananisi.” Ea' anif wapani fa'i, “Epes mamahisa saga'i agol Dembinaii, a' sondakwaha waf awafi.”
55002020	Ipat lu'utai nomon dis amamba hiami esis sanda' kapa fasini gol o silva main mogogala'i sanda'ami. Apa' anom sanda' lawah sanda'am, anom sanda' itap sanda'am. Anom sanda'ama maol fasini, si'i sando gwa'aisi saga'as. Apa' anom sanda'ama maol awani falafini, sagala alapitami.
55002021	Ea' dei' epen ami nekwaha waf afamba awafi ma nepe bo'wen hilili', inimba atiasi nepe si'i dis isimba sanda' maol bu'wani atinasi. Ea' Dembinai notopalopan nepe hilili' nenda' maol ananini. Ea' anin nendandombola nenda' maol naninani bu'wani hiani.
55002022	Dondol ina' nendafa'ma ukup amamba awasimi magataga ma amam amamba sa'umii. Nenda' maol bu'wani banagena nihapifa God nigaila waf usi'ifi feloma okom mogamogaila anisafi. Ea' nila waf opaf fogape sa'umbili, negaloma epes isimba opalef fagape bo'walef hilili' sogofala Dembinaii.
55002023	Apa' ina' newa' alafugama basef amamba mamimami awami dowadowafi ma epes isimba ukup magaso'asi gawa akasi. Dei' main, ina' negawa ea', basef ifimbai atif fagawalapa ukup mamimami wandafumi ma'i mandahihianamai.
55002024	Aman anamba nanda' maola Dembinaii ina ni'i anif basef wafifi nifitapef neloma anis, owa'i. Anen niti amam nematawa hiasi uwahipis noso'as opaf. Anen nondape dembinai tisa, nosopama okom numbutinai, nope nititi esis sonda'mana waf awafi.
55002025	Anen nuwalipas sa'ombel nisindi'amona nomonas nimanisa epes isimba sondaiwa'manai sogosambala basef ananifii. Anen nonda' maol na'amba notopalopas, anaf sombema nelelemba sogogawa basef endilisifi andeande'.
55002026	Fowa' Satan nowalo'as isag ananigai, ma sagaila malogol ananigili. I'i esis sogawa basef ifimba endilisifi, bola ukup asasipi petaga alihip wapani ma sokwaha isag anamba Seteni sogafi'mai God.
55003001	Ina' nendegawa, atiasi nimaguf akutaifi nimanimi awami endilisi a' motaga.
55003002	Nimaguf ifimba epes a' ukup pepoma esis atis, ea' ukup pindatiti moni mais asasisi a'owa', sosa'ma agof asasigufi atogof, sonda' du'waniga, sonda' epes findiwasa God. Ea' sosambala basef mamasasi ahasas asasisi. Ina atiasi sinifela Goda waf fasifi, a' owa'atin. Sosambala waf fasifi hilili'i.
55003003	Ea' ina atiasi ukup pipila anis daias, owa'. Ina atiasi sokwaha waf awafi anis daias sanda'masafi, owa'atin. Atiasi esis ina ukup pese'asa migimigaha siga'i basef awafi, owa'atin. Ea' sonda'i'ipama anis daindaiasa waf awafi. Esis ea' ukup pi'i esis atis ina atiasi sumafi alop asasipi andeande', a' owa'atin. Sohambombaga epes isimba bu'wasi, sowa' alafugah sondaiwa'ma waf bu'wafi.
55003004	Ea' sonda' alipisi asasisi sofe'ma lagof bousii. Ea' esis kwafalis sila waf awafi asasifi atef, ukup pepoma esis atis si'i dambesi. Ea' nomonas sisila dagala naninani aunai a'owa' ma alop asasipi atop. Ina ata' ukup pi'i God, a' owa'atin.
55003005	Epes isimba atiasi sohapila waf Godi alop atona asasinai ando' atogon, apa' ukup asasipi nomon sondaiwa'ma God sowa' alafugaha banagami ananimi. Ina' nindihi'ama epes isimbai.
55003006	Anom amam amambai mandambaho' nimanis mafe' magi'ma nematawa awamba nomonas owa' sogapaowa andeande'ia mawis ifagw awaugwi, ea' mola'ata nomonas awausi. Nematawa awambai waf awaufi fanda' nomonas awausi nimanis a'owa'. Ea' ukup awaupi pesafema awami mamimami mahondo'awa.
55003007	Nematawa awamba dondol wanda' maola ogofa' basef, apa' ina ogawa basef kofagefa endilisifi, owa'atin.
55003008	Fowa' Janisi Jambris manda' naumbih maloma Moses, mowa' alafugahana. Na'amba atin dei' epes isimba sanda' naumbiha basef endilisifi sowa' alafugahef. Ukup asasipi ea' aowasip endilisi a'owa', ea' hapif asasini sambaso'am atin. Esis ina sahapilif endilisi, owa'atin.
55003009	Apa' waf afamba amamifi ina fataga lu'wif a'owa', owa'atin. Dei' main, atiasi epes hiasi siti waf gawa akafi amamifi si'i fowa' gani sagati waf afambai gawa akafi ma amam amamba Janisi Jambris manda'afi.
55003010	Apa' ina' nafe' nagaloma ae'i, nagame' basef ifimba aga'ipasef ea'i. Ina' negegawa fe' ae'anii, ma basef hiafi kofagefa ae'afi. Ina' negawa ae' ahapifa God banagewe, dondol a'ipasa basef ananifi sa'ombel, okom ae'ami ina wandafum, owa'. Ina' negawa ae' okom magamagaila anis daindaiasi, alutu banagewe efa' nimanimi.
55003011	Ina' negawa waf awafi hiafi esis sanda'meaf ae'i, ma akafimi amamba egefa'am walemb ambalemba wanelemb Antioki Aikoniam a Listrai. Ina' negawa hiahaom nimanimi sanda'meam egefa'ami. Apa' Dembinai natagwahowe ma hiahaom amamba hiami nimanimi.
55003012	Aho', epes ami soloma Krais Jisas sisihis sogapani ma sogaila waf Godi, bousi asasisi atiasi sonda'as kwapete'as.
55003013	Ea' amam awami maloma amom magambaso'ami atiasi mombaso'ma epes hiasi. Ea' aman anamba aunai nombaso'ma amom wapani. Ea' waf amamifi atiasi fetaga awef endilisi a'owa'.
55003014	Apa' ina' nihapila basef ifimba nefa'ef nagahapilifi. Ina' negawa apa' amam nematawa mamahepama magawalipina basef ifimbai.
55003015	Ea' ina' negawa isimba wapani. Fowa' ina' ata' awani negawa gawa fasini ma Buk Baibel hilili'i ea'. Buk akwamba la'ifi'wi ma kogase'ena gawa fasini neloma nomonas fasisi ma ina' nigahapifa Krais Jisasa God notopalopena nofa'ena nigatambili.
55003016	Ambal bu'unai Godi atona nasa'ma nomonas amom profeti manda' basef ifimba hiafi fagape Buk Baibeli. Basef ifimba fasifi ma fegaso'apa gawa, figihimba'mapa waf awafi ma mogakwahef, a figasindi'amona fe' ape'ini, figawalipapa ma mogolafa waf usi'ifi.
55003017	Basef ifimba fanda'apa epes Godi banagepa la'ifipa endilisi, ma monda' maol hiani fasini ananini.
55004001	Anaf Jisas Krais nowaloga epes hiasi dei' ata' sagape namisi, soloma isimba sagaga'i wapani. Naep Godi naloma Krais Jisasi, dei' a'ipina banagambel a'i Krais Jisas anaf notaga nondawalap alihina naep hiasii ea' nope Dembinai ma anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma. Isimba atis dei' a'ipina dindinip,
55004002	Ina' ni'ipasa basef Godi atapina. I'i nemaf afamba esis sondandombola sogame' basef, dao' ni'ipasef. Apa' i'i nemaf mamahefa esis owa' sondandombol some'efa, ea' diamaso, apa' ina' ni'ipasef atin. Ni'ipasefa fegatalogofa basef ifimba baso'afi. Ni'ipas dindinipa sogakwaha waf afamba awafi asasifi. Ea' nefela ukup newa' banagas, niwalipasa waf awanafi sa'umbilifi atef.
55004003	Anef nemaf fegataga, atiasi asondaiwa'ma sogofa' basef usi'ifi Godi, a' owa'atin. Ea' a' sila ukup asasipi atip sofa'ai anom tisa hiami asasimi, ma moga'ipasa basef ifimba esis isimba ukup pa'i sogame'ef aligah asasigahii.
55004004	Ea' sowa' alafugaha basef endilisifi seme' basef amamba mamimami falafumi wafimi.
55004005	Apa' ina' dondol nomonas sope sogawa alihisa nigimafi alop. Nemaf afamba nimanimi mogatagamena nendape banagena nenda' maol newalapa basef fasifima esis amam nematawa sogololama Godi. Nenda' maol inimba ma negatopalopas, nenda'an endilisi hi'indalan.
55004006	Ina' negawa, nogota atamba atataga ma sehe egaga'. Esimbel ae'ambeli ba'i kolo'olambel belo sehe ega', ma indilali egaso' God. Nemaf fetaga ma ae' egakwaha itap apa'e.
55004007	Ae' endepambema asagih afa' andeande'. Ae' ahapifa Krais banagewe, asagih andeande', dei' ataga alol.
55004008	Dei' ametal hiahawes isimba sasagih sigikila'i sogofa'asi isimba sandandombol sapome. Ametal alamba na'amba. Atiasi Dembinai nofale ni'ipi ni'i, “Ina' aman nagape hilili'i.” Dembinai anen aman hilili'i nogawalogasi ma nemaf afamba. Nemaf afamba lu'wafi atiasi anen nese'e ametal alamba. Ea' ina neso' ae' atowe, owa'atin. Anen noso'asam isimba epes mamahisa ukup pipila anen notaga nondawalap sogatolonai.
55004009	Dei' ina' ulal nifi'mai ae' kwafalis.
55004010	Dei' main, Demas okom ma'ima'i waf itapafi isimba atis a' nakwahowe nafe' Tesalonaika. Kresens nafe' itap lu'upa Galesia, ea' Taitus nafe' itap lu'upa Dalmesia.
55004011	Dei' Luk atona nape nalome. Ina' ne'wa Mak nolomena nifi'i nehapomeana. Dei' main, andeande'ma anen nogatopalope ma maol Godi.
55004012	Ae' asapa' Tikikus nafe' Efesus.
55004013	Ina' nigafi'i nifa'mai saket anamba launai anamba akwahona na'ihi Troas ipat Karpusi. Anamba ina' nindifa'mianai. Ea' anom bukifah ae'ami wapani nifa'miami, buk amamba sanda' agwafih mafisim sanda'am sanda'awai. Awamba nindifa'miawai atin nifi'i endilisi.
55004014	Aleksander aman nanda' brasi, nanda' megahahe endilisi. Anaf Dembinai nogwamana akafimi anen, mondahama waf anen nanda'meaf ae'i.
55004015	Ina' wapani solawaina ma aman anamba. Anen natalogofa basef ifimba afa'ifi a'owa'.
55004016	Ali' agwa basefa kot atamba esis sanda'meatai, ea' ina anin epen atitin nalutu nalome nemaf afamba natopalope, owa'atin. Epes ae'asi hiasi sakwahowe. Ea' andabetena God na'amba, a'i ina a' okom mopoma waf afamba awafi asasifi ma sagakwahowe nemaf afamba anda' kotefi, owa'.
55004017	Apa' owa', Dembinai numafii ape ea' nase'e banagami. Isimba atis dei' awalapa basef fasifi a'if la'ifiwi endilisi ea' epes isimba hiasi owa' Judaisi sogogawa basef Godia, dei' same'ef hi'alas. Ea' God nelefate ma malogol mafin anamba lu'unai laion.
55004018	Atiasi Dembinai nelefate ma waf afamba awafi hiafi esis sonda'meaf ae'i, ea' atiasi nofa'e itanima nohapone epe anamba God nagala'ambemagoma gani heven nugumafiasa. Ae' a'i banagami mogogala'i mondapaona dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.
55004019	Ina' nese'ago dagala ae'ani ma Akwila noloma Prisila, ea' esis isimba wambota Onesiforusi.
55004020	Erastus ata' napani atin Korin. Ea' Trofimus aowas nanda'ana akwahona napani Miletus.
55004021	Ina' ulal nifi'i kwafalis. Na'amba ina' nepomai nemaf afamba fufin lu'wani nagaluwafi. Yubulus naloma Pudens a Linus a Klodia esis alipisi Kristen isimba hiasi sanda'mepago dagala sandagalamago ina'.
55004022	Ae' a'i Dembinai nope nolomago ambal fasili ine'ili ea' notopalopepa dowaf nowa' banagaipago. Ea' ma'uf.
56001001	Ae' Pol anda' maola Godi ea' ae' aposel Jisas Kraisi. Anen nandandepe ea' ma igawalipasa basef ananifi. Anen nasapa'e ma egewa' banaga esis amam nematawa mamahisa nandandepas ea' ananisii ma etopalopas sohapifana sogogawa basef endilisifi ma sigaila waf ananifi.
56001002	Ae' anda' maola agatopalopa hapif asasini ma esis sogawa ma sonohas sope sogohafa ambal alamba namili sogape andeande' lifilafi. Fowa' gani God ata' owa' nonda' anin mae netaga itap apa'ea, anen a' nali' na'ias ea' ma nogaso'apa ambal alamba apa'. Anen ina nagambaso'ami, owa'atin.
56001003	A'i owa' main, nogota atamba anen atona nandandepata ea'i, anen a' nasa'ma amam amamba mogawalapa basef ananifii alihif. God anen nofa' apa' mogotanimai, anen na'ias ea' dei' nase'e maol inimba ma egawalapa basef ifimba.
56001004	Ae' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ina' Taitus. Ina' nahapifa God ea' na'amba atin si'i apa' hiapai magahapifana. Isimba atis dei' ina' nogame ae'inai endilisi. Ae' a'i God ahamapa noloma Krais Jisas anen nofa'apa mogotanimai, amom biam motopalopena dowaf nembel ine'imbili bepe sa'ombel.
56001005	Ae' akwahina napani Krita negandondomba maol inimba ata' owa' nimbifana ma atiasi nendandepa anom agufumi mugumafi esis Kristeni walemb hielimbi, si'i fowa' aga'ipina. Ea' basef amamifi fagape na'amba.
56001006	Anona aman i'i owa' nonda' anef waf awafima naep esis amam nematawaia, ma anen noso' nemata'w atoto'w ma batawisana ananisi sohapifa Krais esis basef akasa, esis ina sonda' anef waf awafi, esis batawis sope andeande' sogame' basefi, dao' amom monda' waf na'ambai. Ina' nonda'am mope agufumi.
56001007	Ina' negawa agufumi mugumafi esis Kristeni, amom mugumafi maol Godi. Ea' amam amambai fe' poe amamini andeande'ma atiasi esis amam nematawa ina solomam siti anef waf awafi amamifi, owa'atin. Anona aman ama amom agufumi, anen ina a' nonda' du'waniga, a okom wandafuna kwafalis, owa'. Anen ina nea' embel nohaga nogaol nohas atin, owa'i. Anen ina okom mohafel mi'imi'i a'owa' ma monda' waf awafi ma mogofa' otamba, owa'atin.
56001008	Anen nundumafi epes isimba mamahisa sugafi'i laugunii analemb walembi. Anen okom munda'i waf fasifi atef. Ea' nomonas sopaona mundumafi alop andeande' datima. Ma anen nigaila waf fasifi hiafi Godi ea' nope hilili'. Anen nundumafi okom ananimi atom datima andeande'.
56001009	Anen nondahapila basef ifimba bu'wafi apa' magawalipasafi andeande'. Ea' anen la'ifinama nuwalipa anis epes nosa'ma ukup asasipi nogowa' banagasa basef ifimba usi'ifi. Ea la'ifinama niga'ipa isimba sogosambala basef usi'ifii ma sogameme'ma basef asasifi ina endilisifi, owa'atin.
56001010	Aho', epes hiasi ina sagi'ma basef, owa'. Sosambalif. Esis sanda' basef dowaf sa'iam sambaso'ma anis epes. Esis hiasi wambota Judai sagatopa' alopi.
56001011	Esis sandanda' na'ambai, esis sa'i sombaso'mas sogofa'asa otamba moni mais anis epesi. Ea' sawalipa anisa waf afamba apa' mandaiwa'mafi. Esis sanda' waf afambai atef dei' sahambombaga wambotagw epes hiasi. Ea' ina' nesopama malogof asasigufi isimba sanda'am na'ambai.
56001012	Fowa' anona aman Kritinai anen gawainai si'i profet, na'ias na'amba na'i, “Fowa' gani endilisi, esis Krit sape epes sagambaso'ami ea' dei' wapani ata' sape na'amba atin. Esis si'i mafis magail alupi awami. Ala'uta nahas a'owa', tol sa'oh dowaf ea' sa' gwa'aimi hiami.”
56001013	Basef ifimba endilisifi. Ea' ina' nenda'epasef dindinipa, seme'ef sogogawa endilisi waf awafi asasifi ma ata' sogambema nelelemb. Ama hapif asasini ata' netaga negafe' usi'in.
56001014	Ama esis sogakwaha basef mamimami falafumi esis Judai ma mu'uli epes isimba sogowa' alafugaha basef endilisifii.
56001015	Ukup epes isimba nelelemb usi'ilimba waf fasifii, hiahawes hiasi hi'alas bo'wes hilili' ma esis. Apa' nomonas epes isimba nelelemb awasilimbi ma esis owa' soghapifa Kraisia, opalef asasilifi owa' anin mae be'ena, owa'atin. Ukup asasipi paloma malogof fagape opalef asasilifi nomoni a' awasim a'owa'.
56001016	Malogof asasigufi saga'ias na'amba sa'i, “Apa' mogawa God.” Apa' fe' asasini, nawalapa esis sogowa' alafugaha Godi. God anen nandaiwa'ma esis endilisi. Epes isimba sogasambala basefi, ina la'ifisa atiasi sonda' anef waf bu'wafi, owa'atin.
56002001	Apa' ina' ninda'ipa esis amam nematawa ma basef fasifi ma waf asasifi findaila basef ifimba usi'ifi. Ina' niga'ipas na'amba.
56002002	Amam hagami owa'i mea' embel mohaga mogaola. Amom ukup pendanda' andeande'ma waf usi'ifi hilili'i ea' nomonas sopaom mundumafi alop andeande' datima. Amom mondape andeande'ma hapif amamini negape bo'wen atina waf afamba ukup pandaimafi a waf afamba ukup pigaila Godafi a waf afamba pigalutu banagepa ma nimanimi hiami.
56002003	Ea' awo nematawa hagiwai wapani ondafe' usi'iwa hilili'. Awo owa'i ondaha basefa anis unda'i'ipamasa, owa'. Awo owa'i wea' embel hiambeli ohaga ogaola. Awo ondape si'i tisa nagawalipasa waf bu'wafi.
56002004	Awo hagiwai wihimba'ma nematawa awamba ata' sa'uwai kwasakwasalai ma onda' waf na'amba. Ukup awaupi pipila amom wahupawa awaumi moloma awasi awausi.
56002005	Ea' awo undumafi nomonas awausi andeande'ma ogape bo'owa hilili' endilisi. Ea' undumafi ifagw awaugwi andeande' ma otopalopa amom mogoloma awasi awausi. Awo ondape lafela amom wahupawa awaumi. Awo ondanda' waf afamba hiafi bu'wafi hi'indalafa epes ina siti anin maol awauni awena sonda' basef Godi findiwaef, owa'atin.
56002006	Ea' na'amba atin, ina' nesa'ma ukup amam amamba ata' sa'umi kwasakwasalai newa' banagama nomonas sopaom mugumafi alop andeande' datima.
56002007	Ina' atina nenda' waf bu'wafi atefa amom mutilina ma mugailina monda' waf hiafi fasifi. Maol inimba nigawalipa epes, ina' owa'i ni'if feloma basef awafia, owa'. Ni'ipas basef bu'wafi endilisifi atif. Okom ine'imi mopoma waf usi'ifi atefa nenda' maol inimba nigawalipas dondol.
56002008	Ina' ninda'i basef usi'ifi atifa, anis epes ina siti anef waf awafi ma maol inimba, owa'. Ama esis bousi atiasi sogofa' ambagof awagufi. Dei' main, esis ina siti anef waf awafi ma afa' ma siga'i anif basef awafi, owa'.
56002009	Ina' a' ninda'ipa isimba agof akasi sanda' maol dowafi ni'ipas ni'i, esis some' basef agufumii silif sondafe' lafela amom. Ea' sondanda' maol bu'wani naninani hiani amom ukup paga'iani. Esis ina a' sogwa anif basefa agufumi sohahali'am, owa'.
56002010	Esis ina a' sokwalopa anis hiahawes amamisi, owa'i. Esis sondaila basef amamifi andeande' datima. Ama atiasi esis sogafela agola basef ifi'i apa' magawalapefa esis epesi lu'wagol. Basef ifi'i Godi nowambilai apa' mutanimai mogape andeande'i.
56002011	Apa' mogawa okom Godi lu'unai naganagaila ape'i ma nagatopalopapa dowafi anamba nataga nandawalap ea', epes hiasi misi'ah hiahi agufisi saloma agof akasi hi'alas satolona. Ama nofa' apa' amam nematawa nokwahomapa waf awafi mutanimai mogafe'ma anen.
56002012	Waf God nagatopalopapa dowafafi fawalapa apa' ma mokwaha waf afamba mogowa' alafugaha Godi, ea' mokwaha nomonas amamba awami ma waf itapanai, apa' ukup pepe pendanda' pefe' andeande' mumafi alop ape'ipi mugaila waf Godi dei' nogota ata'e.
56002013	Nogota atamba apa' mape masasa dagala anamba lu'unai mape mogohafanai. Aho', apa' mape mohafa glori banagami mogogala'i God Dembinai ape'inai nofa'apa mogotanimai, anen Jisas Krais anaf notaga nondawalap.
56002014	Krais anen nakwaha ambal fasili ananili ma nagatala apa' natagwahepa ma waf aunai hianai mogosambala mu'uli Godi. Anen na'i nondombasa apa' ma mogataga epes ananipai atipa bu'upai, ukup pehafela monda' maol banagambela mogaila waf hiafi fasifi.
56002015	Dondol ina' ni'ipasa basef ifimba. Ea' newa' banagasa sigailif ni'ipas dindinip si'i anona dembinai agol lu'wagilinai. Ea' nepa'aga waf nesa'ma ukup asasipi amam amamba owa' mugaila waf fasifia. Ae' andaiwa'ma anin epen niga'i ina' aman falafunai, owa'.
56003001	Ina' dondol banagenama negasa'ma esis amam nematawa ma sogape lafela amom gavman dembami, amom banagami mugumafi esisi ma sogaila basef amamifi. Ea' esis sondandombola sonda' maol hiani fasini.
56003002	Esis owa'i sonda' anin epen findiwana basef awafia. Esis ina a' sifitap, owa'i. Sope opalef awanelef. Dondol esis sogape sonda' waf sa'umbelifi atefa epes hiasi.
56003003	Ina' negawa fowa' apa' wapani owa' anis nomonas be'esa, apa' mogosambala basefi ea' Satan nambaso'mapa. Apa' mape lafela waf naninani aunai nelelemb mogohafema maemaefah awami ma alop sonogahap. Apa' mafe' maloma waf anamba ukup aoma anis epesi ma kowagalapama hiahaom asasimi. Esis sofala apa' naumbih asasipai ea' apa' wapani manda' naumbih malomas.
56003004	Apa' God, anen nofa'apa mogotanimai ea'i, anen alipunai apa' epesi okom maimailapa. Nogota atamba waf afamba ananifi afataga fendasali alihif,
56003005	anen ina okom mandanda'ma anef waf usi'ifi apa' manda'afi, dei' nofa'apai, owa'atin. Nomonas uwahipimi ananimi atom nofa'apa mutanimai. Anen nasa'opapa ea' mataga awasi dambaipai, Ambal bu'unai Godi naso'apa ambal namili apa'.
56003006	Ama maol Jisas Kraisi, anen aman nofa'apa mogotanimai, God naso'apa Ambal bu'unai ananinai nafi'i hiana a'owa' ma apa' si'i nagakolo'wai banagami ma apa'.
56003007	Anen nanda'as na'amba ma naga'i apa' epes be'epa hilili'i ma okom anamba Jisasi atona lu'unai naganagaila ape'i. Ea' nandandepapa ma mofa' ambal namili mogape andeande' lifilafi. Ea' apa' mahapifana mape mosasam.
56003008	Basef ifimba endilisifi ma apa' hiapai mogahapifif. Ae' a'i newalapa basef ifimba ni'if dindinipa epes isimba sagahapifa God ea'i ukup pendanda'ma sugalutu banagesa waf fasifi. Basef ifimba ma Jisas Krais naloma God, ifimba bu'wafi ma fegatopalopa epes.
56003009	Apa' basef amamba mamimami iwanimi esis sa'iama sogosambala waf fasifii, sa'i sondahihianama saga'i agof hiagufi bafasas akupas asasisii dowadowaf, sogafitapa mu'uli fowa' God nagaso' Mosesani, amambai ina' nindihi'amam. Dei' main, apa' mogawa amambai ina motopalopapa magawalapa anef waf bu'wafii, owa'.
56003010	Epen mamahina nanda' esis Kristen sandawal sagataga biafisi, inimba negesambala basef bu'wafii. Ina' nisindi'amona nomonas ananisi dindinip atetef a'a bif. Ama anin owa' neme' basef ine'ifia, dao' nekwahin newa'an alafuga.
56003011	Ina' negawa epen na'ambaini a' nakwaha ufia'w fasi'wi ea'. Waf awafi ananifi fihimba'mapa mogawa anin epen awani.
56003012	Anaf ae' i'i esapa' Artemas a'a Tikikus nogafe'mago ina', ina' ulal nifi'mai ae' mehip wambel ambalemba Nikopolis. Ina' negawa ae' a'ias ea' ma igapani Nikopolis nogota atamba aotama asaf lu'wafi figalatai.
56003013	Ina' numafi Senas nogogawa mu'uli esis Romi noloma Apolos andeande'. Ea' netopalopama hiahawes amom mofa'as mogafe' walemb hiagoma ma atiasi ina waowaola anis maefah ufia'w, owa'atin.
56003014	Ea' esis Kristen amam nematawa ape'isi sondalafa waf sugalutu banagesafi ma maol fasini naninani sogatopalopa epes isimba hiahawes akasi. Na'amba esis Kristen tol sope dowaf ea' ukup pese'asa sonda' waf bu'wafi Godi.
56003015	Amam nematawa sape sagalome na'ai esis sandagala salomago ina'. Ina' nendagala nelomago epes mamahisa ukup pagapagaila afa'i sahapifa God sagalomafai. Ae' a'i God notopalopago ipa' dowaf nope nolomago ipa' hipai hi'ilipa nowa' banagaipa. Basef ea' ma'uf.
57001001	Ae' Pol, ae' anda' kalabusa maol Krais Jisasi. Owamafa afa'inai Timoti nape nalome na'a'e. Ea' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ina' Filemon, alipunai afa'inai ma wanda' maol atin Godi. Ukup afa'ipi paipailina a'owa'.
57001002	Ae' anda' basef ifimba ma ina' naloma amam nematawa Godi sandakolas ipat ine'itai saloma haniti'mafa Apia kwaloma aman anamba Arkipus, nanda' maol Godi banagambel si'i soldia naloma afa' biafa.
57001003	Ae' a'i ahamapa God noloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais amom motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banagaepa monda' opalef ipe'ilifi fepe awanelef.
57001004	Dondol ae' anifela Goda nimaguf hiafi a'i agol ine'igili andabeten.
57001005	Dei' main, ae' ame'asa ina' nahapifa dembinai Jisas endilisi ea' okom ine'imi maimaila amam nematawa Godi hiasi hi'alas.
57001006	Ae' andabeten ahali' God a'i ina' ni'ipasa hapif ine'ini kofagena newa' banaga anis daias. Ina' nenda'as na'amba ma negegawa andeande' hiahaom bu'wami apa' magape sisihipama Kraisi mogofa'ami.
57001007	Owame ae'inai, ina' okom maimaila amam nematawa Godi ma negewa' banaga opalef asasilifi. Ea' ae' sonahemena a'owa' ma waf afamba ine'ifi ea' fewa' banaga opaf ae'afi awanef a'owa'.
57001008	Ea' okom ae'ami ma'i na'amba. Endilisi, ae' ape aposel banagewe ma agol Kraisi iga'ipina dindinipa nenda' anef waf usi'ifi.
57001009	Apa' ae' andaiwa' ma iga'ipina dindinip, owa'. God okom maimailafa ea' afa' wapani ukup paipaila epes hiasi. Isimba atis dei' ahali'ina. Ae' Pol, hagewe ea' dei' ape anda' kalabus anda' maol Krais Jisasi,
57001010	ae' ahali'ina ma nogame ae'anai Onesimus. Ina' niti anen uwahipina. Nogota atamba ape anda' kalabus, ae' a'ipana basef Godi. Ea' nahapifa Krais a' nataga nogame ae'anai.
57001011	Fowa' anen ina nanda' maol bu'wani ma ina', owa'atin. Ea' nandaiwa'mana. Apa' dei' a' la'ifina ma nonda' maol bu'wani ma nogatopalopa afa' biafa.
57001012	Dei' ae' esapa'ana notambel nefe'mago ina'. Ea' okom ae'ami mefe' molomanago.
57001013	Ae' anda' maol awalipasa basef bu'wafi Godi ea' sanda'e anda' kalabus. Ea' ae' a'i ela'ata Onesimus nope na'a nolome atapina noho'ofena ma nogatopalope.
57001014	Apa' i'i ina' nindaiwa'ma ela'atana nope nogalome ma, hapainai. Ae' andaiwa'ma iga'ipina dindinip. Ae' a'i ina' ni'i aho'ma okom ine'imi atoma anen nope nogalome.
57001015	Onesimus a' nakwahina nogota bandata nafe' anagona bola nefa'ana notanimai nope nolomena lifilafi dondol.
57001016	Ea' dei' anen ina ata' nagape lafela anis epes agol akanai, owa'atin. Anen a' nataga owamena endilisi ma Krais dondo'ma ukup pigapigailana endilisi. Aho' ae' okom maimailana. Apa' ina' atiasi okom mimilana a'owa', ni'i owamena ine'inai ma agol Dembinaii.
57001017	I'i ina' okom mondanda'ma ae' ni'i afa' wandao'oma endilisi wanda' maol Kraisi, dao' a' andeande'ma ina' nefa' Onesimus notanimago sonehenamana si'i na'i negefa' ae'.
57001018	I'i anen nonda' anef waf awafi ma ina' a'a nonda'mena anof wiaf fopomena, dao' ae' egwamonaf.
57001019	Dei' ae' Pol ahapila pen lagol ae'agili atogol anda' basef ifimba bandafi atif, ae' atiasi egwamona wiaf afamba. Endilisi ina' wapani nape si'i a' negewaola anof wiafa ae'. Wiaf afamba ina si'i otamba mais, owa'atin. Afamba ambal ine'ili atol. Dei' main, fowa' a'ipina basef bu'wafi nahapifif nefa' ambal namili nape andeande'.
57001020	Ea' owame alipinai, ae' ihali'ina ma agol Dembinaii, ina' ninifela Onesimus si'i owamena nagahapifa Kraisi. Afa' sahin owan wagahapifa Kraisi atofa. Ea' ina' nenda' opaf ae'afi fotaga bo'of newa' banagai sonehe.
57001021	Anda' basef ifimba, a' egawa endilisi ina' atiasi nigaila basef ifimba ae'afii. Ea' ae' dei' anda'ago basef ifimba ma ina'. Ea' egawa anif basef wapani, ina' atiasi nenda' anef waf bu'wafi endilisi fikila' isimba dei' a'ipina pas isi'i a'i ina' nenda'asi.
57001022	Ea' anif basef wapani. Ae' okom mandanda' a'i God atiasi neme' beten ipe'ini nokwaha ae' efe'mago ipa' wapani. Ea' dei' ina' nendondomba anagon nopomago ma ae' efo'o epe egalomena.
57001023	Epafras anen nape nanda' kalabus naloma ae' ma agol Krais Jisasi. Anen nanda'menago dagala nefe' nelomago ina'.
57001024	Ea' amom manda' maol magalumai, Mak naloma Aristarkusi Demasi Luk, amom wapani manda'menago dagala ina'.
57001025	Ae' a'i Dembinai Jisas Krais netopalopepa dowaf nowa' banagaipa ma waf afamba fepe felomago ambagufi ukup ipa' hipaii. Ea' ma'uf.
58001001	Fowa' gani God na'ipa akusapa bafasapa ape'isi na'amba, na'ipas nimaguf atef atin na'ipa amom profeta ufiawa hiawai mawalapas ma'ipasas.
58001002	Apa' dei' nogota ata'e a si'i nogota atamba anaf tigi' togatagai endilisi, nawalapa basef na'ipapa malogol Nogamana ananinai. God nandandepana ma nemaf akutaifi anen a' nope dembinaima hiahaom hiami ma itap ana'e moloma esis amam nematawa wapani. Anen atona nofa'as numafias. Fowa' gani God na'i aho' ma nogamana ananinai nanda' hiahaom hiami ambagof fagapaumi maloma ambagof akami magape ilif itapi hi'alam mataga magape.
58001003	Nogamana atona nogogala'i lu'unai Godi nahihimapa a'owa', anen ea' na'amba atin si'i God endilisi. Basef ananifi banagafi ifimba atif nowa' banaga hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam. Anen atona nanda' apa' epes mataga be'epa hilili' nanda'asa ea', dei' nape lagol banagagili Godi wa'ol, God banagonai nugumafi hiahaom hiamii.
58001004	Isimba atis dei' nataga Dembinai endilisi nikila' amom ensel hiami hi'alam. Dei' main, agol agalemba nogofa'agola ahamanai gikila' agof amom enseli ea' fasifasigil a'owa'.
58001005	Dei' main, fowa' God ina na'ipa anona ensel ananinai na'i, “Ina' nogame ae'inai, ae' Ahamena ine'iwai endilisi,” owa'. Basef ifimba na'ipa Nogamana ananinai atona. Ea' God na'ias wapani na'i, “Ae' atiasi etaga ahamana ananiwai, anen nope Nogame ae'anai.” God ina na'ipa anona ensela basef ifimba, owa'atin. Na'ipa nogamana ananinai atona.
58001006	Afamba God naga'ipa nogamana ananinai nape nagali'ma hiahaom hiamii, na'ias wapani na'i, “Amom ensel hiami Godi mondanda' lotu ma anen atona hi'indalam.”
58001007	Apa' basef ifimba God naga'ipa amom enselafi na'amba na'i, “Anen nanda' amom ensel mataga si'i fufin, nanda'am manda' maol ananini mataga si'i nif ileliwa fagalilif.”
58001008	Apa' Nogamana ananinai na'ipana na'i, “O God, ina' nape banagonai Dembinai nugumafi hiahaom hiamii, ea' anaf nepe atapina na'amba atin dondol lifilafi. Waf usi'ifi hilili'i atef ina' dei' nape Dembinai ma anamba ina' nagala'ambemagoma.
58001009	Ina' okom magaila waf bu'wafi usi'ifii nandafa'ma waf awafi sogosambala mu'uliefi. Ea' dei' God, anen God ine'inai si'ina, nandandepena nase'ena dagala lu'unai a'owa'. Apa' epes hiasi hi'alas ina sandagala si'i ina', owa'atin.”
58001010	Ea' God na'ias wapani na'i, “Dembinai, fowa' dambadamba ina' atina nanda' itap pataga, lagol ine'igili atogol ganda' ilif otaga wapani nataga nape.
