58001011	Amamba anaf higililam, apa' ina' negape atapinai. Amom molomofe' mofe' anaf motaga apim si'i luwaguf apifi.
58001012	Anaf ina' nila'watefam si'i sindiwa luwaguf sagakolasif, ea' amom moho'ofam si'i luwaguf. Apa' ina' dondol atapina negape na'amba atini, ea' ina anaf hagena nogota ine'itai, owa'atin.”
58001013	God ina na'ipa anona ensel ananinai na'i, “Ina' nepe na'a'e lagol kwahisigili ae'agili wa'ol banagogoma,” owa'atin. Anen na'ipa nogamana atona na'i, “Ina' nepe atapina nefe' nefe'ma nemaf afamba ae' enda' bousi ine'isi sogafe' lafela bo'wagah ine'igahi.” God ina na'ipa anona ensela basef ifimba, owa'atin. Na'ipa nogamana ananinai atona.
58001014	Dei' amom ensel mamahoma? Amom ambagof bu'wagufi manda'mana maol Godii. Anen nasapa'am mafi'i ma mogatopalopa epes isimba dei' God nofa'as sogotanimai ma anaf sogofa' poe bu'wani.
58002001	Jisas nikila' amom ensel a'owa'. Isimba atis dei' apa' mondahapila basef ifimba ananifi apa' magame'afi sisihif mondailif dindinip. Na'amba ambepama basef ifimba mondahagas mokwahona.
58002002	Fowa' gani God na'ipa amom ensela basef ananifi, ea' ma'ipipaef fandawalap endilisi. Dei' basef ifimba fape banagefa epes mamahisa sosambalifa owa' silifa, esis sofa' akafimi amamba mondahama du'waniga asasinai ma sogosambalif.
58002003	God nagwamasa akafimi lu'wami esis sogosambala basef ananifii ensel amamba maga'ipasafi. Dei' ipa' ukup pandanda' pa'imama? I'i pegewa' alafugaha basef ananifi dei' natopalopapa nofa'apa mogape andeande'i, anaf ipa' pefa' pefe' pindihi'ama akafimi amamba pi'imama? Owa'atin endilisi. Pefa' akafimi pelomas. Dei' main, amamba nakwahomapa waf awafi natopalopapa mogotanimai, ina sa'umi, owa'atin. Lu'wami endilisi. Dembinai atona nali' nawalapam alihima anis epes. Epes isimba sihimba'mapa ma mogogawa basef amamba endilisim atom.
58002004	Ea' God nowa' banaga basef amamba ma ufiawa hiawai wawiwawi. Ano'w nihimba'masa ametal naninani hiani banagani. Apa' ano'w nanda' banagami lu'wami mamimami si'i anen atona nanda'ami. Ea' ano'w akwamba nawalogamasi hiahaom fasimi dowaf Ambal bu'unai ananinai nagaso'asami, naila okom ananimi atom nandahamam dindi'i dondo' na'amba ma nigihimba'mapa basef amamba endilisimi atom.
58002005	God ina nanda' amom ensel mape dambema mugumafi waf hiafi dambaifi Jisas nagawalapef ea'i, dei' aga'ipipafi, owa'atin.
58002006	Apa' anif basef fagail Baibeli fowa' anona aman nawalapef naga'iefi na'i, “God, epes esis mamahisa ma ina' okom magapomas? Esis falafisi atis, ina' atina nimafias.
58002007	Ina' nanda' amom ensel mape dambem banagema esis nogota bandata dowaf. Ina' naso'asa agol lu'wagili galoma gawa fasini a'owa'.
58002008	Ea' nanda' hiahaom hiami mafe' lafela esisa sugumafiam.” Basef ifimba fagail Baibeli fa'i, “Aho', God nanda' epes sagape itapi sape dambes sumafi hiahaom hiami magape itapi.” Basef ifimba fa'i hiahaom hiami magape itapi kofagefa fa'i hiahaom hi'alam. Apa' dei' ina mati epes sagape itapi sape dambes sumafi hiahaom chi'alam, ata' owa'.
58002009	Apa' dei' mogawa Jisas! Fowa' nogota bandata God nanda'ana nafe' lafela amom ensel. God nati apa' uwahipipa natopalopapa dowaf, dei' Jisas nofa' akafimi lu'wami naga' ma apa' hiapai hi'agalapa. Isimba atis dei' God naso'ana agol lu'wagili nanda'ana nataga dembinai king nogala' a'owa'.
58002010	God anen Dembinai nanda' hiahaom hiami mataga mape numafiama banagami ananimi mape andeande'. Ea' andeande'ma naga'i aho'ma Jisas nogame' akafimi nanda' ufia'w bu'wakwi ma apa'. God nanda'am na'amba ma nokolasa apa' epes hiapai nofa'apa mogafe' heven mugati mogogala'i ananimi. Dei' main, Jisas atona nanda' ufia'w ma nokwahomapa waf awafi nofa'apa mogotanimai.
58002011	Anen atona nanda'apa amam nematawa mataga be'epa hilili' malomana wambota atotota ahamapa atotona. Isimba atis dei' anen ina ambal aola nofalapa naga'i sahin owan ananipai, owa'atin.
58002012	Si'i anen na'ias naga'i, “God, ae' atiasi ewalapa agol ine'igili ma esis sahin owan ae'asi. Ae' enda' awalef esa'ma agol ine'igili ma esis hiasi sunduwa'anima atogon hi'igalas.”
58002013	Ea' na'ias wapani na'i, “Ae' ahapifa God banagewe.” Ea' anif wapani na'if na'i, “Ae' ape aloma awasi ae'asi God nagasi'iesi.”
58002014	Epes anen nogofalapa awasi ananipai, epes itapasi sogolapai. Isimba atis Jisas wapani nataga epen na'amba atin si'i apa' epes itapasi sogolasi. Anen nataga epen na'amba ma naga' nogahambombaga aman anamba Satan banagona nanda' epes hiasi sagaga'i.
58002015	Jisas natagwaha amam nematawa hiasi dondol ombal mahasa ga', magahapilas sisihisi. Owa' anen natagwahisa ombal amamba magahasi.
58002016	Dei' main, anen ina naga' natopalopa amom ensel, owa'atin. Anen naga'ma nagatopalopa epes sagataga wambota mini'ap Abrahami.
58002017	Isimba atis anen nataga na'amba atin endilisi si'i owasana ananisi ma nagataga pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii. Anen aman naga'i uwahipigama ape'i nanda' maol Godi andeande' endilisi ma nogatofa okom wandafunai Godi nagapoma amam nematawa hiasi sanda' waf awafii.
58002018	Anen atona name' akafimi ea' nofa' gwamba hiani natagamana na'i nenda'ana nonda' waf awafii. Ea' anen la'ifinai ma nogatopalopa epes isimba gwamba nagatagamasi.
58003001	Ipa' alipipai epes Godi, anen nagape ilifi nogofalipai, ipa' peme'. Ipa' ukup pendanda'ma Jisas, anen aposel nogape pris Dembinai ma waf faloma basef kofagefa apa' ea' mahapilaf magawalipasafi.
58003002	Anen naila okom Godi nanda' maol God nandandepanana nonda'ani, si'i fowa' Moses nanda' maol ananini datima natopalopa epes hiasi Godi hi'alas.
58003003	Aman anamba Jisas, God naso'ana agol lu'wagili gikila' agol lu'wagili Mosesi, si'i epes sagaso'ana agol lu'wagili aman nanda' ipat bu'utai nagala'atai itap apa'ii. Apa' esis ina safela agola ipat atamba lu'wagol, owa'atin.
58003004	Endilisi, ifagw hiagwi hi'alagw epes sala'agw. Ea' epen okom kilikala'ma nanda' hiahaom hiami hi'agalami, anen God atona.
58003005	Endilisi, Moses nanda' maola nagatopalopa epes Godi hi'alas datima andeande' nanda'an si'i nanda' maol Godi, ea' na'i basef nawalapefa hiahawes anaf owagama God noga'iasi.
58003006	Apa' Krais nape nogamana naila basef endilisi a'owa' nanda' maol datima ma nogape Dembinai nugumafi epes wambota Godi. I'i dondol apa' mohapifana banagepa mi'i endilisi anaf mofa' hiahaom amamba fasimi dei' mape mogohafami, dao' endilisi apa' a' mape wambota ananipai.
58003007	Ea' dei' apa' mondame' basef Ambal bu'unai Godi naga'iefi andeande'. Anen naga'i na'amba na'i, “Dei' nemaf mamahefa ipa' pegame' malogol ananigili,
58003008	ipa' ina apesopama nelelemb ipe'ilimbi sisihilimb a'owa', si'i fowa' bafasepa sanda'am sogosambala basef Godi ma sanda' okom ananinai numbutina, owa'i. Nogota atamba esis sagape anamba wafigima fataupigima esis sagwambana a'owa' sasopama nelelemb.
58003009	Esis bafasepa ipe'isi sati banagami hiami ae' anda'ami anamba wafigima ma afagof hiagufi 40-pelaiguf. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Esis sandanda' ae' gwambai gwambae endilisi a'owa'.
58003010	Esis sanda'me isimba atis, ae' dei' okom numbutimas endilisi a'i, ‘Lifilafi ukup asasipi paso'asa ufia'w bu'wakwi sololama'w. Esis ina ata' saila waf bu'wafi ae'afi, a' owa'atin.’
58003011	Ea' ae' okom numbutima esis a'i basef endilisifi atif banagafi a'i, ‘Anaf esis ina ata' sifi'i suwis sopoma noma'w solome, owa'atin endilisi!’”
58003012	Alipipai ae'ipai, ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba anin sahin owan la'afena ipa' a' okom mimila waf awafi nekwaha hapif ananini newa' alafugama God nagape namona atapinaii.
58003013	Na'ambai owa'i. Apa' ipa' pendewa' banagama atina waf awafi ina fembaso'ma anin epen atitin ipe'ini ninda'ima opaf ananifi sisihif. Penda'as na'amba atin nimaguf danda nogota ata'e God naga'i, “Dei'i” penda'as pilas pendape atapipa.
58003014	Apa' fowa' mali' mahapifana, ea' dei' mondahapifana sisihipa atapipa, mefe' motagama mogaga'. I'i apa' monda'as na'amba atapipa, dao' apa' a' amam nematawa endilisi Kraisi, ma anaf mofa' hiahaom fasimi mogalomana.
58003015	Si'i basef fagail Baibeli doko' aga'ipipafi faga'ias fa'i, “Dei' ipa' i'i pegame' basefa malogol ananigilima, ipa' ina pesopama nelelemb ipe'ilimbi sisihilimb a'owa' si'i fowa' pegewa' alafugaha Goda panda' okom ananinai numbutina, owa'i.”
58003016	Fowa' epes ami same' basef malogol Godi sowa' alafugahana sanda' okom ananinai numbutina? Epes isimba hiasi fowa' Moses nofa'asi sakwaha Isip sagafi'i, ea' isimba atis.
58003017	Afagof agwafomba hiagufi 40-pelaiguf God okom numbutima ami? Anen okom numbutima epes isimba sanda' waf awafii, ea' saga' lamonas anamba wafigima fataupigima, isimba atis.
58003018	God na'i anis epes na'i basef endilisifi atif banagafi ma esis ina a' sefe' suwis sopoma noma'w solomana. Na'i epes mamahisa? Anen na'i isimba atis.
58003019	Ea' dei' apa' mogawa esis ina atiasi la'ifisa sefe' suwis sopoma noma'w sogalomana, owa'atin. Dei' main, esis ina sahapifana, owa'.
58004001	Basef Godi banagafi endilisi dei' ata' fape atapif. Anen naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Ipa' pefe' piwis anamba sogapoma noma'wa ae'agima.” Apa' a' ombal mondahapa. Na'amba God niti anin epen atitin ipe'ini okom mohan nelelama amamba nefe' higililan, owa'.
58004002	Dei' main, apa' wapani mame' basef bu'wafi si'i fowa' esis Israel sagame'afi. Apa' esis same'ef dowadowaf, ina sahapifif, owa'atin. Ea' basef ifimba bu'wafi sagame'afi ina fatopalopas kwasakwasala, owa'atin.
58004003	Amam nematawa magahapifa Godi apa' dei' mafe' mawis mapoma noma'w maloma God, si'i anen naga'ias na'i, “Ae' okom numbutim ea' a'i basef endilisifi atif banagafi a'i, esis ina suwis sopoma noma'w solome, owa'atin endilisi!” Fowa' nanda' itap apa'e hi'alap ea' napoma noma'w nogota laota nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei'. Anen napoma noma'w nasasa esis suwis sopoma noma'w sogalomana. Owa', esis ina sawis, owa'atin.
58004004	Anif basef God fowa' naga'iefi ma nemaf afamba fagafe'ma 7i sagapoma noma'wafi, faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “God nanda' maol hiani hi'alan ea', nemaf afamba fagafe'ma 7i fataga, napoma noma'w.”
58004005	Basef ifimba doko'ifi God naga'ias wapani na'i, “Esis ina sefe' suwis sopoma noma'w solome, owa'atin endilisi.”
58004006	Esis amam nematawa isimba fowa' sagame' basef bu'wafi ina safe' sawis, owa'. Dei' main, esis ina sahapifana endilisi, owa'. Apa' basef ifimba ata' fape atapif fa'i endilisi anis epes atiasi asofe' suwis sopoma noma'w soloma God.
58004007	Isimba atis dei' ea' nandandepa anef nemaf daiaf wapani. Ea' nofala nemaf afamba na'i dei' atef. Ea' afagof hiagufi fafe'ma ea', God nawalapa basefa nemaf afamba na'i basef ananifi doko'ifi ma malogol Deviti na'amba na'i, “Dei' ipa' i'i pegame' basefa malogol ananigilima, ipa' ina pesopama nelelemb ipe'ilimbi banagelemb a'owa', owa'i.”
58004008	I'i nemaf afamba fowa' Josua nonda'as suwis sopoma noma'wai, anaf God ina ni'i anef nemaf daiaf, owa'atin. Apa' owa' owa'atin. Esis ina sawis, owa'.
58004009	Isimba atis dei' mogawa waf afamba mogapoma noma'wafi ata' fape atapifa apa' epes amam nematawa Godi. Waf afamba si'i God nagapoma noma'w nemaf afamba fagafe'ma 7i.
58004010	Dei' main, epes mamahisa sofe' suwis sopoma noma'w sogaloma Godi esis asambifa maol asasini ea' sapoma noma'w, si'i fowa' God nambifa maol ananini ma nagapoma noma'w.
58004011	Ea' dei' apa' mondanda' maol banagambel mofe' muwis mopoma noma'w mondalomana. Na'amba anin epen ape'ini nesambala basef Godi newa ma waf awafi anaf higililan si'i fowa' esis sanda'ama sowa higilagalas lamonas.
58004012	Dei' main, basef Godi na'if atapif fagapani, ea' banagef atapif. Ifimba hikalif a'owa' fikila' bainat hikakalina wa'owa'ili fapisila epes fagawis nomon endilisii. Basef ifimba fawis fafe' la'afena ukupi ambagof asasisi sondowatanimama a' fafe' fawala so'matagwi gonat la'afisa. Ea' fawaloga ukupi nomonas ape'isi nomon.
58004013	Ina anom hiahaom God nanda'ami atiasi mondambaho'ma anen, owa'atin. Hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam ea' mandawisi' mape mandawalap alihim endilisi ma naep ananipi. Ea' anaf apa' mi'ipana waf maif hiafi hi'ilaf apa' manda'afi.
58004014	Apa' anona pris Dembinai ape'inai nape nagali'ina pris hiamii nafe' nawis heven endilisi nape naloma God. Anen Jisas, Nogamana Godi. Ea' dei' apa' mondahapifa waf mahapifa God magawalapafi tetele'if.
58004015	Pris anamba Dembinai anen la'ifinama nogati apa' uwahipipa, nogota mamahotama apa' owa' banagepama mogahagasa waf awafia, ea' alop owa' la'ifipa ma monda' maola. Hiahaom hiami hi'alam mataga magagwamba ape'i, amamba mali' mataga magwamba anen wapani ea'. Apa' anen ina nanda' anef waf awafi, owa'atin endilisi.
58004016	Isimba atis apa' dei' ukup banagep mondafe' felefele'ma God, ombal mogahapa owa'i. Anen nagatopalopa apa' dowafi ma magape andeande'i. Ea' apa' mofe'ma anona atiasi niti uwahipipa notopalopapa dowaf nugumafiapa nogota mamahotama mogofa' nimanimi akafimi awamiatai.
58005001	Waf afamba fowa' sandandepa pris hiami dembami mape magali'ma pris hiamii na'amba. Anota nogota sandandepa anona sanda'ana napoma maol Godi ma nogofa' malogof epesi nugalutu naep Godi. Esis saso'ana hiahawes fasisi naso' God nondolalimanama nogakwaha waf awafi esis sanda'afi.
58005002	Anen pupulina ea' ina banagona ma nonda' waf bu'wafi atef nimaguf danda, owa'. Isimba atis sanda'ana dei' la'ifinama nogatopalopa esis sagakwaha ufia'w Godi nonda'as sa'ombemas.
58005003	Anen pupulina, isimba atis dei' nondolali ma God nagakwaha waf awafi ananifi faloma waf awafi esis amam nematawai wapani.
58005004	Maol inimba nondolalima Godi nogofa' agol lu'wagilii. Ea' ina anona aman la'ifina ma nogofa' maol inimba okom ananimi atom, owa'atin. God nili' nofalana, dao' nohapila maol inimba, si'i fowa' nogofala Eran.
58005005	Krais wapani na'amba atin. Anen ina nasa'ma agol ananigili atogol nataga pris dembinai, owa'atin. God atona nandandepana nanda' maol inimba, ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ina' Nogame ae'inai. Dei' awalapena alihina asa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol.”
58005006	Ea' God na'i basef du'wanif wapani na'ias na'amba na'i, “Ina' nepe pris Dembinai dondol lifilafii nendelalimai na'amba atin nendahama Melkisedek.”
58005007	Fowa' Jisas ata' nagape epen endilisi itap apa'e, nandabeten nagahali' God, la'ifinai ma nofa'ana nokwaha ga' ma nogape namona. Nandabeten, nofalana mehip nalef nape hiafi. Anen natalogofa anen atona nafe' lafela God. Ea' dei' God name'anama beten ananini.
58005008	Endilisi Jisas Nogamana Godi, owa' anen name' akafimi, ea' amamba atom mawalipana endilisi ma waf nagaila okom Godi.
58005009	Anen nataga nogamana Godi bo'ona endilisii. Isimba atis dei' anen kofagonama epes sagaila basef ananifii nokwahomas waf awafi sofa' ambal namili sogape andeande' lifilafi.
58005010	God nandandepana ea' na'i, “Ina nepe pris Dembinai nendelalima ae' na'amba atin nendahama Melkisedek.”
58005011	Basef hiafi Melkisedeki ata' fape ea' dei' a'i i'ipipaef. Apa' owa' dei' ipa' ina pandagala ma pegegawa basef Godi kofagefa, owa'atin. Ea' dei' ae' maol lu'wani ahifin a'owa' ma igihimba'mepa basef ifimba kofagefa.
58005012	Dei' nogota ata'e ea' ma ipa' pegape dembipai tisa pigawalipa anis daias. Apa' owa' owa'atin. Ipa' gawa du'wanin atina ukup ipe'ipi, ea' anona aman ata' nowalipipa wapani ma basef fagali'i Godi. Ipa' ina banagepa pegegawa basef lu'wafi Godi si'i paga' gwa'aisi banagasi, ata' owa'. Ipa' ilama ata' pegegawa basef fagali'i Godi atif si'i paga' nomagof atogof.
58005013	Apa' mogawa epes mamahisa saga' nomagof atogufi, esis sagape awasi sa'wisi atis. Isimbai ina dei' la'ifisa sogawaloga waf bu'wafi awafi, ata' owa'.
58005014	Apa' gwa'aisi banagasi sapoma epes isimba ea' sagataga dambes banagasi atis. Epes isimba ea' sawalipa ukupi nomonas asasisi atis hihif dondola dei' banagesa sogawaloga waf bu'wafi awafi.
58006001	-
58006002	Apa' ina ata' atapipa mi'i basef ifimba fagali'i Kraisi atif timbi tambel, owa'. Apa' ina mi'i basef ifimba fagali'i mi'i, apa' mondambema nelelemba God mowa' alafugaha waf hiafi awafi fanda' epes higiligalasi ea' mondahapifa Goda basef fafifafi sagapisi'asa embeli sandabeten sagawamona lagofa anis epes, faloma epes hiasi sagaga'i sogosafel wapani, a anaf God nowawaloga epes hiasi ma sogape atapis wambel bu'wambili beloma awambili. Apa' ina mope monda' basef ifimba atif kikif atapif timbi tambel, owa'. Apa' ata' mofo'o atefas ea' monda' basef fegewa' banagasi mi'if si'i isimba dambes ea'i.
58006003	I'i okom God mi'i isimbaiai, dao' monda'as na'amba atin.
58006004	Epes isimba sowa ma waf awafi sogowa' alafugaha Godi, ina ano'w ufia'wa esis sotanima sifi'i sogambema nelelemb wapani, owa'atin. Esis sali' sofa' nogogala'i Godi, sofa' presen hiahaom fasimi magafi'i heveni ea', a sofa' Ambal bu'unai Godi napais.
58006005	Ea' sambama basef Godi sameme'mef, asogawef fasif a'owa', sameme'ma maol banagani dambaini hiani alipisi Kraisi sanda'ani.
58006006	I'i esis sowa ma waf awafi, sowa' alafugaha God a'owa', ina ata' ano'w ufia'wa esis sotanimai sifi'i sogambema nelelemb wapani, a' owa'atin. Waf afamba esis sanda'afi atef, dei' sandola Nogamana Godi nail lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai wapani ma sagahambombagana. Esis sowa' alafugaha God sanda' waf na'ambai, sanda' epes hiasi sanda'ana findiwana ma basef awafi.
58006007	Anep itap asaf falai lifilafi fanda'ap panda' gwa'aisi sataga salo andeande'ma sagatopalopa amam nematawa sanda' maol itap aof afambai, itap apamba God nanda'ap pape andeande'.
58006008	Apa' anep itap daiap panda' otalef wandafilifi atelef hielef fagatagai, apamba falafalafipi awasipi. Ea' felefele'ma God nogahambombaga itap apamba ma anaf fegandep nif lu'wafi.
58006009	Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai endilisi, dei' ae' a'ipipa basef ifimba nimanifi, apa' owa' ae' egawa endilisi anaf ipa' ina awepa higililipa na'amba, owa'atin. Ae' egawa God anaf notopalopepa nofa'ipai pepe andeande'.
58006010	God ina epen aunai ma atiasi okom mogaso'ana opeh hiahi ipa' panda'ahi, owa'atin. Ipa' ukup paipailana. Isimba atis dei' sasa'mai ipa' ma panda' maol inimba ma pegatopalopa amam nematawa ananisi. Ea' dei' ata' panda'as na'amba atapipa.
58006011	Ae' okom ma'i ipa' hipai atona atin ukup kilikala' pelele' na'amba atin pefe' pefe' petagama nemaf afamba Krais nogafi'afii ma pegegawa endilisi anaf anen nogofa'i ipa'.
58006012	Ae' a'i ipa' ina ala'uta tehepa, owa'i. Ipa' pindaila waf epes isimba sagahapifa God endilisii ma esis owa' ukup iwanip kwafalisa, sogofa' hiahaom bu'wami fowa' God na'iasa basef nagala' lapafi na'i nogaso'asam epes ananisii.
58006013	Fowa' God naloma Abraham ma'i basef endilisifi magala' lapafi. Ea' ina anona aman daiana dembinai nikila' God, ama God noga'i basef ifimba endilisifi atifa agol ananigili atogol, owa'atin. Ea' dei' God na'i basef ifimba nagala' lapafi endilisifi atifa agol ananigili atogol.
58006014	Anen na'i, “Dei' ae' a'i endilisi atis, etopalopena enda' wambota bafasena ine'isi sigi' sogatagai sotaga hias a'owa'.”
58006015	Ea' Abraham name' basef ifimba dei' ina ala'uta tahana kwafalis, owa'atin. Nape nasasa hiahaom fasimi God fowa' na'i noso'anam mugaila basef ifimba magala' lapafi.
58006016	Waf epes saga'i basef endilisifi atif saga'if banagafi afamba. Epes saga'i basef ifimbai ma agol anona dembinai nikila' esis. I'i anin epen niga'i basef ifimbai, anin nasopama malogofa epes mamahisa sa'i sogapa'aga basef ananifii.
58006017	Fowa' God na'i nihimba'mas okom ananimi mape atapim alihima awasi ananisi anaf sogofa' hiahaom fasimi si'i naga'ipas basef ananifi nagala' lapafi. Na'i nihimba'masa anaf anen ina nonda' anif dambaifi feha'ofa basef ifimba ananifi, owa'atin. Ifimba atif. Isimba atis dei' na'ias banages endilisi atisa agol ananigili atogol nogowa' banaga basef ifimba nagala' lapafi.
58006018	Anen na'i basef ifimba nagala' lapafi, ma main na'i anif basef na'ambaif atini naga'i endilisi atisafi. Basef ifimba biafif faga'ias na'amba atin dei' fape atapif, ina anin mae neloma anis soho'ofef, owa'atin endilisi. Anen na'ipapa basef ifimba ma fegewa' banaga nelelemb ape'ilimbi endilisi, apa' amam nematawa mafa' mafe' mandambaho' felefele'ma anini. Anen na'ipapa basef ifimba ma mogohapifif tatala'if mogawa endilisi mogahapila hiahaom fasimi mape mogohafami.
58006019	Gawa inimba ma apa' mogogawa endilisi anaf mohapila hiahaom fasimi, nagape na'amba. Gawa inimba banagani fasini mape magasasani inimba na'ambai nogombalo' opalefi ambagof ape'isi si'i sanda' anka nogombalo' sip lu'wapi nahapilap sisihip atapip pagala embel ilif. Gawa bu'wani inimba nawis hi'alan newala gani nomon bo'wagon hilili'ma lowaf lu'wafi alafugaifa sandolaf fagail si'i uta ipat Godi lu'unai heven nomon.
58006020	Anamba Jisas nali'apa nafe' nawis ipat anamba nomon ma nogatopalopapa. Anen nataga pris dembinai dei' nape atapina dondol lifilafi na'amba atin si'i Melkisedek.
58007001	Aman anamba Melkisedek anen king dembinai nugumafi anembel wambel Salemi, anen pris nondolalima God Dembinai nagape ilif endilisii. Fowa' Abraham nanda' wandaf naha anom king dembami nali'amonam nafe' ma notanima nafe' wambel owa' Melkisedek natolona ea' nofalo'mana nowa' banagona.
58007002	Ea' Abraham nawaloga hiahawes gwa'aisi mais ananisi hi'alas ilifunamais atona atin, naso'ana du'wanis ilifunamais safe'ma Melkisedek. Apa' dei' mambema agol agalemba Melkisedek, basef kofagefa biafif. Anif fa'i king dembinai nanda' waf usi'ifi atef datimaii. Ea' anif fa'i anen king dembinai nogaso'apa opalef awanelifii. Dei' main, anen king dembinai nugumafi wambel ambalemba Salemi, dei' mambema basef ifimba ma Salem ma'i opalef awanelef.
58007003	Anen Ahamanai ma'mana akana. Anen bafasana wambota ananisi akana. Ea' nemaf ma'mana kogolanafi owa', ea' nemaf nagaga'afi wapani owa' sogawafa. Anen nape si'i Nogamana Godi, nape pris dembinai nogape atapina dondol lifilafii.
58007004	Dei' ipa' ukup pendapoma Melkisedek, anen agol lu'wagilinai endilisi. Dembinai bafamapa ape'inai nagali'i anen Abraham. Anen natambe' hiahaom hiami bu'wami atom nogofa'ama wandafi nawaloga ilifunamaim atona atin ea' nakolasom ondot atota naso'anam mafe'ma Melkisedek.
58007005	Amom wambota awasi bafapana Livaii anom a' mofa' maol inimba pris. Ea' mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani na'ipa amom atom manda' maol inimbai na'amba na'i amom a' mondowaloga hiahawes isimba hiasi du'wanis ilifunamais atona atin esis Israeli. Esis Israel sahin owan amamisi endilisi, ea' esis bafasana awasi Abrahami wapani. Apa' owa', owa'atin, amom Livai mofa' gwa'aisi mais hiasi du'wanis ilifunamaisa esis sahin owan amamisi.
58007006	Apa' Melkisedek ina nataga wambota amamutai, owa'. Apa' owa', anen nogofa' hiahawes du'wanis ilifunamais hiasi Abraham nogawalogasi. Ea' Melkisedek nofalo'mana na'ipana nowa' banaga aman anamba basef bu'wafi God nala' lapef fagapomanai.
58007007	Apa' ea' mogawa, aman nogofalo'manai nape ilifa aman anamba nogofa' blesin inimbai.
58007008	Amom Livai manda' maol mondolalima Godi mofa' hiahawes du'wanis ilifunamais, amom anaf mogaga'i atom. Apa' Melkisedek nofa' hiahawes sagawalogasi du'wanis ilifunamaisi, anen nagape namunai dondol lifilafii, si'i buk Baibel naga'i.
58007009	-
58007010	Apa' ilama muga'ias na'amba. Fowa' Melkisedek nagatagama Abraham ufia'wafi, Abraham naso'ana hiahawes isimba nogawalogasi ilifunamais du'wanis safe'ma Melkisedek. Ama main, Livai bafapana magi' mataga manda' maol inimba mofa' hiahawes isimba ilifunamais du'wanis esis Israel sagawalogasi. Ea' na'amba atin si'i Livai nagaso'ana du'wanis Melkisedeka lagol Abrahami. Dei' main, nemaf afamba Abraham nagaso'anas Melkisedekafi, Livai owa' ata' solana notagaia, ata' nape opalef nomon bafapana Abrahami.
58007011	Fowa' esis amam nematawa sofa' basefa mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani. Kofagonama mu'uli inimbai amom wambota Livai mahapila maol inimba pris. Apa' i'i maol inimba amom pris manda'ani ilama nenda' esis amam nematawa sotaga bo'wesa naep Godiai, dei' maina ata' anona pris dambainai nogataga wapani si'i Melkisedek, apa' ina si'i Eran? Owa'atin.
58007012	Basef ifimba dei' fape banagef na'amba. I'i amom pris monda' hu'ufi ho'of anaf nemaf, ea' dao' basefa mu'uli inimba wapani a' nenda' hu'ufi ho'of na'amba atin.
58007013	Dembinai ape'inai basef ifimba faga'ianai, anen anota wambota daiata. Wambota ananitai ina a' anona fowa' nanda' maola belita amom magaofa mafis mais mondolalima Godatai, owa'atin.
58007014	Apa' mogawa, Dembinai ape'inai nataga wambota Judai. Apa' Moses ina na'i anom wambota atambaimi motaga mope pris, owa'atin.
58007015	Apa' mati anona pris dembinai nataga, naho'ofa amom pris magali'i, fataga anen si'i Melkisedek. Basef ifimba ma mu'uli inimba fataga faha'ofa mu'uli inimba nagali'i dei' fandawalap alihif na'amba.
58007016	Anen ina nataga prisa anin mu'uli epesi, a'a wambota mamahotama, owa'. Anen nataga prisa banagami ambal namili lagapaunai lifilafi dondoli.
58007017	Dei' main, basef fagail Baibeli faga'i anen fa'i, “Ina' nepe pris dembinai dondol lifilafi nendahama Melkisedek.”
58007018	God nelefata mu'uli inimba nagaso' Mosesani ea'. Dei' main, mu'uli inimba owa' banagena negatopalopa apa'a, owa'atin.
58007019	Mu'uli inimba ina nanda' anis epes sataga bo'wes hilili' ma naep Godi, owa'atin. Ea' dei' God nandogwa ano'w ufia'w, akwamba bu'wakwi kwikila' mu'uli inimba, dei' ufia'w akwamba ato'w apa' mofe' felefele'ma anen.
58007020	Afamba God nandandepa Jisasa mogataga pris Dembinai, ina nanda'ana nosaho'ana dowaf, owa'atin. Anen na'i basef endilisifi atif naga'if banagafi ea' nandandepana. Amom pris fowa'imi ina nandandepam na'amba si'i anen, owa'.
58007021	Apa' God na'i basef endilisifi atif naga'if banagafi ea' nanda' Jisas nataga pris dembinai. Anen nataga pris nemaf afamba God na'ipana naga'i, “Dembinai na'i basef endilisifi atif naga'if banagafima anaf anen ina noho'ofa okom ananimi wapani, owa'atin. Ina' nepe pris dembinai dondol lifilafi.”
58007022	God na'i basef ifimba naga'if banagafi. Isimba atis dei' Jisas nataga Dembinai kofagonama basef bu'wafi dambaifi God nagala' lapafi fikila' basef fowa' nali' nagala' lapafi.
58007023	Fowa' amom pris amom hiami. Dei' main, amom anaf mogaga'i ina la'ifima mogape atapim, owa'.
58007024	Apa' Jisas dei' nogape namona atapina dondol lifilafii. Isimba atis dei' a' nape pris Dembinai atapina.
58007025	Isimba atis dei' anen la'ifinai nofa' esis amam nematawa sogotanimai felefele'ma Goda agol ananigili, ma sogape andeande' lifilafi. Dei' main, anen nogape ambal lagapaona lifilafii nandabetena God nogatopalopas.
58007026	Pris Dembinai na'ambainai, la'ifina endilisi ma nogatopalopapa. Anen bo'ona hilili'i, waf awafi akana. Anen okom bu'wamunai, dei' nape laogona epes awasi sanda' waf awafii. God naso'ana agol lu'wagili nikila' ilif a' ilif a'owa'.
58007027	Amom pris dembami fowa'imi mondolalima God nimaguf hiafi dondol. Magali' ata' mondolalimana ma nagakwaha waf awafi amamifi. Ama main, magi' mondolalimana ma nagakwaha waf awafi esis amam nematawai. Apa' Jisas ina nanda'as si'i amom, owa'atin. Anen nondolali ma God nemaf atetef dowafa waf awafi epes hiasii ea' ma'um. Ama naso' anen atona nagafe'ma God.
58007028	Mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani nesaho' amam amamba owa' la'ifima monda' waf bu'wafi nimaguf dandaia ea' mape pris dembami. Apa' basef ifimba endilisifi atif God naga'if banagafi, ifimba fataga fagi'ma mu'uli inimbai, fandandepa Nogamana ananinai, anen nagataga bo'ona hilili' atapinai.
58008001	Basef ifimba anda'afi fape fagali'i, kofagefa na'amba. Apa' ea' anona pris Dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii na'amba atin si'i basef fagali'i faga'iana. Anen nagape sia bu'wani Dembinaii wa'ol banagagoma felefele'ma lagol kwahisigilima gani heven.
58008002	Anen nahapila maol inimba nondolali ma God ipat lu'unai ananinai. Ipat anamba lotu'unai endilisinai. Anona aman ina nala' ipat anamba, owa'atin. Dembinai atona nasa'mana notawa.
58008003	Fowa' God nandandepa amom pris dembami mofa' hiahawes fasisi gwa'aisi mafis sasisasi ma mondolalimana. Ea' Dembinai ape'inai wapani nofa'i anis hiahawes nondolalimanasi.
58008004	I'i anen itapanaiai, anen ina dei' nope pris Dembinai, owa'. Dei' main, amom hiami ea' mape pris manda' maola mogofa'i hiahawes isimba hiasi mondolalima God, si'i mu'uli nagaso' Mosesani naga'ias. Apa' owa'atin, anen ina nape nanda' maol inimba itap apa'e, owa'.
58008005	Amom mahapila maol inimba mondolalima Godani manda' maol ipat ananinai fowa' sanda' lotuwanai nondola'waif dowafa ipat nani endilisinai hilili'i nagape heveni. Isimba atis afamba Moses na'i nogala' ipat anamba sogowalo' selanai, God na'ipana na'i, “Ina' solawaina ombal mondehena andeande'ma atiasi nenda' hiahaom hiami hi'ilam migi'mam mondahamam dindi'i dondo' endilisi si'i ametal inimba ae' igihimba'menam halafuta Sainaii.”
58008006	Apa' owa', Jisas ea' nanda' maol inimba nondolalima Godani ea' maol inimba a' nikila'an endilisi maol amom pris fowa'imi manda'ani. Dei' main, anen nape la'afena Godi epes ananisi ma basef ifimba dambaifi God nala' lapef nagalomasafi. Ea' dei' basef ifimba dambaifi fikila' basef fowa'ifi God nala' lap nagaloma Mosesafi. Isimba atis dei' basef ifimba dambaifi fataga fawalapai basef bu'wafi endilisifi God nogowa'ef sisihifi fikila' fowa'ifi.
58008007	I'i basef ifimba fowa' God nala' lap nagaloma Mosesafi fepe be'ef atapifai, dei' basef ifimba God nagala' lapafi fagafe'ma bifi, maol fenda'ani owa' anina. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
58008008	Owa' God nawalapa waf awafi epesi, ea' na'i, “Ae' Dembiwai a'i, ‘Peme! Anaf anef nemaf atetef enda' anif basef dambaifi ela' lapef egaloma esis mini'ap wambota Israeli ma mini'ap Judai wapani.
58008009	Basef ifimba dambaifi ina fandahama ifimba anif fowa'ifi ala' lapef a'if agaloma esisi, owa'atin. Fowa' ala' lapa basef ifimba alomasa, afamba agahipa lagof asasigufi ma efa'as sakwaha itap lu'upa Isipi sagafe'. Apa' esis ina saila basef ifimba ala' lap agalomasafi, owa'atin. Ea' dei' andambema ewa'asa alafuga esis.’ Ae' Dembiwai aga'ias na'amba.
58008010	Anaf nimaguf ifimba hi'ilif, ama main, ae' enda' anif basef ela' lapef eloma mini'ap esis Israeli. Basef ifimba kofagefa na'amba. Anaf enda' mu'uli ae'ani nepe opalef asasilifi nomon, ea' enda'an nepe ukup asasipi nomon. Ea' epe God asasiwai, esis sope amam nematawa wambota ae'asi.
58008011	Anaf esis amam nematawa hiasi atona atin maol akasa sogawalipa esis alipisi asasisi sogaloma sahin owan asasisi siga'i, ‘Ipa' pendegawa Dembinai’, owa'atin. Dei' main, nogota atamba epes hiasi a' sogawa ae' andeande' hi'ilas, awasi sa'wisi soloma isimba ea' dambesi wapani.
58008012	Anaf ae' iti esis uwahipis ea' etopalopas dowaf sotanimai sope andeande', ea' ili'amona waf awafi esis sanda'afi. Ea' waf afamba awafi asasifi anaf ae' ina ata' okom mondanda'maf wapani, a' owa'atin.”
58008013	Basef ifimba dei' nagala' lapafi God nofalef na'i basef ifimba dambaifi, fanda' ifimba fowa' nagala' lapafi dei' fataga apif ea'. Hiahawes sagataga apisi isimba sataga hages, ea' sope nogota bandata ma higililas hi'igalas.
58009001	Basef fagali'i God nagala' lapafi, anen nanda' anif basefa mu'uli na'ipasana anona ipat bo'ona hilili'i nogotawa itap apa'e ma sonda' lotuwanai.
58009002	Ipat anamba sanda' sel sanda'ana. Sawalogon biafigin wa'ol nape nagali'ii sofalagon sa'i, “Bo'wagoma hilili'i”. Hiahaom maga'oh anamba nomoni, amamba wanifim. Anona ileliwa wagataganai sanda' gol sanda'ami naloma anota belita magawamona bret mondolali magaso'anota Godi.
58009003	-
58009004	Apa' wa'ol lowaf alafugifa sowaolaf fetaol fawalogon figili'ama ganimba wa'ol momo'w nomone'wai, anamba sofalagon sa'i, “Bo'wagon hilili' a'owa'ma.” Hiahaom maga'oh na'amba nomoni amamba. Belita manda' gol manda'atai, pris mondolalima Goda hiahawes nogoh ambul alogw fasigwi gwagasatai taloma anis bokis atitis basef God nagala' lapafi fagalasi. Bokis isimba sanda' gol sanda'asi ea' ande'esa si'isa gol atona. Bokis isimba nomonesa sala anol botol si'i malep sanda' gol sanda'api. Anis gwa'aisi esis Juda fowa' saga'as anamba wafigimai sofalas saga'i manai sala botol alamba nomon. Botol alamba lala bokis isimba laloma kalamuta Erani fowa' dahanamb kigalalamba soh hagatagambi. Saloma otamba biamba sagandondombamba hilili'i ma God fowa' nanda' basef ifimba nala' lap nagaloma esis Judafi fagailami. Isimba sala bokis isimba nomon.
58009005	Apa' hiahaom magatoma ilifa bokis isimba ando'i amamba. Anom hiahaom biam si'i enseli sanda' gol mogolala'i sagandombami mondola'waifa God nalutu nagalomas. Amamba matoma ilifa bokis isimba. Bihinagof fandagiam malo'mamam na'amba lafel mondolali magakolo' esimbel bagali'amona okom wandafunai Godima. Apa' dei' ae' ina la'ifiwi ma iga'i basefa hiahaom amamba kofagema egenandonaef hi'igalef, owa'atin.
58009006	Esis sanda' hiahaom mape alihima, nimaguf danda amom pris mawis ipat anamba nomon rum wa'am ando' mondolalimana.
58009007	Apa' ganimba nomon wa'ol nagape atina saga'i, “Bo'wagoma hilili' a' owa' ma”, owa'. Anamba pris dembinai atona nape nagali'ma pris hiamii nafe' nagawis nemaf atetefa afagof danda. Apa' ina nafe' nawis dowadowaf, owa'atin. Anen nofa' esimbel atembel mafisi nafe' nawis ganimba nomon nagape atina. Esimbel ambalemba nofa'ambela nondolalima Goda nogakwaha waf awafi ananifi ata' fili', ea' waf awafi esis amam nematawai wapani. Waf afamba esis owa' sogawa andeande' sonda'afa.
58009008	Pris anamba nawis nanda' maol inimbai ma Ambal bu'unai Godi nigihimba'mapa na'amba. I'i ipat anamba nomon wa'ol nape nagali'ma ata' anin maol nepe ma sonda'anai, dao' ufia'w akwamba ma apa' mofe' mugawis ganimba saga'i, “Bo'wagoma hilili' a'owa'ma”, akwamba ina kwataga kwandawalap alihi'w, ata' owa'.
58009009	Ipat anamba nihimba'mapa nogota ata'e dei'itai, nondola'waif nihimba'mapa basef na'amba. Dondol epes hiasi sanda' lotuma God sofa'ai hiahawes isimba fasifi gwa'aisi mafis sasisasi sondolali sagaso' Goda nagakwaha waf awafi asasifi. Apa' isimba ina la'ifisa sonda' malogof fagape opalef esis nomoni andeande'ma fegataga bo'walef endilisi, owa'atin.
58009010	Waf afamba sondolalimanafi kofagefa afamba. Waf saga' gwa'aisii embelafi faloma waf sa'ofaifi ma sotofa alogw awagwi sogataga be'esa naep Godi. Isimba hiahawes alop atopasi, God naso'as mu'uli inimba ma silan atapis sefe' sotagama nogota atamba nogaha'ofa hiahaom dambaimi.
58009011	Dei' Krais nafi'i ea', nataga pris Dembinai nape nogali'ma pris fowa'imi hiamii. Ea' numafi hiahaom amamba mataga magape ea'i. Anen ea' nafe' nawis nomon endilisi ipat anamba agol lu'wagilinai, bu'winai endilisi nikila' ipat atamba selitai fowa'itai togotawa itap apa'ii. Apa' ipat anamba dei'inai ina notawa itap apa'e, epes sanda'ana sagala'ana lagof asasigufi, owa'atin.
58009012	Krais nawis nomon ipat anamba nafe' ganimba nomon nagape atina saga'i, “Bo'wagoma hilili' a'owa'ma”. Anen nanda'am na'amba nemaf atetef, ea' ma'um. Apa' anen ina nofa' esimbel memem baloma bulmakaum nogami nawis ipat anamba, owa'atin. Anen nawis nondolalima Goda esimbeli alop ananisi atis si'is, ea' ma'wis isimba atis. Anen nanda'am na'amba natala apa' natagwahepama waf awafi fagawasi'apai ma mogape andeande' dondol lifilafi.
58009013	Nemaf mamahefa anis epes alogw gwailasa naep Godi, amom pris maha bulmakau suwafumi maofam mofa' esimbel amamibeli baloma agamb na'ol bulmakau numa'inai maga'atonai. Ea' mowali'masam epes isimba. Manda'as na'amba epes isimbai sataga bo'wesa alop atop ando'a naep Godi.
58009014	Apa' esimbel Kraisi bikila' isimba a'owa'. Krais ina nanda' anef waf awafi, owa'atin endilisi. Ambal bu'unai Godi nagape namona dondol lifilafii natopalopana ma nondolalima God naso'ana anen atona hi'agalana. Isimba atis dei' esimbel ananimbeli ina bandombasa alop atop ape'ipi ando', owa'. Ambalemba bandombasa malogof fagape opalef ape'ilifi nomoni bo'walef hilili' pelele' a'owa' ea' bakwaha waf naninani wafinai ma apa' dei' mugahapila maol God nagape namunai.
58009015	Isimba atis dei' Krais nape la'afen numafi basef ifimba dambaifi God nagala' lapafi. Anen naga' ea' ma natala esis amam nematawa nogatagwahisa waf awafi esis sanda'afi nogota atamba sagape lafela basef God nali' nagala' lapafi. Ea' dei' amam nematawa mamahisa nogofalasi ma sagagi'manai, esis sofa' ambal alamba namili sogape andeande' lifilafi dondol. Amamba ambal namili si'i fowa' God naga'i endilisi atisa sogofa'ami.
58009016	Epen mamahina okom mondanda' niga'i basef ifimba banagafi ma epes mamahisa anaf sogofa' hiahawes ananisii afamba anin nigaga'afi, nanda' basef ifimba lapafi fail anop okwatip. Ama nogamana ananinai ni'i nigaila basef ifimba ma nogofa' hiahawes ahamanai, dao' anen nili' nindihimba'mas endilisi ma ahamana ananinai naga' ea'.
58009017	Dei' main, i'i ahamana nogaga', basef ananifi lapafi nanda'ef fagape okwatipi fape banagef fandawalap. Apa' i'i anen ata' nogape namona, basef ifimba ina dei' banagef, owa'. Ata' pupulif.
58009018	Isimba atis basef ifimba fowa' God nagala' lapafi owa' fetaga fendawalap dowafa. Amom maha mafis makolo' esimbel amamimbeli bewa' banaga basef ifimba, dao' fape banagef fandawalap alihif.
58009019	Moses fowa' nali' na'ipa esis amam nematawa Juda hiasi basef hiafi ma mu'uli Godi hi'alef, ama main, nofa' esimbel bulmakau nogami baloma memei baloma embel baloma awif sipsipif akwahimi maloma lawag sa'uni saga'i hisopi agufugama nalam dis esimbel ambalemba bagalasi nuwali'ambela amam nematawa isimba hiasi saloma buk akwamba mu'uli inimba Godi nagapau'wi wapani.
58009020	Ea' na'i, “Esimbel ambalemba begewa' banaga basef ifimba God nagala' lapafi, ifimba na'ipipaefa pigailifi.”
58009021	Moses nowali' esimbel na'amba atin bail ipat anamba sanda' lotuwanai naloma hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam sanda'am sanda' lotumanam God ipat anamba nomoni.
58009022	Basef ifimba ma mu'uli inimba fa'i felefele'ma hiahawes isimba hiasi hi'igalas a' mosa'opas esimbel atembela sogataga bo'wes hilili'. Apa' i'i esimbel owa' biliwia, God ina nokwaha waf awafi epes sanda'afi, owa'atin endilisi.
58009023	Ipat anamba naloma hiahaom amamba sondolali sanda' lotuma Godami, amamba mondola'waifa hiahaom amamba endilisimi magape heveni. Mu'uli Godi na'i hiahaom amamba itapami motaga bo'om hilili'ma esimbel ambalemba atembel. Apa' hiahaom amamba endilisimi magape ilifi mikila' amamba itapami. Isimba atis dei' God na'i hiahaom amamba endilisimi magape ilifi a' mondataga bo'om hilili'ma esimbel dambaimbeli bigikila' esimbel fowa'imbeli.
58009024	Apa' Krais ina nawis ipat anamba Godi epes sagala'ana lagufi, nondola'waifa ipat anamba endilisinai nagape ilifi, owa'atin. Anen nafe' nawis heven atogon, anamba dei' nataga alihina nape atapina ma naep Godi nandabeten nagatopalopapa.
58009025	Nemaf atetef afagof danda pris dembinai nape nagali'ma pris hiamii itap apa'e nofa' esimbel mafisi nawis nomon nondolali ma God. Nawis nomon ganimba wa'ol nagape atina saga'i bo'wagon a'owa'ma. Esimbel ambalemba ina' a' ananimbeli ma alop ananipi, owa'. Apa' Jisas ina nawis nomon naso' anen atona nondolalima God afagof danda si'i amom pris manda'am, owa'atin.
58009026	I'i anen nonda'am na'ambaiai, anen a' nofa' akafimi nimaguf hiafi timbi tambel fowa' dambadamba God nanda' itap apa'e nifi'i notaga dei'. Apa' owa'atin. Apa' dei' felefele'ma nogota ahi'igalata Krais nataga itap apa'e ma nagaso'ana anen hi'agalana nondolalima Goda nogokwaha waf awafi apa' epesi. Nanda'am nemaf atetef ea' ma'um.
58009027	Epes hiasi hi'ilas anaf soga' atetef owagama sulutuma basef lu'wafi God nonda' kotimasafi.
58009028	Ea' na'amba atin si'i Krais naso'ana anen hi'agalana nondolalima Goda nemaf atetef nagakwaha waf awafi epes hiasii. Anaf wapani nigi' notambel nifi'i. Apa' anen ina nifi'i ma nogakwaha waf awafi, owa'. Nifi'i ma nogofa' epes isimba sape sogohafanai.
58010001	Apa' mati mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani nondola'waif dowafa hiahaom bu'wami ma'i anaf migi' mogatagai. Hiahawes isimba apisi ina endilisi, owa'. Isimba sondola'waif dowafi. Ea' dei' mu'uli inimba na'i esis ata' sondolalima God afagof danda ani, ina la'ifina nisindi'amona esis sogafi'i felefele'ma God sondagalamana ma sogataga bo'wes endilisi, owa'atin.
58010002	I'i mu'uli inimba nenda'as be'es endilisiai, dei' ina ata' sondolalima God wapani, owa'. Apa' owa', owa'atin. I'i esis sifi'i sonda' lotumana asotaga be'es sondolalimana atinai, malogof fagape opalef esis nomoni ina fihimba'masa waf awafi asasifi, owa'. Apa' owa', owa'atin.
58010003	Afagof hiagufi danda hiahawes mafis mais sondolalima Godasi sagasa'ma ukup asasipi ma sogogawa waf awafi asasifi atapif fapomas.
58010004	Esimbel bulmakau noganai baloma memei ina la'ifima mogakwaha waf awafi esis sanda'afi, owa'atin endilisi.
58010005	Ea' afamba Krais nagafi'i itap apa'e anen na'ipa God na'i, “Ina' nandaiwa'ma esis soha mafis sofa'ai hiahawes mais sifi'i sondolalima ina', owa'. Apa' ina' nandondomba anop alopa negase'eap ae'.
58010006	Mafis saham saga'atama sondolalima ine'ami maloma hiahawes mafis mais sondolalimamenasi ma negakwaha waf awafii, amambai ina' nandaiwa'mam.
58010007	A'i owa' main a'i, ‘God, ina' dei' netolowe. Si'i fowa' amom profet manda' basef fail buk faga'iasa ae', dei' ea' afi'i ma igaila okom ine'imi atom.’”
58010008	Krais nali' ata' na'ipa God na'i, “Ina' nandaiwa'ma mafis mais saham sanda'am sandolalima ina' belita sondolalima ine'atai. Mafis maim amamba sondolalima ine'mami ma negakwaha waf awafii, amambai ina' nandaiwa'mam.” Apa' owa' mu'uli God nagaso' Mosesani na'i esis sondolalimana atin sondape atapis.
58010009	A'i owa' main, Krais nagi' na'ipa God na'i, “Ina' natolowe. Ae' afi'i ma igaila okom ine'imi atom.” Ea' dei' God natofa mafis maim fowa'imi magali'i sondolalimaminami. Apa' dei' nahapona waf afamba Krais nagaila okom Godi atom fape banagef faha'ofa amamba fowa'imi.
58010010	Jisas Krais naila okom Godi hi'alam datima naso'ana alop ananipi nondolalimana nemaf atetef ea' ma'um. Isimba atis dei' nanda'apa mataga ananipai atepa be'epa hilili'.
58010011	Amom pris hiami hi'alam malutu manda' maol nimaguf hiafi danda. Amom mondolali ma God ea' manda' inimba atin nimaguf hiafi timbi tambel. Apa' owa' ofa inimba ina banagen nakwaha waf awafi, owa'atin.
58010012	Apa' aman anamba nondolali atetef, nagaso'ana anen atona nondolalima Goda nagakwaha waf awafi, amamba atom atapim mope dondol lifilafi. Anen nanda'am na'amba ma ea', dei' nape naloma Goda wa'ol lagol kwahisigili banagagili.
58010013	Anen nape na'amba atapina nape nasasa nemaf afamba God nonda' bousi ananisi sogafe' lafela anen.
58010014	Dei' main, Krais naso'ana alop ananipi atop God nondolalimana nemaf atetef, ea' amamba atom nanda' epes sataga bo'wes hilili' sogape dondol lifilafi. Epes isimba anen dei' nape atapina nanda'as anaf sogataga bo'wes hilili'.
58010015	Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi wapani nawalapa basefa apa' na'amba nali' na'i,
58010016	“Dembinai na'i, nogota atamba ata' hi'ilata tili', ma main dao', ae' enda' anif basef lapafi elomas. Basef ifimba na'amba. Anaf atiasi ae' a' enda' mu'uli ae'ani hiani nepe nelelemb asasilimbi ea' enda'an nil ukup asasipi.”
58010017	Ama main nagi' nowatani basef ifimba na'i, “Ae' dei' ina atiasi mondanda'ma awami asasimi moloma waf awafi esis sanda'afi, a' owa'atin.”
58010018	God nokakisa waf awafi nakwahef ea'. Dei' maol inimba sofa'ai mafis mais sondolali ma Goda waf awafi a' owa'atin endilisi.
58010019	Ea' dei' ipa' alipipai, esimbel Jisasi atembel dei' apa' ukup banagep. Ea' owa' ombel mohapa ma mofe' mugawis nomon anamba God nagapoma bo'wagoma hilili' a'owa'ma.
58010020	Apa' dei' ilama mofe' mugawis anamba ufia'w akwamba dambai'wi ambal namili'wi. Ufia'w akwamba Jisas atona nawala lowaf anamba lu'unai nogotaol si'i utai nandogwa'w kwagal nawis nomon. Lowaf anamba alop ananipi atop.
58010021	Dei' apa' anona pris dembinai nugumafi amam nematawa Godii. Anamba Jisas atona.
58010022	Isimba atis dei' apa' mondafe' felefele'ma Goda waf afamba. Apa' mondakwaha waf hiafi baso'afi ma opalef ape'ilifi ea' mohapifana endilisi. Ukup pendapoma Krais, anen nuwali' esimbel ananimbeli nelelemb ape'ilimbi ma nogandombaselemb. Malogof fagape opalef ape'ilifi nomoni ina fihimba'mapa fawalogapa ma waf awafi ape'ifi, owa'. Apa' ukup pendapoma anen a' nasa'opa alop ape'ipi embel kalagembeli.
58010023	Apa' mondahapila hapif ape'ini mundawalapan alihina hiahaom fasimi apa' mape mogohafami. Isimba apa' mondahapilas sisihis, ea' ina mondahagas, owa'i. Dei' main, apa' ea' mogawa, hiahawes mamahisa God naga'i basef endilisifi atifi atiasi nigi'mif nonda'as datima.
58010024	Apa' mondasa'ma ukup esis sahin owani, ma ukup pigapigaila esis amam nematawa sonda' waf fasifi.
58010025	Apa' ina ukup pese'apama waf mondakolas mogaloma esis alipisi si'i anis epes sanda'as, owa'i. Apa' mondowa' banagama atin ea' mondanda'as atin atapis mindikila' fowa' manda'as. Dei' main, ipa' ea' pegawa nemaf Dembinai nogafi'afii a' fafi'i felefele'.
58010026	I'i apa' mogawa basef endilisifi ea' ma dei' apa' mila ukup ape'ipi atipa mofe' monda' waf awafi atapipamaf, i'i monda'as na'amba, ina atiasi a' anin ofa daiana negakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi, owa'atin endilisi.
58010027	Atiasi apa' ombel mohapa a'owa' endilisi mope mosasa nemaf afamba God nogawaloga apa' ma nosapa'apa mogafe' nif amamba lu'wami a wandafum a'owa'i moga' bousi isimba Godi.
58010028	Apa' ea' mogawa, epen mamahina nimbisila' mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani, ma epes bias a'a wanis sitilina sowalapa waf awafi anin nanda'afi, esis ina atiasi siti anin uwahipin, owa'atin. Esis ea' sola'apan sohan negaga'.
58010029	Dei' ipa' ukup pandame' pa'imama ma epes mamahisa sogowa' alafugaha Nogamana Godi? Epes isimba atiasi sofa' nimanimi lu'wami a'owa' mikila' epen inimba nigimbisila' mu'uli inimba God nagaso' Mosesani. Esimbel Kraisi anol ametala basef God nagala' lapafi fanda' epes isimba ananisi atis bo'wes hilili'i. Owa' epes isimba sanda'as na'amba sa'i esimbel ambalemba Kraisi falafimbeli dowaf, sa'i ga' Kraisi falafini atin. Ea' sanda' basef findiwaefa Ambal bu'unai Godi natopalopapa dowaf nugumafiapai.
58010030	Dei' main, apa' ea' mogawa epen inimba a' na'i, “Waf pegagwa waf awafiafi, maol ae'ani. Ae' atowe bola egwamasaf.” Ea' na'ias wapani na'i, “Ae' atowe Dembiwai anaf ewawaloga esis amam nematawa ae'asi ma kot basef lu'wafi.”
58010031	I'i God banagona nagape namona atapinai nogahapila apa' tatala'ipa ma nogagwamapa waf awafi, amambai dei' ombal lu'wami endilisi mogahepamam kwapati'i.
58010032	Apa' ipa' ukup pendapoma nogata fowa', afamba ipa' pegefa' mogogala'i Godi. Nogota atamba ipa' pefa' nimanimi akafimi lu'wami a'owa'. Owa' owa'atin. Palutu banagepa ma pagali'amona wandafa waf awafi.
58010033	Anif nimaguf sanda'epa palutu naep amam nematawa la'afisa, ea' sanda' basef awafi findiwaefa ipa', sase'epa akafimi nimanimi atom naep asasipi. Ea' anif nimaguf sanda'as na'amba atina anis amam nematawa daias. Ipa' palutu palomas patopalopas.
58010034	Ipa' pati esis amam nematawa sagape kalabusi uwahipis pefa' akafimi palomas. Ea' nemaf afamba esis salolo' lagofapa sofa'mepa hiahaom ipe'imi, ipa' sonahepa ma batap tol pagapomas. Dei' main, ipa' ea' pegawa, hiahaom ipe'imi bu'wami endilisi ata' mapomepa amamba anaf mogape atapim dondoli. Amamba mikila' endilisi hiahaom amamba sogofa'mepami.
58010035	Ea' dei' ipa' ina pekwaha waf bu'wafi ukup pagalutu banagepamafi, owa'i. Waf bu'wafi ea' afamba atef, God anaf nogwamepa hiahaom fasimi ma ipa'.
58010036	Ipa' pindalutu banagepa ma pigaila okom Godi ma pegefa' hiahaom fasimi fowa' God a' na'iam ea' endilisi ma nogasi'ipami.
58010037	Aho', ina ata' nogota laota. Nogota kwasala'uta dowaf, “Ama aman anamba na'i nogafi'i, anen atiasi a' nifi'i. Anen ina atiasi nupani halehale, owa'atin.
58010038	Apa' epes fasisi ae'asi kofagema ma sogape namis atapis na'amba. Esis sahapifa ae'. Epen mamahina nendahagasa nekwaha negahapifa ae'i, atiasi okom ae'ami ina bo'oma anin, owa'atin.”
58010039	Apa' ina epes ombel mahapa mandahagas makwaha magahapifa God ama atiasi higiligalapa lamonapai, owa'atin. Apa' epes magahapifanai mofa' ambal namili mogape andeande'i.
58011001	Waf kofagefa ma apa' mogohapifa God na'amba. Nelelemb ape'ilimbi ea' bahapila hiahawes isimba apa' mahapifana mape mogohafasa anaf sigi' sogotagai soloma anom hiahaom anaf God nogaso'apami. Ea' hiahawes isimba naep ape'ipi owa' mogatilisia, apa' nelelemb ape'ilimbi begawa endilisi hiahawes isimba sape.
58011002	Amom fowa'imi mahapifana na'amba, isimba atis dei' God na'iam na'i, “Waf amamifi bu'wafi.”
58011003	Apa' mahapifana, isimba atis dei' mogawa God nanda' hiahaom magape ilif itapi matagama basef ananifi atif. Ea' apa' mogawa hiahaom hiami apa' ea' magatulumi, amamba God nanda'ama hiahaom amamba apa' owa' mogatolom naepia.
58011004	Abel nahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' nofa'i anis hiahawes nondolalima Godasi be'es endilisi sikila' hiahawes Kain nondolalima Godasi. Aho', Abel nahapifa God, ea' amamba atom God na'i anen epen bo'ona hilili'i. God na'i aho'ma hiahawes Abel nondolalimanasi na'i hiahawes isimba fasis. Abel naga' ea', apa' waf ananifi nagahapifa Godafi si'i malogol ata' fihimba'mapa waf bu'wafi atapina nape.
58011005	Enok nahapifa God ea' dei' God nofa'ana nafe' nalota heven. Anen ina nape naga', owa'atin. Epes sala solaomana sa'i sogati anini, apa' ina satolona, owa'. Dei' main, God nofa'ana. Isimba na'amba atin si'i buk Baibel naga'ias na'i, “Fowa' God ata' owa' nofa'anaia, nogota atamba Enok nali' naila okom Godi.”
58011006	Epes owa' sogahapifa Godia, esis ina atiasi sila okom Godi, owa'atin. Dei' main, i'i epes ami si'i sogafe' felefele'ma Godi, esis sohapifa God sondogawa endilisi anen nagape namona atapinai. Ea' sohapifana ma nogaso'as hiahaom bu'wami epes isimba sala sogolaomana banagambili.
58011007	Noa nahapifa God dei' nihimba'mana basefa hiahaom anaf migi' mogatagai, hiahaom amamba anen owa' ata' notolom nogogawamia. Anen nail basef Godi nanda' ano'w galaho'w lu'wakwi. Galaho'w akwamba Noa nao'wa ako'w awasi ananisi safe' sawis sagapau'wi sape andeande', ina awes, owa'. Anen nahapifa God. Isimba atis si'i nanda' kotima esis amam nematawa sagape itapi hi'alas. Anen nahapifa God. Isimba atis ea' nofalana na'i aman bo'ona hilili'i, si'i nanda'masas epes isimba hiasi mamahisa sagahapifa anini.
58011008	Afamba God nofala Abraham nokwaha wambel ananimbili nogafe' itap anaf anen na'i nogaso'anapi anen nahapifana. Isimba atis nail basef Godi nafe'. Anen ina nogawa anamba nogafe'ma, owa'. Apa' anen nahapifana atin dei' nafe'.
58011009	Anen nahapifana ea' nafe' nape itap apamba fowa' God na'i endilisi atis na'i nogaso'anapi. Anen nape itap apamba si'i anen anota wambotai. Nape ifagw seligwi naloma Aisaki Jekop, amom biam anaf mogofa' itap apamba mogalomanai, si'i fowa' God nali' naga'i basef ifimba lapafi.
58011010	Dondol Abraham okom ma'i ata' niti wambel taun inimba pohawa mais banagasini wambel banagambili gani ilif. God atona gawainai anen okom mandanda'ma nonda' wambel ambalemba, ea' nanda'ambel.
58011011	Sera ako'w asa'w ea' ina kola awasi, owa'atin. Nogota kogola awasiatai ea' tafe' hi'alata. Apa' owa' ako'w kwahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' God nanda'akw banage'wa kogola awani. Dei' main, ako'w kwahapifana endilisi ma basef anen nagala' lapafi, kwa'i anen atiasi nigi'mif nonda'as datima si'i naga'if.
58011012	Ea' dei' aman anamba atotona, anen ea' hagona felefele'ma nogaga', ea' nataga ahama awasi afe'usi hiasi a'owa' anaf sigi' sogatagai. Esis sataga hias a'owa', sondahama ondowa wagape ilifi, waloma ko'onaga goga'oh naoh akatai. Epes ina la'ifisa sigiambas, owa'atin.
58011013	Epes isimba sahapifa God atapisa sape safe'ma sagaga'i. Ina sali' sofa' hiahaom fasimi amamba God na'i endilisi nogaso'asami, nemaf afamba sagape, ata' owa'atin. Esis sahapifana endilisi salutu laogon sandagalam si'i sagatolom ea'i. Ea' sawalapa basef sa'if sa'i, “Apa' mape itap apa'e si'i epes analemb walimbi. Apa' mafi'i mape nogota bandata itap apa'e.”
58011014	Epes saga'i basef ifimbaii, apa' ea' mogawas, sa'i sowando'ma itap asasipi si'ip.
58011015	I'i ukup asasipi ata' pape pandanda'ma wambel ambalemba fowa' sakwahembel sagafi'iai, dei' esis ata' ufia'w kwagala sotambel sogafe'agon.
58011016	Apa' dei' esis ina sanda'as na'amba, owa'atin. Nelelemb asasilimbi behafema anep itap daiap, fasifasip a'owa' pikila' anamba fowa'igima. Anamba anen heven atogon. Isimba atis dei' God ina ambal aola epes isimba saga'i, “Ina' God apa' manda' lotuminai,” owa'atin. Anen nandomba anambel wambel taun ea' ma epes isimba sagahapifanai sofe' sogapaogon.
58011017	Abraham nahapifa God a'owa' ma basef ifimba nala' lapef nagalomanaefi. Ea' dei' God nagwamba Ebrahama nogaso'ana Aisak nondolalimana ma God. Endilisi, Abraham nape nasasama noha nogamana ananinai nondolalimana.
58011018	Apa' owa' God nali' na'ipana na'i, “Esis wambota Aisaki atis anaf sofa' agol wambota ine'isi.”
58011019	Abraham okom mandanda' na'amba na'i, “I'i ae' egahana afunama, ea' hapainai, bola God nogasa'mana wapanii.” Ea' dei' apa' mi'ias mi'i isimba si'i God nasa'ma Aisak notambel nosafili matmat wapani ma Abraham notambel nogofa'ana.”
58011020	Aisak nahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' nofalo'ma Jekopi Iso nowa' banagama hiahaom fasimi na'i anaf mogatagamai.
58011021	Jekop nahapifa God, ea' dei' afamba felefele'ma na'i nogaga', nofalo'ma nogaopana Josepi biam nowa' banagam. Anen nandahi'amon nasisil nindiwa balaga nandagalama God.
58011022	Josep nahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' felefele'ma na'i nogaga' anen na'i basefa anaf esis Israel sokwaha itap lu'upa Isip sogafe'. Ea' na'ipasa sogawa bihitagof alop ananisi wandof.
58011023	Mamasana Mosesi sahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' ma'mana kolana ea' sambaho'wana atin nape aomb wanemb. Dei' main, esis bias satolona fasifasina a'owa' endilisi. Esis ina ombal mahasa King dembinai Fero ma mu'uli ananini, owa'.
58011024	Ama main, Moses nataga dambena, nahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' okom mandanda' nandaiwa'ma esis sofalana siga'i nogama nemata'w akwamba King Fero nogamana, owa'.
58011025	Na'i nondofa' nimanimi na'amba atin nondaloma esis wambota atota Godi. Nandaiwa'ma nogaila waf awafi ma nope nondagala nogota atamba bandata.
58011026	Anen okom mandanda' ma'i i'i anen nogofa' ambal awali ma agol Kraisi, amambai a' fasimi endilisi mikila' moni hiani naloma sosaf fasinai hiana haona esis Isipi. Dei' main, anen okom mapoma hiahaom amamba fasimi a'owa' anaf God na'i endilisi nogaso'anami.
58011027	Moses nahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' nohafel nakwaha itap lu'upa Isip. Anen ina nandafa'ma okom wandafunai King Feroi, owa'atin. Anen si'i nagati aman anamba esis owa' la'ifisa sogatolona naep asasipia. Ea' dei' nape banagona.
58011028	Anen nahapifa God dei' naila basef ananifi ma gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Pasova, naha sipsip nanda' lotuma God. Ea' nuwati' esimbel bail utagw ilifa wa'owa'ol afamba ensel anamba nogaha awasi amam esis Isipi ina atiasi noha esis Israeli, owa'.
58011029	Esis Israel sahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' satopa' naoh agiligwa Embel Akwahimi mandahagas momba' monafa ea' safe' akata si'i itap fatauguma. Ea' esis Isip sati esis salutu la'afen, sagi'mas safe' owa' embel betanima bandahapima baofanas ea' bahas saga' lamonas hi'alas.
58011030	Esis Israel sahapifa God, isimba atis dei' safe' sanogama indalelemba sanda' otamba sanda'ami wambel Jeriko tulif sail wik si'igai, nimaguf 7-pelaif, ea' indalelemb ambalemba guligatam mowa itap.
58011031	Nemata'w akwamba kwanda' so'a waola amami Rahap, ako'w kwahapifa God. Isimba atis dei' amam biam mandambaho' mafi'i magatologini kumafiam andeande'. Ea' dei' ako'w ina afu'w kwaloma epes isimba wambelisi sogosambala Godii, owa'atin.
58011032	Apa' dei' ae' ata' iwatani basef mamahifa wapani? Owa'atin. Nogota ina laota ma ata' iga'i basefa Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jepta, Devit naloma Samyuel maloma amom profet, owa'.
58011033	Amom amamba, magahapifa Godi. Isimba atis dei' malutu banagem mikila' wandaf matalogofa soldia amom king dembami hiamii. Mape dembami mumafiasa waf usi'ifi ea' mofa' hiahaom bu'wami God na'i nogaso'amami. Ea' masopama malogofa mafis amamba laion wandafumi lu'wami.
58011034	Ea' mahefa nif lu'wafi faganda'ef. Amom mafa' mafe'ma bainagw mindihi'amam ea' ina mapisilam, owa'. Amom mape pupulim ama main, owa' mofa' banagami. Ea' mataga banagem endilisi ma wandaf matofa amom soldia hiami misi'ah esis anota wambotai.
58011035	Anom amam ea' magaga'i motambel mosafel wapani, mamamam amamuwai watolom wao'wam. Anis epes sanda' kalabus ea' esis bousi sahambombaga alop asasipi endilisi a'owa', felefele'ma sogaga'. I'i esis sigaila basef asasifima, bola sokwahis sefe' wahifis. Apa' owa', esis ina saila basef asasifi, owa'atin. Esis ukup papoma anaf sotanima sogosafel matmata sogofa' ambal namili, na'ambai andeande' a'owa'.
58011036	Anis sofa' nimanimi ma esis bousi sa'i basef findiwaifi ma esis, sahas kwapete'as. Ea' anis, sowa'as sen sanda'as sape sanda' kalabus.
58011037	Anis, bousi sakwaha otamba sahas afis. Ea' anis, sanda'as kwapete'as endilisi. Anis sofa' so satopa'as alop asasipi biafis atis. Ea' anis, sahas bainatagw saga'. Ea' anis sagahapila Godi sowaho' alop mafis sipsipi memei si'i luwaguf safe'. Esis a' hiahawes hiasi akasa alop asasipi. Ea' bousi sanda'mas waf awafi endilisi saso'as nimanimi.
58011038	Ea' dei' safa' safe' ganigani sandambaho' itap wafigima epes akagoma. Anis sandambaho' halafutagw, anis sandambaho' otamba lu'wami magal magawis nomoni, a itap fagagatagoma. Esis amam nematawa fasifasis a'owa'i. Isimba atis dei' epes itapasi ina bo'wesa sope sogalomas, owa'atin.
58011039	Epes isimba hiasi hi'alas sagahapifa Godi. Isimba atis dei' sofa' agof fasigufi ma naep ananipi. Apa' esis ina dei' sofa' hiahaom amamba fasimi fowa' God na'iam ea' na'i endilisi nogaso'asami, ata' owa'atin.
58011040	Dei' main, fowa' gani God okom mandanda' nandondomba anom hiahaom fasimi a'owa' ma apa'. Hiahaom amamba mikila' hiahawes esis fowa'isi sagahapifanai sa'i sogofa'asi. God nanda'am na'amba ma anaf esis sotaga be'es endilisi sofa'am sogalomapa.
58012001	Dei' apa' si'i main? Esis epes fowa'isi sagahapifa Godi salutu salipapa si'i ilagw lu'wami maso'alepa magala'ambemapa sihimba'mapa waf sagahapifanafi. Isimba atis apa' dei' mondakwaha hiahaom amamba manda' apa' nimanipai, moloma waf hiafi awafi fagawasi'apai. Ea' mondowa' banaga nelelemb ape'ilimbi ma mosagih banagambel mondololai'ma sagih bu'wani inimba God nandandepana mugasagihani.
58012002	Naep ape'ipi pelele' do' pindati Jisas atona anen kofagonama hapif ape'inii, nowatanian netaga andeande'ma mohapifana banagepa atapipa mogape. Fowa' anen okom mapoma dagala anaf na'i nogofa'ani, dei' nalutu banagona. Ea' nofa' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai naga'. Anen okom mapoma atiasi nofa' akafimi lu'wami nogaga' lawag agamba, isimba falafisi atis. Anen ina ombal mahana ma ga' inimba, owa'atin. Ea' dei' nape felefele'ma sia Godi lagol kwahisigili nape banagona.
58012003	Ipa' ukup pendanda' andeande'ma akafimi amamba fowa' nogofa'ami. Epes isimba sanda' waf awafii sowa'ana alafugah Jisas endilisi sanda'ana kwapete'ana. Owa' anen nalutu banagona a'owa'. Ipa' ukup pendapoma isimba ma ina pupulipa ala'uta tehepa, owa'i. Pendape banagepa.
58012004	Ipa' papa' paloma waf awafi ma pagatalagofaf, apa' ipa' ina dei' papa' pafe' patagama wandaf lu'ufa sahepa esimbel kolo'walambalepa paga', ata' owa'atin.
58012005	A'i ipa' ukup pase'epa ma basef ifimba God nanda'efa ipe'i ma nefela ukup ipe'ipi nogowa' banagaipa? Anen dei' nofalepa batawis ananipai, na'i, “Awasi ae'ipai, nemaf mamahefa Dembinai nogase'epa akafimi ipe'ma nogasindi'amonepama, ipa' ina pi'i akafimi amamba anen nagase'epami falafumi, owa'. Nemaf mamahefa ni'i nogase'epa nimanimi ma nigasindi'amonepa, ukup ipe'ipi ina iwanip, owa'i.
58012006	Dei' main, epes mamahisa Dembinai okom mogamogailas a'owa'i anen nanda'as na'amba atina sonda' waf ananifi usi'ifi. Ea' epes mamahisa numafias niga'i awasi ananisii, nahasa nogasindi'amonasa waf usi'ifi wapani ma sogawaf andeande' sogailaf.”
58012007	Nemaf mamahefa akafimi lu'wami mogatagamepa, ipa' pindalutu banagepa pi'i aho'ma God nogasindi'amonepa. Anen nonda'mepa waf afambai si'i awasi ananisi. Dei' main, ahapa awasii ina mape matitilis sanda' waf awafi, owa'atin.
58012008	Ahapas hiami masindi'amonasa same' basef silifa sogape andeande'. Apa' i'i ahamepa owa' nisindi'amonepaea, ipa' ina awasi ananipai endilisi, owa'atin. Ipa' si'i pagataga dowafa amam hiamii.
58012009	Ipa' ukup pendapoma anif basef wapani ifimba. Apa' itapapai hiapai hi'alapa ahapapa ape'imi masindi'amonapa ea' manifelom masa'ma agof amomugufi. Isimba atis dei' apa' andeande'ma mogafe' lafela Ahamapa nagape ilifi numafi ambagof ape'igufi ma mogofa' ambal namili.
58012010	Amom ahapapa ape'imi itapami, masindi'amona waf ape'ifi nogota bandata dowaf, mandahama ukup amamipi. Apa' God nasindi'amonapa ma nogatopalopapa endilisi ma mogofa' waf bu'wafi ananifi atef hilili'i.
58012011	Ahamapa naso'apa akafimi ma nagasindi'amonapa, afamba apa' ina mandagala, owa'atin. Ukup ape'ipi iwanip a'owa'. Nahapa nasindi'amonapa ma nonda' hiahawes fasisi sogatagamapa. Hiahawes isimba na'amba. Atiasi monda' waf bu'wafi atef usi'ifi, nelelemb ape'ilimbi sa'ombel.
58012012	Ipa' sa'ma lagof ipe'igufi dowagof ama gigisilimb banagelemba penda' maol Godi. I'i nembawa bo'wagah ipe'igahi akepigah hokwaepa, ipa' dowagah mehip ea' pilutu banagepa dog.
58012013	Ipa' penda' ufia'w ipe'ikwi usi'ikw kofe'. Ama atiasi epes bo'wagah aogahisi ina awes hi'ilas, owa'atin. Atiasi sogataga be'es wapani.
58012014	Ipa' dei' pendanda' maol banagambela pigaila waf opalef fegape sa'ombel pegaloma epes hiasii. Ea' pindaila waf afamba usi'if hilili'i, pegape Dembinaii atipa si'ipa. Epen waf afambai akani, anaf anin ina niti Dembinai, owa'atin.
58012015	Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba anin alipini ipe'ini newa ma waf awafi nelelama God nagatopalopapa dowafa nowambilapai magape andeande'. Na'amba anin alipini ipe'ini nenda' waf awafi si'i lawag augai gail gogola gwa'aisi numbutisii, ea' nese'epa nimanimi ipa' nenda' ipa' hipai petaga awepa ma naep Godi.
58012016	Na'amba anin epen atitin nila waf awafi so'a waulafi. Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba anin epen atitin nese'ana alafuga God si'i fowa' Iso nanda'asa nagatala gwa'aisi nogota bandata, ea' nakwaha hiahaom bu'wami ahamana nandondombam magapomanai.
58012017	Ipa' pegawa, anen na'i notambel nefe'ma nogofa' hiahaom amamba bu'wami owa', God na'i owa'atin. Iso nanda'am lef atin napoma nogofa'i hiahaom amamba, owa' a' owa'atin. Ufia'w akana ma notanima nombema nembel nogowa' alafugama waf awafi wapani.
58012018	Dei' ipa' ina pataga pape felefele'ma anis maefah patilis pagahapilas lagof ipe'igufi, si'i halaf afamba Sainai, owa'atin. Halaf afamba nif lu'wami, a owamb akot alialinai endilisi a fufin lu'unai banagonai,
58012019	a alof nogogali, a anagol malogol gaga'i basefi. Esis amam nematawa Juda sagame' malogol agalemba ganda' basefi, esis ombal mahas sa'ipa Moses dindinip na'amba sa'i, “Apa' mandaiwa' ma mogame'ana wapani.”
58012020	Dei' main, esis ombal mahas endilisi a'owa' ma basef ifimba God nagaso'asef esisi. Anen naga'i na'amba na'i, “I'i anin epen o anin mafin ami nefe' negatolasa halafuta atambai, andeande'ma esis sogahan otamba ma negaga'.”
58012021	Esis ombal mahas kwapete' endilisi ma hiahaom amamba sagatolomi. Hiahaom amamba lu'wami a'owa' manda' Moses ombal mahana kwapete'a nogatolom. Ea' na'i, “Ae' bolale kwapete' ombal mahe ma egatolom.”
58012022	Ipa' ina pataga hiahaom amamba, owa'atin. Ipa' ea' pataga halafuta Saion, wambel lu'wambili taun God nagape namona atapinai. Anamba Jerusalem dambaigima nagape heveni. Ipa' patagama ensel hiami hiami a'owa' mandatama mape mandagala.
58012023	Ipa' pafi'i pandakolas paloma epes Godi, awasi ananisi sagali'i. God nanda' agof asasigufi fape wambel ambalemba ilif. Ipa' pafi'i felefele'ma God, anen jas dembinai nowalogas hi'igalasi naloma ambagof epes fowa' God naga'i be'es hilili'i.
58012024	Ea' pafi'i felefele'ma Jisas, anen nagape la'afen nugumafi basef lapafi dambaifi. Ea' pafi'i esimbel ananimbeli fowa' nuwali'ambela ipa', nogowa' banaga basef ifimba lapafi. Esimbel ambalemba bawalapa ano'w ufia'w bu'wakwi a'owa'. Basefa ufia'w akwamba fikila' a'owa' basef Ebeli. Dei' main, basefa esimbel Ebeli fefala Goda nogagwa waf awafi. Apa' esimbel Jisasi atembel God nakwaha waf awafi okom maso'anaf.
58012025	Ipa' solawaipa andeande'. Na'amba pewa' alafugaha aman anamba dei' naga'ii. Fowa' gani itap apa'e God naso'asa banagafi endilisi esis amam nematawa, owa' sosambala basef ananifi. Fowa' nogota tatumba sogosambalif, ina la'ifisa sofa' sofe' sindihi'ama okom wandafunai Godi, owa'atin. Fowa' God na'if itap apa'e apa' dei' nape heven na'i basef banagef a'owa' ma apa'. I'i apa mowa' alafugaha anen, anaf apa' wapani ina la'ifipa ma mofa' mefe' mindihi'ama okom wandafunai ananinai, owa'atin endilisi.
58012026	Fowa' God nagaso'ana mu'uli ananini Moses, malagol ananigili gakoto'ma itap apa'e. Apa' dei' na'ipapa na'i, “Anaf ae' ikoto'ma itap anef nemaf wapani. Apa' ina ikoto'ma itap atep, owa'. Ikoto'ma itap peloma heven wapani.”
58012027	Basef ifimba faga'i, “Anef nemaf wapani,” fihimba'mapa na'amba. Hiahaom fowa' God nanda'ami anaf nokoto'mam mefe' higililam hi'ilam. Apa' anom hiahaom fasimi ma poe bu'wani owa' mondokoto'ia amamba banagem mope atapim.
58012028	Isimba atis apa' mundanifela God. Dei' main, dei' apa' mawis God nagala'ambemagoma anamba epes ina la'ifisa sogakoto'magon, owa'atin. Apa' monda' lotumana mondasa'ma agol ananigili ma waf ombal mogohapamafi ma mogaila okom ananimi atom.
58012029	Dei' main, God apa' manda' lotumanai, anen a' si'i nif lu'wami fagando hiahaom awami hi'agalam.
58013001	Ipa' Kristen, ukup pindaima atina sahin owan ipe'isi atapipa.
58013002	Ipa' ina ukup pese'epama pegatopalopa esis epes anambel wambelisi sogafi'i ifagw ipe'igwii, owa'i. Ipa' pegawa, fowa' gani anis epes sanda' waf afambai, ma sagatopalopa anis daiasi, esis sofa' anom ensel safe' sumafiam ifagw asasigwi. Esis ina sogawa sa'i amom ensel mafi'i, owa'. Sa'i owa' epes atis itapasi.
58013003	Ipa' a' ukup pendapoma esis alipisi sagape sanda' kalabusi si'i ipa' ea' panda' kalabus pagalomas. Ea' ukup pendanda'ma epes isimba sogofa' akafimi nimanimi alop asasipii, petopalopas si'i ipa' atipa pegefa' akafimi alop ipe'ipi pegalomas.
58013004	Ipa' amam nematawa pandaso'ama ea'i, penda' waf afamba fetaga fendape hilili'. Ipa' ina penda' waf awafi alugufi, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa anaf God nogwamipai waf awafi ma amam nematawa sanda' waf so'a waulafii, saloma amam nematawa isimba sagahambombaga daso'amaii.
58013005	Ipa' ina pila waf awafi afamba ukup pegehafela moni a'owa', owa'i. Hiahawes ipa' pagahapilasi, isimba ipa' a' ukup pendanda' na'amba pi'i, “Na'ambai andeande'. Isimba atiasi dondo'ma apa'.” Dei' main, God na'ias na'i, “Ae' ina anaf okom mose'e ipa' ewa'epa alafuga, owa'atin endilisi.”
58013006	Ea' dei' apa' mondowa' banaga nelelemb ape'ilimbi ea' mi'ias na'amba minda'i, “Dembinai nagatopalopa ape'i. Apa' ina ombal mohapa, owa'. Atiasi epes la'ifis sonda' maina apa'? Owa'atin endilisi!”
58013007	Ipa' nomonas sondapoma amom agufumi ipe'imi fowa' magawalapa basef Godi ma ipe'i. Ipa' ukup pendanda'ma fe' bu'wani amamini ea' pefe' pila waf amom magahapifa Godafi.
58013008	Jisas Krais nape na'amba atin si'i nambati', ea' dei' wapani, ea' nope atapina anaf dondol lifilafi.
58013009	Ipa' solawaipa. Na'amba anif basef hiafi fafifafi fifi'i felamona opalef ipe'ilifi ea' pekwaha ufia'w Godi. I'i opalef ape'ilifi fegape atapilifa waf God nagatopalopapa dowafafi numafiapa magape andeande'i, na'ambaifi andeande'. Opalef ape'ilifi ina banagalefa mugaila mu'uli epesi ma gwa'aimi mamimami, owa'atin. Waf afambai sagaila mu'uli inimbafi ina fatopalopa amam nematawa sagailafi, owa'atin.
58013010	Apa' anota belita tape sondolalima Goda, atamba Krais atona naso'ana alop ananipi si'ip nondolalimap naso'anap God. Apa' amom pris mondolalima God ipat atamba selita sanda' lotuwatai, amom ina la'ifima moga' gwa'aisi ma belita atamba, owa'atin.
58013011	Pris anamba dembinai nape nagali' ma pris hiamii anen atona nofa' esimbel amamba nawis ipat nomon wa'ol, nagape atina bo'wagon hilili'ma, nondolalima Goda nogakwaha waf awafi. Apa' mafis alop si'ina mofa'an mawisi manda' nif maofam ando'ma anamba esis Israel sagapoma.
58013012	Isimba atis Jisas wapani nofa' akafimi noga' wambel indambel uta ando'ma nagasa'opas nanda'as bo'wes hilili'ma esimbel ananimbeli.
58013013	Ea' dei' apa' wapani mondafe'ma anen indalelemb ando', ma monda' ambagof ape'igufi awagof si'i anen fowa' nagame' ambal aol.
58013014	Dei' main, apa' mogawa itap apa'e apa' ina anambel wambel taun nagape atapini, owa'atin. Apa' dei' mape manda'as mowando'ma wambel taun inimba anaf na'i nigatagai.
58013015	Isimba atis dei' mosa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol mondaso'ana dagala atapina ma agol Jisasi, mondanda'am na'amba si'i hiahaom bu'wami mondolalimanami. Apa' mondolalimana na'amba. Mondaso'ana malogof ape'igufi anen a mogawalapa basefa agol ananigili.
58013016	Ipa' ina ukup pese'epama penda' waf fasifima esis amam nematawa, owa'i. Ea' hiahawes saga'oma ipe'i pendawalogas pese'asa du'wanis epes isimba hiahawes akasi. Dei' main, God okom maga'iaf a'owa'i waf afambai si'i hiahawes bu'wasi ipa' paso'anasa pindalalimanasi.
58013017	Amom agufumi ipe'imi, ma'i motopalopepa, ea' mumafi ipa' dondol. Ama anaf amom mogawalapa basefa Goda maol hiani manda'ana mugumafi ipe'ani. Isimba atis dei' ipa' pindaila basef amomifi ea' pendape lafelam. I'i penda'mamas na'amba ma amom sonohama monda' maol inimba ma ukup amamipi ina iwanip melef atin, owa'atin. I'i amom monda'an mogaloma ukup iwanipi, amambai atiasi ina motopalopepa, owa'atin endilisi.
58013018	Ipa' pendabetena God nogatopalopa afa'. Afa' ogawa malogof fagape opalef afa' nomoni fihimba'mafa wape usi'ifa andeande'. Ea' dei' wa'i ofe' waf usi'ifi hilili'afi nimaguf hiafi dondol.
58013019	Ae' okom ma'i a'owa' ma ipa' pendabetena God nogatopalope ma atiasi itanima egafe'mago ipa' kwafalis.
58013020	God anen kofagonama okom awanimi. Anen nasa'ma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas nosafel wapani. Esimbel bagalo Jisasi begewa' banaga basef Godi nagala' lapafi fagape atapif dondoli. Esimbel ambalemba atembel Jisas nataga Dembinai numafi esis Kristen si'i nugumafi sipsipi.
58013021	Ae' a'i God nowa' banagaipa nese'epa waf bu'wafi hiafi ipa' ma pigaila okom ananimi atom. Ea' a'i anen nonda' opalef ape'ilifi nomon ama mogawalapa waf hiafi fasifi anen okom maga'iafi ma banagami Jisas Kraisi atom. Ea' a'i epes hiasi sosa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.
58013022	Ipa' alipipai, ae' a'ipipa dindinip, pembe' aligah pendagahembe'ma basef anda'afi ma efela ukup ipe'ipi egewa' banagaipa. Dei' main, basef ifi'i ae' anda'efa ipe'i, ifimba bandembandef.
58013023	Ae' a'i ipa' pendegawago, esis ea' sakwaha owamapa ape'inai Timoti, ea' ina ata' nanda' kalabus, a' owa'atin. I'i anen nifi'i nogatagama ae' kwafalisa, dao' atiasi afa' biafa ofo'o atin utilipa.
58013024	Ipa' penda'mamago nemaf bu'wafi afa'ifi ma amom agufumi hiami ipe'imi molomago esis amam nematawa Godi hiasi hi'indalas. Esis Kristen alipisi sagape Italii sanda'mepago nemaf bu'wafi ipa'.
58013025	Ae' a'i God notopalopepa dowaf ea' nope nolomago ipa' hipai nowa' banagaipa. Ea' ma'uf ifimba.
59001001	Ae' Jems, ape lafela God naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais anda' maola amom atom. Anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' epes hipai Godi misi'ah 12-pelaih. Ipa' pagakwaha walemb kofagama ipe'imai ma pafe' pagape walemb hiagoma itap apa'e pape panda' maol naninanii. Ae' anda'mepago dagala nafe'mago ipa'.
59001002	Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, nimaguf mamahifa gwamba mamimami motagamepa, ukup ipe'ipi pinda'i amambai andeande' sonendahepamam.
59001003	Dei' main, ipa' pegawa ea' gwamba mogogwamba hapif ipe'inii, amamba manindifa ipa' ma pigalutu banagepa ma gwamba nimanimi akafimi awami.
59001004	Ea' ipa' pindalutu banagepa ma waf afamba fegataga bo'ofa ipa' ma atiasi pegataga andeande' a'owa', waf awafi akepa. Ama waf hiafi Godi fegapoma ipa' hi'igalafa, ipa' ina waowaola anef waf atetef, owa'atin.
59001005	I'i epen ami waowaola gawa bu'wanii, anin nendabeten nihali' Goda nogaso'anan. Dei' main, anen nagaso'asa hiahaom hiami dowafa epes hiasii, ina niginifala epes isimbai, owa'atin.
59001006	Apa' epen inimba anin nendahapifana endilisi ma nendabeten negahali' God. Ina a' nepe okom bimbiafim, owa'i. Anin nendahapifana banagona. Epen ami nagape ukup bimbiafimi, anin ina nahapifif la'ifin, owa'atin. Okom ananimi si'i embel naoh fufin naolama manda'am lasiali' atin magape.
59001007	-
59001008	Epen inimba ina a' okom mondanda' ni'i atiasi Dembinai noso'ana anom hiahaom, owa'atin. Okom ananimi mandawal biafim mandapoma waf hiafi anin nandanda'afi atef ea' ina nape okom atifim, owa'.
59001009	Sahin owan Kristen mamahina kwahuni anin a' sonondahana God nasa'man nogatopalopan dei' a owagama wapani.
59001010	Apa' Kristen mamahina hiahaom hiamini, anin a' sonondahana God nanda'an nagafe' lafela nagahapifa Krais. Dei' main, epes hiahaom hiamisi atiasi soga' si'i afis sagataga otalefi sagape nogota bandata ma ea' sala'of sogowa.
59001011	Ipa' pegawa awin alipini natafi ma owaf fagaha otalef afalemba ma ala'ulif hi'agalalef. Afis sagatagai sala'of ea' sosaf afisi a' aona. Epes isimba hiahaom hiamisi sonda'am na'amba atin. Afamba sonda' maola bisnisi atisi, asoga' si'i sosaf afisi fagaga'.
59001012	Epen ami nalutu banagena gwamba nimanimi magatagamani, anin sonahan. Dei' main, afamba anin nigikila' gwamba waf aunai naninani ea' hi'igalanai, anaf anin nefa' hiahaom fasimi si'i prais. Amamba na'amba. Ambal namili God nagala' lapali ma nogaso'asal epes mamahisa ukup pagapagaila anini.
59001013	I'i anin epen anona gwamba nogwambana nenda' waf awafi, anin ina a' ni'i God nanda' anin dei' nanda' waf afamba, owa'i. God ina nahondo' anin epen nanda' waf afamba awafi, owa'atin. Ea' ina anis epes la'ifisa sohondo'ana nonda' waf awafi, owa'atin.
59001014	Apa' ukup awami ape'imi atom mafelapa makikipapa ma mafe' mowa magatolo'w isalef si'i anin mafin alupini nafe' natolo'w isag sisihin nagape.
59001015	Ea' ukup ape'imi mohafel manda'apa manda' waf naninani aunai. Ukup amamba awami si'i ano'w nemata'w kogofa' opafa waf awafi si'i awasi akwa'usi. Owagama waf afamba awafi fetaga lu'uf, fenda'apa moga'.
59001016	Ipa' sahin owan, ae' okom maimailipa. Na'amba ipa' pembaso'ma ipa' atipa.
59001017	Hiahaom fasimi hiami hi'alam si'i preseni, amamba ahamapa ape'inai naso'apam misila'i heven. Anen nanda' mogogala'i hiami magape heveni mape. Apa' God ina nanda' ambagof laogof bandagufi nanda' hu'ufiho'of, owa'atin. Anen nagape atapina na'amba atini.
59001018	Anen nandaila okom ananimi atoma basef ananifi endilisifi ma apa' motaga mope mogali'ma hiahaom amamba anen nanda'ami.
59001019	Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' nomonas sopoma basef ifimba na'amba. Ipa' hipai pendandombol kwafalisa pegame' basef. Apa' ina pi'i anif basef pegwaef kwafalis, owa'i. Ea' ina a' ukup numbutip kwafalis, owa'i.
59001020	Dei' main, waf afamba epes ukup numbutipafi figalai waf awafi. Ina fagawalapai waf bu'wafi usi'ifi Godi, owa'atin.
59001021	Isimba atis dei' ipa' kwahago waf alugufi feloma waf aunai hianai hi'indalanago. Waf anamba aunai epes hiasi sanda'ana dondoli. Ea' pinindifa ipa' pepe lafela Goda pegefa' basef ifimba ananifi fagape nelelemb ipe'ilimbi. Basef ifimba banagafi ma figawambilai ipa' pitanima pigafi'mai God.
59001022	I'i pegame' basef Godi atin dowaf, ipa' pambaso'ma ipa' atipa. Amambai hapaimi. Ipa' peme'ef pilif, dao' andeande'.
59001023	Epen ami negame' basef Godi dowafa owa' nigailifia, anin si'i anin epen daian napelaga glas nagati amaga ananigai.
59001024	Anin natologa ea', nandambema nagafe' kwafalis atis, ina ata' okom mandanda'ma amaga gandati, owa'atin.
59001025	Apa' basef mu'uli Godi fegatagwaha apa' epesa mogakwaha waf awafii, ifimba usi'if hilili'i. Epen mamahina niti mu'uli inimba kofagena andeande' atapina ma nigailani, atiasi nepe na'amba. I'i neme'an nilan andeande', dao' epen inimba God nofalo'man nonda'an sonogahana maol main anin nanda'ani.
59001026	I'i anin epen ni'i, “Ae' anda' lotu endilisi agaila Godi” ma anin i'i owa' nimafi malogol ananigili andeande'a, epen inimba nambaso'ma nembel ananimbili atembel. Ea' dei' hapif ananini ma lotu main falafini atin.
59001027	Waf lotuwafi be'ef hilili'i kofagefa akafa nogohnaep ahamapa ape'inai Godi, afamba na'amba. I'i anis awasi mamasas akasi esis atis sogape, a'a nemata'w alifi'wi ako'w ato'w kogape kwahu'w, apa' mofa' nimanimi asasimi motopalopasa otamba gwa'aisi mais. Ea' mundumafi fe' ape'ini andeande' ma waf awafi itapafi ina fenda' nelelemb ape'ilimbi betaga awalemb, owa'atin.
59002001	Sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' pahapifa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, anen dembinai nogogala' a'owa' gani heveni. Ea' dei' ipa' ina petopalopa epes isimba agufisi atis ea' pewa' alafugaha epes agof akasi, owa'i. Penda'asas dondo' na'amba atin.
59002002	Basef ifimba kofagefa na'amba. I'i anona aman hiahaom hiamunai nonda' trausis siot sosaf fasifi nogala ring gol faf ananifi ma nogawis ipat atamba panda' lotuwatai nomon, ma i'i anona aman kwahuna ma otamba luwaguf maisi nogawisi wapani, ipa' atiasi penda' main?
59002003	I'i ipa' penda' aman anamba luwaguf mais fasisi pendagalana pi'ipana pi'i, “Ina' fi'i poe sia bu'wani na'a”, ama i'i aman anamba kwahunai pi'ipana piga'i, “Ina' nilutu gani”, a'a “Nepe gani itap felefele'ma bo'wagah ae'agahi”,
59002004	i'i ipa' penda'am na'amba, atiasi kofagema awami ipe'imi. Ipa' pawawaloga sahin owan ipe'isi ma ukup ipe'ipi, apa' ipa' ina pawawalogas paila waf usi'ifi dondo' atin, owa'. Ipa' pawawalogasa ukup awapi atip.
59002005	Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' peme'! God nandandepa epes isimba kwahusa otamba maisi ma dei' sape sisihis sagahapifana atapis sagape si'i epes isimba hiahaom hiamisi. Anen nandandepasa sogofa' hiahaom fasimi anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma. Hiahaom amamba na'i basef endilisifi atif banagafi nogaso' epes mamahisa ukup pagapagailanai.
59002006	Apa' ipa' paha iwana epes isimba kwahusa otamba maisi. Epes mamahisa saha iwana ipa' sase'epa akafimi sanda'mepa kot? Esis hiahaom hiamisi atis.
59002007	God nase'epa agol fasigili Krais ea' ipa' ananipai. Epes isimba atis sa'i basef awafi sanda' findiwama agol agalemba.
59002008	Dembinai King ape'inai nugumafi apa' hiapai, anen naso'apa basefa mu'uli ananini fagape Buk Baibeli. Basef ifimba faga'ias fa'i, “Ipa' ukup pipila epes mamahisa sagape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ipa' ukup pagapagaila ipa' atona atin.” I'i ipa' pigaila mu'uli inimba, ipa' panda' waf bu'wafi hilili'i.
59002009	Apa' i'i ipa' petopalopa anis, pewa' alafugaha anis, mu'uli inimba atin nanda' kotimipa ma panda' waf afambai pegasambala mu'uli inimba.
59002010	Dei' main, epen ami nila basefa mu'uli hiani hi'ilana nasambala anin mu'uli inimba atitin anif basef do'wanif kwasala'uf, epen inimba kofagema ananimi si'i nagawala mu'uli inimba hiani hi'agalan.
59002011	Dei' main, anen naga'i basef ifimbaii na'i, “Ipa' owa'i peha anis epes soga'a.” I'i ipa' owa' penda' waf afamba so'a waulafia, apa' paha anin epen naga', ipa' apataga epes aopa pegasambala mu'uli Godii.
59002012	Owagama God nowawaloga apa' ma anin mu'uli daian nanda'apa mogape wahifipai. Ea' dondol ipa' pinda'i basef penda' waf fendahama mu'uli inimba.
59002013	Dei' main, epen ami owa' niga'i uwahipigama anis epesia, owagama God ina niti epen inimba uwahipina nemaf afamba nogowaloga anin, owa'atin. Apa' ami nigati anis epes uwahipisi, God anaf ina nowaloga epes isimba ni'i awasi, owa'atin. Waf afamba muga'i uwahipigamasafi fikila' a'owa'.
59002014	Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, i'i anin epen ni'i, “Ae' agahapifa Kraisi” ma waf ananifi owa' bo'wefa, ea' hapif ananini falafini atin. Hapif inimba na'ambaini ina banagani ma atiasi God nofa'an nogatanimai, owa'atin.
59002015	Hapif inimba falafini nagape na'amba. I'i anis sahin owan sape sonda' luwaguf awafi a gwa'aisi akasi, ea'
59002016	anin ipe'ini ni'ipa epes isimba ni'i, “Ipa' opalef awanelef pefe' pifa'i luwaguf ipe'ifi pewahe'ef pembaho' alop ipe'ipi pefe' pea' gwa'aisi bu'wasi!” I'i ipa' piga'ias na'amba ma, basef ifimba ipe'ifi owa' fetaga endilisia. Atiasi basef ifimba ipe'ifi fetopalopas fi'imama? Owa'atin. Falafifi atif.
59002017	Hapif na'amba atin. I'i anin epen nihapilif dowaf ama owa' nenda' waf bu'wafi feloma hapif ananinia, hapif inimba ananini awasin a' naga'.
59002018	Apa' anin atiasi ni'i, “Ina' epen nagahapifa Kraisi apa' ae' anda' waf bu'wafii.” Dei' a'ipa anin epen daian na'amba a'i, “Ina' ata' nihimba'me hapif inimba ine'ini waf bu'wafi owa' fetaga figalomania. Waf bu'wafi ae' anda'afi atiasi ihimba'mina hapif ae'ani.”
