59002019	Ina' nagahapifana na'amba na'i, “God atotona nape.” Ina' na'ias na'amba, dao' andeande'. Ambagof awami wapani magahapifana na'amba atin ea' ombal maham bombol atin kwapete'.
59002020	Ina' aman okom nagaolinai, ina' nagahapifa Jisas atin, ama owa' nenda' waf bu'wafi wapania, hapif inimba ine'ini falafini atin. Dei' ina' na'i negawa isimba kofagesa? Dei' a' i'ipina.
59002021	Fowa' gani akunamapa ape'inai Abraham na'i nonda' ofa ma nogamana ananinai Aisak nondolalimana ma Goda belita atamba sondolalima Goda. Isimba atis dei' God na'ipana na'i anen aman bo'ona hilili'i. Anen nanda' waf bu'wafi dei' God na'ipana basef ifimba na'amba.
59002022	Ina' negawa a'a owa'? Hapif Abrahami naloma waf bu'wafi anen nanda'afi isimba sanda' maol atogon. Ea' waf bu'wafi anen nanda'afi fatopalopa hapif ananini nataga alihin andeande'.
59002023	Ea' basef ifimba fagail buk Baibeli fataga alihif fandawalap. Basef ifimba fa'i, “Abraham nahapifa God, dei' God nofalana na'i anen aman bu'unai hilili'i.” Ea' God nofalana na'i, “Anen alipunai ae'anai.”
59002024	Basef ifimba Baibelifi fihimba'mepa dei' ipa' pegawa hapif atin God ina na'i epes bo'wes hilili'i, owa'atin. Esis sahapilif endilisi ma sanda' waf bu'wafi wapani, dao' anen nofalas na'i epes bu'wasi hilili'i.
59002025	Nemata'w akwamba Rehab kwanda' waf so'a waulafi, ako'w na'amba atin. God nati waf bu'wafi ako'w kwanda'afi dei' okom mapoma'w na'i ako'w nemata'w bo'okw hilili'i. Waf bu'wafi akwa'ufi kwatopalopa amom Juda mandambaho' magafi'ii ea' kwihimba'mam ano'w ufia'w daia'w mafe' wahifim.
59002026	Ea' basef ifimba fagape na'amba. I'i alop atopa ambal owa' lopaopa, alop apamba poga' ea'. Isimba ea' na'amba atina epen ami nagahapilif dowafi ma owa' nenda' waf bu'wafia, hapif epen inimbai aowasin si'i nagaga'i.
59003001	Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, na'amba ipa' hipai petaga gawaipai tisa atipa, owa'i. Dei' main, ipa' pegawa anaf owagama God a' nowaloga afa' tisa wagawalipas basef bu'wafii banagambel a'owa'. Apa' anis Kristen daias, nowawalogas sa'ombel kwasakwasala.
59003002	Apa' hiapai nimaguf hiafi dondol owa' migi'ma hiahawes mimbifasa, owa'atin. I'i anin epen ina nanda' waf awafi ma basef ananifi, anin epen bu'wani hilili'i. Anin la'ifina nigimafi alop poloma nomonas ananisi hi'igalas andeande' wapani.
59003003	Ipa' pegawa apa' manda' waf afamba ma hos na'amba. Apa' masapa' ain nape malogof hosi nomona monda' hosa mogame' basef ape'ifi mogaila ukup ape'ipi ma mamahogoma apa' mogafe'ma.
59003004	Dei' ipa' ukup pendanda' ma sip lu'wapi. Sip apamba lu'wapi ea' fufin lu'unai nasapa' sip anamba, apa' stia sa'usa'uni. Kepten nugumafi sipi nambemana nagafe' anamba anen na'i nogafe'ma. Nanda'am na'amba ma stia inimba sa'usa'uni.
59003005	Ea' na'amba atina afega sa'wini nagape alop nomoni. Anin na'i basef mamimami hiami a'owa' magasa'ma agof epesi ma maol hiani esis sanda'ani. Dei' ipa' ukup pepoma nif. Nif figandif sa'ofa fegataga lu'uf banagef a'owa' atiasi alup lawah lu'ugahi fendogwah fesopamagah hi'ilagah.
59003006	Afegah ape'igahi nomoni ea' na'amba atin si'i nif ifimba hagape la'afena alop ape'ipi hawalapai waf naninani aunai. Ea' handa' epes si'is ukup paloma nomonas alop sataga awes sanda' waf awafi. Hawalapai waf hiafi ape'ifi ma fe' poe ki ape'isi awes hi'alas si'i nif fandif fagataga lu'uf. Nif ifimba fataga wambel awambili hel atogon.
59003007	Mafis mamimami alupumi, amiguf a uguf ea' hiahaom hiami magape naoh embel owini, epes sofa'ami sali'atam sanda'am mogawa mame'as mape lafela esis. Dei' wapani esis ilama sonda'am na'amba.
59003008	Apa' malogof epesi owa'atin. Ina anin epen la'ifina nigimafiagof, owa'. Dondol malogol gatageamb gape atapigil ga'i basef awafi, si'igila nombot marasin aunai naha epes sagaga'i.
59003009	Malogof ape'igufi atogof maso'ma agol Dembinai Ahamapa ape'inai, apa' owa' ma'i basef awafi wapani, fagahambombaga sahin owan ape'isi God nanda'as sagape na'amba atin si'i anini.
59003010	Malogof agwafomba atogof fa'i basef fasifi fasa'ma agol Godi ea' fa'i basef awafi wapani. Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, penda'as na'amba owa'i.
59003011	-
59003012	Sahin owan ae'ipai, anif basef waminif atini ifimba. Ina anembel embel ifata atotota embel fasimbeli baloma numbutimbeli betah ifata atotota, owa'atin. Ea' anoga lawag fik ina la'ifiga ma gil gogola anis gwa'aisi daias oliv, owa'atin. Ea' analef mandelef sa'utip grep pagailalifi ina la'ifilifa fil fegela anep sa'utip daip fik, owa'atin. Na'amba atin si'i embel naoh ina la'ifimbela bendambema begataga embel atembel ku'umbimbel, owa'atin.
59003013	Epen ami ipe'ini nomonas gawaisi ma gawa hiani, anin nendape na'amba. Fe' ananini a' nihimba'mas gawa ananinai anis epesa nenda' waf bu'wafi fegaloma maol bu'wani. Maol inimba anin nanda'ana negape lafela epesa nigaila waf gawa bu'wanifi.
59003014	I'i ukup ipe'ipi kowelep pepoma pegefa' hiahawes uga otamba mais anis daiasi, ina pelaepa anisa sigaila basef ipe'ifi atifa waf kikipaifi, ipa' ina pasa'ma agof ipe'igufi, owa'i. Ipa' penda' waf afambai piga'i ipa' atipa gawaipai, ipa' pambaso'mas. Na'ambai hapaimi. Gawa inimba ipe'ini ina endilisini, owa'.
59003015	Gawa inimba ina nafi'i heveni, owa'. Nataga itap apa'e ma opalef apimi maloma aman aunai Satan atona.
59003016	Epes mamahisa ukup pepoma esis atis si'i sogofa' agof lu'wagufi ma uga mais hiasi ma sonda' waf kowagalasafi, epes isimbai ina sagape andeande'i, owa'atin. Esis ina sandakolas saloma anis epes atogon atin, owa'. Sanda' lopa' fitap atina sanda' waf naninani aunai.
59003017	Apa' gawa nagafi'i heveni nawalapa waf fasifi afamba. Fape fagali'i, ukup epesi pape be'ep hilili'. Ea' waf bu'wafi hiafi wapani na'amba. Epes sagape opalef awanelefa opalef atelef sagaloma anis daias. Ea' sanda' waf sa'osa'ombilifi sati uwahipis endilisi ea' sanda' waf bu'wafi ma sagatopalopa anis epes. Esis ina malogof biagof sa'i anif basef, owa'. Sa'i basef endilisifi atif. Esis ina sanda' waf biafif sanifela anis sosambala anis, owa'. Esis ukup pa'i hiasi na'amba atin.
59003018	Epes mamahisa sanda' maol sowalipa epesa sogape opalef atifilifi isimba si'i apa' magawa gwa'aisi saga'asi. I'i esis sonda' maol inimba ma waf opalef fagape atogini, maol inimba nowalapai waf be'ef hilili'i si'i gwa'aisi sagataga andeande'i.
59004001	Waf mamahefa kofagefa ma fanda' ipa' panda' lopafitap nagape la'afena ipe'i? Ukup awapi atip pasa'ma ipa' dei' panda' lopafitap atapipa opalef nelelemb nomon, alop ando' wapani. Ea' isimba atis.
59004002	Ipa' ukup pa'ipa'i hiahawes hiasi sasisasi, apa' ipa' ina pefa'as, owa'atin. Ea' dei' ukup numbutip paha epes saga'. Ipa' kowalepama hiahaom hiami anis daiasi, apa' ipa' ina la'ifipa pefa'am, owa'atin. Ea' ipa' panda' lopafitapa pa'i pegefa'am. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Dei' main, ipa' ina pahali' Goda amamba, owa'.
59004003	Afamba ipa' pandabetena pegefa' hiahaom amamba, ipa' ina pefa'am, owa'atin. Dei' main, ukup ipe'ipi ina pape be'ep atifipa pagahali' God, owa'. Ipa' ukup pandanda'ma pefa' hiahaom penda'am da' kwahoma ofah inimba ukup ipe'ipi atip.
59004004	Ipa' pakwaha waf Godi ea' pafe'ma waf awafi si'i amam nematawa sagakwaha waf usi'ifi daso'amaifi ma sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi. Ipa' pegawa isimba. I'i epen okom mugaila waf itapafi a'owa'i, anin nanda' naumbih nefala God bounai. Dei' apendegawef. I'i epen ami okom mugaila waf itapafii, anin dei' nataga bouni Godi.
59004005	Ipa' ina pi'i basef Godi fagail buk Baibeli falafifi, owa'i. Basef ifimba faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Ambal alamba ape'ili God naso'apal lagapaipai landa'apa ukup pandanda' ma waf afamba kowagalasafi a'owa'.”
59004006	Apa' God natopalopapa dowaf nowa' banagapa. Waf afamba Godi banagef fikila' si'i basef Baibeli faga'i fa'i, “God nosambala epes isimba sanda' du'waniga sogosambala anini ea' natopalopa epes isimba saganindifa esis sagape lafela anini.”
59004007	Ea' dei' ipa' pinindifa ipa' pendafe' lafela God. Ipa' pendewa' alafugaha Satana anen atiasi nokwahipa nofa' nogafe'.
59004008	Ipa' pifi'i felefele' endilisi ma Goda anen atiasi nigafi'i felefele' endilisi ma ipa'. Ipa' panda' waf awafii, pekwaha waf awafi ipa' panda'afi si'i epes sagasa'opa lagof asasigufi bo'wagof hilili'. Ipa' epes malogof biagufi, ipa' pekwaha waf afamba ea' penda' ukup ipe'ipi be'ep.
59004009	Ipa' pendanda' opalef ipe'ilifi nimanilifa waf awafi ipa' panda'afi, pewa pelef mehipa waf afambai pekwahef ea' hapaifi. Ea' ipa' dei' panda'iafi, pembema nelelemb pendalef. Ipa' dei' sonagahipai, ipa' pendanda' opalef ipe'ilifi nimanilifa waf afambai awafi.
59004010	Ipa' pinindifa ipa' pepe lafela Dembinai ma anen nosa'mepa nogowa' banagaipa.
59004011	Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' owa'i pendawaloga atina waf ipe'ifia. Epen niga'i basef awafima anin alipinii, a'a newawaloga sahin owan ananini, epen inimba anin na'i basef awafi nawaloga mu'uli Godi. I'i ipa' penda' basef awafi pewaloga mu'uli inimba, ina ata' paila mu'uli inimba, a' owa'atin. A pape si'i dembipai jas pawawaloga mu'uli inimba.
59004012	God atotona nawalapa mu'uli ananini ea' anen atona dembinai jas nogawaloga epesi. Anen atona la'ifinai ma nofa'apa mokwaha waf awafi mogotanimai ea' la'ifinai ma nogohambombagapa wapani. Ea' dei' ipa' epes mamahipama ma pela' basef pegawaloga epes isimba sagape felefele'ma ipe'i? Na'ambai hapaimi.
59004013	Anipa ipa' paga'i na'amba pa'i, “Dei' a'a naman afa' ofe' wambel lu'wambili taun ganii a' ope onda' maola bisnis afagol atotogola ogofa' otamba hiambai.” Ipa' paga'ias na'ambai, peme' basef ifimba.
59004014	Ipa' ina pegawa atiasi hiahawes mais sotagamepa naman, owa'atin. Ambagof ipe'igufi ata' pagape namipa fandahama si'i main? Ipa' si'i nogoh gwataga gwagape nogota bandata dowafa hi'agalagw atetef.
59004015	Ipa' a' ukup pendanda' pi'i, “I'i okom Godi mi'i aho'ai, atiasi ope namofa onda' maol inimba a'a anin daian.” Piga'ias na'ambai, dao' andeande'.
59004016	Apa' dei' ipa' panda'i diga lu'unai gigal pasa'ma agof ipe'igufi atogof. Waf du'wanigaifi afambai hiafi awasifi.
59004017	Ea' ipa' pendegawa andeande'. Epen ami negawa ma nenda' waf fasifii ma anin owa' nenda'afa, anin nanda' waf awafi.
59005001	Ipa' hiahaom hiamipai, ipa' peme' ae' dei' a'ipipa! Ipa' ukup pepoma nimanimi akafimi anaf mogatagama ipe'i ea' pewa pendalef mehip a'owa'.
59005002	Hiahawes ipe'isi uga sosaf maim ipe'imi a' lolowam mape ea' totoloh mahahape' luwaguf maim ipe'imi hi'alam.
59005003	Moni ipe'ini gol silva waimba nasagiham a' awasim. Waimba anamba atiasi nihimba'mepa basef si'i anin epen niga'ipipa waf awafi ipa' panda'afi fataga fandawalap. Ea' waimba anamba atiasi nonda' alop ipe'ipi si'i nif fagandipa. Ipa' pakolasa otamba uga maim, apa' owa', nimaguf akutaifi afataga felefele'ma God nonda'mepa basef.
59005004	Ipa' peme'. Ipa' ina paso'am otamba amom manda' maol magala' gwa'aisi aof ipe'ifi, owa'. Ipa' panda' wala otamba amamimbai, pendame' lef amamini. Amom malef mehipa otamba amamimbai ea' lef amamini nafe' natagama aligah Dembinai God banagonai ma hiahaom hiamii a' name'.
59005005	Nogota ipa' pagape itap apa'e, poe ipe'ini bo'wen pefa' hiahawes fasisi a'owa' pa' gwa'aisi hiasi sanda'epa pataga lu'ulu'upa. Apa' owa', nemaf afamba si'i sagaha mafis lu'wasi atiasi afetagamepa fehambombagepa.
59005006	Ipa' panda' basef baso'afi pasapaga epes bo'wes hilili'i pahas saga'. Apa' epes isimba basef akas. Ina sindiwamepa wandaf, owa'.
59005007	Sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' banagepa pindalutu banagepa opalef awanelef pesasa nemaf afamba Dembinai nogotanimai. Ipa' a' ukup pendanda'ma anona aman ahama aofi. Anen nasasa anef nemaf gwa'aisi bu'wasi sogatalisa otamba hiambai sogataga. Anen opaf awanef nalutu banagona nape nasasa nogota laota ma asaf filai fenda' gwa'aisi hiasi sogataga aof afamba.
59005008	Ipa' wapani pendewa' banaga nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pepe opalef awanelef. Dei' main, nemaf Dembinai nogotanimafi felefele'ma fegataga.
59005009	Ipa' ina pendewaloga atina waf ipe'ifi, owa'i. Na'amba atiasi God nowawalogepa. Dembinai jas nape felefele'ma uta.
59005010	Sahin owan ae'ipai, ipa' ukup pendapoma amom profet, fowa' magawalipasa basef Godi ma agol Dembinaii. Amom opalef awanelef malutu banagema nimanimi akafimi lu'wami magatagamami.
59005011	Apa' ma'i amom malutu banagem dei' sonaham. Ipa' pegawa aman anamba Job. Anen nalutu banagona opaf awanefa nimanimi magatagamana. Nape atapina nogota laota, Dembinai natopalopana. Anen na'i uwahipigama apa' a'owa' ea' okom maimailapa.
59005012	Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, basef fagali'i ipa' pigailafi ifimba. Ipa' owa'i pi'i heven a'a itap apa'e a'a anis maefaha pewa' banaga basef endilisifi piga'i gani ilifa, owa'i. Ipa' ina pewa' banaga basef endilisifi pi'i gani ilif, owa'i. I'i ipa' ukup piga'i, “Aho'” a pi'i, “Aho'”. I'i piga'i, “Owa'”, a pi'i, “Owa'”. Ea' God nowawaloga ipa' ma basef ifimba ipe'ifi.
59005013	I'i anin epen ipe'ini neme' nimanimi akafimi maim, anin a' nendabeten nindahali' God. I'i ipa' anin epen sonohan, anin a' nendanda' awalefa negasa'ma agol Godi.
59005014	I'i anin epen ipe'ini aowas nenda'an, anin nendefala amom agufumi siosi mifi'i monda'man beten mohali' God mokolo'wa wel fasili alop ananipi ma agol Dembinaii. Ama nonda' epen inimba bo'wen.
59005015	I'i amom mohapilif endilisi mondabeten mohali' Goda, epen inimba atiasi bo'wen. Dembinai notopalopan nasafel wapani. I'i epen inimba nenda' waf awafi, atiasi God nokwahef okom moso'anaf.
59005016	Isimba atis dei' ipa' pendawalapama waf awafi ipa' panda'afi atin ea' pendakolas pendanda' beten atina God nonda'epa be'epa. I'i anin epen bo'wen hilili', beten ananini banagen a'owa'.
59005017	Aman anamba Elija fowa'inai, anen aman si'i apa' epes sagape itapi. Anen okom mapoma God ea' nandabeten nahali'ana ma nogasopama asaf, ea' ina falai itap asasipi nogota laota afagof si'igufi wanogof du'wanigili.
59005018	A'i owa' main, nandabeten nahali' God wapani, otaga gaso' akutiga asaf falai ea' gwa'aisi sataga itap salo andeande' wapani.
59005019	Sahin owan ae'ipai, i'i anin epen ipe'ini nekwaha nagahapifa basef endilisifi Godi, ma anin epen daian netopalopan nefa'an nitanimai, dao' ipa' a' ukup pepoma basef ifimba.
59005020	Epen ami netopalopa anin nanda' waf awafii ma negakwaha waf ananifi nigatanimai, epen inimba natopalopan nefa'an natanimai nape andeande' nakwaha negaga'. Isimba atis God dei' nakwaha waf awafi hiafi anin nanda'afi okom maso'anaf hi'alaf. Ea' ma'uf.
60001001	Ae' Pita anda' maol Jisas Kraisi, anen nandandepe aposel. Ae' anda'ago basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' amam nematawa anen nosahe'epa ea'i. Ipa' epes Godi ea' pakwaha wambel kofagama pafe' pailas pagape itap lu'upa wanifip biafip agufipa Pontusi Galesia a Kapadosia a Esiai Bitinia.
60001002	Fowa' gani Ahamapa God nogawepa nosahe'epa ea' ananipai. Ambal bu'winai ananinai atona nanda'epa pataga ananipai atipa be'epa hilili'. Anen nanda'epa na'amba ma pigaila waf Jisas Kraisi anen nasa'opepa esimbel ananimbeli pataga be'epa. Ae' a'i God notopalopepago dowaf nowa' banagaipa ma opalef ipe'ilifi fegape awanelefa pegape si'ipa atapipa ma waf afamba.
60001003	Apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi, anen God ahama Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai. Anen okom lu'unai nainailapa nati uwahipipa endilisi. Ea' nasa'ma Jisas Krais nosafel matmat, isimba atis God nanda'apa mataga dambaipa ea', ma mope namepa mogogawa endilisi anaf anen nofa'apa mogotambili.
60001004	Ea' dei' mape mohafana anaf nogaso'apa hiahaom fasimi a'owa'. Amamba bo'om endilisi, ina atiasi aom folo'ogalam lamonami, owa'atin. Amamba mogape bo'om atapimi, God nambe'am ma'oh masasa ipa' otaga ilif.
60001005	Hapif ipe'ini atin God nala'ambemepa ma anaf nofa'epa pigatanimai. Anen na'i notanima nofa'ipai, isimba sandandombola anaf sotaga sondawalap alihigima nemaf akutaifi.
60001006	Ipa' dei' pandagala a'owa' ma isimba, apa' owa' dei' nogota ata' bandata dowaf gwamba naninani natagamepa ma nagase'epa akafimi.
60001007	Akafimi amamba matagamepa ma God nogwamba hapif ipe'ini nonda'an negataga bo'wen banagen. Ipa' a' ukup pendapoma otamba gol, amamba fasimi sagatalom moni lu'wanii. Apa' hapif ipe'ini nikila' gol amamba a' fasin a'owa'. Gol amamba anaf higiligalami apa' owa', esis saofam nifa mogataga bo'om. Hapif ipe'ini wapani na'amba atin netaga bo'wen banagena gwambai akafimi mogatagamipai. God nogawamba hapif ipe'ini ma nendawalap negataga bo'wen banagena. Ama anaf Jisas Krais notaga nondawalap alihina, atiasi God nese'epa agof lu'wagufi foloma basef bu'wafi niganifalipamafi ma agili ametal lu'wani.
60001008	Ipa' ina dei' pati Jisas, apa' owa' ipa' pahapifana pandagalamana endilisi. Dagala inimba a' fasini a'owa' nagafi'i ilifi a' nikila' dagala hiani itap apa'ini. Ea' epes ina la'ifisa sowalapan soga'ian malogof asasigufi, owa'atin endilisi.
60001009	Dei' main, ipa' pape pahapilif dei' hapif inimba ipe'ini nawalapa hiahaom dei' pape pegefa'am atapimi. Hiahaom amamba na'amba. God nowambelepa nokwahomepa waf awafi pitanimai.
60001010	Anaf God nofa'apa mogotanimai, amamba fowa' amom profet maga'i basef ifimba ma anen dei' natopalopapa dowafa magape andeande'. Amamba amom ma'i anaf motagama ipa', God nandandepepa ma pegefa'ami. Ea' manda' maol banagambel ukup kilikala' papoma basef ifimba faga'i anaf anen nofa'apa mogotanimai.
60001011	Ambal bu'unai ananinai nagape nomona amomi na'i basef alihifa anaf Krais nogofa' akafimi hiami mamimami ma nogofa' agol lu'wagili. Ea' amom ukup pandanda' mahahali' ma'i, “Nemaf mamahefa amamba mifi'i motaga?”
60001012	Apa' God nihimba'mam ea' amom ina manda' maol mogatopalopa amoma basef ifimba, owa'atin. Manda' maol matopalopa ipa', ma'i basef ifimba ma hiahaom bu'wami anaf mogatagai. Apa' dei' anom daiam magawalipipa basef bu'wafi Godi ma'ipipa hiahaom amamba atom. Ma'ipipa ma banagami Ambal bu'unai ananinai nigisila'i otaga ilifi. Amom profet amamba, ina amom atom ukup pa'i basef ifimba mogawef, owa'atin. Ensel wapani ma'i mogawef.
60001013	Ea' dei' ipa' pendondomba nomonas ipe'isi ma penda' maol bu'wani, pindimafi alopi nomonas ipe'isi pendape andeande'. Ea' pihapilif pendape ukup kilikala' pehafa Jisas Krais anaf notaga nondowalap alihinama notopalopepa dowaf nowambelepa pigitanimai.
60001014	Ipa' pindaila waf Godi si'i awasi sagaila basef mamasasi. Fowa' ipa' gawa akepa ata' pape waf afamba awafi ukup pagahasafi. Dei' ipa' ina ata' pila waf afamba wapani, hapaifi.
60001015	God nogofala ipe'i, anen bo'ona hilili'i. Ea' ipa' wapani pendape na'amba atin si'i anen, pepe ananipai atipa andeande' hilili' ma fe' poe inimba ipe'ini hi'indalan.
60001016	Dei' main, Baibel naga'ias na'amba na'i, “Ae' ape hilili' bo'owe. Ea' ipa' wapani pendape ae'ipai atipa usi'ipa hilili'.”
60001017	Ipa' pefala God paga'i anen “Ahamapa”. Ahamapa anamba anen ina okom mapoma agof ape'igufi lu'wagof sa'ogof ea' nawaloga apa', owa'atin. Anen nawawaloga apa' na'amba atina ikwaf usi'ifi atetefa waf mamahefa apa' manda'afi. Isimba atis ipa' ombal mondahepama God penda' lotumana pendafe' usi'ipa nimaguf mamahefa ipa' pailas pagape dowaf itap apa'i.
60001018	Ipa' pegawa ea' fowa' ipa' ata' pape panda' waf awasifi wafifi pegefa'afa bafasepa ihasepa ipe'isii. Apa' dei' owa', God natalipa natagwahipa ma waf afamba awafi. Anen ina natalipa ma hiahaom atiasi mogataga awasim higiligalami si'i otamba fasimbai silivai gol, owa'atin.
60001019	Anen natalipa natagwahipa ma pegape wahifipa esimbela ga' Kraisi atin. Esimbel amamba bo'om lu'um a'owa'. Krais naga' si'i fowa' esis sagaha sipsip noganai sondolalimana ma God. Sipsip anamba bo'ona a'owa'i ea' ina anin ametal awasini natomana, owa'atin endilisi. Anen bo'ona hilili'i.
60001020	God owa' ata' nonda' itap apa'e petagaea, anen nogawa Krais nandandepana ea' ma nogaga' si'i sipsip anamba. Nimaguf ifimba hiafi dei' fagi' fagatagai, anen nataga nandawalap alihina ma nogatopalopepa.
60001021	Anen atona natopalopepa dei' pahapifa God anen nasa'ma Krais nosafel matmata nagaso'ana agol lu'wagili anen. Isimba atis dei' pahapifa God atona pegawa endilisi anaf anen atona nofa'epa pitanimai.
60001022	Ipa' paila basef ifimba, isimba atis dei' sanda' opalef ipe'ilifi fasilif. Ea' dei' ipa' panda' waf afamba ukup pagapagailasafi panda'af endilisi. Ipa' ina panda' uhuf pembaso'am alipipai ma alop atop, owa'. Apa' dei' ipa' pendanda' waf afamba banagambel pindikila' fowa' panda'afi. Ea' ukup pindaima atin a'owa' pendaloma esis.
60001023	Dei' main? Ipa' ina pataga dambaipa si'i awasi sagataga mamasas itapasi sagaga'i, owa'atin. Basef Godi atif anen nanda'epa nolaepa pataga dambaipa. Basef ifimba ambal namili lagapaifi fagape namif dondoli, dei' ipa' pataga dambaipa ea'.
60001024	Si'i Baibel na'ias naga'i, “Amam nematawa hiasi hi'alas si'i otalef ea' sosaf asasifi si'i afis sagataga dowaf itapi. Otalef alilifi afis wapani mala'of mogowai,
60001025	apa' basef Dembinaii fagape atapif dondol lifilafi.” Basef ifimba basef bu'wafi esis sagawalapefa ipe'i.
60002001	Ipa' pendombasa ipa' hilili' ma waf hiafi baso'afi paga'i malogof biagufi a ukup kowagalapafi faloma waf afamba piga'i basef awafi alafugaha anis daias. Waf afamba awafi, ipa' pendakwahef.
60002002	Ipa' pendape ukup pindaila basef Godi si'i awasi ata' sogolas dambaisi ukup pagaila saga' nomambeh atembihi. Ipa' dondol iap pese'epama piga'i basef Godi atif be'ef hilili'i, owa' sombema anin mae awani nigalomefia. Basef ifimba fenda'epa dambepa banagepa ma anaf God notopalopepa pitanimai pegape andeande'.
60002003	Endilisi, ipa' pagwamba Dembinai pandondomana ea' pegawana ma waf ananifi bu'wafi endilisi.
60002004	Anen si'i otam ambal namili lagapaumi. Ipa' pindafi'mai anen, otam amamba esis amam nematawa sandaiwa'mam sanda'am lifilefatam maga'ihi. Apa' God nosaho'am ea' na'i otam amamba fasimi endilisi.
60002005	Ipa' wapani si'i otamba ambal namili lagapaimbai. God nape nanda'epa atapina ma pegataga be'epa si'i anota ipat bu'utai ananitai. Ama ipa' pegape epes bu'upai penda' maol pindalalima God. Ea' pindalali pese'ana ukupi ambagof ipe'isi sefe'ma anen. Ipa' pindalali penda'as na'amba, okom Godi ma'i isimba andeande'ma maol inimba Jisas Kraisi.
60002006	Dei' main, basef fowa' God naga'iefi fagail buk Baibeli faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Peme', ae' andandepa otam atotom fasimi sagatalom moni lu'wanii mape magali'i ma mogowa' banaga ipati. Dei' ae' ambe' otam amamba mape wambel lu'wambili Saion. Epes mamahisia sogahapifa anini, esis ina atiasi ukup nimanip, owa'atin.”
60002007	Otam amamba fasim endilisi agol lu'wagili ma ipa' pagahapifanai, apa' isimba owa' sogahapifanaia anif basef fapomas faga'ias na'amba fa'i, “Otam amamba amom magala' ifagwi mandaiwa'mam melefatam maga'ihi, dei' mandambema mataga otam mape magali'i mogowa' banaga ipat atambai.”
60002008	Ea' anif wapani fa'ias fa'i, “Anaf otam amamba monda' anis epes sowa.” Esis sendesembaolam asowa. Dei' main, esis ina same' basef Godi sailif, owa'atin sosambalif. Esis sosambalif si'i fowa' God nali' nandandepasa sendesembaola sogowa.
60002009	Apa' ipa' pape wambota Godi nogosahe'epa ea'i. Ipa' panda' maola dembinai king Jisas Krais pindilalimana si'i pris. Ea' pape amam nematawa Godi atipa mini'ap hiasi ma ganimba hiagoma. God nosahe'epa ea' ananipai atipa ma pegewalapa banagami fasimi moloma agol lu'wagili ananigili. Anen nofalepa ea' nanda'epa pakwaha owamb akot pagafi'mai mogogala'i fasimi ananimi.
60002010	Fowa' ipa' ata' pape epes falafipai atipa, apa' dei' ea' epes ananipai atipa. Fowa' ipa' ina pegawa God nagati uwahipipa ma dei' pagape andeande', ata' owa'. Apa' dei' pegawa God nati uwahipipa natopalopepa pape andeande'.
60002011	Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai endilisi, ae' a'i i'ipipa dindinip, ipa' si'i epes analemb walembipai pafi'i pailas pagapani pape nogota kwaia'uta ma itap apa'e. Dei' ipa' pendewa' alafugaha waf awafi ukup awapi pigahafemafi, fa'i fepa' fegaloma ambagof ipe'igufi.
60002012	Ipa' pepe pefe' andeande' pendanda' waf fasifi usi'ifi ma nogohnaep esis epes sogololama Godi. Ama nemaf mamahefa esis siga'i basef awafima ipa', atiasi siti waf bu'wafi ipe'ifi ea' sinifela waf afamba si'i bu'wafi. Ama main, nemaf akutaifi anen nogafi'afi ma esis sogasa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol.
60002013	Ipa' petalogofa ipa' hi'ilipa pefe' lafela agufumi dembami hiami hi'alam magape dembami ma itap apa'i. Pepe lafela pigaila waf Dembinaii. Pendape lafela dembinai gavman nagali'ma esis Romi.
60002014	Amom gavman dembami wapani, God atona nanda'am mapoma moha epes isimba sanda' waf awafii mogasindi'amonas, ea' mogasa'ma agofa isimba sanda' waf fasifii.
60002015	Okom Godi na'i ipa' penda'as na'amba. Anen na'i ipa' penda' waf fasifi ma fegasopama malogofa epes isimba ukup mahas magaolasi saga'i basef gawa akafii.
60002016	Ipa' ina agof akipai pape lafela anis epes daias, owa'atin. Ipa' pape wahifipa a pape lafela God atona. Ipa' pegawa isimba pendape andeande' si'i pagape wahifipai. Apa' ipa' ina pembaso'am penda' uhuf pewalo' waf afamba sagape wahifisafi usi'ifi fasifi feso'ala waf awafi pandambaho' panda'afi, hapaifi. Ipa' pendape andeande' si'i pape panda' maol Godii.
60002017	Ipa' pendagala pasa'ma agofa epes hiasi hi'indalas penda'as andeande'. Ea' ukup pindapindaila Kristen sahin owan ipe'isi. Ipa' a' ombal mondahepama Goda penda' lotumana andeande'. Ea' pendasa'ma agol king gavman dembinai nagali'ma esis Romi.
60002018	Ipa' panda' maola anis epesi pendafe' lafela dembami amamba ipe'imi ma maol hiani. Ipa' peme'am ea' ombal mondahepamam pesa'ma agof amamugufi. Ipa' ina penda'as na'amba ma amom bu'wami manda' waf sa'umbilifi atom, owa'. Penda'as na'amba ma anom manda' waf awafi akafifi wapani.
60002019	God anaf nofalo'mepa ma isimba i'i ipa' pilutu banagepa pila okom ananimi ma akafimi esis sogase'epam dowadowafi.
60002020	Apa' i'i ipa' penda' waf awafi sogahepama waf afambai ma pilutu banagepa pititilis, anaf ipa' pefa' main fasini ma waf afambai? Owa'atin. Apa' i'i ipa' penda' waf usi'ifi fasifi ma esis sonda'mepa waf awafi, dao' God okom mi'i waf afambai ea' nofalo'mepa ma isimba.
60002021	God nofalai ipa' ea' ma pigaila waf afambai pegefa' akafimi ma waf bu'wafi ipa' panda'afi. Dei' main, Krais atona name' akafimi ma nagatopalopapa. Ea' nihimba'mepa waf afamba bu'wafi ananifi ma pigailaf.
60002022	“Anen ina nanda' anef waf awafi, owa'. Ina na'i anif basef baso'afi ma malogol ananigili, owa'atin.”
60002023	Nemaf afamba esis sanda'ana findiwana anen ina nagwamas nanda'as findiwas, owa'atin. Afamba anen nagame' akafimi lu'wami anen ina naumbelis, owa'. Anen naso' anen atona hi'alana nafe'ma lagof anen aman anamba nogawaloga epes andeande' datimai.
60002024	Krais anen atona naga' nail lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegai ea' nofa' hiahaom awami ape'imi ma alop ananipi. Anen nanda'ama apa' mogape si'i saga' sagakwaha waf awafi hi'agalaf. Ama apa' mogape namepa ambal lopaipa mugaila waf usi'ifi hiafi.
60002025	Esis sahambombaga alop ananipi sanda'ana melegw atogwana, isimba atis dei' nanda'apa be'epa wapani. Fowa' ipa' pelelama ufia'w si'i sipsip owa' sugumafiamia. Apa' dei' ipa' pitanima pafi'i ma Dembinai nugumafi ipa' paloma ambagof ipe'igufi andeande' si'i anona nugumafi sipsip nugumafiam andeande'.
60003001	Basef ifimba fagali'i fa'i ipa' pendape lafela dembami gavman moloma agufisi ipa' panda' maolasi. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' nematawa pagaso' amami pendape lafela amom wauhupipa ipe'imi. I'i anom owa' ata' mugaila basef Godia, ipa' pila'ipam pihimba'mama waf bu'wafi atef atapipa. Ipa' ina pi'ipam anif basef. Apa' pihimba'mama mugati waf bu'wafi ipe'ifi atefa amom mila basef Godi mogahapifana.
60003002	Dei' main, amom atiasi miti ipa' nematawa ombal mehepa ma Goda pila waf fasifi usi'ifi atefa pegafe' andeande' hilili'ma amom mogambema opalefa God.
60003003	Ipa' ina pendefalo' sosaf hiahaom mamimami alop atopami ma monda' ipa' pindati fasifasipa si'i pegefalo'ma balagah ipe'igahi, owa'i. Ipa' ina pendefalo' a'owa' sosaf atona wafinai si'i bahigis mais fasifasisi a gol mogogala' gambigambis a klos sosaf fasifasinai nagailami ma hiasi sitilipa siga'i fasifasipai, owa'i, hapaimi.
60003004	Sosaf ipe'ifi na'ambai, ipa' pendefalo'ma opalef ipe'ilifi nomona ukup nomonas ipe'isi ma waf bu'wafi usi'ifi endilisifi. Sosaf afambai ina atiasi awasifi, owa'atin. Fogape atapif lifilafi na'amba. Nelelemb ipe'ilimbi begape awanelemb a ambagof ipe'igufi tol fogape andeande'ma waf sa'umbilifi. Sosaf afamba nomonafi lu'wafi a'owa' ma naep Godi.
60003005	Nematawa fowa'iwai mini'ap Godi awo wahapifif wape wa'i endilisi God anaf nigaila basef ananifi datimai. Sosaf awaufi na'ambai, wanda' na'amba wanda' waf bu'wafi opalef nomon ea' wafe' lafela wauhupawa awaumi.
60003006	Sera kwanda'as na'amba atin. Ako'w kwahapifa aman akwa'unai Abraham ea' kofalana kwa'i Dembinai akwa'unai. I'i ipa' penda' waf fasifi usi'ifi ma owa' ombal mehepama hiahawes mais si'i sogatagamepai, ipa' dei' ea' ihawama'w ako'upai.
60003007	Ipa' amam wauhupawa wapani pindimafiawa ma gawa bu'wani, ukup pendanda'ma alop awaupi ina banagep, owa'. Ipa' penda'awa andeande' pasa'ma agof awaugufi. Dei' main, awo wapani dei' walomepa ogofa' ambal namili God nogose'epal dowafi. Ipa' penda'mawas na'amba ma ina anis maefah sili'ama beten ipe'ini, owa'atin.
60003008	Basef ifimba fetambel na'amba. Ipa' hipai pendape opalef atelef ea' ukup pindaima atin pila sahin owan.
60003009	Ipa' ina penda' waf awafi fendagwama, owa'i. I'i esis siga'ipipa basef findiwaifi, ipa' ina pegwamasef, owa'i. I'i esis sonda'mepa waf awafi, ipa' pegwamas penda'mas waf fasifi atef pi'ipas basef bu'wafi ma God nogofalo'mas. Dei' main, God nofalepa ea' ma pegefa' hiahaom fasimi anaf nogofalo'mepami.
60003010	Si'i basef Godi fagail Buk Baibeli fa'ias na'amba faga'i, “Epen mamahina ni'i sonahana ambal namili ma okom mi'i negati nemaf bu'wafi, anin nindihi'ama basef nili'ama malogol ananigili andeande'.
60003011	Anin nendambema nefa'ma waf awafi, ea' nenda' waf bu'wafi atef. Ea' anin okom mondaila opaf fogape awanef fogaloma Godi epesi ea' nenda' waf afambai fefe' fepe banagef.
60003012	Dei' main, Dembinai anen nape naep paila epes isimba sogape hilili'i ma waf bu'wafi ea' numafias andeande'. Dondol anen nagahembe'ma beten asasini, apa' isimba sanda' waf awafii anen nandambema nanda' megahahas.”
60003013	I'i ipa' ukup pi'ipi'i a'owa' ma penda' waf fasifi atef, ina a' anin epen la'ifina nenda'mepa waf awafi nehambombagepa, owa'atin endilisi.
60003014	I'i ipa' pefa' akafimi ma waf fasifi ipa' panda'afi, ipa' pendagala a'owa'. Ipa' ina a' ombal mehepama epes ea' ina nomonas iwaiwanis, owa'i.
60003015	Ipa' ukup pendapoma Krais atona nope Dembinai hilili'ma opalef ipe'ilifi penda' lotumana. Ea' penda' dumbulidombol pendape lifilafi ma pewalapa basef kofagefa alihif pegagwamasef epes ami sogahali'ipamafi ma hiahaom fasimi pape pegehafami.
60003016	Apa' ipa' pegwamasef peloma opalef awanilifi ea' penda'as andeande' pinifelis. Ipa' penda' waf bu'wafi ma malogof fagape opalef ipe'ilifi nomoni ina fihimba'mepa anef waf awafi, owa'. Penda'as na'amba ma esis siga'ipipa basef awafi ma poe bu'wani pagaila Kraisani ma esis ambagof awagofa basef ifimba awafi asasifi.
60003017	Dei' main, andeande'ma ipa' pegefa' akafimi ma waf usi'ifi fasifi. Amamba mikila' wafa pegefa' akafimi ma waf awafi ipa' panda'afi. I'i okom Godi ni'i ipa' pefa' akafimi amamba ma waf bu'wafi dao', andeande'.
60003018	Ipa' a' ukup pendapoma Krais anen naga' atetefa nagakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi ea' amamba ma'um. Aman atotona bu'unai naga' ma nagatopalopa epes hiasi sanda' waf awafii ma nili'as sogafe'ma God. Alop ananipi, sahana naga'. Apa' ambal ananili, nosafel nape namona.
60003019	Ambal ananili atol ea' nafe' nawalapa basefa amom ambagof amamba sagawasi'am dindigimi epes isimba
60003020	fowa' sogosambala Godi, anen nanindifa okom nape nasasa afamba Nowa nanda' galaho'wafi. Galaho'w akwamba epes kwaia'wis sawis sape andeande', 8-pelais ina saga' ma embel lu'wami, owa'atin.
60003021	Embel amamba lu'wami mondola'waifa sasa'of sogofa' baptais matopalopepa pegape andeande'. Amamba ina masa'opa alogwa alop atop ando'i, owa'atin. Amamba anif basef endilisi banagafi apa' ma'if magaloma Godi, ifimba fatagai malogof fagape opalef nomoni bo'walef hilili'i. Amamba mofa'epa pigatanimai ma banagami amamba atom Jisas Krais notanima nogosafelami.
60003022	Anen ea' nafe' nalota ilif otaga nape wa'ol felefele'ma lagol kwahisigili Godi banagagoma. Ea' amom ensel hiami maloma agufumi banagami mugumafi ilifi mape lafela anen atona.
60004001	Krais nofa' akafimi alop ananipi ea' ipa' wapani a' ukup banagep na'amba atin si'i anen. Dei' main, epen mamahina ipe'ini negefa' akafimi ma alop ananipii, anin nakwaha waf awafi ea'.
60004002	Ea' dei' nogota ata'e ipa' ata' pagape itap apa'e, ipa' pefe' pila okom Godi atona nola'ambemepa nope pefe' pefe' petagama pegaga'. Apa' okom aunai epesi nogohafema waf awafii, owa'i, hapainai.
60004003	Fowa' ipa' pape nogota launai ea' pafe' paila waf naninani aunai esis sogololama Godi ukup maga'ianai. Waf afamba na'amba, waf so'a waulafi, ukup pegehafela waf awafi a saga' embel banagimbeli ma ukup magaolas a safe' sagape anamba sanda' gwa'aimi saga' embel banagimbeli nogota lautaima a sandakolas saga' embel banagami mamimami a sogosambala basef Godi ma sanda' waf awafi a safe' sanda' lotuma god baso'amunai. Nogota tatumba pafe' pagaila waf anambai dei' ahi'alata.
60004004	Dei' epes isimba sogololama Godi gogolalasis sati ipa' owa' pendao'oma pelomas penda' waf anamba hianai aunaia. Ea' dei' asa'ipipa basef awafi findiwaefa ipa'.
60004005	Anen nandandombol ea' ma nogawaloga epes isimba sagapani soloma isimba ea' sagaga'i. Esis anaf sowalapa waf awafi asasifi sogwamana basef anen a waf afamba kofagefa esis sanda'afi.
60004006	Isimba atis fowa' basef bu'wafi Godi afafe' fatagama epes isimba sagaga'i wapani. Ama God nogawaloga esis si'i anaf nogawaloga epes hiasi hi'igalas. Basef ifimba bu'wafi fafe' fatagama esisa sogape namisa ambagof asasigufi si'i God nagape namona.
60004007	Nogota hiahaom ma'i hi'igalamatai ea' tafi'i felefele'. Isimba atis ipa' a' ukup pindapaipa andeande' pelele' kilikala' ea' pindimafi alop ipe'ipi andeande'ma ipa' la'ifipa ma pendabeten.
60004008	Basef lu'wafi fape fagali'ma basef hiafi hi'agalafi ifimba. Ipa' ukup pindaima atina sahin owan banagambel a'owa'. Dei' main, waf afamba ukup pindaima atinasafi faso'ala waf hiafi awafi ea' fikila' waf hiafi hi'alaf.
60004009	Ipa' pinda'i aho'ma anef waf afambai petopalopa anis alipisi daindaias sogafi'i ifagw ipe'igwii pimafias andeande'. Ipa' ina opalef awalefa esis, owa'i.
60004010	Ipa' hipai atona atin apefa' presen naninani fasini hiani Ambal bu'unai Godi nagase'epani. Ea' pindimafi presen inimba ipa' atona atini andeande' datima ma pegatopalopa esis sahin owan. Pimafian na'amba.
60004011	Ami negawalapa basefi, anin a' ninda'if si'i nagawalapa basef Godi atif. Ea' epen nenda' maola negatopalopa anis daindaiasi, anin nendanda'ana banagami amamba God nagaso'anami. Ama epes hiasi sogati maol inimba hiani fasini hi'igalana sondagala sogasa'ma agol Godi ma Jisas Krais atona. Agol lu'wagili goloma banagami mogogala'i hiami ananimi atom dondol lifilafi. Endilisi atis.
60004012	Ipa' Kristen alipipai endilisi, anom gwamba lu'wami mi'i mogatagama ipa', apa' ipa' ina pi'i amamba a' anom daiam endilisi matagamepa ea' pesafel gogololasipa ma amamba, owa'i. Akafimi amamba ipa' pefa'am paloma Krais.
60004013	Ea' ipa' sonondahepa ma pegame' akafimi amamba. Ama anaf agol lu'wagili ananigili goloma mogogala'i ananimi mogataga, nemaf afamba ipa' pendagala endilisi a'owa'.
60004014	I'i anis siti ipa' pilutu banagepama Kraisa si'ipipa basef awafi findiwaifi, dao' andeande' ipa' pendagala. Dei' main, akafimi amamba mihimba'mepa Ambal bu'unai Godi dei' nogala' napaipa.
60004015	Ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma anin epen ipe'ini neha anin epen daian nega' a'a nenda' wal o nenda' waf awafi fafifafi a'a ni'i nepe nilinili' ma maol anis daiasi, owa'i. Ae' andaiwa'ma anin epen ipe'ini nenda' anef waf afambai awafi ma sogaso'an akafimi. Amambai owa', awasim.
60004016	Apa' i'i ipa' pefa' akafimi ma pagataga Kristen, dao'. Ipa' ina ambagof awagofa amamba pendafa'mam, owa'i. Ipa' sonehepa pindanifela Goda pegefa' agol Kraisi.
60004017	Nogota atamba atataga ea' ma dei' God nogawaloga esis mini'ap ananipi ma basef lu'wafi. I'i God nili' nogawaloga apa' mugali', anaf nigi' nowaloga epes isimba sogosambala basef bu'wafi ananifii sope atiasi si'imama? Esis asofa' akafimi lu'wami.
60004018	Si'i basef Godi fagail Baibeli faga'ias fa'i, “I'i ahifima epes bu'wasi sotanimai sogape andeande'ma, dei' epes isimba sogowa' alafugaha Godi soloma isimba sanda' waf awafii anaf sondanda' si'imama? Esis asope awes sofa' akafimi lu'wami.”
60004019	Ea' epes mamahisa sogofa' akafimi ma sagaila okom Godii, isimba sonda'as na'amba. Esis ea' sondape usi'is atis solo ambagof asasigufi fope lagof Godi, anen nanda' epes hiasi sataga sagapani naila basef ananifi datima atapina.
60005001	Ipa' agufipai pigimafi esis Kristeni, ae' a'i esa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ewa' banagaipa. Ae' wapani ae' agiliwai igimafi esis Kristeni. Fowa' ae' alutu agati Krais nogofa' akafimi a' egegawami. Ea' anaf wapani ilutu elomepa ma mugati mogogala'i lu'wami mogatagai. Dei' a'ipipa dindinip na'amba a'i
60005002	ipa' pindimafi amam nematawa God nogasi'ipasi andeande' si'i amom mugumafi sipsipi manda'as. Ea' ipa' ukup pehafel endilisi ma pigimafias si'i okom Godi ma'i penda'as. Ipa' pendanda' maol ananini andeande' datima, ina penda'an ukup pepoma pegefa' otamba atemba, owa'. Opalef ipe'ilifi fendasafel endilisi ma penda' maol Godi.
60005003	Ipa' owa'i pepe si'i epes sogofa' agof lu'wagufi ma pegape dembipai pegetalogofa esis amam nematawa isimba Godi ipa' pigimafiasia, owa'i. Ipa' pendape hilili' andeande'ma esis sitilipa sigaila waf ipe'ifi.
60005004	Ama Dembinai nugumafi amam nematawa si'i sipsip Godi notaga nondawalap alihinama ipa' pegefa' hiahaom bu'wami mogape andeande' lifilafii, agol lu'wagilimi. Amamba ina atiasi awasim higiligalami, owa'. Mogape atapimi.
60005005	Ea' na'amba atin ipa' amam sa'upai awamipai wapani, ipa' pinindifa ipa' pefe' lafela amam amamba agufumi dembami mugumafi ipe'i. Ea' pendefa' waf afamba pinindifa ipa' pendafe' lafela amom sahopepa ipe'imi pendatopalopa atina waf bu'wafi. Dei' main, basef fagail buk Baibeli faga'ias na'amba fa'i “God nowa' alafuga epes isimba sanda' du'waniga ma sagasa'ma agof asasigufi atogof. Apa' anen natopalopa epes isimba sagatalifa agof asasigufi fagafe' lafela anis daiasi ma sagape sa'umbili.”
60005006	Ea' dei' ipa' pindatalifa ukup ipe'ipi pendafe' lafela God pepe lafela banagami ananimi. Ama nemaf mamahefa anen okom muga'iefi fegataga ma nosa'ma agof ipe'igufi noganifelipa.
60005007	Hiahaom nimanimi monda'epa awipai, pese'anam mefe'ma God atona. Dei' main, anen bu'unai banagonai nugumafi ipa' andeande'i.
60005008	Ipa' pimafi alop ipe'ipi solawaipa andeande'. Satan aman aunai bounai ipe'inai anen nandahama si'i mafin lu'unai wandafunai laion nagail alupi. Anen naha nafe' noga nogalef mehipa na'i niti anis epes nohas noga'as.
60005009	Ipa' pihapifana pilutu banagepa ma pewa' alafugahana pigali'amonana. Dei' main, sahin owan ipe'isi sagape itap hiagomai esis sofa' akafimi na'amba atin.
60005010	God anen kofagonama waf afamba hiafi hi'alaf nagatopalopapa dowafafi. Ipa' sisihipama Krais, isimba atis dei' God nofalepa ma pegape mogogala'i banagami ananimi magape dondol lifilafii. Apa' dei' ipa' pame' akafimi nogota bandata. Ama main owa', anen atona nisindi'amonepa petaga be'epa, ea' nowa' banagaepa pilutu banagepa si'i olaf banagafi fogowa' banaga ipati.
60005011	Banagami hiami hi'alam ananimi atom dondol lifilafi.
60005012	Ae' a'ipa owame Sailas nanda'ago basef ifi'i ae'afi bandafi fafe'mago ipa'. Ae' ati anen nanda' maola Krais datimai. Ea' a'ipipago basef amamba endilisimi God nagatopalopapa dowafami. Dei' lutu atapipa ma amamba. Anda' basef ifi'i a'i asa'ma ukup ipe'ipi egewa' banagaipa.
60005013	Esis amam nematawa Kristen sahin owan ipe'isi sagape wambel Babiloni, God nandandepas ea' sagalomipai. Esis sasapa'o dagala basef bu'wafi fafe'mago ipa'. Nogame ae'anai Mak wapani sonahana ma ipa' ea' nasapa'o basefa dagala ananini ma ipa'.
60005014	Ipa' pindahapima atin ukup pindaima peloma ipa' Kristen alipipai hipai atona atin hi'indalepa. Ama penda' waf afamba ukup pigapigailasafi. Ae' a'i God nonda'epa opalef awanelef, ipa' mamahipama pagape sisihipama Kraisi. Ea' ma'uf.
61001001	Ae' Saimon Pita anda' maol Jisas Kraisi, anen nandandepe aposel. Ae' anda'ago basef ifimba ma ipa' amam nematawa pegefa' hapif fasini lu'wani na'amba atin si'i afa' ogofa'ani. Hapif inimba ipa' pefa'ana waf bu'wafi hilili'i Jisas Kraisi, anen God ape'inai nowambelapa mogotanimai.
61001002	God natopalopepa dowaf ea' nanda' opalef ipe'ilifi fape sa'ombel awanelef. Ae' a'i amamba mondape si'ima ipa' ma ufia'w akwamba pegegawa God noloma Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai.
61001003	Krais nofalepa ma pefa' banagami mogogala'i ananimi atom pegalomana. Ama banagami God nagaso'anami atom anen naso'apa fe' bu'wani hiahaom amamba fasimi hi'alama mope andeande' mogaila waf Godi. Krais nanda'apa na'amba ma ufia'w akwamba mogogawa anen atona.
61001004	Banagami mogogala'i amamba atom anen naso'apa basef ananimi naga'i endilisi atinami. Basef amamba lu'wami fasimi a'owa'. Basef amamba atom ipa' pataga la'ifipama pegefa' ambal namili ma waf Godi pegalomana. Ama pefa' pefe' pindihi'ama hiahaom amamba awami mataga manda' ukup pegehafel a'owa' ma waf awafii mape itap apa'e manda' epes awasii.
61001005	Ipa' ukup pepoma hiahawes isimba pendanda' maol banagambel endilisi dondo' ma ikwafa pepel ipe'ini piwatania hapif ipe'ini penda' waf bu'wafi atef. Ea' piwatania waf afamba bu'wafi ma pegefa' gawa bu'wani.
61001006	Ea' piwatania gawa inimba ma waf nomonas sondapaipa pimafi alop andeande' datima. Ea' piwatania waf pigimafi alopafi ma waf pigalutu banagepamafi, pegefa' nimanimi. Ea' piwatania waf pigalutu banagepamafi ma penda' waf pegasa'ma agol ananigili.
61001007	Ea' waf afamba hiafi bu'wafi fagali'i piwataniaf feloma waf ukup pindaima atina sahin owanafi. Ea' waf afamba ukup pindaima atinafi piwatania waf bu'wafi pegatopalopa sahin owanafi.
61001008	Ipa' pegawa Jisas Krais dembinai ape'inai anen kofagonama waf afambai hiafi hi'alaf. I'i waf afamba fepe ipa' banagefa fetaga lu'uf a'owa' fikila' pali' panda'afi, gawa inimba ipe'ini ina atiasi nepe dowaf, owa'atin. Atiasi a' netaga nefe' lu'win newalapai waf fasifi hiafi.
61001009	Apa' epen mamahina waf afambai akani, anin ina atiasi niti hiahawes sagape lauguni negawas, owa'atin. Anin si'i naep pagaso'ani ea' okom maso'an God nasa'opana nagakwahomana waf awafi hiafi anin nali' nanda'afi.
61001010	Ea' ipa' penda' waf bu'wafi penda' maol banagambel endilisi pindikila' fowa' pali' panda'ana pagaila basef ifimba fowa' God nofalepa nosahe'epa ma pagape ananipai atipa. Penda'as na'amba ma pegegawa endilisi God nofalepa nosaho'epa ea'. I'i ipa' pelam penda'am atapipa, atiasi ina pewa ma anef waf awafi, owa'atin.
61001011	I'i ipa' pigailam, dao' andeande'ma anaf God nonda' ufia'w kogal alihi'wa pendagala pefe' pigawis anamba anen nagala'ambemagoma nagape atapigin lifilafima. Anen atona nagatopalopapa ma dei' magape andeande'i.
61001012	Endilisi, ipa' pegawa hiahawes isimba ma basef ifimba fagali'i ea' pahapifif banagepa ma basef ifimba endilisifi palutu la'ifipamef. Owa' owa'atin, ae' a'i ata' inda'ipipa atina egasa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma pendanda'ma basef ifimba.
61001013	Nimaguf hiafi hi'ilif ae' epe namowe elomepa itap apa'e, okom mandanda' a'i i'ipipa timbi tambela egasa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma basef ifimba.
61001014	Ae' egawa nogota bandata ma atiasi elamona ambal ae'ali ma sehe egaga' si'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nigihimba'me ea'.
61001015	Isimba atis dei' a'i enda' maol banagambel dondo' ma ikwafa pepel ae'ani enda' ano'w ufia'wa anif nimaguf hiafi ae' egaga', ipa' ukup pendanda'ma basef ifimba pepe pegegawef.
61001016	Afa' wa'ipipa ea' pegawa banagami Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi ma anaf notanima nifi'i nogoloma banagami lu'wami. Apa' afa' ina waila anom basef numunefis dowaf epes gawaisi saga'iami wa'ipipa basef ifimba Kraisi, owa'atin. Afa' watolona endilisi nogofa' banagami mogogala'i fasimi Godi ma naep afa'ipi, isimba atis dei' wa'ipipa.
61001017	Afamba afa' wape wagalomana halafuta atamba, wati anen nofa' agol lu'wagili galoma banagami mogogala'i fasimi ma lagol Ahamana Godi. Nemaf afamba anagol malogol ga'i gatagai God nagapoma gafi'mai Jisas ga'i, “Anamba Nogame ae'anai okom magamagailana a'owa'i. Okom ae'ami bo'oma anen.”
61001018	Afa' wape walomana halafuta atamba God nandandepatai bo'wagoma ea' wame' basef ifimba malagol agalemba ga'i gagatagai ilifi.
61001019	Afa' atofa ukup pandanda'ma basef ifimba God naga'iefi wame'ef afamba wagape halafuta atamba. Basef ifimba fewa' banaga basef fowa' amom profet maga'iefi ea' wahapilif banagef wa'i endilisi atis. I'i ipa' peme' basef ifimba amamifi ukup kilikala' pepemef, dao' andeande'. Dei' main, basef ifimba si'i anin nagwapin fagandini nape negegala' akoti. Ea' negala' nape atapin nafi'i nataga a' lala. Ama ondo'w kuhimbitai'wi lagalama'wi kogohafili opalef ipe'ilifi nomon.
61001020	Apa' ipa' ata' pendegawa basef ifimba atapipamef. Ina anona profet atotona naila okom ananimi atom dei' na'i anif basef kofagefa amom profet fowa' manda'ef fagail buk Baibeli, owa'atin.
61001021	Dei' main? Fowa' ina anin epen atitin na'i anif basef mogofa'efa Godi ma okom ananimi atom, owa'atin. Ambal bu'wali Godi atona nasa'mai nomonas amom profeti nasindi'amonam ea' mofa' malagol ananigili ma'i basef ifimba.
61002001	Fowa' anom profet magambaso'ami mataga la'afena esis amam nematawa Israel mambaso'masa basef baso'ami. Dei' na'amba atin atiasi anom amam magambaso'ami mosafel la'afena ipa' wapani ea' mondambaho' mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'ipipa basef mamimami hiami baso'ami magahambombaga epesi. Dembinai anen fowa' naga' ma natala amom amamba nagatagwahoma waf awafi ma mogape andeande'. Apa' owa', amom mowa'ana alafugah wapani. Atiasi monda'as na'amba atin, owa' kwafalis atis mohambombaga amom atom motaga aom.
61002002	Amom manda'as na'amba atiasi anis amam nematawa hiasi sila waf naninani aunai amamunai. Ea' anis epes daias siti waf awafi amom magambaso'ami manda'afi ea' sosambala basef bu'wafi si'i basef awafi atifa waf bu'wafi endilisifi Godi.
61002003	Amom amamba kowagalami endilisi, isimba atis atiasi monda' basef baso'afi ukup amamipi atip paga'iefi ma mogofa' otamba mais ipe'isi. Apa' fowa' God a' nogawa nandandepa anef nemaf fapomam ea' ma nogawaloga amoma anaf higiligalam lamonam. God nandondomba anom maifah mogalamona amom endilisii ata' mape atapim mohafa amom. Ina ma'oh molola, owa'atin.
61002004	God ina niambali' amom ensel mamahoma fowa' manda' waf awafii, owa'atin. Anen a' nali'amonam miliana wambel awambili hel. Ea' nowa'am sisihim mape atapim anamba akotigima mape masasa nemaf God nogowalogamafi.
61002005	Anen ina niambali' esis amam nematawa fowa'isi sogowa' alafugahanai sape andeande', owa'atin. Anen nanda' embel lu'wami matef mahas afis hi'alas. Anen numafi Noa atotona nagawalipasa basef bu'wafi Godii nofa'ana naloma epes 7-pelais wapani nofa'as sotanimai sape andeande'.
61002006	Ea' nahambombaga epes hiasi sagape walemb bialembi lu'walimbi Sodomi Gomora wapani. Epes isimba walemb ambalembai God nahagon naofagon nif lu'wafi ea' agambeh atembeh hotawa. Anen nagwamasa waf awafi esis sanda'afi nanda'as si'i anol ametala akafimi lu'wami epes mamahisa sogosambala basef ananifii anaf sogofa'ami.
61002007	God natopalopa aman anamba bu'unai Lot numafiana nofa'ana notanimai nape andeande', ina aona lamonana, owa'. Anen okom nimanim endilisima waf awafi so'a waulafi alugufi amom manda'afi, mogosambala basef Godii.
61002008	Aman anamba bu'unai Lot nape la'afisa nalomas dondol name'ama waf awafi amom manda'afi nalomam natelef. Okom ananimi a' nimanim a'owa' ma waf afamba amom mogosambala basef Godii manda'afi.
61002009	Basef ifimba fa'ipapa alihif fa'i Dembinai nugumafi epes bu'wasi sagaila waf ananifii andeande'. Nemaf mamahefa gwamba maim mogatagamas, anen nogawa ea' ma nigili'amasa sogape andeande'ma gwamba amamba. Apa' anen nahapila esis sanda' waf awafii ma nogagwamasa akafimi ma waf awafi esis sanda'afi sope atapis sofe' sotagama nemaf afamba anen nogawalogasafi.
61002010	Basef ifimba endilisi atis fapoma epes mamahisa ukup pegehafema waf alugufi alop atopafi ma ukup pa'i basef Dembinaii saga'i falafifii. Epes isimbai anaf sofa' akafimi lu'wami a'owa'. Amom magambaso'ami manda' du'wanigama magaila ukup amamipi atipi masa'ma agof amamugufi atogof. Amom ina ombal maham kwasakwasala manda' anom ensel awami magape ilifi findiwam, owa'.
61002011	Apa' amom ensel bu'wami banagami endilisi mikila' amom amamba magambaso'ami, amom ina magwas manda' ensel amamba awami findiwam manda' kotimama naep Dembinai, owa'atin.
61002012	Hiahawes amom magambaso'ami owa' mogogawasia, amom ma'i basef awafima isimba. Amom si'i mafis magail alupi ukup owa' pigapaumia magaila alop atop wafipii. Mememi mola mafis isimba ma anis epes sowando'mam sofa'am soham afum higiligalam ea' na'amba atina amom amamba wapani anaf awasim higiligalami.
61002013	Amom manda' waf naninani aunai maso'as akafimi anis epes daias. Ea' anaf God nogwamama mogofa' akafimi wapani. Amom ukup pandanda'ma waf afamba saga' gwa'aisi embel maisafi faloma waf awafi so'a waulafi a sonohas endilisi ma sonda' waf afambai alip. Ea' ma' gwa'aisi maloma ipa', apa' waf awafi amamifi si'i anol ametal aluguli awali la'afena ipa'. Amom mape malomepa mandagalama waf awafi amom manda'afi.
61002014	Dondol naep amamipi petaoma nematawa wanda' waf awafii lifilafi ma monda' waf awafi mogalomawa, amom ina makwaha waf afamba, owa'atin endilisi. Amom maga'i'ipa anis epes daiasa mombemefas sonda' waf awafi. Amom mogawa endilisima waf afamba awafi kowagalasafi ma hiahawes anis epes daiasi. Anaf God nohambombagam endilisi.
61002015	Amom mowa' alafugaha ufia'w usi'i'wi, isimba atis dei' ukup paolam a'owa'. Amom maila waf anona aman Balami, Beor nogamana. Anen okom mohafela nanda' waf awafi ma nogofa' otamba hiambai.
61002016	Owa' neme' basef banagafi fa'ipana dindinipa nogokwaha waf afamba awafi. Basef ifimba donki ananini atin nega na'ipanaef si'i epen naga'i nasopama ufia'wa waf afamba awafi ukup pagahasafi profet anamba na'i nonda'afi.
61002017	Amom amam na'ambaimi si'i waiwa amamba magal mogowalai itapi embel akami. Amom mandahama si'i ilagw fufin lu'unai nufapusam nawalom magafe' atona biana daindai. God nandondomba akot lu'unai endilisi alialina a'owa'i ma anaf amom mogapaogon.
61002018	Amam amamba manda' du'waniga gigal ma'oh dowadowafa basef falafalafifi awafi amamifi. Amom maga'i'ipa anis epes daindaiasa waf ukup pigahafemafi ma so'a waola waf naninani aunai alop atopi. Amom manda' waf afambai ea' mambemefa anis epes ata' dei'aol sataga sa'i sogakwaha waf awafi epes isimba sogololama Godi sanda'afi ea' mambemafas saila amom.
61002019	Amom ma'ipa anis epes ma'i, “I'i ipa' pila basef afa'ifi, dao' ipa' atiasi pepe andeande'ma ina anis maefah sowasi'ipa, owa'. Pepe wahifipa.” Apa' owa' amom magape lafela waf awafi, amamba mawasi'am sisihim. Dei' main, i'i anis maefah sombemefa anin epen, atiasi epen inimba ea' atapin nepe lafela hiahawes isimba sagambemefani.
61002020	I'i epes mamahisa sokwaha waf awafi hiafi itapafi fanda' epes awasii sogogawa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nowambelapa mogotanimai, ma i'i waf afambai awafi fehekela esis wapani ma fiwasi'as sisihisa, anaf asope atapis na'amba. Sagali' sape awasis sisihisa waf awafi, ata' sape awes kwasakwasala. Apa a'i owa' sagi' sanda' waf awafi wapani, ea' sape sisihis awes endilisi ma waf awasifi.
61002021	I'i esis ina sofa' gawa ma ufia'w akwamba ma owa' sogawa mu'uli bu'wani Godia, ata' sope awasis kwasakwasala. Apa' dei' sowa' alafugahana ea', anaf sope awes endilisi a'owa'.
61002022	Waf afambai fagatagamasi asi'i anif basef endilisifi epes gawaisi saga'iefi faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Nombat totanima tafe' taga' tagago'wami atatimi wapani.” Anif wapani faga'i, “Bol lafe' lasa'of ea' ma main, owa' lotanima lafe' lambani itap walambuf folo'wagalagoma wapani.”
61003001	Ipa' alipipai endilisi, basef ifi'i fagafe'ma bifi anda'ef fagail okwatihi fafe'mago ipa'. Basef ifimba biafif fagali'i faloma ifi'i ase'epaef ipa' ma fegasa'ma nomonas fasisi ipe'isi ma pegegawa basef ifimba.
61003002	Ea' ae' a'i ipa' ata' ukup pendanda' wapani ma basef ifimba fowa' amom profet Godi magawalapafi. Ea' ukup pendanda'ma basef banagafi Dembinaii, nowambelapa mogotanimaii, ipa' ea' pegefa'ana lagof afa' aposel ipe'ifai.
61003003	Ipa' ata' ukup pagawa isimba sindali'. Nimaguf ifi'i fagagi'i anom amam monda'iafipai motaga migi'ma ukup awapi amamipi ma waf amamifi. Ea' monda'iafipa na'amba
61003004	mi'i, “Anen na'i basef endilisifi atif na'i nogafi'i wapanii. Apa' dei' anen ata' nape ani? Nogota fowa' dambadamba bafasapa sagaga'atai hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam ata' mape atapim na'amba atin si'i fowa' dambadamba itap apa'e pagataga mafi'i mataga dei'.”
61003005	Apa' nomonas amamisi mandaiwa', dei' owa' mogawa hiahawes isimbaia, owa'atin. Amom ina ukup pandanda'ma fowa' gani God na'i atina nanda' itapi otaga sataga sagape, owa'. Anen nanda' itap pandahi' pataga pape la'afena embel.
61003006	Owa' God nanda' embel lu'wami mataga itap maofanap hi'alap mahambombaga epesi hiahaom magape itapi hi'alam.
61003007	Basef Godi ea' ifimba atif dei' fili'ama hiahaom magape ilifi maloma epes saloma hiahaom magape itapi hi'alam dei' ata' mape atapim masasa nif fegandom nemaf afamba God nogawaloga epes isimba sogowa' alafugaha anini ma nonda'as higiligalas.
61003008	Ipa' alipipai endilisi, ipa' owa'i ukup pese'epama anis hiahawes atifisa. Okom Dembinaii na'i nemaf atetef a' si'i afagof hiagufi 1,000-pelaiguf ea' afagof 1,000-pelaiguf fandahama si'i nemaf atetef.
61003009	Dembinai ina nanda' maol lalag atina nogawalapai hiahaom anen okom mandanda' na'i endilisi atisa nonda'ami si'i anis epes ukup pandanda'ma maol sanda'an lalag atin, owa'atin. Anen nandaiwa'ma anin epen atitin higiligalan. Anen okom ma'i epes hiasi hi'ilas sombema nelelemb sondafe'ma anen. Isimba atis dei' anen okom mapoma ipa' dei' nape nasasaipa palomas.
61003010	Apa' nemaf Dembinai nogafi'afii anaf fifi'i si'i epen nanda' wali nagafi'i. Nemaf afamba otaga bendagola mehip ahigililam. Ea' hiahaom amamba hiami magapaunai wapani atiasi ea' fendom fesopamam hi'ilam. Itap apa'e wapani peloma hiahaom hiami sanda'am magape itapi anaf nif fendom fesopamam hi'ilam.
61003011	Endilisi hiahaom amamba anaf higililam hi'ilam na'amba. Apa' ipa' atiasi penda' main? Ipa' pepe pindaila waf usi'ifi bu'wafi hilili'i atef ea' pila waf hiafi Godi.
61003012	Ipa' penda'as na'amba ukup dag pepe pendehafa nemaf lu'wafi Godi, pendanda' maol ananini banagambela pegemaso' nemaf afamba fegataga. Nemaf afamba atef anaf otaga fendena fitai'wana ea' nif lu'wafi a'owa' fendo hiahaom amamba hiami magape otagai hi'ilam motaga mumbul mefe' si'i embel.
61003013	God na'i basef endilisifi atifa nonda' otagai itap dambaisi ma waf usi'ifi atef fegapaogoma. Apa' dei' ea' ukup dag mape mohafa isimba atis.
61003014	Alipipai ae'ipai endilisi, ipa' ukup dag pape pegehafa hiahawes isimbai. Ea' ipa' pendanda' maol banagambel pindimafi ipa' pegape be'epa hilili' andeande'ma waf awafi akepa ma naep Godi, pape opaf atof pegalomana.
61003015	Dembinai ata' nimanis nape nasasa apa' epes hiapai hi'alapa. Ea' dei' ipa' ukup pendapoma basef ifimba anen nowambelapa mogotambili. Isimba na'amba atin si'i basef ifimba hiafi sahomapa Pol apa' ukup pagapagailanai nanda'ef fagafe'ma ipe'i. Anen nanda' basef ifimba ma gawa bu'wami endilisi God nagaso'anani.
61003016	Aho' basef hiafi anen nanda'afi ma nemaf afamba Dembinai nogafi'afii nanda' ifimba atif. Apa' anif basef nanda'ef fagail buki ahifif endilisi ma mogogawa kofagefa. Basef ifimba ahififi, epes isimba gawa akasi ma owa' sugalutu banagesia isimba salalamona basef ifimba faloma anif daif hiafi wapani fagail Baibeli. Ea' esis atis sandahambombaga esisa anaf lamonas hi'igalas.
61003017	Alipipai endilisi, ipa' pegawas ea' hiahawes anaf sigi' sogatagai. Ea' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'amba amam amamba magambaso'ami ma mogosambala mu'uli Godi mohondo'epa pewa ma anef waf awafi.
61003018	Apa' ipa' pape waf afamba Dembinai Jisas Krais nagatopalopapa dowafafi, nowambelapa mogotanimai pegawaf ea'. Ea' pendalutu banagepa ma waf afamba feloma gawa inimba Kraisi pindikila' fowa' pali' pape panda'as. Ae' a'i agol lu'wagili fasigili atogol dei' atapigil gopomana gofe' anaf owagama wapani. Endilisi.
62001001	Afa' wanda' basef ifimba ma anona aman agilinama Basef, anen nagaso'apa ambal namili lagapaipai. Aman anamba fowa' gani dambadamba nagapani. Afa' wame' basef ananifi ea', watolona naep afa'ipi wahapilana lagof afa'igufi.
62001002	Ambal alamba namili lataga ea' afa' watolol naep afa'ipi. Isimba atis dei' afa' wawalipipa ma ambal alamba lagape dondol lifilafii. Ambal alamba fowa' lape laloma Ahamapa ea' dei' lataga alihigima watolol.
62001003	Hiahaom amamba afa' watolom wagame'ami dei' wa'ipipam ipa' wapani ma pegape nembel atotombel pegalomafa. Afa' wape wambota atota waloma Ahamapa nagaloma Nogamana ananinai Jisas Krais.
62001004	Afa' wanda' basef ifimba ma atiasi dagala ape'ini negataga lu'win si'ina apa'.
62001005	Basef ifimba afa' wame'anamef na'amba. God anen nogogala' afitinai. Ina anota akot tailana kwasakwasala, owa'atin endilisi.
62001006	I'i apa' mi'i mape nembel atotombel malomana, ama apa' ata' mape manda' waf awafi si'i magape akot atotai, apa' mambaso'ma apa' atepa ma basef ape'ifi faloma fe' ape'ini.
62001007	Anen nogogala' afitinai. I'i mope mogala' si'i anen waf awafi akapa, ea' mope nembel atembel moloma sahin owan hiasi. Ea' esimbel Jisasi Nogamana Godi basa'opa waf awafi ape'ifi hiafi hi'alaf, ea' mataga be'epa.
62001008	I'i apa' mi'i waf awafi akapa, apa' mambaso'ma apa' atepa ea' basef endilisifi ina fapaepa, owa'atin.
62001009	I'i apa' mowalapa waf awafi ape'ifi alihif, atiasi anen nokwahomapa waf hiafi awafi ape'ifi okom maso'anafa nosa'opapa mogataga be'epa hilili'. Basef fowa' nagala' lapafi ea' nilif nonda' waf usi'ifi datima.
62001010	I'i apa' mi'i, “Apa' owa' monda' waf awafia”, apa' mofala God ma'i anen aman naga'i basef baso'afii. Ea' basef ananifi ina fape opalef ape'ilifi, owa'atin.
62002001	Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa, anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' ma ina penda' waf awafi, owa'i. Apa' i'i anin epen nenda' waf awafi, anin anona nogatopalopani nape. Anen Jisas Krais bo'ona hilili'i. Anen nohali' Ahamana ma nogakwahoman waf awafi epen inimba okom moso'anaf.
62002002	Anen atona nahagofa okom numbutinai Godi naga' nakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi. Apa' ina nakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi atef, owa'. Anen nakwaha waf awafi ma epes hiasi itapasi okom maso'anaf.
62002003	I'i apa' mila basef Godi banagafi, apa' mogawana endilisi.
62002004	Epen ami ni'i, “Ae' egawa God andeande'”, ama anin owa' nila basef Godia, anin nagambaso'ami. Ea' basef endilisifi ina fape opaf ananifi, owa'.
62002005	Apa' epen ami nila basef ananifi, anin okom pelele' si'im maila God endilisi. Apa' magawa apa' mape sisihipama God na'amba.
62002006	Epen ami ni'i, “Ae' ape sisihiwi ma God”, fe' ananini nendataga usi'in si'i fe' Jisas Kraisi.
62002007	Alipipai ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa. Dei' ae' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa', ina anin mu'uli dambaini, owa'atin. Ae' a'ipipa mu'uli inimba atin fowa'ini, fowa' dambadamba pegegawani. Mu'uli inimba basef ipa' pagame' ea'i.
62002008	Apa' basef banagafi ma mu'uli inimba dei' anda'ef fagafe'mago ipe'i, ifimba dambaifi. Ea' fataga alihifa Krais nagi'mif dei' ipa' wapani pagi'mif. Dei' main, akot dei' ta'i pele'etata ea' mogogala'i endilisimi mataga mape ea'.
62002009	Epen ami ni'i, “Ae' ape mogogala'i,” ama anin opaf aofa sahin owan ananisi, epen inimba ata' nape akot atapin.
62002010	Epen ami okom magamagaila esis sahin owani, anin nagape mogogala'ii. Ea' epen inimba ina ata' anef waf awafi fapain fanda'an newa, owa'atin.
62002011	Apa' epen ami opaf awasifa sahin owan ananisi ni'i bousi, epen inimba ata' nape akot ea' nafe' akot atona nasopama naep ananipi. Ea' ina nati ufia'w negawa'w, owa'atin.
62002012	Ipa' awasi ae'ipai, God nakwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi hi'alafa agol Kraisi okom maso'anaf. Isimba atis dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa'.
62002013	Ipa' ahape, apegawa aman anamba andeande' fowa' dambadamba nape atapina. Ea' dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa'. Ipa' amam sa'upai, ipa' patofa wandafa aman aunai pikila'ana. Isimba atis dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa'.
62002014	Ipa' awasi, apegawa Ahamapa andeande'. Ea' dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mepago. Ipa' ahape apegawa aman anamba fowa' dambadamba nape nafi'i nafi'i atapina nape. Isimba atis dei' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mepago. Ea' ipa' amam sa'upai, ipa' banagipai ma penda' waf bu'wafi. Ea' basef Godi fagape nomon opalef ipe'ilifi dei' patofa wandafa aman aunai pikila'ana. Ea' dei' anda'ago basef ifimba ma ipa'.
62002015	Ipa' ina a' ukup pipila waf itapafi o anis hiahawes awasisi sagape itapi, owa'i. I'i ipa' ukup pigapigaila waf itapafi, ipa' ina ukup paipaila Ahamapa, owa'atin.
62002016	Apa' mogawa epes saloma hiahaom hiami magape itapi amamba na'amba. Hiahaom amamba opalef apimi mogohafemami maloma epes saloma hiahaom amamba epes satolom nelelemb kowagalamami maloma hiahaom amamba esis gagatomami ma anis satilis sagasa'ma agof lu'wagofasami, hiahaom amamba ina mafi'i Ahamapa, owa'atin. Amamba mataga itap apa'e.
62002017	Waf itapafi feloma hiahaom hiami epes ukup pigahafemami owagama a' higililam, apa' epen mamahina nigaila basefa okom Godi, epen inimba a' nepe lifilafi dondol.
62002018	Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai ae' okom magamagailipai, dei' nemaf fa'i a' hi'ilaf. Fowa' ipa' pame' basefa bounai Kraisi na'i nogataga. Apa' dei' bousi ananisi hiasi asataga ea'. Ea' apa' mogawa dei' nogota ta'i ahi'ilata.
62002019	Epes isimba sakwaha apa' ea'. Fowa' epes isimba ina a' ape'isi si'isi, owa'. I'i ape'isi si'isiai, esis asope solomapa atapis. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Esis asakwahepa ea'. Isimba atis dei' apa' mogawas andeande', epes isimba hiasi owa' mini'ap ape'ipia.
62002020	Apa' ipa', Krais nase'epa Ambal bu'unai Godi ea'. Dei' ipa' hipai pegawa basef endilisifi ea'.
62002021	Ipa' ina pelelama basef ifimba endilisifi ma dei' enda'mepago basef ifimbai, owa'. Ipa' apegawef. Ea' pegawa basef baso'afi ina fawalapa basef ifimba endilisifi, owa'atin. Isimba atis dei' anda'ago basef ifimba ma ipa'.
62002022	Aman nagambaso'masi anen ami? Anen aman anamba nambaso'mas naga'i Jisas ina Krais, God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, owa'. Aman anamba bounai Kraisi. Anen nowa' alafugama Ahamapa naloma Nogamana wapani.
62002023	Epen ami negewa' alafuga ma Nogamanai, anen newa' alafugama Ahamana wapani. Ea' epen mamahina nagaso' opafa Nogamanai, Ahamapa nape nomona okom ananimi.
62002024	Basef ifimba fowa' dambadamba ipa' pagame'afi, ifimba hapilaef ukup ipe'ipi sisihif. I'i ipa' pihapila basef ifimba pali' pagame'afi ukup ipe'ipi sisihif, bola pepe sisihipama Nogamana noloma Ahamana mope atapim molomepa.
62002025	Krais ana'ipapa basef endilisifi banagafi, anen atiasi noso'apa ambal namili mope andeande' lifilafi.
62002026	Ae' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' awalapa wafa epes isimbai sa'i sogambaso'mipai.
62002027	Apa' ipa', Krais nase'epa Spirit Ambal ananinai. Ea' Ambal ananinai nape nalomepa ukup ipe'imi nomon. Isimba atis dei' ipa' ina gawa akepa ma anin epen negawalipipa, owa'atin. Spirit Ambal Kraisi nawalipapa ma hiahawes hiasi ina nambaso'mapa, owa'. Dei' ipa' hapifa Krais pepe sisihipama anen.
62002028	Aho', ipa' awasi ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa a'i pendape sisihipama anen ama anaf notaga nondawalap, apa' ina ambagof awagof, owa'. Apa' mulutu banagepa ma naep ananipi.
62002029	Ipa' pegawa Krais anen bu'unai hilili' endilisi. Ea' pegawa anif basef wapani, epes mamahisa sagaila waf bu'wafi hilili'i, esis awasi Godi.
62003001	Awasi! Ahamapa God okom maimailapa a'owa'. Ea' anen nofalapa awasi ananipai. Endilisi atis, apa' awasi ananipai atepa. Isimba sandaiwa'ma Godi sagape itap apa'i, esis ina sogawa God, owa'atin. Isimba atis dei' esis ina sogawa apa' wapani.
62003002	Ipa' alipipai, ae' okom maimailipa. Dei' apa' mape awasi Godi. Apa' anaf mope mi'imama, isimba atis apa' ina dei' mogawas, ata' owa'. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Apa' a' mogawa, anafa Krais nogataga alihina, nemaf afamba, dao' a' motolona endilisi ea' motaga mope si'i anen nagape.
62003003	Epes mamahisa sape sagahafa anen nogafi'ii esis sape sandondomba opalef asasilifi lifilafi ma sogape bo'wes hilili' si'i Krais nagape.
62003004	Epen ami nanda' waf awafii, anin negesambala mu'uli Godi. Dei' main, waf awafi atef afamba esis satopa' mu'uli inimba.
62003005	Ipa' pegawa Krais nataga ma nogakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi hi'igalaf. Anen ina nanda' anef waf awafi, owa'atin.
62003006	Ea epen ami nape sisihin nagaloma anini, inimba ina ata' nape naila waf awafi, owa'. I'i epen mamahina nigaila waf awafii, okom ananimi ina a' nati Krais negawana, owa'atin.
62003007	Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, solawaipa andeande'! Na'amba anin epen a' nembaso'mepa. Epen ami nenda' waf usi'ifii, anin nape hilili' si'i Krais nagape.
62003008	Satan nanda' waf awafi fowa' dambadamba nafi'i nafi'i dei' ata' nape atapina. Ea' i'i epen mamahina nenda' waf awafi atapin negapomafi, anin epen Satani. Nogamana Godi nafi'i nataga nandawalapa main? Ma nogahambombaga maol Satani.
62003009	Epen ami nagape awani Godi, anin ina nape nanda' waf awafi atapin, owa'atin. Dei' main, okom Godi a' nape opaf ananifi ea' anin a' awani Godi. Ea' anin ina la'ifina ata' nenda' waf awafi atapin, owa'atin.
62003010	I'i apa' mi'i mogawa epen mamahina, nogamana Satani a mamahina Godi, apa' mogogawas na'amba. Epen ami owa' nenda' waf usi'ifia ma owa' okom mogamogaila alipisi ananisia, anin ina epen Godi, owa'atin.
62003011	Basef fowa' dambadamba ipa' pagame'afi ifimba. Apa' a' ukup pindaila esis sahin owan endilisi.
62003012	Apa' ina a' mila waf Kaini, hapaifi. Kain wambota aman aunai Satani ea' naha owamana Abel naga'. Dei' maina nahana nagaga'? Anen kowalana ma maol bu'wani owamana nanda'ani dei' nahana naga'. Apa' maol ananini awasini atin.
62003013	Ipa' sahin owan ae'ipai, i'i esis sagape itapi sogowa' alafugaha Godi sindaiwa'mepa, ipa' ina a' gogolagalasipa, owa'i.
62003014	Apa' ukup pagapagaila esis sahin owani, isimba apa' mogawas dei' a' makwahef ea' waf afamba ga'ifi ea' mataga mofa' ambal namili. Dei' main? Apa' ukup paipaila esis sahin owan endilisi. Epen ami owa' okom mogamogaila anin sahin owania, anin ata' nape atapina waf ga'ifi.
62003015	Epen ami okom numbutima sahin owan ananisi, anin si'i naha anis amam nematawa sagaga'i. Ea' ipa' pegawa epen naha anis sagaga'i, anin ina dei' a' nefa' ambal namili lapaina negape andeande' lifilafi, ata' owa'atin.
62003016	Waf afamba apa' ukup pigapigaila anis daiasafi mogogawaf na'amba. Krais nakwaha ambal ananili ma nagatopalopapa. Isimba atis apa' wapani a' mondokwaha ambagof ape'imi ma mogatopalopa sahin owan ape'isi.
62003017	I'i anin epen hiahaom hiamini ma nigati sahin owan hiahaom akani ma anin owa' okom mimila sahin owana, epen inimba ina okom maimaila God, owa'atin. Dei' maina epen inimba naga'i, “Okom ae'ami magamagaila God”? Owa'atin, anin nambaso'am.
62003018	O, alipipai ae'ipai, apa' ina a' ukup paipaila esis alipisi ma muga'ipasa basefa malogof atogof wafigufi, owa'atin. Apa' ukup pindapindaila esis endilisi a' motopalopas monda' waf bu'wafi endilisifi mihimba'masaf.
62003019	I'i apa' monda' waf afambai ma ukup pipila sahin owan ape'isi, apa' mogawa maila basef endilisifi. Waf afamba fanda' opalef ape'ilifi awanelefa mogape banagepa ma naep Godi.
62003020	I'i malogof fagape opalef nomoni fi'ipapa fi'i apa' manda' waf awafii, God dembinai a' nikila' ukup ape'ipi ea' nagawa hiahaom hiami.
62003021	Alipipai ae'ipai, ae' okom maimailipa. I'i malogof fagape opalef nomoni owa' fowalapa anef waf awafi fi'ipapaia, dao' mefe'ma God opalef ape'ilifi awanelef mope banagepa.
62003022	I'i apa' mi'i mondabeten mogahali'ana ma anis hiahawes, anen nogaso'apasi. Dei' main, apa' maila okom ananimi ea' manda' hiahawes anen sonahana ma apa' monda'asi.
62003023	Basef banagafi Godi fa'i na'amba fa'i apa' mondahapifa agol nogamanai Jisas Krais ea' ukup ape'ipi pindapindaima atin si'i anen naga'ipapa dindinip.
62003024	Epen mamahina nigaila basef Godi banagafi, anin nepe sisihin neloma God ea' God nope sisihina noloman. Anen a' naso'apa Spirit Ambal bu'unai ananinai ea' dei' mogawa God nape sisihina nalomapa.
62004001	Alipipai ae'ipai, amom profet magambaso'ami mafe'agon anamba itap hiagoma. Ipa' ina pihapifa epes isimba hiasi saga'i, “Ae' Ambal bu'wali Godi nagapauwai.” Owa'. Ipa' ata' pegwamba ambagof amamba hiami pendendomam ama pegegawa amom mataga mafi'i Spirit Ambal Godi a'a owa'.
62004002	Ipa' pegegawa Ambal Godi na'amba. Epen mamahina ni'i, “Endilisi, Jisas Krais nafi'i nataga epen endilisinai”, epen inimba Ambal Godi napain opaf ananifi.
62004003	Apa' epen ami owa' niga'ias na'ambai ma Kraisia, Ambal Godi ina nape anin, owa'atin. Ambal nagape epen inimbai anen bounai Kraisi. Fowa' pagame' basefa Spirit ambal bounai Kraisi nogafi'i, dei' a' nafi'i nape ea' itap apa'e.
62004004	Ipa' alipipai ae'ipai, ipa' epes Godi ea' panda' wandaf paloma amom profet awami magambaso'ami pikila'am. Dei' main, Ambal Godi nagape nomon opalef ipe'ilif anen banagonai nikila' aman aunai nagape itap apa'ii.
62004005	Epes isimba sagaila waf itapafii saga'i basef itapafi atifii, epes itapasi sahapifas. Dei' main, esis isimba itapasi atis.
62004006	Apa' apa', epes Godi. Epen mamahina negegawa Godi, anin neme' basef ape'ifi. Apa' epen ami owa' epen Godia, inimba ina name' basef ape'ifi, owa'atin. Ea' isimba atis dei' ametal inimba nihimba'mapa ma mogogawa epes isimba. I'i Ambal Godi endilisinai nupais, aseme' basef ape'ifi. Apa' i'i ambal nagambaso'ami nupais, ina seme' apa', owa'.
62004007	Ipa' ae' okom magamagailipai, apa' atepa a' ukup pindaima atin. Dei' main, waf afambai fafi'i God. Epen ami okom magamagaila sahin owani, anin awani Godi ea' dei' negawa God a' naila basef ananifi.
62004008	Epen ami owa' okom mogamogaila sahin owania, anin ina negawa God, owa'. Dei' main, God okom magamagaila epes hiasii.
62004009	God a' nihimba'mapa anen okom maimailapa na'amba. Anen nasapa' Nogamana ananinai atotona nafi'i itap apa'e ma apa' mogofa' ambal namili ma anen.
62004010	Basef kofagefa ma God okom magamagaila ape'i ifimba. Apa' ina mali' ukup paipailana, owa'atin. Anen nali' okom maimailapa ea' nasapa' Nogamana ananinai nafi'i ma nanda' okom numbutimi Godi maga' nakwaha waf awafi ape'ifi okom magaso'anaf.
62004011	Ipa' alipipai, waf afamba atef fihimba'mapa God okom maimailapa a'owa'. Ea' apa' wapani ukup pindaima atin endilisi.
62004012	Ina anin epen nati God, owa'atin. I'i apa' atepa ukup pindaima atin, God nope sisihina ma apa' ea' okom ananimi magamagaila ape'i atiasi mope molomapa opalef ape'ilifi nomona monda'as na'amba atin ukup pindaima.
62004013	Dei' apa' mogawa ea' mape sisihipa maloma God ea' nape nalomapa. Dei' main? Anen naso'apa Ambal ananinai nape nalomapa.
62004014	Ea' apa' mogawa Ahamapa nasapa' Nogamana ananinai ma nowambilai epes hiasi sagape itapi nokwahomas waf awafi sogotanimai ma anen. Apa' mati hiahawes isimba ma anen nowambilai epes sogotanimai ma'ipasas.
62004015	Epen ami negawalapa basef alihigima niga'i, “Endilisi, Jisas anen Nogamana Godi”, God a' nope sisihina noloman, anin wapani nape sisihina anen.
62004016	Isimba atis dei' apa' mogawa mahapifa God anen okom maimailapa a'owa'. God anen kofagonama okom magamagaila epes hiasii. Epen ami nape okom maimaila God naloma epes hiasi atapin, anin nape sisihin naloma God ea' anen nape sisihina naloman.
62004017	Waf ukup pigapigaila esis Kristen alipisi a'owa', afambai fataga be'ef endilisi ma apa' ina a' mondafa'ma nemaf afamba lu'wafi ma God nogowalogapa, owa'atin. Dei' main, anen napaipa nomon, ea' mape itap apa'e si'i Krais nagape. Apa' ina ombal mahapa ma nemaf afamba, owa'atin.
62004018	God okom maimailapa, apa' wapani ukup paipailana. Ea' ina ombal mahapa, owa'atin. I'i waf afambai fetaga be'ef endilisi ma apa', afamba ea' fatofa waf ombal magahapamafi fewala hi'alaf. Dei' main, kofagema ombal magahas, ombal mahasa hiahaom akafimi anaf God nowalogasa waf awafi nogaso'asami. Epen mamahina ombal mogahani, waf okom mogomogaila God ina fataga be'ef endilisi ma anin, ata' owa'atin.
62004019	God nali' okom maimailapa a'owa'. Isimba atis dei' apa' ukup paipaila anen naloma epes hiasi wapani.
62004020	I'i anis epes si'i, “Apa' ukup paipaila God,” ama i'i esis ukup wandafuma Kristen alipisi, epes isimba sagambaso'ami. Dei' main? Ina anin epen atitin a' nati God, owa'. Epen ami nati alipini ananini ma owa' okom mogomogailania, epen inimba ina la'ifina okom mogaila God owa' nogatolona naepia, owa'atin.
62004021	Basef ifimba Krais naga'ipapaef dindinipi ifimba. Epen ami okom magamagaila Godi, epen inimba okom mondaila sahin owan ananisi wapani.
62005001	Epen mamahina nagahapifa Jisas anen Krais God nasapa'ana nagafi'ii, epen inimba awani Godi. Ea' epes mamahisa ukup pagapagaila ahamas atotonai, esis ukup paipaila awasi ananisi wapani.
62005002	I'i apa' ukup pipila God mila basef banagafi ananifi, atiasi waf afambai apa' mogawa ukup paipaila awasi ananisi wapani.
62005003	Waf kofagefa ma apa' ukup pigapigaila Godafi afamba. Apa' mondaila basef lo banagafi ananifi, ina ahifif a'owa', owa'atin.
62005004	Dei' main, awasi mamahisa Godi isimba la'ifis sagatalogofa waf itapafii. Apa' mahapifa God dei' waf afambai apa' mikila' wandaf matalogofa waf itapafi awafi.
62005005	Epen ami nikila' wandafa waf awafi ea' natalogofa waf itapafi? Epen nagahapifa Jisas naga'i anen Nogamana Godii, anin atin nikila'af.
62005006	Jisas Krais ma'una aman anamba a' nafi'i. Ea' anen nofa' baptaisa embel, ama main sahana naga' esimbel ananimbeli balo. Anen ina nafi'i ma waf embeli atef, owa'. Anen nafi'i ma waf embeli esimbel endilisifi. Ambal bu'unai Godi kofagonama waf endilisifi hi'alaf. Ea' Ambal anamba nawalipasa basef ifimba ma Krais endilisifi.
62005007	-
62005008	Spirit Ambal Godi naloma embel esimbel isimba wanifis sawalapa basef kofagefa atifif.
62005009	Apa' mahapifa basef epes sagawalipasafi. Apa' basef God nagawalipapafi banagef fikila' basef epesi. Dei' main, basef ifimba fa'i Nogamana ananinai.
62005010	Ea' epen ami nagahapifa Nogamana Godi, basef ifimba endilisifi fape nomon okom ananimi. Apa' epen ami owa' nigahapifa Godia, epen inimba na'i God aman nagambaso'ami. Dei' main, epen inimba ina nahapifa basef ifimba God naga'ifa Nogamana ananinai, owa'.
62005011	Ea' basef ifimba endilisifi na'amba. God a' naso'apa ambal namili ma mogape andeande' lifilafi dondol. Ambal namili alamba anen naso'apala Nogamana ananinai atona.
62005012	Epen ami negape sisihina negaloma Nogamanai, inimba dei' nefa' ambal namili. Apa' ami owa' nepe sisihina Nogamana Godia, inimba ina nefa' ambal namili ma negape andeande' lifilafi, owa'atin.
62005013	Ae' anda' basef fafe'mago ipa' pagahipifa agol Nogamana Godi. Anda'efa ipa' pegegawa dei' apefa' ambal namili pape andeande'.
62005014	Apa' mogawa, i'i apa' mila okom Godi atom mondabetena hiahawes mamahisa hiasi, anen atiasi nogame' beten ape'inii. Ea' nemaf mamahefa mefe' felefele'ma anen mondabeten, ina ombal mohapa ma anen, owa'. Ukup ape'ipi pepe banagepa.
62005015	Apa' mogawa anen nagame' betena hiahawes mamahisa dei magahali'anamasi. Ea' mogawa dei' a' mape si'i mogofa' hiahawes isimba ea'i.
62005016	-
62005017	Waf hiafi hi'alaf owa' usi'ifia afamba waf awafi. Epes sanda' waf awafii sawala basef Godi banagafi. Apa' waf hiafi awafi ina fenda' epes sogaga' lamonasi, owa'. I'i anin epen niti anin sahin owan ananini nenda' anef waf awafi owa' fenda' epen inimba nega' higililana, epen inimba nanda' waf afambai a' nendanda' betena Goda, nogaso'an ambal namili. Endilisi, anef waf atetef awafi fanda' epes sogaga' lamonasi. Ae' ina a'ipipa ma pendabetena epes sanda' waf afambai, owa'.
62005018	Apa' mogawa epes mamahisa sagape awasi Godi, esis ina sape sanda' waf awafi atapis, owa'atin. Dei' main, nogamana Godi numafias andeande'ma banagami ananimi ma aman aunai ina nohambombagas, owa'atin.
62005019	Apa' mogawa apa' awasi Godi, apa' isimba owa' awasi Godia sape lafela aman aunai Satan dembinai asasinai.
62005020	Apa' mogawa Nogamana Godi nafi'i ma noso'apa gawa ma mogogawa anen God endilisinai. Apa' mape sisihipa ma anen endilisinai naloma Nogamana ananinai Jisas Krais. God anamba endilisinai anen kofagonama ambal namili mogape andeande' lifilafii.
62005021	Awasi ae'ipai, ipa' pewa' alafugaha god baso'amunai ea' pendape banagepa.
63001001	Ae' agiliwai igimafi esis Kristeni anda' basef fafe'mago ina', nemata'w God nandandepenai naloma awasi ine'isi. Ae' okom maimaila ipa' endilisi a'owa'. Ina ae' atowe okom maimailipa, owa'atin. Amam nematawa hiasi sogogawa basef endilisifii, esis wapani ukup paipailipa.
63001002	Dei' main, basef endilisifi fagape ukup ape'ipii ifimba atiasi fepe sisihifa apa' lifilafi dondol.
63001003	Ahamapa God noloma Jisas Krais Nogamana ananinai atiasi muti uwahipipa motopalopapa dowaf mowa' banagapa monda' opalef ape'ilifi awanelef. Amom biam atiasi monda'apa na'amba moloma waf endilisifi feloma waf ukup pagapagaila sahin owanasafi.
63001004	Ae' andagala a'owa' ma egegawa anis awasi ine'isi sagaila basef bu'wafi endilisifi si'i Ahamapa naga'ipapa dindinipa mogailif.
63001005	Ea' dei' a'ipa ina' nemata'w na'amba. Apa' hiapai a' ukup pindaima atin pendaloma sahin owan. Ae' ina a'ipina anif basef banagafi dambaifi, owa'atin. A'ipina basef ifimba atif fowa' gani apa' mogawef magahapilafi.
63001006	Basef kofagefa ma apa' ukup pigapigaila sahin owani ifimba. Apa' mope mundaila basef ifimba Godi banagafi atapif. Basef ifimba si'i fowa' dambadamba pagame'ef. Ipa' a' ukup pindaima atin peloma sahin owan.
63001007	Anis epes sagambaso'ami safe' ganigani itap hiagoma. Esis ina sawalipasa Jisas Krais sa'i nogamana Godi a' nataga aman nogofa' alop epeni, owa'atin. Esis sagambaso'ami, isimba bousi Kraisi.
63001008	Ipa' a' solawaipa andeande'ma pegefa' hiahaom fasimi amamba panda' maol pa'i pegefa'ami. Na'amba ipa' anaf ina pefa' amamba, owa'atin. Andeande'ma pegefa'am si'im.
63001009	Epen ami nakwaha basef Kraisi ma nimbisila' nefe' nila anif basef daif, God ina nape opaf epen inimbai, owa'atin. Epen ami banagen nihapila basef Kraisi sisihif atapifi, dei' Ahamana naloma Nogamana wapani mape sisihim moloma epen inimba nomon okom.
63001010	Epen mamahina nifi'mai ipa' ma ina nefa'ai basef ifimba Kraisi, ipa' ina petopalopa epen inimba pi'ipan nefe' nelomepa niwis ifagw ipe'igwi, owa'i. Ina pinifelin pi'ipan penda'man “Nemaf bu'wafi” anin, hapaini.
63001011	Epen mamahina niganifela epen inimbai atiasi a' neloman okom atotom netopalopan nenda' waf awafi anin nanda'afi.
63001012	Ae' a'i i'ipipa anif basef hiafi wapani, apa' ae' ina enda'ef fil pepa, andaiwa'. A'i efo'o itilipa i'i elomepa ma apa' mondatimama mondagala andeande'.
63001013	God a' nandandepa owamena ine'ikwi nosaho'akw ea' anani'wi ato'w. Ea' awasi owaminai sanda'menago nemaf bu'wafi ina'. Ea' ma'uf.
64001001	Ae' agiliwai igimafi esis Kristeni anda' anif basef fafe'mago ina' alipinai Gaius. Ae' okom maimailina endilisi a'owa'.
64001002	Ina' alipinai, andabetena Goda hiahawes hiasi ina' nanda'asi sogataga bo'wes andeande'ma aowas akana negape andeande' si'i ambal ine'ili lagape andeande'.
64001003	Fowa' ae' ame' basefa anom alipumi mafi'i matagame ma'ipi waf ine'ifi ma'i ina' naila basef endilisifi datima. Ame' basef ifimba andagalamena a'owa'.
64001004	Ae' sonahe a'owa' ma awasi sagaila basef endilisifi. Apa' ae' ina sonahe ma anis hiahawes daias sikila' sonagahema isimba, owa'atin.
64001005	Alipinai ae' okom magamagailinai, maol hiani ina' nanda'ani ma nagatopalopa amom sahin owani, inimba ina' nanda'an datima endilisi. Amom ina nati nogohnaepima negawam, owa'. Apa' ina' natolom numafiam atin.
64001006	Amom hiami ma'ipa esis Kristen sagape na'ai ma okom ine'imi maimailam negatopalopam. Ae' ahali'ina ma negatopalopama gwa'aisi otamba mais mofa'as atin mogafe' anagon monda' maol Godi si'i okom ananimi maga'i.
64001007	Dei' main, amom mafe' manda' maola agol Kraisi, apa' ina mofa' gwa'aisi maisa esis isimba sogololama Godi, owa'.
