64001008	Isimba atis apa' a' mondatopalopama gwa'aisi maisa monda' maola basef endilisifi Kraisi mogalomam.
64001009	Ae' anda' anif basef fafe'mago esis Kristen, apa' Diotrefes anen a' okom ma'ima'i a'owa' ma nogape dembinai nigali'i. Anen ina naila basef ae'afi, owa'atin.
64001010	Nemaf mamahefa ae' i'i egafe'mago ina', ae' ewalapa basefa waf hiafi afamba anen nanda'afi. Anen nambaso'mas na'i basef fafifafi awafi findiwaefa ae'. Apa' ina nanda' waf afamba atef, owa'atin. Nanda' anef wapani na'amba. Nowa' alafugama amom sahin owan magawalipasa basef Godi ma'i mogafi'mai anini. Ea' anef wapani na'amba. Nasopama anis Kristen daias sa'i sogatopalopa amom amambai nelefatas safe' sape ando' ma sios.
64001011	Ina' alipinai, owa'i nila waf awafia, hapaifi. Nindaila bu'wafi atef. Epen ami nanda' waf bu'wafi, anin epen Godi. Apa' ami nanda' waf awafii, anin ina negawa God, owa'atin.
64001012	Epes hiasi sagasa'ma agol Demitriusi. Waf ananifi endilisifi fihimba'mapa anen aman bu'unai. Ae' wapani a'i anen bu'unai ea' ina' negawa basef ae'afi endilisifi.
64001013	Ae' a'i i'ipina basef hiafi hi'ilif, apa' ae' andaiwa'ma enda' pen enda'ef fil pepa fegafe'mago ina', owa'.
64001014	Ae' okom ma'i atiasi efo'o itilina, dao afa' biafa ondatima wi'i basef ifimba.
64001015	Ae' a'i opaf ine'ifi fope awanef nepe andeande'. Alipisi ine'isi sagape na'a'e sanda'menago dagala sandagalamago ina'. Ina' da'masago dagala ae'ani wapani nefe'mago esis sagape wambel ine'imbili atona atin. Ea' ma'uf.
65001001	Ae' Jut anda' maol agape lafela Jisas Kraisi, ae' owama Jemsi. Ae' anda' basef ifimba fafe'mago ipa' amam nematawa God nandandepepa ea'i. Fafe'mago ipa' ahamapa God okom magamagailipai, ipa' Jisas Krais atona nagala'ambemapai.
65001002	Ae' a'i God nonda'epa pepe si'ipama uwahipimi ananimi ea' opalef awanelefa pegegawa okom ananimi magamagailapafi pilam.
65001003	Alipipai endilisi, ae' okom mandanda' a'owa' a'i ata' enda' anif basefa God nowambilai apa' hiapai hi'alapa nofa'apa mutanimai magape andeande'. Apa' owa', dei' a'i ata' enda' anif basef daif i'ipipago esa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma penda' maol banagambel pimafiago basef endilisifi Kraisi apa' magahapilafi. Ama pegahagasa boumi amamba magatalogofa basef ifimba Kraisi. Hapif inimba God a' naso'apan apa' hiapai amam nematawa ananipai nemaf afamba atetef ea' atapin nape.
65001004	Dei' main, anom amam mandambaho' mawisi la'afena apa' Kristen. Fowa' gani basef fagail Buk Baibeli fa'i amam amamba ea' ma mogatagama basef lu'wafi Godi ma nowalogama kota higiligalam. Amom mowa' alafugaha God a' maha'ofa basef bu'wafi anen nagatopalopapaef dowafi ea' ma'ipas anif daifa mogowa' banaga waf naninani ukup pegehafela waf awafi so'a waulafi.
65001005	Endilisi atis, ipa' pegawa basef ifimba fowa'ifi fagail Baibeli. Apa' owa' dei' ae' a'i esa'ma ukup ipe'ipi ma pegegawef wapani. Basef ifimba fagape na'amba. Fowa' dembinai nofa' epes amam nematawa ananisi Israel sakwaha itap lu'upa Isip nofa'as sagafi'i. Apa' owa' anen naha epes isimba owa' sogahapifa Godia saga'. Amom mowa' alafugaha aman anamba Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai nugumafi banagami hiamii.
65001006	Dei' ipa' ukup pendapoma amom ensel amamba wapani, amom ina mumafi maol inimba naloma agof lu'wagufi God nagaso'amasi andeande', owa'atin. Amom ea' makwaha wambel amamimbili heven. Ea' dei' God nawasi'am sen sisihin nagape atapini ea' mape atapima wambel ambalemba akutigin a'owa'ma. Mape mohafa nemaf afamba lu'wafi God nowalogam mogaloma epes hiasi wapani hi'igalas.
65001007	Dei' ipa' ukup pendapoma epes isimba fowa' sagape Sodomi Gomorai baloma walemb ambalemba hielimbi bagape felefele'ma na'ambai. Esis sanda' waf awafi na'amba atin si'i ensel amamba. Amom amamba Sodomi Gomorai manda' waf so'a waulafi ea' ukup amamipi pehafel a'owa' ma monda' so'a waola waf awafi mogaloma amom amam atom. Dei' God nagwamama akafimi awami amoma nif lu'wafi fandif fagape dondol lifilafii. Amom mape mondosali alihim si'i anin ametala apa' mitilin mogogawa apa' ina a' mila waf awafi amamifi, owa', hapaifi.
65001008	Amom amamba mandambaho' mawisi magalumapai manda'am na'amba atini. Koh dondo'ah hiani amamini nafela ukup amamipi ma monda' waf alugufi awafi ma alop amamipi. Amom manda' du'waniga ma basef Dembinai ape'inai manda' anom ensel dembami magape heveni wapani findiwami.
65001009	Apa' amom ensel magape ilifi, amom ina ma'i basef findiwaifi si'i amam amamba, owa'atin. Ensel anamba dembinai nape nagali'i Maikel wapani, anen ina nanda' basef findiwaefa anis epes na'amba, owa'. Fowa' anen na'i basef nandahihianamaef naloma Satan, ma'i atiasi ami nefa' alop Mosesi. Apa' Maikel ina nagwamana basef Satan nanda'ana findiwana, owa'atin. Anen nagwaef na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai atona nondanda'mena megah ina'.”
65001010	Apa' amom amamba mandambaho' mawisi magalumapai, amom maga'i basef awafi ma hiahawes hiasi amom owa' mogogawa kofagesaia. Waf ukup pegehafela mogagi'ma alopi nomonasi, dao' mogawaf ea'. Waf afamba amom manda'af si'i mafis amamba nomonas akami mogawaf manda'afi. Amom manda' waf afambai atef fahambombagam endilisi.
65001011	Endilisi atis, akafimi lu'wami anaf a' motagamam. Amom mogofa' waf awafi fowa' Kain nanda'afi. Ukup amamipi pehafel a'owa' ma mogofa' otamba atembai. Ea' dei' maso' alop amamipi pafe' hi'alapa manda' waf awafi si'i fowa' aman anamba Balam nanda'afi. Ea' manda' du'waniga ma God si'i fowa' aman anamba Kora nanda'as. Amom manda' waf afambai, dei' a' aom higilalam si'i Kora higilagalana.
65001012	Waf awafi amam amambai fagape na'amba. Nemaf afamba ipa' Kristen ukup pandaima atin pandakolas panda' gwa'aisi ipe'isi a'a panda' gwa'aisi Jisasi, amom mape malomepa ma' gwa'aisi isimba wapani. Ea' amom si'i alogw gwandahapil sisihigw gwail gwanda' gwa'aisi isimba awes. Amom ma' gwa'aisi malomepa, apa' ina ombal maham kwasakwasala ma waf awafi manda'afi, owa'. Ukup pandapoma amom atom. Ina matopalopa anis daias maso'asas, owa'. Amom mawalipasa basef, apa' basef amamifi ina fatopalopepa, owa'atin. Basef ifimba wafifi dowaf si'i otaga wafigai fufin nefa'aga gagafi'i ina gala asaf, owa'. Amom mandahama lawah hogola gwa'aisii, apa' owa' nogota hagailatai ina hola gwa'aisi, owa'atin. Lawah agahemba aligah sagiagah nombalef fapomagah fataogah haga'ihi.
65001013	Amom manda' waf ambagof awagufafi, afamba ea' fataga si'i naoh embel mohafel lu'um a'owa' matoma apah magatagam. Ea' mape manda' waf afamba awafi mandahama ondowa wagape otagai ogololalama ufiawa dondol wagafe'awai. God a' nandomba anembel wambela amom akot owamb nagapoma anaf mogape lifilafima.
65001014	Aman anamba Enok fowa' nawalapa basefa hiahawes anaf sigi' sogotagai alihifa amam amamba awami. Anen nataga nagi'ma wambotagw agwamba 7-pelaigw tagahafela Adami a' nawalapa basef ifimba alihif a'owa' ma amom na'i, “Ipa' peme'! Dembinai anaf nifi'i noloma ensel ananimi tausen hiami a'owa'
65001015	ma nowaloga epes hiasi hi'ilasa nogagwamasa akafimi awami ma waf awafi asasifi. Ama nigihimba'mas alihisa waf awafi hiafi esis sanda'afi, kofagema asasimi atom. Epes isimba sanda' waf afamba awafi na'ambai. Esis sowa' alafugaha God a'owa', sanda' du'waniga, sa'i basef simbisambalifi fafifafi awafi ma anen.”
65001016	Amom amamba mambaso'am mawisi magalumapai ina mape andeande' opalef awanelef, owa'atin. Amom mondowamba'ma ma hiahawes hiasii ea' manda' du'waniga ma God, ma'i basef simbisambalifi ma anen. Ea' ukup amamipi pesafel na'ana'a ma waf awafi ea' magi'ma isimba. Amom gigal ma'oh na'ana'a ma magasa'ma agof amomugufi atogof. Amom ma'ipa anis daindaiasa basef usiusihifi ma mohondo' ukup asasipi pigaila basef amamifi.
65001017	Apa' ipa' alipipai ae'ipai endilisi, ipa' ukup pendapoma basef fowa' amom aposel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi maga'ipipafi ma hiahawes mais anaf sigi' sogatagai.
65001018	Fowa' amom aposel ma'ipipa na'amba ma'i, “Anif nimaguf akutaifi fegataga, anom amam monda'iafa waf Godi a' mufi'i mope. Amom a' mowa' alafugaha God, ea' ukup amamipi pesafel a'owa' na'ana'a ma waf awafi atef ea' mila isimba.”
65001019	Amom amambai atom manda' ipa' Kristen pandawal. Amom magaila ukup epes itapasi atisi, Ambal bu'unai Godi akam.
65001020	Apa' ipa' alipipai endilisi, lifilafi ipa' pewa' banaga nelelemb ipe'ilimbi pendahapifa God, anen kofagonama hapif ipe'inii. Ea' dondol ipa' pihali' Ambal bu'unai Godi ma nowa' banagaepa nugumafipa ma beten ipe'ini.
65001021	Ipa' solawaipa pindaila waf Godi andeande'ma anen nigihimba'mepa datima okom lu'wami ananimi magamagailipai. Ipa' penda'as na'amba pepe pendehafa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, anen nagati uwahipipai anaf nonda'epa pegape namipa ma pegape andeande' lifilafi.
65001022	Anis epes sagape ukup bimbiafipa sogahapifa Kraisi, ipa' piti uwahipis petopalopas pewa' banagas.
65001023	Anis daias sogowa' alafugaha Godi a' si'i sagape nif fagandifi la'afifa, ipa' kwafalis lefatas sotanimai. Ea' anis daias sanda' waf awafi atapisafi, ipa' a' ombal mondahepamas. Na'amba asohondo'epa pefe' nif. Ea' piti esis uwahipis petopalopas. Waf apifi awafi asasifi a si'i sogowaho' luwaguf alogw sisihigw gwagailafi. Ea' ipa' pewa' alafugaha waf afamba awafi pendafa'maf endilisi.
65001024	Ae' a'i apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol na'amba. Anen la'ifinai ma nogala'ambemepa datima andeande'ma anaf ipa' ina pewa ma waf awafi, owa'atin endilisi. Ama anaf nofa'epa nokolasepa pegape andeande' pendagala endilisi kofagema ma waf awafi akepa ma anamba anen nape nogogala'ma.
65001025	Anen atona God, nowambilai apa' mogotambili ma lagol Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais. Mogogala'i maloma agol lu'wagili banagami lu'wami maloma waf afamba nagape banagonai nugumafi hiahaom hiamii, amamba ananimi atom nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' anaf wapani nope na'amba atin atapina dondol lifilafi. Endilisi. Ea' ma'uf.
66001001	Fowa' gani basef amamba mape mandambaho' apa' dei' Jisas Krais nanda'am mandawalap alihim. God naso'anam Jisasa nowalapam nigihimba'ma anom manda'mana maol Godi ma mogawalapa hiahaom mape mandambahi'i mogataga kwafalis. Anen naso'afa gawa afa' wanda' maola anini ma hiahawes isimba. Ea' dei' nasapa'i ensel ananinai nafi'mai ae' Jon. Ae' dei' anda'mana maol Godi, ea' anen nase'e basef ae' wapani.
66001002	Ae' atolom ea' hiahaom amamba awalapam a'iam alihim basef Godi faloma basef ifimba endilisifi Jisas Krais nanda'ef fandawalap alihifi.
66001003	Epes ami sogotalifa basef ifimba Godi fagail buk akwa'e ma malogof asasigufi ma hiahaom anaf migi' mogatagai, esis atiasi God nonda'as sonohas. Ea' epes ami sogame' basef ifimba ma ukup asasipii, esis sonohas wapani. Dei' main, nemafa hiahaom amambai migi' mogatagai felefele'ma mogataga.
66001004	-
66001006	Ae' Jon anda' basef ifimba ma ipa' Kristen pagape walemb 7-pelailimbi itap lu'upa Esiai. God fowa' gani nape, dei' nape, anaf owagama nope atapina dondol. Ae' a'i anen noloma Jisas Krais moloma Ambal bu'unai Godi banagonai si'i ambagof bu'wagufi 7-pelaiguf mope felefele'ma sia bu'wani Godi motopalopepa dowaf mowa' banagaipa mose'epa opalef awanilifi. Jisas Krais anen naila basef ananifi andeande' nanda' hiahawes ananisi datima. Ea' nawalapa basef hiafi Godi andeande'. God nali' nasa'mana nosafel wandof. Ea' nape nali'ma anaf esis sogaga'i God nosa'mas sogosafel wapani. Jisas Krais anen atona dembinai nugumafi amom king dembami magape itapi. Anen atona okom lu'unai nainaila apa' hiapai, ma esimbel ananimbeli atembel natagwahepa ma waf awafi ape'ifi mataga wahifipa. Anen atona nanda'apa dei' mape dembipai malomana mumafi epes hiasi si'i amom dembami king. Ea' nanda'apa mape pris si'i mondolalima Godi manda' maola God Ahamana ananinai. Ae' a'i mogogala'i moloma banagami hiami ananimi atom mogape dondol lifilafi. Endilisi.
66001007	Piti, anen banagonai anaf nifi'i noloma otaga esis sotolona naep asasipi ea' epes isimba fowa' sagahana wamba'wi sotolona wapani. Isimba atis esis amam nematawa misi'ah hiahi sagape itapi sotolona sowa solopana kwapete' ma waf awafi asasifi. Aho', amamba anaf motaga endilisi na'amba.
66001008	Dembinai God banagami hiamunai anen na'ias na'amba na'i, “Ae' atowe ape Dembiwai lifilafi dondoli ape agali'i a ape agagi'i endilisi.” Ea' anen anamba atona fowa' gani anen nape, dei' wapani anen nape, anaf owagama a' notanima nifi'i.
66001009	Ae' Jon sahomepa ipe'iwai. Ae' alomepa, apa' hiapai Jisasi atepa maloma anen sisihipa mape. Akolata alomepa mofa' akafimi ma mugawis nomona maol Godi nope Dembinai nugumafiapa. Ea' ape alomepa ma apa' hiapai magalutu banagepa na'amba atina mogofa' nimanimi. Ae' awalapa basef Godi faloma basef endilisifi ma maol Jisas nanda'ani. Isimba atis dei' esis sandaiwa'me sali'amone ea' afi'i ape ailan agilina sa'i Patmos.
66001010	Anef nemaf Dembinaii Sande Ambal bu'unai Godi numafi ae' ea' ame' anagol malogol goga ga'i mehip gandame' si'i sugufapula anona alof, na'i natagai alafuga ae'agai.
66001011	Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Ina' da'a basefa hiahawes isimba atiasi nigatilisi sil buk. Ea' nenda' basef ifimba fil buk akwamba fefe' fendanda amam nematawa Godi sagape walemb ambalemba bagape 7-pelaigini. Walemb agufilimba ambalemba. Efesus, Smerna, Pergamum, Taiataira, Sardis, Filadelfia a Laodisia.”
66001012	Ea' ae' andambema a'i iti inimba naga'ipa ae'i. Owa' ati lambeh 7-pelaimbih tol hatoma gol 7-pelaim.
66001013	La'afena gol amamba ati anona aman nalomambeh nalutu. Anen nandati si'i anona dembinai nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi. Nala klos laumi mowala mambaho'wa bo'wagah ananigahi ea' nowaho' let sanda' gol sanda'atai mafata ananitai.
66001014	Balaga galoma auf fagalonai afitim a'owa' si'i auf fagalo sipsipi a si'i ilagw amamba afitimi. Naep ananimi mogala' si'i nif ileliwa.
66001015	Ea' bo'wagah ananimi mogala' gambigambis a'owa' endilisi mandati si'i bras kapa batafunai sagaofam nif lu'wamii. Ea' ame' malogol ananigili nanda'am bendagala mehip si'i embel bagala' lil lil mehip.
66001016	Anen nahapila ondowa 7-pelaiwa nahapilam lagol kwahisigili ananigili. Ea' anona bainat hikalina wa'owa'ili nawisi nape malogol ananigili. Amaga ananigai gogala' a'owa' banagona si'i awin owaf fagaluwi banagef a'owa'.
66001017	Ae' a'i iti anen owa' afa' ewa a'oh felefele'ma bo'wagah ananigahi a' andati si'i sagaga'i. Owa' anen nandome lagol kwahisigili ananigili nahapili na'ipi na'i, “Ina' owa'i ombel mehenaia. Ae' ape dembiwai dondol lifilafi ape agali'i ape agagi'i endilisii.
66001018	Fowa' aga' ea', apa' dei' ina' natolowe ape namowe atapiwi lifilafi. Ea' ape ali' Dembiwai ma igimafi ga' ma egawaloga epes ami sagaga'i sogafe' wambel awambili hel a'a sogafe' wambel bu'wambili heven.
66001019	Ea' Ae' a'i ina' nenda' basefa hiahaom amamba dei' ina' nagatulumi nenda' basefa hiahaom amamba dei' magapani a hiahaom anaf migi' mogatagai wapani buk.
66001020	Ina' nati ondowa awamba 7-pelaiwa wagape lagol kwahisigili ae'agili a lambeh ambahemba 7-pelaimbih hatoma gol amamba 7-pelaim. Isimba sondola'waifi atis. Basef kofagefa ifimba. Ondowa ondola'waifa ensel mugumafi sios amam nematawa mini'ap Godi, apa' gol amamba mondola'waifa sios amam nematawa Godi isimba 7-pelais.
66002001	“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Efesusi. Ae' aman agahapila ondowa awamba 7-pelaiwa lagol ae'agili kwahisigili agafe' la'afena gol amamba lam magatomami 7-pelaimi. Ae' anda'mepago basef ifimba ipa'.
66002002	“Ae' egawa hiahawes mais ipa' panda'asi maol ahifini. Nimanimi matagamepa, palutu banagepa atapipa, ina pandahagas, owa'. Ea' Ae' egawa ipa' palutu banagepa endilisi ma pandaiwa'ma isimba sanda' waf awafii. Ea' ipa' pawaloga amam amamba mambaso'am maga'i amom aposeli, pandondomam pegawa amom ina aposel, owa'. Amom magambaso'ami.
66002003	Ipa' palutu banagepa atapipa ma epes isimba sandaiwa'ma agol ae'agili ma sanda'mepa waf awafii, ina pandahagas, owa'. Ae' egawa ipa' panda' maol ae'ani noma'uni banagambel ea' ina ombel mahepa pakwahin, owa'atin. Ipa' palutu banagepa pefa' akafimi amamba.
66002004	Apa' dei' a'i i'ipipa anif basef ipa' ma anef waf awafi ipa' panda'afi. Fowa' dambadamba ukup ipe'ipi paipaila Ae' pahapifi andeande', apa' dei' a' owa'atin.
66002005	Dei' a' ukup pendanda'maf wapani waf afamba bu'wafi fowa' pali' panda'afi. Ea' pembema nelelemb pilaf penda'af pigi'maf wapani si'i fowa' dambadamba panda'af. I'i ipa' owa' pembema nelelemba, atiasi Ae' ifi'i etagamepa ili'amona gol amamba ipe'imi lam magatomami.
66002006	Apa' dei' anef waf bu'wafi ata' fape ipa' atapif. Anis epes mini'ap Nikolasi Ae' andaiwa'mas endilisi, ipa' wapani pewa' alafugahas pandaiwa'mas a'owa'.
66002007	“Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni! “Epen ami nilutu banagena nelefata wandafa negali'amona waf awafii, bola Ae' i'i aho'man nea' gwa'aisi lawag agamba gagaso'as ambal namili epesi gogotawa aof Godi agiligima Paradaisi.”
66002008	“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel nugumafi esis amam nematawa Kristen sagape Smernai. Ae' ape Dembiwai atapiwi agali'i lifilafii, ape agagi' endilisii. Fowa' agaga' ea'i, apa' dei' esafel wapani ape namowe ambal lapowe. Dei' anda'mepago basef ifimba ipa' a'i,
66002009	Ae' egawa nimanimi akafimi amamba magatagamapai ea' Ae' egawa ipa' pape dowadowaf, otamba uga mais akepa. Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ipa' hiahaom hiami endilisimi magape heveni. Ea' egawa basef ifimba awafi esis saga'ipipafi. Amam nematawa isimba sambaso'mepa sa'i, “Afa' Juda.” Apa' owa'. Esis ina saila waf Judai, owa'. Esis sambaso'mepa. Esis wambota Satani atis. Ae' egawa hiahawes isimba.
66002010	Ipa' ina ombel mehepama nambimb pegefa' akafimi, owa'i. Ipa' peme'! Atiasi Satan nonda' anipa ipa' penda' kalabusa nogagwamba ipa' ea' pefa' akafimi nimanimi amamba nimaguf ilifunamaif. Apa' kwawia', ipa' pihapifi pilutu banagepa ma anis si'i sehepa pegaga'ma, kwawia', pilutu banagepa pindahapifi. Ama Ae' atiasi egase'epa ambal namili ipa' si'i hiahaom bu'wami esis sanda' pilae sogofa'ami.
66002011	Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai, pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni. Epen ami nilutu banagena nelefata wandafa negali'amona waf awafii, atiasi ga' inimba negafe'ma biafini ina nehambomban nonda'an nefe' wambel awambili, owa'atin endilisi.
66002012	“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Pergamumi. Ae' ahapila bainat launai hikalina wa'owa'ili. Ea' anda'mepago basef ifimba ipa' a'i,
66002013	Ae' egawa wambel ipe'imbili. Satan atona ata' nape dembinai ma wambel ambalemba. Apa' ipa' pagahapila agol ae'agili banagipai pagahapifa Ae'i. Ipa' ina pakwaha pagahapifa Ae', owa'atin. Fowa' aman anamba Antipas anen nagawalapa basef ae'afi datima andeande'i. Ea' sahana naga' wambel ipe'imbili Satan nagapoma. Ea' nogota atamba ipa' ina pakwaha pagahapifi Ae', owa'atin.
66002014	Apa' Ae' a'i i'ipipa anif basefa waf awafi ipe'ifi dei' ata' fapomepa. Anis amam nematawa sape sagalomepa Pergamumi, esis ata' sahapila waf afamba si'i anona aman Balam fowa' nanda'afi sisihif. Waf aman anambai na'amba. Fowa' gani anen nihimba'ma anona aman Balak nambaso'mana nanda' esis amam nematawa Israelisi sowa sanda' waf awafi. Ea' Balak nasa'mai ukup esis Israeli ma soga' mafisi gwa'aisi isimba sagaso' god baso'amunai, sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi.
66002015	Ea' na'amba atin anis amam nematawa sagaloma ipe'i esis ata' sahapila waf afamba awafi anis epes mini'ap Nikolasi banagef.
66002016	Ea' ipa' bema nelelemba pekwaha waf awafi ipe'ifi. I'i owa'atin, Ae' felefele' a'i etagamepa epa' eloma epes isimba owa' sombema nelelemb sigafi'mai ae'ia ehas bainat nagape malogol ae'agilii.
66002017	Ipa' aligah hagapaipai pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni. Epen ami nilutu banagena nelefata wandafa negali'amona waf awafii, Ae' bola ese'asa gwa'aisi ae'asi bu'wasi sandambaho' sagape heveni. Gwa'aisi isimba agilisa mana. Ea' ese'asa anemba otamba fasimbai afitimbai atona atin, ea' enda' anagol agol namigili gil otamba ambamba. Ina anin epen negawa agol agalemba, owa'atin. Epen negefa' otam amambai, anin atin negawagol.”
66002018	“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Taiatairai. Ae' nogamana Godi, naep ae'api pegala' a'owa' si'i nif fagandif banagef a'owa', bo'wagah ae'agahi hogala' gambigambis a'owa' si'i bras kapa batafini nogogala'.
66002019	Ae' egawa ea' ma waf hiafi bu'wafi ipa' panda'afi. Ae' egawa ipa' ukup paipaila Godi epes wapani ea' pagahapifi panda' maol hiani patopalopa epes hiasi. Ae' egawepa palutu banagepa ma nimanimi magatagamipai. Ae' egawa maol inimba bu'wani ipa' fowa' panda'ani. Ipa' dei' panda' maol inimba bu'wani hiani pikila' fowa' panda'ani.
66002020	Apa' Ae' anif basefa waf awafi ipe'ifi. Ipa' patiti nemata'w akwamba awo'wi Jesebel kwape kwalomepa. Ako'w kwa'i, ‘Ae' profet aga'i basef Godi fandambahi'i.’ Apa' owa', kwambaso'mepa kwawalipa ipa' panda' maola ae'i panda' waf so'a waulafi awafi ma paga' gwa'aisi isimba sondolali sagaso' god baso'amunaisi.
66002021	Ae' a'i ako'w kombema nembel, isimba atis dei' Ae' ata' animbalo'w kwape anif nimaguf, owa' owa'atin. Ako'w ina kwa'i kombema nembel kowa' alafugama waf afamba awafi so'a waulafi, owa'atin.
66002022	Ea' dei' peme'! Atiasi ikwaho'w kowai belita ese'akwa akafimi lu'wami moloma bumbulita lu'unai. Ea' esis amam nematawa sagaila waf awafi akwa'ufi wapani sofa' akafimi amamba. I'i esis owa' sombema nelelemba sowa' alafugaha waf afamba sanda'afia, bola ese'as akafimi amamba lu'wami.
66002023	Esis isimba sagaila basef akwa'ufi wapani, atiasi ehas soga'. Ama esis amam nematawa hiasi Godi sogogawa Ae' agawaloga nomonas saloma nelelemb epes hiasi andeande'i. Ea' atiasi egwamepa hiahawes ipa' atona atin, sondahama waf ipa' panda'afi.
66002024	“Dei' Ae' a'i i'ipipa anif basef ipa' anipa amam nematawa pagape wambel Taiatairai, ipa' owa' pigaila basef ifimba awafi akwa'ufia, a owa' pigaila waf afamba sofalaf saga'i, ‘Basef fandambahi'i ma waf Satania,’ owa'atin. Ae' a'ipipa na'amba. Ae' ina atiasi ese'epa nimanimi daiam wapani ma ipa', owa'.
66002025	Apa' waf hiafi bu'wafi ipa' pagagi'mafi, afamba ipa' pindahapilaf tatala'if pefe' ma pegataga nogota Ae' igatagatai.
66002026	-
66002027	Ipa' epes ami pigalutu banagepama wandafa pigali'amona waf awafi ma pila okom ae'ami pefe' pegataga nogota hi'igalata, Ae' atiasi ese'epa banagami ipa'. Ama pegape dembipai ma amam nematawa hiasi hi'igalas. Ea' na'amba atin si'i fowa' Ahame nagase'e banagami ma agape Dembiwai igimafi epes hiasi. Ipa' wapani pepe dembipai pefa' banagami pimafi anis amam nematawa wapani na'amba. Ipa' pimafias banagambel si'i anona aman nahapila kalamuta sanda' ain sanda'atai, si'i anona aman nawala malep papalagalap.
66002028	Ea' ese'epa ondo'w kuhumbitai'wi lala'wan.
66002029	Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni.
66003001	“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Sardisi. Ae' ahapila anagof ambagof bu'wagufi Godi 7-pelaiguf ea' ahapila ondowa awamba 7-pelaiwa. Ae' egawa waf hiafi ipa' panda'afi. Esis saga'i basefa ipa' na'ambai sa'i, ‘Ipa' ambal lagapaipai.’ Apa' owa', owa'atin. Ipa' si'i pagaga' ea'i.
66003002	Ipa' safel dasa'ma pekwaha koh! Waf hiafi awafi ipe'ifi ata' fapaipa atapif fa'i fehepa pega'. Apa' anef waf bu'wafi kwaia'uf ipa' pendewa' banagaf fendape. Dei' main? Waf hiafi ipa' panda'afi, Ae' ina ati anef ata' usi'if a'owa' ma naep Ahame Godi, owa'.
66003003	Ipa' ukup pendapoma basef ifimba ae'afi fowa' pali' pame'ef pegefa'ef ea'i. Pigi'mif pembema nelelemb pekwaha waf awafi pifi'mai Ae'. I'i ipa' owa' pesafel ulal pekwaha koha, atiasi Ae' ifi'i endambaho' etagamepa si'i epen nanda' wali nafi'i nagataga ea' ina pegawa nogota mamahotama ifi'i egatagamepa, owa'.
66003004	Apa' ipa' anipa pagape Sardisi owa' penda' luwaguf maim ipe'imi alugumia, atiasi pindawisa klos afitimi dambaimi atom pefe' peloma Ae'. Dei' main, ipa' epes bu'upai ea' pandahama amamba.
66003005	Ipa' paloma anis epes daias wapani sagape ambal namili lifilafi agof ipe'igufi fail ano'w buk sa'i buk ambal namili lagapau'wi. Epen nilutu banagena nelefata negalii'amona waf awafii, Ae' ese'an luwaguf amamba afitimi nilam. Ea' ina atiasi ipati'mas agof asasigufi fagail buk akwambai, owa'atin. Afil atapiguf. Ewalapa agof asasigufi ma naep Ahame ae'anai noloma amom ensel ananimi i'ipam i'i epes isimba ae'asi.
66003006	Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni.
66003007	“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Filadelfiai. Ae' bu'uwai hilili'i endilisii dei' ahapila ki ma uta atamba fowa' king Devit nagahapilanatai. I'i Ae' egawisi'ata, anona aman ina la'ifina ma nogowalowata, ea' Ae' i'i egowalowata wapani, atiasi anin epen ina la'ifina nigawisi'ata, owa'atin. Ae' atowe a'ipipago basef ifimba ipa'.
66003008	Ae' egawa waf hiafi dei' panda'afi hi'alaf ea' egawa ipa' wapani, ata' banagepa kwasakwasala ma anis epes owa' sogame' basef ipe'ifia. Apa' ipa' apaila basef ae'afi andeande'. Ea' ina pambaho' agol ae'agili, owa'atin. “Ipa' piti, ae' anda' uta tagal tapomepa, owa' anona aman la'ifinama nogowalowataea, owa'atin.
66003009	Ipa' peme'! Ipa' pegawa ea' epes isimba Satani. Esis saga'i basef sa'i esis mini'ap Judai, owa' owa'atin. Esis ina saila waf Judai, owa'. Esis sagambaso'ami. Ae' atiasi enda' epes isimba sifi'i sindiwa nembawa sotawa felefele'ma bo'wagah ipe'igahi ma sogogawa ae' okom maimailipa.
66003010	Ipa' paila basef ae'afi andeande' palutu banagepa ma nimanimi amamba magatagamipai. Ea' Ae' dei' imafi ipa' ma atiasi nemaf afamba gwamba motagama mogogwamba amam nematawa hiasi itap hiagomai ma mogawalogasa waf bu'wafi awafii. Amamba ina atiasi motagama ipa', owa'atin.
66003011	Ae' ifi'i etagama ipa' kwafalis atis. Waf bu'wafi usi'ifi ipa' pagahapilaf ea'i, hapilaf tatala'if atapipa. Na'amba anona aman nondalombepa hiahaom bu'wami magapoma ipa' ma anaf pegefa'ami.
66003012	Epen ami nilutu banagena nelefata wandafa nigali'amona waf awafii, bola Ae' enda'an nilutu banagen si'i olaf fogombalo' ipat lu'unai Godi ae'anai. Ea' epen inimba ina atiasi nekwaha ipat anamba lu'unai netanima nuwisi ando' wapani, owa'atin. Nepe andeande' nomon atapin. Atiasi enda' agol Ahame Godi gila anin goloma agol wambel ambalemba lu'wambili God ae'anaii, Jerusalem wambel namimbili fasimbili. Wambel ambalemba atiasi bekwaha heven God ae'anai nagapoma bisila'i. Ea' agol namigili ae'agili wapani enda'agol gila anin.
66003013	Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai pendame' andeande' basef ifimba Ambal bu'wali Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni.”
66003014	“Ina' da'a anif basef fefe'ma ensel anamba nugumafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sagape Laodisiai. Ae' kofagewe ma basef endilisifi, ea' awalapef fafe' usi'if basef hiafi Godi. Lifilafi awalapef usi'if datima. Ae' Dembiwai ma hiahaom hiami God nanda'am magape ilif itapi maloma epes hiasi wapani. Ae' a'ipinago basef ifimba ina'.
66003015	“Ae' egawa ea' ma waf hiafi dei' ipa' panda'afi. Ea' egawa ipa' ina pohalepa, owa'. A ipa' ina nifipa, owa'atin. Apa' Ae' a'i ipa' pendape pohondalepa a'a pendape nifipa.
66003016	Owa', owa'atin. Ipa' nifipa kwasakwasala. Ipa' owa' nifipa endilisia o owa' poholepa endilisia. Ea' Ae' andaiwa'mepa a'i igu'upai malogol ae'agili.
66003017	Ipa' paga'iasi na'amba pa'i, ‘Apa' moni hianai naloma hiahaom hiami ma'omapa. Apa' ina anin mae akapa, owa'atin.’ “Apa' naep ae'api atilipa pape awepa endilisi, ma anis epes sigati ipa' owahipipa. Ipa' pape kwahupa endilisi, naep pase'epa alop paimipa dowaf. Apa' ipa' owa' pegawa isimba sowalapa waf awafi ipe'ifia, owa'.
66003018	Ea' ese'epa nomonas isimba ipa'. Gol ae'ami dei' ea' fandom mataga bo'om a'owa'. Andeande'ma ipa' petaloma pegataga be'epa hiahaom hiamipa a'owa'. Andeande'ma petala klos afitimi pelam pigili'ama alop ipe'ipi ma esis ina siti alop ipe'ipi pope wahifip ea' ambagof awagof, owa'. Andeande'ma ipa' petala anin marasin penda'an naep ipe'ipi ma la'ifipama pigati.
66003019	Epes hiasi mamahisa Ae' okom magamagailasi isimba Ae' enda' megah mohas ehas kalamuta ma enda' waf asasifi fegataga usi'if. Ea' ipa' wapani ukup pendanda'ma waf ipe'ifi hiafi, pembema nelelemb pekwaha waf awafi pifi'mai.
66003020	Ipa' peme', Ae' aha uta alutu. I'i anin epen neme' malogol ae'agili ma nusi' uta, Ae' iwis nomon epe eloman ope atogon wea' gwa'aisi.
66003021	Epen ami nilutu banagena nelefata wandafa nigali'amona waf awafii, Ae' atiasi i'i aho'ma anina nepe negalome ma negape Dembinai sia king ae'anai. Ea' na'amba atin si'i fowa' Ae' agalutu banagewe ma egelefata wandafa waf awafi. Ea' dei' ape aloma Ahame ae'anai ape dembiwai sia king ananinai.
66003022	Ipa' mamahipama aligah hagapaipai pendame' basef ifimba andeande' Ambal bu'unai Godi nagawalapefa esis amam nematawa Kristeni.”
66004001	Isimba hi'alas owa', ati gani heven anota uta tandawisi' tape. Ea' malogol agalemba fowa' agame'agili ga'ipai basef ifimba ae' si'i anona alof nogogal ea' na'i, “Ina' lotai na'a ilifa ihimba'mina hiahaom anaf mugi' mogatagai.”
66004002	Ea' kwafalis atis Ambal bu'unai Godi nataga banagona ma ae'. Ea' ati gani heven sia dembinai kingi ati anona aman Dembinai natoman nape.
66004003	Anen nogala' banagona si'i otam fasimi agilima jaspa a otam akwahimi agilima konilian. Ea' anona ilelina nanogama sia anamba dembinai king nagatomanai ea' ati ilelina anamba goloto'unai si'i anom otam fasimi agilima emeral.
66004004	Ea' anom siaifah hiami bu'wami 24-pelaim motawa lif atina sia inimba dembinai kingi. Ea' anom agufumi mala luwaguf afitimi atom matoma mandanda' siaifah isimba 24-pelais. Ea' mowalo' hagw dembami atom mogowalo'agwi balagah amamugahi sanda' gol sanda'agwi.
66004005	Otaga pele'ala natagai sia dembinai kingi diwala. Ea' anom amalemb lu'wami mala' wapani sia inimba nape nagatologoma bagah 7-pelaim fagandumi mape mogala'mana. Bagah amamba Spirit Ambagof Bu'wagufi Godi 7-pelaiguf.
66004006	Ea' anamba sia dembinai kingi netawa nagatologoma anin mae atitin nape, inimba si'i embel naoh lu'wami. Ambamba mandati si'i mapelaga ambal magati pelele' endilisi. Ea' anom hiahaom biamibiam ambal namili lagapaumi mape la'afen managama sia kingi malutu. Amom magape naep hiami mapaom hi'alam maso'ala amagah opalef amamumi alafugainama hi'alam.
66004007	Nagali'i ambal lagapaunai si'i anona mafin lu'unai wandafunai laion. Nagagi'i anen si'i bulmakau suwafunai. Nagafe'ma wanomi anen amaga gandanda'ana si'i amaga epeni. Ea' nagafe'ma biamibiami nandati si'i anona komon lu'unai nufia' nagafe' ilifi.
66004008	Apa' ambagof namogof fagapaumi atona atin bihinagof wanogof wanogof fape amom atona atin. Ea' alop amamipi si'ip naep atomap hi'alap. Ea' owamb alip amom maga'i atapim na'amba ma'i, “Dembinai God anen banagona bo'ona hilili' a'owa'i. Fowa' gani anen nape ea' dei' nape, anaf owagama wapani nope atapina.” Amom ina mapoma noma'wa maga'i basef ifimba, owa'. Manda'if atapim.
66004009	Amam sonahama God nagatoma sia dembinai kingi nagape ambal namili atapina lifilafii. Ea' masa'ma agol ananigili manifelona.
66004010	Ama nimaguf hiafi nogota mamahotama amom manda'as na'amba atin, agufumi amamba 24-pelaim mindiwa nembawa ma nogohnaep Dembinai kingi, nagatoma sia kingi. Ea' amom manda' lotuma anen nagape lifilafii. Amom mowali hagw amamugwi goligw makwahogw mondola'waifa nogape lafela anen Dembinai amamunai. Hagw agwamba gwafe' gowa felefele'ma sia king notawa nagatologoma ea' ma'i,
66004011	Ina' God afa'inai Dembinai afa'inai. Ina' la'ifinai bu'winai endilisi ma epes hiasi sonogahasa ina' sogasa'ma agol ine'igili lu'wagol. Ina' banaginai. Dei' main, ina' nanda' hiahaom hiamii. Okom ine'inai atona na'iam nanda'am mataga. Ea' dei' hiahaom amamba hiami amape ambal lapaom.”
66005001	Ea' ati aman anamba nagatoma sia kingi nahapila ano'w buk lagol kwahisigili ananigili. Buk akwamba amef mail nomon ando'. Ea' sanda' tep si'i blasta sowa' buk akwamba sisihi'w. Tep du'wanina 7-pelaina sagwindisa'w buk akwamba.
66005002	Ea' ati anona ensel banagonai noga na'i mehip na'amba na'i, “Epen ami bu'wani ma atiasi la'ifina negahape' tep anamba nagawasi' buk akwambai?”
66005003	Owa' anin epen atitin nepe hevena a'a itap apa'ea a'a itap apa'e a'a itap gani awin la'ifina negawala buk akwamba negati nomone'wa, owa'atin.
66005004	Ae' ati esis ina ati anin epen la'ifina nigipalia buk akwamba negati nomone'wa, owa'. Ea' ae' dei' nembel nimanimbila isimba alef ega a'i mehip.
66005005	Ea' anen agilinai na'ipi na'amba na'i, “Ina' owa'i nelefa! Neme'! Anona aman natagama mini'ap esis Judai, aman anamba ma'una Dembinai nagataga wambota atamba bafamepa Deviti. Anen si'i anona mafin wandafunai laion, nikila' wandafa waf awafi. Isimba atis dei' atiasi anen atona la'ifina ma nogahape' tep inimba 7-pelain nagawasi' buk akwambai nugupalia'w.”
66005006	Ae' ati amamba biamibiam ambal lagapaumi maloma amom agufumi mape malipa anona mafin sipsip noganai. Anen tol nalutu, nandati si'i sagahana afuna. Anen nalutu felefele'ma sia inimba kingi. Wambawa magataga balagonai, 7-pelaim ea' naep 7-pelaip. Naep ipimba fa'i Spirit Ambagof Bu'wagufi Godi 7-pelaiguf nasapa'am mafe'agon hi'alagon itap apa'e hiagoma.
66005007	Sipsip anamba noganai nafe' nofa'ai buk akwamba kwagape lagol kwahisigili ananigili nagatoma sia inimba kingi.
66005008	Nofa' buk akwamba ea', hiahaom amamba biamibiam ambal namili lagapaumi maloma agufumi amamba 24-pelaim mindiwa nembawa motawa felefele'ma sipsip anamba noganai. Agufumi amamba hiami atona atin mahapila anin musik si'i gitai naloma anom dis gol si'inama sanda inimba nogoh alogw magami. Sanda inimba alogw ambul mataga malota ilif si'i beten esis amam nematawa Godi.
66005009	Ea' manda' anof awaf dambaifi na'amba ma'i, “Ina' bu'winai hilili'i endilisi ma nigifa'i buk akwamba nagahape' mandof tep amamba hiami mogowa'akwi. Dei' main, esis asahena nagaga'i, esimbel ine'imbeli batala epes isimba wapani sotambili naso'anas God. Aho', ina' natala esis amam nematawa hi'alasa misi'ah ahamba epes hiasi, diga naninani hianai, alop hiapi ma misi'ah sagape anep itap lu'upa walemb hielimbi ma sogotanimai.
66005010	Ina' nanda'as sataga si'i pris mondolalima Godi ma anen nogape Dembinai ma esis numafias sonda' maol ananini. Ea' esis atiasi sope si'i king dembami sumafi epes sagape itapi.”
66005011	Ea' ae' atologon owa' ame' malogof ensel hiami a'owa' sigiambam namba amamuni hiani handet milian tausen, hiami a'owa'. Amom malutu malipa sia inimba kingi maloma hiahaom amamba ambal lagapaumi maloma amom agufumi.
66005012	Amom gigal ma'oh mehip ma'i, “Anamba ma'una sipsip noganai, fowa' esis sahana nagaga'i. Anen bu'unai hilili'i endilisi ma nogofa' namba agol lu'wagili goloma hiahaom hiami bu'wami otamba uga mais soloma banagami lu'wami a gawa bu'wani moloma banagami mogogala'i. Anen bu'unai hilili'i endilisi ma epes hiasi sogasa'ma agol ananigili sonohasa anen soganifelona.”
66005013	A'i owa' main, ame' diga ma hiahawes hiasi God nanda'as ambagof fagapaisi hi'alas. Hiahwes sagape heveni ea' sagape itapi, sagape itap ana'e awini saloma sagape naoh embel awini. Aho', ame' hiahawes isimba hiasi sagape anamba hiagomai sanda' anof awaf na'amba sa'i, “Dembinai nagape sia inimba kingi naloma sipsip noganai wapani, amom biam mondofa'ago danifal inimba hiani neloma agol lu'wagili a mogogala'i banagami. Amom biam mondofa'ago amamba nimaguf hiafi dondol lifilafi.”
66005014	Ea' hiahaom amamba biamibiam magape namumi ma'i, “Endilisi!” Ea' agufumi mindiwa nembawa manda' lotuma God naloma sipsip noganai.
66006001	Ea' ae' ati sipsip noganai nahapila buk akwamba tep 7-pelailip pogowa'akwi ea' nahape' tep pagali'i. Ea' ame' anona ma amom amamba biamibiami na'i basef diga ananigai gandame' si'i otaga diluluwagala. Anen na'i, “Ina' fi'i!”
66006002	Ea' atologon wapani, ati anona mafin hos afitinai epen nagatomanai nahapila kepa'w. Esis saso'ana anota hat si'i sanda' wandaf sali'amonaf sogofa'agwi. Ea' anen banagona nafe' dei' nali'amona wandaf ea' okom banagem nape nape atapina na'i nogali'amona wandaf hiafi.
66006003	Sipsip noganai nahape' anona tep nagafe'ma bifi nogowa' buki ea' ame' anona ma amamba biamibiam nagafe'ma bifi na'i, “Ina' fi'i!”
66006004	Ea' anona hos akwahinai nogogala' a'owa'i nataga, anona aman natoma hos anamba. Ea' amom amamba biamibiam maso'ana banagami aman anamba nagatoma hosi. Ea' la'ifinai ma negelefata nogota bu'utai ma amam nematawa itap apa'isi. Ea' esis lupulupa' atin so'oha sogaga'. Ea' maso'ana anona bainat lu'unai ma nonda' maol inimba.
66006005	Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' anona tep nagafe'ma wanifi wapani nogowa' buki. Ame' anona ma amamba biamibiam nagafe'ma wanifi na'i, “Ina' fi'i!” Ea' ae' atologon wapani ati anona hos alialinai. Ea' aman nagatomanai nahapila anin skel si'i ikwaf dondo'ma nowaloga gwa'aisi nigihimba'masa ikwaf dindi'i dondo'.
66006006	Ea' ame' anef maf si'i anagol malogol ga'i la'afena amamba biamibiam ga'i, “Ina' nesaho' anep malep sagala sa'utip witipi ma 3 kina. Ea' nesaho' maloh sa'wihi wanoh bali si'i wit nagapaihi ma otamba 3 kina. Apa' ina' owa'i nehambombaga waini wel hi'ilasa, owa'i!”
66006007	Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' tep nagafe'ma bifibifi nogowa' buki, ea' ame' malogol anona ma amom nagafe'ma biamibiami na'i, “Ina' fi'i!”
66006008	Ea' atologon wapani owa', ati anona hos batafunai, aman nagatomanai agol ananigili ga'. Ea' anona aman nugumafi wambel esis sagaga'i sagapoma nagi'mana nafi'i. Amom biam atiasi mowala amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi sotaga mini'ap biafip biafipa anis sogowa' banaga amom biama mogaha anis amam nematawa hiasi anep mini'ap sogaga'. Ea' amom biam moha anis soga' bainat amamunai ea' anis nolomohas soga' a aowas naninani nonda' anis soga' ea' anom mafis amamba wandafumi magape itapi moha anis monda'as soga'.
66006009	Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' tep anamba wapani nagafe'ma wanif bifi nogowa' buki, ea' ati ambagofa anis epes sagaga'i sape lafela anota belita sondolalima Goda. Fowa' epes isimba sagahapifa basef Godi sisihifi asawalapef sa'if sa'ipasefa Jisas Krais nagatopalopas. Ea' isimba sandaiwa'ma Godi sahas saga'.
66006010	Amom ambagof amamba ma'i mehip na'amba ma'i, “King dembinai nagahapila itapi otaga ilifi, ina' nape bo'wena hilili'i, ina' endilisinai! Nohotagw ma'ugw atiasi gofe' hi'ilagw dowaf guli' ma ina' nenda' kotima esis amam nematawa sagape itapi, ma negagwa esimbel ape'imbeli?”
66006011	Ea' God naso'ama anom klos afitimi laumi atona atin na'ipam na'amba na'i, “Ipa' ata' pepoma noma'w kwasakwasala. Anaf esis bousi soha sahin owan isimba ipa' pandao'oma panda' maol atini soga', si'i sahepa pagaga'. Anef nemaf dondo'afi esis bousi sohas soga' sotaga ma ikwaf ae' aga'iefi, dao' egwa esimbel ipe'imbeli.”
66006012	Ea' ae' ati sipsip noganai nahape' tep anamba nagafe'ma wanif wanifi nogowa' buki dei' atef imauna lu'unai nakoto' itap, awin alipini netaga nandambema alialina si'i lowaf alifi apifi. Ea' awin owambini nataga akwahina hi'alana si'i esimbel.
66006013	Ea' ondowa magape ilifi mowai itap si'i sa'utip pagail lawah figi owa' ata' akupia fufin nakoto'mep pigawai.
66006014	Ilif wapani a' nafe' higilalagon si'i sala'watefa mat sogowa'ata. Ea' halelef hiami maloma ailan hiani makwaha anamba magapoma a' mindiki'ah mafe' anagon.
66006015	Ea' amom king dembami itapami maloma agufumi a amom kepten dembami mugumafi amom soldiai maloma amam hiahaom hiamumi a amam amamba banagami, epes isimba hiasi sanda' maola otambai saloma isimba hiasi agof akasi sagape lafela anis epesi, esis hiasi sawis sandambaho' sagape bologwalef maim magape itapi ea' magape nomona otamba lu'wami magape halalifi.
66006016	Ea' sofala halalef amamba hiami maloma otamba na'amba sa'i, “Ipa' awi pindahapi'i petomapa ma pembaho'wapa ma amaga anen nagatoma sia kingi naloma nembel wandafunai ma sipsip noganai.
66006017	Dei' main, nemaf afamba lu'wafi ma ukup amom biami wandafipa mogogwa waf awafi dei' fagatagai. Atiasi ami la'ifina nilutu nigikila' amamba? Owa'atin.”
66007001	A'i owa' main, ae' ati hiahawes isimba wapani si'i koh dondo'ah ati ensel biamibiam malutu wa'owa'ola biafigin biafigin itap pafe' pegetambela, mahapila fufin hiani itapani ma atiasi fufin inimba ina banagena negefapusa itap a'a naoh embel lu'wami a'a negaola anoga lawag atotoga, owa'atin.
66007002	Ea' ati anona ensel nafe' nalota ilif awin nagatafima. Anen nahapila ametal banagani Godi nagape namunai ea' nofala ensel amamba biamibiam God naso'am banagami ma mohambombaga itapi naohi.
66007003	Anen na'ipam mehip na'i, “Dei' ipa' ina pehambombaga itapi naoh a lawah maim, owa'i. Ata' owa'. Apa' ma'i monda' ametal Godi ma amagah epes isimba bu'wasi sanda' maola God ape'inai mili'. Ama bola dao', pendahambombaga hiahaom amamba.”
66007004	Ea' ame' esis sa'i esis amam nematawa isimba ma'uma'wis sogofa' ametali. Amom manda'mas ametal esis asataga na'amba 144,000. Esis amam nematawa hiasi misi'ah Israeli.
66007005	Dei' esis 12,000 mini'ap esis Judai esis asofa' ametal a 12,000 mini'ap Rubeni a 12,000 esis mini'ap Gati.
66007006	Ea' esis 12,000 mini'ap Aseri a 12,000 mini'ap Naptalii a 12,000 mini'ap Manasei.
66007007	Ea' 12,000 mini'ap Simeoni a 12,000 mini'ap Livaii a 12,000 mini'ap Isakari.
66007008	Ea' 12,000 mini'ap Sebuluni a 12,000 mini'ap Josepi a 12,000 mini'ap Benjamini. Epes misi'ah isimba sofa' ametal Godi.
66007009	Hiahaom amamba hiami hi'alam, ae' ata' atologon wapani owa', ati esis amam nematawa hiasi a'owa' safi'i sunduwa'anima sape. Ea' ina anin epen la'ifina nigiamba epes isimba sogataga ma'uma'wis, owa'atin. Esis a' hias a'owa'. Epes isimba sagape itap hiagomai ea' epes hiasi sagape walemb hiagomai ma alop anamba hiana haona, diga hianai naninani, isimba hiasi hi'alas. Esis salutu anamba God nagatoma sia kinga ma naep sipsip noganai. Sala anom klos afitimi laumi, sahapila akwitih lagof asasigufi.
66007010	Ea' soga sa'i mehip na'amba sa'i, “God ape'inai anen natoma sia kingi ma sipsip noganai, amom biam mofa'apa mutanimai ma makwaha waf awafi ape'ifi mogape andeande'.”
66007011	Amom ensel amamba hiami mandatama hi'alam malutu managama sia kingi ea' agufumi amamba 24-pelaim maloma hiahaom amamba biamibiam magape namumi mape mitimalo' mindiwa balagah amamugahi mati itap felefele'ma sia kingi manda' lotu mandagala ma God.
66007012	Amom maga'i na'amba ma'i, “Endilisi atis! Apa' mandagala a'owa' ma God ape'inai ea' masa'ma agol ananigili lu'wagol! Anen Dembinai kofagonama mogogala'i. Anen nomonas hiasi bu'wasi sagapaunai ea' apa' manifelona masa'ma agol ananigili! Anen banagami hiamunai endilisi! Aho', banagami lu'wami a' mapoma anen! Amamba hiami ananimi atom lifilafi dondol. Endilisi!”
66007013	Ea' anona amom agufumi amamba 24-pelaim nahali'i na'i, “Esis isimba sagala klos afitimi laumii, esis mamahisa? Esis safi'i anima?”
66007014	Ea' agwa basef a'i, “Dembinai ae'inai, ina' atina negawas.” Anen na'ipi na'i, “Epes isimba fowa' sape itap sogofa' nimanimi akafimi lu'wami ma lagof esis bousi. Ea' esis sasa'opa klos asasimi ma esimbel sipsip anamba noganai, dei' mataga afitim.
66007015	Ea' salutu sia king Godi nagatologoma. Ea' owamba alip sanda' maol ananini ipat ananitai. Ea' anen nagape sia inimba kingi, anen atona atiasi nope nolomas nola'ambemas.
66007016	Esis ina atiasi nolomohas wapani, ina atiasi soga'ma embel iap pese'as wapani, owa'. Owaf ina atiasi banagef fehas, a ina atiasi anif nif lu'wafi fihihi'as sope, owa'atin.
66007017	Dei' main, sipsip noganai nalutu felefele' endilisi ma sia kingi, anen atiasi nope numafias. Anen no'was sefe' ma embel amamba magataga anona bolotaf ifatai ma sogofa' embel ambalemba ambal namili lagapaimbeli. Ea' atiasi God nopati'mas embif hiafi naep asasipi ma esis ina ata' selef wapani, a' owa'atin.”
66008001	Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' tep anamba nagafe'ma 7i nogowa' buk akwambai ea' ina ata' anin mae atitin nanda' amalemb, a ina anif basef fatagai heven fape fafe' fafe' ma nogota si'i awa du'wanini, owa'atin.
66008002	A'i owa' main, ati ensel amamba 7-pelaim atapim magalutu naep Godii mofa' biugel anamba 7-pelain nandandam.
66008003	Ea' anona ensel nafi'i nalutu felefele'ma belita sondolali ma Goda. Nahapila anota plet gol ama nonda' nogoh alogw fasimi magami. Esis saso'ana sanda hiani ma nonda' nogoh amamba ma anen nokolasom mogaloma beten amam nematawa hiasi Godi. Ea' nanda' ofa ma God belita atamba sanda' gol sanda'atai togotawa felefele'ma sia kingi.
66008004	Ea' nogoh magataga sanda inimba alogw gwaga'ani naloma beten esis amam nematawa Godi, isimba sandakolas salota ilifa naep Godi.
66008005	Ea' ensel anamba nofa' plet atamba doko' sanda inimba nagalatai ea' nofa' nifa belita sondolalima Godatai nowalam plet, ea' nakwahis suwai itap. Anen nakwahisi ma ea', otaga holala bendagala owa', anom amalemb mala' ea' pele'ala nafe' itap bolatin nalemb atin nape.
66008006	Ea' ensel amamba 7-pelaim mahapila biugel inimba 7-pelain mandandombola mugufapula biugel inimba.
66008007	Ensel nagali'i nofapula biugel ananini ea' ais afitimi banagami si'i otambai pohagalami maloma nif mandambema maloma esimbel lo'lam mataga na'a heven ea' mafe' mowai itap. Amom mawaloga itap hiagoma paloma lawah hiagahi sataga wanifigin. Ea' nif fando itap wa'ap ea' biafigin nape. Ea' otalef hielifi fagaluwi afalemba wapani ea' fandelef hi'alalef dombol.
66008008	Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma bifi nofapula biugel ananini, esis sakwaha anona maena si'i halafuta fagandonai nandagia nafe' nowala naoh. Ea' sawala naoh mataga wanifigin ea' wa'am mandambema mataga esimbel biafigin mape bo'om.
66008009	Ea' siamba hiahaom amamba hiami magape naohi ambagof namugufumii sawalogam mataga misi'ah wanoh ea' anep mini'ap maga' biah hape bo'oh. Ama main, siamba sip hiapi pagafe' naohi wapani sawaloga pataga misi'ah wanoh ea' anep mini'ap awasim hi'alam biafim mape bo'om.
66008010	Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanumi nofapula biugel ananini, anona ondo'w lu'unai nandagia na'a heven fandona fafal atin si'i nemba'w fagando'w nowai itap. Esis siamba walembeh hiambihi haloma embel hiambeli begetah itapi sawalogas sataga wanifis ea' ondo'w anamba nafe' nowala embel du'wanimbel begetah wa'ili. Wa'ol biafis owa' sape be'es.
66008011	Ondo'w agili'wa akwamba sa'i, Marasin Inimba Numbutini. Ea' siamba walembeh embel hiambeli sawalogambel bataga mini'ap wanifip, ea' anembel anep mini'ap bataga si'i marasin numbutini. Apa' mini'ap biafip bape be'embel. Ea' epes hiasi sa' embel ambalemba aumbeli baofa opalef asasimi saga' hi'alas.
66008012	Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma biamibiami nufapula biugel ananini, esis siamba awin owambini alipini naloma ondowa sawalogas sataga misi'ah wanoh. Ea' sahambombaga mini'ap atetep sataga akutis. Ea' nemaf afamba satopa'af nohotagw wanifigw. Anota akutita, biafigw gogala'. Ea' dei' awin alipini du'wanin owa' negala'a. Ea' owamb du'wanimb na'amba atin.
66008013	Ea' ati anona komon lu'unai nufia' nafe' la'afen gani ilif ame'ana na'i mehip na'i, “Uwahipis uwahipis a'owa' esis amam nematawa sagape itapi ma anom akafimi nimanimi lu'wami wapani mogatagamas. Dei' main, anom ensel wanom ma'i mufapula biugel amamini ma atiasi nimanimi akafimi amamba mogatagamas!”
66009001	Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanif bifi nufapula biugel ananini, ati anona ondo'w nakwaha heven nowai itap. Ondo'w anamba anona ensel. Ea' esis saso'ana ki utaini ma anona nowaga nagal nogowala itap awini. Nowaga anamba owa' nefe' nogotambilia nowala nagafe' atini.
66009002	Anen nawisi' uta nowaga anamba ea' nogoh lu'wami matagai si'i nogoh magalo nif lu'wamii. Ea' nogoh amamba malo maso'ala awin ilif, ea' awin alipini naloma owambini mataga akutim.
66009003	Ea' anom asagof si'i kwamu'wis lu'wami makwaha nogoh amamba mowala itap. Ea' ensel anamba naso'am banagami si'i banagami sipiawai wagape itapi wagahambombaga epesi.
66009004	Ea' mofa' basef na'amba fa'i, “Ipa' ina pehambombaga otalef a'a hiahaom mamimami magataga itapi, a'a anogah lawah, owa'i. Ipa' pendahambombagago epes isimba atis ametal Godi owa' logatoma amagah asasigahia.”
66009005	Ea' amamba amom la'ifima mogaso'asa akafimi epes isimba mefe' mondahama aomb wanemb biamb, apa' ina mofa' banagami ma mohas sogaga', owa'. Ea' maso'asa akafimi awami endilisi ma epes isimba si'i sipiawa wagaha epes sagame' akafimi lu'wami.
66009006	Nemaf afamba atiasi epes hiasi solaoma ufia'wa si'i sogaga', apa' owa', a' owa'atin. Ina siti ano'w. Ga' atiasi nondafa'mas some' akafimi lu'wami atapim mopais sope.
66009007	Ae' ati asagof amamba si'i hos dumbulidombola ma'i mogapa'. Balagahima mandati si'i hagw dembami atom mogowalo'agwi sanda' gol sanda'agwi gwatoma balagah amamugahi. Apa' amagah amamugahi si'i epesi nogohnaep sandanda'am.
66009008	Balagah amamugahi auf laumi si'i balagah nematawai. Nalelef amamumi si'i nalelef mafis wandafisi laionim.
66009009	Mafatagw amamumi mala siaogw si'i dunduwif agufum banagami ea' fa'isih amamumi mala' mehip si'i hos magahondo' wilkar lu'wani hiani masagih magafe'ma wandafa amalemb magala'.
66009010	Akwagah hailam si'i sipiawa ea' nalelef fetawama mogaha hiasi molas nombota sogame' akafimi. Amamba mape akwagahima. Akwagah amamumi banagami ma mogahambombaga epes aomb ambamba wanemb biamb.
66009011	Amom anona dembinai king amamunai numafiam. King anamba anen ensel nugumafi nowaga anamba nagal nogowala gani awin a'owa'i, nandafe' atini. Diga esis Hibrui saga'i agol ensel anambai sa'i, Abadon. Diga esis Griki sa'i, Apolion. Kofagefa fa'i, “Aman nogahambombaga hiahaom hiamii.”
66009012	Nemaf awafi ma nimanimi lu'wami mugali'ii amom ahi'alam. Ea' peme'! Nimanimi biafim ata' magapanii bola motaga migi'i.
66009013	Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanom wanomi nufapula biugel ananini, ame' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai belita sondolalima Goda sanda' gol sanda'atai da'malifitama do'wanido'wan, togotawa naep Godii.
66009014	Malogol agalemba ga'ipa ensel anamba nugufapula biugeli na'amba ga'i, “Ensel amamba awami biamibiam manda' kalabusa walemb lu'wambi Yufretis, ina' nekwaha amom mofo'o.”
66009015	Ea' nakwahom mafe'ma atiasi migiamba esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi mowalogas sotaga mini'ap wanifip ea' moha mini'ap atetep soga', biafip sope be'es. God nanda' ensel amamba dumbulidombol mape masasa nogota atamba ma nemaf awin inimba ma afagol agalemba atotogola monda' maol inimba.
66009016	Ae' ame' soldia hiami a'owa' 200,000,000-pelaim matoma hos amamumi. Ame' siambam mataga hiami a'owa'.
66009017	Ape si'i koh danda'aha agati amom magatoma hosi. Amom soldia mala siaogw kapaimi atom. Siaogw agwamba akwahimi alimi kolotuwaimi maloma batafumi. Balagah hosim si'i balagah mafis wandafumi lu'wami laionim. Ea' nif fandom nogoh mataga otamba batafumi salfa fandom mataga malogof amamugufi ea' felegatam mafe'.
66009018	Amom miamba esis amam nematawa hiasi mawalogas sataga mini'ap wanifip ea' maha atifip a' afisa hiahaom amamba awami wanifim, nifi nogoh maloma otam salfa fagandumi magataga malogof hosi. Apa' mini'ap biafip sape be'es.
66009019	Banagami hosi mape malogofi andoh amamumi. Dei' main, andoh amamumi si'i ugufi, balagah mandanda'am. Ea' dei' mahambombaga epesa andoh amamba amamumi.
66009020	Anis epes hiasi ina afisa hiahaom amamba awami wanifim, ina sambema nelelemba sakwaha waf awafi, owa'atin. Esis ina sowa' alafugaha hiahaom amamba sanda'am lagof asasigufi, owa'. Aho', esis ina dei' sakwaha waf afamba sanda' lotuma ambagof awami maloma god anamba baso'amunai sanda' goli silva a bras otamba a lawah hiami maim sanda'ami, hiahaom amamba ina magati o malutu magafi'i, magame' basefi, owa'atin.
66009021	Epes isimba sagaha anis epes sagaga'i, sanda' naohi ufiali ea' sagaila waf so'a waulafii, sanda' wal atini. Apa' ina sambema nelelemba sowa' alafugaha waf afamba, owa'atin.
66010001	Amamba hi'alam ea', ati anona ensel banagonai nisila'i heven. Anen nandagigil nambaho' alop ananipi ilagw ea' ilelina nape balaga ananigai. Amaga ananigai gogala' si'i owaf ea' bo'wagah ananimi si'i popa'w fagandona.
66010002	Anen nahapila ano'w buk sa'ukwi lagof ananigufi, akwindiatif kwa'oh. Anen nawamona bo'waga ananigai kwahisigai gatoma naoh a egawa nahaponaga itap wata'ita.
66010003	Ea' nogal mehip endilisi si'i mafin lu'unai laion nagalef. Nalef na'amba ma ea', otaga diwala hiafi 7-pelaif. Ga'i si'i anagol malogol.
66010004	Otaga diwala 7-pelaif ga'i basef ea', a'i enda' anif basefa isimba, owa' ame' anagol malogol ga'i gataga heven ga'i, “Basef ifimba otaga diwala hiafi 7-pelaif, isimba ina' nembaho'was sondape okom ine'imi atom. Ina nenda'ef fil buk, owa'i.
66010005	Ea' ensel anamba ali' agatolona nagalutu naohi itap wata'itai anen nasa'ma lagol kwahisigili galota.
66010006	Ea' na'ias endilisi gani ilifa agol Godi nagape namona lifilafi dondoli. Anen nanda' ilifi itap naloma hiahaom hiami ambagof fagapaumi maloma amamba ambagof akami magape ilifi itapi maloma naoh embel lu'wami maloma hiahaom amamba hiami magape naoh owin wapani. Ea' ensel anamba na'i, “Nogota mape magasasatai dei' a' hi'alata.
66010007	Nemaf afamba ensel anamba nagafe'ma 7i ni'i nugufapula biugelafi, hiahaom amamba God nagambaho'ami motaga alihim. God atiasi nonda'am endilisi si'i basef fowa' nagaso'amef amom profet manda' maol ananinii.”
66010008	Ea' malogol fowa' agame'agol heveni ga'ipi wapani na'amba ga'i, “Ina' fo'o fa'ai buk akwamba kwindiatif kwagape lagol ensel nagalutu naohi itapi.”
66010009	Ea' afe'ma ensel anamba a'ipana a'i, “Ina' se'e buk akwamba sa'ukwi.” Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Ina' fa'akw nea'akw. Ako'w atiasi usihi'w si'i aupimbel malogol ine'igili, apa' nembel ine'imbili a' ikahi'w.”
66010010	Anen na'ias ea', asa'ma buk akwamba sa'ukwi lagol enseli a'akw. Ea' malogol ae'agili usihigil si'i aupimbel hani. Apa' a'akw ea' ame' ikahi'w nembel ae'ambili.
66010011	Ea' ame' anif basef sa'ipi sa'i, “Ina' newalapa basef Godi wapani ma hiahaom atiasi mogatagama misi'ah amam nematawa alop naninani hianai ma diga anamba hiana haona ma amom king dembami hiami wapani.”
66011001	Ea' esis sase'e bagol ae' ma indila'waifa hiahawes dondo'as atin ea' sa'ipi sa'i, “Ina' safel nembe' ikwafa ipat lu'unai Godi noloma belita atamba sondolalima Goda. Ea' niamba esis amam nematawa sanda' lotu ma anini sataga ma'wis.
66011002	Apa' ina nenda' indalelemb ambalemba bepe ando'ma ipat anamba, owa'i, hapaimi. Dei' main, indalelemb amambai esis epes sogolalama Godi sofa'alemb. Ama esis atiasi sotaga sogahambombaga wambel lu'wagoma Godi bu'wambili sope sofe' sondahama aomb 42-pelaimb, afagof si'igufi wanogof du'wanigili.
66011003	Ea' atiasi ae' God esapa'o amam amamba biam ae'ami enda'am banagema mogowalapa basef ae'afi. Ea' amom atiasi mowaho' begah wa'ami si'i luwaguf awami ea' mi'ipasa basef ae'afi mofe' mondahama nimaguf 1,260-pelaif, afagof wanogof du'wanigili.”
66011004	Amom biam si'i lawah oliv biagah haloma lambeh biambeh atapis sotawa naep Dembinaii ma itap hiagomai.
66011005	I'i anis epes si'i sonda' amom biam aom, atiasi nif fetaga malogof amomugufi ea' fendo esis bousi amamisi endilisi. Aho' endilisi, epen ami ni'i negahambombagami, waf afamba atef anin a' nega'.
66011006	Amom biam banagema mogasopama otaga ma asaf owa'atina nimaguf hiafi ma monda' maol mogawalapa basef Godi. Amom banagami ma mogambema embel hiambeli begataga akwahimbel si'i esimbel ea' banagami ma mogahambombaga esis amam nematawa itapasi ma hiahaom awami mamimami. Nimaguf mamahifa amom mi'i monda'as na'amba, amom la'ifima monda'as.
66011007	Amom manda' maol mawalapa basef Godi ma ea', anin mafin lu'wani aunai nokwaha nowaga anamba nagal nogowala atini a' nondagiai ilif. Ea' okom numbutina nopa' nolomam. Ea' noham nofa'asom a' afum.
66011008	Ea' alop amamipi po'oh ufia'w lu'ukwa taun anamba lu'wagoma, apa' maga'iagon loo atin maga'i agol Sodomi Isipi. Anamba ea' taun inimba atin fowa' esis saha Dembinai amamunai nagaga' lawag usi'igai ti'wanaegaima.
66011009	Anis epes alop hianai naninani sagape wambel itap hiagomai a diga hianai naninani, epes misi'ah hiasi hi'ilas atiasi sititi alop amom biami atapis sondahama nimaguf wanif si'ifi du'wanifi. Ea' esis ina si'i aho'ma anis epes sogawam matmat, owa'.
66011010	Ea' esis amam nematawa itapasi atiasi sondagala ma amom magaga' asonda' gwa'aisi sea'as sealemb a sandasoso'ama hiahawes fasisi saloma alipisi asasisi. Dei' main, profet amamba biam maso'asa akafimi awami amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi.
66011011	Nimaguf si'ifi wanif du'wanifi ahi'ilif, dao' God a' nosapa'i ambip ambal lagapaipi pefe' piwis nomona amom biam a' mosafel mulutu. Ea' epes sotolom, a' ombal mahas endilisi.
66011012	Ea' mome' anagol malogol gi'i gotagai heven gofalam mehip na'amba gi'i, “Ipa' bipa latai na'a ilif!” Ea' mofe' heven muwis ilagw nomon ea' esis bousi sulutu sotolona mogafe'.
66011013	Ama nogota atamba atota, imauna lu'unai a' notaga ea' taun lu'wagoma du'wanigin pe'ogon ea' 9-pelaigin ata' nope atapigin. Ea' esis amam nematawa 7,000-pelais soga' ma imauna anamba. Apa' esis anis amam nematawa sogapani esis ombal mahas a'owa' endilisi, sosa'ma agola God nagape heveni.
66011014	Hiahaom akafimi lu'wami mogafe'ma bifi amamba a' mefe' hi'ilam, apeme'! Nogota bandata ma nimanimi lu'wami mogafe'ma wanifi mogataga.
66011015	Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma 7i nufapula biugel ananini, ea' anagof malogof foga fa'i mehip fatagai heven na'amba fa'i, “Dembinai ape'inai naloma Krais amom biam dei' mofa' banagami mataga king dembami itap apa'e hiagoma mumafiagon. Ea' anen a' nope king Dembinai lifilafi dondol!”
66011016	Ea' amam amamba agufumi 24-pelaim magatoma sia lu'wani amamini ma naep Godii mape itap mindiwa balagah amamugahi mati itap manda' lotu mandagala ma God
66011017	ma'i, “Dembinai, ina' God banagami hiaminai. Fowa' gani endilisi ina' nagapani, ea' dei' ina' nape. Ina' nefa' banagami hiami ine'imi ea' nape king Dembinai nugumafi epes soloma hiahaom hiamii. Ea' afa' wanifelina.
66011018	Esis sogolalama Godi opalef awalef ukup numbutip, apa' dei' okom ine'imi wandafumi mataga ea'. Dei' nemaf ina' negawaloga esis sagaga'ii ma sogatagama kot. Dei' nemaf ina' nogaso'asa hiahaom fasimi ma amom profet manda' maol ine'inii. Dei' ina' nogaso'asa hiahawes fasisi esis amam nematawa ine'isi soloma isimba hiasi sanda' lotuminai sagape lafela ine'i, esis agof fagatomasi soloma isimba agof akasi wapani. Dei' nemaf ina' negahambombaga epes isimba sagahambombaga epes sagape itapi!”
66011019	Amom ma'ias ea' ma main, ipat lu'unai Godi nagape heven nandawisi' ea' bokis bu'wasi isimba mu'uli Godi nagapaisi isimba sataga sa'oh alihigima nomon ipat ananinai. Ea' holala otaga nogala' nafe', amalemb mala' otaga diluluwala, itap nalemb atin asaf lu'wafi wambawa lu'wamunai si'i otamba mambip nalai.
66012001	Ea' anona ametal lu'unai nataga heven nandanda' na'amba. Ano'w nemata'w atoto'w kwape kowaho' awin alipini alop akwa'upi si'i lowaf. Ea' awin owambini nape lafela bo'wagah akwa'ugahi. Ea' anota hat awo agofuwai atowa ogowalo'ogwi tatoma balaga ako'ugai. Ondowa 12-pelaiwa wailata.
66012002	Ea' ako'w opafu'w kwame' akafimi amamba matagama'wa kogola awani. Ea' kwawal kwalef kwa'oh mehip.
66012003	Ea' anin ametal nataga heven nandanda' na'amba. Anona kwambon lu'unai nape. Anen akwahinai ea' balagah 7-pelaigah handanda'ana, wambawa magataganai 10-pelaim. Ea' hagw 7-pelaigw dembami atom mogowalo'agwi gwatoma balagah ananigahi.
66012004	Akwaga ananinai nambeha ondowa anona mini'ap gani otaga ilif nakwahom mowai itap. Ea' dei' ondowa misi'ah biah ata' hape gani ilif atapih. Ea' kwambon anamba nafi'i nalutu naep nemata'w kwa'i kogola awanii, nalutu nohafa ako'wa ata' kolani atin, ama kwafalis noga'an.
66012005	Ea' nemata'w akwamba kola awani aman. Awani inimba anaf owagama banagena nugumafi esis misi'ah hiahi amam nematawa hiasi. Anen banagona nohapila bumbulita ain nope dambena nugumafias. Ako'w kolan ea', kwafalis atis esis sofa'an safe'ma sia king Godi a' nape andeande'.
66012006	Ea' kwafa' kwafe' anagon wafigima fataupigima. Anamba God a' nagandondombagona ako'wa. Ama atiasi anis epes sumafiakw sogaso'akw gwa'aisi ako'w dondo'ma nimaguf 1,260-pelaif, afagof wanogof du'wanigili.
66012007	Dei' wandaf lu'wafi fataga heven. Ensel dembinai Maikel naloma amom ensel ananimi mapa' maloma kwambon anamba lu'unai. Ea' kwambon anamba nao'wa amom ensel awami ananimi magwamama wandaf amom mapa' malomam wapani.
66012008	Apa' kwambon naloma ensel ananimi amom ina banagem a'owa' ma mugali'amona wandaf, owa'. Ea' dei' amom ina ata' mapani gani heven wapani, owa'atin.
66012009	Ea' amom ensel Godi makwahai kwambon anamba nisila'i. Kwambon anamba fowa' ganinai dei' esis saga'i aman aunai Satan. Anen aman nagambaso'ma esis amam nematawa hiasi itapasii. Amom makwahai anen nafi'i itap, makwahai ensel awami ananimi wapani misila'i malumanai.
66012010	Ea' ame' anagol malogol ga'i mehip gatagai heven ga'i na'amba ga'i, “Dei' God ape'inai a' nowambela apa' mutanimai ea', banagami ananimi mataga mandawalap alihigima ea' ma nogape Dembinai king! Ea' Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nagafi'ii anen banagonai nofa' agol lu'wagili ea'. Dei' main, aman anamba nagambaso'ma alipisi sahin owan ape'isii owamb alip na'ipa God ape'inai na'i esis sanda' waf awafi. Apa' owa' dei' amom ensel Godi makwahana nisila'i ea'.
66012011	Esis alipisi sahin owan ape'isi sofa' banagami ma esimbel sipsip noganaii ea' sawalipasa basef ananifi endilisifi. Esis sanda' waf afambai. Isimba atis dei' silai'ipa wandaf sali'amona boumi ma amamba. Esis ina ukup pa'ipa'i a'owa' ma sogape andeande' itap apa'e, owa'atin. Esis ina ombel mahasa bousi sohas sogaga', owa'atin.
66012012	Ea' ipa' hipai pagape heveni, ipa' sonondahepa! Apa' ipa' pagape itapi paloma sagape naoh ipa' embeli, uwahipipa! Dei' main, nimanimi lu'wami ma'i a' motagamepa. Satan a' nisila'o ea' ma ipa', anen okom wandafuna a'owa' endilisi. Dei' main, anen a' nogawa nogota ea' bandata ma nope nonda' maol ananini, ama main owa', ahigiligalana.
66012013	Amom ensel mowasa'i kwambon lu'unai anamba nisila'i itap dei' nagawa anen ea' nafi'i nape itap ea' nati nemata'w akwamba kogola awani amani natofa'w.
66012014	Owa' saso'akw bihinagof biagof lu'wagufi komonigufa ako'w la'ifi'wa kufia' kogafe' wambel akwa'umbili itap wafigima fataupigima. Ama ata' kogape laogona kwambon anamba lu'unai ma esis sumafia'wa wali'ita solaga'w kofe' kofe' kotambel afagof wanogof du'wanigili.
66012015	Ea' kwambon anamba lu'unai nagu'wai embel malogol ananigili. Embel ambalemba bataga si'i anemb walemb lu'wambi ea' kolo' atin bafe' bagi'ma ako'w. Kwambon anamba na'i embel amamba mondahago ako'wa kofe' higiligala'o.
66012016	Apa' owa', itap patopalopa'w na'amba. Malogol itapi nagal alihina na' embel amamba kwambon nagagu'ami malogol ananigilii hi'alambel.
66012017	Ea' anen okom numbutina a'owa' ma ako'w ea' nafe' na'i nonda' wandaf noloma anis batawisa'w akwa'usi, esis amam nematawa isimba sagaila mu'uli hiani Godii sawalapa basef Jisasi sagailafi.
66012018	Ea' kwambon anamba nafi'i nalutu naoh akata.
66013001	Ea' ati anona mafin nagail alupi nataga naoh embel. Wambawa magataganai ilifunamaim ea' balagah 7-pelaigah hapaona. Wambawa awamba mowalo' hagw dembami atom mogowalo'agwi gwatoma wambawa gwandandamam. Balagah ananigahi sanda' anagof agof fail fandandama balagah agahemba. Agof agwafomba kofagegofa na'amba. Basef mamimami awami findiwaimuma Godi.
66013002	Mafin anamba dei' agatolonai, anen si'i anom mafis lu'wami wandafumi wanom. Anen anona mafin agol lepat ea' bo'walef ananimi si'i bo'walef anona mafin bea, malogol ananigili si'i malogol anona mafin laioni. Ea' kwambon anamba nowa' banaga mafin alupunai ma banagami lu'wami ananimi. Anen nanda' mafin anamba nataga king dembinai ma nugumafi epes hiasi fowa' anen nugumafiasi.
66013003	Mafin anamba balagah 7-pelaigah anoga melet tatomaga si'i sagahana afuna ea'i. Apa' balagonama anamba nagambo'ma dei' ea' wafi'igin, ambo'ona wapani. Ea' epes hiasi sagape itapi sosafel bolalas kwapete'asa mafin anamba alupunai owa' afunaia, sagi'mana.
66013004	Kwambon anamba naso'ana banagami ananimi mafin anamba alupunai. Ea' esis hiasi sanda' lotuma kwambon anamba maloma mafin anamba alupunai wapani sasa'ma agol ananigili sa'i, “Ami nandati na'amba atin si'i mafin alupunai anamba? Owa'atin. Epen a' owa'atin. Ami la'ifina nepa' negalomana? Owa'atin.”
66013005	Ea' dei' God nape natiti mafin anamba gigal na'oh na'i basef awafi findiwaefa God. Anen banagona nape dembinai ma nonda' waf afambai fegape nogota laota aomb ambamba 42-pelaimb, afagof wanogof du'wanigili.
66013006	Malogol ananigili goga na'i basef awafi nanda' findiwa God. Anen nanda' agol Godi findiwagola wambel Godi saloma wambota isimba ananisi sagape heveni.
66013007	Ea' God ata' nape natiti anen ata' banagonama nogasa'ma wandaf nopa' nogaloma esis amam nematawa Godi ea' nalutu nanda' wandaf nahagofas. Anen nofa' banagami ma kwambon anamba ea' la'ifina ma nogape dembinai king banagonai ma esis misi'ah hiasi hi'ilas soloma diga anamba hianai ma itap anamba wambel hiagoma, alop naninani hiana haona.
66013008	Ano'w buk ambal namili'wi kwa'oh. Esis sanda' agof epes Godi atis fail buk akwamba ma nogota atamba fowa' gani God nanda' itap apa'e. Buk akwamba sipsip anamba noganai fowa' esis sahana nagaga'i. Amam nematawa hiasi itapasi agof asasigufi owa' fogail buk akwambaia, esis isimba hiasi hi'ilas sonda' lotuma mafin anamba.
66013009	Epen aligah hagapaini, anin nendame' basef ifimba na'amba.
66013010	I'i esis si'i sonda' anin epen nefe' nenda' kalabus, ea' anin nefo'o nendanda'ago kalabus. Apa' i'i esis si'i soha anin epen negaga'ma bainat, dao' anin nendaga'mago bainat. Endilisi waf afambai nimanif atef atiasi fetaga. Ea' ipa' amam nematawa Godi pendape banagepa pindahapila hapif ipe'ini banagen datima.
66013011	Ea' ati anona mafin alupunai wapani nosafel nawisi itap awin nandagiai ilif. Wambawa biam matagamana si'i wambawa magataga sipsip nogami, apa' basefa diga ananigai si'i malogol diga anona kwambon lu'unaii.
66013012	Mafin anamba nagail alupi na'i nagafe'ma bifi nofa' banagami ma mafin anamba nagali'i ma nugumafi epes hiasi. Ea' nanda' maol banagani ma nogohnaep mafin anamba nagali'i. Anen nanda' maol banagambel ma nonda' esis amam nematawa sagape itapi sonda' lotuma mafin anamba nagali'i, fowa' sahana sa'i nombo'ma nogaga' apa' owa', dei' wafi'ina ea'.
66013013	Mafin anamba nagagi'i, anen nanda' banagami lu'wami mamimami. Banagami amamba lu'wami na'amba. Naep esis amam nematawai, nanda' anif nif fakwaha heven fisila'i itap apa'e.
66013014	God ata' nape natiti anen nanda' banagami amamba mamimami ma naep mafin anamba nagali'i. Ea' anen nagagi'i nanda' waf afambai ma nagahambombaga esis amam nematawa itapasi. Na'ipas dindinip na'amba na'i, “Ipa' pendomba ambala mafin anamba nagali'i nil anona lawag maina ma pegefela agol ananigili lu'wagol. Mafin anamba nagali'i ea' ma'una anamba fowa' bainat tagahanai, apa' ata' nape namona atapina.”
66013015	Ea' God nape natiti mafin anamba noganai na'i aho'ma anen naso'ana ambip ambagof fagapaipi ma ambal anamba mafin alupunai sagandombanai. Ea' ambal anamba noga na'i basef ea' banagona ma noha epes sandaiwa'ma sonda' lotuma anini sogaga'.
66013016	Ea' mafin anamba nagagi'i dindinapina nasasapa' epes isimba hiasi hi'alas sonda' anin ametal nepe atin atina esis lagof da'asigufi a'a amagah asasigahi. Ametal epes isimba agufisi soloma epes agof akasi, a isimba otamba hiambaisi soloma isimba wafisi. Ea' anis isimba agof akasi sanda' maola anis daiasi soloma anis agufisi wapani.
66013017	Ea' epes hiasi sofa' ametal inimba ma agol mafin anamba nagail alupi. Apa' anis sofa' anin namba daiana mafin anamba agilinama. I'i epen ami owa' nefa' ametal inimbaia, anin ina atiasi notala hiahawes epesi, ea' esis wapani ina atiasi sotala hiahawes asasisi, owa'atin.
66013018	Apa' ukup pendape banagep andeande'ma isimba. Epen ami negegawai anin a' nindiamba namba mafin anamba alupunai andeande'. Namba inimba basef waminif atina anona aman. Namba inimba 666.
66014001	Ae' atologon wapani owa', ati sipsip anamba noganai nagalutu halafuta Saioni ea' amam nematawa hiasi a'owa' 144,000-pelais salutu salomana. Agol sipsip noganaii galoma agol ahamana ananinai agof agwafomba fail amagah asasigahi.
66014002	Ea' ame' amalemb fasilimbi mala' mafi'i gani heven si'i amalemb embel magala' lil atin, si'i amalemb magala' ma otaga diwagala mehip. Ae' ame' amalemb amamba si'i epes sagaha gitai musik magala'.
66014003	Esis sanda' anof awaf dambaifi ma anamba sia lu'wani Godi netawa nagatiliginima, ma nogohnaep hiahaom biamibiam magape namumi maloma nogohnaep agufumii. Amam nematawa isimba hiasi a'owa' 144,000-pelais, God natalis la'afena epes hiasi itapasi, isimba atis la'ifisa sogogawa awaf afamba. Ea' ina ata' anis daias wapani la'ifisa sogogawaf, owa'atin.
66014004	Epes isimba sape be'es endilisi. Amam ina manda' waf awafi maloma nematawa, owa'atin. Mape bo'om. Walemb ambalemba sipsip noganai na'i nogafe'ma, esis sagi'mana same' basef ananifi sanda' maol ananini. God natalis la'afena esis amam nematawa hiasi itapasi ea' sape si'i ofa bu'wani nagali'i God naloma sipsip noganai mofa'as sogotanimai ma amomi.
66014005	Esis ina sanda' anif basef kwamaifi baso'aifi, owa'. Esis basef kofagefa ma waf awafi akas.
66014006	Ea' ae' ati anona ensel nufia' nafe' gani ilif. Nofa'ai basef bu'wafi Godi fegape lifilafi dondoli ea' nanda' maol inimba ma noga'ipasa basef ifimba esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape itapi. Nawalapefa misi'ah epes hiasi sagape kantri hiani ganimba itap hiagoma saga'i diga naninanii ma alop naninani hianai hi'alas.
66014007	Anen nogal mehip na'amba na'i, “Nogota tataga ea' ma God nogawalota epes hiasi ma kot. Ea' ipa' ombel mondahepa ma anen pila basef ananifi, pendasa'ma agol ananigili. Ipa' pendanda' lotuma God, anen nanda' heven naloma itap a naoh embel maloma embel amamba hiami magataga itap awini.”
66014008	Anona ensel nagagi'mai ensel anamba nagali'i nafi'i na'i anif basef na'i, “Wambel lu'wambili Babilon ambalemba a' awambel ea'! Aho', anen a awagon ea'! Epes sagape wambel ambalembai sanda' esis misi'ah amam nematawa hiasi hi'alasa saila waf anamba sanda' so'a waolanai. Waf asasifi awafi si'i wain banagonai nanda' epes ukup pagaolasi. Wambel anamba Babilon naso'as wain inimba epes hiasi wambel hiagoma sa'am.”
66014009	Ea' anona ensel nagi'ma amom biam nafi'i. Ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanomi nogal mehip na'amba na'i, “I'i epen ami nenda' lotu ma mafin anamba nagail alupi ma ambal ananinai sagandombanai a nefa' ametal amaga a'a lagof ananisi,
66014010	ea' anin atiasi nepe si'i nega' anin wain. Wain inimba basef waminif atina okom wandafunai Godi. God ina nati uwahipin, owa'atin. Anen okom wandafunai lu'una a'owa'. Anen atiasi nese'an okom wandafunai epen inimba ma nogagwa waf awafi. Ama epen inimba negefa' akafimi awami ma nif fagandumi magahihi'asi ma otamba agol salfa nifimi ma nogohnaep amom ensel bo'om hilili'i moloma nogohnaep sipsip noganaii.
66014011	Ea' nogoh gwataga nif amamba maso'asa akafimi epes isimba sanda' lotuma mafin anamba alupunai naloma ambal anamba ananinai. Epes isimba ina atiasi sopoma noma'w owamb alip, owa'atin. Nogoh amamba atiasi molomolota ilif lifilafi atapim mogapani.”
66014012	Nemaf afamba akafimi amamba mogataga, dao' anis amam nematawa Godi sondalutu banages. Isimba esis amam nematawa sagaila mu'uli Godii ma sagahapifa Jisas sisihina datimai.
66014013	Ea' ame' anagol malogol ga'i gafi'i heven ga'i, “Ina' da'a anif basef na'amba. Esis amam nematawa sahapifa Dembinaii sagaga'i, dei' nimaguf hiafi anaf owagama wapani sonohas!” Ambal bu'unai Godi wapani na'i, “Aho', esis atiasi sokwaha numa'umi amamba esis sanda'ami ea' sopoma noma'w. Esis ina sope dowaf, owa'atin. God atiasi niti waf bu'wafi esis sanda'afi ea' nogwamasa anom hiahaom fasimi esis. Waf bu'wafi asasifi atiasi fisalias sondawalap.”
66014014	Ea' atologon wapani, ati anona otaga afitinai nape ea' anona maena ambal lagapaunai nape otaga anamba anen si'i anona dembinai nataga epen nogofa' alop epesi. Anen nowalo' hat bu'utai togogala' si'i goli balaga ananigai ea' nahapila anona nogwatop hikakalina endilisii lagol ananigili.
66014015	Ea' anona ensel nagape ipat lu'unai Godi nomoni nawisi ando' nofala aman anamba nagatoma otagai mehip na'i, “Ina' topa' gwa'aimi amamba magaofi ma nogwatop anamba ine'inai! Dei' main, gwa'aimi hiami itapami maof ea'. Isimba atis dei' nogota ana'e pegala' gwa'aisiatai.”
66014016	Ea' aman anamba nagape otagai nahapila nogwatop ananipi na'i nowali'ap itap, natopa' gwa'aisi sagaofi itap apa'e.
66014017	Ea' anona ensel wapani nawisi ando' ma ipat anamba lu'unai Godi nagape heveni. Anen wapani nahapila nagwatop hikakalina a'owa'i.
66014018	Ea' anona ensel wapani nakwaha belita atamba sondolalima Goda nafi'i. Ensel anamba banagonai ma nugumafi nifi. Nofala ensel anamba nagahapila nogwatopi nofalana mehip na'amba na'i, “Ina' fa'ai nogwatop apamba ine'ipi hikalip a'owa'i, topa' sa'utip gwa'aipi pagaofi pagail mandelef waini itapi, ea' nekolasom mo'oh! Dei' main, gwa'aimi amamba hiami maof ea'!”
66014019	Ea' ensel anamba nahapila nogwatop ananipi nowali'ap itap, natopa' gwa'aimi sa'utip akumi magail mandelef waini ea' natamam motawa. Ea' nasa'ma gwa'aimi amamba nakwahom mowala otam tang lu'unai nomona sogofa'asa wain embel. Amamba mondola'waifa okom wandafunai Godi ma isimba sogosambala basefi.
66014020	Ea' safa'asa waina otam tang anamba lu'unai nagape ando'ma taun inimba wambel lu'wambili. Ea' esimbel maluwi tang ando' kolo'w atin magafe' laogon mandahama 300 kilomita si'i embel walemb mafi'i matef mataga ilif motambel ain nagape malogof amom hosi.
66015001	Ea' ati anin mae banagani natagai heven ea' nomonas hiahawesa anamba. Ati ensel 7-pelaim mape ea' amom mahapila hiahaom awami endilisii mandandama epesi. I'i anaf hiahaom amamba awami hi'igalam ea', ina atiasi ata' anom motaga wapani, a'owa'. Dei' main, hiahaom amamba awami 7-pelaim, amamba okom wandafunai Godi ea' hi'ilana endilisi.
66015002	Ea' ati anom maefah si'i naoh embel lu'wami mandati si'i glas isimba sanda'as sagaloma nifi. Esis isimba salutu banages sali'amona wandafa waf awafi satalogofa mafin anamba lu'unai nagail alupi naloma ambal ananinai maloma ametal ananini 666, esis salutu naoh agwamba da'malifigwa si'i glas. God naso'as anom musik si'i gita sahapilam.
66015003	Esis sanda' awaf Moses nanda'mana maol Godii faloma awaf sipsip noganaii. Awaf afamba na'amba. “Dembinai, ina' God banagami hiaminai. Maol hiani ina' nanda'ani, anin banagani ea' afa' watilin nomonas salasafe'man hiahias! Ina' dembinai king epes misi'ah hiasii ea' waf ine'ifi usi'if endilisifi hi'andalaf!
66015004	Dembinai, ina' atina nandape bo'wena hilili'. Ea' dei' epen ami atiasi owa' ombel mohana ine'a? Owa'atin. Hiasi hi'alas ombel mahasa ina' sanda' lotu ma ina' atina. Ami atiasi owa' nesa'ma agol ine'igilia? Owa'atin. Epes misi'ah hiahi ma ganimba itap hiagoma atiasi sifi'i sonda' lotu ma ina' atina. Dei' main, waf usi'ifi ine'ifi ea' fataga alihigima fandawalap.”
66015005	Magi'ma amamba magatagai atologon wapani, ati ipat bu'unai hilili'i Godi notawa gani heven. Ipat anamba nagal alihina ati nomon ipat anamba nape sanda' sel sagala'anai God nagapaunai.
66015006	Ea' ensel amamba 7-pelaim magahapila hiahaom awami endilisi mandandam mogalalamona epesi, makwaha ipat anamba mawisi ando'. Ea' mowaho' luwaguf afitifi be'ef a'owa'i fegegala' endilisii. Mowaho' legw si'i goli managam mefetagw amamugwi.
66015007	Ea' anona ma amamba biamibiami magape namumi naso'ama dis lu'wami 7-pelaim sanda' gol sanda'ami sandandama amom ensel atona atin. God nagape namona lifilafii atapinai okom wandafunai ananinai nape si'inama dis amamba 7-pelaim.
66015008	Ea' nogoh amamba mataga mogola'i ma banagami Godi, amamba si'ima ipat anamba Godi. Ea' ina anin epen la'ifina nefe' negawis ipat anamba nomon, owa'atin. Esis sope sohafa ensel 7-pelaim monda' maol hi'ilana hiahaom amamba awami mahapilam mandandami ata' mili'.
66016001	Ea' ame' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai mehip ipat lu'unai Godi nomon. Anona na'i nofala ensel amamba 7-pelaim na'i, “Ipa' pefe' pekolo'wa dis isimba 7-pelais okom wandafunai Godi nagapaisi ma kolo'olam mefe' itap.”
66016002	Ea' ensel nagali'i anamba nafe' nakolo'wa dis amamba ananimi mafe' itap ea' ilambeh mamimami awasimi endilisi mataga itapa epes isimba ametal anamba mafin alipunai magailasi ma epes isimba sanda' lotuma ambal ananinaii.
66016003	Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma bifi wapani nafe' nakolo'wa dis ananimi embel naoh lu'wami. Ea' naoh amamba mandambema mataga si'i esimbela epes hiasi sagaga'i. Ea' hiahaom magape nomon naohi ea' maga' hi'alam.
66016004	Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanifi nakolo'wa dis ananimi embel walemb lu'wambi baloma anamba embel begetah mahagahiwai. Embel amamba hiami mandambema mataga esimbel.
66016005	Ea' ame' ensel anamba nugumafi embel naohi walembeh hiamii na'i, “Ina' bu'winai hilili' endilisii ea' nanda' kot ine'itai andeande' naila ikwaf usi'ifi atef nawaloga esis sanda' waf awafii.
66016006	Dei' main, esis amam nematawa hiasi saha amam nematawa bu'wasi hilili'i ine'isi afis saloma profet ine'imi wapani ea' esimbel asasimbeli balo. Ea' dei' naso'asa esimbel epes isimba sanda' waf awafii ma soga'ambel. Ina' nagwamasam dindi'i dondo' mandahama waf awafi asasifi.”
66016007	Ea' ame' anagol malogol gataga belita atamba sondolalima God atai goga ga'i, “Aho' endilisi Dembinai, ina' God banagami hiami magapainai. Ina' nogawaloga epesa koti ea' kot ine'itai endilisi usi'ita hi'alata.”
66016008	Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma biamibiami nakolo'wa dis ananimi ma awin alipini ea' God nape natiti owaf nagaofa epes nif.
66016009	Nif amamba lu'wami owafimi nifim a'owa'i ma' epes isimba. Ea' sa'i basef findiwaifi awafi ma God nugumafi hiahaom amamba awamii. Apa' esis ina sambema nelelemba sakwaha waf awafi sogasa'ma agol ananigili, owa'atin.
66016010	Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanom biami nakolo'wa dis ananimi sia kingi lu'wani inimba mafin alipunaii. Ea' akot lu'unai nataga anamba mafin alupunai nagala'ambemagoma. Ea' esis sagail waf ananifii sofa' akafimi awami. Ea' sondofapa afegah asasigahi sondola'waifa sogame' akafimi lu'wami.
66016011	Esis ukup papoma akafimi maloma ilambeh asasimi, dei' sa'i basef awafi findiwaifi ma God nagape heveni. Apa' ina sambema nelelemb sowa' alafugaha waf afamba awafi esis sanda'afi, owa'atin.
66016012	Ea' ensel anamba nagafe'ma wanom wanomi nakolo'wa dis ananini walemb lu'unai Yufretis. Ea' walemb embel bakisi hi'alamba mogandondomba ufia'w amom king dembamii mugafi'i anamba awin nagatafimai.
66016013	Ea' ati ambagof awami wanom mandati si'i kwahowa lu'wami matagai malogol kwambon anamba lu'unai naloma malogol mafin anamba alipunai a maloma malogol profet anamba nagambaso'ami.
66016014	Ambagof amamba awami endilisi manda' ametal banagami mamimami ma esis sotolom sogogawam. Amom mafe'ma amom king dembami mugumafi epes hiasi sagape walemb hiagomai. Amom ma'i mokolasai amom atogona monda' wandaf nemaf afamba lu'wafi ma God banagami hiami magapaunai.
66016015	“Peme'! Atiasi ae' etagamepa si'i sanda' wali safi'i sagataga. Etagamepa anef nemaf afamba ipa' owa' pegawa piga'i igafi'ia. I'i epes ukup kilikala' sope sowaho' luwaguf asasifi andeande'ma owa' so'oha, atiasi esis ina sofe' alop atop wahifip solomas siti alop asasipi ambagof awagof, owa'. Isimbai sonohas.”
66016016	Ea' ambagof awami makolasai king dembami anagon itap du'wanip diga Hibrui sa'i Armagedon.
66016017	Ensel anamba nagafe'ma 7i nakolo'wa dis ananimi ea' fufin nofa'am. Ea' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai sia king lu'unai nomon ipat lu'unai Godi ga'i mehip ga'i, “Amamba dei' ea' hi'alam!”
66016018	Ea' otaga holala nafe', amalemb mala' ea' otaga diwala imauna lu'unai nataga. Imauna anamba anen lu'unai endilisi ma nimaguf hiafi danda epes sagape itapi ina same' anona imauna nataga lu'una fowa' si'i anamba, owa'atin.
66016019	Taun inimba wambel lu'wambili nandawal wanifigin ea' walemb hiagoma a' awagon hi'alagon. Ea' God okom mandanda'ma epes awasi sagape taun inimba lu'wagoma Babiloni, dei' okom ananimi wandafumi manda' esis sa' embela kap wain nagalapi mahas kwapete'as.
66016020	Ea' ailan inimba hiani nafa' nafe' higilalan hi'alan ea' ina ata' anota halafuta atotota tape, a' owa'atin.
66016021	Ea' asaf wambawa lu'wamunai si'i otamba afitimi nalai nahas. Asaf wambawa lu'wamunai nimanim a'owa'i si'i beg kopi lu'wani atona atin. Ea' sa'ipana awagon Goda asaf wambawa nimaniminai si'i mowai magahambombaga esisi.
