66017001	Anona ensel atotona la'afena amom ensel 7-pelaim magahapila dis isimba 7-pelaisi nafi'i na'ipi na'amba na'i, “Ina' fi'i! Nemata'w akwamba kwanda' so'a wauli kwatoma embel lu'wami ilif atiasi kofa' akafimi awami akwa'umi. Ae' a'i ihimba'mina amamba.
66017002	Amom dembami king itapami manda' waf hiafi awafi so'a waulafi maloma nemata'w akwamba. Ea' epes itapasi hiasi wapani sanda' waf so'a waulafi saloma'w. Ea' sataga sahaga sagaol si'i epes sa' embel wain banagimbeli ukup pagaolas.”
66017003	Ambal bu'unai Godi nataga banagona ma ae' ea' andame' si'i koh dondo'ah. Ensel anamba nofa'e afe' itap wafigima fataupigima. Anamba ati ano'w nemata'w kwatoma anona mafin ilif nagail alupi akwahinai. Mafin anamba agof hiagufi fail alop ananipi hi'alap. Agof agwafomba basef awafi findiwaifi hiafi fafifafi ma God. Ea' mafin anamba balagah 7-pelaigah handanda'ana wambawa ilifunamaim matagana.
66017004	Nemata'w akwamba kwala klos akwahisi bias ina sandati na'amba atin, ea' sosaf naninani gol naloma sosaf esis sanda' otamba sanda'anai naloma bahigis sagalotamam a'owa'i. Ako'w kwahapila kap gol lagol akwa'ugili. Ea' waf hiafi awafi fagape kap apamba nomoni afamba. Waf naninani aunai folo'wagalana endilisii ma naep Godi, waf naninani alugunai ma waf anamba so'a waolana ma nemata'w akwambai saloma hiahaom amamba hiami mape si'ima kap apamba.
66017005	Ea' amef akwa'ufi ma agol akwa'ugili gail amaga akwa'ugai. Agol agalemba basef fandambahi'i faga'i na'amba fa'i, “Taun lu'wagoma Babilon, anamba nondofala ma'ma nematawa hiawai wanda' so'a wauli ma waf hiafi awafi endilisi ma itap apa'e.”
66017006	Nemata'w akwamba kwaha esis amam nematawa Godi sahapifa Jisasi sagawalapa agol ananigilii sagaga'i. Ea' ati ako'w kwa' esimbel asasimbeli kwataga kwahaga kwagaol. Ati ako'w ea' bolale kwapete'e endilisi nomonas salasafe' hiahias.
66017007	Ea' ensel anamba na'ipi na'i, “Dei' maina ina' gogolagalasina kwapete'? Na'amba owa'i. Atiasi ihimba'mina basef kofagefa fape fandambaho'ma nemata'w akwambai faloma mafin anamba nogofa'akwi. Mafin anamba balagah 7-pelaigah hagapaunai a wambawa ilifunamim magataganai.
66017008	Mafin anamba nagail alupi, ina' natolona ea'. Fowa' anen nape, apa' dei' ina ata' nape, owa'. Ama anaf owagama dao', nokwaha nowaga anamba owa' nowala nogotambilia nondagiai ilif ea' nefe' higililana hi'ilana. Anis epes itapasi Godi ina nanda' agof asasigufi fape buk ambal namili'wi ma nemaf afamba fowa' dambadamba anen nanda' itap, owa'. Amam nematawa isimba atiasi siti mafin anamba nagail alupi agogolalasis kwapete'. Dei' main, fowa' anen nape, apa' dei' owa', ma owagama, dao' anen a' notaga wapani.
66017009	“Epen ami okom bu'wami magapaini, anin nendegawa hiahawes isimba andeande'. Balagah agahemba 7-pelaigah basef waminif atina halafutagw 7-pelaigw nemata'w akwamba kwagatomagwi.
66017010	Apa' balagah agahemba 7-pelaigah waminif atina anom king dembami 7-pelaim wapani. Wanom biam ea' maga', anona dei' nape dembinai numafi hiahawes. Apa' anona ina dei' a' nataga dembinai king, ata' owa'. Bola dao' a' notaga, anen atona ata' nope dembinai nogota bandata.
66017011	Apa' mafin anamba nagail alupi fowa' nagapani, dei' owa' nogapania, anamba si'i king dembinai anamba nagafe'ma 8i. Apa' anen amom wambota atota naloma king amamba 7-pelaim ama atiasi higiligalana.
66017012	“Ea' wambawa amamba ilifunamaim ina' nagatolom ea'i, amamba basef waminif atina anom king dembami ilifunamaim. Ina dei' mataga king dembami, ata' owa'. Apa' amom atiasi mofa' banagami moloma mafin anamba nagail alupi, motaga king mope dembami nogota bandata si'i awa atitin.
66017013	Amom king amamba ma'i basef mandame'maefa ukup atifip pandanda' ma atiasi mogaso' banagami amamba amamumi hi'igalama mafin anamba nagail alupi ma mogame' basef ananifi.
66017014	Atiasi mopa' moloma sipsip noganai. Apa' sipsip noganai a' nikila'am. Epes sagaila fala ananinii naloma basef ananifi datimai, isimba a' nandandepas ananisi atis, epes isimba atiasi la'ifisa solomana sigikila' wandaf afambai.”
66017015	Ea' ensel anamba na'ipi na'i, “Ina' natolom ea' embel amamba lu'wami nemata'w kwanda' so'a wauli kwagatomami. Embel amamba basef waminif atina esis amam nematawa hiasi misi'ah hiahi afe'usi afe'usi sandakolas sape ea' esis amam nematawa hiasi alop naninani a diga hiana haona hi'alas.
66017016	Ea' wambawa amamba ilifunamaim ina' nagatulumi, amamba moloma mafin anamba ukup amamipi numbutipa nemata'w akwamba kwanda' so'a wauli. Atiasi mofa' hiahawes uga mais akwa'usi ma ako'w ato'w kogape dowaf, alipisi aka'w. Ea' mowalima'w klos akwa'umi moha'w koga' mea' ambegw akwa'ugwi mofa' alop akwa'upi nif fendop hi'ilap.
66017017	Dei' main, God atona nasa'ma nomonasa ukup amamipi ma atiasi monda' hiahawes isimba sogataga. Fowa' anen na'ias ea' na'i, Atiasi amom nomonas atifis ea' banagami amamba magape dembami kingi moso'anam hi'ilam mofe'ma mafin anamba nagail alupi. Ea' monda'am na'amba atin mefe' motagama nemaf afamba God nanda'am mandahama hiahawes isimba anen nali' naga'iasi.
66017018	Nemata'w akwamba ina' nagatolo'wi, akwamba basef waminif atina taun inimba wambel lu'wambili bape si'i dembinai nape nagali'ma amom dembami king ma itap anamba hiagomai.”
66018001	Magi' magatagai amamba, ati anona ensel nakwaha heven nisila'i. Anen banagami magapaunai endilisi, sosaf ananinai nogala' nanda' itap hiagoma nogala' a'owa'.
66018002	Anen noga na'i mehip endilisi na'i, “Nemata'w akwamba ao'w hi'ala'w. Ako'w basef waminif atina wambel lu'wambili Babilon agol lu'wagilimbili ea' awagon hi'alagon! Dei' nataga wambel awambili ma ambagof awami maloma amiguf awami mapaogon.
66018003	Dei' main, fowa' esis wambel ambalambaisi sa'ipa amam nematawa misi'ah hiasi hi'alas sasasapa'as saga' wain asasini numbutini. Wain inimba basef waminif atina waf hiafi awafi so'a waulafi esis sanda'afi. Ea' amom dembami king itapami hiami wapani manda' waf afamba so'a waulafi maloma esis wambel ambalemba. Ea' epes itapasi sanda' maol bisnis sofa' otamba hiambai ma waf naninani aunai esis wambel ambalemba sanda'afi.
66018004	Ea' ame' anagol malogol ga'i gatagai heven ga'i, “Ipa' amam nematawa ae'ipai, kwaha wambel ambalemba piwisi ando'. Na'amba ipa' atiasi pendao'oma peloma wambel ambalemba pefa' akafimi awami ma waf awafi esis sanda'afi.
66018005	Waf afamba awafi lu'wif a'owa' endilisi si'i mahanip, fel notawa ilif nagalota gani heven. Ea' God okom mapoma waf afamba.
66018006	Ipa' pegawa ea' waf afambai nemata'w akwamba kwanda' so'a wauli kwanda'afi. Ipa' pegwa waf akwa'ufi dondo'af endilisi piwapanima'w wamafi wapani. Ako'w kwakolefa waf awafi kwanda'af fataga hiaf a'owa'. Ea' pekolefa akafimi awami hiami mikila' akwa'umi ma pegwam mofe' ma ako'w. Ako'w kwambema embel banagimbeli bala kap pa'am. Ea' na'amba atin ipa' awi pekolefa embel banagimbeli pese'akwam ako'w kwea'ama kogame' akafimi awami mogwam mofe'ma ako'w mondogwama.
66018007	Nemata'w akwamba kwafela agol akwa'ugili atogol kwanda' waf hiafi fafifafi ma kogape andeande'. Ea' ipa' pendaso'akwa akafimi hiami ako'w, mondahama aligah hagasi'i. Ea' penda' ako'w ma konda' lef atin. Ako'w okom maga'i na'amba kwa'i, ‘Ae' ataga ape kwin dembiwai. Ae' ina si'i alifiwai, owa'. Nimanimi ina atiasi motagame ma egalef, owa'atin endilisi.’
66018008	Ea' hiahaom mamimami awami endilisi atiasi motagama wambel ambalemba anef nemaf atetef. Aowas hiani notaga ea' epes hiasi atiasi selef kwapete' nolom lu'unai notaga. Ea' nif fetaga fendo wambel ambalemba Babilon hi'ilagon. Dei' main, dembinai God nawaloga wambel ambalemba nagwamasa akafimi awami esis. Anen banagami lu'wamunai banagona a'owa'.”
66018009	Amom dembami king itapami manda' waf so'a waulafi awafi maloma ako'w ea' manda' waf hiafi awasif maloma'w. Atiasi amom king amamba miti ako'w fegando'wa nogoh lu'wami motaga'w ea' melef kwapete'.
66018010	Atiasi amom ombel moham kwapete' endilisi ma akafimi amamba ako'w kogofa'ami. Mulutu laogona ako'w mi'ias mi'i, “Owahipipa owahipipa a'owa' ma wambel Babilon! Ipa' taun wambel banagonai! I'i owa' main kwafalis atis ipa' pefa' akafimi amamba ma waf awafi ipa' panda'afi!”
66018011	Ea' epes sape sanda' maol bisnis itapi atiasi ukup pendanda' ma wambel ambalemba ea' solopagon sope nelelemb nimanilimbagon. Dei' main, ina atiasi anin epen netala uga ananigai wapani, a' owa'atin.
66018012	Uga maina anamba, gol fasimi a otamba silva a anom otamba fasifasimi, bahigis suwasuwaimi sagalotamam a'owa'i, luwaguf fasifasifi, akwahifi fafifafi a anif luwaguf silka nigahapilifa kogwafifi ea' lawah amamba hiahaom alogw fasigwi gwagami ea' hiahaom hiami esis sonda' nalelef elefanilif sonda'ami, hiahaom amamba hiami sonda' lawah sagatalogah otamba lu'umbaii sonda'ami a hiahawes sonda' bras mogogala'i fasimi sonda'ami a hiahawes sonda' ain amamba fasimi sonda'ami a anis hiahawes sonda' otamba fasifasimi sonda'asi.
66018013	Ea' uga na'amba. Lawah nembawa saga'agahi agiligaha sinamon a paura nogoh alogw fasigwini a gris sa'i mer a sanda inimba bu'wani frankinsens a wain naloma wel gwa'aili a plaua waloma wit ea' bulmakau, sipsip, hos maloma karis si'i wilkar maloma epes wapani. Epes isimba agof akasi sanda' maol dowaf sagape lafela anis epesi. Epes isimba anom dembami ma'i esis ina epes bu'wasi. Ea' maso'asas lauguni sotalis si'i sagatal uga mais. Hiahaom amamba hiami esis ina atiasi sotalom wapani, a' owa'.
66018014	Epes sonda' maol bisnis atiasi si'ipas na'amba si'i, ‘Gwa'aisi isimba nelelemb ipe'ilimbi behafemasa pegefa'asi, isimba hiasi sakwaha ipa' safe' ea'. Hiahaom hiami bu'wabu'wami atom suwasuwaimi otamba maim lu'umbai atemba basambagafe'mami maloma sosaf bilas maim ipe'imi hiahaom hiami amamba makwahipa mafe'. Ama ipa' ina atiasi piti amamba mope wapani, a' owa'atin.’
66018015	Ea' epes isimba sonda' maola bisnisa hiahawes isimbai ma sogofa' otamba hiambai wambel ambalemba atiasi ombel mohas endilisi ma akafimi awami wambel ambalemba begefa'ami. Atiasi esis sulutuwi laogona anamba nelelemb nimanilimb selef sope.
66018016	Ea' asi'i, ‘Nandasapal, nandasapal a'owa' ma wambel ambalemba lu'wagoma! Fowa' anamba nagala klos sosaf suwasuwaimi afitimi a luwaguf akwahimi mamimami nogofalo'ma alop ananipi ma goli otamba suwasuwaimbai baloma bahigis fasisi sagalotamas a'owa'i.
66018017	Ama atiasi kwafalis atis hiahaom amamba hiami otamba moni moloma bilas sosaf maim amamba ea' aom hi'ilam.’ Ea' kepten hiami mugumafi sipi, epes hiasi sogatala sip sogafe' analemb walembi, a epes isimba hiasi sonda' boskru ma sipi, a epes hiasi sonda' bisnisa maol naoh embeli, epes isimba hiasi sulutuwi laogona wambel ambalemba.
66018018	Ea' sulutu siti ako'w wambel ambalemba fendembel nogoh mogalembel ea' si'ias na'amba si'i, ‘Wambel lu'wambili anima nape nandati na'amba atin si'i wambel ambalemba? Owa'atin.’
66018019	Ea' esis sola itap sopof balagah asasigahi selef mehip nelelemb nimanilimba wambel ambalemba awagon. Ea' si'i, ‘Pandasapal, pandasapal a'owa' ma anamba wambel lu'wagoma! Ama hiami mugumafi sip apambai maloma amom mugumafi sipi ma pagafe' naoh embeli amom matagama otamba hiambai endilisi ma wambel ambalemba. Pandasapal a'owa'. Ama atiasi kwafalis atis anamba a' awagon hi'ilagon!’
66018020	Ipa' pagape heveni peloma esis amam nematawa Godi, ea' ipa' aposel peloma amom profet, ipa' hipai sonondahepa ma hiahaom amamba dei' magatagama wambel lu'wagoma anambai. Dei' main, God nawaloga anamba ea' nagwa akafimi awami ma anamba. Anen nagwa waf afamba awafi ma wambel ambalemba nali' nanda'mepaf ipe'i.
66018021	Basef ifimba hi'alef, ati anona ensel banagonai nofa'ai anom otam atotom si'i owap lu'unai nogokakisa olemb witimbi. Anen nafela owap anamba nakwahona nafe' nowala embel naoh. Ea' na'i, “Ea' na'amba atin atiasi esis sefela wambel ambalemba lu'wambili Babilon sokwahogon mehip nefe' nowa si'i owap anamba nogowala naoh ama epes ina atiasi sotologon wapani, a' owa'atin.
66018022	Ea' gita anamba apa' nagalifi a musik anamba hianai naninani, moloma batagwi biugel, maguf amambai filifalu'wi ina atiasi ata' peme'am wapani wambel ambalemba, a'owa'. Ea' epes isimba gawaisi sanda' maol hiahaomi, ipa' ina atiasi piti epes isimbai sope wambel ambalemba wapani, a'owa'. Maf owap anamba lu'unai nogokakisa olemb witimbi, atiasi ina ata' some' anona wapani wambel ambalemba, a' owa'atin.
66018023	Ileli'w lami ina atiasi ata' mogala' mope wambel ambalemba wapani, a'owa'. Ea' malogol aman anamba na'i nogaso' nemata'wi ea' malogol nemata'wi kwa'i kogaso' amani, ipa' ina atiasi ata' peme' esis wambel ambalemba wapani, a' owa'. Fowa' epes wambel ambalembaisi bisnis sapomas sape dambesi itapasi. Ea' esis wambel ambalemba sambaso'ma epes misi'ah hiasi ma ufial baso'amunai naninani si'i sagandomboma nematawanai.
66018024	God nati wambel lu'wambili ambalemba bagaha profet hiami maga' maloma amam nematawa hiasi Godi. Isimba atis dei' kofagema mapoma wambel ambalemba. Ea' epes hiasi sagape itap ana'i esis bousi sahas sagaga'i, kofagema amamba wapani ea' mapoma anamba atogon.”
66019001	Sagi' sagatagama sasimbai ame' anom maefah mandame' si'i maguf lu'wami esis amam nematawa hiasi sagape heveni. Esis sa'i na'amba sa'i, “Apa' mefela agol Godi lu'wagol! God ape'inai atona nofa' apa' mogotanimaii. Anen agol lu'wagilinai, banagami lu'wamunai, mogogala'i magapaunai.
66019002	Basef lu'wafi ma kot, anen nawaloga epesa waf endilisifi usi'ifi andeande' hi'alas. Nemata'w akwamba dembe'wi kwanda' so'a wauli kwasapala esis amam nematawa hiasi itapasi ma sanda' waf awafi so'a waulafi saloma'w. Ea' God nanda'ma'w basef. Ako'w kwaha isimba sanda'mana maol Godii saga'. Ea' dei' God nagwama'wa kofagema amamba akwa'umi mafe'ma ako'w.”
66019003	Ea' esis sakolo'wa maguf wapani na'amba sa'i, “Apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagola wambel ambalemba lu'wambili fagandembel nogoh magalo. Amamba a' malo malota ilif lifilafi atapim!”
66019004	Ea' amom agufumi dembami 24-pelaim maloma amamba biamibiam magape namumii mindiwa nembawa motawa manda' lotuma God nagatoma sia lu'wanii. Amom ma'ias ma'i, “Endilisi atis, apa' mondasa'ma agol Godi lu'wagol!”
66019005	Ama sia lu'wani Godi ea' anagol malogol ga'i gafi'i ga'i, “Ipa' panda'mana maol Godii, ombel mahepama anen pagaila basef ananifii, ipa' epes agof akipai paloma epes isimba agufisi, ipa' hipai pekolata pefela agol Godi!”
66019006	Ea' ame' anis maefah si'i basef hiafi fatagama misi'ah amam nematawa hiasi sandatama sagapani. Ea' sape sa'i mimil si'i embel magala' lil atin. Ea' si'i amalemb lu'wami magala'ma otaga diluluwagala, maguf ifimba fa'ias mehip na'amba fa'i, “Apa' mefela agol Godi! Dembinai anen God ape'inai. Anen banagami hiamunai! Dei' anen nataga Dembinai king endilisi ma nugumafi hiahawes hiasi hi'igalas.
66019007	Dei' apa' sonondahapa mefela agol ananigili. Dei' main, anen Dembinai banagonai. Nemaf fataga ea' ma sipsip noganai na'i nogaso' nemata'w. Ea' nemata'w anani'wi kwandandombol kwape.
66019008	God naso'akw klos afitimi suwasuwaimi mogogala'i bu'wami endilisi. Ako'w kwala amamba ma alop akwa'upi.” Klos amamba afitimi bu'wami si'i waf usi'ifi esis amam nematawa Godi sanda'afi.
66019009	Ea' ensel anamba na'ipi na'i, “Ina' da'a basef ifimba. Epes isimba God nofalas sogafi'mai gwa'aisi lu'wasi ma sipsip noganai nogaso' nemata'w akwambai, isimba esis sonohas.” Anen na'ipi wapani na'i, “Basef ifimba basef Godi endilisifi.”
66019010	Ea' ae' indiwa nembawa etawa felefele'ma bo'wagah enseli ma enda' lotumana, owa' na'ipi na'i, “Ina' nenda'as na'amba owa'i. Ae' alipuwai ine'iwai aloma ina' naloma sahopena ine'imi, afa' wandao'oma wanda' maol Godi atini waloma esis hiasi hi'alas sagahapifa basef endilisifi Jisas nagawalipasafi. Ina' nendanda' lotuma God atona. Apa' mogawa basef ifimba endilisifi Jisas nagawalapefa ipe'i, ifimba fasa'mai amom profeta mogawalipasa basef Godi.”
66019011	Ea' ati otaga heven nandawisi' nagal, ati anona hos afitinai nape. Epen nagatumonai agol ananigili sa'i, “Epen nugumafi maol ananini andeande' datimai, nanda' waf endilisifi atifi.” Anen nagaila waf usi'ifi atefa nogawaloga esis amam nematawa ma kot nanda' wandafa waf usi'ifi afamba atef.
66019012	Naep ananipi si'i nif fagandifi ea' hagw bu'wagwi hiagwi si'i dembami king mogowalo'agwi gwape balaga ananigai. Anif amef fail alop ananipi, ifimba agol ananigili. Anen atotona nogawa agol agalemba, anis daias owa'.
66019013	Esimbel masa'opa klos ananimi laumi nalam. Ea' esis sofala agol ananigili sa'i, “Basef Godi.”
66019014	Anen nape nagali'ma epes hiasii ea' amom soldia magape heveni matoma hos amamba afitimi amamumi mailana mafe'. Alop amamipi esis sowaho'mama klos afitimi fasimi endilisi a'owa'i.
66019015	Ea' anona bainat hikalina a'owa'i nape malogol nawisi ando'. Ea' atiasi noha esis mini'ap amam nematawa hiasi ma bainat anamba. Anaf anen numafi epes hiasi sagape itap hiagomai. Numafias banagambel si'i nagahapila anota kalamuta ain. Atiasi nofa'asa sa'utip waina otam tang anamba waini, amamba mondola'waifa okom wandafunai Godi, anen banagonai ma hiahaom hiamii.
66019016	Anef amefa agol ananigili failana klosi bimbita ananisi. Agol agalemba na'amba. Dembinai kinga amom king hiamii, Dembinai ma dembami hiamii.
66019017	Ea' ati anona ensel atotona nalutu felefele'ma awin alipini nape nagatalogoma. Anen na'i mehip na'ipa amiguf hiagufi fufia' fagafe' ilif otagai na'i, “Ipa' pindakolasi pifi'mai gwa'aisi isimba lu'wasi Godi!
66019018	Ama atiasi pega' ambegwa amom king dembami goloma ambegwa amom kepten mugumafi amom soldiai ea' moloma ambegw amom amamba banagamii a ambegw hosi goloma ambegwa epes isimba hiasi sagatumami wapani. Ipa' atiasi pea' ambegwa epes hiasi, anis agof akasi sanda' maol sagape lafela anis daiasi, a anis agufisi sugumafi anisa maoli, isimba soloma anis hiahawes akasi.”
66019019	Ea' ati mafin anamba lu'unai nagail alupi naloma dembami king amamba itapami maloma soldia amamumi mandatama mape. Amom ma'i mopa' mogaloma aman anamba nagatoma hosi noloma soldia ananimi.
66019020	Anen nanda' mafin anamba nagail alupi naloma profet anamba nagawalapa basef baso'afi nanda'am manda' kalabus. Profet anamba nanda' hiahaom banagami si'i God nanda'ami ma naep mafin anamba nagail alupi. Waf afambai atef nambaso'ma epes sogofa' ametala mafin anamba nagail alupi ea' sanda' lotuma ambal atona ananinai sagandombanai. Mafin anamba naloma profet anamba nagambaso'ami amom biam ata' mape ambagof namogof ea' sowasa'am mafe' nif wandafumi fagandom otam batafumi agol salfa nowaga lu'unai unumuwanima si'i dumbi.
66019021	Anom soldia magaila mafin anamba alupunai maloma profet anamba nagambaso'ami, amom ata' mape nomon. Ea' aman anamba nagatoma hosi naha amom a' maga'. Anen naham bainat anamba launai nagape malogol ananigilii. Ea' amiguf hiagufi fa' ambegwa amam amambai ea' nelelemb afafilimbi a' si'im endilisi.
66020001	Ea' ati anona ensel nakwaha heven nisila'i. Anen nahapila ki utaini ma nowaga anamba launai nagal nogowala awin ganii ma owa' nogotambilia. Ea' nahapila sen lu'unai wapani.
66020002	Anen nahapila kwambon anamba lu'unai sisihina, kwambon anamba fowa'inai endilisi. Anen “Aman nagambaso'ma epes hiasii.” Anen Satan. Ea' ensel anamba nowa'ana sen a' nope nonda' kalabus nondahama afagof 1,000-pelaiguf.
66020003	Ensel anamba nakwahona nafe' nowala nowaga anamba launai ea' nowalomana uta ilif sisihita. Ea' Satan ina atiasi la'ifina ma nogambaso'ma esis mini'ap amam nematawa hiasi wapani, owa'. Anen ata' nope nosasa afagof 1,000-pelaiguf ama ata' hi'ilagofa main, dao' ensel anamba notagwahona wapani nefe'agon ganigani ma nogota bandata.
66020004	Ama main owa', ati anom sia lu'wami kingi ma'oh ea' anis epes satoma sia amamba. God naso'asa banagami ma sogowaloga waf esis amam nematawai ma kot. Ea' ati ambagof epes isimba hiasi sagawalapa basef endilisifi Jisasi. Esis owa' sonda' lotuma mafin nagail alupi naloma ambal ananinai sagandombanaia, ea' owa' sogofa' anin ametal awani mafin anambai amagah lagof asasisia. Epes isimba sagahapila basef Jisasi tetele'ifi. Waf afamba atefa sanda' maol bu'wani, dei' esis bousi satopa' bambafugahas afis. Sosafel wapani sofa' ambal namili ea' sope dembesi king soloma Krais sope sondahama afagof 1,000-pelaiguf.
66020005	Nemaf afamba figali'i ma esis sagaga'i sili' sogosafel wandelef. Apa' epes isimba sagaga'i ina sofa' ambal namili nemaf afamba, ata' owa'. Esis ata' sope sosasa afagof agwafomba 1,000-pelaiguf fefe'ma hi'ilagof.
66020006	Epes isimba sotanima sogosafel nemaf afamba figali'i, esis sonohas sope hilili'. Ea' ga' inimba nigagi'i ina banagena negatalogofa epes isimba, owa'atin. Esis atiasi sope pris God noloma Kraisi sondolalimam. Ea' sope dembesi soloma Kraisa sugumafi anis epes afagof 1,000-pelaiguf.
66020007	Ama afagof agwafomba 1,000-pelaiguf hi'ilagof, dao'. Uta ea' tindawisi' kalabus ea' Satan nokwaha kalabus ananimi nuwisi ando'.
66020008	Anen nuwisi ando'ma atiasi nombaso'ma esis misi'ah amam nematawa hiasi sagape itap ana'e da'malifinama biafigin biafigin nafe' nogotambela, esis mini'ap Gok saloma Magoki. Atiasi Satan nokolasa esisa sonda' wandaf. Mini'ap asasipi amam nematawa isimba hiasi sandahama ko'onaga gaga'oh naoh akatai.
66020009	Ea' sefe' ganimba itap hiagoma lauguni sondowasa' sonogama anamba amam nematawa Godi sogapoma noloma wambel taun inimba God okom maga'ian a'owa'i. Owa' nif fisila'i heven fendo soldia amamba Satani hi'ilam.
66020010	I'i owa' main, God nokwahowa aman anamba Satan nagambaso'masi nefe' nowala nowaga unumuwanima si'i dumbi nif fandom wandafum otam salfa atapim magapani. Anom mali' makwahowa mafin nagail alupi naloma profet anamba nagambaso'ami mowala mape anamba. Amom biam moloma Satan mope anamba atapim mofa' akafimi owamb alip anamba nif wandafifi fandif atapif fagapoma.
66020011	Ea' ati sia lu'unai kingi afitinai na'oh, aman natoma sia inimba. Itap paloma otaga ilif safa'ma anen ea' sogapoma a'owa' anagona. Epes hiasi ina atiasi sotolom, owa'atin.
66020012	Ea' ati esis sagaga'i sape, epes isimba agufisi saloma isimba agof akasi salutu nogohnaep sia kingi. Ea' aman anamba nagatoma siai nupalia buk. Ea' nopalima ano'w buk wapani, ambal namili'wi. Ea' nawaloga esis hiasi sagaga'i hi'alas, nati amef fagape buk akwambai faga'i waf mamahefa esis sanda'afi, nawaloga esis sagaga'i sandahama waf hiafi esis sanda'afi.
66020013	Wambel sagaga'i sagapoma naloma naoh embel makwahowa epes isimba sagaga'i sotanimai ma nogota atamba. Ea' anen nagatoma sia kingi nawaloga esis hiasi atona atin sandahama waf hiafi esis sanda'afi.
66020014	Ea' nakwaha ga' naloma wambel sagaga'i sagapoma mafe' mowala nowaga anamba launai unuwana si'i dumbi nif wandafifi fagandif fagapaunai. Nowaga anamba si'i ga' nogafe'ma bifi nogatagama epes hiasii.
66020015	Ama i'i anen nagatoma sia kingi owa' nigati agol anin epeni gope buk akwamba ambal namili'wia, nigi epen nokwahin newala nowaga anamba nif ifimba fagandif fagapaunai.
66021001	Dei' ati itap paloma otaga dambaisi sape. Otaga apigai galoma itap apipi safe' higilalas hi'alas. Ea' naoh wapani ina ata' gotah, a' owa'atin.
66021002	Ea' ati taun wambel bu'wambili hilili'i, anamba Jerusalem dambaigima. Ati anamba nape naloma God, nakwaha heven nisila'i. Wambel anamba nanda' sosaf bu'unai atona nandandombol si'i nemata'w kwa'i kogaso' amani kwanda' sosaf bu'winai atona ma kogaso' aman akwa'unai.
66021003	Ea' ame' anagol malogol gatagai sia kingi ga'i mehip na'amba ga'i, “Peme'! Dei' ipat Godi totawa taloma epes. Ama anen atiasi nogape la'afena esisa sogape amam nematawa ananisi. Aho', God anen atona nape nalomas.
66021004	Anen atiasi nopati'masa embifa naep asasipi. Ama ina atiasi soga' wapani a nelelemb nimanilimb ea' esis ina atiasi selef some' akafimi wapani, a' owa'atin. Hiahaom amamba fowa'imi mowala higilalam hi'alam.
66021005	Ea' aman anamba nagape sia lu'wani kingi na'i, “Peme'! Dei' anda' hiahaom hiami mataga dambaim hi'alam!” Ea' na'ipi wapani na'i, “Ina' da'a basef ifimba. Dei' main, basef ifimba endilisifi atif a'owa' ma sogahapilif endilisi.”
66021006	Ea' na'ipi wapani na'i, “Hiahaom amamba hiami mataga hi'alam. Ae' atowe agape Dembiwai lifilafi dondoli ape agali'i a ape agagi' endilisii. Ae' kofagewe ma agahapila hiahaom hiami hi'agalami anda' maol hiani ae'ani hi'agalani. Epen mamahina ni'i iap pegaso'ani, atiasi i'i aho'ma anin nea' embela ifata embel ambal namilimbeli. Ea' ese'anambel dowaf si'i presen hiahaom fasimi.
66021007	Epen ni'i nilutu banagena negali'amona wandafa waf awafii, anin atiasi nefa' hiahaom amamba fasimi ea' ae' a' epe God ananiwai, anin nepe awani ae'ani.
66021008	Apa' epes isimba ombel mahasa sandahagas sogotanimai, isimba owa' sogahapifa Godia, epes sanda' waf naninani aona endilisii a epes isimba saha anis sagaga'i a epes isimba sanda' so'a wauli a isimba sanda' aupi a epes isimba sanda' lotuma god anamba baso'amunai, epes isimba hiasi sofa' wambel asasimbili ma nowaga anamba launai nif wandafifi fagandifi otam salfa fagapoma. Nowaga anamba launai si'i ga' nigi' nigatagai.”
66021009	Ea' anona ensel nafi'mai ae'. Anen ensel amom amamba 7-pelaim magahapila dis hiahaom magahambombaga epesi magalasi sandandami. Hiahaom amamba awami ma mugagi'i endilisi. Anen na'ipi na'i, “Ina' fi'i, ma igihimba'mina nemata'w sipsip noganai waulu'mana.”
66021010	Ea' Ambal bu'unai Godi nafela okom ae'ami, ensel anamba nofa'e afa' alota anof halaf laufi gani ilif. Ea' nihimba'me taun wambel ambalemba bu'wambili hilili'i Jerusalem, anamba nape naloma God ea' nakwaha heven nafi'i ata' nisila'i atin.
66021011	Glori nogogala'i si'i nagwapin Godi amom mogala'ma taun inimba. Ileliwa mogogala'i ananimi anom daiam endilisi si'i otam fasimi sagatalom otamba hiambaii. Aho' amom si'i otam jaspa a pelele' a'owa' si'i glas.
66021012	Taun inimba indalelemb lu'wami laumi a'owa' malota ilif. Indalelemb ambalemba utagw 12-pelaigw ea' ensel 12-pelaim malutu felefele' mandandama utagw agwamba hiagwi. Ea' agof agwafomba fandahama misi'ah ahamba 12-pelaih epes Israeli fail fandanda utagw agwamba.
66021013	Indalelemb wa'alemb titi gani wa'ol awin nagatafima utagw wanogw. Apa' wa'ol awin natopa' negenafama sanda' utagw wanogw ea' gani awin natopa' negemba'ma sanda' wanogw ea' wa'ol awin negewalama sanda' wanogw.
66021014	Indalelemb ambalemba taun inimba, otamba lu'umbai 12-pelaimba bape ma begesahopa indalelemb itapilimba. Ea' agof amom aposel 12-pelaim sipsip noganaii fail fandanda otamba ambamba.
66021015	Ea' ensel anamba nalome naga'ii nahapila bumbulita gol si'i ikwafa nogosaho' taun inimba ma indalelemb baloma utagw.
66021016	Taun anamba lu'wagoma. Indalelemb ambalemba dindiwaitagw biafigin biafigin ea' hilili' a'owa' endilisi. Wambel ambalemba tef wala, tagasa tol owin nalota nataga ilif dondo'ambel hilili' na'amba atin. Ensel nosaho'agon nondola'waifa taun inimba ma bumbulita ananinai ea' wambel ambalemba tef wala ikwaf fataga fandahama nohotagw hiagwi laugwi namba nataga 2,400 kilomita. Ea' tagasa ikwaf fataga na'amba atin 2,400 kilomita. Wambel ambalemba tol owin nalota nataga ilif, ikwaf afamba fataga na'amba atin 2,400 kilomita.
66021017	Anen nosaho' indalelemb nondola'waif wapani itap nalota nataga ilif. Ea' ikwaf indalelembi fikila' fataga 144 nohotagw bandagwi mita. Mita inimba, anin si'i esis epes sondola'waifa hiahawesani si'i rula. Ea' ensel nondola'waifa indalelemb ambalemba ma ikwaf afamba atef.
66021018	Indalelemb bigili'ama tauni amambai God atona nanda'am otamba ambamba jaspa. Ea' taun inimba God nanda' gol atom nanda'ana. Taun inimba nogala' nahihil a'owa' si'i glas.
66021019	Indalelemb aunilimba ma taun inimba, God nofalo'malemba otamba mamimami bu'wami sagataloma moni hianii. Otam ulilitimi fasimi magali'i mali' mogombalo' indalelemb aunilimbai agol jaspa. Otam magagi'i kolotu'uni agol sapaia. Ea' anom magagi'i ma wanembai afitimi agol aget. Ea' anom magafe'ma biambai biambai ulitimi agol emeral.
66021020	Ea' anom magafe'ma wanemba biambai agol sandonikis, amamba amom manda' apohi akwahim afitim. Ea' magafe'ma wanemba wanembai amom akwahimi agol konilian. Ea' magafe'ma 7-pelaimbai batafumi agol krisolait. Ea' magafe'ma 8-pelaimbai amamba ulitimi anom mandati na'ai agol beril. Ea' anom magafe'ma 9-pelaimbai batafumi mandati na'ai agol topas. Ea' anom magafe'ma ilifunamaimbai agol krisopres amamba manda' apoh batafum ulilitim. Ea' magafe'ma 11-pelaimbai anom kolotu'umi mandati na'ai agol haiasin. Ea' anom magafe'ma 12-pelaimbai amamba anom akwahimi daiam agol amatis.
66021021	Utagw agwamba 12-pelaigw si'i bahigis afitisi 12-pelais sagalotamas a'owa'i. Anota uta sanda'ata anin bahigin lu'wani atitin. Taun inimba ufia'w atoto'w. Ufia'w akwamba gol atom mogogala' pelele' endilisi si'i embel glasi sanda'akw.
66021022	Ae' ina ati ipat Godi lu'unai notawa taun inimba, owa'. Dei' main, Dembinai God Banagami Hiamunai naloma Sipsip Noganai, amom biam mape si'i ipat bu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai ma taun inimba.
66021023	Ea' taun inimba awin owambini alipini maol nenda'ani owa' anina ma wambel ambalemba howagalagon, owa'atin. Dei' main, mogogala'i lu'wami Godi atom mumafiagon manda'agon howalagon. Ea' Sipsip Noganai anen atona si'i nagwapin anamba.
66021024	Epes itapasi hiasi hi'ilas atiasi sofa' mogogala'i atoma taun inimba. Ea' amom dembami king mugumafi itapi atiasi mofa'ai sosaf otamba mais amamisi mifi'mai wambel ambalemba.
66021025	Alip esis ina sowalo utagwa indalelemb ambalemba, owa'. Gwagal atapigw gwape. Dei' main, owamb ina atiasi botaga taun inimba wambel lu'wambili, owa'atin.
66021026	Sosaf bu'wafi feloma otamba moni maina esis misi'ah epes hiasi anaf sofa'am suwisa wambel ambalemba.
66021027	Apa' hiahaom awami alugumi a'a epes ami sanda' waf naninani aunaii ea' epes ami sanda' basef baso'afii, esis isimba soloma hiahaom awami ina sefe' siwisa wambel ambalemba, owa'atin endilisi. Sipsip Noganai nanda' agof anis epesi ea' fail buk akwamba ambal namili'wi, epes isimba atis anaf sefe' sogawis wambel ambalembai.
66022001	Ea' ensel anamba a' nihimba'me anemb walemb lu'wambi. Walemb ambamba ambal namilimbi ea' begala pelele' a'owa' si'i glas. Bewafa batagai sia lu'unai king Godi naloma Sipsip Noganai matoma sia lu'wani kingi ea' kolo'atin bafe'.
66022002	Walemb ambamba bafe' la'afena ufia'w lu'wakwi ma taun wambel anamba lu'wagoma. Walemb fisanai fisana lawah biagah ambal namiligahi hotawa. Ahoh hail hogola sa'utip danda atapigahi handanda aomb atona atina afagof danda atona atin. Nohotagw 12-pelaigw gwandahama aomb 12-pelaimb. Soh apuligaha honda' esis epes misi'ah hiasi sogataga bu'wasi.
66022003	Wambel ambalemba hiahaom hiami God nandaiwa'mam endilisi ma na'i nigali'amonami, hiahaom amamba ina atiasi mope wapani, a'owa'. God noloma Sipsip Noganai, amom dao' anaf motoma sia lu'wami kingi mope mumafi epes isimba. Esis sonda' maol Godi atiasi sope sonda' lotumana sosa'ma agol ananigili.
66022004	Anaf siti nogohnaep ananisi ma nonda' agol ananigili gigail amagah asasigahi.
66022005	Anaf owamb ina botaga wapani, owa'. Ea' ina ata' anom mogogala'i moloma lam nagwahis a owaf awini, owa'. Amamba maol akam. Dei' main, Dembinai God nogala' nihihima esis, anaf sope si'i king dembami dondol lifilafi.
66022006	Ea' ensel anamba na'ipi na'amba na'i, “Basef ifimba hiafi fagape buk akwa'e endilisifi atif ea' andeande'ma epes hiasi sogahapifif. Dembinai God nagaso' amom profet Ambal bu'unai ananinai nasapa'i ensel ananimi ma migihimba'ma esis sanda' maola anini ma hiahawes sogataga kwafalisi.
66022007	Jisas na'i, “Peme'! Anaf ae' ifi'mai ipa' kwafalis atis. Basef Godi fagape buk akwa'e, basef ifimba ma hiahaom hiami ma'i anaf migi' mogatagai. Epen ami nila basef ifimba, anin sonohan.”
66022008	Ae' Jon ame' basef ifimba ati amom hiahaom amamba ame'am ea'. Ea' indiwa nembawa etawa felefele'ma ensel anamba nigihimba'me hiahaom amambai ma enda' lotuma anen.
66022009	Apa' owa', anen na'ipi na'i, “Ina' owa'i nenda'as na'ambaia, ae' ina dembiwai, owa'. Ae'i ina' wandao'oma wanda' maol atini waloma sahopena ine'imi profet fowa'imi maloma epes isimba hiasi sagaila basefa buk akwa'e. Ina' nenda' lotu ma God atona.”
66022010	Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Basef ifimba Godi fagape buk akwambai, ina nembahe'ef nesapamef fepe, owa'i. Dei' main, nogota God na'i nonda' hiahaom amambai, atamba ea' felefele'ma togataga hi'igalata.
66022011	Ea' i'i epen ami nenda' waf awafi, anin nenda'af atapif. Epen ami nenda' waf alugufi awafii, anin nenda'af atapif. Apa' epen ami nenda' waf usi'ifii, anin nenda'af atapif. A epen ami negape hilili'i, anin nendape hilili' na'amba atin atapin.”
66022012	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Peme'! Anaf ae' etaga kwafalis. Ea' ifa'ai hiahaom bu'wami a'a awami, ewaloga esis egagwamasam hi'igalas atona atin mondahama waf esis sanda'afi.
66022013	Ae' atowe agape Dembiwai lifilafi dondoli, ape agali'i a ape agagi' endilisii. Ae' kofagewe ma hiahaom hiamii ea' enda'am efe' efe' imbifam datima hi'ilam.
66022014	“Esis amam nematawa sagasa'opa luwaguf mais asasisi ma sagataga bu'wasi, esis sonohas. Esis isimba anaf ila ma sogofa' gwa'aisi ma lawag agamba ambal namiligai ea' la'ifisa sofe' sogawis uta atamba ma wambel ambalemba bu'wambili.
66022015	Epes sanda' waf awafii si'i bogof nombagwi soloma epes isimba sanda' aupi, epes isimba sanda' waf so'a waulafi soloma epes saha anis sagaga'i a epes isimba sanda' lotuma ambal baso'amunai ea' epes isimba hiasi ukup pagaila waf baso'afi ma sagailafi, epes isimba anaf sope ando'ma wambel ambalemba Godi.”
66022016	Ea' Jisas na'ias wapani na'i, “Ae' asapa' ensel ae'anai nafe'mago ipa' ma nogawalapa basef ifimba ma ipa' sios amam nematawa Kristen. Ae' atowe ae' dapana nandala nombaf lawag Deviti, bafamana ananiwai agataga wambota ananitai. Ea' ae' si'i ondo'w akwamba kogogala' a'owa'i kwagatafi kuhumbitai.
66022017	Ambal bu'unai Godi naloma nemata'w Sipsip Noganai nogaso'akwi esis sa'i, ‘Ipa' fi'i!’ Ea' epen ami negame' basef ifimbai, anin ni'i basef ifimba atif ninda'i ‘Ipa' fi'i.’ Ea' epen ami iap pegaso'ana embeli, anin nindafi'i. Epen ami na'i nega' embeli, anin nifi'i nendefa' embel ambal namili lagapaimbeli si'i presen hiahaom bu'wami God nogaso'asam dowafi, owa' sogatalomia.
66022018	Ipa' epes mamahipama pagame' basef Godi ma hiahawes isimba sagail buk akwa'e anaf sogotagai, ae' a'ipa ipa' hipai dindinip, ipa' solawaipa. I'i anin epen niwatani anif basef wapani feloma basef Godi, anaf hiahaom amamba awasim endilisii God naga'iami ma buk akwa'ii, amamba anaf God nokolefamanam anin.
66022019	Ama i'i anin epen nehape' anif basef du'wanif Godi faga'i hiahawes anaf sogotagai ma nili'amenefa buk akwa'e, anaf God nili'amona epen inimba ea' nelefatan. Ea' anin ina anaf la'ifina negefa' gwa'aisi ma lawag agamba ambal namiligai, owa'. Anaf ina la'ifina nefe' negape andeande' wambel ambalemba bo'wambel hilili'i, buk akwa'e kwaga'iagoma, owa'atin.”
66022020	Aman anamba Dembinai naga'i basefa hiahawes isimba hiasi sagail buk akwa'e dei' na'i, “Endilisi atis, atiasi ifi'i kwafalis atis!” Aho', Dembinai Jisas, ina' nifi'i!
66022021	Ae' a'i Dembinai Jisas nondatopalopa ipa' hipai dowaf nowa' banagaipa. Endilisi.
